40001001	Yeezuu yaabɔɔ wɔɔ ba n nɩ: Yeezuu ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, cir Davɩd Nyɩ m, Abraham do gʋaa m sɔ.
40001002	Abraham n Izakkɩ yɩ,
40001003	Ziida n Farɛɛs kan Zaaraa kɩ yɩ, ŋ da m Tamaar m, Farɛɛs n Ɛsrɔm yɩ, Ɛsrɔm n Aram yɩ,
40001004	Aram n Aminadaab yɩ, Aminadaab n Naasɔɔn yɩ, Naasɔɔn n Salmɔɔn yɩ,
40001005	Salmɔɔn n Boozɩ yɩ, a da m Rahab m, Boozɩ n Zobɛɛd yɩ, a da m Rutɩ m, Zobɛɛd n Yesee yɩ,
40001006	Yesee n cir Davɩd yɩ, Davɩd n Salomɔɔn yɩ, a da nyɩnta Iirii lʋ,
40001007	Salomɔɔn n Roboam yɩ, Roboam n Abɩya yɩ, Abɩya n Azaa yɩ,
40001008	Azaa n Zozafat yɩ, Zozafat n Zooram yɩ, Zooram n Ozɩyas yɩ,
40001009	Ozɩyas n Zowatan yɩ, Zowatan n Akaazɩ yɩ, Akaazɩ n Ezekɩyas yɩ,
40001010	Ezekɩyas n Manase yɩ, Manase n Amɔɔn yɩ, Amɔɔn n Zozɩyas yɩ,
40001011	Zozɩyas n Zekonɩyas kan a dannɔ kɩ yɩ. A n a ga kʋ ʋ kan Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa tarɛ dɔmɩm bɩ kɩ.
40001012	Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Zekonɩyas Salatɩyɛl yɩ, Salatɩyɛl n Zorobabɛl yɩ,
40001013	Zorobabɛl n Abiyud yɩ, Abiyud n Eliyakim yɩ, Eliyakim n Azɔɔr yɩ,
40001014	Azɔɔr n Sadɔk yɩ, Sadɔk n Akim yɩ, Akim n Eliyud yɩ,
40001015	Eliyud n Eleyazaar yɩ, Eleyazaar n Matan yɩ, Matan n Zakɔɔb yɩ,
40001016	Zakɔɔb n Maarii zim Zozɛf yɩ, Maarii bɩ do ɩ Yeezuu yɩ n n'a birm Krista.
40001017	Yaabɔɔ wɔɔ haay lɛ a zɛ kʋ ra bueeresi-si. A n a sa Abraham ma an ta m Davɩd ra bueeresi, an a sa Davɩd ma an ta m Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa ma bueeresi, an a sa Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa ma an ta m Krista ra bueeresi.
40001018	Yeezuu yɩrɛ bɩ zaa ba n nɩ: A da Maarii bɩ, nyɩnta a ʋ Zozɛf jaan, bɩ, an lɛɛ ka kʋ Maarii n a ba Zozɛf lʋ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka Maarii n jɩsɩ sa.
40001019	A jaan Zozɛf bɩ kʋ gʋaa mɩŋŋa m bɩ, a n a ŋʋa k'a a da nyannɩ ʋ y. A n a hɔɔn da k'a wɔ saa kʋ gɔsɩ b'a dɔ y.
40001020	K'a n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Zuuba Malɛɛka bʋr zi nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zozɛf, Davɩd do gʋaa, ɩ bɩ nyi ba k'ɩ Maarii sa ɩ ba ɩ lʋ y, bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa y'a ka, an nɩ jɩsɩ bɩ m,
40001021	a nyɩ yɩm yar, k'ɩ tɔ ka Yeezuu, bala, a m n'a do bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ a mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ."
40001022	Naa do woo••• naa, ba ʋ kʋ meerbaa kʋ Woso a ba kan a lɛsinnɩsorazaa lɛ kɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
40001023	A ba n nɩ: nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ k'a n yar dɔ bɩ jɩsɩ sim, an nyɩ yɩ yar, n y'a tɔ karɛ Emanʋwɛl, a jɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Woso ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ.
40001024	Zozɛf k'a bɩ gu hinceem ma bɩ, a hɔ kʋ Zuuba malɛɛka b'a hɩ m bɩ ba: A Maarii gaa, an a ba a lʋ,
40001025	bɩ, a n a dɔ lʋ y, an ta an aa dɔmɩm k'a nyɩyar bɩ yɩ ʋ bɩ ku, an a tɔ ka Yeezuu.
40002001	Yeezuu bɩ, yɩ a ʋ Betelehɛm ʋ Zidee kʋ ʋ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ dɔmɩm ʋ, bɩ hɔdonno a to dɔjɩr ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr Zerizalɛm ʋ,
40002002	ŋnɩ laaka da: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir k'a yɩ b'ɩ ka? Wɔɔ monyaa yɩ dɔjɩr ʋ bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ n bʋr k'ʋ b'a da ʋ."
40002003	Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a da bɔ ʋ kan Zerizalɛm zannɔ kɩ haay.
40002004	A n wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an laaka da ŋ han kʋ niŋŋə kʋ Krista bɩ n nɩ yɩŋ ʋ bɩ ma.
40002005	Brɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: Betelehɛm ʋ Zidee kʋ ʋ, bala, hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa b'a hɩ bɩ n naa do.
40002006	B'ɩbɩɩ Betelehɛm, Zidee kʋ, ɩbɩɩ bɛɛ m poore Zidee kʋrɔ gʋtɔɔ wɔɔ barla y. Bala, cir bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ bireyaa ʋ, an ka Israyɛl mɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ.
40002007	A m bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ n hɔdonno wɔɔ bir sɛɛrɛ, an laaka da ŋ han dɔmɩm kʋ monyaa bɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ ma.
40002008	A n ŋ nyɔɔ Betelehɛm ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta a laaka da nyɩ bɩ mim ma mɩŋŋa, k'a nyɩ bɩ yɩ, k'a a wusigə a b'a hɩ mɔɔ m, kʋ m ta m aa da ʋ sɔ."
40002009	Cir bɩ k'a naa hɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hʋr, ta kʋ ŋ nawʋm bɩ, monyaa kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋn'a yɩ dɔjɩr b'ɩ tarɛ ŋ lɛɛ, an ta an aa jɩm lɛɛ kʋ nyɩ bɩ n ta ʋ bɩ burə ʋ.
40002010	Monyaa bɩ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ heer yɩ nyɩnta gʋta.
40002011	Ŋ gasʋ cɛ b'ʋ, ŋn'aa nyɩ bɩ yɩ kan a da Maarii kɩ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ a taa, ŋnɩ yaa da m, bɩ jɛ ʋ, ŋn'a mɔdrɔ wɔɔ hʋr, ŋnɩ gan wʋ ma: Sarma m kan tidəər nyisi kɩ, mɩɩr kɩ.
40002012	Bɩ Woso a hɩ ŋ nɩ nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ bɔ Hɩrɔɔdɩ zi y. Naa minto bɩ, brɔɔ zaa vanta sa ŋnɩ doo a kʋ ʋ.
40002013	A hʋr kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka a hɩnka Zozɛf m nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ nyɩ bɩ gaa kan a da bɩ kɩ, ɩ ɩ si, ɩ ta Eziptɩ ʋ, nyɩnta b'ʋ k'an ta an aa dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ m yarɛ m meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ ku, bala, Hɩrɔɔdɩ y'a kam nyɩ bɩ ma, k'a zɛ."
40002014	Zozɛf n wuti, an nyɩ bɩ kan a da bɩ kɩ gaa gunuu ʋ, an a hʋr an ta Eziptɩ ʋ.
40002015	A gɔɔta b'ʋ an ta, an Hɩrɔɔdɩ garɛ ku, kʋ Woso meerbaa k'a ba kan a lɛsinnɩsorazaa lɛ kɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ. Mɔɔ m Nyɩ bɩ bir, k'an bɔ Eziptɩ ʋ.
40002016	Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a b'a dɔ a ʋ, hɔdonno wɔɔ a yamba a m bɩ, a wuti nɔmaa gandaara m. A n gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ Betelehɛm ʋ kan kʋrɔ vantɔɔ k'a a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'aa nyɩnɔ poorero yaarɔ kʋ ŋ dɔɔraa hɩɩya gɛɛ ŋ n a ku rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ. Amba hɔdonno wɔɔ a hɩ m, nyɩnta k'a ʋ, an laaka da k'a nyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm dɔ bɩ ma.
40002017	Naa ma bɩ, hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zeremii a hɩ bɩ kʋ yɩ, a ʋ:
40002018	N zeedarɛ ma Ramaa ʋ, nyikəre kan heerzarlɛ gʋta kɩ: Rasɛl nɩ nyi karɛ a nyɩnɔ minto, a lɛ baa kʋ n n'a wɔ zɩnzɛ a nɩ y, nyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga bɩ tɔ ma.
40002019	Hɩrɔɔdɩ garɛ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka a hɩnka Zozɛf m nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ Eziptɩ ʋ.
40002020	A n meer ba kan kɩ, a ʋ: "Wuti, ɩ nyɩ bɩ kan a da bɩ kɩ gaa ɩ ɩ wusigə, ɩ ta Israyɛl tara ra. Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam ma k'a nyɩ bɩ meeyaa bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gɩnga."
40002021	Zozɛf n wuti, an nyɩ bɩ kan a da bɩ kɩ gaa, an ta Israyɛl ʋ.
40002022	Bɩ, Zozɛf k'a a ma, n ʋ, Arkelayus nɩ cirbəə m Zidee ʋ a zɩ Hɩrɔɔdɩ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, nyibəə a nyasʋ k'an ta b'ʋ bɩ kɩ, bɩ Woso meer ba kan kɩ nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ, an ta Galilee kʋ ʋ.
40002023	A n aa nyɩnta kʋ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma Nazarɛtɩ ʋ b'ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ, ŋ ʋ: N y'a birm Nazarɛtɩ gʋaa.
40003001	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, Zaan-Batiisi bʋr Zidee poo nɔ ʋ, an nɩ Woso lemim pa dam.
40003002	A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a a bɔ a taam, k'a sugur yɛ, bala, Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ."
40003003	A mɩŋŋa wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ ma, a ʋ: Gʋaa leer nɩ bɔm poo nɔ ʋ: k'a Zuuba zaa banka, k'a zaa fɔɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩmbanka kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩ tɩrga.
40003004	Zaan bɩ, yoonde ka huu a a du a ma, an kʋmbar sa an a so a ʋ, bɩsɩnɔ kan zɔɔn kɩ n a hɔbɩrɛ.
40003005	A m naa, Zerizalɛm, Zidee kʋ bɩ haay, kɔ k'a tɔ m Zʋrdɛn kʋrɔ wɔɔ haay nɩ tam zi,
40003006	ŋ n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ hɩrɛ, Zaan nɩ batɛm karɛ ŋ ʋ Zʋrdɛn kɔ ʋ.
40003007	K'a farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ yɩ ŋn'ɩ zɛm gʋta batɛm sire bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɩnnɔ kʋsɩrɔ do, nka y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a ʋ, a a si Woso nɔmaa gʋta k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ lɛɛ?
40003008	K'a zibəə k'a n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, awɔɔ heerlʋrlɛ yɩ bɩ ba.
40003009	B'a b'a hɔɔn da a ʋ, awɔɔ zɩ m Abraham nɩ y. Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Woso a da ma an jaarɔ nɔɔn duro wusigə an ŋ ba Abraham nyɩnɔ.
40003010	Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, n sɩga banka k'an gɔrɔ zɩnzɛ ra ŋ məsi ma, gɔ niŋŋə k'a bɩr nyɩ mɩŋŋa darɛ y, n y'a zɛm la, n n a da sɛ ʋ."
40003011	"Mɔɔ ɩ batɛm karɛ awɔɔ ʋ hi ʋ a heer k'awɔɔ lʋr bɩ minto. Bɩ, an nɩ zɛm mɔɔ jɛ ʋ bɩ paŋŋa lɛ da mɔɔ ra, mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʋsɔrɔ waa a gannɔ ʋ y, a batɛm karɛ awɔɔ ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan sɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
40003012	A y'a gʋr m a wɔ ʋ, a y'a tʋyaa waarɛ an a hɔyaa gʋr an a zar sɩ ʋ, bɩ, a sɛ k'a bɩr lihim bɩ nyam puur b'ʋ."
40003013	A m bɩ, Yeezuu n a to Galilee ʋ, an bʋr Zʋrdɛn ʋ Zaan zi, k'a bɩ batɛm si.
40003014	Bɩ, Zaan a gu an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ ga m, ɩ batɛm ka mɔɔ ʋ, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ya, ɩ nɩ zɛm mɔɔ zi!"
40003015	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "A to k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ naa ma, bala, naa n'a karɛ, wɔɔ n hɔ haay k'an tɩrga Woso ma bɩ ba." Zaan n yɛ kɛɛrɛ.
40003016	Yeezuu k'a batɛm bɩ si bɩ, a bɔ hi b'ʋ. A m bɩ, brama n a gʋ, an Woso Ɛspri yɩ an nɩ zerle, am cirpʋʋrɛ hɔ bɩ m an bɩ zer la.
40003017	Leer n a to mim ʋ an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ba mɔɔ Nyɩ m na. Mɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta. A mɔɔ nɔ yɩ paan•••."
40004001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ ta Yeezuu m poo nɔ ʋ, kʋ Sʋtaana n a gɩnga ma.
40004002	K'a a lɛ kʋsɩ dɔmɩm busi sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ bɩ, nɔ b'a nyasʋ.
40004003	Sʋtaana n a zɔ ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ ka kʋ jaarɔ nɔɔn duro n a ba hɔbɩrɛ."
40004004	Bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Hɔbɩrɛ bɛɛ gʋaa n'a bɩm bala k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba y, bɩ lemim haay k'a nɩ bɔm Woso lɛ ʋ bɩ m."
40004005	Sʋtaana n a gaa an ta m Zerizalɛm ʋ, an a der Wosocɛ bɩ mim ʋ.
40004006	A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m k'ɩ hɩr ɩ ɩ da tara ʋ, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: A lɛrɔ karɛ a malɛɛkarɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'ɩbɩɩ busu a wɔrɔ ʋ k'ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ gəm zɛ y."
40004007	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba sɔ, n ʋ: Ɩ bɩ da Zuuba ɩ Woso lɛ ʋ y."
40004008	Sʋtaana n a ya, an ta m ci gʋta mim ʋ, an durnya cirbəəro kʋrɔ hɩnka m kan ŋ paŋŋa kɩ,
40004009	an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ kukurə zɛ mɔɔ taa, ɩ mɔɔ da ʋ, mɔɔ naa haay karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ."
40004010	Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩ jɛ bɔ mɔɔ jɩr ʋ, Sʋtaana! Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: Zuuba Woso y'a deem ɩbɩɩ nɩ yaa dam nɩ, ɩ da ʋ."
40004011	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Sʋtaana n a bɔ a jɛ ʋ, lɛɛm bɩ malɛɛkarɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʋ.
40004012	Yeezuu k'a a ma, n ʋ, n Zaan du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ bɩ, a a hʋr, an ta Galilee ʋ.
40004013	A n gɔɔta Nazarɛtɩ ʋ y. A hʋr a ʋ, an aa nyɩnta Kapɛrnawum ʋ. Kʋ m bɩ, an nɩ Galilee higʋta lɛ ra Zabɩlɔn kan Nɛftalii kɩ kʋrɔ wɔɔ barla.
40004014	Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro n kʋ yɩ.
40004015	Zabɩlɔn tara, Nɛftalii tara, higʋta zaa, kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zʋrdɛn kɔ gəm la kan doro vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Galilee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
40004016	Do k'a nɩ monsigə ʋ bɩ lɛɛgure gandaara yɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛ kʋ ʋ kan zɛ hinni kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, lɛɛgure bʋr brɔɔ minto.
40004017	A n a sa naa ma bɩ, Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ Woso lemim pa darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a bɔ a taam k'a sugur yɛ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ."
40004018	Yeezuu k'a nɩ Galilee higʋta lɛ ra an nɩ tam bɩ, a gʋɔɔ yɩ hɩɩya: Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a birm Pɩyɛɛr kan a danzaa Andɩr kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋa zom higʋta b'ʋ, bala, zɔbənno m.
40004019	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr a zu mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bam gʋɔɔ kama zannɔ."
40004020	Lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ y'a zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ to, ŋn'ɩ zum Yeezuu ʋ.
40004021	K'a ta lɛɛ bɩ, a Zakkɩ yɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ, Zebedee nyɩnɔ m ŋn'ɩ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ kan a zɩ Zebedee bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a zaŋŋarɔ bankam. A n ŋ bir.
40004022	Ŋ n a bɔ a zɩ b'ʋ kan kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ kɩ lɛɛm, ŋn'ɩ zure a jɛ ʋ.
40004023	Yeezuu gasʋ Galilee kʋ b'ʋ haay, an nɩ bɩmbɩrm, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam, an nɩ yaaba do haay waam kan kʋsɩ do haay kɩ zamaa bɩ bire ʋ.
40004024	A tɔ bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ, an ta kan Siirii kʋ kɩ haay, a m naa, n nɩ zɛm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir bam yaaba do haay kan kʋsɩ do haay nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m: Gʋɔɔ kʋ zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ, parparlɔzannɔ, mɛgarɛzannɔ kɩ an ŋ waa.
40004025	Zamaa cir gʋta nɩ zure a jɛ ʋ, a to ŋ y'a ʋ Galilee ʋ, Taraburo ʋ, Zerizalɛm kan Zidee kɩ, kan Zʋrdɛn kɔ gəm la kɩ.
40005001	Yeezuu k'a zamaa bɩ yɩ bɩ, a der ci burə ʋ, an nyɩnta. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma.
40005002	A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
40005003	"Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m mɩŋŋazerlezannɔ m: Ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.
40005004	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdɔɔ wɔɔ m: Ŋ y'a hɔjirle yɩm durnya ʋ.
40005005	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m nyikərezannɔ m: Woso bra barɛ ŋ nɩ.
40005006	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ tɩrgabaa nɔ nɩ ŋ zɛm kan mɩsɩ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m: Hɔ yɩ ŋ kam.
40005007	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m cicirzɛrɛzannɔ m: Woso yɩ ŋ cicir zɛrɛ.
40005008	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m heerhuzannɔ m: Ŋ Woso yɩrɛ.
40005009	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam kʋmarɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ m: Woso yɩ ŋ birle a nyɩnɔ.
40005010	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir bam tɩrgabaa tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ m: Ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.
40005011	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, kʋ n y'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ, n nɩ cicir karɛ awɔɔ ma, n nɩ ŋʋaar do haay karɛ awɔɔ ra mɔɔ minto,
40005012	k'a heer nyɔɔ heernyɔɔ gʋta m, bala, awɔɔ ganwʋrɛ gʋta yɩm arzana ʋ. A ba n y'a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ m."
40005013	"Durnya yɛ n'awɔɔ m. Bɩ, kʋ yɛ nyɩntabaa bɔ, n y'a bam lɔ, k'a a ya, a nyɩntabaa ka ʋ? A zibəə ba ʋ dɔ y, a lo n nawʋm garga ra, gʋɔɔ nɩ tʋntɔm la."
40005014	"Durnya lɛɛgure n'awɔɔ m, kʋ k'a nɩ zigi burə ʋ bɩ b'a dam ma, an a nyaakʋm da y.
40005015	Kʋ gʋaa sɛ nya fɩtɩrɛ ʋ a bɩr a cɩntam kasɩ taa y, a cɩnta a tɩr a ʋ hɔ burə ʋ an cɛ bɩ gu gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ daahan minto.
40005016	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ lɛɛgure n yɔ ncɩnaaʋ gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔ awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ b'ʋ, awɔɔ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ minto."
40005017	"A b'a hɔɔn da a ʋ, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m bɩ Moyiisi lɛ, gɛɛ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ rɔ wɔɔ zar y. Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ m bɩ ŋ zar y, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋ yɩ.
40005018	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, an lɛɛ ka kʋ tara kan brama kɩ n cem bɩ, Woso lɛ bɩ nyɩ deem bɩ bɩ cenle y, a jɩ deem bɩ cenim sɔ y, kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay n bɔkarɛ an kʋ yɩ.
40005019	Naa minto bɩ, kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka Woso lɛ bɩ poore deem taan••• ma an a dɩnda gʋɔɔ m kʋ ŋ n'a ba maam sɔ, a zaa bɩ do bir n nawʋm gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay poore Woso cirbəə b'ʋ. Bɩ gʋaa k'a zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an a dɩnda gʋɔɔ m ŋn'a ba maam sɔ bɩ, bɩ zaa nyɩntam gʋta Woso cirbəə b'ʋ.
40005020	Kʋ m sɩra hɩ awɔɔ m. K'awɔɔ tɩrgabaa n cem wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ tɩrgabaa kɩ han, awɔɔ bɩ gasʋm Woso cirbəə ʋ y."
40005021	"Awɔɔ ma n n a hɩ wɔɔ yaabɔɔ m, n ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y', kʋ gʋaa a mim meeyaa bɔ ʋ, a a ga m, kʋ n n ta m dʋdɔkənno taa.
40005022	Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ gʋaa nɔmaa ba kan a mim kɩ, a a ga m, kʋ n n ta a zaa m dʋdɔkənno taa. Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a mim m, a ʋ: 'Hɔɔnwarzaa', a a ga m, kʋ n n ta a zaa m dʋdɔkənno jɩtannɔ taa. Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a mim m, a ʋ: 'hɔɔzaa', a ga a ʋ m k'an ta sɛhar ʋ.
40005023	Naa minto bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ ta Wosocɛ ʋ k'ɩ yaa ganwʋrɛ ka Woso ʋ, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ ɩ zar ɩ mim ma,
40005024	k'ɩ ganwʋrɛ bɩ to Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ɩ ta ɩ yaa n'ɩ zɛ kʋ ra kan ɩ mim bɩ kɩ, k'ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ ɩ wusigə ɩ bʋr, ɩ b'ɩ ganwʋrɛ bɩ ka Woso ʋ.
40005025	K'ɩbɩɩ jɩm ɩ tarɛ ɩ m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, k'ɩ tɔ ʋ, a kʋ ma zaa ra. K'a n yɩ ncɩnaaʋ y, a y'ɩ kam dʋdɔkər ʋ, dʋdɔkər bɩ n ɩ ka lɔnnɔdɔmazannɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
40005026	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: Ɩbɩɩ bɩ bɔm b'ʋ k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ zɩm bɩ ka haay y, bɩ tanka deem taan••• bɩ gɔɔtarɛ y."
40005027	"Awɔɔ ma, n ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ jaan da y.'
40005028	Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ gʋaa dɩga lʋ ma a hɔɔn n ta zi, a jaan da kan kɩ a heer ʋ."
40005029	"K'ɩ bɩsɩ mɩnyaa bɩ y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ bɔ ʋ, ɩ zo laatʋ ɩ ma. Bala, a jɩra k'ɩ mɛ vəŋŋə deem n a zaar ba, k'ɩ mɛ bɩ haay bɩ ta sɛhar ʋ y.
40005030	Bɩ, k'ɩ bɩsɩ wɔ bɩ y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra ɩ zo laatʋ ɩ ma. A jɩra k'ɩ mɛ vəŋŋə deem n a zaar ba, k'ɩ mɛ bɩ haay bɩ ta sɛhar ʋ y."
40005031	"N y'a ya, n n a hɩ sɔ, n ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa la a lʋ ra k'an wɔsaalʋmaci ka ʋ.'
40005032	Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ gʋaa la a lʋ ra, bɩ jaan bɛɛ a a da y, lʋ bɩ da an nawʋm jaandarɛ ma. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lʋ k'a gʋ a zim ma sa, jaan a da."
40005033	"Awɔɔ ma, n n a hɩ wɔɔ yaabɔɔ m, n ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ ɩ lerbɔrɛ to y, b'a ka kʋ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ler bɔ Zuuba m ɩ ɩ wer si bɩ n kʋ yɩ.'
40005034	Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, a b'a wer si fɩɩga y: A b'a wer si brama tɔ nɩ y, bala, Woso cirbəəduu m bɩ.
40005035	A b'a wer si tara tɔ nɩ y, bala, a gam cɩntarahɔ m bɩ, a b'a wer si Zerizalɛm tɔ nɩ y, bala, cir gʋta bɩ kʋ m bɩ.
40005036	Ɩ b'ɩ wer si ɩ mim tɔ nɩ y, bala ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ ka minkə deem n a ba kunkum gɛɛ fu y.
40005037	K'awɔɔ ɩ meer barɛ, kʋ ɩɩn••• m, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: ɩɩn••• m. Kʋ ayy••• m, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: ayy••• m. Meerbaa k'a n'a nam ma bɩ, a to a ʋ a Bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩ zi."
40005038	"Awɔɔ ma, n n a hɩ, n ʋ: 'Mɩnyaa nɩ sompim mɩnyaa bɩncɛ ʋ, sɔ nɩ sompim sɔ bɩncɛ ʋ.'
40005039	Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ gʋaa a ba awɔɔ m bʋnyaa, a b'a bʋnyaa ba m sɔ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a wɔ ta ɩ bɩsɩ paasɩ rɛ, k'ɩ ɩ jɩsa paasɩ bɩ ka ʋ k'an a ta rɛ.
40005040	Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, k'a dʋdɔ ka kan ɩ kɩ, k'a ɩ huudaara yɔ ɩ m, k'ɩ to k'an ɩ huukuurə sa sɔ.
40005041	Kʋ gʋaa paŋŋa ba ɩ ma, k'a ɩ da tarɛ ma ganjɩbɔʋrɛ tisi kan a kɩ, k'ɩ ta ganjɩbɔʋrɛ tisi hɩɩya kan kɩ.
40005042	Kʋ gʋaa hɔ yɛ ɩ han, k'ɩ ka ʋ. Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, k'a zɩm sa ɩ zi, ɩ bɩ ɩ gu han y."
40005043	"Awɔɔ ma, n n a hɩ, n ʋ: 'K'ɩ ɩ gʋaa ŋʋa, k'ɩ sɔ ɩ jɩm m.'
40005044	Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: K'a a jɩnnɔ ŋʋa, k'a yaa da Woso m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
40005045	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ yɩm awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ nyɩnɔ paan•••rɔ. Bala, a a ka woso nɩ gum gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ra kan gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. A a ka sɔ, la nɩ bam gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ra kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
40005046	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ŋʋarɛ, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Bala, yawʋrsinno wɔɔ y'a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ.
40005047	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ a danyɩnɔ m bala, bɔ awɔɔ n'a bam, an nɩ yɩrɛ a hɔ? Kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ ra?
40005048	K'a maam, k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa paan••• amba awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ n mɩŋŋa paan••• bɩ m."
40006001	"A b'a ka k'a a zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ ba, kʋ gʋɔɔ n dɩga a ma y. K'awɔɔ ŋ ba kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩga a ma, awɔɔ bɩ ganwʋrɛ yɩm awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ zi y.
40006002	K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ kam cicirzaa ʋ, ɩ bɩ hɔ ba kʋ gʋaa haay n a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ kam gʋaa ʋ, amba zambʋzannɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bam sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ kan zaa birero ʋ kɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ a ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ y'a ganwʋrɛ yɩ.
40006003	B'ɩbɩɩ, k'ɩ ɩ gan wʋrɛ, k'ɩ jɩsa wɔ bɩ bɩ hɔ k'ɩ bɩsɩ wɔ n'a bam bɩ dɔ y.
40006004	K'ɩ ganwʋrɛ bɩ nyaakʋm da ɩ ka, ɩ Zɩ k'a nɩ hɔ nyaakʋndarɛ yɩm bɩ ganwʋrɛ karɛ ɩ ʋ."
40006005	"K'awɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ, a bɩ yɩ am zambʋzannɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa kʋ gʋɔɔ n a yɩ bɩ, jɩm ŋ tɩr a ʋ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kan zaarɔ zɛkʋrajɩrɔ kɩ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ bɩr yaa darɛ. Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, sɩra m, ŋ y'a ganwʋrɛ yɩ.
40006006	B'ɩbɩɩ, k'ɩ lɛ taa kɩ yaa da, gasʋ ɩ cɛ ʋ ɩ lɛ ta, ɩ yaa da ɩ Zɩ Woso k'a nɩ b'ʋ bɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ k'a nɩ lɛɛ k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ yɩm bɩ, a y'ɩbɩɩ zibəə k'ɩbɩɩ nyaakʋm da bɩ ganwʋrɛ karɛ ɩ ʋ.
40006007	K'awɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ, a bɩ meer ba gʋta am kɩfɩɩrɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. A hɔɔn ŋn'a darɛ, ŋ ʋ, k'a meer ba gʋta, Woso y'a yaadarɛ mam.
40006008	A b'a ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Bala, awɔɔ Zɩ Woso bɩ lɛɛ ka an hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ, awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, an n'a yɛm han."
40006009	"K'awɔɔ k'a yaa da, k'a da ncɩnaaʋ: Wɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ, k'ɩ tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ,
40006010	k'ɩ cirbəə n bʋr, k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ n ba tara burə ʋ, amba an nɩ bam arzana ʋ bɩ m.
40006011	Wɔɔ her hɔbɩrɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ.
40006012	Wɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ, amba wɔɔ n'ʋ muno kʋrɔmarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ bɩ m.
40006013	Dɔ wɔɔ ma k'ʋ bɩ yɛ ʋ ʋ do makra bʋnyaa nɔ ʋ y, bɩ wɔɔ yɔ Bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩ wɔ ʋ. [Bala, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ so cirbəə ʋ kan paŋŋa kɩ, lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ."]
40006014	"Kʋ sɩra nɩ, k'awɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ sugur karɛ awɔɔ ʋ sɔ.
40006015	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bɩr sugur kam gʋɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ b'awɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur karɛ awɔɔ ʋ sɔ y."
40006016	"K'awɔɔ y'a lɛ kʋsɩrɛ, a bɩ tɩr a meer zɩnzar kʋ ʋ, am zambʋzannɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. A meer ŋ tɩr a zɩnzar kʋ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, a a lɛ kʋsɩ. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: ŋ y'a ganwʋrɛ yɩ.
40006017	K'ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ lɛ kʋsɩrɛ, k'ɩ hi da ɩ meer ʋ, ɩ tidəər zɛ ɩ mim ma,
40006018	kʋ gʋɔɔ b'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, ɩ lɛ ɩ kʋsɩ y. Bɩ, k'ɩ Zɩ k'a nɩ lɛɛ k'a nyaakʋm da ʋ bɩ n a dɔ a deem. B'a y'ɩ ganwʋrɛ karɛ ɩ ʋ."
40006019	"A b'a ka arzaka ma durnya burə ʋ naa ʋ y. Bala, bɛɛ kan muku kɩ y'a zarm, konno ɩ cɛlɛ yarm, ŋn'a sarɛ.
40006020	Bɩ k'ɩ ka arzana arzaka ma. Bala, muku kan bɛɛ kɩ ba b'ʋ k'a zar y, konno ba b'ʋ k'a cɛlɛ yar, k'a sa y.
40006021	Bala, lɛɛ k'ɩ arzaka n ta ʋ b'ɩ heer n ta ʋ sɔ."
40006022	"Mɛsim fɩtɩrɛ m mɩnyaa m. K'ɩ mɩnyaa mɩŋŋa ɩbɩɩ mɛ bɩ haay ɩ lɛɛgure ʋ.
40006023	Bɩ k'ɩ mɩnyaa bɩ mɩŋŋa y, ɩbɩɩ mɛ bɩ haay nyɩntam monsigə ʋ. K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛɛgure k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m bɩ monsigə nɩ, monsigə bɩ do yɩm gʋta bidə."
40006024	"Gʋaa ba ʋ an b'a dam ma, an zuubɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ zi ba y. A deem ŋʋam, an sɔ deem m, gɛɛ, an a zɛ kʋ ra kan deem kɩ, an kaanm deem m. Awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a zu Woso ʋ, k'a a ya, a zu busoo ʋ y."
40006025	"Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a b'a heer kɔ a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ hɔbɩrɛ mim ma y. B'a b'a heer kɔ huu mim ma sɔ y. Mɩsɩrbaa n lɛ da hɔbɩrɛ m na? Mɛsim bɩ n lɛ da huu m na?
40006026	K'a dɩga bɛnnɔ ma: ŋ bɩr hɔ duure y, bɩ ŋ bɩr hɔ darɛ y, ŋ bɩr hɔ zarm sɩ ʋ y, b'awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ yɩ ŋ tʋrm! Awɔɔ n lɛ da ŋ nɩ gallɛm hɔka ra?
40006027	Nka n'a dam ma, an a mɩsɩrbaa da ra poore tɔkkɛ a hɔɔn k'a n'a dam ma gʋta minto?
40006028	Bɔ y'a ka, awɔɔ n'a heer kɔm huu mim ma? K'a dɩga pooyaa hɔvuro ma, ŋ yɩ mam, bɩ ŋ bɩr zi barɛ, bɩ ŋ bɩr huu barɛ y.
40006029	Bɩ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ awɔɔ m, Salomɔɔn mɩŋŋa, b'a kan a cirbəə bɩ kɩ, a n huu du a ma, am ŋ deem hɔ bɩ nɩ y.
40006030	Bɩ, kʋ Woso ɩ huu dum pooyaa bur ma ncɩnaaʋ, bɩ ta an a ʋ her kʋ sɛ n b'a bɩ booti m, a bɩ huu dure awɔɔ ma an lɛ da brɔɔ m na? Sɩrakarɛ poore zannɔ!
40006031	K'a maam, a b'a heer kɔ a bɩr a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Bɔ wɔɔ n'a bɩrɛ? Bɔ wɔɔ n'a mire? Bɔ wɔɔ n'a dure ʋ ma?
40006032	Naa do haay kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋ ma kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ, b'awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ b'a dɔ, a ʋ, awɔɔ lɛ taa ŋ ma.
40006033	K'a lɛɛ ka a ka Woso cirbəə bɩ ma, kan a tɩrgabaa kɩ. Maam bɩ, Woso hɔ k'a gɔɔta bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
40006034	Naa minto bɩ, a b'a heer kɔ booti mim ma y. Booti dɩgarɛ a mɩŋŋa mim ma. Dɔmɩm biyəə y'a mɩŋŋa mim m."
40007001	"A bɩ gʋaa dʋdɔ yar y, kʋ Woso b'a dʋdɔ yar y.
40007002	K'awɔɔ gʋaa dʋdɔ yar lʋnlɔ, awɔɔ dʋdɔ yar n nawʋm maam sɔ, hɔganhɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m gʋɔɔ minto bɩ, bɩ nɩ nyɩntam hɔganhɔ awɔɔ minto sɔ.
40007003	A lɔ ɩbɩɩ nɩ bur k'a n'ɩ mim mɩm ʋ bɩ yɩrɛ, an bɔkarɛ kusə n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʋ, b'ɩ bɩr a yɩrɛ?
40007004	Ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ, ɩ hɩ ɩ danyɩ m, ɩ ʋ, jɩm kʋ m bur bɔ ɩ mɩm ʋ, an bɔkarɛ kusə n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʋ!
40007005	Zambʋzaa, kusə bɩ bɔ ɩ mɩm ʋ cɩna, k'ɩ dɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa, ɩ bur bɩ bɔ ɩ danyɩ bɩ mɩm ʋ.
40007006	A bɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa ka jino ʋ y, kʋ n bɛɛ m, ŋ y'a bɔrɛ, ŋn'awɔɔ bɩ. A bɩ hɔ wɩsɩ sa a ka kurkuuro ʋ y, kʋ n bɛɛ m, ŋ tʋntɔm la.
40007007	K'a hɔ yɛ, n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ. K'awɔɔ a ka ma, awɔɔ y'a yɩm. K'awɔɔ cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʋrɛ awɔɔ m.
40007008	Bala, kʋ gʋaa hɔ yɛ, a y'a yɩm. K'a a ka ma, a y'a yɩm. Kʋ gʋaa cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʋm nɩ.
40007009	Gʋaa y'awɔɔ bire ʋ a nyɩ nɩ bur yɛm han, an jaa ka ʋ ra?
40007010	Gɛɛ, k'a zɔ yɛ han, a mɩm kaŋ ʋ ra?
40007011	Awɔɔ k'an bʋnyaa ncɩnaaʋ a bɔkarɛ a hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ka a nyɩnɔ ʋ dɔ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ bɛɛ lɛ da ra? A hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a yɛm han rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
40007012	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa haay kʋ gʋɔɔ n a ba awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a ba ŋ nɩ sɔ. Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ ciro wɔɔ kɩ a hɩ.
40007013	K'a gasʋ cɛlɛ fɔɔrɛ bɩ m, bala, cɛlɛ gʋta bɩ kan zaa zanta bɩ kɩ bɩ, ta ŋ nawʋm nyaanlɛ bɩncɛ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ gʋta yɩ ŋ sam.
40007014	Bɩ, cɛlɛ fɔɔrɛ bɩ kan zaa kʋsɩ bɩ kɩ bɩ, ta ŋ nawʋm mɩsɩrbaa bɩncɛ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ bɩ gʋta y.
40007015	K'a dundo a zi kan ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, bʋr ŋ tɩr a ʋ awɔɔ zi, am seero hɔ bɩ m, an bɔkarɛ poojino kʋsɩrɔ m.
40007016	Ŋ zibəəro awɔɔ nɩ ŋ dɔm ma. N bɩr tʋgɔ nyɩ nɔm laa gɔ ra y, n bɩr sɔɔn nyɩ nɔm laazankʋrɛ ra y.
40007017	Gɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ, nyɩ mɩŋŋa an n'a dam, gɔ bʋnyaa bɩ, nyɩ bʋnyaa an n'a dam sɔ.
40007018	Gɔ mɩŋŋa b'a dam ma an nyɩ bʋnyaa da y, gɔ bʋnyaa b'a dam ma, an nyɩ mɩŋŋa da sɔ y.
40007019	Gɔ haay k'a bɩr nyɩ mɩŋŋa dam bɩ, a zɛ n nawʋm la, n n'a dam sɛ ʋ.
40007020	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ ŋ zibəəro awɔɔ nɩ ŋ dɔm ma.
40007021	Gʋaa haay k'a n'a hɩm mɔɔ ma: 'Zuuba, Zuuba' bɩ bɛɛ nɩ gasʋm Woso cirbəə ʋ y. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ bam nɔ wɔɔ m.
40007022	Dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, gʋɔɔ gʋta y'a hɩrɛ: 'Zuuba, Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ tɔ minto, wɔɔ Woso lɛ si ʋ so ra. Ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma wɔɔ la zinəro ra. Wɔɔ hoserlo ba gʋta ɩbɩɩ tɔ minto.'
40007023	Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Mɔɔ n awɔɔ dɔ fɩɩga y. K'a a hʋr mɔɔ jɩr ʋ, mimbʋnyaabənno!'
40007024	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ba naa mam bɩ, an nɩ zi bam nɩ bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a hɔɔn n ta ʋ, an a cɛ dɔ ci burə ʋ kɩ.
40007025	La n ba, hi n yar, hɩnhɛr n hɔn kan paŋŋa kɩ, an a mom cɛ b'ʋ, a n a da y. Bala, a jɩr bɩ da n y'a ʋ ci burə ʋ.
40007026	Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ba naa mam b'a bɩr zi bam nɩ bɩ, gʋaa bɩ do bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa yarma k'a cɛ dɔ nyɩntaa burə ʋ kɩ.
40007027	La n ba, hi n yar, hɩnhɛr n hɔn kan paŋŋa kɩ, an a mom cɛ b'ʋ, cɛ bɩ n wurgə, a hɔsɩ n gɔɔta y."
40007028	Yeezuu k'a hɔ dɩnda ncɩnaaʋ an a nya bɩ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ minto.
40007029	Bala, Yeezuu bɩr hɔ dɩndarɛ am ŋ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Woso paŋŋa an nɩ hɔ bɩ dɩndam nɩ.
40008001	Yeezuu k'a a to ci bɩ mim ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta zu a jɛ ʋ.
40008002	Kusimə n b'a zɔ ma, an kukurə zɛ a taa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, k'ɩ lɛ taa, ɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ mɔɔ waa, ɩ dintim naa do gʋ mɔɔ ma."
40008003	Yeezuu n a wɔ hʋr, an a da ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ taa, ɩ waa. Kʋ dintim bɩ n gʋ ɩ ma." Lɛɛm bɩ, a kusiməbaa bɩ nya ma.
40008004	A m bɩ, Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y, bɩ ta ɩ yaa n'ɩ hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbər bɩ m, k'ɩ ganwʋrɛ kʋ Moyiisi lɛ ka kʋ n n a ba bɩ ka, k'an nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ waarɛ bɩ kasɛtɩ gʋaa haay minto."
40008005	Yeezuu k'a nɩ gasʋm Kapɛrnawum ʋ bɩ, sʋrdaarɔ cir bʋr zi, an a hɩ m, a ʋ:
40008006	"Zuuba, mɔɔ zibəənyɩ nɩ wʋtam har ʋ, a mɛ n ga, an nɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta."
40008007	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ tam, m aa a waa."
40008008	Bɩ sʋrdaarɔ cir b'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ n m ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ n gasʋ mɔɔ har ʋ y, meerbaanyɩ ba deem bala, mɔɔ zibəənyɩ bɩ y'a waam!
40008009	Lɛɛzannɔ y'a so mɔɔ mɩŋŋa ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ m so sʋrdaarɔ ʋ. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ deem m, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Ta!', b'a ta. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ a vanta m, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Bʋr!', b'a bʋr. Kʋ mɔɔ m ya, m a hɩ m zibəənyɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Naa ba!', b'a a ba."
40008010	Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a dɩga gʋaa bɩ ma, an zɛ kədə, an a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ n sɩrakarɛ naa do lɔɔ yɩ Israyɛl gʋaa zi y.
40008011	A hɩ mɔɔ n nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ y'a tom gʋta dɔjɩr ʋ kan meer kɩ ŋnɩ bɩ nyɩnta kan Abraham kɩ Izakkɩ kɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ bɩ Woso cirbəə b'ʋ.
40008012	Gʋɔɔ kʋ n lɛɛ ka n ŋ bɔ ʋ Woso cirbəə bɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ, n brɔɔ nyɔɔm garga ra monsigə ʋ. Nyikəre kan sɔsʋrɛ kɩ nyɩntam b'ʋ."
40008013	Meerbaa naa do jɛ ʋ, Yeezuu a hɩ sʋrdaarɔ cir bɩ m, a ʋ: "Doo har ʋ, k'an ba ɩbɩɩ m, amba ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ m." Wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ lɛɛm bɩ, zibəənyɩ b'a waa.
40008014	Yeezuu k'a gasʋ Pɩyɛɛr har ʋ bɩ, a Pɩyɛɛr dində yɩ an nɩ wʋtam mɛmarɛ m.
40008015	A n a wɔ da a wɔ ma mɛmarɛ bɩ n bɔ a mɛ ʋ, an wuti an nyasʋ Yeezuu m.
40008016	Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, n bʋr gʋɔɔ m gʋta zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ. Yeezuu meer ba bala an la zinəro wɔɔ ra, an yaabazannɔ wɔɔ waa haay.
40008017	Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ. A a hɩ, a ʋ: A ɩ hɔ haay k'a nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ mɛsim ma bɩ sa, an wɔɔ yaabarɔ gʋ wɔɔ ma.
40008018	Yeezuu k'a gʋɔɔ cir gʋta yɩ, ŋnɩ bɩr a ma bɩ, a lɛ ka a ʋ, k'a ta higʋta bɩ gəm deem la.
40008019	Wosocikarɩnsaamba deem n a zɔ ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ zure ɩbɩɩ jɛ ʋ lɛɛ haay k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ taŋ ʋ b'ʋ."
40008020	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɛɛʋnrɔ ɩ yaarɔ m, bɛnnɔ ɩ cɛlɩŋŋarɔ m, bɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ ba bɩncɛ m k'a a mim cɩnta ʋ y."
40008021	Karɩndanyɩ vanta n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, zaa ka m ʋ, kʋ m aa nɩ m zɩ gər bir, kʋ m a dɔ m bʋr."
40008022	Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'ɩ gəəno to kʋ ŋ n'a gəəno bir."
40008023	Yeezuu gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ n zu a jɛ ʋ.
40008024	Lɛɛm bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʋta wuti hi bɩ burə ʋ, an a ŋʋa k'a ka kʋ hi m kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ mom. Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ, an nɩ hinceem bam.
40008025	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma, ŋn'a gu, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, wɔɔ yɔ! Kʋ m bɛɛ m wɔɔ gɩngam!"
40008026	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ nyi barɛ, sɩrakarɛ poore zannɔ!" A n wuti an jɩm, an həən si hɩnhɛr bɩ ma kan higʋta bɩ kɩ. Lɛɛ bɩ n zɛ sɩɩ•••
40008027	Ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ gʋaa bɩ kara n naa, baa hɩnhɛr kan hi kɩ n n'a lɛ sire?"
40008028	Yeezuu k'a lee ku higʋta bɩ tʋr deem ʋ Gadara zannɔ kʋ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a m bɩ, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ n bɔ gəənoyaarɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ b'a zɛ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro nyɩnta bʋnyaa gʋta. Naa minto bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma, an cem lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ y.
40008029	Ŋ n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ ba wɔɔ nɩ Woso Nyɩ? Bʋr ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ bɩ fɩr ka wɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ dɔmɩm bɩ n a ku cɩna ra?"
40008030	A n bɔkarɛ, kurkuuro cir gʋta ɩ nyɩnta laatʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩrɛ.
40008031	Zinəro wɔɔ n'a yɛm Yeezuu han gʋta, ŋ ʋ: "K'ɩ la wɔɔ ra, k'ɩ wɔɔ nyɔɔ kurkuuro wɔɔ mɛ ʋ."
40008032	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta!" Ŋ nɩ bɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ mɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ mɛ ʋ. A m bɩ, kurkuuro cir gʋta bɩ n bra si, ŋnɩ zer, ŋn'a zar higʋta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
40008033	Kurkuuro dundonno wɔɔ n bra si, ŋn'aa hɔ k'a ba bɩ hɩ kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ, kan hɔ k'a ba gʋɔɔ kʋ zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ n bɩ kɩ.
40008034	A m bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ n bɔ, ŋn'ɩ tam k'a yaa Yeezuu zɛ ʋ. A yɩ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ han gʋta k'an bɔ a kʋ b'ʋ.
40009001	Naa jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, an a wusigə, an higʋta bɩ zɛ ra an ta a kʋ ʋ.
40009002	N n mɛgarɛzaa busu wʋtarahɔ ra, n nɩ bʋr m Yeezuu zi. K'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr m nɔ wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, ɩ tɔ ʋ, ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ sugur yɩ."
40009003	Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do ɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ!"
40009004	Yeezuu k'a hɔ k'a nɩ ŋ heer ʋ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto, awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʋ?
40009005	Kara m zanta? Mɔɔ n b'a hɩm lʋgɔ bɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ: Ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ bɩ m gɛ, gɛɛ, ɩ wuti ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr, ɩ ta bɩ nɩ?
40009006	Bɩ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ, a ʋ: Gʋaanyɩ b'ɩ lɛ m tara burə ʋ, k'a gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ." A n a hɩ lʋgɔ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr ɩ doo!"
40009007	Gʋaa bɩ n wuti an doo.
40009008	Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ da bɔ ʋ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, k'a paŋŋa naa do ka gʋɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto.
40009009	Yeezuu k'a nɩ tam bɩ, a a to, an gʋaa yɩ an nɩ nyɩntam yawʋrsire bɩncɛ b'ʋ, a tɔ m Matiyee, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ!" A n wuti an zu a jɛ ʋ.
40009010	Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ nyɩntam Matiyee har ʋ b'ʋ k'a hɔ bɩ bɩ, yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋta kan kɩ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
40009011	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "A lɔ, awɔɔ karɩnsaamba bɩ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan yawʋrsinno kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ?"
40009012	Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩzannɔ lɛ baa lɔɔtɔr ma y, yaabazannɔ lɛ n taa lɔɔtɔr ma.
40009013	K'a ta, a yaa a ka meerbaa naa do jɩ ma: 'Cicirzɛrɛ mɔɔ lɛ n taa, mannɩ barɛ bɛɛ y'. Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ m bɩ gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bir y. Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m bɩ mimbʋnyaabənno bir."
40009014	Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋnɩ laaka da han, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto m, wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ n'ʋ lɛ kʋsɩm, b'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr a kʋsɩrɛ?"
40009015	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ɩ lʋsarɛ cibsa barɛ, lʋ bɩ zim bɩ nɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bireyaa ʋ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a dam ma, ŋnɩ heerzarlɛ ba ra? Bɩ dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʋ, n zɛm bɩ lʋ bɩ zim bɩ gʋ ŋ ma, ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ.
40009016	Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ pɛɛra daa kər sam, an n'a tam huu gusire rɛ y. Bala, pɛɛra daa kər bɩ huu gusire bɩ gaam an a kaansʋ, an lɛ da biisi ra.
40009017	Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ dɩvɛn daa sam k'a tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ gusinno ʋ y. Kʋ m bɛɛ m, hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ hɩnhaanm, dɩvɛn bɩ n a lo hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ n a zaar ba. Bɩ dɩvɛn daa bɩ tɔ n tɩr a ʋ hibɔɔnrɔ daarɔ ʋ, dɩvɛn bɩ kan hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ b'a zaarbarɛ y."
40009018	K'a nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir deem n a zɔ ma, an sʋnta a taa, an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ ɩ ga, a n maasɩrɛ ba cɩna y. Bɩ, bʋr ɩ wɔ ka a mim la, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʋ."
40009019	Yeezuu n wuti kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ zu a jɛ ʋ.
40009020	Bɩ, lʋ n ta ʋ, ma n'a dam zi a dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya hɔ m naa, an a zɔ Yeezuu ma jɛ ʋ, an a wɔ da Yeezuu huu lɛ ma.
40009021	Bala, lʋ bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ m wɔ da a huu lɛ ma tɔkkɛ, mɔɔ yɩ m waam."
40009022	Bɩ, Yeezuu a bɔ an dɩga a jɛ ʋ, an lʋ bɩ yɩ an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɩnnɩ, ɩ heer ba kookoo, ɩ sɩrakarɛ y'ɩ bʋmbɔ". Lɛɛm bɩ, lʋ b'a waa wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ.
40009023	Yeezuu k'a lee ku zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ har ʋ bɩ, k'a hirpenno wɔɔ yɩ kan gʋaa cir bɩ bʋgʋr barɛ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
40009024	"K'a bɔ, nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n ga y. Hinceem a a ba." Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʋm ma.
40009025	Kʋ n bɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, a gasʋ zi, an nyɩ bɩ sa a wɔ ma, a m bɩ, nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n wuti.
40009026	Mim naa do n ta lɛ haay ʋ kʋ bɩ do ʋ.
40009027	Yeezuu k'a hʋr b'ʋ bɩ, bʋʋrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ b'a zɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ zu a jɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ baa dam, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ cicir zɛ Davɩd Nyɩ!"
40009028	Yeezuu k'a lee ku har ʋ bɩ, bʋʋrɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɩra ka a ʋ, mɔɔ yɩ m dam ma, m naa ba ra?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••, Zuuba."
40009029	A m naa, Yeezuu n a wɔ da ŋ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'awɔɔ sɩra ka k'a yɩ bɩ, k'a yɩ maam."
40009030	Ŋ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ n gʋ. Yeezuu n lɛ ka ŋ ʋ paŋŋa m, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi! A b'a ka gʋaa n a dɔ y!"
40009031	Bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ bɩ, ŋ y'a sɩŋŋɩda sa lɛɛm, ŋn'a mim dɩndam kʋ b'ʋ haay.
40009032	Yeezuu k'a n'a hʋrm bɩ, n bʋr gʋaa m zinə n ta m, an a ba bəətir.
40009033	Yeezuu k'a la zinə bɩ ra bɩ, bəətir b'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ meer bam. Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta bɩ zɛ kədə. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Hɔ naa do lɔɔ n ba cɩna Israyɛl kʋ naa ʋ y!"
40009034	Bɩ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zinəro jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɩ paŋŋa kaŋ ʋ, an nɩ lam zinəro wɔɔ ra."
40009035	Yeezuu ɩ bɩrm kʋnɔrɔ wɔɔ ʋ kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ kʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta pa dam sɔ, an nɩ yaaba do haay waam kan kʋsɩ do haay kɩ.
40009036	K'a gʋɔɔ cir gʋta bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ cicir a nyasʋ, bala, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ heerzarlɛ nɔ ʋ kan kɔrɛ kɩ, amba hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ ba dundor m bɩ m.
40009037	A n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Mɔsa zibəə bɩ gʋta, bɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩ gʋta y.
40009038	Naa minto bɩ, k'a yɛ Wutuzaa bɩ han k'an zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ a mɔsa zibəə bɩ tɔ ma."
40010001	Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir, an paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a da zinəro wɔɔ ma, kʋ ŋ nɩ la ŋ la, kʋ ŋ nɩ yaaba do haay waa, kan kʋsɩ do haay kɩ.
40010002	Kristazibəəzannɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔrɔ ba n nɩ: Lɛɛkarɛ zaa bɩ tɔ m, Sɩmɔɔn, n n'a hɩm ma Pɩyɛɛr, kan a danzaa Andɩr kɩ, Zebedee nyɩnɔ Zakkɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ.
40010003	Filipi kan Bartelemii kɩ, Toma kan yawʋrsirezaa Matiyee kɩ, Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ kan Tade kɩ.
40010004	Sɩmɔɔn Zelɔtɩ, kan Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ kɩ, b'ɩ Yeezuu da jɩnnɔ wɔ ʋ bɩ.
40010005	Yeezuu bueerehɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro nyɔɔ, an lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "A bɩ kɩfɩɩrɔ zaa sa y, b'a bɩ gasʋ Samarii zannɔ kʋ ʋ y.
40010006	Bɩ k'a ta Israyɛl do zi, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ zi.
40010007	K'awɔɔ ɩ tam k'a bɩr a pa darɛ, a ʋ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ.
40010008	K'a yaabazannɔ waa, k'a gəəno mɩm bɔ ʋ, k'a kusiməro waa, a dintim gʋ ŋ ma, k'a la zinəro ra. A ka n y'a ʋ awɔɔ ʋ vam, k'a ka vam sɔ.
40010009	A bɩ sarma sa, b'a bɩ busoo sa sɔ y. A bɩ bɔɔlʋgʋ zar a mɔr ʋ sɔ y.
40010010	A bɩ hɩra sa zaa bɩ sarɛ minto, b'a bɩ huu sa hɩɩya y. A bɩ kʋsɔ kan bara kɩ sa y, bala, zibəəzaa b'a ga m, an hɔbɩrɛ yɩ.
40010011	K'awɔɔ gasʋ kʋ poore ʋ gɛɛ kʋ gʋta ʋ, k'a laaka da, kʋ gʋaa ta ʋ a lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ si a har ʋ, k'a gɔɔta b'ʋ k'an ta an awɔɔ hʋrlɛ ku.
40010012	K'awɔɔ ta k'a gasʋ har b'ʋ, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.'
40010013	Kʋ har bɩ do a ga m, k'awɔɔ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta kan kɩ. Bɩ, k'a n a ga m, k'awɔɔ laafɩɩ n a wusigə awɔɔ zi.
40010014	Har bɩ do nɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ n awɔɔ si, kʋ ŋ n a tʋr ka awɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma, ŋn'a si sɔ, k'a ɩ bɔm har bɩ do ʋ, gɛɛ kʋ bɩ do ʋ, k'a taanyisi gʋ a gannɔ ma.
40010015	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, kʋ naa do fɩryɩrɛ yɩm gʋta an lɛ da Sodɔm kan Gomɔɔr kɩ kʋ ra."
40010016	"K'a tʋr ka mɩŋŋa, awɔɔ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋm am seero hɔ bɩ m poojino bireyaa ʋ. Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a hɔɔn ka mɩŋŋa, am mɩnnɔ hɔ bɩ m. K'a yɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim ba ʋ y, am cirpʋnnɔ hɔ bɩ m.
40010017	K'a dundo a zi kan gʋɔɔ kɩ, bala, ŋ y'awɔɔ gʋrm, ŋnɩ ta awɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno zi. Ŋ y'awɔɔ zɛm madɩɩrɔ m a sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ.
40010018	Ŋ tarɛ awɔɔ m kʋrɔ lɛɛzannɔ kan cinno kɩ taa mɔɔ tɔ ma. Naa nɩ nyɩntam kasɛtɩ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ kan kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ.
40010019	Kʋ ŋ bɩ ta awɔɔ m brɔɔ lɛɛ, a b'a hɔɔn da k'awɔɔ meer bam lʋnlɔ, gɛɛ, bɔ awɔɔ n n'a hɩrɛ y. Hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ.
40010020	Bala, awɔɔ bɛɛ n nɩ meer barɛ a zim y, awɔɔ Zɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n nɩ meer k'awɔɔ n n'a bam bɩ darɛ awɔɔ lɛ ʋ.
40010021	Danyɩnɔ kʋ kam zɛ ma. Zɩ y'a nyɩ karɛ, n n a zɛ. Nyɩnɔ wutire ŋnɩ jɩm kan a zɩrɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ ka, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
40010022	Gʋaa haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma. Bɩ gʋaa k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ an ta an fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nyarɛ ku bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
40010023	Kʋ ŋ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma kʋ niŋŋə ʋ, k'a a si a ta kʋ vanta ʋ. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ bɩ Israyɛl kʋnɔrɔ wɔɔ nyarɛ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m bɔkarɛ, an bʋr y.
40010024	Karɩndanyɩ bɩ n lɛ da a karɩnsaamba ra y, zibəənyɩ bɩ n lɛ da a zuuba ra sɔ y.
40010025	Karɩndanyɩ a ga m, an yɩ am a karɩnsaamba m. Zibəənyɩ a ga m, an yɩ am a zuuba m. Kʋ n har bɩ zaa bɩ ba zinəro jɩtaarɛ, awɔɔ hɔɔn ʋ naa, n b'a bam har bɩ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m ncɩnaaʋ ra?
40010026	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a bɩ nyi ba gʋɔɔ nɩ y. Bala, hɔ ba ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da, n ba yɩrɛ y. Mim ba ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da, n b'a dɔrɛ y.
40010027	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m monsigə ʋ bɩ, k'a hɩ garga ra, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam sɔ awɔɔ y'a minto bɩ, k'a pa da kʋ gʋaa haay n a ma.
40010028	A bɩ nyi ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɛsim zɛm gər, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ gʋaa nyi zɛ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y. K'a nyi ba Woso m. Bɩ y'a da ma, an mɛsim kan nyi kɩ zaar ba sɛhar ʋ.
40010029	N bɩr bɛnnɔ hɛɛnm hɩɩya wacɩr la? A n bɔkarɛ deem taan••• bɩr gam k'awɔɔ Zɩ bɛɛ zaa ka y.
40010030	B'awɔɔ, ŋ y'awɔɔ minkə bɩ lɛ dɔ.
40010031	K'a maam, a bɩ nyi ba y. Awɔɔ gore ta ʋ, an lɛ da bɛnnɔ haay ra.
40010032	Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ gʋɔɔ lɛɛ, a ʋ, a mɔɔ dɔ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ m Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ zaa dɔ sɔ.
40010033	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ lɛɛ, mɔɔ bɩsɩ karɛ a zaa ma sɔ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ lɛɛ.
40010034	A b'a hɔɔn da, a ʋ, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta ʋ tara burə ʋ y. Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta ʋ y. Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ zoobarɛ m.
40010035	Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m gʋaa gʋ a zɩ ma, kʋ m nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ gʋ a da ma, kʋ m lʋ gʋ a nyar ma.
40010036	Gʋaa har gʋɔɔ n nɩ yɩrɛ a jɩnnɔ.
40010037	Kʋ gʋaa a zɩ ŋʋa gɛɛ a da an lɛ da mɔɔ m, gʋaa bɩ do n a ga m, an yɩ mɔɔ gʋaa y. Kʋ gʋaa a nyɩyar gɛɛ a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ ŋʋa an lɛ da mɔɔ m, gʋaa bɩ do n a ga m, an yɩ mɔɔ gʋaa sɔ y.
40010038	Kʋ gʋaa n a gɔdarkʋra busu an zu mɔɔ ʋ, a n a ga m, an yɩ mɔɔ gʋaa y.
40010039	Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a a meeyaa bʋmbɔ, a b'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ gʋaa k'a yɛ zɛ ma mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm."
40010040	"Kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ si, mɔɔ a m si. Mɔɔ si k'a ʋ bɩ, bɔzaa ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a a si.
40010041	Kʋ gʋaa wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa si k'an wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ minto, a wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ganwʋrɛ yɩm. Kʋ gʋaa gʋaa tɩrga si a tɩrgabaa tɔ ma, a gʋaa tɩrga ganwʋrɛ yɩm.
40010042	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ gʋaa hi ka hɩnnɩ ʋ tɔkkɛ nyɩnɔ poorero nɔɔn duro deem ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ m bɩ tɔ ma, gʋaa bɩ do bɩ kʋrɔm ganwʋrɛ ma y."
40011001	Yeezuu k'a hɔ dɩnda a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ m an a nya bɩ, a a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ k'a yaa Woso lemim pa da, k'a hɔ dɩnda sɔ kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
40011002	Zaan k'a nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'a to an Krista zibəəro wɔɔ mim ma, an a karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nyɔɔ,
40011003	kʋ ŋ n aa laaka da han, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ŋn'ɩ dɔrɛ ɩ zɛrɛ ma bɩ gɛɛ, gʋaa vanta nɩ?"
40011004	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "K'a ta a yaa hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam, an n'a yɩm naa dɩnda Zaan m:
40011005	Bʋʋrɔ mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, lʋgɔrɔ ɩ tam, kusimoo y'a waam, dintim nɩ gʋrɛ ŋ ma, tikkiro ɩ meerbaa mam, gəəno y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta ɩ hɩm ŋʋazannɔ m.
40011006	Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a n a sɩrakarɛ to mɔɔ minto bɩ m."
40011007	Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a hʋr bɩ, Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a hɩm zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a poohɔɔn ʋ? Hɩnhɛr awɔɔ yɩ, an nɩ niigə gɔ yəŋŋəm gɛ?
40011008	Bɔ awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a paan•••? Gʋaa m, an huu wɩsɩ da a ra gɛ? Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ huu wɩsɩrɔ darɛ a ra rɔ wɔɔ ɩ cinno harlɔ ʋ.
40011009	Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a? Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m gɛ? Ɩɩn•••, mɔɔ y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a lɛ da wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ra.
40011010	Zaan mim n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ nɩ m zibəəzaa nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, k'an ɩbɩɩ zaa banka.'
40011011	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lannɔ nyɩnɔ barla gʋaa ba ʋ an lɛ da Zaan-Batiisi ra y. A n bɔkarɛ gʋaa k'an poore Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ lɛ da m.
40011012	A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa Zaan-Batiisi Woso lemim padarɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ, an lee ku dɩɩtaa naa ma bɩ, arzana bɩ gasʋ n nawʋŋ ʋ paŋŋa m, tʋntɔʋrɛzannɔ n'a soŋ ʋ.
40011013	Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ haay kan Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩnda, an ta an Zaan dɔmɩm ku.
40011014	K'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, Elii niŋŋə kʋ n ʋ a zɛm bɩ m Zaan m.
40011015	Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m k'an a ma!
40011016	Kʋ m her gʋɔɔ nɔɔn makra ba kan bɔ kɩ? Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ yaa nyɩnta daasɩyaa ʋ, ŋn'a to, ŋn'ɩ kʋ bimbirm, ŋ ʋ:
40011017	Wɔɔ hir hɛ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n sar ba y! Wɔɔ zɛlaa lɔ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n nyi ka y!
40011018	Bala, Zaan k'a bʋr bɩ, a bɩr hɔ bɩrɛ y, a bɩr dɩvɛn mim sɔ y. N n a hɩrɛ, n ʋ: zinə n ta m.
40011019	Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr, an nɩ hɔ bɩm, an nɩ hɔ mim, n n'a hɩm ma, n ʋ: Naa do naa, nɔzaa m, bɩ, bɛɛmir m sɔ. Yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ hannyɩ m. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ tɩrga."
40011020	A m naa, Yeezuu n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ nyaa bam kan kʋrɔ k'a hoserlo ba ʋ gʋta bɩ ŋ n a bɔ a taam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
40011021	"Korazɛn, ɩbɩɩ kʋsɩ yɩm! Bɛtsayɩdaa, ɩbɩɩ kʋsɩ yɩm sɔ! Bala, hoserlo kʋ ŋ ba awɔɔ bireyaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ba ŋ y'a ʋ Tiir kʋ ʋ kan Sidɔn kʋ kɩ, k'an naa brɔɔ huu yiiro gʋr ŋnɩ ŋ ka a ra ŋnɩ suu lo a ra, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a lɛ taa k'a a bɔ a taam.
40011022	Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, awɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ nyɩntam kʋsɩ, an lɛ da Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ m.
40011023	B'ɩbɩɩ, Kapɛrnawum, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ busure ɩ lee ku brama ra? Ɩbɩɩ zerm ɩ gasʋ gəənokʋ ʋ! Bala, kʋ hoserlo kʋ ŋ ba ɩbɩɩ zi rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ba ŋ y'a ʋ Sodɔm kʋ ʋ, k'an naa a gɔɔta an ta ʋ her dɔmɩm ʋ.
40011024	Naa y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dʋdɔkarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, ɩbɩɩ fɩryɩrɛ yɩm kʋsɩ an lɛ da Sodɔm hɔ ra."
40011025	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu meer ba, a ʋ: "Zɩ k'a a so tara ʋ kan brama kɩ, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m barka, k'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro nyaakʋm da gʋɔɔ hɔɔnzannɔ m kan hɔdonno kɩ m, ɩ bɔkarɛ, ɩ ŋ hɩnka nyɩnɔ poorero m bɩ minto.
40011026	Ɩɩn•••, Zɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'a ŋʋa ɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ.
40011027	Mɔɔ Zɩ hɔ haay ka mɔɔ ʋ. Zɩ bɩ y'a deem ɩ Nyɩ bɩ dɔ. Nyɩ bɩ y'a deem ɩ Zɩ bɩ dɔ kan gʋɔɔ k'a lɛ n taa k'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bala.
40011028	K'a bʋr mɔɔ zi, awɔɔ haay k'awɔɔ mɔr gorezaa busu an n'a kɔm nɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ hoonsire karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
40011029	K'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'a mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ si, bala, mɔɔ bʋgʋ-bʋgʋ, mɩŋŋazerlezaa m mɔɔ m. Bɩ, awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ hoonsire yɩm.
40011030	Bala, zuuba k'an kʋsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔr kʋ mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ bɩ gore ba ʋ sɔ y."
40012001	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, Yeezuu bɔ hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ, nɔ n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ hɔyaa yɩnyarm ŋn'a tiŋŋəre, ŋn'a sʋm.
40012002	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Dɩga ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, hɔ k'a n a ga barɛ m sabaa hinni ʋ bɩ ŋn'a bam."
40012003	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mim k'a pakra ba Davɩd m kan a gʋɔɔ kɩ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ, hɔ niŋŋə k'a a ba, nɔ k'a a nyasʋ bɩ,
40012004	gasʋ k'a ʋ Woso zɛʋjɩ bɩncɛ ʋ, an mannɩ bur bɩ gʋr an a bɩ, kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, bɩ lɛ ba ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a bɩ kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ bɛɛ m bala bɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba ra?
40012005	Gɛɛ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba Moyiisi lɛrɔ ci b'ʋ, n ʋ: Woso zɛʋjɩ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ bɩr zum sabaa hinni b'ʋ y, bɩ kʋrɔma bɛɛ nɩ y.
40012006	Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Gʋaa ɩ naa ʋ, an lɛ da Wosocɛ bɩ ra.
40012007	N ʋ: cicirzɛrɛ mɔɔ lɛ n taa, mannɩbarɛ bɛɛ y, k'awɔɔ meerbaa naa do jɩ ma, awɔɔ bɩ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro dʋdɔ yarlɛ y, bala, ŋ n kʋrɔma y.
40012008	Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m sabaa hinni bɩ minzaa."
40012009	Cem kʋ Yeezuu ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, ta a ʋ, an aa gasʋ ŋ sokʋmacɛ ʋ.
40012010	Lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋaa n nɩ b'ʋ, a wɔ deem n ga. Ŋ n laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga m, kʋ n nɩ gʋaa waa sabaa hinni ʋ ra?" A hɩ ŋ y'a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'a Yeezuu ku, a mim ka ra.
40012011	Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Nka n'awɔɔ bire ʋ, a ser deem bala n n'a dam yaa ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ, b'a bɩ tarɛ an aa a bɔ yaa b'ʋ?
40012012	Gʋaa n lɛ da ser m denter la? K'a maam, a a ga m, kʋ n nɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba gʋaa m sabaa hinni ʋ."
40012013	A m bɩ, an a hɩ wɔgərzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ wɔ bɩ hʋr!" Gʋaa bɩ n a hʋr, a wɔ bɩ n a banka mɩŋŋa am deem bɩ hɔ bɩ m.
40012014	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a dɩnda k'a ka zaa ma k'a Yeezuu ku a zɛ.
40012015	Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ, gʋaa cir gʋta n zu a jɛ ʋ, an yaabazannɔ wɔɔ waa haay.
40012016	A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ: A b'a ka gɔsɩ n a dɔ y.
40012017	Kʋ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ. A a hɩ, a ʋ:
40012018	Mɔɔ Zibəənyɩ kʋ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ. Gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam kan m heer kɩ haay bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m Ɛspri bɩ kaŋ ʋ. A mɔɔ lɛrɔ hɩ m do gʋta m.
40012019	A b'a kam nyaa ma y. A bɩ zee darɛ y. Gɔsɩ b'a leer mam zaarɔ bire ʋ y.
40012020	A bɩ niigə gɔ paŋŋawarzaa darɛ y. A bɩ fɩtɩrɛ k'a sɛ paŋŋa ba ʋ bɩ lihire y. A ba a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, an ta an paŋŋa ka tɩrgabaa ʋ.
40012021	Do haay sɩra kaŋ ʋ.
40012022	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, n bʋr gʋaa m Yeezuu zi, zinə n ta m, an a ba bʋʋ, bəətirbaa n ta m sɔ. Yeezuu n a waa, a n nɩ meerbarɛ, a mɩm n nɩ lɛɛ yɩm sɔ.
40012023	Gʋaa cir bɩ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ bɛɛ m na?"
40012024	Bɩ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Naa do k'an naa, la a nawʋm zinəro ra, zinəro jɩtaarɛ Bɛlzebul paŋŋa m bala."
40012025	Yeezuu k'a hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ k'a gʋɔɔ bɩr kʋ mam bɩ y'a darɛ. Kʋnɔ gɛɛ, har kʋ kʋmarɛ ba ʋ bɩ y'a dam sɔ.
40012026	Kʋ Sʋtaana bʋr an nɩ lam Sʋtaana ra, gʋngʋrɛ m bɩ. A kʋ bɩ y'a dam ma, an jɩm dʋntɔ ra?
40012027	Bɩ kʋ Bɛlzebul paŋŋa y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra, awɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ la kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ŋ la sɔ bɩ, ŋ paŋŋa b'a to ka? Bɩ y'a ka ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n n'awɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ.
40012028	Bɩ kʋ Woso Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra, k'a maam k'a dɔ a ʋ, Woso cirbəə bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi.
40012029	A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma, an gasʋ gʋaa paŋŋazaa har ʋ, k'a mɔrlɔ gʋr, k'a n ser ka, an a kʋsɩ, an bɔkarɛ, an gasʋ, an mɔrlɔ wɔɔ gʋr y.
40012030	Gʋaa k'a ba kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ, mɔɔ jɩm m. Gʋaa k'a bɩr a dam mɔɔ han an a so kʋ ma bɩ, a hɩsɩga a nawʋm."
40012031	"Naa y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Woso mimbʋnyaarɔ haay kan sʋnsɔrɔ haay kɩ sugur kam gʋɔɔ ʋ. Bɩ, gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sʋnsɔ wʋm bɩ, a b'a sugur yɩm fɩɩga y.
40012032	Kʋ gʋaa meer ba Gʋaanyɩ bɩ ma, a y'a sugur yɩm, bɩ k'a meer ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma, a b'a sugur yɩm tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, b'a b'a yɩm booti hinni ʋ sɔ y."
40012033	"K'a dɔ a ʋ: gɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ, nyɩ mɩŋŋa a n'a dam. Gɔ bʋnyaa bɩ nɩ nyɩ bʋnyaa dam. N gɔ biyəə dɔ a nyɩ ma.
40012034	Mɩnnɔ kʋsɩrɔ, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a mim mɩŋŋa hɩ a kʋsɩrabaa bɩ nɔ ʋ? Bala, hɔ k'a gʋaa heer han b'a lɛ n'a hɩm.
40012035	Gʋaa mɩŋŋa k'a n'a mɩŋŋabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʋm mim mɩŋŋa m a heer ʋ. Gʋaa bʋnyaa k'a n'a bʋnyaabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʋm mim bʋnyaa m a heer ʋ sɔ.
40012036	Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ: Meerbaa k'a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ haay kʋ gʋaa n'a bam bɩ, Woso y'a larm ma.
40012037	Bala, ɩbɩɩ meerbaa n n'ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ, ɩ meerbaa n n'ɩ dam mim ʋ sɔ."
40012038	Naa kur bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ɩ hoser ba k'ʋ a yɩ."
40012039	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Her naa gʋɔɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ m, ŋ bɩr Woso lɛ sire y, ŋ y'a kam makra ma, bɩ kʋ makra bɩ nɩ, ŋ bɩ makra vanta yɩrɛ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zonas makra bɩ bɛɛ y.
40012040	Bala, Zonas k'a gɔɔta zɔ gʋta nɔ ʋ hi ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ bɩ, sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ gɔɔtam maam sɔ tara noom ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ, sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ.
40012041	Dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, Niniivɩ gʋɔɔ wutire, ŋnɩ her gʋɔɔ nɔɔn da lɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ gumə war bɩ hɩnka ŋ nɩ. Bala, Niniivɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ a bɔ a taam ŋnɩ sugur yɛ Zonas Woso lemim padarɛ ma. Bɩ naa ʋ bɩ, gʋaa ta ʋ an lɛ da Zonas ra.
40012042	Dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, lʋ cir k'a a to jɩsadɔpaasɩ ma an bʋr k'a b'a tʋr ka Salomɔɔn mindɔrɛ meerbaa ma bɩ, a zamaana naa do gumə war bɩ hɩnkarɛ ŋ nɩ. Bala, a to a ʋ kʋ laatʋrɛ ʋ, an bʋr k'a b'a tʋr ka ma, an bɔkarɛ, gʋaa ɩ naa ʋ an lɛ da Salomɔɔn ra."
40012043	"Kʋ zinə bɔ gʋaa mɛ ʋ, a da an nawʋm lɛɛ gəəro zi, k'a a ka hoonsire bɩncɛ ma, bɩ k'a bɩr a yɩrɛ,
40012044	b'a hɩ a heer ʋ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ yɩ m wusigəre m bɩncɛ gusire ʋ.' K'a yaa leeku bɩ, a yaa dɩga a gɔsɩ n a so cɛ b'ʋ, bɩ dintim ba b'ʋ sɔ y. Hɔ haay ɩ cɛ b'ʋ, a bɩncɛrɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa.
40012045	K'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, b'a ta an aa zinəro vantɔɔ gaa saanhɩna, ŋ bʋnyaabaa n lɛ da a mɩŋŋa ra, ŋnɩ bɩ gasʋ, ŋn'a so gʋaa bɩ do ʋ. Gʋaa bɩ do mim bɩ bʋnyaabaa lɛ dam biisi hɔ ra. Zamaana naa do k'an bʋnyaa naa, a mim yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ."
40012046	Yeezuu k'a nɩ meer bam kan gʋɔɔ cir bɩ kɩ bɩ, a da kan a danyɩnɔ kɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ jɩm garga ra, ŋn'a ŋʋam k'a meer ba kan kɩ. [
40012047	Gʋaa n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da kan ɩ danyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ garga ra, ŋ lɛ n taa k'a meer ba kan ɩ kɩ."]
40012048	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ gʋaa bɩ nʋ, a ʋ: "Nka m mɔɔ da? Nkɔɔ m mɔɔ danyɩnɔ?"
40012049	A n bɔkarɛ, an a wɔ nyɔɔ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ da bɩ ba n nɩ, kan mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
40012050	Gʋaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ bam bɩ, mɔɔ danyɩ m, mɔɔ danlʋ m, mɔɔ da m."
40013001	Hinni bɩ dɔ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu bɔ har ʋ, an aa nyɩnta higʋta bɩ lɛ ra,
40013002	zamaa cir gʋta a so kʋ ma a jɩr ʋ. A m bɩ, Yeezuu n kɔ, an aa nyɩnta kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, zamaa bɩ haay n nɩ jɩnɩm hi bɩ lɛ ra.
40013003	A hɔ dɩnda ŋ nɩ gʋta hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ nɔ ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ bɔ, k'a hɔ duu.
40013004	A duu k'a nawʋm bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo zaa gʋr ma, bɛnnɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a bɩ haay.
40013005	Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo jaarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, taa n nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋta y. Hɔyaa bɩ n bɔ lɛɛm, kʋ taa ba b'ʋ gʋta bɩ minto.
40013006	Woso k'a der bɩ, a na hɔka bɩ ma, an ga, k'a məsi ba ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
40013007	Gɔsɩnnɔ n a zar laa gaa ʋ, laa bɩ n haan, an ŋ zɩnzɛ.
40013008	Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ, ŋnɩ haan, ŋnɩ ma, ŋnɩ nyɩ da. A yaa deem yaa ka zɔrɔ, deem busɔrdɩ, deem bukərku.
40013009	Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m bɩ, k'an a tʋr ka ma."
40013010	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ n tɩr meer ba kan ŋ kɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom nɩ?"
40013011	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Woso a ka k'awɔɔ n Woso cirbəə bɩ minno kʋ ŋ y'a nyaakʋm da rɔ wɔɔ dɔ, b'a n a ka nawɔnnɔ ʋ y.
40013012	Bala, gʋaa k'an ta hɔ m bɩ, n y'a yarɛ n n a ka ʋ, a hɔ n yɩ gʋta, bɩ gʋaa k'a ba m bɩ, baa hɔ k'an ta m bɩ, n bɩ yɔm nɩ.
40013013	Naa y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan ŋ kɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom m. Bala, ŋ yɩ dɩgam, bɩ ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y. Ŋ y'a tʋr kam, bɩ ŋ bɩr a marɛ, ŋ bɩr a jɩ mam sɔ y.
40013014	Kʋ hɔ kʋ Ezayii a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ ŋ minto. A ʋ: Awɔɔ mim mam gʋta, b'awɔɔ b'a jɩ marɛ y. Awɔɔ dɩgam mɩŋŋa, b'awɔɔ bɩ lɛɛ yɩrɛ y.
40013015	Bala, do naa do heer a ta. Ŋ tʋr bɩr mim marɛ y, ŋ y'a mɩnyaarɔ tɩnta, k'a bɩ lɛɛ yɩ, k'a bɩ mim ma y, k'a heer bɩ mim jɩ ma y, k'a bɩ sugur yɛ, a a bɔ a taam kʋ mɔɔ n a waa y!
40013016	B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ jɩra: awɔɔ mɩnyaarɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, awɔɔ tʋʋrɔ ɩ mim mam!
40013017	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gʋta kan gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ gʋta kɩ a ŋʋa, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm naa yɩ, bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y. K'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam naa ma, bɩ ŋ n a ma y."
40013018	"K'a tʋr ka hɔduure hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom bɩ jɩ ma.
40013019	Hɔyaa k'a nɩ zaa lezi bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim bɩ mam, bɩ ŋ bɩr a jɩ mam nɔ wɔɔ m. Bala, lɛɛm bɩ, Sʋtaana lemim kʋ n y'a duu ŋ heer ʋ bɩ si ŋ han.
40013020	Hɔyaa k'a nɩ jaarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ marɛ, ŋn'a sim lɛɛm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m brɔɔ m.
40013021	Bɩ, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ məsi ba ʋ y, hindeem gʋɔɔ m. Kʋ heerzar gɛɛ fɩryɩrɛ bʋr Woso lemim bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ ŋ y'a do lɛɛm.
40013022	Hɔyaa k'a nɩ laarɔ bireyaa ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋnɩ Woso lemim bɩ ma, durnya hɔɔndama kan a arzaka lɛtaama kɩ ŋ lemim bɩ zɛ, a bɩr nyɩ darɛ y.
40013023	Hɔyaa k'a nɩ lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso lemim bɩ ma, ŋn'a jɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ m: Ŋ n'ɩ nyɩ dam. A yaa deem ɩ nyɩ dam zɔrɔ, deem busɔrdɩ, deem bukərku."
40013024	Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom vanta da, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a hɔdo mɩŋŋa duu a hɔsɩra ʋ bɩ kɩ.
40013025	Gum k'a bɩ da gʋɔɔ nɩ hinceem bam bɩ, gʋaa bɩ jɩm deem n bʋr, an bɩ sʋr duu hɔyaa bɩ barla, an a hʋr.
40013026	Hɔyaa bɩ k'a bɩ bɔ, an ma, an yaa ka bɩ, sʋr bɩ n bɔ sɔ.
40013027	Hɔsɩrazaa bɩ zibəənyɩnɔ n b'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Zuuba, hɔdo mɩŋŋa bɛɛ ɩbɩɩ duu ɩ hɔsɩra b'ʋ ra? A a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ sʋr n bʋr, an ta ʋ?'
40013028	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: 'Jɩm deem ɩ hɔ naa do ba'. A m naa, zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ʋ ta, ʋ aa sʋr bɩ wʋnwʋr la?' A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ:
40013029	'Ayy••• Bala, k'awɔɔ k'a sʋr bɩ wʋnwʋr, awɔɔ cenle a hɔka bɩ wʋnwʋr sɔ.
40013030	K'a ŋ to kʋ ŋ nɩ ma kan kʋ kɩ, k'an ta, an aa hɔdarɛ dɔmɩm ku. Hɔdarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩm zibənno wɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ: K'a lɛɛ ka a sʋr bɩ gʋr, a kʋsɩ, a da sɛ ʋ, k'a bɔkarɛ a hɔyaa bɩ gʋr a zar m sɩ ʋ.' "
40013031	Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom vanta da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma mutardɩ yaa, kʋ gʋaa n'a sam, an n'a duum a hɔsɩra ʋ bɩ kɩ.
40013032	A m hɔdo haay rɔ wɔɔ poore. Bɩ, kʋ n y'a duu an bɔ, ma an nawʋm, an nɩ lɛ dam hɔyaa haay ra: a ba an nawʋm gɔ gʋta, bɛnnɔ n b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ cɛ kɩnka a vəŋŋəro ma."
40013033	A a ya an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan nyʋnyɔɔ kɩ. Lʋ n a sa, an a tʋntɔ kan nyisi kɩ mɔr gʋta lɛ ma kaakʋ. Nyisi bɩ n ta an der."
40013034	Minno nɔɔn duro haay hɩ Yeezuu n nawʋrɛ ŋ nɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom m. A bɩr hɔsɩ hɩm gʋɔɔ cir bɩ m, k'a hɩ bɛɛ a nawʋm hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom nɩ y.
40013035	Kʋ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa b'a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ. A a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ gʋrɛ, m hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, m hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʋ tee••• bɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ.
40013036	Yeezuu k'a zamaa cir bɩ to, an doo bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Sʋr hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom bɩ jɩ dɩnda wɔɔ m."
40013037	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa do duum bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m.
40013038	Hɔsɩra bɩ, durnya m. Hɔdo mɩŋŋa bɩ, Woso cirbəə nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m. Sʋr bɩ, Sʋtaana nyɩnɔ m.
40013039	Jɩm k'a sʋr bɩ duu bɩ, Sʋtaana m. Hɔdarɛ bɩ, durnya nyarɛ m. Hɔdənno wɔɔ, malɛɛkarɔ m.
40013040	Amba kʋ ŋ nɩ sʋr gʋrm ŋn'a dam sɛ ʋ bɩ, yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʋ:
40013041	Gʋaanyɩ bɩ y'a malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔrɛ, ŋnɩ hɔ haay k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ gʋm Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ gʋr Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ. Ŋ mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ gʋrm sɔ, ŋnɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ,
40013042	ŋn'aa ŋ zar sɛhar ʋ. Ŋ nyi kam b'ʋ, ŋn'a sɔ sʋ.
40013043	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ tɩrgarɔ wɔɔ gure am wosogure hɔ bɩ m, ŋ Zɩ bɩ cirbəə nɔ ʋ b'ʋ. Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m, k'a n'a tʋr ka ma."
40013044	"Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan arzaka gʋta kʋ n y'a nyaakʋm da hɔsɩra ʋ bɩ kɩ, gʋaa n sʋr la: a n so ra, an a nyaakʋm da. K'a heer nyɔɔ bɩ, an a hʋr, an aa hɔ haay k'an ta m nɔ wɔɔ hɛɛ, an hɔsɩra bɩ do si m."
40013045	"Woso cirbəə b'a ya an bɔ kʋ rɛ kan terbarɛzaa k'a n'a kam nyɛɛnyaarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma kɩ.
40013046	K'a nyɛɛnyaa wɩsɩ yɩ, a busoo nɩ yɩm gʋta bɩ, an ta, an aa hɔ haay k'an ta m nɔ wɔɔ hɛɛ, an b'a si m."
40013047	"Woso cirbəə b'a ya, an bɔ kʋ rɛ kan zaŋŋa kʋ ŋ n'a zom hi ʋ, an nɩ zɔ do haay gʋrlɛ an nɩ bɔm nɩ bɩ kɩ.
40013048	Kʋ zɔnɔ a han bɩ n y'a gaa, n n bɔ m hi bɩ lɛ ra. N n bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta, ŋnɩ zɔnɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋkɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ zar mɔr ʋ, ŋnɩ zɔnɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ lo.
40013049	Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʋ. Malɛɛkarɔ zɛm bɩ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ gʋ gʋɔɔ tɩrgarɔ wɔɔ ma,
40013050	ŋnɩ ŋ zar sɛhar ʋ. Ŋ nyi kam b'ʋ, ŋn'a sɔ sʋ."
40013051	Yeezuu n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lar, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ naa haay woo••• ma mɩŋŋa ra?" Ŋ ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••"
40013052	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaamba biyəə k'a n'a bam Woso cirbəə kʋ bɩ karɩndanyɩ bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ rɛ kan harzaa k'a nɩ hɔ gusire kan hɔ daa kɩ bɔrɛ a arzaka ʋ bɩ kɩ."
40013053	Yeezuu k'a hɔbɔkʋrɛnoonno nɔɔn duro da an ŋ nya bɩ, a a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ,
40013054	an doo kʋ k'a tʋr ʋ b'ʋ. A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam kʋ bɩ do sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ, zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ a to mindɔrɛ naa do m ka? A a ba lɔ, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ?
40013055	Gɔwurezaa bɩ nyɩ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m na? Maarii nyɩ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m na? Zakkɩ, Zozɛf, Sɩmɔɔn, Ziidi, a danyɩnɔ bɛɛ m nawɔnnɔ ra?
40013056	Awɔɔ danlʋrɔ ba wɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ ra? A a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ, an n'a dam naa do haay barɛ ma?"
40013057	Naa do a ka, ŋ n kaanm Yeezuu m. A m naa, Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ɩ daʋrɛ yɩm bɩncɛ haay ʋ, b'a bɩr a yɩm a kʋ ʋ, a bɩr a yɩm a har ʋ sɔ y."
40013058	Yeezuu n hoser ba b'ʋ gʋta y, ŋ sɩrakarɛwar bɩ tɔ ma.
40014001	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ Yeezuu mim ma, bala a tɔ bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ.
40014002	A n n'a hɩrɛ a zibəənyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do, Zaan-Batiisi m! K'a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ y'a ka, an paŋŋa yɩ, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ."
40014003	Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ka, ŋnɩ Zaan nyasʋ, ŋn'a sur, ŋn'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, a dam Filipi lʋ k'an ta m, a tɔ m Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ bɩ minto.
40014004	Bala, Zaan a hɩ Hɩrɔɔdɩ m, a ʋ: "A n a ga m k'ɩbɩɩ n a ba ɩ lʋ y!"
40014005	Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ŋʋa k'a Zaan zɛ gər, b'a ɩ nyi bam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m. Bala, brɔɔ haay ɩ dɩgam Zaan ma, ŋ ʋ: Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m.
40014006	Bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm cibsa hinni ʋ, Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ sar ba gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ bir cibsa ma rɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ, an Hɩrɔɔdɩ nɔ yɩ.
40014007	Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a wer si, a ʋ: hɔ k'a lɛ n taa haay bɩ, a y'a kaŋ ʋ.
40014008	Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ da bɩ n a nyʋnnyɔɔta, a ʋ: "A n Zaan-Batiisi mim yɛ laaga burə ʋ." Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n a yɛ maam sɔ.
40014009	Cir bɩ heer n a zar, b'a b'a dam ma, an a gu y, k'a wer si hɔbɩrɛbinno wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ minto. A m bɩ, an lɛ ka kʋ n n'a ka ʋ.
40014010	A n gʋaa deem nyɔɔ, an aa Zaan mim gʋ ma lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ,
40014011	an bʋr m laaga ʋ, an b'a ka nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ b'ʋ, an a si, an aa a ka a da ʋ.
40014012	Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ Zaan gər bɩ sa, ŋn'aa bir, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'aa hɔ k'a a ba bɩ hɩ Yeezuu m.
40014013	Yeezuu k'a mim naa do ma bɩ, a a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ, an da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ k'a ta toore ma a deem. Gʋɔɔ cir kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hʋr a kʋrɔ ʋ a gam ma, k'a zu a jɛ ʋ.
40014014	Yeezuu k'a bɔ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a gʋaa cir yɩ gʋta, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ cicir n a nyasʋ, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ ŋ yaabazannɔ waarɛ.
40014015	Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gum da, bɩ pooyaa m naa, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'aa hɔbɩrɛ si, ŋn'a bɩ!"
40014016	Bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A n a ga m, ŋn'a hʋr y. K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ a zim."
40014017	A m bɩ, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bur soor kan zɔnɔ kɩ hɩɩya wɔɔ n ta m naa ʋ."
40014018	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ŋ ka m ʋ naa ʋ".
40014019	A n lɛ ka, kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta bur bɩ ra, an bur soorlɔ wɔɔ si kan zɔ hɩɩya bɩ kɩ a wɔ ʋ, an dɩga brama, an barka da Woso m. A n buuro wɔɔ zɩnzɛ ra, an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a ka zamaa b'ʋ.
40014020	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay a bɩ, an ŋ ka. Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bur kan zɔ kɩ kuuro kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma bueerehɩɩya.
40014021	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ bɩ bɩ rɔ wɔɔ, yaarɔ wɔɔ lɛ a zɔ tisi soor ma. N n lannɔ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ lɛ sa y.
40014022	Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a ka karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bra higʋta bɩ gəm deem la, k'a gɔɔta a zamaa bɩ da zaa ra.
40014023	K'a zamaa bɩ da zaa ra an a nya bɩ, a a hʋr a deem, an ta ci ra, k'a yaa da. Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, a gɔɔta b'ʋ a deem.
40014024	Kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n a gʋ hi bɩ lɛ bɩ ma, an ta laatʋ hi bɩ bire ʋ. Bala, hɩnhɛr y'a nyam kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zi, hikurero wɔɔ n'a monɩm kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ
40014025	Dɔ k'a bʋr an nɩ mɛm bɩ, a wuti an tɔ hi bɩ ra, an nɩ tarɛ ŋ zi.
40014026	Kʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a yɩ an nɩ tam hi bɩ ra bɩ, nyibəə gasʋ ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Toor m!" Ŋ n'ɩ zee dam.
40014027	Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu meer ba kan ŋ kɩ, a ʋ: "K'a sɩra ka, mɔɔ m, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y!"
40014028	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, k'ɩbɩɩ m paan••• k'ɩ lɛ ka kʋ m bʋr ɩ zi hi bɩ burə ʋ."
40014029	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr." Pɩyɛɛr n bɔ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ tɔm hi bɩ ra k'a ta Yeezuu zi.
40014030	K'a hɩnhɛr bɩ yɩ an nɩ hɔnm kan paŋŋa kɩ bɩ, a da bɔ ʋ, hi bɩ n'a monɩm, an zee da, a ʋ: "Zuuba, m bɔ lɛ m!"
40014031	Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a wɔ nyɔɔ an a nyasʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ sɩrakarɛ poore! A lɔ ɩbɩɩ n sɩnsɩm ka?"
40014032	Ŋ n'a da kʋ ʋ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ hɩnhɛr bɩ n jɩm.
40014033	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kukurə zɛ a taa, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m paan•••."
40014034	Kʋ ŋ higʋta bɩ zɛ ra bɩ, ŋ yaa lee ku Zenezarɛtɩ ʋ.
40014035	Kʋ bɩ do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu yɩ, ŋn'a dɔ bɩ, ŋ yaa a hɩ kʋ b'ʋ haay kan kʋrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ, a bʋr. Ŋ n bʋr yaabazannɔ wɔɔ m haay Yeezuu zi.
40014036	Ŋ n a yɛ han, k'a a wɔ da a huu lɛ tɔkkɛ ma. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a wɔ da ma rɔ wɔɔ waarɛ yɩ haay.
40015001	Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ a to Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ:
40015002	"Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩr zum wɔɔ yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ ʋ? Ŋ n'ɩ hɔ bɩm, bɩ ŋ n a wɔ hir y. A n a ga nɩ y."
40015003	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "B'awɔɔ, a lɔ awɔɔ bɩr zum Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, a bɔkarɛ, an nɩ zum a yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ ʋ?
40015004	Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ. Bɩ gʋaa k'a zɩ bɔ ʋ gɛɛ a da a bɔ ʋ, pakra m, kʋ n n a zɛ gər.'
40015005	B'awɔɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a zɩ m, gɛɛ a da m, a ʋ: 'Daahan kʋ mɔɔ m ga m, m a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ, Woso hɔ nɩ.'
40015006	Pakra bɛɛ m kʋ gʋaa bɩ do m a da a zɩ kan a da kɩ han y. Woso lemim bɩ zar awɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ a yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ minto.
40015007	Zambʋzannɔ, Ezayii gumə ta ʋ, an awɔɔ mim hɩ, a ʋ:
40015008	Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, mɔɔ da ŋ nawʋŋ ʋ a lɛ m, bɩ ŋ heer laatʋ mɔɔ ma.
40015009	Daʋrɛ kʋ ŋ n'a kam mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, vam m. Bala, durnya mim ŋn'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ Woso hɔ m."
40015010	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu zamaa bɩ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a tʋr ka mɩŋŋa k'a jɩ ma!
40015011	Hɔ k'a nɩ gasʋm gʋaa lɛ ʋ an ta a nɔ ʋ bɩ bɛɛ nɩ dintim kam ma y, bɩ hɔ k'a nɩ bɔm gʋaa lɛ ʋ bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma."
40015012	A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, a busu ŋ ma ra?"
40015013	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Hɔ haay kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ n a sɔɔn bɩ, n y'a wʋrm.
40015014	K'a ŋ to, bʋʋrɔ nɩ bʋʋrɔ gaam. Bɩ, kʋ bʋʋ bʋr, an nɩ bʋʋ gaarɛ, ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya haay y'a zarm yaa ʋ!"
40015015	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do jɩ hɩ ʋ m."
40015016	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gɔɔta, awɔɔ n a jɩ dɔ ra?
40015017	Awɔɔ n a dɔ, a ʋ, hɔ haay k'a nɩ gasʋm gʋaa lɛ ʋ, an nɩ tarɛ a nɔ ʋ bɩ, ta an nawʋm, an nɩ bɔm garga ra ra?
40015018	Bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ bɔm gʋaa lɛ ʋ bɩ, a to a nawʋm gʋaa heer ʋ, bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma.
40015019	Bala, gʋaa heer hɔɔndarɛ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ bɔŋ ʋ: gərzɛrɛ, jaandarɛ, koorbarɛ, gʋɔɔ tɔ zarlɛ, kan sʋnsɔwʋrɛ kɩ.
40015020	Nawɔnnɔ nɩ dintim kam gʋaa ma, bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, ɩ n ɩ wɔ hir bɩ bɩr dintim kam gʋaa ma y."
40015021	Yeezuu k'a cem b'ʋ bɩ, a ta Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
40015022	Lʋ nɩ b'ʋ an ta Yeezuu zi, zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ nɩ y, Kanaan do nyɩ m, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "M cicir zɛ Zuuba, Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ zinə n ta m, an nɩ fɩr kam ma gʋta."
40015023	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ y. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma, ŋn'a yɛ han, ŋ ʋ: "La lʋ naa do ra, bala, a ɩ wɔɔ kɔm kan a zeedarɛ kɩ."
40015024	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan seero kʋ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ zi."
40015025	Bɩ, lʋ b'a gu an bɩ kukurə zɛ a taa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, bʋr ɩ da mɔɔ han!"
40015026	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A n a ga m, n nɩ nyɩnɔ hɔbɩrɛ sa, n n a ka jinnyɩnɔ ʋ y."
40015027	Lʋ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Zuuba, baa jinnyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bʋtʋ k'a a lo ŋ zuubarɔ wɔɔ taa bɩ gʋrlɛ, ŋn'a bɩrɛ."
40015028	A m naa Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Lʋ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ gandaa ʋ! Ɩ hɔ k'ɩ lɛ n taa bɩ yɩm!" Lɛɛm bɩ, a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ b'a waa wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ.
40015029	Yeezuu a hʋr b'ʋ, an ta Galilee higʋta lɛ ra, an aa der ci ra, an nyɩnta.
40015030	Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta bʋr zi, lʋgɔrɔ m, bʋʋrɔ m, gandeenzannɔ m, bəətinno kan yaabazannɔ vantɔɔ kɩ m, ŋnɩ bɩ ŋ nyɩnta Yeezuu taa, an ŋ waa.
40015031	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə, kʋ bəətinno nɩ meer barɛ, gandeenzannɔ n a gannɔ yɩ, lʋgɔrɔ nɩ tam mɩŋŋa, bʋʋrɔ nɩ lɛɛ yɩm bɩ minto. Ŋ y'a lɛ bɔ Israyɛl Woso ʋ.
40015032	Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zamaa bɩ cicir ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, bala, a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hɔ m naa, ŋ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, hɔsɩ ba ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a bɩrɛ y. Mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m ŋ da zaa ra kan nɔ kɩ y. Kʋ n bɛɛ nɩ, ŋ y'a dundom zaa ra."
40015033	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ bur yɩ ka pooyaa ʋ naa ʋ, ʋ a ka gʋɔɔ cir naa ʋ, k'an ŋ ka?"
40015034	Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bur karɔ n ta awɔɔ ʋ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Saanhɩna kan zɔ poorenyɩnɔ kɩ."
40015035	A n lɛ ka kʋ zamaa bɩ n nyɩnta tara ʋ.
40015036	A n bur saanhɩna bɩ sa kan zɔnɔ wɔɔ kɩ an yaa da Woso m barka, an n'a zɩnzɛm la, an n'a kam a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kam, zamaa b'ʋ.
40015037	Ŋ n a bɩ, an ŋ ka, an a yɔ, ŋn'a kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma saanhɩna.
40015038	Zamaa bɩ gʋɔɔyaarɔ a zɔ tisi si ma, n n lannɔ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ lɛ sa y.
40015039	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ da zaa ra, an da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ an ta Magadaan ʋ.
40016001	Farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋnɩ hoser yɛ han, k'a makra ba.
40016002	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ woso lɛ a zo, b'awɔɔ ʋ, lɛɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa, bala, brama bɩ piin•••.
40016003	Dɔgta m, b'awɔɔ ʋ la bam her, bala, brama bɩ piin••• b'a kundə sɔ. Awɔɔ brama mim dɔ, b'awɔɔ b'a dam ma a hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bam dɩɩtaa rɔ wɔɔ jɩ dɔ y.
40016004	Her gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr Woso lɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ ɩ hoser yɛrɛ, bɩ ŋ bɩ hoser vanta yɩrɛ kʋ Zonas hɔ bɩ bɛɛ y." A n a gʋ ŋ ma, an cem.
40016005	A hʋr kʋ Yeezuu ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ ŋnɩ bra higʋta bɩ gəm deem bɩ ra bɩ, bur tɔ bɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
40016006	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi, k'a a ba laatʋ farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ nyʋnyɔɔ bɩ ma."
40016007	Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ n bur sa bɩ y'a ka an naa hɩ."
40016008	Yeezuu n a dɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A lɔ awɔɔ n'a hɩm kʋ m, a ʋ: kʋ wɔɔ n bur sa bɩ minto nɩ? Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ gʋta y!
40016009	Awɔɔ gɔɔta a bɩr naa jɩ dɔm na? Kʋ mɔɔ bur soor zɩnzɛ ra, m a ka gʋɔɔyaarɔ tisi soor ʋ bɩ, a tɔ b'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra? Awɔɔ kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ?
40016010	Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bur saanhɩna zɩnzɛ ra m a ka gʋaa tisi si ʋ bɩ, kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ awɔɔ kuuro gʋr ʋ? A tɔ b'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra?
40016011	A a ba lɔ awɔɔ n a jɩ ma, a ʋ, bur bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma? K'a dundo a zi kan farizɛɛnrɔ, sadisɛɛnrɔ nyʋnyɔɔ bɩ kɩ."
40016012	A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a jɩ ma, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, bur barɛ nyʋnyɔɔ bɛɛ an n'a hɩm ma y. Farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ hɔdɩndarɛ an n'a hɩm ma.
40016013	Ŋ yaa lee ku kʋ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma, ŋ ʋ: Filipi-Sezaaree kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Yeezuu laaka da a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ han, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: nka m Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nɩ?"
40016014	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: Zaan-Batiisi m, nawɔnnɔ ʋ: Elii m, gɔsɩnnɔ a ya, ŋ ʋ: Zeremii m, gɛɛ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ deem m."
40016015	A n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: nka m mɔɔ nɩ?"
40016016	Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ si, an a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Krista bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ nyɩ."
40016017	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, Sɩmɔɔn, Zonas nyɩnnɩ, bala, gʋaa bɛɛ sɩra naa do hɩnka ɩbɩɩ nɩ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ m.
40016018	Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, Pɩyɛɛr n'ɩbɩɩ m, bɩ ci naa do mɔɔ n nɩ m sokʋma bɩ dɔrɛ a burə ʋ. Zɛ kan a paŋŋa kɩ bɩ bʋrm la y.
40016019	Mɔɔ Woso cirbəə cɛnyɩrɔ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n n'a kʋsɩm tara burə ʋ bɩ, n y'a kʋsɩm arzana ʋ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n n'a hʋrm tara burə ʋ bɩ, n y'a hʋrm arzana ʋ."
40016020	Naa do jɛ ʋ, a lɛ ka ŋ ʋ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ: ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ m, ŋ ʋ, Krista n'awɔɔ nɩ y.
40016021	A n a sa wakatɩ bɩ do ma, Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Pakra m, kʋ m ta Zerizalɛm ʋ kʋ m aa fɩr yɩ gʋta gʋɔɔgusinno kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ wɔ ʋ. Ŋ mɔɔ zɛm gər. B'a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, Woso mɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʋ."
40016022	Pɩyɛɛr n Yeezuu gaa, an bɔ m toore ma, an nɩ nyaa bam kan kɩ, a ʋ. "Woso dɔrɛ ɩ ma kan naa kɩ Zuuba, mim naa do b'ɩ b'ɩ yɩrɛ y."
40016023	Bɩ, Yeezuu a bɔ, an a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Ɩ jɛ bɔ mɔɔ jɩr ʋ! Sʋtaana, mɔɔ makra ɩbɩɩ n'a bam, ɩbɩɩ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Woso hɔ kɩ y. Gʋɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ m."
40016024	Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'an sɔ a mɩŋŋa m, k'an a gɔdarkʋra busu, an zu mɔɔ ʋ.
40016025	Bala, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a a meeyaa bʋmbɔ, a b'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa ga mɔɔ tɔ ma a y'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ.
40016026	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a so durnya hɔ haay ʋ, an bɔkarɛ an kʋrɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ ma, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Gɛɛ gʋaa y'a mɩsɩrbaa lʋrm kan bɔ kɩ?
40016027	Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ a Zɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, a gʋaa biyəə zibəə nyɔɔdʋ kaŋ ʋ."
40016028	Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ naa, gɔsɩnnɔ zɛ b'a kure, kʋ ŋ n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩ an bʋr a cirbəə nɔ ʋ y."
40017001	Dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu Pɩyɛɛr gaa, kan Zakkɩ kɩ a danzaa Zaan kɩ, an bɔ ŋ nɩ toore ma a minto, ci jintə mim ʋ.
40017002	A n a lʋr ŋ mɩm ʋ. A meer nɩ yɔm am wosogure hɔ bɩ m, a huuro wɔɔ nɩ nyakɩ bɔm, ŋn'a ba fu fɩrr•••.
40017003	Elii n a hɩnka ŋ nɩ kan Moyiisi kɩ, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan Yeezuu kɩ.
40017004	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ naa ʋ, a mɩŋŋa. K'ɩ lɛ taa, kʋ m bur ba kaakʋ: ɩbɩɩ hɔ deem, Moyiisi hɔ deem, Elii hɔ deem."
40017005	K'a nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, warkʋ k'a nɩ yɔm bʋr an b'a ku ŋ la. Meerbaa n a to warkʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ba mɔɔ Nyɩ m na. Mɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta. A mɔɔ nɔ yɩ paan•••. K'a a tʋr ka ma."
40017006	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a dundo, ŋn'a meer kunku tara ma, dabɔʋ gʋta k'a ŋ nyasʋ bɩ minto.
40017007	Yeezuu n a zɔ ŋ ma, an a wɔ da ŋ ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a wuti, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y!"
40017008	Kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ ŋnɩ dɩga bɩ, ŋ n gɔsɩ yɩ dɔ, kʋ Yeezuu y'a deem bɛɛ y.
40017009	Kʋ ŋ n'ɩ zerm ci bɩ ra bɩ, a lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'awɔɔ yɩ naa, a b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y, k'an ta, an Gʋaanyɩ bɩ mɩmbɔʋrɛ ku gəəno bire ʋ."
40017010	A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Elii lɛɛkarɛ an bʋr?"
40017011	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Elii nɩ lɛɛkarɛ an bʋr k'a bɩ hɔ haay banka.
40017012	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Elii bʋr kara, bɩ ŋ n a dɔ y, a hɔɔnhɔ ŋ y'a ba m. Gʋaanyɩ bɩ fɩr yɩrɛ ŋ wɔ ʋ maam sɔ."
40017013	A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, Zaan-Batiisi an n'a hɩm ma.
40017014	Kʋ ŋ lee ku zamaa cir gʋta bɩ zi bɩ, gʋaa a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an kukurə zɛ a taa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ:
40017015	"Karɩnsaamba, m nyɩnnɩ cicir zɛ, hɔɔ n'a zɛm, an nɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta, a tɩr a da sɛ ʋ, gɛɛ hi ʋ.
40017016	Mɔɔ n bʋr m ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, bɩ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋn'a waa y."
40017017	Yeezuu n meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʋ: "Zamaana sɩrakarɛwar zannɔ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm bam karɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ? Dɔmɩm karɔ mɔɔ nɩ m yarɛ, m yɛ kɔrɛ ma awɔɔ minto? K'a bʋr m mɔɔ zi."
40017018	Yeezuu n həən si zinə bɩ ma, an bɔ nyɩ bɩ mɛ ʋ, nyɩ bɩ n laafɩɩ yɩ wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ.
40017019	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar a deem, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ y'a ka wɔɔ n ʋ da ma, ʋ la zinə bɩ ra?"
40017020	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ k'an poore bɩ m. Bala, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan mutardɩ yaa kɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɩm ci naa do m, a ʋ: wuti, ɩ ta lɛɛ naa do ʋ! A wutire an ta, awɔɔ bɩ jɩram hɔsɩ barɛ ra y. [
40017021	Bɩ, zinə ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔ ba ʋ an b'a dam ma an a ka, an bɔ, kʋ yaadarɛ bɛɛ kan lɛkʋsɩrɛ kɩ y.]"
40017022	Hindeem ʋ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so kʋ ma haay Galilee ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N Gʋaanyɩ bɩ dam gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
40017023	Ŋ y'a zɛm, b'a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, Woso y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ." Meerbaa naa do ŋ heer zar gʋta.
40017024	Kʋ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ lee ku Kapɛrnawum ʋ bɩ, Wosocɛ yawʋrsinno a zɔ Pɩyɛɛr ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ karɩnsaamba bɩ bɩr Wosocɛ yawʋr kam na?"
40017025	Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A y'a kam." Pɩyɛɛr k'a lee ku har ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu lɛɛ ka m an a lar, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, nkɔɔ durnya cinno nɔɔm nɩ yawʋr sire ŋ han? Ŋ nyɩnɔ m gɛɛ, saanɔɔ nɩ?"
40017026	Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Saanɔɔ m." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'a maam ŋ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ ba ŋ barla y.
40017027	Bɩ k'ʋ lɛ baa kʋ ŋ n'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ, ʋ ʋ zar a ma bɩ, ta higʋta b'ʋ, ɩ yaa ka zo hi b'ʋ. Zɔ niŋŋə k'a nɩ lɛɛ kam an ka bɩ mom bɩ, bɔ zɔ bɩ do m, ɩ lɛ gʋ, ɩbɩɩ busoo yɩrɛ a lɛ b'ʋ, an nɩ mɔɔ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ yawʋr karɛ bɔm. K'ɩ bɔ ʋ, ɩ b'a ka yawʋrsinno wɔɔ ʋ."
40018001	Wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Nka m jɩtaarɛ Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ?"
40018002	Yeezuu n nyɩ poore bir an a jɩm ŋ bire ʋ,
40018003	an bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a lʋr a a ba, am nyɩ poore hɔ bɩ nɩ, awɔɔ bɩ gasʋm Woso cirbəə b'ʋ y.
40018004	Gʋaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa zerm am nyɩ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, bɩ zaa n jɩtaarɛ Woso cirbəə b'ʋ.
40018005	Gʋaa k'a nyɩ poore si mɔɔ tɔ ma am nyɩ naa do m bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ m si."
40018006	"Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a ka nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka mɔɔ rɔ nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ, kʋ n jɛnlajaa gʋta kʋsɩ a wer ma, n n a da higʋta ʋ, a jɩra.
40018007	Kʋsɩ nɩ kan durnya kɩ, kʋ minno n ta ʋ, ŋn'ɩ gʋɔɔ dom mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ bɩ minto. Minno wɔɔ duro bɩ nyam durnya nɔ ʋ y, bɩ kʋsɩ ɩ kan gʋaa k'a ka ŋn'ɩ zɛm bɩ kɩ.
40018008	K'ɩ wɔ gɛɛ, ɩ gam y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra, ɩ zo laatʋ ɩ ma k'ɩ gasʋ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ, ɩ wɔ deem m, gɛɛ ɩ gam deem m, bɩ jɩra, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋrɛ ɩ wɔ hɩɩya m, gɛɛ ɩ gam hɩɩya m sɛhar k'a lihire ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
40018009	K'ɩ mɩnyaa y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ bɔ ʋ ɩ zo laatʋ ɩ ma, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ mɩnyaa deem m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, bɩ jɩra, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋrɛ ɩ mɩm hɩɩya m sɛhar ʋ bɩ m.
40018010	K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka a nyɩnɔ nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem bɔ ʋ y. Bala, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, arzana ʋ bɩ, ŋ malɛɛkarɔ ɩ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ mɛ yɩm wakatɩ haay. [
40018011	Bala Gʋaanyɩ bɩ, bʋr a ʋ, k'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ.]
40018012	Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lʋnlɔ? Kʋ gʋaa ɩ seero m zɔrɔ, deem n a bɔ ʋ an nyaam, a bɩ bunɛɛhʋ a yaa nɛɛhʋ rɔ wɔɔ tom zigi ra, an ta an aa a ka deem k'a nyaam bɩ ma ra?
40018013	K'a ser bɩ yɩ, a heer yɩm nyɩnta kan kɩ an lɛ da bunɛɛhʋ a yaa nɛɛhʋ rɔ kʋ ŋ n nyaam nɔ wɔɔ ra.
40018014	Awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ lɛ baa sɔ kʋ nyɩnɔ nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem n nyaam y.
40018015	K'ɩ danyɩ a zar ɩ ma, k'ɩ ta zi, ɩ yaa hɔ k'a ba ɩbɩɩ m bɩ hɩ m, ɩbɩɩ kan kɩ a hɩɩya. K'a ɩbɩɩ mim bɩ si, k'ɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra.
40018016	Bɩ, k'a n a tʋr ka ɩ ma, k'ɩ gʋaa na ɩ ma deem gɛɛ hɩɩya, amba Wosoci a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Gʋaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ y'a ga mim kasɛtɩ barɛ m.'
40018017	Kʋ gʋaa bɩ lɛ baa k'a tʋr ka brɔɔ ma sɔ, k'ɩ hɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m. K'a ʋ a b'a tʋr kam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ ma, k'ɩ dɩga ma kɩfɩr gɛɛ, yawʋrsirezaa.
40018018	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: hɔ haay, k'awɔɔ n'a gum ma tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, n y'a gum ma sɔ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ. Hɔ haay k'awɔɔ nɩ yɛm ma tara burə ʋ, n yɛm ma sɔ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
40018019	Mɔɔ m ya, m n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m sɔ: K'awɔɔ gʋaa hɩɩya a zɛ kʋ ra tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, k'a hɔ niŋŋə haay yɛ yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ hɔ bɩ do karɛ ŋ ʋ.
40018020	Bala, lɛɛ kʋ gʋɔɔ a so kʋ ma ʋ hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ bireyaa ʋ."
40018021	Pɩyɛɛr n a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, kʋ mɔɔ danyɩ a zar mɔɔ ma, gallɛm karɔ mɔɔ nɩ sugur kaŋ ʋ? Gallɛm saanhɩna gɛɛ?"
40018022	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ gallɛm saanhɩna y, bɩ, gallɛm busaanhɩna a gallɛm saanhɩna."
40018023	"Naa do minto bɩ, Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan cir k'a wuti k'a a zibəənyɩnɔ lar ŋ zibəə ma.
40018024	A sɩŋŋɩda k'a k'a ba bɩ, bʋr n y'a ʋ zibəənyɩ deem m, an ta talan waa bu zɩm m.
40018025	Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ ba hɔsɩ m an b'a zɩm bɩ karɛ y. A m bɩ, cir bɩ n lɛ ka, kʋ n nɩ gʋaa bɩ hɛɛ kan a lʋ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ, kan hɔ niŋŋə k'an ta m haay kɩ, k'a cɩnta zɩm bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ.
40018026	A m naa, zibəənyɩ bɩ n kukurə zɛ cir bɩ taa, an cicir ba a lɛ ra, a ʋ: 'M cicir zɛ, mɔɔ yɩ m zɩm bɩ kam haay!'
40018027	Gʋaa bɩ cicir n cir bɩ nyasʋ, an zɩm bɩ to m, an a da zaa ra.
40018028	Zibəənyɩ bɩ n bɔ, an a muno wɔɔ deem zɛ ʋ zaa ra, a zɩm n ta ra deniyee zɔrɔ, an a wɔ so a bʋkɔ ʋ, an n'a ŋʋam k'a hoonsi ta rɛ, an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: 'M zɩm bɩ ka m ʋ.'
40018029	A mim bɩ n kukurə zɛ a taa, an cicir ba a lɛ ra, a ʋ: 'M cicir zɛ, mɔɔ yɩ m zɩm bɩ kam.'
40018030	Bɩ, gʋaa b'a gu, an ta, an aa a ka, n n a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, k'an tolle ba, an zɩm bɩ ka, an a nya.
40018031	Zibəənyɩnɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ heer a zar gʋta, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'aa hɔ haay woo••• k'a ba bɩ hɩ cir bɩ m.
40018032	Cir bɩ n zibəənyɩ bɩ bir an a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ bʋnyaa, mɔɔ ɩ zɩm bɩ to ɩbɩɩ m haay, k'ɩbɩɩ cicir ba mɔɔ lɛ ra bɩ minto.
40018033	Ɩbɩɩ n ɩ da ma sɔ, ɩ ɩ mim bɩ cicir zɛ, amba mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ cicir zɛ bɩ n na?'
40018034	Cir bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ gʋta, an gʋaa bɩ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ k'an fɩr yɩ, k'an zɩm bɩ ka haay."
40018035	Yeezuu n a ya, an a na ma, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ y'a barɛ awɔɔ m ncɩnaaʋ, k'awɔɔ bɩr sugur kam kʋ ʋ kan a heer kɩ haay y."
40019001	Yeezuu k'a naa do dɩnda haay bɩ, a a hʋr Galilee ʋ, an ta Zidee ʋ, Zʋrdɛn kur.
40019002	Zamaa cir gʋta zu a jɛ ʋ, an ŋ yaabazannɔ waa b'ʋ.
40019003	Farizɛɛnrɔ n a zɔ ma, k'a nyasʋ meerbaa nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ laaka da han, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa a da ma, an la a lʋ ra, baa kʋ mim kara m na?"
40019004	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba Wosoci b'ʋ ra? A ʋ: 'A sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, Woso gʋaa da kan lʋ kɩ.'
40019005	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'Bɩ y'a ka: gʋaa y'a gʋrɛ a zɩ kan a da kɩ ma, an a zɛ kʋ ra kan a lʋ kɩ, ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya bɩ n a ba deem.'
40019006	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩ hɩɩya dɔ y, ŋ deem. Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a zɛ kʋ ra bɩ gʋngʋm kʋ ma y."
40019007	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m Moyiisi ʋ, n nɩ harcɩntarɛ kaansʋrɛ ci ba, kʋ n nɩ bɔkarɛ n nɩ la lʋ ra?"
40019008	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ heerkarɛ minto y'a ka Moyiisi n lɛ ka k'awɔɔ n la a lannɔ ra. Bɩ, durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, ncɩnaaʋ bɛɛ y.
40019009	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: kʋ gʋaa la a lʋ ra, bɩ lʋ bɩ n jaan da y, an lʋ vanta sa, gʋaa bɩ do, jaandarɛzaa m."
40019010	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa kan a lʋ kɩ mim b'ɩ yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ gʋaa n lʋ sa y, a jɩra."
40019011	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa haay bɛɛ nɩ hɔdɩndarɛ naa do sire y, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a si rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ y'a sim.
40019012	Minno y'a hʋnhɔ y'a karɛ gʋɔɔ bɩr lʋ sire y: Gʋɔɔ ta ʋ, yɩ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ lʋ si y, gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʋ, gʋɔɔ y'a ba ŋ nɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ n ta ʋ, ŋ bɩr lʋ sire y Woso cirbəə bɩ minto. Gʋaa k'a n'a dam ma, an meerbaa naa do si bɩ, k'an a si."
40019013	Gʋɔɔ bʋr nyɩnɔ poorero m Yeezuu zi, k'an a wɔ ka ŋ mim la, an yaa da ŋ tɔ ma, bɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n yɛ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, ŋn'a bam kan ŋ kɩ.
40019014	Yeezuu k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnɔ poorero wɔɔ to, ŋnɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi, a b'a ta ŋ nɩ tolle y. Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nawɔnnɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m."
40019015	A n a wɔ ka nyɩnɔ wɔɔ mim la, an a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ.
40019016	Bɩ kur bɩ, gʋaa a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an a lar, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, bɔ mɩŋŋa mɔɔ n'a barɛ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ?"
40019017	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ larm hɔ mɩŋŋa mim ma? Gʋaa mɩŋŋa ba ʋ kʋ Woso deem bɛɛ y. K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ gasʋ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'ɩ zu Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ."
40019018	Gʋaa bɩ n laaka da Yeezuu han, a ʋ: "Karɔɔ m Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ barla?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y, ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɩ kasɛtɩ ŋʋaar ba ɩ ka ɩ mim la y,
40019019	ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ, ɩ ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa ŋʋa bɩ m."
40019020	Nyukumbueere bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zu lɛrɔ nɔɔn duro haay ʋ, bɔ ɩ gɔɔta mɔɔ n'a barɛ?"
40019021	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ yɩ mɩŋŋa paan••• k'ɩ ta ɩ yaa hɔ k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʋ haay bɩ hɛɛ, ɩ busoo bɩ ka ŋʋazannɔ ʋ. Maam bɩ, ɩbɩɩ arzaka yɩm arzana ʋ. K'ɩ bʋr, ɩ bɩr zum mɔɔ ʋ."
40019022	Bɩ, nyukumbueere bɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a heer a zar gʋta, an a hʋr kan heerzar kɩ, bala, arzakazaa gʋta m.
40019023	A m naa, Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a wer ta ʋ kʋ arzakazaa n gasʋ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
40019024	Mɔɔ m ya, m n'a hɩrɛ: Yoonde gasʋ huuka yaa ʋ zanta, an lɛ da arzakazaa gasʋ Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ m."
40019025	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə meerbaa naa do minto, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ nka n'a dam ma kɛɛrɛ an bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ?"
40019026	Yeezuu n dɩga ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ b'a dam ma y, bɩ, Woso a da hɔ haay ma."
40019027	Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʋ: "Dɩga, wɔɔ hɔ haay to k'ʋ zu ɩbɩɩ ʋ, a nyɩntam wɔɔ ma lɔ?"
40019028	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr an nɩ nyɩntam a cirbəəduu paŋŋazaa bɩ ra durnya daa b'ʋ, awɔɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ naa, awɔɔ nyɩntam sɔ duuro ra kan mɔɔ kɩ k'ʋ Israyɛl do bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ ka.
40019029	Bɩ, gʋaa haay k'a gʋ a harlɔ ma, gɛɛ a danyɩnɔ ma, a danlʋrɔ ma gɛɛ a zɩ kan a da kɩ ma, a nyɩnɔ ma, a hɔsɩrarɔ ma mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a nawɔnnɔ haay yɩm gallɛm zɔrɔ kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ kɩ.
40019030	Bɩ, lɛɛkarɛzannɔ gʋta nyɩntam jɛzannɔ, jɛzannɔ gʋta n nyɩnta lɛɛkarɛzannɔ."
40020001	"Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan gʋaa k'a wuti dɔgta mɩŋŋa m, k'a gʋɔɔ sa a dɩvɛnsɩra zibəə ma bɩ kɩ.
40020002	A n lɛ sa kan zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ k'a deniyee deem ka ŋ ʋ hindeem zibəə busoo. A n ŋ nyɔɔ a hɔsɩra b'ʋ.
40020003	A n a ya, an a bɔ dɔgta wakatɩ nɛɛhʋ ma an gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm daasɩyaa ʋ, bɩ ŋ ba zibəə nɩ y.
40020004	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'K'a ta mɔɔ hɔsɩra b'ʋ sɔ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ zibəə busoo k'a a ga m karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.'
40020005	Ŋ n ta hɔsɩra b'ʋ. A n a ya, an bɔ sinsebir ʋ kan yirbəə wakatɩ kaakʋ kɩ ma, an a ya, an a ba maam sɔ.
