40020006	Yirbəə wakatɩ soor k'a a ku bɩ, a a ya, an bɔ, an gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ yɩ ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm daasɩyaa b'ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'Bɔ m, awɔɔ n gɔɔta naa ʋ dɔgta m saa•••, b'awɔɔ ba zibəə nɩ y?'
40020007	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Gɔsɩ n wɔɔ sa zibəə ma y.' A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'K'a ta mɔɔ hɔsɩra b'ʋ sɔ a yaa zi ba.'
40020008	Lɛɛ k'a bʋr k'a lihi bɩ, dɩvɛnsɩra zaa b'a hɩ a zibəədɩgamazaa bɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ bir, ɩ ŋ busoo ka ŋ ʋ. A sɩŋŋɩda ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, k'ɩ nyambʋr lɛɛkarɛzannɔ wɔɔ ma.'
40020009	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr yirbəə wakatɩ soor ma rɔ wɔɔ a zɔ, n nɩ deniyee deem-deem ka ŋ ʋ.
40020010	Lɛɛkarɛzannɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɔ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, a y'a yɩrɛ an lɛ da. Bɩ, deniyee deem-deem ŋ y'a ka ŋ ʋ sɔ.
40020011	Busoo bɩ kʋ ŋ n'a sim bɩ, ŋn'ɩ kukur bam hɔsɩrazaa bɩ ma.
40020012	Ŋ ʋ: 'Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, bʋr ŋ y'a ʋ jɛ ʋ, ŋ n zi ba wakatɩ deem taan•••, ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ, ɩ busoo ka ŋ ʋ hɔdeem kan wɔɔ kɩ, bɩ zi wɔɔ ba, ʋ kɔ dɔgta m tee••• woso n wɔ wɔɔ ʋ, am sɛ hɔ bɩ m!'
40020013	Hɔsɩrazaa bɩ n a hɩ ŋ gʋaa deem m, a ʋ: 'M gʋaa, mɔɔ n tu ta ɩbɩɩ rɛ y, ɩbɩɩ n lɛ sa kan mɔɔ kɩ kʋ m deniyee deem ka ɩ ʋ hindeem zibəə busoo ra?
40020014	Ɩ zibəə busoo si k'ɩ hʋr. Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m busoo ka gʋaa k'a bʋr jɛ ʋ naa ʋ, amba mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ naa m.
40020015	Mɔɔ ba lɛ m kʋ m m hɔɔnhɔ ba m busoo m na? Gɛɛ nɔntaama n ta ɩbɩɩ m kʋ mɔɔ m mɩŋŋa bɩ minto ra!' "
40020016	Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, jɛzannɔ yɩm lɛɛkarɛzannɔ, lɛɛkarɛzannɔ n yɩ jɛzannɔ."
40020017	Yeezuu a hʋr, an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ. A n karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gaa a hɔ, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
40020018	"K'a tʋr ka, ta kʋ wɔɔ nawʋm Zerizalɛm ʋ naa, bɩ n nɩ zɛm bɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋ ʋ, n n a ka wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ʋ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ n a ka zɛ ma.
40020019	Ŋ y'a kam kɩfɩɩrɔ ʋ, brɔɔ n yaa wʋ ma, ŋn'a zɛ madɩr m, ŋn'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, b'a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, Woso y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ."
40020020	Zebedee nyɩnɔ da a zɔ Yeezuu ma kan a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an kukurə zɛ a taa, k'a hɔ yɛ han.
40020021	Yeezuu n a lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩ lɛ n taa?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Lɛ ka kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔm n bɩ nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ. Deem ɩ bɩsɩ, deem ɩ jɩsa."
40020022	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n hɔ k'a n'a yɛm bɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ y'a dam ma, a fɩryɩrɛ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ yɩ ra?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ʋ da ma."
40020023	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Fɩryɩrɛ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ. Bɩ, k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ jɩsa kan mɔɔ bɩsɩ bɩ kɩ nyɩntarɛ nɩ, mɔɔ n m da ma, m zaa ka y, bala, mɔɔ n m so ŋ ʋ y. N zɛm bɩ ŋ ka gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ bɩncɛrɔ wɔɔ banka ŋ minto rɔ wɔɔ ʋ."
40020024	Karɩndanyɩnɔ buro kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ nɔ ma ʋ kan danyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
40020025	Yeezuu n ŋ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ: gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ, ŋ cinno ɩ paŋŋa barɛ ŋ ma, paŋŋazannɔ n n'a hɔɔnhɔ bam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ.
40020026	B'a n a ga m, an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ bire ʋ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a yɩ jɩtaarɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ, k'an a ba awɔɔ zibəənyɩ.
40020027	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a yɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa awɔɔ bire ʋ, k'an a ba awɔɔ lɔ.
40020028	Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n bʋr kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a hɔɔnhɔ ba y, bʋr a ʋ k'a b'a ba gʋɔɔ zibəənyɩ, k'a ga, kʋ gʋɔɔ gʋta n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ."
40020029	Bɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ Zeriko ʋ bɩ, gʋaa cir gʋta zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ.
40020030	Bʋʋrɔ nyɩnta hɩɩya zaa bɩ lezi. Kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ: Yeezuu n nɩ cenim bɩ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda ba ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ. "Karɩnsaamba, Davɩd Nyɩ, wɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
40020031	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ bʋgʋr barɛ ŋ ma, ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a tʋr ka, bɩ ŋ y'a banka ŋn'a da ra: "Karɩnsaamba, Davɩd Nyɩ, wɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
40020032	Yeezuu n jɩm, an ŋ bir, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m bɔ ba awɔɔ minto?"
40020033	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, a ka kʋ wɔɔ n lɛɛ yɩ."
40020034	Yeezuu n ŋ cicir zɛ, an a wɔ da ŋ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩrɛ, ŋn'ɩ zum Yeezuu ʋ.
40021001	Kʋ ŋ y'a zɔ Zerizalɛm ma, ŋn'a zɔ Bɛtfazee jɩr ʋ Oliviyee ci mim ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya.
40021002	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta kʋ k'a n'awɔɔ lɛɛ naa ʋ. Awɔɔ brada yɩrɛ, n n a kʋsɩ kan a nyɩnnɩ kɩ, k'a hʋr a bʋr ŋ nɩ.
40021003	Kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ lar a hʋrlɛ zaa ma, k'a hɩ m a ʋ: Zuuba lɛ n taa. B'a yɩ ŋ tore ŋnɩ bʋr."
40021004	Ba mim naa do ʋ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ hɔ k'a hɩ naa n kʋ yɩ. A ʋ:
40021005	K'a hɩ Siyɔn zannɔ m, a ʋ: K'a dɩga a cir k'a nɩ zɛrɛ a zi mɩŋŋazerle m, an da bra ʋ, brapoo m, brada nyɩnnɩ m.
40021006	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ta, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba.
40021007	Ŋ n bʋr brada bɩ m kan a nyɩnnɩ bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a huuro ka ŋ la, Yeezuu n da ʋ.
40021008	Gʋɔɔ gʋta n a huuro ka zaa bɩ ra, gɔsɩnnɔ n gɔ lɛɛ yɩnyar ŋn'a ka zaa bɩ ra sɔ.
40021009	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Yeezuu lɛɛ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Hozaana Davɩd Nyɩ! Gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ! Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ arzana ʋ!"
40021010	Yeezuu k'a gasʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, kʋ bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay ŋn'ɩ bɩrlɛ a mim ma, ŋn'ɩ laaka dam, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do nka nɩ?"
40021011	Zamaa bɩ n'a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Yeezuu m, a to a ʋ Nazarɛtɩ ʋ, Galilee kʋ ʋ."
40021012	Yeezuu n gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ lam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ hɛɛnm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ sim nɔ wɔɔ ra. A busoolʋrlɛzannɔ taabɩrlɔ hɩnhɩsɩga kan cirpʋnnɔ hɛɛnno nyɩntaragɔrɔ kɩ.
40021013	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N n a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'N mɔɔ cɛ bɩ birm yaadarɛcɛ' ra? Awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ a sa, a ba konno nyaakʋndajɩ!"
40021014	Bʋʋrɔ kan kusiməro kɩ n a zɔ Yeezuu ma Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ an ŋ waa.
40021015	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ heer n yɩ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ y, kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ an nɩ zi gʋta barɛ, kan nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zee dam Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Hozaana, Davɩd Nyɩ!"
40021016	Ŋ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩm bɩ mam na?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba fɩɩga Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ ka nyɩnɔ kan banfinnirɔ kɩ n n'a lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ' ra?"
40021017	A m bɩ, Yeezuu n ŋ to b'ʋ, an a hʋr an bɔ kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ, an ta Betanii ʋ dɔ n mɛ m b'ʋ.
40021018	Yeezuu k'a wusigə dɔgta mɩŋŋa m, an nɩ tam kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, nɔ a nyasʋ.
40021019	A n sɔɔn yɩ zaa bɩ lezi, an a zɔ ma b'a n hɔsɩ yɩ ma k'a lɛɛ bɛɛ bala y. A m bɩ, an a hɩ sɔɔn bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ yarɛ ɩ nyɩ da dɔ y!" Lɛɛm bɩ, sɔɔn bɩ ga.
40021020	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, ŋnɩ laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ: "A a ba lɔ sɔɔn bɩ n ga lɛɛm ncɩnaaʋ?"
40021021	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: k'awɔɔ sɩra ka, bɩ bɩsɩkarɛ b'awɔɔ heer ʋ, awɔɔ mɔɔ zi kʋ mɔɔ ba sɔɔn naa do m bɩ bam. B'awɔɔ a da ma sɔ, a hɩ ci naa do m, a ʋ, ɩ bɔɔta naa ʋ, ɩ ɩ da higʋta ʋ. A bam maam.
40021022	K'awɔɔ sɩra ka, hɔ haay k'awɔɔ n n'a yɛm yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ haay bɩ, Woso yɩ ŋ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ."
40021023	Yeezuu k'a gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Lɛ kara ɩbɩɩ n ta m k'ɩ naa ba? Nka ɩ lɛ bɩ do ka ɩ b'ʋ?"
40021024	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ m awɔɔ lar mim deem ma, deem bala, k'awɔɔ nyɩ bɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɔkarɛ, m lɛ kʋ mɔɔ n ta m bɩ jɩ hɩ awɔɔ m.
40021025	Batɛm kʋ Zaan n n'a kam bɩ, a to a ʋ Woso zi gɛɛ, gʋɔɔ zi?" Ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ a to a ʋ Woso zi, a y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Bɔ minto m, wɔɔ n sɩra ka ʋ?
40021026	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ zi, wɔɔ ɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ kʋ ŋ Zaan dɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa paan••• bɩ, ŋ bɩ yɛm kan ʋ kɩ y."
40021027	A m naa, ŋn'a nyɩ bɔ Yeezuu nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n a dɔ y." Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ bɩ lɛ kʋ mɔɔ n ta m, m nɩ naa bam bɩ jɩ hɩrɛ awɔɔ m sɔ y."
40021028	"Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam mim naa do ma lɔ? Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta nyɩnɔ m hɩɩya. A n a hɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: 'M nyɩnnɩ, ta her ɩ yaa zi ba mɔɔ dɩvɛnsɩra ʋ.'
40021029	Nyɩ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ bɩ tarɛ y.' Maasɩrɛ k'a ba bɩ, a a hɔɔndarɛ lʋr an ta hɔsɩra b'ʋ.
40021030	Gʋaa bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ nyɩ vanta bɩ m maam sɔ. Nyɩ bɩ do ʋ: 'Ɩɩn•••, baaba,' b'a n ta y.
40021031	Nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro bire ʋ bɩ, nka y'a zɩ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ m". Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, yawʋrsinno kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa hɛɛnm nɔ kɩ lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.
40021032	Bala, Zaan-Batiisi bʋr awɔɔ zi, an zaa mɩŋŋa hɩnka awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n a mim si y. Bɩ, yawʋrsinno kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa hɛɛnm nɔ kɩ a mim si. Awɔɔ naa yɩ, b'awɔɔ gɔɔta awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam k'a mim si y."
40021033	"K'a tʋr ka hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom vanta ma: Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta, an dɩvɛn gɔ sɔɔn, an lambaar da ma, an yaa hɔn, k'a bɩr dɩvɛn bɩ hi bɔŋ ʋ, an bɛŋŋʋ dɔ sɔ k'a tɩr dɔ hɔsɩra bɩ ma. A n a sa, an a da gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a zi ba, k'a b'a nyɔɔdʋ bɩ jir. A n a hʋr, an ta kʋ ʋ.
40021034	Dɩvɛn mɔsa k'a ku bɩ, an a zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɔsɩra bɩ zibənno wɔɔ zi, kʋ ŋ n'aa a hɔ si, ŋnɩ b'a ka a ʋ.
40021035	Zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ŋ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ deem dundu, ŋnɩ deem zɛ gər, ŋnɩ deem bɩmba jaarɔ m, ŋn'a zɛ, an ga.
40021036	Hɔsɩrazaa bɩ n a ya, an zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ gʋta an lɛ da biisi bɩ m. Bɩ, zibənno wɔɔ a ya ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba lɛɛkarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ba nawɔnnɔ m sɔ.
40021037	A nyarɛ ma bɩ, a nyɩyar a nyɔɔ, an n'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ nyɩ m naa, ŋ y'a daŋ ʋ.
40021038	Bɩ, zibənno wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to ŋnɩ nyɩ bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋn'a dɩndam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: 'Naa n nɩ zɛm b'a so a zɩ arzaka b'ʋ. K'a bʋr, k'ʋ a zɛ, k'ʋ ʋ so arzaka b'ʋ!'
40021039	Ŋ n a nyasʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ m hɔsɩra b'ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ gər."
40021040	Yeezuu n laaka da ŋ han, a ʋ: "Kʋ dɩvɛnsɩrazaa bɩ bʋr, bɔ an n'a bam zibənno wɔɔ nɩ?"
40021041	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "A gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro zɩnzɛm, a bɩ ŋ cicir zɛrɛ y, an hɔsɩra bɩ ka gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ ʋ ŋn'a zi ba, ŋn'a hɔ ka ʋ a dɔmɩm ʋ."
40021042	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ karɩnda ba ra? A a hɩ, a ʋ: Jaa kʋ cɛdonno wɔɔ a zo bɩ y'a ba cɛ bɩ jɩr jaa paŋŋazaa. Hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba bɩ n naa do, wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma hɔ mɩŋŋa gʋta.
40021043	Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, n Woso cirbəə bɩ yɔrɛ awɔɔ m, n n a ka do vanta ʋ an cirbəə bɩ zibəə k'a a ga m bɩ ba. [
40021044	Kʋ gʋaa a do jaa naa do ra, a hɩsɩga dam, bɩ kʋ jaa b'a da gʋaa ra a gʋaa bɩ do hɔɔnsɩrɛ.]"
40021045	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoonno nɔɔn duro ma bɩ, ŋ y'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a hɩ a nawʋrɛ a ma.
40021046	Ŋ n'a kam ma k'a nyasʋ, bɩ, ŋ yɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m, bala, zamaa b'ɩ dɩgam Yeezuu ma wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa.
40022001	Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
40022002	"Woso cirbəə bɔ kʋ rɛ kan cir k'a a nyɩnnɩ lʋsarɛ cibsa ba kɩ.
40022003	A n a zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'aa gʋɔɔ k'a hɩ ŋ nɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ cibsa bɩ rɔ wɔɔ bir, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋ ʋ, a bɩ zɛrɛ y.
40022004	A n a ya, an zibəənyɩnɔ vantɔɔ nyɔɔ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'K'a yaa hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ bir cibsa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: mɔɔ cibsa bɩ banka m a nya, mɔɔ m dono zɩnzɛ kan m hɔbɩsɩrɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ, hɔ haay banka, k'a bʋr cibsa bɩ ma kɛɛrɛ.'
40022005	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n dɩga cibsa birle bɩ ma hɔsɩ y, ŋn'a hʋr ŋnɩ ta a zibəəjɩrɔ ʋ, naa n ta hɔsɩra ʋ, naa n ta daasɩ ʋ mɔdrɔ hɛɛjɩ ʋ.
40022006	Ŋ n gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ n zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ nyannɩ da ŋ ma, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
40022007	Cir bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ, an sʋrdaarɔ nyɔɔ ŋn'aa gərzenno nɔɔn duro zɩnzɛ, ŋnɩ sɛ da ŋ kʋ bɩ ma.
40022008	A m naa, an a hɩ a zibəənyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: 'Cibsa bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bankarɛ nya, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ n a ga kʋ ʋ ba y.
40022009	K'a ta zaazɛkʋrarɔ wɔɔ ra, kʋ nka awɔɔ yɩ, k'a hɩ m k'an bʋr cibsa bɩ ma.'
40022010	A zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hʋr, ŋnɩ zaarɔ sa ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ n cɛ kʋ n nɩ cibsa bɩ baŋ ʋ bɩ han.
40022011	Cir bɩ gasʋ k'a dɩga gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr cibsa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma, an a to, an gʋaa yɩ, gʋaa bɩ do n harcɩntarɛ cibsa huu du a ma y.
40022012	A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ ba lɔ ɩ gasʋ naa ʋ, b'ɩbɩɩ ba harcɩntarɛ cibsa huu nɩ?' Bɩ gʋaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ y.
40022013	A m bɩ, cir bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'K'a gannɔ kan a wɔrɔ kɩ kʋsɩ a zo garga ra, monsigə ʋ. Lɛɛ bɩ do an nɩ nyi kaŋ ʋ, an a sɔ sʋ.' "
40022014	Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "N gʋɔɔ bir gʋta, bɩ, n nɩ ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ poore."
40022015	Naa jɛ ʋ bɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ ta, ŋn'aa a so kʋ ma, k'a a ka zaa k'a nɩ Yeezuu nyasʋm ma a meerbaa nɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ.
40022016	Ŋ n a karɩndanyɩnɔ kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ jɛzannɔ kɩ nyɔɔ Yeezuu zi, kʋ ŋ n'aa hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ sɩra ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm, Woso zaa ɩbɩɩ n'a dɩndam sɩra bɩncɛ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr nyi bam gʋɔɔ nɩ y, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩr gʋɔɔ nyʋkɔŋ ʋ sɔ y.
40022017	Bɩ minto bɩ, ɩ hɔɔnhɔ hɩ wɔɔ m, wɔɔ lɛ bɩ zaa ka k'ʋ Rɔm cir yawʋr ka ʋ gɛɛ, ʋ b'a ka ʋ gɛ?"
40022018	Bɩ, kʋ Yeezuu ŋ zambʋ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zambʋzannɔ! Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ mɔɔ makra barɛ?
40022019	K'a busoo kʋ n nɩ Rɔm cir yawʋr kam nɩ bɩ hɩnka m m." Ŋ n deniyee deem hɩnka m.
40022020	Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Gʋaa mim kʋ n y'a da ʋ naa kan gʋrsɩra naa do kɩ, nka hɔɔ nɩ?"
40022021	Ŋ ʋ: "Rɔm cir hɔɔ m." A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a maam k'a hɔ kʋ Rɔm cir hɔ m bɩ ka ʋ, k'a hɔ kʋ Woso hɔ m bɩ ka ʋ sɔ."
40022022	Meerbaa naa do a ka ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hʋr, ŋnɩ Yeezuu to.
40022023	Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, sadisɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʋr Yeezuu zi. Bala, sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ ʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ b'a ʋ y. Ŋ n laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ:
40022024	"Karɩnsaamba, Moyiisi a gʋrsɩra ba an a ka wɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ, kʋ gʋaa cɛmba ta ʋ, an ga an a lʋ to, b'a nyɩ ba ʋ y, k'a dam n lʋ bɩ si, k'an nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ a cɛmba bɩ minto.
40022025	A n bɔkarɛ, danyɩnɔ ɩ nyɩnta saanhɩna wɔɔ bire ʋ, lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n lʋ sa an ga, b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ y.
40022026	A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n lʋ bɩ si, an ga, an lʋ bɩ to b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y. A kaakʋ hɔ bɩ maam sɔ, saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay ŋ gɩnga bɩ ŋ n nyɩ yɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ y.
40022027	Ŋ haay kur bɩ, lʋ bɩ n ga sɔ.
40022028	Gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, kʋ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, nka y'a so lʋ b'ʋ ŋ bireyaa ʋ? Bala, gʋɔɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay lʋ bɩ si."
40022029	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ n gʋrsɩra mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ dɔ kan Woso paŋŋa kɩ bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ n'a nyʋnnyɔɔm.
40022030	Bala, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, yar bɩr lʋ sarɛ y, lʋ bɩr yar sarɛ y, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
40022031	Bɩ, kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ mim nɩ, awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ karɩnda ba ra? A a hɩ, a ʋ:
40022032	'Abraham kan Izakkɩ kɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso m mɔɔ m.' Gəəno Woso bɛɛ y, gʋɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ Woso m."
40022033	Yeezuu hɔdɩndarɛ naa do cem zamaa bɩ hɔɔndarɛ han.
40022034	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu a ka sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋn'a ya ŋnɩ meer ba bɩ, ŋ y'a so kʋ ma.
40022035	Ŋ gʋaa deem kʋ wosocikarɩnsaamba gʋta m bɩ laaka da Yeezuu han, k'a makra ba.
40022036	A ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay bire ʋ, kara ɩ lɛ da?"
40022037	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: " 'K'ɩ Zuuba Woso ŋʋa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, kan ɩ nyi kɩ haay, kan ɩ hɔɔndarɛ kɩ haay.'
40022038	Lɛ k'a lɛ da, a m lɛ gʋta bɩ m naa do.
40022039	Lɛ hɩɩya hɔ k'a gʋtabaa lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ ku bɩ m naa do: 'K'ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m.'
40022040	Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ meerbaarɔ kɩ haay məsi m lɛrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro m."
40022041	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so kʋ ma bɩ, Yeezuu laaka da ŋ han, a ʋ:
40022042	"Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam Krista ma lʋnlɔ? Nka nyɩ nɩ?" Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ m."
40022043	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "B'a yɩ lɔ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ka Davɩd n a bir a Zuuba? Bala, Davɩd b'a hɩ, a ʋ:
40022044	Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ zuuba m, a ʋ: nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʋ, kʋ m tolle ba m a ka, k'ɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta ɩ gam taa.
40022045	K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ Davɩd y'a birm a Zuuba, yɩ an nawʋm lɔ kɛɛrɛ kʋ Krista n yɩ Davɩd Nyɩ?"
40022046	Gɔsɩ n a da ma, an a nyɩ bɔ nʋ y. Hinni bɩ do tɛkka ma, gʋaa ba ʋ dɔ, a heer n kookoo k'a lar mim ma y.
40023001	Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ meer bam kan zamaa bɩ kɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
40023002	"Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋn'a hɩnkam gʋɔɔ m.
40023003	Bɩ minto bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m, a sɩra ka ŋ ʋ, a hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m haay bɩ ba, b'a bɩ zu ŋ zibəə ʋ y. Bala, ŋ bɩr hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m bɩ barɛ y.
40023004	Ŋ tɩr mɔr gorezaa kʋsɩ ŋn'a ka gʋaa mee, bɩ ŋ bɩr a wɔ dam ma k'a a da a zaa han, an a busu y.
40023005	Ziro kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ bam haay rɔ wɔɔ ba ŋ nawʋm kʋ gʋɔɔ m dɩga a ma, bɩ y'a ka, Wosoci lemim kʋ ŋ tɩr a kʋsɩ a tusə ma gɛɛ a za ma bɩ ba ŋ tɩr a ʋ jintə, ŋ tɩr pɛɛra lensəzannɔ dɔ a huuro rɛ, k'an bɩr yɩm.
40023006	Lɛɛ mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋ tɩr a ka ma cibsarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, sokʋma bɩncɛ ʋ, lɛɛ wɩsɩ ŋ tɩr a kam ma.
40023007	A ŋʋa ŋ tɩr a ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr yaa darɛ a m mɩŋŋa gʋɔɔ gaa ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n bɩr a birm karɩnsaamba.
40023008	B'awɔɔ, a bɩ yɛ kʋ n n'a bir karɩnsaamba y, bala, danyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m haay, awɔɔ karɩnsaamba bɩ deem.
40023009	A bɩ gɔsɩ bir tara burə ʋ a ʋ, a Zɩ y, bala, awɔɔ Zɩ bɩ deem, an nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ.
40023010	A b'a ka ma kʋ n n'a bir jɩtaarɛ y. Bala, awɔɔ jɩtaarɛ bɩ deem, Krista m.
40023011	Gʋaa k'a lɛ da awɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ, k'an yɩ awɔɔ zibəənyɩ.
40023012	Kʋ gʋaa a mɩŋŋa busu, Woso y'a zerm. Kʋ gʋaa a mɩŋŋa zer, Woso y'a busum."
40023013	"Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ lɛ tam kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩ gasʋ y. Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bɩr gasʋrɛ y, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a gasʋ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ bɩr brɔɔ tore ŋn'ɩ gasʋrɛ y. [
40023014	Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ awɔɔ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ zonno hɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m bɩ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, a a ya, a gaa, an nɩ yaa jintoo dam kʋ n n'a hɩ a ma gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ. Naa minto m, awɔɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ n nɩ yɩm maam-maam.]
40023015	Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ tam kʋrɔ ʋ tara burə ʋ kan kɔɔlʋʋ nɔ ʋ kɩ an n'a kam gʋaa deem taan••• ma k'an zu awɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ k'awɔɔ ku b'awɔɔ ka an yɩ sɛhar gʋaa gallɛm hɩɩya an lɛ da awɔɔ m.
40023016	Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ k'an bʋʋrɔ, an nɩ zaa hɩnkam gʋɔɔ m, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa ler bɔ Wosocɛ bɩ tɔ ma hɔsɩ bɛɛ nɩ y, bɩ k'a ler bɔ Wosocɛ bɩ sarma bɩ tɔ ma pakra m k'an hɔ k'a hɩ bɩ ba.'
40023017	Hɔɔnwarzannɔ, bʋʋrɔ n'awɔɔ m! Kara ɩ lɛ da a mim nɩ? Sarma bɩ m gɛɛ, Wosocɛ k'a ka sarma bɩ nɩ yɩm Woso hɔ bɩ nɩ?
40023018	Awɔɔ a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa ler bɔ mannɩduu ma hɔsɩ bɛɛ y, bɩ k'a ler bɔ mannɩhɔ k'a n'a burə ʋ bɩ ma, pakra m k'an hɔ k'a hɩ bɩ ba.'
40023019	Bʋʋrɔ n'awɔɔ m! Kara ɩ lɛ da? Mannɩhɔ bɩ n gɛɛ, mannɩduu k'a nɩ mannɩhɔ bɩ kam Woso ʋ bɩ nɩ?
40023020	Gʋaa k'a nɩ ler bɔm mannɩduu bɩ ma bɩ, ler bɔ a nawʋm duu bɩ ma, kan hɔ niŋŋə haay k'a nɩ duu bɩ burə ʋ bɩ kɩ.
40023021	Gʋaa k'a nɩ ler bɔm Wosocɛ bɩ ma bɩ, ler bɔ a nawʋm Wosocɛ bɩ ma, kan Woso k'a nɩ cɛ b'ʋ bɩ kɩ.
40023022	Gʋaa k'a nɩ ler bɔm arzana ma, ler bɔ a nawʋm Woso duu bɩ ma kan Woso mɩŋŋa k'a nyɩnta ra bɩ kɩ.
40023023	Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ dʋlɛɛrɔ bu hɔ ganwʋrɛ bɔŋ ʋ an n'a kam Woso ʋ, a bɔkarɛ, a hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ to, amba: Tɩrgabaa, mɩŋŋabaa, kan sɩrabarɛ kɩ, nawɔnnɔ awɔɔ a ga m, a ŋ ba, a ŋ gɔɔtarɔ wɔɔ ba sɔ.
40023024	Awɔɔ k'an bʋʋrɔ, an nɩ zaa hɩnkam bɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɔ mire sʋrm k'a mɛɛm bɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ ɩ yoonde monɩm.
40023025	Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔmihɔ kan hɔbɩrɛ mɔr burə kɩ sʋrgɔm, k'a dintim gʋ ŋ ma. Bɩ, ŋ nɔ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ koorbaa zibəə kan a hɔɔndarɛ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ yɩ ŋ han.
40023026	Farizɛn, bʋʋ n'ɩbɩɩ m, lɛɛ ka ɩ hɔmihɔ bɩ nɔ sʋrgɔ, a burə bɩ hu bɔm sɔ.
40023027	Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, bɔ awɔɔ ʋ kʋ rɛ kan gəənoyaarɔ huro kɩ, ŋ burə gʋɛrɛ n ta ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, ŋ nɔ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, yaarɔ kan hɔɔ vənno do haay kɩ yɩ ŋ han.
40023028	Awɔɔ do m bɩ, gʋɔɔ ɩ dɩgarɛ a ma gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, an bɔkarɛ zambʋ kan bʋnyaabaa kɩ y'awɔɔ heer han."
40023029	"Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, gəənoyaarɔ awɔɔ nɩ ŋ bankam mɩŋŋa wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ minto, gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ awɔɔ nɩ ŋ yaarɔ gʋɛrɛ dam ma.
40023030	A bɔkarɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta ʋ yaabɔɔ dɔmɩm ʋ, wɔɔ b'ʋ zɛm kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ, ʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ y.'
40023031	Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ kasɛtɩ karɛ a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m.
40023032	K'a maam, k'a a tʋntɔ ʋ, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ yaabɔɔ a sɩŋŋɩda ba bɩ nyambʋr.
40023033	Mɩnnɔ, cɩrkarɔ do n'awɔɔ m! Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lɔ, k'a a da ma, a a si Woso k'awɔɔ dʋdɔ yar, an awɔɔ da sɛhar ʋ bɩ lɛɛ?
40023034	Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ, hɔɔnzannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ zi. Awɔɔ nɔɔn zɩnzɛm, a gɔsɩnnɔ wɔ gɔdarkʋrarɔ ma, awɔɔ nɔɔn zɛm madɩɩrɔ m a sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, a fɩr ka ŋ ma kʋrɔ ʋ.
40023035	Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩm gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ minto, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa gʋaa tɩrga Abɛl zɛrɛ ma, an ta an aa Baraki nyɩ Zakarii k'awɔɔ zɛ Wosocɛ bɩ bɩncɛ paan••• bɩ kan mannɩduu bɩ kɩ bire ʋ bɩ ma.
40023036	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, hʋnhʋrlɛ k'a a ga m gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ naa do minto bɩ, her zamaana naa do n nɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ bɩ do yɩm."
40023037	"Zerizalɛm, Zerizalɛm, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ zɩnzɛm, ɩ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ nyɔɔ ɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ bɩmbam jaarɔ m bɩ! Mɔɔ gallɛm karɔ m a ŋʋa kʋ m ɩ ɩ zamaa so kʋ ma m taa amba kʋrda tɩr a nyɩnɔ so kʋ ma a zarɔ taa bɩ m, b'awɔɔ n yɛ!
40023038	Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, 'N y'a bɔrɛ awɔɔ cɛ b'ʋ.'
40023039	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: an a sɩŋŋɩda sa naa ma, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ y, k'awɔɔ m b'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Barka ɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ mim ʋ!' "
40024001	Yeezuu k'a bɔ Wosocɛ b'ʋ k'a a hʋr bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma ŋn'ɩ Wosocɛ bɩ dɔrɛ mim hɩm nɩ.
40024002	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Naa k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm haay naa, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: jaa deem bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a mim burə ʋ y. Ŋ haay zɛm bɩ wurgə."
40024003	Yeezuu k'a nɩ nyɩntam Oliviyee ci mim ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ a zɔ ma a minto, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "A hɩ wɔɔ m, ba naa do nawʋm brɔ? Makra kara n n'ɩbɩɩ zɛrɛ hɩnkarɛ kan durnya nyarɛ kɩ?"
40024004	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kʋ gɔsɩ b'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ y.
40024005	Bala, gʋɔɔ zɛm gʋta, ŋnɩ meer ba mɔɔ tɔ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Mɔɔ m Krista,' bɩ ŋ gʋɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔm gʋta.
40024006	Awɔɔ yarbarɛ mim mam, kan yarbarɛ k'a n'a dam ma an bɩ wuti bɩ mim kɩ, a bɩ dabɔʋ ba y. Bala, pakra m, kʋ naa haay n ba, bɩ durnya bɩ nyarɛ bɛɛ m cɩna y.
40024007	Do deem gʋɔɔ wutire ŋnɩ yar ba kan do vanta kɩ, tara deem zannɔ wutire ŋnɩ yar ba kan tara vanta zannɔ kɩ, nɔ nyɩntam kʋrɔ ʋ, bɩncɛrɔ niŋŋoo nyiŋŋəm.
40024008	Naa do haay bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ rɛ kan lʋ nyɩ yɩrɛ fɩryɩrɛ sɩŋŋɩda kɩ.
40024009	Bɩ, n y'awɔɔ gʋrm, ŋnɩ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma, ŋn'a zɩnzɛ. Doro haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ minto.
40024010	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ gʋɔɔ gʋta sɩrakarɛ tom, ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba kʋ m, ŋnɩ sɔ kʋ m.
40024011	Ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ zɛm gʋta ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta nyʋnnyɔɔ.
40024012	Mimbʋnyaa pasɩm gʋta, an a ka gʋaa cir gʋta ŋʋarɛ n nyɔɔ.
40024013	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nyasʋ a sɩrakarɛ m kaŋŋɩda an ta an fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nyarɛ ku bɩ, bɩ zaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
40024014	Ŋ Woso lemim nyɩnta naa do pa dam durnya haay nɔ ʋ, k'an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ, doro minto. Naa jɛ, durnya nyarɛ n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ."
40024015	"K'awɔɔ bɩ 'Gʋaa kʋ hɔzaarbarɛzaa bʋnyaa m bɩ yɩ', wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Danɩyɛl n a hɩ ma bɩ, an nɩ nyɩntam lɛɛ mɩŋŋa kʋ Woso bɩncɛ m, b'a n a ga nɩ y, gʋaa k'a nɩ karɩnda bam bɩ, k'a n'a jɩ ma mɩŋŋa.
40024016	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a si, ŋnɩ ta ciro ʋ.
40024017	Gʋaa k'a n'a cɛ mim ʋ bɩ, a b'a ka zerle ma k'a gasʋ a cɛ ʋ a hɔsɩ sa y.
40024018	Gʋaa k'a n'a hɔsɩra ʋ sɔ bɩ, a bɩ doo k'a yaa a huu sa y.
40024019	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, a yɩm kʋsɩ lannɔ jɩsɩzannɔ wɔɔ ma, kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɔ karɛ a nyɩnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
40024020	K'a yaa da Woso m k'awɔɔ sire bɩ bɩ nyɩnta la barɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ gɛɛ, sabaa hinni ʋ y.
40024021	Bala, a nyɩntam fɩryɩrɛ gʋta dɔmɩnnɔ an lɛ da fɩryɩrɛ haay ra, an a sa durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma an naa ma ku, naa lɔɔ n nyɩnta ʋ y, b'a bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ fɩɩga y.
40024022	Kʋ Woso bɛɛ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro bɔrɛ, gɔsɩ bɩ larɛ y. Bɩ, a ŋ bɔrɛ a gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto.
40024023	Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ awɔɔ m, a ʋ: Krista ɩ naa ʋ, gɛɛ, a ɩ bra ʋ, a b'a si y.
40024024	Bala, kristarɔ ŋʋaarzannɔ kan ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ gʋta. Ŋ hoserlo bam kan makrarɔ kɩ, k'an yɩ ʋ, a a da ma, a gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ.
40024025	K'a tʋr ka mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ ser ka m a hɩ awɔɔ m.
40024026	Kʋ n b'a hɩ awɔɔ m, n ʋ, k'a dɩga, a ɩ poo ʋ, a bɩ ta y, gɛɛ kʋ n y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, n ʋ, a a nyaakʋm da naa ʋ, a b'a si y.
40024027	Amba brama tɩr nyakɩ bɔ dɔjɩr ʋ an ta meer ʋ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛm maam sɔ.
40024028	Lɛɛ kʋ hɔgər n ta ʋ bɩ, gɔbɩrgʋrɔ n n'a som kʋ ma ʋ."
40024029	"Kʋ fɩr gʋta dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ bɩ cem, woso bɩ gum dɔ y, mom bɩ gum sɔ y, monyaarɔ surm, brama hɔɔpaŋŋazannɔ haay nyiŋŋəm.
40024030	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ makra y'a hɩnkam brama. 'Do haay n nyi ka. Ŋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an a to brama warkʋ mim ʋ' kan paŋŋa kɩ, lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ.
40024031	'Ŋ hir gʋta bɩ hɛm, an a malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔ durnya gʋrga siro wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, an a sa durnya lɛ ma an ta a cɩntarɛ ma.' "
40024032	"K'a makra sa sɔɔn ma: k'awɔɔ b'a yɩ, an lɛɛ daa da, a lɛɛ nɩ kure, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, siire a zɔ.
40024033	A maam sɔ, k'awɔɔ bɩ minno nɔɔn duro yɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ a zɔ, bɩ, yɩ an nawʋm maam sɔ.
40024034	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zamaana naa do bɩ cenim, kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay bɛɛ ba y.
40024035	Brama kan tara kɩ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ bɩ cenle y."
40024036	"A n ta ʋ bɩ, gɔsɩ n dɔmɩm bɩ do kan a wakatɩ kɩ dɔ y. Baa, malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ y, Nyɩ bɩ n a dɔ sɔ y. Zɩ bɩ y'a dɔ a deem.
40024037	Hɔ k'a ba Nowee dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ sɔ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ.
40024038	Kʋ sɩra nɩ, an lɛɛ ka kʋ hi m durnya bɩ Nowee dɔmɩm b'ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mim, ŋn'ɩ lʋ kam cɛ ʋ, ŋn'a nyɩnɔ kam gʋɔɔ ʋ ŋnɩ ŋ kam cɛ ʋ, an ta an aa dɔmɩm kʋ Nowee gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ ku.
40024039	Ŋ n a zu a ʋ, ŋ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ hɔsɩ ɩ barɛ y, hi bɩ n tolle ba an bɩ cem ŋ nɩ haay. A yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ.
40024040	Kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya ɩ hɔsɩra ʋ: n deem gaam, n nɩ deem to.
40024041	Kʋ lannɔ hɩɩya ŋn'ɩ jaa lɔm, n deem gaam, n nɩ deem to.
40024042	Naa minto bɩ, a b'a zu a ʋ y, bala, awɔɔ n dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ bɩ dɔ y.
40024043	K'a mim naa do jɩ ma mɩŋŋa. Kʋ harzaa b'a dɔ a ʋ, koor bɩ zɛm gunuu wakatɩ naa do ma, a bɩ hinceem barɛ y, a bɩ koor bɩ tore an gasʋ a cɛ b'ʋ y.
40024044	Bɩ y'a ka, awɔɔ sɔ k'a a banka, bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛm wakatɩ k'awɔɔ bɩr a hɔɔn dam ma b'ʋ y."
40024045	"Zibəənyɩ kara n mɩŋŋa, a hɔɔn n ta ʋ? Zibəənyɩ lɛɛzaa zibəə ka ʋ, a ʋ, an dɩga zibəənyɩnɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa k'a nɩ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ kaŋ ʋ a dɔmɩm ʋ.
40024046	Zibəənyɩ bɩ do nyɩntam mimbirenyɩntazaa, k'a lɛɛzaa b'a wusigə an bʋr har ʋ, an b'a ku an nɩ zibəə k'a ka ʋ bɩ barɛ.
40024047	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lɛɛzaa bɩ y'a kam an yɩ a har bɩ haay arzaka dɔmazaa.
40024048	Bɩ, kʋ zibəənyɩ bʋnyaa m, a y'a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, a ʋ, mɔɔ Zuuba maasɩrɛ ba a bɩr zɛrɛ y.
40024049	A n wuti, an a muno wɔɔ zɛ, an hɔ bɩ, an bɛɛ mi kan bɛɛminno kɩ.
40024050	B'a Zuuba bɩ zɛm dɔmɩm kʋ zibəənyɩ bɩ bɩr dɔm ma b'ʋ, kan wakatɩ k'a n a dɔ bɩ kɩ ʋ.
40024051	A zibəənyɩ bɩ hʋnhʋrm mɩŋŋa, an zambʋzannɔ fɩryɩrɛ ka ma, bɩncɛ niŋŋə k'a nɩ nyi kaŋ ʋ, an a sɔ sʋ ʋ b'ʋ."
40025001	"Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan nyɩmbɔnnɔ buro kʋ ŋ y'a fɩtɩrɛrɔ gʋr, ŋnɩ bɔ k'a yaa n'a zim zɛ ʋ kɩ.
40025002	Soor hɔɔn ɩ ba ʋ y, soor hɔɔn n ta ʋ.
40025003	Ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a fɩtɩrɛrɔ gʋr, bɩ ŋ n nyɔɔ tɔ mɔr ʋ, ŋn'a sa y.
40025004	Bɩ, ŋ hɔɔn n ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ nyɔɔ tɔ mɔdrɔ ʋ ŋn'a na a fɩtɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma.
40025005	Bɩ, zim bɩ bɔkarɛ an maasɩrɛ ba a bɩr zɛrɛ y. Hinceem n nyɩmbɔnnɔ bu rɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ hinceem ba.
40025006	Gunuu wakatɩ bueerehɩɩya k'a b'a ku bɩ, zee n bɔ, a ʋ: 'Zim bɩ ba n nɩ! K'a bɔ a yaa a zɛ ʋ!'
40025007	A m naa, nyɩmbɔnnɔ bu rɔ wɔɔ n gu, ŋn'a fɩtɩrɛrɔ bankarɛ.
40025008	Ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm, ŋ ʋ: 'K'a nyɔɔ bɩ ka wɔɔ ʋ poore, bala, wɔɔ fɩtɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ lihim.'
40025009	Ŋ hɔɔn ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: 'Ayy•••, bala, a bɩ gʋta y, a bɩ wɔɔ bɔm kan awɔɔ kɩ y. K'a ta a yaa n a hɔ si a hɛɛrɛzannɔ wɔɔ zi.'
40025010	Ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n ta k'a yaa nyɔɔ bɩ si, a hʋr kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, zim bɩ gɔɔta an bʋr ŋ jɛ ʋ, nyɩmbɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ y'a banka rɔ wɔɔ n gasʋ kan kɩ harcɩntarɛ cibsa cɛ ʋ b'ʋ, n nɩ cɛlɛ bɩ gaa, n n a ta a nyɩ m.
40025011	Maasɩrɛ k'a ba bɩ, nyɩmbɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ bʋr, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: 'Karɩnsaamba, karɩnsaamba, cɛ bɩ gʋ wɔɔ m!'
40025012	Bɩ, b'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: 'Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ n awɔɔ dɔ y.' "
40025013	Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "A bɩ hinceem ba y, bala, awɔɔ n dɔmɩm bɩ kan wakatɩ bɩ kɩ dɔ y."
40025014	"Woso cirbəə b'a ya, an bɔ kʋ rɛ kan gʋaa k'a n'a ŋʋam k'a ta kʋ ʋ, an a zibəənyɩnɔ bir, an a arzaka ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔ ma bɩ kɩ.
40025015	A n talan soor ka deem ʋ, an talan hɩɩya ka naa do ʋ, an talan deem ka a vanta ʋ. Gʋaa biyəə n n'a dam ma an zi ba m b'a ka ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, an cem.
40025016	Gʋaa k'a talan soor bɩ yɩ bɩ n ta an ter ba m, an talan soor vanta yɩ an a na ma.
40025017	Gʋaa k'a talan hɩɩya yɩ bɩ n ta an ter ba m sɔ, an talan hɩɩya yɩ an a na ma.
40025018	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a talan deem yɩ bɩ, ta a ʋ, an aa yaa hɔn, an a zuuba bɩ busoo nyaakʋm da ʋ.
40025019	Zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ zuuba bɩ, k'a ta tee••• bɩ, a a bɔ an bʋr, an n'a busoo bɩ mim laaka darɛ ŋ han.
40025020	Gʋaa k'a talan soor yɩ bɩ n a zɔ, an talan soor k'a yɩ an a na ma bɩ hɩnka, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, talan soor ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ hɔɔ, talan soor vanta ba mɔɔ yɩ na.'
40025021	A zuuba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa k'an tɩrga n'ɩbɩɩ m, a mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ sɩra zi ba hɔ poore nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔ gʋta zibəə karɛ ɩ ʋ, bʋr ɩ heernyɔɔ ba kan mɔɔ kɩ.'
40025022	Zibəənyɩ k'a talan hɩɩya yɩ bɩ n a zɔ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Talan hɩɩya ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ, talan hɩɩya vanta ba mɔɔ yɩ na.'
40025023	A zuuba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa k'an tɩrga n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ sɩra zi ba hɔ poore nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔ gʋta zibəə karɛ ɩ ʋ, bʋr ɩ heernyɔɔ ba kan mɔɔ kɩ.'
40025024	Zibəənyɩ k'a talan deem yɩ bɩ n a zɔ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ gʋaa kʋsɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, lɛɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n hɔ duu ʋ bɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔ daŋ ʋ, lɛɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n hɔ sɔɔn ʋ bɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔ saŋ ʋ.
40025025	Nyibəə mɔɔ nyasʋ, mɔɔ n ta m aa ɩ busoo bɩ biitə tara ʋ, dɩga, ɩ busoo bɩ ba n nɩ.'
40025026	A zuuba bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ bʋnyaa yakʋzaa ra! Ɩbɩɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ hɔ dam lɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ duu ʋ, m nɩ hɔ sam lɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ sɔɔn ʋ.
40025027	A dɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ʋ maam bɩ, mɔɔ busoo bɩ cɩnta ɩbɩɩ nawʋm busoocɩntarɛcɛ ʋ, mɔɔ wusigəre ma, mɔɔ yɩ m busoo bɩ sam kan nyɔɔdʋ kɩ.
40025028	Naa minto bɩ, k'a busoo talan deem k'an ta m bɩ yɔm, a ka talan bu zaa b'ʋ.
40025029	Bala, gʋaa k'an ta hɔ m bɩ, n y'a kam bɩ zaa ʋ, an a na ma, a hɔ m yɩ gʋta. Bɩ gʋaa k'a bam bɩ, baa hɔ k'an ta m bɩ, n bɩ yɔm nɩ.
40025030	Bɩ, k'a zibəənyɩ hɔ vam naa do zo garga ra monsigə ʋ. Lɛɛ bɩ do an nɩ baa daŋ ʋ, an a sɔ sʋ.' "
40025031	"Kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bʋr a cirbəə nɔ ʋ kan malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, a nyɩntam a cirbəəduu paŋŋazaa bɩ ra.
40025032	Durnya kʋrɔ haay gʋɔɔ y'a som kʋ ma a lɛɛ, an gʋɔɔ gʋngʋ a hɔ, amba hɔbɩsɩrɔ dundor tɩr seero gʋ biiro ma bɩ m.
40025033	A seero wɔɔ nyɔɔrɛ a bɩsɩ, an biiro wɔɔ nyɔɔ a jɩsa.
40025034	Cir bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a bɩsɩ ra zannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'Awɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ barka n nɩ kan a kɩ bɩ, k'a bʋr, a cirbəə kʋ Woso a banka awɔɔ minto durnya darɛ sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ si.
40025035	Bala, nɔ mɔɔ zɛ, awɔɔ n hɔbɩrɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ, mɩsɩ mɔɔ zɛ, awɔɔ n hi ka mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ bʋr awɔɔ zi saana, awɔɔ mɔɔ si a har ʋ,
40025036	mɔɔ nyɩnta dɩgɩ, awɔɔ n huu du mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ n nyɩnta laafɩɩ y, awɔɔ bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ nyɩnta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, awɔɔ m bʋr mɔɔ zi b'ʋ.'
40025037	Meerbaa naa do jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: 'Zuuba, wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ nɔ n'ɩbɩɩ zɛrɛ, ʋ hɔbɩrɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ, gɛɛ mɩsɩ n'ɩ zɛrɛ, ʋ hi ka ɩ ʋ?
40025038	Wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ saana, ʋ ɩbɩɩ si ʋ har ʋ, gɛɛ ɩbɩɩ n dɩgɩ, ʋ huu du ɩ ma?
40025039	Wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ ɩ nɩ yaaba m, gɛɛ ɩ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, ʋ ta, ʋ aa dɩga ɩ ma?'
40025040	Cir bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, hɔɔ nɔɔn duro k'awɔɔ n n'a bam gʋɔɔ poorero nɔɔn gʋaa deem m bɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩ, a ba awɔɔ nawʋm mɔɔ m.'
40025041	Naa jɛ ʋ, a y'a hɩm jɩsa ra zannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'K'a jɩ bɔ mɔɔ ma a ta laatʋ, awɔɔ kʋ Woso lerbɔrɛ bʋnyaa n'a jɛ ʋ, k'a ta sɛ k'a lihire ba ʋ, n n a banka Sʋtaana kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ minto b'ʋ.
40025042	Bala, nɔ mɔɔ zɛ, b'awɔɔ n hɔbɩrɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ y, mɩsɩ mɔɔ zɛ, b'awɔɔ n hi ka mɔɔ ʋ y,
40025043	mɔɔ nyɩnta saana, awɔɔ n mɔɔ si a har ʋ y, mɔɔ nyɩnta dɩgɩ, awɔɔ n huu du mɔɔ ma y, mɔɔ n nyɩnta laafɩɩ y, awɔɔ n bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma y, mɔɔ nyɩnta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, awɔɔ n bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma sɔ y.'
40025044	Brɔɔ y'a hɩm nɩ, ŋ ʋ: 'Zuuba, wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ nɔ n'ɩ zɛrɛ, mɩsɩ n'ɩ zɛrɛ, gɛɛ saana, ɩ n dɩgɩ, ɩ nɩ yaaba m, ɩ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, wɔɔ n dɩga ɩbɩɩ ma, k'ʋ da ɩ han?'
40025045	Cir bɩ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a ba gʋɔɔ poorero nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem m bɩ, awɔɔ n a ba mɔɔ m sɔ y.'
40025046	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a hʋrlɛ ŋnɩ ta hʋnhʋrlɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, bɩ gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ tam mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ."
40026001	Yeezuu k'a meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba haay bɩ, a a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ pakkɩ cibsa n zizer.
40026002	N Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋrɛ, n n a zɛ gɔdarkʋra ma."
40026003	A m naa, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ, kan kʋ bɩ gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ n a so kʋ ma wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Kayiifʋ har ʋ.
40026004	Ŋ n kʋ ma k'a Yeezuu nyasʋ hɔɔnkarɛ m, a zɛ gər.
40026005	Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ b'a nyasʋ cibsa bɩ bire ʋ y, kʋ m bɛɛ zɛkʋma nyɩntam zamaa bɩ bire ʋ."
40026006	Yeezuu k'a ta Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a birm kusimə bɩ har ʋ, Betanii ʋ bɩ,
40026007	Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ bɩm bɩ, lʋ n a zɔ ma tidəər k'a lɛ n kʋsɩ m albatɩr jaa gedre ʋ, an a burgu Yeezuu mim la.
40026008	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ nɔ n yɩ y, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ noonkahɔma n naa?
40026009	N y'a da ma, n nɩ tidəər naa do hɛɛ busoo gʋta ma, n n a ka ŋʋazannɔ ʋ."
40026010	Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ yɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ lʋ naa do heer kɔrɛ? Zibəə mɩŋŋa a a ba mɔɔ m naa.
40026011	Ŋʋazannɔ gɔɔtarɛ ŋnɩ bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ tee•••, bɩ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ tee••• y.
40026012	Tidəər naa do k'a a burgu mɔɔ ra naa, mɔɔ gər birle a a banka.
40026013	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lɛɛ haay kʋ gʋɔɔ n nɩ lemim nyɩnta naa do dɩndaŋ ʋ durnya lɛɛ haay ʋ bɩ, ŋ lʋ naa do zi k'a a ba bɩ tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a dɩnda."
40026014	Bɩ kur bɩ, Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ ta wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zi.
40026015	A n aa a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ, awɔɔ: "Bɔ hɔ awɔɔ n n'a kam mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ Yeezuu nyasʋ m a ka a ʋ?" Brɔɔ n wanzurfu busooyaa lɛ sa bukərku, ŋn'a ka ʋ.
40026016	Dɔmɩm bɩ do tɛkka ʋ, Zidas y'a kam toore mɩŋŋa ma k'a Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ.
40026017	Bur kʋ n nɩ nyʋnyɔɔ da ʋ cibsa lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm ma bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bʋr Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa kʋ aa pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ banka lɛɛ kara ʋ ɩbɩɩ minto?"
40026018	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "K'a ta kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ niŋŋəzaa naa zi, a hɩ m, a ʋ: Karɩnsaamba ʋ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm a zɔ, ɩbɩɩ har mɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ bɩ bɩŋ ʋ kan ŋ karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ."
40026019	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba, ŋnɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka.
40026020	Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, Yeezuu nyɩnta k'a hɔ bɩ kan bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
40026021	Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kʋ ŋ n'a bɩm bɩ, Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ gʋaa deem mɔɔ nyasʋrɛ, an mɔɔ ka."
40026022	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ heer n a zar, ŋn'ɩ laaka dam han deem-deem, ŋ ʋ: "Yɩ a nawʋm mɔɔ ra, Zuuba?"
40026023	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a a wɔ nyɔɔ laaga b'ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bɩ m.
40026024	Gʋaanyɩ bɩ garɛ amba hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba a tɔ ma bɩ m, bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋm k'a ka bɩ kʋsɩ yɩrɛ. Kʋ gʋaa bɩ do ɩ nɩ yɩ, a jɩra m."
40026025	Zidas k'a nɩ zɛm b'a nyasʋ an a ka bɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ m gɛɛ karɩnsaamba?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩ ɩ zi m."
40026026	Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kʋ ŋ n'a bɩm bɩ, Yeezuu bur sa an barka da Woso m, an a zɩnzɛ ra, an bɔkarɛ an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a si a bɩ, naa do naa mɔɔ mɛ m."
40026027	Bɩ kur bɩ, an hɔmire sa, an barka da Woso m, an bɔkarɛ an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ haay k'a mi.
40026028	Bala, mɔɔ ma n naa, gʋaasɩbabaa ma m, an a lo gʋɔɔ ciiro minto, mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto.
40026029	A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m dɩvɛn daa mi dʋntɔ y, an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n a mim kan awɔɔ kɩ m Zɩ cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ ku."
40026030	Kʋ ŋ cibsa bɩ laarɔ lɔ ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a hʋr ŋnɩ ta Oliviyee ci ra.
40026031	Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Gum naa do ʋ bala, awɔɔ haay y'a sɩrakarɛ tom mɔɔ minto, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ seero dundor bɩ zɛm, seero wɔɔ n hɩsɩga da.'
40026032	Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m mɩm bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʋ."
40026033	Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ sa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Baa kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay a sɩrakarɛ to, mɔɔ bɩ m sɩrakarɛ tore y."
40026034	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: Gum naa do ʋ bala, an lɛɛ ka koo baadarɛ m, ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʋ ɩ ʋ, ɩ n mɔɔ dɔ y."
40026035	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Baa kʋ ga mɔɔ nawʋm kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, bɩ m. Mɔɔ bɩ bɩsɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma y." A muno wɔɔ haay n a hɩ maam sɔ.
40026036	Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ kʋ n n'a birm Gɛtsemanee ʋ b'ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnta naa ʋ, kʋ m aa yaa da lɛɛ naa do ʋ kʋ m bʋr."
40026037	A n Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zebedee nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Heerzar kan dabɔʋ kɩ gasʋ ʋ.
40026038	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ heer a zar an a zɔ zɛ ma, k'a gɔɔta naa ʋ, a bɩ hinceem ba y."
40026039	A n ta lɛɛ poore, an a do an a meer ku tara ma, an nɩ yaa darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, kʋ fɩryɩrɛ naa do y'a dam ma an a gʋ mɔɔ ma, k'ɩ gʋ m ma. Kan naa kɩ haay ɩ bɩ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y, ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba."
40026040	A n a wusigə, an bʋr karɩndanyɩnɔ kaakʋrɔ wɔɔ zi, a bɩ dɩga a ŋ hinceem ba. A n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ n a da a mɩŋŋa ma a jɩm wakatɩ deem nɔ ʋ tɔkkɛ kan mɔɔ kɩ y!
40026041	K'a yaa da, a bɩ hinceem ba y, a yaa n a do makra nɔ ʋ. Gʋaa heer lɛ taa, b'a mɛsim paŋŋa ba ʋ y."
40026042	A n a ya, an a bɔ a hɩɩya hɔ ma, an yaa da, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, kʋ pakra m kʋ fɩryɩrɛ naa do n mɔɔ yɩ, k'an yɩ maam, k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ n kʋ yɩ."
40026043	A n a ya, an a bɔ an bʋr karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an bɩ ŋ yɩ ŋn'ɩ hinceem barɛ, hinceem k'a nɩ ŋ zɛm bɩ minto m.
40026044	Yeezuu n a ya, an a gʋ ŋ ma a kaakʋ hɔ ma, an aa so a yaadarɛ bɩ ra.
40026045	A n a bɔ an bʋr karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gɔɔta an nɩ hinceem bam, an nɩ hoon sim na? K'a dɩga a wakatɩ a ku, n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋrɛ, n n a ka mimbʋnyaabənno ʋ.
40026046	K'a wuti! K'ʋ ʋ hʋr! Gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ lee ku."
40026047	K'a gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem Zidas bɩ lee ku. Bʋr a ʋ kan zamaa cir gʋta kɩ, ŋn'ɩ kargʋrɔ m kan bənkənno kɩ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ.
40026048	Zidas bɩ lɛɛ ka an hɔ k'a n'a bam ŋnɩ Yeezuu dɔ ŋn'a nyasʋ bɩ makra hɩnka ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ yaa dam nɩ kan daʋrɛ kɩ bɩ, gʋaa bɩ do m, k'a nyasʋ."
40026049	Zidas n a zɔ Yeezuu ma lɛɛm, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m!" A n bɔkarɛ, an yaa da m.
40026050	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "M gʋaasɩba, hɔ k'ɩ bʋr, kɩ b'a ba bɩ ba." A m naa, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a nyasʋ.
40026051	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem a kargʋ gaa ʋ, an wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ deem sakʋ, an a tʋr gʋ ma.
40026052	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ kargʋ bɩ du a caan ʋ, bala, gʋaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ yar bam kargʋ m bɩ, kargʋ n n'a zɛm gər.
40026053	Ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ n da ma, m m Zɩ bir, an malɛɛkarɔ tisi bam hɔka-hɔka nyɔɔ mɔɔ m lɛɛm na?
40026054	Bɩ k'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, Wosoci bɩ meerbaa y'a bam lɔ, an kʋ yɩ? Bala, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Pakra m k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ."
40026055	Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ gʋaa cir bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr awɔɔ ʋ kargʋrɔ m kan bannɔ kɩ k'a bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋ, ɩ ʋ, dazaamazaa m mɔɔ nɩ! Mɔɔ nyɩnta Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ dɔmɩm haay, m nɩ hɔ dɩndam, b'awɔɔ n mɔɔ nyasʋ y.
40026056	Bɩ naa do haay naa, ba a ʋ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ meerbaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosoci b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n kʋ yɩ." A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay n a si, ŋn'a bɔ Yeezuu ʋ.
40026057	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu nyasʋ rɔ wɔɔ ta m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Kayiifʋ har ʋ. Lɛɛ bɩ do wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ a so kʋ ma ʋ, kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ.
40026058	Pɩyɛɛr n zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ laatʋ, an ta an aa lee ku wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʋ. A n gasʋ har b'ʋ, an aa nyɩnta kan hallɛdɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a dɩga mim bɩ nyambʋrlɛ ma.
40026059	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ haay kɩ y'a kam mim ma k'a ka Yeezuu ra, k'a ku a dʋdɔ yar, a ka kʋ n n a zɛ gər.
40026060	Bɩ, ŋ bɩr mim yɩrɛ y, baa kʋ gʋɔɔ bʋr gʋta ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba k'a ka ra bɩ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋnɩ hɔsɩ yɩ k'a ka ra y. Gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ bʋr.
40026061	Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ m da ma, m Wosocɛ bɩ wurgə, m m ya, m a dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ."
40026062	Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n wuti, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩr a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ ra? Bɔ mim gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ minto na?"
40026063	Bɩ, Yeezuu bɩr hɔsɩ hɩrɛ y. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a ya, an lɛ ka ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩ wer si Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ tɔ ma, sɩra hɩ wɔɔ m, ɩbɩɩ m Krista Woso Nyɩ bɩ gɛ?"
40026064	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩrɛ, bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an nyɩnta Woso paŋŋazaa bɩ bɩsɩ ra, awɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ, an bɩr zɛm warkʋ mim ʋ."
40026065	A m naa, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ, an a huuro kɩnkaansʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso sʋnsɔ a a wʋ, kasɛtɩzannɔ zibəə a ya an ta wɔɔ ma ra? Awɔɔ Woso sʋnsɔ k'a wʋ bɩ ma.
40026066	Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lɔ kɛɛrɛ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga zɛ m."
40026067	Ŋ n lihi da a meer ma, ŋn'a wɔrɔ hunhuŋŋu ŋn'a zɛrɛ, gɔsɩnnɔ n n'a wɔ tɩntam lɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ:
40026068	"Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa zi ba, ɩ hɩ wɔɔ m, Krista, nka y'ɩ zɛ?"
40026069	Kʋ Pɩyɛɛr nɩ nyɩntam tɩnsara b'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩlʋrɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem a zɔ ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ kan Galilee gʋaa Yeezuu bɩ kɩ sɔ!"
40026070	Pɩyɛɛr n bɩsɩ ka gʋaa haay lɛɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ hɩ naa jɩ dɔ y."
40026071	A n a hʋr b'ʋ, an nɩ tam har bɩ lɛ ma, zibəənyɩlʋ vanta n a yɩ, an a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do nyɩnta kan Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ kɩ."
40026072	Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an bɩsɩ ka Yeezuu ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ m wer si, mɔɔ n gʋaa naa do dɔ y."
40026073	Kʋ maasɩrɛ ba poore bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a zɔ Pɩyɛɛr ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ sɩra m, ŋ gʋaa n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ, ɩbɩɩ meerbaa y'ɩ tojɩ hɩnkarɛ."
40026074	Pɩyɛɛr n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a wer sim, an n'a tarɛ a rɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n gʋaa naa do dɔ y!" Lɛɛm bɩ, koo n baa da.
40026075	Pɩyɛɛr n mim kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʋ koo n bɔkarɛ, an baa da." A n bɔ, an nɩ nyi kam kan heer zar gʋta kɩ.
40027001	Dɔ k'a mɛ dɔgta mɩŋŋa m bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan tara bɩ gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ lɛ sa k'a Yeezuu ka zɛ ma.
40027002	Ŋ n a sur, ŋnɩ ta m, ŋn'aa ka Rɔm lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ b'ʋ.
40027003	Zidas Yeezuu nyasʋ an a ka, bɩ, k'a b'a yɩ ŋnɩ Yeezuu dʋdɔ yar k'a zɛ gər bɩ, a kʋrkʋr da, an a bɔ an a wanzurfu busooyaa bukərku rɔ wɔɔ ka wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ʋ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ ʋ.
40027004	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a n hɔsɩ ba naa kʋ mɔɔ ka ŋn'a zɛ naa, mimbʋnyaa mɔɔ ba." Bɩ brɔɔ a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Kara ɩ pakra ba wɔɔ ma? Ɩbɩɩ mim m!"
40027005	A n aa busoo bɩ lo Wosocɛ b'ʋ, an a hʋr, an ta an aa bar da a ma.
40027006	Wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ n busoo bɩ gʋr, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, a n a ga m, kʋ wɔɔ n busoo naa do zar Wosocɛ bɩ busoo ra y, bala, gərzɛrɛ busoo m."
40027007	Ŋ nɩ kʋ ma, ŋnɩ busoo bɩ sa ŋnɩ mɔrdor hɔsɩra si m, k'an yɩ saanɔɔ gəənoyaa.
40027008	Bɩ y'a ka, n n hɔsɩra bɩ do tɔ ka, n ʋ: 'Ma sɩra,' an ta, an her dɔmɩm ku.
40027009	A m naa, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zeremii meerbaa k'a ba bɩ n kʋ yɩ: 'Ŋ wanzurfu bukərku bɩ sa, ŋnɩ mɔrdor bɩ hɔsɩra bɩ si m, amba Zuuba a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m. Gʋaa kʋ Israyɛl nyɩnɔ kʋ ma, ŋn'a ter ba bɩ busoo m.'
40027011	Bɩ, Yeezuu yaa jɩm lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ lɛɛ. Bɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ hɩ ɩ zim."
40027012	Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ ɩ mim kam Yeezuu ra, b'a n hɔsɩ nyɩ bɔ ʋ y.
40027013	Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩr minno kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ karɛ ɩ ra bɩ mam na?"
40027014	Bɩ, Yeezuu n deem taan••• nyɩ bɔ ʋ y, naa do a ka cir bɩ n zɛ kədə.
40027015	Pakkɩ cibsa biyəə ma, lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ bɩ tɩr lɔ kʋ zamaa bɩ lɛ n taa bɩ bɔ, an a ka ŋ ʋ.
40027016	A n bɔkarɛ lɔ deem ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, lɔ wɩsɩ, a tɔ m Barabas.
40027017	Pɩlatɩ n laaka da gʋaa cir k'a so kʋ ma b'ʋ bɩ han, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ mɔɔ n wɔ saa ma, Barabas gɛɛ, Yeezuu kʋ n n'a birm Krista bɩ nɩ?"
40027018	Bala, Pɩlatɩ a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ Yeezuu nyasʋ ŋ y'a ʋ ŋn'a ka a ʋ jɩmbaa minto.
40027019	Pɩlatɩ k'a nɩ nyɩntam dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, a laarɛ nyɔɔ da ma, kʋ n n a hɩ m, n ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ gasʋ gʋaa tɩrga naa do mim ʋ y. Bala, gunuu ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ fɩr yɩ nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ a minto."
40027020	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ k'ɩ gʋaa cir bɩ nyʋnnyɔɔm, kʋ ŋ nɩ Barabas bɔrɛ yɛ, kʋ ŋ nɩ Yeezuu garɛ yɛ.
40027021	Lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ bɩ n a ya, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya bɩ barla bɩ, kara awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m bɔ m a ka a ʋ?" Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Barabas."
40027022	Pɩlatɩ n laaka da ŋ han, a ʋ: "Bɩ bɔ mɔɔ n'a bam Yeezuu kʋ n n'a birm Krista bɩ nɩ?" Ŋ haay n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "A wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"
40027023	Pɩlatɩ n laaka da, a ʋ: "Mimbʋnyaa kara a a ba?" Ŋ n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"
40027024	Pɩlatɩ k'a n'a yɩrɛ, a ʋ, awɔɔ b'a dam mim bɩ bankarɛ ma bɩ, bɩ zamaa bɩ y'a ŋʋam k'a lɛɛ zɛ kʋ ma bɩ, a hi kusi, an a wɔ hir m zamaa bɩ lɛɛ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ba gʋaa naa do zɛrɛ barla y, awɔɔ mim m!"
40027025	Zamaa bɩ haay n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ: "K'a zɛrɛ mim n wɔɔ yɩ, kan ʋ nyɩnɔ kɩ."
40027026	A m naa do, Pɩlatɩ n Barabas bɔ, an a ka ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ madɩr m, an a ka kʋ n n a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
40027027	Pɩlatɩ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n ta Yeezuu m lɛɛzaa bɩ har ʋ b'ʋ, sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ haay n a so kʋ ma ŋnɩ bɩr Yeezuu ma,
40027028	ŋn'a huuro bɔ ma, ŋnɩ zaba piinə du ma,
40027029	ŋnɩ laa waa ŋn'a ku a mim ma, ŋ ʋ, cinno firgə m, ŋnɩ bənkə da a bɩsɩ wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ a taa ŋn'ɩ yaa wʋm ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m zɩɩfʋrɔ cir!"
40027030	Ŋ n'ɩ lihi dɩndam ma, ŋn'ɩ bənkə bɩ sarɛ ŋn'a zɛm nɩ a mim ma.
40027031	Kʋ ŋ yaa wʋ ma ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ zaba bɩ bɔ ma, ŋn'a huuro wɔɔ du ma, ŋn'a hʋr m k'a yaa wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
40027032	Bɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ Sirɛnnɩ gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn bɩ zɛ ʋ, sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n paŋŋa ba ma, an Yeezuu gɔdarkʋra bɩ busu.
40027033	Ŋ n lee ku lɛɛ kʋ ŋ n'a birm Golgotaa b'ʋ, a jɩ ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, 'Minkorgo bɩncɛ.'
40027034	Ŋ n dɩvɛn war kʋ ma kan hɔ hɛɛnr kɩ, ŋn'a ka ʋ, k'an a mi. K'a da a lɛ ma bɩ, a n a ŋʋa an a mi y.
40027035	Ŋ n a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, ŋnɩ pʋɛɛga da a huuro wɔɔ ma ŋnɩ ŋ jir.
40027036	Ŋ n a gaa, ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dɔm ma.
40027037	Ŋ n Yeezuu zɛ bɩ jɩ gʋrsɩra ba warga ma, Yeezuu mim la gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma, ŋ ʋ: 'Yeezuu m naa, zɩɩfʋrɔ cir m.'
40027038	Ŋ konno wɔ hɩɩya gɔdarkʋra ma Yeezuu jɩr ʋ, deem a bɩsɩ, deem a jɩsa.
40027039	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cenim b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'a mim zukə zɛrɛ, ŋn'a sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ.
40027040	Ŋ n'a hɩm Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n'ɩ dam ma, ɩ Wosocɛ bɩ wurgə, ɩ ya, ɩ dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ, ɩ bʋmbɔ ɩ zim kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ zer gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma!"
40027041	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ ɩ yaa wʋm ma sɔ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ:
40027042	"A gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ bʋmbɔ, b'a b'a dam ma, an a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ y. Kʋ Israyɛl cir nɩ, k'an zer gɔdarkʋra bɩ ra kɛɛrɛ, k'ʋ sɩra ka ʋ.
40027043	A sɩra ka Woso ʋ, an a hɩ a ʋ, Woso Nyɩ n'a mɩ, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, kʋ Woso y'a ŋʋarɛ, k'a n a yɔ wa."
40027044	Konno kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma a jɩr ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a sʋnsɔ wʋm sɔ.
40027045	Sinsebir k'a da bɩ, monsigə gʋta zɛ tara burə ʋ, an ta an wakatɩ kaakʋ ku yirbəəre m.
40027046	Yirbəə wakatɩ kaakʋ zeezi bɩ, Yeezuu zee gʋta da, a ʋ: "Eloyii, Eloyii, lama sabaktaani?" A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Woso, mɔɔ Woso, bɔ m, ɩ ɩ bɔ mɔɔ ʋ?"
40027047	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ naa ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A ɩ Elii birm!"
40027048	Ŋ gʋaa deem n bra si, an aa hɔ mafʋ-mafʋda sa, an a nyɔɔ hɔ hɛɛnr ma an a da bənkə ma, an a ka Yeezuu ʋ k'an a mi.
40027049	Bɩ, a muno wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Jɩm cɩna, k'ʋ dɩga a Elii zɛm b'a bʋmbɔ gɛ?"
40027050	Yeezuu n a ya, an zee gʋta da, an ga.
40027051	Lɛɛm bɩ, Wosocɛ bɩ pɛɛra bɩ n zɛ kumbir, an a sa mim ʋ an b'a zɛ tara ma. Tara n nyiŋŋə, ciro n wunwu,
40027052	gəənoyaarɔ n a gʋngʋ. Wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n a mɩm bʋmbɔ ʋ gʋta.
40027053	Ŋ n bɔ yaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Yeezuu k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ hinni ʋ, ŋnɩ gasʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ mɩŋŋa b'ʋ, gʋɔɔ gʋta nɩ ŋ yɩ.
40027054	Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir, kan sʋrdaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔm Yeezuu ma rɔ wɔɔ tara bɩ nyiŋŋəre yɩ, kan hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba haay bɩ kɩ, ŋ da n bɔ ʋ gʋta, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Sɩra m, Woso Nyɩ m paan•••"
40027055	Lannɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ guta, ŋn'a to laatʋ ŋn'ɩ dɩgam, zu ŋ y'a ʋ Yeezuu jɛ ʋ Galilee ʋ tee•••, ŋn'a dam han.
40027056	Magdalaa Maarii nyɩnta ŋ barla, kan Maarii, Zakkɩ kan Zozɛf kɩ da bɩ, kan Zebedee nyɩnɔ da kɩ.
40027057	Woso lɛ k'a b'a zo bɩ, Arimatee kʋ gʋaa arzakazaa deem k'a tɔ m Zozɛf bʋr, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩ deem m sɔ.
40027058	A n ta Pɩlatɩ zi, an aa Yeezuu gər bɩ yɛ han. Pɩlatɩ n lɛ ka, n n a ka ʋ.
40027059	A n gər bɩ sa, an pɛɛra fɛʋda burgu ma,
40027060	an a da a mɩŋŋa yaa daa k'a hɔ ci ʋ b'ʋ, an jaa gʋta gərgu an a ta rɛ, an a hʋr.
40027061	Magdalaa kʋ Maarii kan Maarii vanta bɩ k'ɩ nyɩntam b'ʋ, ŋn'a meer nya yaa bɩ rɛ.
40027062	Sabaa bankarɛ hinni k'a cem dɔ n mɛ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ zu kʋ ʋ ŋnɩ ta Pɩlatɩ zi.
40027063	Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ lɛɛzaa, ŋʋaarzaa naa do k'a nyɩnta an a hɩ, a ʋ: Dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, mɔɔ yɩ m mɩm bɔŋ ʋ bɩ, a tɔ ɩ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
40027064	Lɛ ka kʋ n n dɔ yaa bɩ ma, k'an ta an dɔmɩm kaakʋ bɩ ku, k'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma, ŋnɩ bʋr, ŋn'a gər bɩ kʋna, ŋn'a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: A a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ y. Kʋ m bɛɛ m, ŋʋaar naa do lɛ dam lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ m."
40027065	Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ ɩ sʋrdaarɔ m, k'a ta a ka ŋnɩ dɔ yaa bɩ ma amba awɔɔ a da ma bɩ m."
40027066	Ŋ n a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'aa jaa k'a ta yaa bɩ lɛ bɩ kʋsɩ, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ da a dɔma ʋ.
40028001	Sabaa hinni bɩ k'a cem bɩ, hatʋ hinni ʋ wutigʋta m bɩ, Magdalaa Maarii kan Maarii deem bɩ kɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ dɩga yaa bɩ ma.
40028002	Tara n nyiŋŋə lɛɛm, Zuuba malɛɛka n a to brama an zer, an bɩ jaa bɩ gərgu an a gʋ yaa bɩ rɛ, an nyɩnta ra.
40028003	A mɛ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan brama nyakɩ kɩ, a huu bɩ fu am lajaa hɔ bɩ m.
40028004	Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ da n bɔ ʋ, ŋ mɛ nɩ hinkəm, ŋn'a ba ɩ ʋ, gɩnga ŋ y'a ʋ.
40028005	Bɩ, malɛɛka bɩ meer ba kan lannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ Yeezuu kʋ n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ awɔɔ n'a kam ma.
40028006	A ba naa ʋ dɔ y, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ amba a lɛɛ ka an a hɩ bɩ m, k'a bʋr a dɩga lɛɛ k'a nɩ wʋtaŋ ʋ hɔɔ bɩ ma.
40028007	Bɩ, k'a ta zɔɔ a yaa hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: A a mɩm bɔ ʋ, bɩ, a ɩ lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʋ, lɛɛ bɩ do awɔɔ naa yɩ ʋ, naa do mɔɔ kʋ m a hɩ awɔɔ m."
40028008	Lannɔ wɔɔ a hʋr yaa bɩ ra zɔɔ-zɔɔ, kan dabɔʋ kɩ heernyɔɔ gʋta kɩ, ŋn'a si, k'a yaa mim bɩ hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m.
40028009	Bɩ, Yeezuu bʋr an ŋ zɛ ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m." Lannɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma ŋn'a gannɔ nyɩnnyasʋ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ a taa.
40028010	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. K'a ta a yaa hɩ mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋnɩ ta Galilee ʋ, ŋ mɔɔ yɩm b'ʋ."
40028011	Kʋ ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, sʋrdaarɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʋr kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ hɔ k'a ba haay bɩ sa, ŋn'a dɩnda wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m.
40028012	Brɔɔ n a so kʋ ma, kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ kʋ ma, ŋnɩ busoo ka sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ gʋta.
40028013	Ŋ nɩ lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a hɩ a ʋ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ ɩ bʋr gunuu ʋ, ŋnɩ b'a gər bɩ kʋna, bɩ ma bɩ, wɔɔ hinceem ba.
40028014	Bɩ, kʋ lɛɛzaa b'a ma, wɔɔ y'a dɩndarɛ dɔm, mim b'a nɔrɛ awɔɔ ma y."
40028015	Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n busoo bɩ si, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda ŋ nɩ bɩ ba, mim naa do n bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, an ta an lee ku her dɔmɩm ʋ.
40028016	Karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeem nɔ wɔɔ n a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta Galilee ʋ, ci kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ a ʋ, ŋnɩ ta ra bɩ burə ʋ.
40028017	Kʋ ŋ yaa yɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ, bɩ gɔsɩnnɔ sɩnsɩm ka.
40028018	Yeezuu n a zɔ ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N paŋŋa do haay ka mɔɔ ʋ, brama kan tara kɩ burə ʋ.
40028019	Bɩ, k'a ta doro haay zi, a yaa gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ba mɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ, a batɛm ka ŋ ʋ, Zɩ kan Nyɩ kɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kɩ tɔ ma.
40028020	A hɔ kʋ mɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m haay bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ zu ʋ. Bɩ mɔɔ ba n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ, k'an ta an durnya nyarɛ ku."
41001001	Lemim nyɩnta k'a nɩ Woso Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista bɩ mim dɩndam bɩ n naa do.
41001002	Mim bɩ, a sɩŋŋɩda a ba, amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a gʋrsɩra ba biisi bɩ m, a ʋ: Mɔɔ nɩ m zibəəzaa nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, k'an b'ɩ zaa banka.
41001003	A mɩŋŋa leer nɩ bɔm poohɔɔn ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: k'a Zuuba zaa banka, k'a a zaarɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋntɔ rɔ wɔɔ banka, k'a ŋ zɛ kʋ ŋ n yɩ tɩrga.
41001004	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Zaan a hɩnka poohɔɔn ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ pa dam, a ʋ: "K'a a bɔ a taam, k'a batɛm si, k'a a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ."
41001005	Zidee kʋ zannɔ kan Zerizalɛm kʋ zannɔ kɩ bʋr Zaan zi, ŋnɩ batɛm si Zʋrdɛn kɔ ʋ, ŋn'a mimbʋnyaarɔ hɩrɛ.
41001006	Zaan bɩ, yoonde ka huu a du a ma, an kʋmbar so a ʋ. Bɩsɩnɔ kan zɔɔn kɩ a n'a bɩrɛ.
41001007	A hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, a y'a hɩm gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa nɩ mɔɔ jɛ ʋ, an nɩ zɛm, bɩ, a zaa paŋŋa cem mɔɔ han. Mɔɔ n m ga m, m sʋnta a taa, m a kʋsɔrɔ bar tɔkkɛ hʋnhʋr y.
41001008	Mɔɔ batɛm ka awɔɔ ʋ hi nɔ ʋ, bɩ, a mɩŋŋa zɛm bɩ batɛm ka awɔɔ ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m."
41001009	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a to Nazarɛtɩ ʋ, Galilee kʋ nɔ ʋ, an bʋr Zʋrdɛn kɔ ʋ k'a bɩ batɛm si Zaan zi.
41001010	Bɩ, k'a bɩ batɛm si an a nya, an nɩ bɔm hi b'ʋ bɩ, brama a gʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer a mim ʋ, am cirpʋʋrɛ hɔ bɩ m.
41001011	Bɩ leer a to mim ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa kan m heer kɩ haay."
41001012	Lɛɛm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka an ta poohɔɔn ʋ.
41001013	A gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm busi, Sʋtaana n'a gɩngam ma. A mɩsɩrbaa ba a nawʋm poohɔɔ barla, bɩ malɛɛkarɔ bʋr k'a b'a da han.
41001014	N Zaan nyasʋ, n n a du, Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ an bʋr Galilee ʋ,
41001015	an nɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta pa dam gʋɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Dɔmɩm b'a ku, Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ. K'a bɔ a taam, k'a lemim nyɩnta bɩ si."
41001016	Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ tam Galilee higʋta lɛ ra bɩ, a zɔbənno yɩ hɩɩya, Sɩmɔɔn kan a danzaa Andɩr kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zɔ bam, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋa zom higʋta b'ʋ, bala, zɔbənno m.
41001017	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr a zu mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bam gʋɔɔkamazannɔ!"
41001018	Lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ to, ŋn'ɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.
41001019	K'a ta lɛɛ poore bɩ, a Zebedee nyɩnɔ yɩ, Zakkɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋarɔ bankarɛ a kɔɔlʋʋ nɔ ʋ.
41001020	Yeezuu n ŋ bir lɛɛm, ŋn'a zɩ Zebedee to kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ kan zibənno wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a hʋr, ŋn'ɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.
41001021	Ŋ gasʋ Kapɛrnawum kʋ nɔ ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, Yeezuu n gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ, an hɔ dɩnda.
41001022	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ minto. Bala Woso paŋŋa an nɩ hɔ bɩ dɩndam nɩ, a bɩ hɔdeem kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ kɩ y.
41001023	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋaa kʋ zinəro n ta m nɩ ŋ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ, an nɩ zee darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
41001024	"Bɔ ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ ba wɔɔ nɩ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu? Bʋr ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ bɩ wɔɔ zibəə zar gɛ? Kʋ nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ dɔ: Woso gʋaa mɩŋŋa n'ɩbɩɩ m."
41001025	Yeezuu n meer ba ma, a ʋ: "Ɩ tʋr ka, k'ɩ bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ!"
41001026	Zinə bɩ n gʋaa bɩ hinkə kan paŋŋa kɩ, an bɔ a mɛ ʋ kan zee kɩ.
41001027	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay zɛ kədə, ŋn'ɩ laaka dɩndam kʋ han, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m naa? Hɔdɩndarɛ daa kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ bɩ ba n nɩ! A m lɛ da bɩ, Yeezuu ɩ həən sim zinəro wɔɔ ma, ŋn'a lɛ sire."
41001028	Yeezuu tɔ bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ, Galilee kʋ ʋ.
41001029	Kʋ ŋ bɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ ta Sɩmɔɔn kan Andɩr kɩ har ʋ, kan Zakkɩ kɩ Zaan kɩ.
41001030	Bɩ ma bɩ, Sɩmɔɔn dində ɩ wʋtam kan mɛmarɛ kɩ. Lɛɛm bɩ, n yaabazaa bɩ mim hɩ Yeezuu m.
41001031	Yeezuu a zɔ, an a wɔ nyasʋ, an a ka an wuti. Mɛmarɛ bɩ n bɔ a mɛ ʋ, an wuti, an nyasʋ ŋ nɩ.
41001032	Yirbəəre m bɩ, woso lɛzore dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, n bʋr yaabazannɔ m kan hɔɔzannɔ kɩ m haay Yeezuu zi.
41001033	Kʋ bɩ zannɔ haay a so kʋ ma har bɩ lɛ ma.
41001034	A yaabazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir bam yaaba do haay m nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ waa gʋta, an la zinəro ra gʋta gʋɔɔ mɛ ʋ. Yeezuu n zinəro wɔɔ to ŋn'ɩ meer barɛ y, kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ bɩ minto.
41001035	Dɔgta mɩŋŋa m, Yeezuu wuti, an bɔ, an ta poohɔɔn ʋ, an nɩ yaa dam b'ʋ.
41001036	Sɩmɔɔn wuti kan a muno kɩ, ŋn'a dɩndaŋ ʋ,
41001037	ŋn'aa yɩ, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma!"
41001038	Bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ʋ ta kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lezima rɔ wɔɔ ʋ sɔ, kʋ m aa Woso lemim nyɩnta dɩnda ŋ nɩ. Bala, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto."
41001039	A a da Galilee kʋrɔ wɔɔ zi haay, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ ŋ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra.
41001040	Kusimə deem n b'a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an sʋnta, an a zuutə a taa, an n'a yɛm han, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ mɔɔ waa."
41001041	Yeezuu a cicir zɛ, an a wɔ hʋr, an a da ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ taa ma k'ɩ laafɩɩ yɩ."
41001042	Lɛɛm bɩ, yaaba bɩ bɔ kusimə bɩ mɛ ʋ, an a ba mɩŋŋa.
41001043	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɔɔ, an lɛ ka ʋ,
41001044	an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Dundo ɩ zi, ɩ b'a ka ɩ hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y. Ta ɩ yaa ɩ hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbər bɩ m, hubɔrɛ mannɩ kʋ Moyiisi lɛ ka awɔɔ ʋ k'a ba bɩ, k'ɩ bɩ ba, kʋ gʋaa biyəə n a dɔ, a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ laafɩɩ yɩ."
41001045	Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ bɔ, an a hʋr, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ mim bɩ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m lɛɛ haay ʋ. Naa do minto ma, Yeezuu b'a dam ma, an a hɩnka, an gasʋ kʋnɔ ʋ y. Gɔɔta a tɩr a ʋ bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʋ. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ a to lɛɛ haay ʋ, ŋn'ɩ zɛm Yeezuu zi.
41002001	Dɔmɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ cem nɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, Yeezuu a wusigə, an bʋr Kapɛrnawum kʋnɔ ʋ, bɩ gʋɔɔ a ma ŋ ʋ, a lee ku an nɩ har ʋ.
41002002	Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a so kʋ ma b'ʋ, lɛ ba b'ʋ y, baa cɛlɛ ma bɩ, lɛ ba ʋ sɔ y. Yeezuu nɩ Woso lemim dɩndam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
41002003	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʋr zi mɛgarɛzaa m, ŋn'a busu gʋaa si.
41002004	Kʋ ŋ n a da ma, ŋn'ɩ tam nɩ Yeezuu zi bɩ, zamaa bɩ minto m, ŋ n cɛ mim bɩ hɔn ra, bɩncɛ kʋ Yeezuu n ta ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ busu kan a wʋtarahɔ bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a zer cɛ bɩ yaa bɩ m.
41002005	Kʋ Yeezuu ŋ sɩrakarɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ sugur yɩ!"
41002006	Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ nyɩntam, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ:
41002007	"Bɔ m, gʋaa naa do nɩ meer naa do barɛ? Woso sʋnsɔ a n'a wʋm! Nka y'a da ma, an gʋaa mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka ʋ, kʋ Woso deem bɛɛ?"
41002008	Zɔɔ-zɔɔ bala, hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam ma a heer ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a dɔ a zim, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto m awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʋ?
41002009	Kara m naanaa? Mɔɔ n b'a hɩm mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ: ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ bɩ m gɛɛ, ɩ wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr, ɩ ta bɩ nɩ?
41002010	Bɩ, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ, a ʋ: Gʋaanyɩ b'a da ma, an gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ, tara burə ʋ naa ʋ."
41002011	A n a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr, ɩ doo ɩ har ʋ!"
41002012	Lɛɛm bɩ, a wuti, an a wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr, an bɔ m, gʋaa biyəə mɩm m. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n mim naa do lɔɔ yɩ deem y."
41002013	Yeezuu a ya, an ta Galilee higʋta lɛ ra. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay bʋr zi, an nɩ Woso lemim dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
41002014	K'a nɩ cenim bɩ, a Alfee nyɩnnɩ Levii yɩ. A n nɩ nyɩntarɛ a yawʋrsire bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ!" Levii bɩ n wuti, an nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.
41002015	Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ nyɩntam Levii har ʋ b'ʋ k'a hɔ bɩ bɩ, yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ gʋta nyɩnta kan kɩ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Bala, gʋɔɔ gʋta zu kʋ ʋ kan Yeezuu kɩ.
41002016	Zɛkʋrazannɔ n ta ʋ, ŋn'ɩ ŋ birm farizɛɛnrɔ. Kʋ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a yɩ, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan yawʋrsinno wɔɔ kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "A lɔ, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan yawʋrsinno wɔɔ kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ kɩ?"
41002017	Yeezuu k'a mim bɩ ma bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩzannɔ lɛ baa lɔɔtɔr ma y, bɩ yaabazannɔ lɛ n taa lɔɔtɔr ma. Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ m bɩ gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bir y, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɩ mimbʋnyaabənno bir."
41002018	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm. Ŋ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ Yeezuu lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto nɩ, Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ n'a lɛ kʋsɩm, b'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr a lɛ kʋsɩrɛ?"
41002019	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ɩ lʋsarɛ cibsa barɛ, lʋ bɩ zim bɩ n gɔɔta, an nɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm na? Kʋ lʋ bɩ zim bɩ nɩ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a lɛ kʋsɩ y.
41002020	Dɔmɩnnɔ niŋŋoo zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ, kʋ n bɩ lʋ bɩ zim bɩ gʋ ŋ ma, ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ."
41002021	A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ pɛɛra daa kər sam, an a sɩnsar kan huu gusire kɩ y. Pɛɛra daa kər bɩ n nɩ huu gusire hɔ bɩ gaam, an n'a kaansʋm, an nɩ cenim biisi han."
41002022	A n a ya, an a vanta hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ dɩvɛn daa sam k'a tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ gusinno ʋ y. Kʋ n bɛɛ m, dɩvɛn bɩ hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ hɩnhaanm. Dɩvɛn bɩ kan hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ y'a zaar bam. Bɩ, k'a dɩvɛn daa tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ daarɔ ʋ."
41002023	Hindeem ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, Yeezuu bɔ hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ y'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ hɔyaa gɔyir yɩnyarm.
41002024	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Dɩga, hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bam sabaa hinni ʋ! A n a ga m, ŋn'a ba a hinni ʋ y."
41002025	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mim k'a pakra ba Davɩd m kan a gʋɔɔ kɩ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ, hɔ niŋŋə k'a a ba, nɔ k'a ŋ nyasʋ bɩ,
41002026	gasʋ k'a ʋ Wosocɛ ʋ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Abɩyataar dɔmɩm ʋ, an bur kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta Woso m bɩ gʋr, an a bɩ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba ra? Bɩ, ŋ n a ga m, ŋn'a bɩ, kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ bɛɛ m bala y."
41002027	Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Hoonsire dɔmɩm bɩ ba Woso ʋ, gʋaa minto, bɩ, a n gʋaa ba hoonsire dɔmɩm minto y.
41002028	Bɩ y'a ka, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m sabaa hinni bɩ minzaa."
41003001	Sabaa vanta hinni ʋ, Yeezuu a ya, an gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, gʋaa deem n ta ʋ, a wɔ n ga.
41003002	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ dɩgam Yeezuu ma, hɔ k'a n'a bam sabaa hinni ʋ, k'a gʋaa bɩ waam k'a yɩ. A ka brɔɔ nawʋm ma, k'a mim ka Yeezuu ra, mim naa do jɛ ʋ.
41003003	Yeezuu n a hɩ wɔgərzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti, ɩ bʋr bireyaa ʋ naa ʋ!"
41003004	B'a a hɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Sabaa hinni ʋ, bɔ barɛ n mɩŋŋa? Zibəə mɩŋŋa barɛ m gɛɛ, zibəə bʋnyaa barɛ nɩ? Gʋaa meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ m gɛɛ, gʋaa zɛrɛ nɩ?" Bɩ ŋ bɩr a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ y.
41003005	A ɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma a jɩr ʋ kan nɔmaa kɩ, a heer n a zar ŋ heerkarɛ bɩ minto. A n a hɩ gʋaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ wɔ bɩ hʋr!" B'a a hʋr, a wɔ bɩ n a banka.
41003006	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a hɔɔn dam hɔ k'a n'a bam, k'a Yeezuu ku a zɛ bɩ ma.
41003007	Yeezuu ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ Galilee higʋta lɛ ra. Zamaa gʋta n zu a jɛ ʋ. Zamaa bɩ, a to ŋ y'a ʋ Galilee ʋ, Zidee ʋ,
41003008	Zerizalɛm ʋ, Idumee ʋ, kan Zʋrdɛn kɔ kur zannɔ kɩ, Tiir kʋ kan Sidɔn kʋ zannɔ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ gʋta n bʋr zi, hɔ haay k'a a ba bɩ minto.
41003009	A a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ, k'a a zɔ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ m mɔɔ jɩr ʋ, kʋ zamaa bɩ b'a da ma, ŋn'a so mɔɔ ʋ y.
41003010	Yeezuu k'a gʋɔɔ waa gʋta bɩ minto y'a ka, yaabazannɔ wɔɔ haay lɛ n taa k'a lɛɛ ka a a zɔ ma, a a wɔ da ma.
41003011	Zinəro wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ kukurə zɛ, ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ: "Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m!"
41003012	A həən si ŋ ma kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ, ŋ b'a ka n n'a dɔ y.
41003013	Yeezuu der ci ra, an nɩ gʋɔɔ k'a lɛ n taa ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ birm. Brɔɔ ŋ bʋr zi.
41003014	A n ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ gʋaa bueerehɩɩya, kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta kan a kɩ, k'a bɩr ŋ nyɔɔm, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr Woso lemim nyɩnta bɩ dɩndam,
41003015	kʋ ŋ n paŋŋa yɩ, ŋnɩ wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ la zinəro ra.
41003016	Bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ Yeezuu ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ ba n nɩ: Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a hɩm ma Pɩyɛɛr ta ʋ,
41003017	Zebedee nyɩ Zakkɩ ta ʋ, kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ. Yeezuu tɔ vanta ka brɔɔ ma, a ʋ: Bʋanɛrgɛs, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ: bramahəənsire nyɩnɔ.
41003018	Andɩr ta ʋ sɔ, kan Filipi kɩ, Bartelemii kɩ, Matiyee kɩ, Toma kɩ, kan Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ kɩ, Tade kɩ, Sɩmɔɔn Zelɔtɩ kɩ sɔ,
41003019	kan Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʋ gʋaa Zidas, k'a Yeezuu zambʋ zɛ bɩ kɩ.
41003020	Yeezuu a wusigə, an bʋr har ʋ, zamaa bɩ n a ya, an a so kʋ ma. Bɩ minto nɩ, Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ ba toore m k'a hɔ bɩ y.
41003021	Bɩ k'a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ma bɩ, ŋ bʋr, k'a b'a gaa, bala ŋ y'a hɔɔndarɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A mim n'a wusigəm!"
41003022	Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɛlzebul nɩ kan kɩ!" Ŋ y'a hɩ sɔ, ŋ ʋ: "Zinəro cir daahan minto y'a ka, an wɔ ʋ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra."
41003023	Yeezuu n ŋ bir, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sʋtaana y'a bam lɔ, an zoo ba kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ?
41003024	Kʋ k'a gʋɔɔ bɩr kʋ mam bɩ y'a darɛ.
41003025	Kʋ har gʋɔɔ a gʋngʋ, har bɩ do b'a dam ma, an ta lɛɛ y.
41003026	Kʋ Sʋtaana bʋr, an nɩ yar bam kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ, kʋ gʋngʋrɛ ta ʋ, a b'a dam ma, an jɩm mim ʋ dʋntɔ y, bɩ, a cirbəə bɩ nyam.
41003027	Gʋaa ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma, an gasʋ gʋaa paŋŋazaa har ʋ, k'a mɔrlɔ gʋr, k'a n ser ka, an bʋr la an a sʋr y. K'a sʋr an a nya, b'a bɔkarɛ an gasʋ, an mɔrlɔ wɔɔ gʋr.
41003028	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Woso mimbʋnyaarɔ haay kan sʋnsɔrɔ haay kɩ sugur kam gʋɔɔ ʋ.
41003029	Bɩ gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sʋnsɔ wʋm bɩ, a b'a sugur yɩm fɩɩga y. A mimbʋnyaa bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a mim ʋ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ."
41003030	Yeezuu naa do hɩ, kʋ ŋ ʋ: Sʋtaana nɩ kan kɩ bɩ minto.
41003031	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu da kan Yeezuu danyɩnɔ kɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ jɩm garga ra, ŋ n nyɔɔ da kʋ ŋ n Yeezuu bir.
41003032	Zamaa bɩ nyɩnta, n nɩ bɩr ma, n n'a hɩm nɩ, n ʋ: "Gaafra, ɩbɩɩ da kan ɩbɩɩ danyɩnɔ kɩ y'ɩbɩɩ birm garga ra."
41003033	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Nka m mɔɔ da? Nkɔɔ m mɔɔ danyɩnɔ?"
41003034	A n bɔkarɛ, an a bɔ, an nɩ dɩgam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋnɩ bɩr ma rɔ wɔɔ ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ da bɩ ba n nɩ, kan mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ!
41003035	Gʋaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ Woso hɔɔnhɔ bam bɩ, mɔɔ danyɩ m, mɔɔ danlʋ m, mɔɔ da m."
41004001	Yeezuu a ya, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam Galilee higʋta lɛ ra. Zamaa a so kʋ ma gʋta ŋnɩ bɩr ma, an wuti, an aa nyɩnta kɔɔlʋʋrɔ wɔɔ deem ʋ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ. Zamaa bɩ haay n nyɩnta tara ʋ hi bɩ lɛ ra.
41004002	A hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ nɔ ʋ, a hɔ dɩnda ŋ nɩ gʋta. A hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
41004003	"K'a tʋr ka: gʋaa ɩ bɔ k'a hɔ duu, a duure nɔ ʋ bɩ, a hɩsɩga an nawʋm.
41004004	K'a n'a duum bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo zaa gʋr ma. Bɛnnɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a bɩ.
41004005	Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo jaarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, taa n nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋta y. Hɔyaa bɩ n lɛɛ ka an bɔ, kʋ taa ba ʋ gʋta b'ʋ bɩ minto.
41004006	Woso k'a der bɩ, an na hɔka bɩ ma, an ga, kʋ ŋ məsi ba ʋ bɩ minto.
41004007	Gɔsɩnnɔ a zar laa bɩncɛ ʋ, laa bɩ n haan, an a ta ŋ mee, ŋ n nyɩ da y.
41004008	Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ, ŋnɩ haan, ŋnɩ ma, ŋnɩ nyɩ da. A yaa deem yaa ka bukərku, deem busɔrdɩ, deem zɔrɔ."
41004009	Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a jɩ ma, k'an a tʋr ka ma mɩŋŋa."
41004010	Kʋ zamaa b'a hʋr bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta kan Yeezuu kɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'a larm a hɔbɔkʋrɛnoonno wɔɔ jɩ ma.
41004011	A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ Woso cirbəə mim k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ yɩ, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr a kam ma k'a yɩ rɔ wɔɔ, a hɩ n nawʋrɛ ŋ nɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ m.
41004012	Bɩ minto y'a ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam, bɩ ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y, ŋn'a tʋr kam, bɩ ŋ bɩr hɔsɩ jɩ marɛ kʋ ŋ b'a da ma ŋn'a bɔ a taam kʋ Woso n sugur ka ŋ ʋ y."
41004013	Yeezuu n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do jɩ dɔ ra? Bɩ, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, a hɔbɔkʋrɛnoonno haay jɩ dɔ?"
41004014	Hɔduurezaa bɩ, Woso lemim a n n'a duum.
41004015	Hɔyaa k'a a lo zaa lezi bɩ, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ Woso lemim bɩ ma, lɛɛm bɩ Sʋtaana lemim kʋ n y'a duu ŋ heer ʋ bɩ si ŋ han.
41004016	B'a hɔdeem kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔyaa k'a a lo jaarɔ bɩncɛrɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, brɔɔ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ marɛ, ŋn'a sim lɛɛm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
41004017	Bɩ, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ məsi ba ʋ y, hindeem gʋɔɔ m. Kʋ cicir gɛɛ fɩryɩrɛ bʋr Woso lemim bɩ minto, bɩ ŋ y'a to.
41004018	Gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔyaa k'a a lo laa bireyaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ mam.
41004019	Kan durnya hɔɔndama bɩ kɩ, braba a mɩŋŋa m arzaka kama kɩ, kan hɔɔ vantɔɔ lɛtaama kɩ gasʋ ŋ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ Woso lemim bɩ zarm, a bɩr nyɩ darɛ y.
41004020	A nyambʋrlɛ ma bɩ, gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ n ta ʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔyaa k'a a lo bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ marɛ, ŋn'ɩ yɛm ma, ŋn'ɩ nyɩ dam. A yaa deem nɩ nyɩ dam bukərku, deem busɔrdɩ, deem zɔrɔ.
41004021	A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N bɩr sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʋ, n n'a cɩntam kasɩ gɛɛ gargʋ taa y, gɛɛ lɔ? A cɩnta n nawʋm hɔ burə ʋ.
41004022	Bala, mim haay kʋ gʋɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋn'a dɔ naa ma bɩ, ŋ zɛm b'a dɔ. Hɔ ba ʋ n n a nyaakʋm da a dɔ n mɩ y.
41004023	Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a jɩ ma, k'an a tʋr ka ma mɩŋŋa."
41004024	Yeezuu a vanta hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam bɩ kɩ. Awɔɔ makra barɛ hɔ bɩ, n zɛm b'a sa, n nɩ ganwʋrɛ makra bam, n n'a ka awɔɔ ʋ. N y'a lɛŋŋa dam sɔ.
41004025	Bala, n hɔ kam gʋaa k'an ta m b'ʋ; Gʋaa k'a ba m bɩ, baa k'a ta m poore, n y'a yɔm nɩ."
41004026	A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ duum tara ʋ bɩ kɩ.
41004027	Kʋ hinceem a n'a barɛ gɛɛ, jɩm a nawʋrɛ, sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, hɔyaa bɩ, haan a nawʋm, an nɩ mam, b'a n a dɔ kʋ ba a nawʋm lʋnlɔ y.
41004028	Tara bɩ n'a zi barɛ, hɔyaa bɩ n nɩ lɛɛkarɛ an nɩ haanm, an nɩ gɔ dam, an nɩ jɩsɩ sim, a nyambʋrlɛ ma bɩ, an nɩ nyɩ dam.
41004029	Hɔyaa bɩ k'a ma bɩ, a da n nawʋm, k'a dɔmɩm a ku bɩ minto."
41004030	Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'ʋ Woso cirbəə makra ba lʋnlɔ kan bɔ kɩ?
41004031	Bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan hɔ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma mutardɩ bɩ yaa kɩ; A m hɔyaa haay k'a nɩ durnya nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ poore, n n'a duum.
41004032	Kʋ n y'a duu, ma a nawʋm, an nɩ gɔ dam an lɛ da hɔyaa haay ra, an nɩ haanm gʋta, a vəŋŋəro n ta ʋ, bɛnnɔ n b'a dam ma ŋnɩ cɛ kɩnka ma."
41004033	Yeezuu ɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta dɩndam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m kan makrarɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kɩ gʋta, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma ŋn'a jɩ ma.
41004034	Hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom an n'a dam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m bala, bɩ k'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ, a y'a jɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ haay.
41004035	Hinni bɩ do yirbəə m bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Ʋ bra gəm deem bɩ ra."
41004036	Kʋ Yeezuu a gʋ zamaa bɩ ma bɩ, a zu kʋ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'aa gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ. Kɔɔlʋʋrɔ vantɔɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ sɔ kan kɩ.
41004037	Lɛɛm bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʋta wuti an nɩ hɔnm. Hi kurə bɩ n'a tɔm kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an a han lɛɛm.
41004038	Bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu a mim ka minkarahɔ ra an nɩ hinceem bam kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ jɛ ʋ, ŋn'a gu, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ gɩngarɛ bɩr hɔsɩ barɛ ɩbɩɩ m na?"
41004039	K'a gu bɩ, an həən si hɩnhɛr bɩ ma, an a hɩ higʋta bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ tʋr ka ɩ zɛ sɩɩ•••" Hɩnhɛr bɩ n jɩm, lɛɛ bɩ n zɛ sɩɩ•••.
41004040	Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ nyi barɛ ncɩnaaʋ? Awɔɔ ba sɩrakarɛ nɩ?"
41004041	Nyibəə gʋta n gasʋ ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ kara n naa, hɩnhɛr kan hi kɩ n'a lɛ sire?"
41005001	Ŋ yaa lee ku higʋta tʋr ʋ, Gerazaa zannɔ kʋ ʋ.
41005002	Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ zerm kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, gʋaa kʋ zinəro n ta m bɔ gəənoyaa ra, an b'a zɛ ʋ.
41005003	A wʋtajɩ m gəənoyaa ra bɩ m. Baa kan pɔyaabar kɩ, gʋaa paŋŋazaa ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma, an a nyasʋ y.
41005004	Bala, dɔmɩm biyəə bɩ, ŋ pɔyaa da a gam ʋ, ŋn'a wɔ kʋsɩ pɔyaabar m, an a cencer haay. Gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ bʋrm ma y.
41005005	Sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, gəənoyaarɔ an nɩ wʋtaŋ ʋ kan ciro wɔɔ burə kɩ, zee an n'a dam, an nɩ yaaba darɛ a mɩŋŋa ma jaarɔ m.
41005006	K'a a to an Yeezuu yɩ laatʋ bɩ, a bra si, an aa sʋnta a taa,
41005007	an nɩ zee darɛ, a ʋ: "Yeezuu, Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ? Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han Woso tɔ ma gʋta: ɩ bɩ zibʋnyaa ba mɔɔ nɩ y!"
41005008	Bala, Yeezuu y'a hɩm zinə bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ!"
41005009	Yeezuu n a lar, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ tɔ m bɔ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ tɔ m Leziyɔn, bala wɔɔ gʋta."
41005010	A n a yɛ Yeezuu han kan a heer kɩ haay, a ʋ: "A bɩ la a ra tara bɩ nɔ ʋ y!"
41005011	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, kurkuuro cir gʋta nɩ ci bɩ zeezi, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm.
41005012	Zinəro wɔɔ n n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A ka k'ʋ gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ mɛ ʋ!"
41005013	A n zaa ka ŋ ʋ. Zinəro wɔɔ n bɔ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ ʋ. Kurkuuro wɔɔ haay n'a to ci bɩ ma, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋnɩ zer, ŋn'aa a zar higʋta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga haay. Kurkuuro wɔɔ a zɔ tisi hɩɩya ma.
41005014	Kurkuuro dundonno wɔɔ n bra si, ŋn'aa hɔ k'a ba bɩ hɩ taranɔzannɔ wɔɔ m, kan lezimazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ m. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ dɩga hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba bɩ ma,
41005015	ŋnɩ bʋr Yeezuu jɩr ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ gʋaa kʋ zinəro Leziyɔn n ta m bɩ yɩ, an huu du a ma, an nɩ nyɩntam kan laafɩɩ kɩ. Dabɔʋ n ŋ nyasʋ.
41005016	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta, ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba gʋaa kʋ zinəro n ta m bɩ m, kan kurkuuro wɔɔ kɩ m bɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
41005017	Ŋ n a da a ra, ŋn'a yɛm Yeezuu han k'an a hʋr a tara bɩ ra.
41005018	Kʋ Yeezuu bʋr an nɩ dam kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, gʋaa kʋ zinəro n ta m bɩ k'a waa b'a yɛ han k'a bɩr kan kɩ.
41005019	Bɩ Yeezuu n zaa ka ʋ y, b'a a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Doo ɩ yaa a hɩ ɩ har zannɔ m. K'ɩ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba ɩbɩɩ m a cicirzɛrɛ minto bɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ."
41005020	Gʋaa bɩ n a hʋr, an aa hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba a m haay bɩ dɩnda Taraburo wɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m. Gʋaa haay n zɛ kədə.
41005021	Kʋ Yeezuu a wusigə kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ m an higʋta bɩ zɛ ra an lee ku tʋr deem bɩ ra b'ʋ bɩ, zamaa cir gʋta a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ bʋr zi. Nyɩnta Yeezuu b'ʋ higʋta bɩ lɛ ra.
41005022	Zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir deem n bʋr, a tɔ m Zayɩɩr. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a kukurə zɛ a taa,
41005023	an a yɛ han kan a heer kɩ haay, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ poore a zɔ zɛ ma, bʋr ɩ bɩ ɩ wɔ ka nyɩ bɩ mim la, k'an a waa, k'an la sɔ."
41005024	Yeezuu n cem kan kɩ, zamaa gʋta n zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, ŋn'a so ʋ, ŋn'ɩ tʋntɔm kʋ ra.
41005025	Lʋ n ta ʋ, ma n'a dam zi a dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya hɔ m naa.
41005026	A a yɔ gʋta nyɩsɩbənno wɔ ʋ, a nyɩsɩbarɛ nɔ ʋ. A a wɔhɔ zar haay a tar la, b'a n a waa y. Yaaba bɩ n'a dam la.
41005027	Lʋ bɩ k'a Yeezuu mim ma bɩ, a bʋr a kur zamaa gaa ʋ b'ʋ, an a wɔ da a huu ma.
41005028	Bala, lʋ b'a hɩ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ m wɔ da a huu tɔkkɛ ma, mɔɔ yɩ m waam."
41005029	Lɛɛm bɩ, lʋ bɩ yaaba b'a da jɩm ʋ. A n a dɔ a ʋ, yaaba bɩ bɔ a mɛ ʋ, b'a a waa.
41005030	Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a dɔ a ʋ, paŋŋa bɔ a mɛ ʋ poore, an a wusigə zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, an laaka da, a ʋ: "Nka y'a wɔ da mɔɔ huu ma?"
41005031	A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ yɩ zamaa bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔtam, ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ nɩ laaka darɛ, ɩ ʋ, nka y'a wɔ da ɩbɩɩ ma gɛ?"
41005032	Yeezuu nɩ dɩndɩgarɛ a jɩr ʋ, k'a zaa yɩ.
41005033	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lʋ b'ɩ nyi bam a mɛ n nɩ hinkəm, k'a hɔ k'a ba a m bɩ dɔ bɩ, a bɩ kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa, an a sɩra hɩ m haay.
41005034	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɩnnɩ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ, ta kan laafɩɩ kɩ, bɩ, ɩ ɩ waa ɩ yaaba bɩ minto."
41005035	K'a nɩ meer bam bɩ, gʋɔɔ a to zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ har ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ ga. K'ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ Zuuba da kɔrɛ ma lʋnlɔ gɛ?"
41005036	Bɩ, Yeezuu n a tʋr ka mim bɩ ma y. A n a hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, sɩra ka bala."
41005037	A n yɛ kʋ gɔsɩ n zu kʋ ʋ kan a kɩ y. Pɩyɛɛr a gaa bala, Zakkɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ.
41005038	Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ har ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu gʋɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ tatʋr barɛ, ŋn'ɩ baa darɛ, ŋn'ɩ zee dam.
41005039	A n gasʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ tatʋr kan baadarɛ kɩ nɩ? Nyɩ bɩ n ga y, hinceem a ba."
41005040	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʋm Yeezuu ma. A n la gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ra, ŋnɩ bɔ, an nyɩ bɩ zɩ kan a da kɩ to, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ gasʋ nyɩ bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
41005041	K'a nyɩ bɩ wɔ sa bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Taliita kum" A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, wuti!"
41005042	Lɛɛm bɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ wuti, an nɩ tam. Bala, nyɩ bɩ dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya. A m bɩ, zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə.
41005043	Yeezuu lɛ ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y." A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka nyɩ b'ʋ, k'an a bɩ!"
41006001	Yeezuu a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an ta kʋ k'a tʋr ʋ b'ʋ.
41006002	Sabaa hinni k'a a ku bɩ, Yeezuu hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ. Zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gʋta y'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ a to mindɔrɛ naa do m ka? A to awɔɔ ʋ hɔɔn naa do m ka, an a da ma, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ a wɔ nɩ?
41006003	Awɔɔ bɛɛ m Maarii nyɩ, an nɩ gɔ wum bɩ ra? Zakkɩ, Zozɛs, Ziidi kan Sɩmɔɔn kɩ danyɩ bɛɛ ra? Awɔɔ danlʋrɔ ba wɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ ra?" Naa do a ka ŋ n kaanm Yeezuu m.
41006004	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ daʋrɛ yɩrɛ a zɩ kʋ ʋ kan a yɩrɛrɔ kɩ, a har gʋɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ y."
41006005	Yeezuu n hoser ba b'ʋ y, kʋ gʋɔɔ k'a wɔ ka ŋ mim la, an ŋ waa rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y.
41006006	Yeezuu zɛ kədə ŋ sɩrakarɛ war bɩ tɔ ma. Yeezuu cem an nɩ hɔ dɩndam kʋrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
41006007	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu n bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir, an a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ ŋ nyɔɔm hɩɩya-hɩɩya, an lɛ ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n la zinəro ra.
41006008	A a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ sa a wɔ ʋ zaa sarɛ minto y. Bur, hɛra, busoo, a b'a sa y, k'a maam bara m.
41006009	Bɩ, k'a kʋsɔrɔ da ʋ, k'a huu sa deem."
41006010	A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a lee ku kʋ ʋ, k'a gɔɔta har kʋ n y'awɔɔ si ʋ b'ʋ, an ta, an awɔɔ hʋrlɛ dɔmɩm ku.
41006011	K'awɔɔ ta kʋ ʋ, ŋ nɩ kaanm awɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ n a tʋr ka awɔɔ mim ma, k'a ɩ doom, k'a kʋ bɩ taanyisi gʋngʋ a gam ma, k'an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ."
41006012	Bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a hʋr ŋn'a hɩm gʋɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'a a bɔ a taam, k'a sugur yɛ."
41006013	Ŋ la zinəro ra gʋta, ŋ nyɔɔ nɔ yaabazannɔ gʋta ma, ŋnɩ ŋ waa.
41006014	Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ Yeezuu mim ma, bala, a tɔ bɔ lɛɛ woo••• ʋ. Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zaan-Batiisi a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ. Bɩ y'a ka, an paŋŋa yɩ, an nɩ hoserlo bam."
41006015	Nawɔnnɔ ʋ: "Elii m." Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ deem m am biisi hɔɔ wɔɔ m."
41006016	Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba bɩ ma bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zaan-Batiisi m! Mɔɔ n a ka, n n a mim gʋ ma bɩ y'a a ya, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ!"
41006017	A yɩ sɩra, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ka, n nɩ Zaan nyasʋ, n n'a sur, n n'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Hɩrɔɔdɩ bɩ, naa ba a ʋ: a dam Filipi lʋ k'a yɔ m a tɔ m Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ bɩ minto.
41006018	Bala, Zaan a hɩ Hɩrɔɔdɩ m, a ʋ: "A n a ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ m ɩ dam lʋ yɔm y!"
41006019	Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ nyɩnta an sɔ Zaan m, a lɛ n taa k'a ka kʋ n n a zɛ, b'a b'a dam ma y.
41006020	Hɩrɔɔdɩ ɩ nyi bam Zaan m, an nɩ kum la, bala, a a dɔ, a ʋ: Zaan bɩ, gʋaa tɩrga nɩ, gʋaa mɩŋŋa m sɔ. K'a a tʋr ka Zaan meerbaa bɩ ma bɩ, a n a dɔ kʋ bɔ an n'a hɩm Zaan nɩ y, b'a a meerbaa bɩ ŋʋa, an n'a tʋr kam ma.
41006021	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, toore a ka Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ ʋ. Hɩrɔɔdɩ a kʋ lɛɛzannɔ, yarbənno jɩtannɔ, kan Galilee gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ bir a yɩrɛ cibsa hɔbɩrɛ ma.
41006022	Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ gasʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ cɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an sar ba zamaa bɩ bire ʋ; a Hɩrɔɔdɩ nɔ yɩ kan hɔbɩrɛbinno wɔɔ kɩ. Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a hɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa bɩ yɛ mɔɔ han, kʋ m a ka ɩ ʋ."
41006023	Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a wer si bɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa bɩ, mɔɔ y'a karɛ ʋ, baa kʋ mɔɔ cirbəə tara bɩ zɛkumbir m."
41006024	Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n bɔ, an aa a hɩ a da m, a ʋ: "M bɔ yɛ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zaan-Batiisi mim yɛ."
41006025	Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n ta zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an aa a hɩ cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ n taa dɩɩtaa, k'ɩ Zaan-Batiisi mim da laaga ʋ, ɩ ka m ʋ."
41006026	Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ heer a zar, bɩ, a b'a dam ma, an a gu ma y, k'a a wer si hɔbɩrɛbinno wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ minto.
41006027	Lɛɛm bɩ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ lɛ ka a dɔmazaa deem ʋ, k'an bʋr Zaan mim m. A dɔmazaa bɩ n ta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an aa Zaan mim gʋ ma,
41006028	an bʋr m laaga ʋ, an b'a ka nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ b'ʋ, an a si, an a ka a da ʋ.
41006029	Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ Zaan gər bɩ sa, ŋn'aa bir.
41006030	Yeezuu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʋr zi, ŋnɩ hɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a ba bɩ hɩ Yeezuu m, kan hɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m bɩ kɩ.
41006031	Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ n toore yɩ k'a hɔ bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm, ŋn'a wusigəm bɩ minto. Bɩ minto y'a ka, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr k'ʋ bɔ toore ma, bɩncɛ kʋ gʋɔɔ ba ʋ b'ʋ, k'a hoon si poore."
41006032	Ŋ yaa da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ŋnɩ ta toore ma bɩncɛ kʋ gɔsɩ ba ʋ b'ʋ.
41006033	Bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta ŋ cenle yɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ dɔ, ŋnɩ bra si a gam ma, ŋnɩ lɛɛ ka Yeezuu m kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ.
41006034	Kʋ Yeezuu bɔ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a zamaa cir gʋta yɩ. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ cicir n a nyasʋ, bala, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan hɔbɩsɩ cir kʋ ŋ dɔmazaa ba ʋ bɩ kɩ. A a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ hɔ gʋta dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
41006035	Gum k'a bʋr an nɩ dam bɩ, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gum da, bɩ pooyaa m naa,
41006036	gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'aa hɔbɩrɛ si, ŋn'a bɩ!"
41006037	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a bɩ!" Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ʋ aa bur si deniyee zɔɔhɩra k'ʋ b'a ka ŋ ʋ gɛ?"
41006038	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa dɩga a, bur karɔ n ta awɔɔ ʋ?" Kʋ ŋ yaa dɩga a bɩ, ŋ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bur soor n ta ʋ kan zɔ kɩ hɩɩya."
41006039	A n lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n zamaa bɩ nyɩnta bur butur bɩ ra.
41006040	Ŋ nɩ nyɩnyɩnta zɔrɔ-zɔrɔ, busoor-busoor.
41006041	Yeezuu bur soor bɩ si kan zɔ hɩɩya bɩ kɩ a wɔ ʋ, an dɩga brama, an a barka da ʋ, an ŋ zɩnzɛra, an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n a ka zamaa b'ʋ. A zɔ hɩɩya bɩ jir zamaa bɩ m sɔ.
41006042	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay a bɩ, an ŋ ka.
41006043	Ŋ bur kan zɔ kɩ kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma bueerehɩɩya.
41006044	Bur bɩ binno wɔɔ barla, yar tisi soor ɩ nyɩnta ʋ.
41006045	Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, k'a bra gəm la Bɛtsayɩdaa zeezi." A mɩŋŋa n gɔɔta k'a zamaa bɩ da zaa ra.
41006046	K'a ŋ da zaa ra, an a nya bɩ, a a hʋr, an ta ci ra k'a yaa da.
41006047	Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ hi bireyaa ku, a mɩŋŋa nɩ gəm la.
41006048	K'a yɩ hɩnhɛr n a nya ŋ lɛ, ŋn'a yɔm kan kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bɔrɛ kɩ bɩ, dɔ k'a bʋr an nɩ mɛm bɩ, a wuti an tɔ hi ra, an nɩ tarɛ ŋ zi, an a yo k'a cem ŋ han.
41006049	Kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ an nɩ tam hi ra bɩ, ŋ yɩ dɩgam ma, ŋ ʋ: "Toor m," ŋn'ɩ zee dam.
41006050	Bala, ŋ haay a yɩ, nyibəə n ŋ nyasʋ. Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu meer ba kan ŋ kɩ, a ʋ: "K'a sɩra ka, mɔɔ m, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y!"
