41006051	A n da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ kan ŋ kɩ, hɩnhɛr bɩ n jɩm. Ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋ n a so a ʋ y.
41006052	Baa kʋ ŋ bur bɩ jirle yɩ bɩ, ŋ n hɔsɩ jɩ ma ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu a da hɔ haay ma y.
41006053	Kʋ ŋ higʋta bɩ zɛ ra bɩ, ŋ yaa lee ku Zenezarɛtɩ gəm la, ŋn'a kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ kʋsɩ.
41006054	Kʋ ŋ zer lɛɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ Yeezuu dɔ.
41006055	Ŋ n a si, ŋnɩ ta kʋrɔ haay ʋ, ŋn'aa yaabazannɔ busu a gʋraŋŋarɔ m, ŋnɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ bɩncɛ kʋ Yeezuu n ta ʋ b'ʋ.
41006056	Bɩncɛ k'a nɩ taŋ ʋ, kʋrɔ gʋtɔɔ ʋ, kʋrɔ poorero ʋ, bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʋ, zɛ n nawʋm yaabazannɔ m daasɩrɔ ʋ, ŋn'a yɛm han, k'an yɛ kʋ ŋ n'a wɔ da a huu lɛ ma bala. Bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a wɔ da ma rɔ wɔɔ waarɛ yɩ haay.
41007001	Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ y'a to Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ bʋr Yeezuu zi,
41007002	ŋnɩ Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm kan dintim kɩ, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: ŋ n a wɔ hir y.
41007003	Kʋ sɩra nɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ kɩ haay hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ bɩ, a wɔ ŋn'a hirm mɩŋŋa, amba ŋ yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ m.
41007004	Kʋ ŋ y'a to daasɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr, ŋ bɩr hɔ bɩm kʋ ŋ n dintim gʋ a ma y. Ŋ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ vantɔɔ ta ʋ gʋta, amba hɛrɔ sʋrgɔrɛ, gərlo kan hɔbɩrɛ mɔdrɔ kɩ.
41007005	Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩr zum wɔɔ yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm, bɩ ŋ n hi nyasʋ?"
41007006	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zambʋzannɔ, Ezayii gumə ta ʋ, Woso lɛ k'a a si an so ra, an awɔɔ mim hɩ bɩ nɔ ʋ, bala, a a gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ, a ʋ: Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, mɔɔ da ŋ nawʋŋ ʋ a lɛ m, bɩ ŋ heer laatʋ mɔɔ ma,
41007007	bɩ mɔɔ daʋrɛ bɩ vam m. Durnya mim ŋ n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m, Woso hɔ bɛɛ y.
41007008	Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ awɔɔ to, an nɩ zum gʋɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ ʋ."
41007009	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɔ awɔɔ ʋ a jɛ m, an nɩ zum a yɩnnɩbayɩ ʋ.
41007010	Bala, Moyiisi a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ,' bɩ, 'Gʋaa k'a zɩ bɔ ʋ kan a da kɩ, kʋ ŋ n a zɛ gər.'
41007011	B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɩm, a ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a zɩ m gɛɛ a da m, a ʋ: hɔ kʋ mɔɔ m ga m, m m dam ɩbɩɩ han bɩ 'kɔrbaan m' a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Woso mannɩ hɔ m.'
41007012	A n a ga m, k'an a da a zɩ han gɛɛ a da han dɔ y.
41007013	A ba awɔɔ nawʋm ncɩnaaʋ an nɩ Woso lemim bɩ zaar bam a yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ m. Ziro ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɔɔrɔ awɔɔ nɩ ŋ bam gʋta."
41007014	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu zamaa bɩ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma, k'a da a heer ʋ.
41007015	Hɔ ba ʋ, an n'a tom garga ra, an gasʋ gʋaa nɔ ʋ k'a dintim ka ma y. Bɔ n'a tom gʋaa nɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma. [
41007016	Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m bɩ, k'an a tʋr ka ma.]"
41007017	K'a a gʋ zamaa bɩ ma, an gasʋ har ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a lar hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do jɩ ma.
41007018	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ n naa do jɩ dɔ ra? Awɔɔ n a dɔ, a ʋ: hɔ k'a n'a tore, an nɩ gasʋm gʋaa nɔ ʋ bɩ b'a dam ma, an dintim ka ma ra?
41007019	Bala, a nɔ an nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ, an ta, an nɩ bɔm garga ra, a bɩr gasʋrɛ a heer ʋ y." Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Yeezuu y'a hɩnkarɛ, a ʋ: "hɔbɩrɛ haay mɩŋŋa."
41007020	A a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ nɩ bɔm gʋaa nɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma.
41007021	Bala, gʋaa heer hɔɔndarɛ bʋnyaa bɩ n nɩ bɔŋ ʋ: so a mɩŋŋa ʋ, koorbarɛ, gərzɛrɛ,
41007022	jaandarɛ, gʋaa hɔ ŋʋarɛ, zibʋnyaa do haay barɛ, bra ba gʋaa m, mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa barɛ, jɩm barɛ, gʋaa tɔ zarlɛ, mɩŋŋa busure kan yarmabaa kɩ.
41007023	Hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro haay, bɔ ŋ nawʋm gʋaa heer ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dintim kam ma."
41007024	Yeezuu k'a cem b'ʋ bɩ, a ta Tiir kʋ ʋ, an aa gasʋ har ʋ, a lɛ baa kʋ ŋ n a yɩ y. Bɩ, a n a da ma, an a nyaakʋm da y.
41007025	Bala, lʋ nɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ m, zinə nɩ kan kɩ. Bɩ, lʋ bɩ Yeezuu mim ma, an bra si, an bɩ kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa.
41007026	Lʋ bɩ, grɛkkɩ do m, yɩ a ʋ Siirii kʋ Fenisii ʋ. A n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'an la zinə bɩ ra nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ mɛ ʋ.
41007027	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "A to kʋ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ ŋ hɔ bɩ, an ŋ ka. A n a ga m, ŋnɩ nyɩnɔ hɔbɩrɛ sa, ŋn'a ka jinnyɩnɔ ʋ y."
41007028	Lʋ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Zuuba, bɩ, jinnyɩnɔ wɔɔ tɩr hɔbɩrɛ kuuro kʋ ŋ y'a lunlo taabɩr bɩ taa bɩ gʋr, ŋn'a bɩ." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ:
41007029	"Meerbaa naa do minto, doo, zinə bɩ bɔ ɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ mɛ ʋ."
41007030	Lʋ bɩ n a hʋr, an doo, an aa a nyɩ bɩ yɩ, an nɩ wʋtam gargʋ burə ʋ. Zinə bɩ n bɔ a mɛ ʋ.
41007031	Yeezuu a hʋr Tiir kʋ ʋ, an a bɔ, an bɔ Sidɔn ʋ kan Taraburo wɔɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ, an ta Galilee higʋta zeezi.
41007032	N bʋr tikki m Yeezuu zi. Tikki bɩ, bɛkka m sɔ. N n a yɛ han k'an a wɔ ka a mim la, k'an a waa.
41007033	Yeezuu n a gaa zamaa bɩ jɩr ʋ, an bɔ m toore ma, an a nyʋkʋnnyɩnɔ dundu tikki bɩ tʋr ʋ, an lihi da, a nyʋkʋr ma, an a nɔ a nɛɛm ma,
41007034	an a bɔɔta an dɩga brama, an hoonsi bɔ a rɛ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɛfata!"
41007035	A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ gʋ!" A tʋʋrɔ wɔɔ n a gʋ lɛɛm, a nɛɛm bɩ n a bɔ kʋ zi, an nɩ meer bam mɩŋŋa.
41007036	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y." Yeezuu k'a lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: ŋ b'a hɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a pa da, an lɛ da biisi ra.
41007037	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A ɩ hɔ haay bam mɩŋŋa; A ɩ tikkiro tʋr gʋm, a a ka bəətinno nɩ meer bam!"
41008001	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, zamaa gʋta a ya, an ta ʋ, bɩ hɔbɩrɛ ba ʋ kʋ ŋ n a bɩ y. Yeezuu n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
41008002	"Zamaa bɩ cicir ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, bala, ŋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ mɔɔ zi, bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ ba ŋ ʋ y.
41008003	Kʋ mɔɔ ŋ da zaa ra kan nɔ kɩ, ŋ y'a dundom zaa ra, bɩ gɔsɩnnɔ a to laatʋ."
41008004	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ bur yɩ ka poohɔɔn ʋ naa ʋ, ʋ a ka ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a bɩ k'an ŋ ka?"
41008005	Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bur karɔ n ta awɔɔ ʋ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Saanhɩna"
41008006	A n lɛ ka, a ʋ, ŋ n nyɩnta tara ʋ. A n bur saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ gʋr, an a barka da ʋ, an n'a zɩnzɛ ra, an n'a kam a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kam zamaa b'ʋ.
41008007	Zɔnnyɩnɔ nyɩnta ŋ ʋ sɔ. Yeezuu n ŋ barka da ʋ, a ʋ: ŋ n a ka ŋ ʋ sɔ.
41008008	Ŋ n a bɩ, an ŋ ka. Ŋ n a kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma saanhɩna.
41008009	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta, ŋn'a zɔ tisi si ma. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ da zaa ra.
41008010	Lɛɛm bɩ, a da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam Dalmanutaa zeezi.
41008011	Farizɛɛnrɔ bʋr, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan Yeezuu kɩ, ŋn'a yɛ han, k'an hoser kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ ba, k'a dɩga a, a y'a dam ma, an a ba gɛ.
41008012	Yeezuu hoon gʋta si, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto her zamaana naa nɩ hoser yɛrɛ? Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, hoser ba ʋ mɔɔ n n'a bam awɔɔ zamaana naa do minto y."
41008013	A n a gʋ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ ma, an aa da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an bra gəm deem bɩ ra.
41008014	Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, bur sarɛ tɔ bɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ. Bur deem bala nɩ ŋ ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
41008015	Yeezuu lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi, k'a ba laatʋ farizɛɛnrɔ nyʋnyɔɔ bɩ ma, kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ hɔ bɩ kɩ ma sɔ."
41008016	Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kʋ kɩ, kʋ bur ba ŋ ʋ bɩ minto.
41008017	Yeezuu n a ma, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ n'a karɛ? Bur k'a ba awɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto m gɛ? Awɔɔ hɔɔn gɔɔta a n gu k'a jɩ dɔ ra? Awɔɔ heer ɩ ka gɛ?
41008018	Awɔɔ mɩnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩm na? Awɔɔ tʋʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩr mim mam na?
41008019	Kʋ mɔɔ bur soor zɩnzɛ ra, m a ka gʋaa tisi soor ʋ bɩ, a tɔ ba awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra? Awɔɔ kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Bueerehɩɩya."
41008020	"Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bur saanhɩna zɩnzɛ ra m a ka gʋaa tisi si ʋ bɩ, kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ awɔɔ kuuro gʋr ʋ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Saanhɩna."
41008021	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gɔɔta a n a dɔ, a ʋ, bur mim bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma ra?"
41008022	Ŋ lee ku Bɛtsayɩdaa ʋ, n n bʋr bʋʋ m Yeezuu zi, n n a yɛ han, k'an a wɔ da bʋʋ bɩ ma, k'an lɛɛ yɩ.
41008023	A n bʋʋ bɩ gaa a wɔ ma, an bɔ m bɔlɛɛma, an lihi da a mɩm ma, an a wɔ ka a mim la, an n'a larm, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔsɩ yɩm na?"
41008024	K'a mɩm bɩ gʋ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ yɩm, ɩ ʋ, gɔrɔ m, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ."
41008025	Bɩ, Yeezuu a ya, an a wɔ ka gʋaa bɩ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ ra. Gʋaa bɩ nɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ•••, an a waa, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa.
41008026	Yeezuu n a da a har zaa ra, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'a ka ɩ gasʋ kʋnɔ b'ʋ y!"
41008027	Yeezuu ɩ tam kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ Filipi-Sezaaree kʋrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ. Zaa ra bɩ, a a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lar, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩm, ŋ ʋ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ?"
41008028	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: Zaan-Batiisi m, nawɔnnɔ ʋ: Elii m, gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem m."
41008029	Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Nka m mɔɔ nɩ?" Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ sa, an a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Krista n'ɩbɩɩ m."
41008030	A n lɛ ka ŋ ʋ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ: ŋ b'awɔɔ mim bɩ hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.
41008031	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, a n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: pakra m, kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n cicir ba gʋta. Bɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kɩ, kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ kaanɩm nɩ, an ta kan a zɛrɛ kɩ, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ.
41008032	A n minno nɔɔn duro nyaakʋm da an n'a hɩrɛ y. Pɩyɛɛr n a gaa an bɔ m toore ma, an nɩ nyaa bam kan Yeezuu kɩ, a ʋ: a n a ga m, an naa hɩ y.
41008033	Bɩ, Yeezuu k'a wusigə an dɩga a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, a həən si Pɩyɛɛr ma, a ʋ: "Ɩ jɛ bɔ mɔɔ jɩr ʋ! Sʋtaana, ɩbɩɩ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Woso hɔ kɩ y. Gʋɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ m."
41008034	Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ, an a karɩndanyɩnɔ bir kan zamaa bɩ kɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'an a mɩŋŋa lɛtaamarɔ to, k'an a gɔdarkʋra busu, an zu mɔɔ ʋ.
41008035	Bala, gʋaa k'a a lɛ n taa k'a meeyaa bʋmbɔ bɩ, a b'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa ga mɔɔ tɔ ma, kan lemim nyɩnta bɩ kɩ tɔ ma, a y'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ.
41008036	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a so durnya hɔ haay ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, an ga, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka?
41008037	Bɔ gʋaa bɩ n n'a sam, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ nɩ?
41008038	Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ nyannɩ zɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma kan mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta bɩ kɩ tɔ ma, her zamaana jaandənno nɔɔn duro kan mimbʋnyaabənno nɔɔm kɩ bireyaa ʋ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ b'a zaa nyannɩ zɛm, dɔmɩm k'a nɩ zɛŋ ʋ, kan malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ kɩ b'ʋ y."
41009001	Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gɔsɩnnɔ zɛ hinni b'a kure y, ŋn'ɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ yɩm kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ."
41009002	Dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu Pɩyɛɛr, Zakkɩ kan Zaan kɩ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ toore ma a minto ci jintə mim ʋ, an a lʋr ŋ mɩm ʋ.
41009003	A huuro wɔɔ nɩ nyakɩ bɔm, gʋaa ba ʋ an b'a nyakɩ bɔrɛ bɩ makra barɛ y.
41009004	Elii n a hɩnka ŋ nɩ kan Moyiisi kɩ, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan Yeezuu kɩ.
41009005	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ naa ʋ, a mɩŋŋa. K'ʋ bur ba kaakʋ: ɩbɩɩ hɔ deem, Moyiisi hɔ deem, Elii hɔ deem."
41009006	Dabɔʋ ŋ haay nyasʋ. Bɩ y'a ka, Pɩyɛɛr n a dɔ kʋ bɔ an n'a hɩrɛ y.
41009007	Warkʋ bʋr an b'a ku ŋ la, meerbaa n a to warkʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ n naa do, k'a tʋr ka ma."
41009008	Lɛɛm bɩ, a bɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ, ŋnɩ dɩga a jɩr ʋ bɩ, ŋ n gɔsɩ yɩ kʋ Yeezuu bɛɛ m a deem kan ŋ kɩ y.
41009009	Kʋ ŋ n'ɩ zerm ci bɩ ra bɩ, a lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "hɔ kʋ ŋbɔɔ n a yɩ bɩ, ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y, k'an ta, an Gʋaanyɩ bɩ mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ku gəəno bire ʋ.
41009010	Ŋ lɛ naa do si, bɩ, ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa larm: 'Mɩmbɔʋrɛ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ mim bɩ ma.' "
41009011	A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ Elii n lɛɛ ka an bʋr Krista m gɛ?"
41009012	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Elii nɩ lɛɛ karɛ an bʋr k'a bɩ hɔ haay banka. Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, a m lɔ, ŋn'a gʋrsɩra ba ŋ ʋ: Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bɔʋrɛ yɩm b'a fɩr yɩm gʋta gɛ?
41009013	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Elii bʋr, bɩ ŋ y'a hɔɔnhɔ ba m, amba hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba a minto bɩ m."
41009014	Kʋ Yeezuu a wusigə kan karɩndanyɩnɔ kaakʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ zi bɩ, ŋ zamaa cir gʋta yɩ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan ŋ kɩ.
41009015	Zamaa bɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋn'ɩ tam k'a yaa daʋrɛ yaa da m.
41009016	A n karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ n'a kam kan ŋ kɩ?"
41009017	Gʋaa n a to zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, an a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: karɩnsaamba, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ, m nyɩ m ɩbɩɩ zi, zinə n ta m, an a ba bəətir.
41009018	K'a wuti ma bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, a do an nawʋm b'ʋ, an lihihur ta a lɛ rɛ, an n'a sɔ sʋrɛ, a mɛ bɩ n a ba taŋŋɩ-taŋŋɩ. Mɔɔ n a yɛ ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ han kʋ ŋ nɩ la zinə bɩ ra, bɩ ŋ n a da ma y.
41009019	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Do sɩrakarɛ war zannɔ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm karɔ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ? Kʋ m nyasʋ awɔɔ m dɔmɩm karɔ? K'a nyɩ bɩ gaa, a bʋr m mɔɔ zi."
41009020	Ŋ n a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m. Nyɩ bɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ lɛɛm bɩ, zinə bɩ n a hinkə, an a do tara ʋ, an nɩ pɩr kam, an nɩ lihi bɔrɛ a rɛ.
41009021	Yeezuu n a zɩ bɩ lar, a ʋ: "Yaaba b'a sɩŋŋɩda ba brɔ an nɩ nyɩ bɩ ma?" A ʋ: "A nyɩbaa ma.
41009022	Dɔmɩm niŋŋoo ʋ, a a zɛ, an a da sɛ ʋ, gɛɛ hi ʋ k'an ga. Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ dam hɔsɩ ma, k'ɩ da wɔɔ han, ɩ cicirzɛrɛ minto."
41009023	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto ɩ n'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ: k'ɩ y'ɩ dam ma! Hɔ woo••• a da ma an ba sɩrakarɛzaa m."
41009024	Lɛɛm bɩ, nyɩ bɩ zɩ bɩ n zee da, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ sɩra ka, mɔɔ cicir zɛ, m sɩrakarɛ war bɩ minto!"
41009025	Yeezuu k'a zamaa bɩ yɩ ŋn'ɩ zɛm gʋta bɩ, a həən si zinə bɩ ma, a ʋ: "Zinə, ɩbɩɩ n nɩ gʋaa bam bəətir, ɩ n n'a bam tikki, bɔ nyɩ naa do mɛ ʋ, bɩ, ɩ b'ɩ ya ɩ gasʋ y!"
41009026	Zinə bɩ n nyɩ bɩ hinkə kan paŋŋa kɩ, an bɔ a mɛ ʋ kan zee kɩ. Nyɩ bɩ n gɔɔta am gər hɔ bɩ m. Gʋɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Ga a ʋ."
41009027	Bɩ, Yeezuu a sa a wɔ ma, an a busu, an a jɩm brama.
41009028	Kʋ Yeezuu gasʋ har ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a lar a deem, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto y'a ka wɔɔ n ʋ da ma, ʋ la zinə bɩ ra?"
41009029	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zinə ncɩnaaʋ do bɩ, hɔ ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma an a ka, an bɔ, kʋ yaadarɛ bɛɛ y."
41009030	Yeezuu k'a cem kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ bra Galilee ʋ, Yeezuu n a ŋʋa kʋ n n a dɔ y.
41009031	Bala, a nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ dɩndam a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "N Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋm, ŋn'a ka gʋɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ, b'a zɛ bɩ kur bɩ dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ."
41009032	Bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta ŋ n'a jɩ dɔrɛ y, b'a larlɛ nyibəə ta ŋ nɩ.
41009033	Ŋ yaa lee ku Kapɛrnawum ʋ. Gasʋ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ har ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ n'a kam zaa ra bɩ?"
41009034	Ŋ n zɛ pi, bala, zaa ra bɩ, ŋ bʋgʋr ba kʋ ma jɩtambaa minto.
41009035	Yeezuu n nyɩnta, an gʋaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a bɩr jɩtaarɛ, k'an bɩr gʋaa haay jɛzaa, k'an bɩr gʋaa haay zibəənyɩ."
41009036	A n nyɩ gaa, an a jɩm ŋ bire ʋ, an a wɔ burgu ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
41009037	"Gʋaa k'a nyɩnɔ nɔɔm gʋaa deem da ʋ bɩ, a ba a ʋ mɔɔ m. Bɩ gʋaa k'a mɔɔ da ʋ bɩ, a n mɔɔ da ʋ m deem y, Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a da ʋ sɔ."
41009038	Zaan n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ gʋaa yɩ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra ɩbɩɩ tɔ m, wɔɔ k'ʋ a gʋ ma k'a bɩr zum kʋ ʋ kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ minto."
41009039	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A b'a gʋ ma y, bala, gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra mɔɔ tɔ m, an a ya, an mɔɔ tɔ zar y.
41009040	Gʋaa k'a bɩr jɩm bam kan wɔɔ kɩ y, wɔɔ gʋaa m.
41009041	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a hi ka awɔɔ ʋ poore a mi, kʋ mɔɔ gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ minto, a zaa bɩ kʋrɔm a ganwʋrɛ ma y.
41009042	Kʋ gʋaa a ka nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem n'a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ, kʋ n jɛnlajaa gʋta kʋsɩ a wer ma, n n a da higʋta ʋ, a jɩra.
41009043	K'ɩ wɔ y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ wɔ deem m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ, bɩ jɩra, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋm ɩ wɔ hɩɩya m sɛhar k'a lihire ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
41009045	K'ɩ gam y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ gam deem m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ, bɩ jɩra, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋm ɩ gam hɩɩya m sɛhar ʋ bɩ m.
41009047	K'ɩ mɩnyaa y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ bɔ ʋ, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ mɩnyaa deem m, Woso cirbəə b'ʋ, bɩ jɩra, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ mɩm hɩɩya m sɛhar ʋ bɩ m,
41009048	bɩncɛ kʋ mukuno bɩr gɩngaŋ ʋ, sɛ bɩr lihiŋ ʋ sɔ y.
41009049	Bala, n sɛ sam, n nɩ yɛ da gʋaa haay ma.
41009050	Yɛ naa, hɔ mɩŋŋa m. Bɩ kʋ yɛ b'a nyɩntabaa nɩ y, k'a banka bɔ nɩ? K'a ka kʋ yɛ n bɩr ta a ma, k'a nyɩnta kan kʋ kɩ laafɩɩ."
41010001	Yeezuu a hʋr b'ʋ, an ta Zidee ʋ, Zʋrdɛn kur, zamaa n a ya, an a so kʋ ma a jɩr ʋ, an a ya, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, am dɔmɩm haay hɔ bɩ m.
41010002	Farizɛɛnrɔ n a zɔ k'a nyasʋ meerbaa nɔ ʋ. Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋn'a larlɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Yar a da ma an la a lʋ ra gɛ?"
41010003	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ Moyiisi a gʋrsɩra ba awɔɔ nɩ?"
41010004	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Moyiisi ʋ, n n harcɩntarɛ kaansʋrɛ ci ba, kʋ n n bɔkarɛ, n n la lʋ ra."
41010005	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ heerkarɛ minto y'a ka, an lɛ naa do gʋrsɩra ba.
41010006	Durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma bɩ, Woso yar da kan lʋ kɩ.
41010007	Bɩ minto y'a ka, yar n n'a gʋm a zɩ ma kan a da kɩ, k'a nyɩnta kan a lʋ kɩ.
41010008	Bɩ, ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya bɩ y'a bam mɛsim deem. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩ gʋaa hɩɩya dɔ y, mɛsim deem zannɔ m.
41010009	Hɔ kʋ Woso a zɛ kʋ ra bɩ, a b'a ka gʋaa n a gʋngʋ kʋ ma y."
41010010	Kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ, ŋnɩ doo har ʋ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ya, ŋn'a lar mim naa do jɩ ma.
41010011	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a la a lʋ ra, an a vanta sa bɩ, jaan an n'a dam kan bɩ kɩ.
41010012	Bɩ, kʋ lʋ a gʋ a zim ma, an a vanta sa, jaan an n'a dam kan bɩ kɩ sɔ."
41010013	Gʋɔɔ bʋr nyɩnɔ poorero m Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a yɛ han k'an a wɔ da ŋ ma, b'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n yɛ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
41010014	Yeezuu k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a nɔ ma ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ to ŋnɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi, a b'a ta ŋ nɩ tolle y, bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nawɔnnɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.
41010015	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a n Woso cirbəə bɩ si am nyɩ poore hɔ bɩ m bɩ, a bɩ gasʋŋ ʋ y."
41010016	Bɩ kur bɩ, a a wɔ burgu ŋ ma, an a wɔ ka ŋ mim la, an nɩ ŋ barka daŋ ʋ.
41010017	Kʋ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ zaa sa, ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, gʋaa n a si, an bɩ kukurə zɛ a taa, an a yɛ han, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba mɩŋŋa, bɔ mɔɔ m ga m, m a ba, kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ?"
41010018	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto, ɩ n nɩ mɔɔ birm mɩŋŋa? Gʋaa mɩŋŋa ba ʋ kʋ Woso deem bɛɛ y.
41010019	Ɩbɩɩ Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ. 'Ɩ bɩ gʋaa zɛ y, ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɩ ŋʋaar ba y, ɩ b'ɩ hɔɔn da gʋaa hɔ ma k'an yɩ ɩ hɔ y, ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ.' "
41010020	Gʋaa bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ naa haay sɩŋŋɩda sa m nyɩbaa ma, m n'a barɛ."
41010021	Yeezuu n dɩga gʋaa bɩ ma, an a ŋʋa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ deem ɩ jɩra ɩbɩɩ ma: ta, hɔ k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ hɛɛ haay, ɩ jir ŋʋazannɔ m. Ɩbɩɩ yaa arzaka yɩ Woso zi, k'ɩ bʋr ɩ zu mɔɔ ʋ."
41010022	Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ bɩ, gʋaa bɩ heer a zar gʋta, an a hʋr kan heerzarlɛ kɩ, bala, a arzaka nyɩnta ʋ gʋta.
41010023	Yeezuu k'a dɩga a jɩr ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə gasʋʋrɛ nyɩntam arzakazannɔ ma kaŋŋɩda!"
41010024	A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə a meer naa do barɛ minto. Yeezuu n a ya, an so ra, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, Woso cirbəə gasʋʋrɛ kɔɔkɔɔ.
41010025	Yoonde gasʋ huuka yaa m nyɩntam zanta an lɛ da arzakazaa gasʋ Woso cirbəə ʋ m."
41010026	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ya ŋnɩ zɛ kədə an lɛ da, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n nɩ bɔm lɛ nɩ?"
41010027	Yeezuu n dɩga ŋ ma, a ʋ: "Gʋaa b'a dam ma, an a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ y, bɩ Woso y'a da hɔ haay ma."
41010028	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɩga, wɔɔ hɔ haay to, k'ʋ zu ɩbɩɩ ʋ."
41010029	Yeezuu n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ gʋaa a gʋ a har, kan a zɩ kɩ, a da kɩ, a dakumbonno kɩ, a danlʋrɔ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ, a tara kɩ ma mɔɔ minto kan lemim nyɩnta bɩ minto kɩ,
41010030	a zaa har, kan da kɩ, dakumbonno kɩ, danlʋrɔ kɩ, nyɩnɔ kɩ, tara kɩ yɩm gallɛm zɔrɔ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ, kan fɩryɩrɛ kɩ. Durnya k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nɔ ʋ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩm sɔ.
41010031	Lɛɛkarɛzannɔ gʋta nyɩntam jɛzannɔ, jɛzannɔ nyɩntam lɛɛkarɛzannɔ."
41010032	Ŋ y'a hʋr, ŋnɩ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ. Yeezuu nɩ tarɛ ŋ lɛɛ. Dabɔʋ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, nyibəə gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ. Yeezuu a ya, an bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir a jɩr ʋ, an nɩ mim k'a nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ ba m bɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
41010033	"K'a dɩga, ta kʋ wɔɔ nawʋm Zerizalɛm ʋ naa, n yaa Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋ n a ka wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ ʋ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ ʋ. Ŋ y'a dʋdɔ yarlɛ k'a zɛ gər, ŋn'a da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
41010034	Ŋ yaa wʋm ma, ŋ lihi dam ma, ŋ y'a zɛm madɩɩrɔ m, ŋ y'a zɛrɛ an ga, bɩ, dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ."
41010035	Zebedee nyɩnɔ Zakkɩ kan Zaan kɩ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han naa ma bɩ, ɩ bɩ zɛ wɔɔ m ma y."
41010036	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ mɔɔ n a ba awɔɔ minto?"
41010037	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ a yɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ɩbɩɩ cirbəə bɩncɛ ʋ, k'ɩ ka kʋ wɔɔ gʋaa deem n nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ, deem ɩbɩɩ jɩsa."
41010038	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n hɔ k'a n'a yɛm bɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ a da ma, a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a mim laaga ʋ bɩ mi ra? Gɛɛ awɔɔ a da ma a fɩryɩrɛ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ yɩ ra?"
41010039	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ʋ da ma." Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laaga hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a mim bɩ, awɔɔ y'a mim, fɩr kʋ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ,
41010040	bɩ, k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ jɩsa kan mɔɔ bɩsɩ bɩ kɩ nyɩntarɛ nɩ, mɔɔ n m da ma m zaa ka y, bala, mɔɔ n m so ʋ y. Bɩncɛ bɩ banka Woso ʋ ŋ zannɔ minto."
41010041	Karɩndanyɩnɔ buro wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ nɔ ma ʋ kan Zakkɩ kɩ, Zaan kɩ.
41010042	Yeezuu n ŋ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ: gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma cinno wɔɔ, brɔɔ nɩ paŋŋa barɛ a kʋrɔ ma, paŋŋazannɔ n'a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ a gʋɔɔ ma.
41010043	B'a bɩ nyɩntarɛ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ bire ʋ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a bɩr jɩtaarɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ, k'an a ba zibəənyɩ.
41010044	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a bɩr lɛɛkarɛzaa awɔɔ bire ʋ, k'an a ba awɔɔ haay lɔ.
41010045	Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n bʋr kʋ gʋɔɔ n b'a hɔɔnhɔ ba y, bʋr a ʋ k'a b'a da gʋɔɔ han, k'a a mɩsɩrbaa ka gʋɔɔ gʋta bʋmbɔrɛ minto."
41010046	Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, zamaa bɩ kɩ yaa lee ku Zeriko ʋ. Kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔm kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, bʋʋ ɩ nyɩnta zaa lezi b'ʋ, a tɔ m Bartimee, Time nyɩ m, an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm.
41010047	K'a a ma ŋ ʋ: Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu m bɩ, an nɩ zee darɛ, a ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
41010048	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ bʋgʋr bam ma, ŋ ʋ, an a tʋr ka, b'a a banka, an a da ra: "Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
41010049	Yeezuu n jɩm, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bir!" N n a bir, n n a hɩ m, n ʋ: "Ɩ tɔ ʋ, wuti, a y'ɩ birm."
41010050	Bʋʋ bɩ n a gɔbga bɔ a ra, an a zo, an wuti kan bra kɩ, an bʋr Yeezuu zi.
41010051	Yeezuu n a lar, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa kʋ m bɔ ba ɩ nɩ?" Bʋʋ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, a ka kʋ m m ya, m lɛɛ yɩ."
41010052	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ta, ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ." Lɛɛm bɩ, a mɩnyaa ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, an zu Yeezuu ʋ, an nɩ tam.
41011001	Kʋ ŋ n'a zɔm Zerizalɛm ma, Bɛtfazee kan Betanii kɩ jɩr ʋ, ci kʋ n n'a birm Oliviyee ci bɩ zeezi bɩ, Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya,
41011002	an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta kʋ k'a n'awɔɔ lɛɛ naa ʋ. Bɩ, k'awɔɔ yaa gasʋ b'ʋ lɛɛm nɩ, awɔɔ brapoo yɩm, n n a kʋsɩ, bɩ gʋaa n da ʋ cɩna y. K'a hʋr a bʋr m.
41011003	Kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ lar, a ʋ: bɔ minto m awɔɔ nɩ naa barɛ, k'a hɩ m, a ʋ: Zuuba lɛ n taa, a y'a tore awɔɔ m bʋr m lɛɛm."
41011004	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ta, ŋ n'aa brapoo yɩ, n n a kʋsɩ tɩnsara harlɛ ma zaa lɛ zi, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hʋr.
41011005	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ŋ lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ n nɩ brapoo bɩ hʋrlɛ?"
41011006	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, amba Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ m, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n ŋ to, ŋn'a hʋr.
41011007	Ŋ n ta brapoo bɩ m Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a huuro ka brapoo bɩ ra, Yeezuu n da ʋ.
41011008	Gʋɔɔ gʋta n a huuro ka zaa bɩ ra, gɔsɩnnɔ n gɔ lɛɛ yɩnyar hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ, ŋn'a ka ra.
41011009	Bɔɔ nɩ Yeezuu lɛɛ, kan bɔɔ n'a kur lɔ wɔɔ kɩ ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ: "Hozaana! Kʋ gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ!
41011010	Kʋ cirbəə k'a nɩ zɛm naa n barka yɩ, am wɔɔ yaaba Davɩd hɔ bɩ m. Hozaana! K'ɩ tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ brama."
41011011	A n gasʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ, Wosocɛ ʋ. K'a dɩga hɔ haay ma bɩ, a a hʋr an ta Betanii ʋ kan bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kʋ gum da bɩ minto.
41011012	A dɔ k'a mɛ ŋn'ɩ bɔm Betanii ʋ bɩ, nɔ Yeezuu nyasʋ.
41011013	A n a to, an sɔɔn yɩ laatʋ a lɛɛ n ta ʋ, an ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a yaa dɩga a hɔsɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ gɛ. A zɔ k'a ʋ sɔɔn bɩ ma bɩ, a lɛɛ a yɩ, bala, sɔɔn bɔɔnrɛ dɔmɩm bɛɛ y.
41011014	A n a hɩ sɔɔn bɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa b'a yarɛ an ɩbɩɩ nyɩ bɩ dɔ y!" A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a ma.
41011015	Yeezuu yaa lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. Gasʋ kʋ Yeezuu ʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ lam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ hɛɛnm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ sim nɔ wɔɔ ra Wosocɛ hallu ʋ b'ʋ. A busoolʋrlɛzannɔ mɔdrɔkuntərehɔɔ hɩnhɩsɩga kan cirpʋnnɔ hɛɛnno nyɩntaragɔrɔ kɩ.
41011016	Bɩ, a n gɔsɩ to an nɩ cenim mɔr m Wosocɛ hallu ʋ b'ʋ y.
41011017	A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'N mɔɔ cɛ bɩ birm yaadarɛ cɛ, do haay minto.' Awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ a sa, a ba konno bɩncɛ."
41011018	Kʋ Yeezuu naa hɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ n a ma bɩ, ŋ y'a karɛ a zɛrɛ zaa ma. Bɩ, ŋ yɩ nyi bam. Bala, zamaa b'a lɛ bɔ Yeezuu hɔdɩndarɛ b'ʋ.
41011019	Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, Yeezuu bɔ tara bɩ nɔ ʋ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
41011020	A dɔ k'a mɛ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɩ cenim bɩ, ŋ sɔɔn bɩ yɩ, an ga kan a məsi kɩ.
41011021	Pɩyɛɛr n hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Dɩga, Zuuba, sɔɔn k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ lɛ da ʋ bɩ ga haay!"
41011022	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a sɩra ka Woso ʋ.
41011023	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ gʋaa a hɩ ci naa do m: 'Ɩ bɔɔta, ɩ ɩ da kɔ ʋ,' bɩ bɩsɩkarɛ ba a heer ʋ, k'a a sɩra ka, a ʋ: hɔ k'awɔɔ hɩ bɩ barɛ, a bam, amba a a hɩ bɩ m.
41011024	Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɛm a yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a sɩra ka, a ʋ, awɔɔ yɩ, bɩ n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ sɔ.
41011025	Bɩ k'awɔɔ jɩm brama, an nɩ yaa dam, kʋ hɔ y'awɔɔ heer ʋ kan gʋaa kɩ, k'a sugur ka ʋ, k'awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ n awɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur ka awɔɔ ʋ sɔ. [
41011026	Bɩ k'awɔɔ n sugur ka a muno ʋ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ b'awɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ wɔɔ sugur karɛ y.]"
41011027	Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ a ya, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ. Yeezuu k'a nɩ bɩmbɩrm Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ bʋr zi, ŋ ʋ:
41011028	"Nka ɩ lɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ naa barɛ minto? Nka ɩ zaa ka?"
41011029	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ m awɔɔ lar mim deem ma, k'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɔkarɛ, m bɩncɛ kʋ n lɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ hɩ awɔɔ m.
41011030	Batɛm kʋ Zaan nyɩnta an n'a kam bɩ, a to a ʋ Woso zi gɛɛ, gʋɔɔ zi? K'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ!"
41011031	Ŋ n'ɩ bɩsɩ kɩnkam kʋ ma, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: a to a ʋ Woso zi, a y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ: bɔ minto m wɔɔ n a mim si gɛ?
41011032	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: a to a ʋ gʋɔɔ zi, zamaa bɩ bɩ yɛrɛ y. Kʋ zamaa bɩ Zaan dɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa paan••• bɩ minto."
41011033	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n a dɔ y." Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɩ minto bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ n lɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ hɩrɛ awɔɔ m sɔ y."
41012001	Yeezuu n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ meer bam kan ŋ kɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta an dɩvɛn gɔ sɔɔn, an lambaar da ma, an yaa hɔn, k'a bɩr dɩvɛn nyɩ bɩ hi bɔŋ ʋ, an bɛŋŋʋ dɔ sɔ, an gʋɔɔ sa kʋ ŋ n dɔ dɩvɛnsɩra bɩ ma, an a hʋr an ta zaa ra.
41012002	Dɩvɛn mɔsa k'a a ku bɩ, a n a zibəənyɩ deem nyɔɔ wutu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zi, k'an aa a hɔ si, an b'a ka a ʋ.
41012003	Ŋ n a nyasʋ, ŋn'a zɛ, ŋn'a da zaa ra a wɔ n tu.
41012004	Wutu zaa bɩ n a ya, an zibəənyɩ vanta nyɔɔ. Wutu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a zɛ, ŋnɩ yaaba da a mim ma, ŋnɩ fɩr ka ma.
41012005	A n a ya, an a kaakʋ hɔ nyɔɔ, ŋn'a zɛ gər. Bɩ jɛ ʋ, an gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ nyɔɔ, ŋnɩ fɩr ka gɔsɩnnɔ ma, ŋnɩ gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛ.
41012006	A kur ma hɔ ma bɩ, a nyɩ k'a ŋʋa bɩ y'a deem ɩ gɔɔta, an a nyɔɔ ŋ zi, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Ŋ mɔɔ nyɩ bɩ daŋ ʋ.'
41012007	Wutu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a dɩnda kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: 'A n nɩ zɛm b'a so arzaka b'ʋ. K'a bʋr, k'ʋ a zɛ, k'ʋ ʋ so wutu b'ʋ.'
41012008	Ŋ n a nyasʋ, ŋn'a zɛ gər, ŋnɩ bɔ m dɩvɛnsɩra b'ʋ, ŋn'a zo."
41012009	"Bɔ dɩvɛnsɩra zaa bɩ n'a barɛ? A zɛm, an b'a dɩvɛnsɩra zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, an a sa, an a ka a vantɔɔ ʋ.
41012010	Awɔɔ n naa karɩnda ba ra? Jaa kʋ cɛdonno a bɔ ʋ ŋn'a zo bɩ, bɩ y'a ba jaa paŋŋazaa, cɛ bɩ dɔrɛ minto.
41012011	Zuuba ɩ naa ba, bɩ wɔɔ yɩ hɔ gʋta m."
41012012	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka ma rɔ wɔɔ n'a kam ma k'a nyasʋ, bɩ, ŋ yɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m. Ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ: hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da Yeezuu ʋ awɔɔ minto. Ŋ n a hʋr, ŋn'a gʋ ma.
41012013	N farizɛɛnrɔ kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ gʋɔɔ kɩ nyɔɔ Yeezuu zi kʋ ŋ n'aa a nyasʋ a meerbaa nɔ ʋ.
41012014	Ŋ n b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, wɔɔ dɔ sɩrazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ heer tɩrga kan gʋaa biyəə kɩ. Ɩbɩɩ bɩr dɩgam gʋaa meer ma bala y, Woso zaa ɩbɩɩ n'a dɩndam sɩra bɩncɛ ʋ. Zaa ta ʋ k'ʋ Rɔm cir yawʋr ka gɛ? A a ga m gɛɛ a n a ga nɩ?"
41012015	Bɩ, kʋ Yeezuu ŋ zambʋ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ n'a gɩngam mɔɔ ma ncɩnaaʋ? K'a bʋr wacɩr m deem, kʋ m dɩga a."
41012016	Ŋ n bʋr m. Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ŋʋasa naa do kan gʋrsɩra naa do kɩ, nka hɔ nɩ?" Ŋ ʋ: "Rɔm cir hɔ m."
41012017	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a hɔ kʋ cir a so ʋ bɩ ka ʋ, k'a hɔ kʋ Woso a so ʋ bɩ ka ʋ." Meerbaa naa do nyɩbɔʋrɛ a ka, ŋ n zɛ kədə.
41012018	Sadisɛɛnrɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ bɩ, ŋ bʋr Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ laaka da han, ŋ ʋ:
41012019	"Zuuba, Moyiisi a gʋrsɩra ba an a ka wɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ, 'Kʋ gʋaa ga, an a lʋ to, b'a nyɩ ba ʋ y, k'a danyɩ n lʋ bɩ si, k'an nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ a danyɩ bɩ minto.'
41012020	Danyɩnɔ ɩ nyɩnta saanhɩna. Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n lʋ sa, an ga, an a gʋ lʋ bɩ ma, bɩ nyɩ ba ʋ y.
41012021	A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n lʋ bɩ si, an ga, b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y. A kaakʋ hɔ bɩ maam sɔ.
41012022	Saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay ŋ gɩnga, bɩ ŋ n nyɩ yɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ y. Ŋ haay kur bɩ, lʋ bɩ n bɩ ga.
41012023	Gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, kʋ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, ŋ haay bireyaa ʋ, nka y'a so lʋ b'ʋ? Bala, gʋɔɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay lʋ bɩ si."
41012024	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ n gʋrsɩrarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kan Woso paŋŋa kɩ dɔ bɩ, bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ nɩ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ nɔ ʋ.
41012025	Bala, kʋ gəəno b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, yar bɩr lʋ sarɛ y, lʋ bɩr yar sarɛ y. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
41012026	Bɩ kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ mim nɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba Moyiisi ci bɩ nɔ ʋ ra, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso meer ba kan Moyiisi kɩ tutugu nɔ ʋ bɩ, a ʋ: 'Abraham kan Izakkɩ kɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso m mɔɔ m.'
41012027	Gəəno Woso bɛɛ y, mɩsɩɩrɔ Woso m. Awɔɔ ɩ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ nɔ ʋ gʋta."
41012028	Wosocikarɩnsaamba deem ŋ bɩsɩkarɛ bɩ ma, a a yɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa, an a zɔ, an Yeezuu lar, a ʋ: "Lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay bire ʋ kara ɩ lɛ da?"
41012029	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Lɛ lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ n naa do: 'K'a tʋr ka Israyɛl zannɔ, Zuuba k'a m wɔɔ Woso bɩ, a y'a deem m Zuuba.
41012030	K'ɩ Zuuba ɩ Woso bɩ ŋʋa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, kan ɩ nyi kɩ haay, kan ɩ hɔɔndarɛ kɩ haay, kan ɩ paŋŋa kɩ haay.'
41012031	A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: 'K'ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m.' Lɛ vanta ba ʋ an lɛ da nawɔnnɔ ra y."
41012032	Wosocikarɩnsaamba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra ɩbɩɩ hɩ, karɩnsaamba, a mɩŋŋa gʋta: 'Woso y'a deem m, bɩ a vanta ba ʋ, an a na ma y.
41012033	Ɩ Woso ŋʋa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, ɩ hɔɔn kɩ haay, ɩ paŋŋa kɩ haay, k'ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m,' bɩ jɩra mannɩ haay kʋ n nɩ sɛ nyaŋ ʋ bɩ m, kan ganwʋrɛrɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ ŋ kam Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ."
41012034	Yeezuu k'a yɩ gʋaa b'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩ laatʋ Woso cirbəə bɩ ma y." Bɩ kur bɩ, gʋaa biyəə ɩ nyi bam Yeezuu larlɛ m.
41012035	Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔ dɩndam Zerizalɛm Wosocɛ ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto m wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ: Davɩd Nyɩ m Krista bɩ m gɛ?
41012036	Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka Davɩd n a hɩ, a ʋ: Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ Zuuba m: nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʋ, kʋ m b'a ka k'ɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta ɩ gam taa.
41012037	Davɩd mɩŋŋa y'a birm Zuuba. Kʋ Zuuba n a ba lɔ, an nyɩnta Davɩd Nyɩ gɛ?" Zamaa bɩ n'a tʋr kam ma kan heernyɩnta kɩ.
41012038	Yeezuu y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ a hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩmbɩrm zabarɔ m, ŋn'a kam daʋrɛ ma zamaa gʋta bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ,
41012039	ŋn'a kam lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛ ma hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, kan sokʋma bɩncɛ kɩ.
41012040	Ŋ n'ɩ zonno hɔ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋn'a mɩŋŋabaa hɩnkam kan yaadarɛrɔ jintoo kɩ. Ŋ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩm maam-maam."
41012041	Yeezuu nyɩnta an a meer nya busoo daʋrɛ bɩncɛ bɩ rɛ, an nɩ dɩgam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ busoo bɩ daʋrɛ ma. Arzakazannɔ wɔɔ barla gɔsɩnnɔ y'a daŋ ʋ gʋta.
41012042	Zoro n bɩ tanka hɩɩya zar ʋ.
41012043	Yeezuu n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zoro ŋʋazaa naa do busoo bɩ zar ʋ gʋta, an lɛ da gʋaa haay k'a n'a daŋ ʋ bɩ ra.
41012044	Bala, ŋ haay busoo k'a zibəə ba ŋ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a da ʋ. Bɩ zoro bɩ kan a cicir bɩ kɩ, a a mɩsɩrbaa hɔ sa haay, an a da ʋ."
41013001	Yeezuu k'a bɔ Wosocɛ b'ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, dɩga cɛ bɩ jaarɔ wɔɔ gʋɛrɛ ma kan a dɔrɛ kɩ!"
41013002	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɩga ɩbɩɩ nawʋm cɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔrɛ gʋtabaa ma ra? Jaa deem bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a mim burə ʋ y. Ŋ haay zɛm bɩ wurgə."
41013003	Yeezuu yaa nyɩnta Oliviyee ci bɩ ra, an a meer nya Wosocɛ bɩ rɛ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zakkɩ kɩ, Zaan kɩ, Andɩr kɩ kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, gɔsɩ ba b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ laaka naa do da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ: "Naa do bam brɔ?
41013004	A hɩ wɔɔ m, makra kara n nɩ nawɔnnɔ nyarɛ bɩ hɩnkam wɔɔ nɩ?"
41013005	Yeezuu n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kʋ gɔsɩ b'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ y.
41013006	Gʋɔɔ gʋta zɛm, ŋnɩ bɩ meer ba mɔɔ tɔ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Krista n a mɩ,' bɩ ŋ gʋɔɔ gʋta nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ.
41013007	K'awɔɔ bɩ yar mim ma kan yar k'a n'a dam ma, an bɩ wuti bɩ kɩ, a bɩ dabɔʋ ba y, bala, pakra m kʋ naa haay n ba. Bɩ, durnya nyarɛ bɛɛ m naa cɩna y.
41013008	Do deem gʋɔɔ wutim ŋnɩ yar ba kan doro vantɔɔ kɩ. Tara deem zannɔ wutim ŋnɩ yar ba kan tara vanta zannɔ kɩ. Bɩncɛrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ tara nyiŋŋəm. Nɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, k'a dɔ, a ʋ: fɩryɩrɛ sɩŋŋɩda a zɔ.
41013009	K'a dundo a mɩŋŋa zi, ŋ y'awɔɔ gʋrm, ŋnɩ ta awɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno zi, ŋ y'awɔɔ zɛm madɩɩrɔ m sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ. Ŋ tarɛ awɔɔ m tara lɛɛzannɔ kan cinno kɩ taa mɔɔ minto. Nawɔnnɔ y'awɔɔ yɩm mɔɔ minto, an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ brɔɔ minto.
41013010	Bɩ pakra m kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka, ŋnɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da durnya haay nɔ ʋ, kʋ durnya nyarɛ n bɔkarɛ, an a ku.
41013011	Kʋ ŋ b'awɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ awɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, a bɩ lɛɛ ka a a hɔɔn da hɔ k'awɔɔ n aa a hɩ bɩ ma y. Mim k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr awɔɔ hɔɔn ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, b'awɔɔ n n'a hɩm. Bala, awɔɔ bɛɛ n nɩ meer bam dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n nɩ meer bɩ barɛ awɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ.
41013012	Danyɩnɔ kʋ kam zɛ ma. Zɩ y'a nyɩ karɛ n n a zɛ. Nyɩnɔ wutim nyaam kan a zɩrɔ kɩ, ŋn'a ka, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
41013013	Gʋaa haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma, bɩ gʋaa k'a nyasʋ a sɩrakarɛ m kɔɔkɔɔ an ta an fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nyarɛ ku, bɩ zaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm."
41013014	"K'awɔɔ bɩ 'Gʋaa kʋ hɔzaarbarɛzaa bʋnyaa m bɩ' yɩ an nɩ bɩncɛ niŋŋə ʋ, b'a n'a ga m, an nyɩnta bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, gʋaa niŋŋə k'a n'a karɩnda bam bɩ ma bɩ, k'an a jɩ ma. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɩntam Zidee ʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a si ŋnɩ ta ciro ʋ.
41013015	Gʋaa k'a n'a cɛ mim ʋ bɩ, a b'a ka ma k'a zer a gasʋ a cɛ ʋ, k'a hɔsɩ sa dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ y.
41013016	Gʋaa k'a n'a hɔsɩra ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, a b'a bɔ an doo k'a yaa a huu sa y!
41013017	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, mim pakra bam lannɔ jɩsɩzannɔ m, kan bɔɔ n nɩ nyɔ karɛ a nyɩnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
41013018	K'a yaa da, kʋ naa do bɩ lee ku la dɔmɩm ʋ y.
41013019	Bala, a nyɩntam fɩryɩrɛ dɔmɩnnɔ k'an nyɩnta ʋ hallɩ durnya kʋ Woso a da bɩ sɩŋŋɩda ma, an ta an naa ma ku, bɩ, ʋ b'ʋ yarɛ, ʋ a do yɩ fɩɩga y.
41013020	Kʋ Woso bɛɛ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro bɔrɛ, gʋaa ba ʋ an b'a dam ma, an a meeyaa bʋmbɔ y. Bɩ gʋɔɔ k'an ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto, a dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro bɔrɛ.
41013021	Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ, a ʋ: Krista ɩ naa ʋ, gɛɛ, a ɩ bra ʋ, a b'a si y.
41013022	Ŋʋaarzannɔ kʋ ŋ Krista tɔ sa ŋn'a ka a ma rɔ wɔɔ, kan ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ gʋta. Ŋ makrarɔ bam gʋta kan hoserlo kɩ k'a a da ma, a gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ.
41013023	Bɩ k'awɔɔ m, k'a dundo a zi kan hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ haay awɔɔ m, b'a n'a ku cɩna bɩ kɩ."
41013024	"Bɩ kʋ fɩryɩrɛ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ bɩ cem, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nɔ ʋ, woso b'a yarɛ an gu y, mom b'a yarɛ an gu sɔ y.
41013025	Monyaarɔ surm, brama paŋŋa haay y'a zɛm kʋ ma.
41013026	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an a to warkʋ nɔ ʋ an bɩr zɛm kan paŋŋa kɩ, cirbəə gʋta kɩ.
41013027	A n bɔkarɛ, an malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ, ŋn'aa gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, an a sa dɔjɩr ma an ta kan meer kɩ.
41013028	K'a sɔɔn makra bɩ sa. K'awɔɔ b'a yɩ, an lɛɛ daa da, an nɩ kum, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ siire a zɔ.
41013029	A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ bɩ minno nɔɔn duro yɩ, ŋn'ɩ zɛrɛ, k'a dɔ a ʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm a zɔ.
41013030	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: zamaana naa do bɩ cenim, kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay bɛɛ ba y.
41013031	Brama kan tara kɩ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ bɩ cenle y.
41013032	Bɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do kan wakatɩ bɩ do kɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ an b'a dɔrɛ y. Baa malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ y. Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n a dɔ sɔ y. K'a maam, Zɩ bɩ y'a deem y'a dɔ.
41013033	K'a dundo a zi, a bɩ hinceem ba y. Bala, awɔɔ n dɔmɩm bɩ do zɛrɛ dɔ y.
41013034	Bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ tam kʋ ʋ bɩ kɩ, an a har to a zibəənyɩnɔ m, an lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, an zibəə ka gʋaa biyəə ʋ k'an a ba. A n a hɩ hardɔmazaa bɩ m, a ʋ: a bɩ hinceem ba y.
41013035	K'a b'a zu a ʋ y. Bala, awɔɔ n har bɩ zaa bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm dɔ y. Kʋ dibsir nɩ, kʋ wuti gʋta nɩ, kʋ koo baadarɛ dɔmɩm nɩ, kʋ dɔmɩrɛ nɩ, awɔɔ n a dɔ y.
41013036	Dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr ʋ bɩ, a b'a ka, an bɩ dɩga a awɔɔ hinceem ba y.
41013037	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, awɔɔ haay mɔɔ hɩ a m. K'a bɩ hinceem ba y."
41014001	Pakkɩ cibsa kan bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma cibsa kɩ gɔɔta dɔmɩm hɩɩya. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ y'a kam zaa k'a n'a sam k'a Yeezuu ku a nyasʋ a mim ka ra, kʋ n n'a zɛ bɩ ma.
41014002	Ŋ y'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ b'a ba cibsa hinni ʋ y. Kʋ n bɛɛ nɩ, zamaa bɩ wutim yar m kan wɔɔ kɩ a minto."
41014003	Yeezuu nyɩnta Betanii ʋ, gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn kusimə bɩ har ʋ. K'a nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm bɩ, lʋ deem bʋr har ʋ b'ʋ kan gedre kɩ, n n a ba albatɩr jaa m, tidəər n a han. A ji n nyɩnta, a lɛ m kʋsɩ, an tidəər gedre bɩ yi, an tidəər bɩ lo Yeezuu ra.
41014004	Bɩ, naa do gʋɔɔ gʋta heer zar, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ tɔ ma m, n n tidəər naa do zaar barɛ?
41014005	N y'a da ma, n n tidəər naa do hɛɛ, a busoo n cem deniyee zɔɔkarkʋ han, n n a ka ŋʋazannɔ ʋ." Bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ kukur bam lʋ bɩ ma.
41014006	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a lʋ bɩ to zenyy••• Bɔ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n'a heer zarlɛ? Zibəə mɩŋŋa a ba mɔɔ tɔ ma.
41014007	Ŋʋazannɔ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ dɔmɩm haay. Awɔɔ y'a dam ma a hɔ mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa ʋ. Bɩ mɔɔ, mɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay y.
41014008	Lʋ naa do, hɔ k'a a da ma b'a a ba. K'a tidəər nɔ mɔɔ mɛ ma bɩ, lɛɛ a ka, an mɔɔ mɛsim banka mɔɔ birle minto.
41014009	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: durnya nɔ ʋ, bɩncɛ kʋ n nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa daŋ ʋ haay bɩ, n y'a tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ, n n lʋ naa do hɔ k'a a ba bɩ hɩ sɔ."
41014010	Bɩ kur bɩ, Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ ta, an aa wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ yɩ, k'a Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ.
41014011	Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ heer nyɔɔ gʋta, ŋnɩ ler bɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'a busoo ka ʋ." Zidas n yɛ, an n'a kam dɔmɩm k'a n'a dam ma a Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ ma.
41014012	Bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm ma bɩ, n nɩ pakkɩ sinnyɛɛm mannɩ baŋ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa kʋ aa pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba ka, ɩbɩɩ minto?"
41014013	A n a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta tara nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ gʋaa zɛŋ ʋ, an hi busu gər ʋ, k'a zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ,
41014014	a gasʋ bɩncɛ k'a nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ b'ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, k'a hɩ har bɩ zaa m, a ʋ: 'Zuuba ɩ laaka dam: bɩncɛ kara awɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩŋ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ?'
41014015	A cɛ gʋta hɩnkarɛ awɔɔ m mim ʋ, ŋn'a banka haay. Bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ awɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ baŋ ʋ."
41014016	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'aa hɔ haay bɩ yɩ amba a a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ m, ŋnɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka.
41014017	Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, Yeezuu bʋr kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
41014018	Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩm kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ gʋaa deem k'a nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm, an mɔɔ ka."
41014019	Ŋ haay nɩ nyɩntam kan heer zar kɩ. Ŋ gʋaa deem-deem n'a larm, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ m gɛ?"
41014020	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gʋaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ deem m. Gʋaa k'a n'a wɔ nyɔɔm kan mɔɔ kɩ laaga b'ʋ, bɩ m.
41014021	Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ cenim amba hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba a tɔ ma bɩ m. Bɩ kʋsɩ ɩ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ kɩ. Kʋ gʋaa bɩ do ɩ nɩ yɩ, a jɩra."
41014022	Kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩm bɩ, Yeezuu bur sa, an a barka da ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a si, naa do naa, mɔɔ mɛ m.
41014023	Bɩ kur bɩ, a a ya, an laaga sa, dɩvɛn n a han, an barka yaa da Woso m, an a ka ŋ ʋ, ŋ haay n a mi."
41014024	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ma m naa, gʋaasɩbabaa ma m, an a lo gʋɔɔ gʋta minto.
41014025	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m dɩvɛn mi dɔ y, an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ m ya, m a mi kan awɔɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ ku."
41014026	Kʋ ŋ barka laarɔ wɔɔ lɔ ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ bɔ ŋnɩ ta Oliviyee ci ra.
41014027	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ y'a wɩsɩrabaa tom, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ seero dundor bɩ zɛm, seero wɔɔ n hɩsɩga da.'
41014028	Bɩ mɔɔ mɩmbɔʋrɛ kur bɩ, mɔɔ lɛɛ karɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʋ."
41014029	Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Baa kʋ gʋaa haay bɩ wɔ saa a wɩsɩrabaa ma, mɔɔ bɩ wɔ saa n ma y."
41014030	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, gum naa do ʋ bala, koo bɩ baa dam gallɛm hɩɩya y, ɩbɩɩ n bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʋ."
41014031	Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, an so ra kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ ga mɔɔ nawʋm kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ a jɩra, mɔɔ bɩ bɩsɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma y." A muno wɔɔ n a hɩ maam sɔ.
41014032	Bɩ kur bɩ, ŋ ta bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Gɛtsemanee ʋ b'ʋ. Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnta naa ʋ, kʋ m yaa da, kʋ m bʋr."
41014033	A n Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zakkɩ kɩ Zaan kɩ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, heerzar gʋta kan dabɔʋ kɩ gasʋ ʋ.
41014034	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ heer a zar an a zɔ zɛ ma. K'a gɔɔta naa ʋ, a bɩ hinceem ba y."
41014035	A n ta lɛɛ poore, an kukurə zɛ, an a meer ku tara ma, an nɩ yaa darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ, kʋ fɩryɩrɛ k'awɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ y'a dam ma, an a gʋ a ma.
41014036	A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, hɔ ba ʋ an kɔɔkɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ma y. Fɩr naa do gʋ mɔɔ ma, kan bɩ kɩ haay, ɩ bɩ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y, ɩ hɔ ba."
41014037	A n a bɔ, an bʋr a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, a bɩ dɩga a ŋ hinceem ba, an ŋ gu, an a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, hinceem ɩbɩɩ n'a bam na, ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ da ɩ mɩŋŋa ma wakatɩ deem ma tɔkkɛ ra!
41014038	K'a yaa da, a bɩ hinceem ba y, a yaa n a do makra nɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ heer lɛ taa, bɩ mɛsim paŋŋa ba ʋ y."
41014039	A n a bɔ, an ta yaadarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an a ya, an so a yaadarɛ bɩ ra.
41014040	A n a bɔ, an bʋr a hɩɩya hɔ ma a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an bɩ dɩga a, ŋ hinceem ba. Bala, hinceem ta ŋ nɩ gʋta. Ŋ n hɔ k'a n'a hɩm nɩ bɩ dɔ y.
41014041	A n a bɔ an bʋr a kaakʋ hɔ ma ŋ zi, an b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a lɛ taa, k'a hinceem ba kɛɛrɛ, k'a hoon si. Hɔ haay nya. Dɔmɩm a ku. Naa ma bɩ, n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋrɛ n a ka mimbʋnyaabənno ʋ.
41014042	K'a wuti, k'ʋ ta, gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ lee ku."
41014043	Kʋ Yeezuu gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, Zidas, bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ lee ku lɛɛm, kan gʋɔɔ cir kɩ, bannɔ kan kargʋrɔ kɩ a wɔ ʋ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ.
41014044	Zunzukʋrazaa bɩ lɛɛ ka an makra hɩnka ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ m wɔ burgum ma bɩ, bɩ zaa m. K'a nyasʋ, a dɔ ma mɩŋŋa, a ta m."
41014045	Zidas k'a lee ku lɛɛm bɩ, a a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba." A n a burgu ma.
41014046	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro Yeezuu nyasʋ lɛɛm.
41014047	A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem kargʋ gaa ʋ, an wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ sakʋ, an a tʋr gʋ ma.
41014048	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋr awɔɔ kargʋrɔ m kan bannɔ kɩ m k'a bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋ, ɩ ʋ, dazaamazaa n mɔɔ m.
41014049	Mɔɔ nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʋ dɔmɩm haay, m nɩ karɩnda bam Wosocɛ ʋ, b'awɔɔ n mɔɔ nyasʋ y." Naa do naa, ba a ʋ, kʋ hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
41014050	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a gʋ ma, ŋn'a si.
41014051	Nyukumbueere deem zu a jɛ ʋ, an gɔbga zu a kɔɔn ʋ. Gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a nyasʋ.
41014052	Bɩ n a mɩŋŋa yɔ, an a si a mɛ m dɩgɩ, an gɔbga bɩ to ŋ wɔ ʋ.
41014053	Ŋ ta Yeezuu m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ har ʋ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ, gʋɔɔgusinno kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ a so kʋ ma b'ʋ.
41014054	Pɩyɛɛr n zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ laatʋ, an ta, an aa lee ku wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʋ b'ʋ, an aa nyɩnta kan hallɛdɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ nyɩkam sɛ ma.
41014055	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan dʋdɔkənno vantɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay y'a kam mim ma k'a ka Yeezuu ra, a dʋdɔ yar, k'a ka kʋ n n a zɛ gər, bɩ ŋ bɩr a yɩrɛ y.
41014056	Bala, kasɛtɩ ŋʋaarzannɔ bʋr gʋta, bɩ ŋ meerbaa bɩ bɩr zum kʋ y.
41014057	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n wuti, ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba, ŋn'a ka a lɛ m, ŋ ʋ:
41014058	"Wɔɔ ma an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Wosocɛ naa do kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ a wɔ m naa, mɔɔ y'a wurgəm, bɩ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ y'a vanta dɔm, b'a bɩ nyɩntam gʋaa wɔ zibəə y."
41014059	Bɩ kan hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩm bɩ kɩ, ŋ meerbaa bɩ bɩr a gam kʋ ʋ y.
41014060	Bɩ kur bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ wuti gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, an Yeezuu lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ mim gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ra na? Ɩbɩɩ b'a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ ra?"
41014061	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ y. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a ya, an a lar, a ʋ: "Krista n'ɩbɩɩ m na? Ɩbɩɩ m Nyɩ kʋ Woso barkazaa b'a nyɔɔ bɩ gɛ?"
41014062	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m. B'awɔɔ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩm an aa nyɩnta Woso paŋŋazaa bɩsɩ ʋ, an a to brama warkʋ nɔ ʋ, an bɩr zɛm."
41014063	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɔ ma ʋ, an a mɩŋŋa huuro kɩnkaansʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Kasɛtɩzannɔ zibəə a ya, an ta wɔɔ ma ra?
41014064	Awɔɔ ma an Woso sʋnsɔ wʋ. Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lɔ?" Ŋ haay n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga zɛ m."
41014065	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ lihi dɩndam ma, ŋnɩ pɛɛra ku a meer ma, ŋn'a zɛm, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ nka nɩ zɛrɛ k'ɩ dɔ ɩ hɩ!" Hallɛdɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n'a zɛm.
41014066	Kʋ Pɩyɛɛr nɩ hallu b'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩlʋrɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ bʋr b'ʋ.
41014067	A n bɩ Pɩyɛɛr yɩ, an nɩ nyɩ kam sɛ ma, an dɩga a meer ma, an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu Nazarɛtɩ gʋaa bɩ kɩ sɔ."
41014068	Pɩyɛɛr n bɩsɩ ka, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n a dɔ y. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ hɩ naa, mɔɔ n a jɩ ma y." A n bɔ, an ta zaŋŋʋ ʋ.
41014069	Zibəənyɩlʋ bɩ k'a a ya an a yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Naa do naa ŋ gʋaa deem m."
41014070	Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an bɩsɩ ka. Bɩ kur bɩ, kʋ maasɩrɛ ba poore bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ haay a ya, ŋn'a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ sɩra m, ɩbɩɩ, ŋ gʋaa n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ. Bala, Galilee gʋaa n'ɩbɩɩ m."
41014071	Pɩyɛɛr n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a wer sire, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n gʋaa k'awɔɔ n'a mim dɩndam naa dɔ y."
41014072	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, koo baa da gallɛm hɩɩya hɔ ma. Pɩyɛɛr bɔkarɛ, an mim kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: "Koo bɩ baa dam gallɛm hɩɩya y, ɩbɩɩ n bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʋ." A n bɔ zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an nɩ nyi karɛ.
41015001	Wutigʋta m bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ a zɛ kʋ ra, k'a dɩga hɔ k'a n'a bam bɩ ma. Ŋ y'a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu wɔrɔ sur, ŋnɩ ta m, ŋn'aa ka Pɩlatɩ ʋ.
41015002	Pɩlatɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ hɩ."
41015003	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ŋʋaar ba ŋn'a kam la kan ŋʋaarbaa do haay kɩ.
41015004	Pɩlatɩ n a ya, an a lar, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ b'a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ ra? Dɩga mim haay kʋ ŋ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ra bɩ ma."
41015005	Bɩ Yeezuu n a ya, an hɔsɩ nyɩ bɔ ʋ Pɩlatɩ nʋ y. Pɩlatɩ n zɛ kədə.
41015006	Kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bʋr ŋn'ɩ cibsa gʋta barɛ, Pɩlatɩ bɩ, lɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɛ bɩ, an n'a bɔrɛ, an wɔ saa.
41015007	Bala, gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Barabas bɩ nyɩnta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yar ba tara nɔ ʋ ŋnɩ gər zɛ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
41015008	Zamaa bɩ n ta Pɩlatɩ zi, ŋn'aa hɔ k'a n'a karɛ ŋ ʋ biisi bɩ yɛ.
41015009	Pɩlatɩ n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m zɩɩfʋrɔ cir bɩ bɔ, m wɔ saa gɛ?"
41015010	Bala, a a dɔ a ʋ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ nɔ nɩ tam Yeezuu ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ a ŋʋa bɩ minto.
41015011	Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zamaa bɩ nyʋnnyɔɔ, kʋ Pɩlatɩ m Barabas bɔ an wɔ saa.
41015012	Pɩlatɩ n a ya, an zamaa bɩ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m a ba gʋaa k'awɔɔ n'a birm zɩɩfʋrɔ cir bɩ nɩ?"
41015013	Ŋ n zee da, ŋ ʋ: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"
41015014	Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ a a ba an bʋnyaa?" Ŋ n a ya, ŋnɩ zee da, an lɛ da biisi ra: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"
41015015	Pɩlatɩ k'a lɛ n taa k'a zamaa bɩ heer nyɔɔ bɩ, a Barabas bɔ an wɔ saa, an a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ madɩɩrɔ m, an a ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
41015016	Yarbənno Yeezuu gaa ŋnɩ ta m hallu ʋ, bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma Pretʋaar b'ʋ, kan yarbənno kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
41015017	Bɩ kur bɩ, ŋnɩ cinno huu kʋ n y'a ba pɛɛra piinə m da Yeezuu ra, ŋnɩ laa waa, ŋn'a ku a mim ma.
41015018	Ŋ n'ɩ yaa dam nɩ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir, wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m."
41015019	Ŋ n'a zɛrɛ a mim ma bara m, ŋn'ɩ lihi dɩndam ma. Ŋ n sʋnta a taa, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam nɩ.
41015020	Kʋ ŋ y'a hɔɔnhɔ ba Yeezuu m ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ cinno huu bɩ bɔ ma ŋn'a huuro wɔɔ du ma, ŋn'ɩ tam nɩ k'a yaa a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
41015021	Sirɛnnɩ gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn b'a to a har ʋ, an nɩ tam kʋnɔ ʋ. Alɛsandɩr kan Rifis kɩ baaba m. Yarbənno wɔɔ n paŋŋa ba ma k'an Yeezuu gɔdarkʋra bɩ busu.
41015022	Ŋ n ta Yeezuu m bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Golgotaa b'ʋ. A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Minkorgo bɩncɛ.'
41015023	Ŋ n dɩvɛn war kʋ ma kan mɩɩr kɩ ŋn'a ka Yeezuu ʋ, b'a n a mi y.
41015024	Ŋ n a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, ŋnɩ pʋɛɛga da a huuro wɔɔ ma ŋnɩ ŋ jir. Gʋaa biyəə kan a hɔ kɩ.
41015025	Ŋ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma ŋn'a nya dɔgta m wakatɩ nɛɛhʋ ma.
41015026	Ŋ n Yeezuu zɛ bɩ jɩ gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ warga ma Yeezuu mim la gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma: 'Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir m.'
41015027	Ŋ konno wɔ hɩɩya gɔdarkʋrarɔ ma bɩncɛ deem ʋ kan Yeezuu kɩ. Deem a jɩsa, deem a bɩsɩ. [
41015028	Hɔ kʋ n nyɩnta, n n a da Wosoci nɔ ʋ bɩ kʋ yɩ: 'N y'a lɛ sa n n a da mimbʋnyaabənno barla.']
41015029	Cenlezannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cenim b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a sʋnsɔ wʋm, ŋn'a mim zɛm zukə-zukə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Haya! Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ Wosocɛ wurgə, ɩ ɩ bɔ, ɩ dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ,
41015030	ɩ mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ, k'ɩ zer gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma."
41015031	Wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ sɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ y'a dɩndam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ yaa wʋm Yeezuu ma, ŋ ʋ: "A a muno bʋmbɔ, an bɔkarɛ, a b'a dam ma an a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ y."
41015032	Kʋ Krista, Israyɛl cir bɩ n zer gɔdarkʋra ma kɛɛrɛ, k'ʋ a yɩ, k'ʋ sɩra ka. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a sʋnsɔ wʋm sɔ.
41015033	Sinsebir k'a bɩ da bɩ, monsigə gʋta zɛ tara burə ʋ an ta an wakatɩ kaakʋ ku yirbəəre m.
41015034	Wakatɩ kaakʋ bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu zee gʋta da, a ʋ: "Eloyii, Eloyii, lama sabaktaani?" A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Woso, mɔɔ Woso, bɔ nɩ, ɩ ɩ bɔ mɔɔ ʋ?"
41015035	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ naa ma, ŋ ʋ: "K'a tʋr ka, a ɩ Elii birm k'an b'a da a han."
41015036	Ŋ deem n bra si an aa hɔ mafʋ-mafʋda sa, an a nyɔɔ hɔ hɛɛnr ma, an a du bənkə ma, an a ka Yeezuu ʋ k'an a mi, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a to, k'ʋ dɩga a Elii zɛm b'a zer gɛ."
41015037	Yeezuu n zee gʋta da, an ga.
41015038	Wosocɛ bɩ pɛɛra bɩ n kaansʋ a bire ʋ, an a sa mim ʋ an b'a zɛ tara ma.
41015039	Yarbənno cir bɩ n jɩm, an a nya Yeezuu rɛ. K'a yɩ an ga maam bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, gʋaa naa do nyɩnta Woso Nyɩ paan•••."
41015040	Lannɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ jɩm laatʋ ŋn'ɩ dɩgam. Magdalaa Maarii nyɩnta ŋ bire ʋ, kan Salomee kɩ, Zozee kan Zakkɩ poore da Maarii kɩ.
41015041	Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta Galilee ʋ bɩ, lannɔ nɔɔn duro nyɩnta ŋnɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, ŋn'a dam han. Lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr Zerizalɛm ʋ.
41015042	Woso lɛ ter. Sabaa bankarɛ wakatɩ m, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʋ, hoonsire dɔmɩm n bɩr booti m.
41015043	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Arimatee kʋ gʋaa deem k'a tɔ m Zozɛf bɩ lee ku. Nyɩnta a ʋ gʋaa gʋta dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ bire ʋ. A nyɩnta, an nɩ dɔm Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ ma. A n a heer ba koodə, an ta Pɩlatɩ zi, k'a yaa Yeezuu gər bɩ yɛ han.
41015044	Yeezuu k'a ga lɛɛm ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Pɩlatɩ zɛ kədə, an yarbənno cir bɩ bir, an a lar kʋ Yeezuu garɛ bɩ maasɩrɛ ba gɛ.
41015045	K'a hɔ kʋ yarbənno cir b'a hɩ bɩ ma bɩ, a Yeezuu gər bɩ ka Zozɛf ʋ.
41015046	Zozɛf n pɛɛra fɛʋda si, an a ka, n n Yeezuu gər bɩ zer gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma, an pɛɛra fɛʋda bɩ burgu ma, an aa wʋta yaa kʋ n y'a hɔn ci ʋ b'ʋ. A n jaa gʋta gərgu, an a ta yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ.
41015047	Magdalaa Maarii kan Zakkɩ da Maarii kɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dɩgam bɩncɛ kʋ n nɩ Yeezuu gər bɩ wʋtaŋ ʋ bɩ ma.
41016001	Sabaa hinni bɩ k'a cem bɩ, Magdalaa Maarii kan Salomee kɩ, Maarii Zakkɩ da kɩ tidəər si k'a yaa da Yeezuu ma.
41016002	Hatʋ hinni k'an lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm bɩ wutigʋta m bɩ, ŋ bʋr yaa ra b'ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, woso n haan y.
41016003	Ŋ n'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n nɩ jaa bɩ gʋm wɔɔ m yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ?"
41016004	Kʋ ŋ y'a bɔɔta ŋnɩ dɩga bɩ, ŋ jaa k'a nyɩnta gʋta bɩ yɩ, n n a gərgu, n n a gʋ yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ.
41016005	Ŋ n gasʋ yaa b'ʋ, ŋn'aa nyukumbueere yɩ, an nɩ nyɩntam bɩsɩ ʋ, an zaba fu du a ma. Ŋ da n bɔ ʋ gʋta.
41016006	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu kʋ n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma b'awɔɔ n'a kam ma. A a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a ba naa ʋ dɔ y. Ba bɩncɛ kʋ n y'a wʋta ʋ bɩ n na."
41016007	Bɩ, k'a yaa a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "A lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʋ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do awɔɔ n n'a yɩŋ ʋ, amba a hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ m."
41016008	Ŋ n bɔ yaa b'ʋ, ŋnɩ bra si kan mɛhinkə kɩ, ŋ n a so a ʋ y. Kan dabɔʋ k'an ta ŋ nɩ bɩ kɩ, ŋ n yɛ, ŋ n a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y. [
41016009	Yeezuu k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ hatʋ hinni k'an lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm bɩ wutigʋta m bɩ, a lɛɛ ka an a hɩnka Magdalaa Maarii m. A n nyɩnta an la zinəro ra saanhɩna a mɛ ʋ bɩ m.
41016010	Magdalaa Maarii n ta, an aa hɔ k'a yɩ bɩ hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m. Brɔɔ haay heer nyɩnta an a zar, ŋn'ɩ nyi karɛ.
41016011	Kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka Magdalaa Maarii meerbaa bɩ ma an n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ yɩ bɩ, ŋ n a si nɩ y.
41016012	Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩnka makra do vanta m karɩndanyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ bɔm tara nɔ ʋ.
41016013	Ŋ n a wusigə, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ a muno karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, bɩ brɔɔ n a si sɔ y.
41016014	A nyarɛ ma bɩ, a a hɩnka karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeem nɔ wɔɔ m, ŋnɩ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm. Yeezuu n ŋ sɩrakarɛ war kan ŋ heerkarɛ bɩ kɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ. Kʋ ŋ n gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ rɔ mim si bɩ minto.
41016015	A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta durnya haay nɔ ʋ, a yaa lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da gʋɔɔ m.
41016016	Gʋaa k'a sɩra ka, an yɛ an batɛm si sɔ bɩ, bɩ zaa n nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm. Bɩ gʋaa k'a bɩ sɩra kam bɩ, a zaa bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y.
41016017	Ba makrarɔ kʋ sɩrakarɛzannɔ a da ma, ŋnɩ ŋ ba bɩ n na: Ŋ lam zinəro ra mɔɔ tɔ ma, ŋ lemim daarɔ hɩrɛ.
41016018	Kʋ n cem ŋnɩ mɩnnɔ gʋr a wɔ ʋ gɛɛ, ŋnɩ nyɩsɩ da hɔ ʋ, ŋn'a ka ŋ ʋ, a bɩ hɔsɩ barɛ ŋ nɩ y. Ŋ y'a wɔ kam yaabazannɔ ra, bɩ brɔɔ y'a waam."
41016019	Kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu meer ba kan ŋ kɩ an a nya bɩ, a der, an ta arzana ʋ, an aa nyɩnta Woso bɩsɩ ʋ.
41016020	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ta, ŋn'aa lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da lɛɛ haay ʋ. Zuuba bɩ y'a darɛ ŋ han, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ paŋŋa daŋ ʋ kan hoserlo barɛ kɩ.]
42001001	Jɩtaarɛ Teofil, gʋɔɔ gʋta a tʋntɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ minno kʋ ŋ ba wɔɔ bire ʋ ŋnɩ cem nɔ wɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba.
42001002	Kasɛtɩzannɔ kʋ ŋ minno wɔɔ yɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ma kan a nyarɛ kɩ, ŋn'a ba Woso lemim nyɩnta padənno wɔɔ ɩ b'a dɩnda wɔɔ m amba ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ m.
42001003	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa sɔ, mɔɔ laaka dɩnda mɩŋŋa. Jɩtaarɛ Teofil, a ta mɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa, kʋ m mim haay sa a sɩŋŋɩda ma an ta kan a nyarɛ kɩ, m a gʋrsɩra ba ɩbɩɩ ma,
42001004	k'ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ, ɩ ʋ, hɔ kʋ n y'a dɩnda ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, sɩra m.
42001005	Zidee cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a tɔ m Zakarii. Abɩya hargʋaa m, a m wosocɛmannɩbər sɔ. A lʋ bɩ tɔ m Elizabɛtɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Aarɔn yaŋŋa m sɔ.
42001006	Ŋ hɩɩya haay nyɩnta gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ Woso taa. Ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ hɔ kʋ Zuuba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ bam mɩŋŋa.
42001007	Ŋ n nyɩ yɩ y, bala, Elizabɛtɩ bɩ cɩna m, ŋ hɩɩya haay gusi.
42001008	Hindeem ʋ, Zakarii y'a wosocɛmannɩbərbaa zi bam Woso taa. Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Abɩya wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ zibəə hinni m.
42001009	Amba wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ tɩr a ba bɩ m bɩ, pʋɛɛga bɩ, a da a ʋ Zakarii mim la hinni bɩ do ʋ, k'an sɛ nya tidəər nyisi ʋ, an gasʋ m Wosocɛ ʋ, bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa b'ʋ.
42001010	Zamaa bɩ jɩm garga ra, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam tidəər nyisi bɩ sɛ nyaʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ.
42001011	Zuuba Woso malɛɛka deem a hɩnka Zakarii m, an jɩm brama tidəər nyisi bɩ sɛnyaʋrɛhɔ bɩ bɩsɩ ʋ.
42001012	Zakarii k'a a yɩ bɩ, a nyi wer ma, nyibəə n gasʋ ʋ.
42001013	Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zakarii, ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, bala, Woso ɩbɩɩ yaa si. Ɩbɩɩ lʋ Elizabɛtɩ bɩ nyɩ yɩrɛ an a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ. B'ɩbɩɩ y'a birm Zaan.
42001014	B'a nyɩntam heernyɩnta kan heernyɔɔ zee kɩ ɩbɩɩ minto. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋta y'a heer nyɔɔm a yɩrɛ minto.
42001015	A nyɩntam gʋaa gʋta Zuuba Woso taa. A bɩ dɩvɛn mire y, a bɩ bɛɛ kʋsɩ vanta mim sɔ y. K'a bʋr an a da nɔ ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a heer hanm.
42001016	A bɔm Israyɛl gʋɔɔ lɛɛ, an bʋr ŋ nɩ ŋ Zuuba Woso zi.
42001017	A lɛɛ kam Zuuba lɛɛ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Elii hɔɔn kan a paŋŋa kɩ m, k'a bɩ 'zɩrɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ', kʋ bayɛrɛzannɔ wɔɔ n hɔɔn yɩ an gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ m. K'an zamaa banka mɩŋŋa, kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔ Zuuba ma."
42001018	Zakarii n malɛɛka bɩ lar, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, m a dɔ mɔɔ ʋ sɩra nɩ? Mɔɔ gusi, mɔɔ lʋ bɩ gusi sɔ."
42001019	Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gabrɩyɛl m mɔɔ m, m nɩ Woso lɛɛ. Mɔɔ nyɔɔ a ʋ, kʋ m bɩ meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, kʋ m bɩ lemim nyɩnta hɩ ɩbɩɩ m.
42001020	Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bam bəətir, ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ meer ba dɔ y, an ta an minno nɔɔn duro nyarɛ dɔmɩm ku. Bala, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka mɔɔ meerbaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ kʋ yɩ dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta b'ʋ y."
42001021	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, zamaa b'ɩ dɔm Zakarii ma. Ŋ zɛ kədə, k'a maasɩrɛ ba Wosocɛ bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa b'ʋ bɩ minto.
42001022	K'a bɔ bɩ, a n a da ma an nɩ hɔsɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ y. Bɩ minto y'a ka ŋn'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, Woso makra a yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ. A n hɔɔrɔ bɩmba a wɔ ma, k'a hɩnka, a ʋ, a b'a dam ma a meer ba dɔ y. A n gɔɔta bəətir.
42001023	Kʋ Zakarii a zi bɩ ba an a nya, a dɔmɩm n a ku bɩ, a a hʋr an doo.
42001024	K'a yɩ poore bɩ kur bɩ, a lʋ Elizabɛtɩ jɩsɩ si. A n a mɩŋŋa nyaakʋm da mom soor, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
42001025	"Ba hɔ kʋ Zuuba Woso a ba mɔɔ m bɩ n na. A dɩga mɔɔ ma, an mɔɔ bɔ nyannɩ ʋ gʋɔɔ bire ʋ."
42001026	Elizabɛtɩ jɩsɩ mom sɔrdɩ hɔ ma bɩ, Woso malɛɛka Gabrɩyɛl nyɔɔ Galilee tara nɔ kʋ n n'a birm Nazarɛtɩ b'ʋ,
42001027	nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ deem zi. A ler n y'a bɔ gʋaa m. A jaan bɩ tɔ m Zozɛf. Cir Davɩd do gʋaa m. Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ tɔ m Maarii.
42001028	Malɛɛka bɩ n gasʋ zi, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m Maarii, ɩbɩɩ kʋ Woso barka ka ɩ ʋ gʋta, Zuuba Woso ɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ."
42001029	Maarii k'a meerbaa bɩ ma bɩ, a da bɔ ʋ. A n n'a hɔɔn dam yaadarɛ bɩ jɩ ma.
42001030	Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y Maarii, bala, ɩbɩɩ barka yɩ Woso zi.
42001031	Ɩbɩɩ jɩsɩ sim, ɩ nyɩ yɩ yar, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a birm Yeezuu.
42001032	A nyɩntam gʋaa gʋta, bɩ n y'a birm Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ. Zuuba Woso y'a yaaba Davɩd cirbəə bɩncɛ kaŋ ʋ,
42001033	a cirbəə bɩm Zakɔɔb do nɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay, b'a cirbəə bɩ nyarɛ ba ʋ y."
42001034	Maarii n a hɩ malɛɛka bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɩ naa y'a bam lɔ an kʋ yɩ, kʋ mɔɔ n yar dɔ naa?"
42001035	Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɛnt-Ɛspri zerle ɩbɩɩ mim ʋ, Woso k'a lɛ da haay paŋŋa y'a kure ɩbɩɩ ra, am hinni hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ y'a ka, nyɩ k'a nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ yɩ bɩ, n y'a birm Woso Nyɩ mɩŋŋa.
42001036	Ɩbɩɩ danyɩ Elizabɛtɩ, kʋ n n'a birm cɩna b'ɩ jɩsɩ m sɔ, a mom sɔrdɩ hɔ m naa. A nyɩyar yɩm a gusimbaa nɔ ʋ.
42001037	Bala, 'hɔ ba ʋ, Woso n a da ma y.' "
42001038	Maarii n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zuuba zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, k'an ba mɔɔ m amba ɩbɩɩ hɩ bɩ m." Malɛɛka bɩ n a hʋr, an a gʋ ma.
42001039	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Maarii wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an zaa sa, an bɔ kʋrɔ kʋ ciro n ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an ta Zidee kʋ deem nɔ ʋ.
42001040	A n aa gasʋ Zakarii har ʋ, an yaa da Elizabɛtɩ m.
42001041	Elizabɛtɩ k'a Maarii yaadarɛ bɩ ma bɩ, nyɩ k'a n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ heer ba. Sɛnt-Ɛspri n Elizabɛtɩ heer han.
42001042	A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Woso ɩbɩɩ barka da ʋ an lɛ da lannɔ haay ra, bɩ barka bɩ zer an nawʋm nyɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ bɩ ra.
42001043	Nka m mɔɔ nɩ, kʋ mɔɔ Zuuba da n bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma?
42001044	Bala, k'ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛ bɩ gasʋ mɔɔ tʋr ʋ bɩ, nyɩ bɩ heer ba mɔɔ nɔ ʋ kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
42001045	Mimbirenyɩntazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka, ɩ ʋ, meerbaa kʋ n y'a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m Zuuba Woso tɔ ma bɩ kʋ yɩm."
42001046	Bɩ, Maarii a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyi y'a lɛ bɔm mɔɔ Zuuba Woso ʋ.
42001047	Bɩ, heernyɔɔ mɔɔ heer han, bala Woso m mɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa.
42001048	Bala, a zerga an dɩga a zibəəzaa cicirzaa bɩ ma. Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, do haay y'a hɩm mɔɔ ma mimbirenyɩntazaa.
42001049	Paŋŋazaa Woso minno gʋtɔ-gʋtɔɔ ba mɔɔ minto. A tɔ bɩ, tɔ mɩŋŋa m.
42001050	A cicirzɛrɛ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi bam nɩ rɔ wɔɔ mim ʋ dɔmɩm haay.
42001051	A zibəəro gʋtɔɔ ba a wɔ paŋŋa m. A gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa busum nɔ wɔɔ hɩsɩga.
42001052	A paŋŋazannɔ bra a cirbəəduuro ra an ŋ dundo. A n gʋɔɔ ŋʋazannɔ wɔɔ busu brama.
42001053	A gan wʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ nɔ nɩ ŋ zɛm nɔ wɔɔ ma, an arzakazannɔ da zaa ra a wɔ n tu.
42001054	A b'a da a zibəənyɩ Israyɛl han, an a cicirzɛrɛ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
42001055	Ler k'a bɔ Abraham m, kan a yaŋŋɔɔ kɩ m a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ minto."
42001056	Maarii gɔɔta kan Elizabɛtɩ kɩ an a zɔ mom kaakʋ ma, an bɔkarɛ, an doo.
42001057	Elizabɛtɩ nyɩ yɩrɛ a ku. A nyɩ bɩ yɩ yar.
42001058	A cɩsɔnnɔ kan a dogʋɔɔ kɩ a ma ŋ ʋ, Zuuba a cicir zɛ, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ, ŋn'a heer nyɔɔm.
42001059	Nyɩ bɩ k'a dɔmɩm sinnyə ba bɩ, ŋ bʋr k'a b'a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. Ŋ y'a ŋʋa k'a tɔ ka Zakarii, am a zɩ bɩ hɔ bɩ m.
42001060	A da bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ayy•••, a tɔ m Zaan."
42001061	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ do bɩ nɔ ʋ, gʋaa ba ʋ, n n a tɔ ka ncɩnaaʋ y."
42001062	Ŋ n makra ba a wɔ m, ŋn'a zɩ bɩ lar, kʋ n y'a birm lʋnlɔ gɛ?
42001063	Zakarii n warga yɛ, an gʋrsɩrarɔ nɔɔn duro ba ma: "A tɔ m Zaan." Ŋ haay n zɛ kədə.
42001064	Lɛɛm bɩ, Zakarii lɛ a gʋ, a nɛɛm n a bɔ kʋ zi, an nɩ meer barɛ, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
42001065	Nyibəə gasʋ a cɩsɔnnɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay, an ta kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cigəəzi rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Zidee gʋrga haay jilli, sʋʋra n'a bam mim naa do ma.
42001066	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim naa do ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa larm, ŋ ʋ: "Nyɩ naa do zɛm bɩ nyɩnta lɔ?" Sɩra m, Zuuba Woso wɔ nyɩnta nyɩ bɩ ra.
42001067	Sɛnt-Ɛspri nyɩnta an nyɩ bɩ zɩ Zakarii heer han, an nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsora meer barɛ, a ʋ:
42001068	"Zuuba, Israyɛl Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, bala, a bɩ dɩga a do ma, an a bʋmbɔ.
42001069	A bɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa paŋŋazaa m wɔɔ minto, a zibəənyɩ Davɩd do nɔ ʋ.
42001070	Naa a lɛɛ ka an a hɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛ m biisi.
42001071	A ʋ, a wɔɔ bɔm wɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔ ʋ, kan gʋaa haay k'a sɔ wɔɔ m bɩ kɩ.
42001072	A wɔɔ yaabɔɔ cicir zɛ, a a gʋaasɩbabaa mɩŋŋa tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
42001073	A lerbɔrɛ k'a bɔ wɔɔ yaaba Abraham m bɩ ba n nɩ:
42001074	K'a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ jɩnnɔ wɔ ʋ an nya, a zaa kam wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ a zi ba kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ,
42001075	mɩŋŋabaa kan tɩrgabaa kɩ nɔ ʋ, Woso taa dɔmɩm haay kan ʋ mɩsɩrbaa nyarɛ kɩ.
42001076	B'ɩbɩɩ, m nyɩnnɩ, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ birm Woso k'a lɛ da haay lɛsinnɩsorazaa. Bala, ɩbɩɩ kam Zuuba lɛɛ k'ɩ zaarɔ banka,
42001077	k'ɩ ka, k'a dogʋɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ dɔ, ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ nɔ ʋ.
42001078	Bala, wɔɔ Woso bɩ cicirzɛrɛ gʋta. Naa minto bɩ, lɛɛgure y'a tom brama, an gu wɔɔ m, amba woso haanrɛ hɔ bɩ m,
42001079	k'a bɩ lɛɛ gu gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ monsigə ʋ, ŋn'ɩ nyi bam zɛ m nɔ wɔɔ m, k'a bɩ laafɩɩ zaa hɩnka wɔɔ m."
42001080	Kʋ nyɩ bɩ nɩ, a ɩ mam, a heerkoodəbaa n'a dam la. A gɔɔta zaŋŋa ʋ, an ta an dɔmɩm k'a a hɩnka ʋ Israyɛl zamaa lɛɛ bɩ dɔmɩm ku.
42002001	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, cir Ogisti bɩ lɛ ka, a ʋ, n n durnya haay gʋɔɔ lɛ sa.
42002002	Lɛɛkarɛ lɛsarɛ n naa, an ba Kiriniyusi k'a nyɩnta Siirii kʋzaa bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ.
42002003	Gʋaa haay ta, kʋ n n'a lɛ sa, gʋaa biyəə lɛ sa n nawʋrɛ a kʋ ʋ.
42002004	Zozɛf wuti sɔ Galilee kʋ Nazarɛtɩ ʋ, an ta Zidee gʋrga deem kʋ n n'a birm Betelehɛm ʋ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do cir Davɩd yɩ ʋ. Bala a mɩŋŋa naa, cir Davɩd do gʋaa m.
42002005	Ta a ʋ k'a yaa lɛsarɛ bɩ wʋ kan a jaan Maarii kɩ. Bɩ ma bɩ, Maarii ɩ jɩsɩ m.
42002006	Kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ bɩ, Maarii nyɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm a ku.
42002007	A a dʋndɔmbaa nyɩ yɩ yar, an pɛɛra burgu ma, an a wʋta hɔbɩsɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ mɔr ʋ. Bala, ŋ n toore yɩ saanɔɔ cɛ ʋ b'ʋ y.
42002008	Gʋrga bɩ do poo ʋ bɩ, dundonno nɩ b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dɔrɛ a hɔbɩsɩrɔ ma gunuu ʋ.
42002009	Zuuba malɛɛka n a hɩnka ŋ nɩ. Zuuba lɛɛgure n yɔ ŋ nɩ. Nyibəə gʋta n ŋ nyasʋ.
42002010	Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, bala, zɛ mɔɔ nawʋm lemim nyɩnta m kʋ m b'a hɩ awɔɔ m. A nyɩntam heernyɔɔ gʋta do bɩ haay minto.
42002011	Bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ yɩ her Davɩd tara ra awɔɔ tɔ ma. A m Krista, Zuuba.
42002012	Makra k'a n'a kam awɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: awɔɔ yaa nyɩhure yɩ, n n pɛɛra burgu ma, n n a wʋta hɔbɩsɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ mɔr ʋ."
42002013	Lɛɛm bɩ, arzana malɛɛkarɔ cir gʋta bʋr, ŋ n b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan malɛɛka bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋ ʋ:
42002014	"Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ brama, kʋ gʋɔɔ k'a nɔ yɩ ŋ la tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m mɛnyɔɔ yɩ."
42002015	Kʋ malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ a gʋ ŋ ma ŋnɩ der brama bɩ, dundonno wɔɔ gɔɔta ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ ta Betelehɛm ʋ, k'ʋ aa hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ, Zuuba n a hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ."
42002016	Ŋ n ta zɔɔ-zɔɔ, ŋn'aa Maarii yɩ kan Zozɛf kɩ, kan nyɩhure bɩ kɩ, n n a wʋta hɔbɩsɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ mɔr ʋ.
42002017	Kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ malɛɛka b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ nyɩ naa do minto bɩ dɩnda.
42002018	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka dundonno wɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma haay rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ zɛ kədə.
42002019	Bɩ, Maarii minno nɔɔn duro da a heer ʋ, an n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma.
42002020	Dundonno wɔɔ n a wusigə, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ, hɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋn'a yɩ sɔ bɩ minto. Bala, hɔ haay ba amba malɛɛka b'a hɩ bɩ m.
42002021	Dɔmɩm sinnyə k'a ku bɩ, n nyɩ bɩ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. N n a tɔ ka Yeezuu, tɔ kʋ malɛɛka bɩ nyɩnta an a ka, bɩ ma bɩ, a da n a jɩsɩ sa bɩ m.
42002022	Kʋ ŋ hubɔrɛ dɔmɩnnɔ a ku amba Moyiisi lɛ ka bɩ m bɩ, Zozɛf kan Maarii kɩ nyɩ bɩ busu, ŋnɩ ta m Zerizalɛm ʋ, k'a yaa ka Woso ʋ,
42002023	amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Zuuba lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ m: 'Nyɩyar haay k'an a da nyɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ, Zuuba hɔ m.'
42002024	N n 'pʋnnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ gɛɛ cirpʋʋrɛ nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ' ka, kʋ n n mannɩ ba m, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Zuuba Wosoci ʋ bɩ m.
42002025	Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta Zerizalɛm ʋ, a tɔ m Sɩmɩnyɔɔ. Gʋaa tɩrga m, an nɩ zum Woso ʋ mɩŋŋa. Nyɩnta a ʋ, an nɩ Israyɛl bʋmbɔrɛzaa mɩm dam. Sɛnt-Ɛspri nyɩnta kan kɩ.
42002026	Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri nyɩnta an a hɩnka m, a ʋ, awɔɔ bɩ gam, k'a n Krista, kʋ Zuuba n n'a nyɔɔm bɩ yɩ y.
42002027	Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka, an ta Wosocɛ ʋ. Bɩ ma bɩ, a Yeezuu zɩrɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ zɛrɛ a nyɩ bɩ m k'a b'a ka Woso ʋ amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba bɩ m,
42002028	Sɩmɩnyɔɔ nyɩ bɩ si a wɔ ʋ, an barka da Woso m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
42002029	"Naa ma bɩ, Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ lerbɔrɛ bɩ kʋ yɩ. Ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ ɩ zibəənyɩ bɩ to an cem kan laafɩɩ kɩ amba ɩbɩɩ hɩ bɩ m.
42002030	Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ yɩ,
42002031	ɩbɩɩ n a banka doro haay lɛɛ.
42002032	Ɩbɩɩ do Israyɛl lɛbɔʋrɛ m. Lɛɛgure m, an n'ɩbɩɩ hɩnkam doro haay m."
42002033	K'a nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, nyɩ bɩ zɩ kan a da kɩ zɛ kədə.
42002034	Sɩmɩnyɔɔ n ŋ barka da ʋ, an a hɩ nyɩ bɩ da Maarii m, a ʋ: "Nyɩ naa do, bʋr a ʋ k'a bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta do, k'a gʋɔɔ gʋta wuti Israyɛl nɔ ʋ sɔ. A nyɩntam Woso makra, bɩ gʋɔɔ bɩsɩ kam ma.
42002035	A gʋɔɔ gʋta hɔɔndarɛrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a nyaakʋm da rɔ wɔɔ hɩnkam lɛɛgure ʋ. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, kargʋ n n'ɩbɩɩ heer hɔnm."
42002036	Lʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, a tɔ m Annɩ. Nyɩnta a ʋ Fanɩyɛl nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ, Asɛɛr do m. A gusi gʋta. A nyɩnta kan a zim k'a sa a poombaa ma bɩ kɩ dɔɔraa saanhɩna.
42002037	A gɔɔta zoro, a dɔɔraa businnyə a yaa si ku. A n nɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ dɔmɩm haay, an nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ. A n n'a lɛ kʋsɩm, an nɩ yaa dam sɔ.
42002038	A mɩŋŋa bʋr dɔmɩm kʋ n nɩ nyɩ bɩ kam Woso ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ barka dam Woso m, an nɩ nyɩ bɩ mim dɩndam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔm ma kʋ Woso n bʋr Zerizalɛm bʋmbɔrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ m.
42002039	Kʋ Yeezuu zɩrɔ wɔɔ hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Zuuba lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ ba ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ, ŋnɩ ta Galilee kʋ Nazarɛtɩ ʋ.
42002040	Nyɩ bɩ n nɩ marɛ, a paŋŋa n n'a dam la. A mindɔrɛ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta, Woso barka nɩ kan kɩ.
42002041	Dɔɔraa haay, Yeezuu zɩrɔ wɔɔ tɩr ta Zerizalɛm ʋ pakkɩ cibsa ma.
42002042	Kʋ Yeezuu dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya kʋ bɩ, ŋ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ cibsa bɩ ma, amba ŋn'a bam dɔɔraa haay bɩ m.
42002043	Kʋ cibsa bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ cem bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə, ŋnɩ doore. Nyukumbueere Yeezuu bɩ gɔɔta Zerizalɛm ʋ, b'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ y.
42002044	Ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, zaasənno an nɩ kan ŋ kɩ. Ŋ tarɛ bɩ yɩ dɔmɩm deem, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'a kam ma a yɩrɛrɔ kan a dɔrɛrɔ kɩ bire ʋ.
42002045	Bɩ, ŋ n a yɩ y. Ŋ n'a wusigə, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, a kama jɩ ʋ.
42002046	A dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, ŋ yaa a yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ, an nɩ nyɩntam karɩnsaambɔɔ bire ʋ, an n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ meerbaa ma, an nɩ ŋ larm sɔ.
42002047	Gʋaa haay k'a n'a tʋr kam ma bɩ, zɛ a nawʋm kədə a hɔɔntaʋrɛ meerbaa nyɩbɔʋrɛ tɔ ma.
42002048	K'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ a yɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, a da bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, bɔ m ɩbɩɩ m naa do ba wɔɔ nɩ? Dɩga a, ɩ zɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ da bɔ ʋ, ʋ n'ʋ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma."
42002049	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m an n'a kam mɔɔ ma? Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ m ga m, m bɩr m Zɩ har ʋ ra?"
42002050	Bɩ, hɔ k'a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ŋ n a jɩ ma y.
42002051	Yeezuu n a wusigə kan ŋ kɩ Nazarɛtɩ ʋ. A n nɩ ŋ lɛ sire. A da bɩ minno nɔɔn duro da a heer ʋ.
42002052	Yeezuu nɩ marɛ, a mindɔrɛ n'a dam la. A Woso nɔ yɩ, an gʋɔɔ nɔ yɩ sɔ.
42003001	Rɔm cir Tibɛɛr cirbəə bɩrɛ dɔɔraa bueeresoor hɔ ma bɩ, Pɔns Pɩlatɩ nyɩnta an a so Zidee gʋrga ʋ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a so Galilee ʋ, a danyɩ cir Filipi n a so Itiree kʋ ʋ kan Trakonitɩ kʋ kɩ, cir Lizaniyas n a so Abɩlɛnnɩ kʋ ʋ.
42003002	Hannɩ kan Kayiifʋ k'ɩ nyɩnta wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Woso a lemim ka Zakarii nyɩ Zaan ʋ poohɔɔn ʋ.
42003003	Bɩ Zaan ta Zʋrdɛn gʋrga haay ʋ, an nɩ heerlʋrlɛ kan batɛm kɩ mim pa dam gʋɔɔ m, ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto,
42003004	amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci nɔ ʋ bɩ m: Gʋaa leer nɩ bɔm poohɔɔn ʋ: K'a Zuuba zaa banka, k'a zaafɔɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩmbanka kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩ tɩrga.
42003005	K'a hɔ zar toko haay ʋ, k'a ciro kan dimbirlɔ kɩ zɛ a wʋta, k'a zaarɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋntɔ rɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋr, bɔɔ ɩ bɩ mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ, k'a ŋ banka a ŋ lʋnlɔ.
42003006	Bʋmbɔrɛzaa k'a a to Woso zi bɩ, a gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔm do haay nɔ ʋ.
42003007	Zamaa gʋta nɩ zɛm Zaan zi, k'a bɩ batɛm si. A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ naa, cɩrka do n'awɔɔ m. Nka y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a ʋ, a a si a bɔ lɛm Woso heerbusu k'a nɩ zɛm booti m bɩ lɛɛ?
42003008	K'a zi mɩŋŋa ba amba gɔ nɩ nyɩ dam bɩ m, k'an zu kʋ ʋ kan awɔɔ heerlʋrlɛ bɩ kɩ, b'a b'a hɔɔn da a ʋ, awɔɔ yaaba m Abraham nɩ y. Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, Woso a da ma, an jaarɔ nɔɔn duro wusigə an ŋ ba Abraham nyɩnɔ.
42003009	Bala, n sɩga banka an nɩ cɩntam k'an gɔrɔ zɩnzɛ ra ŋ məsi ma. Gɔ niŋŋə k'a bɩr nyɩ mɩŋŋa dam bɩ, n y'a zɛm la, n a da sɛ ʋ."
42003010	Zamaa bɩ barla gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n laaka da, ŋ ʋ: "K'a maam, k'ʋ a ba lɔ?"
42003011	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ɩ huu m hɩɩya, k'an a jir kan gʋaa k'a ba m bɩ kɩ. Gʋaa k'an ta hɔbɩrɛ m bɩ, k'an a ba maam sɔ."
42003012	Yawʋrsinno n bʋr sɔ k'a bɩ batɛm si, ŋnɩ laaka da Zaan han, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ a ba?"
42003013	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A bɩ busoo si an lɛ da lɛ kʋ n y'a ka bɩ ra y."
42003014	Yarbənno n a lar sɔ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ wɔɔ, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ a ba?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "A bɩ paŋŋa ba gʋaa ma y, b'a bɩ ŋʋaar ba a ka gʋaa lɛ m k'a busoo yɩ y. Bɩ k'a zerga a yawʋra bɩ rɛ."
42003015	Zamaa bɩ nɩ dɔm hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ bɩ ma. N n'a hɔɔn dam. N nɩ laaka darɛ a mɩŋŋa han a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Krista bɛɛ m Zaan bɩ m na?"
42003016	Zaan n a hɩ ŋ haay m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ naa, batɛm mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ hi ʋ. Bɩ, gʋaa ɩ zɛm, a paŋŋa n lɛ da mɔɔ ra, bɩ mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʋsɔrɔ bar tɔkkɛ hʋr y. A batɛm karɛ awɔɔ ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m kan sɛ kɩ m.
42003017	A gʋr sa a wɔ ʋ, k'a tʋyaa kʋnkɔ m, k'a hɔyaa zo m. A hɔyaa bɩ zarlɛ a sɩ ʋ, a sɛ k'a bɩr lihim bɩ nyam puur b'ʋ."
42003018	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Zaan a ya, an minno gɔsɩnnɔ hɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ hɩm Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
42003019	Bɩ kur bɩ, Zaan nyaa ba kan cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ kɩ, a cɛmba lʋ Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ k'a yɔm, kan a hɔbaa bʋnyaarɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ minto.
42003020	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ya, an mimbʋnyaa ba an a na ma: a a ka n nɩ Zaan du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
42003021	Dɔmɩm kʋ zamaa bɩ haay nɩ batɛm siŋ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu batɛm si sɔ. K'a nɩ yaa dam bɩ, brama a gʋ,
42003022	Sɛnt-Ɛspri n cirpʋʋrɛ mɛ sa, an zer a mim ʋ. Leer n a to brama an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa gʋta, mɔɔ nɔ yɩ ɩbɩɩ ra."
42003023	Yeezuu dɔɔraa bɩ, a ga kʋ ʋ a ba kan bukərku kɩ, an bɔkarɛ an a zibəə sa. Ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʋ Zozɛf nyɩ m. Zozɛf zɩ m Helii m,
42003024	Helii zɩ m Mataat m, Mataat zɩ m Levii m, Levii zɩ m Mɛlkii m, Mɛlkii zɩ m Yanayɩ m, Yanayɩ zɩ m Zozɛf m,
42003025	Zozɛf zɩ m Matatɩyas m, Matatɩyas zɩ m Amɔs m, Amɔs zɩ m Nahum m, Nahum zɩ m Hɛslii m, Hɛslii zɩ m Nagayɩ m,
42003026	Nagayɩ zɩ m Maatɩ m, Maatɩ zɩ m Matatɩyas m, Matatɩyas zɩ m Semeyini m, Semeyini zɩ m Yosɛkɩ m, Yosɛkɩ zɩ m Yooda m,
42003027	Yooda zɩ m Yohanam m, Yohanam zɩ m Reeza m, Reeza zɩ m Zorobabɛl m, Zorobabɛl zɩ m Salatɩyɛl m, Salatɩyɛl zɩ m Neerii m,
42003028	Neerii zɩ m Mɛlkii m, Mɛlkii zɩ m Adii m, Adii zɩ m Kozam m, Kozam zɩ m Ɛlmadam m, Ɛlmadam zɩ m Ɛɛr m,
42003029	Ɛɛr zɩ m Yeezuu m, Yeezuu zɩ m Eliyezɛɛr m, Eliyezɛɛr zɩ m Yoorim m, Yoorim zɩ m Mataat m, Mataat zɩ m Levii m,
42003030	Levii zɩ m Sɩmɩnyɔɔ m, Sɩmɩnyɔɔ zɩ m Ziida m, Ziida zɩ m Zozɛf m, Zozɛf zɩ m Yoonam m, Yoonam zɩ m Eliyakim m,
42003031	Eliyakim zɩ m Meleyaa m, Meleyaa zɩ m Menaa m, Menaa zɩ m Matataa m, Matataa zɩ m Natan m, Natan zɩ m Davɩd m, Davɩd zɩ m Yesee m,
42003032	Yesee zɩ m Yobɛdɩ m, Yobɛdɩ zɩ m Boozɩ m, Boozɩ zɩ m Salaa m, Salaa zɩ m Naasɔɔn m,
42003033	Naasɔɔn zɩ m Aminadaab m, Aminadaab zɩ m Admɩnɩ m, Admɩnɩ zɩ m Arnii m, Arnii zɩ m Ɛsrɔm m, Ɛsrɔm zɩ m Farɛɛs m, Farɛɛs zɩ m Ziida m,
42003034	Ziida zɩ m Zakɔɔb m, Zakɔɔb zɩ m Izakkɩ m, Izakkɩ zɩ m Abraham m, Abraham zɩ m Taaraa m, Taaraa zɩ m Nahɔɔr m,
42003035	Nahɔɔr zɩ m Seruki m, Seruki zɩ m Ragoo m, Ragoo zɩ m Falɛkɩ m, Falɛkɩ zɩ m Ebɛɛr m, Ebɛɛr zɩ m Salaa m,
42003036	Salaa zɩ m Kayɩnam m, Kayɩnam zɩ m Arfasatɩ m, Arfasatɩ zɩ m Sɛm m, Sɛm zɩ m Nowee m, Nowee zɩ m Lamɛk m,
42003037	Lamɛk zɩ m Matusalam m, Matusalam zɩ m Enɔk m, Enɔk zɩ m Yarɛtɩ m, Yarɛtɩ zɩ m Maleleyɛl m, Maleleyɛl zɩ m Kayɩnam m,
42003038	Kayɩnam zɩ m Enɔs m, Enɔs zɩ m Sɛt m, Sɛt zɩ m Adam m, Adam zɩ m Woso m.
42004001	Yeezuu kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a han bɩ, a a to Zʋrdɛn kɔ lɛ ra b'ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ka, an ta poohɔɔn ʋ.
42004002	B'ʋ bɩ, Sʋtaana a makra ba dɔmɩm busi. A n hɔsɩ bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nɔ ʋ y. Bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro kʋ ŋ cem bɩ, nɔ a nyasʋ.
42004003	Sʋtaana bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ ka kʋ jaa naa do n a ba bur."
42004004	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Gʋaa b'a dam ma an mɩsɩrbaa ba hɔbɩrɛ m bala y."
42004005	Sʋtaana bɩ n ta m brama, an tara burə cirbəəro haay hɩnka m lɛɛm.
42004006	A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ cirbəəro nɔɔn duro paŋŋa kan a arzaka kɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, ɩ ɩ so ʋ. Bala, mɔɔ hɔɔ m. Mɔɔ m da ma m a ka gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋa ʋ.
42004007	Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ yɛ ɩ kukurə zɛ mɔɔ taa ɩ mɔɔ da ʋ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ haay."
42004008	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: Ɩ ɩ Zuuba Woso da ʋ, bɩ, deem bala ɩbɩɩ n nɩ yaa dam nɩ."
42004009	Sʋtaana bɩ n a gaa, an ta m Zerizalɛm ʋ, an aa a jɩm Wosocɛ bɩ mim ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ hɩr naa ʋ, ɩ ɩ da tara ʋ:
42004010	Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: Woso lɛ karɛ a malɛɛkarɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔ ɩbɩɩ ma,
42004011	bɩ, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba sɔ, n ʋ: Ŋ y'a wɔ karɛ ɩbɩɩ taa k'ɩ b'ɩ gəm zɛ jaa ma y."
42004012	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "N y'a hɩ: ɩ bɩ da Zuuba ɩ Woso lɛ ʋ y."
42004013	Kʋ Sʋtaana bɩ Yeezuu makra ba kan makrarɔ do haay kɩ an a nya bɩ, a a gʋ ma an cem, an n'a kam toore vanta ma.
42004014	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ, Yeezuu a bɔ an bʋr Galilee ʋ. A tɔ n bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ.
42004015	A n nɩ hɔ dɩndam sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, gʋaa haay n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ.
42004016	Yeezuu ta Nazarɛtɩ ʋ, kʋ kʋ n y'a tʋr ʋ b'ʋ. A n gasʋ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ hoonsire hinni kʋ n n'a birm sabaa bɩ hinni ʋ, amba a tɩr a ba biisi bɩ m. A n wuti k'a Wosoci karɩnda ba.
42004017	N nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci ka ʋ. K'a ci bɩ hʋr bɩ, a a zɛ bɩncɛ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ ma:
42004018	Zuuba mɔɔ bɔ ʋ, a a Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer mɔɔ ra, kʋ m lemim nyɩnta pa da cicirzannɔ m, [kʋ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ heer a zar lɔ wɔɔ heer wʋta.] A mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʋ m b'a hɩ lɔnnɔ m, ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa ku, kʋ m a hɩ bʋʋrɔ m, ŋ mɩm lɛɛ yɩm. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
42004019	Mɔɔ nyɔɔ a ʋ sɔ, kʋ m ba hɩ gʋɔɔ m, Zuuba barka dɔ ɩ gʋ ra.
42004020	A n ci bɩ huŋŋu, an a ka sokʋmacɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ b'ʋ, an nyɩnta. Ŋ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ cɛ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'ɩ dɩgam Yeezuu ma.
42004021	A n a sa ma, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wosoci meerbaa k'awɔɔ ma dɩɩtaa-dɩɩtaa naa ʋ bɩ kʋ yɩ her."
42004022	Ŋ haay n yɛ Yeezuu ma y, bɩ ŋ zɛ kədə barka meerbaa nyɩnta k'a n'a bam bɩ tɔ ma. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zozɛf nyɩ bɩ bɛɛ m naa ra?"
42004023	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ bɔɔr naa do zɛm mɔɔ ma: Lɔɔtɔr, lɛɛ ka ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa waa. Wɔɔ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ba Kapɛrnawum ʋ bɩ ma. Bɩ ba ɩ kʋ ʋ naa ʋ."
42004024	Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, n bɩr wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa sɩ sim mɩŋŋa a kʋ ʋ y.
42004025	Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, biisi bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Elii dɔmɩm ʋ, la a gʋsɩ barɛ ma dɔɔraa kaakʋ kan mom kɩ sɔrdɩ, nɔ gʋta n a da tara bɩ ra haay. Zonno nyɩnta ʋ gʋta Israyɛl ʋ bɩ ma.
42004026	Bɩ, Woso n Elii nyɔɔ ŋ gʋaa deem zi y, kʋ bɩ m, zoro deem k'a nyɩnta ʋ Sarɛptaa ʋ, Sidɔn gʋrga ʋ bɩ m.
42004027	Kusimoo nyɩnta ʋ sɔ gʋta Israyɛl ʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Elizee dɔmɩm ʋ. Bɩ ŋ gʋaa deem taan••• n a waa, kʋ saana k'a a to Siirii ʋ, n n'a birm Naaman bɩ bɛɛ y."
42004028	Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ haay nɔ ma ʋ gʋta sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
42004029	Ŋ nɩ wuti, ŋn'a nyʋnnyɔɔta, ŋnɩ bɔ m tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ ta m a kʋ ci mim ʋ k'a yaa nyɔɔta a bɩra a da tara ʋ.
42004030	Yeezuu n bɔ ŋ bireyaa ʋ, an cem.
42004031	Yeezuu ta Galilee gʋrga deem Kapɛrnawum ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m sabaa hinni ʋ.
42004032	Ŋ zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ tɔ ma, bala, a meer bɩ ba an nawʋm lɛ k'an ta m bɩ m.
42004033	Gʋaa deem ɩ nyɩnta sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ, zinə nɩ kan kɩ. A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ a ʋ:
42004034	"Hey! Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu, ɩbɩɩ bɔ nɩ wɔɔ zi? Bʋr ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ bɩ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ gɛ? Kʋ nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, gʋaa mɩŋŋa kʋ Woso a nyɔɔ bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m."
42004035	Yeezuu n zinə bɩ da jɩm ʋ a meerbaa m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Zɛ hi, k'ɩ bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ." Zinə bɩ n gʋaa bɩ do tara ʋ zamaa bɩ lɛɛ, an bɔ a mɛ ʋ, b'a n yaaba da ma y.
42004036	Ŋ haay zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ meerbaa m naa! A n nɩ lɛ kam zinəro ʋ kan paŋŋa kɩ ŋn'ɩ bɔrɛ!"
42004037	N nɩ Yeezuu mim dɩndam lɛɛ haay ʋ, gʋrga bɩ do nɔ ʋ.
42004038	Yeezuu k'a bɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a ta gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn har ʋ. A n aa dɩga a, Sɩmɔɔn dində ɩ yaaba m. Ŋ n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'an a waa.
42004039	Yeezuu n a zɔ ma, an zerga a burə ʋ, an həən si yaaba bɩ ma, an bɔ a mɛ ʋ. A n wuti lɛɛm an nyasʋ ŋ nɩ.
42004040	Kʋ woso lɛ a da bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaabazannɔ m, ŋnɩ yaaba do haay m bɩ, ŋ bʋr ŋ nɩ Yeezuu zi. Bɩ n a wɔ ka ŋ gʋaa deem-deem la, an ŋ waa.
42004041	Zinəro bɔ yaabazannɔ gʋta mɛ ʋ, kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m!" Bɩ, Yeezuu ɩ həən sire ŋ ma, a bɩr yɛm kʋ ŋ nɩ meer ba y. Bala, zinəro wɔɔ a dɔ, ŋ ʋ Krista m.
42004042	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Yeezuu bɔ, an ta poohɔɔn ʋ, gʋɔɔ gʋta n'a kam ma. Kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a ŋʋa kʋ Yeezuu n gɔɔta kan a kɩ.
42004043	Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Pakra m, kʋ m aa Woso cirbəə bɩ pa da tara gɔsɩnnɔ ra, bala, mɔɔ nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ bɩ minto."
42004044	A n nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m Zidee sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ.
42005001	Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu ɩ jɩnɩm Zenezarɛtɩ higʋta lɛ ra, zamaa bɩ nɩ kʋ nyʋnnyɔɔtam a jɩr ʋ k'a tʋr ka Woso lemim ma.
42005002	A kɔɔlʋʋ yɩ hɩɩya higʋta bɩ lɛ ra. Zɔbənno wɔɔ n bra, ŋn'a zaŋŋarɔ sʋrgɔm.
42005003	Yeezuu n da kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ deem ʋ. Nyɩnta a ʋ Sɩmɔɔn hɔ. A n a yɛ han k'an a gaa higʋta bɩ lɛ ma poore. Yeezuu n nyɩnta, an a to kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam zamaa bɩ m.
42005004	K'a meer bɩ ba an a nya bɩ, a a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn m, a ʋ: "Ɩ zɔ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'a a zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ zo, k'a zɔ gʋr."
42005005	Sɩmɔɔn n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ zi ba gunuu ʋ tee••• bɩ wɔɔ n hɔsɩ nyasʋ y. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ hɩ bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ zom."
42005006	Kʋ ŋ zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ zo bɩ, ŋ zɔ gʋr gʋta, ŋ zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ nɩ kɩnkaansʋrɛ.
42005007	Ŋ n a to, ŋn'a wɔ zo a zibəəkɔɔnrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kɔɔlʋʋ deem bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ nɩ b'a da a han. Brɔɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a da ŋ han ŋn'a waa ʋ, ŋn'a zar kɔɔlʋʋrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an a han, ŋn'a yo k'a nyoo ba.
42005008	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩ ba mɔɔ ma laatʋ, bala, mimbʋnyaabər m mɔɔ m."
42005009	Dabɔʋ gʋta y'a nyasʋ kan a muno wɔɔ kɩ, zɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ y'a gʋr bɩ tɔ ma.
42005010	Dabɔʋ Zebedee nyɩnɔ Zakkɩ kan Zaan kɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ Sɩmɔɔn zibəəkɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ sɔ. Yeezuu n a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ zɔnɔ gʋr biisi, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bam gʋɔɔkamazaa kɛɛrɛ."
42005011	Ŋ n a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʋr kɔɔlʋʋrɔ wɔɔ m higʋta lɛ ra b'ʋ, ŋnɩ hɔ haay bɩ to, ŋnɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.
42005012	Yeezuu k'a yaa lee ku tara deem la bɩ, gʋaa nɩ b'ʋ kusiməbaa n ta ma jilli. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a sʋnta, an a meer zuutə tara ʋ, an yaa da m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, k'ɩ lɛ taa ma, ɩ ɩ da ma ɩ mɔɔ waa, k'ɩ dintim gʋ mɔɔ ma."
42005013	Yeezuu n a wɔ hʋr, an a da ma, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ taa, ɩ waa." Lɛɛm bɩ, a kusiməbaa bɩ nya ma.
42005014	Yeezuu n lɛ ka ʋ, a ʋ, a b'a hɩ gʋaa nɩ y. Bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ta ɩ yaa n'ɩ hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbər m, k'ɩ ganwʋrɛ ka amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Moyiisi lɛ ka bɩ m, ɩ dintim gʋ ɩ ma minto, k'an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ gʋaa haay lɛɛ."
42005015	Bɩ y'a ka Yeezuu tɔ n bɔ an n'a dam la. Zamaa gʋta n tɩr a zɛm kʋ ra, k'a tʋr ka a lemim ma, k'a ka kʋ Yeezuu n a waa a yaabarɔ minto.
42005016	Bɩ, kʋ Yeezuu nɩ, ta a tɩr a ʋ a deem bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʋ, an bɩr yaa darɛ.
42005017	Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ dɩndam. Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ. A to ŋ y'a ʋ Galilee kan Zidee kɩ Zerizalɛm kɩ kʋrɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr. Zuuba paŋŋa nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ, an a ka, an nɩ yaabazannɔ waam.
42005018	Gʋɔɔ n lee ku mɛgarɛzaa m wʋtarahɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kam ma k'a gasʋ m har ʋ b'ʋ, a wʋta Yeezuu taa.
42005019	Zamaa bɩ minto bɩ ŋ n a dɔ kʋ gasʋ awɔɔ n nawʋm nɩ lʋnlɔ y. Ŋ nɩ der cɛ bɩ ra, ŋnɩ cɛ bɩ mim hɔn ra, ŋn'a nyɔɔ, ŋn'a zer kan a wʋtarahɔ bɩ kɩ Yeezuu taa zamaa bɩ lɛɛ.
