42005020	Yeezuu k'a ŋ sɩrakarɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ yaabazaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa, ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ."
42005021	Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ y'a mɩŋŋa larm a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ kara n naa, an nɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ? Nka y'a da ma an mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka kʋ Woso deem bɛɛ?"
42005022	Bɩ Yeezuu k'a ŋ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʋ?
42005023	Kara n naanaa? M a hɩ, m ʋ: Ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ bɩ m gɛ, ɩ wuti ɩ ta bɩ nɩ?"
42005024	Bɩ k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, Gʋaanyɩ b'ɩ lɛ m k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka tara burə ʋ bɩ, an a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ sa ɩ doo."
42005025	Bɩ n wuti lɛɛm, ŋ mɩnyaa m, an a wʋtarahɔ bɩ sa, an doo, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
42005026	Ŋ haay zɛ kədə, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ. Dabɔʋ n ŋ nyasʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ mim daa yɩ her."
42005027	Bɩ kur bɩ, a bɔ an yawʋrsir yɩ, a tɔ m Levii, an nɩ nyɩntarɛ a zibəə bɩncɛ ʋ. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ."
42005028	Levii n wuti, an a gʋ hɔ haay ma, an zu Yeezuu ʋ.
42005029	Levii n cibsa gʋta ba a har ʋ, an hɔbɩrɛ ba Yeezuu minto. Yawʋrsinno gʋta bʋr, kan gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ b'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ.
42005030	Farizɛɛnrɔ kan a wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ n bʋr, ŋn'ɩ kukur bam karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto, awɔɔ n nɩ hɔ bɩm, an nɩ hɔ mim kan yawʋrsinno kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ?"
42005031	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩzannɔ bɩr a kam lɔɔtɔr ma y, yaabazannɔ n n'a kam ma.
42005032	Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ m bɩ gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ bir y, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaabənno minto, kʋ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa lʋr."
42005033	Gʋɔɔ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Gallɛm gʋta Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm, ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩrɛ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mire?"
42005034	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ y'a dam ma, a ka lʋ daa zim gʋaasɩbɔɔ n a lɛ kʋsɩ, kʋ lʋ daa bɩ zim b'ɩ kan ŋ kɩ ra?
42005035	Dɔmɩm zɛm, n nɩ zɛm bɩ lʋ daa zim bɩ bɔ ŋ bire ʋ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm."
42005036	A n a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom vanta da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ pɛɛra daa kur sam, an a sɩnsar kan huu gusire kɩ y. Bala, pɛɛra daa bɩ b'a gam kʋ ʋ kan a gusire bɩ kɩ y. Pɛɛra daa bɩ y'a gusire bɩ kaansʋm.
42005037	Gʋaa b'a dam ma, an dɩvɛn daa tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ gusinno ʋ y, kʋ bɩ bɛɛ nɩ, dɩvɛn bɩ yɩ ŋ hɩnhaanm, an a lo, bɩ hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ nyɩntam bɔm.
42005038	Bɩ, a ga a wʋm, ŋnɩ dɩvɛn daa tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ daarɔ ʋ.
42005039	Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ dɩvɛn gusire mim bɩ, a lɛ baa dɩvɛn daa ma y. Bala, a hɩ a nawʋrɛ, a ʋ, dɩvɛn gusire bɩ m mɩŋŋa."
42006001	Hindeem ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, Yeezuu bra hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m hɔyaa bɩ yɩnyar, ŋn'a tiŋŋə, ŋn'a sʋrɛ.
42006002	Farizɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto, awɔɔ nɩ naa barɛ? Bɩ n n lɛ ka kʋ n naa ba sabaa hinni ʋ?"
42006003	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Nɔ k'a Davɩd nyasʋ kan a muno kɩ an hɔ niŋŋə ba bɩ,
42006004	an gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ, an bur kʋ n y'a ka Woso ʋ bɩ sa, an a bɩ kan a muno wɔɔ kɩ, bɩ n nɩ lɛ ka kʋ n a bɩ kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno bɛɛ bala bɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba ra?"
42006005	A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m sabaa hinni bɩ minzaa."
42006006	Sabaa hinni vanta ʋ, Yeezuu gasʋ sokʋmacɛ ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam. Gʋaa nɩ b'ʋ, a bɩsɩ ra wɔ n ga.
42006007	Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ dundom Yeezuu zi, k'a dɩga a, a yaabazaa bɩ waam sabaa hinni ʋ gɛ, k'a ku a mim ka ra.
42006008	Bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ dɔ. A n a hɩ wɔgərzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ jɩm naa ʋ, zamaa bɩ bire ʋ." Gʋaa bɩ n wuti an jɩm b'ʋ.
42006009	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ kʋ m awɔɔ lar: zaa ta ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ, kʋ n nɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba gɛɛ, kʋ n nɩ zi bʋnyaa ba? Zaa ta ʋ kʋ n nɩ gʋaa meeyaa bʋmbɔ gɛɛ, kʋ n n'a zar?"
42006010	A n dɩga ŋ ma a jɩr ʋ, an a hɩ gʋaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ wɔ hʋr." Gʋaa bɩ n a wɔ hʋr, a wɔ bɩ n a waa.
42006011	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, k'a mim ka ra rɔ wɔɔ nɔ ma ʋ gʋta, ŋn'a dɩndam kan kʋ kɩ, k'a dɩga hɔ k'a n'a bam Yeezuu m bɩ ma.
42006012	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ta ci mim ʋ, k'a yaa yaa da. B'a yaa bɩ da Woso m gunuu ʋ b'ʋ kan dɔmɩrɛ kɩ.
42006013	Dɔ k'a mɩ bɩ, a a karɩndanyɩnɔ bir, an ŋ bɔ ʋ bueerehɩɩya, an tɔ ka ŋ ʋ, kristazibəəzannɔ.
42006014	Sɩmɔɔn k'a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr, a danzaa Andɩr, Zakkɩ, Zaan, Filipi, Bartelemii,
42006015	Matiyee, Toma, Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ, Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a birm Zelɔtɩ,
42006016	Zakkɩ nyɩ Zidas, kan Iskarɩyɔtɩ Zidas k'a a ba zambʋzaa bɩ kɩ.
42006017	Yeezuu a to ci mim ʋ kan ŋ kɩ, an zer, an aa jɩm bɩncɛ fapɩda ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ gʋta gɔɔta b'ʋ. Zamaa gʋta nyɩnta b'ʋ sɔ. A to ŋ y'a ʋ Zidee ʋ, Zerizalɛm ʋ, kan kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ higʋta lɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ, Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ jir ʋ.
42006018	Bʋr ŋ y'a ʋ, k'a b'a tʋr ka ma, k'an a waa a yaabarɔ minto. Gʋɔɔ kʋ zinəro nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a waam sɔ.
42006019	Zamaa bɩ haay y'a kam ma k'a a wɔ da ma. Bala, paŋŋa nyɩnta an nɩ bɔrɛ a mɛ ʋ, an nɩ ŋ haay waarɛ.
42006020	Yeezuu n dɩga a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma kɛɛrɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a m ŋʋazannɔ, Woso cirbəə bɩ, awɔɔ y'a so ʋ.
42006021	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʋ nɔ n'awɔɔ zɛm naa ma, hɔbɩrɛ y'awɔɔ bɔm. Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a nɩ baa dam naa ma, awɔɔ yaa wʋm.
42006022	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, kʋ n sɔ awɔɔ m, kʋ n kaanm awɔɔ m, kʋ n y'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ, ŋn'a bʋnyaa hɩ awɔɔ ma Gʋaanyɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
42006023	K'a heernyɔɔ gʋta ba hinni bɩ do ʋ. Bala, Woso ɩ ganwʋrɛ gʋta bankam awɔɔ minto arzana ʋ. Ŋ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ, nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ, ŋn'a ba ncɩnaaʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ m biisi.
42006024	A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ arzakazannɔ. Bala, awɔɔ a heernyɔɔ yɩ biisi.
42006025	A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a hɔ bɩ an a ka her bɩ, nɔ y'awɔɔ zɛm. A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a nɩ yaa wʋm naa ma bɩ, awɔɔ heer y'a zarm, a baa da.
42006026	Awɔɔ kʋ gʋaa haay n n'awɔɔ mɩŋŋabaa hɩm bɩ, a pakra barɛ awɔɔ m. Ŋ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ, a ba ŋ y'a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ biisi lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ŋʋaarzannɔ wɔɔ m."
42006027	"B'awɔɔ k'a n'a tʋr kam mɔɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'a a jɩnnɔ ŋʋa, k'a hɔ mɩŋŋa ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɔ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ m.
42006028	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ler bʋnyaa bɔrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a brɔɔ barka da ʋ. K'a yaa da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ŋʋaar ba ŋn'a karɛ awɔɔ lɛ m nɔ wɔɔ minto.
42006029	Kʋ gʋaa a wɔ ta ɩ paasɩ deem lɛ, k'ɩ deem bɩ ka ʋ k'an a tarɛ. Kʋ gʋaa ɩ gɔbga yɔ ɩ m, k'ɩ to k'an ɩ huuduama sa.
42006030	Kʋ gʋaa hɔ yɛ ɩ han, k'ɩ ka ʋ. Gʋaa k'a ɩbɩɩ hɔ sa bɩ, ɩ b'a laaka da han y.
42006031	Hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a ba awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a ba ŋ nɩ maam sɔ.
42006032	K'awɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ŋʋam bala, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Bala mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ŋʋam.
42006033	K'awɔɔ ɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a barɛ awɔɔ n nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ y'a bam maam sɔ.
42006034	K'awɔɔ zɩm sa gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, ŋ y'a karɛ awɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Bala, mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ ɩ zɩm sam kʋ m, k'a b'a si a lɛ ma.
42006035	Bɩ, k'a a jɩnnɔ ŋʋa, k'a zi mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ, k'a zɩm sa ŋ nɩ, b'a b'a hɔɔn da a sire ma y. Maam bɩ, awɔɔ ganwʋrɛ yɩm gʋta, awɔɔ nyɩntam Woso k'a lɛ da haay nyɩnɔ. Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n barka darɛ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ.
42006036	K'a cicirzɛrɛ zi ba, amba awɔɔ Zɩ m cicirzɛrɛzaa bɩ m.
42006037	A b'a muno dʋdɔ ka y. Maam bɩ, Woso b'awɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ y. A b'a muno dʋdɔ yar y. Maam bɩ, Woso b'awɔɔ dʋdɔ yarlɛ y. K'a sugur ka a muno ʋ, maam bɩ, Woso sugur karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
42006038	K'a hɔ ka a muno ʋ. Maam bɩ, Woso y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ sɔ. N hɔgammɔr mɩŋŋa sam, n nɩ hɔ zar m awɔɔ mɔr ʋ, an a han, n n'a yɩga-yɩga zɛ, an bɩr a lom. Bala, hɔgammɔr k'awɔɔ n ta m gʋɔɔ minto bɩ, bɩ n nɩ nyɩntam hɔgammɔr awɔɔ minto sɔ."
42006039	Yeezuu n a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋʋ y'a dam ma an bʋʋ gaa ra? Ŋ hɩɩya haay b'a zarm yaa deem ʋ ra?
42006040	Karɩndanyɩ n lɛ da a karɩnsaamba ra y, bɩ karɩndanyɩ haay, k'a bankarɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa, a nyɩntam am a karɩnsaamba hɔ bɩ m.
42006041	Bɔ nɩ, ɩ nɩ bur k'a n'ɩ mim mɩnyaa ʋ bɩ yɩrɛ, an bɔkarɛ kusə k'a n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr a yɩrɛ?
42006042	Ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ ɩ hɩ ɩ danyɩ m, ɩ ʋ: Jɩm kʋ m bur bɔ ɩ mɩm ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr kusə k'a n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʋ bɩ yɩrɛ? Zambʋzaa, kusə bɩ bɔ ɩ mɩm ʋ cɩna, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ mɩm lɛɛ yɩm, k'ɩ bur bɩ bɔ ɩ mim bɩ mɩm ʋ."
42006043	"Gɔ mɩŋŋa ba ʋ, an nɩ nyɩ bʋnyaa darɛ y, gɔ bʋnyaa ba ʋ, an nɩ nyɩ mɩŋŋa dam sɔ y.
42006044	N gɔ biyəə dɔ kan a nyɩ kɩ. N bɩr sɔɔn nyɩ nɔm laa gɔ ra y. N bɩr tʋgɔ nyɩ nɔm laazankʋrɛ ra y.
42006045	Gʋaa mɩŋŋa k'a n'a mɩŋŋabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʋm mim mɩŋŋa m a heer ʋ sɔ. Gʋaa bʋnyaa k'a n'a bʋnyaabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʋm mim bʋnyaa m a heer ʋ. Bala, hɔ k'a ɩbɩɩ heer han bɩ, b'ɩ lɛ n'a hɩm."
42006046	"Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ nɩ mɔɔ birm Zuuba, Zuuba, b'awɔɔ bɩr hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ barɛ?
42006047	Gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm mɔɔ zi, an n'a tʋr kam mɔɔ meerbaa ma, an nɩ zi bam nɩ bɩ, kʋ m a bɔkʋrɛ hɩnka a m.
42006048	Bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ cɛ dɔm, an yaa hɔn zukudə, an a jɩr bɩ cɩnta ci burə ʋ bɩ kɩ. La gʋta bʋr, hi n yar kan hɩnhɛr kɩ an a mom cɛ b'ʋ, b'a n a da ma, an a wurgə y, bala a dɔrɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa.
42006049	Gʋaa k'a n'a mam, b'a bɩr zi bam nɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a cɛ dɔ tara ʋ, b'a na jɩr cɩnta y. La gʋta bʋr, hi n yar kan hɩnhɛr kɩ an a mom cɛ b'ʋ, an wurgə lɛɛm. Bɩ cɛ bɩ wurgəre kur, a hɔsɩ n gɔɔta y."
42007001	Yeezuu k'a meer bɩ ba kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ an a nya bɩ, a wuti an ta Kapɛrnawum ʋ.
42007002	Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir deem n ta lɔ m, an a ŋʋa maam-maam, an yaaba zɛ, an a zɔ zɛ ma.
42007003	K'a Yeezuu mim ma bɩ, a zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔgusinno nyɔɔ zi, kʋ ŋ n'aa a yɛ han, k'an b'a lɔ bɩ waa.
42007004	Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku Yeezuu zi bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ han, ŋnɩ so ra, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do a ga m k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ da han,
42007005	bala, a wɔɔ do bɩ ŋʋa, a sokʋmacɛ dɔ an a ka wɔɔ ʋ."
42007006	Yeezuu n ta kan ŋ kɩ. Kʋ ŋ y'a zɔ har bɩ ma bɩ, sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir b'a gʋaasɩbɔɔ nyɔɔ, ŋn'a hɩm, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa da kɔrɛ ma, bala, mɔɔ n m ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ n gasʋ mɔɔ har ʋ y.
42007007	Mɔɔ m hɔɔn da mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ poore kʋ m bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi, bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ meer ba deem bala, mɔɔ lɔ bɩ y'a waam.
42007008	Lɛɛzannɔ y'a so mɔɔ mɩŋŋa ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ m so sʋrdaarɔ ʋ. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ deem m, an ta, a tam. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ a vanta m, an bʋr, a zɛm. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ zibəənyɩ m, an naa ba, a y'a bam."
42007009	Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a zɛ kədə sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir bɩ tɔ ma, an a bɔ an dɩga zamaa k'a zu a jɛ ʋ bɩ ma, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, baa Israyɛl nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ n sɩrakarɛ yɩ ncɩnaaʋ y."
42007010	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ doo sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir bɩ har ʋ bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a lɔ b'a waa.
42007011	Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu ta tara deem kʋ n n'a birm Nayin bɩ nɔ ʋ. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ kan zamaa gʋta kɩ.
42007012	K'a n'a zɔm tara bɩ lɛ ma bɩ, n gər busu, n nɩ tam nɩ yaa ra. Zoro nyɩ m, b'a m nyɩyar a deem a da han. Tara bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta lʋ bɩ da zaa ʋ.
42007013	Zuuba k'a lʋ bɩ yɩ bɩ, lʋ bɩ cicir gasʋ ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'ɩ ya ɩ nyi ka y."
42007014	A n a zɔ, an a wɔ da gʋraŋŋa bɩ ma. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a busu rɔ wɔɔ n jɩm. Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Nyukumbueere, mɔɔ lɛ ka, wuti."
42007015	Gər bɩ n wuti an nyɩnta, an nɩ meer bam. Yeezuu n nyɩ bɩ gaa, an a ka a da ʋ.
42007016	Dabɔʋ gʋta ŋ haay nyasʋ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa gʋta a hɩnka wɔɔ bire ʋ. Bɩ Woso bɩ dɩga a do ma."
42007017	Hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba bɩ ta Zidee haay ʋ kan a gʋrgarɔ kɩ ʋ.
42007018	Zaan-Batiisi karɩndanyɩnɔ yaa hɔ haay k'a ba bɩ hɩ m. Zaan nɩ ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya bir,
42007019	an ŋ nyɔɔ Zuuba zi kʋ ŋ n'aa a lar: "Ɩbɩɩ n nɩ dɔrɛ ɩ zɛrɛ ma bɩ gɛɛ, gʋaa vanta nɩ?"
42007020	Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku Yeezuu zi bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zaan-Batiisi ɩ wɔɔ nyɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ma, k'ʋ bɩ laaka da ɩbɩɩ han: ɩbɩɩ n gʋaa k'a a ga m an bʋr bɩ gɛɛ, gʋaa vanta nɩ?"
42007021	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu yaabazannɔ waa gʋta, an gʋɔɔ waa a yaabarɔ do haay nɔ ʋ, kan zinərozannɔ kɩ, a bʋʋrɔ mɩm gʋ sɔ.
42007022	A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ Zaan-Batiisi ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a ta, a yaa hɔ k'awɔɔ yɩ, a ma sɔ bɩ hɩ Zaan m: bʋʋrɔ mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, lʋgɔrɔ ɩ tam, kusimoo laafɩɩ yɩ, tikkiro tʋr a gʋ, gəəno a mɩm bɔ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta ɩ hɩm cicirzannɔ m.
42007023	Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a n a sɩrakarɛ to mɔɔ minto bɩ m."
42007024	Gʋɔɔ kʋ Zaan-Batiisi ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a hʋr bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a poohɔɔn ʋ? Hɩnhɛr awɔɔ yɩ an nɩ niigəgɔ yəŋŋəm gɛ?
42007025	Bɔ awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a paan•••? Gʋaa m, an huu wɩsɩ da a ra gɛ? Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ huu wɩsɩrɔ da a ra, ŋn'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam mɩŋŋa bɩ, cinno har brɔɔ n ta ʋ.
42007026	Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a? Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m gɛ? Ɩɩn••• mɔɔ y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a lɛ da wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ra.
42007027	Bala, Zaan bɩ mim n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ bɩ, n ʋ: 'Ba mɔɔ nɩ m zibəəzaa nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, k'a n'ɩbɩɩ zaarɔ bɩmbanka na.'
42007028	Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lannɔ nyɩnɔ bire ʋ, gʋaa ba ʋ an lɛ da Zaan-Batiisi ra y. Bɩ gʋaa k'an poore Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ, a lɛ da m."
42007029	Zamaa bɩ haay kan yawʋrsinno wɔɔ kɩ a tʋr ka Zaan ma, ŋn'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ Woso tɩrga, ŋn'a ka an batɛm ka a ʋ.
42007030	Bɩ farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ kaanm hɔ kʋ Woso lɛ n taa ŋ minto bɩ m, kaanm kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ Zaan batɛm bɩ m bɩ tɔ ma.
42007031	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ m her gʋɔɔ nɔɔn makra ba kan bɔ kɩ? Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan bɔ kɩ?
42007032	Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ yaa nyɩnta daasɩ ʋ, ŋn'a to ŋn'ɩ kʋ bimbirm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: Wɔɔ hir hɛ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n sar ba y! Wɔɔ zɛ laa lɔ b'awɔɔ n nyi ka y?
42007033	Bala, Zaan-Batiisi bʋr, a bɩr bur bɩrɛ y, a bɩr dɩvɛn mire y, awɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Zinə nɩ kan kɩ.
42007034	Bɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr, an nɩ hɔ bɩm, an nɩ hɔ mim, awɔɔ ʋ: Naa do naa, nɔzaa m bɩ dɩvɛnmir m sɔ, yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ hannyɩ m.
42007035	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ tɩrga."
42007036	Farizɛn deem Yeezuu bir k'an bɩ hɔ bɩ kan a kɩ. Yeezuu n gasʋ a har ʋ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋnɩ hɔ bɩrɛ.
42007037	Lʋ n nɩ tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, mimbʋnyaabər m. A n a ma ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu ɩ hɔ bɩm farizɛn har ʋ b'ʋ. A n bʋr gedre m, n n'a ba albatɩr jaa m, tidəər n a han,
42007038	an bɩ sʋnta a kur a gannɔ ma, an nɩ nyi karɛ. A mɩm hi n bɔ, an n'a lom Yeezuu gannɔ ra. A n a minkə gaa, an a nʋnnɔ ma, an a wɔ barka ŋ la, an tidəər bɩ sa, an a lo ŋ la.
42007039	Farizɛn k'a Yeezuu bir bɩ k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a y'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: "Kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m gʋaa naa do nɩ, a lʋ k'a n'a wɔ nɔrɛ awɔɔ ma naa dɔm, kʋ nka m sɔ: mimbʋnyaabər naa."
42007040	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, mɔɔ ɩ mim m kʋ m a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m." A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Meer ba, karɩnsaamba."
42007041	"Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, gʋaa hɩɩya n n'a zɩm m. Deem nɩ dɔmɩm zɔrsoor zibəə busoo m, deem bɩ n ta dɔmɩm busoor zibəə busoo m.
42007042	Kʋ ŋ ba busoo m k'a zɩm bɩ kam bɩ, busoo bɩ zaa b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: ŋn'a to. Nka nɩ busoozaa bɩ ŋʋarɛ an lɛ da?"
42007043	Sɩmɔɔn n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a hɩm, mɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa k'a zɩm lɛ da a mim la bɩ m." Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ sɩra hɩ."
42007044	Yeezuu n a bɔ an dɩga lʋ bɩ ma, an a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lʋ naa do yɩ ra? Mɔɔ gasʋ ɩbɩɩ har ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n hi lo mɔɔ gannɔ ra y, bɩ, a nyi ka, a mɩm hi n a lo mɔɔ gannɔ ra, an a gʋngʋ ma a minkə m.
42007045	Ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ nyaasɩ ka kan daʋrɛ kɩ y. Bɩ lʋ bɩ mɔɔ nyaasɩ ka an a wɔ barka mɔɔ gannɔ ra, b'a bɩr a tore y.
42007046	Ɩbɩɩ n nyɔɔ nɔ mɔɔ mim ma y, bɩ, a tidəər nɔ mɔɔ gannɔ ma.
42007047	Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ: a a mimbʋnyaarɔ k'a ŋ ba gʋta rɔ wɔɔ sugur yɩ, bɩ tɔ ma m, an ŋʋarɛ gʋta zi naa ba. Gʋaa k'a mimbʋnyaa m poore n nɩ sugur ka ʋ bɩ, a ɩ ŋʋarɛ m poore sɔ."
42007048	Yeezuu n a hɩ lʋ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ."
42007049	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Nka m gʋaa naa do nɩ? A n yɛ an nɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ?"
42007050	Yeezuu n a hɩ lʋ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ. Ta kan laafɩɩ kɩ."
42008001	Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu zaa sa an bɔ kʋrɔ gʋtɔɔ kan kʋrɔ poorero kɩ nɔ ʋ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa darɛ. Karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta kan kɩ,
42008002	kan lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ k'a ŋ waa zinəro kan yaabarɔ kɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ kɩ: Magdalaa Maarii kʋ zinəro bɔ a mɛ ʋ saanhɩna,
42008003	Hɩrɔɔdɩ har dɩgamazaa Kuzaa lʋ Zannɩ kɩ, Sʋzannɩ kan lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ gʋta, kʋ ŋ y'a da ŋ han a hɔnyɩrɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
42008004	Zamaa a to kʋrɔ haay ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr Yeezuu zi. Kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra bɩ, Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da.
42008005	"Gʋaa ɩ bɔ k'a hɔ duu. K'a n'a duum bɩ, a hɩsɩga an nawʋm. A yaa gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo zaa bire ʋ. N n tʋntɔ ra, brama bɛnnɔ n a bɩ.
42008006	Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo jaarɔ ra. Ŋ haan, ŋnɩ gɩnga kʋ taa butur ba ʋ bɩ minto.
42008007	Gɔsɩnnɔ n a zar laa ʋ. Ŋ bɔ, laa bɩ n a ta ŋ mee, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
42008008	Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ. Ŋ bɔ, ŋnɩ nyɩ da zɔrɔ-zɔrɔ." Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, an so ra kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a tʋr n ta ʋ, k'an a ma!"
42008009	Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do jɩ ma.
42008010	A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso zaa ka awɔɔ n hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ, bɩ, bɔɔ ɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom n n'a darɛ ŋ nɩ, kʋ 'ŋnɩ dɩga, bɩ ŋ b'a yɩ y, kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr ka, bɩ ŋ b'a ma y.' "
42008011	"Ba hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom bɩ jɩ n na. Hɔduure bɩ, Woso lemim m.
42008012	Bɔɔ nɩ zaa bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋn'a mam, Sʋtaana k'a lee ku bɩ, an nɩ hɔ k'a nɩ ŋ heer ʋ bɩ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ b'a da ma, ŋn'a si, ŋnɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ nɩ y.
42008013	Bɔɔ nɩ jaarɔ burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ Woso lemim bɩ ma, a si ŋ nawʋm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, bɩ ŋ məsi ba ʋ y. A si ŋ nawʋm, bɩ k'a yɩ poore, makra dɔmɩm ʋ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa.
42008014	Bɔɔ y'a zar laa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋn'a mam, bɩ kan hɔɔndarɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, durnya arzakarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, durnya heernyɔɔrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gɔɔta ŋ nawʋm jɛ ʋ, ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ nyɩ da mɩŋŋa y.
42008015	Bɔɔ y'a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋn'a tʋr kam lemim bɩ ma, ŋn'a sim mɩŋŋa kan heer tɩrgabaa kɩ. Ŋ bɩr a tɔ bɔrɛ a nɔ ʋ y, ŋ bɩr a tom sɔ y, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ nyɩ dam."
42008016	"Gʋaa bɩ sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʋ, an mɔr sa an a ku ma, gɛɛ an a sa, an a nyɔɔ gargʋ ta y. A cɩnta n nawʋrɛ a bɩncɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋm nɔ wɔɔ n bɩr lɛɛ gure bɩ yɩm.
42008017	Bala, mim haay kʋ gʋɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋn'a dɔ naa ma bɩ, ŋ zɛm b'a dɔ. Mim ba ʋ n n a nyaakʋm da a dɔ n mɩ y.
42008018	K'a dundo a zi kan a tʋr k'awɔɔ n'a kam ma lʋnlɔ bɩ kɩ. Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ m bɩ, n y'a dam la. Bɔ ɩ bɩ hɔsɩ n bɩ, a hɔɔn k'a a da a ʋ, a ta m poore bɩ, n y'a yɔm nɩ."
42008019	Yeezuu da kan a danyɩnɔ kɩ bʋr zi, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a zɔ ma y, zamaa minto.
42008020	N n'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ da kan ɩ danyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ garga ra, ŋ lɛ n taa ɩbɩɩ ma."
42008021	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ da kan mɔɔ danyɩnɔ kɩ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam Woso lemim ma, ŋn'a zi bam nɔ wɔɔ m."
42008022	Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ʋ ta higʋta bɩ gəm deem bɩ ra", ŋnɩ cem.
42008023	Kʋ ŋ y'a hʋr, ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, Yeezuu hinceem ba. Hɩnhɛr gʋta n yar higʋta bɩ ra. Hi n'a tɔm kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an n'a ŋʋam k'a nyoo zɛ.
42008024	Ŋ n'a zɔ, ŋn'a gu, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, karɩnsaamba, ʋ ɩ gɩngam!" A n wuti, an həən si hɩnhɛr bɩ ma kan hikurero wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a da zenyy•••, lɛɛ n zɛ sɩɩ•••
42008025	A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ b'ɩ ka?" Dabɔʋ nɩ ŋ nyasʋ, ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Nka m gʋaa naa do nɩ? A n nɩ lɛ kam hɩnhɛr ʋ kan hi kɩ, ŋn'a lɛ sire!"
42008026	Ŋ yaa lee ku Gergezaa zannɔ kʋ ʋ. Kʋ bɩ, a nya a ʋ Galilee kʋ bɩ rɛ.
42008027	Yeezuu k'a zer tara ʋ bɩ, tara bɩ gʋaa deem a zɛ ʋ, zinəro nɩ kan kɩ. A dɔmɩm laatʋ, a n a ya, an nɩ huu darɛ a ra y, b'a n a ya, an nɩ wʋtam har ʋ y. Wʋta a nawʋm gəənoyaarɔ nɔ ʋ.
42008028	Gallɛm gʋta zinə bɩ tɩr gasʋ gʋaa b'ʋ an maasɩrɛ ba. N n a wɔrɔ sur baŋŋarɔ m, n n pɔyaarɔ da a gam ʋ k'a dɔ ma. Bɩ, a tɩr ŋ yɩnyar, zinə bɩ n a gaa, an ta m zaŋŋa ʋ. Yeezuu n lɛ ka zinə b'ʋ k'an bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a zee da, an sʋnta a taa, an n'a hɩm kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ, Yeezuu, Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ? Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ɩ bɩ fɩr ka mɔɔ ma y."
42008030	Yeezuu n a lar, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ tɔ m bɔ?" A ʋ: "Leziyɔn" A jɩ k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Gʋta maam-maam, bala, zinəro gʋta ɩ gasʋ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ.
42008031	Zinəro wɔɔ n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'a bɩ lɛ ka a ʋ, k'a gasʋ yaa gʋta ʋ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ y.
42008032	Kurkuuro ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋta, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm ci bɩ ra. Zinəro wɔɔ n a yɛ Yeezuu han, k'an zaa ka a ʋ, k'a gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ ʋ. A n zaa ka ŋ ʋ.
42008033	Zinəro wɔɔ n bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ ʋ. Kurkuuro wɔɔ n bra si ci bɩ mim ʋ, ŋnɩ zer, ŋn'a zar higʋta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
42008034	Kurkuuro dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ bra si, ŋn'aa hɩ tara nɔ ʋ, kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ.
42008035	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n bʋr k'a bɩ dɩga hɔ k'a ba bɩ ma. Ŋ lee ku Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ gʋaa kʋ zinəro bɔ a mɛ ʋ bɩ yɩ, an nɩ nyɩntam Yeezuu jɩr ʋ, an huu da a ra, an a ba gʋaa mɩŋŋa, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da n bɔ ʋ.
42008036	Bɔɔ ɩ hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ zinəro zaa bɩ waarɛ jɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr lɔ wɔɔ m.
42008037	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Gergezaa zannɔ wɔɔ n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'an a hʋr a tara ra. Bala, nyibəə gʋta gasʋ ŋ ʋ. Yeezuu n a bɔ, an da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an a wusigə.
42008038	Gʋaa kʋ zinəro bɔ a mɛ ʋ b'a yɛ Yeezuu han k'a zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ. Yeezuu n a da zaa ra, a ʋ:
42008039	"Doo ɩ har ʋ, k'ɩ yaa hɔ kʋ Woso a ba ɩbɩɩ minto bɩ hɩ." Gʋaa bɩ n a hʋr, an aa hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba a m bɩ hɩ tara bɩ nɔ ʋ jilli.
42008040	Yeezuu k'a a bɔ, an bɩ lee ku bɩ, zamaa bɩ b'a zɛ ʋ, ŋn'a si. Bala, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ dɔm ma.
42008041	Gʋaa n bʋr b'ʋ, a tɔ m Zayirus, sokʋmacɛ cir m. A n bɩ sʋnta Yeezuu taa, an a yɛ han, k'an bʋr a har ʋ,
42008042	bala, a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ n ta ʋ deem bala, a dɔɔraa a zɔ bueerehɩɩya ma, an n'a bam k'a ga. Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ tam bɩ, zamaa b'a so ʋ.
42008043	Lʋ ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ma n'a dam zi dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya. [A n a hɔnyɩ zar lɔɔtɔɔrɔ zi,] bɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ an a da ma, an a waa y.
42008044	A n a zɔ Yeezuu ma a kur, an a wɔ da a huu lɛ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, a ma b'a da jɩm ʋ.
42008045	Yeezuu n laaka da, a ʋ: "Nka y'a wɔ da mɔɔ ma?" Ŋ haay n bɩsɩ ka. Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so ɩbɩɩ ʋ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ nyʋnnyɔɔtam nɔ wɔɔ m."
42008046	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa a wɔ da mɔɔ ma, bala paŋŋa bɔ mɔɔ mɛ ʋ, mɔɔ n a dɔ."
42008047	Lʋ bɩ k'a a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ sʋr a ra bɩ, a bʋr kan mɛhinkə kɩ, an bɩ kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa. Hɔ niŋŋə k'a ka, an a wɔ da ma, an a waa lɛɛm bɩ, an a jɩ sa, an a dɩnda m zamaa bɩ haay taa.
42008048	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "M nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ. Ta kan laafɩɩ kɩ."
42008049	Kʋ Yeezuu gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, gʋaa a to sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ har ʋ, an b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ ga. Ɩ b'ɩ ya, ɩ karɩnsaamba da kɔrɛ ma y."
42008050	Bɩ Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, an a hɩ Zayirus m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Sɩra ka bala, a y'a waam."
42008051	Kʋ Yeezuu lee ku har ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a n zaa ka gɔsɩ ʋ k'an gasʋ y. Pɩyɛɛr a gaa bala, kan Zaan kɩ, Zakkɩ kɩ, kan nyɩ bɩ zɩ kɩ, a da kɩ.
42008052	Zamaa bɩ haay nɩ baa dam, ŋnɩ heerzar nɔ ʋ nyɩ bɩ minto. Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "A bɩ baa da y. A n ga y, hinceem an n'a bam."
42008053	Ŋ nɩ yaa wʋm Yeezuu ma, bala, ŋ sɩra ka, a ga.
42008054	Yeezuu n nyɩ bɩ sa a wɔ ma, an a bir, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, wuti!"
42008055	A n a mɩm bɔ ʋ, an wuti lɛɛm. Yeezuu n zaa ka, a ʋ, ŋnɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʋ.
42008056	A zɩrɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə, bɩ Yeezuu lɛ ka, a ʋ, ŋ bɩ hɔ k'a ba naa hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.
42009001	Yeezuu bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, a paŋŋa kan lɛ kɩ ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ la zinəro ra, kʋ ŋ nɩ yaabazannɔ waa.
42009002	A n ŋ nyɔɔ, kʋ ŋ n'aa Woso cirbəə bɩ pa da, kʋ ŋ nɩ yaabazannɔ waa.
42009003	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A bɩ hɔsɩ sa a wɔ ʋ k'a zaa bɩ sa nɩ y. A bɩ bara sa, gɛɛ hɛra, gɛɛ bur, gɛɛ busoo y. A b'a ka gʋaa deem m huuro gʋr hɩɩya y.
42009004	Har niŋŋə kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ siŋ ʋ bɩ, k'a gɔɔta b'ʋ, an ta, an awɔɔ hʋrlɛ dɔmɩm ku.
42009005	Kʋ ŋ n awɔɔ si kʋ bɩ do nɔ ʋ y, k'a bʋr an n'a hʋrm, k'a kʋ bɩ taanyisi bɩ gʋngʋm a gannɔ ma, kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, a kʋrɔ ma."
42009006	Ŋ n'a hʋr ŋnɩ ta kʋrɔ haay ʋ, ŋn'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam, ŋn'ɩ yaabazannɔ waam bɩncɛ haay ʋ.
42009007	Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ hɔ haay kʋ Yeezuu a ba naa ma. A n a dɔ k'a hɔɔn an n'a dam lɔ y. Bala, nawɔnnɔ ʋ Zaan y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.
42009008	Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ Elii y'a hɩnka. Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ biisi rɔ wɔɔ deem y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ.
42009009	Hɩrɔɔdɩ ʋ: "Mɔɔ ka ŋnɩ Zaan mim gʋ ma. Bɩ, nka ŋn'a mim dɩndam mɔɔ n'a mam naa?" A n n'a kam ma k'a yɩ.
42009010	Zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a wusigə bɩ, ŋ yaa hɔ haay kʋ ŋ yaa ba bɩ hɩ Yeezuu m. A n ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ toore ma, tara kʋ n n'a birm Bɛtsayɩdaa bɩ zeezi.
42009011	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ bɩ, ŋ zu ŋ jɛ ʋ. Yeezuu nɩ ŋ si, an nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, an nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa laafɩɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ waarɛ.
42009012	Gum k'a bʋr an nɩ dam bɩ, bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra, kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ jɩnjɛɛm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'aa a ka wʋtajɩrɔ ma kan hɔbɩrɛ kɩ ma ŋn'a bɩ. Bala, bɩncɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta ʋ naa, laatʋ hadrɔ ma."
42009013	Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ ŋn'a bɩ a zim." Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Bur soor taan••• ɩ gɔɔta wɔɔ ʋ kan zɔnɔ kɩ hɩɩya, kʋ bɩ bɛɛ y, k'ʋ ta ʋ aa hɔbɩrɛ si, ʋ b'a ka zamaa b'ʋ."
42009014	Gʋɔɔ yaarɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tisi soor ku. Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta busoor-busoor."
42009015	Ŋ n'a ba maam, ŋnɩ ŋ nyɩnta haay.
42009016	Yeezuu n bur soor bɩ sa kan zɔ hɩɩya bɩ kɩ, an a mɩm busu brama, an ŋ barka da ʋ, an a zɩnzɛ ra, an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a ka zamaa b'ʋ.
42009017	Ŋ n'a bɩ, an ŋ ka haay. A kuurero kʋ ŋ gɔɔta bɩ, ŋn'a gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma bueerehɩɩya.
42009018	Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu bɔ toore ma, an nɩ yaa dam, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ kan kɩ. A n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Zamaa bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ?"
42009019	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ, Zaan-Batiisi m. Nawɔnnɔ ʋ, Elii m. Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ, biisizannɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ."
42009020	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ?" Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Krista kʋ Woso a nyɔɔ bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m."
42009021	Yeezuu ŋ lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y."
42009022	A n a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Pakra m kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n fɩr yɩ gʋta, kʋ gʋɔɔgusinno n kaanm m kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a zɛ an ga, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ."
42009023	Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ haay, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'an a mɩŋŋa lɛtaamarɔ to haay, dɔmɩm haay, k'an a gɔdarkʋra busu, an zu mɔɔ ʋ.
42009024	Kʋ sɩra nɩ, gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a a meeyaa bʋmbɔ, bɩ zaa n nɩ kʋrɔm ma. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a yɛ zɛ ma mɔɔ minto bɩ, bɩ zaa ɩ bɩ kʋrɔm a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ ma y.
42009025	Bɩ kʋ gʋaa durnya naa arzaka yɩ haay, a zaa n bɔkarɛ an a mɩŋŋa nyaam, gɛɛ, an a mɩŋŋa zar, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka?
42009026	Bala, kʋ gʋaa ɩ nyannɩ zɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma, an nɩ nyannɩ zɛm mɔɔ meerbaa tɔ ma, kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ kan a Zɩ hɔ kɩ malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔ kɩ, a b'a zaa nyannɩ zɛrɛ y.
42009027	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, gɔsɩnnɔ Woso cirbəə bɩ yɩm, a mɩsɩrbaa dɔmɩm ʋ."
42009028	Yeezuu k'a meer bɩ ba bɩ, a dɔmɩm a zɔ sinnyə ma. A Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zaan kɩ, Zakkɩ kɩ, an der ci ra k'a yaa da.
42009029	K'a nɩ yaa bɩ dam bɩ, a meer a lʋr, a huu n a ba fu fɩtɩtɩ, an nɩ nyakɩ bɔm.
42009030	Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ bʋr, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan kɩ; Moyiisi kan Elii kɩ y'a hɩnka Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ,
42009031	ŋn'ɩ zibəə kʋ Yeezuu n n'a nyambʋrlɛ a zɛ m, Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ mim dɩndam kan kɩ.
42009032	Bɩ ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr ɩ hinceem barɛ a ra kan a muno wɔɔ kɩ. Hinceem bɩ n bɩ ku ŋ la. Kʋ ŋ gu bɩ, ŋ Yeezuu lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ yɩ kan gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
42009033	Gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a gʋm Yeezuu ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ naa ʋ a mɩŋŋa. Ʋ bur ba kaakʋ: Ɩbɩɩ hɔ deem, Moyiisi hɔ deem, Elii hɔ deem." A n hɔ k'an a hɩm bɩ dɔ y.
42009034	K'a nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, warkʋ bʋr an b'a ku ŋ la. Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ warkʋ bɩ yɩ an n'a kure a ra bɩ, ŋ da bɔ ʋ gʋta.
42009035	Meerbaa n a to warkʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ m naa, mɔɔ n'a bɔ ʋ. K'a a tʋr ka ma."
42009036	Meerbaa bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n gɔsɩ yɩ, kʋ Yeezuu deem bɛɛ y. Ŋ n hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ hɩ gɔsɩ m dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ y, ŋ zɛ pi.
42009037	Bɩ dɔ k'a mɩ bɩ, ŋ zer ci bɩ ra, zamaa n bʋr, an bɩ Yeezuu zɛ ʋ.
42009038	Gʋaa deem nɩ zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, an zee da, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, dɩga mɔɔ nyɩyar bɩ mim ma, an mɔɔ nyɩ a deem bala.
42009039	Zinə deem ɩ gasʋ ʋ, an tɩr a da zeedarɛ ma, an a hinkə. A n bɩr lihihur tarɛ a lɛ rɛ, an bɩr a dam kɔrɛ ma, a bɩr bɔrɛ a mɛ ʋ naanaa y.
42009040	Mɔɔ yɛ ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ han kʋ ŋ nɩ la ra, bɩ ŋ n a da ma y."
42009041	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩrakarɛ warzannɔ kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ do n'awɔɔ m. Mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m dɔmɩm karɔ ba, kʋ m bʋraama zi ba kan awɔɔ kɩ? Bʋr ɩ nyɩ bɩ m naa ʋ."
42009042	Nyɩ bɩ k'a bʋr an n'a zɔm bɩ, zinə b'a zɛ an a zo tara ʋ, an a hinkə. Yeezuu n həən si zinə bɩ ma, an nyɩ bɩ waa, an a ka a zɩ ʋ.
42009043	Ŋ haay n zɛ kədə Woso gʋtabaa bɩ minto. Hɔ haay kʋ Yeezuu a ba bɩ a ka gʋaa biyəə heer n nyɩnta. A a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ:
42009044	"K'a tʋr ka hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ ma mɩŋŋa: N Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋm, n n'a da gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ."
42009045	Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩr a meerbaa bɩ jɩ marɛ y. A jɩ b'a nyaakʋm da ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ b'a da ma, ŋn'a dɔ y, ŋn'ɩ nyi bam Yeezuu larlɛ m mim naa do minto.
42009046	Laakadarɛ deem bʋr ŋ hɔɔn ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩsɩ kam kʋ ma, ŋ ʋ: nka y'a da ma an yɩ jɩtaarɛ a bire ʋ.
42009047	Yeezuu k'a ŋ laaka bɩ darɛ jɩ dɔ bɩ, a nyɩ gaa, an a jɩm a jɩr ʋ,
42009048	an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a nyɩ naa do si mɔɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ a yɩ m si. Gʋaa k'a mɔɔ si bɩ, gʋaa k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a a si. Bala, gʋaa k'an poore awɔɔ haay barla bɩ, bɩ n'awɔɔ jɩtaarɛ."
42009049	Zaan meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ gʋaa yɩ an nɩ lam zinəro ra ɩbɩɩ tɔ m, wɔɔ n a gʋ ma, k'a ba kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ tɔ ma."
42009050	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "A b'a gʋ ma y, bala, gʋaa k'a bɩ bʋnyaa kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ gʋaa m."
42009051	Dɔmɩm k'a a ga m kʋ Woso n Yeezuu bɔ durnya ʋ bɩ k'a n'a zɔm bɩ, a a cɩnta k'a ta Zerizalɛm ʋ.
42009052	A gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka a m. Brɔɔ n zaa sa, ŋn'aa gasʋ Samarii kʋ deem ʋ, k'a leekure bɩ banka.
42009053	Bɩ, ŋ n a si y, k'a zaa sa an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
42009054	Karɩndanyɩnɔ Zaan kan Zakkɩ kɩ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ʋ lɛ ka, kʋ sɛ n a to brama an zer, an nawɔnnɔ bɩ gɛ?"
42009055	Yeezuu n a bɔ an dɩga ŋ ma, an nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ, [a ʋ: "Nyi k'an ta awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ n a dɔ y. Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n bʋr k'a bɩ gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛ y, bʋr a ʋ k'a bɩ ŋ bʋmbɔ."]
42009056	Ŋ n'a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta tara vanta ra.
42009057	Kʋ ŋ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, gʋaa deem a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zum kʋ ʋ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, m ta bɩncɛ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n nɩ taŋ ʋ."
42009058	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɛɛʋnrɔ yaarɔ ta ʋ, bɩ bɛnnɔ y'a cɛrɔ m. Bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ ba bɩncɛ m k'a mim cɩnta ʋ y."
42009059	A n a hɩ gʋaa vanta m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ." Bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, zaa ka m ʋ, kʋ m dɔ m zɩ birle ma."
42009060	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Gəəno wɔɔ to kʋ ŋ n a gəəno bir. B'ɩbɩɩ, ta ɩ yaa Woso cirbəə pa da."
42009061	Gʋaa vanta n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zure ɩbɩɩ ʋ karɩnsaamba, bɩ zaa ka m ʋ, kʋ m m leer so m harzannɔ m."
42009062	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa donokaan sa k'a dam wʋ, an a bɔ an nɩ dɩgarɛ a kur, a zaa b'a dam ma an Woso cirbəə zi ba y."
42010001	Bɩ kur bɩ, Zuuba karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bɔ ʋ busaanhɩna a yaa hɩɩya, an ŋ nyɔɔ hɩɩya-hɩɩya, kʋrɔ kan bɩncɛ haay k'a a ga m an ta ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ lɛɛ ka a lɛɛ.
42010002	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔdarɛ bɩ gʋta, b'a darɛzannɔ ba ʋ gʋta y. K'a yaa da wutu zaa bɩ m, k'a yɛ han, k'an zibənno nyɔɔ hɔdarɛ bɩ minto.
42010003	K'a ta! Awɔɔ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋm am sinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ hɔ bɩ m tamparɔ bire ʋ.
42010004	A bɩ busoo sa y, a bɩ hɛra sa y, a bɩ kʋsɔ sa sɔ y. A bɩ jɩm a yaa da gʋaa m zaa ra y.
42010005	K'a lɛɛ ka a hɩ har k'awɔɔ n nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ b'ʋ, a ʋ: Kʋ laafɩɩ n bɩr har naa do mim la.
42010006	Kʋ laafɩɩ zaa ɩ b'ʋ deem, awɔɔ laafɩɩ bɩ zerm la. Kʋ bɩ bɛɛ y, a y'a bɔm an bʋr awɔɔ zi.
42010007	K'a gɔɔta har bɩ do ʋ. Hɔ kʋ n n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, a bɩr a bɩrɛ, a bɩr a mire. Bala, zibəəzaa b'a ga a busoo m. A bɩ har lʋnlʋr y.
42010008	K'awɔɔ yaa gasʋ tara niŋŋə nɔ ʋ, n n'awɔɔ si, k'a hɔ kʋ n y'a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩ.
42010009	K'a yaabazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ waa. K'a hɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ awɔɔ ma.
42010010	K'awɔɔ yaa gasʋ kʋ niŋŋə ʋ, bɩ ŋ n awɔɔ si, k'a bɔ a hɩ gʋɔɔ gaa ʋ, a ʋ:
42010011	Baa k'awɔɔ kʋ bɩ taanyisi k'a naasʋ wɔɔ gannɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ y'a gʋngʋm ma, ʋ a to awɔɔ m. Bɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ awɔɔ ma.
42010012	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Woso dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, Sodɔm hʋnhʋrlɛ bɩ nyɩntam gʋta, an kʋ bɩ do ku y."
42010013	"A nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma bʋnyaa, Korazɛn zannɔ! A nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma bʋnyaa, Bɛtsayɩdaa zannɔ! Bala, hoserlo kʋ ŋ ba awɔɔ bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ba ŋ y'a ʋ Tiir ʋ kan Sidɔn kɩ, ncɩnaaʋ naa ŋ yɔrgɔrɔ da a ra, ŋnɩ suu lo a mim la, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a a mɩsɩrbaa lʋr, a dɔmɩm laatʋ.
42010014	Bɩ minto bɩ, dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ bɩ nyɩntam gʋta, an awɔɔ hɔ bɩ ku y.
42010015	B'ɩbɩɩ Kapɛrnawum, ɩ hɔɔn ɩbɩɩ n n'a darɛ ɩ ʋ, n y'ɩbɩɩ busum ɩ ta arzana ʋ ra? N y'ɩbɩɩ zerm yaa gʋta ʋ, fɩryɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ."
42010016	Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔzaa n n'a tʋr karɛ awɔɔ ma bɩ, a tʋr an n'a kam mɔɔ ma. Bɔzaa ɩ kaanm awɔɔ m bɩ, kaanm a ʋ mɔɔ m sɔ. Bɩ bɔzaa ɩ kaanm mɔɔ m bɩ, kaanm a ʋ gʋaa k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ m."
42010017	Karɩndanyɩnɔ busaanhɩna a yaa hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a wusigə, ŋnɩ bʋr kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, baa zinəro wɔɔ lɛ si ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma."
42010018	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Sʋtaana yɩ, an a to brama an a da, am brama nyakɩ hɔ bɩ m.
42010019	Ba n nɩ: mɔɔ paŋŋa ka awɔɔ ʋ k'a tɔ mɩnnɔ ra kan bɔɔrɔrɔ kɩ kan jɩnnɔ paŋŋa kɩ haay, bɩ hɔsɩ bɩ barɛ awɔɔ nɩ y.
42010020	Bɩ, a b'a hɔɔn nyɔɔ zinəro kʋ ŋ y'awɔɔ lɛ si rɔ wɔɔ minto y. K'a heer nyɔɔ, kʋ Woso awɔɔ tɔrɔ gʋrsɩra ba arzana ʋ bɩ minto."
42010021	Lɛɛm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka heernyɔɔ gʋta n gasʋ Yeezuu ʋ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, brama kan tara kɩ Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ mim naa do nyaakʋm da hɔɔnzannɔ, kan hɔdonno kɩ m, ɩ b'a hɩnka gʋɔɔ poorero m. Sɩra m, m Zɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'a ŋʋa k'an nyɩnta ncɩnaaʋ."
42010022	"Mɔɔ Zɩ hɔ haay sa, an a ka mɔɔ ʋ, bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ an Nyɩ bɩ dɔ kʋ Zɩ bɩ bɛɛ bala y. Bɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ an Zɩ bɩ dɔ kʋ Nyɩ bɩ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ Nyɩ bɩ lɛ n taa k'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɛɛ bala y."
42010023	A n a bɔ, an dɩga karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ a minto, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm nɔ wɔɔ yɩm.
42010024	Bala, Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gʋta kan cinno kɩ a ŋʋa k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ yɩ, bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam bɩ ma, bɩ ŋ n a ma y."
42010025	Wosocikarɩnsaamba deem wuti an laaka da Yeezuu han, k'a nyasʋ meerbaa nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, bɔ mɔɔ m ga m m a ba, kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ?"
42010026	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Moyiisi lɛ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ, bɔ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba? Ɩbɩɩ y'a karɩnda bam lɔ?"
42010027	A n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "K'ɩ Zuuba ɩ Woso ŋʋa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, kan ɩ nyi kɩ haay, kan ɩ paŋŋa kɩ haay, kan ɩ hɔɔndarɛ kɩ haay. K'ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m."
42010028	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ nyɩ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa. A ba ncɩnaaʋ, ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ yɩm."
42010029	Bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaamba bɩ k'a lɛ n taa k'a gumə ka a mɩŋŋa ʋ bɩ, a Yeezuu lar, a ʋ: "Nka m mɔɔ mim nɩ?"
42010030	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta an a to Zerizalɛm ʋ, an nɩ tam Zeriko ʋ. Konno n aa da ma, ŋn'a huuro yɔ m, ŋn'a zɛ bannɔ m, ŋnɩ yaaba da ma, ŋn'a gʋ ma, an n'a bam k'a ga.
42010031	Wosocɛmannɩbər deem a to b'ʋ sɔ, an bʋr an nɩ cenim zaa bɩ do ra. A n gʋaa bɩ yɩ, an bɩr ma, an cem.
42010032	Wosocɛ zibəəzaa deem a to Zerizalɛm ʋ sɔ, an nɩ cenim b'ʋ. Levii do gʋaa m. A n gʋaa bɩ yɩ, an bɩr ma, an cem.
42010033	Bɩ, Samarii gʋaa deem y'a to zaa ra, an bɩ lee ku gʋaa bɩ zi. K'a a yɩ bɩ, a cicir a nyasʋ.
42010034	A n a zɔ ma, an a nyinno wɔɔ sʋrgɔ dɩvɛn m, an nyɔɔ nɔ ŋ ma, an pɛɛra burgu ma, an a busu, an a da a sisi ʋ, an ta m zaasənnocɛ ʋ, an aa nyɩsɩ ba m.
42010035	Dɔ k'a mɩ bɩ, a busoo bɔ ʋ bɔɔlʋgʋ hɩɩya, n n a ba wanzur m, an a ka zaasənnocɛ zaa b'ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: Dɩga a mim ma, bɩ k'ɩ busoo zar a kur, kʋ mɔɔ m wusigə, kʋ m b'a sompi a yaa ʋ.
42010036	Ɩbɩɩ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ, gʋaa kaakʋ naa bireyaa ʋ, nka m gʋaa kʋ konno a zɛ bɩ mim nɩ?"
42010037	Wosocikarɩnsaamba bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩ mɩŋŋabaa ba kan kɩ bɩ m." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "B'ɩbɩɩ sɔ, ta, ɩ ba maam sɔ."
42010038	Kʋ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ yaa gasʋ kʋ deem ʋ. Lʋ kʋ n n'a birm Martɩ bɩ ŋ si a har ʋ.
42010039	A dam n ta ʋ, a tɔ m Maarii, b'ɩ nyɩnta Zuuba bɩ taa, an n'a tʋr karɛ a meerbaa ma.
42010040	Martɩ nyɩnta an n'a tʋntɔŋ ʋ kan hɔbɩrɛ barɛ kɩ, zibəə gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ sɔ. A n bʋr, an b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ dam bɩ k'a mɔɔ to m deem, m nɩ ziro wɔɔ bam bɩ, a bɩr hɔsɩ barɛ ɩbɩɩ n na? A hɩ m k'an b'a da m han."
42010041	Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Martɩ, Martɩ, hɔ gʋta y'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔn ʋ, an n'ɩbɩɩ kɔm.
42010042	Deem bala m pakra. Maarii hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ bɔ ʋ, bɩ, gʋaa b'a yɔm nɩ y."
42011001	Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu nyɩnta an nɩ yaa dam bɩncɛ niŋŋə ʋ. K'a yaa bɩ da an a nya bɩ, karɩndanyɩ deem a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, yaadarɛ dɩnda ʋ m, amba Zaan a dɩnda a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m bɩ m."
42011002	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ɩ yaa dam, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Zɩ, a ka kʋ n n'ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa dɔ Woso a deem, k'ɩ cirbəə n bʋr.
42011003	Wɔɔ dɔmɩm biyəə hɔbɩrɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ,
42011004	k'ɩ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ, amba wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ y'a sugur kam bɔɔ ɩ kʋrɔma kan wɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m. Ɩ b'a ka, ʋ ʋ do makra nɔ ʋ y."
42011005	Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ kara hannyɩ n ta ʋ, an ta an aa hɩ m dibsir ma, a ʋ: 'M hannyɩ, bur zɩm sa m m kaakʋ,
42011006	mɔɔ hannyɩ deem y'a to zaa ra an bʋr mɔɔ zi, bɩ hɔsɩ ba mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ʋ y.'
42011007	Bɔ n nɩ cɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ mɔɔ kɔ y. Mɔɔ cɛ lɛ ta. Mɔɔ kan m nyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ wʋtam. Mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m wuti, m bur ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ y.'
42011008	Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: baa k'a b'a dam ma, an wuti an a ka ʋ a hannyɩbaa bɩ minto, a wutire an hɔ haay k'a lɛ n taa bɩ ka ʋ, k'a lɛ baa k'an a kɔ bɩ tɔ ma."
42011009	"Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: K'a hɔ yɛ, n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ. K'a ka, awɔɔ y'a yɩm. K'a cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʋrɛ awɔɔ m.
42011010	Bala, gʋaa k'a hɔ yɛ, n y'a kaŋ ʋ, gʋaa k'a ka, a y'a yɩm, gʋaa k'a cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʋrɛ a zaa m.
42011011	Zɩ bɩ kara n n'awɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ, a nyɩ n zɔ yɛ han an mɩm sa an a ka ʋ?
42011012	Gɛɛ a n a ya, an jir yɛ, bɩ n bɔɔrɔ sa an a ka ʋ?
42011013	K'awɔɔ n gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ hɔ mɩŋŋa ka a nyɩnɔ ʋ dɔ. Bɩ Zɩ Woso k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ, a bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a yɛm han rɔ wɔɔ ʋ an lɛ da ra?"
42011014	Yeezuu ɩ lam zinə k'a gʋaa ba bəətir bɩ la. Bɩ, zinə bɩ k'a bɔ bɩ, bəətir b'ɩ meer bam, zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə.
42011015	Bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ a hɩ, ŋ ʋ, la Yeezuu n nawʋm zinəro wɔɔ ra, zinəro cir Bɛlzebul paŋŋa m.
42011016	Gɔsɩnnɔ lɛ n taa k'a Yeezuu makra ba a dɩga a, ŋn'a yɛm han k'an a ka kʋ makra n a to arzana ʋ k'a yɩ.
42011017	Bɩ Yeezuu ŋ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ yɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ cirbəə deem zannɔ wuti ŋn'ɩ yar bam kan kʋ kɩ, a da an nawʋm, a cɛrɔ wɔɔ n a dɩnda kʋ ra sɔ.
42011018	K'awɔɔ ʋ, Bɛlzebul paŋŋa minto y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra bɩ, kʋ Sʋtaana a bɔ an nɩ yar bam kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ sɔ, a cirbəə bɩ nyɩntam lɔ?
42011019	Kʋ Bɛlzebul minto y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra, awɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ, la ŋ nawʋrɛ ŋ la, nka tɔ ma? Awɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n n'awɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm.
42011020	Bɩ kʋ la mɔɔ nawʋm zinəro wɔɔ ra kan Woso wɔ paŋŋa kɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ: Woso cirbəə b'ɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi.
42011021	Kʋ gʋaa paŋŋazaa ɩ dɔrɛ a har ma kan a yarbaa mɔrlɔ kɩ, hɔsɩ bɩ bam hɔ k'an ta m bɩ nɩ y.
42011022	Bɩ kʋ paŋŋazaa vanta bʋr a paŋŋa n lɛ da ra, an b'a nyasʋ an a da ra, an a yarbaa mɔrlɔ k'a ŋ ka a ma rɔ wɔɔ yɔ nɩ, hɔ k'an ta m bɩ gʋr an nawʋm an a jir.
42011023	Gʋaa k'a ba kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ, mɔɔ jɩm m. Gʋaa k'a bɩr a dam mɔɔ han an a so kʋ ma bɩ, a hɩsɩga an nawʋm."
42011024	"Kʋ zinə bɔ gʋaa mɛ ʋ, bɩmbɩr an nawʋm zaŋŋa ʋ an n'a kam mɛnyɔɔ darɛ bɩncɛ ma. K'a n a yɩ y, a y'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yɩ m wusigəm, m ta m har gusire ʋ, bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ m bɔ ʋ bɩ.
42011025	K'a a wusigə bɩ, a yaa dɩga a, n y'a waa, n n'a banka mɩŋŋa.
42011026	A n a bɔ an ta, an aa zinəro gaa saanhɩna, ŋ bʋnyaabaa n lɛ da ra, ŋnɩ bɩ gasʋ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ. Bɩ gʋaa bɩ do bʋnyaabaa lɛ da m biisi ra."
42011027	Yeezuu k'a meer ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, lʋ deem a leer busu an meer ba zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazaa m lʋ k'a ɩbɩɩ yɩ durnya ʋ, an nyɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ m."
42011028	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam Woso lemim ma, ŋn'a lɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ m."
42011029	Zamaa bɩ k'a a so kʋ ma bɩ, Yeezuu y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ m, makra ŋn'a kam ma. Bɩ kʋ makra bɩ nɩ, ŋ bɩ makra vanta yɩm kʋ Zonas makra bɩ bɛɛ y.
42011030	Bala, Zonas k'a nyɩnta makra Niniivɩ gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyɩntam makra sɔ her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ minto.
42011031	Woso dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, lʋcir k'a a to jɩsadɔpaasɩ ʋ bɩ wutim kan her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔ m kɩ an ŋ dʋdɔ yar, bala, a to a ʋ durnya lɛ cɩnta jɛ ʋ, k'a b'a tʋr ka mindor Salomɔɔn lemim ma. Bɩ, bɔ ɩ lɛ da Salomɔɔn m b'ɩ naa ʋ.
42011032	Dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, Niniivɩ gʋɔɔ wutim kan her gʋɔɔ nɔɔ m kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yar, bala, kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka hɔ kʋ Zonas a hɩ bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ a taam. Bɔ ɩ lɛ da Zonas ra b'ɩ naa ʋ."
42011033	"Gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da y, gɛɛ, an a nyɔɔ kasɩ taa y. A cɩnta n nawʋm hɔ burə ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋm nɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛgure bɩ yɩ.
42011034	Ɩbɩɩ mɛsim fɩtɩrɛ bɩ, mɩnyaa m. K'ɩbɩɩ mɩnyaa mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ mɛsim bɩ haay b'ɩ lɛɛgure ʋ. Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ mɩnyaa bɩ mɩŋŋa y, ɩbɩɩ mɛsim b'ɩ monsigə ʋ sɔ.
42011035	Dundo ɩ zi kan lɛɛgure k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ kɩ, ɩ b'a ka, an a ba monsigə y.
42011036	K'ɩbɩɩ mɛsim haay ɩ lɛɛgure ʋ, bɩ monsigə poore ba ʋ tɔkkɛ, a haay nyɩntam lɛɛgure ʋ amba fɩtɩrɛ k'a nɩ lɛɛ bɔrɛ a ʋ, an nɩ lɛɛgure kam bɩ m."
42011037	Yeezuu k'a nɩ meer bam bɩ, farizɛn deem a bir a har ʋ k'an bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ. A n gasʋ, k'a hɔ bɩ.
42011038	Farizɛn bɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'a n a wɔ hir amba n tɩr a ba bɩ, a zɛ kədə.
42011039	Zuuba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɩga, awɔɔ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ, hɛ kan laaga kɩ kur awɔɔ n'a sʋrgɔm, koorbaa n bɔkarɛ an awɔɔ heer han kan kʋsɩrabaa kɩ.
42011040	Hɔɔnwarzannɔ n'awɔɔ m! Gʋaa k'a kur bɩ ba bɩ, a bɛɛ y'a nɔ bɩ ba sɔ ra?
42011041	Bɩ, k'a hɔ ka cicirzannɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n n'a bam kɛɛrɛ bɩ haay yɩm mɩŋŋa awɔɔ ma.
42011042	A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, farizɛɛnrɔ ra! Bala, ganwʋrɛ bu hɔ awɔɔ n'a kam kan mantɩ, poobur kɩ, kan hɔ haay k'a nɩ haanm brikəro ʋ bɩ kɩ. A bɔkarɛ a kaanm Woso tɩrgabaa bɩ m kan a ŋʋarɛ bɩ kɩ m. Bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m, a ba, a bɔɔ ɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ ba sɔ.
42011043	A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, farizɛɛnrɔ ra! Awɔɔ ɩ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ yaadarɛrɔ ŋʋa daasɩrɔ ʋ.
42011044	A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gəənoyaarɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tɔrɛ ŋ la, bɩ ŋ bɩr a dɔrɛ y."
42011045	Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ deem a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ sʋnsɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a wʋm sɔ."
42011046	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɔ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ ra, a pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ mɔrlɔ gorezannɔ kam gʋɔɔ ra, b'awɔɔ bɔkarɛ, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bɩr a nyʋkʋr deem taan••• dam mɔrlɔ wɔɔ duro ma y.
42011047	A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ yaarɔ dɔm bɩ minto, b'awɔɔ zɩrɔ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
42011048	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ a ʋ, awɔɔ yɛ ŋ zibəə bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ yɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, awɔɔ m bʋr an nɩ ŋ yaarɔ bɩmbankam.
42011049	Bɩ y'a ka Woso n a hɩ a mindɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kan m zibəəzannɔ kɩ nyɔɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛrɛ ŋ barla, ŋnɩ zibəə bʋnyaa ba gɔsɩnnɔ m.
42011050	Bɩ minto bɩ, ŋ her gʋɔɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋrm, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ haay kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ hallɩ durnya darɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma lore minto.
42011051	A n a sa Abɛl ma lore ma, an ta m Zakarii k'a ga Wosocɛ ʋ, mannɩjaa bɩ kan bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ kɩ bire ʋ. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro hʋnhʋrm minno nɔɔn duro minto.
42011052	A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ ra, awɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ cɛlɛnyɩ sa a nyaakʋm da. Awɔɔ n gasʋ a zim y, a bɔkarɛ an n'a nyam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ taa k'a gasʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ."
42011053	Yeezuu k'a bɔ b'ʋ bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ wuti ŋn'ɩ tatʋr bam kan nɔmaa kɩ, ŋn'ɩ laakarɔ do haay dɩndam han.
42011054	Ŋ n'ɩ dundom zi k'a ku a nyasʋ, a meerbaa deem nɔ ʋ.
42012001	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ dɔrɛ ba ʋ a zɛ kʋ ra, hallɩ ŋn'ɩ tʋntɔm kʋ ra. Yeezuu n a sa, an n'a dɩndam a karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: "A n lɛ da haay bɩ, k'a dundo a zi kan farizɛɛnrɔ nyʋnyɔɔ kʋ zambʋ m bɩ kɩ.
42012002	Hɔ ba ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da, n b'a yɩrɛ y. Mim ba ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da, n b'a dɔrɛ y.
42012003	Hɔ k'awɔɔ hɩ monsigə ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a mam lɛɛgure ʋ. Awɔɔ n a hɩ tʋr ʋ cɛ ʋ bɩ, n bɔm garga ra ŋn'a hɩ."
42012004	"A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, m hannyɩnɔ: A bɩ nyi ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɛsim zɛm gər, bɩ, ŋ b'a dam hɔsɩ ma ŋn'a ba bɩ jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
42012005	Hɔ k'awɔɔ a ga m a nyi ba m bɩ, kʋ m a hɩnka a m: K'a nyi ba Woso k'a a da ma an gər zɛ, bɩ jɛ ʋ an a da ma, an ɩ gasʋ sɛhar ʋ bɩ m. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m a nyi ba m.
42012006	N bɩr bɛnnɔ nyɩnɔ hɛɛnm soor, k'a tanka hɩɩya yɩ ra? Bɩ deem taan••• tɔ bɩr bɔm Woso nɔ ʋ y.
42012007	B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ minkə bɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ sa haay. A da bɩ bɔ y, awɔɔ jɩra bɛnnɔ nyɩnɔ m jilli."
42012008	"A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ gʋaa kasɛtɩ ka gʋɔɔ taa, a ʋ, mɔɔ gʋaa n'a mɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ y'a kasɛtɩ kam Woso malɛɛkarɔ taa sɔ.
42012009	Bɩ kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ taa, mɔɔ bɩsɩ kam ma Woso malɛɛkarɔ taa sɔ.
42012010	Gʋaa k'a meerbaa bʋnyaa ba Gʋaanyɩ bɩ ma, a y'a sugur yɩm. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a meerbaa bʋnyaa ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma, a b'a sugur yɩrɛ y.
42012011	Kʋ ŋ bʋr, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ awɔɔ m yaadarɛcɛrɔ ʋ, gɛɛ cinno taa, gɛɛ taralɛɛzannɔ taa, a b'a heer kɔ kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a hɩm k'a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔm bɩ kɩ y.
42012012	Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, a hɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ."
42012013	Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, a hɩ mɔɔ danyɩ bɩ m k'an wɔɔ zɩ arzaka niŋŋə k'a a to bɩ jir kan mɔɔ kɩ."
42012014	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Nka ɩ lɛ ka kʋ mɔɔ n nyɩnta awɔɔ dʋdɔkarɛzaa gɛɛ awɔɔ hɔjirlezaa?"
42012015	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kan arzaka ŋʋarɛ kɩ. Bala, gʋaa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ bɩr zum kʋ ʋ kan a arzaka kɩ y, baa kʋ arzakazaa m."
42012016	A n hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Arzakazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a hɔsɩra n hɔ ba mɩŋŋa.
42012017	A n n'a hɔɔn darɛ a heer ʋ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ y'a bam lɔ? Bala, bɩncɛ ba mɔɔ ʋ, m nɩ m hɔyaa bɩ zarŋ ʋ y.
42012018	A n n'a hɩ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ ba n nɩ: kʋ m m sɩrɔ wɔɔ zɔ haay, m ŋ banka m ŋ dɔ gʋta-gʋta, m m hɔyaa bɩ zar ʋ kan m arzaka bɩ kɩ.
42012019	Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ m mɩŋŋa m, mɔɔ ʋ: Ba ɩ n nɩ arzaka gʋta m na, dɔɔraa hɔka-hɔka minto. Mɛnyɔɔ da, hɔ bɩ, ɩ hɔ mi, k'ɩ heer nyɔɔ.
42012020	Bɩ, Woso a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Hɔɔnwarzaa ra, ɩbɩɩ gam gum naa ʋ. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ banka haay bɩ, nka n n'a sarɛ?'
42012021	Ncɩnaaʋ m kan gʋaa k'a arzaka gʋr an n'a kuntəre a mɩŋŋa tɔ ma, an bɔkarɛ hɔntazaa bɛɛ m Woso mɩm ʋ y."
42012022	Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: "Naa minto y'a ka mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a b'a heer kɔ kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a bɩm k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba bɩ mim kɩ y, a b'a heer kɔ kan huu k'awɔɔ n n'a dure a ma bɩ mim kɩ sɔ y.
42012023	Bala, mɩsɩrbaa lɛ da hɔbɩrɛ m, mɛsim n lɛ da huu m.
42012024	K'a dɩga kaakaarɔ ma, ŋ bɩr hɔ duure y, bɩ ŋ bɩr a darɛ y. Ŋ ba hɔbɩrɛ kuntəjɩ nɩ y, ŋ ba sɩ m sɔ y. Bɩ Woso yɩ ŋ tʋrm. Awɔɔ jɩra bɛnnɔ m gallɛm hɔka!
42012025	Gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ, an n'a dam ma, an a mɩsɩrbaa nyɔɔ lɛɛ poore a heerkɔrɛ minto?
42012026	K'awɔɔ b'a dam a poore bɩ barɛ ma bɩ, bɔ minto m, awɔɔ n n'a heer kɔm kan bɔ ɩ gɔɔta haay bɩ kɩ?
42012027	K'a dɩga burvuro kʋ ŋ nɩ haanm hɔsɩra ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋ bɩr lannɩ nɔɔrɛ, ŋ bɩr huu barɛ y, bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Salomɔɔn kan a cirbəə bɩ kɩ, a n huuro gʋɛrɛrɔ yɩ an burvuro nɔɔn duro deem nɩ y.
42012028	Kʋ Woso ɩ bur gʋɛrɛ dam ma ncɩnaaʋ her, booti m kʋ sɛ n a bɩ, a bɩ dɩgarɛ awɔɔ mim ma gʋta an lɛ da ra, sɩrakarɛ poore zannɔ ra?
42012029	B'awɔɔ, a b'a mɩŋŋa da kɔrɛ ma a a ka hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a bɩm, kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a mim bɩ kɩ ma y.
42012030	Naa haay naa, durnya gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yaa dam nɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋ ma. B'awɔɔ Zɩ Woso a dɔ a ʋ, a zibəə ta awɔɔ ma.
42012031	Bɩ, k'a ka Woso cirbəə bɩ ma. A n nɩ bɔ ɩ gɔɔta bɩ darɛ awɔɔ m la."
42012032	"Awɔɔ k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔbɩsɩ cir poore kɩ bɩ, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Bala, a awɔɔ Zɩ bɩ nɔ yɩ, k'a a cirbəə bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ."
42012033	"K'a hɔ k'an ta awɔɔ ʋ bɩ hɛɛ, a ka cicirzannɔ ʋ. K'a a ka busoohɛra k'a bɩr zarm bɩ ma, kan arzaka k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ kɩ. B'ʋ bɩ, ŋ nyaanlɛ ba ʋ y. Konno b'a dam ma ŋn'a sa, bɛɛ b'a dam ma an a bɩ y.
42012034	Bala, bɩncɛ k'awɔɔ arzaka bɩ n ta ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ heer bɩ, b'an ta ʋ sɔ."
42012035	"K'a hɔsoaʋ sa, a so a ʋ, k'a sɛ da a fɩtɩrɛ ʋ.
42012036	K'a a ba amba zibəənyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ dɔm a harzaa k'a ta harcɩntarɛ cibsa ma rɔ wɔɔ m. Kʋ harzaa b'a bɔ an nɩ zɛrɛ, k'a bɩ lee ku an cɛlɛ zɛ, k'a gʋ m.
42012037	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m zibəənyɩnɔ nɔɔn duro m, kʋ ŋ harzaa bɩ bʋr, an bɩ dɩga a ŋ n hinceem ba y. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a y'a hɔsoaʋ sarɛ, an a so a ʋ an ŋ nyɩnta hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, an hɔbɩrɛ sa a zim an b'a ka ŋ ʋ.
42012038	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, k'a bɔ an bʋr dibsir ma gɛɛ dɔmɩrɛ m, a n a ya, an bɩ dɩga a ŋ n hinceem ba y.
42012039	K'a mim naa do jɩ ma mɩŋŋa. Kʋ harzaa bɩ, kʋ koor zɛrɛ dɔmɩm a dɔ, a b'a tom an gasʋ a cɛ ʋ y.
42012040	Awɔɔ sɔ, k'a a banka mɩŋŋa. Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'awɔɔ bɩr a hɔɔn dam ma b'ʋ."
42012041	Pɩyɛɛr n a lar, a ʋ: "Zuuba, wɔɔ minto ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do dam gɛɛ, gʋaa haay minto nɩ?"
42012042	Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Nka m zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa, a hɔɔn n ta ʋ? Bɔ harzaa lɛ ka ʋ k'an dɩga a har bɩ mim ma, k'an hɔbɩrɛ ka a muno wɔɔ ʋ dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a a ga m b'ʋ bɩ m.
42012043	Mimbirenyɩntazaa m zibəənyɩ bɩ do m, kʋ harzaa a wusigə, an bʋr a har ʋ, an bɩ dɩga a a y'a zibəə lɛ ra.
42012044	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, harzaa bɩ y'a dɔm a arzaka bɩ haay ma.
42012045	Bɩ kʋ zibəənyɩ bɩ do a hɩ a heer ʋ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ harzaa bɩ bɩr zɛm zɔɔ y, an wuti an n'a zibəənyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ zɛrɛ, kan zibəənyɩlʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ hɔ bɩrɛ an nɩ hɔ mire a mɩm nɩ durgəre.
42012046	Zibəənyɩ bɩ do harzaa bɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr hin niŋŋə k'a n a hɔɔn da ma b'ʋ, kan wakatɩ k'a n a dɔ a ʋ a zɛm bɩ kɩ ʋ. A lam la, an fɩr ka ma mɩŋŋa, an a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr zum Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla.
42012047	Zibəənyɩ k'a hɔ k'a harzaa lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ bɩ, b'a bɩr a mɩŋŋa bankam, b'a bɩr bɩ hɔɔnhɔ barɛ, a zɛrɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa.
42012048	Bɩ bɔ ɩ nɩ hɔ k'a harzaa lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ an bɔkarɛ an nɩ zi k'a a ga zɛrɛ m bam bɩ, a bɩ zɛrɛ yɩm gʋta y. Bɩ bɔ n y'a ka ʋ gʋta bɩ, n y'a laaka dam han gʋta. Bɔ n y'a ka ʋ gʋta k'an dɔ ma bɩ, n y'a sim han gʋta sɔ."
42012049	"Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ sɛ m tara burə ʋ. A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm paan••• k'an yɔ.
42012050	Fɩryɩrɛ n ta ʋ an nɩ mɔɔ yɩm. A gore ta ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ, b'a mɔɔ ku an nya.
42012051	A hɔɔn awɔɔ n'a darɛ a ʋ laafɩɩ mɔɔ bʋr m tara burə ʋ ra? Ayy•••, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ gʋngʋ kʋ ma m.
42012052	Bala, naa ma kɛɛrɛ naa, kʋ gʋaa soor ɩ har deem ʋ, ŋ y'a gʋngʋm kʋ ma, gʋaa kaakʋ y'a gʋm gʋaa hɩɩya ma, gʋaa hɩɩya n a gʋ gʋaa kaakʋ ma.
42012053	Zɩ y'a gʋrɛ a nyɩ ma, nyɩ n a gʋ a zɩ ma. Da y'a gʋrɛ a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ ma, nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ n a gʋ a da ma. Da y'a gʋrɛ a nyar ma, nyar y'a gʋrɛ a da ma."
42012054	A n a ya, an a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ warkʋ yɩ an jɩm meer ʋ, b'awɔɔ hɩ lɛɛm a ʋ: la n nɩ zɛm, b'a kʋ yɩm maam.
42012055	K'awɔɔ hɩnhɛr yɩ an a to jɩsadɔpaasɩ an nɩ hɔnrɛ, b'awɔɔ ʋ lɛɛ ma m, b'a kʋ yɩm maam.
42012056	Zambʋzannɔ ra, awɔɔ ba lɔ a brama kan tara kɩ minno dɔ, a bɔkarɛ a n dɔmɩm k'an ta ʋ dɩɩtaa naa mim dɔ?"
42012057	"Bɔ m sɔ b'awɔɔ bɩr hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ dʋdɔ karɛ a zim nɩ y?
42012058	K'ɩbɩɩ jɩm ɩ tarɛ ɩ m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ tɔ ʋ a kʋ ma zaa ra, k'a bɩ ta ɩ m dʋdɔkər taa y, kʋ dʋdɔkər bɩ b'ɩbɩɩ ka lɔnnɔdɔmazannɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ y.
42012059	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: N b'ɩbɩɩ bɔm lɔnnɔcɛ b'ʋ k'ɩbɩɩ n zɩm bɩ ka haay ɩ nya y. Baa tanka deem bɩ gɔɔtarɛ y."
42013001	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ Galilee gʋɔɔ kʋ Pɩlatɩ a ka ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ ŋ mannɩbarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ mim hɩ Yeezuu m.
42013002	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, Galilee zannɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ naa mimbʋnyaabənno gʋtɔɔ m ŋnɩ lɛ da Galilee gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ ra gɛ?
42013003	Ayy•••, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam y, gɩnga awɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ.
42013004	Bɩ, gʋaa bueeresinnyə kʋ Silowee cɛjintə a da ŋ la, an ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, mimbʋnyaabənno m an lɛ da Zerizalɛm gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ ra gɛ?
42013005	Ayy•••, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam y, gɩnga awɔɔ nawʋm haay am brɔɔ hɔ bɩ m."
42013006	Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a sɔɔn n ta ʋ a dɩvɛnsɩra ʋ. A n bʋr k'a b'a bɔ, b'a n bɩ hɔsɩ yɩ y.
42013007	A n a hɩ hɔsɩra zibəəzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: A dɔɔraa kaakʋ hɔ m naa, mɔɔ n tɩr bʋr kʋ m b'a bɔ, bɩ mɔɔ n tɩr a nyɩ yɩ y. A da! Bɔ m an tara si an a so ʋ b'a zibəə ba ʋ y?
42013008	Bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Karɩnsaamba, ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ to dɔɔraa deem, kʋ m yaa hɔn, m a bɩr ma, kʋ m buundi da ma.
42013009	A a da ma, an bɩ nyɩ da dɔɔraa m, k'a bʋr a n nyɩ da y, k'ɩ ka kʋ n n'a da."
42013010	Yeezuu nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ dɩndam sokʋmacɛ ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ.
42013011	Lʋ ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ zinə n a ka, an a huŋŋu a dɔɔraa bueeresinnyə hɔ m naa. A b'a dam ma an jɩm brama tɩrga y.
42013012	Yeezuu k'a a yɩ bɩ, a a bir, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Lʋ, ɩ ɩ waa, ɩ yaaba bɩ nya."
42013013	A n a wɔ ka a mim la. Lɛɛm bɩ, lʋ b'a ba tɩrga, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
42013014	Sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ k'a a yɩ Yeezuu n lʋ bɩ waa sabaa hinni ʋ bɩ, a nɔ ma ʋ. A meerbaa bɩ si, an a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ n ta ʋ, gʋɔɔ n a da ma, ŋnɩ zi ba. Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro awɔɔ a ga m, a bʋr, ŋn'a waa, sabaa hinni ʋ bɛɛ y."
42013015	Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zambʋzannɔ ra! Awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə bɩr a der zarm, gɛɛ, a bra, k'a yaa ka hi ma sabaa hinni ʋ ra?
42013016	Bɩ lʋ naa do Abraham yaŋŋa m, zinə n yaaba da ma a dɔɔraa bueeresinnyə hɔ m naa, sabaa hinni bɛɛ a a ga m, n n a bɔ bar ma ra?"
42013017	K'a naa hɩ bɩ, nyannɩ a jɩnnɔ wɔɔ haay nyasʋ. Zamaa bɩ n'a heer nyɔɔm kan zibəə gʋtɔɔ haay k'a n'a bam bɩ kɩ.
42013018	A a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan bɔ kɩ? A makra mɔɔ n'a bam kan bɔ kɩ?
42013019	Bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan mutardɩ yaa kʋ gʋaa n'a sam, an n'a duum a brikə ʋ bɩ kɩ. A n haan, an a ba gɔ gʋta, bɛnnɔ nɩ cɛ kɩnkarɛ a vəŋŋəro ma."
42013020	A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ makra mɔɔ n'a bam kan bɔ kɩ?
42013021	A makra mɔɔ n'a bam kan nyʋnyɔɔ kʋ lʋ n'a sam, an n'a warm kʋ ma kan koŋŋo kaakʋ nyisi kɩ, an nɩ derm haay."
42013022	Yeezuu bɔ kʋrɔ ʋ kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ kɩ ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam, an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm zeezi.
42013023	Gʋaa deem n a lar, a ʋ: "Zuuba, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ gʋta nɩ?"
42013024	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a a tɔ ʋ k'a gasʋ hallɛ poore bɩ m. Bala, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ gʋta y'a kam ma k'a gasʋ m, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma y.
42013025	Kʋ harzaa bɩ bɩ wuti, an hallɛ bɩ ta, awɔɔ gɔɔtam garga ra, awɔɔ ba n bɩr cɛlɛ zɛrɛ, a bɩr a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Zuuba, cɛlɛ gʋ wɔɔ m. A y'a nyɩ bɔrɛ awɔɔ nʋ, a ʋ: Awɔɔ, mɔɔ n awɔɔ tojɩ dɔ y.
42013026	Awɔɔ y'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: Wɔɔ hɔ bɩ, ʋ hɔ mi kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ. Ɩbɩɩ hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m, ʋ daasɩrɔ ʋ.
42013027	B'a y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, a ʋ: Mɔɔ n awɔɔ tojɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ, k'a a gaa mɔɔ ma, awɔɔ haay k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ bam bɩ.
42013028	K'awɔɔ bɩ Abraham kan Izakkɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ yɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ, kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ awɔɔ n nɩ garga ra, a nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma baadarɛ kan sɔ sʋrɛ kɩ.
42013029	Gʋɔɔ y'a tom dɔjɩr kan meer kɩ ʋ, jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ nyɩnta ŋnɩ hɔ bɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
42013030	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, jɛzannɔ nyɩntam lɛɛkarɛzannɔ, lɛɛkarɛzannɔ n nyɩnta jɛzannɔ."
42013031	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ b'a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ta bɩncɛ vanta ʋ. Hɩrɔɔdɩ y'a kam ma k'a ɩbɩɩ zɛ."
42013032	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa hɩ pooji naa do m: mɔɔ ɩ lam zinəro ra, m nɩ gʋɔɔ waam, her kan booti kɩ zizer kɩ, an nya.
42013033	Bɩ pakra m kʋ m ta lɛɛ her, kan booti kɩ zizer kɩ. Bala wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa b'a dam ma an ga bɩncɛ vanta ʋ kʋ Zerizalɛm nɔ bɛɛ y."
42013034	"Zerizalɛm, Zerizalɛm, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ zɩnzɛm, ɩ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ bɩmbam jaarɔ m bɩ. Gallɛm karɔ, mɔɔ ŋʋa kʋ m ɩ nyɩnɔ so kʋ ma, amba kʋr tɩr a nyɩnɔ so kʋ ma a za taa bɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ n yɛ?
42013035	Dɩga! Woso y'a bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ y, an ta an dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba Woso tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ.' "
42014001	Yeezuu gasʋ farizɛɛnrɔ jɩtaarɛ deem har ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ. Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ nɩ dundom zi.
42014002	Gʋaa deem ɩ bɩ jɩm Yeezuu lɛɛ, a mɛ n hɩnhanrɛ.
42014003	Yeezuu n a hɩ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ m kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ k'ʋ yaabazaa waa sabaa hinni ʋ gɛɛ, zaa ba ʋ y?"
42014004	Ŋ nɩ zɛ pi. Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Yeezuu n yaabazaa bɩ gaa, an a waa, an a da zaa ra.
42014005	Bɩ kur bɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ, a nyɩ, gɛɛ, a der n a da hiyəə ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ, a bɩ bra sire, an a bɔ ʋ lɛɛm nɩ?"
42014006	Bɩ ŋ n a da ma ŋn'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ y.
42014007	Yeezuu k'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ bir hɔbɩrɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ bʋmbɔŋ ʋ bɩ, a hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
42014008	"Kʋ gʋaa ɩbɩɩ bir harcɩntarɛ cibsa ma, ɩ b'aa nyɩnta lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ y. Bala, a a da ma, a gʋaa vanta bir, an lɛ da ɩbɩɩ ra.
42014009	Gʋaa k'awɔɔ bir bɩ, a b'a ka, an b'a hɩ awɔɔ gʋaa hɩɩya bɩ m, a ʋ: toore ka ɩ mim b'ʋ y. Ɩbɩɩ zɛm bɩ wuti kan nyannɩ kɩ, ɩ ta jɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
42014010	Bɩ kʋ n y'ɩbɩɩ bir hɔbɩrɛ ma, k'ɩ yaa nyɩnta jɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, gʋaa k'a ɩbɩɩ bir bɩ, k'a bɩ bʋr, a y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, a ʋ: M hannyɩ, ɩ zɔ lɛɛ bɩncɛ b'ʋ. A nyɩntarɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ busure gʋaa haay kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ bɩrɛ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ rɔ kɩ lɛɛ.
42014011	Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa busum bɩ, n y'a zerm, bɔ n'a mɩŋŋa zerm bɩ, n y'a busum."
42014012	A n a hɩ gʋaa k'a a bir bɩ m sɔ, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ sinuu hɔbɩrɛ ba gɛɛ gunuu hɔ, ɩ b'ɩ hannyɩnɔ, gɛɛ, ɩ dogʋɔɔ, gɛɛ ɩ cɩsɔnnɔ arzakazannɔ kɩ bir y. Kʋ n bɛɛ, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ birm sɔ a zɩm ma, ŋn'a so a yaa ʋ.
42014013	Bɩ, k'ɩ cibsa hɔbɩrɛ ba, k'ɩ cicirzannɔ, paŋŋawarzannɔ, lʋgɔrɔ, bʋʋrɔ kɩ bir,
42014014	b'a nyɩntam mimbirenyɩnta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, bala, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋ n a ba, ŋ n a so a yaa ʋ y. Bala, Woso naa sompire ɩbɩɩ m, gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ."
42014015	Gʋaa deem k'a nyɩnta b'ʋ an naa haay ma bɩ, a a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ m."
42014016	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa deem ɩ nyɩnta an cibsa gʋta hɔbɩrɛ ba. A n zamaa bir gʋta kʋ ŋ nɩ b'a bɩ.
42014017	Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ, a a zibəənyɩ nyɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ bir hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ zi, a ʋ: K'a bʋr kɛɛrɛ, n hɔ haay banka, an nya.
42014018	Ŋ haay n a lɛ ba deem, ŋ ʋ: a b'a dam ma y. Lɛɛkarɛ zaa bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: hɔsɩra mɔɔ si, pakra m kʋ m ta, m aa dɩga a. Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ sugur ba m ma.
42014019	A vanta n a hɩ, a ʋ: Dono mɔɔ n si bu, kʋ m aa nɩ ŋ makra ba ŋ dɩga a. Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han k'ɩ sugur ba m ma.
42014020	A vanta n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: lʋ mɔɔ sa daa, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m bʋr y.
42014021	Zibəənyɩ bɩ k'a a wusigə bɩ, a yaa naa hɩ a harzaa bɩ m. Harzaa bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: ta zɔɔ-zɔɔ kʋ bɩ daasɩrɔ ʋ, kan kʋ bɩ zaa bire rɔ kɩ, ɩ cicirzannɔ gaa kan paŋŋawarzannɔ kɩ, lʋgɔrɔ kɩ, bʋʋrɔ kɩ ɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ naa ʋ.
42014022	Zibəənyɩ bɩ n ta an a bɔ an bʋr an b'a hɩ, a ʋ: harzaa, ʋ lɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ka bɩ ba, bɩ lɛ gɔɔta.
42014023	Harzaa bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: ta zaa poorero wɔɔ ra kan brikəro kɩ, ɩ ɩ ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma ɩ gasʋ ŋ nɩ, kʋ lɛ bɩ gɔɔta mɔɔ har b'ʋ y.
42014024	Bala, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ n bir lɔ wɔɔ, gʋaa deem taan••• ba ʋ an nɩ mɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ darɛ a lɛ ʋ y."
42014025	Bɩ jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta zu Yeezuu ʋ. A n a bɔ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
42014026	"Kʋ gʋaa bʋr mɔɔ zi, a n mɔɔ ŋʋa an lɛ da a zɩ ra, kan a da kɩ, a lʋ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ, a cɛmbɔɔ kɩ, a danlʋrɔ kɩ, baa kan a mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa kɩ, a b'a dam ma an nyɩnta mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ y.
42014027	Gʋaa k'a bɩr a gɔdarkʋra busure an nɩ zum mɔɔ jɛ ʋ, a b'a dam ma an nyɩnta mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ y.
42014028	Kʋ sɩra nɩ, gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ a lɛ n taa k'a cɛ gʋta dɔ, a n lɛɛ ka an nyɩnta, an busoo k'a n'a bɩm bɩ lɛ zɛ, an a dɔ, k'a cɛ bɩ dɔm gɛ ra?
42014029	Kʋ bɩ bɛɛ, k'a lɛɛ ka an a jɩr cɩnta b'a b'a dam ma an a nyambʋr y, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a yɩm bɩ, ŋ yaa wʋm ma,
42014030	ŋnɩ bɩr a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: Ba gʋaa cɛ dɔrɛ sɩŋŋɩda sa na, b'a n a nyambʋr na.
42014031	Gɛɛ cir bɔ n ta ʋ, k'a ɩ tam k'a yaa yar ba kan cir vanta kɩ, a n lɛɛ ka an nyɩnta an dɩga, k'a y'a dam ma kan gʋaa tisi bu kɩ, a yar ba kan gʋaa k'a nɩ gʋaa m tisi buhɩra bɩ kɩ gɛ?
42014032	Kʋ bɩ bɛɛ, cir deem bɩ k'a gɔɔta an laatʋ bɩ, a gʋaa deem nyɔɔ n zi, an aa laafɩɩ mim dɩnda kan kɩ.
42014033	Ncɩnaaʋ sɔ bɩ, awɔɔ bire ʋ kʋ gʋaa lɛ baa k'a wɔ saa hɔ k'an ta m bɩ ma, a b'a dam ma an nyɩnta mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ y."
42014034	"Sɩra m, yɛ k'an naa, hɔ mɩŋŋa m. Bɩ kʋ yɛ nyɩntabaa bɩ bɔ, bɔ n'a yarɛ an bʋr a nyɩntabaa bɩ nɩ?
42014035	A bɩ mɩŋŋa tara minto, b'a bɩ yɩm buundi sɔ y. A lo n nawʋm garga ra. Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m k'an a ma."
42015001	Yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ haay a zɔ Yeezuu ma, k'a a tʋr ka ma.
42015002	Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ nɩ kukur barɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do ɩ mimbʋnyaabənno sim, an nɩ hɔ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ."
42015003	Bɩ Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
42015004	"Gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ, a seero n ta ʋ zɔrɔ, deem n nyaam, a bɩ bunɛɛhʋ a yaa n nɛɛhʋ rɔ wɔɔ tom a hɔbɩjɩ ʋ, an ta an aa a ka deem bɩ ma, an tolle ba an a yɩ?
42015005	Bɩ, k'a a yɩ, a busu an nawʋm kan heernyɩnta kɩ a kɔɔn ra.
42015006	K'a lee ku har ʋ, an a hannyɩnɔ so kʋ ma kan a cɩsɔnnɔ kɩ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: k'a heer nyɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bala mɔɔ m ser k'a nyaam bɩ yɩ.
42015007	A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, heernyɔɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ gʋta arzana ʋ, mimbʋnyaabər deem k'a a bɔ a taam bɩ tɔ ma, an lɛ da gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ bunɛɛhʋ a yaa nɛɛhʋ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ heerlʋrlɛ zibəə ba ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ ra."
42015008	"Gɛɛ lʋ bɩ kara n ta ʋ, a wanzurfu m bu, deem n nyaam, a bɩ sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʋ, an cɛ bɩ waa, an a ka ma mɩŋŋa an tolle ba an a yɩ?
42015009	Bɩ k'a a yɩ, a y'a hannyɩnɔ som kʋ ma, kan a cɩsɔnnɔ kɩ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: K'a heernyɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bala mɔɔ m wanzurfu k'a nyaam bɩ yɩ.
42015010	A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, heernyɔɔ ta ʋ Woso malɛɛkarɔ zi mimbʋnyaabər deem k'a n'a bɔrɛ a taam tɔ ma."
42015011	Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a nyɩnɔ hɩɩya.
42015012	A poore bɩ n a hɩ a zɩ m, a ʋ: M zɩ, arzaka k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m bɩ, a jir, k'ɩ m hɔ ka m ʋ. Ŋ zɩ bɩ n arzaka k'an ta m bɩ jir ŋ nɩ.
42015013	A dɔmɩm k'a yɩ poore bɩ, nyɩ poore b'a hɔ bɩ gʋr an a hɛɛ, an ta zaa ra, kʋ laatʋrɛ ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, a yaa a arzaka bɩ zar zibəəro bʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ.
42015014	K'a a zar an a nya bɩ, nɔ gʋta a da kʋ b'ʋ, cicir n a nyasʋ.
42015015	A n ta, an nɩ zi bam kan tara bɩ gʋaa deem kɩ, bɩ n a nyɔɔ kurkuuro dɔ ma ʋ a hɔsɩra ʋ.
42015016	A mɩŋŋa a ŋʋa k'a hɔbɩrɛ kʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ n'a bɩm bɩ bɩ, k'an a ka. Bɩ gɔsɩ bɩr a kaŋ ʋ y.
42015017	A n bɩ, an nyɩnta an a hɔɔn da, a ʋ: Mɔɔ zɩ zibəəzannɔ gʋta, ŋn'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ a mɩsɩ nɩ gɔɔtam, mɔɔ n bʋr kɛɛrɛ, m nɩ gam nɔ ma naa ʋ.
42015018	Mɔɔ tarɛ m zɩ zi, m aa a hɩ m, mɔɔ m zar Woso kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ ma.
42015019	Mɔɔ n m ga m, ɩbɩɩ n ɩ ya, ɩ mɔɔ bir ɩ nyɩ y. Mɔɔ ba am ɩ zibəəzannɔ gʋaa deem hɔ bɩ m.
42015020	A n a bɔ an nɩ doore a zɩ bɩ zi. K'a gɔɔta an laatʋ bɩ, a zɩ bɩ n a to an a yɩ, a cicir n a nyasʋ. A n bra si, an aa a wɔ burgu ma, an a lɛ dɔrɛ.
42015021	A nyɩ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: M zɩ, mɔɔ mim zar Woso kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ ma, mɔɔ n m ga m, k'ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ mɔɔ bir ɩ nyɩ y.
42015022	B'a zɩ b'a hɩ a zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: K'a ba zɔɔ, a bʋr huu k'a gʋɛrɛ lɛ da bɩ m, a b'a du ma. K'a bʋr tolleŋŋa m a da a nyʋkʋm ma, k'a kʋsɔrɔ da a gam ʋ.
42015023	K'a bʋr dinnyɛɛm ka mɛ ka bɩ m, a zɛ k'ʋ a bɩ, k'ʋ ʋ heer nyɔɔ,
42015024	bala, mɔɔ nyɩ k'a nyɩnta an ga bɩ, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a nyɩnta an nyaam, ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ a yɩ. Ŋ n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'ɩ cibsa barɛ.
42015025	A nyɩ jɩtaarɛ bɩ nyɩnta pooyaa ʋ. K'a a bɔ, an nɩ zɛm an a zɔ har ma bɩ, a bɩ kɔnnɩrɔ kan bintiiro kɩ nyi ma, kan sarbaa kɩ.
42015026	A n zibəənyɩ deem bir an laaka da a jɩ ma.
42015027	Zibəənyɩ bɩ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ dam bɩ y'a bɔ an bʋr, ɩbɩɩ zɩ bɩ n dinnyɛɛm k'ʋ wɔɔ tʋr bɩ zɛ, k'a a nyɩ bɩ yɩ kan laafɩɩ kɩ bɩ minto.
42015028	Nyɩ jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ, a ʋ: A bɩ gasʋm har ʋ y. A zɩ bɩ n bɔ k'a yaa bir k'an bɩ gasʋ.
42015029	A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: Dɩga a, a dɔɔraa gʋta mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ zi bam, mɔɔ n kaanm ɩbɩɩ lɛ m deem nɩ y. B'ɩbɩɩ n binnyɛɛm ka mɔɔ ʋ cɩna m a zɛ, m cibsa ba m kan m hannyɩnɔ kɩ y.
42015030	B'ɩbɩɩ nyɩ k'a ɩbɩɩ arzaka gʋr, an aa a zar kan lannɔmɩŋŋaheenno kɩ an a bɔ an bʋr naa, ɩbɩɩ dinnyɛɛm k'a mɛ ka bɩ zɛ a minto.
42015031	A zɩ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: M nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay, hɔ haay k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ so ʋ.
42015032	Bala, a a ga m k'ʋ cibsa ba, k'ʋ ʋ heer nyɔɔ. Ɩbɩɩ dam bɩ k'a nyɩnta an ga, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ minto. Nyaam a ʋ, ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ a yɩ."
42016001	Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Arzakazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a zibəənyɩ n ta ʋ, an nɩ dɩgarɛ a hɔnyɩ mim ma. Gʋɔɔ n b'a hɩ arzakazaa bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: Awɔɔ zibəənyɩ bɩ y'awɔɔ arzaka bɩ zarm.
42016002	A n a bir, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: bɔ minto m n n'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩndam mɔɔ m, ncɩnaaʋ? Ɩ hɔcɩntarɛ ciro ka m ʋ, bala ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ yarɛ, ɩ mɔɔ zi bɩ ba y.
42016003	Zibəənyɩ bɩ n'a mɩŋŋa larm, a ʋ: Kʋ m a ba lɔ? Kʋ mɔɔ zuuba mɔɔ bɔ zibəə b'ʋ bɩ? Mɔɔ paŋŋa ba ʋ kʋ m dam wʋ ra? Hɔyɩnyɛrɛ nyannɩ ɩ mɔɔ zɛm.
42016004	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a bam bɩ mɔɔ dɔ, kʋ m bɩ bɔ zibəə b'ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n m si a har ʋ.
42016005	A n gʋɔɔ kʋ zuuba bɩ zɩnnɔ ta ŋ lɛ rɔ wɔɔ bir deem-deem, an lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ lar, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ ta mɔɔ zuuba bɩ zɩm m karɔ?
42016006	Bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Nyɔɔ gər zɔrɔ. A n'a hɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: Ba ɩ sɩraci m na, a si, ɩ nyɩnta zɔɔ-zɔɔ ɩ gʋrsɩra ba busoor.
42016007	A n a ya, an a vanta lar, a ʋ: B'ɩbɩɩ, ɩ ta m karɔ? A ʋ: Hɔyaa yɔrgɔ zɔrɔ. Zibəənyɩ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: Ba ɩbɩɩ sɩraci n na, a gʋrsɩra ba businnyə.
42016008	Zuuba bɩ n a lɛ bɔ zibəənyɩ b'ʋ, zi k'a ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ tɔ ma. Her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn ka kan kʋ kɩ, an lɛ da lɛɛgurezannɔ wɔɔ ra."
42016009	"Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'a durnya arzaka bɩ sa a gʋaasɩbabaa da m gʋɔɔ ma. Dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a bʋr a b'awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, Woso y'awɔɔ sire a har ʋ.
42016010	Gʋaa k'a sɩra ba kan hɔ poore kɩ, a sɩra barɛ a gʋta m sɔ. Bɩ gʋaa k'a n sɩra ba hɔ poore m, a bɩ sɩra bam hɔ gʋta m sɔ y.
42016011	Bɩ minto bɩ, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ba kan durnya naa arzakarɔ kɩ y, nka nɩ hɔnyɩ paan••• bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ?
42016012	Bɩ k'awɔɔ n sɩra ba gʋaa hɔ m, nka n n'awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔ bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ?
42016013	Zibəənyɩ ba ʋ a n n'a dam ma, an zuubɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ zi ba y. A deem ŋʋarɛ, an sɔ deem m. Gɛɛ an bɩr kan deem kɩ, an kaanm deem m. Awɔɔ b'a dam ma a Woso ŋʋa, a busoo ŋʋa sɔ y."
42016014	Farizɛɛnrɔ busoo ŋuənno wɔɔ y'a tʋr kam naa haay ma, ŋn'ɩ yaa wʋrɛ a meerbaa bɩ ma.
42016015	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A ka awɔɔ nawʋm ma k'a bɩr tɩrga gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ. Bɩ Woso awɔɔ heer dɔ, bala, hɔ niŋŋə kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ bɩ, hɔ vəm m bɩ Woso mɩm ʋ.
42016016	Lɛrɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ ta an Zaan dɔmɩm ku. N y'a sɩŋŋɩda ba dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, n nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta pa dam, gʋaa haay n'a tɔŋ ʋ k'a gasʋ ʋ kan paŋŋa kɩ.
42016017	Brama kan tara kɩ cenle naanaa an lɛ da lɛ minnyɩ deem taan••• k'a nɩ gɔɔtam bɩ ra.
42016018	Bɩ y'a ka, gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ larɛ a lʋ ra, an n'a vanta sam bɩ, jaandər m. Bɩ gʋaa k'a lʋ k'a zim la ra bɩ sa, jaandər m sɔ."
42016019	"Arzakazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, an nɩ huu wɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ ŋ kʋsɩ dure a ma, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ mɩŋŋa bɩrɛ dɔmɩm haay, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa nyɩnta bam.
42016020	Cicirzaa deem k'a tɔ m Lazaar bɩ nɩ wʋtam arzakazaa bɩ cɛlɛ ma, a mɛ haay bɩ, nyinno m.
42016021	A ɩ hɔbɩrɛ kuuro kʋ ŋ n'a lom arzakazaa bɩ hɔbɩrɛ gɔ bɩ ra bɩ ŋʋam k'a bɩ, b'a bɩr a yɩrɛ y. Kan naa kɩ haay, jino bʋr ŋn'a nyinno mɩmmɛɛsʋm.
42016022	Cicirzaa bɩ n bɩ ga. Malɛɛkarɔ n a busu ŋnɩ ta m Abraham jɩr ʋ. Arzakazaa bɩ m bɩ ga sɔ, n n a bir.
42016023	Gəəno bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, arzakazaa b'ɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta. A n a mɩm busu brama an a to an Abraham yɩ laatʋ, Lazaar n'a jɩr ʋ.
42016024	A n zee da, a ʋ: M zɩ Abraham, mɔɔ cicir zɛ, k'ɩ Lazaar nyɔɔ k'an a nyʋkʋm nyɔɔ hi ma k'an b'a tɔkʋ m nɛɛm la, k'an bɩsa, bala, mɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta sɛ naa do nɔ ʋ.
42016025	Abraham n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: M nyɩnnɩ, a tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta mɩŋŋa ɩ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, Lazaar n a bʋnyaa yɩ. Naa ma bɩ, a heernyɔɔ yɩ naa ʋ, ɩbɩɩ nɩ fɩr nɔ ʋ.
42016026	Bɩ, yaa gʋta y'awɔɔ kan wɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tom wɔɔ zeezi naa ʋ k'a ta awɔɔ zi rɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma, ŋnɩ cem y, awɔɔ zeezi sɔ, kʋ ŋ b'a da ma ŋnɩ bʋr naa ʋ y.
42016027	Arzakazaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: M zɩ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ Lazaar nyɔɔ mɔɔ zɩ har ʋ,
42016028	bala, mɔɔ danzannɔ ta ʋ soor, k'an aa a hɩ ŋ nɩ, kʋ brɔɔ bɩ bʋr fɩr yɩrɛ bɩncɛ naa do ʋ sɔ y.
42016029	Abraham n a hɩ m, a ʋ: Ŋ yɩ Moyiisi ciro m kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ hɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a tʋr ka ŋ lemim ma.
42016030	Arzakazaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: Ayy•••, m zɩ Abraham, kʋ gʋaa a to gəəno zi naa ʋ an ta b'ʋ, ŋ y'a bɔrɛ a taam.
42016031	Abraham n a hɩ, a ʋ: Kʋ ŋ n a tʋr ka Moyiisi ma kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, baa kʋ gʋaa a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, ŋ b'a sire y."
42017001	Yeezuu n a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Mim k'a a da ma an gʋaa do bɩ b'a dam ma, a n nyɩnta ʋ y. Bɩ, a pakra bam gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ m.
42017002	Kʋ n bar da jɛnlajaa ma, n n'a da a wer, n n'a da higʋta ʋ jɩra, nyɩnɔ poorero nɔɔn duro deem k'a n'a dam mim ʋ bɩ m.
42017003	K'a dundo a zi mɩŋŋa! K'ɩ danyɩ a zar ɩ ma, k'ɩ dʋndɔ, k'a a bɔ a taam, k'ɩ sugur ka ʋ.
42017004	Bɩ k'a zar ɩbɩɩ ma gallɛm saanhɩna hindeem ʋ, an tɩr a bɔ an bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi an b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ m bɔ m taam, sugur ka m ʋ, k'ɩ sugur ka ʋ."
42017005	Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ Zuuba m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ da ra."
42017006	Zuuba n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ, kʋ mutardɩ yaa a ku, awɔɔ y'a hɩm gɔ naa do m, a ʋ: Ɩ bɔɔta, ɩ yaa ɩ sɔɔn higʋta ʋ, b'a y'awɔɔ lɛ sim."
42017007	"Gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ, a zibəənyɩ n ta ʋ, an nɩ dam wʋm, gɛɛ, an nɩ dɔm hɔbɩsɩ ma. K'a a to poo ʋ, an bʋr, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: A ba zɔɔ ɩ bʋr, ɩ nyɩnta ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ?
42017008	A hɩ bɛɛ an nawʋrɛ, a ʋ: Hɔbɩrɛ ba gum naa ʋ, k'ɩ huuro da ɩ ra, ɩ sa ɩ ba ka m ʋ kʋ m a bɩ, kʋ m a mi, k'ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ bɩ, ɩ mi ra?
42017009	A yaa dam zibəənyɩ bɩ m barka ra? K'a a lɛ si an a zi bɩ ba bɩ minto ra? Mɔɔ n a si a yaa dam nɩ barka y.
42017010	A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ hɔ haay kʋ Woso lɛ ka awɔɔ ʋ k'a ba bɩ ba, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bala, wɔɔ ʋ zibəə k'a a ga m bɩ ba."
42017011	Kʋ Yeezuu zaa sa an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm zeezi bɩ, bɔ a ʋ Galilee kan Samarii kɩ bire ʋ.
42017012	K'a nɩ gasʋm tara deem ʋ bɩ, kusiməro bu b'a zɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ jɩm laatʋ,
42017013	ŋn'a leer busu, ŋ ʋ: "Yeezuu, karɩnsaamba! Wɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
42017014	Yeezuu k'a ŋ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa a hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbənno m." Kʋ ŋ y'a hʋr ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ yaa a waa zaa ra, dintim n gʋ ŋ ma.
42017015	Ŋ gʋaa deem k'a yɩ a laafɩɩ yɩ bɩ, a a wusigə an bʋr, an a leer busu, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
42017016	A n sʋnta Yeezuu taa, an a meer zuutə tara ʋ, an nɩ barka dam nɩ. Gʋaa bɩ, Samarii gʋaa m.
42017017	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa bu haay bɛɛ y'a waa dintim n gʋ ŋ ma ra? Bɩ nɛɛhʋ rɔ wɔɔ be?
42017018	Gɔsɩ n a bɔ ŋ bire ʋ k'a b'a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, kʋ saana naa do bɛɛ y."
42017019	A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ ta, ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ."
42017020	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n Yeezuu lar, ŋ ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛ an nawʋm brɔ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ bɩr zɛrɛ, an nɩ yɩrɛ y.
42017021	N b'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: Woso cirbəə bɩ ba n nɩ, gɛɛ, a ɩ naa ʋ y!" A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ kɛɛrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a dɩga a, Woso cirbəə bɩ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ."
42017022	A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: "Dɔmɩnnɔ ta ʋ ŋn'ɩ zɛm, awɔɔ n n'a ŋʋam k'a Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩ hindeem ʋ bala, b'awɔɔ ba yɩrɛ y.
42017023	N y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: A ba n nɩ, gɛɛ, a ɩ naa ʋ! A bɩ ta y, a b'a si a ta y.
42017024	Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm bɩ, zɛ an nawʋm amba brama tɩr nyakɩ bɔ dɔjɩr ʋ an ta meer ʋ bɩ m.
42017025	Bɩ, a lɛɛkarɛ an fɩr yɩ gʋta, her gʋɔɔ nɔɔn n kaanm m.
42017026	Hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba Nowee dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, a zɛm bɩ nyɩnta maam Gʋaanyɩ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ:
42017027	Ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mim, ŋn'ɩ lʋ sam, ŋn'ɩ zim sam an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ Nowee gasʋ ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ bɩ ku. Bɩ, Woso a ka la gʋta n ba an ŋ bɩ haay.
42017028	Gɛɛ, am hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba Lɔttɩ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ hɔ bɩ m: Ŋ yɩ hɔ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mim, ŋn'ɩ hɔ sim, ŋn'ɩ hɔ hɛɛnm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ duum, ŋn'ɩ cɛ dɔm.
42017029	Bɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ Lɔttɩ bɔ ʋ Sodɔm ʋ bɩ, Woso a ka sɛ n a to brama, an ba am la hɔ bɩ m, an ŋ zɩnzɛ haay.
42017030	Gʋaanyɩ bɩ hɩnkarɛ hinni ʋ, a nyɩntam maam sɔ.
42017031	Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ cɛ mim ʋ a mɔdrɔ nɩ cɛ ʋ bɩ, a bɩ zer an gasʋ an ŋ gʋr y. A maam sɔ kan gʋaa k'a ta poo ʋ bɩ kɩ, a b'a bɔ an bʋr har ʋ y.
42017032	K'a Lɔttɩ lʋ bɩ mim tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
42017033	Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a a meeyaa bʋmbɔ bɩ, a b'a yɩrɛ y. Bɩ gʋaa k'a yɛ zɛ ma mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a y'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
42017034	A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gum bɩ do ʋ, gʋaa hɩɩya y'a zɛm kʋ ra, ŋnɩ wʋta gargʋ deem la. N deem gaarɛ, n n deem to.
42017035	Lannɔ y'a zɛm kʋ ra hɩɩya, ŋn'ɩ bɩr jaa lɔm. N deem gaarɛ, n n deem to." [
42017036	Kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya ɩ hɔsɩra ʋ: N deem gaam, n nɩ deem to.]
42017037	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, a nyɩntam ka?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Bɩncɛ kʋ sim n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ bɩ, bɩncɛ bɩ do gɔbɩrgʋrɔ n n'a som kʋ ma ʋ."
42018001	Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a a ga m kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa da dɔmɩm haay, bɩ ŋ bɩ kɔ kan yaadarɛ bɩ kɩ y.
42018002	A a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Dʋdɔkər ɩ nyɩnta tara deem nɔ ʋ, a bɩr nyi bam Woso nɩ y, a bɩr gʋɔɔ daŋ ʋ sɔ y.
42018003	Zoro nɩ tara bɩ do nɔ ʋ, an nɩ zɛm tee••• an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Gumə ka m ʋ mim kʋ mɔɔ jɩm bɩ n ta m kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
42018004	Dʋdɔkər bɩ n a gu, gallɛm hɔka. Bɩ kur bɩ, a n n'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Baa kʋ mɔɔ bɩr nyi bam Woso m, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr gʋɔɔ daŋ ʋ sɔ,
42018005	lʋ naa do k'a bʋr an nɩ mɔɔ kɔm bɩ, mɔɔ y'a dʋdɔ bɩ karɛ, m gumə ka ʋ, k'a bɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi dɔ dɔmɩm haay, an bɩr mɔɔ kɔrɛ y."
42018006	Zuuba n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a tʋr ka, hɔ kʋ dʋdɔkər bʋnyaa b'a hɩ bɩ ma mɩŋŋa.
42018007	Bɩ, Woso b'a darɛ a gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ ŋn'ɩ zee dam zi sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ han ra? A maasɩrɛ bam, an bɔkarɛ an a da ŋ han ra?
42018008	A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, a y'a darɛ ŋ han zɔɔ-zɔɔ. Bɩ kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bɩ bʋr, a zɛm bɩ sɩrakarɛ yɩ tara burə ʋ ra?"
42018009	Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n'a mɩ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a muno bɔŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ:
42018010	"Gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ k'a yaa da. Gʋaa deem bɩ farizɛn m, deem bɩ yawʋrsirezaa m.
42018011	Farizɛn bɩ n jɩm brama an nɩ yaa darɛ a heer ʋ ncɩnaaʋ: Woso, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m barka kʋ mɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ konno, mimbʋnyaabənno, jaandənno, gɛɛ yawʋrsir naa do kɩ minto.
42018012	Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ kʋsɩm gallɛm hɩɩya dɔmɩm saanhɩna nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔnyɩ haay nɔ ʋ mɔɔ y'a bu hɔ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ.
42018013	Yawʋrsir bɩ n jɩm laatʋ, a lɛ baa k'a a mɩm busu brama y, an n'a cɩ zɛrɛ k'a a heerzar hɩnka, a ʋ: Woso, mɔɔ cicir zɛ, bala, mimbʋnyaabər m mɔɔ m.
42018014	A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, a tɩrgabaa yɩ Woso mɩm ʋ, an a bɔ an doo, deem bɩ n a yɩ y. Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a busum bɩ, n y'a zerm tara ʋ, bɩ gʋaa k'a a mɩŋŋa zer bɩ n y'a busum."
42018015	Gʋɔɔ bʋr nyɩnɔ poorero m Yeezuu zi k'an a wɔ ka ŋ mim la. Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ.
42018016	Yeezuu n a ka ŋnɩ bʋr nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ to ŋnɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi, a b'a ta ŋ nɩ toore y, bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a so Woso cirbəə b'ʋ.
42018017	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a n Woso cirbəə bɩ si am nyɩ poore hɔ bɩ m bɩ, a bɩ gasʋŋ ʋ y."
42018018	Cir deem Yeezuu lar, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba mɩŋŋa, bɔ mɔɔ n'a barɛ kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ?"
42018019	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ birm mɩŋŋa? Gʋaa mɩŋŋa ba ʋ kʋ Woso y'a deem bɛɛ y.
42018020	Ɩbɩɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ ra? Ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɩ ŋʋaar kasɛtɩ ka y, ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ."
42018021	Gʋaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ naa haay ba m nyɩbaa ma tee•••."
42018022	Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ deem ɩ gɔɔta ɩbɩɩ ma k'ɩ ba: Hɔ k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ hɛɛ haay ɩ jinjir ŋʋazannɔ m, k'ɩ bʋr ɩ zu mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ arzaka yɩm arzana ʋ."
42018023	Kʋ gʋaa bɩ naa ma bɩ, a heer a zar, bala, a arzaka bɩ gʋta.
42018024	Yeezuu k'a a heerzarlɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Arzakazannɔ Woso cirbəə gasʋʋrɛ yɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
42018025	Sɩra m, yoonde huuka yaa gasʋʋrɛ nyɩntam naanaa, an lɛ da arzakazaa Woso cirbəə gasʋʋrɛ m."
42018026	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam ma rɔ wɔɔ a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, nka m nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ?"
42018027	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ gʋaa b'a dam ma an a ba bɩ, a naanaa Woso ma."
42018028	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Dɩga, wɔɔ hɔ haay to, ʋ zu ɩbɩɩ ʋ."
42018029	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a a har to, kan a lʋ kɩ, a danyɩnɔ kɩ, a zɩrɔ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə minto,
42018030	a naa haay yɩm gʋta an lɛ da durnya naa do nɔ ʋ, b'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩm durnya k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nɔ ʋ sɔ."
42018031	Yeezuu bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ba wɔɔ nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ na, bɩ, hɔ haay kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a gʋrsɩra ba Gʋaanyɩ bɩ minto bɩ kʋ yɩm.
42018032	N y'a nyasʋm, n n'a ka kɩfɩɩrɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa wʋ ma, kʋ ŋ n'a sʋnsɔ wʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ lihi dɩnda ma,
42018033	kʋ ŋ n'a zɛ madɩɩrɔ m, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a zɛ gər, b'a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ."
42018034	Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n hɔsɩ jɩ ma y. Mim naa do a nyaakʋm da ŋ nɩ, ŋ n hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ jɩ dɔ y.
42018035	K'a ta, an n'a zɔm Zeriko ma bɩ, bʋʋ deem ɩ nyɩnta zaa lezi b'ʋ, an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm.
42018036	Zamaa k'a bʋr an nɩ cenim an a ma bɩ, a laaka da kʋ bɔ m gɛ.
42018037	N n a hɩ m, n ʋ: "Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu nɩ cenim."
42018038	A n zee da, a ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ, Yeezuu, m cicir zɛ!"
42018039	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyaa bam kan kɩ ŋ ʋ, an zɛ pi. A n a banka an zee da an lɛ da biisi ra, a ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
42018040	Yeezuu n jɩm, an lɛ ka kʋ ŋ n'a gaa, ŋn'ɩ bʋr m. K'a a zɔ bɩ, Yeezuu a lar, a ʋ:
42018041	"Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ kʋ mɔɔ n a ba ɩbɩɩ minto?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, a ka kʋ m mɩm n a ya an lɛɛ yɩ."
42018042	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'ɩ mɩm n a ya an lɛɛ yɩ! Ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ."
42018043	Lɛɛm bɩ, a mɩm a gʋ, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩm, an zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ. Zamaa bɩ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ sɔ.
42019001	Yeezuu gasʋ Zeriko ʋ, an nɩ kʋ bɩ zɛm la.
42019002	Gʋaa nɩ b'ʋ a tɔ m Zasee, yawʋrsinno cir m, arzakazaa m sɔ.
42019003	A n n'a kam Yeezuu ma k'a yɩ, kʋ nka m, k'a a dɔ. Zamaa bɩ minto, kʋ gʋaa kutiim m bɩ, a b'a dam ma, a n a yɩ y.
42019004	A n bra si an ta lɛɛ, an aa der gɔ ra, kʋ Yeezuu bʋr an nɩ cenim b'ʋ, k'a yɩ.
42019005	Kʋ Yeezuu lee ku bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, a a bɔɔta an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zasee, a ba zɔɔ ɩ zer, bala, mɔɔ cɩnta kʋ m zer ɩbɩɩ har ʋ her."
42019006	Zasee n zer zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an a si kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
42019007	Kʋ zamaa bɩ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋn'ɩ kukur barɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zer a ʋ mimbʋnyaabər har ʋ."
42019008	Zasee n a zɔ Zuuba ma an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɩga, Zuuba, mɔɔ yɩ m arzaka bɩ haay, zɛkumbir sam, m a ka cicirzannɔ ʋ, bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ mim zu ʋ gʋaa ma, mɔɔ y'a sompim nʋ gallɛm si."
42019009	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋmbɔrɛ gasʋ har naa do ʋ her, bala, gʋaa naa do Abraham yaŋŋa m sɔ.
42019010	Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr a ʋ, an b'a ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ ma, an ŋ bʋmbɔ."
42019011	Kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'a tʋr kam a meerbaarɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ. Bala, a a zɔ Zerizalɛm ma. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ dɩgam ma, ŋ ʋ, Woso cirbəə bɩ y'a hɩnkarɛ a m b'ʋ lɛɛm.
42019012	Bɩ y'a ka Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Cir nyɩ deem ɩ ta kʋ laatʋ ʋ k'a yaa cirbəə bɩ, k'a bɔ a bʋr.
42019013	A n a zibəənyɩnɔ bir bu, an busoo jir ŋ nɩ minnɩ deem-deem, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'K'a zi ba m, k'an ta an mɔɔ wusigəre dɔmɩm ku.'
42019014	B'a gʋrgazannɔ wɔɔ sɔ m, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ a jɛ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a a hɩ cirbəə karɛzaa bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Wɔɔ lɛ baa k'an a so wɔɔ ʋ y.'
42019015	K'a yaa cirbəə bɩ bɩ an bʋr bɩ, a a ka ŋnɩ zibəənyɩnɔ k'a busoo jinjir ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ bir a taa, k'a dɩga a kʋ bɔ zi ŋ y'a ba m gɛ.
42019016	Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n bʋr, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, minnɩ deem k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, minnɩ bu y'a da ra.'
42019017	A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa n'ɩbɩɩ m, bala, ɩbɩɩ noonhubaa hɩnka hɔ poorero nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ cirbəə karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ so tara bu ʋ.'
42019018	A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n b'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ busoo bɩ nyɩ da minnɩ soor.
42019019	A n a hɩ bɩ m sɔ, a ʋ: Ɩ so tara soor ʋ.'
42019020	A vanta n bʋr, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, ba ɩbɩɩ busoo bɩ n na, pɛɛra mɔɔ burgu ma, m a nyaakʋm da.'
42019021	Mɔɔ ɩ nyi barɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ heer kʋsɩrabaa bɩ minto. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n a cɩnta bɩ ɩbɩɩ n n'a sam. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n a duu bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n n'a dam.
42019022	A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa meerbaa bɩ mɔɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ dʋdɔ yarm ma, zibəənyɩ bʋnyaa. 'Ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ: gʋaa kʋsɩ m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ nɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n a cɩnta bɩ sam, m nɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n a duu bɩ dam.
42019023	Bɔ minto, ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ busoo bɩ cɩnta busoo cɛ ʋ y? Kʋ mɔɔ m bɔ, m bʋr kʋ m bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ?'
42019024	A n a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'K'a busoo bɩ yɔ m, a ka gʋaa k'an ta m bu b'ʋ.'
42019025	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Zuuba, a lɛɛ ka an a yɩ bu.'
42019026	A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa biyəə k'an ta hɔ m bɩ, n y'a kaŋ ʋ, gʋaa k'a ba m bɩ, baa k'a ta m poore bɩ, n y'a yɔm nɩ.
42019027	Mɔɔ jɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ ŋʋa kan cirbəə kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a bʋr ŋ nɩ mɔɔ taa naa ʋ, a ŋ zɩnzɛ."
