42019028	Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ bɩ, a ka ŋ lɛɛ an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ.
42019029	K'a ta an n'a zɔm Bɛtfazee ma kan Betanii kɩ, Oliviyee ci bɩ zeezi bɩ, a a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya.
42019030	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta kʋ k'a nɩ lɛɛ naa ʋ. K'awɔɔ ta an nɩ gasʋm, awɔɔ brapoo yɩm n n'a kʋsɩ, bɩ gɔsɩ n da ʋ cɩna y. K'a hʋr a bʋr m.
42019031	Bɩ kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ lar, a ʋ: Bɔ m awɔɔ n'a hʋrlɛ? K'a hɩ m, a ʋ: Zuuba lɛ n taa."
42019032	Gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ŋ ta bɩ, ŋ yaa hɔ haay bɩ yɩ amba Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ m.
42019033	Kʋ ŋn'ɩ brapoo bɩ hʋrm bɩ, a zannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ n'a hʋrlɛ?"
42019034	Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba lɛ n taa."
42019035	Ŋ n brapoo bɩ gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a huuro ka ra, ŋn'a ka Yeezuu n da ʋ.
42019036	K'a nɩ tam bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n'a huuro kam zaa bɩ ra.
42019037	K'a a zɔ Oliviyee ci bɩ zerjɩ bɩ ma bɩ, heernyɔɔ gasʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, zamaa bɩ haay, ŋn'a leer busu, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ hoserlo haay kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ minto.
42019038	Ŋ ʋ: "Cir k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba Woso tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ. Kʋ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta arzana ʋ, kʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ n nyɩnta brama."
42019039	Farizɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a hɩ Yeezuu m zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, a ka k'ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zɛ pi."
42019040	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ ŋ zɛ pi, jaarɔ n nɩ zee dam."
42019041	K'a a zɔ Zerizalɛm kʋnɔ bɩ ma, an a to an a yɩ bɩ, a nyi ka a minto.
42019042	A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ sɔ, k'a dɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ her, kʋ nka n nɩ laafɩɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ! Bɩ naa ma bɩ, a a nyaakʋm da ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma, ɩ yɩ y.
42019043	Sɩra m, dɔmɩnnɔ ɩ zɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ minto, ɩbɩɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ tee kɩnkarɛ ɩbɩɩ pəŋŋə bɩ ma, ŋ bɩrlɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, k'a ɩbɩɩ da, ŋn'a so bɩncɛ haay ʋ.
42019044	Ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ wurgəm haay, ɩbɩɩ kan ɩ zamaa kɩ. Ŋ bɩ jaa deem taan••• tore, an bɩr a mim burə ʋ y, bala, ɩbɩɩ n dɔmɩm kʋ Woso bʋr k'a b'a da ɩ han bɩ dɔ y."
42019045	Yeezuu gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ, an nɩ lam hɔheenno wɔɔ ra.
42019046	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba, ŋ ʋ: 'Mɔɔ cɛ bɩ nyɩntam yaadarɛ cɛ.' B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ sa a ba konno bɩncɛ."
42019047	Yeezuu ɩ hɔ dɩndam dɔmɩm haay Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, tara cinno kɩ y'a karɛ a zɛrɛ zaa ma.
42019048	Bɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta k'a ba bɩ, ŋn'a zaa yɩ y, bala, zamaa bɩ haay y'a tʋr karɛ a meerbaa ma kan bʋraama gʋta kɩ.
42020001	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔ dɩndam zamaa bɩ m Wosocɛ ʋ, an nɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta pa dam bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ bʋr zi.
42020002	Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Lɛ kara ɩbɩɩ n ta m ɩ nɩ naa bam nɩ, gɛɛ, bɔ a ʋ, nka lɛ ʋ, k'ɩ hɩ wɔɔ m?"
42020003	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa sɔ, mɔɔ laaka darɛ awɔɔ han, k'a hɩ mɔɔ m:
42020004	Zaan batɛm bɩ, a to a ʋ brama gɛɛ gʋɔɔ zi?"
42020005	Ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: A to a ʋ brama, a y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Bɔ minto m awɔɔ n a mim si gɛ?
42020006	Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: A to a ʋ gʋɔɔ zi, zamaa bɩ haay wɔɔ gʋngʋɛɛnm jaarɔ m, bala, ŋ sɩra ka, ŋ ʋ Zaan bɩ nyɩnta wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa."
42020007	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n a dɔ k'a to a ʋ ka y."
42020008	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ sɔ, mɔɔ b'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ nka ɩ lɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ naa barɛ y."
42020009	A n nɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do dam zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ dɩvɛnsɩra da ʋ, an a ka a zibənno ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a zi ba, an ta zaa jintə ra.
42020010	K'a dɔmɩm a ku bɩ, a a zibəənyɩ deem nyɔɔ dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ zi, k'an aa a hɔ si an b'a ka a ʋ. Bɩ, dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ a nyasʋ ŋn'a zɛ, ŋn'a ka an doo a wɔ m tu.
42020011	A n a ya, an a zibəənyɩ vanta nyɔɔ, ŋn'aa bɩ nyasʋ ŋn'a zɛ sɔ, ŋn'a sʋnsɔ wʋ, ŋn'a ka an doo a wɔ m tu.
42020012	A n a ya, an a vanta nyɔɔ a kaakʋ hɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩ zɛ, ŋnɩ yaaba da ma, ŋnɩ la ra.
42020013	Dɩvɛnsɩrazaa bɩ n a hɩ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Kʋ m a ba lɔ? Mɔɔ yɩ m nyɩ ŋʋarɛ bɩ nyɔɔm. Ŋ bɩ daŋ ʋ barɛm.
42020014	Kʋ ŋ y'a nyɩ bɩ yɩ bɩ, dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ n a dɩnda kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: Naa do n nɩ zɛm b'a so ʋ. Ʋ a nyasʋ ʋ a zɛ gər k'ʋ ʋ so arzaka b'ʋ.
42020015	Ŋ n a nyasʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ m dɩvɛnsɩra ʋ b'ʋ toore ma, ŋn'a zɛ gər. Bɔ dɩvɛnsɩrazaa bɩ n n'a barɛ ŋ nɩ?
42020016	A zɛm bɩ bʋr, an b'a ka ŋnɩ dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, an dɩvɛnsɩra bɩ ka a vantɔɔ ʋ." Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ayy•••, kʋ naa bɩ ba y!"
42020017	Yeezuu n a nya ŋ lɛ an dɩga ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wosoci bɩ gʋrsɩra naa do jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Jaa kʋ cɛdonno a bɔ ʋ ŋn'a zo bɩ, bɩ y'a ba cɛ bɩ jaa wɩsɩ.
42020018	Kʋ gʋaa a do jaa bɩ do ra, hɩsɩga a zaa nawʋm. Bɩ, kʋ jaa bɩ do a da gʋaa ra, a hɔɔnsɩ an nawʋm."
42020019	Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kɩ y'a karɛ a nyasʋrɛ ma b'ʋ lɛɛm, bɩ ŋ yɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m. Ŋ y'a jɩ ma mɩŋŋa, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da a ʋ awɔɔ tɔ ma.
42020020	Ŋ nɩ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ dundom Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ zi, ŋnɩ tɩrgabaa ka a ra. K'a ku a nyasʋ a meerbaa nɔ ʋ, a ka tara lɛɛzannɔ ʋ kan kʋzaa bɩ kɩ ʋ.
42020021	Ŋ laaka naa do da han: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ meer bam, ɩ nɩ hɔ dɩndam kan sɩra kɩ, ɩ bɩr nyi bam gɔsɩ nɩ y, ɩ nɩ Woso zaa hɔ dɩndam kan a sɩra kɩ.
42020022	A a ga m k'ʋ Rɔm cir yawʋr ka gɛɛ, a n a ga nɩ?"
42020023	Yeezuu k'a ŋ zambʋ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a ʋ:
42020024	"K'a busoo ka m ʋ deem naa ʋ. Nka meer kan a tɔ kɩ nɩ busoo bɩ burə ʋ naa?" Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Rɔm cir hɔ m."
42020025	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a Rɔm cir tɔ hɔ ka ʋ, k'a hɔ kʋ Woso a so ʋ bɩ ka ʋ sɔ."
42020026	Ŋ n a da ma, ŋnɩ Yeezuu nyasʋ a meerbaa nɔ ʋ zamaa bɩ lɛɛ y. A nyɩbɔʋrɛ bɩ k'a a ka ŋ n zɛ kədə bɩ, ŋ zɛ pi.
42020027	Sadisɛɛnrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ma bɩ, ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ:
42020028	"Karɩnsaamba, Moyiisi a gʋrsɩra ba wɔɔ minto, a ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa ga an a gʋ a lʋ ma b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y, k'a danyɩ n a si an nyɩnɔ yɩ kan kɩ a minto.'
42020029	Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta, a nyɩnɔ saanhɩna: Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n lʋ sa an ga an a gʋ ma b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y.
42020030	A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n lʋ bɩ si,
42020031	a kaakʋ hɔ bɩ maam sɔ, an ta an nyɩnɔ saanhɩna rɔ wɔɔ ku. Ŋ haay gɩnga bɩ ŋ nɩ nyɩ yɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ y.
42020032	A nyarɛ ma bɩ, lʋ bɩ ga sɔ.
42020033	Bɩ, lʋ naa do, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, nka hɔ m lʋ bɩ nɩ? Kʋ ŋ haay lʋ bɩ si bɩ?"
42020034	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zamaa naa do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔ sam.
42020035	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ga mɩmbɔʋrɛ m Woso mɩm ʋ, ŋnɩ zɛm bɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba durnya k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ lʋ gɛɛ yar sam b'ʋ y.
42020036	Ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ ga dɔ y, bala, ŋ bɔm kʋ ʋ kan malɛɛkarɔ kɩ. Woso nyɩnɔ m, kʋ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ minto.
42020037	Moyiisi gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ hɩnka mɩŋŋa, bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ Wosoci nɩ tutugu mim dɩndaŋ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ Zuuba Woso birm Abraham Woso, Izakkɩ Woso, Zakɔɔb Woso.
42020038	Bɩ Woso bɩ, gəəno Woso bɛɛ y, mɩsɩɩrɔ Woso m, bala, hɔ haay mɩsɩr a minto."
42020039	Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ meerbaa bɩ si, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, ɩ meer ba mɩŋŋa."
42020040	Ŋ bɩr yɛm dɔ k'a laaka da han mim sɩ ma y.
42020041	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ: 'Krista bɩ, Davɩd Nyɩ' nɩ?
42020042	Kʋ Davɩd mɩŋŋa n'a hɩm laarɔ ci nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ Zuuba m: nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʋ,
42020043	an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ bam gankarahɔ, k'ɩ gam ka ŋ la bɩ ku.
42020044	Naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Davɩd y'a birm 'Zuuba'. A nyɩnnɩ m lʋnlɔ kɛɛrɛ?"
42020045	Kʋ zamaa bɩ haay n'a tʋr kam bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ:
42020046	"K'a dundo a zi kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩmbɩr zabarɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Ŋ gʋɔɔ yaadarɛ ŋʋa daasɩrɔ bire ʋ. Ŋ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ ŋʋa yaadarɛcɛrɔ ʋ, ŋ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ ŋʋa sɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
42020047	Ŋ nɩ zonno hɔ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋn'ɩ yaa jintoo dam, kʋ ŋ n'a yɩ. N yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarm, ŋnɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩ gʋta an lɛ da."
42021001	Yeezuu k'a a mɩm busu bɩ, a arzakazannɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ busoo dam ganwʋrɛ mɔr ʋ.
42021002	A n zoro yɩ sɔ cicirzaa m, an tamma hɩɩya da ʋ.
42021003	A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zoro cicirzaa naa do a da ʋ an lɛ da ŋ nɩ haay.
42021004	Bala, nawɔnnɔ haay busoo k'an ta ŋ ʋ gʋta bɩ ŋ y'a bɔ ʋ ŋn'a da ganwʋrɛ mɔr b'ʋ, bɩ zoro bɩ busoo k'a n'a wɔ ʋ b'a ka haay."
42021005	Gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosocɛ bɩ mim dɩndam, ŋn'a lɛ bɔrɛ a gʋɛrɛ ʋ, a jaarɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋabaa ʋ, kan ganwʋrɛ kʋ ŋ y'a bankam bɩ kɩ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
42021006	"Dɔmɩm ta ʋ an nɩ zɛm, hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a yɩm naa, jaarɔ wɔɔ bɩ gɔɔtam kʋ burə ʋ y, ŋ haay wurgəm."
42021007	Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, naa zɛm brɔ? Bɩ makra kara n nɩ naa dɔmɩm hɩnkarɛ?"
42021008	A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka ŋnɩ braba a nɩ y, bala, gʋɔɔ gʋta zɛm b'a hɩ mɔɔ tɔ m, ŋ ʋ: Awɔɔ m Krista, gɛɛ: Dɔmɩm a ku. A bɩ zu ŋ ʋ y.
42021009	K'awɔɔ bɩ yar barɛ mim ma, tara gʋɔɔ n wuti kan a cinno kɩ, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Bala, pakra m kʋ bɩ n lɛɛ ka an bʋr, b'a nyarɛ bɛɛ m bɩ lɛɛm y."
42021010	A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Tararɔ wutim kan kʋ kɩ yar m, tara cinno n wuti kan kʋ kɩ.
42021011	Tara hinkəre gʋta zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ, yaaba bʋnyaarɔ kan nɔ kɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ bɩncɛ-bɩncɛ. Hɔɔrɔ bam ŋnɩ nyibəə gʋta da gʋɔɔ ma, kan makrarɔ gʋtɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to brama kɩ."
42021012	"Bɩ, an nɩ lɛɛ kam naa haay lɛɛ bɩ, n y'awɔɔ gʋrm, n nɩ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma, n y'a karɛ, n n'awɔɔ dʋdɔ ka sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, n n'awɔɔ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, n tarɛ awɔɔ m cinno kan lɛɛzannɔ kɩ taa mɔɔ tɔ ma.
42021013	Bɩ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ dɔmɩm mɔɔ minto.
42021014	Bɩ, a bɩ lɛɛ ka a a hɔɔn da minno nɔɔn duro nyɩbɔʋrɛ ma y.
42021015	Bala, mɔɔ meerbaa dɔrɛ kan hɔɔn kɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem b'a dam ma an awɔɔ meerbaa nyɩ bɔ ʋ, gɛɛ, an bɩsɩ ka ma y.
42021016	Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ zɩrɔ kan a dɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ danyɩnɔ kɩ, awɔɔ dogʋɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ gʋaasɩbɔɔ kɩ, n n'awɔɔ nyasʋrɛ, bɩ, ŋ y'awɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛm.
42021017	Gʋaa haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma.
42021018	Bɩ, awɔɔ minkə deem taan••• bɩ nyaanɩm awɔɔ mim ʋ y.
42021019	Awɔɔ tʋntɔʋrɛ n nɩ mɩsɩrbaa karɛ awɔɔ ʋ."
42021020	"K'awɔɔ bɩ Zerizalɛm yɩ yarbənno n bɩr ma, k'a dɔ a ʋ, a wurgəre dɔmɩm a zɔ.
42021021	Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a si, ŋnɩ ta ciro ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n bɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ gasʋ tara nɔ ʋ y!
42021022	Woso heerbusu dɔmɩm m dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro m, bɩ hɔ haay kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ bɩ n nɩ kʋ yɩŋ ʋ.
42021023	A pakra bam lannɔ jɩsɩzannɔ kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɔ karɛ a nyɩnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, bala, cicir gʋta y'a dam tara bɩ ra kan heerbusu gʋta kɩ zamaa bɩ minto.
42021024	N gʋɔɔ gʋta zɩnzɛm kargʋrɔ m, ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ gʋrm lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ do haay bire ʋ, do vantɔɔ tʋntɔm Zerizalɛm la an ta an do vantɔɔ wɔɔ dɔmɩm bɩ nyarɛ ku."
42021025	"Makrarɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ woso kan mom kɩ monyaarɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ. Tara burə ʋ, do haay gʋɔɔ nyɩntam kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋ b'a banjɩ dɔrɛ y, higʋta paŋŋa kan a kurəro tatʋr kɩ tɔ ma.
42021026	Gʋɔɔ n'a mom, hoonsi n ta ŋ lɛ hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm tara burə ʋ bɩ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ. Bala, n brama paŋŋazannɔ hinkəm.
42021027	Bɩ kur bɩ, ŋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an bɩr zɛm warkʋ nɔ ʋ kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ, cirbəə kɩ."
42021028	"Kʋ minno nɔɔn duro haay bʋr ŋn'ɩ barɛ, k'a a bɔɔta a dɩga brama, awɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ a zɔ."
42021029	A n hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dɩga sɔɔn kan gɔrɔ haay kɩ ma.
42021030	K'awɔɔ yɩ ŋn'ɩ lɛɛ daa darɛ, awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, siire a zɔ.
42021031	A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ bɩ naa yɩ an nɩ zɛrɛ, k'a dɔ a ʋ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ.
42021032	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zamaana naa do bɩ cenim kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay bɛɛ ba y.
42021033	Brama kan tara kɩ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ bɩ cenle y."
42021034	"K'a dundo a zi, a b'a heer gore da ʋ kan bɛɛ mire waasɩ kɩ, hɔ bɩ gʋta kɩ, kan durnya minno hɔɔndarɛrɔ kɩ y, kʋ dɔmɩm naa do bɩ daata zɛ awɔɔ ra y,
42021035	amba zaŋŋa hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Bala, a y'a kum gʋaa haay k'a nɩ tara burə ʋ ra.
42021036	A b'a zuu ʋ y, k'a yaa da dɔmɩm haay, k'a a da ma, a bɔ lɛm hɔ haay k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ma, k'a jɩm brama, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ lɛɛ."
42021037	Dɔmɩm haay Yeezuu tɩr ta an aa hɔ dɩnda Zerizalɛm Wosocɛ ʋ. Bɩ, yirbəə haay a tɩr bɔ, an ta ci kʋ n n'a birm Oliviyee ci bɩ ra, dɔ n tɩr mɩ m b'ʋ.
42021038	Bɩ wutigʋta nɩ, zamaa bɩ tɩr ta zi Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'aa a tʋr ka ma.
42022001	Bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma cibsa kʋ n a birm pakkɩ bɩ y'a zɔm.
42022002	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ y'a kam zaa k'a n'a sam k'a a ku a zɛ bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ yɩ nyi bam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
42022003	Bɩ, Sʋtaana gasʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem heer ʋ. Zidas m, gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Iskarɩyɔtɩ bɩ m.
42022004	A n ta, an aa a dɩnda kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cinno wɔɔ kɩ, hɔ k'a n'a bam k'a Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ.
42022005	Bɩ ŋ heer nyɔɔ gʋta ŋn'a dɩnda kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: k'a busoo ka ʋ.
42022006	Bɩ, Zidas yɛ sɔ, an n'a kam dɔmɩm k'a n'a dam ma, an Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ ma, kʋ zamaa bɩ b'a dɔ y.
42022007	Bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma cibsa, n nɩ pakkɩ sinnyɛɛm mannɩ bam ma bɩ dɔmɩm a zɔ.
42022008	Yeezuu n Pɩyɛɛr nyɔɔ kan Zaan kɩ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta, a yaa pakkɩ cibsa hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka k'ʋ b'a bɩ."
42022009	Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ʋ aa hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka ka?"
42022010	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ n'ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a dɩga a, k'awɔɔ gasʋ tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, awɔɔ gʋaayar deem zɛŋ ʋ, an gər busu kan hi kɩ, k'a zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, a gasʋ har k'a nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ b'ʋ.
42022011	K'a hɩ har bɩ zaa m, a ʋ: Karɩnsaamba y'ɩbɩɩ larm: saanɔɔcɛ ɩ ka, kʋ m bɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kan m karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ?
42022012	A cɛ gʋta hɩnkarɛ awɔɔ m mim ʋ, n nɩ mɔrlɔ wɔɔ banka haay, bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, awɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bankaŋ ʋ."
42022013	Ŋ n ta, ŋn'a hɔ haay k'a a hɩ bɩ yɩ, ŋnɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba.
42022014	Wakatɩ bɩ k'a a ku bɩ, Yeezuu yaa nyɩnta kan a zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ.
42022015	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta kʋ m pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ naa do bɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, kʋ m bɔkarɛ m fɩr yɩ.
42022016	Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m hɔbɩrɛ naa do bɩ fɩɩga y, k'a mim m tolle ba an kʋ yɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ."
42022017	A n hɔmire sa, an yaa da Woso m barka, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a si a a mi kan kʋ kɩ.
42022018	Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a nya her mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m dɩvɛn mi dʋntɔ y, an ta an Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ku."
42022019	A n bɔkarɛ an bur sa, k'a yaa da Woso m barka an a nya bɩ, a a zɩnzɛ ra an a ka ŋ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ mɛ m naa, [mɔɔ n a ka awɔɔ minto. K'a naa ba mɔɔ tɔdaanɔʋ minto."
42022020	Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kur bɩ, a hɔmihɔ sa an a ba maam sɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔmire naa do gʋaasɩbabaa daa hɔmire m. Mɔɔ ma m, an a lo awɔɔ minto.]"
42022021	"K'a tʋr ka, gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ, a ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ naa ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
42022022	Sɩra m, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛm bɩ ga, amba Woso lɛɛ ka an a hɩ bɩ m. Bɩ, kʋsɩ ɩ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ kɩ."
42022023	Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a sɩŋŋɩda sa ŋn'ɩ kʋ larm: "Wɔɔ bireyaa ʋ naa ʋ, nka n nɩ mim naa do barɛ?"
42022024	Ŋ wuti bɩsɩkarɛ vanta m kan kʋ kɩ, k'a a dɔ nka m jɩtaarɛ gɛ.
42022025	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Do vantɔɔ cinno ɩ cirbəə bɩm ŋn'a so a tarazannɔ ʋ, bɩ cinno wɔɔ y'a kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ birm: mimmɩŋŋabənno.
42022026	B'awɔɔ kan kʋ kɩ, a b'a ba maam y. Bɔ n jɩtaarɛ awɔɔ bireyaa ʋ bɩ, k'an a ba awɔɔ dam poore. Bɔ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'an a ba awɔɔ zibəənyɩ.
42022027	Nka m jɩtaarɛ paan•••? Bɔ ɩ nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm bɩ m gɛɛ, bɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ sa an n'a kam bɩ nɩ? Mɔɔ ʋ: bɔ ɩ nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm bɩ m. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bireyaa ʋ am zibəənyɩ hɔ bɩ m."
42022028	Awɔɔ, awɔɔ gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay m cicir nɔ ʋ.
42022029	Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ cirbəə bɩncɛ bankam awɔɔ minto, amba mɔɔ Zɩ a banka mɔɔ minto bɩ m.
42022030	K'a a da ma, a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan mɔɔ kɩ a hɔ bɩ, a hɔ mi mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ. K'a a da ma sɔ a nyɩnta cirbəəduuro ra, a Israyɛl do bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar.
42022031	Bɩ, Zuuba a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, Sɩmɔɔn, Sʋtaana a yɛ k'awɔɔ daŋŋa am hɔyaa hɔ bɩ m.
42022032	Bɩ mɔɔ yaa da ɩbɩɩ minto k'ɩbɩɩ sɩrakarɛ b'a da jɩm ʋ y. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi, k'ɩ danyɩnɔ heer ba kookoo."
42022033	Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ yɛ kʋ m ta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Baa kʋ zɛ m sɔ, mɔɔ yɛrɛ m ga kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ."
42022034	Bɩ Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʋ: "Pɩyɛɛr, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam gum naa ʋ, ɩ ʋ: ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ dɔ y, gallɛm kaakʋ, koo n bɔkarɛ an baa da."
42022035	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ awɔɔ nyɔɔ, awɔɔ n busoohɛra sa y kan bɔɔn kɩ, kʋsɔrɔ kɩ bɩ, bɔ ɩ kʋrɔ awɔɔ ʋ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Hɔsɩ."
42022036	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ busoohɛra m bɩ, k'an a sa; Gʋaa k'a nɩ bɔɔn m bɩ, k'an a sa sɔ. Gʋaa k'a ba kargʋ m bɩ, k'an a huu hɛɛ an a si m.
42022037	Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: mim niŋŋə kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ mɔɔ minto bɩ kʋ yɩm: 'N y'a lɛ sa n a da mimbʋnyaabənno barla.' Bɩ sɩra m, hɔ niŋŋə kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ minto bɩ kʋ yɩm."
42022038	Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, kargʋrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ba n na." A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "A bʋrbɔ."
42022039	Yeezuu bɔ an ta Oliviyee ci mim ʋ, amba a tɩr a bam bɩ m. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.
42022040	K'a lee ku bɩncɛ b'ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa da, a yaa n a do makra nɔ ʋ."
42022041	A n a jɛ bɔ ŋ ma, an ta lɛɛ poore, an a kukurə zɛ, an nɩ yaa darɛ, a ʋ:
42022042	"M Zɩ, k'ɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ fɩr naa do gʋ mɔɔ ma, kan bɩ kɩ haay ɩ bɩ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y, ɩ hɔ ba!" [
42022043	Bɩ ma bɩ, malɛɛka y'a to arzana ʋ, an b'a hɩnka m, an a paŋŋa da ra.
42022044	Yeezuu nɩ zoo kaŋŋɩda bam a heer ʋ, an n'a tʋntɔŋ ʋ kan yaadarɛ kɩ, a lɛɛmaa n'a ba am macina hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ surm tara ʋ.]
42022045	K'a yaa bɩ da bɩ, a wuti, an bʋr a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an bɩ dɩga a ŋ hinceem ba heerzarlɛ nɔ ʋ.
42022046	A n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ nɩ hinceem barɛ? K'a wuti, a yaa da k'a b'a do makra nɔ ʋ y!"
42022047	Kʋ Yeezuu gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, gʋaa cir gʋta bʋr. Iskarɩyɔtɩ Zidas bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem b'ɩ nyɩnta gʋaa cir gʋta bɩ lɛɛ, an a zɔ Yeezuu ma k'a yaa da m.
42022048	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zidas, yaa ɩ n'a dam Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m kan daʋrɛ kɩ, k'ɩ zambʋ ba ma gɛ?"
42022049	Bɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ k'a n'a bam k'a nyɩnta ʋ bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, ʋ ŋ zɛ kargʋ m gɛ?"
42022050	Bɩ ŋ gʋaa deem wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ zibəənyɩ sakʋ an a bɩsɩ tʋr gʋ ma.
42022051	Bɩ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a to maam." A n bɔkarɛ an a wɔ da gʋaa bɩ tʋr bɩ ma, an a waa.
42022052	Yeezuu n a bɔ, an a hɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m, kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cinno kɩ, kan gʋɔɔgusinno kʋ ŋ bʋr k'a b'a nyasʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ bʋr kan kargʋrɔ kɩ, bannɔ kɩ, ɩ ʋ, ta awɔɔ nawʋm koor nyasʋ jɩ ʋ.
42022053	Bɩ mɔɔ nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay Wosocɛ ʋ, b'awɔɔ n a wɔ da mɔɔ ma y. Naa ma bɩ, awɔɔ wakatɩ m kan monsigə cir bɩ hɔ kɩ."
42022054	Kʋ ŋ Yeezuu nyasʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʋ. Pɩyɛɛr n zu a jɛ ʋ laatʋ, an ta.
42022055	N nɩ sɛ hɛ hallu bireyaa ʋ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ. Pɩyɛɛr n ta, an aa nyɩnta ŋ bireyaa ʋ sɔ.
42022056	Zibəənyɩlʋ k'a a yɩ an nɩ nyɩntam sɛ bɩ lɛ ma b'ʋ bɩ, a dɩga a sɩɩ•••, a ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do nyɩnta kan kɩ sɔ!"
42022057	Bɩ Pɩyɛɛr bɩsɩ ka, a ʋ: "Lʋ, mɔɔ n a dɔ y."
42022058	K'a yɩ poore bɩ, gʋaa vanta n a yɩ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "ɩbɩɩ sɔ, ŋ gʋaa deem n'ɩbɩɩ m!" Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ gʋaa bɩ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ayy•••, ŋ gʋaa deem bɛɛ n mɔɔ nɩ y!"
42022059	K'a maasɩrɛ ba an wakatɩ deem ku bɩ, gʋaa vanta a ya, an a hɩ, an so ra, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, gʋaa naa do nyɩnta kan kɩ! Galilee gʋaa m."
42022060	Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa, mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ hɩ y!" Lɛɛm bɩ, k'a gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, koo n baa da.
42022061	Zuuba n a bɔ, an dɩga Pɩyɛɛr ma. Pɩyɛɛr n mim niŋŋə kʋ Zuuba a hɩ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma her gallɛm kaakʋ, ɩ ʋ: ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ dɔ y, koo n bɔkarɛ an baa da.
42022062	A n bɔ garga ra, an nyi ka kan heerzarlɛ kɩ.
42022063	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔm Yeezuu ma rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa wʋm ma, ŋn'a zɛm.
42022064	Ŋ n pɛɛra sa, ŋn'a ku a meer la, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa n'ɩ mɩ. Nka y'ɩbɩɩ zɛ, a hɩ?"
42022065	Ŋ n bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ sʋnsɔ do haay wʋ Yeezuu ma.
42022066	Woso k'a haan bɩ, tara bɩ jɩtannɔ kan wosocɛmannɩbənno kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ a so kʋ ma, ŋnɩ Yeezuu gaa, ŋnɩ bʋr m a dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
42022067	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ Krista n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ hɩ ʋ m!" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ b'a sim mɔɔ nɩ y.
42022068	Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ laaka da awɔɔ han sɔ, awɔɔ b'a nyɩ bɔm mɔɔ nʋ y.
42022069	Bɩ, naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ y'aa nyɩnta Woso paŋŋazaa bɩsɩ ʋ."
42022070	Ŋ haay n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ minto bɩ, Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m na?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ hɩ, a m mɔɔ m."
42022071	Bɩ, ŋ haay a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Kasɛtɩzannɔ zibəə ta wɔɔ ma ra! Wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a lɛ mim bɩ ma."
42023001	Bɩ sokʋma zannɔ wɔɔ wuti, ŋnɩ Yeezuu gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Pɩlatɩ taa.
42023002	Ŋ nɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋnɩ mim ka ra, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ sʋr gʋaa naa do ra, an nɩ wɔɔ tara gʋɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ, an n'a tarɛ ŋ nɩ tolle, a ʋ: ŋ bɩ Rɔm cir yawʋr ka y. A n a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Awɔɔ m Krista, cir n'awɔɔ m."
42023003	Pɩlatɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m nɩ?" Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ."
42023004	Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m kan zamaa bɩ kɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n gʋaa naa do kʋrɔma yɩ y."
42023005	Bɩ, ŋ so ra, ŋ n'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A mɩŋŋa nɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ a hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ. A sɩŋŋɩda a sa Galilee ʋ, an bɔ Zidee ʋ, an bɔkarɛ an lee ku naa ʋ."
42023006	Pɩlatɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a laaka da, a ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ Galilee gʋaa m gɛ?"
42023007	K'a a dɔ a ʋ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ gʋrga gʋaa m bɩ, a a nyɔɔ Hɩrɔɔdɩ zi. Bɩ nyɩnta Zerizalɛm ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ.
42023008	Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a heer nyɔɔ gʋta, bala, a a ŋʋa k'a yɩ a dɔmɩm laatʋ. Bala, a a mim ma, an n'a hɔɔn dam k'an hoser ba k'a yɩ.
42023009	A hɔ gʋta laaka da han, bɩ Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ y.
42023010	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba, ŋn'a karɛ a lɛ m kan a paŋŋa jire kɩ.
42023011	Bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a zɛ kʋ ra kan a dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ, ŋnɩ yaa wʋ ma, ŋnɩ cicir ka ma, ŋnɩ cinno huu du ma. Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a ka, ŋn'a wusigəm ŋnɩ ta m Pɩlatɩ zi.
42023012	Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Pɩlatɩ kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ kɩ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta kʋ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ, ŋ gʋaasɩbabaa da kʋ ma.
42023013	Bɩ kur bɩ, Pɩlatɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bir, kan cinno vantɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ,
42023014	an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gʋaa naa do gaa a b'a ka mɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ: gʋɔɔ an nɩ ŋ nyʋnnyɔɔm. Bɩ mɔɔ lar awɔɔ taa naa ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɩ, an a ba, an bʋnyaa amba awɔɔ hɩ bɩ nɩ y.
42023015	Hɩrɔɔdɩ n hɔsɩ yɩ sɔ y, an a wusigə mɔɔ zi. Gʋaa bɩ n hɔsɩ ba an a ga zɛ nɩ y.
42023016	Bɩ k'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, mɔɔ y'a kam ŋn'a hʋnhʋr mɩŋŋa, m bɔkarɛ, m a to." [
42023017	Pakkɩ cibsa haay, pakra m kʋ Pɩlatɩ n ŋ hɔɔnhɔ lɔ deem bɔ an a ka ŋ ʋ.]
42023018	Bɩ y'a ka, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a zɛ kʋ ra haay, ŋn'ɩ zee dam: "K'a gʋaa naa do zɛ, k'a Barabas bɔ a ka wɔɔ ʋ."
42023019	Barabas bɩ nyasʋ ŋ y'a ʋ, ŋn'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, nyaa k'a zɛ an a da tara nɔ ʋ, an gər zɛ bɩ minto.
42023020	Pɩlatɩ n a ya, an meer ba kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ k'a Yeezuu to.
42023021	Ŋ haay n zee da, ŋ ʋ: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma! K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"
42023022	Pɩlatɩ a ya, an ŋ lar a gallɛm kaakʋ hɔ ma, a ʋ: "Bɔ a ba an bʋnyaa? Kʋ mɔɔ m, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɩ an a ba, an a ga zɛ nɩ y. K'a maam nɩ, mɔɔ y'a kam, ŋn'a hʋnhʋr, m bɔkarɛ m a to."
42023023	Ŋ n a gu, ŋn'a hɩ ŋn'ɩ som la kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!" Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ bʋgʋr bɩ n maam-maam bɩ, ŋ bʋr Pɩlatɩ la.
42023024	Pɩlatɩ n dʋdɔ bɩ yar amba ŋ lɛ n taa bɩ m.
42023025	Bɩ, a gʋaa niŋŋə k'a yar ba, an gər zɛ, ŋn'a nyasʋ, ŋn'a du bɩ to, amba ŋ y'a yɛ bɩ m. A n bɔkarɛ an Yeezuu to yarbənno m, kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔnmim ba m.
42023026	Kʋ yarbənno wɔɔ Yeezuu nyasʋ, ŋn'ɩ tam nɩ bɩ, ŋ Sirɛnnɩ gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn bɩ zɛ ʋ, an a to poo ʋ an nɩ zɛm, ŋn'a nyasʋ, ŋn'a da gɔdarkʋra bɩ busure ʋ k'an zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ.
42023027	Zamaa gʋta zu a jɛ ʋ kan lannɔ kɩ. Lannɔ wɔɔ n zɛnyi da ʋ Yeezuu tɔ ma.
42023028	Yeezuu n a bɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zerizalɛm lannɔ, a bɩ nyi ka mɔɔ tɔ ma y. K'a nyi ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ tɔ ma an lɛ da, kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ.
42023029	Bala, dɔmɩm ta ʋ an nɩ zɛm, n nɩ zɛm b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m lannɔ kʋ cɩnarɔ m, kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr nyɩnɔ yɩm cɩna rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, kan bɔɔ ɩ nɩ nyɔ ka nyɩnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
42023030	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, n y'a hɩm ciro m: K'a da wɔɔ ra, ŋn'a hɩ dimbirlɔ m: K'a ku wɔɔ ra.
42023031	Bala, kʋ n y'a bam gɔ butur m ncɩnaaʋ, a zɛm bɩ nyɩnta gɔ gər ma lɔ?"
42023032	Ŋ bibiiro gaa hɩɩya k'a yaa nɩ ŋ zɛ kan kɩ.
42023033	Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma: 'Minkorgo' bɩ, yarbənno yaa a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma b'ʋ kan bibiiro hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Deem a bɩsɩ, deem a jɩsa.
42023034	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, sugur ka ŋ ʋ, bala hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bam bɩ, ŋ n a jɩ dɔ y." Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, ŋ n pʋɛɛga da a huuro wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ jir kan kʋ kɩ.
42023035	Zamaa bɩ n jɩm b'ʋ, an nɩ dɩgam. Tara cinno wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʋm ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A gɔsɩnnɔ bʋmbɔ. Kʋ Krista kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ bɩ n'awɔɔ nɩ, k'an a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ a zim."
42023036	Yarbənno wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʋm ma sɔ. Ŋ y'a zɔ, ŋnɩ bɛɛ hɛɛnr ka ʋ, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ:
42023037	"Kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ ɩ zim."
42023038	Ŋ nɩ warga deem zeŋŋə a mim la, ŋn'a gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir m naa."
42023039	Bibii deem k'a nɩ zeŋŋəm gɔdarkʋra ma kan kɩ bɩ y'a sʋnsɔ wʋm, a ʋ: "Krista bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m na? Ɩ mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ, k'ɩ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ sɔ."
42023040	Deem bɩ n nyaa ba kan kɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩr nyi bam Woso m na? Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ nɔ ʋ am a hɔ bɩ m.
42023041	Kʋ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ, a a ga m, k'ʋ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩ an a ga wɔɔ mim barɛ m, bɩ kʋ naa zaa nɩ, a mim ba ʋ y."
42023042	A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Yeezuu, k'ɩ yaa lee ku ɩ cirbəə bɩncɛ ʋ, k'ɩ mɔɔ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ."
42023043	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: her naa ʋ, ɩbɩɩ nyɩntam kan mɔɔ kɩ arzana ʋ."
42023044	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ sinsebir da, monsigə gʋta n zɛ tara burə ʋ jilli, woso n ter, lɛɛ n'a ba bimm••• an ta an wakatɩ kaakʋ ku. Wosocɛ pɛɛra bɩ n kaansʋ a bire ʋ.
42023046	Yeezuu n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m nyi darɛ ɩbɩɩ wɔ ʋ." K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a ga.
42023047	Yarbənno zɔrɔ cir bɩ k'a hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, a y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, gʋaa naa do nyɩnta gʋaa tɩrga."
42023048	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr k'a bɩ dɩga a bɩ, kʋ ŋ hɔ haay k'a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə ŋn'ɩ doom kan heerzar kɩ.
42023049	Bɩ Yeezuu dɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ haay, kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ hallɩ Galilee ʋ saa••• rɔ wɔɔ haay jɩm laatʋ ŋn'ɩ dɩgarɛ.
42023050	Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a tɔ m Zozɛf. Zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ deem kʋ n n'a birm Arimatee kʋ bɩ gʋaa m. Gʋaa bɩ do nyɩnta mɩŋŋa, a nyɩnta gʋaa tɩrga. A nyɩnta, an nɩ dɔm Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ ma. A nyɩnta dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ gʋaa deem, b'a n yɛ hɔ kʋ dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ a cɩnta, ŋn'a ba naa ma y.
42023052	A n ta Pɩlatɩ zi, an aa Yeezuu gər bɩ yɛ han.
42023053	A n a zer gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma, an pɛɛra mɩŋŋa ku ra, an aa wʋta yaa deem kʋ n y'a hɔn ci ʋ, bɩ n nɩ gər bir ʋ cɩna bɩ nɔ ʋ.
42023054	Pakkɩ cibsa hinni m, bɩ sabaa y'a bam k'a sɩŋŋɩda sa sɔ.
42023055	Lannɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Galilee ʋ ŋnɩ bʋr kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ Zozɛf da zaa ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ dɩga yaa bɩ ma, kʋ ŋ Yeezuu bir lʋnlɔ gɛ.
42023056	Ŋ n a wusigə k'a yaa tidəər hi banka kan nyɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, kan bɩ kɩ, sabaa hinni ʋ bɩ, ŋ hoon si amba Woso lɛ ka bɩ m.
42024001	Hatʋ hinni ʋ wutigʋta m, lannɔ wɔɔ ta yaa ra b'ʋ kan tidəər nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a banka bɩ kɩ.
42024002	Kʋ ŋ lee ku b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a jaa kʋ ŋ y'a ta yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ bɩ, n y'a gərgu n n a gʋ rɛ, n n ta m laatʋ, n n yaa bɩ lɛ bɩ to.
42024003	Gasʋ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, ŋ n Yeezuu gər bɩ yɩ y.
42024004	Ŋ n a dɔ k'a hɔɔn an n'a dam lɔ mim naa do ma y. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔyaarɔ hɩɩyɔɔ y'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ, ŋ huuro nɩ yɔm.
42024005	Ŋ da bɔ ʋ, ŋn'a meer zuutə. Yaarɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto awɔɔ n'a kam gʋaa k'an mɩsɩr bɩ ma gəəno bire ʋ?
42024006	A ba naa ʋ y. A a mɩm bɔ ʋ. K'a hɔ niŋŋə k'a hɩ awɔɔ m, an bɩr Galilee ʋ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ."
42024007	A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Pakra m, kʋ n n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋ n a ka mimbʋnyaabənno ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, bɩ k'an a mɩm bɔ ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ."
42024008	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, lannɔ wɔɔ Yeezuu mim bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
42024009	Lannɔ wɔɔ n a hʋr yaa ra b'ʋ, ŋn'a wusigə, ŋn'aa naa haay hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeenno wɔɔ m kan gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ kɩ m.
42024010	Nyɩnta a ʋ: Magdalaa Maarii, kan Zannɩ kɩ, kan Zakkɩ da Maarii kɩ. Lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ mim naa do hɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m sɔ.
42024011	Bɩ, kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a tʋr ka lannɔ wɔɔ mim bɩ ma, ŋ n a si y, ŋ ʋ: "Para-para ŋ n'a dɩndam."
42024012	Pɩyɛɛr n wuti an bra si, an ta yaa ra b'ʋ. Bɩ, k'a yaa zerga an dɩga yaa bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, pɛɛra b'a a yɩ, an nɩ cɩntam. A n a wusigə, an doo. A n zɛ kədə hɔ k'a ba bɩ tɔ ma.
42024013	Hinni bɩ do ʋ, karɩndanyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ tam kʋ kʋ n n'a birm Emayuus b'ʋ. Tara bɩ, a ga kʋ ʋ a ba cilo bueeredeem kan Zerizalɛm kɩ.
42024014	Ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ mim k'a ba bɩ dɩndam kan kʋ kɩ.
42024015	Kʋ ŋ nɩ mim bɩ dɩndam, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kʋ kɩ bɩ, Yeezuu bɩ ŋ ku, an nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ.
42024016	Bɔ a kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ: Hɔ y'a ka ŋ mɩm la, ŋ n a dɔ kʋ nka nɩ y.
42024017	Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ ka an nɩ tarɛ?" Ŋ n a gaa, ŋnɩ jɩm kan heerzarlɛ kɩ.
42024018	Ŋ gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Kleopas b'a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ deem ɩ gɔɔta Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ naa ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n mim k'a ba dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ bɩ dɔ ra?"
42024019	Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩ ba?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa, a zibəə paŋŋa nyɩnta ʋ kan a meerbaa kɩ Woso taa bɩ, kan gʋaa haay kɩ taa sɔ bɩ,
42024020	wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wɔɔ cinno kɩ y'a nyasʋ, ŋn'a dʋdɔ ka, ŋ ʋ: A a ga zɛ m. Ŋ n a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
42024021	Wɔɔ y'ʋ hɔɔn dam, ʋ ʋ: A n nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ Israyɛl bʋmbɔ. Bɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, minno nɔɔn duro ba ŋ y'a ʋ, a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hɔ m her.
42024022	Sɩra m, lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ barla rɔ wɔɔ a ka wɔɔ n zɛ kədə. Ta ŋ y'a ʋ yaa ra b'ʋ wutigʋta m,
42024023	Ŋ n aa a gər bɩ yɩ y, ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: Malɛɛkarɔ y'a hɩnka awɔɔ m, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu mɩsɩr.
42024024	Wɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ta yaa ra b'ʋ, ŋn'a hɔ haay bɩ yɩ amba lannɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ m, bɩ ŋ n a mɩŋŋa yɩ y."
42024025	Bɩ Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔɔn poore zannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ bɩr yɛm an nɩ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a hɩ awɔɔ m haay bɩ mim sim zɔɔ y.
42024026	Pakra m kan Krista kɩ, k'an fɩr yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, k'an bɔkarɛ an gasʋ a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ."
42024027	A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ kʋ Wosoci a hɩ a minto bɩ jɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ. A n a sa Moyiisi ma kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a mim gʋrsɩra ba rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
42024028	Kʋ ŋ y'a zɔ tara kʋ ŋ nɩ taŋ ʋ bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu n a hɔ ba ɩ ʋ, a hɩ a ʋ k'a cem ŋ han.
42024029	Ŋ n yu ra, ŋ ʋ: "Gɔɔta kan wɔɔ kɩ, woso lɛ y'a zom." Yeezuu n gasʋ k'a gɔɔta kan ŋ kɩ.
42024030	K'a nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ bɩ, a bur sa an a barka da ʋ an bɔkarɛ an a zɩnzɛ ra, an a ka ŋ ʋ.
42024031	Bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ mɩm zer, ŋnɩ Yeezuu dɔ, bɩ Yeezuu nyaam ŋ lɛɛ.
42024032	Ŋ n'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Sɩra m, dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a nyɩnta an nɩ Wosoci bʋmbɔm wɔɔ m kʋ zi, ʋ nɩ tam bɩ, wɔɔ heer yɩ nyɩnta gʋta."
42024033	Ŋ n a bɔ lɛɛm, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋn'a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeenno wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'a so kʋ ma kan a muno kɩ.
42024034	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ duro n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Sɩra m, Zuuba a mɩm bɔ ʋ! A a hɩnka Sɩmɔɔn m."
42024035	Gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ n hɔ k'a ba zaa bire ʋ bɩ hɩ, ŋn'a hɩ sɔ, ŋ ʋ: "Yeezuu k'a bʋr an nɩ bur bɩ zɩnzɛm la bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ wɔɔ b'a dɔ ma, ʋ ʋ, a mɩŋŋa m."
42024036	Kʋ ŋ gɔɔta, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan kʋ kɩ bɩ, Yeezuu bʋr ŋ bire ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ."
42024037	Ŋ da n bɔ ʋ, nyibəə gʋta n gasʋ ŋ ʋ. Ŋ hɔɔn ʋ bɩ, zinə awɔɔ yɩ naa.
42024038	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ da bɔ ʋ n ta awɔɔ nɩ? Bɔ hɔɔndarɛ n ta awɔɔ heer ʋ?
42024039	K'a dɩga mɔɔ wɔrɔ ma kan mɔɔ gannɔ kɩ. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m bala! K'a wɔ da mɔɔ ma, a dɩga a. Zinə mɛsim ba ʋ, b'a yaa ba ʋ, amba awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩ mɔɔ m ta m naa nɩ y."
42024040	K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a a wɔrɔ hɩnka kan a gannɔ kɩ.
42024041	Heernyɔɔ gʋta nyɩnta ŋ ʋ, ŋ n zɛ kədə. Bɩ y'a ka ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a si y. Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ: "Hɔbɩrɛ y'awɔɔ ʋ naa ʋ ra?"
42024042	Ŋ n zɔdɩsɛɛrɛ sa, ŋn'a ka ʋ.
42024043	A n a si, an a sʋ ŋ mɩnyaa m.
42024044	A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n na: Pakra m kʋ hɔ haay kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ minto, Moyiisi lɛrɔ ci nɔ ʋ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro kɩ nɔ ʋ, kan laarɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ n kʋ yɩ."
42024045	Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu n ŋ hɔɔn gu, kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosoci bɩ jɩ dɔ.
42024046	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ba hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba bɩ n na: Pakra m kʋ Krista n fɩr yɩ, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ.
42024047	Bɩ, a tɔ ma bɩ, a a ga m kʋ n n'a pa da durnya gʋɔɔ m, kʋ n n'a mɩsɩrbaa lʋr, kʋ n n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, bɩ a sɩŋŋɩda an n'a sam Zerizalɛm ma.
42024048	Mɔɔ kasɛtɩzannɔ n'awɔɔ m.
42024049	Bɩ, mɔɔ ganwʋrɛ kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ a ler bɔ bɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ m. B'awɔɔ, k'a gɔɔta tara nɔ ʋ naa ʋ, an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ paŋŋa k'a n'a tom brama, an zer awɔɔ mim ʋ bɩ ku."
42024050	Bɩ Yeezuu ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ tara bɩ nɔ ʋ, an ta ŋ nɩ Betanii zeezi. B'ʋ bɩ, a a wɔ busu, an ŋ barka da ʋ.
42024051	K'a nɩ ŋ barka daŋ ʋ bɩ, a a gʋ ŋ ma, an der arzana ʋ.
42024052	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n Yeezuu da ʋ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a wusigə Zerizalɛm ʋ kan heernyɔɔ gʋta kɩ.
42024053	Bɩ ŋ tɩr ta Wosocɛ ʋ dɔmɩm haay ŋnɩ bɩr a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
43001001	A sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, Lemim bɩ lɛɛ ka an nyɩnta ʋ. Lemim bɩ nyɩnta a ʋ kan Woso kɩ, bɩ Lemim bɩ, Woso m.
43001002	A sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, a nyɩnta ʋ kan Woso kɩ.
43001003	Hɔ haay bɩ, a y'a da. Hɔ ba ʋ an ba, an nyɩnta a nɔ ʋ y.
43001004	Mɩsɩrbaa bɩ, nyɩnta a ʋ a mɩŋŋa ʋ, bɩ Mɩsɩrbaa bɩ nyɩnta gʋɔɔ Lɛɛgure.
43001005	Lɛɛgure bɩ nɩ yɔm monsigə nɔ ʋ, bɩ monsigə bɩ n a si y.
43001006	Gʋaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, Woso n a nyɔɔ. A tɔ m Zaan.
43001007	Bʋr a ʋ kasɛtɩ m, k'a bɩ Lɛɛgure kasɛtɩ ka, kʋ gʋaa haay n a si, a kasɛtɩ bɩ minto.
43001008	A bɛɛ m Lɛɛgure y. Bʋr a ʋ, k'a bɩ Lɛɛgure kasɛtɩ ka.
43001009	Lɛɛgure paan•••, Lemim bɩ m, an bʋr durnya nɔ ʋ k'a bɩ lɛɛ gu gʋaa haay m.
43001010	A nyɩnta durnya nɔ ʋ, a ɩ durnya da, bɩ, kʋ nka m a mɩŋŋa nɩ, durnyazannɔ n a dɔ y.
43001011	Bʋr a ʋ a dogʋɔɔ bire ʋ, b'a dogʋɔɔ n a si y.
43001012	Bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a si, ŋnɩ sɩra ka a tɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a ba Woso nyɩnɔ.
43001013	Brɔɔ n yɩ ma nɔ ʋ, kan mɛsim lɛtaama kɩ, kan gʋaa hɔɔnhɔ kɩ y. Yɩ ŋ y'a ʋ Woso nɔ ʋ.
43001014	Lemim b'a ba gʋaa, an bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ bire ʋ, mɩŋŋabaa n a heer han kan sɩra kɩ. Wɔɔ cirbəə yɩ, cirbəə niŋŋə kʋ Zɩ b'a ka Nyɩ k'a vanta ba ʋ b'ʋ.
43001015	Zaan a kasɛtɩ ka, an n'a pa darɛ, a ʋ: "Ba gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ma bɩ n na. A lɛ da mɔɔ m, an nɩ zɛm mɔɔ jɛ ʋ, bala, dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n nyɩnta ʋ bɩ, a ta ʋ."
43001016	Woso hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ haay k'a nɩ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ŋ yɩ barka k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
43001017	Moyiisi ɩ bʋr lɛrɔ m, bɩ, Yeezuu Krista ɩ bʋr barka m kan sɩra kɩ.
43001018	Gʋaa ba ʋ, an Woso yɩ y. Woso Nyɩ a deem, k'a m Woso, an n'a Zɩ jɩr ʋ bɩ, a a hɩnka wɔɔ m.
43001019	Ba Zaan kasɛtɩ k'a ka bɩ n na. Dɔmɩm niŋŋə kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ wosocɛmannɩbənno kan a daahanzannɔ kɩ nyɔɔ ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'aa laaka naa do da han, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ?"
43001020	A n bɩsɩ ka a nyɩbɔʋrɛ ma y, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Krista (kʋ Woso a ler bɔ k'a nyɔɔ bɩ) bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y."
43001021	Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ? Elii n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Elii bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y." "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ayy•••"
43001022	Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ? Kʋ aa a nyɩbɔʋrɛ ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ wɔɔ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ. K'ɩbɩɩ m, nka n'ɩbɩɩ m paan•••?"
43001023	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ bɩ m: " 'Leer k'a nɩ bɔm poohɔɔn ʋ bɩ' m mɔɔ m, 'k'a Zuuba zaa zɛ a wʋta.' "
43001024	Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ, farizɛɛnrɔ m.
43001025	Ŋ n gɔɔta, ŋn'a larlɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ Krista, gɛɛ Elii, gɛɛ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, bɔ minto ɩbɩɩ nɩ batɛm karɛ?"
43001026	Zaan a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ naa, batɛm mɔɔ n'a kam hi nɔ ʋ. Gʋaa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ.
43001027	A ɩ zɛm mɔɔ jɛ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʋsɔrɔ bar hʋr y."
43001028	Ba naa ʋ Betanii ʋ, kɔ kʋ n n'a birm Zʋrdɛn bɩ lɛ ra zeezi, bɩncɛ kʋ Zaan nɩ batɛm kaŋ ʋ b'ʋ.
43001029	Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Zaan Yeezuu yɩ, an nɩ zɛm zi, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ba Woso sinnyɛɛm k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaa k'a nɩ durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ gʋm ma bɩ n na.
43001030	A mɩŋŋa mɔɔ hɩ ma, mɔɔ ʋ: A lɛ da mɔɔ m, an nɩ zɛm mɔɔ jɛ ʋ, bala, a lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m, an ta ʋ.
43001031	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ n nyɩnta m a dɔ y, kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ Israyɛl ʋ bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ batɛm kam hi ʋ."
43001032	Zaan a kasɛtɩ ka, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri yɩ, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan cirpʋʋrɛ kɩ, an a to brama, an bɩ zer a mim ʋ.
43001033	Bɩ, mɔɔ n nyɩnta m a dɔ y. Bɩ, Woso ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: kʋ m bɩ batɛm ka hi ʋ. Gʋaa niŋŋə kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n nɩ zerle a mim la bɩ n nɩ zɛm bɩ batɛm ka Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ.
43001034	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ, m n'a kasɛtɩ kam, mɔɔ ʋ, a m Woso Nyɩ."
43001035	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Zaan a ya, an ta bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ hɩɩya.
43001036	K'a Yeezuu yɩ, an nɩ cenim bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso sinnyɛɛm bɩ ba n nɩ."
43001037	Kʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a ma, an n'a hɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ zu Yeezuu ʋ.
43001038	Yeezuu n a bɔ an dɩga a kur, k'a ŋ yɩ ŋn'ɩ zure a jɛ ʋ bɩ, a ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ awɔɔ n'a kam ma?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Rabi, - a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: karɩnsaamba - ɩbɩɩ har ɩ ka?"
43001039	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr a dɩga a." Ŋ n ta, ŋnɩ bɩncɛ bɩ dɔ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta kan kɩ hinni bɩ do ʋ. Nyɩnta a ʋ yirbəə wakatɩ si ma.
43001040	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr danzaa Andɩr nyɩnta ŋ gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem, ŋn'a tʋr ka Zaan meerbaa bɩ ma, ŋnɩ zu Yeezuu ʋ.
43001041	Lɛɛm bɩ, a ta, an aa a danyɩ Sɩmɔɔn bɩ yɩ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Wɔɔ Mesii bɩ yɩ!" - Bɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Krista. -
43001042	A n a gaa, an ta m Yeezuu zi. Yeezuu n dɩga a sɩɩ••• an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ m Sɩmɔɔn, Zaan nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m; n y'ɩbɩɩ birm Sefas." Bɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Pɩyɛɛr.
43001043	Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a ʋ, k'a ta Galilee ʋ. A n aa Filipi yɩ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ."
43001044	Filipi bɩ, Bɛtsayɩdaa gʋaa m, Andɩr kan Pɩyɛɛr kɩ kʋ ʋ.
43001045	Filipi n aa Natanayɛl yɩ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ n y'a mim dɩnda Moyiisi ciro nɔ ʋ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ hɔɔ kɩ m bɩ, wɔɔ yɩ. Zozɛf nyɩ Yeezuu, Nazarɛtɩ gʋaa bɩ m."
43001046	Natanayɛl n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ mɩŋŋa do bɔm Nazarɛtɩ ʋ ra?" Filipi n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr ɩ dɩga a."
43001047	Yeezuu n Natanayɛl yɩ, an nɩ zɛm zi, an a mim dɩnda, a ʋ: "Ba Israyɛl gʋaa paan••• n na, a zambʋ ba ʋ y."
43001048	Natanayɛl n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ dɔ ka?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Nyɩnta k'ɩbɩɩ ʋ sɔɔn bɩ taa bɩ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, Filipi n ɩbɩɩ bir y."
43001049	Natanayɛl n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ m Israyɛl cir."
43001050	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ sɔɔn bɩ taa bɩ, bɩ y'a ka, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka ra? Ɩbɩɩ hɔ gʋta yɩrɛ, an lɛ da naa m."
43001051	A n a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: awɔɔ brama yɩrɛ an a gʋ, Woso malɛɛkarɔ n bɩr derm, ŋn'ɩ bɩr zerm Gʋaanyɩ bɩ burə ʋ."
43002001	A dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ bɩ, lʋsarɛ cibsa ɩ nyɩnta ʋ Galilee kʋ Kanaa ʋ. Yeezuu da nyɩnta b'ʋ.
43002002	N Yeezuu bir lʋsarɛ cibsa bɩ ma sɔ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ.
43002003	Dɩvɛn bɩ k'a bɩ nya bɩ, Yeezuu da a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɩvɛn ba ŋ ʋ dɔ y."
43002004	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "M naa, kara y'ɩbɩɩ ku? Mɔɔ wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y."
43002005	A da bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a hɔ k'a n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m haay bɩ ba."
43002006	Sipiro ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ sɔrdɩ, ŋnɩ tɩr hi tʋntɔŋ ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ hubɔrɛ minto, amba ŋ tɩr a ba a Woso zaa zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ m. Bɩ sipi deem a da ma, an gər si si.
43002007	Yeezuu n a hɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a hi tʋntɔ sipiro nɔɔn duro ʋ, k'an ŋ hɩnhan." Ŋ n hi bɩ tʋntɔ ŋ ʋ, an ŋ hɩnhan kan a lɛ kɩ.
43002008	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a kusi kɛɛrɛ, a ka hɔjirlezaa b'ʋ." Ŋ n a kusi, ŋn'aa a ka ʋ.
43002009	K'a hi k'a lʋr dɩvɛn bɩ da a lɛ ma bɩ, a n a dɔ k'a to a ʋ ka y. Bɩ, zibəənyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ y'a kusi rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ. A lʋ bɩ zim bɩ bir,
43002010	an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa biyəə naa, dɩvɛn nyɩnta a tɩr lɛɛ ka, an a ka gʋɔɔ ʋ. Kʋ ŋ b'a mi, an ŋ ka, an bɔkarɛ, an bɔ ɩ bɩ nyɩnta bɩ ka ŋ ʋ. Ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ ɩ dɩvɛn nyɩnta bɩ to, an wakatɩ naa do ku!"
43002011	Yeezuu lɛɛkarɛ hoser n naa, an a ba Kanaa ʋ, Galilee kʋ ʋ. A a cirbəə bɩ hɩnka, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n sɩra ka ʋ.
43002012	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a ta Kapɛrnawum ʋ kan a da kɩ, a danyɩnɔ kɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. Ŋ yaa nyɩnta b'ʋ, bɩ, ŋ n maasɩrɛ ba y.
43002013	Zɩɩfʋrɔ pakkɩ cibsa a zɔ, Yeezuu n ta Zerizalɛm ʋ.
43002014	A n aa dɩga a, ŋ yɩ ŋʋannɔ hɛɛnm Wosocɛ hallu ʋ b'ʋ, kan seero kɩ, cirpʋnnɔ kɩ, busoolʋrlɛzannɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ sɔ.
43002015	A n bar sa, an a ba madɩr, an la ŋ la haay Wosocɛ hallu ʋ b'ʋ kan seero wɔɔ kɩ, dono wɔɔ kɩ. A busoolʋrlɛzannɔ wɔɔ bɔɔlʋgʋ bɩ hɩsɩga, an ŋ mɔdrɔkuntərehɔɔ wɔɔ hɩnhɩsɩga.
43002016	A n a hɩ cirpʋnnɔ hɛɛrɛ zannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a bɔ nawɔnnɔ haay m naa ʋ, a bɩ mɔɔ Zɩ cɛ bɩ sa a ba daasɩ y."
43002017	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ har bɩ ŋʋarɛ a so mɔɔ ʋ haay.'
43002018	Zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n meerbaa bɩ sa, ŋ ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ naa, bɔ makra ɩbɩɩ n n'a hɩnkam wɔɔ nɩ?"
43002019	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "K'a Wosocɛ naa do wurgə, mɔɔ yɩ m bɔrɛ m a dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ."
43002020	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Dɔɔraa busi a yaa sɔrdɩ wɔɔ Wosocɛ naa do dɔ, ʋ a nya ma. Ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ, ɩ ʋ, k'ɩ dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ?"
43002021	Bala, Wosocɛ k'a n'a mim hɩm bɩ, a mɩŋŋa mɛ m.
43002022	Bɩ minto y'a ka, Yeezuu k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ, a nyɩnta an a hɩ ncɩnaaʋ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka Wosoci bɩ lemim ʋ kan meerbaa k'a ba bɩ kɩ.
43002023	Yeezuu k'a nɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ pakkɩ cibsa dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋta sɩra ka Yeezuu tɔ ʋ makrarɔ k'a ŋ ba ŋn'a yɩ rɔ wɔɔ minto.
43002024	Bɩ, Yeezuu n yɛ, an sɩra ka ŋ ʋ y. Bala, a ŋ dɔ haay,
43002025	a lɛ baa kʋ n n gʋaa kasɛtɩ ka ʋ y. Bala, a hɔ k'a nɩ gʋaa heer ʋ bɩ dɔ.
43003001	Zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtaarɛ deem ɩ nyɩnta farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ barla, a tɔ m Nikodɛm.
43003002	A n bʋr gunuu Yeezuu zi, an b'a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Rabi, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ karɩnsaamba n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ ɩ to Woso zi. Bala, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an makrarɔ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ ŋ bam nɔ nɔɔn ba, kʋ Woso ba kan a zaa kɩ y."
43003003	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: kʋ gʋaa n a bɔ an yɩ, a bɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ yɩrɛ y."
43003004	Nikodɛm n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa gusi, a y'a bam lɔ k'a a ya, a yɩ gɛ? A y'a bɔrɛ, an gasʋ a da nɔ ʋ a hɩɩya hɔ ma k'a yɩ ra?"
43003005	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: Kʋ gʋaa n yɩ hi nɔ ʋ kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri kɩ, a b'a dam ma, an gasʋ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ y.
43003006	Hɔ k'a yɩ mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɛsim m. Hɔ k'a yɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ bɩ, ɛspri m.
43003007	Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ, ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ so ɩ ra ɩ yɩ bɩ, ɩ bɩ zɛ kədə y.
43003008	Hɩnhɛr bɩ, hɔ an nawʋm bɩncɛ k'a ŋʋa ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n'a bʋgʋr marɛ, b'ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ k'a to a ʋ ka, an nɩ tam ka y. A maam sɔ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ yɩm Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ."
43003009	Nikodɛm n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Naa y'a dam ma, an ba lɔ?"
43003010	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Israyɛl karɩnsaamba n'ɩbɩɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ n hɔɔ nɔɔn duro dɔ y!
43003011	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ wɔɔ n n'a hɩm, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ yɩ bɩ wɔɔ n'a kasɛtɩ kam, awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, awɔɔ bɩr wɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ sire y.
43003012	Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ tara burə minno hɩrɛ b'awɔɔ bɩr ŋ sire, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ brama mim hɩ, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a si?
43003013	Bala, gɔsɩ n ta arzana ʋ y, kʋ n maam Gʋaanyɩ k'a a to arzana ʋ, an bʋr bɩ m.
43003014	Amba Moyiisi k'a mɩm busu brama poohɔɔn ʋ bɩ, pakra m kʋ n n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ busu sɔ.
43003015	Kʋ gʋaa k'a sɩra ka ʋ bɩ n mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ.
43003016	Sɩra m, Woso durnya ŋʋa paan•••, hallɩ an a Nyɩ deem bɩ sa an a ka, kʋ gʋaa k'a nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʋ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa b'a zar y, k'an mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ.
43003017	Bala, Woso n a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ durnya ʋ k'an bɩ durnya dʋdɔ ka y. A nyɔɔ a ʋ, k'an bɩ durnya bʋmbɔ.
43003018	N bɩ gʋaa k'a sɩra ka ʋ bɩ dʋdɔ karɛ y. Bɔ ɩ nɩ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ, n lɛɛ ka, n n a dʋdɔ ka. Bala, a n sɩra ka Woso Nyɩ a deem b'ʋ y.
43003019	Ba dʋdɔ bɩ n na: lɛɛgure bʋr durnya ʋ, gʋɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ monsigə ŋʋa an lɛ da lɛɛgure m, bala, ŋ zibəəro wɔɔ nyɩnta bʋnyaa.
43003020	Gʋaa k'a n'a bʋnyaa bam bɩ, a sɔ lɛɛgure m, an nɩ nyi barɛ, a lɛ baa k'a bʋr lɛɛgure ʋ y, a zibəəro bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ y'a n a hɩnka.
43003021	Gʋaa k'a nɩ sɩra zi bam bɩ, zɛ bɩ nawʋm lɛɛgure ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a zibəəro wɔɔ dɔ, bala, ŋ ba a ʋ Woso tɔ ma."
43003022	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ Zidee kʋ ʋ. A gɔɔta b'ʋ kan ŋ kɩ, an nɩ batɛm kam.
43003023	Zaan ɩ batɛm kam sɔ Enɔɔn kʋ ʋ, Salim kʋ jɩr ʋ. Bala, hi ɩ b'ʋ gʋta. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n bʋr, ŋn'ɩ batɛm sire.
43003024	Bɩ ma bɩ, n n Zaan du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ y.
43003025	Bɩsɩkarɛ wuti Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ kan zɩɩfʋ deem kɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ hubɔrɛ minto.
43003026	Ŋ n bʋr Zaan zi, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, gʋaa k'a nyɩnta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ Zʋrdɛn kɔ zeezi bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n a kasɛtɩ ka bɩ, a ɩ batɛm kam kɛɛrɛ sɔ, gʋaa haay nɩ tam zi."
43003027	Zaan n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa b'a dam ma, an hɔ yɩ, kʋ Woso bɛɛ y'a ka ʋ y.
43003028	Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzannɔ kan hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ kɩ: mɔɔ ʋ Krista bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ n yɩ m nyɔɔ kʋ m lɛɛ ka a lɛɛ.
43003029	Gʋaa k'a nɩ lʋ bɩ m bɩ, bɩ n a zim. Lʋzaa bɩ gʋaasɩba bɩ, jɩm an nawʋm b'ʋ, an n'a tʋr karɛ. Heernyɔɔ n a heer han lʋzaa bɩ leer k'a n'a mam bɩ minto. Mɔɔ heernyɔɔ bɩ n naa, a mɩŋŋa paan•••.
43003030	Pakra m k'a wɩsɩrabaa n bɩr a dam la, kʋ mɔɔ n bɩr m bɔm lɛ."
43003031	Gʋaa k'a a to brama an bʋr bɩ lɛ da hɔ haay ra. Bɔ y'a to tara ʋ bɩ, tara burə gʋaa m, an nɩ tara burə mim dɩndam. Gʋaa k'a a to brama bɩ,
43003032	hɔ k'a yɩ, an a ma sɔ bɩ kasɛtɩ an n'a kam. Bɩ gɔsɩ bɩr a kasɛtɩ bɩ sire y.
43003033	Gʋaa k'a n'a kasɛtɩ bɩ sim bɩ, a sɩra ka an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Woso bɩ sɩrazaa m.
43003034	Sɩra m, gʋaa kʋ Woso a nyɔɔ bɩ, Woso lemim an n'a hɩm. Bala, Woso Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka ʋ, b'a jire ba ʋ y.
43003035	Zɩ Woso a Nyɩ ŋʋa, an hɔ haay sa, an a zar a wɔ ʋ.
43003036	Gʋaa k'a nɩ sɩra kam Nyɩ b'ʋ, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m. Gʋaa k'a kaanm Nyɩ bɩ nɩ, a bɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩrɛ y, bɩ Woso heerbusu gɔɔtarɛ a mim ʋ.
43004001	Kʋ Yeezuu b'a dɔ a ʋ, farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ a ma, ŋn'a dɩndarɛ ŋ ʋ, a ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ yɩm gʋta, an nɩ batɛm karɛ an lɛ da Zaan ra bɩ,
43004002	a a hʋr Zidee kʋ ʋ, an a bɔ, an ta Galilee kʋ ʋ. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu mɩŋŋa bɩr batɛm karɛ y, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n'a kam.
43004004	Bɩ pakra m, k'an aa bɔ Samarii ʋ.
43004005	A yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, ŋn'aa lee ku Samarii kʋ deem kʋ n n'a birm Sikaar bɩ nɔ ʋ. A bɩ laatʋ tara kʋ Zakɔɔb a ka a nyɩ Zozɛf ʋ biisi bɩ ma y.
43004006	Bɩncɛ bɩ do Zakɔɔb hiyəə bɩ n ta ʋ. Yeezuu k'a ta, an kɔ bɩ, a nyɩnta hiyəə bɩ lɛ ra. Nyɩnta a ʋ sinsebir ʋ.
43004007	Samarii kʋ lʋ deem n bʋr k'a bɩ hi kusi. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hi bɩ kusi, ɩ ka m ʋ, kʋ m a mi!"
43004008	Bɩ ma bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ta tara nɔ ʋ, k'a yaa hɔbɩrɛ si.
43004009	Samarii kʋ lʋ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "A ba a ʋ lɔ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m zɩɩfʋ, ɩbɩɩ nɩ hi yɛm mɔɔ han k'ɩ mi, bɩ Samarii kʋ lʋ n mɔɔ nɩ?" Kʋ sɩra nɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bɩr kʋ mam kan Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ kɩ y.
43004010	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ Woso ganwʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ dɔ, kan gʋaa k'a n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, a ʋ: ɩ hi kusi, ɩ ka m ʋ kʋ m a mi naa kɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ ga m, ɩ yɛ han, an hi k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam bɩ ka ɩ ʋ."
43004011	Lʋ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "M Zuuba, poko ba ɩbɩɩ ʋ, ɩ n bɩ hi bɩ kusim nɩ y. Bɩ hiyəə bɩ nɔ ta sɔ. Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hi mɩŋŋa bɩ do m ka?
43004012	Lɛ ɩbɩɩ da wɔɔ yaaba Zakɔɔb k'a hiyəə naa do ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ n na? A mɩŋŋa bɛɛ y'a mi kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ, a hɔbɩsɩrɔ kɩ ra?"
43004013	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a nɩ hi naa do mire, mɩsɩ y'a yarɛ an a zɛ.
43004014	Bɩ, gʋaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ hi kʋ mɔɔ n n'a kaŋ ʋ bɩ mim bɩ, mɩsɩ b'a yarɛ an gʋaa bɩ do zɛ fɩɩga y. Hi kʋ mɔɔ n n'a kaŋ ʋ bɩ y'a bam hi mɩnyaa a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, an bɩr surm, an mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ ka ʋ."
43004015	Lʋ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, hi bɩ do ka m ʋ, kʋ mɩsɩ b'a ya, an m zɛ y, kʋ m bɩ m ya, m bɩ hi kusi naa ʋ y."
43004016	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ta ɩ yaa ɩ zim bɩ bir, k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ bʋr naa ʋ."
43004017	Lʋ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zim ba ʋ y."
43004018	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ gumə ta ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ zim ba ʋ y. Ɩbɩɩ zino nyɩnta ʋ soor, bɩ gʋaa k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ kan kɩ naa ma bɩ, ɩbɩɩ zim bɛɛ y. Bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, ɩ sɩra hɩ."
43004019	Lʋ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ, mɔɔ ʋ: wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m.
43004020	Wɔɔ yaabɔɔ Woso da ʋ ci naa do mim ʋ, awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ a hɩ, a ʋ, Woso daʋrɛ bɩncɛ bɩ m Zerizalɛm m."
43004021	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, lʋ, wakatɩ ɩ zɛm, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a Zɩ Woso da ʋ ci naa do mim ʋ, bɩ Zerizalɛm nɩ y.
43004022	Hɔ k'awɔɔ n a dɔ b'awɔɔ n'a daŋ ʋ. Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ wɔɔ n'a daŋ ʋ. Bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ, a to an nawʋm zɩɩfʋrɔ barla.
43004023	Bɩ dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm, b'a lee ku kɛɛrɛ. Zɩ Woso daʋrɛ zannɔ paan•••rɔ wɔɔ Zɩ bɩ daŋ ʋ a heer ʋ kan sɩra kɩ. Gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso lɛ n taa ŋ ma.
43004024	Woso naa, Ɛspri m, bɩ minto y'a ka, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a ga m, ŋn'a da ʋ a heer ʋ kan sɩra kɩ."
43004025	Lʋ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, Mesii kʋ n n'a birm Krista bɩ zɛm. K'a bɩ bʋr, a hɔ haay hɩm wɔɔ m."
43004026	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "A m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ naa."
43004027	Lɛɛm bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lee ku. Ŋ n zɛ kədə, kʋ ŋ Yeezuu yɩ, an nɩ meer bam kan lʋ kɩ bɩ minto. Bɩ, gɔsɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩ n'ɩ kam ma gɛ?" gɛɛ "Bɔ minto ɩ nɩ meer bam kan kɩ gɛ?"
43004028	Lʋ bɩ n a gʋ a gər bɩ ma, an ta tara nɔ ʋ, an aa a hɩ gʋɔɔ m, a ʋ:
43004029	"K'a bʋr a dɩga gʋaa k'a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ba haay bɩ hɩ mɔɔ m. Krista bɛɛ m barɛm na?"
43004030	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n bɔ tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ ta zi.
43004031	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ mam ma, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ."
43004032	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔbɩrɛ niŋŋə n ta ʋ mɔɔ nɩ m ga m, m a bɩ, b'awɔɔ n a dɔ y."
43004033	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʋ, an a bɩ gɛ?"
43004034	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba n nɩ: Woso mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʋ m b'a hɔɔnhɔ ba, kan a zibəə kɩ, m a nya.
43004035	Awɔɔ n a hɩ a zim a ʋ, a gɔɔta mom si mɔsa n n'a kum na? Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'a a bɔɔta a dɩga: Wuturo wɔɔ a ba fu mɔsa minto.
43004036	Zibəəzaa b'a zibəə nyɔɔdʋ yɩ, an n'a hɔnyɩ bɩ som kʋ ma mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ minto. Bɩ y'a ka, gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ duum kan gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ som kʋ ma bɩ kɩ y'a heer nyɔɔm kan kʋ kɩ.
43004037	Bɩ y'a ka, hɔ kʋ bɔɔr naa do a hɩ bɩ sɩra m, a ʋ: gʋaa deem ɩ hɔ duure, gʋaa vanta n nɩ zɛm b'a da.
43004038	Mɔɔ awɔɔ nyɔɔ k'a yaa hɔ k'awɔɔ n a zi ba bɩ da. Gɔsɩnnɔ kɔrɛ yɩ a nɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ n bʋr an n'a nyɔɔdʋ bɩrɛ."
43004039	Kʋ bɩ do nɔ ʋ, Samarii gʋɔɔ gʋta sɩra ka ʋ, lʋ bɩ kasɛtɩkarɛ naa do minto. "A hɔ haay kʋ mɔɔ ba bɩ hɩ mɔɔ m."
43004040	Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku zi sɔ bɩ, Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a yɛ han k'an gɔɔta kan a kɩ. A n gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm hɩɩya.
43004041	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ya, ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʋ a mɩŋŋa meerbaa bɩ minto bɩ, ŋ gʋta ŋnɩ lɛ da biisi ra.
43004042	Ŋ n'a hɩm lʋ bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: ɩbɩɩ n a hɩ bɩ minto bala bɛɛ y'a ka wɔɔ n sɩra ka ʋ y. Wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a lɛ meerbaa ma, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ sɔ, sɩra m, durnya bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ m.
43004043	Dɔmɩm hɩɩya k'a cem bɩ, Yeezuu a hʋr bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, an ta Galilee ʋ.
43004044	Bala, a mɩŋŋa nyɩnta an a hɩ, a ʋ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩr daʋrɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa a kʋ ʋ y.
43004045	Bɩ, k'a lee ku Galilee ʋ bɩ, Galilee zannɔ wɔɔ a si mɩŋŋa. Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ cibsa bɩ minto. Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba haay bɩ yɩ sɔ.
43004046	Yeezuu n a bɔ, an bʋr Kanaa ʋ Galilee kʋ ʋ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do a hi ba ʋ dɩvɛn bɩ. Rɔm cir zibəəzaa jɩtaarɛ deem ɩ nyɩnta Kapɛrnawum ʋ, a nyɩ bɩ laafɩɩ y.
43004047	K'a a ma, ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu a to Zidee ʋ, an bʋr Galilee ʋ bɩ, a bʋr an b'a yɩ, an a yɛ han, k'an b'a nyɩ k'a n'a bam k'a ga bɩ waa.
43004048	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ n makrarɔ yɩ kan hoserlo kɩ, awɔɔ bɩ sɩra kam fɩɩga ra!"
43004049	Zibəəzaa jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, bʋr kʋ n bɛɛ m, mɔɔ nyɩ bɩ gam."
43004050	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ta, ɩ nyɩ bɩ mɩsɩr." Gʋaa bɩ do sɩra ka Yeezuu meerbaa b'ʋ, an a wusigə.
43004051	K'a nɩ doom bɩ, a zibəənyɩnɔ b'a zɛ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩ nyɩ bɩ mɩsɩr!"
43004052	A n ŋ lar, a ʋ, wakatɩ kara a waa ma gɛ? Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Jim sinuu wakatɩ deem ma mɛmarɛ bɩ zer ma."
43004053	Nyɩ bɩ zɩ bɩ dɩga a sɔ wakatɩ bɩ do Yeezuu a hɩ a m, a ʋ: "Ɩ nyɩ bɩ mɩsɩr." Dɔmɩm bɩ do tɛkka ma, a sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ, a mɩŋŋa kan a har gʋɔɔ kɩ haay.
43004054	Yeezuu hoser k'a ba a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a to k'a ʋ Zidee ʋ an ta Galilee ʋ bɩ n naa do.
43005001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ cibsa deem ma.
43005002	Zerizalɛm ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, lɛɛ nɩ b'ʋ hi m ta ʋ, seero cɛ lɛ jɩr ʋ, ŋn'a birm ebree lemim m Bɛtzata. A gasʋjɩrɔ soor gʋta-gʋta, n n a dɔ jaarɔ m.
43005003	Bɩncɛ bɩ do gʋɔɔ yaabazannɔ nɩ wʋtarɛ a taa, bʋʋrɔ, lʋgɔrɔ kan mɛgarɛzannɔ kɩ. [
43005004	Bala, Zuuba Malɛɛka deem ɩ tɩr zer dɔmɩm niŋŋoo ʋ hi b'ʋ, an heer ba ma. Yaabazaa k'a lɛɛ ka, an gasʋ hi bɩ heerbarɛ jɛ ʋ bɩ, laafɩɩ an n'a yɩrɛ, baa k'a yaaba bɩ lʋnlɔ.]
43005005	Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, an nɩ yaaba m, a yaaba bɩ dɔɔraa bukərku a yaa sinnyə.
43005006	Yeezuu n a yɩ, an nɩ wʋtam, bɩ k'a a ma ŋ ʋ, a yaaba bɩ maasɩrɛ ba bɩ, a a lar, a ʋ: "Ɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ waa gɛ?"
43005007	Yaabazaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ ba gʋaa m, an nɩ mɔɔ gasʋm hi b'ʋ, a heer barɛ dɔmɩm ʋ y. Kʋ mɔɔ kʋ m gasʋ, gʋaa nɩ lɛɛ kam mɔɔ lɛɛ."
43005008	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ sa, ɩ ta."
43005009	Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋaa b'a waa, an a wʋtarahɔ bɩ sa, an nɩ tarɛ. Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, sabaa hinni m.
43005010	Zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ gʋaa k'a waa bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Sabaa hinni m, a n a ga m, ɩbɩɩ n ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ busu y."
43005011	Gʋaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a laafɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ y'a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ sa, ɩ ta."
43005012	Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ kara ɩ naa hɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ, a ʋ, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ sa, ɩ ta?"
43005013	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a laafɩɩ yɩ bɩ n a dɔ kʋ nka ɩ laafɩɩ bɩ ka a ʋ y. Bala, Yeezuu a gʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma laatʋ.
43005014	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu b'a yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ba ɩbɩɩ laafɩɩ yɩ kɛɛrɛ na. Ɩ b'ɩ ya, ɩ mimbʋnyaa ba y, mim y'a ɩ yɩ, an lɛ da biisi hɔ naa ra."
43005015	Gʋaa bɩ n ta an aa a dɩnda zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ, Yeezuu y'awɔɔ waa bɩ.
43005016	Bɩ y'a ka, jɩtannɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyaa m kan Yeezuu kɩ k'a naa ba sabaa hinni b'ʋ bɩ minto.
43005017	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Zɩ gɔɔta an nɩ zi bam, mɔɔ y'a bam sɔ."
43005018	Bɩ y'a ka, brɔɔ n'a kam ma, k'a zɛ gər, k'a nɩ zi bam sabaa hinni ʋ bɩ bɛɛ bala y, k'a nɩ Woso birm a Zɩ, an a mɩŋŋa sa, an a ga kʋ ʋ kan kɩ bɩ minto m sɔ.
43005019	Yeezuu meerbaa bɩ sa, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Woso Nyɩ bɩ b'a dam ma, an hɔsɩ ba a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y. K'a Zɩ Woso bɩ yɩ, an hɔ niŋŋə ba, b'a ba. Bala, hɔ kʋ Zɩ n'a bam bɩ, bɩ Nyɩ n'a bam sɔ.
43005020	Kʋ Zɩ a Nyɩ ŋʋa bɩ, a hɔ k'a n'a bam bɩ hɩnkam nɩ haay. A zibəə gʋta hɩnkam nɩ, an lɛ da nawɔnnɔ ra, awɔɔ m zɛ kədə.
43005021	Kʋ Zɩ bɩ nɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʋ an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa karɛ ŋ ʋ bɩ, Nyɩ bɩ, gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa b'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kaŋ ʋ sɔ.
43005022	Zɩ bɩ bɩr gʋaa dʋdɔ karɛ y. A dʋdɔkarɛ haay sa an a ka a Nyɩ b'ʋ,
43005023	kʋ gʋaa haay n a da ma, an Nyɩ bɩ da ʋ amba ŋn'ɩ Zɩ bɩ daŋ ʋ bɩ m. Gʋaa k'a bɩr Nyɩ bɩ daŋ ʋ bɩ, a bɩr Zɩ k'a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ bɩ daŋ ʋ sɔ y.
43005024	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a n'a tʋr kam mɔɔ lemim ma, an nɩ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ mim sire, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m. Ŋ b'a dʋdɔ karɛ y. Bɔ a ʋ zɛ nɔ ʋ, an ta mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ.
43005025	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, wakatɩ ɩ zɛm, b'a lee ku kɛɛrɛ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ Woso Nyɩ bɩ leer mam, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ.
43005026	Bala, kʋ Zɩ b'a so mɩsɩrbaa ʋ bɩ, a a ka, k'a Nyɩ bɩ n nyɩnta mɩsɩrbaasoʋrezaa sɔ.
43005027	Woso paŋŋa ka ʋ k'an dʋdɔ ka, k'a m Gʋaanyɩ bɩ minto.
43005028	A bɩ zɛ kədə naa haay tɔ ma y! Wakatɩ ɩ zɛm gəəno wɔɔ y'a leer mam.
43005029	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa ba rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a bʋnyaa ba rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ dʋdɔ ka.
43005030	Mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m hɔsɩ ba, m mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y. Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a mam bɩ mɔɔ n'a dʋdɔ kam, bɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩ tɩrga, bala, mɔɔ bɩr m karɛ m mɩŋŋa hɔɔnhɔ ma y. Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ mɔɔ n nɩ m kam ma.
43005031	Kʋ m mɩŋŋa kasɛtɩ mɔɔ n'a karɛ, n bɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ sire y.
43005032	Woso nɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam, bɩ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ kasɛtɩ niŋŋə k'a n'a kam mɔɔ minto bɩ, sɩra m.
43005033	Awɔɔ gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ Zaan zi, b'a sɩra kasɛtɩ ka.
43005034	Mɔɔ bɩr m kam gʋaa kasɛtɩ ma y. Meer bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋm ncɩnaaʋ, k'a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
43005035	Zaan nyɩnta amba fɩtɩrɛ kʋ n nɩ sɛ nyaŋ ʋ, an nɩ yɔm bɩ m. Bɩ, awɔɔ ŋʋa mɩŋŋa k'a a heer nyɔɔ dɔmɩm poore ʋ, a lɛɛgure b'ʋ.
43005036	Mɔɔ ɩ kasɛtɩ m, a gʋtabaa n lɛ da Zaan hɔ bɩ ra. Zibəəro kʋ Zɩ a ka mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m ŋ ba rɔ wɔɔ m. Mɔɔ yɩ ŋ bam, bɩ brɔɔ nɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ, ŋ ʋ, Zɩ b'ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
43005037	Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ nɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam. B'awɔɔ n a leer ma, b'awɔɔ n a meer yɩ sɔ y.
43005038	Woso lemim bɩr gɔɔtarɛ awɔɔ heer ʋ y, bala, awɔɔ n sɩra ka gʋaa k'a nyɔɔ b'ʋ y.
43005039	Wosoci karɩnda awɔɔ n'a bam, an n'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʋ, bɩ nɔ awɔɔ n nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩŋ ʋ. Bɩ, bɩ nɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam.
43005040	Awɔɔ lɛ baa k'a bʋr mɔɔ zi k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ y.
43005041	Mɔɔ bɩr m kam lɛbɔʋrɛ ma gʋɔɔ zi y.
43005042	Bɩ mɔɔ awɔɔ dɔ, awɔɔ n Woso ŋʋa y.
43005043	Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ, m Zɩ tɔ ma, b'awɔɔ kaanm mɔɔ m. Kʋ gʋaa vanta ɩ bʋr a mɩŋŋa tɔ ra, awɔɔ y'a sim.
43005044	Awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ a si, awɔɔ k'a n'a kam daʋrɛ ma a muno zi, a bɩr a kam daʋrɛ k'a a to Woso y'a deem bɩ zi bɩ ma?
43005045	A b'a hɔɔn da, a ʋ, mɔɔ n nɩ mim karɛ awɔɔ ra m Zɩ taa y. Hɔ k'a nɩ mim karɛ awɔɔ ra bɩ Moyiisi lɛrɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ yure ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ m.
43005046	Kʋ nyɩnta awɔɔ ʋ a Moyiisi mim si, awɔɔ mɔɔ mim sim sɔ. Bala, a gʋrsɩra ba a ʋ mɔɔ minto.
43005047	K'awɔɔ n hɔ k'a gʋrsɩra ba bɩ si, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ si?"
43006001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu bra Galilee higʋta kʋ n n'a birm sɔ Tiberiyaadɩ higʋta bɩ gəm deem la.
43006002	Gʋaa cir gʋta zu a jɛ ʋ, bala, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ hoserlo k'a nɩ ŋ bam, an nɩ yaabazannɔ waam nɔ wɔɔ yɩ.
43006003	Gʋaa cir bɩ minto y'a ka, Yeezuu n der ci ra, an nyɩnta b'ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ.
43006004	Bɩ ma bɩ, pakkɩ k'a m zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ cibsa b'a zɔ.
43006005	Kʋ Yeezuu a bɔɔta an dɩga bɩ, a gʋaa cir gʋta yɩ, an nɩ zɛm zi. A n a hɩ Filipi m, a ʋ: "K'ʋ bur yɩ ka, ʋ a si, kʋ ŋ n'a bɩ?"
43006006	Meer bɩ ba a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ k'a dɩga a. Hɔ k'a mɩŋŋa ʋ k'a ba bɩ, a a dɔ.
43006007	Filipi n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ bur si deniyee zɔɔhɩra nɩ, a bɩ bʋr bɔrɛ y, bala, gʋaa biyəə b'a kur yɩm poore y."
43006008	A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ deem Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr danzaa Andɩr a hɩ m, a ʋ:
43006009	"Nyɩyar ɩ naa ʋ, an nɩ bur m soor, kan zɔnɔ kɩ hɩɩya. Bɩ, bɔ naa n n'a bam gʋaa cir naa nɩ?"
43006010	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɩnta." Lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, bur m jilli. Ŋ n nyɩnta. Gʋɔɔ cir bɩ gʋɔɔyaarɔ wɔɔ lɛ a zɔ tisi soor ma.
43006011	Yeezuu n bur bɩ si, an a barka da ʋ, an a ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ. A n a ba maam sɔ zɔnɔ wɔɔ m. A n a ka ŋ ʋ amba ŋ lɛ taa bɩ m.
43006012	Kʋ ŋ y'a bɩ, an ŋ ka bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a kuuro kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, a b'a ka deem m nyaam nɩ y."
43006013	Ŋ n bur soor kʋ ŋ y'a bɩ rɔ wɔɔ kuuro so kʋ ma, ŋn'a zar kasɩ ʋ bueerehɩɩya.
43006014	Kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ hoser k'a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa paan••• k'a a ga m, an bʋr durnya ʋ bɩ m naa."
43006015	Bɩ, Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a ʋ, n zɛm b'a nyasʋ, n n'a ba cir bɩ, a a hʋr a deem, an ta ci ra.
43006016	Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ta higʋta lɛ ra.
43006017	Ŋ n da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ tam Kapɛrnawum zeezi, gəm deem bɩ ra. Bɩ ma bɩ, gum da, bɩ Yeezuu n ŋ ku cɩna y.
43006018	Hɩnhɛr gʋta nɩ hɔnm, an nɩ hi bɩ wunwusigəm.
43006019	Kʋ ŋ ta, cilo soor gɛɛ sɔrdɩ bɩ, ŋ Yeezuu yɩ, an nɩ tam hi burə ʋ, an n'a zɔm kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ ma. Nyibəə n gasʋ ŋ ʋ.
43006020	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, mɔɔ m!"
43006021	Ŋ y'a ŋʋa k'a busu kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ m. Lɛɛm bɩ, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bɩncɛ kʋ ŋ nɩ taŋ ʋ bɩ gəm ku.
43006022	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta kɔ bɩ lɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ kɔɔlʋʋ deem yɩ b'ʋ. Bɩ, Yeezuu n zu kʋ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ ŋ kɔɔlʋʋ deem bɩ nɔ ʋ y. Ta brɔɔ ʋ a minto.
43006023	Kɔɔlʋʋrɔ y'a to Tiberiyaadɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr bɩncɛ kʋ Yeezuu bur bɩ barka da ʋ, ŋn'a bɩ bɩ jɩr ʋ.
43006024	Kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ a yɩ Yeezuu ba b'ʋ, bɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ba b'ʋ sɔ bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Kapɛrnawum ʋ k'a yaa a ka Yeezuu ma.
43006025	Kʋ ŋ yaa yɩ higʋta bɩ gəm deem la bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, ɩbɩɩ lee ku naa ʋ brɔ?"
43006026	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, awɔɔ bɩr a kam mɔɔ ma k'awɔɔ hoserlo yɩ bɩ minto y, k'awɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ an a ka bɩ minto m.
43006027	A bɩ zi ba hɔbɩrɛ k'a n'a zarm bɩ minto y, k'a zi ba, a a ka hɔbɩrɛ k'a nɩ gɔɔtam an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ kam bɩ minto. Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ do, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n nɩ zɛm b'a ka awɔɔ ʋ, bala, a mɩŋŋa Zɩ k'a m Woso b'a mɩŋŋa jɩ da ʋ."
43006028	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ wɔɔ n'a bam, k'ʋ Woso zi ba?"
43006029	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Woso zibəə bɩ, k'ɩ sɩra ka gʋaa k'a nyɔɔ b'ʋ."
43006030	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hoser kara ɩbɩɩ n'a bam ʋ a yɩ, k'ʋ sɩra ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ? Ɩbɩɩ zibəə bɩ n kara?
43006031	Wɔɔ zɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ kʋ n'a birm mann bɩ bɩ poohɔɔn ʋ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba bɩ m: 'Bur a to arzana ʋ, an a ka ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a bɩ.' "
43006032	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Moyiisi bɛɛ arzana bur bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ ɩ arzana bur paan••• bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
43006033	Bala, Woso bur bɩ m gʋaa k'a a to arzana ʋ an bʋr, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam durnya ʋ bɩ m."
43006034	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, bur bɩ do ka wɔɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay!"
43006035	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ m mɩsɩrbaa bur bɩ. Gʋaa k'a bʋr mɔɔ zi, nɔ b'a zaa zɛrɛ y. Gʋaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, mɩsɩ b'a yarɛ an a zaa zɛ y.
43006036	Bɩ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m: Awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩ, b'awɔɔ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ y.
43006037	Gʋaa haay kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ n'a kam mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ zɛm mɔɔ zi, bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm mɔɔ zi bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ kaanm nɩ y.
43006038	Bala, m to mɔɔ ʋ arzana ʋ kʋ m bɩ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba, mɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y.
43006039	Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ bɩ, a lɛ baa kʋ gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ deem m nyaam nɩ y, kʋ m ŋ mɩm bɔ ʋ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʋ.
43006040	Mɔɔ Zɩ hɔɔnhɔ bɩ n naa: Gʋaa haay k'a Nyɩ bɩ yɩ, an sɩra ka ʋ bɩ, k'an mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ. Bɩ mɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʋ."
43006041	Bɩ tɛkka ma, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a sa ma, ŋn'ɩ kukur barɛ a minto. K'a a hɩ, a ʋ, a mɩŋŋa m bur k'a a to arzana ʋ a bʋr bɩ minto m.
43006042	Ŋ n a ya, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Yeezuu bɛɛ ra, Zozɛf nyɩ bɩ? Wɔɔ n a zɩ dɔ kan a da kɩ ra? A a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ, an a hɩ, a ʋ, a to a ʋ arzana ʋ?"
43006043	Yeezuu n a bɔ, an meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʋ: "K'a kukur barɛ bɩ to kan kʋ kɩ!
43006044	Gʋaa b'a dam ma, an bʋr mɔɔ zi kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ n a gaa y. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʋ.
43006045	N y'a gʋrsɩra ba wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro ʋ, n ʋ: 'Ŋ haay hɔdɩndarɛ yɩm Woso zi.' Gʋaa niŋŋə k'a Woso lemim ma, an n'a hɔdɩndarɛ sim bɩ, zɛ an nawʋm mɔɔ zi.
43006046	Gʋaa ba ʋ an Zɩ yɩ y. Gʋaa k'a a to Woso zi an bʋr bɩ y'a yɩ bala.
43006047	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a nɩ sɩra kam bɩ, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m.
43006048	Mɔɔ n bur k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam.
43006049	Awɔɔ zɩrɔ mann bɩ poohɔɔn ʋ, bɩ ŋ gɩnga.
43006050	Bur k'a a to arzana ʋ bɩ n naa. Gʋaa k'a bɩ a bɩ garɛ y.
43006051	Mɔɔ m bur mɩsɩr, m m to arzana ʋ. Gʋaa k'a bur bɩ do bɩ bɩ, a zaa bɩ gam fɩɩga y. Bur kʋ mɔɔ n n'a kam bɩ, m mɩŋŋa mɛsim m, m n n'a kam kʋ durnya n mɩsɩrbaa yɩ."
43006052	Naa do y'a ka, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ ŋ wuti bʋgʋr m kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Naa y'a bam lɔ k'a mɛsim ka wɔɔ ʋ, k'ʋ a sʋ?"
43006053	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ sim sʋ, k'awɔɔ n a ma mi, awɔɔ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩrɛ y.
43006054	Gʋaa k'a mɔɔ sim sʋ, an mɔɔ ma mi b'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m, bɩ mɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʋ.
43006055	Bala, mɔɔ mɛsim bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ paan••• m, mɔɔ ma bɩ, hɔmire paan••• m sɔ.
43006056	Gʋaa k'a mɔɔ sim sʋ, an mɔɔ ma mi, a zaa ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ kan a zaa kɩ.
43006057	Kʋ Zɩ k'an mɩsɩr bɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba mɔɔ nawʋm Zɩ bɩ minto bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ bɩm bɩ, mɔɔ y'a kam an mɩsɩrbaa ba sɔ.
43006058	Bur k'a a to arzana ʋ bɩ n naa. A bɩ hɔdeem kan awɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a bɩ bɩ kɩ y. Ŋ gɩnga, bɩ gʋaa k'a bur naa do bɩ, a zaa bɩ garɛ y."
43006059	Minno nɔɔn duro Yeezuu a dɩnda gʋɔɔ m Kapɛrnawum sokʋmacɛ ʋ.
43006060	Karɩndanyɩnɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Meerbaa naa do kaŋŋɩda! Nka n'a dam ma, an a si?"
43006061	Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a zim, a ʋ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ kukur bam mim naa do minto bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Busu a ʋ awɔɔ ma ra?
43006062	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bɔkarɛ a bɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩ an nɩ tam bɩncɛ k'a nyɩnta ʋ biisi b'ʋ?
43006063	Ɛspri nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam, mɛsim bɩ zibəə ba ʋ y. Meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ, Ɛspri m kan mɩsɩrbaa kɩ.
43006064	Bɩ gʋɔɔ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, ŋ n sɩra ka y." Yeezuu lɛɛ ka, an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ dɔ, kan gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm b'a nyasʋ an a ka bɩ kɩ.
43006065	A a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ n a hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an bʋr mɔɔ zi kʋ Zɩ bɛɛ y'a bir y."
43006066	Dɔmɩm bɩ do tɛkka ma bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ gʋta a bɔ a jɛ ʋ, ŋ n a ya, ŋn'ɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan kɩ y.
43006067	Yeezuu n a hɩ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ b'a gʋm mɔɔ ma sɔ ra?"
43006068	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, k'ʋ ta nka zi? Ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ meerbaarɔ m.
43006069	Bɩ wɔɔ si, ʋ a dɔ sɔ, ʋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ m Krista, Woso Nyɩ mɩŋŋa."
43006070	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ bɛɛ y'awɔɔ gʋaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ bɔ ʋ ra? Bɩ, Sʋtaana y'a so awɔɔ gʋaa deem ʋ!"
43006071	Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʋ gʋaa Sɩmɔɔn nyɩ Zidas b'a n'a hɩm ma. Bala, a m bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem, an nɩ Yeezuu nyasʋrɛ, an a ka.
43007001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu cem, an nɩ bɩmbɩrm Galilee kʋ ʋ, a n a ŋʋa k'a ta Zidee ʋ y, bala, zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ y'a kam ma k'a zɛ gər.
43007002	Bɩ ma bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ cibsa kʋ n n'a birm buuro cibsa b'a zɔ.
43007003	A danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ta Zidee ʋ, k'ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n'ɩ zibəəro k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ yɩ sɔ.
43007004	Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa kʋ n n'a dɔ, a bɩr a zibəə bɩ nyaakʋm darɛ y. K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ zibəəro barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ɩ hɩnka durnyazannɔ m."
43007005	Yeezuu danyɩnɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n sɩra ka ʋ y.
43007006	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y. B'awɔɔ wakatɩ m dɔmɩm haay m.
43007007	Durnya bɩ sɔrɛ awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ, a ɩ sɔm mɔɔ m, bala, kʋ mɔɔ n'a zibəə bɩ kasɛtɩ kam, mɔɔ ʋ, a bʋnyaa bɩ minto.
43007008	K'a ta cibsa bɩ ma, mɔɔ bɩ tarɛ y. Bala, mɔɔ wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y."
43007009	K'a meer bɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a gɔɔta Galilee ʋ.
43007010	K'a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ta cibsa bɩ ma bɩ, a zaa sa sɔ, an a nyaakʋm da, an nɩ tam, a lɛ baa kʋ n a dɔ y.
43007011	Cibsa bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ y'a kam Yeezuu ma, ŋnɩ laaka da, ŋ ʋ: "A ɩ ka?"
43007012	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, ŋ y'a mim dɩndarɛ: Gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa mɩŋŋa m." Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: "Ŋʋaarzaa m, bra an n'a bam gʋɔɔ m."
43007013	Bɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ yɛrɛ, an n'a mim hɩm garga ra y. Bala, ŋ yɩ nyi barɛ a jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m.
43007014	Kʋ buuro cibsa bɩ bireyaa a ku bɩ, Yeezuu ta Wosocɛ ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m.
43007015	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A a ba lɔ an hɔ dɔ, b'a n karɩnda ba?"
43007016	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ n a to mɔɔ zi y. A to a ʋ Woso k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi.
43007017	Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a Woso hɔɔnhɔ ba, a y'a dɔm kʋ hɔdɩndarɛ naa do, k'a to a ʋ Woso zi, gɛɛ kʋ m mɩŋŋa mim mɔɔ n'a dɩndarɛ.
43007018	Gʋaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa mim dɩndam bɩ, a ka an nawʋrɛ a mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ ma. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a n'a kam a gʋaa k'a a nyɔɔ bɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ ma bɩ, bɩ bala n sɩrazaa. Zambʋ b'a nɔ ʋ y.
43007019	Moyiisi bɛɛ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka awɔɔ ra? B'awɔɔ gʋaa deem ba ʋ, an nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. Bɔ minto, an n'a kam mɔɔ garɛ ma?"
43007020	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Zinə nɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ! Nka y'a hɩ, a ʋ, k'a ɩbɩɩ zɛ?"
43007021	Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zibəə deem mɔɔ ba sabaa hinni ʋ, awɔɔ n zɛ kədə haay!
43007022	Moyiisi lɛ ka awɔɔ ʋ, k'a gʋɔɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. A to a ʋ awɔɔ yaabɔɔ zi Moyiisi mɩŋŋa bɛɛ bʋr nɩ y. Bɩ, k'a a da sabaa hinni ma, awɔɔ y'a bam.
43007023	Bɩ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ gʋaa gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ, an bɔ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ la nɩ, bɔ minto m, awɔɔ heer nɩ busum kan mɔɔ kɩ gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ waa haay sabaa hinni ʋ bɩ ma?
43007024	A bɩ hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm mɩm ʋ bɩ dʋdɔ ka bala y, k'a dʋdɔ ka kan sɩra kɩ."
43007025	Zerizalɛm gʋɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ ŋ n'a kam ma k'a mee bɔ ʋ bɩ bɛɛ m naa ra?
43007026	Ba an nɩ meer bam ŋn'a mam na, bɩ ŋ bɩr hɔsɩ hɩm nɩ y! Wɔɔ tara bɩ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ, a dɔ ŋ y'a ʋ paan•••, ŋ ʋ, Krista m gɛ?
43007027	Wɔɔ gʋaa naa do tojɩ dɔ, kʋ Krista bɩ bʋr, gɔsɩ b'a tojɩ dɔrɛ y."
43007028	Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔ dɩndam Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ mɔɔ dɔ! Awɔɔ mɔɔ tojɩ dɔ. Bɩ, mɔɔ n bʋr m zi nɩ y. Sɩrazaa m Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ m. B'awɔɔ n bɩ zaa dɔ y.
43007029	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a dɔ, m to mɔɔ ʋ zi, a ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ."
43007030	Ŋ n'a kam ma k'a nyasʋ, bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ, an a wɔ da ma y. Bala, a wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y.
43007031	Gʋɔɔ nyɩnta zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ Krista bɩ bʋr, a hoserlo barɛ an lɛ da naa n a ba rɔ wɔɔ ra gɛ?"
43007032	Kukur kʋ n n'a bam Yeezuu minto gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ a ma. A m bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ n Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'aa a nyasʋ.
43007033	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ gɔɔtam kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɩ m bɔ, m ta Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi.
43007034	Awɔɔ zɛm b'a ka mɔɔ ma, b'awɔɔ bɩ mɔɔ yɩrɛ y. Bala, bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ taŋ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a bʋr b'ʋ y."
43007035	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ta awɔɔ nawʋm ka, wɔɔ b'ʋ yarɛ ʋ a yɩ? Ta awɔɔ nawʋm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɩsɩga da ŋn'a war kʋ ma kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ zi ra? Gɛɛ, ta an nawʋm k'a yaa hɔ dɩnda grɛkkɩrɔ m na?
43007036	Hɔ k'a hɩ naa jɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ lɔ: Awɔɔ y'a kam mɔɔ ma, b'awɔɔ bɩ mɔɔ yɩrɛ y, bɩ bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ taŋ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a bʋr ʋ y?"
43007037	Cibsa bɩ nyarɛ ma bɩ, dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'an dɔmɩm gʋta bɩ, Yeezuu jɩm brama, an a leer busu, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ mɩsɩ n'a zɛm k'an bʋr mɔɔ zi, an bɩ hi mi.
43007038	Gʋaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa hi kɔyaarɔ y'a tom zi, amba Wosoci a hɩ bɩ m."
43007039	Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ mim an n'a hɩm. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu k'a n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ cɩna bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n bʋr cɩna y.
43007040	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'a tʋr ka Yeezuu meerbaa bɩ ma gʋɔɔ cir bɩ bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Sɩra m, ba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ n na."
43007041	Gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Krista bɩ n naa." Gɔsɩnnɔ a ya, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Krista y'a dam ma, an a to Galilee kʋ ʋ ra?
43007042	Wosoci n a hɩ, a ʋ, 'bɔ an nawʋm Davɩd do nɔ ʋ', b'a to an nawʋm tara poore kʋ Davɩd yɩ ʋ, ŋn'a birm Betelehɛm b'ʋ ra?"
43007043	Naa do y'a ka, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a gʋngʋ a minto.
43007044	Ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a ŋʋa k'a nyasʋ, bɩ gɔsɩ n a wɔ da ma y.
43007045	Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʋr wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zi kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ nɩ ŋ lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m awɔɔ n bʋr nɩ?"
43007046	Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa ba ʋ an meer kʋ gʋaa naa do a ba bɩ lɔɔ ba y."
43007047	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A to awɔɔ ʋ, an awɔɔ hɔɔn da a zi ra?
43007048	Jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ barla bɩ, gʋaa deem taan••• ta ʋ, an a mim si ra?
43007049	Bɩ, gʋaa cir naa do n lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ y. Ŋ barka ba ʋ y!"
43007050	Nikodɛm k'a nyɩnta an ta Yeezuu zi bɩ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ, an a hɩ, a ʋ:
43007051	"N n gʋaa dʋdɔ yar bɩ n n'a meerbaa ma kan hɔ k'a ba bɩ kɩ y. Wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n bɩ hɩ ra?"
43007052	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩ to ɩbɩɩ ʋ Galilee ʋ sɔ ra? Bɩ, ɩ ka mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ bɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa yɩrɛ an bɩr Galilee gʋaa y." [
43007053	Ŋ haay n a hʋr, ŋnɩ dundoo a harlɔ ʋ.
43008001	Yeezuu n a hʋr an ta Oliviyee ci mim ʋ.
43008002	Dɔ k'a bʋr an nɩ mɛm bɩ, a a bɔ an bʋr Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, gʋaa haay nɩ zɛm zi, an nyɩnta, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
43008003	Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ bʋr lʋ m b'ʋ, ŋn'a da gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ. Sʋr n y'a ʋ ra, an nɩ jaan darɛ.
43008004	Ŋ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, lʋ naa do, sʋr n y'a ʋ ra, an nɩ jaan darɛ.
43008005	Lɛrɔ nɔ ʋ, Moyiisi a hɩ, a ʋ, n n lannɔ nɔɔn duro zɛ jaarɔ m. B'ɩbɩɩ, ɩbɩɩ ʋ lɔ?"
43008006	A hɩ ŋ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ k'a nyasʋ meerbaa nɔ ʋ, k'a ku a mim ka ra. Yeezuu a zuutə, an n'a nyʋkʋm wʋnwɔsɩm tara ʋ.
43008007	Kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'a larm bɩ, Yeezuu a bɔɔta, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a n'awɔɔ bire ʋ, b'a n mimbʋnyaa ba cɩna bɩ n lɛɛ ka, an a gʋɛɛn."
43008008	A n a ya, an a zuutə, an n'a nyʋkʋm bɩ wʋnwɔsɩm tara ʋ.
43008009	Kʋ ŋ meerbaa naa do ma bɩ, ŋ cem deem-deem. Gʋɔɔ marɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ cem, a poorero wɔɔ n a nya ŋ ʋ. Yeezuu n gɔɔta a deem. Kʋ lʋ bɩ gɔɔta an nɩ b'ʋ bɩ,
43008010	Yeezuu a bɔɔta, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ŋ bee, lʋ ra? Gɔsɩ n'ɩbɩɩ dʋdɔ yar la?"
43008011	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ayy•••, Zuuba, gɔsɩ." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ sɔ, mɔɔ b'ɩbɩɩ dʋdɔ yarlɛ y. Ta, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ya, ɩ mimbʋnyaa ba y."]
43008012	Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Durnya lɛɛgure m mɔɔ m. Gʋaa k'a nɩ zum mɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩ tam monsigə ʋ y. A mɩsɩrbaa lɛɛgure yɩm."
43008013	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩ mɩŋŋa kasɛtɩ ɩ n'a kam na? Ɩbɩɩ kasɛtɩ bɩ, ŋʋaar m."
43008014	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, m mɩŋŋa kasɛtɩ mɔɔ n'a kam. Bɩ, mɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ sɩra m, bala, mɔɔ m tojɩ dɔ, m m tajɩ dɔ. B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ m to mɔɔ ʋ ka m nɩ tam ka y.
43008015	Dʋdɔ awɔɔ n'a karɛ am gʋɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. Mɔɔ bɩr gʋaa dʋdɔ karɛ y.
43008016	Baa kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m dʋdɔ ka, a ka mɔɔ nawʋm kan sɩra kɩ, bala, mɔɔ bɩ m deem nɩ y. Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ ta ʋ sɔ.
43008017	Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ, gʋaa hɩɩya kasɛtɩ bɩ, sɩra m.
43008018	M mɩŋŋa kasɛtɩ mɔɔ n'a kam, bɩ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'ɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam sɔ."
43008019	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ Zɩ b'ɩ ka?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n mɔɔ dɔ y, b'awɔɔ n mɔɔ Zɩ dɔ sɔ y. Kʋ mɔɔ dɔ awɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ dɔm sɔ."
43008020	Meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba Yeezuu ʋ bɩncɛ kʋ n nɩ busoo zarŋ ʋ b'ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, a ɩ hɔ dɩndam Wosocɛ ʋ, gɔsɩ n a wɔ da ma y, bala, a wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y.
43008021	Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Cem mɔɔ n nawʋm, awɔɔ y'a kam mɔɔ ma, bɩ, gɩnga awɔɔ nawʋm a mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ. Bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ taŋ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a ta b'ʋ y."
43008022	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A ŋʋa an nawʋm k'a mɩŋŋa zɛ gɛ? K'a a hɩ, a ʋ: bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ taŋ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a ta b'ʋ bɩ minto."
43008023	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Tara burə naa gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ, m to mɔɔ ʋ brama. Durnya naa gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ, durnya naa do gʋaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y.
43008024	Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n a hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ gɩngarɛ a mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ. K'awɔɔ n a si, a ʋ: A n ta ʋ bɩ m mɔɔ m, awɔɔ gɩngarɛ a mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ."
43008025	Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n'a mim hɩrɛ awɔɔ m tee••• bɩ m.
43008026	Awɔɔ minno ta ʋ gʋta, kʋ m ŋ hɩ awɔɔ m, kʋ m ŋ dʋdɔ ka. Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, sɩrazaa m, bɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ma zi bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ n'a hɩm durnya m."
43008027	Ŋ n a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu bɩ, Zɩ Woso mim a a hɩ a nɩ y.
43008028	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'awɔɔ nɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ busuŋ ʋ bɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do awɔɔ n n'a dɔrɛ, a ʋ: A n ta ʋ bɩ m mɔɔ m. Bɩ mɔɔ bɩr zi bam ŋ mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y. Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ a dɩnda mɔɔ m bɩ mɔɔ n'a hɩm.
43008029	Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ. A n mɔɔ to m deem nɩ y, bala, hɔ k'a ŋʋa bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam dɔmɩm haay."
43008030	K'a nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋta sɩra ka ʋ.
43008031	Yeezuu n a hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ gɔɔta mɔɔ lemim bɩ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ paan•••rɔ n'awɔɔ m.
43008032	Awɔɔ sɩra dɔm, bɩ sɩra bɩ y'awɔɔ bam soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ."
43008033	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n wɔɔ m, bɩ gʋaa n wɔɔ ba a lɔnnɔ cɩna y. Ɩbɩɩ ba lɔ, ɩ n'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ: wɔɔ nyɩntam soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ?"
43008034	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaa barɛ, mimbʋnyaa lɔmbaa nɔ an ta ʋ.
43008035	Lɔ bɩ, har nɔ bɛɛ an ta ʋ dɔmɩm haay y. Har nyɩ b'ɩ har ʋ dɔmɩm haay.
43008036	Bɩ minto y'a ka, kʋ Nyɩ b'awɔɔ bɔ lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ nyɩntam soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ.
43008037	Mɔɔ dɔ Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m. Kʋ mɔɔ lemim bɩ bɩr gasʋrɛ awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, bɩ y'a ka, awɔɔ n'a kam mɔɔ meeyaa ma.
43008038	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ yɩ m Zɩ zi bɩ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ. B'awɔɔ, hɔ k'awɔɔ ma a zɩ zi b'awɔɔ n'a bam!"
43008039	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ zɩ m Abraham m." Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ Abraham nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, k'a Abraham zi ba.
43008040	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a kam ma k'a mɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ sɩra kʋ mɔɔ ma Woso zi bɩ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ minto. Abraham n naa ba y.
43008041	B'awɔɔ, a zɩ zibəə awɔɔ n'a bam." Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Jaandarɛnyɩnɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y! Wɔɔ Zɩ deem bala, a m Woso m."
43008042	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ Zɩ m Woso nɩ, awɔɔ mɔɔ ŋʋam, bala, m to mɔɔ ʋ Woso zi, m bʋr. Mɔɔ n bʋr m mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y. A ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
43008043	Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ bɩr mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ marɛ? Bala, awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a a tʋr ka mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma y.
43008044	Awɔɔ zɩ bɩ n Sʋtaana m. B'awɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a zɩ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba. Gərzer m tee••• a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ. A n gɔɔta sɩra nɔ ʋ y, kʋ sɩra ba a nɔ ʋ bɩ minto. K'a ɩ ŋʋaar barɛ, meerbaa k'a n'a nɔ ʋ b'a n'a bam, bala, ŋʋaarzaa m, bɩ ŋʋaar zɩ m sɔ.
43008045	Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ sɩra hɩm bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ bɩr sɩra kam mɔɔ ʋ y.
43008046	Awɔɔ bire ʋ, nka y'a da ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: mɔɔ mimbʋnyaa ba? Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ ɩ sɩra hɩrɛ, bɔ m, awɔɔ bɩr a sire?
43008047	Gʋaa k'an Woso gʋaa bɩ, Woso lemim an n'a tʋr kam ma. Kʋ Woso gʋɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m bɩ y'a ka, awɔɔ bɩr a tʋr kam mɔɔ ma y."
43008048	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ, Samarii gʋaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, bɩ zinə nɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ gumə ba ʋ ra?"
43008049	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zinə ba kan mɔɔ kɩ y. Bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m Zɩ daŋ ʋ, awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ an nɩ mɔɔ bɔŋ ʋ!
43008050	Mɔɔ bɩr m karɛ m mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ ma y. Bɩ, gʋaa ta ʋ, an nɩ mɔɔ daŋ ʋ, an nɩ dʋdɔ karɛ.
43008051	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ gʋaa mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ si, a bɩ gam fɩɩga y."
43008052	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ, ʋ ʋ, zinə nɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ! Abraham ga kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ sɔ, ɩbɩɩ n bʋr ɩ n'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa mɔɔ mim si, a bɩ gam fɩɩga y.
43008053	Lɛ ɩbɩɩ da wɔɔ yaaba Abraham k'a ga bɩ ra ra? Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gɩnga sɔ! Ɩ mɩŋŋa sa ɩbɩɩ ʋ nka?"
43008054	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ m lɛ mɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, mɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ jɩ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ n'a lɛ bɔm mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n'a hɩm ma, a Woso bɩ.
43008055	Awɔɔ n a dɔ y, bɩ mɔɔ dɔ. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ n a dɔ, m ba mɔɔ nawʋm ŋʋaarzaa a n'awɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ mɔɔ dɔ, m n'a meerbaa sim.
43008056	Awɔɔ yaaba Abraham b'a heer nyɔɔ, an a ka mɔɔ dɔmɩm bɩ yɩrɛ ma. B'a a yɩ, a heer nyɔɔ."
43008057	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ dɔɔraa n busoor ku y, ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ ɩ Abraham yɩ!"
43008058	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dɔmɩm kʋ Abraham n nyɩnta ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ ta ʋ."
43008059	Ŋ n jaarɔ gʋr k'a gʋngʋɛɛn. Yeezuu n a nyaakʋm da, an bɔ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
43009001	Yeezuu k'a nɩ cenim bɩ, a gʋaa yɩ, an yɩ kan bʋʋbaa kɩ.
43009002	A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n laaka naa do da han, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, nka ɩ mimbʋnyaa ba an yɩ kan bʋʋbaa kɩ? A y'a ba gɛɛ, a zɩrɔ nɩ?"
43009003	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A mɩŋŋa bɛɛ y, b'a zɩrɔ bɛɛ sɔ y. Bɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ, kʋ Woso zibəə bɩ n a hɩnka a gʋr zi!
43009004	A a ga m, k'ʋ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi ba, kʋ woso lɛ n gɔɔta an bɩr ta ʋ. Kʋ gum da, gʋaa b'a dam ma an zi ba y.
43009005	Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ, durnya lɛɛgure m mɔɔ m."
43009006	Kʋ Yeezuu meer ba maam bɩ, a lihi da tara ʋ, an taa bɩ yɔɔ lihi bɩ m, an a gʋr, an a nɔ bʋʋ bɩ mɩnyaa bɩ ma,
43009007	A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ta ɩ yaa hi da ɩ meer ʋ Silowee bɔrkɔ ʋ." Tɔ naa do lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: nyɔɔdarɛ. Bʋʋ bɩ n ta, an aa hi bɩ da a meer ʋ. K'a wusigə an nɩ doom bɩ, a mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm.
43009008	A cɩsɔnnɔ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋn'a yɩ biisi an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Naa bɛɛ tɩr nyɩnta an bɩr hɔ yɩnyɛm bɩ ra?"
43009009	Gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A mɩŋŋa m!" Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: "A bɛɛ y, a bɔkʋʋrɛzaa m." Bʋʋ bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m."
43009010	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ mɩnyaa b'a ba lɔ, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩrɛ?"
43009011	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Yeezuu b'ɩ taa yɔɔ, an a nɔ mɔɔ mɩnyaa bɩ ma, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Ta ɩ yaa hi da ɩ meer ʋ Silowee bɔrkɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ n ta, m aa hi da m meer ʋ, mɔɔ mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm."
43009012	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa b'ɩ ka?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n a dɔ y."
43009013	Ŋ n gʋaa k'a nyɩnta bʋʋ bɩ gaa, ŋnɩ ta m farizɛɛnrɔ zi.
43009014	Yeezuu k'a taa bɩ yɔɔ an a mɩm bɩ gʋm bɩ, a ba a ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ.
43009015	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a lar sɔ, k'a ba a ʋ lɔ, a mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm gɛ? A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Taa a yɔɔ, an a nɔ mɔɔ mɩm ma, mɔɔ m hi da m meer ʋ, m nɩ lɛɛ yɩm."
43009016	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ barla gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do, Woso gʋaa bɛɛ y, a bɩr zum sabaa hinni lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ y." Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: "Gʋaa mimbʋnyaabər y'a bam lɔ an bɩr hoserlo barɛ ncɩnaaʋ?" Mim naa do farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ gʋngʋ kʋ ma.
43009017	Ŋ n a ya, ŋn'a hɩ bʋʋ bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "B'ɩbɩɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm gʋaa k'a ɩbɩɩ waa bɩ jɛ ʋ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m."
43009018	Bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a si ŋ ʋ, a nyɩnta bʋʋ, an mɩm n bɔkarɛ an gʋ y. Pakra m kʋ ŋ n'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ bir, ŋnɩ laaka da ŋ han.
43009019	Ŋ n laaka naa do da ŋ han, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ nyɩ m gʋaa naa do m, awɔɔ n a dɔ, a ʋ, yɩ a ʋ kan bʋʋbaa kɩ gɛ? Bɩ, a a ba lɔ, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩm kɛɛrɛ?"
43009020	A zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ, "Wɔɔ dɔ paan••• ʋ ʋ, wɔɔ nyɩ m, bɩ yɩ a ʋ bʋʋ.
43009021	Bɩ, wɔɔ n a dɔ k'a ba a ʋ lɔ, a mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm kɛɛrɛ y. Kʋ nka y'a mɩm bɩ gʋ, wɔɔ n bɩ zaa dɔ sɔ y. K'a lar, nyɩ bɛɛ m dɔ y. A a da ma, an a mim dɩnda a zim!"
43009022	A zɩrɔ wɔɔ ɩ nyi bam zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka, ŋnɩ meer ba ncɩnaaʋ. Bala, jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kʋ ma, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ, a ʋ: Yeezuu bɩ, Krista m, k'a bɔ a zi.
43009023	Bɩ y'a ka, a zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Nyɩ bɛɛ m dɔ y, k'a lar."
