43009024	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a ya, ŋnɩ gʋaa k'a yɩ bʋʋbaa nɔ ʋ bɩ bir a hɩɩya hɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Nyi ba Woso m, ɩ sɩra hɩ! Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa naa do mimbʋnyaabər m."
43009025	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ mimbʋnyaabər nɩ y. Hɔ deem mɔɔ dɔ, bala, mɔɔ nyɩnta bʋʋ, bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩm kɛɛrɛ."
43009026	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ a a ba ɩbɩɩ nɩ? A ba a ʋ lɔ an ɩbɩɩ mɩm bɩ gʋ?"
43009027	A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka, m a dɩnda awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n a tʋr ka ma y, gɛɛ lɔ? Bɔ minto m, a a ya, an nɩ mɔɔ larlɛ? A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ k'a ba a karɩndanyɩnɔ sɔ ra?"
43009028	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'a sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ n a karɩndanyɩ! Moyiisi karɩndanyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m.
43009029	Wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʋ, Woso meer ba kan Moyiisi kɩ, bɩ naa do naa, wɔɔ n a dɔ k'a to a ʋ ka y."
43009030	Gʋaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zɛkədə mim n naa! Awɔɔ n a tojɩ dɔ, b'a a ka mɔɔ mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm la!
43009031	Wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʋ, Woso bɩr a tʋr kam mimbʋnyaabənno ma y. Bɩ kʋ gʋaa ɩ Woso daŋ ʋ, an n'a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ, Woso y'a tʋr kam bɩ zaa ma.
43009032	Gʋaa n a ma cɩna, ŋ ʋ, gʋaa ɩ gʋaa k'a yɩ kan bʋʋbaa kɩ bɩ mɩm gʋ y.
43009033	Gʋaa naa do, kʋ Woso gʋaa ɩ bɛɛ, a b'a dam ma, an hɔsɩ ba y."
43009034	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Yɩ ɩbɩɩ ʋ mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ, ɩ bʋr, ɩ nɩ karɩnda dɩndam wɔɔ m na?" Ŋ n la ra an bɔ, ŋn'a bɔ a zi.
43009035	Yeezuu k'a a ma a ʋ, ŋ la ra bɩ, a bʋr zi an b'a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ sɩra kam Gʋaanyɩ b'ʋ ra?"
43009036	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Nka nɩ, Zuuba, kʋ m sɩra ka ʋ?"
43009037	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ yɩ, an nɩ meer bam kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ naa."
43009038	Gʋaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ sɩra ka ɩ ʋ, Zuuba." A n kukurə zɛ a taa.
43009039	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ durnya naa nɔ ʋ dʋdɔ minto, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mɩm bɩr lɛɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛ yɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ n a ba bʋʋrɔ."
43009040	Farizɛɛnrɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A hɩ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, bʋʋrɔ m wɔɔ m sɔ gɛ?"
43009041	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ bʋʋrɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ mimbʋnyaa bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ y. Bɩ naa ma bɩ, k'awɔɔ ʋ, a mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ mimbʋnyaa bɩ gɔɔta an ta ʋ."
43010001	"Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a n gasʋ seero bakʋ lɛ nɩ y, an bɔkarɛ an bɔɔra m, an gasʋ, bɩ zaa bɩ, koor m, hɔyɔrɛzaa m sɔ.
43010002	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a gasʋ bakʋ bɩ lɛ m bɩ, bɩ zaa m seero wɔɔ dundor.
43010003	Gʋaa k'a nɩ dɔm cɛlɛ ma bɩ n'a gʋm dundor bɩ m, seero wɔɔ n a tʋr ka a leer ma. A n a seero wɔɔ bir deem-deem ŋ tɔ ma, an bɔ ŋ nɩ garga ra.
43010004	K'a bɔ ŋ nɩ haay, ka an nawʋrɛ ŋ lɛɛ, seero wɔɔ n zu a jɛ ʋ, kʋ ŋ y'a leer dɔ bɩ minto.
43010005	Ŋ bɩ yɛrɛ, ŋnɩ zu saana jɛ ʋ y. A si ŋ nawʋm, ŋn'a gʋ saana bɩ ma, bala, ŋ n saanarɔ leer dɔ y."
43010006	Yeezuu n hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, bɩ ŋ n hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ jɩ dɔ y.
43010007	Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ m bakʋ bɩ lɛ.
43010008	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ lɛɛ ŋnɩ bʋr lɔ wɔɔ, konno m, hɔyɔrɛzannɔ m sɔ. Bɩ, seero wɔɔ n a tʋr ka ŋ ma y.
43010009	Mɔɔ m bakʋ bɩ lɛ. Kʋ gʋaa gasʋ mɔɔ m, a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm. A gasʋrɛ, an bɔ, an bʋr, an hɔbɩrɛ yɩ an a bɩ.
43010010	Koor bɩr zɛm k'a hɩ bɛɛ a ʋ, k'a koor ba, k'a gər zɛ, k'a hɔ zar y. Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ gʋɔɔ m mɩsɩrbaa yɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a yɩ an bʋr bɔ."
43010011	"Mɔɔ m dundor mɩŋŋa. Bɩ dundor mɩŋŋa bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa an n'a kam a seero wɔɔ minto.
43010012	Gʋaa k'a nɩ zi bam busoo minto bɩ, seero wɔɔ dundor bɛɛ nɩ y, bɩ ŋ zaa bɛɛ sɔ y. K'a tampa yɩ an nɩ zɛrɛ, a si an nawʋrɛ, an n'a gʋm seero wɔɔ ma. Tampa bɩ n a da ŋ bir, ŋn'a hɩsɩga.
43010013	Kʋ gʋaa bɩ, a ka an nawʋm busoo ma bɩ, a leer ba seero wɔɔ mim ma y.
43010014	Dundor mɩŋŋa m mɔɔ m. Mɔɔ m seero wɔɔ dɔ, bɩ mɔɔ seero wɔɔ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ,
43010015	amba mɔɔ Zɩ mɔɔ dɔ, mɔɔ nɩ m Zɩ dɔ bɩ m. Bɩ, m mɩsɩrbaa mɔɔ n'a karɛ m seero wɔɔ minto.
43010016	Seero gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʋ, ŋ ba bakʋ naa do ʋ y, bɩ mɔɔ brɔɔ gaam, m bʋr ŋ nɩ. Ŋ zɛm b'a tʋr ka mɔɔ leer ma. Bɩ, seero bakʋ nyɩntam deem a dundor deem.
43010017	Mɔɔ Zɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋarɛ, bala, mɔɔ yɩ m mɩsɩrbaa karɛ, kʋ m m ya, m b'a si.
43010018	Gʋaa bɛɛ nɩ mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ sire y, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa n'a kam. Mɔɔ m da ma, m a ka, mɔɔ m da ma, m a si. Mɔɔ Zɩ ɩ lɛ naa do ka mɔɔ ʋ."
43010019	Minno nɔɔn duro a ya, an zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ gʋngʋ kʋ ma.
43010020	Gʋɔɔ gʋta yɩ ŋ barla, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zinə nɩ kan kɩ, hɔɔzaa m, bɔ minto m, a n'a tʋr karɛ a meerbaa ma?"
43010021	Bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ zinə n nɩ kan kɩ meerbaarɔ bɛɛ m naa y. Zinə y'a dam ma, an bʋʋ mɩm gʋ ra?"
43010022	N ɩ Zerizalɛm Wosocɛ bankarɛ tɔdaanɔʋ cibsa bam. Nyɩnta a ʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm.
43010023	Yeezuu nɩ bɩmbɩrm Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ Salomɔɔn laŋŋa gʋta kʋ n y'a dɔ jaa m bɩ taa b'ʋ.
43010024	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n bɩ bɩr ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ Krista n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, ɩbɩɩ wɔɔ tore ʋ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ, an ta, an dɔmɩm kara ku? A hɩ wɔɔ m paan•••!"
43010025	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n a si y, ziro kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ barɛ m Zɩ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam.
43010026	Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ bɩr a sire y, kʋ mɔɔ seero bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m bɩ minto.
43010027	Mɔɔ seero wɔɔ y'a tʋr kam mɔɔ leer ma, bɩ mɔɔ ŋ dɔ sɔ, ŋn'ɩ zum mɔɔ jɛ ʋ.
43010028	Bɩ mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ karɛ ŋ ʋ. Ŋ bɩ gam fɩɩga y. Bɩ, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an ŋ bɔ mɔɔ wɔ ʋ y.
43010029	Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ lɛ da hɔ haay ra, bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ an b'a dam ma, an hɔ bɔ Zɩ bɩ wɔ ʋ y.
43010030	Mɔɔ kan Zɩ bɩ kɩ, wɔɔ deem."
43010031	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n a ya, ŋnɩ jaarɔ gʋr k'a gʋngʋɛɛn.
43010032	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ka awɔɔ m zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Zɩ zi rɔ wɔɔ yɩ. Brɔɔ minto y'a ka, awɔɔ k'a mɔɔ gʋngʋɛɛn ra?"
43010033	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Zibəə mɩŋŋa barɛ minto bɛɛ y'a ka, wɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ gʋngʋɛɛnrɛ y, sʋnsɔ k'ɩbɩɩ wʋ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m gʋaa, ɩ bɔkarɛ, ɩ n'ɩ mɩŋŋa bam Woso bɩ minto m."
43010034	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ŋ n a gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ lɛrɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ ra? 'Mɔɔ hɩ: wosoro n'awɔɔ m.'
43010035	Wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ bɩ zar y. Woso gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a lemim ma rɔ wɔɔ bir wosoro. Awɔɔ y'a hɩm gʋaa kʋ Zɩ b'a nyɔɔ bɩ ma, a ʋ, sʋnsɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a wʋrɛ, kʋ mɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ ʋ Woso Nyɩ m mɔɔ m bɩ minto.
43010036	Gʋaa kʋ Zɩ b'a bɔ ʋ, an a nyɔɔ durnya ʋ, b'awɔɔ ʋ, Woso sʋnsɔ an n'a wʋrɛ. Bala, kʋ mɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ ʋ Woso Nyɩ mɔɔ m bɩ minto.
43010037	Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ m Zɩ zi ba, a bɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ y.
43010038	Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ y'a barɛ, baa k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, k'a sɩra ka a zibəə bɩ minto, k'a bɔkarɛ a dɔ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ, Zɩ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ kan Zɩ kɩ."
43010039	Ŋ n a ya, ŋnɩ wuti, ŋn'a ŋʋam k'a nyasʋ. Yeezuu n a yɔ ŋ nɩ.
43010040	Yeezuu n a wusigə an ta Zʋrdɛn kɔ lɛ ra zeezi, bɩncɛ kʋ Zaan a sɩŋŋɩda ba ʋ, an nɩ batɛm kaŋ ʋ b'ʋ, an aa gɔɔta b'ʋ.
43010041	Gʋɔɔ gʋta n bʋr zi, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zaan n hoser deem taan••• ba y, bɩ hɔ haay k'a hɩ gʋaa naa do minto bɩ, sɩra m."
43010042	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋta sɩra ka ʋ b'ʋ.
43011001	Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, an nɩ yaaba m. A tɔ m Lazaar. Betanii gʋaa m. Maarii kan a cɛmba Martɩ kɩ kʋ m bɩ.
43011002	Maarii bɩ do ɩ tidəər nɔ Zuuba ma, an a minkə gaa, an a nʋnnɔ a gannɔ ma bɩ. A dakumboor Lazaar ɩ bɩ laafɩɩ bɩ.
43011003	A danlʋrɔ wɔɔ n nyɔɔ da, ŋn'aa a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa k'ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa bɩ bɩ laafɩɩ y."
43011004	Kʋ Yeezuu a ma bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Yaaba naa do, zɛ yaaba bɛɛ y, zɛ an nawʋm Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ m. A minto n'a kam Woso Nyɩ bɩ n daʋrɛ yɩ."
43011005	Yeezuu nyɩnta an Martɩ ŋʋa kan a danzaa bɩ kɩ, Lazaar kɩ.
43011006	Baa k'a a dɔ a ʋ, Lazaar bɩ laafɩɩ bɩ, a gɔɔta bɩncɛ k'an ta ʋ b'ʋ dɔmɩm hɩɩya.
43011007	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: "Ʋ ʋ bɔ, ʋ ta Zidee ʋ."
43011008	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, zɩɩfʋrɔ a ka ma dɩɩtaa k'a ɩbɩɩ gʋngʋɛɛn jaarɔ m, ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ ɩ bɔ, ɩ ta b'ʋ ra?"
43011009	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A n a sa dɔgta m an ta yirbəə ra lɛɛgure bɛɛ m ta ʋ wakatɩ bueerehɩɩya ra? Kʋ gʋaa ɩ tam lɛɛgure ʋ a bɩr a gəm zɛrɛ y, bala, a ɩ durnya naa do lɛɛgure yɩm.
43011010	Bɩ kʋ gʋaa ɩ tam gunuu ʋ, a y'a gəm zɛm, bala, a mɩm bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y."
43011011	K'a meer naa do ba an a nya bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Wɔɔ gʋaasɩba Lazaar hinceem ba, bɩ mɔɔ tam, m aa a gu."
43011012	A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, kʋ hinceem a ba, a laafɩɩ yɩrɛ."
43011013	Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu bɩ, a ŋʋa a ʋ, k'a hɩ a ʋ, Lazaar ga. Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʋ, hinceem paan••• mim an n'a dɩndarɛ.
43011014	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ paan•••, a ʋ: "Lazaar ga.
43011015	Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ n nyɩnta b'ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ heernyɔɔ m awɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a a da ma, a sɩra ka. K'a wuti, k'ʋ ta zi."
43011016	Toma kʋ n n'a birm Didim b'a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Ʋ ta, kan kɩ, ʋ aa gɩnga sɔ."
43011017	Yeezuu k'a lee ku bɩ, a yaa dɩga a n Lazaar bir. A birle dɔmɩm si lɛɛm.
43011018	Bɩ kʋ Betanii bɩ laatʋ Zerizalɛm ma bɩ, a ga kʋ a ba cilo kaakʋ.
43011019	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bʋr gʋta k'a bɩ yaa da Martɩ m kan Maarii kɩ, ŋ dakumboor bɩ garɛ minto.
43011020	Kʋ Martɩ a ma, n ʋ, Yeezuu ɩ zɛm bɩ, a ta, an aa a zɛ ʋ, Maarii n gɔɔta har ʋ, an nɩ nyɩntam.
43011021	Martɩ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, kʋ nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ ʋ naa ʋ, mɔɔ dakumboor bɩ bɩ garɛ y.
43011022	Bɩ, an gɔɔta naa, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n n'a yɛm Woso han bɩ, a y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ."
43011023	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ dakumboor bɩ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ."
43011024	Martɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ dɔ, a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ durnya nyarɛ ma."
43011025	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ m mɩmbɔʋrɛ, mɔɔ m mɩsɩrbaa. Gʋaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, baa k'a zaa ga, a mɩsɩrbaa yɩrɛ.
43011026	Bɩ gʋaa k'an mɩsɩr, an nɩ sɩra kam mɔɔ ʋ, a bɩ gam fɩɩga y. Ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka naa ʋ ra?"
43011027	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn••• Zuuba, mɔɔ sɩra ka, mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ m Krista, Woso Nyɩ k'a a ga m an bʋr durnya ʋ bɩ."
43011028	K'a meer bɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a a hʋr, an aa a danzaa Maarii bɩ bir, an a hɩ m sɩnsɛɛrɛ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba bʋr, an n'ɩbɩɩ birm."
43011029	Maarii k'a naa ma bɩ, a wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an ta zi.
43011030	Bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu n gasʋ kʋ b'ʋ cɩna y. A gɔɔta an nɩ bɩncɛ kʋ Martɩ a zɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
43011031	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta kan Maarii kɩ har ʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ bra bam nɩ. Kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ an wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ an bɔ bɩ, ŋ zu a jɛ ʋ, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʋ, ta an nawʋm yaa ra b'ʋ k'a yaa nyi ka.
43011032	Maarii k'a yaa lee ku bɩncɛ kʋ Yeezuu n ta ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, k'a a yɩ lɛɛm bɩ, a sʋnta a taa an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, kʋ nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ ʋ naa ʋ, mɔɔ dakumboor bɩ bɩ garɛ y."
43011033	Yeezuu k'a yɩ, an nɩ nyi kam kan zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ yaa a da zaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a heer a zɛ kʋ ma.
43011034	A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "A bir awɔɔ ʋ ka?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, bʋr ɩ dɩga a."
43011035	Yeezuu n nyi ka.
43011036	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a dɩga a, a a ŋʋa gʋta!"
43011037	Gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ ŋ barla, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a bʋʋ k'a yɩ kan bʋʋbaa kɩ mɩm gʋ bɩ, a b'a dam ma, an a ka Lazaar bɩ gam na?"
43011038	Yeezuu heer n a ya, an a zɛ kʋ ma, an a hʋr an ta yaa ra b'ʋ. Nyɩnta a ʋ ci yaa, ŋ n jaa ta a lɛ bɩ rɛ.
43011039	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a jaa bɩ gʋ rɛ." Gər bɩ danlʋ Martɩ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, a ji nyɩntaŋ ʋ, a dɔmɩm si hɔ n naa."
43011040	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ, k'ɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, ɩ Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩm na?"
43011041	Ŋ n jaa bɩ gʋ rɛ. Yeezuu n a bɔɔta, an dɩga brama, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, mɔɔ ɩ barka darɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ mɔɔ yaadarɛ si bɩ minto.
43011042	Mɔɔ dɔ, mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ yaadarɛ sim dɔmɩm haay, bɩ meer bɩ ba mɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr mɔɔ ma naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a si, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ."
43011043	K'a meer ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a həən si kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Lazaar, bɔ!"
43011044	Gər bɩ n bɔ, a gannɔ kan a wɔrɔ kɩ nɩ kʋsɩm kan pɛɛrarɔ kɩ, pɛɛra nɩ burgure a meer ma. Yeezuu n a hɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋr ma, k'a to k'an ta!"
43011045	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ duro gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta kan Maarii kɩ jɩr ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba bɩ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋta sɩra ka ʋ.
43011046	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ta, ŋn'aa farizɛɛnrɔ yɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ.
43011047	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ a so kʋ ma, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ wɔɔ n n'a barɛ? Gʋaa naa do ɩ hoserlo bam gʋta.
43011048	Kʋ wɔɔ to an n'a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ gʋaa haay sɩra kaŋ ʋ, Rɔm zannɔ zɛm, ŋnɩ bɩ wɔɔ Wosocɛ bɩ da, kan wɔɔ do bɩ kɩ."
43011049	Ŋ gʋaa deem k'a tɔ m Kayiifʋ b'ɩ nyɩnta wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ dɔɔraa bɩ do ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ bɩr hɔsɩ jɩ marɛ y.
43011050	Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, a jɩra kʋ gʋaa deem n ga, gʋaa haay minto kʋ wɔɔ do bɩ b'a zar haay ra?"
43011051	A mɩŋŋa hɔɔndarɛ bɛɛ m meerbaa naa do nɩ y, kʋ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m dɔɔraa bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Woso lemim naa do da a lɛ ʋ, a ʋ: Pakra m kʋ Yeezuu m ga do bɩ minto,
43011052	bɩ do bɩ minto bɛɛ m bala y, k'a Woso nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ y'a hɩsɩga bɩ so kʋ ma lɛɛ deem ʋ.
43011053	Hinni bɩ do ʋ, ŋ y'a cɩnta ŋ ʋ, k'a zɛ gər.
43011054	Bɩ minto y'a ka, Yeezuu n a ya, an nɩ bɩmbɩrm paan••• zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ y. A ta bɩncɛ niŋŋə k'an jɩnjɛɛm poohɔɔn ma b'ʋ, kʋ niŋŋə kʋ n n'a birm Efrayim ʋ b'ʋ, an aa gɔɔta b'ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ.
43011055	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, pakkɩ cibsa a zɔ. Pakkɩ bɩ k'a gɔɔta booti m bɩ yirbəə m gʋɔɔ gʋta a to bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ mɩŋŋa hubɔrɛ zibəə minto.
43011056	Ŋ n'a kam Yeezuu ma, bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʋ lɔ? A bɩ zɛm cibsa bɩ ma ra!"
43011057	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛ ka, ŋ ʋ: Gʋaa k'a bɩncɛ dɔ kan a hɩ k'a ku a nyasʋ.
43012001	Pakkɩ cibsa k'a gɔɔta dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ bɩ, Yeezuu ta Betanii ʋ, kʋ kʋ Lazaar n ta ʋ b'ʋ. Kʋ bɩ do a Lazaar mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ.
43012002	N yirbəə hɔbɩrɛ ba b'ʋ, n n a ka Yeezuu ʋ. Martɩ nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ jirm, bɩ ma bɩ, Lazaar ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ barla.
43012003	Maarii n tidəər nyɔɔ kʋ n y'a ba naar paan••• m a lɛ n kʋsɩ bɩ sa gedre ʋ, an a nɔ Yeezuu gannɔ ma, an a minkə gaa an a nʋnnɔ ma, tidəər ji bɩ n sʋr har bɩ ma haay.
43012004	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʋ gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka b'a hɩ, a ʋ:
43012005	"Bɔ minto, n n tidəər naa do sa, n n a hɛɛ deniyee zɔɔkarkʋ, n n a ka cicirzannɔ ʋ?"
43012006	K'a hɩ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, a hɔɔn an n'a dam cicirzannɔ ma y. Bala, a mɩŋŋa koor m, k'a y'a so busoo bɩ zibəə b'ʋ bɩ, a ɩ hɔ kʋ n n'a cɩntam bɩ kʋnam.
43012007	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a to! Naa do ba an nawʋm mɔɔ birle dɔmɩm minto.
43012008	Cicirzannɔ wɔɔ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay, bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay y."
43012009	Bɩ ma bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ cir gʋta a ma, ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu bʋr b'ʋ. Ŋ n bʋr zi, bɩ ŋ n bʋr a minto bala y, bʋr ŋ y'a ʋ k'a bɩ Lazaar k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ yɩ.
43012010	Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta k'a Lazaar zɛ gər sɔ,
43012011	bala, a minto y'a ka, zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔ gʋta n'a gʋrɛ ŋ ma, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu mim sim.
43012012	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ bʋr cibsa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu ɩ zɛm Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ,
43012013	ŋ bɛ gɔ lɛɛ yɩnyar, ŋnɩ ta k'a yaa a zɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Hozaana! Gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm Woso tɔ ma, Israyɛl cir bɩ n barka yɩ."
43012014	Yeezuu brapoo yɩ, an da ʋ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba bɩ m:
43012015	Siyɔn zannɔ, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Ba awɔɔ cir nɩ zɛm n na. Da a ʋ brapoo ʋ.
43012016	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm naa jɩ dɔ hɔɔ y. Bɩ, kʋ ŋ Yeezuu lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ bɩ, ŋ hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba a minto bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, bɩ naa ba ŋ y'a ʋ a minto.
43012017	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ dɔmɩm k'a Lazaar bir yaa ʋ an bɔ, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a kasɛtɩ ka.
43012018	Bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta bʋr zi. Kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ, a hoser naa do ba bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋnɩ bʋr k'a b'a zɛ ʋ.
43012019	Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ yɩ, a dɔ a ʋ, a b'a dam ma, a hɔsɩ ba y. K'a dɩga gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ zure a jɛ ʋ!"
43012020	Cibsa k'a n ta ʋ bɩ minto, grɛkkɩrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ der k'a Woso da ʋ.
43012021	Ŋ n a hɩ Galilee kʋ Bɛtsayɩdaa gʋaa Filipi m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ harzaa, wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʋ Yeezuu yɩ."
43012022	Filipi n ta, an aa hɩ Andɩr m, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'a hɩ Yeezuu m.
43012023	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Wakatɩ a ku kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ.
43012024	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: kʋ hɔyaa a zo tara ʋ, a n ga y, gɔɔta an nawʋrɛ a deem. Bɩ, k'a ga, nyɩ an n'a dam gʋta.
43012025	Gʋaa k'a a mɩsɩrbaa ŋʋa, a b'a yɩrɛ y. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a kaanm a mɩsɩrbaa m durnya naa do nɔ ʋ, a mɩsɩrbaa yɩm mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
43012026	Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a mɔɔ zi ba k'an zu mɔɔ ʋ, bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ n ta ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ zibəənyɩ bɩ nyɩntam b'ʋ sɔ. Gʋaa k'a mɔɔ zi ba, Zɩ y'a daŋ ʋ.
43012027	Naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ heer a zɛ kʋ ma, bɩ, kʋ m a hɩ mɔɔ ʋ lɔ? Kʋ m a hɩ, mɔɔ ʋ: M Zɩ, mɔɔ bʋmbɔ wakatɩ naa do ma gɛɛ? Bɩ, wakatɩ naa do minto y'a ka, mɔɔ n bʋr.
43012028	Zɩ, ɩ lɛ bɔ ɩ tɔ ʋ." Leer n a to brama, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n lɛ bɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ, m m lɛ bɔ ʋ."
43012029	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ leer bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ, brama ɩ həən si. Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ, malɛɛka ɩ meer ba kan kɩ.
43012030	Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Leer naa do n bɔ mɔɔ minto y, bɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ minto.
43012031	Durnya naa do dʋdɔ karɛ n naa kɛɛrɛ, bɩ, n lam durnya naa do cir bɩ ra, an bɔ garga ra.
43012032	Bɩ kʋ n mɔɔ busu brama durnya burə ʋ, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ haay gaarɛ m zi."
43012033	Meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba Yeezuu ʋ, k'a a zɛ zaa hɩnka.
43012034	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Lɛrɔ ci b'a dɩnda wɔɔ m, a ʋ: Krista gɔɔtam dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ. Ɩbɩɩ ba lɔ, ɩ n'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ, n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ busum brama? Gʋaanyɩ naa do, nka nɩ?"
43012035	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Lɛɛgure gɔɔta awɔɔ minto dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ. Bala, lɛɛgure k'a gɔɔta an ta ʋ bɩ, k'a ta a nɔ ʋ, a b'a ka monsigə bɩ n zɛ awɔɔ ra y. Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ tam monsigə ʋ bɩ n a dɔ kʋ ta an nawʋm ka y.
43012036	Kʋ lɛɛgure bɩ gɔɔta an ta ʋ bɩ, k'a sɩra ka lɛɛgure b'ʋ, k'a a ba lɛɛgure nyɩnɔ." Yeezuu k'a meer ba kan ŋ kɩ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a a hʋr an a nyaakʋm da ŋ lɛɛ.
43012037	Baa kan hoserlo k'a ŋ ba ŋ mɩm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, ŋ n sɩra ka ʋ y,
43012038	kʋ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ n bɩ n kʋ yɩ: 'Zuuba, nka ɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ hɩ bɩ si? Nka Zuuba a paŋŋa hɩnka nɩ?'
43012039	Ezayii deem-deem b'a hɩ kʋ bɔ minto y'a ka, ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋn'a si y:
43012040	'A ŋ mɩm ta, an ŋ heer ka, kʋ ŋ mɩm b'a da ma an lɛɛ yɩ, kʋ ŋ heer b'a da ma an a jɩ ma y, kʋ ŋ b'a bɔ a taam, kʋ m ŋ waa y.'
43012041	Ezayii naa do hɩ, bala, a Yeezuu lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ yɩ, an a mim dɩnda.
43012042	Kan bɩ kɩ haay, jɩtannɔ wɔɔ barla, gʋta a mim si. Bɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ minto, ŋ bɩr a kasɛtɩ karɛ y. Bala, ŋ yɩ nyi bam, ŋ y'a la a ra sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ.
43012043	Gʋɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ ŋ n'a ŋʋarɛ, ŋ bɩr a kam Woso hɔ ma y.
43012044	Yeezuu n a leer busu, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, sɩra bɛɛ a ka mɔɔ ʋ y, Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a sɩra ka ʋ.
43012045	Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ yɩrɛ, Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a n'a yɩrɛ.
43012046	Mɔɔ m lɛɛgure, m bʋr durnya ʋ, kʋ gʋaa k'a nɩ sɩra kam mɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩ gɔɔta monsigə ʋ y.
43012047	Kʋ gʋaa mɔɔ lemim ma, b'a n a si y, mɔɔ bɛɛ n n'a dʋdɔ karɛ y. Bala, mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ m bɩ durnya dʋdɔ ka y, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m bɩ durnya bʋmbɔ.
43012048	Gʋaa k'a kaanm mɔɔ m, a n mɔɔ lemim bɩ si, a zaa dʋdɔkər ta ʋ. Lemim kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ y'a dʋdɔ kam durnya nyarɛ hinni ʋ.
43012049	Mɔɔ n m mɩŋŋa mim dɩnda y, Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'ɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ m ga m, m a hɩ bɩ hɩ mɔɔ m, kʋ m a hɩ.
43012050	Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, a lɛ bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m. Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ amba mɔɔ Zɩ a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m."
43013001	Pakkɩ cibsa k'a n a ku cɩna bɩ, Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a ʋ a wakatɩ a ku bɩ, k'a bɔ durnya nɔ ʋ a a wusigə a Zɩ zi bɩ, a a mɩŋŋa gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa kan ŋʋarɛ gʋta kɩ.
43013002	A bʋr an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm, bɩ ma bɩ, Sʋtaana hɔɔndarɛ da Sɩmɔɔn nyɩ Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʋ gʋaa bɩ heer ʋ, k'an a nyasʋ an a ka.
43013003	K'a a dɔ a ʋ, Zɩ bɩ hɔ haay zar a wɔ ʋ bɩ, b'a to a ʋ Woso zi, a a bɔ an nɩ tam zi bɩ,
43013004	Yeezuu wuti hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ra, an a zaba bɩ bɔ a ra, an a cɩnta, an pɛɛra sa an a so a ʋ.
43013005	A n hi tɔ mɔr ʋ, an a sɩŋŋɩda ba an n'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gannɔ sʋrgɔm, an nɩ pɛɛra k'a so a ʋ bɩ nʋnnɔrɛ ŋ ma.
43013006	A n aa lee ku Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr zi. Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "A n a ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ gannɔ sʋrgɔ y, Zuuba!"
43013007	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ jɩ dɔ cɩna y, b'ɩbɩɩ zɛm b'a dɔ."
43013008	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩ mɔɔ gannɔ sʋrgɔm fɩɩga y!" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ n ɩbɩɩ gannɔ sʋrgɔ, mɔɔ gʋaa bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ y."
43013009	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩ bɩ mɔɔ gannɔ sʋrgɔ bala y, mɔɔ wɔrɔ sʋrgɔ sɔ kan mɔɔ mim kɩ!"
43013010	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a a zʋr bɩ lɛ baa zʋrlɛ ma dɔ y, bala, a hu bɔ jilli. B'awɔɔ, dintim b'awɔɔ ma dɔ y. Bɩ, awɔɔ haay bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ a ma y."
43013011	Bala, a gʋaa k'a n'a nyasʋm k'a ka bɩ dɔ. Bɩ minto y'a ka, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ haay hu bɛɛ bɔ y."
43013012	Yeezuu ka ŋ gannɔ sʋrgɔ an a nya bɩ, a a huu bɩ sa, an a da a ra, an nyɩnta hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ m bɩ jɩ dɔ ra?
43013013	Awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ birm, Karɩnsaamba gɛɛ Zuuba, a maam karɛ, bala, a m mɔɔ m.
43013014	K'awɔɔ Zuuba kan a karɩnsaamba kɩ m mɔɔ m bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n awɔɔ gannɔ sʋrgɔ, b'awɔɔ a ga m sɔ a kʋ gannɔ sʋrgɔ.
43013015	Bala, makra mɔɔ ka awɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ minto bɩ, k'a ba sɔ.
43013016	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zibəənyɩ n lɛ da a karɩnsaamba nɩ y, bɩ zibəəzaa kʋ n y'a nyɔɔ n lɛ da gʋaa k'a nyɔɔ bɩ nɩ y.
43013017	K'awɔɔ naa haay dɔ bɩ, k'awɔɔ ba maam, mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m.
43013018	Mɔɔ bɩr meer bɩ barɛ awɔɔ haay minto y. Mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ dɔ. Kʋ Wosoci bɩ meerbaa naa do n kʋ yɩ: 'Gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ bɩm kan mɔɔ kɩ b'a ba mɔɔ jɩm.'
43013019	A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ, kʋ mim bɩ n lee ku cɩna bɩ minto, k'a bɩ bʋr, k'a sɩra ka, a ʋ: A n ta ʋ bɩ m mɔɔ m.
43013020	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ mɔɔ gʋaa nyɔɔ, n n a si, mɔɔ n yɩ m si, bɩ kʋ n mɔɔ si, Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ n y'a si."
43013021	Kʋ Yeezuu meer ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a heer a zɛ kʋ ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ gʋaa deem mɔɔ nyasʋrɛ an mɔɔ ka."
43013022	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam kʋ ma, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa larlɛ kʋ nka mim an n'a hɩm gɛ.
43013023	Karɩndanyɩ deem kʋ Yeezuu nyɩnta an a ŋʋa bɩ nyɩnta a jɩr ʋ.
43013024	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n kʋtɩ zɛ m, a ʋ, an laaka da han: "Nka an n'a hɩm ma gɛ?"
43013025	Karɩndanyɩ bɩ n zerga Yeezuu cɩ ra, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, nka nɩ?"
43013026	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ nɩ bur nyɔɔm taanm ʋ m a ka ʋ bɩ, bɩ m." K'a bur kur bɩ nɔ ma bɩ, a a ka Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʋ gʋaa Sɩmɔɔn nyɩ Zidas ʋ.
43013027	Zidas k'a bur kur bɩ si bɩ, Sʋtaana gasʋ ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'ɩ ʋ k'ɩ ba bɩ, a ba zɔɔ."
43013028	Ŋ haay kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem n a dɔ kʋ bɔ minto, an naa hɩ y.
43013029	Kʋ Zidas n ta busoo bɩ m bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʋ, a hɩ Yeezuu ʋ k'an aa cibsa bɩ mɔdrɔ si, gɛɛ, an aa hɔ niŋŋə ka cicirzannɔ ʋ.
43013030	Zidas k'a bur bɩ kur bɩ si bɩ, a bɔ lɛɛm: Bɩ ma bɩ, gum da.
43013031	Zidas k'a bɔ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʋ: "Naa ma bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, bɩ Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ a tɔ ma.
43013032	Woso y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ a zi, bɩ k'a yɩ poore Woso y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ.
43013033	M nyɩnɔ, dɔmɩm gɔɔta poore kʋ mɔɔ n gɔɔta kan awɔɔ kɩ. Awɔɔ y'a kam mɔɔ ma. Amba mɔɔ hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ m bɩ m, bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ taŋ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ bɩ lee kum b'ʋ y. A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ sɔ.
43013034	Lɛ daa mɔɔ n n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ: k'a kʋ ŋʋa. Amba mɔɔ awɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ, k'a kʋ ŋʋa maam sɔ.
43013035	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋaa haay y'a dɔrɛ, a ʋ, mɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ ɩ kʋ ŋʋarɛ."
43013036	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ta ɩbɩɩ n nawʋm ka?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ zu mɔɔ ʋ ɩ ta bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ taŋ ʋ b'ʋ cɩna y, bɩ k'a yɩ poore, ɩ zɛm bɩ zu mɔɔ ʋ."
43013037	Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, bɔ minto mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m zu ɩbɩɩ ʋ dɩɩtaa? Mɔɔ yɩ m mɩŋŋa meeyaa karɛ ɩbɩɩ minto!"
43013038	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'ɩ mɩŋŋa meeyaa ka mɔɔ minto nɩ? Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʋ, koo n bɔkarɛ, an baa da."
43014001	"A b'a heer zar y. K'a sɩra ka Woso ʋ, k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ sɔ.
43014002	Cɛrɔ ta ʋ gʋta mɔɔ Zɩ har ʋ. Kʋ n bɛɛ mɔɔ b'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ m aa bɩncɛ k'awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ bɩ banka y.
43014003	Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ ta, m aa a banka awɔɔ minto, mɔɔ yɩ m bɔrɛ, m b'awɔɔ gaa, bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ mɔɔ m ta ʋ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n bɩr b'ʋ sɔ.
43014004	Awɔɔ bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ taŋ ʋ bɩ zaa dɔ."
43014005	Toma n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, wɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ ta ɩbɩɩ nawʋm ka y. Wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, k'ʋ zaa bɩ dɔ?"
43014006	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n zaa, kan sɩra kɩ, mɩsɩrbaa kɩ. Gʋaa b'a dam ma, an ta Zɩ zi kʋ mɔɔ minto bɛɛ y.
43014007	Kʋ nyɩnta awɔɔ ʋ a mɔɔ dɔ, awɔɔ mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ dɔm sɔ. Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, awɔɔ dɔ, a yɩ sɔ."
43014008	Filipi n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, Zɩ bɩ hɩnka wɔɔ m, bɩ wɔɔ bɔ."
43014009	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ laatʋ, ɩbɩɩ n gɔɔta, ɩ n mɔɔ dɔ ra, Filipi! Gʋaa k'a mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, a Zɩ bɩ yɩ sɔ. Bɔ minto ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, n n Zɩ hɩnka ɩ nɩ?
43014010	Ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ kan Zɩ kɩ, Zɩ bɩ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ ra? Meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ ŋ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ bɩr ŋ barɛ, m mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y! Zɩ k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ n'a mɩŋŋa zi barɛ.
43014011	K'a mɔɔ mim si a ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ kan Zɩ kɩ, Zɩ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bɩ, k'awɔɔ n mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ si, k'a si zibəəro nɔɔn duro minto.
43014012	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, a zibəəro kʋ mɔɔ nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ barɛ. A zibəəro bam gʋta, ŋnɩ lɛ da nawɔnnɔ m, bala, ta mɔɔ nawʋm Zɩ zi.
43014013	Hɔ haay k'awɔɔ n n'a yɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ y'a barɛ, kʋ Zɩ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ Nyɩ bɩ zi.
43014014	K'awɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə yɛ mɔɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ y'a barɛ.
43014015	K'awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋarɛ, k'a mɔɔ lɛrɔ si, a zu ŋ ʋ.
43014016	Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ m Zɩ han k'an Daahanzaa vanta ka a ʋ, k'an gɔɔta kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay.
43014017	A m sɩra Ɛspri, durnya b'a dam ma an a si y. Bala, n bɩr a yɩrɛ, bɩ n n a dɔ sɔ y. B'awɔɔ dɔ, bala, a ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, an n'awɔɔ heer ʋ.
43014018	Mɔɔ b'awɔɔ tom sʋnnɔ y, mɔɔ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi.
43014019	A gɔɔta poore, durnya b'a yarɛ an mɔɔ yɩ y. B'awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩm mɩsɩr, awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bam sɔ.
43014020	Hinni bɩ do ʋ, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ a ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ kan Zɩ kɩ, awɔɔ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
43014021	Gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, an nɩ zure ŋ ʋ bɩ, a zaa ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋam. Gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ ŋʋarɛ, mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ y'a ŋʋam sɔ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ y'a ŋʋarɛ, m m hɩnka m."
43014022	Ziidi, Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʋ gʋaa bɩ bɛɛ y, bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ ɩ ɩ hɩnka wɔɔ m, b'ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ hɩnkam durnya nɩ?"
43014023	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋarɛ, a zum mɔɔ lemim ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ Zɩ y'a ŋʋarɛ. Wɔɔ zɛm zi, ʋ bɩ gɔɔta kan kɩ.
43014024	Gʋaa k'a n mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ bɩr zum mɔɔ lemim ʋ y. Bɩ lemim k'awɔɔ n'a mam naa, mɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y, a to a ʋ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi.
43014025	Nawɔnnɔ hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m kʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta m nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ minto.
43014026	Daahanzaa Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʋ Zɩ n n'a nyɔɔm mɔɔ tɔ minto bɩ hɔ haay dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m, a hɔ haay kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ tɔ darɛ awɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
43014027	Mɔɔ laafɩɩ to awɔɔ m, m nɩ m laafɩɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ bɩr a karɛ amba durnya n'a kam bɩ nɩ y. A b'a ka a heer n a zar gɛɛ, a da n bɔ ʋ y.
43014028	Awɔɔ ma mɔɔ n a hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m bɔrɛ, m bʋr awɔɔ zi. K'awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋarɛ, awɔɔ y'a heer nyɔɔm kʋ mɔɔ nɩ tam Zɩ zi bɩ minto. Bala, Zɩ bɩ lɛ da mɔɔ ra.
43014029	Minno nɔɔn duro hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m naa ma, bɩ ŋ n a ku cɩna y. Kʋ ŋ b'a ku, k'a ŋ si.
43014030	Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ, m meer gʋta ba kan awɔɔ kɩ y. Bala, durnya cir b'ɩ zɛrɛ. B'a hɔsɩ ba mɔɔ gʋr zi y.
43014031	Bɩ, kʋ durnya n a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ yɩ m Zɩ ŋʋarɛ, m nɩ zi barɛ amba Zɩ lɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ m. K'a wuti, k'ʋ cem."
43015001	"Dɩvɛn gɔ paan••• m mɔɔ m, bɩ wutuzaa m mɔɔ Zɩ m.
43015002	Mɔɔ vəŋŋə haay k'a bɩr nyɩ dam bɩ, n y'a zɛm la, n n a zo. Bɩ, mɔɔ vəŋŋə haay k'a nyɩ da bɩ, n y'a bankarɛ, k'an nyɩ da an lɛ da biisi ra.
43015003	Awɔɔ lɛɛ ka, a bankarɛ yɩ kan lemim kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ kɩ.
43015004	K'a gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ amba mɔɔ nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ m. Bala, kʋ dɩvɛn gɔ vəŋŋə bɩ n gɔɔta kan kɩ, a b'a dam ma, an nyɩ da a zim y. B'a hɔdeem k'an awɔɔ kɩ, k'awɔɔ n a naasʋ mɔɔ ma y."
43015005	"Mɔɔ m dɩvɛn gɔ, awɔɔ n'a vəŋŋoo. Gʋaa k'a a naasʋ mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ nɩ m naasʋ ma sɔ, a zaa nyɩ dam gʋta, bala, kʋ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a hɔsɩ ba y.
43015006	Kʋ gʋaa n a naasʋ mɔɔ ma, n y'a zom garga ra, amba gɔvəŋŋə kʋ n y'a zɛ ra hɔ bɩ m, an ga, n n'a gʋr n n'a da sɛ rɛ, an a bɩ.
43015007	K'awɔɔ a naasʋ mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ lemim bɩ nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ n hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ yɛ, a y'a yɩrɛ.
43015008	K'awɔɔ nyɩ da gʋta, bɩ n nɩ nyɩntam mɔɔ Zɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ, b'awɔɔ gɔɔtam mɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ."
43015009	"Kʋ Zɩ mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ, mɔɔ awɔɔ ŋʋa sɔ. K'a gɔɔta mɔɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
43015010	K'awɔɔ zu mɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ gɔɔta mɔɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, amba mɔɔ nɩ zum m Zɩ lɛrɔ ʋ, m gɔɔta a ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
43015011	Naa hɩ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ nɩ, kʋ mɔɔ heernyɔɔ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'awɔɔ heernyɔɔ n bɩr mɩŋŋa paan•••."
43015012	"Ba mɔɔ lɛ bɩ n na: k'a kʋ ŋʋa, amba mɔɔ awɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ m.
43015013	Gʋaa ŋʋarɛ ba ʋ an lɛ da gʋaa k'a mɩsɩrbaa ka zɛ ma gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ ŋʋa rɔ wɔɔ minto y.
43015014	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ, k'awɔɔ ba, mɔɔ gʋaasɩbɔɔ n'awɔɔ m.
43015015	Mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m awɔɔ bir, m zibəənyɩnɔ y, bala, zibəənyɩ bɩ n hɔ k'a zuuba n'a bam bɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ bir mɔɔ nawʋrɛ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ, bala, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ma m Zɩ zi bɩ, mɔɔ ka awɔɔ n a dɔ.
43015016	Awɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ y, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bɔ ʋ, m zibəə ka awɔɔ ʋ, k'a ta, k'a nyɩ da, k'awɔɔ nyɩ bɩ nya y. Bɩ y'a ka, k'awɔɔ hɔ haay yɛ mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ han mɔɔ tɔ ma, a y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
43015017	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm k'awɔɔ n a ba bɩ, k'a kʋ ŋʋa."
43015018	"Kʋ durnya sɔ awɔɔ m, k'a dɔ a ʋ, lɛɛ a ka an sɔ mɔɔ m.
43015019	Kʋ durnya bɩ zannɔ n'awɔɔ m, durnya bɩ hɔ k'a so ʋ bɩ ŋʋam. Bɩ durnya bɩ zannɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bɔ ʋ durnya nɔ ʋ a hɔ, bɩ y'a ka, durnya n sɔ awɔɔ m.
43015020	K'a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: zibəənyɩ n lɛ da a zuuba ra y. Kʋ ŋ fɩr ka mɔɔ ma, ŋ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ. Kʋ ŋ zu mɔɔ lemim b'ʋ, ŋ zure awɔɔ hɔ ʋ sɔ.
43015021	Ŋ naa haay barɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma, bala, ŋ n Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ dɔ y.
43015022	Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ nɩ bʋr ŋ bire ʋ, m bɩ hɔ k'an ta ʋ hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ mimbʋnyaa bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ y. Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, ŋ mimbʋnyaa bɩ sugur ba ʋ y.
43015023	Gʋaa k'a sɔ mɔɔ m, sɔ a ʋ mɔɔ Zɩ m sɔ.
43015024	Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ nɩ zibəəro nɔɔn duro kʋ gʋaa n a ba rɔ nɔɔm ba ŋ bire ʋ, ŋ mimbʋnyaa bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ y. Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, ŋ yɩ ŋ yɩ, ŋn'a gu, ŋn'ɩ sɔm wɔɔ m, mɔɔ kan m Zɩ kɩ.
43015025	A lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʋ, lemim kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba ŋ lɛrɔ ci nɔ ʋ bɩ kʋ yɩ. 'N sɔ mɔɔ m, b'a jɩ ba ʋ y.' "
43015026	"Kʋ mɔɔ ta m Zɩ zi, mɔɔ Daahanzaa bɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ m. Sɩra Ɛspri k'a n'a tore m Zɩ zi bɩ, a mɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ a zim.
43015027	Awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam, bala, awɔɔ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ hallɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ."
43016001	"Naa haay hɩ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ b'a gəm zɛ y.
43016002	Ŋ larɛ awɔɔ ra sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ. Dɔmɩm ta ʋ an nɩ zɛm, gʋaa k'a n'awɔɔ zɛm gər bɩ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, mannɩ a ba, a ka Woso ʋ.
43016003	Ŋ y'a barɛ awɔɔ m ncɩnaaʋ, bala, ŋ n Zɩ dɔ, ŋ n mɔɔ dɔ sɔ y.
43016004	Naa hɩ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ m, kʋ wakatɩ bɩ bɩ bʋr, k'a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ." "Mɔɔ n lɛɛ ka m a hɩ awɔɔ m a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ y, bala, mɔɔ nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ.
43016005	Bɩ naa ma bɩ, ta mɔɔ nawʋm Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi, b'awɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ mɔɔ larm, a ʋ: ta ɩ nawʋm ka?
43016006	Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ minto y'a ka, awɔɔ heer n a zar.
43016007	Sɩra mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m. Awɔɔ daahan minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ tarɛ. Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ n doo, Daahanzaa bɩ bɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi y. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ doo, mɔɔ y'a nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ m.
43016008	K'a mɩŋŋa bɩ bʋr, a mimbʋnyaa, tɩrgabaa kan dʋdɔkarɛ kɩ, kʋ ŋ lʋnlɔ, a y'a hɩnkam durnyazannɔ m.
43016009	Mimbʋnyaa bɩncɛ ʋ, ŋ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ y.
43016010	Tɩrgabaa bɩncɛ ʋ, ta mɔɔ nawʋrɛ m Zɩ zi, b'awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ y.
43016011	Dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, n durnya cir bɩ dʋdɔ ka."
43016012	"Hɔ gʋta ta ʋ mɔɔ n n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a ŋ si naa ma y.
43016013	Kʋ sɩra Ɛspri bɩ bɩ bʋr, a y'awɔɔ dam sɩra haay zaa ra, bala, a bɛɛ n n'a mɩŋŋa meer barɛ y, bɩ, a hɔ k'a n'a mam bɩ hɩrɛ, a hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m.
43016014	A y'a lɛ bɔm mɔɔ ʋ, bala, a hɔ k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ sire, an a hɩ awɔɔ m.
43016015	Hɔ haay kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ n tam bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n a hɩ, mɔɔ ʋ, a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a hɩm bɩ hɩrɛ awɔɔ m."
43016016	"A gɔɔta poore, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ mɩm ʋ y, bɩ k'a yɩ poore sɔ, awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩm."
43016017	A karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ a a ŋʋa k'a hɩ wɔɔ nɩ? A gɔɔta poore awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ a mɩm ʋ y, b'a gɔɔta poore awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩrɛ, gɛɛ, ta mɔɔ nawʋrɛ, m Zɩ zi?"
43016018	Ŋ n a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Poore naa do jɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ lɔ? Wɔɔ bɩr hɔ k'a n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ dɔrɛ y!"
43016019	Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a ʋ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a lar bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laaka awɔɔ n'a dam kʋ han k'a mɔɔ mim bɩ jɩ dɔ ra? A gɔɔta poore awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ a mɩm ʋ y, poore awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩrɛ.
43016020	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nyi karɛ, a zee da, durnyazannɔ n bɩr a heer nyɔɔm. Awɔɔ heer y'a zarm, b'awɔɔ heerzar y'a bam heernyɔɔ.
43016021	Kʋ lʋ ɩ nyɩ yɩrɛ, a ɩ busum ma, a dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ minto. Bɩ k'a nyɩ bɩ yɩ, a fɩr yɩrɛ bɩ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ. Heernyɔɔ gʋta ɩ kan kɩ k'a nyɩ yɩ durnya ʋ bɩ minto.
43016022	Bɩ minto y'a ka, awɔɔ nɩ heerzar nɔ ʋ naa ma, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ, m awɔɔ yɩ heernyɔɔ nɔ ʋ, bɩ, heernyɔɔ bɩ do, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an a zar y.
43016023	Ncɩnaaʋ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ lar hɔsɩ minto y. Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ hɔ yɛ mɔɔ Zɩ han mɔɔ tɔ ma, a y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
43016024	A n ta, an dɩɩtaa ku, awɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɛ mɔɔ tɔ ma y. K'a hɔ yɛ, a y'a yɩrɛ, k'awɔɔ heernyɔɔ bɩ n bɩr mɩŋŋa paan•••."
43016025	"Naa haay hɩ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ m hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom m, bɩ wakatɩ ɩ zɛm mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ, m meer ba kan awɔɔ kɩ ncɩnaaʋ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ mim hɩrɛ awɔɔ m paan•••.
43016026	Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ hɔ yɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ n a hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ yaa dam Zɩ m awɔɔ tɔ ma y.
43016027	Bala, Zɩ b'awɔɔ ŋʋa. K'awɔɔ mɔɔ ŋʋa, a si sɔ, a ʋ, m to mɔɔ ʋ Woso zi bɩ minto.
43016028	M to mɔɔ ʋ Zɩ zi, m bʋr durnya ʋ. Bɩ naa ma bɩ, bɔ mɔɔ nawʋm durnya ʋ, m n nɩ tam Zɩ zi."
43016029	A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ba ɩbɩɩ nɩ meer bam paan••• kɛɛrɛ ɩ wɔ saa hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ haay ma na.
43016030	Kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ ɩbɩɩ hɔ haay dɔ, ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa kʋ gʋaa n ɩ lar y. Bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ n a dɔ mɩŋŋa wɔɔ ʋ, ɩ to ɩbɩɩ ʋ Woso zi."
43016031	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Dɩɩtaa awɔɔ bɔkarɛ an n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, awɔɔ sɩra ka kɛɛrɛ ra?
43016032	Ba wakatɩ n nɩ zɛm na, b'a lee ku kɛɛrɛ, awɔɔ hɩsɩga dam, gʋaa biyəə n bɩr tarɛ a lɛ a lɛ, a mɔɔ to m deem. Bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m deem nɩ y, Zɩ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
43016033	Naa hɩ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ m k'a laafɩɩ yɩ mɔɔ zi. Awɔɔ ɩ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ durnya naa do nɔ ʋ. Bɩ k'a heer ba kookoo, mɔɔ bʋr durnya ra."
43017001	Kʋ Yeezuu meer ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a a bɔɔta an dɩga brama, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, wakatɩ a ku, ɩ Nyɩ bɩ tɔ busu, k'ɩ Nyɩ bɩ n a da ma, an ɩ tɔ busu sɔ.
43017002	Paŋŋa k'ɩbɩɩ ka ʋ gʋaa haay burə ʋ bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ kam gʋɔɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
43017003	Bala, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ dɔ bɩ m, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m Woso a deem paan••• kan gʋaa k'ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔ Yeezuu Krista bɩ kɩ.
43017004	Mɔɔ m lɛ bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ tara burə ʋ. Zibəə k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ma ba bɩ, mɔɔ ba, m a nya.
43017005	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Zɩ, mɔɔ da ʋ ɩ zi, cirbəə niŋŋə kʋ mɔɔ n ta m ɩ zi, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya n nyɩnta ʋ bɩ m."
43017006	"Gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ bɔ ʋ durnya nɔ ʋ, ɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ tɔ hɩnka ŋ nɩ. Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ, ɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ, bɩ ŋ zu ɩbɩɩ lemim b'ʋ.
43017007	Ŋ y'a dɔ kɛɛrɛ, ŋ ʋ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, a to a ʋ ɩbɩɩ zi.
43017008	Lemim kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ m. Ŋ y'a si, ŋn'a dɔ sɩra paan••• ŋ ʋ, bɔ mɔɔ ʋ ɩbɩɩ zi, ŋn'a si, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
43017009	Mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ŋ minto. Mɔɔ bɩr yaa dam durnya minto y, yaa mɔɔ n'a dam gʋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto. Ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ m.
43017010	Bɩ, hɔ haay k'an mɔɔ hɔ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ m sɔ, amba hɔ haay k'a n'ɩbɩɩ hɔ bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ m. Mɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ ŋ gʋr zi.
43017011	Bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ maasɩrɛ bam durnya nɔ ʋ dɔ y, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ ŋ n bɩr durnya nɔ ʋ. Zɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi. M Zɩ mɩŋŋa, dɔ ŋ ma ɩ tɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr deem, amba wɔɔ n deem bɩ m.
43017012	Kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ bɩ, dɔ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ŋ ma ɩbɩɩ tɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto. Mɔɔ ku ŋ la, bɩ ŋ gʋaa deem n nyaam nɩ y, kʋ n bɩ m, nyaanlɛzaa bɩ m, kʋ Wosoci meerbaarɔ wɔɔ n kʋ yɩ."
43017013	"Zɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi kɛɛrɛ, bɩ meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba mɔɔ nawʋm durnya nɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ heernyɔɔ yɩ haay.
43017014	Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ lemim bɩ ka ŋ ʋ, durnya n sɔ ŋ nɩ, kʋ durnya hɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ, amba durnya hɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ minto.
43017015	Mɔɔ n a yɛ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ ŋ bɔ durnya ʋ y, bɩ, k'ɩ dɔ ŋ ma Sʋtaana minto.
43017016	Durnya hɔɔ bɛɛ y, amba durnya hɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ m.
43017017	A ka k'ɩ sɩra bɩ n ŋ ba a hɔ. Ɩbɩɩ lemim bɩ sɩra m.
43017018	Amba ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋm durnya nɔ ʋ sɔ.
43017019	Ŋ minto, mɔɔ yɩ m mɩŋŋa kam, kʋ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka sɩra minto."
43017020	"Yaa bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a darɛ ŋ minto bala y. Yaa mɔɔ n'a dam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ minto sɔ.
43017021	Zɩ, kʋ ŋ haay n bɩr deem amba ɩbɩɩ n nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ m. Kʋ ŋ n nyɩnta kan wɔɔ kɩ sɔ, kʋ durnya n a si, a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
43017022	Bɩ mɔɔ, mɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr deem amba wɔɔ n deem bɩ m.
43017023	Kʋ mɔɔ n bɩr kan ŋ kɩ amba ɩbɩɩ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ m. Kʋ ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra deem kʋ durnya n a dɔ a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ, ɩ ŋ ŋʋa amba ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ m."
43017024	"Zɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ n ta ʋ bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n bɩ nyɩnta kan mɔɔ kɩ b'ʋ sɔ, kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ bɩ yɩ, bala, ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ ka ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ ma bɩ, durnya n nyɩnta ʋ y.
43017025	M Zɩ k'an tɩrga, durnya k'a n ɩbɩɩ dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ dɔ. Bɩ, nawɔnnɔ a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
43017026	Mɔɔ ka ŋn'ɩbɩɩ dɔ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m a ka ŋn'ɩ dɔ, kʋ ŋʋarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ ŋʋam bɩ m nyɩnta ŋ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n bɩr kan ŋ kɩ."
43018001	Kʋ Yeezuu meer bɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a a hʋr kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an bra Sedrɔn bɔrkɔ bɩ ma. Gɔsɩra nɩ b'ʋ, an gasʋ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
43018002	Zidas k'a n'a nyasʋm k'a ka bɩ bɩncɛ bɩ dɔ, bala, Yeezuu tɩr ta b'ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
43018003	Zidas ka Rɔm sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ŋ ka rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr gɔsɩra ʋ b'ʋ kan yar mɔr kɩ, fɩtɩrɛrɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ sɛ gungu.
43018004	Yeezuu k'a hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a zɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ n'a kam ma?"
43018005	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu." A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A m mɔɔ m." Bɩ, Zidas k'a n'a nyasʋm k'a ka bɩ yɩ ŋ barla.
43018006	Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ a kur m, ŋn'a dundo.
43018007	Yeezuu n a ya, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ n'a kam ma?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu."
43018008	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, a m mɔɔ m. K'a ka awɔɔ nawʋm mɔɔ ma, k'a nawɔnnɔ to, ŋnɩ cem."
43018009	Meerbaa kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ, kʋ an n'a yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ: "Gʋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ n deem to, an nyaam y."
43018010	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr nyɩnta kargʋ m, an a gaa ʋ, an wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ zɛ an a bɩsɩ tʋr gʋ ma. Zibəənyɩ bɩ do tɔ m Malkus.
43018011	Yeezuu n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɔ, ɩ ɩ kargʋ bɩ du a caan ʋ. Mɔɔ bɩ fɩryɩrɛ niŋŋə kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ yɩm na?"
43018012	Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ kan a cir bɩ kɩ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ Yeezuu nyasʋ, ŋn'a wɔrɔ sur.
43018013	Lɛɛ ŋ y'a ka, ŋnɩ ta m Hannɩ zi. Bɩ, Hannɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ zim m Kayiifʋ m. Kayiifʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m dɔɔraa bɩ do ʋ.
43018014	Kayiifʋ deem-deem bɩ do ɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ dʋndɔ, a ʋ: kʋ gʋaa deem ga gʋaa haay minto, a jɩra bɩ.
43018015	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr kan karɩndanyɩ vanta kɩ zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ. Bɩ, kʋ wosocɛmannɩbər bɩ karɩndanyɩ deem bɩ dɔ bɩ, a gasʋ kan Yeezuu kɩ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʋ b'ʋ.
43018016	Pɩyɛɛr n jɩm garga ra, hallɛ ma, karɩndanyɩ deem kʋ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ b'a dɔ bɩ bɔ, an meer ba kan lʋ k'a nɩ dɔm har bɩ lɛ ma bɩ kɩ, an Pɩyɛɛr gaa, an gasʋ m.
43018017	Zibəənyɩlʋ k'a nɩ dɔm hallɛ ma bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ ra?" Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ayy•••, a bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y."
43018018	Zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɛ hɛ, ŋn'ɩ nyɩ kam ma, bala, nyɛɛm ɩ barɛ. Pɩyɛɛr nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ, an nɩ nyɩ kam ma sɔ.
43018019	Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɩ Yeezuu larm a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma kan a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ kɩ.
43018020	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ pa da gʋaa haay m, mɔɔ hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m dɔmɩm haay sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ kan Wosocɛ ʋ kɩ, bɩncɛ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ haay n'a som kʋ ma ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ n hɔsɩ nyaakʋm da, m a hɩ y.
43018021	Bɔ minto m, ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ larlɛ? Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ lar. Ŋ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa."
43018022	Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ bɩ, Wosocɛ dɔmazaa deem k'a nyɩnta b'ʋ b'a wɔ ta rɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto m, ɩbɩɩ n'a nyɩ bɔm wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m ncɩnaaʋ?"
43018023	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ ŋʋaar mɔɔ ba, k'ɩ hɩ m m. Bɩ kʋ sɩra mɔɔ hɩ, bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ mɔɔ zɛrɛ?"
43018024	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Hannɩ a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu sur, ŋnɩ ta m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Kayiifʋ zi.
43018025	Bɩ ma bɩ, Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr ɩ nyɩ kam sɛ ma. N n a hɩ m, n ʋ: "A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m na?" Pɩyɛɛr n bɩsɩ ka, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ bɛɛ y!"
43018026	Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ kʋ Pɩyɛɛr a tʋr gʋ ma bɩ danyɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n ɩbɩɩ yɩ gɔsɩra ʋ b'ʋ kan kɩ ra?"
43018027	Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an bɩsɩ ka. Lɛɛm bɩ, koo n baa da.
43018028	Ŋ bɔ Yeezuu m Kayiifʋ har ʋ, ŋnɩ ta m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ. Bɩ ma bɩ, wutigʋta m. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ta m nɔ wɔɔ n gasʋ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ y, a y'a dintim ka a ma, a n a da ma a pakkɩ cibsa bɩ bɩ y.
43018029	Bɩ minto bɩ, Pɩlatɩ n bɔ an ta ŋ zi garga ra b'ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ mim awɔɔ n'a kam gʋaa naa do ra?"
43018030	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa naa do, kʋ zibʋnyaa bɛɛ a a ba, wɔɔ y'a nyasʋrɛ ʋ a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ ra?"
43018031	Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a gaa a dʋdɔ ka a zim amba awɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ m." Zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "N n lɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ gər zɛ y!"
43018032	Meerbaa kʋ Yeezuu a ba, a zɛ zaa minto bɩ, yɩ an nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, an kʋ yɩ.
43018033	Pɩlatɩ n gasʋ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an Yeezuu bir an a lar, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m nɩ?"
43018034	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ nɩ naa hɩrɛ ɩ zim gɛ? Gɛɛ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ mɔɔ mim hɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ?"
43018035	Pɩlatɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Ɩbɩɩ dogʋɔɔ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ y'ɩbɩɩ nyasʋ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ! Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ba?"
43018036	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ, durnya naa do hɔ bɛɛ y. Kʋ mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ durnya naa do hɔ nɩ, mɔɔ dɔmazannɔ yar bam kʋ ŋ bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ mɔɔ ka zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. Bɩ mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ, durnya naa do hɔ bɛɛ y."
43018037	Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'a maam cir n'ɩbɩɩ m wa?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩ, ɩ zim, cir m mɔɔ m. Yɩ mɔɔ ʋ m bʋr durnya ʋ, kʋ m bɩ sɩra kasɛtɩ ka. Gʋaa k'a sɩra ŋʋa bɩ, a y'a tʋr kam mɔɔ leer ma."
43018038	Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ m sɩra?" K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a a ya, an ta garga ra b'ʋ, an aa zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ yɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ n mim kʋ gʋaa naa do a zar bɩ yɩ y.
43018039	K'a mim ka awɔɔ m, kʋ pakkɩ cibsa a zɔ, kʋ m gʋaa bɔ, m wɔ saa bɩ, awɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m zɩɩfʋrɔ cir bɩ bɔ, m wɔ saa gɛ?"
43018040	Ŋ n'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Naa do bɛɛ y, k'a Barabas bɔ!" A n bɔkarɛ, Barabas bɩ do, gərzer m.
43019001	Pɩlatɩ n a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ madɩɩrɔ m.
43019002	Rɔm sʋrdaarɔ n laa waa, ŋn'a ku a mim ma, ŋnɩ cinno huu kʋ n y'a ba pɛɛra piinə m sa, ŋn'a da ra,
43019003	ŋn'a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m, zɩɩfʋrɔ cir!" Ŋ n'a wɔ tɩntam lɛ.
43019004	Pɩlatɩ n a bɔ, an bɔ garga ra, an a hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ yɩ ra, mɔɔ y'a gaarɛ, m bɔ m garga ra naa ʋ. Awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ a ʋ, mɔɔ n mim k'a a zar bɩ yɩ y."
43019005	Yeezuu n bɔ garga ra b'ʋ, kan laa bɩ kɩ, cinno huu bɩ kɩ a ra. Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ba gʋaa bɩ n na."
43019006	Kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, k'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!" Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a gaa a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma a zim. Bala, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɩ, an a ba, an bʋnyaa y."
43019007	Zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ɩ lɛ m, bɩ kan wɔɔ lɛ bɩ kɩ, a a ga zɛ m, bala, a a mɩŋŋa sa, an a ba Woso Nyɩ!"
43019008	Kʋ Pɩlatɩ mim naa do ma bɩ, dabɔʋ a nyasʋ an lɛ da biisi m.
43019009	A n a bɔ, an ta dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Ɩ to ɩbɩɩ ʋ ka?" Yeezuu n hɔsɩ nyɩ bɔ nʋ y.
43019010	Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩr a nyɩ bɔm mɔɔ nʋ ra? Ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ m da ma, m wɔ saa ɩbɩɩ ma ra, gɛɛ, mɔɔ m da ma, m a ka, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma ra?"
43019011	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ hɔsɩ ba mɔɔ m k'a a to bɛɛ n y'a ʋ brama, n n lɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ y. Bɩ minto y'a ka sɔ, gʋaa k'a mɔɔ nyasʋ an mɔɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ, mimbʋnyaa gandaara a a ba!"
43019012	Bɩ tɛkka ma, Pɩlatɩ y'a kam ma k'a wɔ saa ma, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nɩ zee darɛ ŋ ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ wɔ saa ma, Rɔm cir gʋaasɩba bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m dɔ y! Bala, gʋaa k'a mɩŋŋa ba cir bɩ, cir bɩ jɩm m."
43019013	Pɩlatɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a a ka, ŋnɩ bɔ Yeezuu m. Pɩlatɩ n nyɩnta dʋdɔkarɛ gɔ bɩ ra, bɩncɛ kʋ n'a birm ebree lemim m Gabata b'ʋ.
43019014	Pakkɩ cibsa bankarɛ hinni m, sinuu ʋ. Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ cir bɩ ba n nɩ!"
43019015	Ŋ n'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a zɛ gər! K'a zɛ gər! K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!" Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "M awɔɔ cir bɩ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma ra?" Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ba cir vanta m kʋ Rɔm cir bɛɛ y."
43019016	Pɩlatɩ n Yeezuu ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma. Ŋ n Yeezuu nyasʋ.
43019017	Yeezuu n a gɔdarkʋra busu a zim, an bɔ, an ta bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Minkorgo, n n'a hɩm ma ebree lemim m Golgotaa b'ʋ.
43019018	Bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, ŋ y'a wɔ ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma kan gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kɩ, deem jɩsa, deem bɩsɩ, Yeezuu nɩ ŋ bire ʋ.
43019019	Pɩlatɩ n gʋrsɩra ba warga ma, an a wɔ gɔdarkʋra b'ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Yeezuu Nazarɛtɩ gʋaa, zɩɩfʋrɔ cir.
43019020	Zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔ gʋta warga bɩ karɩnda ba, bala, bɩncɛ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ bɩ laatʋ tara nɔ bɩ ma y. B'a gʋrsɩra ba n y'a ʋ ebree lemim m, grɛkkɩ lemim m, kan latɛn lemim kɩ m.
43019021	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ Pɩlatɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩ b'a gʋrsɩra ba zɩɩfʋrɔ cir y, a gʋrsɩra ba: A a hɩ, a ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n a mɩ."
43019022	Pɩlatɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba bɩ, a ba mɔɔ ʋ."
43019023	Kʋ Rɔm sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a huuro gʋr, ŋn'a jir lɛ si. Gʋaa biyəə a yɩ deem. Zaba b'ɩ gɔɔta. A ba n y'a ʋ deem jilli.
43019024	Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ b'a kaansʋ y, ʋ pʋɛɛga da ma, ʋ dɩga a, kʋ nka n n'a yɩrɛ." Kʋ Wosoci bɩ meerbaa naa do n kʋ yɩ: 'Ŋ mɔɔ huuro jinjir kan kʋ kɩ, ŋnɩ pʋɛɛga da mɔɔ zaba ma.' Hɔ kʋ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ a ba bɩ n naa.
43019025	Yeezuu gɔdarkʋra bɩ jɩr ʋ bɩ, a da ɩ jɩnɩm b'ʋ kan a da bɩ dam kɩ, Klopas lʋ Maarii kɩ, kan Magdalaa kʋ Maarii kɩ.
43019026	K'a a da bɩ yɩ kan a karɩndanyɩ k'a ŋʋa bɩ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ a da bɩ m, a ʋ: "M naa, ba ɩ nyɩ n na!"
43019027	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, an a hɩ a karɩndanyɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ba ɩ da n na!" Wakatɩ bɩ do ma, karɩndanyɩ b'a da bɩ gaa, an doo m.
43019028	Yeezuu k'a a dɔ kɛɛrɛ a ʋ, hɔ haay ba an nya, kʋ Wosoci meerbaarɔ wɔɔ n kʋ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɩsɩ nɩ mɔɔ zɛm."
43019029	Gər ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ bɛɛ hɛɛnr n a han. Ŋ n hizɔp gɔ sa ŋnɩ hɔ k'an mafʋ-mafʋ kʋsɩ ma, ŋn'a nyɔɔ bɛɛ hɛɛnr ma, ŋn'a ka Yeezuu ʋ.
43019030	Kʋ Yeezuu bɩ mi bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔ haay ba an nya." A n a mim zuutə, an ga.
43019031	Kʋ pakkɩ cibsa bankarɛ hinni m bɩ, nyibəə gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋ lɛ baa kʋ gəəno wɔɔ n gɔɔta gɔdarkʋrarɔ wɔɔ ma sabaa hinni ʋ b'ʋ y. Sabaa bɩ do, cibsa gʋta m. Ŋ y'a yɛ Pɩlatɩ han, k'a ŋ gannɔ yɩnyar, k'a ŋ zer gɔdarkʋrarɔ wɔɔ ma.
43019032	Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ gannɔ yɩnyar: lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ kan a nyaʋrɛzaa bɩ kɩ.
43019033	Kʋ ŋ lee ku Yeezuu zi bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a, a ga kara, bɩ ŋ n a gannɔ yɩnyar y.
43019034	Bɩ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem a hɔn sɔɔn m a boon ma, ma n bɔ kan hi kɩ.
43019035	Gʋaa k'a yɩ b'a kasɛtɩ ka, b'a kasɛtɩ bɩ sɩra m. B'a dɔ, a ʋ, sɩra an n'a hɩm, k'awɔɔ n a si sɩra sɔ.
43019036	Sɩra m, ba naa haay ʋ, kʋ Wosoci meerbaa naa do n kʋ yɩ: 'A yaarɔ wɔɔ haay deem taan••• bɩ yarlɛ y.'
43019037	Wosoci bɩ bɩncɛ niŋŋə ta ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Ŋ zɛm bɩ gʋaa kʋ ŋ y'a hɔn bɩ yɩ.'
43019038	Minno nɔɔn duro kʋ ŋ cem bɩ, Arimatee kʋ gʋaa Zozɛf k'a nyɩnta Yeezuu karɩndanyɩ sɛɛrɛ, nyi k'a n'a bam zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ minto. A bɩ zaa yɛ Pɩlatɩ han k'a Yeezuu gər bɩ sa. Pɩlatɩ n zaa ka, an bʋr an b'a gər bɩ sa.
43019039	Nikodɛm bʋr sɔ. A ɩ nyɩnta an ta Yeezuu zi gunuu ʋ bɩ. A mɩɩr war kʋ ma kan tidəər kʋ n n'a birm alʋɛsɩ kɩ, n a a zɔ a cilo bukərku ma.
43019040	Ŋ n Yeezuu gər bɩ sa, ŋnɩ pɛɛrarɔ bumburgu ma kan tidəər kɩ amba zɩɩfʋrɔ gər birle m.
43019041	Brikə nɩ bɩncɛ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma ʋ b'ʋ, brikə bɩ do nɔ ʋ, yaa daa nɩ b'ʋ, n n gər bir ʋ cɩna y.
43019042	Bɩ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n'a bankarɛ sabaa k'a n'a bam k'a sɩŋŋɩda sa minto bɩ, bɩ yaa bɩ do k'an jɩnjɛɛm sɔ bɩ, ŋ Yeezuu bir ʋ.
43020001	Hatʋ hinni b'ʋ wutigʋta m, bɩ ma bɩ dɔ n mɛ y, Magdalaa Maarii ta yaa ra b'ʋ, a yaa dɩga a, n jaa bɩ gʋ yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ.
43020002	A n bra si, an aa Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr yɩ, kan karɩndanyɩ deem kʋ Yeezuu a ŋʋa bɩ kɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N Zuuba bɔ yaa b'ʋ, bɩ wɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ ta n y'a ʋ m ka y."
43020003	Pɩyɛɛr n bɔ kan karɩndanyɩ deem bɩ kɩ, ŋnɩ ta yaa ra b'ʋ.
43020004	Ŋ hɩɩya haay bra si, karɩndanyɩ deem bɩ bra si, an cem Pɩyɛɛr han, an lɛɛ ka yaa ra b'ʋ.
43020005	A n zerga an pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ kuntəm b'ʋ. Bɩ, a n gasʋ y.
43020006	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr k'a zu a jɛ ʋ bɩ, a lee ku sɔ. A n gasʋ yaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, an pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ kuntəm b'ʋ,
43020007	kan pɛɛra kʋ n y'a burgu a mim ma bɩ kɩ. Bɩ, bɩ n nyɩnta kan pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ kɩ y. A huŋŋu n y'a ʋ, n n a cɩnta bɩncɛ vanta ʋ.
43020008	Karɩndanyɩ k'a lɛɛ ka an lee ku bɩ gasʋ yaa ʋ b'ʋ kɛɛrɛ. A n a yɩ, an sɩra ka.
43020009	Bɩ ŋ gɔɔta, ŋ n Wosoci bɩ jɩ ma y. Bala, a a hɩ, a ʋ, Yeezuu y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.
43020010	Bɩ kur bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a wusigə, ŋnɩ doo.
43020011	Maarii gɔɔta garga ra yaa bɩ jɩr ʋ, an nɩ nyi kam. K'a nɩ nyi bɩ kam bɩ, a zerga, an dɩga yaa b'ʋ,
43020012	an malɛɛkarɔ yɩ hɩɩya, ŋn'ɩ huu furo m a ma, ŋnɩ nyɩnta bɩncɛ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu gər bɩ wʋta ʋ b'ʋ. Deem n'a mim ma, deem n'a gannɔ ma.
43020013	Ŋ n a hɩ lʋ bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ nyi ɩbɩɩ n'a karɛ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Zuuba n y'a busu, bɩ kʋ ta n y'a ʋ m ka, mɔɔ n a dɔ y."
43020014	K'a nɩ meer bɩ bam bɩ, a a bɔ an dɩga, an Yeezuu yɩ an nɩ jɩnɩm b'ʋ, b'a n a dɔ, a ʋ, Yeezuu nɩ y.
43020015	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Lʋ, bɔ minto ɩ nɩ nyi karɛ? Nka ɩbɩɩ nɩ kam ma?" Lʋ bɩ hɔɔn ʋ bɩ, brikə bɩ dɔmazaa m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, k'ɩbɩɩ y'a busu, k'ɩ bɩncɛ hɩnka mɔɔ m, mɔɔ yaa busu."
43020016	Yeezuu n a hɩm, a ʋ: "Maarii". A n a wusigə, an a hɩ m ebree lemim m, a ʋ: "Rabuni" bɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba."
43020017	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ mɔɔ da jɩm ʋ y, mɔɔ n ta m Zɩ zi cɩna y. Bɩ, ta ɩ yaa hɩ mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ tarɛ m Zɩ k'a n'awɔɔ Zɩ bɩ zi, mɔɔ Woso k'a n'awɔɔ Woso bɩ zi."
43020018	Magdalaa kʋ Maarii bɩ n b'a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Zuuba yɩ, hɔ k'a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ!"
43020019	Hinni bɩ do yirbəə m, k'a nyɩnta hatʋ hinni bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ cɛlɛrɔ tɩnta a ma nyi kʋ ŋ n'a bam zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ minto. Yeezuu n bʋr, an bɩ jɩm ŋ bire ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ."
43020020	K'a nɩ meer bɩ bam bɩ, a a wɔrɔ wɔɔ hɩnka ŋ nɩ kan a boon bɩ kɩ. Kʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ Zuuba yɩ bɩ, ŋ haay heer nyɔɔ.
43020021	Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ. Kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ nyɔɔm sɔ."
43020022	K'a meer ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a hoon si ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a Sɛnt-Ɛspri si.
43020023	Gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ n nɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ sugur yɩrɛ. Gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ bɩr ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ sugur yɩrɛ y."
43020024	Bɩ ma bɩ, bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem Toma kʋ n n'a birm Didim bɩ n nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ Yeezuu hɩnkarɛ dɔmɩm b'ʋ y.
43020025	Karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ Zuuba yɩ!" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ n karɔ wɔɔ yaarɔ yɩ a wɔrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n m nyʋkʋm nyɔɔ ka yaa deem ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n m wɔ du a boon b'ʋ, mɔɔ b'a sire y."
43020026	Dɔmɩm sinnyə kur bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ya, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra har ʋ b'ʋ, Toma nɩ kan ŋ kɩ. Yeezuu n bʋr, bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ tɩnta, an bɩ jɩm ŋ bire ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ."
43020027	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, an a hɩ Toma m, a ʋ: "Ɩ zɔ, ɩ ɩ nyʋkʋm nyɔɔ naa ʋ, k'ɩ dɩga mɔɔ wɔrɔ ma, ɩ wɔ bɩ da mɔɔ mɛ ma, k'ɩ nyɔɔ mɔɔ boon ʋ, k'ɩ sɩra ka kɛɛrɛ, k'ɩ ba sɩrakarɛzaa."
43020028	Toma n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Zuuba, mɔɔ Woso."
43020029	Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ y'a ka, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ. Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n a yɩ, bɩ ŋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ m."
43020030	Yeezuu hoserlo ba gʋta karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ n n a gʋrsɩra ba ci naa do nɔ ʋ y.
43020031	Nawɔnnɔ gʋrsɩra ba n y'a ʋ, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka, a ʋ, Yeezuu m Krista, a m Woso Nyɩ. Bɩ, k'awɔɔ sɩra ka, k'a mɩsɩrbaa yɩ a tɔ ma.
43021001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩnka a karɩndanyɩnɔ m Tiberiyaadɩ kɔ lɛ ra. A hɩnkarɛ bɩ ba n nɩ.
43021002	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr kan Toma kʋ n n'a birm Didim bɩ kɩ, Galilee kʋ Kanaa gʋaa Natanayɛl kɩ, Zebedee nyɩnɔ kɩ, kan karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ hɩɩya, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra.
43021003	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ta mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m aa zɔnɔ ba." Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ tam kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ." Ŋ n bɔ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, bɩ gum bɩ do ʋ, ŋ n hɔsɩ nyasʋ y.
43021004	Bɩ ma bɩ, dɔ mɛ. Yeezuu n jɩm kɔ lɛ ra b'ʋ, bɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu nɩ y.
43021005	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Hey! Nyɩnɔ, zɔnɔ b'awɔɔ ʋ ra?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Ayy•••"
43021006	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a zaŋŋa bɩ zo kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bɩsɩ ra, awɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ." Ŋ n zaŋŋa bɩ zo, an zɔ gʋr gʋta, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋn'a gaa y.
43021007	Karɩndanyɩ kʋ Yeezuu a ŋʋa bɩ n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Zuuba m!" Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr k'a a ma, n ʋ, Zuuba m bɩ, a huu sa, an a du a ma, nyɩnta a ʋ dɩgɩ, an a da hi b'ʋ.
43021008	Karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʋr kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ m, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋa bɩ gaam, zɔnɔ n a han, ŋ bɩ laatʋ kɔ bɩ lezi ma y. A gakʋ ʋ a ba kan mɛtɩr zɔrɔ kɩ.
43021009	Kʋ ŋ zer tara ʋ bɩ, ŋ sɛcɩna yɩ zɔ n ta ra kan bur kɩ.
43021010	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr zɔnɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ gʋr dɩɩtaa rɔ wɔɔ m."
43021011	Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a bɔ, an gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an zaŋŋa bɩ gaa tara ʋ, zɔ gʋta-gʋta n a han zɔrɔ busoor yaa kaakʋ, bɩ kan bɩ kɩ haay zaŋŋa bɩ n kaansʋ y.
43021012	Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr a hɔ bɩ." Bɩ karɩndanyɩ deem taan••• n laaka da han, a ʋ: "Nka n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ y?" Ŋ y'a dɔ mɩŋŋa, ŋ ʋ, Zuuba m.
43021013	Yeezuu n a zɔ kɛɛrɛ, an bur bɩ sa, an a ka ŋ ʋ. A n a ba zɔ bɩ m maam sɔ.
43021014	Yeezuu k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ, a gallɛm kaakʋ hɔ a hɩnka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m naa.
43021015	Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, Zaan nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ ŋʋa an lɛ da nawɔnnɔ ra ra?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn••• Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ ŋʋarɛ." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɔ mɔɔ sinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ ma."
43021016	Yeezuu n a hɩ m a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a ʋ: "Zaan nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋam na?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn••• Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ ŋʋarɛ." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɔ mɔɔ seero ma."
43021017	A kaakʋ hɔ ma bɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, Zaan nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋam na?" Pɩyɛɛr heer a zar kan hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ m a kaakʋ hɔ ma bɩ kɩ. "Ɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋam na?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔ haay dɔ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ ŋʋarɛ." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɔ mɔɔ seero ma.
43021018	Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta nyukumbueere bɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bankam, ɩ nɩ tarɛ ɩ hɔɔnhɔ bɩncɛ ʋ. K'ɩbɩɩ bɩ gusi, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ zarɔ hʋrm, gʋaa vanta n n'ɩbɩɩ banka, an ɩbɩɩ gaa, an ta ɩbɩɩ m bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa ʋ b'ʋ."
43021019	Yeezuu bɩ meer naa do ba a ʋ k'a zɛ niŋŋə k'a nɩ Pɩyɛɛr zɛm, an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ bɩ hɩnka. K'a meer naa do ba bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ."
43021020	Pɩyɛɛr k'a a bɔ, an dɩga bɩ, a karɩndanyɩ kʋ Yeezuu a ŋʋa bɩ yɩ a jɛ ʋ. A ɩ nyɩnta hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, an zerga Yeezuu cɩ ra, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, nka n n'ɩbɩɩ nyasʋm, k'a ɩbɩɩ ka bɩ?"
43021021	Pɩyɛɛr k'a yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Bɩ naa, Zuuba, bɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ naa yɩ?"
43021022	Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ ʋ k'an gɔɔta an ta an mɔɔ wusigəre ku, kara y'ɩbɩɩ ku? Ɩbɩɩ, zu mɔɔ ʋ."
43021023	Meerbaa naa do minto y'a ka, n n so ra danyɩnɔ wɔɔ barla, ŋ ʋ, karɩndanyɩ naa do bɩ garɛ y. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ, a bɩ garɛ y. A a hɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ lɛ taa k'an gɔɔta, an ta an mɔɔ wusigəre ku, kara y'ɩbɩɩ ku?"
43021024	Karɩndanyɩ bɩ do nɩ minno nɔɔn duro kasɛtɩ kam, an nɩ ŋ gʋrsɩra barɛ, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʋ, a kasɛtɩ bɩ sɩra m.
43021025	Yeezuu a ya, an hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ ba. K'a gʋrsɩra n n'a bam deem-deem, mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ, durnya haay b'a dam ma, an ciro kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ gʋrsɩra bam nɔ wɔɔ si y.
44001001	Teofil, m lɛɛkarɛ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ Yeezuu zibəə haay k'a ba kan hɔ haay k'a dɩnda bɩ da ʋ, an a sa a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ,
44001002	an ta, an hinni k'a zibəəzannɔ bɔ ʋ, an a lɛrɔ ka ŋ ʋ, kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ, an ta an a dɔmɩm k'a der ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ ku.
44001003	Brɔɔ a a hɩnka ŋ nɩ mɩsɩr a zɛ bɩ kur, kan makrarɔ gʋtɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩsɩkarɛ ba ʋ kɩ, a ʋ: a a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a m mɩsɩr. A kasɛtɩ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta. Dɔmɩm busi nɔ ʋ, a a hɩnka ŋ nɩ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
44001004	A nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ hindeem ʋ, an lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: ŋ bɩ bɔ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ y, bɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta ŋnɩ dɔ Zɩ Woso lerbɔrɛ bɩ ma. "Hɔ niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma, mɔɔ n a hɩ m lɛ m bɩ.
44001005	Zaan hi batɛm ka denter, b'awɔɔ, naa kan dɔmɩm poore kɩ, awɔɔ batɛm sim Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ."
44001006	Ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ laaka naa do da han, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, naa ma ɩbɩɩ n nɩ Israyɛl cirbəə bɩ bankaŋ ʋ gɛ?"
44001007	A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n a ga m k'a dɔmɩnnɔ kan wakatɩrɔ kɩ kʋ Zɩ Woso a cɩnta a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa m bɩ dɔ y.
44001008	Bɩ, awɔɔ paŋŋa yɩrɛ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔ m, an nɩ zɛm bɩ zer awɔɔ mim ʋ, a paŋŋa karɛ awɔɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ nyɩntam mɔɔ kasɛtɩzannɔ Zerizalɛm ʋ, Zidee haay kan Samarii kɩ haay, kan tara lɛ cɩnta jɩ kɩ."
44001009	Kʋ Yeezuu minno nɔɔn duro hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, a der ŋ mɩnyaa m, warkʋ bʋr an b'a nyaam ŋ lɛɛ.
44001010	Kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ dɩgam brama ma bɩ, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ bʋr ŋnɩ huu fu du a ma, ŋnɩ bɩ jɩm ŋ jɩr ʋ.
44001011	Ŋ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Galilee gʋɔɔ ra, bɔ minto m, awɔɔ n gɔɔta an nɩ dɩgam brama ncɩnaaʋ? Yeezuu naa do kʋ n y'a bɔ awɔɔ bire ʋ an der brama bɩ y'a bɔrɛ an bʋr maam, amba awɔɔ yɩ an der brama bɩ m."
44001012	Kʋ ŋ zer ci kʋ n n'a birm Oliviyee ci bɩ ra bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ. Bɩ ci bɩ do, a ga a ʋ sabaa dɔmɩm tarɛ m, amba n lɛ ka bɩ m.
44001013	Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku bɩ, ŋ der cɛ k'a nɩ mim ʋ b'ʋ, amba ŋ tɩr a ba biisi bɩ m. Bɩncɛ bɩ do, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ, Zakkɩ kɩ, Andɩr kɩ, Filipi kan Toma kɩ, Bartelemii kan Matiyee kɩ, Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ kan Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a birm Zelɔtɩ bɩ kɩ, kan Zakkɩ nyɩ Ziidi kɩ tɩr kʋ zɛ ʋ.
44001014	Ŋ haay a zɛ kʋ ra lɛ deem ŋn'a tɔŋ ʋ kan yaadarɛ kɩ, kan lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ Yeezuu da Maarii kɩ, kan Yeezuu danyɩnɔ kɩ.
44001015	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, gʋɔɔ a so kʋ ma b'ʋ, ŋ lɛ n a zɔ zɔrɔ buhɩra ma. Pɩyɛɛr n wuti a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ:
44001016	"M danyɩnɔ, a ga a wʋm kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri mim k'a hɩ Davɩd lɛ m Wosoci nɔ ʋ Zidas k'a ka lɛɛ, ŋnɩ Yeezuu nyasʋ bɩ minto bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
44001017	A nyɩnta wɔɔ bire ʋ, an a hɔ jirle hɔ yɩ, wɔɔ zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.
44001018	Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ do, zibəə bʋnyaa k'a a ba bɩ, a bɩ busoo bɩ sa, an tara si m. A do a ʋ a nɔ ra, a nɔ bɩ n haan, a nɔbaarɔ haay n bɔ, ŋnɩ sur tara ʋ.
44001019	Zerizalɛm gʋɔɔ haay a dɔ. Bɩ y'a ka ŋn'ɩ tara bɩ birm a lemim m Hakɛldamaa, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Ma tara.
44001020	Sɩra m, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ laarɔ ci nɔ ʋ: K'a har n gɔɔta zer, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩnta ʋ y. Bɩ, a a ya an a hɩ, a ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa vanta n a zibəə bɩ sa.
44001021	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ wɔɔ da zaa ʋ lɛɛ haay ʋ dɔmɩm kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu mɩsɩrbaa ba ʋ wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ,
44001022	an a sa Yeezuu batɛm k'a a si Zaan zi bɩ ma, an ta an dɔmɩm k'a der ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ ku bɩ, a a ga m, kʋ ŋ gʋaa deem n a ba kan wɔɔ kɩ a mɩmbɔʋrɛ kasɛtɩzaa."
44001023	N ŋ hɩnka hɩɩya, Zozɛf kʋ n n'a birm Barsabas, n nɩ so ra, n n'a tɔ ka Zistus bɩ m kan Matɩyas kɩ.
44001024	Ŋ n yaa da ncɩnaaʋ: "Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ gʋaa haay heer dɔ, dɩga gʋaa hɩɩya naa bire ʋ ɩ gʋaa k'ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ hɩnka wɔɔ m,
44001025	k'an nyɩnta lemim nyɩnta zibəəzaa, bɩncɛ kʋ Zidas a to an ta a bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ."
44001026	Ŋ n pʋɛɛga da, an jɩm Matɩyas mim ʋ. Bɩ y'a da kristazibəəzannɔ bueeredeenno wɔɔ barla.
44002001	Pantɩkɔtɩ dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'a so kʋ ma haay bɩncɛ deem ʋ.
44002002	Lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ bʋgʋr ma am hɩnhɛr gʋta hɔ bɩ m, an a to brama, an bɩ har kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ bɩ han haay.
44002003	Ŋ n hɔ yɩ an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛ nɛɛm kɩ, an a jinjir, an a cɩnta gʋaa biyəə mim ʋ.
44002004	Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ ŋ haay han, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'ɩ lemim vantɔɔ hɩm amba Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩ bɩ m.
44002005	Bala, zɩɩfʋrɔ wosohɔɔnhɔbarɛzannɔ y'a to durnya kʋrɔ haay ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr, ŋn'ɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ.
44002006	Bʋgʋr bɩ k'a ba bɩ, zamaa b'a so kʋ ma, bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, bala, gʋaa biyəə nyɩnta an nɩ ŋ mam, ŋn'ɩ meer barɛ a do lemim m.
44002007	Hɔ k'a nɩ bam b'a ka ŋnɩ zɛ kədə, gʋaa biyəə n a lɛ gu, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay kʋ ŋ nɩ meer bam naa, Galilee gʋɔɔ bɛɛ ra?
44002008	Bɩ, a ba a ʋ lɔ, wɔɔ gʋaa biyəə nɩ ŋ marɛ a do lemim nɩ?
44002009	Partɩ zannɔ kan Mɛɛdɩ zannɔ kɩ, Elamitɩ kan Mezopotamii zannɔ kɩ, Zidee zannɔ kan Kapadɔs zannɔ kɩ, Pɔn zannɔ kan Azii zannɔ kɩ,
44002010	Frizii zannɔ kan Panfilii zannɔ kɩ, Eziptɩ zannɔ kan Libii Sirɛnnɩ zannɔ kɩ, kan Rɔm zannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44002011	Wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ m Zɩɩfʋrɔ, kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Krɛtɩ zannɔ kan Araabɩrɔ kɩ, wɔɔ y'a mam, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso zibəə mɩŋŋa b'ʋ, wɔɔ do lemim m."
44002012	Mim naa do k'a ba bɩ cem ŋ han haay, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kʋ ma, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Naa lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʋ lɔ?"
44002013	Gɔsɩnnɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ yaa wʋrɛ ŋ ma, ŋ ʋ: "Bɛɛ yɩ ŋ ka."
44002014	Pɩyɛɛr n wuti meerbaa m bueeredeenno kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ: "Zidee zannɔ, kan awɔɔ haay k'a nɩ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a hɔ k'a nɩ bam bɩ jɩ ma mɩŋŋa, k'a tʋr gʋ mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma.
44002015	Ayy•••, gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n bɛɛ mi amba awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ nɩ y. Dɔ k'a mɛ naa, wakatɩ kaakʋ wɔɔ n ta ma cɩna.
44002016	Bɩ naa do naa, hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zowɛl a hɩ bɩ n naa:
44002017	Ba hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ bɩ n na: Dɔmɩnnɔ jɛzannɔ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ yɩ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri zerm gʋaa haay mim ʋ, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ yaarɔ kan lannɔ kɩ Woso lɛ sire ŋnɩ so ra, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ pooro hɔhɩnkarɛrɔ yɩm, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gusinno hɔɔ yɩrɛ nɩnnarɛrɔ nɔ ʋ.
44002018	Sɩra m, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nɔ ʋ, yaarɔ kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ zi bam nɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ zerle ŋ la, ŋn'ɩ Woso lɛ si ŋnɩ so ra.
44002019	Mɔɔ hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ bam brama, m makrarɔ ba tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, ma kan sɛ kɩ, siŋŋə kɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ.
44002020	Woso gure y'a lʋrm an a ba am monsigə hɔ bɩ m, mom n a lʋr am ma hɔ bɩ m, kʋ Zuuba dɔmɩm gʋta kan a cirbəə kɩ bɩ n bɔkarɛ, an lee ku.
44002021	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ Zuuba birm yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ n nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm."
44002022	"Israyɛl zannɔ, k'a tʋr ka mɔɔ meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ma: Amba awɔɔ dɔ bɩ nɩ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ, gʋaa bɩ do Woso a kasɛtɩ ka ʋ awɔɔ zi, an nɩ hoserlo bam, kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n a yɩ cɩna bɩ kɩ, kan makrarɔ kɩ awɔɔ bire ʋ.
44002023	Gʋaa bɩ do, awɔɔ nyasʋ a da gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔ ʋ, ŋn'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, amba Woso lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta a zim a hɔdɔrɛ nɔ ʋ k'an ba bɩ m.
44002024	Bɩ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ, an a bʋmbɔ zɛ kaʋdabaa ma, bala, zɛ b'a dam ma an gɔɔta m a cirbəə nɔ ʋ y.
44002025	Sɩra m, Davɩd a hɩ a minto, a ʋ: Mɔɔ ɩ Zuuba yɩrɛ m lɛɛ dɔmɩm haay, bala, a ɩ mɔɔ bɩsɩ ra, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m da ma, m m do y.
44002026	Mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ sɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛm nɩ heernyɩnta laa lɔm, mɔɔ mɛ nɩ mɛnyɔɔ dam taaheerlɛ nɔ ʋ an lɛ da.
44002027	Bala, mɔɔ dɔ ɩbɩɩ bɩ mɔɔ nyi to m gəəno bɩncɛ ʋ y. Ɩbɩɩ gʋaa paan••• m mɔɔ m, ɩ bɩ mɔɔ tore m vɔn y.
44002028	Ɩbɩɩ mɩsɩrbaa zaa hɩnka mɔɔ m, ɩbɩɩ y'a kam mɔɔ m heernyɔɔ yɩ ɩ zi."
44002029	"M danyɩnɔ, zaa ta ʋ kʋ m a hɩ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, m a bɔ kʋ zi: Wɔɔ yaaba Davɩd ga, n n a bir, a yaa gɔɔta an nɩ wɔɔ zi naa ʋ her.
44002030	B'a nyɩnta wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa, an a dɔ, a ʋ: Woso a wer si m, a do gʋaa bɔrɛ, an nyɩnta a cirbəəduu ra.
44002031	A lɛɛ ka an Krista mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ yɩ, bɩ, a minto y'a ka an a hɩ, a ʋ: N n a to gəəno bɩncɛ ʋ y, b'a mɛsim n vɔnrɛ dɔ y.
44002032	Woso Yeezuu bɩ do mɩm bɔ ʋ, wɔɔ haay, a kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m.
44002033	Woso a busu a bɩsɩ ʋ a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a Zɩ a ler bɔm bɩ, a a yɩ, an a jir, amba awɔɔ n'a yɩm, an n'a mam sɔ bɩ m.
44002034	Bala, Davɩd k'an der paan••• arzana ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ: Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ Zuuba m: nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʋ
44002035	an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ bam ɩ gankarahɔ bɩ ku."
44002036	"Kʋ Israyɛl do haay n a dɔ mɩŋŋa: Yeezuu niŋŋə k'awɔɔ wɔ gɔ ma bɩ, bɩ Woso a ba Zuuba kan Krista kɩ."
44002037	Kʋ ŋ heer a zɛ kʋ ma kan minno nɔɔn duro marɛ kɩ bɩ, ŋ Pɩyɛɛr lar kan kristazibəəzannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ a ba lɔ, ʋ danyɩnɔ?"
44002038	Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a a bɔ a mimbʋnyaarɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋaa biyəə m batɛm si Yeezuu tɔ ma a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto. B'awɔɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri yɩm ganwʋrɛ.
44002039	Lerbɔrɛ naa do, awɔɔ hɔ m kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ laatʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ Zuuba wɔɔ Woso n nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ kɩ."
44002040	Pɩyɛɛr meer ba gʋta, an n'a kasɛtɩ kam, an nɩ ŋ heer bam kookoo, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a a gʋ her gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn ma."
44002041	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a meerbaarɔ wɔɔ si rɔ wɔɔ ŋ batɛm si. Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ lɛ a zɔ tisi kaakʋ ma.
44002042	Ŋ yɛ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ karɩnda bɩ ma, ŋn'ɩ tam lɛɛ dɔmɩm haay, ŋn'a zɛm kʋ ra, ŋn'ɩ Zuuba zɛkʋra hɔbɩrɛ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ yaa darɛ.
44002043	Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hoserlo bam gʋta kan makrarɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ haay zɛ kədə.
44002044	Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ haay a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'a hɔ haay zɛm kʋ ra.
44002045	Ŋ y'a wɔhɔɔ hɛɛrɛ kan a arzakarɔ kɩ, k'a bɩ ŋ jir kan kʋ kɩ amba gʋaa biyəə lɛ n taa bɩ m.
44002046	Dɔmɩm haay, ŋ y'a zɛm kʋ ra Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'a zɛm kʋ ra a harlɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu zɛkʋra hɔ bɩrɛ kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, noonhubaa kɩ.
44002047	Ŋ n'ɩ Woso daŋ ʋ, do bɩ haay n a lɛ bɔrɛ ŋ ʋ. Dɔmɩm biyəə, Zuuba a ka gʋɔɔ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ, sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛ n'a dam la.
44003001	Yirbəə deem m wakatɩ kaakʋ hɔ ma bɩ, yaadarɛ wakatɩ m bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ ta Wosocɛ ʋ.
44003002	Gʋaa n nɩ b'ʋ, an yɩ lʋgɔ, n n tɩr a busu dɔmɩm haay, n n aa nyɩnta Wosocɛ lɛ kʋ n n'a birm "cɛlɛ gʋɛrɛ-gʋɛrɛ" bɩ ma, k'an hɔ yɩnyɛ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋm Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ han.
44003003	K'a Pɩyɛɛr yɩ kan Zaan kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam k'a gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a hɔ yɛ ŋ han.
44003004	Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ n dɩga a sɩɩ••• ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Dɩga wɔɔ ma!"
44003005	Gʋaa bɩ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma, bala, dɔ an nawʋrɛ ŋ ma kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ ka a ʋ.
44003006	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ba sarma m gɛɛ wanzur nɩ y. Bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ: Yeezuu Krista, Nazarɛtɩ gʋaa bɩ tɔ ma, wuti ɩ ta!"
44003007	A n a sa a bɩsɩ wɔ ma, an a ka an wuti. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋaa bɩ gannɔ kan a gankʋyɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ a bɔ kʋ zi.
44003008	A n wuti brama vugur, an nɩ tam. A n gasʋ kan ŋ kɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ tam, an nɩ hinherm, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
44003009	Zamaa bɩ haay n a yɩ an nɩ tam, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
44003010	N y'a dɔ: A mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta Wosocɛ lɛ gʋɛrɛ-gʋɛrɛ bɩ lɛ ma an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm bɩ. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋ da n bɔ ʋ, hɔ k'a ba gʋaa bɩ m bɩ tɔ ma.
44003011	Gʋaa bɩ n a ya, an n'a gʋm Pɩyɛɛr ma kan Zaan kɩ y. Zamaa bɩ haay n a si ŋnɩ ta ŋ zi laŋŋa kʋ n n'a birm "Salomɔɔn laŋŋa" bɩ taa. Hɔ k'a ba b'a ka ŋnɩ zɛ kədə.
44003012	Pɩyɛɛr k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Israyɛl zannɔ, bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ zɛm kədə hɔ k'a ba naa ma? Gɛɛ bɔ minto m, awɔɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʋ, gʋaa naa k'a nɩ tam bɩ, wɔɔ paŋŋa gɛɛ wɔɔ mɩŋŋabaa y'a ka, an nɩ tarɛ?
44003013	Abraham, Izakkɩ, kan Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso k'a m wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso bɩ y'a lɛ bɔ a Zibəənyɩ Yeezuu b'ʋ. Bɩ, awɔɔ nyɩnta a nyasʋ a ka Pɩlatɩ ʋ, an a ŋʋa k'a wɔ saa, awɔɔ n a gu bɩ.
44003014	Awɔɔ, Gʋaa mɩŋŋa k'an tɩrga bɩ, awɔɔ kaanm bɩ m, a yɛ kʋ n nɩ wɔ saa gərzer bɩ ma.
44003015	Mɩsɩrbaa cir b'awɔɔ zɛ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, a kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m.
44003016	Sɩrakarɛ minto y'a ka Yeezuu tɔ ma, wɔɔ n tɔ naa do hɩ, ʋ yaabazaa k'awɔɔ n nɩ dɩgam ma a dɔ sɔ naa waa. Bɩ, sɩrakarɛ k'a a to Yeezuu zi bɩ y'a ka gʋaa naa n a waa awɔɔ haay bire ʋ."
44003017	"Sɩra m, m danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ badɔ y'a ka awɔɔ n a ba ncɩnaaʋ haay, awɔɔ kan a cinno wɔɔ kɩ.
44003018	Woso mɩŋŋa lɛɛ ka an a hɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lɛ m, a ʋ: A Krista bɩ fɩr yɩrɛ, b'a kʋ yɩ maam sɔ.
44003019	K'a a bɔ a mimbʋnyaarɔ ʋ, k'a a bɔ a bʋr Woso zi, k'a a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ.
44003020	Zuuba Woso mɛnyɔɔ dɔmɩnnɔ kam, an Yeezuu bʋmbɔrɛzaa niŋŋə k'a banka wɔɔ minto bɩ nyɔɔ.
44003021	K'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ, nyɩnta an nawʋm b'ʋ, an dɔ hɔ haay bankarɛ dɔmɩm ma, dɔmɩm niŋŋə kʋ Woso a hɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛ m biisi bɩ m.
44003022	Moyiisi lɛɛ ka an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba Woso y'a lɛsinnɩsorazaa bɔŋ ʋ awɔɔ danyɩnɔ bire ʋ awɔɔ minto, amba mɔɔ m. K'a tʋr ka hɔ haay k'a n'a hɩm bɩ ma.
44003023	Gʋaa k'a n a tʋr ka wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ do lemim ma, kʋ n n a bɔ do barla, n n'a zɛ gər.'
44003024	Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ haay, an a sa Sanwɛl ma kan a jɛzannɔ kɩ dɔmɩnnɔ kʋ wɔɔ n ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɔɔn mim hɩ.
44003025	Awɔɔ m wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kan gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ Woso a cɩnta kan awɔɔ zɩrɔ kɩ bɩ hɔyɩrɛzannɔ, dɔmɩm k'a hɩ ʋ Abraham m, a ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ yaŋŋɔɔ minto, do haay k'a nɩ tara burə ʋ barka yɩm.'
44003026	Woso k'a Zibəənyɩ bɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ lɛɛ ka an a nyɔɔ awɔɔ zi an a barka zer awɔɔ mim ʋ, an n'a kam awɔɔ gʋaa haay n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ tore."
44004001	Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan zamaa bɩ kɩ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cir bɩ kɩ, kan Sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ bʋr ŋ zi.
44004002	Ŋ heer busu kan ŋ kɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ karɩnda dɩndam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu mim hɩm gʋɔɔ m kan gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ kɩ bɩ minto.
44004003	Ŋ nɩ ŋ gʋr, ŋnɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, bala, gum da, ŋn'a to dɔ n mɛ.
44004004	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ, gʋta a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ. Ŋ lɛ wuti an a zɔ tisi soor ma.
44004005	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, cinno kʋ ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ kan tara bɩ gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a zɛ kʋ ra.
44004006	Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Hannɩ nyɩnta ʋ kan Kayiifʋ kɩ, Zaan kan Alɛsandɩr kɩ, kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay.
44004007	Ŋ n a ka, ŋnɩ Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zaan kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ a taa, ŋn'ɩ ŋ larlɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ paŋŋa m, gɛɛ nka tɔ awɔɔ yu ma an nɩ naa barɛ?"
44004008	Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a Pɩyɛɛr han bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
44004009	"Kʋ lɛɛzannɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ, her naa ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ lar awɔɔ nawʋm hɔ mɩŋŋa kʋ wɔɔ ba lʋgɔ naa do m bɩ minto. Kʋ a hɩ, k'a ba wɔɔ ʋ lɔ gʋaa naa do n a waa gɛ?
44004010	K'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, awɔɔ haay kan Israyɛl do haay kɩ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu Krista tɔ minto m. Awɔɔ y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, Woso n a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, a minto y'a ka gʋaa naa do n a waa, an n'awɔɔ lɛɛ naa ʋ.
44004011	Amba Wosoci a hɩ bɩ m, 'jaa k'awɔɔ cɛdonno, wɔɔ a bɔ ʋ a zo bɩ, a y'a ba cɛjɩr jaa.'
44004012	Bʋmbɔrɛzaa vanta ba ʋ bɩncɛ vanta ʋ k'a bɛɛ y. Tɔ vanta ba ʋ durnya nɔ ʋ n n a ka gʋɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ ʋ da ma ʋ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ k'a bɛɛ y."
44004013	Kʋ ŋ Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ heerkoodəbaa bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, ŋ n karɩnda ba y, targarɔ m bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə. Ŋ y'a dɔ kɛɛrɛ, ŋ ʋ Yeezuu zukuuzannɔ m,
44004014	ŋn'ɩ dɩgam gʋaa k'a waa bɩ ma a jɩr ʋ, ŋ n hɔ k'a n'a hɩm bɩ dɔ y.
44004015	Ŋ n lɛ ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta k'a dɩga ŋ mim ma.
44004016	Ŋ n'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ a ba gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n lɔ? Kʋ sɩra nɩ, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, ŋ hoser ba, bɩ wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ bɩsɩ ka ma y.
44004017	Ʋ ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ da jɩm ʋ, k'a bɩ lee ku lɛɛ haay ʋ y. Ʋ bɔ ŋ lɛɛ, kʋ ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ meer ba kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ tɔ naa do minto y."
44004018	Ŋ n a ka, ŋnɩ ŋ bir, ŋnɩ lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ Yeezuu tɔ hɩ, gɛɛ, ŋn'a mim dɩnda y.
44004019	Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m mɩŋŋa Woso mɩm ʋ? Ʋ ʋ tʋr ka awɔɔ ma gɛɛ, ʋ ʋ tʋr ka Woso ma? K'a a hɔɔn da ma, a dɩga a.
44004020	Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ yɩ, ʋ a ma bɩ hɩrɛ to y."
44004021	Kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ hɔsɩ ba ŋ nɩ y. Ŋ n a ya, ŋnɩ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ to. Bala, gʋaa haay y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ hɔ k'a ba bɩ minto.
44004022	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a waarɛ yɩ hoser naa do barɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, a dɔɔraa lɛ da busi m.
44004023	Kʋ ŋ wɔ saa ŋ ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ ta a muno wɔɔ zi, ŋn'aa hɔ kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan tara gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ a hɩ bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ.
44004024	N n a tʋr ka ŋ ma. Ŋ haay n a zɛ kʋ ra deem, ŋn'a hɩ Woso m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, ɩbɩɩ 'brama da kan tara kɩ, hi kɩ, kan hɔ haay k'an a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ.'
44004025	Ɩbɩɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa da ɩ zibəənyɩ Davɩd wɔɔ yaaba bɩ lɛ ʋ, minno nɔɔn duro minto: Bɔ minto kʋrɔ nɩ həən sire ncɩnaaʋ, zamaa n'a hɔɔn dam, hɔɔndarɛ vam-vam nɩ?
44004026	Durnya cinno n a zɔ kʋ ma, kʋrɔ cinno n a so kʋ ma k'a yar ba kan Zuuba Woso kɩ, a Krista kɩ.
44004027	Sɩra m, Hɩrɔɔdɩ kan Pɔns Pɩlatɩ kɩ a zɛ kʋ ra tara naa do nɔ ʋ, kan do vantɔɔ kɩ Israyɛl zannɔ kɩ, k'a yar ba kan Yeezuu ɩbɩɩ zibəəzaa mɩŋŋa k'ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ.
44004028	Naa ba ŋ y'a ʋ, k'ɩbɩɩ paŋŋa, ɩ hɔɔnhɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ ka ɩ cɩnta bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
44004029	Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Zuuba, ɩ tʋr ka ŋ nyaabarɛ meerbaa bɩ ma, k'ɩ ka k'ɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n'ɩ lemim bɩ hɩ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ.
44004030	Ɩ wɔ hʋr, ɩ ka kʋ yaabazannɔ m waarɛ yɩ, kʋ makrarɔ m ba, kan hoserlo kɩ ɩbɩɩ Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa Yeezuu tɔ ma."
44004031	Kʋ ŋ yaa bɩ da ŋn'a nya bɩ, bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ bɩ hinkə. Sɛnt-Ɛspri gasʋ ŋ ʋ an ŋ han haay. Ŋ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ pa dam kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ.
44004032	Zamaa bɩ kʋ ŋ y'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ, ŋ heer a ba deem, nyi deem, gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ hɔ m, a ʋ, awɔɔ y'a so ʋ y. Hɔ haay bɩ zɛ ŋ nawʋm kʋ ra deem.
44004033	Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ɩ Zuuba Yeezuu mɩmbɔʋrɛ kasɛtɩ karɛ kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ. Ŋ haay nɩ zi bam Woso barka gʋta kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ m.
44004034	Gʋaa ba ʋ ŋ bire ʋ an cicirzaa y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tararɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, gɛɛ, ŋ nɩ harlɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ hɛɛ ŋ nawʋrɛ, ŋn'ɩ zɛrɛ a busoo kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ m,
44004035	ŋnɩ b'a ka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Gʋaa biyəə k'a lɛ taa daahan ma bɩ, a y'a yɩrɛ amba a lɛ taa bɩ m.
44004036	Amba Zozɛf kʋ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a tɔ ka Barnabas bɩ, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʋ "muno heeryurezaa" bɩ n nɩ hɔsɩra m. Levii do gʋaa m, an a to Siipɩr ʋ.
44004037	A n a hɔsɩra bɩ hɛɛ, an a busoo bɩ sa, an b'a ka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
44005001	Gʋaa deem n ta ʋ, a tɔ m Ananɩyas, an kʋ ma kan a lʋ Safɩɩra kɩ ŋn'a tara hɛɛ.
44005002	A n kʋ ma kan a lʋ bɩ kɩ, an busoo bɩ bɔ ʋ an a cɩnta, an a mɩsɩ bɩ sa an aa a ka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
44005003	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ananɩyas, bɔ m Sʋtaana n'ɩbɩɩ heer han? Ɩbɩɩ ŋʋaar ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, ɩ tara k'ɩbɩɩ hɛɛ bɩ busoo bɩ bɔ ʋ.
44005004	Ɩbɩɩ n ɩ da ma ɩ tara bɩ hɛɛrɛ to, ɩ ba ɩ hɔ ra? Gɛɛ, k'ɩ hɛɛ, ɩ busoo bɩ sa ɩ hɔ k'ɩ lɛ n taa bɩ bam na? A ba ɩbɩɩ ʋ lɔ, ɩ naa da ɩ heer ʋ? Ŋʋaar bɛɛ ɩbɩɩ ba gʋɔɔ nɩ y, a ba ɩbɩɩ ʋ Woso m."
44005005	Ananɩyas k'a naa ma bɩ, an a do, an ga. Nyibəə gʋta gasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ minno nɔɔn duro ma rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
44005006	Gʋɔɔ pooro n bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a gər bɩ sa, ŋnɩ pɛɛra burgu ma, ŋn'aa a bir.
44005007	A maasɩrɛ ba, an a zɔ wakatɩ kaakʋ ma, a lʋ bɩ n bɩ gasʋ, an a dɔ kʋ bɔ ɩ ba y.
44005008	Pɩyɛɛr n a lar, a ʋ: "Tara bɩ k'awɔɔ hɛɛ bɩ, a lɛ paan••• m naa ra?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••, a lɛ n bɩ bala."
44005009	Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an a lar, a ʋ: "A ba awɔɔ lɔ a a lɛ ba deem k'a Zuuba Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ makra ba? Ɩ tʋr ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yaa ɩbɩɩ zim bɩ bir lɔ wɔɔ gam heer ma hallɛ ma, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ busum sɔ."
44005010	Lɛɛm bɩ, Safɩɩra a do Pɩyɛɛr jɩr ʋ, an ga. Kʋ gʋɔɔ pooro wɔɔ bʋr bɩ, ŋ bɩ dɩga a a ga, ŋn'a busu k'a yaa bir a zim bɩ jɩr ʋ.
44005011	Dabɔʋ gʋta sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ haay, kan gʋaa haay k'a minno nɔɔn duro ma bɩ kɩ.
44005012	Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ɩ makrarɔ kan hoserlo kɩ bam gʋta zamaa bɩ bire ʋ. Ŋ haay a zɛ kʋ ra deem Salomɔɔn laŋŋa taa b'ʋ.
44005013	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a n sɩra ka Woso ʋ paan••• bɩ bɩr yɛm an n'a zɛm kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ y. Kan bɩ kɩ, zamaa bɩ n n'a lɛ bɔrɛ ŋ ʋ.
44005014	Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta, yaarɔ kan lannɔ kɩ ɩ sɩra kam Zuuba ʋ, ŋn'a zarlɛ ŋ la.
44005015	N n bʋr yaabazannɔ m zaarɔ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ wʋta gargʋrɔ ʋ gɛɛ gʋraŋŋarɔ ʋ, kʋ Pɩyɛɛr bʋr an nɩ cenim b'ʋ gɛɛ a hinni y'a kam niŋŋoo ra gɛ.
44005016	Gʋɔɔ gʋta n a to yaabazannɔ m Zerizalɛm gʋrgarɔ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ zinəro nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ, ŋn'a waa haay.
44005017	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kan a jɛzannɔ kɩ, Sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ, wuti kan jɩmbaa heerbusu kɩ.
44005018	Ŋ n a ka, ŋnɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ gʋr gʋɔɔ mɩm m, ŋnɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
44005019	Gunuu ʋ bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka bʋr, an bɩ lɔnnɔcɛ bɩ lɛ rɔ wɔɔ gʋngʋ, an ŋ bɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
44005020	"K'a ta a yaa jɩm Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, a mɩsɩrbaa daa naa do minno nɔɔn duro haay hɩ zamaa bɩ m."
44005021	Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, ŋ ta Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ k'a yaa dɩnda gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n lee ku kan a jɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ. A n a ka ŋnɩ dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ bir haay, Israyɛl gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ haay, an nyɔɔ da kʋ n aa kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, n nɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ.
44005022	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ ta bɩ, kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ n ŋ yɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ y. Ŋ n a wusigə ŋn'aa a hɩ, ŋ ʋ:
44005023	"Wɔɔ yaa lɔnnɔcɛ bɩ yɩ ŋn'a ta mɩŋŋa, a dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n nɩ jɩnɩm cɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ ma. Kʋ wɔɔ gʋ bɩ, wɔɔ n gɔsɩ yɩ a nɔ ʋ y."
44005024	Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cir bɩ k'a naa ma kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ minto, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa larm naa k'a ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a jɩ nyɩntam lɔ?
44005025	Gʋaa n bʋr an b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ n gʋr a ŋ du rɔ wɔɔ ɩ Wosocɛ ʋ ŋn'ɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m."
44005026	Wosocɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n ta kan a zibəəzannɔ kɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zi, an aa ŋ gaa an bʋr ŋ nɩ. Ŋ n paŋŋa ba ŋ ma y, bala, ŋ y'ɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m, ŋ y'a a gʋngʋɛɛn jaarɔ m.
44005027	Ŋ n ŋ gaa, ŋnɩ bɩ ŋ hɩnka dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ m. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n ŋ lar, a ʋ:
44005028	"Wɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, ʋ ʋ: A b'a ya, a tɔ naa do hɩ a karɩnda nɔ ʋ y, awɔɔ karɩnda bɩ n bɔkarɛ an Zerizalɛm han, a lɛ n taa k'a gʋaa naa do ma bɩ ka wɔɔ mim la."
44005029	Pɩyɛɛr kan kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga m, k'ɩ Woso lɛ si, k'ɩ gʋɔɔ to.
44005030	Wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso, Yeezuu k'awɔɔ zeŋŋə gɔ ma a zɛ gər bɩ, mɩm bɔ ʋ.
44005031	Bɩ, Woso a busu a bɩsɩ ʋ arzana ʋ, an cirbəə ka ʋ, an a ba bʋmbɔrɛzaa, k'an a ka kʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ n a bɔ a taam, ŋnɩ ŋ sugur yɩ.
44005032	Minno nɔɔn duro kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m, wɔɔ kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʋ Woso a ka gʋɔɔ kʋ n n'a lɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ ʋ kɩ."
44005033	Minno nɔɔn duro ŋ heer busu, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ zɩnzɛrɛ ma.
44005034	Gʋaa deem n wuti dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ bire ʋ. Farizɛn m, a tɔ m Gamalɩyɛl, wosocikarɩnsaamba m, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n'a daŋ ʋ. A n lɛ ka kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m cɩna,
44005035	an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Israyɛl zannɔ, k'a dundo a zi mɩŋŋa kan hɔ k'awɔɔ k'a ba gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro m bɩ kɩ.
44005036	Dɔɔraarɔ kʋ ŋ cem dɩɩtaa rɔ nɔɔn nɔ ʋ, Tedas a hɩnka wɔɔ m, a ʋ: Gʋaa gʋta n'awɔɔ m. A n gʋɔɔ gaa, an ŋ so kʋ ma, ŋ lɛ n a zɔ zɔrsi ma. Ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa zɛ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay hɩsɩga da. Gɔsɩ n gɔɔta y.
44005037	Bɩ jɛ ʋ, lɛsarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, Galilee gʋaa Zidas a hɩnka wɔɔ m. Gʋɔɔ gʋta nɩ zure a jɛ ʋ. Bɩ mɩŋŋa ga sɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zure a jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n hɩsɩga da.
44005038	Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ, k'a gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro to kʋ ŋ nɩ cem, a bɩ hɔsɩ ba ŋ nɩ y. Meerbaa naa do kan zibəə naa do kɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ hɔɔ nɩ, ŋ nyaanlɛ a zim.
44005039	Bɩ kʋ Woso hɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a ka, ŋ n nyaam nɩ y. K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka, a bɩ yar ba kan Woso kɩ y." Ŋ yɛ Gamalɩyɛl meerbaa bɩ ma.
44005040	Ŋ nɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ bir, ŋn'a ka, ŋnɩ ŋ zɛ madɩɩrɔ m, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ, ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ Yeezuu tɔ hɩ y, ŋnɩ wɔ saa ŋ ma.
44005041	Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n bɔ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, kʋ Woso yɛ ŋn'a ga fɩryɩrɛ m Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ minto.
44005042	Dɔmɩm biyəə, amba Wosocɛ ʋ gɛɛ har ʋ, ŋ bɩr Yeezuu Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ dɩndarɛ kan a padarɛ kɩ tore y.
44006001	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ y'a dam la, zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ grɛkkɩ lemim hɩm nɔ wɔɔ n wuti kukur barɛ m kan kʋ bɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Bala, ŋ dɔmɩm haay hɔ jirle bɩ, ŋ bɩr a karɛ ŋ zonno wɔɔ ʋ y.
44006002	Bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ n zamaa sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A n a ga m k'ʋ wɔ saa Woso lemim nyɩnta pa darɛ ma, k'ʋ hɔbɩrɛ jir y.
44006003	M danyɩnɔ, k'a ka gʋɔɔ yaarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma a bire ʋ saanhɩna, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n ŋ heer han kan mindɔrɛ kɩ, k'ʋ zibəə naa do ka ŋ ʋ.
44006004	Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ba n bɩr ʋ tɔŋ ʋ kan yaadarɛ kɩ, ʋ bɩr Woso lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam."
44006005	Zamaa bɩ haay yɛ meerbaa naa do ma: ŋ n Etɩyɛnnɩ bɔ ʋ, gʋaa m, sɩrakarɛ n a heer han kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri kɩ, kan Filipi kɩ, Prokɔɔr kɩ, Nikanɔɔr kɩ, Timɔn kan Parmenas kɩ, kan Antɩyɔs gʋaa Nikola k'a nɩ zum zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ.
44006006	Ŋ nɩ ŋ hɩnka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m, ŋnɩ yaa da, ŋn'a wɔ ka ŋ mim la.
44006007	Woso lemim bɩ padarɛ n'a dam la, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ n'a dam la gʋta Zerizalɛm ʋ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno gʋta nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ zum sɩrakarɛ zaa b'ʋ.
44006008	Barka kan paŋŋa kɩ kʋ ŋ Etɩyɛnnɩ han bɩ, a nyɩnta an nɩ hoserlo kan makrarɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ bam zamaa bɩ bire ʋ.
44006009	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n wuti meerbaa m kan Etɩyɛnnɩ kɩ: Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ lɔnnɔ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa ŋ ma, ŋ sokʋmacɛ bɩ n a hɔ. Sirɛnnɩ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ nyɩnta ŋ barla kan Alɛsandrii zannɔ kɩ, Silisii zannɔ kɩ, Azii zannɔ kɩ. Ŋ n a sɩŋŋɩda sa ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan Etɩyɛnnɩ kɩ,
