44006010	Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a a ka Etɩyɛnnɩ nɩ meer bam kan mindɔrɛ kɩ bɩ, ŋ bɩr a dam ma ŋn'a meerbaa bɩ nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ y.
44006011	Ŋ n zambʋ ba, ŋn'a ka gʋɔɔ ma kʋ ŋ n'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ma, an nɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋm kan Moyiisi kɩ."
44006012	Nyɩnta a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, ŋnɩ zamaa bɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ, kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ nyʋnnyɔɔta ŋnɩ bɩ daata zɛ Etɩyɛnnɩ la, ŋn'a nyasʋ ŋnɩ ta m dʋdɔkənno taa.
44006013	Bɩ ŋ yaa kasɛtɩ ŋʋaarzannɔ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do bɩr wɔɔ Wosocɛ bɩ kan lɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ tore y.
44006014	Wɔɔ ʋ ya, ʋ a ma an n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu naa do n nɩ zɛm bɩ bɩncɛ naa do wurgə, an Moyiisi lɛrɔ k'a ŋ ka wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lʋr."
44006015	Gʋaa haay k'a nɩ nyɩntam dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, dɩga ŋ nawʋm ma, ŋn'a meer yɩ an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan malɛɛka hɔ kɩ.
44007001	Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Sɩra m naa gɛ?"
44007002	Etɩyɛnnɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a a tʋr ka, m danyɩnɔ kan ŋ zɩrɔ kɩ. Woso k'a a so cirbəə ʋ b'a hɩnka wɔɔ yaaba Abraham m, dɔmɩm k'a nyɩnta ʋ Mezopotamii ʋ, an bɔkarɛ an ta Haaran ʋ b'ʋ.
44007003	A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Ɩ gʋ ɩ kʋ bɩ ma, kan ɩ harzannɔ kɩ, ɩ ta tara kʋ mɔɔ n n'a hɩnkarɛ ɩbɩɩ m b'ʋ.'
44007004	Abraham n a gʋ Kalde zannɔ kʋ bɩ ma, k'a yaa nyɩnta Haaran ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, a zɩ garɛ kur bɩ, Woso n a bɔ kʋ bɩ do nɔ ʋ, an bɩ nyɩnta kʋ k'awɔɔ n ta ʋ heer naa ʋ.
44007005	A n tara ka ʋ k'an a so ʋ kʋ bɩ do ʋ y, b'a gam cɩnta jɩ ba ʋ y. B'a a ler bɔ m k'a ka ʋ k'an a so ʋ kan a yaŋŋarɔ kɩ, baa k'a n nyɩ yɩ bɩ kɩ.
44007006	Woso n a hɩ, a ʋ: 'A dogʋɔɔ nyɩntam do vanta tara ra, bɩ ŋ gasʋm lɔmbaa ʋ, ŋ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma dɔɔraa zɔrsi.'
44007007	Woso n a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Do niŋŋə k'a ŋ ba lɔnnɔrɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m dʋdɔ kam. Bɩ kur kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ŋ bɔm, ŋnɩ yaa da mɔɔ m bɩncɛ naa do ʋ.'
44007008	A n gʋaasɩbabaa da kan kɩ baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ minto y'a ka, Abraham k'a Izakkɩ yɩ bɩ, an a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ a yɩrɛ dɔmɩm sinnyə hɔ ma, Izakkɩ n a ba maam sɔ kan Zakɔɔb kɩ. Zakɔɔb n a ba a nyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ m maam sɔ."
44007009	"Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ sɔ Zozɛf m, ŋn'a hɛɛ. N n a gaa n nɩ ta m Eziptɩ ʋ. Bɩ, Woso nyɩnta kan kɩ.
44007010	A n a bɔ a fɩr do haay nɔ ʋ, an hɔɔn ka ʋ kan barka kɩ Eziptɩ cir Farawɔn taa. Bɩ m Zozɛf ba Eziptɩ lɛɛzaa, an a so Eziptɩ ʋ kan a har kɩ haay.
44007011	Nɔ gʋta n b'a da Eziptɩ kʋ ʋ haay ʋ, kan Kanaan kʋ kɩ ʋ. Fɩryɩrɛ bɩ paŋŋa nyɩnta ʋ, wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n hɔbɩrɛ yɩ ŋn'a bɩrɛ y.
44007012	Kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ hɔbɩrɛ ɩ Eziptɩ tara ra bɩ, Zakɔɔb a nyɩnɔ, wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ nyɔɔ ŋ lɛɛkarɛ hɔ ma.
44007013	A hɩɩya hɔ ma bɩ, Zozɛf a hɩnka a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m. Bɩ Farawɔn a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ dɔ ma ʋ.
44007014	Bɩ m, Zozɛf n nyɔɔ da, ŋn'aa a zɩ Zakɔɔb gaa kan a dogʋɔɔ kɩ. Ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra haay gʋaa busaanhɩna a yaa soor.
44007015	Zakɔɔb n ta Eziptɩ ʋ, an aa ga b'ʋ kan wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44007016	Ŋ n ŋ gʋr, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ Sikɛm ʋ ŋn'aa ŋ bir yaa kʋ Abraham a si busoo m Emɔɔr nyɩnɔ zi, Sikɛm tara ra b'ʋ."
44007017	"Woso lerbɔrɛ k'a ba kan Abraham kɩ kan kʋ yɩ bɩ dɔmɩm k'a n'a zɔm bɩ, zamaa bɩ lɛ a da ra, ŋn'a ba gʋta Eziptɩ tara ra,
44007018	an ta an Eziptɩ cir vanta k'a bɩ cirbəə bɩ, b'a n Zozɛf dɔ bɩ ku.
44007019	Cir bɩ do nyɩnta bʋnyaa, an zambʋ ba wɔɔ do bɩ ma. A paŋŋa ba wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ ma, an a ka ŋn'a a nyɩnɔ poorero gʋr, ŋn'aa ŋ lo kʋ ŋ nɩ gɩnga.
44007020	Dɔmɩm bɩ do Moyiisi yɩ ʋ. A gʋɛrɛ nyɩnta ʋ Woso mɩm ʋ. A tʋr n y'a ʋ mom kaakʋ a zɩ har ʋ.
44007021	Bɩ kʋ ŋ y'a zo bɩ, Farawɔn nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ y'a busu an a tʋr, an a ba a nyɩ.
44007022	Moyiisi n Eziptɩ zannɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn dɩnda haay, a meerbaarɔ kan a zibəəro kɩ paŋŋa nyɩnta ʋ."
44007023	"K'a dɔɔraa busi ku bɩ, a a hɔɔn da a ʋ, k'a dɩga a danyɩnɔ Israyɛl zannɔ wɔɔ ma.
44007024	K'a deem yɩ Eziptɩ gʋaa nɩ fɩr kam ma bɩ, k'a ʋ k'a a da a danyɩ k'a nɩ fɩr yɩm bɩ han a bʋmbɔ bɩ, an Eziptɩ gʋaa bɩ zɛ, an ga.
44007025	A hɔɔn a da a ʋ a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ ŋ ʋ, Woso y'a bɔ ʋ k'a bɩ ŋ bʋmbɔ, bɩ ŋ n a jɩ ma y.
44007026	A dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a a danyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ yɩ ŋnɩ kʋ zɛm, an a zɔ k'a ŋ bʋmbɔ kʋ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'M hannyɩnɔ, danyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m kan kʋ kɩ, bɔ minto, awɔɔ nɩ kʋ zɛrɛ?'
44007027	Bɔzaa nɩ fɩr karɛ a mim bɩ ma bɩ n a wɔ nya Moyiisi cɩ ʋ, an kaanm m, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Nka y'ɩbɩɩ ba wɔɔ cir, k'ɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ dʋdɔkarɛzaa?
44007028	Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ mɔɔ zɛ amba ɩbɩɩ Eziptɩ zannɔ gʋaa bɩ zɛ jim bɩ m na?'
44007029	Moyiisi k'a naa ma bɩ, an a si, an aa a nyaakʋm da kʋ vanta ʋ, Madɩyan tara ra. B'a nyɩnɔ yɩ ʋ hɩɩya."
44007030	"Dɔɔraa busi kur bɩ, malɛɛka a hɩnka m Sinayii ci poohɔɔn ʋ tutugu ʋ, sɛ nɔ ʋ.
44007031	Moyiisi k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a zɛ kədə, an a zɔ k'a dɩga a. A Zuuba Woso leer ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
44007032	'Ɩbɩɩ zɩrɔ Abraham kan Izakkɩ kɩ Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso m mɔɔ m.' Moyiisi da n bɔ ʋ, a mɛ nɩ nyiŋŋəm, a n yɛ k'a a ya, a a mɩm busu a dɩga y.
44007033	Zuuba n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Ɩ kʋsɔrɔ bɔ ɩ gam ʋ, bala, bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n nɩ jɩnɩŋ ʋ naa, bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa m, bala mɔɔ ɩ naa ʋ.
44007034	Mɔɔ m gʋɔɔ wɔɔ cicir yɩ Eziptɩ tara ra, mɔɔ ŋ zeedarɛ ma, mɔɔ n zer kʋ m ŋ bʋmbɔ. Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m ɩ nyɔɔ Eziptɩ kʋ ʋ.' "
44007035	"Moyiisi bɩ do ŋ kaanm m ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: 'Nka y'ɩbɩɩ ba cir, dʋdɔkarɛzaa sɔ?' Bɩ, Woso a nyɔɔ k'an bɩr cir, bʋmbɔrɛzaa sɔ kan malɛɛka k'a hɩnka m tutugu nɔ ʋ bɩ daahan kɩ.
44007036	Bɩ yɩ ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ kan hoserlo barɛ kɩ, makrarɔ kɩ Eziptɩ tara ra, higʋta piinə bɩncɛ ʋ, poohɔɔn ʋ, dɔɔraa busi.
44007037	Moyiisi mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ Israyɛl zannɔ m, a ʋ: 'Woso y'a lɛsinnɩsorazaa bɔŋ ʋ awɔɔ danyɩnɔ bire ʋ, amba mɔɔ m, an a ka awɔɔ ʋ.'
44007038	A mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta kan Israyɛl zannɔ wɔɔ kɩ poohɔɔn ʋ, malɛɛka n meer ba kan kɩ Sinayii ci mim ʋ. A n mɩsɩrbaa lemim si an a ka wɔɔ ʋ.
44007039	Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n yɛ k'a lɛ si y. Ŋ kaanm m, ŋn'a ŋʋa k'a a bɔ a ta Eziptɩ tara ra."
44007040	"Ŋ n a hɩ Aarɔn m, ŋ ʋ: 'wosoro ba ɩ ŋ ka wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr ʋ lɛɛ. Bala, Moyiisi naa do k'a wɔɔ gaa an bɔ wɔɔ m Eziptɩ ʋ naa, wɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ bɔ ɩ ba nɩ y.'
44007041	Ŋ n hɔ ba an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan dinnyɛɛm kɩ, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, ŋnɩ mannɩ ba ma, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba bɩ cibsa ba kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
44007042	Woso n kaanm ŋ nɩ, an ŋ to ŋn'ɩ brama monyaarɔ daŋ ʋ, amba ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ci ʋ bɩ m: Israyɛl zannɔ, mɔɔ awɔɔ ganwʋrɛ gɛɛ mannɩhɔ ka m ʋ dɔɔraa busi nɔ ʋ, poohɔɔn ʋ ra?
44007043	Awɔɔ wosobaawɔm Molok cɛ kʋ n y'a ba huu m bɩ busu kan awɔɔ woso Refan monyaa kɩ, hɔɔbarɛrɔ, awɔɔ ŋ ba, k'a bɩr ŋ daŋ ʋ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ tarɛ awɔɔ m lɔmbaa ʋ laatʋ Babɩlɔnnɩ ma."
44007044	"Wɔɔ zɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta poohɔɔn ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ nyɩnta Woso taʋrɛ kasɛtɩ cɛ m. Ba a ʋ, amba Woso meer ba kan Moyiisi kɩ an a hɩ m bɩ m. A ʋ: 'A ba amba hɔ niŋŋə k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ m.'
44007045	Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a si bɩ, ŋ gasʋ m tara kʋ Zoziye ka ŋ lɛɛ, ŋnɩ yar ba ʋ Woso m la do vantɔɔ ra ŋn'a so ʋ naa ʋ. Bɩ, a gɔɔta ʋ, an ta, an Davɩd dɔmɩm ku.
44007046	Davɩd barka yɩ Woso taa, Zakɔɔb Woso bɩ, an zaa yɛ han k'a cɛ dɔ a ka ʋ.
44007047	Salomɔɔn ɩ cɛ bɩ dɔ an a ka ʋ.
44007048	Bɩ Woso k'a lɛ da haay bɩ bɩr nyɩntam cɛrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ ŋ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. Amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa a da a ci nɔ ʋ bɩ m:
44007049	Zuuba Woso a hɩ: Mɔɔ nyɩntajɩ bɩncɛ m arzana m, tara m mɔɔ gankarahɔ. Cɛ kara awɔɔ k'a dɔ a ka mɔɔ ʋ? Mɔɔ mɛnyɔɔdarɛ bɩncɛ m kara?
44007050	Mɔɔ wɔ bɛɛ hɔ haay naa ba ra?"
44007051	"Tʋrgarɛ zannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ heer kan awɔɔ tʋr kɩ bɩr Woso mim sire y. Awɔɔ nɩ bɩsɩ kam Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma dɔmɩm haay. Awɔɔ kan a zɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ hɔdeem.
44007052	Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ kara ɩ nyɩnta ʋ awɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n fɩr ka ma? Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ Gʋaa tɩrga bɩ zɛrɛ bɩ hɩ rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, gʋaa bɩ do awɔɔ zambʋ ba ma, a zɛ.
44007053	Woso malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔ ŋnɩ bɩ Woso lɛrɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n zu ʋ y."
44007054	Minno nɔɔn duro ŋ heer busu, ŋn'a sɔ sʋrɛ Etɩyɛnnɩ minto.
44007055	Bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a Etɩyɛnnɩ han bɩ, an a bɔɔta, an dɩga brama, an Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, Yeezuu nɩ jɩnɩm Woso bɩsɩ ʋ.
44007056	A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ba mɔɔ arzana yɩ an a gʋ, mɔɔ n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩ an nɩ jɩnɩm Woso bɩsɩ ʋ na."
44007057	Ŋ n zee da, ŋn'a wɔ tɩnta a tʋʋrɔ rɛ. Ŋ haay wuti, ŋnɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ nyasʋ,
44007058	ŋnɩ bɔ m tara bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a gʋngʋɛɛnm jaa m. Kasɛtɩzannɔ wɔɔ, a huuro wɔɔ kuntə ŋ y'a ʋ gʋaa poo kʋ n n'a birm Sol bɩ jɩr ʋ.
44007059	Kʋ ŋ nɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ gʋngʋɛɛnm bɩ, a ɩ yaa darɛ an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Zuuba Yeezuu mɔɔ nyi si!"
44007060	A n sʋnta, an zee gʋta da, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩ bɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaa naa do taar ka ŋ ʋ y." Naa k'a hɩ bɩ, an ga.
44008001	Sol y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, Etɩyɛnnɩ garɛ bɩ mɩŋŋa. Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ fɩr ka Zerizalɛm sokʋma bɩ ma. Sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay hɩsɩga da ŋnɩ ta Zidee kan Samarii kɩ gʋrgarɔ ʋ, kʋ bɩ m, kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m bala.
44008002	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʋ paan••• rɔ wɔɔ ɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ busu ŋn'a bir, ŋnɩ nyi ka gʋta a minto.
44008003	Sol bɩ, sokʋma bɩ wurgə an nawʋm, an nɩ gasʋm harlɔ ʋ, an nɩ yaarɔ gʋrm kan lannɔ kɩ, an nɩ ŋ dum lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
44008004	Bɔɔ y'a hɩsɩga rɔ wɔɔ ɩ tam kʋrɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam.
44008005	Filipi ta Samarii kʋ deem nɔ ʋ, an nɩ Krista pa dam.
44008006	Zamaa bɩ haay n a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'a tʋr kam Filipi meerbaa bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ y'a hoserlo k'a nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ mam, ŋn'a yɩrɛ.
44008007	Zinəro gʋta ɩ bɔm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ ŋ ʋ rɔ mɛ ʋ kan zee gʋta darɛ kɩ. Lʋgɔrɔ kan paŋŋawarzannɔ kɩ a waa.
44008008	Heernyɔɔ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta tara bɩ do nɔ ʋ.
44008009	Bɩ, gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta kʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, a tɔ m Sɩmɔɔn, nyɩsɩzaa m, an nɩ nyibəə dam Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ ma. A y'a hɩrɛ a zi m, a ʋ gʋaa gʋta naa a mɩ.
44008010	Gʋaa haay nɩ tam zi, gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ poorero kɩ. Ŋ n a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ do, Woso paŋŋa kʋ n n'a birm paŋŋa gʋta bɩ m."
44008011	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a tʋr karɛ a lemim ma, bala, a ka k'a ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ zɛm kədə a nyɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a dɔmɩm laatʋ.
44008012	Bɩ, kʋ ŋ Filipi Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta padarɛ bɩ si kan Yeezuu Krista tɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ batɛm si, lannɔ kan yaarɔ kɩ.
44008013	Bɩ kur bɩ, Sɩmɔɔn mɩŋŋa n a ba sɩrakarɛzaa sɔ, an batɛm si, an nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan Filipi kɩ. Hoserlo kan makrarɔ kɩ k'a nɩ ŋ yɩm bɩ, a n zɛ kədə.
44008014	Kʋ ŋ y'a ma ŋ ʋ Samarii zannɔ Woso lemim bɩ si bɩ, kristazibəəzannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ Pɩyɛɛr nyɔɔ kan Zaan kɩ.
44008015	Kʋ ŋ lee ku b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ yaa da Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ minto kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer, kʋ ŋ n a da ma ŋn'a si.
44008016	Sɩra m, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer ŋ gʋaa deem taan••• ra cɩna y. Batɛm ŋ y'a si Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma bala.
44008017	Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ n'a wɔ kam Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ ra, ŋn'ɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sim.
44008018	Sɩmɔɔn k'a yɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ kam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ mim la, ŋnɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sim bɩ, a a cɩnta k'a busoo ka ŋ ʋ.
44008019	A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a paŋŋa naa do ka m ʋ sɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm, kʋ m bɩ m wɔ ka ŋ la rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ŋ nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri si."
44008020	Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ busoo bɩ n a zar kan ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa kɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ ɩ hɔɔn da ɩ ʋ, n y'a dam ma, ŋnɩ Woso ganwʋrɛ si busoo m bɩ minto.
44008021	Hɔ k'a nɩ bam naa ʋ naa, ɩbɩɩ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩrɛ a nɔ ʋ y, bala, ɩbɩɩ heer bɩ tɩrga Woso taa y.
44008022	Ɩ bɔ ɩ taam ɩ kʋsɩrabaa bɩ minto, k'ɩ yaa da Zuuba m. Hɔɔndarɛ k'a bʋr ɩbɩɩ heer ʋ bɩ, n y'a sugur karɛ ɩ ʋ barɛm.
44008023	Sɩra m, mɔɔ yɩ, jɩmbaa heerbusu kan mimbʋnyaa lɔmbaa kɩ nɔ ɩbɩɩ n ta ʋ."
44008024	Sɩmɔɔn n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa da Zuuba m mɔɔ minto, hɔ k'awɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ, kʋ hɔsɩ bɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ y."
44008025	Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ kʋ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ ka, ŋnɩ Zuuba lemim bɩ pa da bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋn'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam Samarii gʋrgarɔ ʋ gʋta.
44008026	Zuuba malɛɛka deem meer ba kan Filipi kɩ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ ta jɩsa zeezi, ɩ zaa k'a bɔ Zerizalɛm ʋ an nɩ tam Gazaa ʋ bɩ sa. Zaa bɩ do, poohɔɔn m."
44008027	Filipi n wuti lɛɛm an ta. Bala, Etiyopii gʋaa deem, lannɔdɔmazaa, k'a m Etiyopii zannɔ lʋcir Kandasɩ arzaka dɔmazaa bɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, an aa yaa da,
44008028	an a bɔ an nɩ doom. Nyɩnta a ʋ a tɛrkʋ nɔ ʋ, an nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci karɩnda bam.
44008029	Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩ Filipi m, a ʋ: "Ta zɔɔ, ɩ tɛrkʋ bɩ ku."
44008030	Filipi n bra si, an wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci karɩnda barɛ ma Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ lɛ ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a karɩnda bam naa, ɩbɩɩ y'a jɩ mam paan••• ra?"
44008031	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ m a ba lɔ m a jɩ ma, kʋ gʋaa ba ʋ an n'a jɩ dɩndam mɔɔ nɩ?" A n Filipi bir, a ʋ, an bɩ nyɩnta a jɩr ʋ.
44008032	Wosoci bɩ bɩncɛ naa do an n'a karɩnda barɛ: Amba, serda kʋ n bʋr m k'a b'a bʋkɔ bɔ ʋ, amba, sinnyɛɛm bəətir kʋ n n'a ka zɩnzɛm la, ncɩnaaʋ a bɩr meer barɛ y.
44008033	Kʋ n y'a da nyannɩ ʋ bɩ, a n gumə yɩ dʋdɔkənno zi y. Nka n nɩ naa do mim dɩndarɛ? Bala, n y'a mɩsɩrbaa bɔ durnya ʋ.
44008034	Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ n a hɩ Filipi m, a ʋ: "Nka wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ n n'a mim dɩndarɛ? K'ɩ hɩ m m. A hɔ an n'a dɩndam gɛɛ, gʋaa vanta hɔ nɩ?"
44008035	Filipi n a lɛ gʋ, an zu Wosoci bɩ meerbaa b'ʋ, an Yeezuu lemim nyɩnta bɩ hɩ m.
44008036	Kʋ ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ yaa hi ku, Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ba hi m na. Bɔ n n'a tam mɔɔ m tolle kʋ m bɩ batɛm si?" [
44008037	Filipi n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma ɩ batɛm si." Gʋaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ n'ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ sɩra ka, mɔɔ ʋ: Yeezuu Krista bɩ, Woso Nyɩ m."]
44008038	A n lɛ ka, n nɩ tɛrkʋ bɩ da jɩm ʋ. Filipi kan Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ kɩ, ŋ hɩɩya haay gasʋ hi b'ʋ, Filipi n batɛm ka ʋ.
44008039	Kʋ ŋ bɔ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri Filipi gaa an cenim, Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ n a ya, an n'a yɩrɛ y, an a zaa sa kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
44008040	Kʋ Filipi nɩ, a yɩ n yaa ʋ Azɔttɩ kʋ ʋ, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam kʋrɔ haay ʋ an nɩ cenim, an nɩ tam Sezaree kʋ ʋ.
44009001	Sol k'a gɔɔta an nɩ fɩr kam Zuuba karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, a lɛ n taa k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ bɩ, a ta wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zi,
44009002	an aa yɛ han, k'an ciro ba Damas zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ minto, k'a yaa gʋɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ zum zaa daa b'ʋ, kʋ lʋ m gɛɛ yar nɩ, k'a nyasʋ a sur, a bʋr m Zerizalɛm ʋ.
44009003	A zaa sa, an nɩ tarɛ, an aa a zɔ Damas ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, lɛɛgure a to mim ʋ, an yɔ, an a ku ra.
44009004	A n a do tara ʋ, an a to, an leer ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Sol, Sol, bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma?"
44009005	A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, Zuuba?" "Mɔɔ m Yeezuu, gʋaa k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ fɩr kam ma bɩ.
44009006	Bɩ, wuti, ɩ gasʋ tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, n hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ ba bɩ hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m."
44009007	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ jɩm, dabɔʋ bɩ n a ka, ŋ n a dɔ kʋ bɔ an n'a hɩrɛ y. Ŋ yɩ leer bɩ mam, bɩ ŋ bɩr gɔsɩ yɩrɛ y.
44009008	Sol n wuti tara ʋ b'ʋ, baa kan a mɩnyaa gaa ra bɩ kɩ haay, a bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y. A zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ n a gaa a wɔ ma, ŋnɩ gasʋ m Damas ʋ.
44009009	A n gɔɔta b'ʋ kan mɩm war bɩ kɩ dɔmɩm kaakʋ, a n hɔsɩ bɩ, b'a n hi mi sɔ y.
44009010	Karɩndanyɩ deem ɩ nyɩnta Damas ʋ b'ʋ, a tɔ m Ananɩyas. Zuuba n a bir hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ: "Ananɩyas!" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ba mɔɔ n na!"
44009011	Zuuba n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ zaa kʋ n n'a birm 'Zaa tɩrga' bɩ sa, ɩ ta Zidas har ʋ, ɩ gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Sol bɩ laaka da. Tarsɩ gʋaa m. A ɩ b'ʋ, an nɩ yaa dam,
44009012	a gʋaa k'a tɔ m Ananɩyas bɩ yɩ hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ, an gasʋ, an a wɔ ka ra k'a mɩm n lɛɛ yɩ."
44009013	Ananɩyas n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa, gʋɔɔ nɩ gʋaa naa do mim dɩndam, ŋn'a zibəəro bʋnyaarɔ k'a ŋ ba ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m bɩ mim dɩndam sɔ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ.
44009014	Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zaa ka ʋ an bʋr naa ʋ, k'a bɩ gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ sur."
44009015	Bɩ, Zuuba a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ta bala, gʋaa naa do makra hɔ m, mɔɔ n a bɔ ʋ k'an mɔɔ tɔ hɩ kɩfɩɩrɔ kan cinno kɩ, Israyɛl zannɔ kɩ bire ʋ.
44009016	Bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa fɩryɩrɛ do haay k'a n'a yɩm mɔɔ tɔ minto bɩ hɩnkam nɩ."
44009017	Ananɩyas n ta, an aa gasʋ har ʋ b'ʋ, an a wɔrɔ ka ra, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "M danyɩ Sol, Zuuba Yeezuu niŋŋə k'a hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ zaa sa, ɩ nɩ zɛm b'ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ, kʋ m b'a ka k'ɩ mɩm n lɛɛ yɩ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'ɩbɩɩ heer han."
44009018	Lɛɛm bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ zɔ kapra y'a to a mɩm ʋ an sur tara ʋ, a mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm. A n wuti, an batɛm si.
44009019	Bɩ, Sol k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ, a a ya, an paŋŋa yɩ. A gɔɔta an dɔmɩnnɔ ba kan karɩndanyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Damas nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ poore,
44009020	bɩ, a a hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ lɛɛm, a ʋ Yeezuu bɩ Woso Nyɩ m.
44009021	Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam ma rɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do bɛɛ nyɩnta an nɩ fɩr kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa dam tɔ naa do minto Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ ra? Bʋr bɛɛ a ʋ tɔkkɛ k'a bɩ ŋ gʋr, a ŋ sur a ta ŋ nɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zi ra?"
44009022	Bɩ, Sol paŋŋa y'a dam la, an nɩ bʋr m zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Damas ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ra kan a meerbaa bɩ kɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Yeezuu bɩ, a m Krista.
44009023	K'a maasɩrɛ ba bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ duro a dɩnda kan kʋ kɩ, k'a Sol zɛ k'an ga.
44009024	Sol n hɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ k'a ba bɩ dɔ. Ŋ nɩ dɔ tara bɩ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ ma sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ, k'a a da ma, a ku a zɛ.
44009025	Bɩ, gunuu deem ʋ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a da kasɩ ʋ, ŋn'a busu, ŋn'a zer bar m pəŋŋə bɩ kur.
44009026	Sol k'a lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, a a ŋʋa k'a a zɛ kʋ ra kan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, ŋ haay ɩ nyi bam nɩ, bala ŋ n yɛ, ŋn'a si paan••• karɩndanyɩ y.
44009027	Barnabas n a gaa, an ta m kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zi, an Zuuba k'a hɩnka m hɔ niŋŋə zaa bire ʋ bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, kan meerbaa niŋŋə k'a ba bɩ kɩ. A Yeezuu tɔ dɩnda Damas ʋ kan sɩra kɩ.
44009028	Bɩ kur kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Sol ɩ minkarɛ ŋ nɩ, an nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ, an nɩ Zuuba tɔ hɩm kan nyɛɛsʋm kɩ.
44009029	A tɩr kan zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ grɛkkɩ lemim hɩm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ bɩr bɩsɩ kam kan kʋ kɩ. Brɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋn'a kam ma k'a zɛ gər.
44009030	Danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Sezaree ʋ, b'ʋ bɩ ŋ y'a ka, an ta Tarsɩ ʋ.
44009031	Sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ kan Galilee kɩ, Samarii kɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam kan laafɩɩ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ paŋŋa yɩm, ŋn'ɩ tam kan Zuuba nyibəə kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa minto y'a ka, ŋ lɛ n n'a dam la.
44009032	Pɩyɛɛr k'a nɩ bɩrm lɛɛ haay ʋ bɩ, a ta wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Lida ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zi.
44009033	A n aa gʋaa yɩ b'ʋ a tɔ m Enee. Yɩnyar a ʋ an nɩ wʋtam kan mɛgarɛ kɩ a gargʋ burə ʋ dɔɔraa sinnyə.
44009034	Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Enee, Yeezuu Krista y'ɩ waam. Wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr ɩ zi m." A n wuti lɛɛm sɔ.
44009035	Lida gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay kan Sarɔɔn kʋ bɩncɛ fapɩda zannɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ a taam, ŋnɩ zu Zuuba ʋ.
44009036	Lʋ ɩ nyɩnta ʋ Zoppee ʋ, karɩndanyɩ m, a tɔ m Tabɩta, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Dɔrkas' grɛkkɩ lemim m. (A jɩ k'a hɩ a ʋ: 'Mee'). A ziro mɩŋŋɔɔ ba gʋta, an n'a dam cicirzannɔ han sɔ.
44009037	Bala, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, a yaaba zɛ, an ga. Kʋ ŋ y'a gər bɩ zʋr, ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ yaa a wʋta cɛ nɔ k'a nɩ mim ʋ b'ʋ.
44009038	Lida k'an jɩnjɛɛm Zoppee ma bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ma ŋ ʋ, Pɩyɛɛr ta b'ʋ. Ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ yaarɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nyɔɔ ma kʋ ŋ n'aa a bir ncɩnaaʋ: "Ɩ tɔ ʋ ɩ wɔɔ zɛ ʋ dɩɩtaa-dɩɩtaa."
44009039	Lɛɛm bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr wuti, an zu kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ. K'a yaa lee ku bɩ, ŋ y'a ka an ta cɛ k'a nɩ mim ʋ b'ʋ, zonno wɔɔ haay n jɩm a lɛɛ, ŋn'ɩ nyi karɛ. Ŋ nɩ huuro kan gɔbgarɔ kɩ kʋ Dɔrkas nyɩnta an nɩ bam dɔmɩm k'a nyɩnta ʋ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ hɩnka m.
44009040	Pɩyɛɛr n a ka gʋaa haay n bɔ, an sʋnta, an yaa da. A n a wusigə an a nya gər bɩ rɛ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Tabɩta, wuti!" A n a mɩm gʋ, k'a Pɩyɛɛr yɩ bɩ, a wuti an nyɩnta.
44009041	Pɩyɛɛr n a wɔ dɔ rɛ, an wuti an jɩm. A n wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ bir kan zonno wɔɔ kɩ, an a hɩnka ŋ nɩ mɩsɩr.
44009042	Zoppee zannɔ haay a ma, gʋɔɔ gʋta n sɩra ka Zuuba ʋ.
44009043	Pɩyɛɛr gɔɔta an maasɩrɛ ba Zoppee ʋ, zappa kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn bɩ har ʋ.
44010001	Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta Sezaree ʋ, a tɔ m Kɔrnɛy. Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa m. Sʋrdaarɔ zɔrsɔddɩ zɛkʋra kʋ n n'a birm "Italik" bɩ barla an ta ʋ.
44010002	Gʋaa m an sɩra ka Woso ʋ paan•••, an nɩ nyi bam Woso m kan a har zannɔ kɩ haay. A y'a dam zɩɩfʋrɔ cicirzannɔ gʋtɔɔ han, an nɩ yaa dam Woso m dɔmɩm haay.
44010003	Hindeem ʋ, wakatɩ kaakʋ zeezi yirbəə n bɩ, a Woso malɛɛka yɩ paan••• Makra nɔ ʋ, an gasʋ a har ʋ, an n'a birm, a ʋ: "Kɔrnɛy!"
44010004	Kɔrnɛy n dɩga ma sɩɩ•••, dabɔʋ n a nyasʋ, an a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A lɔ, Zuuba?" Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛrɔ kan ɩ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ba rɔ wɔɔ kɩ minto, Woso a hɔɔn da ɩbɩɩ ma.
44010005	Bɩ, naa ma bɩ, gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ Zoppee ʋ kʋ ŋ n'aa Sɩmɔɔn, gʋaa niŋŋə kʋ n so ra, n n'a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ gaa ŋnɩ bʋr m.
44010006	Zer a ʋ Sɩmɔɔn vanta k'an zappa bɩ har ʋ higʋta lɛ ra."
44010007	Malɛɛka k'a meer ba kan kɩ bɩ k'a nyaam bɩ, Kɔrnɛy a zibəənyɩnɔ bir hɩɩya kan a sʋrdaarɔ gʋaa deem k'a sɩra ka Woso ʋ paan••• bɩ kɩ,
44010008	an mim haay k'a ba bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, an ŋ nyɔɔ Zoppee ʋ.
44010009	Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, kʋ ŋ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ y'a zɔ kʋ bɩ ma. Bɩ ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr der cɛ bɩ bɛŋŋʋ ra k'a yaa da. Nyɩnta a ʋ sinuu zeezi.
44010010	Bɩ jɛ ʋ, nɔ a nyasʋ, an nyɩnta an a ŋʋa k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ. N nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bam k'a ka ʋ. Lɛɛm bɩ, a hɔhɩnkarɛ yɩ.
44010011	A n brama yɩ an a gʋ, hɔ niŋŋə n a to brama, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan pɛɛra gʋta kɩ, n n a bɔ kʋ ʋ, an b'a cɩnta tara ʋ.
44010012	A nɔ ʋ bɩ, hɔmɩsɩr do haay n ta ʋ: hɔ gam si, bɔɔ n n'a gaatam tara ʋ, kan bɔɔ n nɩ werm brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44010013	Leer n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Pɩyɛɛr, aya, ŋ zɩnzɛ, ɩ ŋ bɩ!" Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ:
44010014	"Ayo Zuuba, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ n hɔ bʋnyaa kan dintim hɔ kɩ bɩ cɩna y. Wɔɔ do sɩhɔ m."
44010015	Leer n a ya, an a hɩ m a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ Woso dintim gʋ ma bɩ, ɩ b'a bir dintim hɔ y."
44010016	Naa do ba gallɛm kaakʋ, hɔ bɩ n a bɔ, an ta brama lɛɛm.
44010017	Pɩyɛɛr n a mɩŋŋa lar a hɔɔn ʋ gallɛm hɔka hɔhɩnkarɛ naa do jɩ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, Kɔrnɛy zibəəzannɔ kʋ ŋ laaka da jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ Sɩmɔɔn har ma rɔ wɔɔ lee ku hallɛ ma.
44010018	Ŋ nɩ bir darɛ, k'a a dɔ kʋ Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n so ra, n n a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ, zer a ʋ har bɩ do ʋ gɛ.
44010019	Pɩyɛɛr n gɔɔta an n'a hɔɔn dam hɔhɩnkarɛ k'a a yɩ bɩ ma. Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ba gʋɔɔ kaakʋrɔ n n'a karɛ ɩ ma na.
44010020	Zer zɔɔ-zɔɔ ɩ zaa sa kan ŋ kɩ, ɩ bɩ bɩsɩ ka y. Bala, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ."
44010021	Pɩyɛɛr n zer, an gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ba n nɩ. Mɔɔ awɔɔ n'a karɛ m ma bɩ. Bɔ minto y'a ka awɔɔ n bʋr naa ʋ?"
44010022	Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa Kɔrnɛy k'an gʋaa tɩrga, an nɩ nyi bam Woso m, a tɔ n nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩm zɩɩfʋrɔ do barla bɩ, Woso malɛɛka a hɩnka m, a ʋ, an a ka, k'ɩbɩɩ m bʋr a har ʋ, k'a b'a tʋr ka ɩ ma."
44010023	Pɩyɛɛr n ŋ si, an a ka ŋnɩ gasʋ, an wʋtaʋrɛcɛ ka ŋ ʋ. Bɩ, dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a cem kan ŋ kɩ, kan Zoppee danyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ.
44010024	Ŋ lee ku Sezaree ʋ, dɔmɩm hɩɩya hinni ʋ. Kɔrnɛy n a banka, an nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma. A a do gʋɔɔ bir kan a gʋaasɩbɔɔ paan•••rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44010025	Dɔmɩm kʋ Pɩyɛɛr lee ku ma bɩ, Kɔrnɛy wuti, an a zɛ ʋ, an sʋnta a taa, an a da ʋ.
44010026	Pɩyɛɛr n a wɔ dɔrɛ, an a busu brama, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Wuti! Gʋaa m mɔɔ m sɔ."
44010027	Ŋ n sʋʋra ba kan kʋ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ gasʋm. K'a bɩ sʋr gʋɔɔ ma, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra gʋta bɩ,
44010028	a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ a cisə ba kan zɩɩfʋ kɩ k'an a zɛ kʋ ra kan saana kɩ, gɛɛ an gasʋ a har ʋ ra! Bɩ, Woso a hɩnka mɔɔ m, a ʋ, mɔɔ n m ga m, kʋ m dɩga gɔsɩ ma, m a ba hɔ bʋnyaa gɛɛ dintim zaa y.
44010029	Bɩ y'a ka, k'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ bir bɩ, mɔɔ n bɩsɩ ka zɛrɛ ma y. Bɩ naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m m birle bɩ jɩ dɔ."
44010030	Kɔrnɛy n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A dɔmɩm kaakʋ her, ncɩnaaʋ nyi m, mɔɔ n nɩ yaa darɛ m har ʋ yirbəə wakatɩ kaakʋ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋaa n a hɩnka mɔɔ lɛɛ, a huuro n nɩ gum,
44010031	an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Kɔrnɛy, n y'ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛ si, bɩ Woso ɩbɩɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka cicirzannɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
44010032	Bɩ minto bɩ, gʋaa nyɔɔ Zoppee ʋ k'an aa gʋaa k'a tɔ m Sɩmɔɔn n nɩ so ra, n n a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ bir, k'an bʋr naa ʋ. Zer a ʋ Zoppee zappa k'a tɔ m Sɩmɔɔn bɩ har ʋ, higʋta lɛ ra.
44010033	Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n nyɔɔ da lɛɛm kʋ n n'ɩbɩɩ bir, ɩbɩɩ yɛ sɔ, k'ɩ bʋr wɔɔ zi. Ba wɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ taa naa ʋ haay na, k'ʋ ʋ tʋr ka hɔ haay kʋ Zuuba a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m k'ɩ hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ ma."
44010034	Pɩyɛɛr n bɔkarɛ, an a lɛ gʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, mɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ mɔɔ ʋ, Woso bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
44010035	Bɩ do haay nɔ ʋ, gʋaa k'a nɩ nyi bam nɩ, an nɩ tɩrgabaa zi bam bɩ, a y'a sire a jɩr ʋ.
44010036	Woso a mɩŋŋa lemim nyɔɔ Israyɛl zannɔ ma, an Yeezuu Krista k'an gʋɔɔ haay Zuuba bɩ laafɩɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ hɩ.
44010037	Awɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə k'a ba Zidee kʋ haay ʋ bɩ dɔ. A sɩŋŋɩda a sa Galilee ʋ Zaan batɛm lemim hɩrɛ bɩ jɛ ʋ.
44010038	Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ do, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, bɩ Woso a bɔ ʋ, an Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan a paŋŋa kɩ zer a mim ʋ. A bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ, an mɩŋŋabaa zi ba, an nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Sʋtaana lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ waam, bala, Woso ɩ kan kɩ.
44010039	A zibəə haay k'a a ba zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ʋ, kan Zerizalɛm kɩ ʋ bɩ, a kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m. Ŋ y'a zeŋŋə gɔ ma, ŋn'a zɛ gər.
44010040	Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hɔ ma, an lɛ ka ʋ k'an a taʋrɛ hɩnka.
44010041	Gʋaa haay bɛɛ a a hɩnka nɩ y, a hɩnka a ʋ kasɛtɩzannɔ kʋ Woso lɛɛ ka an ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, wɔɔ k'ʋ hɔ bɩ, ʋ hɔ mi kan kɩ a mɩmbɔʋrɛ kur gəəno bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
44010042	A lɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ kɛɛrɛ k'ʋ a hɩ do bɩ m, k'ʋ a kasɛtɩ naa do ka, ʋ ʋ: A mɩŋŋa Woso a bɔ ʋ kan nyɩnta mɩsɩɩrɔ kan gəəno kɩ dʋdɔkər.
44010043	A mɩŋŋa wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ n'a kasɛtɩ kam, ŋ ʋ: Gʋaa haay k'a sɩra ka ʋ bɩ y'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ, a tɔ ma."
44010044	Kʋ Pɩyɛɛr gɔɔta an nɩ meer bɩ bam bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ zer gʋaa haay k'a nyɩnta an n'a tʋr kam meerbaa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ra.
44010045	Zɩɩfʋrɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ Pɩyɛɛr da zaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, kʋ ŋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛ yɩ an zer do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ gʋta ra sɔ bɩ minto.
44010046	Ŋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro ma, ŋn'ɩ meer bam do y'a hʋnhɔ lemim m, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ. Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ:
44010047	"Gʋaa y'a dam ma, an a ta tolle, a ʋ, ŋ bɩ batɛm ka hi m gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ ra? Ŋ y'a ba, am wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m, ŋnɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri yɩ ra!"
44010048	A n lɛ ka, kʋ n nɩ batɛm ka ŋ ʋ Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, ŋn'a yɛ han k'a n a ya, an gɔɔta kan a kɩ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ.
44011001	Kristazibəəzannɔ kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta Zidee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a ma ŋ ʋ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ Woso lemim bɩ si kɛɛrɛ.
44011002	Kʋ Pɩyɛɛr a bɔ an ta Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kɩ, ŋ ʋ:
44011003	"Ɩbɩɩ gasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zi, ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kan ŋ kɩ!"
44011004	Pɩyɛɛr n a bɔ, an mim bɩ sa a jɩ ma deem-deem, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
44011005	"Nyɩnta mɔɔ ʋ Zoppee kʋ nɔ ʋ, m nɩ yaa dam, mɔɔ m hɔhɩnkarɛ yɩ. Hɔ niŋŋə y'a to brama, an nɩ zerm, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan pɛɛra gʋta kɩ, n n a bɔ kʋ ʋ, an bɩ lee ku mɔɔ zi.
44011006	Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ••• bɩ, mɔɔ tara burə hɔɔ yɩ, ŋ gam n si-si, poohɔɔ, bɔɔ n'a gaatam nɔ, kan bɔɔ nɩ werm brama rɔ kɩ.
44011007	Mɔɔ leer ma, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Pɩyɛɛr, wuti, ɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ, ɩ ŋ sʋ.
44011008	Mɔɔ n a hɩ, mɔɔ ʋ: Fɩɩgaa Zuuba, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, hɔ bʋnyaa gɛɛ dintim hɔ n gasʋ mɔɔ lɛ ʋ y.
44011009	Leer bɩ n a ya, an a to brama, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a ʋ: Hɔ kʋ Woso dintim gʋ ma bɩ, ɩ b'a bir dintim hɔ y.
44011010	Naa do ba gallɛm kaakʋ, a haay n a bɔ, an ta brama.
44011011	Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋaa kaakʋ a hɩnka har kʋ wɔɔ n ta ʋ b'ʋ. Ŋ bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ Sezaree ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ nyɔɔ mɔɔ ma.
44011012	Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ, m ta kan ŋ kɩ, bɩ, m bɩ bɩsɩ ka y. Danyɩnɔ sɔrdɩrɔ nɔɔn duro mɔɔ da zaa ʋ, wɔɔ n aa gasʋ gʋaa kʋ n y'a hɩ ma bɩ har ʋ.
44011013	A n malɛɛka bɩ k'a a hɩnka hɔ niŋŋə a har ʋ bɩ sa, an a dɩnda wɔɔ m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Gʋaa nyɔɔ Zoppee ʋ k'an a ka kʋ Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n so ra, n n a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ n bʋr.
44011014	A minno kʋ ŋ n'a kam ɩbɩɩ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ kan ɩ har gʋɔɔ kɩ bɩ dɩndarɛ ɩbɩɩ m.
44011015	Kʋ mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ sa bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer ŋ la, amb'a a ba wɔɔ m a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ m.
44011016	Mɔɔ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a hɩ bɩ tɔ da m nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Zaan hi batɛm ka denter, b'awɔɔ, awɔɔ batɛm sim Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ.
44011017	Kʋ Woso ganwʋrɛ deem ka gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ ncɩnaaʋ amb'a a ka wɔɔ ʋ, dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ sɩra ka Zuuba Yeezuu Krista ʋ bɩ, nka m mɔɔ m kʋ m m ta Woso m tolle k'a b'a zi ba?"
44011018	Naa k'a a hɩ bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ heer a da, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Woso heerlʋrlɛ k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam bɩ ka do vantɔɔ haay ʋ sɔ."
44011019	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a si, ŋnɩ hɩsɩga da fɩr kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ garɛ kur bɩ, ŋ ta Fenisii ʋ kan Siipɩr kɩ, Antɩyɔs kɩ ʋ. Ŋ bɩr Woso lemim bɩ pa dam gɔsɩ vanta m, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ bala y.
44011020	Bɩ, Siipɩr zannɔ kan Sirɛnnɩ zannɔ kɩ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ ŋ barla, kʋ ŋ lee ku Antɩyɔs ʋ, ŋnɩ Zuuba Yeezuu lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da grɛkkɩ zannɔ wɔɔ m sɔ.
44011021	Zuuba paŋŋa nyɩnta an nɩ kan ŋ kɩ, hallɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ zu Zuuba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ n'a dam la gʋta.
44011022	Zerizalɛm sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ mim naa do dɩndarɛ ma, n n Barnabas nyɔɔ Antɩyɔs ʋ.
44011023	K'a lee ku, an Woso barka bɩ yɩ, an nɩ zi bam bɩ, a heer yɩ nyɩnta, an ŋ dʋndɔ haay, kʋ ŋ heer n gɔɔta an bɩr kan Zuuba kɩ kɔɔkɔɔ.
44011024	Nyɩnta a ʋ gʋaa tɩrga, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a han kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ gʋta n zu Zuuba zaa ʋ.
44011025	Barnabas ta Tarsɩ ʋ k'a yaa a ka Sol ma.
44011026	A n aa a yɩ, an a gaa, an bʋr m Antɩyɔs ʋ. Ŋ nɩ dɔɔraa deem ba kan kʋ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zi bam sokʋma bɩ do ʋ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ gʋta m. Antɩyɔs ʋ n lɛɛ ka ʋ, n nɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir kristagʋɔɔ.
44011027	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a to Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Antɩyɔs ʋ.
44011028	Ŋ gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Agabus bɩ wuti, an a hɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m, a ʋ: nɔ gʋta n'a dam tara burə ʋ jilli. A nyɩnta ʋ denter, cir Kloodɩ dɔmɩm ʋ.
44011029	Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a cɩnta kan kʋ kɩ, gʋaa biyəə kan a wɔhɔ kɩ, k'a nyɔɔ a danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ daahan minto.
44011030	Bɩ ŋ y'a ba, ŋnɩ Barnabas kan Sol kɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ nyɔɔ gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ ma kan daahan bɩ kɩ.
44012001	Bɩ ma bɩ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ka, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gʋr, k'a fɩr ka ŋ ma.
44012002	A a ka, n n Zaan danyɩ Zakkɩ bɩ zɛ kargʋ m.
44012003	K'a dɩga a zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ heer nyɔɔ mim naa do ma bɩ, a a ya, an a ka, ŋnɩ Pɩyɛɛr nyasʋ. Nyɩnta a ʋ, bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma cibsa dɔmɩm ʋ.
44012004	K'a a ka, ŋn'a nyasʋ, ŋn'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ bɩ, a a ka sʋrdaarɔ n dɔ ma gʋaa bueeresɔrdɩ, ŋn'a sinsim kʋ m si-si, k'a b'a dʋdɔ ka pakkɩ cenle kur gʋɔɔ lɛɛ.
44012005	Dɔmɩm kʋ Pɩyɛɛr nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ bɩ, sokʋma bɩ y'a tɔŋ ʋ kan Woso yaadarɛ kɩ kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ a minto.
44012006	N Pɩyɛɛr kʋsɩ baŋŋarɔ m hɩɩya. A dɔ k'a nɩ mɛm kʋ Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a bɔ bɩ, gum bɩ do ʋ, Pɩyɛɛr ɩ hinceem bam sʋrdaa hɩɩya bire ʋ, sʋrdaarɔ nɩ dɔm lɔnnɔcɛ bɩ lɛ ma.
44012007	Lɛɛm bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka sʋr zɛ, lɛɛgure n cɛ bɩ han haay. Malɛɛka bɩ n Pɩyɛɛr zɛ pa-pa a boon ma, an a gu, a ʋ: "Wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ!" Baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ n a hʋnhʋr Pɩyɛɛr wɔrɔ wɔɔ ma.
44012008	Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ hɔsoaʋ bɩ sa, ɩ so ɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ kʋsɔrɔ wɔɔ da ʋ!" A n a ba maam. Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ zaba bɩ sa, ɩ da ɩ ra, k'ɩ zu mɔɔ ʋ!"
44012009	Pɩyɛɛr n bɔ, an zu a jɛ ʋ. B'a n a dɔ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ malɛɛka b'a ba bɩ, sɩra nɩ y, a ɩ dɩgam ma a ʋ makra awɔɔ yɩ.
44012010	Ŋ n lɛɛ ka, ŋnɩ cem lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛ bɩ han kan a dɔmazannɔ kɩ, ŋn'a ya, ŋnɩ cem a hɩɩya hɔ bɩ han, ŋn'a lee ku pɔyaa cɛlɛ k'a nya kʋ bɩ rɛ bɩ ma. A n a gʋ a zim ŋ lɛɛ. Kʋ ŋ bɔ garga ra bɩ, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'aa zada bɩ ku, lɛɛm bɩ, malɛɛka b'a gʋ Pɩyɛɛr ma.
44012011	Pɩyɛɛr hɔɔn n zer kɛɛrɛ. A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ. Sɩra m, Zuuba a malɛɛka nyɔɔ, an bɩ mɔɔ bɔ Hɩrɔɔdɩ wɔ ʋ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ kɩ, kan hɔ haay kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta k'a ba mɔɔ m bɩ kɩ."
44012012	K'a hɔɔn bɩ zer bɩ, a a hʋr, an ta Zaan kʋ n so ra, n n a tɔ ka Markɩ bɩ da Maarii har ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋta nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam.
44012013	K'a cɛlɛ bɩ zɛ bɩ, Zibəənyɩlʋ k'a tɔ m Rode bɩ bʋr k'a bɩ dɩga a.
44012014	A Pɩyɛɛr leer dɔ, kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, cɛlɛ bɩ gʋrɛ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ, an a wusigə an bra si, k'a yaa hɩ a ʋ, Pɩyɛɛr bʋr, an nɩ cɛlɛ ma.
44012015	Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ mim y'a wusigə ra?" A n gɔɔta, an n'a hɔ bɩ ra, a ʋ sɩra m. Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: A malɛɛka bɛɛ ra?
44012016	Pɩyɛɛr n gɔɔta, an nɩ cɛlɛ bɩ zɛm. Ŋ n kɔ ŋn'a gʋ, kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ n zɛ kədə.
44012017	A n meer ba a wɔ m, a ʋ, ŋnɩ zɛ pi. Hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba, an a bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ bɩ, a bɩ jɩsa an n'a dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, an b'a nyambʋr, a ʋ: "K'a ta, a yaa hɩ Zakkɩ m kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ." A n bɔ, an ta bɩncɛ vanta ʋ.
44012018	Dɔmɩrɛ ma bɩ, tatʋr gʋta nyɩnta ʋ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ. Ŋ n a dɔ kʋ Pɩyɛɛr a ba lɔ y?
44012019	Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a ka, ŋn'a ka ma, bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y. A n a ka, ŋnɩ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ lar, an lɛ ka a ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr a to Zidee ʋ, an ta Sezaree ʋ, an aa gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ.
44012020	Hɩrɔɔdɩ heer wuti kan Tiir zannɔ kɩ, Sidɔn zannɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ n a lɛ ba deem, ŋnɩ bʋr k'a b'a yɩ. Ŋ n gʋaasɩbabaa da cirhar dɩgamazaa Blastus ma, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ bʋr k'a bɩ kʋ ma. Bala, ŋ kʋ bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, bɔ a nawʋm cir bɩ kʋ b'ʋ.
44012021	Dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ ʋ bɩ k'a a ku bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a cirbəəhuu da a ra, an nyɩnta duu burə ʋ, an nɩ gʋtabaa meer bam kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ,
44012022	ŋn'ɩ zee dam Hɩrɔɔdɩ mim ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Woso leer n naa, gʋaa hɔ bɛɛ y!"
44012023	Lɛɛm bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka Hɩrɔɔdɩ zɛ, k'a n a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ bɩ minto. Mukuno n a bɩ, an ga.
44012024	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, Woso lemim y'a dam la, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ n n'a zum la.
44012025	Barnabas kan Sol kɩ kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, a zi bɩ ba an nya Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ ŋn'ɩ tam Antɩyɔs ʋ. Ŋ Zaan kʋ n so ra ŋn'a tɔ ka Markɩ bɩ gaa kan a kɩ, ŋnɩ ta m.
44013001	Sokʋma kʋ n y'a cɩnta Antɩyɔs ʋ bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ kan karɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ: Barnabas, Sɩmɩnyɔɔ kʋ n n'a birm Nizɛɛr bɩ kɩ, Sirɛnnɩ Lusiyus kɩ, kan cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ Antipas nyɩbaa zukuuzaa Manayɛn kɩ, Sol kɩ.
44013002	Hindeem ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa dam Zuuba m, ŋn'a lɛ kʋsɩm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a Barnabas kan Sol kɩ bɔ ʋ a hɔ, zibəə kʋ mɔɔ ŋ bir ma bɩ minto."
44013003	Kʋ ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩ, ŋnɩ yaa da ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a wɔ ka ŋ la, ŋnɩ ŋ da zaa ra.
44013004	Kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ŋ nyɔɔ bɩ, Barnabas kan Sol kɩ zer Selesii ʋ, ŋnɩ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ ta Siipɩr ʋ, kʋ m bɩ, hi m bɩr ma.
44013005	Kʋ ŋ lee ku Salamin ʋ bɩ, ŋ Woso lemim pa da zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ. Zaan nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ, an n'a darɛ ŋ han.
44013006	Kʋ ŋ y'a da tara kʋ hi bɩr ma haay bɩ zi, ŋnɩ lee ku Pafɔs ʋ bɩ, ŋ yaa nyɩsɩzaa deem zɛ ʋ. Ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazaa m, zɩɩfʋ m, ŋn'a birm Bar-Yeezuu.
44013007	A nyɩnta tara bɩ do lɛɛzaa Sɛrziyus Polus, k'a nyɩnta gʋaa hɔɔnzaa bɩ jɩrmazannɔ wɔɔ barla. Tara bɩ lɛɛzaa bɩ m Barnabas kan Sol kɩ bir, bala, a nyɩnta an a ŋʋa k'a Woso lemim bɩ ma.
44013008	Nyɩsɩzaa bɩ do kʋ n n'a birm Elimas, grɛkkɩ lemim bʋʋrɔzaa, bɩ n yɛ ŋ nɩ y, an n'a kam ma k'a a ka kʋ tara bɩ lɛɛzaa bɩ bɩ sɩra ka y.
44013009	Sol kʋ n n'a birm Pol bɩ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a han b'ɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ•••,
44013010	an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔɔn bʋnyaa ka, kan ŋʋaarbaa kɩ bɩ, Sʋtaana nyɩ ra, sɩra jɩm naa, ɩbɩɩ bɩ Zuuba zaa tɩrga bɩ zarlɛ tom na?
44013011	Ba Zuuba wɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ ra na: ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bam bʋʋ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ yarɛ ɩ woso gure yɩ y." Lɛɛm bɩ, monsigə kan gunuu kɩ a ku ra, an n'a bɩrm lɛɛ haay ʋ, an n'a kam gʋaa ma k'an a gaa.
44013012	Tara bɩ lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a a ba sɩrakarɛzaa, bala, Zuuba karɩnda bɩ gasʋ a hɔɔn ʋ paan•••.
44013013	Pol kan a zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a hʋr Pafɔs ʋ, ŋnɩ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Panfilii kʋ Pɛrzee ʋ. Bɩ, Zaan a gʋ ŋ ma, an a wusigə Zerizalɛm ʋ.
44013014	Ŋ n a hʋr Pɛrzee ʋ, ŋn'a zaa sa, ŋn'aa lee ku Pisidii Antɩyɔs ʋ. Ŋ n gasʋ sokʋmacɛ ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta.
44013015	Kʋ ŋ lɛrɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ ciro karɩnda ba, ŋn'a nya bɩ, sokʋmacɛ cinno wɔɔ a ka, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ ɩ dʋndɔ m k'a ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, zaa ta ʋ!"
44013016	Pol n wuti, an a wɔ busu, a ʋ: "Israyɛl zannɔ kan awɔɔ k'a nɩ nyi bam Woso m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma.
44013017	Wɔɔ do Israyɛl Woso bɩ wɔɔ zɩrɔ bɔ ʋ. Do k'a nyɩnta Eziptɩ ʋ bɩ, a a da ra gʋta, bɩ, kan a wɔ paŋŋa kɩ, a a ka ŋnɩ bɔ,
44013018	a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ poohɔɔn ʋ dɔɔraa busi nɔ ʋ.
44013019	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a do saanhɩna zɩnzɛ Kanaan kʋ ʋ, an a ka, ŋna so ŋ tararɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
44013020	A ga kʋ ʋ naa haay a ba kan dɔɔraa zɔrsi busoor kɩ. Bɩ kur bɩ, a dʋdɔkənno ka ŋ ʋ an ta, an wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Sanwɛl ku.
44013021	Ŋ n cir yɛ, Woso n Bɛnzamɛn do gʋaa Kis nyɩ Sol ka ŋ ʋ. A cirbəə bɩrɛ dɔɔraa busi ku.
44013022	Woso n wɔ saa bɩ ma, an Davɩd bɔ ʋ, an a ka ŋ ʋ k'an yɩ cir. A n a kasɛtɩ ka b'ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ Zesee nyɩ Davɩd yɩ, mɔɔ heer gʋaa m, an nɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa haay bɩ bam.'
44013023	Amba Woso k'a ler bɔ bɩ, a Yeezuu bɔ Davɩd do nɔ ʋ k'an yɩ Israyɛl bʋmbɔrɛzaa.
44013024	K'a n bʋr cɩna bɩ, Zaan lɛɛ ka an bɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ tore batɛm pa da Israyɛl zannɔ m haay.
44013025	Zaan zibəə k'a bʋr an nɩ nyam bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam a ʋ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ? Gʋaa k'awɔɔ nɩ dɔm ma bɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, gʋaa ɩ zɛm mɔɔ kur, bɩ mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʋsɔrɔ bar hʋr y."
44013026	"M danyɩnɔ, Abraham donyɩnɔ, kan bɔɔ nɩ nyi bam Woso m awɔɔ bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, bʋmbɔrɛ lemim naa do nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ wɔɔ minto.
44013027	Zerizalɛm zannɔ kan a cinno kɩ n Yeezuu dɔ y. Ŋ n wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lemim kʋ n n'a karɩnda bam sabaa biyəə hinni ʋ bɩ jɩ ma sɔ y. Bɩ, kʋ ŋ y'a nyasʋ, ŋn'a ka zɛ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a ka wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lemim bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
44013028	Kʋ ŋ n mim yɩ a gʋr zi an a ga zɛ m bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ Pɩlatɩ han k'an a ka kʋ n n'a zɛ gər.
44013029	Bɩ, kʋ ŋ hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba a minto bɩ ba an nya bɩ, gʋɔɔ a zer gɔ bɩ ma, ŋn'a da yaa ʋ.
44013030	Bɩ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.
44013031	Bɩ, a a hɩnka dɔmɩm gʋta nɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ Galilee ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, brɔɔ m kasɛtɩzannɔ kɛɛrɛ gʋɔɔ lɛɛ."
44013032	"Bɩ wɔɔ sɔ, lemim nyɩnta naa do, wɔɔ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m, lerbɔrɛ kʋ Woso a bɔ wɔɔ zɩrɔ m bɩ,
44013033	Woso a ba wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ minto, wɔɔ k'ʋ nɩ ŋ nyɩnɔ bɩ minto, a Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ amb'a n y'a gʋrsɩra ba laarɔ ci ʋ, laa hɩɩya hɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ m: Mɔɔ nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, her naa, mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ.
44013034	Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, k'a b'a da ma, an vɔn y, a mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ Davɩd hɔɔmɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ paan••• rɔ wɔɔ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
44013035	Bɩ minto y'a ka, an n'a hɩm lɛɛ vanta ʋ laarɔ ci ʋ: A b'a gʋaa mɩŋŋa bɩ tore, an vɔn y.
44013036	Bala, Davɩd k'a Woso zi bɩ ba a dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, a bɩ ga, ŋn'a bir a zɩrɔ zi, a mɛsim n vɔn.
44013037	Bɩ gʋaa kʋ Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ, a mɛsim n vɔn y.
44013038	M danyɩnɔ, k'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, gʋaa bɩ do minto y'a ka mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur pa n nɩ dam awɔɔ bire ʋ.
44013039	A mɩŋŋa minto, gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʋ bɩ, a y'a mimbʋnyaarɔ haay sugur yɩrɛ, bɩ lɛ kʋ Moyiisi a ka bɩ b'a dam ma an a ka awɔɔ ʋ y.
44013040	K'a dundo a zi, kʋ hɔsɩ bɩ ba awɔɔ m amba hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a hɩ bɩ nɩ y. Ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ:
44013041	K'a dɩga a, sɔ gʋɔɔ m zannɔ, k'a zɛ kədə, k'a nyaam! Mɔɔ zi bam awɔɔ dɔmɩm ʋ, zibəə m, awɔɔ n nɩ bɩsɩ kam ma, baa kʋ gʋaa a dɩnda awɔɔ m."
44013042	Pol kan Barnabas kɩ kʋ ŋ bʋr ŋn'ɩ bɔm bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ ŋ han gʋta, kʋ ŋ nɩ so minno nɔɔn duro ra sabaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ma.
44013043	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɩsɩga da bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋta kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Pol kan Barnabas kɩ da zaa ʋ. Sʋʋra kʋ ŋ n'a bam bɩ, ŋ yɩ ŋ dʋndɔm, kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta Woso barka nɔ ʋ.
44013044	Sabaa k'a nya ʋ bɩ k'a ku bɩ, tara bɩ zannɔ haay a zɛ kʋ ra k'a a tʋr ka Woso lemim ma.
44013045	Zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ gʋta ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, jɩmbaa ŋ heer han, ŋn'ɩ Pol meerbaarɔ wɔɔ nyɩ bʋmbɔŋ ʋ, ŋn'a sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ.
44013046	Pol kan Barnabas kɩ a heer ba kookoo, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ Woso lemim b'a ga m, an lɛɛ ka, an hɩ awɔɔ m! K'awɔɔ kaanm Woso lemim bɩ m bɩ, awɔɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ dʋdɔ yar kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ kɩ, a hɩnka a ʋ: awɔɔ lɛ baa k'a yɩ y. Kɛɛrɛ naa, ʋ wusigə wɔɔ nawʋm do vantɔɔ zi.
44013047	Bala, lɛ kʋ Zuuba a ka wɔɔ bɩ n naa: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʋ k'ɩ yɩ lɛɛgure do gʋta minto, k'ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ ganwʋrɛ bɩ sa, ɩ ta m durnya lɛ cɩnta jɩ ʋ."
44013048	Kʋ ŋ minno nɔɔn duro ma bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ, kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔm Zuuba Woso lemim ʋ. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ sɩra ka.
44013049	Zuuba lemim bɩ lee ku lɛɛ haay ʋ.
44013050	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ lannɔ tɔzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ paan••• rɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta kan tara gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ k'a fɩr ka Pol ma kan Barnabas kɩ, k'a la ŋ la, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔ a tara bɩ ra.
44013051	Brɔɔ n taanyisi gʋngʋ a gannɔ ma ŋ minto, ŋnɩ ta Ikonɩyɔm ʋ.
44013052	Kʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan heernyɔɔ kɩ ŋ heer han.
44014001	Ikonɩyɔm ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a ba am biisi hɔ bɩ m. Pol ta kan Barnabas kɩ, ŋn'aa gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ. Ŋ meerbaa b'a ka, gʋɔɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ nɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ n a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ.
44014002	Bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ n yɛ sɩrakarɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta, ŋ heer nɩ busum kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44014003	Pol kan Barnabas kɩ gɔɔta b'ʋ tee•••, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ Zuuba minto. Zuuba a kasɛtɩ ka ŋ ʋ. Bala, a mɩŋŋa yɩ ŋ meerbaa sɩra hɩnka, an a ka, ŋn'a da ma, ŋn'ɩ hoserlo bam kan makrarɔ kɩ.
44014004	Tara nɔ zannɔ wɔɔ n a jir lɛ hɩɩya: gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ kan kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44014005	Do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a cinno kɩ, lɛ sa k'a zibəə bʋnyaa ba kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m, k'a ŋ gʋngʋɛɛn jaarɔ m.
44014006	Kʋ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ k'a ba bɩ dɔ bɩ, ŋ y'a si, ŋnɩ ta Likawonii kʋrɔ ʋ, Listɩr kan Derbe kɩ, kan ŋ bɔlɛɛmarɔ kɩ.
44014007	B'ʋ sɔ bɩ, ŋ y'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ.
44014008	Listɩr kʋ gʋaa deem n ta ʋ, a b'a dam ma an jɩm a gannɔ ra y. Yɩ a ʋ lʋgɔbaa bɩ m, a n ta fɩɩgaa y.
44014009	Hindeem ʋ, an nyɩnta an n'a tʋr kam Pol meerbaa ma. Pol nɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ•••. K'a yɩ a nɩ sɩrakarɛ m k'a laafɩɩ yɩ bɩ,
44014010	a a hɩ kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ jɩm, ɩ gannɔ ra!" Gʋaa bɩ n wuti lɛ deem, an nɩ tam.
44014011	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ kʋ Pol a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a leer busu brama, ŋn'a hɩm Likawonii lemim m, ŋ ʋ: "Wosoro y'a ba gʋɔɔ, ŋnɩ zer wɔɔ bire ʋ."
44014012	Ŋ n'ɩ Barnabas birm 'Zes', ŋn'ɩ Pol birm 'Hermɛs', bala, a ɩ nyɩnta meerbaazaa.
44014013	Zes yaadarɛcɛ bɩ, pəŋŋə kʋ n y'a bɩr kʋ bɩ ma bɩ lɛ ma n ta ʋ. A mannɩbər b'a ka ŋnɩ ta ŋʋannɔ m, ŋnɩ lɛɛrɔ waa, ŋn'a dɩnda ŋ wer, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ kʋ bɩ lɛ ma. A n a zɛ kʋ ra kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a mannɩ ba.
44014014	Kristazibəəzannɔ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ kʋ ŋ mim naa do ma bɩ, ŋ heer a zar gʋta, ŋn'a huuro kɩnkaansʋm, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋn'ɩ tam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zi kan zee kɩ.
44014015	Ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ ra, bɔ awɔɔ n'a bam naa? Wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m sɔ am awɔɔ hɔ bɩ m! Lemim nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m naa, k'a wɔ saa hɔbaarɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ nɔɔn duro ma, k'a zu Woso k'an mɩsɩr, an brama da kan tara kɩ, higʋta kɩ kan hɔ haay k'an a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ b'ʋ.
44014016	Kʋ biisi bɩ nɩ, a do haay to, ŋn'ɩ zure a zaarɔ ʋ,
44014017	b'a hɔ mɩŋŋa ba awɔɔ m, bala, a lahi ka awɔɔ ʋ, kan mɔsa kɩ, a hɔbɩrɛ ka awɔɔ ʋ, an n'awɔɔ heer nyɔɔm."
44014018	Meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro bʋraama ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ. B'a n nyɩnta naanaa k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da jɩm ʋ kʋ ŋ bɩ mannɩ bɩ ba y.
44014019	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ y'a to Antɩyɔs ʋ kan Ikonɩyɔm kɩ, ŋnɩ bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta. Ŋ n Pol gʋngʋɛɛn jaarɔ m, ŋn'a gɩngaata, ŋnɩ bɔ m tara nɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dɩgam ma, ŋ ʋ, ga a ʋ.
44014020	Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ bɩr ma bɩ, a wuti, an gasʋ tara nɔ ʋ. Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a a hʋr kan Barnabas kɩ, ŋnɩ ta Derbe ʋ.
44014021	Kʋ ŋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da Derbe ʋ ŋnɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ yɩ gʋta bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ, ŋnɩ bɔ Listɩr ʋ, Ikonɩyɔm kan Pisidii Antɩyɔs kɩ ʋ.
44014022	Ŋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ heer yo, ŋnɩ ŋ dʋndɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta a sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga m, wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ gʋta, k'ʋ bɔkarɛ, ʋ gasʋ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ."
44014023	Ŋ lɛɛzannɔ bɔ ʋ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma biyəə nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ yaarɔ da ŋn'a lɛ kʋsɩ, ŋnɩ yaa da lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ da Zuuba kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ wɔ ʋ.
44014024	Ŋ bɔ Pisidii ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Panfilii ʋ,
44014025	ŋnɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da Pɛrzee ʋ, ŋnɩ cem, ŋnɩ ta Atalɩyaa ʋ.
44014026	Ŋ n a to b'ʋ, ŋnɩ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Antɩyɔs ʋ, tara niŋŋə kʋ ŋ y'a yɛ ʋ Woso han, k'a nɩ ŋ barka da ʋ zibəə kʋ ŋ y'a ba naa minto b'ʋ.
44014027	Kʋ ŋ lee ku bɩ, ŋ sokʋma bɩ bir, ŋnɩ hɔ haay kʋ Woso a da ŋ han ŋn'a ba bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, hɔ kʋ Woso a ba, do vantɔɔ ŋn'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ bɩ.
44014028	Ŋ maasɩrɛ ba b'ʋ kan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44015001	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a to Zidee ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ karɩnda ba danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'awɔɔ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ b'ʋ, a zu Moyiisi yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəə b'ʋ, awɔɔ bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y."
44015002	Mim naa do wuti bʋgʋr gʋta m kan bɩsɩkarɛ kɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kan Pol kɩ Barnabas kɩ bire ʋ. Danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a cɩnta kʋ Pol kan Barnabas kɩ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ n ta Zerizalɛm ʋ kʋ ŋ n'aa kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ yɩ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim naa do minto.
44015003	Antɩyɔs kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ n dɩga ŋ zaa sarɛ mim ma. Ŋ bɔ Fenisii ʋ kan Samarii kɩ, ŋn'ɩ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ heerlʋrlɛ mim dɩndam, b'a yɩ heernyɔɔ gʋta kan ʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay.
44015004	Kʋ ŋ lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, sokʋma a nya ŋ zi, an ŋ si, kristazibəəzannɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a da ŋ han ŋn'a ba bɩ sa, ŋn'a dɩnda ŋ nɩ.
44015005	Farizɛɛnrɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wuti ŋn'a hɩ ŋ ʋ, a a ga m kʋ ŋ nɩ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛ ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ zu Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
44015006	Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a so kʋ ma, k'a dɩga mim naa do ma.
44015007	Kʋ ŋ bɩsɩ bɩ ka tee••• bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr wuti an a hɩ, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, Woso mɔɔ bɔ ʋ awɔɔ bire ʋ, kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma mɔɔ lɛ m, kʋ ŋ n'a si.
44015008	Woso k'a heerlɔ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ, a kasɛtɩ ka ŋ ʋ, an Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ ka ŋ ʋ, amba a a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
44015009	Woso n ŋ gʋ wɔɔ ma poore tɔkkɛ y, sɩrakarɛ minto y'a ka an ŋ heerlɔ wɔɔ sʋrgɔ.
44015010	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, bɔ minto y'a ka, an nɩ Woso makra barɛ? A n nɩ mɔr gorezaa bɩ kam karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ra, bɩ wɔɔ zɩrɔ kan wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ n a da ma, ʋ n'a busure?
44015011	Bɩ, wɔɔ si wɔɔ ʋ, Zuuba Yeezuu barka minto y'a ka wɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, am ŋ hɔ bɩ m."
44015012	Ŋ haay n zɛ pi, ŋn'a tʋr kam Pol kan Barnabas kɩ ma, brɔɔ nɩ hoserlo kan makrarɔ kɩ kʋ Woso a ka ŋ nɩ ba haay do vantɔɔ kʋ ʋ bɩ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
44015013	Kʋ ŋ y'a nya bɩ, Zakkɩ meerbaa bɩ si, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, k'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma.
44015014	Sɩmɩnyɔɔ hɔ kʋ Woso a ba a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ, k'a dɩga a do ma, a bɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ tɔ da wɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
44015015	Bɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ yɛ bɩ ma sɔ, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ:
44015016	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ zɛm bɩ Davɩd har k'a a da bɩ banka m a dɔ, zeero kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ, m ŋ dɔ, m ŋ jɩm brama.
44015017	Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ n a ka Zuuba ma, kan do vantɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ mɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44015018	Zuuba ɩ naa hɩ, a y'a ka ŋnɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro dɔ biisi hɔɔ tee•••.
44015019	Bɩ minto y'a ka mɔɔ m hɔɔn da, mɔɔ ʋ, a n a ga m, wɔɔ n fɩr ka do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɛ Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ ma y.
44015020	Ʋ ci ba ŋ ma, ʋ a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ʋ ʋ, ŋ bɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩbarɛ sim sʋ y, ŋ bɩ jaan da y, ŋ bɩ hɔ gər sim sʋ, kan ma kɩ sɔ y.
44015021	Sɩra m, a dɔɔraa laatʋ, gʋɔɔ ɩ tara nɔ biyəə ʋ, ŋnɩ Moyiisi lɛrɔ karɩnda bam sabaa hinni haay ʋ ŋ sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ."
44015022	Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, sokʋma bɩ kɩ, a cɩnta k'a gʋɔɔ bɔ ʋ a barla a ŋ nyɔɔ kan Pol kɩ Barnabas kɩ Antɩyɔs ʋ. Nyɩnta a ʋ Ziidi kʋ n n'a birm Barsabas, kan Silas kɩ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋ nɩ daʋrɛ m danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ.
44015023	Ŋ n ci naa do ka ŋ ʋ: "Kristazibəəzannɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, ʋ danyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ a danyɩnɔ do vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Antɩyɔs ʋ kan Siirii kɩ, Silisii kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m.
44015024	Wɔɔ ma ŋ ʋ, wɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ b'awɔɔ wʋnwar kʋ ma, ŋn'awɔɔ heer zar, ŋnɩ dabɔʋ da awɔɔ ma kan a meerbaarɔ kɩ, bɩ wɔɔ n ŋ nyɔɔ y.
44015025	Wɔɔ ʋ lɛ ba deem, ʋ a cɩnta k'ʋ gʋɔɔ bɔ ʋ, ʋ ŋ nyɔɔ kan ʋ gʋaasɩbɔɔ paan•••rɔ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ.
44015026	Gʋɔɔ m, ŋn'a mɩsɩrbaa ka zɛ ma, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
44015027	Bɩ minto y'a ka, wɔɔ n nɩ Ziidi kan Silas kɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ ma, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ minno nɔɔn duro hɩ awɔɔ m a lɛ m.
44015028	Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ ʋ hɔɔn da, ʋ ʋ, a n a ga m, k'ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ mɔr gorezaa vanta ka awɔɔ ra, kʋ mim pakrarɔ nɔɔn duro bɛɛ y:
44015029	A bɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩbarɛ sim sʋ y, kan ma kɩ, hɔɔ gəəro kɩ, b'a bɩ jaan da sɔ y. K'awɔɔ zu naa haay ʋ, awɔɔ ba mɩŋŋa. Woso y'a darɛ a han."
44015030	Gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a leer so, ŋn'a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta Antɩyɔs ʋ, ŋn'aa gʋɔɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, ŋnɩ ci bɩ ka ŋ ʋ.
44015031	Ci bɩ karɩnda bɩ barɛ ŋ heer nyɔɔ, kʋ ŋ dʋndɔrɛ ncɩnaaʋ yɩ bɩ minto.
44015032	Ziidi kan Silas kɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ, ŋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ dʋndɔ kan meerbaarɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ paŋŋa da ra.
44015033	Ŋ gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm poore, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n bɩ zaa ka ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ ta gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ zi.
44015035	Kʋ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ nɩ, ŋ gɔɔta Antɩyɔs ʋ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ, ŋn'ɩ Zuuba lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam kan gʋɔɔ gʋta kɩ sɔ.
44015036	K'a yɩ poore bɩ kur bɩ, Pol a hɩ Barnabas m, a ʋ: "Ʋ ʋ wusigə, ʋ aa dɩga ʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma kʋ biyəə kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba lemim nyɩnta pa da ʋ b'ʋ. K'ʋ dɩga a kʋ ŋ y'a bam lɔ gɛ."
44015037	Barnabas n a ŋʋa k'a Zaan kʋ n n'a birm Markɩ bɩ gaa a ta m.
44015038	Bɩ, Pol n yɛ k'a gaa y, bala, a nyɩnta an nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ, an a gʋ ŋ ma Panfilii ʋ, a n a ya, an zi ba kan ŋ kɩ y.
44015039	Ŋ bɩsɩ ka kan kʋ kɩ maam-maam, bɩsɩ bɩ n bɩ ŋ gʋngʋ kʋ ma gʋaa biyəə n ta a lɛ, a lɛ. Barnabas Markɩ gaa, an da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ an ta Siipɩr ʋ.
44015040	Pol n Silas gaa, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n yaa da, kʋ Zuuba n a barka ka ŋ ʋ. Ŋ n cem.
44015041	Pol bɔ Siirii kan Silisii kɩ kʋrɔ ʋ, an nɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa dam la.
44016001	Pol kan Silas kɩ ta ŋn'aa lee ku Derbe ʋ, ŋnɩ cem ŋnɩ ta Listɩr ʋ. Karɩndanyɩ deem n nɩ b'ʋ, a tɔ m Timote, a da bɩ zɩɩfʋ m, an a ba sɩrakarɛzaa, a zɩ bɩ grɛkkɩ m.
44016002	A danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Listɩr ʋ kan Ikonɩyɔm kɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a lɛ bɔrɛ a tɔ ʋ.
44016003	Pol n a ŋʋa k'a gaa. A n a gaa, an a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto, bala, ŋ haay a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, a zɩ bɩ grɛkkɩ m.
44016004	Tara nɔ rɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ yɩ lɛrɔ kʋ Zerizalɛm kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋn'a yɛrɛ ŋ han kʋ ŋ nɩ zu ŋ ʋ mɩŋŋa.
44016005	Kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa n'a dam la, ŋ lɛ n'a dam la dɔmɩm biyəə.
44016006	Pol kan Silas kɩ bɔ Frizii ʋ kan Galasii kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ta ŋ nɩ tolle, kʋ ŋ bɩ lemim bɩ pa da Azii ʋ y.
44016007	Kʋ ŋ lee ku Mizii jireyaa ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a ŋʋa k'a ta Bitinii ʋ, bɩ, Yeezuu Ɛspri bɩ ŋ da jɩm ʋ.
44016008	Ŋ n cem, ŋnɩ bra Mizii ʋ, ŋn'aa lee ku Trowas ʋ.
44016009	Gum deem ʋ, Pol Woso hɔhɩnkarɛ yɩ: Masedʋan gʋaa deem y'a hɩnka m, an jɩm brama, an n'a wɔ zɩnzɛm nɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋr Masedʋan ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da wɔɔ han!"
44016010	Pol hɔhɩnkarɛ bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'ʋ ta Masedʋan ʋ, bala, wɔɔ si wɔɔ ʋ Woso n nɩ wɔɔ birm kʋ aa lemim nyɩnta pa da b'ʋ.
44016011	Da kʋ wɔɔ ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ Trowas ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ta tɩrga kan Samotrasɩ kɩ. A dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ ta Neyapolis ʋ.
44016012	Ʋ ʋ to b'ʋ, ʋ ta Filipii ʋ, ʋ gam ma, Masedʋan kʋrɔ haay tara nɔ gʋta m bɩ. A gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a so a mɩŋŋa ʋ am Rɔm zannɔ paan•••rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. Wɔɔ dɔmɩm poore ba tara nɔ bɩ do ʋ.
44016013	Sabaa hinni ʋ, wɔɔ bɔ tara nɔ ʋ, ʋ ta bɔrkɔ lɛ ra. Bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ hɔɔn da, ʋ ʋ, yaadarɛ bɩncɛ nyɩntam b'ʋ. Kʋ wɔɔ nyɩnta bɩ, wɔɔ Yeezuu mim dɩnda kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so kʋ ma b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44016014	Ŋ gʋaa deem k'a tɔ m Lidii, garhuuro hɛɛrɛzaa m, bɩ nyɩnta, an n'a tʋr kam wɔɔ ma. Tɩyatɩɩr kʋ nyɩ m, an nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ. Zuuba a heer gʋ k'an bʋr a ma, an a tʋr ka Pol meerbaa bɩ ma.
44016015	K'a batɛm si bɩ, a mɩŋŋa kan a har gʋɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a a yɛ wɔɔ han, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ zum Zuuba ʋ, k'a bʋr, a bɩ wʋta mɔɔ har ʋ." A n ma wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ n kɔ ʋ yɛ.
44016016	Hindeem ʋ, wɔɔ nɩ tam yaadarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, lʋpoo n bɩ wɔɔ zɛ ʋ, lɔ m, bʋʋrɔzaa m. A wɔ bɩ kure ɩ busoo karɛ a zuubɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
44016017	A n nɩ zum wɔɔ jɛ ʋ, Pol kan wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ zee darɛ, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro Woso k'a lɛ da haay zibəənyɩnɔ m. Bʋmbɔrɛ zaa ŋ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m."
44016018	A ba a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ dɔmɩm gʋta nɔ ʋ. Pol n bɩ kɔ, an a bɔ, an a hɩ zinə bɩ m, a ʋ: "Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, mɔɔ lɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ: bɔ lʋ naa do mɛ ʋ!" Lɛɛm bɩ, a bɔ a mɛ ʋ.
44016019	A zuubɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ a busoo bɩ yɩrɛ n a zɛ ra bɩ, ŋ Pol nyasʋ kan Silas kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ gɩngaata, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ daasɩ ʋ, jɩtannɔ taa.
44016020	Brɔɔ n ŋ gaa, ŋn'aa ŋ hɩnka dʋdɔkənno m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ wɔɔ kʋ naa nyankʋrɛ. Zɩɩfʋrɔ m.
44016021	Ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a bɩr zum wɔɔ Rɔm zannɔ lɛrɔ ʋ bɩ dɩndam."
44016022	Zamaa n wuti nyaa m kan Pol rɔ kɩ. Dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ n lɛ ka, ŋnɩ ŋ huuro bʋmbɔ ŋ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ zɛ madɩɩrɔ m.
44016023	Ŋ zɛ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ gʋta bɩ, ŋ bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Ŋ n lɛ ka lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa b'ʋ kan dɩga ŋ ma mɩŋŋa.
44016024	Gʋaa kʋ ŋ lɛ naa do ka ʋ bɩ, a yɩ ŋ du cɛnɔzaa b'ʋ, an ŋ da gɔ ʋ.
44016025	Dibsir k'a da bɩ, Pol kan Silas kɩ ɩ yaa dam, ŋn'ɩ Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ laa lɔm, lɔnnɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma.
44016026	Tara n nyiŋŋə lɛ deem, a nyiŋŋəre bɩ paŋŋa n cɛ jɩr bɩ yinyi. Cɛ bɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay n gʋngʋ lɛɛm, lɔnnɔ wɔɔ haay baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ n sur pəŋŋə bɩ ma.
44016027	Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n wuti hinceem ma, a lɔnnɔcɛ lɛrɔ wɔɔ yɩ ŋn'ɩ gʋm, a hɔɔn ʋ bɩ lɔnnɔ wɔɔ a si ŋ y'a ʋ. A n a kargʋ gaa ʋ, k'a a mɩŋŋa zɛ m.
44016028	Pol n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ hɔsɩ ba ɩ mɩŋŋa nɩ y. Wɔɔ haay ta ʋ."
44016029	Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n sɛ yɛ, an bra si, an gasʋ, an aa sʋnta Pol kan Silas kɩ taa mɛhinkə m.
44016030	A n ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ garga ra, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ ra, mɔɔ y'a bam lɔ kʋ m bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ?"
44016031	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Sɩra ka Zuuba Yeezuu ʋ, ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm, ɩbɩɩ kan ɩ har gʋɔɔ kɩ."
44016032	Ŋ n Zuuba lemim bɩ dɩnda m, kan gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44016033	Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n ŋ gaa gunuu ʋ b'ʋ lɛɛm, k'a yaa ŋ nyinno sʋrgɔ. Wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ sɔ bɩ, a batɛm si kan a har gʋɔɔ kɩ haay.
44016034	A n ŋ gaa, an ta ŋ nɩ a cɛ ʋ, an hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ, an n'a heer nyɔɔm kan a har gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a sɩra ka Woso ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
44016035	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ a dɔmazannɔ nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'aa a hɩ lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ m, kan wɔ saa gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma.
44016036	Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n mim naa do hɩ Pol m, a ʋ: "Dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ nyɔɔ da, ŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa awɔɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'a bɔ a doo kan laafɩɩ kɩ."
44016037	Bɩ Pol a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ŋ y'a ka, ŋnɩ wɔɔ zɛ zamaa bire ʋ, bɩ ŋ n wɔɔ dʋdɔ ka y, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ n Rɔm zannɔ, ŋn'a ka, ŋnɩ wɔɔ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a ŋʋam k'a a kʋna, a wɔɔ bɔ. Bɩ bɩ kʋ yɩrɛ y. Ŋ n bʋr a zim, ŋnɩ bɩ wɔɔ bɔ."
44016038	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a wusigə, ŋn'aa naa haay hɩ dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ m, nyibəə n gasʋ ŋ ʋ, kʋ y'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ Rɔm zannɔ n a mɩ bɩ minto.
44016039	Ŋ n bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ sugur yɛ ŋ han, ŋnɩ ŋ bɔ, ŋn'a yɛ ŋ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔ tara bɩ nɔ ʋ.
44016040	Kʋ ŋ bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, Pol kan Silas kɩ ta, ŋn'aa Lidii yɩ, ŋnɩ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ yɩ ŋnɩ ŋ heer ba kookoo, ŋnɩ cem.
44017001	Ŋ bɔ Anfipolis ʋ kan Apolonii kɩ, ŋn'aa lee ku Tesaloniki ʋ. Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ sokʋmacɛ n nɩ b'ʋ.
44017002	Amb'a tɩr a ba biisi bɩ, Pol ta, an aa ŋ yɩ, an sʋʋra ba kan ŋ kɩ sabaa hinni ʋ, an a ta kʋ rɛ gallɛm kaakʋ, an nɩ Wosoci bɩ
44017003	bɔrɛ ŋ nɩ kʋ zi, a ʋ Krista a ga m, an fɩr yɩ, an ga, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ. A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Krista kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m bɩ, Yeezuu m."
44017004	Zɩɩfʋrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɛ, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra kan Pol kɩ Silas kɩ, kan grɛkkɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ gʋta, kan lannɔ tɔzannɔ kɩ gʋta.
44017005	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wuti kan jɩmbaa heerbusu kɩ, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ gaa zaa bire ʋ, ŋn'a ka tara bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n yar, ŋnɩ taranɔ bɩ nya kʋ rɛ. Ŋ n ta Zasɔn har ʋ, ŋn'a kam Pol ma kan Silas kɩ, k'a ŋ gaa a ta ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ taa.
44017006	Kʋ ŋ n ŋ yɩ bɩ, ŋ Zasɔn gaa kan danyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ dʋdɔkənno taa, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ durnya bɩ dam, ŋnɩ cem ŋnɩ bʋr naa ʋ kɛɛrɛ,
44017007	Zasɔn n ŋ si a har ʋ. Ŋ haay kaanm Rɔm cir lɛ m, ŋ ʋ, cir vanta n ta ʋ, a tɔ m Yeezuu."
44017008	Zeero nɔɔn duro gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da bɔ ʋ, kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ,
44017009	ŋnɩ busoo si Zasɔn kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ han, ŋn'a cɩnta, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa ŋ ma.
44017010	Lɛɛm bɩ, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ka Pol kan Silas kɩ n cem kan Beree kʋ kɩ gunuu ʋ. Kʋ ŋ lee ku bɩ, ŋ ta zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ.
44017011	Zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋa, an lɛ da Tesaloniki zannɔ wɔɔ ra. Ŋ lemim bɩ si kan a heer kɩ haay. Dɔmɩm haay, ŋ yɩ dɩgam Wosoci b'ʋ, k'a dɩga a hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩm bɩ sɩra m gɛ.
44017012	Gʋta a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ ŋ bire ʋ kan grɛkkɩ lannɔ tɔzannɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔyaarɔ kɩ gʋta.
44017013	Tesaloniki zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ, Pol ɩ Beree ʋ an nɩ Woso lemim pa dam bɩ, ŋ lee ku b'ʋ, k'a a ya, a gʋɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta.
44017014	Danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a ba zɔɔ, ŋnɩ Pol da zaa ra an ta kan higʋta bɩ lɛ ra kɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, Silas kan Timote kɩ gɔɔta b'ʋ.
44017015	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Pol da zaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a gaa ŋnɩ ta m Atɛnnɩ ʋ, ŋn'a wusigə kan Pol lɛ kɩ, kʋ Silas kan Timote kɩ n a jɩ sa zɔɔ-zɔɔ.
44017016	Pol k'a nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma Atɛnnɩ ʋ bɩ, a heer a zar kan wosobaawɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ minto.
44017017	A n gasʋ sokʋmacɛ deem ʋ, an nɩ meer bam kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, dɔmɩm haay daasɩrɔ ʋ, a y'a bam kan gʋaa haay k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ kɩ.
44017018	Hɔɔnkamazannɔ, Epikiriyɛɛnrɔ kan Stoyisɛɛnrɔ kɩ, nyɩnta b'ʋ ŋn'ɩ sʋʋra bam kan kɩ. Gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Para-paradarɛzaa naa do ʋ lɔ?" Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: "Wosoro daarɔ an nɩ ŋ pa darɛ!" Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Pol ɩ Yeezuu pa dam, kan a mɩmbɔʋrɛ kɩ.
44017019	Ŋ n a nyasʋ k'a ta m ci kʋ n n'a birm Arewopaazɩ bɩ mim ʋ. Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ karɩnda daa k'ɩbɩɩ n'a bam naa jɩ dɩnda wɔɔ n na?
44017020	Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ minno daarɔ dɩndam wɔɔ m, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʋ ŋ jɩ dɔ."
44017021	Atɛnnɩ zannɔ wɔɔ kan saanarɔ kɩ bɩr hɔsɩ bam, kʋ minno daarɔ dɩndarɛ kan a tʋr ka ma kɩ bɛɛ y.
44017022	Pol n jɩm brama Arewopaazɩ ʋ b'ʋ, a ʋ: "Atɛnnɩ zannɔ, dɩga kʋ mɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ ma naa, sɩrakarɛzannɔ gʋtɔɔ n'awɔɔ m.
44017023	Kʋ mɔɔ m da awɔɔ kʋ bɩ zi bɩ, hɔ haay k'a n'awɔɔ yaadarɛ mɔr bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ. Mɔɔ yɩ, n n a gʋrsɩra ba mannɩduu niŋŋə ma ncɩnaaʋ: 'Woso kʋ gʋaa n a dɔ minto.' Hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a daŋ ʋ, b'awɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ bʋr kʋ m b'a pa da awɔɔ m naa.
44017024	Woso k'a durnya da, kan hɔ haay k'a n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ, a m brama kan tara kɩ Zuuba. A bɩr gasʋm wosocɛrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ a dɔ a wɔ m nɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y.
44017025	Hɔsɩ zibəə ba ma y. A bɩr a kam ma kʋ gʋaa n a da a han hɔ niŋŋə ma y. Bala, a n nɩ mɩsɩrbaa, hoonsi, kan hɔ haay kɩ kam gʋaa haay ʋ.
44017026	K'an gʋaa deem mɛ kɩ, a do haay da kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr tara burə lɛɛ haay ʋ. A dɔmɩnnɔ bɔ kʋ zi gʋɔɔ minto, kan ŋ tararɔ jirə kɩ,
44017027	kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a wɔ dɩnda, ŋn'a ka Woso ma, gɛɛ ŋ y'a yɩm gɛ, an bɔkarɛ a bɩ laatʋ wɔɔ gʋaa biyəə ma y.
44017028	Bala, A mɩŋŋa zi wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa n ta ʋ, ʋ nɩ tarɛ, ʋ nɩ meeyaa m. Amba awɔɔ gʋrsɩrabənno gɔsɩnnɔ a hɩ bɩ m: 'A dogʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m.'
44017029	Kʋ Woso dogʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ, wɔɔ n ʋ ga m, ʋ ʋ hɔɔn da, ʋ ʋ, Woso bɩ sarma nɩ, gɛɛ wanzurfu, gɛɛ jaa kʋ gʋaa a banka, an a bɔ ʋ a hɔɔn ʋ bɩ nɩ y.
44017030	Bɩ, Woso n a ya, an nɩ dɩgam dɔmɩm kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ badɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ ma y. A y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ kɛɛrɛ, kʋ ŋ haay n a bɔ a mimbʋnyaarɔ ʋ bɩncɛ haay ʋ.
44017031	A dɔmɩm deem bɔ ʋ, an a cɩnta, kʋ gʋaa k'a bɔ ʋ bɩ n bɩ durnya dʋdɔ ka kan sɩra kɩ. Bɩ, a a kasɛtɩ hɩnka gʋɔɔ haay m, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ."
44017032	Gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ mim kʋ ŋ b'a ma bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ yaa wʋm Pol ma, niŋŋoo n n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ mim naa do minto m, wɔɔ y'ʋ yarɛ, ʋ tʋr ka ɩbɩɩ ma dɔmɩm vanta ʋ."
44017033	A yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, Pol n a gʋ ŋ ma.
44017034	Gɔsɩnnɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ yɛ a meerbaa bɩ ma, ŋn'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ. Arewopaazɩzaa Denii nyɩnta ʋ, kan lʋ deem kʋ n n'a birm Damariisi bɩ kɩ, kan gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ sɔ.
44018001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Pol a hʋr Atɛnnɩ ʋ, an ta Korɛntɩ ʋ.
44018002	B'ʋ bɩ, a zɩɩfʋ deem zɛ ʋ, a tɔ m Akilas. Pɔn kʋ gʋaa m, an a to Italii ʋ lɛɛm an bʋr kan a lʋ Prisil kɩ. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, cir Kloodɩ lɛ ka, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ haay n bɔ Rɔm ʋ. Pol n kʋ ma kan ŋ kɩ,
44018003	bɩ, kʋ wɔzibəə deem ŋ n'a bam bɩ, (zappabaa m,) a zer ŋ har ʋ, ŋn'ɩ zi bɩ bam kan kʋ kɩ. Huucɛrɔ pɛɛrarɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ barɛ.
44018004	Sabaa hinni haay, a ɩ karɩnda dɩndam zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ, an n'a tɔŋ ʋ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ grɛkkɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a si.
44018005	Silas kan Timote kɩ kʋ ŋ y'a to Masedʋan ʋ, ŋnɩ lee ku bɩ, ŋ bɩ dɩga a Pol ɩ karɩnda bam, an n'a hɩm zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ Krista bɩ, Yeezuu m.
44018006	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bɩsɩ ka kan Pol kɩ, ŋnɩ meerbaa bʋnyaa ba. Pol n a huuro zɛ fər, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, a taar y'awɔɔ mim ʋ. Mɔɔ mim bɛɛ m bɩ dɔ y. Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ta mɔɔ nawʋm do vantɔɔ zi."
44018007	A n a hʋr bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, an ta gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Titiyus Zistus bɩ har ʋ. Woso daʋrɛzaa m, a har bɩ n jɩnjɛɛm sokʋmacɛ bɩ ma.
44018008	Krispus k'a m sokʋmacɛ bɩ cir b'a ba sɩrakarɛzaa kan a har gʋɔɔ kɩ haay. Korɛntɩ zannɔ gʋtɔɔ, kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam Pol ma rɔ wɔɔ, a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ sɔ, ŋnɩ batɛm si.
44018009	Gum deem ʋ, Zuuba a hɩ Pol m, a hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, ɩ bɩr a hɩm, ɩ bɩ zɛ pi y.
44018010	Kʋ sɩra nɩ, mɔɔ ɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ, an n'ɩbɩɩ nyasʋm k'a fɩr ka ɩ ma y, bala, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ ta ʋ gʋta tara naa do nɔ ʋ."
44018011	Pol dɔɔraa ba b'ʋ deem kan a kur kɩ, an nɩ Woso lemim dɩndarɛ ŋ bire ʋ.
44018012	Dɔmɩm kʋ Galɩyɔn nyɩnta ʋ Akayii tara lɛɛzaa bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a lɛ ba deem, ŋnɩ wuti jɩmbaa m kan Pol kɩ, ŋn'a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Galɩyɔn dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ:
44018013	"Gʋaa naa do, karɩnda an n'a bam gʋɔɔ m, a ʋ, gʋɔɔ n yaa da Woso m kan yaadarɛ k'a n a gaakʋmba kan wɔɔ lɛrɔ kɩ."
44018014	Pol ʋ k'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, Galɩyɔn n a nyɩ bɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ ra, kʋ zi niŋŋə a ba a bɩ tɩrga, gɛɛ zibəə bʋnyaa a ba, mɔɔ yɩ m tʋr karɛ awɔɔ ma, bala, a a yɔ.
44018015	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bɩsɩ bɩ karɛ bɩ, meerbaa m, gɛɛ tɔrɔ m, gɛɛ awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛrɔ m bɩ, pakra a ba awɔɔ m. Mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m nyɩnta minno nɔɔn duro dʋdɔkər y."
44018016	A n la ŋ la dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
44018017	Ŋ haay n Sɔstɛn, sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ nyasʋ, ŋn'a zɛ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, bɩ, Galɩyɔn n a war hɔbaa naa do ma y.
44018018	Pol a ya, an maasɩrɛ ba Korɛntɩ ʋ. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a a gʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, an da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, k'a ta Siirii ʋ. Akilas kan Prisil kɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ. Pol a mim zɩnzɛra Sɛnkrɛs ʋ, bala, a ler bɔ Woso m.
44018019	Ŋ lee ku Efɛɛzɩ ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, Pol a gʋ a zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ ma. A ta, an aa gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ bɩsɩ kam kan ŋ kɩ.
44018020	Brɔɔ n a yɛ han kan a dɔmɩm bɩ zu ra, an a gu,
44018021	an a gʋ ŋ ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zɛm bɩ bʋr awɔɔ zi dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʋ, kʋ Woso yɛ." A n da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, Efɛɛzɩ ʋ.
44018022	K'a lee ku Sezaree ʋ an bɔ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a cem an ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, an aa yaa da danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, an cem an ta Antɩyɔs ʋ,
44018023	an aa maasɩrɛ ba b'ʋ poore. A n cem, an ta Galasii kan Frizii kɩ gʋrgarɔ haay ʋ, an nɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay heer bam kookoo.
44018024	Zɩɩfʋ deem kʋ n n'a birm Apolɔs, an yɩ Alɛsandrii ʋ bɩ lee ku Efɛɛzɩ ʋ. Hɔɔn zaa m, an mim dɔ. A n Wosoci bɩ dɔ sɔ.
44018025	Zuuba zaa b'a dɩnda zʋr-zʋr, a y'a pa darɛ kan a heer kɩ haay, an nɩ karɩnda dɩndam gʋɔɔ m, an nɩ hɔ haay k'a ba Yeezuu minto bɩ dɩndam, an nɩ zure a zaa ʋ. Bɩ, batɛm kʋ Zaan nyɩnta an a kam b'a dɔ bala.
44018026	A n nɩ meer bam kan wɩsɩrabaa kɩ sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Prisil kan Akilas kɩ kʋ ŋ y'a meerbaa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ Woso zaa bɩ dɩnda m zʋr-zʋr, ŋn'a paŋŋa da ra.
44018027	K'a nyɩnta, an n'a ŋʋam k'a ta Akayii ʋ bɩ, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ: A a ga m. Ŋ n ci ba karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, kʋ ŋ n'a si mɩŋŋa. K'a lee ku b'ʋ bɩ, a daahan gʋta ka gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso barka minto ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
44018028	Bala, a meerbaa bɩ paŋŋa bʋr zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ ra gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, a ɩ Wosoci bɩ jɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ sɩrɩɩ-sɩrɩɩ, a ʋ: Krista bɩ, Yeezuu m.
44019001	Dɔmɩm kʋ Apolɔs nyɩnta ʋ Korɛntɩ ʋ bɩ, Pol bɔ kʋ bɩ gʋrgarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cigaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an ta Efɛɛzɩ ʋ, an karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ b'ʋ,
44019002	an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ bɩ, awɔɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri si ra?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n Sɛnt-Ɛspri mim ma cɩna y."
44019003	Pol n laaka da, a ʋ: "Batɛm kara awɔɔ si kɛɛrɛ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Zaan batɛm bɩ m."
44019004	Pol n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zaan nyɩnta, an nɩ heerlʋrlɛ batɛm kam, an n'a hɩm gʋɔɔ m kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr awɔɔ jɛ ʋ b'ʋ. A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Yeezuu."
44019005	Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ batɛm si Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma.
44019006	Pol n a wɔrɔ ka ŋ la, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer ŋ la, ŋn'ɩ meer bam leminno vantɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ Woso lɛ si ŋn'ɩ som la.
44019007	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ a zɔ bueerehɩɩya ma.
44019008	Pol tɩr ta sokʋmacɛ ʋ, an bɩr Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩndam kan wɩsɩrabaa kɩ, an ta an mom kaakʋ ku. Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam nɔ wɔɔ n a si sɩra.
44019009	Gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ heer ka, ŋ bɩr yɛm k'a si bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu zaa bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋm gʋɔɔ bire ʋ. Pol n bɔ ŋ bire ʋ, an karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gaa a hɔ, an ta ŋ nɩ Tiranɔsɩ karɩndacɛ ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ dɔmɩm haay.
44019010	A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ an ta, an dɔɔraa hɩɩya ku, bɩ minto y'a ka Azii zannɔ, zɩɩfʋrɔ, kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ n a ku, ŋnɩ Zuuba lemim bɩ ma.
44019011	Woso n nɩ hoserlo kʋ ŋ lɔɔ ba ʋ bam kan Pol kɩ.
44019012	Baa kʋ n pɛɛra gɛɛ huu a nɔ a mɛ ma, n a nɔ yaabazannɔ ma, ŋ yɩ laafɩɩ yɩrɛ, zinəro wɔɔ nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ mɛ ʋ.
44019013	Zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔ n ta ʋ ŋnɩ bɩmbɩrm, ŋn'a dam ma, ŋn'ɩ lam zinəro ra. Hindeem ʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋa k'a la zinəro ra gʋɔɔ mɛ ʋ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ m. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m Yeezuu kʋ Pol n n'a pa dam bɩ tɔ ma, k'a bɔ!"
44019014	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ deem kʋ n n'a birm Seva b'ɩ nyɩnɔ m saanhɩna, ŋn'ɩ zibəə naa do barɛ.
44019015	Zinə n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Yeezuu dɔ, kʋ nka m Pol m, mɔɔ dɔ. B'awɔɔ, nkɔɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ?"
44019016	Gʋaa kʋ zinə n a mɛ ʋ bɩ n der ŋ ma haay, an a da ŋ ma, an fɩr ka ŋ ma, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋnɩ bɔ har ʋ b'ʋ dɩgɩ, kan nyinno kɩ.
44019017	Efɛɛzɩ kʋ jilli, zɩɩfʋrɔ kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ haay mim naa do ma. Nyibəə n gasʋ ŋ haay ʋ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ʋ.
44019018	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, gʋta bʋr, ŋn'a leer busu brama, ŋn'a minno bɔrɛ a lɛ ma.
44019019	Gʋɔɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ gɔɔta, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa ka wɔkure ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a ciro wɔɔ gʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ ŋ so kʋ ra, ŋnɩ sɛ nya ŋ ʋ, gʋaa haay taa. Ciro wɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a busoo lɛ zɛ bɩ, a wanzurfu busoo ma waa busoor.
44019020	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kan Zuuba paŋŋa kɩ, lemim bɩ nɩ tam lɛɛ, a paŋŋa n'a dam la.
44019021	Minno nɔɔn duro kʋ ŋ cem bɩ, Pol a cɩnta a hɔɔn ʋ, k'a bɔ Masedʋan ʋ kan Akayii kɩ ʋ, a ta Zerizalɛm ʋ. A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a lee ku b'ʋ, k'a cem a ta Rɔm ʋ."
44019022	A a daahanzannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ Timote kan Erastɩ kɩ nyɔɔ Masedʋan ʋ, a mɩŋŋa n gɔɔta Azii ʋ an maasɩrɛ ba poore.
44019023	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, nyaarɔ gʋtɔɔ bɩ wuti ŋnɩ ba Zuuba zaa bɩ minto.
44019024	Nyɔkka deem n nɩ b'ʋ a tɔ m Demetrus, an nɩ Artemis yaadarɛcɛ nyʋgɔrɔ bam wanzurfu m kan nyɔkkarɔ vantɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ busoo yɩm gʋta.
44019025	A nyɔkkarɔ wɔɔ duro so kʋ ma kan tar deem zibəəzannɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ wɔzibəə naa do nɩ hɔbɩrɛ kam wɔɔ ʋ.
44019026	B'awɔɔ yɩ, an n'a mam: Efɛɛzɩ nɔ bɛɛ m bala y, Azii ʋ haay Pol naa do n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ haay m, a ʋ, wosoro kʋ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ barɛ ʋ wɔ m nɔɔn duro, wosoro bɛɛ y. Gʋɔɔ gʋta ŋn'ɩ zure a hɔ b'ʋ.
44019027	Wɔɔ zibəə bɩ zarlɛ minto bɩ bɛɛ wɔɔ nɩ nyi bam nɩ bala y, wɔɔ wosolʋ gʋta Artemis cɛ bɩ bɔʋrɛ m. Bala, Artemis kʋ Azii zannɔ kan durnya naa haay kɩ n'a daŋ ʋ bɩ, a bɩ daʋrɛ yɩm dɔ y."
44019028	Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ heer busu, ŋnɩ zee da, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Efɛɛzɩ zannɔ Artemis n gʋta!"
44019029	Mim naa do a kərgu kʋnɔ bɩ haay ra, an a zɛ kʋ ma, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋnɩ ta sarbarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ Masedʋan zannɔ Gayus kan Aristarkɩ kɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ Pol zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ.
44019030	Pol n a cɩnta, k'a ta sokʋma bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ. Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a to an ta y.
44019031	Azii cinno gɔsɩnnɔ k'a gʋaasɩbɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ nyɔɔ da kʋ n n'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: a b'a ka a mim ma, a ʋ, ta a ʋ sarbarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ y.
44019032	Lɛɛ bɩ n a ba bʋrgʋ. Gʋaa biyəə n'a hɔɔnhɔ hɩm, tatʋr ŋ n'a bam bala, gʋɔɔ gʋta n a dɔ kʋ bɔ minto m, a a so kʋ ma y.
44019033	Gʋɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta sokʋma bɩ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ mim bɩ dɩnda Alɛsandɩr kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a bɔ ʋ n a ka lɛɛ bɩ m. Alɛsandɩr n a wɔ busu, k'a meer ba kan zamaa bɩ kɩ.
44019034	Kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ zɩɩfʋ m bɩ, ŋ haay a lɛ ba deem, ŋn'ɩ zee dam. Ŋ zee bɩ darɛ wakatɩ hɩɩya ku. Ŋ ʋ: "Efɛɛzɩ zannɔ Artemis n gʋta!"
44019035	Gʋrsɩrabər b'a gu an a da ma, an gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da bar ʋ, a ʋ: "Efɛɛzɩ zannɔ, gʋaa ta ʋ, a n a dɔ, a ʋ, Efɛɛzɩ kʋ zannɔ nɩ dɔm Artemis gʋta cɛ bɩ ma, kan a jaa k'a a to brama an a da bɩ kɩ ra?
44019036	Kʋ ŋ n bɩsɩ ka hɔ naa do ma bɩ, a a ga m, awɔɔ m bʋr a ma, a b'a ka, a ba zɔɔ-zɔɔ y.
44019037	Awɔɔ bʋr gʋɔɔ m naa ʋ, ŋ n mim zu ʋ wɔɔ wosolʋ bɩ ma y, ŋ n a sʋnsɔ wʋ sɔ y.
44019038	Kʋ Demetrus kan zibənno wɔɔ kɩ ɩ mim m kan gʋaa kɩ, dʋdɔkarɛ dɔmɩm ta ʋ. Taralɛɛzannɔ ta ʋ. K'a ta kʋ m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
44019039	Kʋ minno gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʋ kʋ kʋ bɩ gʋɔɔ a so kʋ ma, ŋ dɩgam minno wɔɔ duro ma.
44019040	Her naa, mim b'a da ma, an yɩ bʋnyaa kan wɔɔ kɩ. Bala, n y'a da ma, n nɩ mim ka wɔɔ ra sokʋma naa do minto. Sokʋma naa do jɩ ba ʋ y, kʋ n wɔɔ lar wɔɔ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩm ʋ a hɩ y."
44019041	Bɩ, naa k'a hɩ bɩ, a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra.
44020001	Bʋgʋr bɩ k'a b'a da bar ʋ bɩ, Pol karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, a nɩ ŋ dʋndɔ. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a a leer so ŋ nɩ, an Masedʋan zaa sa.
44020002	A a da a gʋrgarɔ zi, an danyɩnɔ wɔɔ dʋndɔ gʋta, an bɔkarɛ an lee ku Grɛsɩ ʋ,
44020003	an aa nyɩnta b'ʋ mom kaakʋ. Dɔmɩm k'a nɩ daŋ ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ k'a ta Siirii ʋ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ kʋ ma k'a nyasʋ bɩ, a a hɔɔn da, an a bɔ an bɔ Masedʋan ʋ.
44020004	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, Beree kʋ gʋaa Piirus nyɩ Sopatrɔs kan Tesaloniki kʋ gʋɔɔ Aristarkɩ kan Sekundus kɩ, Derbe kʋ gʋaa Gayus kɩ, kan Timote kɩ, kan Azii kʋ gʋɔɔ Tisikkɩ kɩ, Trofim kɩ sɔ.
44020005	Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro lɛɛ ka lɛɛ, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'ɩ dɔm wɔɔ ma Trowas ʋ.
44020006	Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ʋ hʋr Filipii ʋ, bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ kur, ʋ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ k'ʋ aa n ŋ ku. Dɔmɩm soor jɛ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ lee ku Trowas ʋ. Wɔɔ n gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm saanhɩna.
44020007	Hatʋ hinni ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra, k'ʋ bur zɩnzɛ ra. A dɔ k'a nɩ mɛm kʋ Pol n a hʋr bɩ, a meerbaa sa, an n'a bam kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, meerbaa bɩ maasɩrɛ ba, an ta an a zɔ dibsir zeezi ma.
44020008	Fɩtɩrɛrɔ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta cɛmim kaakʋ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ so kʋ ma ʋ b'ʋ.
44020009	Nyukumbueere deem k'a tɔ m Etikɩ bɩ nyɩnta cɛ bɩ tokoro lɛ ra, hinceem gʋta n a nyasʋ. Bɩ ma bɩ, Pol meerbaa bɩ n nya y. Hinceem bɩ k'a a nyasʋ gʋta bɩ, a bra cɛmim kaakʋ hɔ b'ʋ, an a da tara ʋ. Kʋ ŋ bʋr k'a b'a busu bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a a ga.
44020010	Pol n zer, an bra si an ta zi, an aa a busu a za ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. A mɩsɩr!"
44020011	Pol k'a a bɔ an der bɩ, a bur bɩ zɛ ra, an a bɩ. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a meerbaa bɩ maasɩrɛ ba an ta an wutigʋta ku. Bɩ kur bɩ, a cem.
44020012	Bɩ, nyukumbueere k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ doo m. B'a yɩ heernyɔɔ gʋta, ŋ haay minto.
44020013	Wɔɔ kɔɔlʋʋ sa, ʋ lɛɛ ka lɛɛ, k'ʋ aa zer Asɔs ʋ, kʋ aa Pol k'a zaa sa a gam ma bɩ zɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ʋ a busu, amba a cɩnta bɩ m.
44020014	K'a wɔɔ zɛ ʋ Asɔs ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ busu kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ k'ʋ ta Mitilɛnnɩ ʋ.
44020015	B'ʋ bɩ, dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, ʋ ʋ zɔ Kiyo ma. A dɔmɩm hɩɩya hinni ʋ, wɔɔ bɔ Samɔs ʋ, bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ jɩm poore Trogiliyɔn ʋ, ʋ cem, ʋ lee ku Milɛ ʋ.
44020016	Pol a cɩnta k'a bɩ jɩm Efɛɛzɩ ʋ y, k'a lɛ baa k'a maasɩrɛ ba Azii ʋ bɩ minto. Nyɩnta a ʋ, an n'a bam zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'a a da ma, k'a lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ, Pantɩkɔtɩ dɔmɩm bɩ minto.
44020017	Pol a to Milɛ ʋ, an Efɛɛzɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ bir.
44020018	Kʋ ŋ b'a zɛ ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa kʋ mɔɔ ba dɔmɩm haay, mɔɔ leekure sɩŋŋɩda ʋ Azii ʋ bɩ dɔ.
44020019	Mɔɔ Zuuba zi ba kan mɩŋŋa zerle kɩ, kan nyifeer kɩ, kan fɩryɩrɛ do haay kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ a cɩnta k'a mɔɔ nyasʋ, a mɔɔ zɛ bɩ kɩ.
44020020	Mɔɔ n hɔsɩ k'a zibəə m ta awɔɔ ma bɩ nyaakʋm da awɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta pa da, m hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m gʋɔɔ bire ʋ, amba harlɔ ʋ.
44020021	Mɔɔ kasɛtɩ ka, m zɩɩfʋrɔ kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ bir, kʋ ŋ n'a bɔ a taam ŋnɩ zu Woso ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu ʋ.
44020022	Bɩ naa ma bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri mɔɔ ba a lɔ, kʋ m zaa sa, m ta Zerizalɛm ʋ. Mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ bɔ n n'aa ba mɔɔ m b'ʋ y.
44020023	Kan bɩ kɩ haay, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ mɔɔ m, kʋ haay kʋ mɔɔ nɩ bɔŋ ʋ, a ʋ, baŋŋarɔ kan fɩryɩrɛ kɩ ɩ dɔm mɔɔ ma.
44020024	Bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr kɔm sɩ ma, m mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa minto y. Mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, kʋ m zu m zaa ʋ mɩŋŋa, kan zibəə kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ. Kʋ m Woso barka lemim nyɩnta bɩ kasɛtɩ ka."
44020025	"Mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa kɛɛrɛ, mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ meer yɩ y, awɔɔ haay, awɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ bɔ, m Woso cirbəə pa da a m nɔ wɔɔ.
44020026	Mɔɔ m da ma, m a hɩ awɔɔ taa her: Awɔɔ gɔsɩ taar ba mɔɔ mim ʋ y.
44020027	Mɔɔ n hɔsɩ nyaakʋm da awɔɔ m fɩɩga y. A n lɛ da bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ kʋ Woso a cɩnta haay k'a ba bɩ hɩ awɔɔ m.
44020028	Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a dundo a mɩŋŋɔɔ zi, kan bakʋ bɩ haay kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri awɔɔ ba a dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a nyɩnta Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma k'a cɩnta kan a mɩŋŋa ma kɩ bɩ dundonno.
44020029	Mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hʋrlɛ jɛ ʋ, poojino bʋnyaarɔ gasʋrɛ awɔɔ zi, ŋnɩ bakʋ bɩ zar.
44020030	Baa gʋɔɔ bɔrɛ awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ barla, ŋnɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn lʋr kan meerbaa bʋnyaarɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ da a tar la.
44020031	Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a dundo a zi, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: Dɔɔraa kaakʋ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə dʋndɔ gunuu ʋ kan a sinuu ʋ kɩ, m nyifeer nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ n mɛnyɔɔ da y.
44020032	Bɩ naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ awɔɔ ka Woso ʋ kan a meerbaa barka k'a paŋŋa n ta ʋ, an n'a dam ma, an awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ da ra, k'a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ hɔjirle nɔ ʋ.
44020033	Mɔɔ hɔɔn n a ka gɔsɩ wanzurfu zi, gɛɛ sarma, gɛɛ huu y.
44020034	Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a dɔ a ʋ, m wɔ naa mɔɔ zi ba m, m a yɩ, an a ga mɔɔ m kan m zukuuzannɔ kɩ.
44020035	Mɔɔ hɔ haay hɩnka awɔɔ m, k'ɩ zi ba ncɩnaaʋ, ɩ hɔ yɩrɛ, ɩ ɩ dam paŋŋawarzannɔ han, k'a Zuuba Yeezuu minno k'a ŋ hɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ sɔ: Hɔ ka gʋaa ʋ jɩra gʋaa n'a ka ɩ ʋ m."
44020036	K'a minno nɔɔn duro hɩ bɩ, a sʋnta kan ŋ kɩ haay an yaa da.
44020037	Ŋ haay n zɛ nyi da ʋ, ŋn'a burgu Pol wer ma.
44020038	K'a hɩ, a ʋ, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ meer yɩ bɩ, yɩ ŋ heer zar an lɛ da. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, ŋnɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, ŋn'aa a da zaa ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ jir ʋ.
44021001	Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ gʋ ŋ ma bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ʋ ta tɩrga kan Kɔɔs kɩ. Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ ta Rodɛs ʋ, ʋ ʋ to b'ʋ, ʋ ta Pataraa ʋ.
44021002	Kʋ wɔɔ kɔɔlʋʋ yɩ an nɩ tam Fenisii ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ da ʋ, ʋ cem.
44021003	Kʋ wɔɔ ta, ʋ n'ʋ zɔm Siipɩr ma bɩ, wɔɔ da, ʋ jɩsa ʋ, ʋ ta Siirii ʋ, ʋ aa zer Tiir ʋ bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n'a mɔr bɩ zerŋ ʋ b'ʋ.
44021004	Wɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm saanhɩna, bala, wɔɔ sʋr karɩndanyɩnɔ ma b'ʋ. Kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ, brɔɔ a hɩ Pol m, ŋ ʋ, a bɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ y.
44021005	Wɔɔ cenle dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ wusigə. K'ʋ wɔɔ nɩ tam bɩ, ŋ haay wɔɔ da zaa ʋ, lannɔ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bɔ tara nɔ b'ʋ. Wɔɔ n sʋnta hi bɩ lɛ ra, ʋ yaa da.
44021006	Ʋ ʋ leer so kʋ m kɛɛrɛ, ʋ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'a wusigə, ŋnɩ doo.
44021007	Kʋ wɔɔ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ sa Tiir ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ yaa lee ku Potolemayiisi ʋ. Kʋ wɔɔ yaa da danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ʋ a nya bɩ, wɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʋ kan ŋ kɩ dɔmɩm deem.
44021008	A dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ hʋr, ʋ ta Sezaree ʋ, ʋ aa zer lemim nyɩnta padarɛzaa Filipi har ʋ. Saanhɩnarɔ kʋ n nyɩnta n nɩ ŋ bɔ ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem m. Wɔɔ n gɔɔta kan kɩ b'ʋ.
44021009	A nyɩmbɔnnɔ si, ŋ n yar dɔ y. Ŋ n'ɩ wosolɛ sire ŋn'ɩ som la.
44021010	Kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʋ an maasɩrɛ ba bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem bɩ lee ku, Zidee kʋ gʋaa m, a tɔ m Agabus.
44021011	K'a bɩ wɔɔ yɩ bɩ, a Pol hɔsoaʋ bɩ sa, an a gannɔ sur m kan a wɔrɔ kɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm bɩ ba n nɩ. Ba hɔ kʋ n n'a bam hɔsoaʋ naa do zaa bɩ m Zerizalɛm ʋ na: Zɩɩfʋrɔ y'a nyasʋm, ŋn'a sur, ŋn'a da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ!"
44021012	Wɔɔ kan kʋ bɩ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ yɛ Pol han k'a bɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ b'ʋ y.
44021013	A n a nyɩ bɔ wɔɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto awɔɔ nɩ nyi karɛ, an nɩ mɔɔ heer zarlɛ? Mɔɔ surle bɛɛ mɔɔ yɛ ma bala y. Baa kʋ garɛ m Zerizalɛm ʋ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma, mɔɔ yɛ."
44021014	K'a bɩr yɛm kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋr a la bɩ, wɔɔ n yɛ, ʋ ta mim bɩ m laatʋ y, ʋ n n'a hɩrɛ, ʋ ʋ: "Kʋ Zuuba hɔɔnhɔ n ba!"
44021015	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nyarɛ ma bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ banka ʋ nya bɩ, wɔɔ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ.
44021016	Sezaree karɩndanyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tam k'a yaa wɔɔ da zaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ta wɔɔ m ʋ aa zer Siipɩr gʋaa Mɩnasɔɔn har ʋ. Karɩndanyɩ m, a dɔmɩm laatʋ.
44021017	Kʋ wɔɔ lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ wɔɔ si kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
44021018	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Pol ta kan wɔɔ kɩ Zakkɩ har ʋ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta ŋn'a so kʋ ma ʋ sɔ.
44021019	Pol k'a yaa da ŋ nɩ bɩ, a hɔ haay kʋ Woso a ka, an a ba do vantɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ jɩ sa deem-deem, an n'a dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
44021020	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam Pol ma rɔ wɔɔ, y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋn'a hɩm nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ danyɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ tisi-tisi a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ, bɩ ŋ haay lɛrɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.
44021021	Bɩ, ŋ y'a ma ŋn'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩndam, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ dɩndam zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ do vantɔɔ bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ nɩ wɔ saa Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma, kʋ ŋ b'a ya, ŋn'a nyɩnɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ y, kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩnnɩbayɩ bɩ to.
44021022	Kʋ a ba lɔ? Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a marɛ, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ bʋr.
44021023	Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m bɩ ba. Wɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔyaarɔ m si, ŋnɩ ler bɔ Woso m.
44021024	Ŋ gaa, ɩ dintim gʋ ɩ ma kan ŋ kɩ, k'ɩ da ŋ han kan busoo kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a lerbɔrɛ nyambʋr m, ŋn'a a da ma, ŋn'a mim bɔ. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋaa haay y'a dɔrɛ ŋ ʋ, hɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a ma ɩbɩɩ minto bɩ, ŋʋaar m, b'ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa ɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ɩ nɩ ŋ sim mɩŋŋa.
44021025	Kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ cɩnta bɩ ci ba ŋ ma: 'Ŋ bɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩbarɛ sim sʋ y, kan ma kɩ, kan hɔ gər sim kɩ, bɩ ŋ bɩ jaan da y.' "
44021026	Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Pol gʋɔɔ wɔɔ gaa, an dintim gʋ a ma sɩŋŋɩda sa hɔdeem kan ŋ kɩ. A n ta Wosocɛ ʋ, k'a dintim gʋ a ma bɩ nyarɛ dɔmɩm cɩnta, k'an yɩ hindeem ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yaa ler bɔ Woso m nɔ wɔɔ ganwʋrɛ karɛ kɩ.
44021027	Kʋ dɔmɩm saanhɩna b'a zɔ nyarɛ ma bɩ, Azii zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ka a hɔɔn zi ŋn'a yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ, ŋnɩ Pol nyasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
44021028	Ŋ n'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Israyɛl zannɔ, k'a bʋr a da wɔɔ han! Ba gʋaa k'a bɩmbɩr lɛɛ haay ʋ, an n'a dɩndam zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ, ŋn'ɩ kaanm a do m kan lɛrɔ kɩ, Wosocɛ naa do kɩ bɩ n na. A bɔɔla m, an gasʋ grɛkkɩrɔ m Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ dintim kam bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa naa do ma ncɩnaaʋ."
44021029	Bala, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋnɩ Efɛɛzɩ kʋ gʋaa Trofim yɩ tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ kan Pol kɩ. Ŋ n'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʋ Pol bɩ, a gaa a ʋ, an gasʋ m Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
44021030	Tara bɩ n yar jilli, gʋɔɔ n bra si, ŋnɩ bʋr yuu•••. Ŋ n Pol nyasʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ m Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ tɩnta lɛɛm.
44021031	Ŋ n'a kam ma k'a zɛ gər, sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n mim naa do ma, ŋ ʋ: "Zerizalɛm haay a zɛ kʋ ma."
44021032	A n sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ bir lɛɛm, an ŋ so kʋ ma kan sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an a ka ŋnɩ la gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ra ŋnɩ bɔ. Kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ yɩ kan a sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ Pol zɛrɛ to.
44021033	Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a zɔ, an Pol nyasʋ, an lɛ ka, a ʋ, ŋn'a sur baŋŋa m hɩɩya. A n a lar a ʋ, kʋ nka n'awɔɔ m, bɩ, kʋ bɔ a ba sɔ.
44021034	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, gʋaa biyəə nɩ zee darɛ, ŋ bɩr mim zaa deem hɩrɛ y. Kʋ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ bɩr hɔsɩ jɩ mam paan••• bʋgʋr bɩ minto bɩ, a lɛ ka a ʋ, ŋnɩ Pol gaa ŋnɩ ta m sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ b'ʋ.
44021035	Kʋ Pol yaa lee ku derlɛ bɩncɛ bɩ ra bɩ, sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ a busu, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tɔŋ ʋ k'a ku bɩ minto.
44021036	Bala, zamaa bɩ haay ɩ zure a jɛ ʋ kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a zɛ gər."
44021037	Dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ ʋ, k'a gasʋ m sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ bɩ, Pol a hɩ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n da ma, m meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ ra?" Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ grɛkkɩ lemim mam na?
44021038	Ɩbɩɩ bɛɛ m Eziptɩ gʋaa niŋŋə k'a gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ zannɔ gaa dɔmɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ cem dɩɩtaa-dɩɩtaa rɔ nɔɔn nɔ ʋ, gʋaa tisi si, ɩ ta ŋ nɩ poohɔɔn ʋ bɩ ra?" Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ gɛɛ? Zɩɩfʋ n mɔɔ m, m to mɔɔ ʋ Silisii kʋ Tarsɩ ʋ. Tara gʋta nyɩ n mɔɔ m.
44021039	K'ɩ sugur ba, ɩ zaa ka m ʋ, kʋ m meer ba kan zamaa bɩ kɩ."
44021040	A n zaa ka ʋ, Pol n wuti an jɩm brama zerjɩ bɩ ra, an a wɔ busu zamaa bɩ m, ŋnɩ zɛ sɩɩ•••, an meerbaa bɩ sa ebree lemim m, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
44022001	"M danyɩnɔ, kan m zɩrɔ kɩ, k'a tʋr ka, kʋ m m gumə mim dɩnda awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ."
44022002	Kʋ ŋ Pol ma an ebree lemim sa k'a hɩ bɩ, ŋ bʋgʋr bɩ to haay.
44022003	"Zɩɩfʋ n mɔɔ m, yɩ mɔɔ Silisii kʋ Tarsɩ ʋ, bɩ tʋr mɔɔ ʋ naa ʋ, tara naa do nɔ ʋ. Gamalɩyɛl ɩ wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɩnda mɔɔ m zʋr-zʋr. Mɔɔ nyɩnta m Woso zuure nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, amba awɔɔ haay m her naa m.
44022004	Mɔɔ nyɩnta, m fɩr ka gʋɔɔ ma karɩnda naa do zuure ma, m gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛ, m gɔsɩnnɔ sur, m ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, lannɔ kan yaarɔ kɩ.
44022005	Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kan do bɩ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a da ma, ŋn'a kasɛtɩ ka. Ciro mɔɔ ŋ si ŋ han wɔɔ danyɩnɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Damas ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto. Bɩ mɔɔ ɩ tam Damas ʋ, kʋ m aa sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ sur, m bʋr ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ fɩr ka ŋ ma.
44022006	Mɔɔ m zaa sa, m nɩ tarɛ, m m zɔ Damas ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, sinuu zeezi, lɛɛgure gʋta n a to brama an b'a ku mɔɔ ra.
44022007	Mɔɔ n m do tara ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ leer marɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Sol, Sol, bɔ minto ɩ nɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma?'
44022008	Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, Zuuba?' Leer bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ nɩ fɩr karɛ m ma.'
44022009	Mɔɔ zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ lɛɛgure bɩ yɩ mɩŋŋa, bɩ ŋ bɩr leer k'a nɩ meer bam kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ marɛ y.
44022010	Mɔɔ n laaka da: 'Bɔ mɔɔ m ga m, m a ba Zuuba?' Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ mɔɔ nʋ, a ʋ: 'Wuti, ɩ ta Damas ʋ. K'ɩ lee ku b'ʋ, hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ ba bɩ, n y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m deem-deem.'
44022011	Bɩ, kʋ lɛɛgure naa do mɔɔ mɩm bɩ ta bɩ, mɔɔ zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ a wɔ dɔ mɔɔ rɛ, mɔɔ n lee ku Damas ʋ.
44022012	Gʋaa niŋŋə n nɩ b'ʋ, a tɔ m Ananɩyas. A nyɩnta gʋaa mɩŋŋa, an nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ sim mɩŋŋa, zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ.
44022013	A n bʋr, an bɩ mɔɔ yɩ, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'M danyɩ Sol, k'ɩ mɩm n lɛɛ yɩ!' Lɛɛm bɩ, mɔɔ mɩm a gʋ, m a yɩ.
44022014	A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'Wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso ɩ bɔ ʋ, k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ dɔ, k'ɩ Gʋaa tɩrga bɩ yɩ, k'ɩ mɩŋŋa lɛ meerbaa ma.
44022015	Sɩra m, ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ bɩr kasɛtɩzaa a minto gʋaa haay taa kan hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ, ɩ ma sɔ bɩ kɩ.
44022016	Bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ sɩnsɩm karɛ? Aya! Wuti ɩ batɛm si, k'ɩ tɔ bir, ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ dintim gʋ ɩ ma.'
44022017	Kʋ mɔɔ m wusigə Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, hindeem ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ yaa dam Wosocɛ ʋ,
