44022018	mɔɔ n Zuuba yɩ hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'A ba zɔɔ, ɩ ɩ hʋr Zerizalɛm ʋ, bala, ŋ bɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a kam bɩ sire y.'
44022019	Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Zuuba, ŋ y'a dɔ mɩŋŋa, ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta, m nɩ tam sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, m nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gʋrm, m a ka, ŋn'ɩ ŋ dum lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ ŋ zɛm madɩɩrɔ m.
44022020	Ɩbɩɩ kasɛtɩzaa Etɩyɛnnɩ ma k'a bra tara ra bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa nyɩnta b'ʋ sɔ, m m zɛ kʋ ra kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a zɛm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, m dɔ ŋ huuro ma.'
44022021	A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'Ta, ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋm do vantɔɔ kʋrɔ ʋ.' "
44022022	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka Pol ma, an ta an meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ku bɩ, ŋ wuti, ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ: "K'a gʋaa ncɩnaaʋ bɩ bɔ durnya ʋ! A n a ga m, an bɩr mɩsɩr y."
44022023	Kʋ ŋ nɩ zee dam bɩ, ŋ y'a huuro bɔ a ra, ŋnɩ taa gʋr, ŋn'a nyɔɔm brama,
44022024	sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n lɛ ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋ Pol m, sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ b'ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ, k'a laaka da han a dɔ, kʋ bɔ minto m zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nɩ zee darɛ awɔɔ ma gɛ.
44022025	Kʋ ŋ n'a bankam k'a Pol wʋta k'a zɛ bɩ, a a hɩ sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa k'a nɩ zibəə ʋ b'ʋ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa kʋ ŋ n'a dʋdɔ ka bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m a zɛ madɩr m na?"
44022026	Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa k'a naa ma bɩ, a ta an aa hɩ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ ba naa? Gʋaa bɩ, Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa m!"
44022027	Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a bɔ, an bɩ Pol lar, a ʋ: "Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa n'ɩbɩɩ m paan••• ra, k'ɩ hɩ m m?" Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••"
44022028	Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ busoo bɔ gʋta kʋ m bɔkarɛ, m m ba Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa." Pol n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ naa, yɩ mɔɔ a nɔ ʋ."
44022029	Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta k'a Pol zɛ rɔ wɔɔ a to. Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a a dɔ a ʋ, Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa m Pol m, awɔɔ n a sur bɩ, dabɔʋ a nyasʋ.
44022030	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a lɛ n taa k'a a dɔ paan••• kʋ bɔ minto m, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nɩ mim kam Pol ra bɩ, a a ka, ŋnɩ baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ ma. A n a ka, ŋnɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bir kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ, an ŋ so kʋ ma, an a ka Pol n bʋr ŋ taa.
44023001	Pol n dɩga dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ ma sɩɩ•••, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ba kan noom fu kɩ Woso mɩm ʋ, an ta, an her naa ku."
44023002	Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Ananɩyas lɛ ka a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a jɩr ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ a lɛ ma. Pol n a hɩ m, a ʋ:
44023003	"Ɩbɩɩ Woso n n'ɩ zɛm, noonkundəzaa ra! Nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ ʋ naa ʋ, ɩ zu lɛrɔ ʋ, k'ɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ ka, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ kaanm lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, ɩ lɛ ka kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ zɛ ra?"
44023004	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n həən si ma, ŋ ʋ: "Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ b'ɩbɩɩ n'a sʋnsɔ wʋm naa ra?" Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ:
44023005	"Mɔɔ n a dɔ mɔɔ ʋ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ nɩ y, m danyɩnɔ. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'Ɩ b'ɩ do cir sʋnsɔ wʋ y.' "
44023006	Pol k'a b'a dɔ, a ʋ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sadisɛɛnrɔ m kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ bɩ, a a leer busu brama dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ bire ʋ, a ʋ: "Farizɛn m mɔɔ m, m danyɩnɔ, farizɛɛnrɔ nyɩ m mɔɔ m. Kʋ mɔɔ si mɔɔ ʋ gəəno y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ bɩ y'a ka ŋn'ɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ kam."
44023007	K'a meer naa do ba an a nya bɩ, nyaa wuti farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Zamaa bɩ n a gʋngʋ.
44023008	Sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ y, malɛɛka ba ʋ, nyi ba ʋ sɔ y. Farizɛɛnrɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a sim, ŋ ʋ, ŋ ta ʋ.
44023009	Bʋgʋr paan••• nyɩnta ʋ. Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wuti farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ ŋnɩ meer ba kan heerbusu kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n gʋaa naa do kʋrɔ ma yɩ y. Kʋ nyi ɩ meer ba kan kɩ, gɛɛ malɛɛka, wɔɔ n a dɔ y."
44023010	Kʋ nyaa bɩ nɩ paŋŋa yɩm bɩ, sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa b'ɩ nyi bam, ŋ y'a Pol kɩnkaansʋ. A lɛ ka kʋ gʋɔɔ n a bɔ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ ta m sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ b'ʋ.
44023011	Gunuu bɩ do ʋ, Zuuba a hɩnka Pol m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ, amba ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ ka Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam Rɔm ʋ maam sɔ."
44023012	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a dɩnda ŋn'a zɛ kan kʋ kɩ, ŋn'a wer si k'a bɩ hɔ bɩ, a hɔ mi k'a n Pol zɛ gər y.
44023013	Kutim-kutim naa do nɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛ lɛ da busi ra, ŋn'a wer bɩ si.
44023014	Ŋ n ta, ŋn'aa wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ yɩ kan jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ʋ wer si, ʋ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n Pol zɛ gər y, wɔɔ bɩ hɔ bɩrɛ y.
44023015	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ, k'a kʋ yɩ, k'a hɩ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ m k'an a gaa, an a ka a ʋ, ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ lɛ n taa k'a b'a banka a lar. Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n n'a bam, ʋ a ku, ʋ a zɛ b'a n lee ku bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ bɩ dɔ."
44023016	Pol danlʋ nyɩ n minno nɔɔn duro ma. A n ta sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ, an aa gasʋ, an a hɩ Pol m.
44023017	Pol n sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa deem bir, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Nyukumbueere naa gaa, ɩ ta m sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ zi, a lɛ n taa k'a meer ba kan kɩ."
44023018	Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ n a gaa, an ta m sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ zi, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Lɔ Pol b'ɩ mɔɔ bir, an a yɛ mɔɔ han, kʋ m nyukumbueere naa do gaa, m bʋr m ɩbɩɩ zi. A lɛ n taa k'a meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ."
44023019	Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a gaa a wɔ ma, an bɔ m toore ma, an a lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ hɩ mɔɔ nɩ?" Nyukumbueere bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ:
44023020	"Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a dɩnda ŋn'a zɛ kan kʋ kɩ, k'a yɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ Pol gaa ɩ bʋrm booti m dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ taa, ɩ ʋ, ŋ lɛ n taa k'a banka a lar a mim bɩ jɩ ma mɩŋŋa k'a a dɔ.
44023021	Ɩ bɩ ŋ meerbaa bɩ si y. Ŋ lɛ dam gʋaa busi ra, ŋnɩ kunku ma. Ŋ y'a wer si k'a bɩ hɔsɩ bɩ, a bɩ hi mi k'awɔɔ n Pol zɛ gər y. Ŋ y'a banka, ŋnɩ nya, ŋn'ɩ dɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zaakarɛ ma."
44023022	Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n nyukumbueere bɩ da zaa ra, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ hɔ naa do hɩ mɔɔ nɩ y."
44023023	Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzannɔ bir hɩɩya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a a banka, k'a ta Sezaree ʋ yirbəə wakatɩ nɛɛhʋ ma, sʋrdaarɔ zɔɔhɩra, siirozannɔ busaanhɩna, kannɩzannɔ zɔɔhɩra.
44023024	K'a siiro banka, kʋ Pol n da ŋ ʋ an lee ku kan laafɩɩ kɩ tara lɛɛzaa Feligsi zi."
44023025	A n ci ba, an a hɩ ncɩnaaʋ:
44023026	"Mɔɔ Klodiyus Liziyas nɩ yaa dam tara lɛɛzaa mɩŋŋa Feligsi m.
44023027	Zɩɩfʋrɔ ɩ gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi naa nyasʋ ŋn'a ŋʋam k'a zɛ. Kʋ mɔɔ b'a ma ŋ ʋ Rɔm gʋaa m bɩ, mɔɔ ta kan m sʋrdaarɔ kɩ, m aa yɔ.
44023028	Kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m mim kʋ ŋ y'a ka ra bɩ dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ ka ŋnɩ ta m ŋ dʋdɔkənno taa.
44023029	Mɔɔ bɩ dɩga a, bɩsɩ ŋ n'a kam, a lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ mim ka ra. B'a n hɔsɩ ba, an a ga zɛ m, gɛɛ ŋn'a sur baŋŋarɔ nɩ y.
44023030	Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ma ŋ ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ ɩ dundom zi k'a zɛ bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi zɔɔ-zɔɔ. Mɔɔ hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim ka ra rɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi, ŋnɩ b'a gumə lemim hɩ."
44023031	Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n lɛ kʋ n y'a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ si, ŋnɩ Pol gaa, ŋnɩ ta m gunuu ʋ Antipatris ʋ.
44023032	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, kannɩzannɔ wɔɔ m Pol to siirozannɔ wɔɔ m, ŋn'a wusigə, ŋnɩ bʋr sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ b'ʋ.
44023033	Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku Sezaree ʋ bɩ, siirozannɔ wɔɔ ci bɩ ka tara lɛɛzaa b'ʋ, ŋnɩ Pol hɩnka m sɔ.
44023034	Tara lɛɛzaa bɩ n ci bɩ karɩnda ba, an laaka da kʋ Pol bɩ, a to a ʋ gʋrga kara ʋ gɛ. K'a a dɔ a ʋ, a to a ʋ Silisii ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʋ:
44023035	"Gʋɔɔ k'ʋ ŋ mim ka ɩbɩɩ ra bɩ, kʋ ŋ bʋr, mɔɔ yɩ m tʋr karɛ ɩbɩɩ meerbaa ma." A n lɛ ka, a ʋ, ŋnɩ dɔ ma naa ʋ, hargʋta kʋ Hɩrɔɔdɩ a dɔ b'ʋ.
44024001	Dɔmɩm soor jɛ ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Ananɩyas kan jɩtannɔ kɩ, meerbaa dɔrɛzaa deem Tɛrtulus kɩ bʋr. Ŋ n ta Pol mim bɩ m tara lɛɛzaa Feligsi taa.
44024002	Bɩ m Pol bir, Tɛrtulus n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ mim karɛ a lɛ m, a ʋ: "Feligsi mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ minto y'a ka wɔɔ n laafɩɩ yɩ gʋta, lʋnlʋrlɛrɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ba wɔɔ bire ʋ wɔɔ do naa minto, bɩ tɔ ma.
44024003	Dɔmɩm haay, lɛɛ haay ʋ, Feligsi mɩŋŋa, wɔɔ ɩ barka darɛ ɩbɩɩ m zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ nɔɔn duro minto.
44024004	Kʋ mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m ɩbɩɩ kɔ gʋta bɩ, meerbaa bɩ bɩ gʋta y. Meerbaa nyɩntam poore, bɩ mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, kʋ bamɩŋŋazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ tʋr kam ma kan bʋraama k'ɩbɩɩ n tam wɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ kɩ.
44024005	Wɔɔ yɩ gʋaa naa do, minzaa m. A nyaa zɛ an n'a dam durnya naa zɩɩfʋrɔ haay bire ʋ. Nazarɛtɩ gʋngʋrɛzannɔ wɔɔ karɩnda jɩtaarɛ deem m.
44024006	A a ŋʋa k'a wɔɔ Wosocɛ bɩ zar, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ n a nyasʋ. [
44024007	Wɔɔ ʋ kʋ a dʋdɔ ka, ʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ. Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa Liziyas n a ma, an b'a bɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ, an lɛ ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim ka ra rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi.]
44024008	Ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ lar ɩ zim: Ɩbɩɩ hɔ niŋŋə k'a ka wɔɔ nɩ mim kam la bɩ jɩ dɔm."
44024009	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n yo meerbaa naa do ra, ŋ ʋ, sɩra m.
44024010	Tara lɛɛzaa b'a wɔ busu, an zaa ka Pol ʋ, k'an meer ba. Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ so gʋrga naa do dʋdɔ karɛ ʋ a dɔɔraa laatʋ, mɔɔ heer nyɩnta sɔ, kʋ m m meer ba.
44024011	K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ laaka da. Ta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, a dɔmɩm n lɛ da bueerehɩɩya ra y, mɔɔ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ m aa yaa da.
44024012	Gɔsɩ n mɔɔ yɩ m nɩ bɩsɩ kam Wosocɛ ʋ kan gʋaa kɩ, gɛɛ, m nyaa zɛ m a da sokʋmacɛ ʋ, gɛɛ, lɛɛ vanta ʋ tara nɔ ʋ y.
44024013	Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ hɔsɩ yɩ ŋn'a ka mɔɔ ra, ŋ ʋ sɩra nɩ y.
44024014	Ba hɔ kʋ mɔɔ dɔ bɩ n na: Wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso zi mɔɔ n'a bam, m nɩ zum Zuuba Yeezuu zaa kʋ ŋ ʋ gʋngʋrɛzaa m b'ʋ. Kʋ zaa bɩ do nɩ, mɔɔ ɩ hɔ haay kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba lɛrɔ ci nɔ ʋ bɩ sim kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro kɩ.
44024015	Mɔɔ ta Woso taafeerle naa do m, mɔɔ ʋ: Gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ. Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ maam sɔ.
44024016	Bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ m tɔŋ ʋ dɔmɩm haay kʋ m bɩ mim zu ʋ Woso ma kan gʋɔɔ kɩ y. Bɩ, naa minto bɩ, dabɔʋ ba mɔɔ ma y.
44024017	Mɔɔ bɔrɛ dɔɔraa laatʋ, m m bɔ, m bʋr kɛɛrɛ, kʋ m bɩ daahan ka m dogʋɔɔ cicirzannɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɩ mannɩ ba sɔ.
44024018	Bɩ, ŋ bɩ mɔɔ yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, mɔɔ dintim gʋ m ma. Gʋaa cir n nyɩnta ʋ y, bɩ bʋgʋr n nyɩnta ʋ sɔ y,
44024019	kʋ Azii zɩɩfʋrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bɛɛ nyɩnta b'ʋ y. Brɔɔ y'a ga m, ŋn'a hɩnka ɩbɩɩ taa, ŋnɩ mim yɩ ŋn'a ka mɔɔ ra, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ba bɩ minto.
44024020	Gɛɛ k'a bɛɛ m bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a da ma, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ba, ŋnɩ ta mɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ taa bɩ hɩ.
44024021	Hɔ deem naa mɔɔ jɩm brama, m zee da, m a hɩ ŋ bire ʋ: Gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ minto y'a ka, ŋn'ɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ awɔɔ taa her."
44024022	Bala, Feligsi Zuuba Yeezuu zaa bɩ mim dɔ. N gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Kʋ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa Liziyas bɩ bʋr naa ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim bɩ dʋdɔ karɛ."
44024023	A n lɛ ka sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa b'ʋ, a ʋ, an dɔ Pol ma, b'a b'a du y. A b'a ta a gʋaasɩba sɩ m tolle, a nyasʋm minto y.
44024024	Dɔmɩm k'a cem poore bɩ, Feligsi nyɩnta kan Drusil a lʋ kʋ zɩɩfʋ m bɩ kɩ. A n a ka, ŋnɩ Pol bir k'an Krista sɩrakarɛ mim dɩnda a m.
44024025	Bɩ, Pol k'a nɩ meer bɩ bam an nɩ tam tɩrgabaa, bʋraama, dʋdɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ kɩ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, Feligsi da bɔ ʋ, an Pol meerbaa bɩ zɛ ra, a ʋ: "Naa ma bɩ, ɩ wusigə, ɩ ta ɩ bɩncɛ ʋ. Mɔɔ zɛm b'ɩ bir dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʋ."
44024026	Feligsi nyɩnta an n'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʋ, Pol busoo karɛ a ʋ. Bɩ y'a ka an tɩr nyɔɔ da, ŋn'aa bir hallɩ gallɛm gʋta k'a bɩ sʋʋra ba.
44024027	Dɔɔraa hɩɩya k'a cem bɩ, Pɔrsiyus Fɛstus ɩ Feligsi bɩncɛ sa. Feligsi k'a lɛ n taa k'a bɩr mɩŋŋa zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ, a Pol to lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
44025001	Bala, Fɛstus k'a lee ku a gʋrga ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a dɔmɩm kaakʋ kur bɩ, a a hʋr Sezaree ʋ, an ta Zerizalɛm ʋ.
44025002	B'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ bʋr k'a mim ka Pol ra a taa. Ŋ n a yɛ Fɛstus han, k'an sugur ba a m,
44025003	an zaa ka, kʋ n nɩ ta Pol m Zerizalɛm ʋ. Bala, ŋ y'a dɩnda, ŋn'a zɛ kan kʋ kɩ a minto, k'a bɩ daata zɛ ra, a ku a zɛ gər zaa ra.
44025004	Fɛstus n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ, Pol gɔɔtam Sezaree lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Bɩ, kan bɩ kɩ haay, k'a yɩ poore, a y'a bɔrɛ a ta b'ʋ.
44025005	"A a ya, an a hɩ a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa, awɔɔ bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋnɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ, k'ʋ ta Sezaree ʋ, kʋ hɔ niŋŋə ta an ta ʋ gʋaa naa do minto, kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋr ŋnɩ mim ka ra."
44025006	Fɛstus n maasɩrɛ ba ŋ bire ʋ y, a n lɛ da dɔmɩm sinnyə m gɛɛ bu nɩ y. K'a lee ku Sezaree ʋ bɩ, a dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a yaa nyɩnta a dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, an a ka n n bʋr Pol m.
44025007	Bɩ k'a lee ku b'ʋ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Zerizalɛm ʋ ŋnɩ bʋr lɔ wɔɔ bɩr ma, ŋnɩ ŋʋaar gʋta ba, ŋ n'a kam la kan minno gʋtɔɔ kɩ, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋn'a kasɛtɩ ka y.
44025008	Pol n a gumə mim hɩ sɔ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n mim zu ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ lɛrɔ ma, gɛɛ ŋ Wosocɛ, gɛɛ Rɔm cir ma y."
44025009	Kʋ Fɛstus lɛ n taa k'a bɩr mɩŋŋa kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ Pol m, "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ɩbɩɩ m Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ m aa ɩ dʋdɔ ka gɛɛ?"
44025010	Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Rɔm cir dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ mɔɔ n ta ʋ naa, naa ʋ ŋn'ɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ kaŋ ʋ. Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa a dɔ paan•••, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ n mim zu ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ ma y.
44025011	Kʋ mim mɔɔ zu ʋ paan•••, an a ga mɔɔ zɛ m, mɔɔ bɩ m bɔrɛ m kur y. Bɩ, kʋ minno kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro a ba, n n'a kam mɔɔ ra b'a jɩ ba ʋ rɔ nɔɔn nɩ, gʋaa ba lɛ m, an n'a dam ma, a n mɔɔ ka ŋ ʋ y. Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m ta Rɔm cir taa."
44025012	Fɛstus kʋ ma kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ an a hɩ Pol m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ yɛ k'ɩ ta Rɔm cir taa, ta ɩbɩɩ n nɩ zɛm b'a ʋ b'ʋ."
44025013	Dɔmɩm k'a cem poore bɩ, cir Agripaa kan a danlʋ Berenisi kɩ ta Sezaree ʋ, ŋnɩ ta k'a yaa yaa da Fɛstus m.
44025014	Kʋ ŋn'ɩ maasɩrɛ bam b'ʋ poore bɩ, Fɛstus Pol mim bɩ sa, an a dɩnda cir bɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa n nɩ naa ʋ, Feligsi n a to lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
44025015	Dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ ta ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ kɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ mim ka ra, ŋn'a zɛrɛ yɛrɛ.
44025016	Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, mɔɔ ʋ, Rɔm zannɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəə bɛɛ k'a gʋaa bɔ a ka kʋ ŋ n'a zɛ gər, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mim kam la rɔ wɔɔ ba ʋ, k'an aa a gumə mim dɩnda kan mim kʋ ŋ y'a ka ra bɩ kɩ y.
44025017	Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋnɩ bʋr naa ʋ, mɔɔ n m ya, m dɔ hɔsɩ ma y, a dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, mɔɔ n nyɩnta, m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, m a ka, ŋnɩ bʋr gʋaa bɩ m.
44025018	Kʋ ŋ bʋr dʋdɔ bɩ ma bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mim kam la rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n mim sɩ gurezaa yɩ, ŋn'a ka ra, amba mɔɔ m hɔɔn da ma bɩ nɩ y.
44025019	Ŋ Woso zaa zuure minnɔ m bala, kan gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Yeezuu k'a ga Pol n'a hɩm a ʋ, a mɩsɩr bɩ kɩ.
44025020	Kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a bam bɩ dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ yɛ han, k'a lɛ taa k'a ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ m aa mim bɩ dʋdɔ ka b'ʋ.
44025021	Bɩ kʋ Pol a hɩ a ʋ, a lɛ n taa k'a gɔɔta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ cir gʋta n n'a mim bɩ dʋdɔ kam ma bɩ ku bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔ ma, an ta, an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔŋ ʋ Rɔm cir zi bɩ ku."
44025022	Agripaa n a hɩ Fɛstus m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ n gʋaa naa do meerbaa ma sɔ." Fɛstus n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Booti m bala, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ tʋr karɛ a meerbaa ma."
44025023	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Agripaa kan Berenisi kɩ lee ku dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ kan cirbəə gʋta kɩ, sʋrdaarɔ jɩtannɔ yɩ ŋ da zaa ʋ kan tara bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ. Fɛstus n lɛ ka, ŋnɩ bʋr Pol m.
44025024	Fɛstus n meerbaa sa, a ʋ: "Cir Agripaa kan awɔɔ haay woo•••, k'a nɩ naa ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ gʋaa naa do yɩrɛ. Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ haay bɩ mɔɔ yɩ a minto Zerizalɛm ʋ, an ta an lee ku naa ʋ kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʋ, ŋ b'a ya, ŋn'a to mɩsɩr y.
44025025	Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ n zibəə bʋnyaa yɩ, an a ba, an a ga a zɛ nɩ y. Bɩ, k'a ʋ, k'a lee ku Rɔm cir zi bɩ, mɔɔ cɩnta, kʋ m a nyɔɔ b'ʋ.
44025026	Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ ba meerbaa m paan•••, kʋ m a gʋrsɩra ba cir gʋta ma k'an Pol mim bɩ dɔ bɩ, bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ n a ka, an bʋr awɔɔ taa, an lɛ da ɩbɩɩ taa naa ʋ cir Agripaa, kʋ wɔɔ lar, naa jɛ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔsɩ yɩrɛ, m a gʋrsɩra ba Rɔm cir ma.
44025027	Kʋ mɔɔ lɔ nyɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ, bɩ mɔɔ n a kʋrɔma k'an a mim ʋ bɩ yɩ, yarmabaa zibəə m."
44026001	Agripaa n a hɩ Pol m, a ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ k'ɩ meer ba kɛɛrɛ, ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ." Pol n a wɔ busu, an a gumə lemim hɩ, a ʋ:
44026002	"Mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ, cir Agripaa, kʋ mɔɔ zaa yɩ kʋ m meer ba ɩbɩɩ taa her, kʋ m m gumə mim dɩnda, mim haay kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ mɔɔ a ka wɔɔ ra bɩ minto.
44026003	Bala, ɩbɩɩ minkə ŋ bɩsɩkarɛ gʋta m kan ŋ yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəə kɩ. Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ tʋr ka mɔɔ meerbaa ma kan bʋraama kɩ.
44026004	Mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyɩnta hɔ niŋŋə, m nyɩbaa ma, kan nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ hɔ niŋŋə, m dogʋɔɔ bire ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ kɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ haay a dɔ.
44026005	Kʋ ŋ lɛ taa, ŋ y'a da ma, ŋn'a kasɛtɩ ka, ŋ y'a dɔ a dɔɔraa laatʋ, ŋ ʋ, farizɛn m mɔɔ m. Gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm wɔɔ Woso zaa zuure ma paan•••, an lɛ da ŋ haay ra rɔ wɔɔ.
44026006	Bɩ her naa, kʋ mɔɔ Woso lerbɔrɛ k'a ba wɔɔ zɩrɔ m bɩ si bɩ, bɩ y'a ba mɔɔ dʋdɔ her.
44026007	Wɔɔ do haryaa bueerehɩɩya b'ɩ yaa dam Woso m sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, ŋ bɩr a tore y. Kʋ ŋn'ɩ dɔm lerbɔrɛ bɩ do ma bɩ minto. Kʋ mɔɔ lerbɔrɛ naa do ta m heer lɛ bɩ y'a ka, m cir Agripaa, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nɩ mim kam mɔɔ ra.
44026008	Bɔ minto m, b'awɔɔ n a si a ʋ, Woso ɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʋ?
44026009	Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta m a si mɩŋŋa mɔɔ ʋ lɛ m, kʋ m yar ba kan Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ tɔ bɩ kɩ, paŋŋa do haay m.
44026010	Bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ ba Zerizalɛm ʋ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ɩ lɛ naa do ka mɔɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa sɩrakarɛzannɔ gʋr gʋta, m m du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ ʋ, a a ga m.
44026011	Gallɛm gʋta, mɔɔ ta sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, m fɩr ka ŋ ma, m paŋŋa ba ŋ ma, kʋ ŋ nɩ Yeezuu sʋnsɔ wʋ. Bɩ, kan jɩmbaa heerbusu gʋta kɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ jɩ bɔm tararɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ra, m nɩ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma.
44026012	Bɩ minto y'a ka, hindeem ʋ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n zaa ka mɔɔ ʋ kan paŋŋa haay kɩ, kʋ m ta Damas ʋ mim naa do minto.
44026013	Cir, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ tam bɩ, kʋ sinuu b'a zɔ bɩ, mɔɔ lɛɛgure yɩ, an a to brama, a gure n lɛ da wosogure ra, an b'a ku mɔɔ ra kan m zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44026014	Wɔɔ haay, wɔɔ ʋ dundo tara ʋ, mɔɔ n leer ma, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m ebree lemim m, a ʋ: Sol, Sol, bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma? A ba ɩbɩɩ nawʋrɛ, ɩ mɩŋŋa m!
44026015	Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, Zuuba?' Zuuba n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Yeezuu m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ n nɩ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma.
44026016	Bɩ, wuti ɩ jɩm! Ba hɔ k'a ka mɔɔ n m hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m bɩ n na: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʋ k'ɩ nyɩnta mɔɔ zibəənyɩ, mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa kan hɔ niŋŋə k'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ yɩ ʋ naa kɩ, kan a vantɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ m hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44026017	Mɔɔ lɛɛ kam m ɩbɩɩ bʋmbɔ ɩ do kan do vantɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ wɔ ʋ,
44026018	k'ɩ yaa nɩ ŋ mɩm gʋ, k'ɩ ŋ bɔ monsigə nɔ ʋ, ɩ ta ŋ nɩ lɛɛgure ʋ, k'ɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ Sʋtaana lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ, ɩ ta ŋ nɩ Woso zi, kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, bɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔjirle yɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.'
44026019	Bɩ tɛkka ma, cir Agripaa, mɔɔ n bɩsɩ ka hɔ kʋ Zuuba a hɩ mɔɔ m hɔhɩnkarɛ naa do nɔ ʋ bɩ ma y.
44026020	A sa mɔɔ ʋ Damas zannɔ ma kan Zerizalɛm zannɔ kɩ, an lɛ da, Zidee jilli kʋ zannɔ kɩ, bɩ jɛ ʋ kan do vantɔɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ kɩ, m a dɩnda kʋ ŋ n'a bɔ a taam, ŋnɩ yɛ Woso ma, kʋ ŋ n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba, k'an zu kʋ ʋ kan ŋ heerlʋrlɛ bɩ kɩ.
44026021	Bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ Wosocɛ ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋn'a gɩnga k'a mɔɔ mee bɔ ʋ.
44026022	Woso n ku mɔɔ ra mɩŋŋa, an ta an dɔmɩm naa do ku. Mɔɔ gɔɔta m nɩ kasɛtɩ kam gʋɔɔ poorero kan gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ taa. Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kan Moyiisi kɩ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ hɩ. Mɔɔ bɩr hɔsɩ vanta hɩrɛ, an lɛ da bɩ ra y.
44026023	Ŋ ʋ: 'Krista fɩr yɩrɛ, b'a lɛɛ kam an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, an nɩ lɛɛgure pa dam zɩɩfʋrɔ m kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ.' "
44026024	Pol k'a lee ku bɩncɛ naa do ʋ a meerbaa nɔ ʋ bɩ, Fɛstus a leer busu, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔɔzaa n'ɩbɩɩ naa Pol! Ɩbɩɩ hɔdɔrɛ maam-maam bɩ y'ɩbɩɩ bam hɔɔzaa!"
44026025	Pol n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔɔzaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y, Fɛstus mɩŋŋa, sɩra meerbaa mɔɔ n'a bam, hɔɔntaʋrɛ m.
44026026	Cir Agripaa bɩ minno nɔɔn duro dɔ mɩŋŋa haay, bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ m dam ma, m meer ba a lɛɛ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ. Mɔɔ si mɔɔ ʋ, hɔsɩ n ba a mɩm ma sɛɛrɛ y. Bala, minno nɔɔn duro n ba gʋrga k'a nyaakʋm da ʋ y.
44026027	Cir Agripaa, ɩbɩɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ mim si ra? Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ŋ mim si"
44026028	Agripaa n a hɩ Pol m, a ʋ: "Kan ɩbɩɩ meerbaa bɩ kɩ, gɔɔta a ʋ poore, k'ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ ba kristagʋaa ra?"
44026029	Pol n a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a a ŋʋa, an gɔɔta poore gɛɛ gʋta, mɔɔ ŋʋa, kʋ Woso yɛ, a bɩ nyɩntarɛ ɩbɩɩ bala y, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam mɔɔ meerbaa ma her lɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a bam amba mɔɔ m, bɩ baŋŋarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ wɔ ma rɔ nɔɔn duro bɩ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ wɔ ma y."
44026030	Cir bɩ n wuti kan tara lɛɛzaa bɩ kɩ, Berenisi kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɩntam kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
44026031	Kʋ ŋn'a hʋrm bɩ, ŋ sʋʋra ba kan kʋ kɩ ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do n hɔsɩ ba, an a ga zɛ m gɛɛ baŋŋarɔ nɩ y."
44026032	Agripaa n a hɩ Fɛstus m, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa naa do bɛɛ y'a ŋʋa k'a ta mim bɩ m Rɔm cir taa, a a ga m, ŋnɩ wɔ saa."
44027001	Kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta kʋ wɔɔ n da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ʋ ta Italii ʋ bɩ, ŋ Pol kan lɔnnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ da sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa k'a tɔ m Zuliyus bɩ wɔ ʋ, sʋrdaarɔ zɔrsɔddɩ zɛkʋra kʋ n n'a birm Ogista zɛkʋra, bɩ y'a so ʋ.
44027002	Wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ k'a a to Adramitɩyɔm an nɩ tam Azii kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hi lɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Aristarkɩ ɩ nyɩnta kan wɔɔ kɩ. Masedʋan kʋ Tesaloniki gʋaa m.
44027003	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ lee ku Sidɔn ʋ, bɩ kʋ jɩnlɛ poore m bɩ, Zuliyus a ba Pol m mɩŋŋa. A zaa ka ʋ, k'an aa dɩga a gʋaasɩbarɔ ma, brɔɔ n nyasʋ m.
44027004	Kʋ wɔɔ bɔ b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, ʋ bɔ Siipɩr jɩr ʋ, k'a n'a ta wɔɔ m hɩnhɛr bɩ k'a nya wɔɔ rɛ bɩ minto.
44027005	A m bɩ, wɔɔ n higʋta k'a nɩ Silisii kan Panfilii kɩ jɩr ʋ bɩ zɛ ra, ʋ aa lee ku Lisii kʋ Miir ʋ.
44027006	Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a Alɛsandrii kɔɔlʋʋ yɩ b'ʋ an nɩ tam Italii ʋ bɩ, a a ka wɔɔ n da ʋ.
44027007	Kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n ta poore-poore dɔmɩm gʋta nɔ ʋ, ʋ aa lee ku kan kɔrɛ kɩ Kinɩdɩ ʋ. Hɩnhɛr bɩ k'a nya wɔɔ rɛ bɩ, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ ta tɩrga bɩ, wɔɔ bɔ Salmonɛ jɩr ʋ, ʋ aa bɔ Krɛtɩ jɩr ʋ, k'a n'a ta wɔɔ m hɩnhɛr bɩ minto.
44027008	Wɔɔ fɩr yɩ kan kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ kɩ, ʋ bɔkarɛ ʋ aa lee ku bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Jɩnjɩ-Mɩŋŋa b'ʋ, Lazaya kʋ jɩr ʋ.
44027009	Dɔmɩnnɔ cem gʋta, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ tarɛ nyibəə n ta ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, lɛkʋsɩrɛ dɔmɩm cem. Pol n ŋ dʋndɔ, a ʋ:
44027010	"M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ tarɛ naa do hɔ zarm gʋta, a nyaanɩm gʋɔɔ gʋta m, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bɛɛ bala kan mɔr bɩ kɩ y, wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ sɔ."
44027011	Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ, a tʋr an n'a kam gʋaa k'a nɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bram bɩ ma kan kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zaa hɔnyɩ kɩ ma, an lɛ da Pol meerbaa bɩ ra.
44027012	Bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ wɔɔ jɩm ʋ bɩ, k'a bɩ bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, ŋ gʋɔɔ gʋta a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'a lɛ ba deem k'a zu zaa ʋ, kʋ dɩga a, k'ʋ lee kum jɩnjɩ k'a nɩ Krɛtɩ kʋ Fenigsi ʋ b'ʋ, k'an a ta wɔɔ m nyɛɛm hɩnhɛr minto. K'ʋ nyɩnta b'ʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ.
44027013	Hɩnhɛr poore wuti jɩsa, bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋn'a hɔɔn da, ŋ ʋ, a y'a dam ma, a zaa sa. Ŋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ hʋr, ŋn'a na Krɛtɩ gəm b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ tam.
44027014	K'a yɩ poore bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʋta kʋ n n'a birm Erakilɔn bɩ wuti tara bɩ zeezi, an bʋr kan paŋŋa kɩ, an b'a ku ŋ la.
44027015	A n kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ gaa an cenim, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ a bɔ y. Wɔɔ n a to an a gaa, an nɩ tam nɩ, kʋ lɛɛ ka m, ʋ n a dɔ y.
44027016	K'a nɩ tam zɔɔ-zɔɔ bɩ, wɔɔ yaa lee ku tara poore k'a nɩ hi bire ʋ, n n'a birm Koda bɩ jɩr ʋ, an a ta wɔɔ m hɩnhɛr bɩ minto. Wɔɔ ʋ tɔ ʋ kan kɔrɛ gʋta kɩ, ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ poore bɩ gaa, ʋ a bɔ hi b'ʋ, ʋ a da kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta b'ʋ.
44027017	Kʋ ŋ kɔɔlʋʋ poore bɩ gaa ŋn'a da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ an nya bɩ, ŋ bar sunso kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta b'ʋ kɛɛrɛ. Kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi bam kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ yaa wɔ Sɩrtɩ nyɩntaa b'ʋ bɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋsɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ jɛ ma, ŋn'a da hi b'ʋ, k'a n'a tarɛ bɩ bɔrɛ, ŋn'a to an nɩ tarɛ a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
44027018	Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʋta bɩ k'a nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma tee••• bɩ, ŋ mɔrlɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ waa ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ zar higʋta b'ʋ.
44027019	A dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ bɩ, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ zar hi b'ʋ a zim.
44027020	Woso kan monyaarɔ kɩ n a hɩnka dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y, bɩ hɩnhɛr bɩ hɔnrɛ bʋnyaabaa gɔɔta an nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma. Wɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ wɔɔ bɔrɛ y.
44027021	A dɔmɩm laatʋ, ŋ n hɔbɩrɛ bɩ y. Pol n wuti an jɩm brama ŋ bire ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ yɩ ra, gʋɔɔ, kʋ mɔɔ dʋndɔrɛ b'awɔɔ si, ʋ n ʋ hʋr Krɛtɩ ʋ, fɩr kʋ wɔɔ yɩ naa kan mɔr k'a zar naa kɩ bɩ wɔɔ yɩrɛ y.
44027022	Bɩ naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han, k'a heer ba kookoo. Awɔɔ gʋaa deem taan••• bɩ garɛ y, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ y'a deem n n'a zarm bala.
44027023	Woso k'a a so mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ n'a zi bam bɩ malɛɛka a hɩnka mɔɔ m gum naa ʋ bala, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ:
44027024	Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, Pol. A a ga m, ɩbɩɩ m ta Rɔm cir taa, bɩ Woso gʋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ meeyaa da ɩbɩɩ wɔ ʋ.
44027025	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, yaarɔ, k'a heer ba kookoo! Mɔɔ sɩra ka Woso ʋ, a bam amba a a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m.
44027026	Wɔɔ yaa nʋ lo tara niŋŋə k'a nɩ hi bire ʋ bɩ ra."
44027027	A gunuu bueeresi hɔ, wɔɔ nyaam ʋ higʋta bɩ burə ʋ. Dibsir k'a a zɔ bɩ, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a dɔ a hɔɔn ʋ, ŋ ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ zɔ tara ma.
44027028	Ŋ n higʋta bɩ nɔ makra ba mɛtɩr busi, kʋ ŋ ta lɛɛ poore bɩ, ŋ y'a ya, ŋn'a makra ba ŋn'a yɩ mɛtɩr bukərku.
44027029	Kʋ ŋn'ɩ nyi bam kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ yaa a zɛ ci ma bɩ, ŋ pɔyaa gorezannɔ zo si, ŋn'a kʋsɩ baŋŋarɔ m jɛ ʋ, ŋn'a yɛm kʋ dɔ n mɛ zɔɔ.
44027030	Kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zibəəzannɔ hɔ ba ɩ ʋ, a hɩ ŋ y'a ʋ k'a baŋŋarɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zo hi bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'an kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nyasʋ, ŋn'a nyaakʋm da k'a bra si kan kɔɔlʋʋ poore bɩ kɩ.
44027031	Pol n a hɩ, sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ m kan sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n gɔɔta kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ, awɔɔ bɩ bɔrɛ y."
44027032	Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n kɔɔlʋʋ poore bɩ barlɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ ra, ŋn'a to an ta an cem.
44027033	Kʋ ŋn'ɩ dɔm dɔmɩrɛ ma bɩ, Pol gʋaa haay bir, an a yɛ ŋ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔmɩm bueeresi her, awɔɔ n hɔ bɩ y. A n nɩ dɔm ma kʋ hɩnhɛr bɩ n a da jɩm ʋ.
44027034	Bɩ minto bɩ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han k'a hɔ bɩ, awɔɔ laafɩɩ minto m. Bala, minkə deem taan••• bɩ nyaanɩm gʋaa mim ʋ naa ʋ y."
44027035	K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a bur sa, an barka da Woso m gʋaa haay mɩm m, an a zɛ ra, an n'a sʋrɛ.
44027036	Ŋ haay heer n ka bɩ jɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ.
44027037	Wɔɔ haay wuti, gʋaa zɔɔhɩra busaanhɩna yaa sɔrdɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
44027038	Kʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ŋ ka bɩ, ŋ hɔyaa bɩ waa kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a zar hi b'ʋ, k'a gore bɩ n a bɔrɛ.
44027039	Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a ya, ŋnɩ tara bɩ dɔ y. Bɩncɛ ŋ y'a yɩ hi bɩ lɛ ra, an zerle bɩncɛ. Ŋ lɛ n taa k'a a da ma, k'a kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ da jɩm ʋ b'ʋ.
44027040	Ŋ n baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, ŋnɩ pɔyaarɔ wɔɔ to hi b'ʋ, kʋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n a da ma, an ta. Ŋ n kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bɩrlɛ hɔ bɩ ba yɔhɔ-yɔhɔ, ŋnɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ pɛɛra poore bɩ busu, ŋnɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ to, an nɩ tam bɩncɛ gər zeezi.
44027041	Kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n aa der nyɩntaa dimbir la, lɛɛ bɩ n wɔ, a b'a dam ma a n bɔ y. Bɩ ma bɩ, hikurero wɔɔ b'a jɛ bɩ zɛ, an a kɩnkaansʋ.
44027042	Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n a ŋʋa k'a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, kʋ ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ darɛ dɔ ŋ yaa a si hi bɩ burə ʋ.
44027043	Bɩ, sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a ŋʋa k'a Pol bʋmbɔ bɩ, a n yɛ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ y. A lɛ ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ darɛ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka, ŋn'a da hi b'ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'aa tara gər bɩ ku.
44027044	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ dam gɔrɔ ʋ gɛɛ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ kəəro wɔɔ ʋ. A yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, ŋ haay n lee ku tara ʋ kan laafɩɩ kɩ.
44028001	Kʋ wɔɔ bɔ mim pakra bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ma ŋ ʋ, tara k'a nɩ hi bire ʋ bɩ tɔ m Maltɩ.
44028002	Tara bɩ zannɔ wɔɔ wɔɔ si kan daʋrɛ gʋta kɩ. Ŋ sɛ gʋta hɛ, ŋnɩ wɔɔ gaa, ŋnɩ wɔɔ zɔ ma, bala, la a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ barɛ, nyɛɛm n ta ʋ.
44028003	Pol n nyʋkɔ gər gʋr a zangʋrga ʋ, an b'a da sɛ bɩ rɛ. Kʋ sɛ bɩ nɩ nyʋkɔ bɩ bɩm bɩ, cɩrka bɔ sɛ b'ʋ, an a sɔ wɔ Pol wɔ ʋ.
44028004	Tara bɩ zannɔ kʋ ŋ cɩrka bɩ yɩ, an nɩ zeŋŋəm Pol wɔ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do nyɩntam gərzer paan••• A bɔ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ kan laafɩɩ kɩ, bɩ Woso tɩrgabaazaa lɛ baa a mɩsɩrbaa ma y."
44028005	Pol n a wɔ vɩga zɛ, cɩrka bɩ n a da sɛ b'ʋ, b'a n busu ma y.
44028006	Ŋ n jɩm, ŋn'ɩ dɩgarɛ a wɔ bɩ ma, a hanrɛ gɛɛ, a y'a dore, an ga lɛɛ nɩ? Bɩ, kʋ ŋ dɩgarɛ bɩ maasɩrɛ ba, bɩ ŋ n hɔsɩ yɩ an ba bɩ, ŋ y'a hɔɔndarɛ bɩ lʋr, ŋ ʋ: "Woso m!"
44028007	Lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, tararɔ nyɩnta ʋ, lɛɛkarɛ dʋdɔkər Publiyus y'a so ŋ ʋ. A wɔɔ si, an nyasʋ wɔɔ m mɩŋŋa dɔmɩm kaakʋ.
44028008	A zɩ nyɩnta an nɩ wʋtam kan mɛmarɛ kɩ, yoor kɩ. Pol n ta, an aa dɩga a, an aa a wɔ busu, an a ka ra, an yaa da, an a waa.
44028009	Naa do minto bɩ, tara bɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ yaaba m nɔ wɔɔ ɩ zɛm zi, ŋ n'a waam sɔ.
44028010	Wɔɔ daʋrɛ yɩ gʋta, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ bɔ, ʋ n nɩ cenim bɩ, ŋ hɔ haay k'a zibəə n ta wɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ka wɔɔ ʋ.
44028011	Mom kaakʋ jɛ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ k'a gɔɔta tara bɩ do ra b'ʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ. Alɛsandrii kɔɔlʋʋ m, a tɔ m Diyoskiir.
44028012	Wɔɔ zer Sirakɩɩzɩ ʋ k'ʋ hoon si dɔmɩm kaakʋ.
44028013	Kʋ wɔɔ cem b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ da higʋta bɩ lezi, ʋ aa lee ku Regiyo ʋ. Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, hɩnhɛr wuti jɩsa, dɔmɩm hɩɩya hinni ʋ, wɔɔ yaa lee ku Puzɔl ʋ.
44028014	Wɔɔ ʋ danyɩnɔ yɩ b'ʋ, ŋn'a yɛ wɔɔ han k'ʋ gɔɔta kan a kɩ dɔmɩm saanhɩna. Nyɩnta a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, ʋ bɔkarɛ, ʋ lee ku Rɔm ʋ.
44028015	Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ wɔɔ zɛrɛ bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ wɔɔ zɛ ʋ bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Apiyus-Daasɩ kan Tavɛrnɩ-Kaakʋ kɩ ʋ. Pol k'a ŋ yɩ bɩ, a barka da Woso m, a heer paŋŋa n a da ra.
44028016	Kʋ wɔɔ lee ku Rɔm ʋ bɩ, n zaa ka Pol ʋ, k'an a ka a mɩŋŋa har ma, kʋ sʋrdaa deem n bɩr dɔm ma.
44028017	Dɔmɩm kaakʋ k'a cem bɩ, a Rɔm zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bir, kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋ zɛ ʋ. Kʋ ŋ y'a so kʋ ma bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ ba m dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, mɔɔ n wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəəro zar sɔ y. Ŋ mɔɔ ba lɔ Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋnɩ mɔɔ da Rɔm zannɔ wɔ ʋ.
44028018	Kʋ ŋ laaka dɩnda ŋ nɩ mim bɩ jɩ dɔ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ŋ y'a ŋʋa k'a wɔ saa mɔɔ ma, bala, ŋ n hɔsɩ yɩ mɔɔ gʋr zi an a ga zɛ nɩ y.
44028019	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, a bɩ yɛm bɩ, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n a yɛ kʋ Rɔm cir n mɔɔ dʋdɔ ka. Mɔɔ bɛɛ y'a hɩ, kʋ m mim ka m do ra y.
44028020	Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n a yɛ kʋ m awɔɔ yɩ, kʋ m sʋʋra ba kan awɔɔ kɩ. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Israyɛl taaheerlɛ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ baŋŋarɔ nɔɔn duro m."
44028021	Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ n ci sɩ yɩ, an a to Zidee ʋ, an n'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩndarɛ y, bɩ, wɔɔ danyɩ sɩ n a to an b'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩnda, gɛɛ tɔbɔrɛ bʋnyaa y.
44028022	Wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ɩbɩɩ n hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ hɔɔn dam ma bɩ hɩ k'ʋ a ma, bala, lɛɛ haay ʋ, wɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa ŋ bɩr yɛm gʋngʋrɛ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ zuŋ ʋ naa ʋ y."
44028023	Ŋ n dɔmɩm cɩnta kan kʋ kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr gʋta, ŋnɩ b'a yɩ a har ʋ. Pol sʋʋra ba kan ŋ kɩ dɔgta m an ta an yirbəə ku. Woso cirbəə bɩ mim a sa an a dɩnda, an Moyiisi lɛrɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim dɩnda ŋ nɩ, k'a a da ma, kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, Krista bɩ Yeezuu m.
44028024	Gɔsɩnnɔ hɔ k'a dɩnda bɩ si, niŋŋoo n a si y.
44028025	Kʋ ŋ bʋr ŋn'ɩ cenim bɩ, ŋ n kʋ ma y: Pol n mim deem hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɛnt-Ɛspri meer k'a ba kan Ezayii kɩ awɔɔ zɩrɔ minto bɩ, sɩra m. A a hɩ, a ʋ:
44028026	Ta ɩ yaa do naa do yɩ, ɩ hɩ m, ɩ ʋ: Awɔɔ y'a tʋr kam mɩŋŋa, b'awɔɔ b'a jɩ marɛ y. Awɔɔ dɩgam mɩŋŋa, b'awɔɔ b'a yɩrɛ y.
44028027	Bala, do naa do heer b'ɩ monsigə ʋ, ŋ tʋr ga, ŋ lɛ baa k'a lɛɛ yɩ a mɩm nɩ y, ŋ lɛ baa k'a tʋr n mim ma y, ŋ lɛ baa k'a heer n a jɩ dɔ y, ŋ lɛ baa k'a a bɔ a taam k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n ŋ waa y. Woso n a hɩ bɩ n naa.
44028028	K'a dɔ kɛɛrɛ, a ʋ, Woso bʋmbɔrɛ naa do nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ do vantɔɔ ma, bɩ ŋ y'a sim." [
44028029	Pol k'a meer naa do ba bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a hʋr ŋnɩ bɩsɩ kam gʋta kan kʋ kɩ.]
44028030	Pol mɩsɩrbaa ba ncɩnaaʋ dɔɔraa hɩɩya tɔr b'ʋ, an a mɩŋŋa busoo bɔ, an n'a mɩsɩrbaa ba n nɩ. Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm zi rɔ wɔɔ, a yɩ ŋ sim mɩŋŋa,
44028031	an nɩ Woso cirbəə pa darɛ, an nɩ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mim dɩndam kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, bɩ gɔsɩ bɩr a tam nɩ tolle y.
45001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, Pol, Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ ɩ ci naa do ba awɔɔ ma. Woso mɔɔ bir kʋ m m ba a zibəəzaa, a mɔɔ bɔ ʋ m hɔ, k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʋ m aa lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da.
45001002	Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do Woso nyɩnta an a ler bɔ tee••• Wosoci nɔ ʋ, a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lɛ m bɩ.
45001003	Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do bɩ, a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista, wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ mim an n'a dɩndam. K'a mɛsim nɔ ʋ nɩ, Davɩd do gʋaa m.
45001004	Bɩ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri zibəə nɩ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, hɔ bɩ do n a hɩnka a ʋ, Woso Nyɩ m an nɩ paŋŋa m.
45001005	Yeezuu Krista minto m mɔɔ n barka yɩ, m m ba a zibəəzaa, kʋ m a ka kʋ do haay gʋɔɔ m sɩra ka ʋ, ŋnɩ zu ʋ.
45001006	Awɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro barla, bala, Yeezuu Krista y'awɔɔ bir k'a so awɔɔ ʋ.
45001007	Awɔɔ haay kʋ sɩrakarɛzannɔ n'awɔɔ m, an nɩ Rɔm ʋ, Woso awɔɔ ŋʋa, an awɔɔ bir k'a nyɩnta a gʋɔɔ barla. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ m barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
45001008	A n lɛɛ ka bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso kʋ mɔɔ n'a zi bam bɩ m barka, Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ haay minto, bala, durnya nɔ ʋ jilli n y'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ mim dɩndam.
45001009	Woso zi mɔɔ n'a barɛ kan m heer kɩ haay, a Nyɩ bɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ nɔ ʋ, a m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, a a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm haay yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ tɔ darɛ m nɔ ʋ,
45001010	m n'a yɛm han, k'a hɔɔnhɔ m, kʋ m kɔ, m zaa yɩ, m bʋr awɔɔ zi.
45001011	Mɔɔ lɛ taa paan••• kʋ m awɔɔ yɩ, kʋ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ jir kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'awɔɔ paŋŋa n a da ra gʋta,
45001012	gɛɛ, k'ʋ kʋ paŋŋa da ra, awɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, sɩrakarɛ deem kʋ wɔɔ n ta m bɩ nɔ ʋ.
45001013	M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ gɩnga gallɛm hɔka kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi, bɩ, an ta an her ku naa, mɔɔ n m da ma y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, kʋ m zibəə n nyɩ da, amba a a da kʋrɔ vantɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
45001014	Hɔɔngʋrɛzannɔ kan bahɔɔngʋrɛzannɔ kɩ mim pakra ba mɔɔ ma, mindonno kan bamindonno kɩ mim pakra ba mɔɔ ma sɔ.
45001015	Naa y'a ka mɔɔ lɛ n taa paan••• kʋ m lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m sɔ, awɔɔ k'a nɩ Rɔm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
45001016	Nyannɩ bɩr mɔɔ zɛm lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma y, bala, Woso paŋŋa m, an nɩ gʋaa haay k'a sɩra ka bʋmbɔm. Zɩɩfʋrɔ a lɛɛ ka ŋ ma, an bɔkarɛ an lee ku do vantɔɔ wɔɔ zi.
45001017	Wɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ denter, lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɔ ʋ Woso tɩrgabaa n'a hɩnkaŋ ʋ, Woso ɩ gʋaa k'a sɩra ka bɩ bam tɩrga, sɩra k'a a ka Woso ʋ bɩ minto bala, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'an tɩrga sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam.'
45001018	Woso a to brama an a heerbusu hɩnka, kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩr a daŋ ʋ, mimbʋnyaarɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ bam, ŋ bʋnyaabaa n a ka, sɩra bɩr dɔm dɔ sɔ y.
45001019	Denter m, hɔ k'a n'a karɛ ŋnɩ Woso dɔ n a nyaakʋm da y, Woso a hɩnka kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ mɩŋŋa.
45001020	Paŋŋa kʋ Woso n ta m b'a jirə ba ʋ bɩ, kan Woso mɩŋŋa taʋrɛ kɩ bɩ, gɔsɩ bɩr ŋ yɩrɛ y, bɩ durnya darɛ tɛkka ma, gʋaa a da ma an ŋ yɩ hɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da rɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, naa minto bɩ, gʋɔɔ bɩ gumə yɩm fɩɩga y.
45001021	Ŋ Woso dɔ, bɩ ŋ bɩr Woso daŋ ʋ, ŋn'a barka darɛ amba Woso a ga m bɩ nɩ y. Naa n a ka, ŋ hɔɔndarɛ n'a ba daŋŋada, ŋ n kʋrɔ hɔɔn ma, ŋn'ɩ monsigə ʋ.
45001022	Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ a ma mindɔrɛzannɔ, an bɔkarɛ taajɛmzannɔ m,
45001023	a ga kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ m, kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso k'a nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa m tee••• bɩ da ʋ bɩ, bɩ to ŋ y'a ʋ ŋn'ɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ ga m kɩ, bɛnnɔ kɩ, hɔɔgansiro kɩ, tara burə hɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a gaatam nɔ kɩ daŋ ʋ.
45001024	Naa minto m, Woso n ŋ to ŋn'ɩ dintim zibəəro kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa rɔ wɔɔ barɛ a hɔɔnhɔ ma, ŋn'a mɛ gore bɔŋ ʋ mim k'a nyannɩ n ta ʋ barɛ nɔ ʋ kan kʋ kɩ.
45001025	Bala, ŋ Woso sɩra minno wɔɔ to ŋnɩ ŋʋaar sa, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam hɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da rɔ wɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ zure ŋ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ Woso ŋ y'a ga m, ŋn'a da ʋ, a m hɔ haay darɛzaa. Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay! Amina!
45001026	Naa minto m, Woso n ŋ to, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr a nyannɩ minno lɛtaamarɔ bam. Ŋ lannɔ wɔɔ bɩr a kam ma sɔ, k'a bɩr kan yar kɩ y, wʋta ŋ nawʋm lannɔ kan kʋ kɩ, an bɔkarɛ, naa barɛ n a ga nɩ y.
45001027	Yaarɔ wɔɔ maam sɔ, ŋ bɩr a kam ma, k'a bɩr kan lʋ kɩ y, a ŋʋa ŋ nawʋm paan•••, k'a bɩr wʋtam kan a muno yaarɔ kɩ. Yaarɔ kan yaarɔ kɩ nɩ nyannɩ zi bam kan kʋ kɩ, naa n a ka sɔ, ŋn'a nyaanlɛ zibəə fɩryɩrɛ k'a a ga m yɩrɛ a mɛ ʋ.
45001028	Kʋ ŋ n a ŋʋa k'a Woso dɔ bɩ, Woso n ŋ to a hɔɔn daŋŋada bɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a n'a ga barɛ m bɩ ba.
45001029	Zibəə k'a n a ga barɛ m do haay ba ŋ nawʋm, mimbʋnyaa do haay, gʋɔɔ lɛtaama bʋnyaa do haay, bʋnyaabaa do haay, jɩmbaa n ŋ heer han, gərzɛrɛ ba n nɩ, nyaabarɛ ba n nɩ, zambʋbarɛ ba n nɩ, zibəə daŋŋada haay,
45001030	ŋn'ɩ tɔ bɔm, ŋn'ɩ gʋɔɔ tɔ zaar barɛ, ŋnɩ sɔ Woso m, ŋ bɩr gʋɔɔ daŋ ʋ y, ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busum, ŋn'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ bɔm mimbʋnyaa daarɔ barɛ m, ŋ bɩr yɛm a zɩrɔ lɛ ma y,
45001031	ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ y, ŋ bɩr jɩnlɛ a lɛ ra y, gʋaa mim bɩr ŋ kɔrɛ y, gʋaa cicir bɩr ŋ zɛrɛ y.
45001032	A n bɔkarɛ, ŋ y'a dɔ mɩŋŋa ŋ ʋ, Woso lɛ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, gʋaa k'a nɩ ziro nɔɔn duro barɛ a ga zɛ m. Kan naa kɩ haay ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ tam lɛɛ kan minno nɔɔn duro barɛ kɩ. A n a na ma bɩ, kʋ ŋ gʋaa yɩ sɔ, an nɩ minno nɔɔn duro barɛ, bɩ ŋ nɔ yɩ.
45002001	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n'ɩ gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ yarlɛ? Ɩbɩɩ bɩ gumə yɩrɛ y, gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a yarm bɩ, ɩ mɩŋŋa dʋdɔ ɩ n'a yarm, bala, ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarm, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ zi kʋ ŋ n'a bam bɩ bam sɔ.
45002002	Wɔɔ dɔ denter m, ʋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ minno nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ, Woso yɩm dʋdɔ yarm sɩra m, amba ŋ zibəə bʋnyaa b'a ga m bɩ m.
45002003	Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ minno nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm bɩ, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a barɛ, am ŋ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, ɩ hɔɔn ɩbɩɩ da ɩ ʋ, ɩ bɔm lɛm Woso dʋdɔyarlɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ ra?
45002004	Gɛɛ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr dɩgam Woso ŋʋarɛ gʋta k'an ta m ɩbɩɩ minto, an nɩ bʋrlɛ a ma, k'a mɩŋŋa ba ɩbɩɩ m bɩ ma hɔsɩ ra? Ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ ɩ ʋ, a ba k'a nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ m mɩŋŋa bɩ, a hɩ a ʋ, k'ɩbɩɩ m toore yɩ, ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam la?
45002005	B'ɩbɩɩ da bɩr bɔŋ ʋ y, ɩ lɛ baa k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam y, bɩ, a ba k'ɩbɩɩ n nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ naa, hʋnhʋrlɛ gʋta ɩbɩɩ n'a bankarɛ ɩ minto, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso n n'a heerbusu hɩnkaŋ ʋ, an dʋdɔ ka kan sɩra kɩ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
45002006	Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, a gʋaa biyəə zibəə nyɔɔdʋ kaŋ ʋ, amba a a ga m bɩ m.
45002007	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tɔŋ ʋ, k'a mɩŋŋa ba tee•••, ka Woso nɔ yɩ, ŋn'a kam Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ ma, kan a daʋrɛ kɩ ma, kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a bɩr a zaar bam kɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ, Woso mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ karɛ ŋ ʋ.
45002008	Bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam Woso ma, ŋ bɩr zum sɩra ʋ y, ŋn'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Woso y'a nɔmaa kan a heerbusu kɩ hɩnkarɛ ŋ nɩ.
45002009	Kʋsɩ kan fɩr kɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ yɩm, zɩɩfʋrɔ n nɩ lɛɛ kam, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ n a nya ŋ ʋ.
45002010	Bɩ, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ, daʋrɛ, kan laafɩɩ kɩ kam gʋaa haay k'a n'a mɩŋŋa bam b'ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ n nɩ lɛɛ kam, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ n a nya ŋ ʋ.
45002011	Bala, Woso bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
45002012	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam, ŋ n Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ gɩngam sɔ, bɩ Moyiisi lɛrɔ bɛɛ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ dʋdɔ karɛ zaa y, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ, ŋn'a gu ŋn'ɩ mimbʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ dʋdɔ karɛ zaa.
45002013	Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma bala rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ y, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zure ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
45002014	A a da ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y, ŋ n Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, nɔɔ m hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ ba, bɩ ŋ n a dɔ y. A ba kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ ŋ n lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ, naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, ŋ lɛ cɩnta a mɩŋŋɔɔ m.
45002015	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ ʋ, hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba a heer ʋ, ŋ heer ɩ kasɛtɩ kam, kan ba ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ tɩr a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a mɩŋŋa ba gɛɛ a bʋnyaa ba bɩ kɩ.
45002016	Nyɩnta a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, amba lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ m, Woso zaa kam Krista Yeezuu ʋ k'an hɔ haay k'a nyaakʋm da gʋɔɔ heer ʋ bɩ dʋdɔ ka.
45002017	Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n'a hɩrɛ ɩ ma zɩɩfʋ, ɩ nɩ yom lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ n'ɩ lɛ bɔrɛ ɩ mɩŋŋa ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ Woso dɔ,
45002018	ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ dɔ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ k'a ga barɛ m bɩ dɔ ɩ bɔ kʋ la m.
45002019	Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ hɔɔn darɛ ɩ ʋ, zaa hɩnka bʋʋrɔ m zaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ nɩ lɛɛ gum monsigəzannɔ m,
45002020	ɩ ʋ, bahɔdonno dʋndɔrɛzaa n'ɩ mɩ, gʋɔɔ poorero karɩnsaamba, a gɩnga ɩbɩɩ nawʋm ɩ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ dɔ, ɩ sɩra dɔ mɩŋŋa lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto.
45002021	A lɔ ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m, ɩ bɩr a dɩndarɛ ɩ mɩŋŋa nɩ? Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩm gʋɔɔ m, ŋ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ nɩ koor barɛ.
45002022	Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ n'a darɛ, ɩbɩɩ sɔ wosobaawɔnnɔ daʋrɛ m, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ nɩ gasʋrɛ ŋ daʋrɛ cɛrɔ ʋ, ɩ nɩ ŋ bɔm.
45002023	Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ heer nyɔɔm lɛrɔ wɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ dɔ bɩ tɔ ma, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ Woso gore bɔŋ ʋ, k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ bɩsɩ kam lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
45002024	Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ bɩ, n ʋ: 'Awɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ, awɔɔ y'a kam, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋm.'
45002025	K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ jɩ ta ʋ, bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ gum lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure ma, baa k'ɩbɩɩ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, a bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y.
45002026	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa k'a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ ɩ hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ barɛ, Woso bɩ dɩgarɛ a zaa ma ɩ ʋ, gasʋ a ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ ra?
45002027	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ b'a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ, a y'ɩbɩɩ dam nyannɩ ʋ, bala, ɩbɩɩ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, ɩ nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, bɩ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr zure ŋ ʋ y.
45002028	Zɩɩfʋ paan••• bɩ, gʋaa k'a m zɩɩfʋ gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ bɛɛ y, mɛsim gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɛɛ m baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ paan••• y.
45002029	Bɩ, zɩɩfʋ paan••• bɩ, heer an ta ʋ, baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ paan••• bɩ, heer hɔ bɩ m. A to a nawʋm Sɛnt-Ɛspri zi, a bɩr a tom Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y. Zɩɩfʋ bɩ do lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩr a tom gʋɔɔ zi y, a to a nawʋm Woso zi.
45003001	Ncɩnaaʋ naa, k'ɩ zɩɩfʋ, bɔ ɩ n'a yɩrɛ a nɔ ʋ, baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ nyɔɔdʋ m bɔ nɩ?
45003002	A nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ gʋta denter. Bala, a lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ Woso a lemim da ŋ wɔ ʋ.
45003003	K'ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ lɔ? Ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ n sɩra ba minto b'a da ma, an a ka Woso bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a sɩrabarɛ nɔ ʋ ra?
45003004	Fɩɩga! Baa, kʋ gʋaa haay ŋʋaarzaa, Woso gɔɔta an nɩ sɩra m, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Kʋ n n'ɩ dɔ tɩrga ɩ meerbaa nɔ ʋ, bɩ k'ɩ bʋr ɩ jɩnnɔ ra dʋdɔkarɛ nɔ ʋ.
45003005	Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ batɩrgabaa ɩ Woso tɩrgabaa hɩnkarɛ, bɔ wɔɔ k'ʋ a hɩ? K'ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ, Woso gumə ba ʋ kan wɔɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ kɩ a nɔmaa nɔ ʋ ra? Meer naa do kʋ wɔɔ ba naa, gʋɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ meerbaa m.
45003006	A bɩ ncɩnaaʋ y, kʋ n bɛɛ m, Woso y'a bam lɔ k'a durnya dʋdɔ ka?
45003007	Gɛɛ, gʋaa a da ma, an a hɩ a ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋaarbarɛ y'a kam Woso sɩra n'a hɩnkam paan••• a lɛbɔʋrɛ minto, bɔ m kɛɛrɛ, an mɔɔ ba mimbʋnyaazaa, an nɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ?
45003008	A lɔ wɔɔ bɩr mimbʋnyaa barɛ, k'a mɩŋŋa m nyɩnta ʋ? Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ wɔɔ tɔ bʋnyaa hɩm, ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, naa wɔɔ n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m. Kʋ Woso bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro dʋdɔ yar, a gumə ta ʋ.
45003009	Ʋ a nyambʋr ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ lɔ? Wɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ, lɛ wɔɔ da gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ m na? Fɩɩga! Wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ʋ a hɩnka, ʋ ʋ, gʋaa haay, kʋ zɩɩfʋ m, gɛɛ zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ, ŋ yɩ mimbʋnyaa lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ.
45003010	Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ bɩ m, n ʋ: Gʋaa tɩrga ba ʋ y, baa deem taan••• tɔkkɛ,
45003011	Woso mindor ba ʋ y, baa deem taan••• ba ʋ, an n'a kam Woso ma y.
45003012	Ŋ haay, ŋ y'a nyʋnnyɔɔ, ŋ haay jilli, a bʋnyaa ŋn'a bam. Ŋ barla bɩ, a mɩŋŋabarɛzaa ba ʋ y, baa deem taan••• tɔkkɛ.
45003013	Ŋ lɛ meerbaa ɩ gʋɔɔ zaar bam. Bra ŋn'a bɩmbam gʋɔɔ m, a lɛ meerbaa m, ŋ nɛɛm ɩ busum am cɩrka sɛ m.
45003014	Ler kʋsɩ bɔrɛ yɩ ŋ lɛ han, kan meerbaa k'a nɩ busum gʋɔɔ ma kɩ.
45003015	Ŋ kaarɛ kan gərzɛrɛ kɩ.
45003016	Kʋ ŋ bɔ lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ, lɛɛ zaarbarɛ kan kʋsɩ kɩ ŋn'a tore a jɛ ʋ.
45003017	Ŋ n laafɩɩ zaa dɔ y.
45003018	Ŋ mɩm ʋ bɩ, Woso daʋrɛ jɩ ba ʋ y.
45003019	A n bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, hɔ haay kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, a hɩ a nawʋm gʋɔɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m. Kʋ gɔsɩ b'a da ma, an gumə ka a mɩŋŋa ʋ y, kʋ durnya haay m kʋrɔ gumə ma Woso taa.
45003020	Bɩ y'a ka, 'gɔsɩ b'a bam tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ', lɛrɔ wɔɔ zi k'a ŋ ba minto y, lɛrɔ wɔɔ, gʋaa mimbʋnyaa ŋn'a hɩnkam nɩ bala.
45003021	Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso hɔ k'a a ba, an wɔɔ ba tɩrga, bɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ mim b'a nɔ ʋ bɩ hɩnka, amba lɛrɔ wɔɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ ciro nyɩnta ŋn'a hɩ bɩ m.
45003022	Woso ɩ gʋɔɔ bam tɩrga, kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ minto, a ba a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, bala, ŋ hɔdeem, a bɩr ŋ jirə bɔrɛ y.
45003023	Ŋ haay mimbʋnyaa ba, ŋ y'a do Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ gasʋʋrɛ ma.
45003024	Bɩ, Woso ŋ ba tɩrga nɩbɩr, a cicirzɛrɛ nɔ ʋ, Krista Yeezuu k'a nɩ ŋ bʋmbɔm mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
45003025	A mɩŋŋa Woso a bɔ ʋ, k'an ga gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto, k'a tɩrgabaa hɩnka, bala, a nyɩnta an bʋr a ma biisi, a n gʋɔɔ hʋnhʋr ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma y.
45003026	Bɩ her naa, Woso ɩ zaa k'a n'a sam, an nɩ gʋɔɔ bam tɩrga bɩ hɩnkam, bala, a lɛ taa k'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ba tɩrga, k'a gɔɔta a tɩrgabaa nɔ ʋ sɔ.
45003027	Lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ zaa ta ʋ dɔ ra? Fɩɩga! Bɔ minto? Bala, a n ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure bɛɛ y, sɩrakarɛ m.
45003028	Sɩra m, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, n nɩ gʋaa bam tɩrga, bɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
45003029	Gɛɛ, Woso bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ Woso m bala ra? Do vantɔɔ wɔɔ Woso bɛɛ sɔ ra? Ɩɩn•••, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ Woso m sɔ.
45003030	Bala, Woso deem taan••• n ta ʋ, an nɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ bam tɩrga ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, an nɩ do vantɔɔ bam tɩrga sɔ, ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
45003031	Wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ ba a nawʋm hɔ k'a jɩ ba ʋ ra? A bɛɛ m bɩ y, lɛrɔ wɔɔ gore an n'a daŋ ʋ paan•••.
45004001	Kɛɛrɛ naa, bɔ mim wɔɔ n'a hɩm ʋ yaaba Abraham bɩncɛ ʋ? Bɔ hɔ a a yɩ a zi nɩ?
45004002	K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Abraham ba n y'a ʋ tɩrga, a zibəə tɔ ma, a a da ma an a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ, b'a bɩ ncɩnaaʋ y, a b'a dam ma an a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ Woso taa y.
45004003	Bala, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʋ, am naa Woso n a ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.'
45004004	Kʋ gʋaa zi ba, a yawʋra n n'a bam, yawʋra bɩ do, ganwʋrɛ bɛɛ y, hɔ k'a zaa b'a ga m bɩ m bɩ.
45004005	Bɩ gʋaa k'a n hɔsɩ zi ba y, an sɩra ka Woso k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaabər bam tɩrga b'ʋ bɩ, Woso ɩ dɩgam bɩ zaa ma tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ minto.
45004006	Davɩd ɩ gʋaa kʋ Woso dɩga a tɩrga b'a zibəə tɔ ma bɛɛ b'ɩ heernyɩnta mim hɩm sɔ, a ʋ:
45004007	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ, an ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ m.
45004008	Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa kʋ Woso bɩr a mimbʋnyaa darɛ a heer ʋ bɩ m.
45004009	Mimbirenyɩnta naa do zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ hɔ m a minto ra, gɛɛ do vantɔɔ wɔɔ a da ma ŋn'a yɩ sɔ ra? Wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ʋ ʋ: 'Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʋ, Woso n a ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ minto.'
45004010	Ba naa a ʋ brɔ dɔmɩm ʋ? Gasʋ k'a b'a ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ m gɛɛ, gɛɛ a lɛɛ ka a baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ bɩ nɩ? Gasʋ k'a b'a ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ dɔmɩm bɛɛ y, a lɛɛ ka, bɩ ma bɩ, a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y.
45004011	Dɔmɩm kʋ Abraham n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ, Woso a ba tɩrga, bɩ jɛ nɩ, Woso n bɔkarɛ, an a da ʋ, k'an gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. Kʋ bɩ m nyɩnta makra, an a hɩnka a ʋ, Woso Abraham ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Abraham n a ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra kam Woso ʋ haay yaaba, baa kʋ ŋ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y. Kʋ Woso n brɔɔ ba tɩrga sɔ, ŋ sɩrakarɛ minto.
45004012	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ yaaba m sɔ, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ ŋnɩ sɩra ka Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, amba Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ m.
45004013	Woso k'a durnya soʋre ler bɔ Abraham m kan a yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ m bɩ, lɛrɔ zuure minto bɛɛ y, k'a Abraham ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ m.
45004014	Kʋ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ n nawʋm lɛrɔ zuure tɔ ma, sɩrakarɛ jɩ ba ʋ dɔ y, lerbɔrɛ bɩ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ sɔ y.
45004015	Bala, lɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ zɛm Woso nɔmaa m, bɩ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛrɔ ba ʋ y, lɛrɔ bɩsɩkama ba ʋ sɔ y.
45004016	Naa y'a ka sɩrakarɛ n nɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm, k'an yɩ Woso ganwʋrɛ k'a n'a kam, kʋ lerbɔrɛ bɩ n nyɩnta Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ haay hɔ. Yaŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m a deem nɩ y, yaŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka am Abraham hɔ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, ʋ woo•••, ʋ zɩ m Abraham m.
45004017	Denter m, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ cɩnta mɔɔ ʋ, k'ɩ yɩ doro gʋta zɩ.' Wɔɔ zɩ m Abraham m, Woso k'a sɩra ka ʋ bɩ taa. Woso k'a nɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, an n'a kam hɔ k'a ba ʋ nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ m.
45004018	Abraham sɩra ka an a ta a heer lɛ a ʋ, a hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm, baa kʋ hɔsɩ ba ʋ, an nɩ yom ma k'a a dɔ a ʋ, a hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm bɩ, a a gu an sɩra ka, an b'a ba doro gʋta yaaba, amba Woso a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ yaŋŋɔɔ zɛm bɩ yɩ gʋta' bɩ m.
45004019	Abraham dɔɔraa k'a bɩ ta an zɔrɔ ku, Saara n gusi sɔ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ nyɩ yɩ dɔ bɩ, Abraham sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa gɔɔta a n a bɔrɛ y.
45004020	A n sɩnsɩm ka Woso lerbɔrɛ bɩ ma y, bɩ, sɩrakarɛ bɩ paŋŋa ka ʋ, an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ.
45004021	A n a nyasʋ a heer ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ a ʋ, kʋ Woso hɔ ler bɔ, a ɩ paŋŋa m sɔ, k'a ka k'an kʋ yɩ.
45004022	Naa minto m, Woso n Abraham ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
45004023	Kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Woso Abraham ba tɩrga' bɩ, Abraham y'a deem tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
45004024	Wɔɔ tɔ ma n sɔ, bala, n wɔɔ bam tɩrga, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ sɩra kam, Woso k'a wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ b'ʋ.
45004025	Woso a ka n n'a zɛ gər wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ, k'a wɔɔ ba tɩrga.
45005001	Woso wɔɔ ba tɩrga, wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ minto, wɔɔ n laafɩɩ yɩ kan Woso kɩ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
45005002	Yeezuu Krista minto m, wɔɔ n b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ Woso cicirzɛrɛ yɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, cicirzɛrɛ bɩ do wɔɔ jɩm ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, bɩ wɔɔ y'ʋ heer nyɔɔm, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ taaheerlɛ m, ʋ ʋ, ʋ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
45005003	A n lɛ da bɩ, wɔɔ y'ʋ heer nyɔɔrɛ ʋ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ, bala, wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, fɩryɩrɛ n nɩ zɛm tʋntɔʋrɛ m,
45005004	tʋntɔʋrɛ n nɩ zɛm mim dama m, mim dama n nɩ zɛm taaheerlɛ m.
45005005	Taaheerlɛ naa do bɩ wɔɔ dam nyannɩ ʋ y, bala, Woso a ŋʋarɛ k'an ta m wɔɔ minto bɩ da wɔɔ heer ʋ an a han, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
45005006	Sɩra m, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a ku bɩ, wɔɔ n nɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, ʋ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ ʋ yɔ bɩ, Krista ga wɔɔ mimbʋnyaazannɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
45005007	A wer ta ʋ, kʋ gʋaa n yɛ, an ga gʋaa tɩrga tɔ ma. A a da ma gʋaa n yɛ, an ga gʋaa mɩŋŋa tɔ ma barɛ m.
45005008	Hɔ kʋ Woso a ba k'a wɔɔ ŋʋa k'a nawʋm bɩ hɩnka bɩ ba n nɩ: Wɔɔ nyɩnta mimbʋnyaabənno, Krista n a gu an ga wɔɔ tɔ ma.
45005009	Woso k'awɔɔ ba tɩrga, Krista k'a ga wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ minto bɩ, an lɛ da haay bɩ, a wɔɔ bɔ lɛ m Woso heerbusu nɔ ʋ.
45005010	Bala, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ Woso jɩnnɔ bɩ, a zu kʋ ʋ kan a Nyɩ bɩ garɛ kɩ, an wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ. K'a wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, a wɔɔ bʋmbɔm sɔ a Nyɩ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa m.
45005011	Naa bɛɛ n'a deem nɩ y, wɔɔ y'ʋ heer nyɔɔm sɔ Woso nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, a ɩ wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ.
45005012	Gʋaa deem taan••• y'a ka mimbʋnyaa n gasʋ durnya ʋ, Adam m. Mimbʋnyaa bɩ do m bʋr zɛ m. Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, zɛ n a kərgu gʋɔɔ haay ra, bala, ŋ haay mimbʋnyaa ba.
45005013	Mimbʋnyaa lɛɛ ka an nɩ durnya ʋ, Woso n bɔkarɛ an lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka Moyiisi ʋ, bɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ba ʋ bɩ, Woso bɩr gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaa taar karɛ ŋ la y.
45005014	Kan bɩ kɩ, an a sa Adam dɔmɩm bɩ ma, an ta Moyiisi dɔmɩm ra bɩ, zɛ a so gʋɔɔ ʋ, baa gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Adam mimbʋnyaa bɩ lɔɔ ba rɔ wɔɔ, zɛ brɔɔ zɛ sɔ. Adam nyɩnta Krista k'a a ga m, an bʋr bɩ bɔkʋʋrɛzaa.
45005015	Bɩ, Woso ganwʋrɛ k'a n'a kam vam bɩ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Adam kʋrɔma bɩ kɩ y. Sɩra m, gʋaa deem kʋrɔma ɩ bʋr gʋaa cir zɛ m, bɩ Woso ganwʋrɛ bɩ gʋtabaa lɛ da, Woso ganwʋrɛ bɩ do ka gʋɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa deem taan••• tɔ ma, Yeezuu Krista m, bɩ tɔ ma m, Woso n barka ka gʋaa cir ʋ gʋta.
45005016	Hɔ kʋ Woso ganwʋrɛ bɩ n nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ bɩ hɔdeem kan hɔ kʋ gʋaa deem kʋrɔma n nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ kɩ y. Bala, Adam deem taan••• kʋrɔma kʋ Woso a dʋdɔ yar b'a ka, gʋaa haay nɩ mimbʋnyaa kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ. A n bɔkarɛ, mimbʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba gʋta bɩ kur bɩ, Woso ganwʋrɛ bɩ ŋ ba tɩrga.
45005017	A yɩ sɩra, gʋaa deem mimbʋnyaa y'a ka, zɛ n a so gʋaa haay ʋ gʋaa deem bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ Yeezuu Krista deem tɔ ma, gʋɔɔ ɩ hɔ yɩm Woso zi gʋta, a y'a ganwʋrɛ gʋta bɩ karɛ ŋ ʋ nɩbɩr, an nɩ ŋ bam tɩrga. Krista tɔ ma, ŋ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ, ŋnɩ cirbəə bɩ.
45005018	K'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, gʋaa deem kʋrɔma k'a a ka, gʋaa haay nɩ mimbʋnyaa kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, gʋaa deem tɩrgabaa zibəə gʋaa haay bʋmbɔ an ŋ ba tɩrga, kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba.
45005019	Gʋaa deem bɩsɩkarɛ k'a ka gʋɔɔ haay n a ba mimbʋnyaabənno Woso mɩm ʋ bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, gʋaa deem k'a yɛ Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma b'a ka, gʋɔɔ gʋta n a ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ.
45005020	A n bɔkarɛ, bʋr kʋ lɛ b'ʋ bɩ, a a ka mimbʋnyaa n a ba gʋta, bɩ, lɛɛ kʋ mimbʋnyaa pasɩ ʋ bɩ, Woso barka nyɩnta ʋ gʋta an lɛ da.
45005021	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, amba mimbʋnyaa a so gʋɔɔ ʋ zɛ tɔ ma bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, Woso barka y'a som gʋɔɔ ʋ tɩrgabaa tɔ ma, k'a ka, kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ yɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
45006001	Bɔ wɔɔ k'ʋ a hɩ kɛɛrɛ? Ʋ gɔɔta ʋ bɩr mimbʋnyaa bam, kʋ Woso cicirzɛrɛ n a da ra gɛ?
45006002	Ayy•••, fɩɩga! Kʋ mimbʋnyaa mim bɩncɛ nɩ, gəəno m wɔɔ m, wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ kɛɛrɛ k'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ?
45006003	Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, batɛm kʋ wɔɔ si bɩ, ʋ ba wɔɔ ʋ deem kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ a garɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ ra?
45006004	Batɛm bɩ sire nɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ bir n y'a ʋ kan kɩ a zɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ Krista a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ Zɩ paŋŋa m bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa daa ba.
45006005	Bala, ʋ ba kʋ wɔɔ ʋ deem kan kɩ a zɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ y'ʋ bam deem kan kɩ sɔ a mɩmbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
45006006	Ʋ a dɔ mɩŋŋa, ʋ ʋ, mɩsɩrbaa kʋ wɔɔ n ta m biisi bɩ, n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma kan Krista kɩ. Kʋ mimbʋnyaa k'a nɩ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ paŋŋa n a da, k'ʋ bɩ nyɩnta mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ dɔ y.
45006007	Denter m, gʋaa k'a ga bɩ, mimbʋnyaa paŋŋa ba zi dɔ y.
45006008	Bala, kʋ wɔɔ ga kan Krista kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ sɩra ka, ʋ ʋ, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bam kan kɩ sɔ.
45006009	Bala, Krista k'a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ, a bɩ gam dɔ y, zɛ paŋŋa ba zi dɔ y.
45006010	Krista ga gallɛm deem, an a gʋ kʋ ma kan mimbʋnyaa kɩ, dɔmɩm haay minto. Dɩɩtaa naa, a mɩsɩr, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba a nawʋm Woso tɔ ma.
45006011	Awɔɔ sɔ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ gɩnga, a a gʋ kʋ ma kan mimbʋnyaa kɩ, bɩ awɔɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam kɛɛrɛ Woso tɔ ma, Yeezuu Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
45006012	A b'a ya, a ka kʋ mimbʋnyaa n a so a mɛ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ga b'ʋ y, a yaa a ka awɔɔ n zu a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ʋ.
45006013	A b'a mɛ vəŋŋəro sa, a ŋ ka mimbʋnyaa ʋ, k'an ŋ sa an ŋ ba a zibəə mɔr y. Awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ sa a ka Woso ʋ, a mɩm awɔɔ bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, k'a mɛ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ sa, a ŋ ba zi mɩŋŋa barɛ mɔr.
45006014	Mimbʋnyaa bɛɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ dɔ y, bala, awɔɔ ba lɛ nɔ ʋ y, Woso barka nɔ awɔɔ n ta ʋ.
45006015	Naa jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Kʋ lɛ bɛɛ y'a so wɔɔ ʋ dɔ, bɩ Woso barka wɔɔ n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a nam bɩ lɛ m, k'ʋ mimbʋnyaa ba ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga!
45006016	Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, k'awɔɔ a mɩŋŋa sa, a ka gʋaa ʋ k'a zu a hɔɔnhɔ ʋ, gʋaa k'awɔɔ nɩ zure a hɔɔnhɔ ʋ bɩ lɔnnɔ n'awɔɔ m na? A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, bɩ mimbʋnyaa a ka awɔɔ n gɩnga, gɛɛ kʋ Woso hɔɔnhɔ awɔɔ nɩ zuŋ ʋ, bɩ Woso mɩsɩrbaa k'an tɩrga ka awɔɔ ʋ.
45006017	Bɩ, ʋ Woso barka da. Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ biisi mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ bɩ zu hɔdɩndarɛ kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda awɔɔ m b'ʋ kan a heer kɩ haay.
45006018	Awɔɔ yɔ kʋ n y'a ʋ mimbʋnyaa wɔ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ a ba tɩrgabaa lɔnnɔ.
45006019	Makrarɔ yaargarɛrɔ mɔɔ ŋ sa meerbaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ ma, bala, awɔɔ bɩr a dam ma, an nɩ minno wɔɔ jɩ marɛ y. Amba awɔɔ nyɩnta biisi, a a mɩŋŋɔɔ ba dintim kan zibʋnyaa do haay kɩ zibəə lɔnnɔ, a a ba Woso bɩsɩkamazannɔ bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ba tɩrgabaa zibəə lɔnnɔ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba Woso mɩm m.
45006020	Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ rɔ wɔɔ, tɩrgabaa zibəə mim n nyɩnta awɔɔ ma y.
45006021	Bɔ awɔɔ yɩ, zibəəro wɔɔ duro nɔ ʋ? Ŋ nyannɩ ta awɔɔ m her, bala, ŋ nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, zɛ m.
45006022	Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, n y'awɔɔ yɔ mimbʋnyaa wɔ ʋ, a a ba Woso lɔnnɔ, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩrɛ a nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ m, a nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩrɛ m.
45006023	Bala, mimbʋnyaa yawʋra bɩ, zɛ m, bɩ ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso n'a kam nɩbɩr bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
45007001	M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a ŋʋam kʋ m a hɩ awɔɔ m naa dɔ mɩŋŋa, bala, awɔɔ lɛrɔ dɔ. Ba gʋaa gɔɔta an mɩsɩr bɩ lɛ tɩr a so ʋ. K'a zaa bɩ ga, lɛ n a so ʋ dɔ y.
45007002	Ʋ makra sa: lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, n y'a cɩnta kʋ lʋ b'a gʋ a zim ma k'a zim bɩ bɛɛ bɩ ga y, bɩ k'a zim bɩ ga, lɛ k'a so lʋ b'ʋ k'an gɔɔta an bɩr kan a zim bɩ kɩ a mɩsɩrbaa dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ n a ya, an a so lʋ b'ʋ dɔ y.
45007003	Bɩ, kʋ lʋ bɩ gʋaa vanta sa a zim bɩ nɩ meeyaa m, lʋ bɩ bir n nawʋm jaandər. Bɩ k'a zim bɩ bɩ ga, lɛ bɩ n a ya, an a so ʋ dɔ y, a a da ma an gʋaa vanta sa, bɩ n b'a dam ma n a hɩ ma jaandər y.
45007004	M danyɩnɔ, a maam sɔ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ biisi. Kɛɛrɛ naa, a zɛ awɔɔ ʋ kʋ ra kan Krista k'a ga wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ kɩ, lɛ n a ya, an a so awɔɔ ʋ dɔ y, awɔɔ gɩnga sɔ. Gʋaa vanta y'a so awɔɔ ʋ kɛɛrɛ, gʋaa k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ m, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma ʋ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ ba Woso tɔ ma.
45007005	Bala, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ biisi, ʋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto bɩ, lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ wɔɔ mɛ jilli bɩ dam zi bʋnyaarɔ barɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ tam wɔɔ m zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
45007006	Biisi bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ba n y'a ʋ a lɔnnɔ, ŋn'a so wɔɔ ʋ, kɛɛrɛ naa, lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, gɩnga wɔɔ ʋ, Woso wɔɔ bɔ ŋ wɔ ʋ. Kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ ʋ da ma, ʋ Woso zi ba zaa daa nɔ ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zaa m, lɛrɔ zaa gusire k'a nɩ Moyiisi ci ʋ bɩ bɛɛ dɔ y.
45007007	Naa jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Mimbʋnyaa m, lɛrɔ wɔɔ m na? Ayy•••, fɩɩga! Bɩ, kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m, mɔɔ b'a dɔm kʋ bɔ m mimbʋnyaa y. Bala, mɔɔ bɩ gʋaa hɔ lɛtaamarɔ dɔrɛ, kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y'a cɩnta, ŋ ʋ: 'Ɩ b'a ka ɩ lɛ m bɩr gʋaa hɔ zi y.'
45007008	A m naa, mimbʋnyaa n a na lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta rɔ wɔɔ ma, an zaa yɩ mɔɔ gʋr zi, an mɔɔ lɛ ka gʋaa hɔ lɛtaama do haay zi. Bala, kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ba ʋ, mimbʋnyaa bɩ, hɔ gər m.
45007009	Biisi bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ mɩsɩr. Bɩ, lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ bɩ bʋr bɩ, mimbʋnyaa n a mɩm bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ m ga.
45007010	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa mim bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ler bɔm mɔɔ m, brɔɔ a ka mɔɔ n ga.
45007011	Bala, a na mimbʋnyaa b'ʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ m, an bra ba mɔɔ m, an a ka, lɛrɔ wɔɔ n mɔɔ zɛ gər.
45007012	Bɩ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a to ŋ y'a ʋ Woso zi, lɛ biyəə mɩŋŋa, a tɩrga, hɔ mɩŋŋa m.
45007013	Bɩ, hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n ga ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga! Mimbʋnyaa ɩ mɔɔ zɛ, hɔ mɩŋŋa a a sa, an mɔɔ zɛ m gər. Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ mimbʋnyaa bʋnyaabaa n a hɩnka. Lɛrɔ wɔɔ y'a ka, mimbʋnyaa bʋnyaabaa gʋtabaa n a hɩnka paan•••.
45007014	Wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ a to ŋ y'a ʋ Woso zi. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, gʋaa m mɔɔ m bala, mimbʋnyaa n mɔɔ si, an mɔɔ ba a lɔ.
45007015	Mɔɔ bɩr m zi kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam jɩ dɔrɛ y, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m a ba bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr bɩ barɛ y, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m a ba bɩ, mɔɔ n'a bam.
45007016	Bɩ, k'a nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ baa bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, mɔɔ yɛ kɛɛrɛ m ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋa.
45007017	A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ bʋnyaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, mɔɔ bɛɛ n'a barɛ y, mimbʋnyaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ n'a bam.
45007018	Bala, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ gʋr zi, (b'ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ: mɔɔ mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ) hɔ mɩŋŋa ba ʋ y. Mɔɔ ɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ lɛtaama m, bɩ mɔɔ ba a barɛ paŋŋa nɩ y.
45007019	Mɔɔ bɩr zi mɩŋŋa kʋ mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam bɩ barɛ y, zi bʋnyaa kʋ mɔɔ bɩr a ŋʋam bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam.
45007020	Kʋ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ baa bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa bɛɛ n'a barɛ y, mimbʋnyaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
45007021	Mɔɔ tɩr a yɩm, kʋ mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ba a paŋŋa nɩ y. Zi bʋnyaa barɛ paŋŋa mɔɔ m ta m bala.
45007022	A ɩ yɩrɛ ʋ, mɔɔ heer nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa,
45007023	bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ lɛ vanta yɩrɛ an nɩ zi bam mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, an nɩ zoo bam kan lɛrɔ niŋŋoo kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔn nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Lɛ vanta bɩ do k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ n'a kam, mɔɔ nɩ m bam mimbʋnyaa paŋŋa k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ lɔ.
45007024	Cicirzaa m mɔɔ m! Nka nɩ mɔɔ yɔm mɛ k'a nɩ tam mɔɔ m zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ wɔ ʋ?
45007025	Woso m, Yeezuu Krista wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ tɔ ma, Woso m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ! Naa haay tɔ ma, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa nɩ, mɔɔ hɔɔn mɔɔ ba Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɔ, mɔɔ mɛsim n bɔkarɛ an mɔɔ ba mimbʋnyaa lɔ.
45008001	Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso b'a yarɛ an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar y.
45008002	Bala, Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ, lɛ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a sa k'a mɩsɩrbaa ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, a mɔɔ bʋmbɔ lɛ k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaa m k'a nyɩnta k'a mɔɔ gaa a ta mɔɔ m zɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ wɔ ʋ.
45008003	Hɔ kʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ n a da ma ŋn'a ba, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a da ma ŋnɩ zu ʋ bɩ minto bɩ, Woso hɔ bɩ do ba. Woso k'a a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ mɛsim nɔ ʋ, an bʋr mimbʋnyaabənno mɛsim m k'a bɩ ŋ yɔ mimbʋnyaa wɔ ʋ bɩ, a mimbʋnyaa dʋdɔ yar.
45008004	Naa do ba Woso ʋ, kʋ tɩrgabaa kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta bɩ n kʋ yɩ, wɔɔ gʋr zi. Wɔɔ k'ʋ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa bam dɔ mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ m.
45008005	Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɛsim mɩsɩrbaa bam nɔ wɔɔ, hɔ kʋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do lɛ n taa ŋn'a kam ma, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri lɛ n taa bɩ ŋn'a kam ma.
45008006	Mɛsim hɔɔnhɔrɔ kama bɩ, ta a nawʋm gʋaa m zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔɔnhɔ kama bɩ, ta a nawʋm gʋaa m mɩsɩrbaa kan laafɩɩ kɩ bɩncɛ ʋ.
45008007	Bala, Woso jɩnnɔ m mɛsim hɔɔnhɔrɔ wɔɔ m, bala, mɛsim bɩr zum Woso lɛ ʋ y, a b'a dam ma sɔ an zu ʋ y.
45008008	Maam sɔ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ Woso nɔ yɩ y.
45008009	K'awɔɔ nɩ, mɛsim bɛɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, bala, Woso Ɛspri b'ɩ y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ. Kʋ gʋaa ba Krista Ɛspri bɩ nɩ, Krista gʋaa bɛɛ n'a zaa nɩ y.
45008010	Bɩ, Krista y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, sɩra m, awɔɔ mɛ bɩ zɛm bɩ ga mimbʋnyaa tɔ ma. Bɩ, kʋ n y'awɔɔ ba tɩrga minto bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri mɩsɩrbaa y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
45008011	Kʋ Woso k'a Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ Ɛspri y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, Woso bɩ do, k'a Yeezuu Krista mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan a Ɛspri bɩ kɩ, an mɩsɩrbaa ka awɔɔ mɛ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ga b'ʋ.
45008012	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, pakra bɛɛ m, kʋ wɔɔ n zu mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ b'ʋ dɔ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a ŋʋam bɩ wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ a ba.
45008013	Bala, k'awɔɔ y'a mɩsɩrbaa bam a mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ gɩngarɛ, bɩ k'awɔɔ a mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ zibəəro wɔɔ da jɩm ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bam.
45008014	Bala, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ Woso Ɛspri n nɩ karɛ ŋ lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ m Woso nyɩnɔ.
45008015	Ɛspri kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩr awɔɔ bam lɔnnɔ, k'awɔɔ n a ya a bɩr nyibəə nɔ ʋ y, Ɛspri bɩ do, awɔɔ ba a nawʋm Woso nyɩnɔ, an n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ Woso birm, ʋ ʋ: 'Aba', a jɩ k'a hɩ a ʋ: 'Baaba'.
45008016	Ɛspri bɩ do n n'a kam wɔɔ n n'a dɔrɛ ʋ heer ʋ mɩŋŋa, ʋ ʋ, Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m.
45008017	Kʋ Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ, wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'ʋ so hɔnta k'a cɩnta wɔɔ m b'ʋ, wɔɔ zɛm b'ʋ so ʋ kan Krista kɩ, bala, kʋ wɔɔ fɩr yɩ kan kɩ, wɔɔ nyɩntam kan kɩ a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ sɔ.
45008018	Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʋ, fɩr k'ʋ n'a yɩm her naa b'a dam ma fɩɩgaa, an a makra ba kan lɛbɔʋrɛ kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a hɩnka wɔɔ m bɩ kɩ y.
45008019	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, durnya nɩ dɔm Woso nyɩnɔ hɩnkarɛ dɔmɩm ma, kan a heer kɩ haay.
45008020	Durnya bɩ haay a ba hɔ vam, a bɛɛ y'a ŋʋa maam nɩ y, Woso k'a a da vambaa ma bɩ minto m, bɩ durnya gɔɔta an n'a gɩngam k'a bɩ bɔ vambaa bɩ nɔ ʋ.
45008021	Bala, Woso durnya bɩ yɔm vambaa lɔmbaa bɩ wɔ ʋ sɔ k'an zɛkʋra yɩ kan Woso nyɩnɔ wɔɔ soamɩŋŋaʋ kɩ, kan ŋ lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ kɩ sɔ.
45008022	A n bɔkarɛ wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, durnya bɩ jilli ɩ fɩr yɩm, an nɩ kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ dɩɩtaa, amba lʋ k'a nɩ nyoosi bam bɩ m.
45008023	Durnya bɩ bɛɛ n'a deem nɩ y, wɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm ʋ heer ʋ, dɔ kʋ wɔɔ nawʋm dɔmɩm kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm bɩ wɔɔ ba a nyɩnɔ paan•••rɔ, an wɔɔ mɛ bʋmbɔ bɩ ma. Woso Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka wɔɔ ʋ lɛɛkarɛ ganwʋrɛ, k'ʋ bɔkarɛ ʋ bɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ yɩ.
45008024	Bala, wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, bɩ gɩnga nɔ ʋ m. Kʋ gʋaa ɩ hɔ k'a n'a gɩngam k'a b'a yɩ bɩ yɩrɛ a mɩm m, gɩnga bɛɛ m bɩ dɔ y, nka n'a yarɛ an hɔ k'a n'a yɩrɛ a mɩm m gɩnga?
45008025	Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ bɩr a yɩrɛ ʋ mɩm m bɩ gɩngarɛ, dɔ wɔɔ nawʋm ma kan bʋraama kɩ.
45008026	Maam sɔ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ zɛm sɔ, an n'a dam wɔɔ han, ʋ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ. Bala, kʋ wɔɔ n yaadarɛ dɔ an a ga kʋ ʋ ba bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri mɩŋŋa ɩ yaa dam wɔɔ tɔ ma, hoonsibɔɔrɛ kʋ gʋaa b'a dam ma an a jɩ hɩ nɔ ʋ.
45008027	Bɩ, Woso k'a hɔ k'a nɩ gʋaa heer ʋ dɔ bɩ, a hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ. Bala, yaa kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a dam wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a da a nawʋm amba Woso n lɛ n taa bɩ m.
45008028	Wɔɔ dɔ sɔ, ʋ ʋ, Woso n n'a kam mim haay woo••• nɩ kʋ zɛŋ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yɩm mɩŋŋa gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ bir amba a a cɩnta bɩ m.
45008029	Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso lɛɛ ka, an ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a a cɩnta sɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan a Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, k'a Nyɩ bɩ m yɩ Nyɩ jɩtaarɛ danyɩnɔ cir bireyaa ʋ.
45008030	Gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso lɛɛ ka an ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a ŋ bir sɔ, ŋ bir k'a ʋ bɩ, a ŋ ba tɩrga, k'a ŋ ba tɩrga bɩ, a ŋ tɔ busu a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ sɔ.
45008031	Bɔ wɔɔ n'ʋ yarɛ ʋ a hɩ? Kʋ Woso ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, nka m nɩ bʋrm wɔɔ ra?
45008032	Woso n a mɩŋŋa Nyɩnnɩ bɩ bɔ lɛ m y, a a ka ŋn'a zɛ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma. K'a a yo an yɛ naa do ma bɩ, a hɔ haay kam wɔɔ ʋ kan a Nyɩ bɩ kɩ.
45008033	Nka m nɩ mim kam gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ra? Gɔsɩ, bala, Woso nɩ ŋ bam tɩrga.
45008034	Nka m nɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarlɛ? Gɔsɩ, bala, Yeezuu Krista ɩ ga, an lɛ da bɩ, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ, an nɩ nyɩntam Woso bɩsɩ ʋ, an nɩ yaa dam wɔɔ tɔ ma.
45008035	Nka m nɩ wɔɔ gʋm ŋʋarɛ kʋ Krista n ta m wɔɔ minto bɩ ma? Fɩryɩrɛ m gɛɛ heerzɛkʋma nɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir kam wɔɔ ma rɔ m gɛɛ nɔ nɩ, ta dɩgɩbaa m gɛɛ mim kʋsɩ nɩ, gɛɛ zɛ nɩ?
45008036	Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ bɩ m, n ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma m, n nɩ wɔɔ zɩnzɛm wakatɩ haay nɔ ʋ, n yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, am seero kʋ ŋ nɩ tam k'a yaa n ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
45008037	Bɩ, naa haay nɔ ʋ, damazannɔ paan•••rɔ m wɔɔ m, a zaa k'a wɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ tɔ ma.
45008038	Bala, mɔɔ dɔ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, m ʋ: zɛ, gɛɛ mɩsɩrbaa, malɛɛkarɔ gɛɛ paŋŋasoʋrezannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ, hɔ k'an ta ʋ her, gɛɛ an nɩ zɛm booti m, paŋŋazannɔ haay,
45008039	mim ʋ paŋŋazannɔ, gɛɛ paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara ʋ, gɛɛ hɔ kʋ Woso a da haay, sɩ b'a dam ma an wɔɔ gʋ ŋʋarɛ kʋ Woso n ta m, wɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ ma y.
45009001	Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩm, Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩr ŋʋaar barɛ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a zɛ kʋ ra kan mɔɔ heer kɩ, ŋnɩ mɔɔ sɩra bɩ hɩrɛ kasɛtɩ karɛ.
45009002	Mɔɔ ɩ heerzaarbarɛ gʋta m, m heer nɩ busum dɔmɩm haay.
45009003	Mɔɔ y'a ŋʋam k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Woso kaanm mɔɔ m, m bɩr laatʋ Krista ma, m danyɩnɔ, m zɩrɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ, naa yɩm ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ.
45009004	Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m Israyɛl zannɔ, Woso n ŋ bɔ ʋ k'a ŋ ba a nyɩnɔ, an a lɛbɔʋrɛ ka ŋ ʋ kan a gʋaasɩbabaa zaarɔ kɩ, a lɛrɔ kɩ, a Woso daʋrɛ zaa kɩ, lerbɔrɛrɔ kɩ.
45009005	Ŋ yaabɔɔ m Abraham m, Izakkɩ kan Zakɔɔb kɩ m. Kʋ yɩrɛ nɔ ʋ nɩ, Krista bɩ, ŋ do gʋaa m. Krista mɩŋŋa nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ. A m Woso, a tɔ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ. Amina!
45009006	A bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, jɩra Woso ʋ ler k'a bɔ bɩ ra wa, bɩ, Israyɛl yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ haay bɛɛ m Israyɛl do gʋɔɔ paan•••rɔ y,
45009007	Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ haay bɛɛ n a nyɩnɔ paan•••rɔ y, bala, Woso a hɩ Abraham m, a ʋ: 'Izakkɩ n n'ɩ nyɩnɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ler bɔ ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ yɩrɛ.'
45009008	Naa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: nyɩnɔ kʋ gʋaa nɩ ŋ yɩrɛ, am gʋaa haay hɔ bɩ m bɩ, brɔɔ bɛɛ m Woso nyɩnɔ y, bɩ nyɩnɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ n nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma yaŋŋɔɔ paan•••rɔ.
45009009	Ler kʋ Woso a bɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: 'Kʋ dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ cɩnta b'a ku, mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m bʋr, Saara m nyɩyar yɩ.'
45009010	Naa bɛɛ n a deem nɩ y, cirgərenyɩnɔ kʋ Rebeka ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ zɩ deem, wɔɔ yaaba Izakkɩ m.
45009011	A n bɔkarɛ, Woso y'a mɩŋŋa zaa m, an n'a gʋaa bɔŋ ʋ a hɔɔnhɔ ma, a bɩr dɩgam zi kʋ gʋɔɔ a ba bɩ ma y, dɩga a nawʋm a mɩŋŋa lɛtaama ma, an nɩ gʋɔɔ birm. Woso k'a lɛ n taa kʋ zaa naa do n gɔɔta an bɩr ta ʋ bɩ, an a to nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m yɩ y. Maam bɩ, ŋ n a da ma ŋnɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa, gɛɛ hɔ bʋnyaa ba y.
45009012	A n lɛɛ ka nyɩnɔ wɔɔ yɩrɛ ma bɩ, a a hɩ Rebeka m, a ʋ: 'Nyɩnɔ wɔɔ poore bɩ n n'a som jɩtaarɛ b'ʋ.'
45009013	Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ Zakɔɔb ŋʋa, m Eso bɔ m jɛ m' bɩ m.
45009014	Bɔ wɔɔ kʋ a hɩ? Kʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ, Woso bɩr a zi bam tɩrga ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga!
45009015	Bala, Woso a hɩ Moyiisi m, a ʋ: 'Gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, mɔɔ nɩ m ŋʋarɛ zi bam kan kɩ, gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, mɔɔ n'a cicir zɛ m.'
45009016	Woso mɩŋŋabaa bɩ bɩr zum kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa hɔɔnhɔ kɩ y, b'a ba a zibəə ma sɔ y. Woso deem an ta ma, kʋ nka a lɛ n taa b'a bɩ zaa cicir zɛ.
45009017	Naa minto m Wosoci bɩ n'a hɩ Eziptɩ cir m, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ cɩnta cir kʋ m m paŋŋa bɩ hɩnka, bɩsɩ k'ɩ n'a kam mɔɔ ma bɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ tɔ m bɔ durnya lɛɛ haay ʋ.'
45009018	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ nka Woso lɛ n taa, b'a cicir zɛ, kʋ nka a lɛ n taa sɔ, b'a ka sɔ a zaa n a ba bɩsɩkər heerkarɛ nɔ ʋ.
45009019	Gʋaa a da ma an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, bɔ m Woso n a ya, an nɩ həən sim gʋɔɔ ma? Bala, nka n'a dam ma an bɩsɩ ka a hɔɔnhɔ ma?"
45009020	Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m gʋaa, bɔ zaa n'ɩbɩɩ m k'ɩ bɩsɩ ka kan Woso kɩ? Taanm y'a hɩm a dɔrɛ zaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ dɔ ncɩnaaʋ gɛ?"
45009021	Mɔrdor y'a so ji k'a nɩ zi bam nɩ b'ʋ, a a da ma, an ji deem-deem bɩ yɔɔ an mɔr dɔ m cibsa tɔ ma, an mɔr dɔ m sɔ, dɔmɩm haay zibəə tɔ ma.
45009022	Woso a ŋʋa k'a a nɔmaa hɩnka, a a ŋʋa sɔ kʋ n n'a paŋŋa dɔ, an bɔkarɛ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ga dʋdɔyarlɛ m Woso nɔ k'a ma ʋ kan ŋ kɩ bɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ, Woso a gu an bʋr a mɩŋŋa ma, an ŋ dʋdɔ yar y.
45009023	K'a lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋtabaa hɩnka gʋɔɔ k'a nɩ ŋ cicir zɛm nɔ wɔɔ m. Lɛɛ a ka an brɔɔ banka k'a lɛbɔʋrɛ ka ŋ ʋ.
45009024	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro m wɔɔ m, a n wɔɔ bir zɩɩfʋrɔ barla bala y, wɔɔ bir a ʋ sɔ doro vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ barla.
45009025	Naa Woso a hɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ozee ci ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Do kʋ mɔɔ do bɛɛ m bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩm ma, m do, do kʋ mɔɔ bɩr a ŋʋam biisi bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩm ma, m ŋʋarɛ do.
45009026	Lɛɛ kʋ n y'a hɩm nɩ hɔɔ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ do bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m bɩ,' lɛɛ bɩ do n ŋ birŋ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ nyɩnɔ.'
45009027	Ezayii Israyɛl do bɩ mim hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: 'Baa kʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ pasɩ, an higʋta lɛ ra nyɩntaayaa m bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ ŋ barla rɔ wɔɔ, bɩ yɩm gʋta y.
45009028	Bala, Zuuba hɔ k'a nyɩnta an a hɩ haay bɩ bam tara burə ʋ zɔɔ-zɔɔ.'
45009029	Amba Ezayii a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: Kʋ hɔ haay Zuuba bɩ bɛɛ yaŋŋɔɔ to wɔɔ m poore y, bɔ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ ʋ kan Sodɔm kʋ kɩ, ʋ ʋ ba am Gomɔɔr kʋ hɔ bɩ m.
45009030	Naa jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ n nyɩnta ŋ n'a ka tɩrgabaa ma rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ tɩrgabaa yɩ, tɩrgabaa k'a a to sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ m.
45009031	A n bɔkarɛ, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam lɛro kʋ ŋ nɩ tɩrgabaa karɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋ n zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ y.
45009032	Bɔ minto nɩ? A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Israyɛl n a ka ma k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa Woso mɩm ʋ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ y, a ka a ʋ ma, k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, ŋn'a gəm zɛ, gənzɛrɛ jaa bɩ ma,
45009033	amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ bɩ m, n ʋ: K'a dɩga a, mɔɔ ɩ gənzɛrɛ jaa cɩntam Siyɔn ʋ, jaa m, an nɩ gʋaa dom. Bɩ kʋ gʋaa sɩra ka ʋ, a bɩ nyannɩ bɩrɛ y.
45010001	M danyɩnɔ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa, m n'a yɛm Woso han bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
45010002	Bala, mɔɔ m da ma, m a hɩ, m ʋ, ŋ y'a tʋntɔŋ ʋ Woso kama nɔ ʋ, bɩ hɔdɔrɛ ɩ jɩra tʋntɔʋrɛ bɩ do nɔ ʋ.
45010003	Kʋ ŋ n Woso k'a nɩ gʋaa bam tɩrga bɩ zaa jɩ dɔ bɩ, a mɩŋŋɔɔ m tɩrgabaa zaa ŋ y'a cɩnta, naa do a ka ŋ n zu zaa kʋ Woso nɩ gʋaa bam tɩrga b'ʋ y.
45010004	Bala, Krista hɔ kʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta bɩ ba haay an a nya, kɛɛrɛ naa, gʋaa haay k'a sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ bɩ, Woso ɩ bɩ zaa bam tɩrga.
45010005	Moyiisi tɩrgabaa k'a n'a tom lɛrɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ mim hɩ, a ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'a nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay ʋ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.'
45010006	Tɩrgabaa kʋ sɩrakarɛ n'a kam bɩ mim ba n nɩ: 'Ɩ b'a hɩ ɩ heer ʋ, ɩ ʋ, nka n nɩ tam brama?' Naa do naa, a hɩ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ʋ, nka n nɩ tam brama an a ka Krista m zer?
45010007	Ɩ b'a hɩ sɔ, ɩ ʋ, 'nka n nɩ zerm tara noom ʋ?' Ncɩnaaʋ naa, a hɩ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ʋ, nka n nɩ zerm an a ka Krista m bɔ gəəno bire ʋ?
45010008	Lemim nyɩnta bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ lɔ kɛɛrɛ? A y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Lemim bɩ y'ɩ jɩr ʋ, ɩbɩɩ lɛ kan ɩ heer kɩ an ta ʋ.' A n bɔkarɛ, sɩrakarɛ lemim bɩ do wɔɔ n n'a pa dam naa.
45010009	K'ɩbɩɩ bɔ ɩ lɛ ma gʋaa haay lɛɛ, ɩ ʋ, Yeezuu Krista m Zuuba, k'ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka ɩ heer ʋ, ɩ ʋ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, ɩbɩɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ.
45010010	Bala, kʋ gʋaa sɩra ka a heer ʋ, bɩ Woso a ba tɩrga. Kʋ gʋaa a sɩrakarɛ bɔ a lɛ ma gʋaa haay lɛɛ, bɩ Woso a zaa bʋmbɔ.
45010011	Bala, Wosoci a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa sɩra ka ʋ, a bɩ nyannɩ bɩrɛ y.'
45010012	Naa minto bɩ, zɩɩfʋ kan do vanta gʋaa kɩ b'a hʋnhɔ y, ŋ haay Zuuba deem, an nɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa dam nɩ rɔ wɔɔ m.
45010013	Bala, gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ Zuuba tɔ birm bɩ, a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
45010014	Bɩ, ŋ y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a bir, kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka ʋ? Ŋ y'a bam lɔ ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʋ, kʋ ŋ n a mim ma? Ŋ y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a mim ma, kʋ gʋaa n a pa da ŋ nɩ?
45010015	Bɩ, gʋaa y'a bam lɔ k'a mim pa da, kʋ n n'a nyɔɔ? Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da rɔ wɔɔ leekure ɩ heernyɩnta kam.'
45010016	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay bɛɛ lemim nyɩnta bɩ si y. Amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, nka ɩ sɩra ka lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da b'ʋ?'
45010017	Naa minto bɩ, bɔ sɩrakarɛ n nawʋm lemim kʋ gʋaa n'a tʋr kam ma bɩ nɔ ʋ, bɩ lemim bɩ do k'a n'a mam bɩ, Krista lemim m.
45010018	Bɩ, mɔɔ laaka dam kɛɛrɛ wa, Israyɛl do bɩ n lemim bɩ ma ra? Ŋ y'a ma sɩɩn! Bala, n y'a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Ŋ leer lee ku tara burə haay ra, ŋ meerbaarɔ m ta durnya lɛzojɩ ʋ.'
45010019	Mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m laaka da sɔ, Israyɛl do bɩ, an lemim bɩ jɩ ma ra? A lɛɛkarɛ hɔ, Moyiisi a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ y'a karɛ awɔɔ m jɩm ba do kʋ mɔɔ do paan••• bɛɛ m bɩ minto, mɔɔ y'a karɛ awɔɔ nɔ n ma ʋ, do k'a hɔɔn ba ʋ tɔ ma.'
45010020	Ezayii n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr a kam mɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ yɩ, mɔɔ m hɩnka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n hɔsɩ yɛ mɔɔ han rɔ wɔɔ m.'
45010021	Kʋ Israyɛl mim nɩ, Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Dɔmɩm haay, mɔɔ m wɔ nyɔɔ do k'a bɩr yɛrɛ y, an nɩ bɩsɩ kam bɩ zi.'
45011001	Kʋ m m ya, m laaka da wa, Woso bɩ a bɔ a ʋ, a do b'ʋ ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga, mɔɔ n a gɩnga y! Bala, Israyɛl gʋaa m mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m, Abraham yaŋŋa m mɔɔ m, m to mɔɔ ʋ Bɛnzamɛn do bɩ barla.
45011002	'Woso n a bɔ a do k'a lɛɛ ka an a bɔ ʋ b'ʋ y.' Awɔɔ hɔ kʋ Wosoci bɩ n'a hɩm Elii k'a bʋr an bɩ Israyɛl mimbʋnyaarɔ k'a ŋ ba rɔ wɔɔ dɩnda Woso m bɩ dɔ.
45011003	A a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ mannɩjaarɔ wɔɔ wurgə, mɔɔ ɩ gɔɔta m deem, ŋn'a kam ma k'a mɔɔ mee bɔ ʋ.'
45011004	Bɩ, bɔ Woso a hɩ nɩ? A a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ m gʋɔɔ bɔ ʋ tisi saanhɩna, m hɔ, ŋ n kukurə zɛ, ŋ n yaa da wosobaawɔm Baal nɩ y.'
45011005	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, her dɔmɩm naa nɔ ʋ sɔ naa, gʋɔɔ ta ʋ poore, Woso n ŋ bɔ ʋ a hɔɔn n'a ŋʋa tɔ ma.
45011006	Ŋ bɔ a ʋ, a hɔɔn n'a ŋʋa tɔ ma, ŋ zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y, kʋ m bɛɛ m, Woso hɔɔn bɔʋrɛ bɩ bɩ yɩm hɔɔn bɔʋrɛ paan••• y.
45011007	Kʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ lɔ? Hɔ kʋ Israyɛl n'a kam ma bɩ, an a yɩ y, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a yɩ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ heer karɛ ba, k'a bɩ hɔsɩ jɩ ma y.
45011008	Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Woso a ka ŋ hɔɔn n a ta, ŋ mɩm n ta ʋ, bɩ ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y, ŋ tʋr n ta ʋ, bɩ ŋ bɩr mim marɛ y, an ta an her dɔmɩm ku.'
45011009	Davɩd a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ n nyɩnta ŋ ma am baŋŋa k'a nɩ hɔ sam bɩ m, am zaŋŋa hɔ bɩ m, kʋ ŋ n'a dundo, ŋnɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩ a n'a gakʋ ʋ kan ŋ zibəəro kɩ.
45011010	Kʋ monsigə n ka ŋ mɩm la, kʋ ŋ bɩ lɛɛ yɩ dɔ y, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr kuntəm tee•••.'
45011011	Mɔɔ m ya, m nɩ laaka dam, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gəm zɛ naa, a do ŋ y'a ʋ fɩɩga ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga, mɔɔ n a gɩnga y! Bɩ, ŋ kʋrɔma bɩ minto bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, kʋ bɩ n a ka kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m jɩm ba ŋ ma.
45011012	A n bɔkarɛ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, ŋ kʋrɔma a ka durnya m hɔnta yɩ, kʋ ŋ terma b'a ka do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m hɔnta yɩ, kʋ ŋ bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, bɩ bɛɛ nɩ zɛm hɔ m an lɛ da ra?
45011013	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, m ʋ: kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, an mɔɔ nyɔɔ do vantɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma. Maam bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m zibəə bɩ tɔ busure.
45011014	A gɩnga mɔɔ nawʋm maam, kʋ m do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m jɩm ba, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gɔsɩnnɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
45011015	Ŋ bɔ kʋ Woso ʋ a rɛ b'a ka durnya n a zɛ kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ, k'a a ya, an ŋ gaa, bɔ n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ? Nyɩnta a nawʋm mɩsɩrbaa, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
45011016	K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Woso hɔ m lɛbiisi bur bɩ nɩ, bur bɩ haay Woso hɔ m sɔ. Kʋ Woso hɔ m gɔ bɩ nyim nɩ, Woso y'a so gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro haay ʋ sɔ.
45011017	Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gɔ kʋ n n'a bankam mɩŋŋa kɩ, n n'a vəŋŋəro gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛ ra. Kʋ zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ kʋ rɛ kan pooyaa gɔ vəŋŋə kʋ n y'a sa, n n'a naasʋ gɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ bɩncɛ ma kɩ. Maam bɩ, gɔ kʋ n y'a banka bɩ nyinno wɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ tʋrm sɔ.
45011018	Naa minto bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ ga m, ɩ gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ gore bɔ ʋ y. Ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ k'ɩ lɛ bɔ ɩ mɩŋŋa ʋ? Ɩbɩɩ bɛɛ m ta gɔ bɩ nyinno wɔɔ nɩ y, gɔ bɩ nyinno wɔɔ m ta ɩbɩɩ m.
45011019	A a da ma, ɩbɩɩ n a hɩ mɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ: "Bɩ, gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro zɩnzɛ n y'a ʋ ra, kʋ mɔɔ n ŋ bɩncɛ sa wa."
45011020	Sɩra m, n zɩnzɛ n y'a ʋ ra kʋ n y'a do sɩrakarɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma, ɩbɩɩ n ŋ bɩncɛ sa, ɩ sɩrakarɛ minto. Bɩ, dundo ɩ zi, ɩ bɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa busu y, nyi ba.
45011021	Bala, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro paan•••rɔ, bɩ Woso n ŋ to gɔ bɩ ma y, a a da ma an a ba ɩbɩɩ m maam sɔ, a b'ɩbɩɩ tore y.
45011022	Dɩga Woso ŋʋarɛ kan a nyaa kɩ zaa ma. A nyaa ta ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ to rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an bɔkarɛ an mɩŋŋa kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ. Bɩ, pakra m k'ɩbɩɩ m gɔɔta a ŋʋarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɛɛ m, n y'ɩbɩɩ zɛm la, am vəŋŋəro wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
45011023	Kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a bɩsɩkarɛ bɩ to, n y'a yarɛ, n nɩ ŋ cɩnta a bɩncɛ gusire b'ʋ. Bala, Woso a da ma, an a ya an ŋ cɩnta lɛɛ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ hɔɔ b'ʋ.
45011024	Ɩbɩɩ kʋ zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan pooyaa gɔ vəŋŋə kʋ n y'a zɛ ra n n'a naasʋ har gɔ kʋ n n'a bankam bɩ kɩ ma, an bɔkarɛ a n a ga m y. Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ, har gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro m, a naanaa an cem kʋ n n'a ya, n nɩ ŋ naasʋ gɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan kɩ hɔɔ bɩ ma.
45011025	M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ mim k'a nyaakʋm da naa n nyɩnta awɔɔ ma yirgu y, k'awɔɔ bɩ dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma mindɔrɛzannɔ y. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a ba heerkarɛzannɔ, bɩ nyɩnta a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ m tolle ba ŋnɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
45011026	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay ŋ zɛm bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ y'a tom Siyɔn ʋ, a Zakɔɔb yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋrɛ ŋ ma,
45011027	gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a darɛ ŋ ma bɩ n naa. Dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ ŋ ma bɩ m.
45011028	Kʋ gʋaa k'a dɩga Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gu lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma bɩ ma, a a da ma an a hɩ a ʋ, Woso jɩnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, bɩ, awɔɔ daahan m bɩ, bɩ kʋ Woso gʋaa bɔʋrɛ bɩ nɔ nɩ, Woso ŋ ŋʋa ŋ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
45011029	Bala, Woso bɩr hɔ k'a a ka bɩ sire y, a bɩr a hɔɔn lʋrm sɔ gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ y.
45011030	Biisi bɩ, awɔɔ nyɩnta bɩsɩ ka Woso ma zannɔ, bɩ her naa, Woso awɔɔ cicir zɛ, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɩsɩ ka ma bɩ tɔ ma.
45011031	Her sɔ naa, brɔɔ bɩsɩ ka Woso ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ cicir kʋ n y'a zɛ bɩ jɛ ʋ, kʋ n nɩ ŋ cicir zɛ sɔ.
45011032	Bala, Woso a ka gʋɔɔ haay nɩ bɩsɩkarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a ŋ haay cicir zɛ.
45011033	Woso hɔnta, a mindɔrɛ kan a hɔdɔrɛ kɩ nɔyaa ta ʋ gʋta maam-maam! Gɔsɩ b'a dam ma, an hɔ k'a a cɩnta nɔ dɔ y, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma, an a zaarɔ jɩ dɔ y.
45011034	Wosoci y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Nka ɩ Zuuba hɔɔndarɛ dɔ? Gɛɛ, nka ɩ nyɩnta a dʋndɔrɛzaa?
45011035	Gɛɛ, nka ɩ lɛɛ ka an hɔ ka ʋ, k'an a zɩm ka a zaa ʋ?
45011036	Bala, hɔ haay bɩ, a to a ʋ a zi, an ta ʋ a paŋŋa tɔ ma, an ta ʋ a mɩŋŋa tɔ ma. Woso m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay! Amina!
45012001	M danyɩnɔ, k'a yo Woso n a ŋʋarɛ zi ba kan awɔɔ kɩ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka Woso ʋ, amba mannɩ k'an mɩsɩr, Woso n a so ʋ, an mɩŋŋa ma bɩ m. Daʋrɛ naa do nɩ Woso nɔ yɩm.
45012002	A bɩ zu her durnya naa mɩsɩrbaa zaarɔ ʋ y, bɩ k'a yɛ a zu Woso zaarɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ n a lʋr jilli, an awɔɔ banka. Maam bɩ, awɔɔ Woso hɔnhɔ, hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa, an a nɔ yɩ, an mɩŋŋa paan••• bɩ dɔrɛ.
45012003	Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma, mɔɔ m da ma m a hɩ awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə m, m ʋ: a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ m busu a heer ʋ y. Bɩ, gʋaa biyəə n dɩga a mɩŋŋa ma, amba Woso sɩrakarɛ hɔ jir a n'a hɔ ka ʋ bɩ m. B'a b'a ka an bra ba a mɩŋŋa m y.
45012004	Gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋə bɩ deem nɩ y, ŋ gʋta, ŋn'a hʋnhɔ sɔ, wɔɔ mɛ vəŋŋəro bɩr zi deem barɛ y.
45012005	Ncɩnaaʋ sɔ bɩ, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ m gʋta bɩ, mɛ deem m wɔɔ m Krista zɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ, ʋ nɩ zɛkʋra m kan kʋ kɩ, gʋaa biyəə kan a bɩncɛ kɩ.
45012006	Gʋaa biyəə nɩ ganwʋrɛ do m a hʋnhɔ, an a ga kʋ ʋ kan barka kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ kɩ m. Kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'a zaa m bɩr zi bam nɩ, k'an a ga kʋ ʋ kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ.
45012007	Kʋ gʋaa vanta ɩ daahan ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'an bɩr a daahan zi bam, k'a vanta ɩ hɔdɩndarɛ ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'an a hɔdɩndarɛ zi ba.
45012008	Kʋ gʋaa vanta ɩ dʋndɔrɛ ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'an a zi ba. Gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ kam, k'an a ka kan a heer kɩ haay. Kʋ lɛɛzannɔ n a zi ba mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa, kʋ gʋaa cicirzɛrɛzaa n a cicirzɛrɛ zi ba kan heernyɩnta kɩ.
45012009	K'a kʋ ŋʋa sɩra m. K'a sɔ hɔ bʋnyaa m, a zi mɩŋŋa barɛ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.
45012010	K'a bɩr a kam kʋ ŋʋarɛ ma kan a heer kɩ haay, amba danyɩnɔ nɩ kʋ ŋʋam bɩ m. K'a bɩr lɛ zɛm kʋ daʋrɛ ma.
45012011	K'a yakʋ to, a Zuuba zi ba kaarɛ-kaarɛ.
45012012	K'a heernyɔɔ ba taaheerlɛ nɔ ʋ, a bʋr a ma cicir nɔ ʋ, k'a a yo ʋ yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ.
45012013	K'a da wosogʋɔɔ kʋ hɔ jɩra ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ han, k'a bɩ kɔ saanɔɔ sire ma y.
45012014	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ Woso han k'an hɔ mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ. K'a lɛ nyɩnta da gʋɔɔ nʋ, a b'a bʋnyaa da ŋ nʋ y.
45012015	K'a heer nyɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a heernyɔɔm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a nyi ka kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi kam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
45012016	K'a kʋ ma mɩŋŋa, a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu y. 'A b'a gu zibəə poore barɛ ma y, a bɩ dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma mindonno y.'
45012017	A bɩ zi bʋnyaa ba a sompi gʋaa nʋ y. 'K'a a ka ma k'a mɩŋŋa ba gʋɔɔ haay mɩm ʋ.'
45012018	K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ an ta a ma, k'a a yo ʋ k'a bɩr laafɩɩ m kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ.
45012019	M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, a b'a zɩm bɔ a zim nɩ y, bɩ k'a to kʋ Woso n a nɔmaa zi ba, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ m Zuuba, mɔɔ nɩ zɩm bɔm, mɔɔ n nɩ gʋaa biyəə hɔ k'a a ga m kaŋ ʋ.'
45012020	N y'a ya n a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'Bɩ kʋ nɔ y'ɩ jɩm zɛrɛ, k'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʋ k'an a bɩ. Kʋ mɩsɩ y'a zɛm, k'ɩ hi ka ʋ k'an a mi. Bala, a ba k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋm maam bɩ, sɛkɩna ɩbɩɩ n'a karɛ a mim la bɩ.'
45012021	Ɩ b'a to mimbʋnyaa m bʋr ɩ ra y, b'a mɩŋŋa ba k'ɩ bʋr a bʋnyaa ra.
45013001	Gʋaa haay a ga m, an zu lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩgam kʋ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʋ. Bala, lɛɛzaa ba ʋ, k'a a to bɛɛ ʋ Woso zi y. Kʋrɔ lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ haay rɔ nɔɔm, Woso yɩ ŋ cɩncɩnta.
45013002	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka lɛɛzannɔ ma, bɩsɩ a ka lɛ kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ ma. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ karɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔyarlɛ yɩrɛ.
45013003	Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa bam nɔ wɔɔ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ nyi ba lɛɛzannɔ nɩ y, bɩ, a bʋnyaabənno wɔɔ nyi barɛ ŋ nɩ. K'ɩ lɛ baa k'ɩ nyi ba lɛɛzannɔ m, k'ɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔrɛ ɩ ʋ,
45013004	bala, Woso zi ŋ n'a bam, k'a ka k'ɩbɩɩ n a mɩŋŋa ba. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ y'a bʋnyaa barɛ, k'ɩ nyi ba ŋ nɩ. Bala, paŋŋa kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m k'a gʋaa hʋnhʋr bɩ, a bɩ vam nɩ y. Woso zi ŋ n'a bam, k'a Woso nɔmaa hɩnka a bʋnyaabarɛzaa m.
45013005	Bɩ minto nɩ, gʋaa n a ga m, an zu kʋ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʋ. Kʋ Woso nɔmaa n b'a yɩ minto bɛɛ n'a deem nɩ y. Kʋ heer kɔrɛ bɩ nyɩnta ʋ sɔ y.
45013006	Naa tɔ ma m sɔ, awɔɔ n nɩ yawʋrlɔ kam, bala, a sirezannɔ wɔɔ, Woso yɩ ŋ da ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a ba mɩŋŋa.
45013007	K'a gʋaa biyəə hɔ k'awɔɔ m ta m ka ʋ. Kʋ yawʋr m, k'a ka a zaa ʋ. Kʋ hɔhɛɛrɛ gɛɛ a sire yawʋr m, k'a ka sɔ. Kʋ gʋaa k'awɔɔ a ga m a lɛ si bɩ nɩ, k'a lɛ si. A n a ga m awɔɔ n a da ʋ bɩ, k'a da ʋ.
