45013008	Awɔɔ, a b'a ka kʋ gʋaa zɩm m bɩr ta awɔɔ ra y, kʋ bɩ m kʋ ŋʋarɛ m. Gʋaa k'a mim ŋʋa bɩ, a zaa hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta bɩ ba haay.
45013009	Bala, lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ b'a ka ɩ lɛ m bɩr gʋaa hɔ zi y.' Nawɔnnɔ haay kan lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, a zɛ ŋ yaa ʋ kʋ ra lɛ naa do nɔ ʋ: 'Ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa ŋʋa bɩ m.'
45013010	Gʋaa k'a n'a mim ŋʋam bɩ, a bɩr hɔsɩ bʋnyaa bam nɩ y. Bɩ y'a ka, kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay.
45013011	K'awɔɔ dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ m ta ʋ naa mim dɔ bɩ, wakatɩ m, an a ga m k'awɔɔ n gu hinceem ma. Her naa, bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ jɩnjɛɛm wɔɔ ma, an lɛ da dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ sɩŋŋɩda sa ʋ, ʋ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ ma.
45013012	Gum da gʋta, dɔmɩrɛ a zɔ, bɩ minto bɩ, ʋ monsigə zibəəro to, ʋ lɛɛgure yarmɔr da ʋ ma.
45013013	Ʋ ta sɩra nɔ ʋ, amba a a ga m n nɩ ta sinsebir ʋ bɩ m. Ʋ b'ʋ zɛ kʋ ra k'ʋ hɔ bɩ maam-maam y, k'ʋ hɔ mi maam-maam sɔ y. Ʋ bɩ jaan da y, ʋ bɩ mɛsim zi daŋŋadɔɔ ba y, ʋ bɩ nyaa ba kan kʋ kɩ y, ʋ bɩ jɩmbaa da kʋ ma y.
45013014	K'a mɩsɩrbaa daa kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mɩsɩrbaa m bɩ ba, a b'a ya, a a hɔɔn da a mɩŋŋɔɔ m mɛsim mɩsɩrbaa gusire bɩ ma, k'a lɛtaamarɔ ba y.
45014001	K'a gʋaa kʋ paŋŋawarzaa m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ si, b'a ba hɔɔndarɛrɔ mim dɩnda bʋnyaa y.
45014002	Makra ba n nɩ, gʋaa deem y'a gɩngarɛ a ʋ, a a da ma a hɔ haay bɩ, deem n bɔkarɛ, a sɩrakarɛ paŋŋawar minto bɩ, dʋlɛɛrɔ an ŋ bɩrɛ.
45014003	Gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ haay bɩm bɩ n a ga m, an gʋaa k'a bɩr a bɩm bɩ gore bɔ ʋ y, bɩ gʋaa k'a bɩr a bɩm bɩ, a bɩ gʋaa k'a n'a bɩm bɩ dʋdɔ ka y, bala, Woso a zaa si a zi.
45014004	Nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ gʋaa vanta zibəənyɩ dʋdɔ ka? K'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, gɛɛ k'a do, a zuuba bɩ mim m bɩ. B'a jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɔ, bala, Zuuba ɩ paŋŋa m k'a ka k'an jɩm.
45014005	Makra vanta ba n nɩ sɔ: Gʋaa niŋŋə zi, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ lɛ da kʋ m, a vanta zi, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ hɔdeem. A a ga m kʋ gʋaa biyəə n hɔ k'an ta m a heer ʋ bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
45014006	Gʋaa k'a nɩ dɩgarɛ a ʋ, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ lɛ da kʋ m bɩ, a ba a nawʋm Zuuba tɔ ma, gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ haay bɩm bɩ, Zuuba tɔ ma m sɔ, bala, a ɩ Woso barka darɛ. Gʋaa k'a bɩr hɔ haay bɩm bɩ, Zuuba tɔ ma m sɔ, an nɩ Woso barka darɛ.
45014007	Bala, wɔɔ gʋaa deem ba ʋ, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam a mɩŋŋa minto y, bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ sɔ, an nɩ gam a mɩŋŋa minto sɔ y.
45014008	Bala, kʋ wɔɔ mɩsɩr, Zuuba tɔ ma m wɔɔ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam, kʋ wɔɔ gɩnga, gɩnga wɔɔ ʋ Zuuba tɔ ma sɔ. Kʋ wɔɔ mɩsɩr gɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ gɩnga, Zuuba ɩ gɔɔta an a so wɔɔ ʋ.
45014009	Bala, a hɩ Krista ʋ k'a nyɩnta gəəno kan mɩsɩɩrɔ kɩ Zuuba, bɩ minto m an ga an a ya an a mɩm bɔ ʋ.
45014010	B'ɩbɩɩ, bɔ m ɩ n'ɩ danyɩ dʋdɔ karɛ? B'ɩbɩɩ, bɔ minto m sɔ, ɩ n n'ɩ danyɩ gore bɔŋ ʋ? Wɔɔ haay naa, Woso wɔɔ birm a dʋdɔkarɛ duu bɩ taa, k'a bɩ wɔɔ dʋdɔ ka.
45014011	Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Amba mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zuuba m mɩsɩr denter naa m, mɔɔ y'a hɩ m ʋ: Gʋaa haay kukurə zɛrɛ m taa, gʋaa biyəə yaa darɛ, an a leer busu an a hɩ, a ʋ, mɔɔ m Woso.
45014012	Maam bɩ, wɔɔ gʋaa biyəə y'a mɩŋŋa mim nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ Woso taa.
45014013	Ʋ b'ʋ ya, ʋ kʋ dʋdɔ yar y. Bɩ, k'a ka ma k'a bɩ hɔsɩ ba fɩɩga k'an a ka, k'a danyɩ n a do, gɛɛ an mimbʋnyaa ba y.
45014014	Zuuba Yeezuu zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa m heer ʋ, m ʋ, hɔsɩ ba ʋ an dintim nɩ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a hɔɔn da, a ʋ, hɔ naa do dintim m, a ba a nawʋm dintim a mɩŋŋa ma.
45014015	K'ɩbɩɩ ka ɩ danyɩ heer n a zar hɔbɩrɛ tɔkkɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a bɩm tɔ ma, ɩbɩɩ bɩr tam ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ dɔ y. Ɩ b'a ka kʋ gʋaa kʋ Krista ga a tɔ ma bɩ m nyaam ɩ hɔ k'ɩ n'a bɩm bɩ tɔ ma y.
45014016	A b'a ka hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa awɔɔ ma bɩ m bʋr tɔ bɔrɛ m awɔɔ jɛ ʋ y.
45014017	Bala, Woso cirbəə bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ kan hɔmire kɩ mim bɛɛ y, tɩrgabaa kan laafɩɩ kɩ, heernyɩnta kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ kɩ mim m.
45014018	Gʋaa k'a nɩ Krista zi barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Woso nɔ ɩ yɩm la, gʋɔɔ n'a ŋʋam sɔ.
45014019	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ ʋ ka hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm laafɩɩ m kan wɔɔ haay sɩrakarɛ talɛɛ kɩ bɩ ma.
45014020	Ɩ bɩ Woso zibəə zar hɔbɩrɛ tɔ ma y. Hɔ haay mɩŋŋa, sɩra m, bɩ, kʋ gʋaa hɔ niŋŋə k'a nɩ zɛm gʋaa vanta dore m bɩ bɩ, a bʋnyaa.
45014021	Hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ ba n nɩ: Kʋ sim sʋrɛ, gɛɛ bɛɛ mire, gɛɛ hɔ vanta barɛ y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ danyɩ n'a do, ɩ b'a ba y.
45014022	Ɩ sɩrakarɛ k'ɩ n ta m hɔ bɩ do minto bɩ to ɩ zi, Woso lɛɛ. Heernyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a n'a ŋʋam k'a mim ba b'a heer bɩr a dʋdɔ yarm bɩ m.
45014023	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ bɩm an bɔkarɛ a heer nɩ sɩnsɩm kam hɔ bɩ do ma bɩ, Woso a dʋdɔ yar, bala, a zibəə bɩ n a to heer sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ y. A n bɔkarɛ hɔ haay k'a n a to heer sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, mimbʋnyaa m.
45015001	Wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ paŋŋa m ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ʋ b'ʋ ka ʋ hɔɔnhɔ lɛtaama barɛ ma y. Bɩ, k'ʋ ʋ da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba paŋŋa bɩ do m nɔ wɔɔ han a paŋŋawar bɩ nɔ ʋ.
45015002	A a ga m kʋ gʋaa biyəə n a ka ma k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa a mim tɔ ma, a daahan kan a sɩrakarɛ kɩ dara minto.
45015003	Bala, Krista n a ka hɔ k'a mɩŋŋa nɔ yɩ ma y, bɩ, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ sʋnsɔrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a wʋm nɔ wɔɔ a ba mɔɔ sʋnsɔrɔ.'
45015004	A n bɔkarɛ, hɔ kʋ n lɛɛ ka n n'a gʋrsɩra ba haay bɩ, a ba n y'a ʋ kʋ wɔɔ m hɔ dɔ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, bʋraama kan heerwʋtarɛ kʋ Wosoci bɩ n'a kam bɩ tɔ ma, wɔɔ ʋ da ma ʋ nyasʋ taaheerlɛ m.
45015005	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ Woso k'a a so bʋraama ʋ kan heerwʋtarɛ kɩ bɩ n a ka k'awɔɔ m bɩr hɔɔndarɛ deem m kan kʋ kɩ, amba Krista Yeezuu lɛ n taa bɩ m,
45015006	k'a a da ma, a a lɛ bɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Zɩ kʋ Woso m b'ʋ, zɛkʋra deem nɔ ʋ, leer deem m.
45015007	K'a bɩr kʋ sim mɩŋŋa, amba Krista awɔɔ si bɩ m, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ tɔ ma.
45015008	A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m paan••• Krista bɩ, a ba a ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ zibəənyɩ, k'a a da ma a ka kʋ Woso lerbɔrɛrɔ ŋ yaabɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ŋ kʋ yɩ, k'a Woso sɩra hɩnka maam.
45015009	Bʋr a ʋ sɔ, kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, a mɩŋŋabaa tɔ ma, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ doro bire ʋ, mɔɔ laa lɔm m ɩ tɔ da ʋ.
45015010	Wosoci b'a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: Doro vantɔɔ, k'a a heer nyɔɔ kan Zuuba do bɩ kɩ.
45015011	A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: Doro haay, k'a a lɛ bɔ Zuuba ʋ. Kʋrɔ haay gʋɔɔ, k'a lɛ bɔ ʋ sɔ.
45015012	Ezayii ci a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Yese yaŋŋa bɩ zɛm, a wutire an ka doro lɛɛ, doro wɔɔ n yo ma.
45015013	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ Woso k'a so taaheerlɛ ʋ bɩ n a ka, k'awɔɔ n'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka ʋ, bɩ k'a n'a ka sɔ, kʋ heernyɔɔ kan laafɩɩ kɩ n'awɔɔ han gʋta, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa tɔ ma.
45015014	M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa m ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ mɩŋŋabaa m gʋta, a hɔ k'a a ga dɔrɛ m haay dɔ, an n'a dam ma a kʋ dʋndɔ.
45015015	A n bɔkarɛ, ci naa do nɔ ʋ naa, mɔɔ lɛɛ niŋŋoo gʋrsɩra ba kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔɔ niŋŋoo tɔ da awɔɔ nɔ ʋ. A ba mɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, barka niŋŋə kʋ Woso a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto.
45015016	Woso a k'a mɔɔ n Krista Yeezuu zi ba, amba wosomannɩbər hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ zibəə bɩ do, lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ m. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ ka ŋ ʋ mannɩ ganwʋrɛ, kʋ bɩ n Woso nɔ yɩ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer la, k'an yɩ mɩŋŋa.
45015017	Krista Yeezuu zɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ m da ma, m m heer nyɔɔ, Woso zi kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ tɔ ma.
45015018	Kʋ mɔɔ kʋ m hɔ niŋŋə mim hɩ, hɔ kʋ Krista a ka mɔɔ n a ba kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m zu Woso ʋ bɩ m. Naa ba a ʋ, meerbaarɔ kan zibəəro kɩ nɔ ʋ,
45015019	hoserlo kan makrarɔ paŋŋa kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ nɔ ʋ. Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, mɔɔ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da lɛɛ haay ʋ mɩŋŋa, an a sa Zerizalɛm ma an ta Iliiri kʋrɔ ʋ.
45015020	Bɩ, lɛɛrɔ kʋ n nɩ Krista mim ma ʋ cɩna rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da ŋ ʋ. A ba mɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m zi ba lɛɛ kʋ gʋaa lɛɛ ka an zibəə sɩŋŋɩda sa ʋ tɔ ma.
45015021	Hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ mɔɔ ba, n ʋ: Gʋɔɔ kʋ n n'a mim dɩnda ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a yɩm, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n hɔsɩ ma a mim nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a mim jɩ dɔrɛ.'
45015022	Naa do ɩ tɩr a nya mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩr m dam ma m nɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi y.
45015023	Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ zibəə nya kʋrɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ. A dɔɔraa laatʋ mɔɔ n n'a ŋʋam kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi.
45015024	Kʋ mɔɔ bʋr m nɩ tam Ɛspanyɩ ʋ, mɔɔ bɔm b'ʋ. A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m bɩ dɩga awɔɔ ma. Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ zer awɔɔ ra, m nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ m a ga m tɛkka m, k'awɔɔ m dɩga mɔɔ zaa bɩ sarɛ mim ma, kʋ m cem.
45015025	Her-her naa, ta mɔɔ nawʋm Zerizalɛm ʋ, daahan m, wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
45015026	Bala, Masedʋan kʋ bɩ kan Akayii kʋ bɩ kɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛ sa, k'a busoo zɩnzɛ kʋ ra, a ka Zerizalɛm wosogʋɔɔ ŋʋazannɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
45015027	Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ɩ lɛ bɩ sa a zim, bɩ sɩra nɔ ʋ, cicirzannɔ wɔɔ duro a ga hɔ naa do yɩrɛ m ŋ zi, bala, Krista gʋɔɔ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ n ŋ mɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a Woso dɔrɛhɔ jir kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ Krista gʋɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ a ga m ŋn'a da ŋ han kan hɔnta kʋ ŋ nɩ tam bɩ kɩ sɔ.
45015028	Kʋ mɔɔ zi naa do ba m a nya, m zɩnzɛkʋra busoo bɩ ka ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ bɔrɛ awɔɔ zi, m cem m ta Ɛspanyɩ ʋ.
45015029	Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ bʋr m nɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi, zɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kan Krista barka gʋta kɩ.
45015030	M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, kan ŋʋarɛ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n n'a kam bɩ kɩ minto, k'a yar ba kan mɔɔ kɩ a yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ.
45015031	K'a yaa da, kʋ basɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ b'a da mɔɔ ma y. Bɩ, kʋ wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m daahan kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ tam nɩ bɩ si mɩŋŋa.
45015032	K'a n bɩr yɩrɛ ʋ, kʋ Woso yɛ sɔ, mɔɔ lee kure awɔɔ zi heernyɔɔ gʋta m, m hoon si awɔɔ bire ʋ.
45015033	Kʋ Woso k'a nɩ laafɩɩ kam bɩ m bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ. Amina!
45016001	Wɔɔ danlʋ Febe k'a nɩ zi bam Sankre kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ n'a hɩ m, a kasɛtɩ mɩŋŋa.
45016002	K'a si a zi Zuuba tɔ ma, amba a a ga barɛ m wosogʋɔɔ kan kʋ kɩ bire ʋ bɩ m, k'a bʋr a lɛ n taa awɔɔ daahan ma, k'a a da han a mim haay nɔ ʋ. A mɩŋŋa a da gʋɔɔ han gʋta, a a da mɔɔ mɩŋŋa han sɔ.
45016003	K'a yaa da Priska kan Akilas kɩ m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ m Krista Yeezuu zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.
45016004	Ŋ y'a mɩŋŋɔɔ mee ka zɛ ma, k'a mɔɔ bɔ lɛm. Mɔɔ yɩ m deem bɛɛ nɩ ŋ barka darɛ y, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ haay yɩ ŋ barka dam sɔ.
45016005	K'a yaa da sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ n'a som kʋ ma ŋ har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m. K'a yaa da mɔɔ gʋaasɩba Epayinɛtɩ bɩ m, a ɩ lɛɛ ka an sɩra ka Krista ʋ Azii kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
45016006	K'a yaa da Maarii k'a zi ba gʋta awɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ m.
45016007	K'a yaa da Andronikus kan Zuniyas kɩ m, mɔɔ danyɩnɔ m, bɩ, n nyɩnta n nɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ. Kristazibəəzannɔ wɩsɩrɔ m, ŋ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m ŋn'a ba kristagʋɔɔ.
45016008	K'a yaa da Ampliyatus m, mɔɔ ŋʋarɛzaa m Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ.
45016009	K'a yaa da Urbɛn m, wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m Krista zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ, kan mɔɔ ŋʋarɛzaa Sɩtakɩs kɩ m.
45016010	K'a yaa da Apelɛs m, a a sɩra ka Krista ʋ hɩnka hɔ gʋta nɔ ʋ. K'a yaa da Aristobul hargʋɔɔ m.
45016011	K'a yaa da Herodɩnyɔ m, mɔɔ danyɩ m. K'a yaa da Narsis hargʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Zuuba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
45016012	K'a yaa da Trifɛn kan Trifozɩ kɩ m, Zuuba zi ŋn'a bam. K'a yaa da Pɛrzidɩ m mɩŋŋa, a zi ba gʋta Zuuba tɔ ma.
45016013	K'a yaa da Rufus m, Zuuba zibəənyɩ wɩsɩ m. K'a yaa da a da bɩ m, mɔɔ da m sɔ.
45016014	K'a yaa da Asɩnkritɩ m, Flegɔn m, Hermɛs m, Patrobas m, Hermas m, kan danyɩnɔ vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m.
45016015	K'a yaa da Filolɔg kan Zuli kɩ m, Neere kan a danlʋ kɩ m, Olɩmpas kan wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m haay.
45016016	K'a yaa da kʋ m mɩŋŋa danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ, kan kʋ daʋrɛ kɩ, ŋʋarɛ kɩ. Krista sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
45016017	M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a dundo a zi, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ gʋngʋ kʋ ma zi bam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ sɩrakarɛzannɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ m, bɩsɩ kʋ ŋ n'a kam hɔdɩndarɛ k'awɔɔ yɩ bɩ ma. K'a gʋ ŋ ma laatʋ.
45016018	Bala, gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ, Zuuba Krista zi bɛɛ ŋ n'a barɛ y, a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɔ zi ŋn'a bam. Bra ŋ n'a bam bahɔdonno m, meerbaarɔ nyɩntɔɔ kan a ŋʋaar mindɩndarɛrɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
45016019	Gʋaa haay a dɔ, a ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm Zuuba ma. Mɔɔ heer nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ naa tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ m yɩ mindɔrɛzannɔ, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ nɔ ʋ. K'a yɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ mim bɩr zar darɛ ŋ ma zannɔ, mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ.
45016020	Woso k'a a so laafɩɩ ʋ bɩ Sʋtaana hɔɔnsɩrɛ awɔɔ gannɔ taa dɩɩtaa. Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu barka m bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
45016021	Mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn Timote ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ danyɩnɔ Lusiyus, Zasɔn, kan Sosipatɛɛr k'ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
45016022	Bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Tɛɛrtiyus, kʋ Pol a da ci naa do barɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m Zuuba k'a nɩ wɔɔ zɛm kʋ ra bɩ nɔ ʋ.
45016023	Gayus k'a mɔɔ si a har ʋ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ haay n nɩ kʋ zɛŋ ʋ a har ʋ b'ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. Erastɩ, kʋ bɩ busoocɩntər bɩ, kan Kaartus kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ a m. [
45016024	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka m nyɩnta kan awɔɔ haay kɩ. Amina!]
45016025	Woso ɩ paŋŋa m k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa da ra, amba lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ n n'a pa dam bɩ n n'a hɩm bɩ m, Yeezuu Krista lemim kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa dam, Woso hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da gɔsɩ n a dɔ y, an a hɩnka wɔɔ m, ʋ a dɔ bɩ m. Hɔ bɩ do Woso nyɩnta an a nyaakʋm da biisi tee••• bɩ,
45016026	kɛɛrɛ naa, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro wɔɔ a hɩnka lɛɛgure nɔ ʋ gʋaa haay m, amba Woso k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ lɛ ka bɩ m, a lɛ ka kʋ n nɩ ta m doro haay zi kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka, ŋnɩ zu ʋ.
45016027	Kʋ Woso y'a deem k'an ta mindɔrɛ m bɩ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, dɔmɩm haay! Amina!
46001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso ɩ mɔɔ bir a hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʋ kʋ m yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa, mɔɔ m kan wɔɔ danyɩ Sɔstɛn kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ bam.
46001002	A ba wɔɔ nawʋm Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma k'a nɩ Korɛntɩ ʋ bɩ ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ a hɔ Krista Yeezuu zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, an ŋ bir kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba rɔ wɔɔ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ haay ʋ, ŋnɩ yaa dam wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Yeezuu mɩŋŋa m brɔɔ Zuuba, a m wɔɔ Zuuba sɔ.
46001003	A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso, kan wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ m barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
46001004	Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka dɔmɩm haay awɔɔ tɔ ma, barka k'a ka awɔɔ ʋ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ minto.
46001005	Bala, a tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ Woso ganwʋrɛrɔ do haay yɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ lemim, kan hɔdɔrɛ kɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ m.
46001006	A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, Krista kasɛtɩ bɩ paŋŋa yɩ awɔɔ zi,
46001007	bɩ n a ka Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛ sɩ n jɩra awɔɔ ma y, awɔɔ k'a nɩ dɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista hɩnkarɛ dɔmɩm ma rɔ wɔɔ.
46001008	A mɩŋŋa n nɩ paŋŋa karɛ awɔɔ ʋ k'an ta an dɔmɩnnɔ nyarɛ ku, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hinni kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ bɩ, kʋ hɔsɩ minsi bɩ nyɩnta awɔɔ gʋr zi y.
46001009	Woso k'a awɔɔ bir, k'awɔɔ m zɛkʋra yɩ kan a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba m bɩ kɩ bɩ, taalɛrazaa m.
46001010	M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, k'a kʋ ma, a b'a ka gʋngʋrɛ n nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʋ y, k'a zɛ kʋ ra a bɩr hɔɔn deem m, kan hɔɔndarɛ deem kɩ m.
46001011	Bala, m danyɩnɔ, Kolowe gʋɔɔ a dɩnda mɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ, awɔɔ bɩr kʋ marɛ y.
46001012	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ: "Pol gʋaa n mɔɔ m, naa zaa a ʋ, Apolɔs gʋaa n mɔɔ m, naa ʋ, Sefas gʋaa n mɔɔ m. Naa a ya, a ʋ, Krista gʋaa n mɔɔ m."
46001013	Krista a gʋngʋ ra? Pol n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma awɔɔ minto ra? Pol tɔ minto m n nɩ batɛm ka awɔɔ ʋ ra?
46001014	Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka, bala mɔɔ n batɛm ka awɔɔ gɔsɩ ʋ, kʋ Krispus kan Gayus kɩ bɛɛ y.
46001015	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a hɩ a ʋ, mɔɔ batɛm ka a ʋ, m tɔ ra y.
46001016	Mɔɔ batɛm ka Stefanas har gʋɔɔ ʋ sɔ, kʋ naa bɛɛ y, mɔɔ n batɛm ka gʋaa vanta ʋ m a dɔ y.
46001017	Bala, Krista n mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʋ m bɩ batɛm ka y, mɔɔ nyɔɔ a ʋ kʋ m bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da. Mɔɔ n yo mindɔrɛ ma m n'a pa bɩ darɛ y. A ba mɔɔ ʋ maam kʋ Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ bɩ bɔ vam y.
46001018	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ ɩ dɩgam lemim kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam, ʋ n'a hɩm, ʋ ʋ, Krista ga gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ ma hɔɔzaabaa lemim. Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Woso paŋŋa m gɔdarkʋra lemim bɩ m.
46001019	Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Mɔɔ mindɔrɛzannɔ mindɔrɛ zaar bam, m hɔɔntaʋrɛzannɔ hɔɔn zaar ba."
46001020	Mindɔrɛzaa ɩ ka? Lɛrɔ karɩnsaamba ɩ ka? Her durnya naa do meerbaawaasɩzaa ɩ ka? Woso a ka durnya mindɔrɛ n a ba hɔɔzaabaa mim.
46001021	Bala, Woso hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a mɩŋŋa mindɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, kʋ durnya b'a da ma an a dɔ durnya mindɔrɛ nɩ y, bɩ, k'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra kam nɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ hɔɔzaabaa lemim padarɛ bɩ m.
46001022	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ, a ka brɔɔ n nawʋm hoserlo ma, grɛkkɩrɔ wɔɔ n'a kam mindɔrɛ ma,
46001023	bɩ wɔɔ, Krista kʋ n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ wɔɔ n'a pa dam, zɩɩfʋrɔ ɩ dɩgam naa ma nyannɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma hɔɔzaabaa.
46001024	Bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ m, gɛɛ grɛkkɩrɔ nɩ, Krista kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam b'ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Woso paŋŋa m, bɩ Woso mindɔrɛ m sɔ.
46001025	Bala, hɔ k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, Woso hɔɔzaabaa m bɩ, hɔ bɩ do hɔɔntaʋrɛ lɛ da gʋɔɔ mindɔrɛ m, sɔ bɩ, hɔ k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, Woso paŋŋawar m bɩ, a paŋŋa lɛ da gʋɔɔ paŋŋa m.
46001026	M danyɩnɔ, k'a dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa k'a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ kʋ Woso a bir lɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ barla, gʋɔɔ ba ʋ gʋta ŋnɩ mindɔrɛzannɔ durnya mɩm ʋ y, ŋnɩ paŋŋazannɔ sɔ y, ŋnɩ har wɩsɩ gʋɔɔ y.
46001027	Bɩ, hɔ kʋ hɔɔzaabaa m durnya ʋ bɩ, Woso bɩ sa, k'a nyannɩ da mindɔrɛzannɔ ma, hɔ kʋ paŋŋawar m durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ, Woso bɩ sa, k'a nyannɩ da hɔ k'a nɩ paŋŋa m bɩ ma.
46001028	Hɔ k'a bɩ zore an yaarsɩ durnya ʋ bɩ, hɔ k'a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ bɩ, Woso hɔ bɩ do sa, k'a nyaam hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma hɔ bɩ m,
46001029	kʋ gɔsɩ b'a da ma an a mɩŋŋa busu Woso lɛɛ y.
46001030	Woso mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m, awɔɔ m zɛkʋra yɩ kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ, a mɩŋŋa y'a ba wɔɔ mindɔrɛ k'a a to Woso zi, a ɩ wɔɔ ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, an n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Woso tɔ ma, an nɩ wɔɔ bʋmbɔm mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ.
46001031	Kʋ hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ n kʋ yɩ, n ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a ʋ, k'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ, a b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ y, an a lɛ bɔ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba b'ʋ.
46002001	M danyɩnɔ, bʋr kʋ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi bɩ, mɔɔ n bʋr lɛmindɔrɛ m gɛɛ mindɔrɛ m kʋ m bɩ Woso kasɛtɩ bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ y.
46002002	Bala, mɔɔ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɩ hɔsɩ mim dɩnda awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, kʋ Yeezuu Krista mim bɛɛ y, an lɛ da bɩ a wɔ kʋ n y'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ mim m.
46002003	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, mɔɔ n nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʋ, paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, dabɔʋ nɔ ʋ, kan mɛhinkəre kɩ.
46002004	Mɔɔ meerbaa kan mɔɔ pa bɩ darɛ kɩ n nyɩnta lɛmindɔrɛ meerbaa nɔ ʋ y, bɩ nyɩnta ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa zibəə hɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ.
46002005	Nyɩnta a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ bɩ yo gʋɔɔ mindɔrɛ ma y, bɩ k'an yo Woso paŋŋa ma.
46002006	A n bɔkarɛ, mindɔrɛ paan••• wɔɔ n'a dɩndam kristagʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ yaa ka rɔ wɔɔ m. Mindɔrɛ naa do n a to durnya naa do nɔ ʋ, b'a n a to durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'a zaar bam nɔ wɔɔ zi y.
46002007	Woso mindɔrɛ wɔɔ n'a dɩndam, hɔ k'a n dɔ biisi m, n n a nyaakʋm da, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta an a cɩnta, bɩ ma bɩ durnya ba ʋ y, kʋ wɔɔ n bɩ nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
46002008	Durnya naa do paŋŋazannɔ gɔsɩ n nyɩnta an a dɔ y, bala, k'a dɔ ŋ y'a ʋ, ŋ bɩ Zuuba k'a a so lɛbɔʋrɛ ʋ bɩ wɔm gɔdarkʋra ma y.
46002009	Bɩ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ gʋaa mɩm n a yɩ cɩna y, a tʋr n a ma cɩna y, hɔ kʋ gʋaa n a hɔɔn da ma cɩna y, hɔ bɩ do haay Woso a cɩnta gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ m."
46002010	Denter m, wɔɔ, Woso hɔ bɩ do hɩnka wɔɔ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ. Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ hɔ haay taa zɛm, baa hɔ kʋ Woso a nyaakʋm da paan••• haay, a y'a taa zɛm sɔ.
46002011	Nka m nɩ gʋɔɔ barla, an gʋɔɔ mim dɔ? K'a maam, hɔɔn k'a nɩ kan kɩ bɩ m. Maam sɔ bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ Woso gʋr zi bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a dɔ kʋ Woso Ɛspri bɛɛ y.
46002012	Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ n durnya ɛspri yɩ y, bɩ, Woso Ɛspri wɔɔ yɩ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma ʋ Woso barka ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ.
46002013	Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ yɩ ŋ mim dɩndam, wɔɔ bɩr a dɩndam gʋaa mindɔrɛ nɩ y, bɩ, a dɩnda wɔɔ nawʋm Sɛnt-Ɛspri mindɔrɛ m, ʋ nɩ Woso hɔɔ jɩ dɩndam, Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔdɩndarɛ m.
46002014	Gʋaa k'a nɩ mɛsim hɔɔn m bala bɩ, a bɩr yɛm hɔ k'a a to Woso Ɛspri zi bɩ ma y. Hɔɔzaabaa m kan kɩ, a b'a dam ma an a jɩ ma y, bala, Woso Ɛspri n'a dam ma an a ka gʋaa n a dɔ.
46002015	Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso Ɛspri m bɩ, a ɩ hɔ haay dʋdɔ kam bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dʋdɔ karɛ y.
46002016	Bala, n y'a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Nka ɩ Woso hɔɔndarɛ dɔ, k'a hɔ dɩnda nɩ?" A n bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ, Krista hɔɔndarɛ wɔɔ n ta m.
46003001	M danyɩnɔ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ n wɔ ʋ m meer ba kan awɔɔ kɩ amba n tɩr a ba kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso Ɛspri m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɩ y, bɩ meer bɩ ba mɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ durnya mɩsɩrbaa bam nɔ wɔɔ m, bala, awɔɔ gɔɔta a m banfinnirɔ Krista sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.
46003002	Nyonhi mɔɔ ka awɔɔ ʋ, hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɛɛ y, bala, awɔɔ b'a dam ma cɩna a hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩ y. Baa kan dɩɩtaa dɔmɩm kɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩ y.
46003003	Bala, awɔɔ gɔɔta an nɩ durnya mɩsɩrbaa bam. Jɩmbaa kan nyaa kɩ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, naa bɩr a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, awɔɔ gɔɔta an nɩ durnya mɩsɩrbaa bam, an nɩ tam am gʋaa k'an Woso dɔ m naa?
46003004	K'awɔɔ gʋaa deem tɩr a hɩ, a ʋ: "Pol gʋaa m mɔɔ m", gʋaa vanta ʋ: "Apolɔs y'a so mɔɔ ʋ", naa k'awɔɔ n'a bam naa, gʋaa k'an Woso dɔ zibəə bɛɛ awɔɔ n'a bam naa?
46003005	Nka m Apolɔs nɩ? Nka m Pol nɩ? Zibəənyɩnɔ m, Woso nɩ ŋ nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka Krista ʋ, n gʋaa biyəə a zi ba amba Zuuba a da ʋ bɩ m.
46003006	Apolɔs kan mɔɔ kɩ, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan danwunno kɩ. Mɔɔ ɩ Woso lemim bɩ duu, Apolɔs n hi da ra, Woso y'a ka an ma.
46003007	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m gʋaa k'a n'a duum bɩ nɩ y, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m gʋaa k'a nɩ hi dam la bɩ m sɔ y, Woso k'a ka hɔ bɩ nɩ mam b'ɩ lɛ da haay.
46003008	Gʋaa k'a n'a duum kan gʋaa k'a nɩ hi dam la bɩ kɩ, ŋ hɔdeem, bɩ, gʋaa biyəə y'a yawʋra yɩm an a ga kʋ ʋ kan a mɩŋŋa zibəə kɩ.
46003009	Bala, zi wɔɔ n'a bam kan kʋ kɩ Woso zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ m hɔsɩra kʋ Woso n'a wʋm. Awɔɔ m cɛ kʋ Woso n n'a dɔ m.
46003010	Amba cɛdɔrɛzaa mɩŋŋa m bɩ, mɔɔ cɛ bɩ jɩr cɩnta an a ga kʋ ʋ kan ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ, gʋaa vanta m bɔkarɛ an n'a dɔm lɛ. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa biyəə n dundo a zi kan zaa k'a sa an nɩ cɛ bɩ dɔm nɩ m bɩ kɩ.
46003011	Kʋ cɛ bɩ jɩr bɩ nɩ, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an cɛjɩr vanta da fɩɩga y, cɛjɩr k'an ta ʋ hɔɔ tee••• bɩ nɩ gɔɔtarɛ a bɩncɛ ʋ, cɛjɩr bɩ do, Yeezuu Krista m.
46003012	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa cɛ dɔ cɛjɩr bɩ rɛ sarma mɔr m, gɛɛ wanzurfu m, gɛɛ jaa tɔzannɔ m, gɛɛ gɔ m, gɛɛ bur m, gɛɛ haaʋ m,
46003013	Woso y'a zaa zibəə makra barɛ an dɩga a dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ. Woso gʋaa biyəə zibəə makra bam sɛ m, sɛ nɩ gʋaa biyəə zibəə k'an lʋnlɔ hɩnkarɛ, bɩ gʋaa biyəə n n'a zibəə mɩŋŋabaa gɛɛ a bʋnyaabaa dɔm ma.
46003014	Gʋaa kʋ sɛ bɩ b'a zibəə bɩm bɩ, bɩ zaa y'a zibəə ganwʋrɛ yɩm.
46003015	Bɩ gʋaa kʋ sɛ bɩ n'a zibəə bɩm bɩ, a b'a zibəə ganwʋrɛ yɩrɛ y, a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm, bɩ, bɔ a nawʋm kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, bɔ a ʋ sɛ nɔ ʋ.
46003016	Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, Wosocɛ n'awɔɔ m, Woso Ɛspri bɩ nɩ kan a kɩ ra?
46003017	Kʋ gʋaa Wosocɛ bɩ zaar ba, Woso bɩ zaa zaar bam sɔ. Bala, Wosocɛ bɩ Woso hɔ m, bɩ cɛ bɩ do bɩ n'awɔɔ m.
46003018	Gɔsɩ bɩ bra ba a mɩŋŋa nɩ y. K'awɔɔ gʋaa deem ʋ, a hɔɔn ka amba durnya naa do hɔ bɩ nɩ, k'a n'a ba hɔɔzaa k'an bɔkarɛ an hɔɔn ka.
46003019	Bala, durnya naa do mindɔrɛ bɩ, hɔɔzaabaa m Woso mɩm ʋ. Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ sɔ, n ʋ: "Woso ɩ mindɔrɛzannɔ kum hɔɔnkarɛ zi kʋ ŋ n'a bam bɩ nɔ ʋ."
46003020	N y'a ya, n n a gʋrsɩra ba sɔ, n ʋ: "Zuuba mindɔrɛzannɔ hɔɔndarɛrɔ dɔ. A a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y."
46003021	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ, gʋɔɔ tɔ ma y, bala, awɔɔ hɔ m hɔ haay m.
46003022	Kʋ Pol m, gɛɛ Apolɔs m, gɛɛ Sefas m, awɔɔ hɔɔ m, kʋ durnya m gɛɛ mɩsɩrbaa m, gɛɛ zɛ m, kʋ her-her dɔmɩm naa m, gɛɛ bootirɔ dɔmɩnnɔ m, woo••• naa awɔɔ hɔ m.
46003023	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ nɩ, Krista y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, Woso n a so Krista ʋ.
46004001	A a ga m, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ kan Apolɔs kɩ bɩ, Krista zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m, Woso n a minno k'a ŋ nyaakʋm da biisi bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n ŋ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.
46004002	Kʋ n hɔ da gʋaa wɔ ʋ k'a n dɩga a mim ma, hɔ kʋ n'a kam ma k'a zaa bɩ n a ba kɛɛrɛ bɩ, sɩrabarɛ m.
46004003	Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m kan mɔɔ kɩ k'awɔɔ mɔɔ dʋdɔ yar, gɛɛ gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ mɔɔ dʋdɔ yar y. Mɔɔ bɩr m mɩŋŋa dʋdɔ yarlɛ m zim sɔ y.
46004004	Sɩra m, mɔɔ n kʋrɔma yɩ m heer ʋ an nɩ mɔɔ kɔrɛ y, bɩ naa bɛɛ n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, mim ba mɔɔ ma wa. Gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ kam bɩ, Zuuba m.
46004005	Bɩ minto bɩ, a bɩ lɛɛ ka a gɔsɩ dʋdɔ ka y, k'a to kʋ Zuuba n a bɔ an bʋr, k'a b'a bɔ an bʋr, a hɔ gaam hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da monsigə ʋ ra, an bɔ hɔ haay kʋ gʋɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ a nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m garga ra. Maam bɩ, Woso y'a lɛ bɔm gʋaa biyəə ʋ, amba a a ga m bɩ m.
46004006	M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma m, mɔɔ n naa dɩnda, m makra sa Apolɔs kan mɔɔ kɩ ma, k'awɔɔ n wɔɔ hɔbaa sa, a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu a cem hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ han y. Awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ yo gʋaa vanta ma k'a a mɩŋŋa busu, a gʋaa vanta gore bɔ ʋ y.
46004007	Bala, gʋaa ra, nka y'a ka ɩbɩɩ m lɛ da ɩ muno nɩ? Bɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ ɩ zim k'a ka bɛɛ n y'a ʋ ɩbɩɩ ʋ? Bɩ k'a ka n y'a ʋ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, bɔ m, ɩ n'ɩ mɩŋŋa busurɛ ɩ ʋ, a yɩ ɩ ʋ ɩ zim nɩ?
46004008	Ʋn'hʋʋn•••, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ haay m kaka an bʋrbɔ, hɔnyɩzannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ a ba cinno, bɩ cinno bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n'a ba cinno paan•••rɔ, kʋ wɔɔ m nyɩnta cinno sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
46004009	Mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ m kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ, Woso bɩ, wɔɔ da ʋ gʋaa haay jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma. Bɔ wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yar n nɩ tarɛ ŋ nɩ k'a yaa ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ kɩ. Ɩ ʋ wɔɔ nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ saa, am hɔɔnɩbɩɩrɔ hɔ bɩ m durnya haay mɩm ʋ, malɛɛkarɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma sɔ.
46004010	Hɔɔzannɔ n wɔɔ m, Krista kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ minto. B'awɔɔ, mindɔrɛzannɔ n'awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista kɩ bɩ tɔ ma. Paŋŋawarzannɔ n wɔɔ m, awɔɔ m paŋŋazannɔ, n y'awɔɔ gore daŋ ʋ, bɩ n yɩ wɔɔ gore bɔŋ ʋ.
46004011	A n ta an wakatɩ naa do ku naa, wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ nɩ fɩr yɩm, nɔ m kan mɩsɩ kɩ m, huu jɩra wɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ ba ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ har nɩ y, lɛɛ wɔɔ n'a sam tee•••.
46004012	Zi wɔɔ n'a bam kɔɔkɔɔ k'ʋ lɛɛmaa hɔ yɩ, ʋ a bɩ. Kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ, bɩ wɔɔ ŋ barka da ʋ. Kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ yɛ fɩryɩrɛ bɩ ma.
46004013	Kʋ gʋɔɔ y'a bʋnyaa hɩm wɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ meerbaa nyɩnta ba kan ŋ kɩ. Kan a her kɩ naa, n gɔɔta n nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ɩ ʋ, durnya gumə m wɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ, durnya dintim m wɔɔ m.
46004014	Mɔɔ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba naa ʋ naa ba, kʋ m awɔɔ da nyannɩ ʋ y. A ba mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m awɔɔ bɔ zaa ʋ, bala, mɔɔ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, m n'awɔɔ ŋʋam.
46004015	Baa k'awɔɔ karɩnsaambɔɔ yɩ tisi-tisi Krista nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ zɩ bɩ hɔka y, a deem. Mɔɔ n'awɔɔ zɩ, bala, mɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ ka m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ.
46004016	Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ dʋndɔ mɔɔ nawʋm, k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa.
46004017	Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mɔɔ hɔbaa sa, bɩ minto m, mɔɔ n Timote nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma, k'an bɩ mɩsɩrbaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam Krista zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ zaarɔ tɔ da awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, amba mɔɔ n'a dɩndam lɛɛ haay ʋ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ haay m bɩ m. K'a dɔ a ʋ, Timote bɩ mɔɔ nyɩ m am awɔɔ hɔ bɩ m sɔ, mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam, an a kʋsɩ mɔɔ ma.
46004018	Awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu, ŋn'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ y.
46004019	Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba yɛ, mɔɔ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ zɔɔ, bɩ mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ wɔɔ meerbaarɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma kʋ m a ma y, bɩ, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ m a dɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ paŋŋa m gɛ.
46004020	Bala, Woso cirbəə bɩ, meerbaarɔ mim bɛɛ y, zi paŋŋazaa k'a n'a bam bɩ mim m.
46004021	N kara awɔɔ lɛ n taa? Awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ mɔɔ n bʋr a zi bara m m wɔ ʋ kʋ m nyaa ba kan a kɩ gɛɛ, kʋ m bʋr a zi ŋʋarɛ m kan nyɩntabaa kɩ nɩ?
46005001	Mɔɔ ma n n'a dɩndam lɛɛ kar ʋ, n ʋ, gʋaa ɩ jaan da awɔɔ barla, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ m nɔ wɔɔ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋn'ɩ jaandarɛ naa do lɔɔ da y, k'an bʋnyaa maam-maam bɩ tɔ ma. A dɩnda n nawʋrɛ, n ʋ, awɔɔ gʋaa deem nɩ kan a zɩ lʋ kɩ.
46005002	A ga a wʋm k'awɔɔ heer n a zar, a nyi ka mimbʋnyaa k'an awɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ minto, a gʋaa k'a naa ba bɩ bɔ a zi, an bɔkarɛ, awɔɔ bɩ to an n'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busum.
46005003	Mɔɔ ba b'ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ heer ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, mɔɔ gʋaa k'a mim naa do ba bɩ dʋdɔ yar, ɩ ʋ b'ʋ mɔɔ n ta ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
46005004	K'awɔɔ b'a so kʋ ma k'a mim naa do dɩnda, mɔɔ heer nyɩntam kan awɔɔ kɩ, wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, k'a gʋaa bɩ do dʋdɔ yar Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ kan a paŋŋa kɩ m.
46005005	K'a gʋaa bɩ do da Sʋtaana wɔ ʋ, k'a mɛsim n a zaar ba, k'a nyi bɩ n a da ma an bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ hinni kʋ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ.
46005006	Awɔɔ n a ga m hɔɔ, a a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu y. N ʋ: "Nyʋnyɔɔ poore tɔkkɛ ɩ nyisi derm haay." Awɔɔ n bɔɔr naa do dɔ ra?
46005007	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mimbʋnyaa haay k'ɩ ʋ nyʋnyɔɔ gusire m bɩ bɔ a bire ʋ, k'a a da ma, a yɩ mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa ɩ ʋ, nyisi daa kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma bɩ m. Bala, sɩra nɔ ʋ, Woso awɔɔ hu bɔ, Yeezuu Krista zɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Yeezuu Krista bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm kʋ n tɩr a zɛ mannɩ pakkɩ cibsa ma bɩ kɩ.
46005008	Ʋ ʋ pakkɩ cibsa bɩ bɩ, bɩ, ʋ b'a bɩ bur kʋ nyʋnyɔɔ gusire n ta ma bɩ nɩ y. Nyʋnyɔɔ gusire bɩ do bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, mimbʋnyaabarɛ m kan mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa barɛ kɩ. Bɩ, ʋ ʋ cibsa bɩ bɩ bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma m, naa k'a hɩ a ʋ, heer hu nɔ ʋ, sɩra nɔ ʋ.
46005009	Ci kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta m a ba awɔɔ ma bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m mɔɔ ʋ, a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan jaandər kɩ y.
46005010	Durnyazannɔ kʋ jaandənno m, mɩnyɔɔzannɔ m, ŋnɩ konno, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam wosobaawɔnnɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ ʋ a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ y. Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, a b'a lɛ dam nawɔnnɔ ʋ, pakra m k'an bɔ durnya ʋ, kʋ n bɛɛ m a wer ta ʋ.
46005011	Ayy••• durnyazannɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ ma y, bɩ gʋaa k'a ʋ danyɩ n a mɩ Krista zuure nɔ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, jaandər m, gɛɛ mɩnyɔɔzaa, gɛɛ an nɩ yaa dam wosobaawɔnnɔ m, gɛɛ tɔzarlɛzaa, gɛɛ bɛɛmirewaasɩzaa, gɛɛ hɔyɔrɛzaa bɩ. Bɩ zaa mɔɔ hɩ ma, baa kʋ hɔbɩrɛ m, a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ y.
46005012	Mɔɔ bɛɛ n nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarlɛ y. B'awɔɔ a ga m, a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ sokʋma nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar.
46005013	Kʋ durnyazannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Woso n nɩ brɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm. K'a hɔ kʋ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ ba, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a la gʋaa k'a n'a bʋnyaa bam bɩ ra a bɔ a barla."
46006001	A a ba lɔ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa deem ɩ mim m kan a mim kɩ, ta a tɩr a ʋ durnya dʋdɔkənno zi kʋ ŋ nɩ dʋdɔ bɩ ba, a lɔ a bɩr mim bɩ dam wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a dɩnda?
46006002	Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ durnya dʋdɔ ka ra? Bɩ, k'awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ durnya dʋdɔ ka, bɔ m awɔɔ bɩr a dam ma an nɩ minno poorero nɔɔm dɩndarɛ?
46006003	Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ zɛm bɩ malɛɛkarɔ dʋdɔ ka ra? Bɩ, bɔ m kɛɛrɛ wɔɔ bɩ her mɩsɩrbaa naa minno dʋdɔ karɛ?
46006004	Kan naa kɩ haay, kʋ minno nɔɔn duro b'a da ʋ, b'awɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɩr dɩgarɛ ŋ ma hɔsɩ a sokʋma nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ sa a ŋ ba a dʋdɔkənno.
46006005	Naa do nyannɩ ba awɔɔ m na? Awɔɔ k'a m danyɩnɔ Krista nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ gʋaa deem taan••• ba ʋ, mindɔrɛzaa, k'a mim banka awɔɔ barla ra?
46006006	A n a ga m, kʋ danyɩnɔ n ta kʋ m dʋdɔkənno taa y, an lɛ da bɩ, a bɩ zore kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋ m basɩrakənno taa y.
46006007	Sɩra nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ kʋrɔ ma maam-maam, ta k'awɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m dʋdɔkənno taa bɩ minto. Kʋ hɔ k'a bɩ tɩrga n y'a ba awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩrɛ, a jɩra ta b'ʋ bɩ m. Kʋ hɔ n n'a yɔrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n yɛ ma, k'a jɩra sɔ.
46006008	Bɩ, awɔɔ bɩr yɛm hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma y, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ hɔ k'a bɩ tɩrga bam, an nɩ koor bam, bɩ, naa ba awɔɔ nawʋrɛ a danyɩnɔ m.
46006009	Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ bɩ nyɩntam Woso cirbəə b'ʋ ra? A bɩ bra bɩmba a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ y. K'a dɔ a ʋ, jaandənno, kan wosobaawɔnnɔ yaadənno kɩ, muno lannɔbənno, muno zinobənno, yaarɔ wʋta kan kʋ kɩ zannɔ,
46006010	konno, mɩnyɔɔzannɔ, bɛɛmirewaasɩzannɔ, gʋɔɔ tɔzarlɛzannɔ, hɔyonno, ŋ bɩncɛ bɩ nyɩntam Woso cirbəə b'ʋ y.
46006011	Awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro bam biisi. Bɩ, Woso awɔɔ hu bɔ, an mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro gʋ awɔɔ ma, an awɔɔ bɔ ʋ a hɔ, k'a a so awɔɔ ʋ, a awɔɔ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʋ, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ.
46006012	Gʋaa a da ma an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ haay woo••• ba." Sɩra m, bɩ, hɔ haay bɛɛ n mɩŋŋa gʋaa n'a bam wa. Mɔɔ m da ma, m a hɩ, m ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ kʋ m hɔ haay ba." Bɩ, mɔɔ b'a tom hɔ niŋŋə n mɔɔ ba a lɔ y.
46006013	Gʋaa bɩ do a da ma an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: "Hɔbɩrɛ da n y'a ʋ gʋaa nɔ tɔ ma, n nɩ gʋaa nɔ da hɔbɩrɛ tɔ ma sɔ. Bɩ, Woso zɛm bɩ hɔbɩrɛ kan gʋaa nɔ bɩ kɩ zaar ba." Sɩra m, bɩ, n nɩ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ da jaandarɛ minto y, wɔɔ mɛ bɩ, ta an a wʋ ʋ Zuuba hɔ, Zuuba n ta ʋ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ daahan minto.
46006014	Bɩ, Woso k'a Zuuba Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ, a wɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʋ sɔ a paŋŋa bɩ m.
46006015	Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ mɛrɔ wɔɔ Krista mɛ vəŋŋəro m na? Mɔɔ yɛrɛ m Krista mɛ vəŋŋə sa m a ba lʋmɩŋŋahɛɛrɛzaa mɛ vəŋŋə ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga!
46006016	Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, kʋ gʋaa a zɛ kʋ ra kan lʋmɩŋŋahɛɛrɛzaa kɩ, a zaa bɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ a ba n y'a ʋ deem na? Bala, Wosoci a hɩ a ʋ: "Ŋ hɩɩya haay a ba gʋaa deem."
46006017	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a a zɛ kʋ ra kan Zuuba kɩ bɩ, a a ba ɛspri deem kan kɩ.
46006018	Naa minto bɩ, k'a a si jaandarɛ lɛɛ. Mimbʋnyaarɔ vantɔɔ kʋ gʋaa nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ n a so a mɛ ʋ jilli y. Bɩ, jaandarɛzaa bɩ, mimbʋnyaa an n'a barɛ a mɛ bɩ m.
46006019	Gɛɛ, awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ mɛ bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri cɛ m, Woso n a ka awɔɔ ʋ, an n'awɔɔ heer ʋ ra? Bɩ minto bɩ, awɔɔ bɛɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ dɔ ra? Woso y'a so awɔɔ ʋ.
46006020	Bala, Woso hɔ bɔ gʋta an awɔɔ bʋmbɔ m. Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a hɔ k'a n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ bɩ ba a mɛ bɩ m.
46007001	Kɛɛrɛ naa, kʋ m minno k'awɔɔ mɔɔ lɩnlar ma ci ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nyɩ bɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ ʋ: "A mɩŋŋa kʋ gʋaa b'a zɔ lʋ ma y."
46007002	Bɩ, kʋ jaandarɛ n a ga m bɩ, gʋaa biyəə a ga m an bɩr a mɩŋŋa lʋ m, lʋ biyəə n bɩr a mɩŋŋa zim m.
46007003	Bɩ, gʋaa yar b'a ga m an hɔ k'a lʋ b'a ga m bɩ ba a lʋ bɩ m, lʋ bɩ maam sɔ, a a ga m an hɔ k'a zim b'a ga m bɩ ba a zim bɩ m.
46007004	Bala, lʋ bɩ bɛɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋa mɛ b'ʋ y, a zim bɩ y'a so ʋ. Gʋaa bɩ bɛɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋa mɛ b'ʋ sɔ y, a lʋ bɩ y'a so ʋ.
46007005	A b'a gu kʋ ma y, k'a maam kʋ awɔɔ ma, k'a zɛkʋra da jɩm ʋ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, k'a a da ma a toore yɩ a yaa da gʋta, bɩ, a b'a to dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ a zɛkʋra da jɩm ʋ bɩ n maasɩrɛ ba y. K'a a ya, a a bɔ a bɩr kan kʋ kɩ, kʋ m bɛɛ m awɔɔ bɩ zɛm b'a da ma a bʋr a ma y, bɩ Sʋtaana yom bɩ ma an awɔɔ makra ba k'awɔɔ n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ.
46007006	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ naa, lɛ bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ y, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ a da ma, a naa ba.
46007007	Kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ m, kʋ gʋaa haay do m mɔɔ m, bɩ, Woso gan wʋ gʋaa biyəə ma a hʋnhɔ, a a ka gʋaa niŋŋə nɩ lʋ m, an a ka gʋaa vanta n'a dam ma, an mɩsɩrbaa ba bazabaa nɔ ʋ.
46007008	Naa y'a ka mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lannɔ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ m, kan zonno wɔɔ kɩ m, m ʋ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta a deem maam amba mɔɔ m.
46007009	Bɩ, kʋ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ bʋr a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, kʋ yaarɔ wɔɔ n lannɔ ka cɛ ʋ, kʋ zonno wɔɔ n zino sa. Kʋ ŋ y'a ba ncɩnaaʋ a jɩra, kʋ lʋ gɛɛ zim yɩrɛ lɛtaama n a so ŋ ʋ, an bɩr bɩrɛ am sɛ hɔ bɩ m.
46007010	Lɛ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a cɩnta lannɔzannɔ wɔɔ m kan zinzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ m bɩ ba n nɩ: "Lʋ b'a gʋ a zim ma y." Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa bɛɛ lɛ bɩ cɩnta y, Zuuba m.
46007011	Kʋ lʋ a gʋ a zim ma, a b'a ya an zim sa y, k'a lɛ taa zim ma k'an a bɔ an aa kʋ ma kan a zim bɩ kɩ, an nyɩnta kan kɩ. Lʋ zim n a ga m sɔ an la a lʋ ra y.
46007012	Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan ŋ kɩ, Zuuba bɛɛ y, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: "Kʋ kristagʋaa ta lʋ m, bɩ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ m lʋ bɩ nɩ, lʋ bɩ m bɔkarɛ an yɛ k'a nyɩnta kan kɩ, a bɩ la lʋ bɩ ra y."
46007013	A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, kʋ lʋ kʋ kristagʋaa m zim ta ʋ, bɩ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ y, an bɔkarɛ an yɛ k'a nyɩnta kan lʋ bɩ kɩ, lʋ bɩ b'a bɔ ʋ y.
46007014	Bala, zim kʋ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ b'a ba Woso hɔ a lʋ bɩ tɔ ma, lʋ kʋ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ b'a ba Woso hɔ sɔ a zim bɩ tɔ ma. Kʋ ncɩnaaʋ bɛɛ, bɔ an nawʋm kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ, dintim nyɩnɔ m Woso mɩm ʋ, an bɔkarɛ ŋ y'a ba wosogʋɔɔ.
46007015	Kʋ basɩrakarɛzaa bɩ lɛ taa k'a gʋ a mim bɩ ma, k'an a gʋ ma. Zim kʋ kristagʋaa m bɩ, gɛɛ lʋ kʋ kristagʋaa m bɩ, a so a mɩŋŋa ʋ mim naa do nɔ ʋ. A n bɔkarɛ, Woso k'a awɔɔ bir bɩ, awɔɔ bir a ʋ, k'awɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba laafɩɩ nɔ ʋ.
46007016	Bala, lʋ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m kristagʋaa bɩ, a a da ma ɩbɩɩ n a ka ɩ zim bɩ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a dɔm na? Gʋaa yar bɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m kristagʋaa bɩ, a a da ma, ɩbɩɩ n a ka ɩ lʋ bɩ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a dɔm sɔ ra?
46007017	Mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m hɔ vanta naa do hɩ awɔɔ m sɔ, hɔ naa do mɔɔ n'a dɩndam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ m lɛɛ haay ʋ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gʋaa biyəə a ga m an mɩsɩrbaa niŋŋə kʋ Woso a ka ʋ dɔmɩm k'a a bir ma kan bɩ zu a ʋ bɩ ba.
46007018	Kʋ Woso gʋaa bir, bɩ ma bɩ a zaa gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, a b'a baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ bɩ nyaakʋm da y. Kʋ gʋaa vanta Woso a bir, bɩ ma bɩ, a zaa n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, a b'a ka ma k'a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y.
46007019	Kʋ gʋaa gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, gɛɛ k'a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ n bɩ y. Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure n hɔ.
46007020	Gʋaa biyəə n gɔɔta mɩsɩrbaa kʋ Woso a ka ʋ, a birle dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ m.
46007021	Kʋ nyɩnta ɩ ʋ lɔ, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso ɩ bir ʋ bɩ ma, ɩ bɩ ɩ hɔɔn kɔ a tɔ ma y, bɩ kʋ zaa ta ʋ k'ɩ ɩ da ma ɩ bɔ lɔmbaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'ɩ zaa bɩ do sa.
46007022	Bala, lɔ kʋ Woso a bir k'an bɩ zu Zuuba ʋ bɩ, a ba b'ʋ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa Zuuba nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, soamɩŋŋaʋzaa kʋ Woso a bir sɔ bɩ, a ba b'ʋ Krista lɔ.
46007023	Woso hɔ bɔ gʋta an awɔɔ bʋmbɔ m, a b'a ya a yɛ, a a ba gʋɔɔ lɔnnɔ y.
46007024	M danyɩnɔ, amba mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ bɩ, gʋaa biyəə a ga m, an gɔɔta an bɩr mɩsɩrbaa kʋ Woso a ka ʋ dɔmɩm k'a a bir ʋ bɩ bam Woso mɩm ʋ.
46007025	Kʋ bazanɔ wɔɔ mim nɩ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ naa, Zuuba bɛɛ y'a cɩnta a ʋ, mɔɔ n a hɩ y, m hɔɔndarɛ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ, bɩ Zuuba barka ma bɩ, gʋaa kʋ n n'a dam ma, n n a mim si sɩra bɩ m mɔɔ m.
46007026	Mɔɔ yɩ m hɔɔn dam mɔɔ ʋ, her-her dɔmɩm naa kɔrɛ minto bɩ, a mɩŋŋa kʋ baza n gɔɔta maam.
46007027	K'ɩ ɩ jaan m sɔ, ɩbɩɩ ka ma k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ʋ y, k'ɩ ba jaan m, ɩbɩɩ ka ma k'ɩ jaan zɛ y.
46007028	Bɩ, k'ɩ ɩ jaan bɩ sa, mimbʋnyaa bɛɛ ɩ ba y, kʋ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ a jaan sa sɔ, an mimbʋnyaa ba sɔ y. Bɩ, kʋ m a hɩ a m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lannɔ ka cɛ ʋ, kan nyɩmbɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ zino sa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ fɩr yɩrɛ a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n fɩr bɩ do yɩ y, bɩ minto m mɔɔ nɩ meerbaa naa do bam.
46007029	M danyɩnɔ, kʋ m a hɩ a m denter, dɔmɩm n gɔɔta wɔɔ m gʋta y. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, an a sa naa ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ n a mɩsɩrbaa ba ɩ ʋ, ŋ ba lannɔ nɩ y.
46007030	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi kam nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ heer n a zar y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a heer nyɔɔm nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ heer n nyɔɔ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ sim nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ ba hɔsɩ nɩ y.
46007031	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya naa hɔ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ bɩr a yɩrɛ y. Bala, durnya naa do k'a nɩ yɩm naa, cem an nawʋm naa.
46007032	Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ hɔɔn n bɩr kɔrɛ y. Gʋaa k'a n lʋ sa bɩ, a hɔɔn an n'a dam Zuuba hɔɔnhɔrɔ ma, an n'a kam ma kʋ Zuuba nɔ n yɩ a ra.
46007033	Bɩ gʋaa k'a lʋ n ta ʋ bɩ, a hɔɔn nɩ kɔm durnya minno ma, a ka a nawʋm ma k'a laarɛ nɔ n yɩ a ra,
46007034	a hɔɔn m hɩɩya-hɩɩya. Maam sɔ bɩ, lʋ k'a ba zim nɩ y, kan nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ k'a n zim sa kɩ, a hɔɔn ŋn'a dam Zuuba hɔɔnhɔrɔ ma. Ŋ n'a kam ma kʋ Woso n a so a ʋ jilli, a mɛ, kan a nyi kɩ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ lʋ k'a zim n ta ʋ bɩ, a hɔɔn an n'a dam durnya minno ma, a ka a nawʋm ma k'a zim nɔ n yɩ a ra.
46007035	Naa hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan minto. M ka bɛɛ mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ m awɔɔ hɔɔn kɔ y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ m hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da bɩ ba, k'a hɔɔn bɩ nyɩnta hɩɩya-hɩɩya y, k'a kʋsɩ Zuuba ma bala.
46007036	Kʋ gʋaa jaan ta ʋ, a hɔɔn nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ gʋta, b'a bɩr a da ra a mɩŋŋa ma y, an a hɔɔn da a ʋ, a yaa a zɔ ma an yɩ mim, a a da ma, an a jaan bɩ sa. K'a naa ba, a n mimbʋnyaa ba y, kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋ sa.
46007037	Bɩ gʋaa k'a a hɔɔn da, an hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a zim, bɩ pakra bɛɛ m kan kɩ, an a da a mɩŋŋa lɛtaama ma, an a cɩnta a heer ʋ a zim, a ʋ, a bɩ lʋ sarɛ y, a a ba mɩŋŋa.
46007038	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋaa k'a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ sa bɩ, a a ba mɩŋŋa, bɩ gʋaa k'a n a sa bɩ, a a ba mɩŋŋa an lɛ da.
46007039	Kʋ lʋ zim ta ʋ, gɔɔta a nawʋm an bɩr gʋaa bɩ do lʋ tee•••, gʋaa bɩ mɩsɩrbaa tɛkka ma. Bɩ, k'a zim bɩ bɩ ga, a a so a mɩŋŋa ʋ kɛɛrɛ, a a da ma, an bɔ an gʋaa vanta sa, bɩ kristagʋaa an n'a sam bala.
46007040	Bɩ, mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a gɔɔta a n a ya an zim sa, a heer nyɔɔrɛ an lɛ da, mɔɔ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, Woso Ɛspri ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ sɔ, bɩ minto bɩ, k'a mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ si.
46008001	Ʋ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩrɔ sinno wɔɔ mim dɩnda kɛɛrɛ. Awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ʋ haay ʋ ta hɔdɔrɛ m." Denter m, bɩ hɔdɔrɛ ɩ gʋaa dam mɩŋŋabusure ma. A n bɔkarɛ ŋʋarɛ y'a kam gʋɔɔ sɩrakarɛ n'a dam la.
46008002	Kʋ gʋaa y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, a hɔ dɔ, k'an a dɔ a ʋ, a n hɔ dɔ amba a a ga m bɩ nɩ y.
46008003	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa Woso ŋʋa, Woso bɩ zaa dɔ a gʋaa.
46008004	Kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ ʋ ga m ʋ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ sim sʋ gɛɛ? Wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, wosobaawɔm deem taan••• ba ʋ an mɩsɩr durnya ʋ y, bɩ Woso vanta ba ʋ, kʋ Woso k'an ta ʋ deem bɩ bɛɛ y.
46008005	Bala, baa kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ hɔɔ niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ nɩ brama gɛɛ tara ʋ birm wosoro, ŋnɩ ŋ ba denter sɔ wosoro kan zuubɔɔ kɩ,
46008006	a bɩ ncɩnaaʋ wɔɔ zi y, wɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ, Woso deem taan•••, Zɩ bɩ m, a to hɔ haay ʋ a mɩŋŋa zi, wɔɔ n ta ʋ a tɔ ma. Bɩ Zuuba bɩ deem sɔ, Yeezuu Krista m, a mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m hɔ haay woo••• n ta ʋ, a tɔ ma m sɔ wɔɔ n ta ʋ.
46008007	Bɩ, kristagʋɔɔ haay bɛɛ naa dɔ y. Gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ mim ka wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩrɔ sinno wɔɔ m bɩ, ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ ŋ sʋm, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ ka n nawʋm wosoro paan•••rɔ ʋ. Naa minto bɩ, kʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa ba ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, a kʋrɔ ma Woso mɩm ʋ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ sinno wɔɔ sʋrɛ tɔ ma.
46008008	Wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, hɔbɩrɛ bɛɛ nɩ wɔɔ zɔm Woso ma y, kʋ wɔɔ n a bɩ, a b'a dam ma an wɔɔ ba laatʋ Woso ma y, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ sɔ a bɛɛ n n'a dam ma an wɔɔ zɔ Woso ma sɔ y.
46008009	Bɩ, k'a dundo a zi, awɔɔ ɩ soamɩŋŋaʋ m k'a a hɔɔnhɔ bɩ, b'a ba ka k'awɔɔ soamɩŋŋaʋ bɩ n a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba paŋŋa m cɩna Woso zuure bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ y.
46008010	Bala, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔ dɔ bɩ, kʋ gʋaa kʋ paŋŋawarzaa m Woso zuure nɔ ʋ b'ɩbɩɩ yɩ ɩ nɩ nyɩntam wosobaawɔm cɛ ʋ, ɩ n'a mannɩ sim sʋrɛ, naa y'a dam han denter la? A bɩ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ sim sʋm, bɩ n a heer kɔ ra?
46008011	Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔ dɔ bɩ minto, paŋŋawarzaa n a dom Woso ma, b'ɩbɩɩ danyɩ m, Krista mɩŋŋa n ga a tɔ ma.
46008012	K'awɔɔ ɩ naa bam, a bʋnyaa awɔɔ n'a barɛ a danyɩnɔ paŋŋawarzannɔ wɔɔ m, an nɩ ŋ heer warm kʋ ma, bɩ mimbʋnyaa naa do ba awɔɔ nawʋm Krista m sɔ.
46008013	Naa minto bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ danyɩ y'a dom mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bɩm tɔ ma, k'a maam mɔɔ bɩ n yarɛ m sim sʋ fɩɩga y, kʋ m danyɩ b'a do y.
46009001	Mɔɔ n m so m mɩŋŋa ʋ ra? Kristazibəəzaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ m na? Mɔɔ n wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu yɩ m mɩm m na? Zi kʋ mɔɔ ba Zuuba nɔ ʋ, bɩ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m na?
46009002	Kan gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ, kʋ kristazibəəzaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ, kan awɔɔ kɩ, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m. Bala, hɔ k'a n'a hɩnkam, a ʋ, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ m, Zuuba nɔ ʋ.
46009003	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ m nɩ m gumə dɩndam, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mim kam mɔɔ ra rɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ bɩ ba n nɩ:
46009004	Mɔɔ n m ga m, kʋ gʋɔɔ m hɔbɩrɛ kan hɔmire kɩ ka m ʋ, m zibəə bɩ tɔ ma ra?
46009005	Mɔɔ n m ga m, m lʋ sɩrakər sa k'an bɩr kan mɔɔ kɩ, m zaakʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, amba kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ, Zuuba dannɔ wɔɔ kan Pɩyɛɛr kɩ n'a bam bɩ m na?
46009006	Gɛɛ, mɔɔ kan Barnabas kɩ, wɔɔ y'ʋ ga m ʋ minto kʋ zi ba, ʋ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ tʋr m na?
46009007	Awɔɔ ma cɩna, n ʋ, sʋrdaa tɩr a mɩŋŋa tʋr a zim k'a bɩr sʋrdaabaa bam na? Gɛɛ kʋ gʋaa dɩvɛn gɔ sɔɔn a ba zaa m k'a dɩvɛn gɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ ra? Gɛɛ hɔbɩsɩrɔ dundor b'a lɛ m k'a hɔbɩsɩrɔ k'a nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyonhi mi ra?
46009008	A b'a hɔɔn da a ʋ, yo mɔɔ nawʋm hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a bam tee••• bɩ makrarɔ ma y. Bala, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm naa hɩm sɔ.
46009009	Bala, n y'a da lɛrɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, n ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ hɔ du der k'a nɩ hɔyaa zɔm bɩ lɛ ma y." A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ, Woso bɩ kɔ a nawʋm dono ma,
46009010	gɛɛ meer naa do ba a ʋ wɔɔ tɔ ma ra? Sɩra m, wɔɔ minto m n nɩ hɔ naa do gʋrsɩra ba. Bala, a a ga m, kʋ gʋaa k'a nɩ dam wʋm bɩ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔyaa zɔm bɩ kɩ n bɩr a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, a y'a hɔ yɩm hɔyaa bɩ jirle nɔ ʋ sɔ.
46009011	Amba danwur nɩ hɔyaa duum bɩ, wɔɔ lemim nyɩnta duu awɔɔ m. Amba gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔyaa zɔm bɩ, an n'a hɔjirle yɩm bɩ, a hɩ awɔɔ ʋ kʋ wɔɔ ɩ durnya hɔnyɩ yɩrɛ awɔɔ zi, a bʋnyaa ra?
46009012	K'awɔɔ ɩ nyasʋm gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ m, k'a a ga m bɩ minto bɩ, wɔɔ bɛɛ awɔɔ nɩ nyasʋm wɔɔ m an lɛ da ra? Bɩ, kʋ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ ga m bɩ m bɩ. Bɩ wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma k'awɔɔ m naa ba wɔɔ nɩ y. Yɛ wɔɔ ʋ kɔrɛ do haay ma, kʋ hɔsɩ b'a ta Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ m toore y.
46009013	Awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosocɛ gʋta bɩ zi bam nɔ wɔɔ, hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ zɛm nɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ nɩ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosocɛ mannɩrɔ zi bam nɔ wɔɔ, mannɩhɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ.
46009014	Maam sɔ bɩ, Zuuba lɛ ka kʋ n nɩ nyasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa dam nɔ wɔɔ m.
46009015	Bɩ, mɔɔ nɩ m ka ma kʋ gʋɔɔ n a ba m m ncɩnaaʋ y. Mɔɔ n ci naa do ba kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ ka m ʋ y. Kʋ mɔɔ ga, a jɩra mɔɔ m kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ yɛ, m zi kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam naa minto. Gɔsɩ bɩ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ naa do yɔm mɔɔ nɩ y.
46009016	Bala, kʋ mɔɔ m, lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ bɩ, lɛbɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ hɔ bɛɛ y. Pakra m kʋ mɔɔ n a pa da, bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ n a pa da, kʋ kʋsɩ n m yɩ.
46009017	Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ m zim, kʋ m zi naa do ba, mɔɔ ba n tɩr m mɩm dam kʋ Woso m ganwʋ m ma. Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ da n y'a ʋ bɩ, zi kʋ n mɔɔ da ʋ bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam, mɔɔ bɩr dɔm hɔsɩ ma y.
46009018	Bɔ mɔɔ n'a yɩrɛ a nɔ ʋ kɛɛrɛ? Lemim nyɩnta bɩ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a pa dam vam bɩ m mɔɔ hɔ. Mɔɔ bɩr m kam ma kʋ nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ m ga m ka m ʋ y.
46009019	Soamɩŋŋaʋzaa m mɔɔ m, gɔsɩ lɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, mɔɔ m mɩŋŋa ba gʋaa haay lɔ, kʋ m m da ma m a ka, kʋ gʋɔɔ gʋta n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ sɩra ka Krista ʋ nɔ ʋ.
46009020	Kʋ mɔɔ ta m nɩ zi bam zɩɩfʋrɔ barla, bɩ mɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ mɩsɩrbaa sa, kʋ m a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Krista ʋ. Baa kʋ mɔɔ bɩr zum Moyiisi lɛrɔ ʋ bɩ, m mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋm ɩ ʋ, zu mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ŋ ʋ. Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ zi bam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zure ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bireyaa ʋ, a ba mɔɔ nawʋm maam, kʋ m m da ma m bʋr ŋ nɩ Krista sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.
46009021	Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ barla, bɩ mɔɔ m ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, mɔɔ bɩr zum Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ y, kʋ m a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Krista ʋ. A bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ bɩr zum Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ y, mɔɔ ɩ zure ŋ ʋ, bala, mɔɔ ɩ zum Krista lɛ ʋ.
46009022	Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ paŋŋawarzannɔ m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, bɩ mɔɔ m ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, ɩ ʋ, paŋŋawarzaa m mɔɔ m, kʋ m a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Krista ʋ. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋkɔɔ m, bɩ mɔɔ m ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, kʋ m a ka, baa kʋ bɔ m, kʋ ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
46009023	Naa woo••• naa ba mɔɔ nawʋm lemim nyɩnta bɩ minto, kʋ m m hɔ yɩ sɔ.
46009024	Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ bra sim brasire zaŋŋa ʋ, ŋ haay ɩ bra bɩ sim, bɩ deem taan••• nɩ bra bɩ sire ganwʋrɛ yɩm. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a bra bɩ si mɩŋŋa k'a a ganwʋrɛ yɩ.
46009025	Brasinno haay y'a mɛ tʋntɔm gʋta, k'a a da ma a yɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa, a ganwʋrɛ yɩ. Bɩ, ŋ ganwʋrɛ bɩ, hɔ m an n'a zarm. Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ tʋntɔ ʋ, wɔɔ ganwʋrɛ bɩ nyɩntam hɔ k'a bɩr a zaar barɛ y.
46009026	Bɩ minto bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ bra bɩ sim, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr a sim yaarsɩ y. Mɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ, kan zoobər kɩ, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr zoo bɩ bam kan lɛɛ tu kɩ y.
46009027	Bɩ, m mɛ bɩ mɔɔ n'a tʋntɔm, m n'a dam bar ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, bala, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m lemim nyɩnta pa da gʋɔɔ nɩ, kʋ Woso n bɔkarɛ an bɩ mɔɔ bɔ a jɛ m, m bɔ vam nɩ y.
46010001	M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mim k'a wɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ, wɔɔ yaabɔɔ yɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ poo ʋ ŋn'ɩ zum Moyiisi ʋ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Woso a ka warkʋ n dɔ ŋ ma jilli, ŋ bra higʋta ma sɔ,
46010002	a bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, ŋ haay batɛm si warkʋ bɩ kan higʋta bɩ kɩ ʋ, k'a zu Moyiisi ʋ.
46010003	Ŋ haay hɔbɩrɛ k'a a to Woso zi bɩ bɩ.
46010004	Ŋ nɩ hi k'a a to Woso zi sɔ bɩ mi, bala, ci deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, ci bɩ do hi ŋ y'a mi. Ci bɩ, Woso y'a ka ŋ ʋ, an nɩ zure ŋ jɛ ʋ. Bɩ, ci bɩ do bɩ, Krista m.
46010005	Baa kan naa kɩ haay, ŋ gʋɔɔ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta Woso nɔ n yɩ ŋ la y, bala, ŋ gɩnga, n ŋ bir poo b'ʋ.
46010006	Ba minno nɔɔn duro ʋ, k'a hɔɔn dɩnda wɔɔ m, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ nyɩnta hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ lɛtaama nɩ, amba ŋ nyɩntam bɩ nɩ y.
46010007	A bɩ yɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ daʋrɛzannɔ amba ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ y, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta k'a hɔ bɩ, k'a hɔ mi, ŋnɩ bɩ wuti k'a sar ba."
46010008	Amba ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ jaan da bɩ, ʋ bɩ jaan da y. Bala, jaan bɩ darɛ a ka, ŋ gʋɔɔ bam tisi-tisi buhɩra a yaa n kaakʋ n gɩnga hindeem taan••• nɔ ʋ.
46010009	Amba ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ Zuuba makra ba bɩ, ʋ bɩ Zuuba makra ba y. Bala, naa kʋ ŋ y'a ba b'a ka mɩnnɔ m sakʋ dɩnda ŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
46010010	Amba ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kukur ba bɩ, ʋ bɩ kukur ba y. Bala, naa kʋ ŋ y'a ba bɩ, Woso malɛɛka k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛ m bɩ, bʋr an bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
46010011	Minno nɔɔn duro wɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ, k'an nyɩnta makra, bɩ y'a ka n ŋ da ci ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ m hɔɔn yɩ ʋ ŋ tɔ ma, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bam jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
46010012	Naa minto bɩ, gʋaa k'a n'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, a b'a barɛ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, k'an dundo a zi k'a b'a do y.
46010013	Makrarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ yɩ bɩ, bɩ taalɛrazaa m Woso m, a b'a tore awɔɔ n makra yɩ k'an cem awɔɔ paŋŋa han y. Kʋ makra awɔɔ yɩ, a y'a karɛ awɔɔ m bɔ ʋ, k'a a da ma a bʋr la.
46010014	M danyɩnɔ, naa minto bɩ, k'a ba wosobaawɔnnɔ daʋrɛ ma laatʋ.
46010015	Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, hɔɔntaʋrɛzannɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma m mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a a hɔɔn da hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ ma a dɩga a.
46010016	Ba wɔɔ tɩr ʋ so kʋ ma kʋ Zuuba tɔdaanɔʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ bɩ, wɔɔ tɩr barka hɔmire bɩ barka da ʋ, ʋ a dɔ ʋ a mi, barka hɔmire bɩ kʋ wɔɔ n'a mim bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ zɛkʋra yɩm kan Krista kɩ a ma bɩ tɔ ma. Kʋ wɔɔ bur bɩ jinjir ʋ a bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ zɛkʋra yɩm sɔ kan Krista kɩ a mɛ bɩ tɔ ma.
46010017	Kʋ bur bɩ n deem bɩ, wɔɔ haay, mɛ deem zannɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, bala, bur deem bɩ wɔɔ ʋ da kʋ ʋ haay ʋ n'a bɩm.
46010018	K'a dɩga Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋ tɩr hɔɔ zɩnzɛ k'a mannɩ ba ŋ nɩ Woso ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro sim sʋm nɔ wɔɔ, a zɛ ŋ nawʋm kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ.
46010019	Bɩ, mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ jɩ n bɔ nɩ? A hɩ mɔɔ ʋ, hɔsɩ m wosobaawɔm kan a mannɩ sim kɩ n na?
46010020	Ayy•••! Mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ m ʋ, basɩrakənno wɔɔ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ ba ŋ nawʋm zinəro ma, a ka bɛɛ ŋ nawʋm Woso ʋ y. Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n'a zɛ kʋ ra kan zinəro kɩ y.
46010021	A n a ga m, k'awɔɔ n Zuuba hɔmire mi, k'a a ya, a zinəro hɔ mi y. A n a ga m sɔ, k'awɔɔ n Zuuba hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, k'a a ya, a zinəro hɔ bɩ y.
46010022	Gɛɛ, a ŋʋa wɔɔ nawʋm k'ʋ Zuuba da nɔmaa ma ra? A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ wɔɔ paŋŋa lɛ da m na?
46010023	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ, k'ʋ hɔ haay ba." Denter m, bɩ hɔ haay bɛɛ n'a dam wɔɔ han wa. Kʋ ŋ bɩ to ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ, k'ʋ hɔ haay ba", kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, hɔ haay bɛɛ n'a kam wɔɔ n ta lɛɛ Woso zuure nɔ ʋ wa.
46010024	Kʋ gʋaa biyəə n bɩr a kam hɔ k'a n'a dam a mim han bɩ ma, a b'a ka a mɩŋŋa daahan ma y.
46010025	Awɔɔ a da ma a hɔ haay k'a nɩ daasɩ ʋ si a bɩ, b'a bɩ laaka da a mim ma y, k'a b'a heer kɔ y.
46010026	Bala, Zuuba y'a so tara burə ʋ kan hɔ haay k'a n a nɔ ʋ kɩ ʋ.
46010027	Kʋ basɩrakakristaʋzaa awɔɔ bir a har ʋ k'a bɩ hɔ bɩ, k'awɔɔ yɛ a birle ma k'a ta, k'a yaa lee ku, kʋ bɔ n y'a ka a ʋ, k'a bɩ bala, a bɩ laaka da ma y, a yaa n'a heer kɔ.
46010028	Bɩ kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a m, a ʋ: "Sim naa do mannɩ sim m", a ba sʋ y, gʋaa k'a naa hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ minto, kʋ heer kɔrɛ bɩ yɩ ʋ y.
46010029	Bɩ, awɔɔ heer kɔrɛ bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma y, gʋaa k'a sim bɩ mim hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ heer mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma. Bala, a n a ga m, kʋ gʋaa vanta heer m mɔɔ dʋdɔ yar y.
46010030	Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ Woso barka darɛ m nɩ hɔ niŋŋə bɩrɛ, bɔ m gʋaa vanta nɩ mɔɔ tɔ zarlɛ an bɔkarɛ mɔɔ Woso barka da, m n'a bɩrɛ?
46010031	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ hɔ awɔɔ n'a bɩrɛ, gɛɛ hɔ awɔɔ n'a mire, baa kʋ bɔ awɔɔ n'a barɛ, k'a hɔ haay ba Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ minto.
46010032	A b'a ka, k'awɔɔ tɔ ma kʋ gʋɔɔ n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ y. Kʋ zɩɩfʋ m, gɛɛ grɛkkɩ m, gɛɛ kristagʋɔɔ kʋ Woso y'a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a b'a ka kʋ gɔsɩ n a do y.
46010033	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa nɩ m yoŋ ʋ, kʋ m yɩ mɩŋŋa gʋaa haay ma, hɔ haay nɔ ʋ. A ba kʋ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr m kam m mɩŋŋa daahan ma y. M ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ cir gʋta n daahan yɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
46011001	Amba mɔɔ nɩ Krista hɔbaa dɩndam bɩ, k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa sɔ.
46011002	Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ, bala, awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, an nɩ zum mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛrɔ haay ʋ, amba mɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ m.
46011003	Bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mim naa do dɔ: Yeezuu Krista m gʋaa yar haay lɛɛzaa, gʋaa yar m lʋ lɛɛzaa, Woso m Krista lɛɛzaa.
46011004	Gʋaa yar haay k'a hɔ ku a mim ma, k'a yaa da, gɛɛ an nɩ Woso lɛ sim k'a so ra bɩ, a lɛɛzaa kʋ Krista m bɩ an n'a bɔŋ ʋ.
46011005	Bɩ, lʋ niŋŋə k'a n hɔ ka a mim la, an bɔkarɛ a ʋ k'a yaa da, gɛɛ Woso lɛ an n'a sim k'a so ra bɩ, a lɛɛzaa an n'a gore bɔŋ ʋ, bala, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, a mim a a bɔ.
46011006	Kʋ lʋ lɛ baa k'a hɔ ka a mim la, k'a n'a minkə zɩnzɛra. Bɩ k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, nyannɩ m kʋ lʋ n a minkə zɩnzɛra gɛɛ an a mim bɔ, k'a maam, k'an hɔ ka a mim la.
46011007	Gʋaa yar bɩ n a ga m an hɔ ka a mim la y. Bala, Woso bɔkʋʋrɛzaa m, a m Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ sɔ, bɩ gʋaa yar lɛbɔʋrɛ m lʋ m.
46011008	Bala, gʋaa yar n a to lʋ mɛ ʋ y, lʋ n y'a bɔ gʋaa yar mɛ ʋ.
46011009	Bɩ, Woso n gʋaa yar da lʋ tɔ ma y, lʋ a a da gʋaa yar tɔ ma.
46011010	Naa minto nɩ, lʋ n a ga m, an hɔ ka a mim la k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a zim n'a lɛɛzaa, malɛɛkarɔ tɔ ma.
46011011	Kan naa kɩ haay, gʋaa b'a dam ma an a hɩ a ʋ, lʋ zibəə ba gʋaa yar ma y, b'a b'a dam ma sɔ an a hɩ a ʋ, gʋaa yar zibəə ba lʋ ma, Zuuba mɩm ʋ y.
46011012	Bala, k'a nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lʋ bɔ n y'a ʋ gʋaa mɛ ʋ bɩ, lʋ nɩ gʋaa yɩm. Bɩ naa haay a to a ʋ Woso zi.
46011013	K'a hɔɔn da ma a zim a dɩga a, a a ga m kʋ lʋ n yaa da Woso m b'a n hɔ ka a mim la ra?
46011014	Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, nyannɩ m kʋ gʋaa yar minkə n bɩr jintə ra? Gʋaa woo••• naa dɔ.
46011015	A n bɔkarɛ kʋ lʋ minkə jintə bɩ n a lɛbɔʋrɛ, bala, minkə jintə bɩ ka n y'a ʋ lʋ ʋ, k'a mim bɩ gɔɔta vam y.
46011016	Kʋ gʋaa a ʋ, k'a bɩsɩ ka hɔdɩndarɛ naa do ma, k'an a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ n minkə hɔ vanta m kʋ yɩnnɩbayɩ naa do bɛɛ y.
46011017	Hɔ k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ y. Bala, k'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʋ ma k'a yaa da Woso m, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a bam sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ bɩr a darɛ awɔɔ han y, awɔɔ bɔ a nawʋrɛ a jɛ m.
46011018	Mim lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ, n y'a hɩ mɔɔ m, n ʋ, k'awɔɔ a so kʋ ma, b'awɔɔ a gʋngʋ a hʋnhɔ. Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʋ, a a da ma an yɩ sɩra.
46011019	Denter sɔ, k'awɔɔ a gʋngʋ a hʋnhɔ, bɩ n n'a kam n nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ taalɛrazannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ dɔ.
46011020	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ a so kʋ ma, Zuuba hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩrɛ tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
46011021	Bala, sokʋma bɩ wakatɩ ʋ, gʋaa biyəə nɩ larɛ a mɩŋŋa hɔbɩrɛ ra, maam bɩ, nɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zɛrɛ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ bɛɛ mire an nɩ ŋ zɛm.
46011022	Awɔɔ har ba ʋ, awɔɔ nɩ hɔ bɩŋ ʋ, a nɩ hɔ miŋ ʋ ra? Gɛɛ a hɩ awɔɔ ʋ, k'a Krista gʋɔɔ wɔɔ gore bɔ ʋ, k'a a ya a nyannɩ da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba hɔsɩ m nɔ wɔɔ ma ra? Bɔ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ ra? Fɩɩgaa! Mɔɔ bɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ naa nɔ ʋ y.
46011023	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta m a dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ, a ma mɔɔ ʋ Zuuba Yeezuu zi: Gum niŋŋə kʋ n'a bam k'a Zuuba nyasʋ a ka kʋ n a zɛ bɩ, gunuu ʋ bɩ do ʋ, a mɩŋŋa bur sa,
46011024	an barka da Woso m, an bɔkarɛ an a zɩnzɛ an a jinjir, an a hɩ a ʋ: "Naa do naa, mɔɔ mɛ m, mɔɔ n a ka awɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a tɩr naa ba, a mɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ."
46011025	Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a a ba maam sɔ hɔmire bɩ m, an a hɩ a ʋ: "Hɔmire naa do gʋaasɩbabaa daa k'an ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ mɔɔ ma minto bɩ m. K'awɔɔ bʋr an nɩ hɔmire bɩ mim, k'a tɩr a ba, a mɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ."
46011026	Bala, wakatɩ haay, k'awɔɔ nɩ Zuuba tɔdaanɔʋ bur bɩ bɩŋ ʋ, an nɩ tɔdaanɔʋ hɔmire bɩ mim bɩ, Zuuba mɩŋŋa zɛ awɔɔ n'a pa darɛ, k'an tolle ba an bʋr.
46011027	Bɩ y'a ka gʋaa k'a nɩ Zuuba tɔdaanɔʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩm, gɛɛ an n'a hɔmire bɩ mim, an Zuuba bɔ ʋ bɩ, mim ɩ kan kɩ, bala, a n dɩga Zuuba mɛ bɩ kan a ma bɩ kɩ ma, hɔsɩ y.
46011028	Gʋaa biyəə a ga m, an a mɩŋŋa lar an dɩga a k'a jɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa gɛ, k'an a dɔ an bur bɩ bɩ, an hɔmire bɩ mi.
46011029	Bala, kʋ gʋaa bur bɩ bɩ, an hɔmire bɩ mi, b'a n a hɔɔn da mɩŋŋa an a dɔ a ʋ, Zuuba mɛ nɩ, a bɩ k'a ʋ, an a mi bɩ, a mɩŋŋa dʋdɔ yarlɛ a ka ma bɩ.
46011030	Naa tɔ ma m, awɔɔ barla gʋɔɔ n ta ʋ gʋta, ŋ bɩ laafɩɩ y, gɔsɩnnɔ n a ba yir, nɔɔn n gɩnga.
46011031	Kʋ wɔɔ y'ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m heer daasɩrɛ ʋ zim, Woso bɩ wɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ y.
46011032	Bɩ kʋ Woso wɔɔ dʋdɔ ka, a hɩ a ʋ, k'awɔɔ bɔ zaa ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ nyɩnta durnya gʋɔɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yar, an ŋ da kɔrɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ y.
46011033	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ a so kʋ ma k'a Zuuba tɔdaanɔʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ, k'a dɔ kʋ ma.
46011034	Kʋ nɔ ɩ gʋaa zɛm, k'an lɛɛ ka an hɔ bɩ a har ʋ, k'a b'a so kʋ ma, a a ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ dʋdɔyarlɛ ma y. Kʋ minno kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ bʋr, mɔɔ brɔɔ bɔm kʋ zi.
46012001	M danyɩnɔ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n hɔ k'an ta a nɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
46012002	Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ basɩrakənno biisi bɩ, wosobaawɔnnɔ daʋrɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n a da ma an n'a bɔrɛ ŋ ʋ y.
46012003	Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ, kʋ Woso Ɛspri a so gʋaa ʋ, a zaa nɩ meer bam, a zaa b'a dam ma an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan Yeezuu kɩ y." Bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma sɔ an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zuuba m Yeezuu m," kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɛɛ y'a ka y.
46012004	Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ y'a hʋnhɔ, bɩ Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ nɩ ŋ karɛ.
46012005	Zibəəro y'a hʋnhɔ n ta ʋ Zuuba nɩ gʋɔɔ darɛ ŋ barɛ ʋ, bɩ Zuuba deem-deem bɩ zibəə m.
46012006	Zibəəro zaarɔ y'a hʋnhɔ ta ʋ, bɩ Woso deem-deem bɩ n'a kam gʋɔɔ n'a dam zibəəro wɔɔ duro barɛ ma.
46012007	Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ zi bam kan gʋaa biyəə kɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ m, bɩ naa ba an nawʋm k'a a da gʋɔɔ haay han.
46012008	Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ mindɔrɛ meerbaa ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa deem ʋ. A n hɔdɔrɛ meerbaa ganwʋrɛ ka gʋaa vanta ʋ.
46012009	Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ do ɩ sɩrakarɛ ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa ʋ, a ɩ waarɛ ganwʋrɛrɔ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ sɔ.
46012010	A ɩ hoserlo barɛ ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ, an nɩ Wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ sɔ. A ɩ ɛsprirɔ dɔ n a bɔ kʋ zi ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ, an nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ, a ɩ leminno wɔɔ duro wusigəre ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ sɔ.
46012011	Bɩ, naa woo••• naa, Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ zibəə m, an nɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ jinjirm gʋaa biyəə m, a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
46012012	Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ gʋaa mɛ deem, an bɔkarɛ a vəŋŋəro m hɔka, bɩ, gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro k'a bɩ to an hɔka naa, mɛ deem m bala, Krista maam sɔ.
46012013	Bala, wɔɔ haay woo••• naa, Zuuba batɛm ka wɔɔ ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'ʋ yɩ mɛ deem zannɔ, kʋ zɩɩfʋ m wɔɔ m, gɛɛ do vantɔɔ m wɔɔ m, kʋ lɔnnɔ wɔɔ m, gɛɛ soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ m wɔɔ m, ʋ ʋ ba deem, Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ n y'a ka wɔɔ ʋ, an wɔɔ han an bra wɔɔ ra.
46012014	Gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋə bɩ deem y, ŋ hɔka.
46012015	Kʋ gʋaa gam a hɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ wɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ ba mɛ bɩ barla y," naa do a da ma an a ka, a bɩ nyɩntam mɛ bɩ barla dɔ ra?
46012016	Kʋ gʋaa tʋr a hɩ a ʋ: "Kʋ mɩnyaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ ba mɛ bɩ barla y," naa a da ma an a ka a bɩ nyɩntam mɛ bɩ vəŋŋə dɔ ra?
46012017	K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gʋaa mɛ bɩ jilli, mɩnyaa nɩ, gʋaa tʋr nyɩntam lɛɛ ka ra ʋ? Kʋ gʋaa mɛ bɩ jilli, tʋr nɩ, gʋaa meeyaa nyɩntam lɛɛ ka ra ʋ?
46012018	Bɩ sɩra nɔ ʋ, Woso gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro haay cɩncɩnta a bɩncɛ ʋ, a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
46012019	Kʋ gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ jilli, vəŋŋə deem nɩ, mɛ bɩ nyɩntam ka?
46012020	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ hɔka bɩ mɛ deem m.
46012021	Gʋaa mɩnyaa b'a dam ma an a hɩ a wɔ m a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ zibəə ba mɔɔ ma y." Gʋaa mim b'a dam ma an a hɩ a gannɔ m sɔ a ʋ: "Awɔɔ zibəə ba mɔɔ ma y."
46012022	A n lɛ da bɩ, gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro k'ɩ ʋ, ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ fɩɩgaa rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ zibəə n ta ʋ gʋta karɛ.
46012023	Wɔɔ mɛ vəŋŋəro kʋ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma ɩ ʋ, ŋ bɩ wɩsɩ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyasʋrɛ ŋ nɩ gʋta, niŋŋoo k'ɩ ʋ nyannɩ bɩncɛrɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyasʋrɛ ŋ nɩ paan•••.
46012024	Wɔɔ mɛ vəŋŋəro kʋ ŋ nɩ ta daʋrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ bɩr a kam nyasʋrɛ bɩ do ma y. Woso k'a gʋaa vəŋŋəro da bɩ, a zi bɩ ba a ʋ, kʋ vəŋŋəro kʋ ŋ ba daʋrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ n daʋrɛ yɩ gʋta.
46012025	A ba a ʋ maam, kʋ gʋngʋrɛ bɩ nyɩnta mɛ b'ʋ y, bɩ kʋ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ n bɩr nyasʋm kʋ m.
46012026	Kʋ mɛ vəŋŋə deem ɩ fɩr yɩm, vəŋŋəro mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ fɩr yɩm kan kɩ. Kʋ vəŋŋə deem daʋrɛ yɩ, vəŋŋəro mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ haay y'a heer nyɔɔm kan kɩ sɔ.
46012027	A n bɔkarɛ, Krista mɛ n'awɔɔ m, a mɛ bɩ vəŋŋə n'awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə m, gʋaa biyəə kan a bɩncɛ kɩ.
46012028	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Woso n gʋɔɔ bɔ ʋ an zibəə ka ŋ ʋ, kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla. Lɛɛkarɛ ma bɩ, kristazibəəzannɔ a ŋ cɩnta. A hɩɩya hɔ ma bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a ŋ cɩnta. A kaakʋ hɔ bɩ, hɔdɩndagʋɔɔnzannɔ a ŋ cɩnta. Bɩ jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hoserlo barɛ ganwʋrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ m, kan yaabarɔ waarɛ ganwʋrɛrɔ zannɔ kɩ, kan daahanzannɔ kɩ, kan lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm zannɔ kɩ.
46012029	K'awɔɔ dɩga a naa, awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ woo••• bɛɛ m kristazibəəzannɔ ra? Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ m wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ sɔ y. Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ m hɔdɩndagʋɔɔnzannɔ y. Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ nɩ hoserlo barɛ y.
46012030	Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ nɩ yaabarɔ waarɛ ganwʋrɛrɔ nɩ y. Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ y. Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ nɩ leminno wɔɔ wusigəre y.
46012031	K'a ka ganwʋrɛrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa an lɛ da rɔ wɔɔ ma, kan a heer kɩ haay. Bɩ, kʋ m zaa k'an mɩŋŋa an cem haay bɩ hɩnka a m kɛɛrɛ.
46013001	Baa kʋ mɔɔ ɩ leminno haay hɩm, gʋɔɔ hɔ kan malɛɛkarɔ hɔ kɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ba ŋʋarɛ m, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɔ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan lɔmbɩr k'a nyi nɩ bɔm kɩ, gɛɛ bɔ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ, kan sɩsaka k'a nyi nɩ bɔm kɩ.
46013002	A a da ma mɔɔ m wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ yɩ, m bɩr hɔdɔrɛ m haay, m hɔ k'a a nyaakʋm da haay dɔ, a a da ma mɔɔ m bɩr sɩrakarɛ m haay, m m dam ma m n'a kam ciro n'a gaarɛ a bɩncɛrɔ ʋ, lɛ meerbaa tɔkkɛ ma, kʋ mɔɔ ba ŋʋarɛ m hɔsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y.
46013003	Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ to m m hɔnyɩ haay jir cicirzannɔ m, m m da ma sɔ m yɛ fɩr ma, n m da sɛ rɛ, kʋ mɔɔ ba ŋʋarɛ m, naa woo••• naa, vam m.
46013004	Kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a ɩ bʋrlɛ a ma, a ɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ m, a bɩr jɩm barɛ y, a bɩr a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋa ʋ y, a bɩr a mɩŋŋa busure y.
46013005	Kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a bɩr zi daŋŋada barɛ y, a bɩr a karɛ a mɩŋŋa daahan ma y, a nɔ bɩr maŋ ʋ zɔɔ-zɔɔ y, a bɩr mim cɩntarɛ a heer ʋ kan gʋaa kɩ y,
46013006	kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm zibʋnyaa barɛ ma y, a heer a n'a nyɔɔm sɩra ma.
46013007	Kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a ɩ sugur bam hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, a ɩ sɩra kam dɔmɩm haay, a ɩ taaheerlɛ m tee•••, a ɩ yɛm kɔrɛ do haay ma.
46013008	Ŋʋarɛ nyarɛ ba ʋ y. Wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaarɔ ganwʋrɛ nyarɛ, leminno y'a hʋnhɔ rɔ wɔɔ hɩrɛ nyarɛ, hɔdɔrɛ nyam sɔ.
46013009	Bala, wɔɔ n hɔ haay dɔ y, wosolɛsinnɩsora zibəə kʋ wɔɔ n'a bam sɔ bɩ, wɔɔ bɩr a barɛ an n'a gam kʋ ʋ haay y.
46013010	Bɩ, kʋ hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa paan••• bɩ bɩ bʋr, hɔ k'a jirə n ta ʋ bɩ nyarɛ.
46013011	Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ nyɩ bɩ, nyɩnzɛɛmbaa meer mɔɔ n'a barɛ, m nɩ m hɔɔn darɛ am nyɩ hɔ bɩ m, m nɩ nyɩbaa hɔɔn m. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m ba gʋaa burgu bɩ, mɔɔ nyɩbaa zibəəro wɔɔ to.
46013012	Her-her naa, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, dɩga wɔɔ nawʋm jɛtɩga ʋ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma bɩ bɩr yɩm fasɩ y, bɩ dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm wɔɔ m b'a yɩm garga ra haay. Her-her naa, mɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ jirə ta ʋ, bɩ hinni bɩ do ʋ, mɔɔ hɔ haay dɔm, amba Woso mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ m.
46013013	Kɛɛrɛ naa, hɔɔ kaakʋrɔ nɔɔn duro n ta ʋ, bɩ ŋ nyarɛ ba ʋ y: Sɩrakarɛ m, bɩ taaheerlɛ m kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, bɩ ŋʋarɛ ɩ lɛ da ŋ nɩ haay.
46014001	K'a a ka kʋ ŋʋarɛ ma paan•••, a a ka Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ kan a heer kɩ haay, an lɛ da bɩ, k'a a ka wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ bɩ ma.
46014002	Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm bɩ, a hɩ bɛɛ a nawʋm kan gʋɔɔ kɩ y, meer bɩ ba a nawʋm kan Woso kɩ. Gɔsɩ bɩr hɔ k'a n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ marɛ y, hɔɔ kʋ n y'a nyaakʋm da, an nɩ ŋ hɩm Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m.
46014003	Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la bɩ, meer bɩ ba a nawʋm kan gʋɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ ŋ paŋŋa dam la, an nɩ ŋ heer yom, an nɩ ŋ heer wʋtam.
46014004	Gʋaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm bɩ, a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa an n'a dam la, bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la bɩ, sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ an nɩ ŋ paŋŋa dam la.
46014005	Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ haay n bɩr lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm, bɩ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa an lɛ da bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la, bɩ m jɩra. Gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la bɩ, a lɛ da gʋaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm bɩ m, k'a maam lemim bɩ wusigə a ʋ, sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a jɩ ma, an ŋ paŋŋa da ra.
46014006	M danyɩnɔ, k'a hɔɔn da a dɩga a. Kʋ mɔɔ bʋr awɔɔ zi, m nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ, bɩ Woso n hɔ hɩnka mɔɔ m, mɔɔ n a jɩ dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ n awɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ da ra y, bɩ mɔɔ n Woso lɛ si m so ra y, bɩ mɔɔ n hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y, ncɩnaaʋ bɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ nyɔɔdʋ y'awɔɔ ma ka?
46014007	A do m naa sɔ kan sarbarɛ mɔdrɔ kɩ. Kɔnnɩ gɛɛ hir, kʋ ŋ nyi bɩr bɔm mɩŋŋa, gʋaa y'a bam lɔ k'a a tʋr ka kɔnnɩ bɩ, gɛɛ hir bɩ ma?
46014008	Kʋ n huure hɛ kʋ gʋɔɔ n bɔ ŋnɩ ta yar ma, kʋ huure bɩ nyi bɩr bɔm zore, gʋɔɔ y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a bir n nawʋm yarbarɛ ma, k'a banka a ta?
46014009	A do m bɩ sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩ, bɩ lemim bɩ do jɩ bɩr marɛ y, ŋ y'a bam lɔ k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ dɔ? A bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, meer awɔɔ n'a bam vam.
46014010	Leminno ɩ durnya naa ʋ gʋta ŋn'a hʋnhɔ, bɩ ŋ woo••• naa, ŋ jɩ ta ʋ.
46014011	Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩr lemim kʋ gʋaa n'a hɩm kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ marɛ, a zaa ɩ dɩgam mɔɔ ma saana kan a kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ a zaa ma saana sɔ.
46014012	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'awɔɔ nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋʋam paan••• bɩ, k'a ka ganwʋrɛrɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ n ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n ŋ yɩ gʋta.
46014013	Bɩ y'a ka, gʋaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm b'a ga m, an a yɛ Woso han, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n leminno wɔɔ wusigəre ganwʋrɛ ka a ʋ sɔ.
46014014	Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m lemim vanta m, mɔɔ heer ɩ yaa bɩ darɛ nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ marɛ y.
46014015	Ncɩnaaʋ naa, bɔ mɔɔ n n'a barɛ? Mɔɔ yaa dam lemim y'a hʋnhɔ bɩ m, bɩ mɔɔ yaa dam lemim kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a mam bɩ m sɔ. Mɔɔ laa lɔm lemim y'a hʋnhɔ bɩ m, bɩ mɔɔ laa lɔm lemim kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a mam bɩ m sɔ.
46014016	Bala, k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka lemim y'a hʋnhɔ nɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɩntam sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla, bɩ ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ naa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a hɩ a ʋ "Amina" ɩ barka yaa bɩ darɛ ma? Bala, ŋ bɩr hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ marɛ y.
46014017	A a da ma, ɩbɩɩ barka yaa bɩ darɛ bɩ m bɩr mɩŋŋa gʋta, b'a bɩr a dam gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ han sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ y, kʋ ŋ bɩr hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm bɩ mam bɩ tɔ ma.
46014018	Mɔɔ ɩ Woso barka dam, kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm gʋta, an cem awɔɔ haay han bɩ minto.
46014019	Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ta m nɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma barla, kʋ mɔɔ meerbaanyɩ ba soor gʋɔɔ n a ma an a da ŋ han, a jɩra kʋ mɔɔ n meer ba yɔɔgʋ lemim vanta m.
46014020	M danyɩnɔ, a bɩ tɩr a hɔɔn da am nyɩnzɛɛnnyɩnɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y, k'a tɩr a hɔɔn da am gʋɔɔ burgurɔ hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ kʋ mimbʋnyaa bɩncɛ nɩ, k'a yɩ am nyɩnzɛɛnnyɩnɔ hɔ bɩ m.
46014021	N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: Do k'a nɩ lemim vanta hɩm mɔɔ n'a sarɛ, m meer ba kan Israyɛl do bɩ kɩ, saanɔɔ mɔɔ nɩ ŋ sarɛ, m meer ba kan ŋ kɩ, baa kan naa kɩ haay ŋ b'a tʋr kam mɔɔ ma y.
46014022	Naa minto bɩ, leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ bɩ, makra a n'a hɩnkam basɩrakənno wɔɔ m, a bɩr hɔsɩ hɩnkam sɩrakənno wɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ bɩ, makra a n'a hɩnkam sɩrakənno wɔɔ m, b'a bɩr hɔsɩ hɩnkam basɩrakənno wɔɔ nɩ y.
46014023	K'awɔɔ a so kʋ ma haay, a a da kʋ ʋ haay an nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔsɩ dɔ a nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gɛɛ basɩrakənno bɩ gasʋ awɔɔ zi, ŋ b'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, hɔɔzannɔ n'awɔɔ m na?
46014024	Bɩ k'awɔɔ haay ɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la, kʋ basɩrakər, gɛɛ gʋaa k'a n hɔsɩ dɔ naa nɔ ʋ bɩ, gasʋ awɔɔ zi, a y'a dɔrɛ a heer ʋ a ʋ, a y'a bʋnyaa bam, hɔ k'a n'a mam bɩ y'a karɛ an a dɔ a ʋ, a kʋrɔ ma, gʋaa haay n'a dʋdɔ yarm.
46014025	Hɔ k'a n'a heer ʋ haay bɔm garga ra, bɩ n a ka an kukurə zɛ Woso taa, an Woso da ʋ, an kasɛtɩ ka, a ʋ, Woso y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, denter.
46014026	Bɔ y'a ga barɛ m kɛɛrɛ? K'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʋ ma, kʋ gʋaa ʋ k'a laa lɔ, gʋaa vanta k'a hɔ dɩnda, Woso n hɔ hɩnka gʋaa vanta m k'a n'a hɩ, kʋ gʋaa vanta ɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ m sɔ, deem nɩ lemim bɩ wusigəre nɩ, naa woo••• naa, a a ga m an ba sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay sɩrakarɛ talɛɛ tɔ ma.
46014027	K'awɔɔ tɩr meer ba lemim y'a hʋnhɔ nɩ, kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ bala n meer bɩ ba lemim y'a hʋnhɔ bɩ m, deem-deem, kʋ gʋaa deem n a si an bɩr a wusigəre.
46014028	Kʋ gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ bɩ wusigəm sokʋma bɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ zannɔ wɔɔ n ze pi, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr meer bam kan Woso kɩ.
46014029	Kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ bɩ nɩ, kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ m Woso lɛ bɩ si, ŋnɩ so ra. Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ n a tʋr ka ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ dɩga a Woso meerbaarɔ m denter gɛ.
46014030	Kʋ Woso hɔ hɩnka gʋaa vanta m gʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla k'a n'a hɩ, kʋ gʋaa k'a lɛɛ ka an nɩ meer bam bɩ n ze pi, kʋ bɩ n a hɔ bɩ hɩ.
46014031	Awɔɔ a da ma a Woso lɛ si a so ra haay, bɩ k'a bɩr a bam deem-deem, kʋ gʋaa haay m daahan yɩ a nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ paŋŋa yɩ ŋnɩ ta lɛɛ.
46014032	Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a da ma, ŋn'a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma,
46014033	amba kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ haay n'a bam bɩ m. Bala, Woso lɛ baa warkʋma ma y, hɔ haay n ba laafɩɩ an a ga kʋ ʋ bɩ an n'a ŋʋam.
46014034	K'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʋ ma, kʋ lannɔ wɔɔ n ze pi, ŋ ba lɛ m k'a meer ba sokʋma nɔ ʋ y, ŋnɩ nyɩnta sɩɩ••• ŋnɩ bɩr a tʋr kam amba Moyiisi lɛrɔ a hɩ bɩ m.
46014035	Kʋ ŋ lɛ taa k'a laaka da hɔ niŋŋə ma k'a jɩ dɔ, kʋ ŋ n'a to ŋn'aa laaka da a zino han har ʋ. A bɩ zore kʋ lʋ m meer ba sokʋma nɔ ʋ y.
46014036	A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ Woso lemim bɩ, a to a ʋ, awɔɔ zi ra? Gɛɛ, a gɩnga awɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n ta m a minto ra?
46014037	Kʋ gʋaa y'a gɩngarɛ a ʋ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa n a mɩ, gɛɛ a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ, k'a n'a dɔ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba awɔɔ ma naa, Zuuba mɩŋŋa lɛ m.
46014038	Kʋ gʋaa a ʋ, a bɩ yɛm hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ naa ma, k'a dɔ a ʋ, Woso n a zaa dɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa barɛ zaa y.
46014039	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, k'a ka wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ bɩ ma kan a heer kɩ haay, b'a b'a ta gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm nɔ wɔɔ m toore y.
46014040	Bɩ k'a ka ma, kʋ hɔ haay woo••• n ba an a ga kʋ ʋ, warkʋma bɩ yɩ ʋ y.
46015001	M danyɩnɔ, lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n a si, a gɔɔta a sɩra ka ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ bɩ, mɔɔ n'a tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ.
46015002	Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do n'awɔɔ bʋmbɔm, k'awɔɔ nyasʋm amba mɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ m. Bɩ k'awɔɔ n nyasʋm mɩŋŋa, sɩra k'awɔɔ ka bɩ bɔm vam.
46015003	Lɛɛ mɔɔ ka m hɔ kʋ n y'a dɩnda mɔɔ m bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Krista ga wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, amba n y'a da Wosoci ʋ bɩ m.
46015004	N y'a bir, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, amba Wosoci a hɩ bɩ m.
46015005	A a hɩnka Sefas m, bɩ jɛ ʋ an a hɩnka bueerehɩɩyɔɔ k'a ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
46015006	Dɔmɩm vanta ʋ, an a hɩnka wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kristagʋɔɔ bam zɔrsoor m lɛ deem, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro gɔsɩnnɔ gɩnga, gʋta gɔɔta ŋnɩ mɩsɩr.
46015007	Naa jɛ ʋ, a a hɩnka Zakkɩ m, an b'a hɩnka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m haay.
46015008	Nawɔnnɔ woo••• jɛ ʋ, an b'a a hɩnka mɔɔ m sɔ, mɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nyɩ k'a yɩ b'a dɔmɩm n a ku bɩ kɩ bɩ.
46015009	Bala, mɔɔ m kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ haay poore, mɔɔ n m ga m, kʋ n nɩ m bir kristazibəəzaa y, bala, mɔɔ fɩr ka Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma ma.
46015010	Bɩ, m ba kʋ mɔɔ ʋ gʋaa niŋŋə her naa, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, b'a barka bɩ n bɔ vam mɔɔ gʋr zi y. Bɩ mɔɔ zi ba, m lɛ da ŋ haay ra, bɩ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa bɛɛ y, Woso barka k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ m.
46015011	Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ, gɛɛ zibəəzannɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ, bɩ bɛɛ pakra ba y. Lemim deem wɔɔ n'a pa dam, bɩ lemim bɩ do awɔɔ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ.
46015012	Wɔɔ y'a pa dam ʋ ʋ, Krista a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, b'a a ba lɔ awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gəəno b'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ?
46015013	Kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ, k'a maam, Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʋ wa.
46015014	Bɩ k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʋ, wɔɔ pa bɩ darɛ jɩ ba ʋ wa. B'awɔɔ sɩra bɩ karɛ vam sɔ wa.
46015015	Bɩ, kʋ ncɩnaaʋ m, ŋʋaar kasɛtɩ zannɔ m wɔɔ m Woso mim bɩ nɔ ʋ. Bala, wɔɔ hɩ ʋ ʋ, Woso Krista mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, bɩ kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩr a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, k'a maam Woso n Krista mɩm bɔ ʋ y.
46015016	Kʋ gəəno bɩr a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, k'a maam Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʋ y.
46015017	Bɩ kʋ Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʋ, sɩra awɔɔ ka nɩbɩr, awɔɔ gɔɔta an n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ tee•••.
46015018	Naa k'a hɩ sɔ a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʋ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ ɩ nyaanlɛ nɔ ʋ.
46015019	K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, her mɩsɩrbaa naa daahan tɔ ma m bala wɔɔ n sɩra ka Krista ʋ, yaanda barɛ paan••• zannɔ m wɔɔ m, an cem gʋɔɔ haay han.
46015020	B'a bɩ ncɩnaaʋ y, Krista a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ paan•••. Lɛɛ a ka an a mɩm bɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ n b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ sɔ.
46015021	Bala, gʋaa deem y'a ka zɛ n bʋr durnya ʋ, gʋaa deem tɔ ma m sɔ, gəəno n'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ.
46015022	Adam minto y'a ka gʋɔɔ n ta ʋ, bɩ y'a ka gʋɔɔ nɩ gɩngam sɔ. Bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista kɩ rɔ wɔɔ haay y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, Krista tɔ ma sɔ.
46015023	Bɩ, mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ, yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ: Krista m lɛɛkarɛzaa, a lɛɛ ka an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ. K'a b'a bɔ an bʋr kɛɛrɛ, gʋɔɔ k'a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ.
46015024	Naa jɛ ʋ, Yeezuu Krista zinəro wɔɔ kan a cinno kɩ paŋŋa zaar bam, a paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya ʋ haay paŋŋa zaar bam. K'a ŋ paŋŋa zaar ba, bɩ jɛ ʋ, durnya nyarɛ, an bɔkarɛ an cirbəə kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ da Zɩ Woso wɔ ʋ.
46015025	Bala, a a ga m, k'an a so cirbəə ʋ, kʋ Woso n tolle ba, an a ka an bʋr a jɩnnɔ ra, an tʋntɔ ŋ la.
46015026	Jɩm k'a nɩ gɔɔtam jɛ ʋ, n n'a zaar bam bɩ n zɛ m.
46015027	Bala, n y'a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Woso a ka hɔ woo••• n'a gannɔ taa." Bɩ Wosoci bɩ k'a hɩ a ʋ, hɔ haay woo••• y'a taa bɩ, a ba Woso mɩŋŋa burə ʋ wa, bala, Woso mɩŋŋa y'a ka an nɩ hɔ haay woo••• burə ʋ.
46015028	Bɩ, kʋ Woso b'a ka Krista nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ, Krista mɩŋŋa k'a m Woso Nyɩ bɩ y'a mɩŋŋa zerm Woso taa, bala a y'a ka an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ. Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa m bɩ nyɩntam hɔ haay soʋrezaa, gʋɔɔ haay burə ʋ.
46015029	Kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ, bɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ batɛm sim gəəno tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ n'a barɛ? Kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ denter, bɔ tɔ ma m ŋnɩ batɛm sire ŋ minto?
46015030	Bɩ bɔ m sɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, wɔɔ nɩ yɛm wɔɔ zibəə bɩ nɩ wɔɔ dam mim kʋsɩ lɛ ʋ?
46015031	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, dɔmɩm biyəə mɔɔ ɩ zɛ lɛ ʋ. M danyɩnɔ, naa hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ mɔɔ heer nɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ minto Zuuba Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
46015032	Gʋɔɔ fɩr ka mɔɔ ma Efɛɛzɩ ʋ naa ʋ, ɩ ʋ poohɔɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, mɔɔ m zoo ba kan ŋ kɩ kɔɔkɔɔ. Kʋ naa ba mɔɔ ʋ durnya naa do hɔ yɩrɛ tɔ ma, a nyɔɔdʋ m bɔ nɩ? Kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ, k'a maam k'a ba amba bɔɔr naa do a hɩ bɩ m: "Ʋ ʋ da hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ lɛ ʋ bala, k'ʋ bɩr bɛɛ mim bala, bala, booti m, ʋ gɩngam."
46015033	A bɩ bra bɩmba a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ y. Bala, n ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ɩ kan zukuuro bʋnyaarɔ kɩ, a ba a nawʋm gʋaa bʋnyaa sɔ."
46015034	K'a a bɔ hɔɔn daŋŋada k'awɔɔ n ta m b'ʋ, k'a mimbʋnyaabarɛ to fasɩ. Awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n Woso dɔ cɩna y, awɔɔ nyannɩ n bɩ.
46015035	A a da ma gʋaa n laaka da a ʋ, gəəno y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a mɩm bɔ ʋ? Kʋ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, ŋ mɛ bɩ yɩm lʋnlɔ?
46015036	Hɔɔnwarzaa ra, hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a duum bɩ, k'an ga a bɔm na?
46015037	Bɩ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a duum bɩ, kʋ yɩryaa m gɛɛ hɔ vanta m, hɔ bɩ yaa ɩbɩɩ n'a duum, a gɔ bɛɛ ɩbɩɩ n'a sɔɔn wa.
46015038	Ba ɩbɩɩ duu bɩ, bɩ Woso a ka an bɔ, a do n a hɔ kan hɔyaa do vantɔɔ kɩ, amba Woso mɩŋŋa lɛ n taa bɩ m, hɔyaa do biyəə y'a hɔ.
46015039	Hɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ rɔ nɔɔm, biyəə mɛ y'a hɔ. Gʋɔɔ mɛrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ, poo kan harhɔɔ kɩ, bɛnnɔ kɩ, zɔnɔ kɩ mɛrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ sɔ.
46015040	Hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kan hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ y'a hʋnhɔ, ŋ gʋɛrɛ y'a hʋnhɔ sɔ.
46015041	Wosogure lɛɛgure y'a hɔ, mom hɔ y'a hɔ, monyaarɔ lɛɛgure y'a hʋnhɔ sɔ, monyaarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛɛgure lɛ dɩnda kʋ m.
46015042	Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ma. Kʋ n ta k'a yaa gər bir, a do m ba n tɩr hɔyaa duu bɩ m. Gər bɩ hɔ vɔnrɛzaa m, bɩ k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a bɩ vɔnm dɔ y.
46015043	Gər ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ nyɔɔdʋwarzaa m, paŋŋawarzaa m sɔ n n'a birm maam, an bɔkarɛ an n'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ an nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m kan paŋŋa kɩ m gʋta.
46015044	Gər birle ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, tara burə hɔ n n'a birm bala, an bɔkarɛ k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a mɛ b'a ba arzana mɛ. K'ʋ n nɩ tara burə ʋ naa ʋ naa, kʋ mɛ ta ʋ, arzana ʋ, mɛ nyɩntaŋ ʋ sɔ.
46015045	Naa tɔ ma m, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: "Gʋaa lɛɛkarɛzaa Adam a ba gʋaa mɩsɩr. Bɩ Krista bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, Adam hɩyaazaa m, bɩ bʋr a ʋ, jɛ ʋ, b'a m Ɛspri k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa karɛ."
46015046	Bɩ lɛɛkarɛ mɛ k'an ta ʋ bɩ, mɛ kʋ Woso Ɛspri a ka bɩ bɛɛ m bɩ, durnya hɔ m bɩ. Woso Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ, zɛ bɩ n nawʋm jɛ ʋ.
46015047	Gʋaa lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ, durnya gʋaa m bɩ, a bɔ n y'a ʋ taa ʋ. Gʋaa hɩɩyazaa bɩ, a to b'ʋ arzana ʋ.
46015048	Gʋaa kʋ durnya gʋaa m bɩ, durnya gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɔ bɩ rɛ, gʋaa kʋ arzana gʋaa m bɩ, arzana gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɔ bɩ rɛ sɔ.
46015049	Dɩɩtaa naa, wɔɔ bɔ durnya gʋaa bɩ rɛ, Bɩ, dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm, wɔɔ n bɩ zɛm bɩ bɔ arzana gʋaa bɩ rɛ sɔ.
46015050	M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ m ʋ, gʋaa b'a dam ma an gasʋ Woso cirbəə b'ʋ, a mɛsim nɩ y. Hɔ k'a nɩ vɔnm bɩ b'a dam ma an hɔ k'a bɩr vɔnm bɩ yɩ y.
46015051	K'a dɩga a, kʋ m hɔ kʋ gɔsɩ n a dɔ hɩ a m. Ʋ woo••• naa, ʋ bɩ gɩngam haay y, bɩ ʋ da ʋ nawʋm kʋ ʋ haay ʋ ʋ lʋr.
46015052	Ba naa do n nawʋm, huure jɛzaa bɩ hɛrɛ ma, ʋ lʋr ʋ n nawʋm lɛɛm-lɛɛm, am mɩm nɩfɩ zɛrɛ m. Bala, kʋ n bɩ huure bɩ hɛ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ mɛ k'a bɩ vɔnm dɔ m, wɔɔ n'ʋ lʋr.
46015053	Bala, wɔɔ k'ʋ nɩ gɩngam, ʋ nɩ vɔnm naa, pakra m kʋ wɔɔ n mɛ k'a bɩ gam fɩɩga y, b'a bɩ vɔnm sɔ sa.
46015054	Kʋ wɔɔ mɛrɔ b'a lʋr ncɩnaaʋ, hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ kʋ yɩm, n ʋ: Zɛ ba ʋ dɔ y, n bʋr zɛ ra.
46015055	Zɛ ra, ɩ dama bii? Ɩ paŋŋa bii?
46015056	Zɛ paŋŋa bɩ m mimbʋnyaa m, mimbʋnyaa paŋŋa bɩ m Moyiisi lɛrɔ m.
46015057	Ʋ yaa da Woso m barka, an n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ bʋrm hɔ haay ra, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
46015058	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a b'a ka hɔsɩ n a da a ma y, k'a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee••• Zuuba zibəə nɔ ʋ, bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, kɔ k'awɔɔ nawʋm Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ, a bɩ zɛm bɩ bɔ vam nɩ y.
46016001	Kʋ busoo zɩnzɛkʋra n a ka kristagʋɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩncɛ nɩ, k'a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ Galasii kʋrɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ba sɔ.
46016002	Hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ ba n nɩ: Hatʋ hinni biyəə ʋ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə n dɩga busoo k'an ta m ma an a bɔ ʋ an a cɩnta a hɔ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku, k'awɔɔ b'a ya a ka ma k'a busoo zɩnzɛ kʋ ra y.
46016003	Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku, mɔɔ ci bam m a ka gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ ŋ bɔŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta a ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ m ŋn'aa ŋ ka Zerizalɛm kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m kan busoo bɩ kɩ.
46016004	K'a bʋr an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, a a ga m kʋ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa n ta, ŋ tam kan mɔɔ kɩ.
46016005	Ta mɔɔ nawʋm Masedʋan kʋ ʋ, m a dɔ m lee ku awɔɔ zi, bra mɔɔ nawʋm b'ʋ, m bʋr awɔɔ zi.
46016006	A a da ma, mɔɔ n nyɩnta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ poore, gɛɛ m nyɩnta b'ʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ, k'awɔɔ n a da mɔɔ han, m zaa bɩ sarɛ ma, baa kʋ ta mɔɔ nawʋm ka.
46016007	Naa do ma naa, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m dɩga awɔɔ ma cenle ma y, mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m bɩ gɔɔta kan a kɩ poore, kʋ Zuuba yɛ.
46016008	Bɩ, mɔɔ gɔɔtam Efɛɛzɩ kʋ ʋ naa ʋ, an ta an pantɩkɔtɩ cibsa dɔmɩm ku.
46016009	Bala, Woso a ka mɔɔ nɩ m dam ma m zi ba naa ʋ gʋta, bɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ gʋta sɔ.
46016010	Kʋ Timote bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, k'a nyasʋ m mɩŋŋa, k'a heer n nyɔɔ, bala, Zuuba zi an n'a bam sɔ am mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
46016011	Gɔsɩ b'a gore bɔ ʋ y. K'a a da han k'an a bɔ an bʋr mɔɔ zi laafɩɩ, bala, mɔɔ y'a mɩm dam, kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
46016012	Kʋ wɔɔ danyɩ Apolɔs nɩ, mɔɔ hɩ m gallɛm hɔka k'an bʋr awɔɔ zi kan ʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, b'a lɛ baa fɩɩgaa k'a ta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ dɩɩtaa y, k'a bɩ toore yɩ, a zɛm.
46016013	K'a dundo a zi, a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, a bɩr heer koodə m, a bɩr paŋŋa m.
46016014	K'a hɔ haay woo••• ba ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
46016015	M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Stefanas kan a hargʋɔɔ kɩ ɩ lɛɛ ka ŋn'a ba sɩrakənno Akayii kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Ŋ y'a tʋntɔ ʋ paan••• ŋn'a da kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ han Woso zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ a m,
46016016	k'a yɛ gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zi bam, ŋn'ɩ kɔrɛ yɩm kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ.
46016017	Mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm gʋta, Stefanas k'a nɩ naa ʋ, kan Fɔrtɩnatus kɩ, Akayikus kɩ bɩ tɔ ma, kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
46016018	Bala, ŋ minto bɩ, mɔɔ heer koodə yɩ, ŋ y'awɔɔ heer ba kookoo sɔ. Gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ a ga daʋrɛ m paan•••.
46016019	Azii kʋrɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. Akilas kan Priska kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m danyɩbaa Zuuba nɔ ʋ minto. Kristagʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a som kʋ ma ŋ har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m sɔ.
46016020	Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. K'a yaa da kʋ m mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa kan daʋrɛ kɩ.
46016021	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ leersore naa do gʋrsɩra bam.
46016022	Kʋ gʋaa n Zuuba ŋʋa y, Woso lerbɔrɛ bʋnyaa ɩ kan a zaa kɩ. "Maranata" a jɩ k'a hɩ a ʋ, Zuuba n bʋr.
46016023	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Zuuba n'awɔɔ barka da ʋ.
46016024	Mɔɔ y'awɔɔ woo••• ŋʋam Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ.
47001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ m ba Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa, mɔɔ kan wɔɔ danyɩ Timote kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ bam, a ba wɔɔ nawʋm Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma k'a nɩ Korɛntɩ ʋ bɩ ma. A ba wɔɔ nawʋm wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Akayii kʋrɔ vantɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma haay sɔ.
47001002	A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm wɔɔ Zɩ Woso, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka a ʋ.
47001003	Ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ bɩ, wɔɔ Zɩ m, an n'a mɩŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ m tee•••, an nɩ ŋ heer wʋtam mim haay nɔ ʋ.
47001004	A ɩ wɔɔ heer wʋtam wɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ haay nɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma, ʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr do haay yɩm nɔ wɔɔ heer wʋta sɔ, heerwʋtarɛ kʋ wɔɔ yɩ a mɩŋŋa zi bɩ m.
47001005	Denter m, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta amba Krista fɩr yɩ bɩ m bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, Woso ɩ wɔɔ heer wʋtam gʋta Krista tɔ ma.
47001006	Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm, fɩr bɩ yɩ wɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n heerwʋtarɛ yɩ, a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ. Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ heerwʋtarɛ yɩrɛ, a yɩ wɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n a da ma a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ lɔɔrɔ nɔ ʋ.
47001007	Naa tɔ ma m wɔɔ heer n kookoo awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ, bala, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ nɩ fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ heerwʋtarɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m bɩ m sɔ.
47001008	Wɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n'a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ fɩr yɩ gʋta Azii kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ fɩr yɩ maam-maam an cem wɔɔ paŋŋa han. Wɔɔ n a gɩnga, ʋ ʋ, ʋ lam fɩr naa do nɔ ʋ y.
47001009	Ɩɩn••• yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ karɛ, a gɩnga wɔɔ ʋ, ʋ ʋ, wɔɔ dʋdɔ n y'a yar k'a wɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ. Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, wɔɔ n ʋ da ma dɔ, ʋ yo ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma y, wɔɔ n yo Woso ma, bala, an nɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʋ.
47001010	A wɔɔ yɔ karɛ fɩryɩrɛrɔ maam-maam kʋ ŋ y'a yo k'a wɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ. Wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, a ba n nɩ wɔɔ yɔm tee••• ŋ wɔ ʋ.
47001011	Awɔɔ y'a dam wɔɔ han sɔ, yaa k'awɔɔ n n'a dam wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ minto. Yɩ an nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, wɔɔ n daahan yɩ Woso zi gʋta, gʋɔɔ cir kʋ ŋ yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ minto. Naa n'a kam sɔ gʋɔɔ gʋta n yaa da m barka.
