47001012	Hɔ k'a nɩ wɔɔ heer bam nyɩnta kan ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ noom k'an fu an nɩ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam mɩŋŋa bɩ m. Bala, wɔɔ ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba kan gʋaa haay kɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, kan awɔɔ kɩ sɩra nɔ ʋ, kan ʋ heer kɩ haay. Woso y'a da wɔɔ han, a barka bɩ tɔ ma m wɔɔ n wɔ ʋ, ʋ naa ba, wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ mindɔrɛ bɛɛ y.
47001013	Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma biyəə bɩ, a ba wɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʋ, a karɩnda ba, a jɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam, m ʋ, awɔɔ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a hɩ naa jɩ mam mɩŋŋa fasɩ.
47001014	Dɩɩtaa naa, awɔɔ y'a jɩ mam poore a ʋ, wɔɔ nɩ yɩm awɔɔ heernyɔɔ, b'awɔɔ yɩm wɔɔ heernyɔɔ sɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu wusigəre hinni ʋ.
47001015	Mɔɔ naa nyasʋ m heer ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ hɔɔ, m a cɩnta kʋ m lɛɛ ka m bɔ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, m awɔɔ heernyɔɔ da ra gallɛm hɩɩya.
47001016	Kʋ m m to awɔɔ zi b'ʋ m ta Masedʋan ʋ, kʋ m bɩ m to Masedʋan ʋ, m bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ k'awɔɔ n b'a da m han kʋ m ta Zidee ʋ.
47001017	A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ gɩnga naa do kʋ mɔɔ wʋ bɩ, dɔ mɔɔ ka ra? Gɛɛ a hɩ awɔɔ ʋ, m gɩngarɔ wɔɔ wʋ mɔɔ nawʋm amba durnya gʋɔɔ hɔ bɩ m na? M n'a hɩm m ʋ, ɩɩn••• mɔɔ naa bam, m m ya m jɩm b'ʋ, m ʋ, ayy••• mɔɔ bɩ naa barɛ y.
47001018	Sɩrazaa m Woso m, a m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, meer kʋ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a n nyɩnta hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya nɔ ʋ y.
47001019	Bala, Yeezuu Krista kʋ Woso Nyɩ m bɩ lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ kan Silas kɩ, Timote kɩ bɩ, lemim bɩ do n nyɩnta "Ɩɩn••• kan Ayy••• kɩ" nɔ ʋ y. Nyɩnta a ʋ, sɩra nɔ ʋ.
47001020	Bala, Yeezuu mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m, Woso n nɩ hɔ k'a ler bɔ haay barɛ. Bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ nɩ "Amina" dam Yeezuu tɔ ma, ʋ n'ʋ lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
47001021	Woso nɩ wɔɔ paŋŋa dam la, awɔɔ kan wɔɔ kɩ Krista zuure nɔ ʋ. A ɩ wɔɔ bɔ ʋ, ʋ hɔ,
47001022	an a wɔjɩ da wɔɔ ʋ a Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a zɛm bɩ hɔ k'a ler bɔ wɔɔ m haay ka wɔɔ ʋ.
47001023	Woso mɔɔ n'a barɛ m kasɛtɩzaa, kʋ mɔɔ ga a jɩra mɔɔ m ŋʋaarbarɛ m. Kʋ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m awɔɔ heer kɔ bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n m ya m bʋr awɔɔ zi Korɛntɩ ʋ y.
47001024	Wɔɔ bɩr ʋ kam ma kʋ minno niŋŋoo dɩnda awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka ŋ ʋ paŋŋa nɩ y. Awɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩra ka Krista ʋ nɔ ʋ kara. Bɩ, ʋ da wɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'awɔɔ n heernyɔɔ yɩ.
47002001	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ cɩnta m heer ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Mɔɔ bɩ n bɔrɛ m bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ heerzar nɔ ʋ y.
47002002	Kʋ mɔɔ awɔɔ heer zaar ba, nka nɩ heernyɔɔ kam mɔɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ awɔɔ heer zaar ba rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ?
47002003	Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ n lɛɛ ka m ci ba awɔɔ ma ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi k'awɔɔ n mɔɔ da heerzar ma, an bɔkarɛ awɔɔ y'a ga m a mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ bɩ tɔ ma m. Bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ paan••• m ʋ, awɔɔ haay, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ heernyɔɔ m, awɔɔ heernyɔɔ m sɔ.
47002004	Ci bɩ do kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma naa, a n yɩ mɔɔ ma naanaa y, a ba mɔɔ ʋ kan heerzar kɩ, m nyi ka. Mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m awɔɔ heer zar y, ci bɩ ba mɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta.
47002005	K'awɔɔ gʋaa nyɩnta an bʋr heerzar nɩ, mɔɔ bɛɛ a m heer zar y, awɔɔ haay a a heer zar, gɛɛ awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ m.
47002006	A da k'awɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ a hʋnhʋr bɩ, a a zaa bɔ.
47002007	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a sugur ka ʋ, a heer wʋta, k'a heer b'a zar an bɔɔlam ba y.
47002008	Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han k'a a ŋʋarɛ hɩnka m.
47002009	Bala, ci bɩ kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma bɩ, m ka mɔɔ ʋ ma kʋ m dɩga a k'awɔɔ ɩ mim sim fasɩ-fasɩ gɛ.
47002010	K'awɔɔ sugur ka gʋaa ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ sugur karɛ a zaa ʋ sɔ. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ sugur ka gʋaa ʋ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ a ga a ʋ m kʋ m sugur ka ʋ, a ba mɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ tɔ ma, Krista mɩm m.
47002011	A ba wɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, k'ʋ bɩ zaa ka Sʋtaana ʋ, k'an wɔɔ ku y. Bala, gɩngarɔ k'an ta m nɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ŋ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
47002012	Mɔɔ m hʋr m ta Trowas ʋ, kʋ m aa Krista lemim nyɩnta pa da, kʋ mɔɔ yaa lee ku bɩ, mɔɔ yaa dɩga a Zuuba zaa banka gʋta, kʋ m lemim bɩ pa da.
47002013	Bɩ, heerkɔrɛ gʋta mɔɔ nyɩnta a nɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n wɔɔ danyɩ Tiitɩ yɩ bɩ tɔ ma. A m naa, mɔɔ n zaa yɛ Trowas gʋɔɔ wɔɔ han m m len so ŋ nɩ, m m hʋr, m ta Masedʋan ʋ.
47002014	Krista a da a jɩnnɔ haay ma, an nɩ ŋ gɩngaatarɛ an nɩ yirbə sire ŋ nɩ. Woso tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, k'a nɩ wɔɔ gaam Krista da ma naa do nɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay, an n'a kam gʋɔɔ nɩ Krista dɔm lɛɛ haay ʋ bɩ minto.
47002015	Bala, wɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan tidəər ji nyɩnta kɩ, Krista n'a kam Woso ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ zaa ra rɔ wɔɔ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'ɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ k'ɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma tidəər.
47002016	Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'ɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kan brɔɔ kɩ zɛ wɔɔ nɩ zɛm nɩ, ŋn'ɩ gɩngarɛ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ zaa ra rɔ wɔɔ, kan brɔɔ kɩ, mɩsɩrbaa wɔɔ nɩ zɛm nɩ, ŋn'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩm sɔ. Bɩ, kʋ Woso bɛɛ m, nka ɩ wɔ ʋ, an nɩ zi naa do barɛ?
47002017	Wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso lemim bɩ sa, ŋn'ɩ ter bam nɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ y. Bɩ kʋ Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, a lemim bɩ pa wɔɔ n'a dam kan sɩra kɩ, a mɩm m, kʋ Krista zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ tɔ ma.
47003001	Awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, a hɩ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ, ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ ra? Wɔɔ bɩr ʋ kam ci ma kʋ a hɩnka gʋɔɔ m k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ kristazibəəzannɔ paan•••rɔ m wɔɔ nɩ y. Wɔɔ bɩr a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han sɔ k'a ci ba a ka wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a hɩnka gʋɔɔ m, amba gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ n'a bam bɩ nɩ y.
47003002	Wɔɔ ci bɩ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ m wɔɔ ci, n n a gʋrsɩra ba wɔɔ heerlɔ ʋ. Gʋaa haay n a dɔ an n'a karɩnda bam.
47003003	Gʋaa woo••• a dɔ a ʋ Krista ci k'a ba bɩ n'awɔɔ m, an a da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ k'ʋ a ka. Ci bɩ ba bɛɛ n y'a ʋ, gʋrsɩra ba hɔ nɩ y, a ba n y'a ʋ Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ Ɛspri m, n n a ba jaa wargarɔ ma sɔ y, a ba n y'a ʋ gʋɔɔ heerlɔ ma.
47003004	Wɔɔ heer k'an kookoo bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ nɩ naa hɩm, Krista barka tɔ ma, Woso taa.
47003005	Wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ, wɔɔ wɔŋ ʋ, ʋ zi naa do ba ʋ zim nɩ y. Woso n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ wɔrɛ a barɛ ʋ.
47003006	A y'a ka wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma, ʋ ʋ ba Gʋaasɩbabaa daa bɩ zibəənyɩnɔ. Gʋaasɩbabaa naa do n a to lɛrɔ ci b'ʋ y, a to a ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zi. Bala, lɛrɔ ci b'ɩ zɛ a nawʋm zɛ m, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ n'a kam.
47003007	Lɛrɔ wɔɔ gʋrsɩra n y'a ba deem-deem jaa wargarɔ ma, a gʋrsɩra bɩ barɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ a hɩnka, Moyiisi meer nɩ yɔm kan paŋŋa kɩ. A yɔrɛ bɩ k'an maam-maam b'a ka Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr a dam ma n n'a mɩm nyam Moyiisi rɛ y. A n bɔkarɛ pakra m, kʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ do n nya. K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zibəə bɩ, zɛ a nɩ zɛm nɩ, an bɔkarɛ a ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m ncɩnaaʋ,
47003008	k'a maam, zibəə kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a bam b'ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m gʋta an cem haay.
47003009	Kʋ zibəə k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm bɩ nyɩnta lɛbɔʋrɛ m, k'a maam, zibəə k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ bam tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ b'ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m an lɛ da.
47003010	Wɔɔ ʋ da ma ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ, lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a nyɩnta ʋ biisi bɩ b'a dam ma an a makra ba kan lɛbɔʋrɛ k'an ta ʋ her bɩ kɩ y, her hɔ bɩ lɛ da soyy•••.
47003011	Bala, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ k'a nɩ cenim bɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, k'a maam hɔ k'a nɩ gɔɔtam tee••• bɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩrɛ an lɛ da.
47003012	Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ taaheerlɛ naa do m bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ heer n kookoo.
47003013	Wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Moyiisi kɩ y, bɩ nyɩnta an nɩ pɛɛra karɛ a meer ma, kʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩ dɩga Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a n'a meer ma an nɩ nyam bɩ ma y.
47003014	Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ biisi rɔ wɔɔ n wɔ ʋ ŋnɩ hɔsɩ jɩ ma y. Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ her sɔ nɔɔm maam sɔ, kʋ ŋ yɩ gʋaasɩbabaa gusire ciro wɔɔ karɩnda barɛ, ŋ bɩr ŋ jɩ marɛ y. Ɩ ʋ pɛɛra n y'a ka a meer ma, am Moyiisi hɔ bɩ m, pɛɛra bɩ n gaa ŋ meer la y. Bala, sɩra ka Krista ʋ bala n'a kam pɛɛra bɩ do n gaa gʋaa meer la, a zaa n hɔ k'an ta ʋ jɩ ma.
47003015	Denter m, baa kan her kɩ, kʋ ŋ yɩ Moyiisi ciro wɔɔ karɩnda barɛ, ŋ bɩr a jɩ marɛ y, ɩ ʋ pɛɛra nɩ karɛ ŋ hɔɔn ra.
47003016	Ba gʋaa a bɔ a ta a m, an sɩra ka Zuuba ʋ bɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ pɛɛra bɩ tɩr gaa a zaa meer la.
47003017	Bɩ, Zuuba kʋ n y'a hɩ ma bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, bɩ lɛɛ kʋ Zuuba Ɛspri n ta ʋ bɩ, soamɩŋŋaʋ ɩ lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ.
47003018	Bɩ, wɔɔ haay k'ʋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ, pɛɛra n a ka wɔɔ meer la y, bɩ, Zuuba lɛbɔʋrɛ nɩ yɩm wɔɔ ma, a lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ nɩ wɔɔ lʋrm kʋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ. Ncɩnaaʋ m wɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ n'a dam la tee••• zi kʋ Zuuba n'a bam bɩ n naa. A m Sɛnt-Ɛspri.
47004001	Woso a ba wɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, a zibəə naa do da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ bɩr ʋ heer zaar barɛ y.
47004002	Wɔɔ bɩr yɛm kutim-kutim kan nyannɩ zibəəro wɔɔ kɩ ma y. Wɔɔ bɩr bra bɩmbam gʋɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ wɔɔ bɩr ŋʋaar warm Woso lemim bɩ ma sɔ y. Bɩ, sɩra wɔɔ n'a hɩm garga ra Woso mɩm m, kʋ gʋaa haay n a dɔ a heer ʋ a ʋ, sɩrazannɔ m wɔɔ m.
47004003	K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ jɩ a nyaakʋm da kan gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo kɩ, k'a maam, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ m.
47004004	Durnya naa do woso kʋ Sʋtaana m bɩ yɩ ŋ hɔɔn ta, kʋ ŋ bɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ jɩ ma, ŋ nɩ sɩra ka ʋ y. Ŋ hɔɔn a ta kʋ ŋ bɩ wɔ ʋ sɔ, ŋ nɩ Krista lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a nɩ yɔm lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ yɩ y.
47004005	K'a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ bɩr ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ mim pa darɛ y, bɩ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista wɔɔ n'a pa darɛ. Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma awɔɔ zibəənyɩnɔ Yeezuu tɔ ma.
47004006	Bala, Woso k'a hɩ a ʋ, kʋ lɛɛgure n nyɩnta monsigə nɔ ʋ bɩ, Woso bɩ do y'a ka a mɩŋŋa lɛɛgure n gu wɔɔ heerlɔ ʋ, k'a ka kʋ wɔɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ k'an ta m, an nɩ yɔm Krista meer ma bɩ yɩ. Bɩ, kʋ Woso lʋnlɔ Krista maam sɔ.
47004007	Bɩ, wɔɔ, a hɔ gʋta naa do ka wɔɔ ʋ, k'ʋ a hɩnka gʋɔɔ m, an bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gedre tɔkkɛ kɩ, ʋ nɩ hɔ gʋta naa do m ʋ gʋr zi. Ncɩnaaʋ m kʋ gʋaa woo••• n a dɔ a ʋ, paŋŋa gʋta naa do n a to wɔɔ zi y, a to a ʋ Woso zi.
47004008	Wɔɔ ɩ fɩr do haay yɩm, bɩ bɩ n a da wɔɔ ma y, wɔɔ hɔɔn ɩ kɔm minno gʋtɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ hɔɔn n a zar y.
47004009	Gʋɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma gʋta, bɩ Woso n a bɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. Ŋ yɩ wɔɔ nam tara ma, bɩ ŋ bɩr wɔŋ ʋ ŋnɩ wɔɔ zaar barɛ y.
47004010	Dɔmɩm haay, wɔɔ ɩ zɛ m ʋ mɩm la, ɩ ʋ ga wɔɔ nawʋrɛ am Yeezuu hɔ bɩ m, ncɩnaaʋ m, kʋ Yeezuu mɩsɩrbaa bɩ n a hɩnka wɔɔ gʋr zi.
47004011	Wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr, bɩ dɔmɩm haay n y'a kam ma k'a wɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ Yeezuu tɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, wɔɔ zɛm bɩ gɩnga. Bɩ kan naa kɩ haay, Krista mɩsɩrbaa y'a hɩnkam wɔɔ gʋr zi.
47004012	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ nɩ zɛ lɛ ʋ dɔmɩm haay, bɩ n a ka awɔɔ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam.
47004013	N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ ka, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n meer ba." Sɩrakarɛ deem-deem naa do wɔɔ n ta m sɔ, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ nɩ meer bam.
47004014	Wɔɔ dɔ denter m, ʋ ʋ, Woso Zuuba Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, a wɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʋ sɔ kan kɩ. A n a ka wɔɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ, ʋ nyɩnta kan kɩ lɛɛ deem ʋ.
47004015	Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay ba wɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ cir n Woso barka bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ sɔ, maam bɩ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta Woso barka darɛ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ ʋ.
47004016	Naa tɔ ma m, wɔɔ bɩr ʋ heer zaar barɛ y. Bala, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ paŋŋa y'a bɔŋ ʋ poore-poore k'a bɩ nya, wɔɔ nyi bɩ paŋŋa y'a dam la dɔmɩm haay.
47004017	Bala, fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ yɩm dɩɩtaa naa, ŋ zɛm bɩ nya, wɔɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta yɩ, ŋ tɔ ma. Lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ do gʋta maam-maam, a nyarɛ ba ʋ sɔ y. Kʋ wɔɔ dɩga lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ do ma, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ hɔsɩ bɛɛ m fɩryɩrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ y.
47004018	Hɔ kʋ gʋaa n'a yɩrɛ a mɩm m bɩ bɛɛ wɔɔ n'ʋ kam ma y, hɔ kʋ gʋaa bɩr a yɩrɛ a mɩm m bɩ wɔɔ n'ʋ kam ma. Bala, hɔ k'a nɩ yɩm mɩm m bɩ, cenlezaa m, bɩ hɔ k'a bɩr yɩm mɩm m bɩ, a nyarɛ ba ʋ y.
47005001	Wɔɔ mɛ naa do bɔ kʋ ʋ kan pɛɛracɛ kɩ. Wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, k'a b'a zaar ba, Woso mɛ vanta kam wɔɔ ʋ arzana ʋ. Mɛ bɩ do garɛ ba ʋ y, gʋaa wɔzibəə bɛɛ m bɩ y.
47005002	Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, wɔɔ ɩ pɛn wʋm, ɩ ʋ, mɔr wɔɔ busu, bala, a ŋʋa wɔɔ nawʋm paan••• k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ y'ʋ mɛ daa b'ʋ, mɛ kʋ Woso n b'a kam wɔɔ ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ.
47005003	Bala, kʋ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ do sa, wɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam dɩgɩ fɩɩga y.
47005004	Kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ n'ʋ mɛ naa do ʋ naa, wɔɔ ɩ pɛn wʋm, ɩ ʋ mɔr wɔɔ busu, bɩ, a ŋʋa bɛɛ wɔɔ nawʋm k'ʋ mɛ naa do to wa, wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʋ mɛ daa bɩ ka a gusire naa ra, kʋ mɛ k'a garɛ ba ʋ bɩ n nyaam mɛ k'a nɩ gam bɩ m.
47005005	Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ banka k'a bɩ naa woo••• ka wɔɔ ʋ. A Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka wɔɔ ʋ, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a zɛm bɩ hɔ k'a ler bɔ wɔɔ m naa ba.
47005006	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ heer n kookoo dɔmɩm haay, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta, ʋ n'ʋ mɛ naa do ʋ, wɔɔ n'ʋ mɛ daa bɩ yɩ cɩna bɩ, wɔɔ ba Zuuba har ʋ b'ʋ cɩna sɔ y.
47005007	Bala, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʋm sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɩnyaa n a yɩm bɩ bɛɛ wɔɔ nɩ yom ma y.
47005008	Sɩra m, wɔɔ heer kookoo, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ bɔ ʋ mɛ naa do ʋ, ʋ ta ʋ nɩ kan Zuuba kɩ, a jɩra wɔɔ m.
47005009	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ y'ʋ mɛ naa do ʋ, gɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ bɔ ʋ, a bɩ mim y, ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma k'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ n a nɔ yɩ.
47005010	Bala, pakra m kʋ wɔɔ haay n bɩ jɩm Krista dʋdɔkarɛ duu bɩ taa, kʋ gʋaa biyəə n zi k'a nyɩnta an a ba a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ tara burə ʋ naa ʋ bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ, k'a mɩŋŋa ɩ ba ɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ, k'a bʋnyaa nɩ a maam sɔ.
47005011	Naa tɔ ma m, kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba nyi ba m dɔ bɩ, wɔɔ n'ʋ kam ma kʋ gʋɔɔ n sɩra ka wɔɔ meerbaa ʋ, bɩ Woso wɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam sɔ m ʋ, awɔɔ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ mɩŋŋa a heerlɔ ʋ
47005012	A b'a hɩ a ʋ, a ŋʋa wɔɔ nawʋm k'ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa ʋ ko y. Ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma, k'awɔɔ n a heer nyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a a da ma a mim yɩ a nyɩ bɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ mɩm m bala rɔ wɔɔ nʋ, hɔ zore ba ŋ heer ʋ y, ŋ leer ba b'ʋ y.
47005013	Kʋ hɔɔzannɔ m wɔɔ nɩ, Woso tɔ ma m, bɩ kʋ hɔɔntaʋrɛzannɔ m wɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma m.
47005014	Krista ŋʋarɛ y'a so wɔɔ ʋ. Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ hɔɔn da, ʋ ʋ, gʋaa deem kʋ Krista m ga gʋaa haay bɩncɛ ʋ, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, k'a maam, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ woo••• gɩnga sɔ.
47005015	Bɩ ga a ʋ denter gʋaa haay bɩncɛ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ bɩncɛ sa rɔ wɔɔ b'a mɩsɩrbaa ba a mɩŋŋɔɔ tɔ ma dɔ y, kʋ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba a tɔ ma, a ɩ ga an a mɩm bɔ ʋ ŋ bɩncɛ ʋ.
47005016	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ bɩr dɩgam gɔsɩ ma gʋɔɔ dɩgarɛ m bala y, biisi bɩ, wɔɔ dɩga Krista ma ncɩnaaʋ, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ bɩr dɩgam ma maam y.
47005017	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a ba kristagʋaa, a ba a zaa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ n nawʋm mɩsɩrbaa daa. A mɩsɩrbaa k'a n'a bam biisi bɩ cem, hɔ woo••• a ba daa.
47005018	Naa haay naa, a to a ʋ Woso zi, a ɩ wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ Krista tɔ ma, an a ya, an gʋɔɔ zɛkʋra zibəə bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
47005019	Hɔ k'an ta ʋ bɩ, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta an zu kʋ ʋ kan Krista kɩ an nɩ gʋɔɔ haay zɛm kʋ ra kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ. A bɩr ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ karɛ ŋ la y, a y'a ya an gʋɔɔ zɛkʋra lemim bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ kʋ wɔɔ n a pa da.
47005020	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Krista ɩ wɔɔ bɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n meer ba a bɩncɛ ʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan wɔɔ meerbaa kɩ, an nɩ gʋɔɔ birm kʋ ŋ nɩ b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ. Ʋ wɔ wɔɔ n'a zɩnzɛrɛ awɔɔ m Krista tɔ ma, k'a to kʋ Woso n awɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ.
47005021	Krista mɩŋŋa n mimbʋnyaa ba fɩɩga y, Woso n a ka an a ba ɩ ʋ mimbʋnyaa n a mɩŋŋa m wɔɔ tɔ ma, a ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, Krista tɔ ma.
47006001	Kʋ zi wɔɔ n'a bam kan Woso kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han, ʋ ʋ, a b'a to Woso barka k'a yɩ bɩ n ta vam y.
47006002	Bala, Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: Dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ nɩ barka kam bɩ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛ si, hinni k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ ŋʋaŋ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ bʋr m bɩ m da ɩ han. Dɔmɩm kʋ Woso n'a barka kam bɩ n naa. Dɔmɩm k'a n'a bʋmbɔrɛ kam bɩ n naa sɔ.
47006003	Wɔɔ lɛ baa k'ʋ hɔsɩ ba k'an yɩ gʋaa ma bʋnyaa y, bala, wɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ gɔsɩ n wɔɔ zibəə bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y.
47006004	A n ta ʋ bɩ, hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, a ba wɔɔ nawʋm ʋ n'a hɩnkam ʋ ʋ, Woso zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩr do y'a hʋnhɔ nɔ ʋ, mim kʋsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ n'ɩ wɔɔ yɩm nɔ ʋ, cicir nɔ ʋ, dabɔʋ nɔ ʋ.
47006005	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ madɩr m gʋta, ŋnɩ wɔɔ du, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra ŋnɩ zee da wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ nyɩnta kɔrɛrɔ nɔ ʋ, hinceem bɩr bam wɔɔ nɩ y, hɔbɩrɛ bɩr bɩm wɔɔ nɩ y.
47006006	Wɔɔ ɩ heer fu zi bam, Woso hɔdɔrɛ zi wɔɔ n'a bam, ʋ nɩ bʋraama zi bam. Ʋ nɩ mɩŋŋabaa bam, ʋ nɩ tam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m, ʋ nɩ ŋʋarɛ zi bam noom fu m.
47006007	Ʋ nɩ sɩra lemim hɩm, ʋ nɩ tam Woso paŋŋa nɔ ʋ, ʋ nɩ tɩrgabaa yar mɔrlɔ sam ʋ nɩ yar barɛ ŋ nɩ, k'ʋ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
47006008	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ wɔɔ daŋ ʋ, niŋŋoo nɩ wɔɔ bɔŋ ʋ, nɔɔrɔ y'a lɛ bɔm wɔɔ ʋ, nɔɔm nɩ wɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋm. N yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ŋʋaarbənno, an bɔkarɛ sɩrazannɔ m wɔɔ m.
47006009	Gʋɔɔ ɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʋ, gɔsɩ n wɔɔ dɔ y, an bɔkarɛ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ dɔ. N y'a gɩngarɛ n ʋ, gɩnga wɔɔ nawʋm, bɩ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr, n yɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma gʋta, bɩ wɔɔ n gɩnga y.
47006010	N yɩ wɔɔ heer zaar barɛ, bɩ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ nɩ heernyɔɔ m, n yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ŋʋazannɔ, an bɔkarɛ wɔɔ y'a kam gʋɔɔ n'a bam hɔzannɔ, n yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ɩ ʋ, hɔsɩ ba wɔɔ ʋ y, an bɔkarɛ wɔɔ nɩ hɔ haay m.
47006011	Awɔɔ Korɛntɩ zannɔ, wɔɔ ʋ heer gʋ ʋ meer ba kan awɔɔ kɩ fasɩ, ʋ ʋ ŋʋarɛ hɩnka awɔɔ m.
47006012	Wɔɔ awɔɔ si ʋ heer ʋ, awɔɔ n wɔɔ si a heer ʋ y.
47006013	Awɔɔ ba mɔɔ ʋ m nyɩnɔ, m nɩ meer bɩ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a a heer gʋ wɔɔ m, a wɔɔ ŋʋa sɔ, amba wɔɔ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam bɩ m.
47006014	A bɩ yɛ a a zɛ kʋ ra kan basɩrakənno kɩ y. A n a ga m, awɔɔ n a ba deem kan ŋ kɩ y. Hɔ tɩrga y'a dam ma an a zɛ kʋ ra kan hɔ bʋnyaa kɩ ra? Lɛɛgure y'a dam ma an a war kʋ ma kan monsigə kɩ ra? A n a ga nɩ y.
47006015	Krista y'a dam ma an kʋ ma kan Sʋtaana kɩ ra? Gɛɛ sɩrakarɛzaa y'a dam ma an a ba deem kan basɩrakarɛzaa kɩ ra?
47006016	Wosocɛ b'a dam ma an kʋ ma kan wosobaawɔnnɔ kɩ y. Bɩ, wɔɔ m Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ cɛ, amba a mɩŋŋa a hɩ bɩ m, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ ŋ bire ʋ, m bɩr kan ŋ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ yɩrɛ ŋ Woso, ŋnɩ yɩ mɔɔ gʋɔɔ."
47006017	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, Zuuba a ya, a ʋ: K'a bɔ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, a a gʋ a hɔ. A b'a wɔ da dintim hɔ ma y, maam bɩ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ sire m zi.
47006018	Mɔɔ yɩrɛ awɔɔ zɩ, awɔɔ n yɩ mɔɔ nyɩnɔ yaarɔ kan mɔɔ nyɩmbɔnnɔ kɩ, Zuuba k'a paŋŋa jirə ba ʋ y'a hɩ.
47007001	M danyɩnɔ, k'a a yo Woso n lerbɔrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro bɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, ʋ mim haay k'a nɩ dintim kam wɔɔ mɛ kan wɔɔ nyi kɩ ma gʋ ʋ ma, ʋ ʋ tɔ ʋ gʋta k'ʋ bɩr mɩŋŋa fasɩ Woso lɛsire nɔ ʋ.
47007002	K'a yɛ a wɔɔ ŋʋa, wɔɔ n a bʋnyaa ba gɔsɩ nɩ y, wɔɔ n gɔsɩ mim zaar ba y, wɔɔ n ʋ da gʋaa bir y.
47007003	Mɔɔ bɩr meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ kʋ m awɔɔ dʋdɔ yar y, amba mɔɔ hɩ dɩɩtaa bɩ, wɔɔ y'awɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta, hɔsɩ b'a dam ma an wɔɔ gʋ awɔɔ ma y, baa zɛ, baa mɩsɩrbaa.
47007004	Mɔɔ sɩra ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm awɔɔ tɔ ma gʋta. Wɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ haay nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ heer koodə m gʋta, m nɩ m heer nyɔɔm paan•••.
47007005	Bala, lee kʋ wɔɔ ku Masedʋan ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ n hoonsire yɩ baa poore tɔkkɛ y. Jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ a n yɩ wɔɔ ma naanaa y, gʋɔɔ ɩ nyaa bam kan wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ nɩ dabɔʋ m ʋ heer ʋ sɔ.
47007006	Bɩ Woso nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔɔn kaanm a mɩŋŋa m nɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa dam la, a a ka Tiitɩ n bʋr, naa n wɔɔ paŋŋa da ra.
47007007	Bɩ, naa bɛɛ n a deem y, hɔ kʋ Tiitɩ a hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ wɔɔ paŋŋa da ra sɔ, a a hɩ a ʋ, a heer koodə yɩ awɔɔ tɔ ma. A a hɩ sɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ lɛ taa paan••• k'a a ya, a mɔɔ yɩ, bala, awɔɔ heer a zaar ba kan mim k'awɔɔ ba bɩ kɩ, an n'a ŋʋam paan••• k'a a da mɔɔ han gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'ɩ mɔɔ tɔ zarm nɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ. Naa tɔ ma m sɔ mɔɔ heer n nyɩnta gʋta maam-maam kɛɛrɛ.
47007008	Baa kʋ ci kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma biisi b'awɔɔ heer zaar ba, dɩɩtaa naa mɔɔ bɩr kʋrkʋr darɛ a tɔ ma y. K'a nyɩnta an awɔɔ heer zaar ba dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ bɩ, a a da ma mɔɔ n kʋrkʋr da.
47007009	Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, m heer mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔm, kʋ mɔɔ awɔɔ heer zaar ba bɩ tɔ ma bɛɛ y. Kʋ heerzar b'a ka awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam bɩ tɔ ma m. Woso awɔɔ heerzar bɩ sa, an a ba awɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, naa tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ n a bʋnyaa ba y.
47007010	Bala, heerzar k'a a to Woso zi bɩ zɛ a nawʋm heerlʋrlɛ m, an nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ kam, kʋrkʋrdarɛ ba a nɔ ʋ y. Bɩ, durnya naa do heerzar bɩ, zɛ bɩ n nawʋm zɛ m.
47007011	K'a dɩga a, heerzar k'a a to Woso zi b'a ka, awɔɔ n a ka ma ŋʋɩɩ••• k'a mim bɩ banka, a a ka awɔɔ n sugur yɛ, awɔɔ nɔ n ma ʋ kan a mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ n nyi ba hɔ kʋ mim bɩ n'a bam bɩ m, a a ka sɔ awɔɔ n n'a ŋʋam k'a a ya, a mɔɔ yɩ zɔɔ, a n'a kam ma k'a a da mɔɔ han paan•••, a a ka sɔ awɔɔ n yɛ k'a gʋaa k'a mim bɩ ba bɩ hʋnhʋr. A n ta ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ hɔ woo••• ba k'a hɩnka a ʋ, awɔɔ ba mim bɩ nɔ ʋ y.
47007012	Mɔɔ n ci bɩ ba awɔɔ ma gʋaa k'a mim bʋnyaa bɩ ba bɩ tɔ ma y, gɛɛ gʋaa kʋ n mim bɩ ba m bɩ tɔ ma y. A ba mɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ n a da ma a dɔ Woso mɩm ʋ a ʋ, a wɔɔ ŋʋa paan•••.
47007013	Naa tɔ ma m hɔ k'awɔɔ ba bɩ n wɔɔ heer ba kookoo. Heer koodə bɛɛ wɔɔ yɩ bala y, wɔɔ heernyɔɔ yɩ sɔ gʋta. Tiitɩ k'a b'a hɩ wɔɔ m a ʋ, awɔɔ a paŋŋa da ra, a ka a heernyɔɔ yɩ bɩ tɔ ma m sɔ.
47007014	Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka hɔɔ, m m lɛ bɔ awɔɔ ʋ a mɩm m, b'awɔɔ ka an a dɔ denter a ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ sɩra m. Amba wɔɔ nɩ sɩra hɩm tee••• bɩ, ʋ lɛ kʋ wɔɔ bɔ awɔɔ ʋ Tiitɩ zi bɩ yɩ sɩra sɔ amba wɔɔ hɩ bɩ m.
47007015	Bʋr k'a ʋ, awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, awɔɔ n a si mɩŋŋa kan nyibəə kɩ daʋrɛ kɩ, a yɛ a lɛ ma bɩ, a y'a tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ, an n'awɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta an cem biisi han.
47007016	Mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm gʋta, kʋ mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ m da ma m yo awɔɔ ma hɔ haay nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
47008001	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n barka kʋ Woso a ka Masedʋan kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ mim dɔ.
47008002	Kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ yɛ fɩr ma gʋta, kʋsɩ do y'a hʋnhɔ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta heernyɔɔ gʋta m, bɩ n a ka ŋnɩ yɛ ŋnɩ hɔ k'an ta m ka gʋta maam-maam kan a heer kɩ haay busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ɩ ŋʋazaabaa nɔ ʋ gʋta.
47008003	Mɔɔ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ, hɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m bɩ ŋ y'a ka, a ka ŋ y'a ʋ sɔ an lɛ da a paŋŋa ra a zim.
47008004	A yɛ ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ han ŋʋɩɩ••• k'a a hɔ na busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ ma a a da m wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ han.
47008005	Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n a gɩnga bɩ ŋ y'a ba, lɛɛ ŋ y'a ka ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka Zuuba ʋ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ yɛ ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ bam, Woso hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʋ.
47008006	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ n ma Tiitɩ ma, k'an a bɔ an bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ an bɩ daahan zibəə k'a sɩŋŋɩda sa kan awɔɔ kɩ, busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ ba an a nyambʋr.
47008007	K'a a yo hɔntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, Woso lemim padarɛ nɔ ʋ, Woso hɔdɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n'a yoŋ ʋ kan a heer kɩ haay a n nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam sɔ bɩ, k'a a yo ʋ sɔ paan••• busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ mim nɔ ʋ.
47008008	Mɔɔ n naa hɩ, ɩ ʋ, lɛ mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ y. Kʋ mɔɔ gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ tʋntɔʋrɛ mim hɩ bɩ, a hɩ mɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ n a hɩnka a ʋ, ŋʋarɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ paan••• denter.
47008009	Awɔɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka k'a n'a kam wɔɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ. Hɔntazaa n a mɩŋŋa m, an bɔkarɛ a yɛ an a mɩŋŋa ba ŋʋazaa awɔɔ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n a ba hɔntazannɔ a mɩŋŋa ŋʋazaabaa tɔ ma.
47008010	Naa kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm naa, m hɔɔndarɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm. A gɩnga mɔɔ ʋ a mɩŋŋa k'awɔɔ n gɔɔta a ta lɛɛ kan zibəə k'awɔɔ sɩŋŋɩda sa zu ʋ bɩ kɩ. Awɔɔ ɩ yɩ lɛɛkarɛzannɔ, a busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ ka, awɔɔ ɩ lɛ sa a bɔ a lɛ m sɔ.
47008011	Kɛɛrɛ naa, k'a ta lɛɛ kan a heer kɩ haay, amba awɔɔ sɩŋŋɩda sa bɩ m, a zi bɩ ba a nyambʋr, k'a busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ ka a paŋŋa tɛkka ma.
47008012	Bala, kʋ gʋaa hɔ ka Woso ʋ a zim, Woso ɩ hɔ bɩ do sim, dɩga a nawʋm hɔ k'a zaa bɩ n ta m bɩ ma, a bɩr dɩgam hɔ k'a ba m bɩ ma y.
47008013	Mɔɔ bɩr m kam ma kʋ m awɔɔ da ŋʋazaabaa ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n hɔ yɩ wa, a ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ gakʋʋbarɛ n nyɩnta ʋ.
47008014	Dɩɩtaa naa, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ m gʋta, bɩ minto bɩ, awɔɔ a da ma, a a da gʋɔɔ kʋ hɔ jɩra ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ han. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ hɔ bʋr an bɩ jɩra awɔɔ ma sɔ, gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ a da ŋ han rɔ wɔɔ nɩ hɔ nɩ, ŋ y'a darɛ awɔɔ han sɔ. Maam bɩ gakʋʋbarɛ nyɩntaŋ ʋ.
47008015	Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ m bɩ: Gʋaa k'a hɔ gʋr gʋta bɩ, a ba m an cem a bɩncɛ han y, gʋaa k'a gʋr poore bɩ, hɔ n jɩra bɩ zaa ma sɔ y.
47008016	Wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka, kʋ Tiitɩ lɛ n taa gʋta k'a a da awɔɔ han amba wɔɔ lɛ n taa sɔ bɩ tɔ ma, Woso ɩ naa da a heer ʋ.
47008017	A yɛ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ han k'an ta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, a yɛ, an lɛ da bɩ, a yɛ kan a heer kɩ haay, an hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a zim k'a ta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ.
47008018	Wɔɔ danyɩ vanta wɔɔ n'a nyɔɔm kan kɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ haay y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ, k'a nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa dam mɩŋŋa bɩ tɔ ma.
47008019	A n lɛ da bɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ y'a bɔ ʋ, k'an wɔɔ da zaa ʋ, zɩnzɛkʋra zibəə naa do kʋ wɔɔ n'a bam Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ tɔ ma bɩ nɔ ʋ, zi naa do ba wɔɔ nawʋm sɔ k'ʋ a hɩnka, ʋ ʋ, ʋ lɛ taa k'ʋ ʋ da gʋɔɔ han.
47008020	Busoo kʋ n y'a da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ naa gʋta maam-maam, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ dundore ʋ zi, kʋ gɔsɩ b'a hɩ a ʋ, wɔɔ n nyasʋm mɩŋŋa y.
47008021	Wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ʋ hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa ba Woso mɩm ʋ, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ʋ a ba sɔ gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ.
47008022	Wɔɔ gʋaa vanta nyɔɔm sɔ kan ŋ kɩ, wɔɔ tɩr a ka lɛɛ ʋ dɩga a, bɩ, wɔɔ yɩ gʋaa m, an nɩ Woso zibəə bɩ ŋʋam. Dɩɩtaa sɔ naa, a y'a tɔŋ ʋ paan•••, bala a sɩra ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta.
47008023	Kʋ Tiitɩ nɩ, mɔɔ zukuu m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m sɔ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ yɩ ŋ bɔ ʋ, ŋ zibəə bɩ y'a lɛ bɔm Krista ʋ.
47008024	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a ŋʋarɛ hɩnka ŋ nɩ paan•••, kʋ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ, ʋ lɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ awɔɔ ŋʋarɛ gʋtabaa ʋ bɩ, sɩra m.
47009001	Pakra bɛɛ m kʋ mɔɔ nɩ m ya m ci ba awɔɔ ma, kʋ m daahan kʋ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a ka Zidee gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ mim hɩ y.
47009002	A ŋʋa k'awɔɔ nawʋm paan••• k'a a da ŋ han bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ m lɛ bɔ awɔɔ ʋ Masedʋan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ, m a hɩ ŋ nɩ, m ʋ: "Akayii kʋ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ a banka zu ʋ kara, k'a a da Zidee kʋ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ han." Naa kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, a a ka ŋ gʋɔɔ gʋta nɩ lɛtaama m, k'a a da Zidee gʋɔɔ wɔɔ han sɔ.
47009003	Bɩ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma rɔ nɔɔm, ŋ nyɔɔ mɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ n busoo k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa k'a ka bɩ zɛ kʋ ra, amba mɔɔ hɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ m mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ a banka a nya bɩ m. K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ kʋ wɔɔ bɩ lee ku, gʋaa woo••• y'a dɔrɛ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, sɩra m.
47009004	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʋ kan Masedʋan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ʋ bɩ dɩga a awɔɔ n a banka a nya y, nyannɩ gʋta wɔɔ nyasʋm, bala, wɔɔ sɩra ka awɔɔ ʋ b'a n yɩ maam y. Bɩ, nyannɩ y'awɔɔ nyasʋm sɔ gʋta an lɛ da.
47009005	Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ n a gɩnga mɔɔ ʋ, a a ga m kʋ m a yɛ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ han kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m awɔɔ zi b'ʋ. K'awɔɔ n busoo k'awɔɔ ʋ k'a ka kan a heer kɩ haay bɩ zɩnzɛ kʋ ra a nya. Awɔɔ busoo bɩ do ler bɔ kara. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ mɔɔ zɛm bɩ dɩga a awɔɔ busoo bɩ zɩnzɛ kʋ ra a nya, naa y'a hɩnkam sɔ a ʋ, a ka awɔɔ nawʋm kan a heer kɩ haay, awɔɔ bɩr a kam pakra nɩ y.
47009006	K'a mim naa do tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: Gʋaa k'a hɔ duu poore bɩ, hɔ poore an n'a yɩm sɔ, gʋaa k'a duu gʋta bɩ, hɔ gʋta an n'a yɩm sɔ.
47009007	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a a ga m kʋ gʋaa biyəə n hɔ k'a gɩnga k'a ka bɩ ka, a b'a ka pakra nɩ, gɛɛ paŋŋa n y'a ba a ma tɔ ma y. Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ kam kan heernyɩnta kɩ bɩ, Woso ɩ bɩ zaa ŋʋam.
47009008	Bɩ, Woso a da ma an hɔ mɩŋŋa do y'a hʋnhɔ ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta, kʋ hɔsɩ bɩ jɩra awɔɔ ma y, bɩ kʋ hɔ n bɩr ta awɔɔ ʋ gʋta, k'a zi mɩŋŋɔɔ do haay ba m.
47009009	Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ m, n ʋ: A ɩ hɔ kam ŋʋazannɔ ʋ gʋta, a ba k'a nawʋm gʋɔɔ m mɩŋŋa bɩ nyarɛ ba ʋ y.
47009010	Woso nɩ hɔ kam hɔduurezaa ʋ an n'a duum, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ kaŋ ʋ an n'a bɩm. Woso bɩ do nɩ hɔ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ gʋta amba awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ m, an a ka an pasɩ yɔɔgʋ, k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʋ a ba gʋɔɔ m mɩŋŋa gʋta.
47009011	A y'a kam awɔɔ n hɔ yɩ gʋta dɔmɩm haay, k'awɔɔ n bɩr a bam gʋɔɔ m mɩŋŋa tee•••. K'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, awɔɔ ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋ ʋ tɔ ma.
47009012	Bala, busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ zibəə bɩ, a da bɛɛ a nawʋm wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ han bala y, a ka a nawʋm sɔ gʋɔɔ nɩ Woso barka dam gʋta maam-maam.
47009013	Zi naa do barɛ n'awɔɔ taalɛra zaa bɩ zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ hɩnkam. A a hɩnka a ʋ, awɔɔ sɩra ka Krista lemim nyɩnta b'ʋ denter, an nɩ yɛm ma karɛ. Gʋɔɔ gʋta y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ naa tɔ ma, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ sɔ k'awɔɔ n'a barɛ ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa, an n'a hɔnyɩ jirm kan ŋ kɩ kan gʋaa haay kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
47009014	Ŋ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma, ŋ n'awɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta, kʋ Woso a barka ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta ncɩnaaʋ bɩ minto.
47009015	Bɩ kʋ Woso tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, a ganwʋrɛ gʋta k'a lɔɔ ba ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
47010001	Awɔɔ y'a hɩm mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol ma, a ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, nyibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, bɩ kʋ mɔɔ laatʋ bɩ mɔɔ nɩ m darɛ m nyaa ma kan awɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han Krista bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa m kan a ŋʋarɛ kɩ m, m ʋ:
47010002	A b'a ka kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku awɔɔ bire ʋ, kʋ m m da m nyaa ma wa! Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, ʋ zi woo••• ba wɔɔ nawʋm gʋaa hɔɔndarɛ m bala rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ mɔɔ m da ma, m m da m nyaa ma kan ŋ kɩ.
47010003	Sɩra m, wɔɔ mɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m ʋ n'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bam nɩ naa, mɛsim m. Bɩ wɔɔ bɩr Woso zuure zoo bɩ bam gʋaa hɔɔndarɛ nɩ y.
47010004	Yar mɔdrɔ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m, ʋ nɩ yar bɩ barɛ ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ, durnya gʋɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y. Wɔɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ, Woso yar mɔdrɔ paŋŋazannɔ m ŋn'a dam ma ŋnɩ bʋr jɩnnɔ gʋtɔ-gʋtɔɔ ra. Wɔɔ ɩ hɔɔndarɛrɔ daŋŋadɔɔ zaar bam.
47010005	Wɔɔ ɩ hɔɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ ŋ sa mɩŋŋabusure nɔ ʋ ŋn'a ta m Woso dɔrɛ m toore rɔ wɔɔ zaar bam, wɔɔ ɩ hɔɔndarɛ haay dam jɩm ʋ, ʋ n'a karɛ a zannɔ nɩ yɛm Krista ma.
47010006	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ hɩnka a ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a hɩm haay ma fasɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ banka ʋ a nya k'ʋ gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm nɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋr.
47010007	Gɛɛ dɩga awɔɔ nawʋm hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a yɩrɛ a mɩm m bɩ ma bala ra? Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ gʋaa ʋ Krista hɔ n a mɩ fasɩ, k'an a hɔɔn da an a dɔ sɔ a ʋ, Krista y'a so wɔɔ ʋ, amba a a so a zaa ʋ bɩ m.
47010008	Baa kʋ mɔɔ m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ gʋta, lɛ kʋ Krista a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a nyannɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, lɛ kʋ mɔɔ m ta m naa, a ka Woso ʋ mɔɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʋ a ta lɛɛ, a sokʋma bɩ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ zaarbarɛ tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
47010009	Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n a gɩnga a ʋ, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ m awɔɔ da bɔ ʋ m ciro wɔɔ meerbaarɔ nɩ y.
47010010	Bala, n y'a hɩrɛ, n ʋ: "Mɔɔ ciro wɔɔ meerbaarɔ kʋsɩ, nyaa meerbaarɔ m sɔ, bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bʋr m nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, paŋŋawarzaa n mɔɔ m, bɩ mɔɔ n meerbaa dɔ sɔ y."
47010011	Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ naa hɩm bɩ, mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m a hɩ m, m ʋ: Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ ʋ ciro wɔɔ ʋ kʋ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, kan hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a bam kʋ wɔɔ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ hɔdeem, ŋ jirə ba ʋ y.
47010012	Sɩra m, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma ʋ ʋ ga kʋ ʋ gɛɛ ʋ ʋ makra ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, a lɛ da gʋɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ma y. Hɔɔnwarzannɔ m brɔɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka ŋn'ɩ dɩgarɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma k'a a makra ba kan gʋɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a makra barɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma.
47010013	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ bɩ yɛrɛ ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ, an cem jirə kʋ Woso a ka bɩ han y, wɔɔ y'ʋ lɛ bɔrɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ zibəə kʋ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a ba bɩ tɛkka ma, a ka k'a ʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma ʋ lee ku awɔɔ zi bɩ nɔ ʋ.
47010014	Bala, ta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, cem bɛɛ wɔɔ ʋ ʋ jirə han y. Wɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ ka, ʋ bɩ Krista lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m.
47010015	Wɔɔ bɩr ʋ lɛ bɔrɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ zibəə tɔ ma y. Bɩ, wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ n a da ra, kʋ wɔɔ zibəə n paŋŋa yɩ gʋta awɔɔ barla sɔ, zibəə kʋ Woso wɔɔ da ʋ bɩ m naa, wɔɔ bɩ bɔrɛ a jirə la nɩ y.
47010016	Wɔɔ wɔŋ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ ʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ laatʋ awɔɔ kʋ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ wɔɔ b'ʋ lɛ bɔrɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ zi kʋ gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ a ba tɔ ma y, zi kʋ Woso a ka brɔɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a ba bɩ n bɩ.
47010017	Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a ʋ k'a a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ, a b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ y, an a lɛ bɔ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba b'ʋ."
47010018	Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋa ʋ a zim bɩ bɛɛ Woso nɔ nɩ yɩm ma y. Gʋaa kʋ Woso mɩŋŋa n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ bɩ m.
47011001	Kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ hɔɔzaabaa meer bam kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a yɛ ma. Ɩɩn••• a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a yɛ mɔɔ hɔɔzaabaa meerbaa bɩ ma.
47011002	Awɔɔ ŋʋa kʋ mɔɔ nawʋm bɩ, jɩmbaa n ta mɔɔ m, a to a ʋ Woso zi. Bala, awɔɔ banka mɔɔ ʋ amba nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ k'a n yar dɔ bɩ m, kʋ m a ka Krista ʋ, k'a n yɩ awɔɔ zim.
47011003	Bɩ, mɔɔ da nɩ bɔŋ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ, a a da ma gʋɔɔ n bra ba awɔɔ m ŋʋaarlɔ m awɔɔ n a bɔ Krista zuure ʋ paan•••, amba mɩm bɩ bra ba Ɛɛvɩ m ŋʋaarlɔ meerbaa m bɩ m.
47011004	Meer bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, bala, kʋ gʋaa bʋr an nɩ Yeezuu Krista vanta mim hɩrɛ, an nɩ meer bɩ bam ɛspri kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɛɛ m bɩ nɩ, an nɩ lemim vanta pa darɛ awɔɔ m, bɩ lemim nyɩnta k'awɔɔ zu ʋ biisi bɩ bɛɛ y, awɔɔ tɩr a gu a yɛ ma.
47011005	Gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma a ʋ, zibəəzannɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ da rɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam m ʋ ŋ n lɛ da mɔɔ nɩ y.
47011006	A a da ma mɔɔ bɩ wɔŋ ʋ, m meer ba wɩsɩ am ŋ hɔ bɩ nɩ y, bɩ kʋ Woso hɔdɔrɛ mim nɩ, ŋ bɩ jɩra mɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ m hɔdɔrɛ bɩ hɩnka hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, mim haay nɔ ʋ.
47011007	Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, a pa bɩ da mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ m vam, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ si awɔɔ han y. M mɩŋŋa mɔɔ zer, kʋ m awɔɔ gore da ʋ. A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ, a ba kʋ mɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ naa, kʋrɔ mɔɔ ʋ ma ra?
47011008	Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ vantɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ yawʋra ba, mɔɔ brɔɔ wɔ nya, kʋ m m da awɔɔ han.
47011009	M da kʋ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han b'ʋ bɩ, kʋ busoo mim ta mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ bɩr awɔɔ kɔm k'a hɔsɩ kaŋ ʋ y. Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Masedʋan ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bʋr, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa haay bɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ n yɛ fɩɩgaa k'awɔɔ n kɔ mɔɔ mim ma y, naa mɔɔ nɩ gɔɔtarɛ m bɩr a bam.
47011010	Naa m mɔɔ goredaʋrɛ, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩm Krista k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ m, mɔɔ b'awɔɔ busoo sire y, m lɛ mɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ naa tɔ ma, bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma Akayii kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ jilli an a ta mɔɔ m toore naa nɔ ʋ y.
47011011	Bɔ m mɔɔ n naa hɩ? Mɔɔ bɩr awɔɔ ŋʋam gɛ? Ayy•••, Woso a dɔ a ʋ mɔɔ y'awɔɔ ŋʋam.
47011012	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam naa, mɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ m bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ can, kʋ m a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ, a ɩ zi bam, am wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ n a da jɩm ʋ, kʋ ŋ b'a da ma ŋnɩ naa hɩ y.
47011013	Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, zibəəzannɔ paan•••rɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y, ŋʋaar ŋn'a bam gʋɔɔ m a zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a hɔ barɛ ɩ ʋ, Krista zibəəzannɔ m.
47011014	Bɩ naa do naa, zɛkədə mim b'a nɔ ʋ y, bala, Sʋtaana mɩŋŋa a da ma an a mɩŋŋa ba ɩ ʋ, lɛɛgure malɛɛka m.
47011015	K'a yo Sʋtaana mɩŋŋa wɔ ʋ an naa ba bɩ, k'a maam wɔɔ b'a hɩm ʋ ʋ, a zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ ɩ ʋ zibəətɩrgazannɔ n a mɩ wa. Bɩ, ŋ nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, bɔ a nawʋm kʋ ʋ kan ŋ zibəə bɩ kɩ, a yɩrɛ ŋ ma bʋnyaa.
47011016	Kʋ m m ya, m so ra, awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma ɩ ʋ, hɔɔzaa n mɔɔ nɩ y. Gɛɛ k'awɔɔ ʋ hɔɔzaa n mɔɔ nɩ, k'a maam k'a yɛ mɔɔ ma amba awɔɔ nɩ yɛm hɔɔzannɔ ma bɩ m, kʋ m wɔ ʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ poore.
47011017	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ba naa, Zuuba hɔɔnhɔ bɛɛ m kʋ mɔɔ n a ba ncɩnaaʋ y. Kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ naa, hɔɔzaabaa zibəə m.
47011018	K'a a yo gʋɔɔ gʋta n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ durnya minno ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ sɔ.
47011019	Awɔɔ kʋ mindɔrɛzannɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm hɔɔzannɔ ma naanaa.
47011020	Awɔɔ ɩ yɛm gʋɔɔ n'a sore awɔɔ ʋ am lɔnnɔ hɔ bɩ m, ŋn'ɩ hɔ yɔrɛ a m, ŋn'ɩ ŋʋaar barɛ a m, ŋn'awɔɔ gore bɔŋ ʋ, ŋn'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋm.
47011021	Nyannɩ ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, bala, wɔɔ n wɔ ʋ, ʋ naa ba awɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ meer bɩ barɛ am hɔɔzaa hɔ bɩ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ hɔɔ niŋŋoo m nɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro m sɔ.
47011022	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ ebree gʋɔɔ n'a mɩ, bɩ, ebree gʋaa n mɔɔ m sɔ. Ŋ ʋ, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ n'a mɩ, mɔɔ maam sɔ. Ŋ ʋ, Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n'a mɩ, bɩ mɔɔ maam sɔ.
47011023	Ŋ ʋ, Krista zibəənyɩnɔ n'a mɩ, ʋnhʋʋn•••, mɔɔ hɔɔzaabaa meer bam fasɩ kɛɛrɛ, Krista zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m an lɛ da ŋ la. Mɔɔ zi ba an lɛ da ŋ hɔ ra. N mɔɔ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ an lɛ da ŋ la, n mɔɔ zɛ mawʋr m an lɛ da ŋ la sɔ, mɔɔ m mee ka zɛ ma gallɛm hɔka.
47011024	Zɩɩfʋrɔ lɛɛzannɔ mɔɔ nyasʋ gallɛm soor ŋnɩ mɔɔ zɛ mawʋr m, mɔɔ zɛ n tɩr a ʋ mawʋr bɩ m gallɛm bukərku a yaa n nɛɛhʋ.
47011025	Rɔm gʋɔɔ mɔɔ nyasʋ gallɛm kaakʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ zɛ bannɔ m, hindeem ʋ gʋɔɔ mɔɔ bɩmba jaarɔ m k'a mɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ m yo kʋ m ga kɔɔlʋʋ nyoobarɛ nɔ ʋ gallɛm kaakʋ, hindeem ʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta higʋta ʋ dɔmɩm deem, dɔ n mɩ n nɩ mɔɔ bɔ lɛm.
47011026	Mɔɔ zaakʋ gʋta, mɔɔ zaakʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, pɛrgʋrɔ kʋ ŋ tɩr yar lɔ wɔɔ a yo k'a mɔɔ bɩ, dazaamazannɔ a yo k'a mɔɔ zɛ sɔ, mɔɔ dogʋɔɔ a ŋʋa k'a mɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ sɔ. Doro vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ a yo k'a mɔɔ zɛ gər sɔ. Minno a yo k'a mɔɔ yɩ kʋnɔrɔ ʋ, kan poohɔɔnrɔ kɩ ʋ, higʋtɔɔ burə ʋ sɔ, ŋʋaar kristagʋɔɔ barla sɔ.
47011027	Mɔɔ zi kʋsɩrɔ ba, m makra kʋsɩrɔ yɩ, hinceem tɩr jɩra mɔɔ ma, nɔ n tɩr mɔɔ zɛ kan mɩsɩ kɩ, m tɩr m lɛ kʋsɩ pakra m, nyɛɛm mɔɔ zɛ, huu jɩra mɔɔ ma sɔ.
47011028	Mɔɔ bɩ m kɔrɛ m minno vantɔɔ hɩ y, dɔmɩm biyəə mɔɔ heer ɩ kɔm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ mim tɔ ma.
47011029	Kʋ paŋŋawarzaa m gʋaa nɩ, b'ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ m. Kʋ gʋaa a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ b'a busu mɔɔ ma gʋta, ɩ ʋ mɔɔ m.
47011030	Kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, m lɛ mɔɔ n n'a bɔrɛ m paŋŋawar minno ʋ.
47011031	Woso, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Zɩ bɩ, a a dɔ a ʋ, ŋʋaar bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a barɛ y. Bɩ, k'a tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay.
47011032	Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Damas kʋ ʋ bɩ, kʋ bɩ dɩgamazaa kʋ cir Aretas a so ʋ b'a ka yarbənno n jɩm kʋ bɩ lɛrɔ ma, k'a mɔɔ ku a mɔɔ nyasʋ.
47011033	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ mɔɔ da kasɩ ʋ, n n'a ka mɔɔ n bɔ kʋ bɩ pəŋŋə bɩ tokoro deem m, yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ kʋ bɩ dɩgamazaa bɩ n mɔɔ ku an mɔɔ nyasʋ y.
47012001	Mɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ ra? Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ hɔɔ kʋ Zuuba ŋ hɩnka mɔɔ m nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mim hɩm.
47012002	Mɔɔ kristagʋaa dɔ, Woso n a busu an ta m a zi arzana ʋ, a busure dɔɔraa bueeresi hɔ m naa. Mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ ta a ʋ arzana ʋ paan•••, gɛɛ hɔhɩnkarɛ a a yɩ y, Woso ɩ naa dɔ.
47012003	Denter m, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, Woso a busu an ta m arzana ʋ, a a da ma hɔhɩnkarɛ a a yɩ, a a da ma Woso a busu paan••• an ta m arzana ʋ b'ʋ, Woso ɩ naa dɔ mɔɔ n a dɔ y.
47012004	Arzana ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a meerbaarɔ niŋŋoo ma, gʋaa n a ga m an so ŋ la y, bɩ, zaa ba ʋ, gʋaa n ŋ mim hɩrɛ y.
47012005	M lɛ mɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, gʋaa ncɩnaaʋ bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ y. Kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, m paŋŋawar minno mɔɔ nɩ ŋ hɩm.
47012006	K'a hɩ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ yɩm hɔɔzaa y, bala, mɔɔ sɩra hɩm. Bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ y, bala, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ gʋaa n a hɔɔn da mɔɔ ma an lɛ da m bɩncɛ ra, zi kʋ mɔɔ ba an n'a yɩm nɔ ʋ, gɛɛ meer kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam an n'a mam nɔ ʋ y.
47012007	Hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ nɔɔn duro kʋ Woso ŋ hɩnka mɔɔ m b'a da ma an a ka mɩŋŋabusure n a so mɔɔ ʋ. Naa tɔ ma m Woso n yaaba da mɔɔ zi an nɩ mɔɔ kɔm, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m mɩŋŋa busu y. Yaaba bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, Sʋtaana zibəəzaa deem zibəə m, an nɩ mɔɔ zɛm, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m mɩŋŋa busu y.
47012008	Mɔɔ yaa da Woso m gallɛm kaakʋ k'an mɔɔ yɔ fɩryɩrɛ naa do wɔ ʋ.
47012009	A n a nyɩ bɔ mɔɔ n'ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ barka b'ɩbɩɩ bɔ, bala, k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ barka b'a zi ba fasɩ." Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔm m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, m paŋŋawarlɔ tɔ ma, kʋ Krista paŋŋa bɩ n nyɩnta mɔɔ gʋr zi fasɩ.
47012010	Naa y'a ka Krista tɔ ma mɔɔ nɩ m heer nyɔɔm, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawarlɔ nɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ, kʋ minno a hʋnhɔ ɩ mɔɔ yɩrɛ, kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma, kʋ minno ɩ mɔɔ heer kɔm sɔ. Bala, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ paŋŋa n ta ʋ.
47012011	Mɔɔ ɩ meerbaa bɩ barɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔɔzaa m mɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ da ʋ paŋŋa m. Awɔɔ y'a ga m hɔɔ a mɔɔ nyaa ba. Bala, baa kʋ hɔsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ, gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma zibəəzannɔ wɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n lɛ da mɔɔ m hɔsɩ nɔ ʋ y.
47012012	Zibəəro kʋ ŋ n'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ ʋ, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ziro wɔɔ duro ba mɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ bire ʋ kan bʋraama gʋta kɩ. Zibəəro wɔɔ duro, hoserlo do y'a hʋnhɔ m kan gɩngarɛ do y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ.
47012013	Bɔ n ta ʋ mɔɔ n a ba kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ m, mɔɔ n a ba awɔɔ nɩ? K'a maam kʋ mɔɔ n yɛ k'awɔɔ n dɩga mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa mim ma bɩ m. K'a kʋrɔma naa do sugur ka m ʋ.
47012014	Dɩɩtaa naa, mɔɔ m banka m a nya kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, a gallɛm kaakʋ hɔ mɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'ʋ naa, bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bɩ bʋr, mɔɔ bɩ yɛm awɔɔ n dɩga mɔɔ mim ma y. Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ mɔɔ nɩ m karɛ a ma, awɔɔ busoo bɛɛ y. Bala, nyɩnɔ bɛɛ n'a kam busoo ma k'a nyasʋ a zɩrɔ nɩ y, zɩrɔ wɔɔ n'a kam ma ŋn'ɩ nyasʋrɛ a nyɩnɔ m.
47012015	Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, heernyɔɔ m kan mɔɔ kɩ, kʋ m hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n ta m haay sa kan m mɩŋŋa kɩ, m m da m awɔɔ han. Awɔɔ ŋʋa kʋ mɔɔ nawʋm gʋta ncɩnaaʋ naa y'a ka awɔɔ bɩr mɔɔ ŋʋam na?
47012016	Awɔɔ yɛ a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ n yɛ k'awɔɔ n kɔ mɔɔ nyasʋm tɔ ma y. B'a da ma gʋaa n a hɩ a ʋ, hɔɔnkarɛ zi mɔɔ ba kʋ m awɔɔ ku m wɔ ʋ, ŋʋaarlɔ m.
47012017	Mɔɔ ŋʋaar ba awɔɔ m kʋ m hɔ yɩ awɔɔ gʋr zi ra? Mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ nyɔɔ awɔɔ zi rɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem da ʋ k'an ŋʋaar ba awɔɔ m na?
47012018	Mɔɔ yɛ Tiitɩ han an ta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, kan wɔɔ danyɩ kʋ mɔɔ mim hɩ awɔɔ m biisi bɩ kɩ. Awɔɔ a da ma a hɩ a ʋ, Tiitɩ ŋʋaar ba awɔɔ m k'a hɔ yɩ ra? A mɩŋŋa kan mɔɔ kɩ, tar deem wɔɔ sa, ʋ ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba m, kan ʋ zibəə kɩ.
47012019	A hɔɔn k'awɔɔ n'a darɛ a ʋ, ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gumə ka ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ lɛɛ bɩ, a dɔmɩm laatʋ. Ayy•••, ʋ meerbaa bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʋm Woso taa amba Krista n'a ŋʋam bɩ m, bɩ, ʋ gʋaasɩbɔɔ, naa haay hɩ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.
47012020	Mɔɔ da ɩ bɔŋ ʋ, m ʋ, ɩ b'a ka mɔɔ n bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ m bɩ dɩga a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a gɩngarɛ awɔɔ zi bɩ bɩ maam nɩ y, awɔɔ n a yɩ sɔ a ʋ, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a gɩngam mɔɔ zi bɩ, a bɩ maam sɔ y. Mɔɔ da ɩ bɔŋ ʋ, m ʋ, ɩ b'a ka nyaa n bɩ nyɩnta ʋ, kan jɩmbaa kɩ, nɔmaa kɩ, mɩmbɔkʋma kɩ, kan sʋnsɔwʋrɛ kɩ, gʋɔɔtɔzarlɛ kɩ, kan mɩŋŋabusure kɩ, warkʋma kɩ y.
47012021	Mɔɔ da ɩ bɔŋ ʋ sɔ, m ʋ, m ya kʋ mɔɔ ʋ m nɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ naa, ɩ b'a ka Woso n mɔɔ da nyannɩ ʋ awɔɔ bire ʋ wa. M m ya m nyi ka gʋɔɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ mimbʋnyaa ba hɔɔ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta ŋn'a bɔ a taam a dintim zibəəro wɔɔ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma wa, a a da ma ŋnɩ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ jaan dam, ŋn'a zibʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ bam.
47013001	Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, a gallɛm kaakʋ hɔ m naa kɛɛrɛ. Amba Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, gʋaa vanta mim ba, pakra m kʋ mim bɩ kasɛtɩzannɔ n nyɩnta ʋ hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ, kʋ mim bɩ n yɩ sɩra", kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku, naa wɔɔ n'a bam.
47013002	Kʋ m lɛɛ ka m a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mimbʋnyaa ba hɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ m kan gʋɔɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, bʋr kʋ mɔɔ ʋ b'ʋ a hɩɩya hɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ ŋ bɔ zaa ʋ, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, kʋ mɔɔ ba b'ʋ naa, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ m ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ m ya m bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ gɔsɩ tore y, mɔɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ karɛ ŋ haay ʋ.
47013003	Awɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a dɔ a ʋ, Krista a meerbaa da mɔɔ lɛ ʋ mɔɔ n'a bam, gɛɛ lɔ? K'a maam awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ. Paŋŋawarzaa bɛɛ m Krista m awɔɔ gʋr zi y. A y'a paŋŋa bɩ hɩnkarɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ.
47013004	Sɩra m, a zɛ kʋ n y'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ, a nyɩnta paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, bɩ, a y'a mɩsɩrbaa bam kɛɛrɛ Woso paŋŋa tɔ ma. Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ sɔ, bɩ, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʋm kan kɩ, ʋ n'ʋ zi bɩ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ Woso paŋŋa m.
47013005	K'a bɔ a dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma a zim, awɔɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ gɛ. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, gɛɛ lɔ? K'awɔɔ n a dɔ, k'a maam, k'awɔɔ bɩ wɔŋ ʋ a a sɩrakarɛ zibəəro hɩnka bɩ tɔ ma m.
47013006	Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ bɩ jɩra m sɩrakarɛ zibəəro hɩnkarɛ ra wa.
47013007	Yaa wɔɔ n'a dam Woso m, k'awɔɔ bɩ mimbʋnyaa ba y. Ʋ ka bɛɛ wɔɔ nawʋm ma, k'ʋ a hɩnka awɔɔ m, ʋ ʋ, ʋ gumə ta ʋ wa. Ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma k'awɔɔ n a mɩŋŋa ba, baa k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ bɩ gumə yɩm mim kʋ wɔɔ dɩnda naa nɔ ʋ y.
47013008	Bala, wɔɔ ba paŋŋa m k'ʋ sɩra da jɩm ʋ y. Paŋŋa wɔɔ n ta m k'ʋ a ka, kʋ sɩra n ta lɛɛ.
47013009	Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ nɩ paŋŋa m denter, wɔɔ y'ʋ heer nyɔɔm. Wɔɔ n'a yɛm Woso han bɩ n naa karɛ. A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ.
47013010	Naa tɔ ma m, kʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta m m laatʋ awɔɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ nɩ naa haay gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma. K'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku awɔɔ bire ʋ, m bɩ m da m nyaa ma kan awɔɔ kɩ, lɛ kʋ Zuuba a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ y. Bala, lɛ kʋ Zuuba a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, a ka a ʋ mɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ bankarɛ tɔ ma, a n a ka mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m ŋ zaar ba y.
47013011	Kɛɛrɛ naa, m danyɩnɔ, m leer mɔɔ n'a sore awɔɔ m. K'a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm. A bɩr a tɔŋ ʋ k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ. K'a bɩr kʋ heer yom. A bɩr kʋ marɛ. A bɩr a mɩsɩrbaa bam laafɩɩ kan kʋ kɩ nɔ ʋ. Maam bɩ, kʋ ŋʋarɛzaa kan laafɩɩzaa kɩ m Woso m bɩ, a nyɩntam kan awɔɔ kɩ.
47013012	K'a yaa da kʋ m mɩŋŋa danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ. Wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
47013013	Bɩ kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka, kan Woso ŋʋarɛ kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zɛkʋra kɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
48001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ ci naa do bam, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ y, bɩ gʋaa bɛɛ mɔɔ nyɔɔ sɔ y, Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa, kan Zɩ Woso k'a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ k'ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ.
48001002	Mɔɔ kan danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ n'awɔɔ m, an nɩ Galasii kʋrɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
48001003	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm wɔɔ Zɩ Woso han, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
48001004	Yeezuu mɩŋŋa ɩ yɛ an ga, k'a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ, k'a a da ma a wɔɔ yɔ durnya bʋnyaa naa do wɔ ʋ, amba wɔɔ Zɩ Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m.
48001005	Woso tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
48001006	A bɔ k'awɔɔ nawʋm Woso k'a awɔɔ bir k'awɔɔ n yɩ a gʋɔɔ Krista barka minto b'ʋ, a ta k'a zu lemim nyɩnta vanta ʋ bɩ, a a ka mɔɔ n zɛ kədə.
48001007	A bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ lemim nyɩnta vanta n ta ʋ wa, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ warm kʋ ma, ŋn'a kam ma k'a Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ zaar ba.
48001008	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lemim nyɩnta vanta dɩnda awɔɔ m, an a hɔ kan lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ kɩ, baa kʋ wɔɔ m, baa kʋ malɛɛka y'a to arzana ʋ an bɩ naa ba, kʋ Woso nɔmaa n a kərgu a zaa ra.
48001009	Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m so ra, kʋ gʋaa lemim nyɩnta vanta pa da awɔɔ m, bɩ lemim k'awɔɔ si hɔɔ bɩ bɛɛ, kʋ Woso nɔmaa n a kərgu a zaa ra.
48001010	Ncɩnaaʋ naa, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔ n yɩ kan m kɩ ra? Gɛɛ, kʋ Woso nɔ n yɩ kan m kɩ ra? A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ gʋɔɔ n m ŋʋa ra? Ayy•••, kʋ m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔ n yɩ m la, mɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam Krista zibəənyɩ dɔ y.
48001011	M danyɩnɔ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ n a to gʋɔɔ zi y.
48001012	Bala, a ma bɛɛ mɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ zi y, bɩ gʋɔɔ bɛɛ y'a dɩnda mɔɔ n sɔ y, Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa y'a hɩnka mɔɔ m, mɔɔ n a dɔ.
48001013	Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ hɔ niŋŋə biisi, m nɩ zum zɩɩfʋrɔ wosozaa ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ mim ma. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ fɩr ka Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ ma gʋta maam-maam, kʋ m a zaar ba.
48001014	Zu kʋ mɔɔ nawʋm zɩɩfʋrɔ wosozaa b'ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ cem m muno zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ han zaa bɩ zuure nɔ ʋ gʋta, m nɩ m yoŋ ʋ gʋta m lɛ da ŋ la, m yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ zuure nɔ ʋ.
48001015	Bɩ Woso lɛɛ ka an mɔɔ bɔ ʋ a barka bɩ tɔ ma kʋ m a zi ba, bɩ ma bɩ, mɔɔ n yɩ cɩna y. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, an mɔɔ bir zibəə bɩ tɔ ma.
48001016	Bɩ k'a b'a ŋʋa kʋ mɔɔ n'a Nyɩ bɩ dɔ kʋ m a pa da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ n m ka ma kʋ m gʋaa lar ma y,
48001017	mɔɔ n ta Zerizalɛm ʋ sɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m ŋn'a ba kristazibəəzannɔ rɔ wɔɔ zi y, m hʋr mɔɔ ʋ lɛɛm m ta Araabɩrɔ kʋ ʋ, m m to b'ʋ, m bʋr Damas kʋ ʋ.
48001018	Bɩ jɛ ʋ dɔɔraa kaakʋ kur bɩ, mɔɔ n ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ m aa Sefas dɔ, mɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʋ kan kɩ dɔmɩm bueeresoor.
48001019	Mɔɔ n zibəəzaa vanta yɩ kʋ Zakkɩ bɛɛ y, Zuuba danzaa bɩ.
48001020	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m ci b'ʋ naa, Woso n mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, ŋʋaar bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a barɛ y.
48001021	M hʋr kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ jɛ ʋ, ta mɔɔ ʋ Siiri kʋrɔ ʋ, kan Silisii kʋrɔ ʋ kɩ.
48001022	Bɩ, Zidee kʋrɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ n mɔɔ yɩ deem y.
48001023	A ma ŋ y'a ʋ bala, n n'a dɩndarɛ, n ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma biisi bɩ, a ɩ Krista zaa k'a nyɩnta an n'a zaar bam bɩ pa dam kɛɛrɛ."
48001024	Naa do n a ka, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ mɔɔ minto.
48002001	Dɔɔraa bueeresi cenle jɛ ʋ, mɔɔ m bɔ, m m ya, m ta Zerizalɛm ʋ kan Barnabas kɩ, mɔɔ Tiitɩ gaa m ta m kan m kɩ sɔ.
48002002	Woso y'a hɩ mɔɔ m hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ, mɔɔ n ta, bɩ minto m mɔɔ n ta. Kʋ wɔɔ yaa lee ku bɩ, mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa dam do vantɔɔ barla bɩ sa, m a dɩnda ŋ nɩ. Mɔɔ sokʋma ba kan lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a minto m a dɩnda ŋ nɩ sɔ, kʋ zi kʋ mɔɔ ba kan zi kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ kɩ bɩ bɔ vam y.
48002003	Baa mɔɔ zukuuzaa Tiitɩ kʋ grɛkkɩ gʋaa m bɩ, ŋ n a ka ma k'a paŋŋa ba ma k'an gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y.
48002004	A n bɔkarɛ gʋɔɔ a da wɔɔ zi ŋn'a hɩrɛ a ma kristagʋɔɔ bɩ ŋʋaarzannɔ m, brɔɔ a nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ kʋ Tiitɩ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. A da ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ zi k'a soamɩŋŋaʋ kʋ Krista Yeezuu a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ sɩnsɩɩ, a ŋʋa ŋ y'a ʋ k'a a ya, a wɔɔ da lɔmbaa ma.
48002005	Wɔɔ n yɛ ŋ ma y, wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma k'ʋ kʋ ma kan ŋ kɩ baa poore tɔkkɛ y, a ba wɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ sɩra k'a nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ m bɩr a bɩncɛ ʋ.
48002006	Kʋ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ lɛɛzaabaa mim n pakra ba mɔɔ ma y, bala, Woso bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ n mɔɔ da hɔsɩ vanta barɛ ma lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ nɔ ʋ y.
48002007	Bɩ, ŋ yɛ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Woso mɔɔ da ʋ kʋ m lemim nyɩnta pa da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m, amba Woso Pɩyɛɛr da ʋ k'an a pa da zɩɩfʋrɔ m bɩ m.
48002008	Bala, Woso k'a Pɩyɛɛr bɔ ʋ, an a nyɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ ma bɩ, Woso bɩ do ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ sɔ, an mɔɔ nyɔɔ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ zi.
48002009	Kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ dɩgam Zakkɩ kan Sefas kɩ Zaan kɩ ma a lɛɛzannɔ, brɔɔ yɛ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ Woso a barka ka mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n zi bɩ ba denter. A m naa, ŋnɩ mɔɔ wɔ nyasʋ, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, kʋmarɛ ɩ wɔɔ bire ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ m ta do vantɔɔ wɔɔ zi, kʋ ŋ bɔɔm n ta zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ zi.
48002010	Bɩ, hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta bɩ, ŋ ʋ, ʋ ʋ da ŋʋazannɔ han, bɩ kʋ hɔ bɩ do nɩ, mɔɔ ba denter.
48002011	Bɩ, Sefas k'a bɩ bʋr Antɩyɔs ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ ba kan kɩ gʋaa haay lɛɛ, k'a kʋrɔ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
48002012	Bala nyɩnta a ʋ, an nɩ hɔ bɩm kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, Zakkɩ gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ ŋnɩ lee ku cɩna y. Kʋ ŋ bɩ lee ku bɩ, an a da a ra, an a gʋ ŋ ma an jɩm a hɔ, nyi k'a n'a bam zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m bɩ minto.
48002013	Zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ m ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ n a hɔbaa sa sɔ, naa n a ka Barnabas mɩŋŋa n gasʋ ŋ hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya zibəə b'ʋ.
48002014	Kʋ mɔɔ ŋ yɩ ŋ bɩr zum sɩra k'a nɩ lemim nyɩnta b'ʋ tɩrga bɩ, mɔɔ hɩ Sefas m gʋaa haay lɛɛ mɔɔ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n zɩɩfʋ bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam am do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, ɩ bɩr a bam am zɩɩfʋrɔ hɔ m bɩ, a a ba lɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a ŋʋam k'ɩ paŋŋa ba do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma kʋ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa ba am zɩɩfʋrɔ hɔ nɩ?"
48002015	Zɩɩfʋrɔ m wɔɔ m, wɔɔ zɩrɔ ɩ nyɩnta maam, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso lɛrɔ dɔ rɔ bɛɛ n wɔɔ nɩ y.
48002016	Bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, gʋaa b'a dam ma an yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ zibəəro barɛ minto y, sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ nɩ gʋaa bam tɩrga bala. Sɩra wɔɔ ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ sɔ kʋ Woso n'ʋ ba tɩrga a tɔ ma, bɩ lɛrɔ zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y, bala, n bɩ gɔsɩ bam tɩrga lɛrɔ zuure tɔ ma y.
48002017	Wɔɔ, ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ n n'ʋ ba tɩrga Krista tɔ ma, an bɔkarɛ an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, ʋ ba wɔɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaabənno sɔ am do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m. K'a maam Krista bɩ mimbʋnyaa zi an n'a bam na? Ayy••• fɩɩga!
48002018	Bala, kʋ mɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure to k'a b'a dam ma an gʋaa ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ bɩ minto, kʋ mɔɔ n ya m m bɔ kʋ m zu ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ m bam lɛrɔbɩsɩkamazaa kɛɛrɛ.
48002019	Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m, lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr m mɩsɩrbaa bam lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma dɔ y, kʋ m m da ma m m mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba Woso tɔ ma. Kʋ n Krista wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ, mɔɔ ga kan kɩ.
48002020	Mɩsɩrbaa kʋ mɔɔ n ta m naa, mɔɔ bɛɛ m ta nɩ y, Krista n a mɩsɩrbaa bam mɔɔ ʋ. Mɩsɩrbaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam her-her naa, a ba mɔɔ nawʋm sɩra ka Krista ʋ nɔ ʋ, a m Woso Nyɩ, an mɔɔ ŋʋa an yɛ an ga mɔɔ tɔ ma.
48002021	Mɔɔ bɩr Woso barka bɩ bam hɔ nɩbɩr y, bala, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma gʋaa a da ma an yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, k'a maam, Krista bɩ ga a ʋ vam.
48003001	Aba! Galasii zannɔ, hɔɔnwarzannɔ. Nka ɩ wɔ ʋ an awɔɔ hɔɔn wusigə ncɩnaaʋ? A n bɔkarɛ n y'a hɩnka awɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, a dɔ a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista ga gɔdarkʋra ma.
48003002	Kʋ m laaka da a han wa: Lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure minto y'a ka Woso n a Ɛspri bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ ra, gɛɛ zu k'awɔɔ ʋ sɩrakarɛ lemim b'ʋ bɩ minto nɩ?
48003003	Bɔ yarmabaa m naa? Woso zuure bɩ sɩŋŋɩda sa awɔɔ ʋ Woso Ɛspri paŋŋa m, a bɔkarɛ an n'a ŋʋam kɛɛrɛ k'a nyambʋr a mɛsim paŋŋa m na?
48003004	Ziro kʋ Woso ŋ ba awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ vam kan awɔɔ kɩ ra? Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʋ, ŋ bɩ vam kan awɔɔ kɩ sɩɩn!
48003005	Kʋ Woso y'a Ɛspri karɛ awɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ, naa ba an nawʋm lɛrɔ wɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ zure ŋ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma ra? Gɛɛ zu k'awɔɔ ʋ sɩrakarɛ lemim b'ʋ bɩ tɔ ma nɩ?
48003006	K'a a yo Abraham n sɩra ka Woso ʋ, Woso n dɩga ma tɩrga a mɩm ʋ bɩ,
48003007	k'a maam, k'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, sɩrakənno wɔɔ n Abraham nyɩnɔ.
48003008	A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ ka an a hɩ hɔɔ a ʋ, Woso do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bam tɩrga a mɩm ʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, bɩ minto m Woso n lemim nyɩnta naa do hɩ Abraham m, a ʋ: 'Tara burə gʋɔɔ do haay barka yɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma.'
48003009	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ sɩrakənno m nɔ wɔɔ nɩ barka yɩm kan sɩrakarɛzaa Abraham kɩ.
48003010	Bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yom lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan ŋ kɩ, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'a bɩr hɔ haay kʋ n y'a da lɛrɔ wɔɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ bam tee••• bɩ, lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan kɩ.'
48003011	Sɩra nɔ ʋ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma y, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'an tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa bam.'
48003012	Lɛrɔ wɔɔ zaa bɩ y'a hɔ kan sɩrakarɛ zaa bɩ kɩ, bala, n ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'a nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay bɩ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩm.'
48003013	Krista a mɩŋŋa ka n a zɛ wɔɔ tɔ ma, a ba a ʋ maam k'a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ nɔ ʋ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ sompi wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ an lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ bɩ yɩ, bala, Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan gʋaa kʋ n y'a zeŋŋə gɔ ma bɩ kɩ.'
48003014	Nyɩnta ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m barka kʋ Abraham a yɩ bɩ yɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
48003015	M danyɩnɔ, ʋ makra sa gʋɔɔ minkəm zibəə nɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋaa a hɔɔnhɔ da ci ʋ an a cɩnta, amba a a ga m bɩ nɩ, kʋ n a ba a zɛ kur, gɔsɩ bɩr hɔ k'a hɩ bɩ zaar barɛ, b'a bɩr hɔ nam ma sɔ y.
48003016	A do m bɩ sɔ, lerbɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ bɔ Woso ʋ Abraham m kan a nyɩ bɩ kɩ m. N n a hɩ, n ʋ: "A nyɩnɔ y," ɩ ʋ a hɩ n y'a ʋ nyɩnɔ hɔka ma y, ayy•••, nyɩ bɩ deem, bɩ nyɩ bɩ, Krista m, bɩ n ʋ, k'a hɩ ma.
48003017	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Woso lɛɛ ka an a hɔɔnhɔ hɩ an a cɩnta, dɔɔraa zorsi bukərku kur bɩ, n nɩ bɔkarɛ n nɩ bɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, ncɩnaaʋ naa, lɛrɔ wɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Woso lɛɛ ka an a hɩ bɩ zaar ba, ŋnɩ ler kʋ Woso a bɔ bɩ zaar ba sɔ wa.
48003018	Bala, kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma m gʋaa nɩ hɔjirle yɩm Woso zi, k'a maam Woso lerbɔrɛ tɔ ma bɛɛ dɔ y. A n bɔkarɛ ler kʋ Woso a bɔ bɩ y'a ka Woso n a barka ka Abraham ʋ.
48003019	Kʋ ncɩnaaʋ m lɛrɔ wɔɔ zibəə n bɔ m kɛɛrɛ? Lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka Woso ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ hɩnkam wɔɔ m, kʋ nyɩ kʋ Woso ler bɩ bɔ a tɔ ma bɩ n tolle ba an yɩ. Malɛɛkarɔ ɩ bʋr lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, gʋaa deem ɩ nyɩnta malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ.
48003020	Lɛrɔ wɔɔ karɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, a yɩ pakra kʋ gʋaa n nyɩnta ʋ ŋ karɛ ma, bɩ ler bɩ bɔrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa mim m bɩ a deem.
48003021	Naa k'a hɩ a ʋ, lɔ? Lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩsɩ ŋn'a kam Woso lerbɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma ra? Ayy•••, a bɛɛ m naa y. Bala, kʋ yɩ an nawʋrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛ niŋŋə n ta ʋ, gʋɔɔ n'a dam ma ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩ a tɔ ma, k'a maam lɛ bɩ do n'a kam gʋɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ sɔ.
48003022	Bɩ, Wosoci b'a hɩ a ʋ, mimbʋnyaa paŋŋa y'a so durnya gʋɔɔ ʋ jilli. Maam bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ, sɩra kʋ ŋ y'a ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
48003023	Dɔmɩm kʋ sɩrakarɛ zaa bɩ n bʋr cɩna bɩ, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ wɔɔ ba a lɔnnɔ ŋn'ɩ dɔm wɔɔ ma, kʋ Woso n tolle ba an sɩrakarɛ zaa bɩ hɩnka.
48003024	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ, dɔ ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ ma, kʋ Krista n tolle ba an bʋr, kʋ Woso n wɔɔ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
48003025	Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, sɩra ka Krista ʋ dɔmɩm m, lɛrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ dɔm wɔɔ ma bɩ, ŋ bɛɛ y'a so wɔɔ ʋ dɔ y.
48003026	Bala, awɔɔ woo••• naa, Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, sɩra k'awɔɔ ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
48003027	Denter m, awɔɔ haay k'a batɛm si Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa n n'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ʋ jilli.
48003028	Naa tɔ ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, kʋ zɩɩfʋ n'ɩ mɩ, gɛɛ do vanta gʋaa n'ɩ mɩ, minsi bɛɛ n bɩ y, kʋ lɔ n'ɩ mɩ, gɛɛ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa n'ɩ mɩ, minsi bɛɛ n bɩ sɔ y, kʋ yar n'ɩ mɩ, gɛɛ lʋ n'ɩ mɩ minsi bɛɛ sɔ y. Bala, awɔɔ woo••• naa, awɔɔ a ba deem Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ.
48003029	Kʋ Krista y'a so awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a maam Abraham nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ hɔjirle kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm.
48004001	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Nyɩ k'a nɩ zɛm b'a so a zɩ hɔnyɩ ʋ bɩ, a nyɩbaa dɔmɩm ʋ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan lɔ kɩ, an bɔkarɛ a y'a so hɔnyɩ b'ʋ jilli.
48004002	A nyɩbaa dɔmɩm ʋ, gʋɔɔ nɩ nyasʋm nɩ, ŋnɩ dɩgarɛ a mim woo••• ma, kʋ dɔmɩm k'a zɩ b'a cɩnta k'an a so a hɔnyɩ b'ʋ bɩ n tolle ba an a ku.
48004003	A do m bɩ sɔ kan wɔɔ kɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ n Krista dɔ cɩna bɩ, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ gʋaa bɩr ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ y'a so wɔɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ wɔɔ ba lɔnnɔ.
48004004	Bɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a b'a ku bɩ, a a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ, lʋ y'a yɩ. Yɩ a ʋ, dɔmɩm kʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ ma.
48004005	K'a a da ma a gʋɔɔ kʋ lɔnnɔ m lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto rɔ wɔɔ yɔ, kʋ Woso n wɔɔ ba a nyɩnɔ.
48004006	Kʋ Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ y'a ka, an a Nyɩ bɩ Ɛspri bɩ zer wɔɔ heerlɔ ʋ, wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma Ɛspri bɩ tɔ ma, ʋ nɩ Woso birm, ʋ ʋ: "Ʋ Zɩ."
48004007	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, lɔnnɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m dɔ y, Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ k'a nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'a so a hɔjirle b'ʋ, Woso n nɩ naa barɛ.
48004008	Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ biisi awɔɔ n Woso dɔ bɩ, zu awɔɔ nawʋm hɔɔ kʋ n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ma wosoro, a a ba ŋ lɔnnɔ, bɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro, Woso bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y.
48004009	Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ Woso dɔ, an lɛ da bɩ, Woso awɔɔ dɔ, b'a a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ, a a ya, a a bɔ k'a zu durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ gʋaa bɩr ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ ʋ, k'a a ya, a a ba ŋ lɔnnɔ? Bɩ hɔɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, ŋ ba paŋŋa nɩ y.
48004010	Awɔɔ ɩ dɩgam dɔmɩnnɔ niŋŋoo ma dɔmɩm wɩsɩrɔ a yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ, an n'a bam maam sɔ kan monno niŋŋoo kɩ, hɔɔ niŋŋoo dɔmɩm kɩ, dɔɔraarɔ kɩ.
48004011	Awɔɔ mim naa ɩ mɔɔ da bɔŋ ʋ, ɩ b'a ka zi mɔɔ ba awɔɔ minto vam wa?
48004012	M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ n nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han gʋta, amba mɔɔ m ba awɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ, k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa sɔ. A zar bɛɛ awɔɔ ʋ mɔɔ ma y.
48004013	Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, mɔɔ yaaba zɛrɛ sabaabʋ y'a ka mɔɔ n lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m, m lɛɛkarɛ zɛrɛ ma awɔɔ zi b'ʋ.
48004014	K'awɔɔ bɩ to a kɔ mɔɔ yaaba bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ n mɔɔ bɔ ʋ y, b'awɔɔ n a si mɔɔ lɛɛ y. Bɩ mɔɔ si awɔɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa ɩ ʋ, Woso malɛɛka deem awɔɔ si, ɩ ʋ, Krista Yeezuu mɩŋŋa awɔɔ si.
48004015	Heernyɔɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m biisi b'ɩ ka? Mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa m ʋ, k'awɔɔ n'a dam ma, awɔɔ y'a mɩnyaarɔ waaŋ ʋ a ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ.
48004016	Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, m ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ jɩm sɩra kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ minto ra?
48004017	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋʋaar hɔ dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ, tʋntɔʋrɛ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m kan awɔɔ kɩ naa, tʋntɔʋrɛ paan••• bɛɛ y, a ka ŋ nawʋm ma k'a awɔɔ gʋ mɔɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n a tɔ ʋ kan a kɩ.
48004018	A mɩŋŋa kʋ gʋɔɔ n bɩr ta tʋntɔʋrɛ m hɔ mɩŋŋa tɔ ma, b'a ga a ʋ m kʋ tʋntɔʋrɛ bɩ do n bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, baa kʋ mɔɔ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, gɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ b'ʋ y.
48004019	Mɔɔ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, mɔɔ m ya m nɩ fɩr yɩm paan••• m heer ʋ awɔɔ tɔ ma, m nɩ nyoosi bam am lʋ jɩsɩzaa hɔ bɩ m, kʋ m a ka k'awɔɔ n Krista mɩsɩrbaa yɩ paan•••.
48004020	A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm paan••• kʋ m bɩr awɔɔ bire ʋ b'ʋ dɩɩtaa, kʋ m m meerbaa bɩ lʋr m a ba, bala, mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ mɔɔ meer bɩ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ lʋnlɔ y.
48004021	Awɔɔ k'a n'a ŋʋam kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n a so a ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a hɩ m m wa. Awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ ma ra?
48004022	N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ, Abraham nyɩnɔ yɩ hɩɩya, deem yɩ a ʋ kan Agaar kɩ, lɔ m bɩ, an deem yɩ kan Saara kɩ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa m bɩ.
48004023	Bɩ lʋ kʋ lɔ m bɩ nyɩ bɩ, yɩ b'ʋ amba gʋaa haay nɩ yɩm bɩ m, an bɔkarɛ, nyɩ kʋ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa b'a yɩ bɩ, Woso ɩ lɛɛ ka an a yɩrɛ ler bɔ.
48004024	Mim naa do naa, hɔ a ʋ k'a dɩnda wɔɔ m, a ba n nɩ: Lannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ, gʋaasɩbabaa hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da rɔ wɔɔ makra nɩ ŋ mɩ. Lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa makra m Agaar m. Gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ Woso a da Sinayii ci burə ʋ bɩ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ do a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, lɔnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ.
48004025	Bala, Agaar bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, Sinayii ci bɩ m, Araabɩrɔ kʋ ci bɩ do n ta ʋ, a bɔ kʋ ʋ sɔ ɩ ʋ, Zerizalɛm kʋnɔ k'an ta ʋ her-her naa m, bala, a ɩ lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ.
48004026	Bɩ arzana Zerizalɛm bɩ, soamɩŋŋaʋzaa m bɩ, wɔɔ kʋnɔ bɩ m bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ da m.
48004027	Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n cɩna bɩ, ɩ heer nyɔɔ, bala, ɩbɩɩ bɩr nyɩnɔ yɩm biisi y, heernyɔɔ zee da, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n nyoosibarɛ fɩr yɩ biisi bɩ, bala, lʋ kʋ n kaanm m bɩ nyɩnɔ yɩm gʋta, an lɛ da lʋ k'a zim n ta ʋ bɩ nyɩnɔ ra.
48004028	B'awɔɔ, m danyɩnɔ, amba Izakkɩ m bɩ, ler kʋ Woso a bɔ bɩ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m.
48004029	Biisi bɩ, amba nyɩ k'a yɩ am gʋaa haay hɔ bɩ m bɩ nɩ fɩr kam nyɩ kʋ Woso Ɛspri a ka an yɩ bɩ ma bɩ, her sɔ naa, a maam sɔ.
48004030	Bɩ, bɔ n y'a hɩ Wosoci b'ʋ? N ʋ: 'La lʋ kʋ lɔ m bɩ ra kan a nyɩ bɩ kɩ, bala, a n a ga m kʋ lɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ n hɔjirle yɩ kan soamɩŋŋaʋzaa bɩ nyɩ bɩ kɩ y.'
48004031	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, lɔ bɩ nyɩnɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y, lʋ kʋ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa n bɩ nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m.
48005001	Krista bɩ, wɔɔ yɔ a ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ so ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ paan•••. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a b'a ya a to gɔsɩ n'a ba hɔ niŋŋə lɔnnɔ y.
48005002	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ a m, m ʋ, k'awɔɔ ʋ kʋ n a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, hɔ kʋ Krista a ba awɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ nyɔɔdʋ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y.
48005003	Kʋ m m ya m so ra paan•••, kʋ gʋaa a bɔ an gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, k'an a dɔ a ʋ, pakra m k'an zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay.
48005004	Awɔɔ k'a n'a kam ma k'a yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ a gʋ Krista ma, a do awɔɔ ʋ Woso barka bɩ ma sɔ.
48005005	Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, a ta wɔɔ ʋ ʋ heer lɛ kʋ Woso n'ʋ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ n'a mɩm dam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m bɩ n naa.
48005006	Bala, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ, kʋ wɔɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, gɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m bɩ y, hɔ k'a a ga m bɩ, sɩrakarɛ m, an nɩ zi bam ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
48005007	Biisi bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ tam lɛɛ mɩŋŋa Woso zaa bɩ ra, nka y'a ta awɔɔ m toore k'awɔɔ bɩ zu sɩra ʋ dɔ?
48005008	Woso k'awɔɔ bir bɩ bɛɛ nɩ naa barɛ awɔɔ nɩ y.
48005009	Bɔɔr deem y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ: "Nyʋnyɔɔ poore ɩ nyisi derm haay."
48005010	Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ heer kookoo Zuuba tɔ ma awɔɔ mim bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ yɩm deem kan mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ kɩ. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a n'awɔɔ warm kʋ ma bɩ, Woso bɩ zaa hʋnhʋrm, baa kʋ nka m.
48005011	M danyɩnɔ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ bɩr baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ mim pa dam dɔ y, k'a pa mɔɔ n'a dam, gʋɔɔ bɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma dɔ y, bɩ ŋ bɩ kaanm Krista gɔdarkʋra zɛ bɩ m sɔ y.
48005012	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ warm kʋ ma rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ m, kʋ ŋ lɛ taa kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ŋn'aa mɩŋŋɔɔ bɔ am hɔbɩsɩ hɔ bɩ m, a pakra ba ŋ ma.
48005013	M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ bir Woso ʋ k'awɔɔ n a so a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ, b'a bɩ yo soamɩŋŋaʋ bɩ do ma k'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ zi ba y. Bɩ k'a yɩ kʋ zibəənyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
48005014	Bala, lemim k'a so lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay bɩ ba n nɩ: "Ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa ŋʋa bɩ m."
48005015	Bɩ k'awɔɔ y'a hɔ barɛ ɩ ʋ poohɔɔ n'a mɩ, an nɩ sɔ dɩndam kʋ ʋ, an nɩ kʋ kɩnkaansʋrɛ, k'a dundo a zi, kʋ n bɛɛ a kʋ nyam.
48005016	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ: K'a to kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n ka a lɛɛ a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, maam bɩ, awɔɔ b'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ barɛ y.
48005017	Hɔ kʋ mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ n'a ŋʋam bɩ bɩr yɛm Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a ŋʋam sɔ bɩ bɩr yɛm mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ y, jɩnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ kan kʋ kɩ, maam bɩ awɔɔ b'a dam ma a a mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y.
48005018	Bɩ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ karɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ dɔ y.
48005019	Mɛsim zibəəro ɩ yɩm garga ra, ŋ ba n nɩ: Jaandarɛ m, lannɔ kan yaarɔ barɛ kɩ m, dintim zibəə haay m,
48005020	yaa da wosobaawɔnnɔ m, nyɩsɩrɔ bɩrɛ m, sɔkʋm m, bakʋmarɛ m, jɩmbaa m, kan nɔmaa kɩ, ka a mɩŋŋa daahan ma m, gʋngʋrɛ m, bazɛkʋra m,
48005021	kan mɩm bɩr gʋɔɔ hɔ ma kɩ, bɛɛmire waasɩ kɩ, kan hɔ bɩ maam-maam kɩ, kan zibəəro kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nawɔnnɔ kɩ. Kʋ m m ya m so ra, amba mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m awɔɔ bɔ zaa ʋ bɩ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ gasʋm Woso cirbəə b'ʋ y.
48005022	Bɩ nyɩ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a dam gʋaa mɩsɩrbaa ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: ŋʋarɛ m, kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, laafɩɩ kɩ, bʋraama kɩ, mɩŋŋabaa kɩ, bamɩŋŋa kɩ, taalɛra kɩ,
48005023	kan bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa kɩ, kan da a mɩŋŋa ma kɩ. Lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩr nyaa bam hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma y.
48005024	Gʋɔɔ kʋ Krista a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ wɔɔ kan a hɔɔnhɔrɔ kɩ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
48005025	Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ minto bɩ, a a ga m k'an ka wɔɔ lɛɛ, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ.
48005026	Ʋ b'ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ busu y, ʋ bɩ kʋ da nɔmaa ma y, ʋ bɩ jɩm ba kʋ ma y.
48006001	M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa yɩ an nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam, awɔɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ karɛ a lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ, k'awɔɔ n dundo zi a bɔ zaa ʋ, bɩ kʋ m a hɩ awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə m, gʋaa biyəə n dundo a zi k'a bɩ gasʋ kʋrɔma bɩ do ʋ sɔ y.
48006002	K'a bɩr kɔm kʋ ma, a bɩr a dam kʋ han, k'awɔɔ y'a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, lɛ kʋ Krista a cɩnta b'awɔɔ nɩ zuŋ ʋ.
48006003	Kʋ gʋaa y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, hɔsɩ n' a mɩ, an bɔkarɛ hɔsɩ bɛɛ n'a zaa nɩ, bra an n'a barɛ a mɩŋŋa m.
48006004	Bɩ kʋ gʋaa biyəə n a hɔɔn da a mɩŋŋa zibəə ma an dɩga a, kʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ y'a nɔ ʋ, k'a n'a heer nyɔɔ kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ, b'a ba gɩnga gʋaa ma k'a heer nyɔɔ y.
48006005	Bala, gʋaa biyəə n'a mɩŋŋa mim nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ Woso taa.
48006006	Gʋaa kʋ n nɩ Woso lemim dɩndam nɩ b'a ga m, an hɔ haay k'an ta m bɩ bɔ ʋ an a ka hɔdɩndarɛzaa b'ʋ.
48006007	A bɩ bra bɩmba a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ y, Woso bɩ yɛm gʋaa n yaa wʋ a ma y, bala, hɔ kʋ gʋaa a duu b'a n'a dam.
48006008	Kʋ gʋaa a mɩŋŋa lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ zibəəro duu, hɔ k'a n'a dam bɩ n zɛ m. Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔɔnhɔ zibəəro duum bɩ, hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ an n'a yɩm, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ m.
48006009	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ bɩ kɔ kan zi mɩŋŋa barɛ kɩ y, ʋ bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, bala, kʋ wɔɔ n kɔ y, wɔɔ y'ʋ zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩm, a dɔmɩm ʋ.
48006010	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ toore n naa, ʋ zi ba gʋaa haay daahan minto, an lɛ da bɩ, ʋ a mɩŋŋa ba ʋ danyɩnɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m.
48006011	Kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ nɩ gʋrsɩra bɩ barɛ m zim, bɩ minto m gʋrsɩranyɩ bɩ n gʋta-gʋta.
48006012	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ, a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a ka ŋ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a yɩ, mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ tɔ ma. Ŋ lɛ baa k'a fɩr yɩ Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ pa darɛ tɔ ma y.
48006013	Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋm baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bɩr zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. Ŋ nɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a ŋʋam k'awɔɔ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, k'a a da ma a a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ yɛ a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ.
48006014	Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ bɛɛ y. Kan mɔɔ kɩ durnya bɩ hɔgər m Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ tɔ ma, kan durnya bɩ kɩ sɔ, gər m mɔɔ m Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ tɔ ma sɔ.
48006015	Bala, kʋ gʋaa gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, gɛɛ k'a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ n bɩ y, an lɛ da bɩ, yɩrɛdaa kʋ Woso n'a kam bɩ m.
48006016	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ naa do ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kan Woso gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ, kʋ Woso n laafɩɩ kan cicirzɛrɛ kɩ ka ŋ ʋ.
48006017	A n a sa naa ma, gɔsɩ b'a ya an mɔɔ da kɔrɛ ma y, bala, mɔɔ ɩ fɩryɩrɛ jɩrɔ m m mɛ ma, an n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Yeezuu y'a so mɔɔ ʋ.
48006018	M danyɩnɔ, bɩ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ. Amina.
49001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ ci bɩ barɛ awɔɔ ma. Woso ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ kʋ m yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ kʋ wosogʋɔɔ n'a mɩ, [an nɩ Efɛɛzɩ ʋ,] an nɩ yɛm Krista Yeezuu ma, an nɩ zɛkʋra m kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ.
49001002	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
49001003	Ʋ Woso barka da, a m Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ. A Sɛnt-Ɛspri barka do haay ka wɔɔ ʋ arzana ʋ, Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
49001004	Woso lɛɛ ka an wɔɔ bɔ ʋ Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, a n durnya da y, wɔɔ bɔ a ʋ maam k'ʋ yɩ a gʋɔɔ, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ gʋr zi a mɩm ʋ y.
49001005	K'a nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam bɩ minto bɩ, a a cɩnta hɔɔ tee••• kʋ wɔɔ n b'ʋ ba a nyɩnɔ Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, naa a lɛ n taa a ŋʋarɛ bɩ tɔ ma.
49001006	Ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, a barka k'an ta lɛbɔʋrɛ m bɩ tɔ ma, a ka an nawʋm wɔɔ ʋ vam, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ zɛkʋra m kan a Nyɩ ŋʋarɛzaa bɩ kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
49001007	Bala, Krista ma bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, Woso wɔɔ bʋmbɔ, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ. A barka bɩ gʋtabaa tɔ ma m.
49001008	A barka bɩ k'a ka wɔɔ ʋ gʋta bɩ minto bɩ, a a ka wɔɔ nɩ mindɔrɛ m kan hɔɔn kɩ m.
49001009	A a ka wɔɔ n a hɔɔnhɔ k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ dɔ, hɔ k'a cɩnta biisi tee••• k'a ba Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
49001010	Hɔ kʋ Woso a cɩnta k'a ba a nyambʋr dɔmɩm k'a bɔ ʋ bɩ ma bɩ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ k'a nɩ brama haay kan hɔ k'a nɩ tara burə ʋ haay kɩ bɩ, an n'a som kʋ ma kʋ Krista deem taan••• n yɩ ŋ soʋrezaa.
49001011	Hɔ woo••• ba Woso n nawʋm a hɔɔnhɔ ma, bɩ y'a ka an lɛɛ ka an wɔɔ bɔ ʋ, amba a lɛ n taa bɩ m, kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ a gʋɔɔ. Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ zɛkʋra m kan Yeezuu Krista kɩ bɩ tɔ ma m. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, an wɔɔ hɔjirle ka wɔɔ ʋ.
49001012	Naa ba a ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ a gʋtabaa ʋ wɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ʋ Krista ta ʋ heer lɛ rɔ wɔɔ.
49001013	A do n naa sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. Krista nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ sɩra lemim bɩ ma, lemim nyɩnta k'a n'awɔɔ bʋmbɔm bɩ m. Awɔɔ n sɩra ka Krista ʋ, a m bɩ Woso n Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a ler bɔ bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
49001014	Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ ka a ʋ wɔɔ ʋ, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a hɔ haay, k'a ler bɔ bɩ kam wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro yɩm, dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ n bɩ bɔlɛm yɩŋ ʋ fasɩ b'ʋ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ Woso gʋtabaa ʋ.
49001015	Naa tɔ ma m, kʋ mɔɔ sɩra k'awɔɔ ka Zuuba Yeezuu ʋ bɩ mim ma bɩ, m a ma sɔ, n ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay ŋʋam bɩ,
49001016	kʋ mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m awɔɔ tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ n'a barka dam awɔɔ minto dɔmɩm haay.
49001017	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Woso bɩ han, wɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m gʋta bɩ, k'an mindɔrɛ ka awɔɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a bɩr Woso dɔm, k'a b'a dɔ paan•••.
49001018	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm han sɔ, k'a n'awɔɔ hɔɔn gu a lɛɛgure bɩ m, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a taaheerlɛ k'awɔɔ bir ma bɩ dɔ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a hɔnyɩ k'an a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ sɔ, hɔjirle hɔnyɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ m.
49001019	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm sɔ, k'a n a ka k'awɔɔ n a paŋŋa gʋta k'a zi bam wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ dɔ, wɔɔ kʋ sɩrakarɛzannɔ m wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ. K'awɔɔ n a paŋŋa bɩ gʋtabaa k'a cem haay dɔ.
49001020	Paŋŋa bɩ do Woso zi ba m an a hɩnka, Yeezuu Krista mɩm k'a a bɔ ʋ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ, an a ka an nyɩnta a bɩsɩ ra arzana ʋ.
49001021	A n a ka Yeezuu nɩ paŋŋazannɔ do haay burə ʋ, lɛɛzannɔ do haay, lɛɛsoʋrezannɔ haay, cirbəə do haay kɩ burə ʋ. A a ka an nɩ hɔ k'an ta ʋ her durnya naa ʋ gɛɛ booti m haay burə ʋ.
49001022	A a ka Krista n a so hɔ haay ʋ. A a ka an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ, an a ka an a ba a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma minzaa.
49001023	Kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m Krista mɛ. A mɩŋŋa n'a mɩsɩrbaa barɛ a gʋr zi jilli, Woso mɩŋŋa n'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Krista mɩŋŋa gʋr zi jilli sɔ.
49002001	Biisi bɩ, gəəno n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ kan a mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ tɔ ma.
49002002	A mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba awɔɔ nawʋm am durnya gʋɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. A n nɩ zum paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ warkʋ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ cir b'ʋ. Cir bɩ do bɩ, zinəro cir k'a nɩ zi bam kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam Woso ma kɩ bɩ m.
49002003	Wɔɔ haay, wɔɔ nyɩnta ŋ barla sɔ, ʋ nɩ hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ wɔɔ mɛsim lɛ n taa rɔ wɔɔ bam. Ʋ nɩ zure ʋ mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kan ʋ hɔɔndarɛrɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ. Kʋ wɔɔ n maam bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso nɔmaa n n'a kərgure ŋ la rɔ wɔɔ m wɔɔ m, amba gʋɔɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ m.
49002004	Bɩ, Woso cicirzɛrɛ bɩ gʋta maam-maam, k'a nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta bɩ tɔ ma.
49002005	Bɩ y'a ka, gɩnga kʋ wɔɔ ʋ, ʋ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ ʋ Krista zɛkʋra tɔ ma. Denter m, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
49002006	Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ bɩ, Woso wɔɔ mɩm bɔ ʋ kan kɩ, an wɔɔ nyɩnta kan kɩ arzana ʋ, ʋ nɩ cirbəə bɩm kan kɩ.
49002007	A ba a ʋ wɔɔ m mɩŋŋa ncɩnaaʋ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, k'a barka gʋtabaa hɩnka gʋɔɔ m, wakatɩ haay k'a nɩ zɛm nɔ ʋ.
49002008	Bala, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ minto bɛɛ y'a ka awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ y, Woso ganwʋrɛ m an a ka awɔɔ ʋ vam.
49002009	Awɔɔ zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y, ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ y.
49002010	Bala, Woso ɩ wɔɔ da, wɔɔ da a ʋ, Krista Yeezuu zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ gʋta, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ lɛɛ ka an zibəəro wɔɔ duro banka kʋ wɔɔ n bɩ ŋ ba.
49002011	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: awɔɔ, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, biisi bɩ, awɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ a ma ŋ ʋ, awɔɔ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma ŋ ʋ, a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ makra n a mɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
49002012	Dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ nɩ naa hɩrɛ awɔɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ laatʋ Krista ma, awɔɔ ba gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla y, nyɩnta awɔɔ ʋ saanɔɔ. Gʋaasɩbabaarɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma, an ler bɔ ŋnɩ bɩ, awɔɔ n nyɩnta ŋ nɔ ʋ y. Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ a n'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ bam durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ ba taaheerlɛ nɩ, b'awɔɔ n Woso dɔ sɔ y.
49002013	Kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ k'a nyɩnta laatʋ Woso ma bɩ, Krista Yeezuu zɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ a zɔ Woso ma, Krista ma bɩ tɔ ma.
49002014	Bala, Krista mɩŋŋa ɩ bʋr laafɩɩ m an ba ka wɔɔ ʋ, a zɩɩfʋrɔ kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ zɛ kʋ ra an ŋ ba do deem. K'a yɛ an ga gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a sɔkʋm k'a nɩ ŋ bire ʋ am pəŋŋə hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ ŋ gʋngʋm kʋ ma bɩ zaar ba.
49002015	A zɩɩfʋrɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ, kan ŋ damarɔ kɩ, ŋ sʋfɔrɔ kɩ ci zɛ, k'a ka kʋ do hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔm n a ba do deem taan••• a mɩŋŋa zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ. A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, an ŋ zɛ kʋ ra laafɩɩ nɔ ʋ.
49002016	Krista sɔkʋm zaar ba, ga k'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ. A zɛ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a do hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra, an ŋ ba mɛ deem, an ŋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ.
49002017	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Krista n bʋr an laafɩɩ pa da awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ n'a mɩ, an laatʋ Woso ma biisi rɔ wɔɔ. Bʋr a ʋ sɔ k'a laafɩɩ bɩ pa da zɩɩfʋrɔ m, brɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ jɩnjɛɛm Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ.
49002018	Krista mɩŋŋa barka tɔ ma m, zɩɩfʋrɔ kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma, ʋ ʋ zɔ Woso ma Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem nɔ ʋ.
49002019	Bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, saanɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m dɔ, bɩ lɛɛ laatʋrɛ gʋɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m sɔ y. Awɔɔ ɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla, Woso hargʋɔɔ n'a mɩ.
49002020	Awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan cɛ kʋ n n'a dɔm kɩ, n n'a dɔm cɛjɩr kʋ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ n a cɩnta bɩ ra, cɛ bɩ jɩr jaa wɩsɩ bɩ m Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa m.
49002021	A mɩŋŋa n'a kam cɛ bɩ jaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ kʋ nyasʋm kɔɔkɔɔ, cɛ bɩ nɩ derm tee••• an bɩ zɛm b'a ba Wosocɛ, Zuuba zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
49002022	Zɛkʋra k'awɔɔ n ta m kan Yeezuu Krista kɩ b'a ka, cɛ kʋ n n'a dɔm bɩ, awɔɔ n sɔ, k'a b'a ba cɛ kʋ Woso n a nɔ ʋ a Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.
49003001	Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ nɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, awɔɔ kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ du n y'a ʋ Krista tɔ ma awɔɔ daahan minto.
49003002	Zibəə kʋ Woso mɔɔ da ʋ a barka tɔ ma, kʋ mɔɔ n a ba m m da awɔɔ han k'a hɔɔnhɔ n kʋ yɩ awɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ, awɔɔ zibəə bɩ do mim ma mɩŋŋa.
49003003	Gɩnga kʋ Woso n ta m an a nyaakʋm da bɩ, a a hɩnka mɔɔ m kʋ mɔɔ n a dɔ. A mim mɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m ci bɩ nɔ ʋ poore m cem bɩ.
49003004	K'awɔɔ ci kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma naa karɩnda ba, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ a ʋ, mɔɔ Krista mim k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
49003005	Biisi bɩ, Woso n Krista mim k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ hɩnka gɔsɩ nɩ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso mim bɩ do hɩnka a zibəəzannɔ m, kan a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.
49003006	Krista mim k'a nyaakʋm da Woso n a hɩnka bɩ ba n nɩ: A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista kɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, brɔɔ hɔjirle kʋ Woso a cɩnta zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m bɩ yɩm sɔ kan ŋ kɩ. Ŋ y'a ba hɔdeem kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ler kʋ Woso a bɔ Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ woo••• hɔ m.
49003007	Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ n ganwʋrɛ yɩ, m m ba lemim nyɩnta bɩ zibəənyɩ, Woso y'a paŋŋa zi ba an yɩ mɔɔ ma ncɩnaaʋ.
49003008	Mɔɔ m wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ poorero wɔɔ poore, baa kan naa kɩ haay, Woso gan wʋ mɔɔ ma. Kʋ mɔɔ m hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Krista nɔ ʋ, bɩ ŋ tɛkka ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ pa da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
49003009	Kʋ m a ka, kʋ gʋɔɔ m hɔ kʋ Woso a nyaakʋm da biisi bɩ kʋ yɩrɛ zaa dɔ. Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ hɔ haay da, a ɩ hɔ naa do nyaakʋm da sɔ biisi tee•••.
49003010	Woso bɩ, naa do ba a ʋ, kʋ paŋŋazannɔ kan paŋŋasoʋrezannɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ n Woso mindɔrɛ k'a zaa n hɔka bɩ dɔ kɛɛrɛ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ tɔ ma.
49003011	Naa ba Woso ʋ, bala, a a cɩnta hɔɔ laatʋ, bɩ ma bɩ durnya ba ʋ y, k'a hɔɔnhɔ naa do ba wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ.
49003012	Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista kɩ ʋ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ lɛ m k'ʋ zɔ Woso ma kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ.
49003013	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a b'a heer zar kʋ mɔɔ nɩ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ awɔɔ minto bɩ tɔ ma y. Mɔɔ fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ bɩ, a ka a nawʋm awɔɔ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ.
49003014	Naa tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ kukurə zɛm Zɩ Woso taa.
49003015	A mɩŋŋa har haay a to zi brama kan tara burə ʋ kɩ.
49003016	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm han, a lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋtabaa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a n'awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, k'a a da ma a bɩr paŋŋa m a heer nɔ ʋ.
49003017	K'an a ka sɔ, kʋ Krista n nyɩnta awɔɔ heer ʋ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm sɔ, k'awɔɔ m məsi da a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ kʋ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
49003018	Maam bɩ, awɔɔ wɔŋ ʋ kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, a Krista ŋʋarɛ gʋtabaa kan a jintəbaa kɩ, a hɛ kɩ, kan a nɔyaa kɩ jɩ dɔ.
49003019	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n a ŋʋarɛ bɩ dɔ, baa kʋ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a dɔ haay bɩ kɩ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n a dɔ, kʋ Woso mɩsɩrbaa jilli n'awɔɔ heer han.
49003020	Woso mɩŋŋa a da ma an hɔ woo••• ba, an lɛ da hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ n'a yɛm, gɛɛ ʋ n'ʋ hɔɔn dam ma bɩ ra, naa ba a nawʋm kan paŋŋa k'a nɩ zi bam wɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ kɩ m.
49003021	Bɩ k'a tɔ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ gʋr zi, Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma, wakatɩ haay nɔ ʋ, dɔmɩm haay. Amina!
49004001	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a yɛ awɔɔ han kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ba n nɩ: awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ du n y'a ʋ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ Krista zi bam bɩ tɔ ma. K'a mɩsɩrbaa ba amba Woso mɩŋŋa lɛ n taa, an awɔɔ bir ma bɩ m.
49004002	K'a bɩr a mɩŋŋɔɔ zerm tee•••, a bɩr bʋgʋ-bʋgʋ, a bɩr bʋraama m, k'a yɛ kʋ ma ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
49004003	K'a a yo ʋ, a bɩr deem Sɛnt-Ɛspri zɛkʋra bɩ tɔ ma, laafɩɩ kan kʋ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
49004004	Krista mɛ bɩ deem, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ deem, taaheerlɛ hɔ kʋ Woso wɔɔ bir ma, k'ʋ b'a yɩ bɩ deem sɔ.
49004005	Wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ deem, sɩrakarɛ bɩ deem, batɛm deem wɔɔ n'a sim,
49004006	Woso deem, a m gʋaa haay Zɩ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʋ, an nɩ zi bam kan gʋaa haay kɩ, an nɩ gʋaa haay heer ʋ.
49004007	Bɩ Woso barka ka wɔɔ gʋaa biyəə ʋ, Krista n a jir a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
49004008	Naa do Wosoci b'a hɩ ma, a ʋ: K'a der mim ʋ bɩ, a lɔnnɔ gaa an ta ŋ nɩ, an gan wʋ gʋɔɔ ma.
49004009	N ʋ: 'A der.' Naa jɩ n bɔ nɩ? Naa ʋ k'a hɩ, a ʋ, lɛɛ a ka an zer tara noom ʋ paan•••.
49004010	Gʋaa k'a zer bɩ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ der brama laatʋ, k'a nyɩnta hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ.
49004011	A ɩ gan wʋ gʋɔɔ ma. A a ka gɔsɩnnɔ n a ba a zibəəzannɔ, an a ka gɔsɩnnɔ m wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ. A n a ka nɔɔ m lemim nyɩnta padənno, an nɔɔrɔ ba a gʋɔɔ dundonno, hɔdɩndagʋɔɔnzannɔ m sɔ.
49004012	A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a da ma ŋnɩ Woso zuure zibəə bɩ ba, kʋ Krista mɛ bɩ m ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.
49004013	Maam bɩ, wɔɔ tam lɛɛ haay. Ʋ sɩrakarɛ, kan Woso Nyɩ bɩ dɔrɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m bɩ kɩ n yɩ deem. Ʋ ma Woso zaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, ʋ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Krista mɩŋŋa kɩ fasɩ.
49004014	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam nyɩnɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ to gʋɔɔ n bɩr ʋ yəŋŋəm jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ a hɔdɩndarɛ haay nɩ y, ŋʋaarzannɔ m, bɩ ŋ bɩ wɔŋ ʋ dɔ ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba wɔɔ m, wɔɔ n fɔ y.
49004015	Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ sɩra hɩm ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ mam hɔ haay nɔ ʋ Woso zuure bɩ nɔ ʋ, ʋ tolle ba ʋ ʋ ba amba Krista m, a m minzaa.
49004016	A mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m, mɛ bɩ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ jilli n kʋ nyasʋ ŋnɩ deem. Gʋaa mɛ kunəro n'a kam mɛ bɩ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ nɩ kʋ nyasʋm, mɛ bɩ n deem. Maam bɩ, kʋ mɛ bɩ vəŋŋə biyəə y'a zi bam, bɩ n'a kam mɛ bɩ n bɩr tam lɛɛ tee••• an bɩr mam ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
49004017	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, m n'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: A b'a ya a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba am gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Woso dɔ rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y, zu ŋ nawʋrɛ a hɔɔndarɛrɔ ʋ, ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩm naa barɛ nɔ ʋ y.
49004018	Monsigə y'a so ŋ hɔɔn ʋ, ŋ laatʋ mɩsɩrbaa kʋ Woso n'a kam bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ y, kʋ ŋ y'a heer ta bɩ tɔ ma.
49004019	Nyannɩ bɩr ŋ zɛm fɩɩga y, a da ŋ y'a ʋ jaandarɛ lɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ dintim mɩsɩrbaa do haay bam, b'a nyannɩ ba ŋ nɩ y.
49004020	B'awɔɔ, mɩsɩrbaa naa do bɛɛ Krista a dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y.
49004021	A mɩŋŋa mim n y'a dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ, kʋ kristagʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, n nɩ sɩra k'a nɩ Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m.
49004022	Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m, a a biisi mɩsɩrbaa bɩ to, a a bɔ a mɛsim k'a lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɩ bra bɩmbarɛ awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ zaar ba b'ʋ.
49004023	K'a lʋrlɛ yɩ a heer kan a hɔɔn kɩ ʋ.
49004024	K'a mɩsɩrbaa daa kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ ba. Woso ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do da an bɔ a mɩŋŋa rɛ, bɩ y'a ka mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do n tɩrga, an Woso nɔ yɩ, an sɩra sɔ.
49004025	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a b'a ya, a ŋʋaar ba y. Gʋaa biyəə n sɩra hɩ a mim m, bala mɛ deem vəŋŋoo n wɔɔ m.
49004026	K'awɔɔ nɔ ma ʋ, a b'a ka a mimbʋnyaa ba y. A b'a nɔmaa bɩ to a nɔ ʋ gum n da nɩ y.
49004027	A bɩ zaa ka Sʋtaana ʋ, an bʋr a ra y.
49004028	Gʋaa k'a nɩ koor bam biisi bɩ, an a wɔ bɔ koorbaa b'ʋ k'an zi ba an a lɛɛmaa hɔ yɩ, maam bɩ, a y'a dam ma an hɔ yɩ, an n'a dam gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa daahan ma han.
49004029	Meerbaa bʋnyaa sɩ n a ga m an bɔ awɔɔ lɛ ʋ y, k'a meerbaa k'a n'a dam gʋɔɔ han, ŋnɩ ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ ba. K'a meerbaa mɩŋŋa ba, k'an a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ han.
49004030	A b'a ka a Sɛnt-Ɛspri heer zɛ ma y, Woso bɩ, a ka a ʋ awɔɔ ʋ, k'a a jɩ da wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, an n'a hɩnkam sɔ a ʋ, dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm Woso n bɩ wɔɔ yɔm fasɩ-fasɩ.
49004031	A b'a to mim n bɩr a heer ʋ kan gʋaa kɩ y, a bɩ yɩ heerbusuzannɔ y, a bɩ nɔmaa ba y. A bɩ yɩ hany-hany zannɔ y, a bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y, k'a zi bʋnyaabarɛ do haay to.
49004032	Bɩ, k'a bɩr mɩŋŋa kan kʋ kɩ, a bɩr kʋ ŋʋam gʋta, a bɩr sugur kam kʋ ʋ, amba Woso sugur ka awɔɔ ʋ Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
49005001	K'a Woso hɔbaa dɩnda, bala, a nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, an n'awɔɔ ŋʋam.
49005002	K'a mɩsɩrbaa ba ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ amba Krista m. A ɩ wɔɔ ŋʋa, an a meeyaa ka wɔɔ tɔ ma, a mɩŋŋa a ka amba n tɩr hɔ zɛ n a ka Woso ʋ, an Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ m.
49005003	Wosogʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, an a ga m kʋ jaandarɛ mim, dintim do haay mim, lɛ n bɩr gʋaa hɔ zi mim n nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʋ y, a bɩ sʋʋra ba ŋ ma sɔ fɩɩga y.
49005004	A n a ga m sɔ, kʋ meerbaarɔ yaarsɩrɔ n bɔ a lɛ ʋ y, hɔɔnwar kan dɔkarɛrɔ meerbaarɔ kɩ y. A ga a ʋ m k'awɔɔ n bɩr barka yaa dam Woso m.
49005005	K'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, jaandənno, lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔbənno, mɩnyɔɔzaa. Mɩnyɔɔzaa bɩ, wosobaawɔm yaadər m, bala, a hɔnyɩ ŋʋa an lɛ da Woso ra. Nawɔnnɔ haay, ŋ gɔsɩ bɩ gasʋm Krista kan Woso kɩ cirbəə b'ʋ fɩɩga y.
49005006	A n a ga m kʋ gʋaa n bra bɩmba awɔɔ m meerbaa vanvannɔ nɩ y. Naa woo••• tɔ ma m, Woso nɔmaa n'a kərgum gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm ma rɔ wɔɔ ra.
49005007	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ y.
49005008	Biisi bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ monsigə ʋ, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ ɩ leegure nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan Zuuba kɩ bɩ tɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʋ naa, kʋ leegure gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a leegure mɩsɩrbaa ba.
49005009	Bala, hɔ kʋ leegure nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ, bamɩŋŋa m, kan tɩrgabaa zibəə kɩ, kan sɩra kɩ.
49005010	K'a a yo ʋ, a hɔ kʋ Zuuba lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ, a bɔ kʋ zi.
49005011	A bɩ monsigə zibəəro wɔɔ ba sɔ y, ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y, k'a ŋ bʋnyaabaa bɩ hɩ garga ra.
49005012	Hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro n'a bam sɛɛrɛ bɩ, a hɩrɛ mɩŋŋa nyannɩ ta ʋ.
49005013	Bɩ, hɔ haay k'ʋ n nɩ bɔrɛ a mim n garga ra bɩ, hɔ bɩ do ɩ yɩm fasɩ, ʋ n'a mim dɔm.
49005014	Bala, hɔ haay k'a nɩ bɔm garga ra bɩ, a ba a nawʋm leegure. Bɩ y'a ka n a hɩ, n ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ hinceem bam bɩ, gu hinceem ma, wuti gəəno gaa ʋ, kʋ Krista n lɛɛ gu ɩ m.
49005015	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a dundo mɩsɩrbaa k'awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ zi mɩŋŋa. A b'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba hɔɔnwar nɔ ʋ y, bɩ k'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba hɔɔntaʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
49005016	Bʋnyaabaa y'a so her dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔ ʋ gʋta, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a a yo ʋ, a bɩr hɔ k'a ga barɛ m bɩ bam wakatɩ haay nɔ ʋ.
