49005017	A bɩ yɩ hɔɔnwarzannɔ a mɩsɩrbaa barɛ nɔ ʋ y, bɩ k'a a ka ma a hɔ kʋ Zuuba lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ n a ba bɩ dɔ.
49005018	A bɩ dɩvɛn mi an a mɩm durgə y. Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa an n'a zaar bam. Bɩ, k'a to kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a a han.
49005019	K'a kʋ paŋŋa da ra Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ laarɔ m: K'a laa lɔ laarɔ ciro wɔɔ ʋ, kan mim ma laarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan laa haay kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a da a heer ʋ kɩ. K'a laarɔ wɔɔ lɔ a Zuuba da ʋ kan a heer kɩ haay.
49005020	Wakatɩ haay kan mim haay kɩ nɔ ʋ, k'a Zɩ Woso barka da, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
49005021	K'a yɛ kʋ ma, k'awɔɔ nɩ Krista daŋ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
49005022	Lannɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ a zino wɔɔ ma, amba awɔɔ nɩ yɛm Zuuba ma bɩ m.
49005023	Bala, lʋ minzaa n'a zim m, amba Krista n'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma bɩ minzaa bɩ m, Krista mɩŋŋa mɛ n'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m, an a mɛ bɩ bʋmbɔrɛzaa.
49005024	Bɩ, amba kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma bɩ nɩ yɛm Krista mɩŋŋa ma bɩ, lannɔ wɔɔ k'a yɛ a zino wɔɔ ma sɔ hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
49005025	Yaarɔ wɔɔ, k'a lannɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa, amba Krista a gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ ŋʋa an yɛ an a mɩŋŋa ka zɛ ma a tɔ ma bɩ m.
49005026	A a ba ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'a ka k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ Woso mɩm ʋ. A gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma hu a bɔ hi m kan a lemim kɩ m.
49005027	A ŋʋa a ʋ, k'a gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, hubɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, mɩŋŋabaa fasɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ kʋrɔma sɩ, gɛɛ hɔ bʋnyaa sɩ bɩ yɩ ʋ a gʋr zi y, k'an bɩr Woso soʋhɔ fasɩ, minsi bɩ yɩ ʋ a gʋr zi y.
49005028	Yaarɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, n n'a lannɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa ncɩnaaʋ, amba ŋn'a mɛ ŋʋam bɩ m. Gʋaa k'a n'a lʋ ŋʋam bɩ, a mɩŋŋa a n'a ŋʋam.
49005029	Gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ sɔrɛ a mɩŋŋa mɛ nɩ y, nyasʋ a nawʋm nɩ, an n'a tʋrm, amba Krista n n'a barɛ a gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m bɩ m.
49005030	K'a mɛ bɩ vəŋŋəro n wɔɔ m bɩ tɔ ma m, an nɩ nyasʋm wɔɔ m maam.
49005031	N y'a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Naa tɔ ma m, gʋaa n n'a gʋrɛ a zɩ kan a da kɩ ma, an a na a lʋ ma, ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya haay n a ba gʋaa deem.'
49005032	Mim naa do nɔyaa ta ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ m ʋ, Krista kan a gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ kɩ mim n y'a hɩ.
49005033	Bɩ, a hɩ n nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ, gʋaayar biyəə n a lʋ ŋʋa amba a a mɩŋŋa ŋʋa bɩ m, kʋ lʋ biyəə n a zim da ʋ sɔ.
49006001	Nyɩnɔ wɔɔ k'a a zɩrɔ wɔɔ lɛ si, amba Zuuba lɛ n taa bɩ m, a ga a ʋ m.
49006002	Lɛɛkarɛ lɛ kʋ Woso ler bɔ an a na ma bɩ ba n nɩ: 'Ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ.
49006003	Maam bɩ, ɩ mɩsɩrbaa nyɩnta yɩm, ɩ meeyaa jintə yɩm tara burə ʋ.'
49006004	Awɔɔ k'a m nyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ, a bɩ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ da nɔmaa ma y, bɩ k'a ŋ tʋr, a ŋ bɔ zaa ʋ, dʋndɔrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Zuuba zi m.
49006005	Awɔɔ kʋ lɔnnɔ n a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a zu a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʋ daʋrɛ gʋta m, kan a heer kɩ m haay, amba awɔɔ nɩ yɛm Krista ma bɩ m.
49006006	A bɩ ŋ zi ba kʋ ŋ nɩ dundore awɔɔ zi bɩ tɔ ma y, ɩ ʋ a ka awɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔ n yɩ a ra y. Bɩ k'a ŋ zi bɩ ba, kʋ Zuuba zibəənyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m a n nɩ zum Woso hɔɔnhɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
49006007	K'a a zuubɔɔ wɔɔ zi ba kan a heer kɩ haay, ɩ ʋ, Zuuba zi awɔɔ n'a bam gʋɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y.
49006008	Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, zi mɩŋŋa kʋ gʋaa n'a bam haay, Zuuba y'a zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʋ karɛ a zaa ʋ, baa k'a zaa bɩ lɔ m gɛɛ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa m.
49006009	Awɔɔ kʋ lɔnnɔ soʋrezannɔ n'awɔɔ n nɔ wɔɔ, k'a ba maam sɔ a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ m, a bɩ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ y. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ kan a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ Zuuba bɩ deem an nɩ brama, b'a bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
49006010	Meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a nyambʋrm nɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: k'a a paŋŋa da ra Zuuba zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, a paŋŋa gʋta bɩ nɔ ʋ.
49006011	K'a yarmɔdrɔ kʋ Woso nɩ ŋ karɛ a ʋ bɩ da a ma, k'a a da ma a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Sʋtaana hɔɔnkarɛrɔ zibəə bɩ lɛ ʋ.
49006012	Gʋɔɔ bɛɛ wɔɔ nɩ yar bɩ bam kan ŋ kɩ y. A ba wɔɔ nawʋm kan zinəro kɩ, kan lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ paŋŋa bam, ŋ n'a so lɛɛrɔ ʋ, ŋ n'a so durnya naa do kʋ monsigə n b'ʋ, ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
49006013	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a Woso yar mɔdrɔ wɔɔ da a ma. K'a wɔ ʋ, a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ dɔmɩm bʋnyaa hinni ʋ, a a da jɩm bɩ lɛ ʋ, a yar ba paan••• a a da ma, k'a gɔɔta a jɩm a gam la.
49006014	K'a a banka a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ. K'a sɩra so a mɔr ʋ, am hɔsoaʋ hɔ bɩ m, k'a bɩr tɩrgabaa m, goŋŋo kʋ n n'a dure a ma n bɩ, k'a du a ma.
49006015	Lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɩ laafɩɩ kam, k'a pa da kaarɛ-kaarɛ, kʋsɔ n bɩ awɔɔ n'a daŋ ʋ.
49006016	K'a bɩr sɩrakarɛ m, goŋŋo kʋ n n'a tarɛ a m n bɩ sɔ, awɔɔ nɩ bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩ karɔ kʋ sɛwurə n ta ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ linlihim nɩ.
49006017	Bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, yarbarɛ firgə m, k'a ku a mim ma. K'a Woso lemim bɩ sa sɔ, yarbarɛ kargʋ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
49006018	K'a yaa da wakatɩ haay. K'a yaadarɛ do haay da Sɛnt-Ɛspri daahan nɔ ʋ. A bɩ kɔ kan yaa bɩ darɛ kɩ y, k'a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••. K'a yaa da wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma sɔ.
49006019	K'a yaa da mɔɔ tɔ ma sɔ, kʋ Woso n a lemim da m lɛ ʋ, kʋ m a pa da kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, kʋ m hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da lemim nyɩnta nɔ ʋ bɩ hɩ fasɩ-fasɩ.
49006020	Mɔɔ bɔ Woso ʋ kʋ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da, baa kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa. Naa minto bɩ, k'a yaa da Woso m mɔɔ tɔ ma, kʋ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da amba a a ga m bɩ m.
49006021	Tisikkɩ mɔɔ mim dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ dɔ. Wɔɔ danyɩ m, ʋ n'a ŋʋam, an nɩ Zuuba zi bam mɩŋŋa.
49006022	A nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma tɔkkɛ, k'an bɩ mɔɔ mim dɩnda awɔɔ m, an awɔɔ heer yo.
49006023	Bɩ kʋ Zɩ Woso, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ m laafɩɩ kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ ka ʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay ʋ.
49006024	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista ŋʋam, ŋʋarɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ, kʋ Woso n ŋ barka da ʋ.
50001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol kan Timote kɩ bɩ, Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m, ci bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʋm wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ Filipii kʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, kan a lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ kan a daahanzannɔ kɩ ma.
50001002	A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka a ʋ.
50001003	Kʋ mɔɔ tɩr m hɔɔn da awɔɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ yaa da Woso m barka awɔɔ tɔ ma.
50001004	Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma, a da mɔɔ n nawʋm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
50001005	Bala, awɔɔ jɩm mɔɔ m paan••• lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ nɔ ʋ hallɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ an ta an her ku.
50001006	Mɔɔ dɔ fasɩ m ʋ: zi mɩŋŋa kʋ Woso a sɩŋŋɩda ba awɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ, a tam lɛɛ an tolle ba an zibəə bɩ do nyambʋr Krista Yeezuu wusigəre hinni ʋ.
50001007	A a ga m kʋ mɔɔ nɩ m hɔɔn da awɔɔ haay ma ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta bɩ minto. Bala, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa ʋ naa, gɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa dam m n'a hɩnkam sɔ m ʋ, sɩra m bɩ, awɔɔ a na mɔɔ ma barka kʋ Woso a ka mɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
50001008	Denter m, Woso m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, a a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ gʋaa haay ŋʋam paan••• Krista Yeezuu ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
50001009	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a yɛm Woso han awɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ ŋʋarɛ n bɩr a dam la tee•••, k'awɔɔ m bɩr hɔdɔrɛ m, k'a a da ma a bɩr mim jɩ marɛ m.
50001010	K'a a da ma sɔ, a hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa dɔ a bɔ kʋ zi a ba. Maam bɩ, awɔɔ yɩm mɩŋŋa fasɩ, minsi bɩ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma hinni kʋ Krista n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ y.
50001011	Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, tɩrgabaa zibəəro y'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa hanm, an yɩ Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ kan a daʋrɛ kɩ.
50001012	M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, mim niŋŋə k'a mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, a da a ʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ ta lɛɛ han denter m.
50001013	Bala, mim bɩ do tɔ ma bɩ, Rɔm cir dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ sɔ a dɔ ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ du n y'a ʋ Krista tɔ ma.
50001014	Bɩ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa a da ra Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ dure bɩ tɔ ma, a a ka ŋ heer n kookoo gʋta, ŋn'ɩ Woso lemim bɩ pa dam bɩ nyibəə ba ŋ nɩ y.
50001015	Sɩra m, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam jɩmbaa kan bakʋmarɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ y'a pa dam noom hu m.
50001016	A pa bɩ da brɔɔ n nawʋm ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋ y'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa, lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ tɔ ma m.
50001017	Bɩ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, pa bɩ da brɔɔ n nawʋm noom kundə m, jɩmbaa nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, a mɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ bɩ gore daŋ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
50001018	Baa kʋ ŋ yɩ pa bɩ dam noom m gɛɛ sɩra nɩ, mɔɔ bɩr kɔm sɩ ma y, bala, Krista lemim bɩ n'a pa dam. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔrɛ, bɩ mɔɔ gɔɔtam m m heer nyɔɔ.
50001019	Bala, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, naa woo••• zɛm bɩ yɩ mɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ, awɔɔ yaadarɛ kan Yeezuu Krista Ɛspri daahan kɩ tɔ ma.
50001020	Bala, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ dɔm ma, m a ta m heer lɛ kan m paŋŋa kɩ haay bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ hɔsɩ nyannɩ n bɩ m nyasʋ y, mɔɔ gɔɔta m heerkoodəbaa m. Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ sɔ naa, amba dɔmɩm haay m bɩ, kʋ Krista n lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta yɩ m mɛ ʋ, m mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, gɛɛ m zɛ nɔ ʋ.
50001021	Bala, kan mɔɔ kɩ, Krista m mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa, zɛ b'ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔnyɩ m.
50001022	Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta tara burə ʋ kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa ba, a y'a kam m zi ba gʋɔɔ daahan tɔ ma. Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ kara mɔɔ n'a bɔŋ ʋ y.
50001023	Hɔ hɩɩya naa nɩ mɔɔ gaarɛ: Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m m hʋr, m ta m bɩr kan Krista kɩ. Bɩ n mɩŋŋa mɔɔ ma an lɛ da paan•••.
50001024	Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta tara burə ʋ naa ʋ sɔ, a yɩrɛ awɔɔ daahan gʋta.
50001025	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ paan•••, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ gɔɔtam mɩsɩr, m bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ k'awɔɔ n ta lɛɛ, a bɩr heernyɔɔ m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.
50001026	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ m bɔ m bʋr awɔɔ zi, awɔɔ y'a heer nyɔɔm a a lɛ bɔ Krista Yeezuu ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ tɔ ma.
50001027	Bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba amba Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ m. Maam bɩ kʋ mɔɔ wɔ ʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi, gɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ n m da ma, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim mam, m a dɔ m ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ a lɛ n deem, an nɩ zoo bam heer deem m, kʋ sɩrakarɛ kʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ n'a kam bɩ n ta lɛɛ.
50001028	A bɩ yɛ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ n nyibəə da a ma fɩɩga y. Bɩ n'a karɛ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a nyaam, b'awɔɔ ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ m. Bɩ naa do naa, a to a ʋ, Woso zi.
50001029	Bala, mimbirenyɩnta kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka ʋ bɛɛ n a deem y, bɩ k'awɔɔ n fɩr yɩ a tɔ ma sɔ.
50001030	Awɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, zoo deem wɔɔ m tara ʋ n'a bam. Zoo deem bɩ do mɔɔ ba biisi awɔɔ mɩm la bɩ, bɩ, awɔɔ dɔ, a mɩŋŋa mɔɔ gɔɔta m m ta ra.
50002001	Zɛkʋra k'awɔɔ n ta m kan Krista kɩ bɩ, a bɩr awɔɔ heerkoodəbaa dam la ra? Awɔɔ ŋʋa k'a nawʋm bɩ bɩr awɔɔ heer yom na? Awɔɔ n a zɛ kʋ ra Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ ra? Awɔɔ ɩ kʋ ŋʋam an nɩ kʋ cicir zɛm, gɛɛ lɔ?
50002002	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a kʋ ma, a a lɛ ba deem, a bɩr ŋʋarɛ deem m, a bɩr hɔɔn deem m. Maam bɩ, mɔɔ heernyɔɔ yɩm fasɩ.
50002003	A bɩ hɔsɩ ba jɩmbaa nɩ y, b'a bɩ hɔsɩ ba k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ hɩnka y, naa nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y. Bɩ, gʋaa biyəə n a mɩŋŋa zer a muno taa, a ʋ, ŋ lɛ da a m.
50002004	A b'a ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan ma bala y, k'a a ka a muno daahan ma sɔ.
50002005	K'a bɩr hɔɔn kʋ Krista Yeezuu n ta m bɩ m kan kʋ kɩ.
50002006	A mɩŋŋa kan Woso kɩ bɩ, ŋ deem, bɩ, a n a ka ma wʋɩɩn••• kan paŋŋa kɩ, k'a gɔɔta a a ga kʋ ʋ kan Woso kɩ y.
50002007	Bɩ, a yɛ an hɔ haay to, an a ba zibəənyɩ, a ba a ʋ gʋaa, am gʋaa woo••• hɔ bɩ m. A n yɩ amba gʋɔɔ n nɩ yɩm bɩ m.
50002008	A a mɩŋŋa ba poore, an yɛ Woso ma, an tolle ba an yɛ an ga, b'a zɛ bɩ, zɛ bʋnyaa m, ga a ʋ, gɔdarkʋra ma.
50002009	Naa k'a a ba bɩ minto bɩ, Woso a gore da ʋ, an cem haay, an tɔ k'a nɩ tɔrɔ haay woo••• burə ʋ bɩ ka ma.
50002010	A ba a ʋ maam kʋ Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ, kʋ kunkonno haay kʋ ŋ nɩ brama kan tara burə ʋ kɩ, tara noom kɩ ʋ, n kukurə zɛ.
50002011	Kʋ nɛɛm haay n a bɔ a lɛ ma a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista m Zuuba, bɩ nɩ yɩm Zɩ Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ.
50002012	M ŋʋarɛ gʋɔɔ, nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm Woso ma tee•••. Bɩ, dɩɩtaa naa, mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ b'ʋ y. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'a banka a yɛ ma gʋta. K'a bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ zi ba, nyi ba Woso m, kan mɛhinkə kɩ nɔ ʋ.
50002013	Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa nɩ zi barɛ awɔɔ ʋ, an n'a kam awɔɔ nɩ lɛtaama m kan paŋŋa kɩ m, k'a hɔ k'a ga kʋ ʋ kan a hɔɔnhɔ kɩ bɩ ba.
50002014	Kʋ zibəə kara n ta ʋ, k'a ba, a bɩ kukur ba, b'a bɩ bɩsɩ ka a barɛ nɔ ʋ y.
50002015	Maam bɩ, awɔɔ yɩm noonhuzannɔ, gɔsɩ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩrɛ an a hɩ awɔɔ ma y. Awɔɔ yɩm Woso nyɩnɔ kʋ mim daŋŋada sɩ ba ŋ ma y, a n nɩ durnya naa do gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ vɔn, ŋnɩ zibʋnyaabənno nɔɔm bire ʋ. Awɔɔ a ga m, a yɔ ŋ bire ʋ am fɩtɩrɛrɔ m.
50002016	Bala, awɔɔ n ta mɩsɩrbaa lemim bɩ m, an n'a pa darɛ ŋ nɩ. K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, bɩ n n'a kam awɔɔ n yɩ mɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ, hinni kʋ Krista n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ. Bala, bɩ n n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, mɔɔ zibəə bɩ, kan mɔɔ kɔrɛ bɩ kɩ n yɩ vam y.
50002017	Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, mannɩ awɔɔ n'a kam Woso ʋ. A a da ma, n nɩ mɔɔ zɛ gər, bɩ k'a yɩ maam m meeyaa bɩ mɔɔ na awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ mannɩ bɩ ma. Bɩ, a yɩm mɔɔ ma heernyɔɔ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔm kan awɔɔ kɩ.
50002018	A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a heer nyɔɔ, a heernyɔɔ ba kan mɔɔ kɩ.
50002019	Kan Zuuba Yeezuu daahan kɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam kʋ m Timote nyɔɔ awɔɔ zi zɔɔ. Maam bɩ, k'a b'a bɔ an bʋr, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim mam sɔ m heer koodə yɩ.
50002020	Gɔsɩ vanta ba naa ʋ, an n'a hɔɔn dam, an nɩ kɔrɛ awɔɔ mim ma kan mɔɔ kɩ y.
50002021	Ŋ woo••• naa, a ka ŋ nawʋrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan ma, ŋ bɩr a kam Yeezuu Krista hɔɔnhɔ ma y.
50002022	Bɩ, kʋ Timote nɩ, awɔɔ sɩra bɩ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, a nyɩnta kan mɔɔ kɩ amba nyɩ tɩr kan a zɩ kɩ bɩ m, ʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ zi ba.
50002023	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ m mim bɩ zaa yɩ, a mɩŋŋa mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ ma zɔɔ-zɔɔ.
50002024	Mɔɔ sɩra ka Zuuba nɔ ʋ, m a dɔ m ʋ, mɔɔ zɛm sɔ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ zɔɔ.
50002025	Bɩ mɔɔ y'a gɩngam kɛɛrɛ mɔɔ ʋ, pakra m kʋ m Epafrodit da zaa ra awɔɔ m, mɔɔ danyɩ m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m, mɔɔ zoobarɛkɔɔn m sɔ. Awɔɔ y'a nyɔɔ mɔɔ ma, k'an b'a da mɔɔ han.
50002026	A y'a ŋʋam paan••• k'a a ya, a awɔɔ yɩ haay, a ma k'a ʋ, n ʋ, awɔɔ a yaaba bɩ ma bɩ, a heer a zar gʋta.
50002027	Denter m, a yaaba zɛ an a yo k'a ga, Woso a cicir zɛ, b'a deem bɛɛ Woso a cicir zɛ y, mɔɔ cicir a a zɛ sɔ, kʋ mɔɔ heerzarlɛ b'a da ra y.
50002028	Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a darɛ awɔɔ m zaa ra zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'awɔɔ n a yɩ, a heernyɔɔ ba, kʋ mɔɔ heerzar bɩ n'a bɔrɛ sɔ.
50002029	K'a bɩ lee ku, k'a si kan heernyɔɔ gʋta kɩ Zuuba nɔ ʋ. K'a gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ da ʋ.
50002030	Bala, a a yo k'a ga Krista zibəə bɩ tɔ ma, a a meeyaa ka zɛ ma, k'a a da ma, a zi k'awɔɔ a ga m a ba mɔɔ m bɩ ba awɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ.
50003001	Kɛɛrɛ naa, m danyɩnɔ, k'a a heer nyɔɔ, k'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan Zuuba kɩ bɩ tɔ ma. Meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ mɔɔ m ya m nɩ sore ŋ la, bɩ naa bɩr mɔɔ kɔrɛ y, bala, a y'a darɛ awɔɔ han.
50003002	K'a dundo a zi kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, jino m, ŋʋaar baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ bɩ hɔdɩndarɛzannɔ m, k'a dundo a zi kan ŋ kɩ.
50003003	Wɔɔ nɩ baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ paan••• bɩ zi bam. Bala, zu wɔɔ nawʋm Woso ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m. Krista Yeezuu n wɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ, wɔɔ bɩr yom zɩɩfʋrɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ ma k'ʋ lɛ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ y.
50003004	A n bɔkarɛ, mɔɔ m da ma m yo yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ duro ma sɔ. Kʋ gʋaa y'a gɩngarɛ a ʋ, a hɔ yɩm yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ zibəə nɔ ʋ, k'a maam mɔɔ ɩ lɛ da.
50003005	Mɔɔ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm sinnyə hinni ʋ, m mɔɔ gasʋ ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. Israyɛl gʋaa paan••• m mɔɔ m, Bɛnzamɛn do gʋaa m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ haay zɩɩfʋrɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ. Kʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure nɩ, nyɩnta mɔɔ ʋ farizɛn m nɩ zure ŋ ʋ paan•••.
50003006	Wɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ŋʋa gʋta bɩ, a a ka mɔɔ m fɩr ka kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ ma. Kʋ tɩrgabaa kʋ n n'a kam ma lɛrɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta mɩŋŋa fasɩ, gɔsɩ n mim yɩ k'a hɩ mɔɔ ma y.
50003007	A n bɔkarɛ, hɔɔ nɔɔn duro kʋ ŋ nyɔɔdʋ n ta mɔɔ ma biisi bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma dore hɔɔ kɛɛrɛ, Krista kʋ mɔɔ dɔ bɩ tɔ ma.
50003008	Sɩra m, mɔɔ ɩ dɩgam hɔ haay woo••• ma dore hɔ, mɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu dɔrɛ mɩŋŋabaa k'a lɛ da hɔ haay ra bɩ tɔ ma. A tɔ ma m mɔɔ m hɔ haay to, m nɩ dɩgam hɔɔ wɔɔ duro ma bʋtʋrɔ, kʋ Krista n yɩ mɔɔ hɔ haay.
50003009	K'an a so mɔɔ ʋ jilli sɔ. Mɔɔ bɩr a gɩngam dɔ, mɔɔ ʋ, m tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma y. Sɩra kʋ mɔɔ ka Krista ʋ b'ɩ mɔɔ ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ. Tɩrgabaa kʋ Woso n'a kam sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ m.
50003010	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma bɩ, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ m Krista mɩŋŋa dɔ, kʋ m a mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ paŋŋa dɔ. Kʋ m m na ma a fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɔ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ a zɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
50003011	K'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ m da ma sɔ, m bɩ m mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.
50003012	Mɔɔ n a hɩ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma bɩ yɩ m wɔ ʋ wa. Gɛɛ, mɔɔ m ba mɩŋŋa fasɩ wa. Bɩ, m tɔ mɔɔ nawʋŋ ʋ, kʋ m brasire ganwʋrɛ bɩ ku m wɔ ʋ, bala, Krista-Yeezuu mɔɔ ku a wɔ ʋ.
50003013	Ayy••• m danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ bɩr a gɩngarɛ m ʋ, mɔɔ brasire ganwʋrɛ bɩ ku m wɔ ʋ y. Bɩ hɔ deem mɔɔ n'a bam, hɔ k'a ba an cem bɩ bɔ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ m nɔ ʋ, m nɩ m tɔŋ ʋ kʋ m hɔ k'a nɩ lɛɛ bɩ ku.
50003014	M tɔ mɔɔ nawʋŋ ʋ, kʋ m hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta wɔɔ m lɛɛ bɩ ku. Brasire ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso wɔɔ bir ma Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, k'a b'a ka wɔɔ ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ m.
50003015	Wɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'ʋ yaa ka sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ʋ bɩr hɔɔndarɛ deem naa m. Bɩ, k'awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a hɔ, mim naa do nɔ ʋ, Woso y'awɔɔ hɔɔn gum ma.
50003016	Bɩ, hɔ k'an ta ʋ bɩ, ʋ gɔɔta ʋ bɩr tam lɛɛ kan kʋ kɩ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
50003017	M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ haay k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa, k'a dɩga gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa bam am wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ hɔbaa ŋ y'a sa.
50003018	Gʋɔɔ gʋta, ŋn'a mɩsɩrbaa bam ɩ ʋ, Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ jɩnnɔ m. Mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m hɔɔ gallɛm hɔka, m m ya m nɩ som la kɛɛrɛ kan nyikəre kɩ.
50003019	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, nyaanlɛ m, ŋ nɔ nɩ ŋ woso, hɔ k'a nyannɩ n ta ʋ bɩ n ŋ lɛbɔʋrɛ, durnya naa do hɔ ŋn'a hɔɔn dam ma bala.
50003020	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ kʋ bɩ m arzana m. Wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kʋ wɔɔ nɩ dɔm ma bɩ, a to a nawʋm arzana ʋ b'ʋ an bʋr.
50003021	K'a bɩ bʋr, a wɔɔ mɛrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ rɔ nɔɔm lʋrlɛ, an ŋ ba, an a mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ mɛ bɩ m. Naa ba a nawʋm paŋŋa k'an ta m k'a a so hɔ haay ʋ bɩ m.
50004001	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Zuuba nɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m m ya m awɔɔ yɩ, mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm awɔɔ tɔ ma, awɔɔ m mɔɔ zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʋ.
50004002	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kan m heer kɩ haay Evodi kan Sɩntɩsɩ kɩ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋ ma mɩŋŋa, Zuuba nɔ ʋ.
50004003	Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn paan••• bɩ, ɩ da ŋ han, bala, ŋ y'a na mɔɔ ma ʋ zoo ba lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ nɔ ʋ. Lannɔ nɔɔn duro, kan Kleman kɩ, kan mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ y'a na mɔɔ ma ʋ zoo bɩ ba. Ŋ haay tɔrɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ.
50004004	K'a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm Zuuba nɔ ʋ, dɔmɩm haay. Kʋ m m ya m so ra, k'a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm.
50004005	K'a bɩr bʋgʋ-bʋgʋ kan gʋaa woo••• kɩ. Zuuba wusigəre dɔmɩm a zɔ.
50004006	A b'a heer kɔ hɔsɩ mim ma y, bɩ mim haay nɔ ʋ, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa ma bɩ yɛ Woso han, a a wɔ zɩnzɛ m, bɩ, k'a yaa dam barka sɔ.
50004007	Maam bɩ, Woso y'a laafɩɩ k'a cem hɔ haay kʋ gʋaa n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ han bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ. Bɩ laafɩɩ bɩ do dɔrɛ awɔɔ heerlɔ kan awɔɔ hɔɔndarɛrɔ kɩ ma Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ.
50004008	M danyɩnɔ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ: K'a a tɔ ʋ a bɩr hɔ k'an sɩra, an ta daʋrɛ m, an tɩrga m. A a tɔ ʋ a bɩr hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa, an a ga ŋʋarɛ m, a goredaʋrɛ n ta ʋ, hɔ kʋ zorebaa m fasɩ, an a ga lɛbɔʋrɛ m bɩ m.
50004009	Hɔ haay k'awɔɔ dɩnda mɔɔ zi, a si, a ma, gɛɛ a yɩ mɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ, k'a sa a zi ba m. K'awɔɔ ba maam, Woso k'a nɩ heer laafɩɩ kam wɔɔ ʋ bɩ bam bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
50004010	Mɔɔ m heernyɔɔ gʋta Zuuba nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ a ya, a a da mɔɔ han bɩ tɔ ma. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam mɔɔ ma hɔɔ, bɩ, daahan bɩ dɔmɩm b'ɩ n'a a zaa ka y.
50004011	Hɔ bɛɛ ɩ jɩra mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʋ y. Bala mɔɔ minkə m, m nɩ m zergam hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n ta m bɩ rɛ, k'a gʋta gɛɛ k'a poore, a bɩ mim kan mɔɔ kɩ y.
50004012	Mɔɔ wɔ ʋ, m nɩ m mɩsɩrbaa bam ŋʋazaabaa nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ wɔ ʋ, m n'a bam sɔ hɔtaʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. Lɛɛ haay ʋ, wakatɩ haay nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ m da ma m mɩsɩrbaa ba, kʋ mɔɔ hɔ bɩ an m ka, gɛɛ kʋ nɔ ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, hɔtaʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, gɛɛ hɔjɩrarɛ nɔ ʋ.
50004013	Mɔɔ m da ma, m naa haay ba, Krista k'a nɩ paŋŋa kam mɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
50004014	Bɩ, a da k'awɔɔ ʋ mɔɔ han m kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ naa, awɔɔ ba mɩŋŋa.
50004015	Filipii zannɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, m hʋr kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Masedʋan kʋ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ sɩŋŋɩda dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a deem ɩ nyɩnta kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ barla, a a da mɔɔ han, hɔ ka kʋ ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
50004016	Baa kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta Tesaloniki ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ daahan nyɔɔ mɔɔ ma gallɛm hɔka, hɔ k'a jɩra mɔɔ ma dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ.
50004017	M ka bɛɛ mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ n nɩ bɩr hɔ karɛ m ʋ y. Bɩ, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma, k'awɔɔ n hɔ k'awɔɔ ba bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ gʋta.
50004018	Hɔ k'awɔɔ ka haay bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ, a bɔ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ la m. Hɔ k'awɔɔ ka Epafroditɩ ʋ k'an b'a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ, hɔsɩ n jɩra mɔɔ ma dɔ y. Ganwʋrɛrɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, bɔ ŋ y'a a ʋ kʋ rɛ kan mannɩ k'a ji n nyɩnta Woso ma, an a ŋʋa an a si kɩ.
50004019	Bɩ, mɔɔ Zɩ Woso hɔnyɩ gʋtabaa cem haay, a hɔ k'a jɩra awɔɔ ma haay karɛ awɔɔ ʋ gʋta, Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma.
50004020	Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
50004021	K'a yaa da wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm Krista Yeezuu ma rɔ wɔɔ m. Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ a m.
50004022	Wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ yaa darɛ a m, an lɛ da bɩ, Rɔm cir hargʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
50004023	Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
51001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ kʋ m yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa. Mɔɔ kan wɔɔ danyɩ Timote kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ barɛ awɔɔ ma.
51001002	Awɔɔ, kʋ wosogʋɔɔ n'a mɩ, an nɩ Kolɔɔsɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ danyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m Krista nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ tarɛ a lɛ ra. A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
51001003	Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m awɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam nɩ barka dɔmɩm haay.
51001004	Wɔɔ ma denter n n'awɔɔ sɩra ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ mim hɩm, kan ŋʋarɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma bɩ mim kɩ.
51001005	Awɔɔ ɩ sɩrakarɛ m, a n nɩ ŋʋarɛ m, bala, Woso hɔ cɩnta awɔɔ m arzana ʋ, awɔɔ n a ta a heer lɛ. Bɩ lemim nyɩnta kʋ n y'a pa da awɔɔ m, a m sɩra lemim b'ɩ taaheerlɛ bɩ do ka awɔɔ ʋ.
51001006	Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do ɩ tam durnya lɛɛ haay ʋ, an nɩ nyɩ dam, an n'a kərgum lɛɛ ra, amb'a a ba awɔɔ zi, Woso barka mim k'awɔɔ ma bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ saa•••, a b'a dɔ a ʋ, barka paan••• m bɩ.
51001007	Wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn Epafras naa do dɩnda awɔɔ m, wɔɔ gʋaasɩba m, Krista zibəənyɩ m, a m taalɛrazaa, zi bɩ ba a nawʋm kan awɔɔ kɩ wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ.
51001008	A ɩ ŋʋarɛ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a da awɔɔ heer ʋ bɩ mim hɩ wɔɔ m.
51001009	Bɩ y'a ka, hinni kʋ wɔɔ naa ma ʋ bɩ tɛkka ma, wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma dɔmɩm haay. A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm Woso han, k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n a hɔɔnhɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, a bɩr Sɛnt-Ɛspri mindɔrɛ m kan a hɔdɔrɛ kɩ m.
51001010	Maam bɩ, awɔɔ y'a dam ma, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a Zuuba nɔ yɩ bɩ ba, a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ. Naa n'a kam awɔɔ n zi mɩŋŋa do haay ba, a ta lɛɛ Woso dɔrɛ nɔ ʋ.
51001011	Wɔɔ y'a yɛm han sɔ k'an awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra, a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa k'a cem hɔ haay han bɩ m. K'awɔɔ n a da ma a bɩr a tʋntɔŋ ʋ, a bʋr a ma hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
51001012	K'a Zɩ Woso barka da kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, a ɩ zaa ka k'awɔɔ n hɔjirle yɩ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛgure nɔ ʋ.
51001013	A wɔɔ yɔ monsigə paŋŋa wɔ ʋ, an ta wɔɔ m a Nyɩ k'a n'a ŋʋam bɩ cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
51001014	A Nyɩ bɩ tɔ ma m, Woso wɔɔ bʋmbɔ, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ.
51001015	Gɔsɩ bɩr Woso yɩrɛ y, bɩ kʋ gʋaa Yeezuu yɩ, k'a lʋnlɔ Woso maam. A m lɛɛkarɛzaa an nɩ hɔ haay kʋ Woso a da bɩ burə ʋ.
51001016	Bala, zu Woso ʋ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ an hɔ haay da, brama ʋ kan tara burə ʋ kɩ, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩm mɩm ʋ kan hɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɩm kɩ, cirbəəro, kan lɛɛsoʋrezannɔ kɩ, lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, paŋŋazannɔ kɩ. Zu Woso ʋ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ an hɔ haay da, an a ka ʋ, an a so ʋ.
51001017	A ɩ lɛɛ ka an ta ʋ, hɔ haay lɛɛ, a tɔ ma m hɔ haay n gɔɔta an a bɩncɛ ʋ.
51001018	A mɩŋŋa n a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma bɩ minzaa. A m lɛɛkarɛzaa, a ɩ lɛɛ ka an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr hɔ haay lɛɛ, hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
51001019	Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa y'a ŋʋa k'an yɩ an a mɩŋŋa m jilli.
51001020	Woso a cɩnta, k'a hɔ haay zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ a Nyɩ bɩ tɔ ma, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama kan tara burə ʋ kɩ, ga k'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ tɔ ma.
51001021	B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ nyɩnta biisi a m laatʋ Woso ma, zibəə bʋnyaarɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma, a nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ a ka, awɔɔ n a ba a jɩnnɔ.
51001022	Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso awɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ a Nyɩ bɩ k'a ga mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma. A ba a ʋ maam, k'awɔɔ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ, k'awɔɔ n bɩr mɩŋŋabaa nɔ ʋ, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta awɔɔ gʋr zi y. Kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ mim yɩ k'a hɩ awɔɔ ma y.
51001023	Bɩ, a y'awɔɔ ma k'awɔɔ n gɔɔta a bɩr sɩra kam, a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a b'a to kʋ hɔsɩ n awɔɔ gʋ taaheerlɛ kʋ lemim nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ma b'a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ ma y. N lemim nyɩnta bɩ do pa da gʋaa haay m durnya nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, m ba mɔɔ ʋ a zibəənyɩ.
51001024	Kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔm fɩr kʋ mɔɔ n'a yɩm k'awɔɔ n daahan yɩ a nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma. Bɩ, mɔɔ gɔɔta m nɩ Krista fɩryɩrɛ bɩ yɩrɛ m mɛ ʋ, a mɛ bɩ tɔ ma, naa k'a hɩ a ʋ, a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma.
51001025	Zibəə kʋ Woso a da mɔɔ wɔ ʋ kʋ m a ba k'awɔɔ n daahan yɩ bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ m ba kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ zibəənyɩ, kʋ m Woso lemim bɩ pa da jilli, gʋaa haay m.
51001026	Lemim bɩ do bɩ, hɔ kʋ Woso a nyaakʋm da biisi tee••• bɩ m. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso a hɩnka a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
51001027	A ŋʋa a ʋ, k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m hɔ k'a a nyaakʋm da, am gʋta, a gore n ta ʋ, k'a ka do vantɔɔ haay ʋ bɩ dɔ. Hɔ bɩ do ba n nɩ: Krista y'awɔɔ heer ʋ, k'a maam, awɔɔ ɩ taaheerlɛ m, a ʋ, a nyɩntam Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
51001028	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ nɩ Krista pa dam gʋaa haay m. Ʋ nɩ gʋaa biyəə bɔ n zaa ʋ, ʋ nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋaa biyəə m, mindɔrɛ haay nɔ ʋ. K'a ka kʋ gʋaa biyəə n yɩ amba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
51001029	Naa mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ zi bam, m nɩ zoo bam Krista paŋŋa k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ zi bam mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ʋ bɩ m.
51002001	Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n zoo kɔɔda kʋ mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma, kan Lawodisee zannɔ kɩ tɔ ma, kan gʋɔɔ cir kʋ ŋ n mɔɔ yɩ a mɩm m fɩɩgaa rɔ wɔɔ kɩ tɔ ma bɩ dɔ.
51002002	Zoo bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ ŋ nɩ heer koodə yɩ, kʋ ŋ lɛ n bɩr deem ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra dɔ fasɩ, ŋnɩ heer koodə yɩ a nɔ ʋ. Maam bɩ, ŋ hɔ kʋ Woso a nyaakʋm da biisi bɩ dɔm. Hɔ bɩ do bɩ, Krista m.
51002003	A mɩŋŋa n ta mindɔrɛ hɔnyɩ haay woo••• kan hɔdɔrɛ haay woo••• kɩ m.
51002004	Naa hɩ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ bra bɩmba awɔɔ m meerbaa nyɩntɔɔ nɩ y.
51002005	Sɩra m, mɔɔ ba b'ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ heer ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, m nɩ m heer nyɔɔm k'awɔɔ nɩ jɩnɩm kan kʋ kɩ kɔɔkɔɔ a sɩra ka Krista ʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
51002006	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'awɔɔ Krista Yeezuu si k'an yɩ a Zuuba bɩ, k'a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee••• kan kɩ a zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
51002007	K'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ a yaa ka a nɔ ʋ, a a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ dɔ ra am cɛ hɔ bɩ m. A nyasʋ a sɩrakarɛ bɩ m kɔɔkɔɔ, amba n y'a dɩnda awɔɔ n bɩ m, a bɩr yaa dam Woso m barka kan a heer kɩ haay.
51002008	K'a a dundo a zi, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ bra bɩmba a m, gʋɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ yaarsɩ nɩ y. Gʋɔɔ minkəm hɔdɔrɛ m, durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ hɔ m, a n a to Krista zi y.
51002009	Bala, Woso k'an lʋnlɔ haay bɩ, Krista maam sɔ a mɛsim nɔ ʋ.
51002010	K'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ haay m, a mɩŋŋa nɩ lɛɛzannɔ kan paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɩm mɩm m nɔ wɔɔ burə ʋ.
51002011	K'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ bɩ, n y'awɔɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, bɩ gʋɔɔ baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ bɩ bɛɛ y, Krista y'awɔɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ bɩ do ʋ, awɔɔ yɔ k'a ʋ mɛsim k'an awɔɔ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma bɩ wɔ ʋ bɩ m.
51002012	Batɛm kʋ n y'a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ bir n y'a ʋ kan Krista kɩ, awɔɔ n a mɩm bɔ ʋ kan kɩ sɔ, k'awɔɔ sɩra ka Woso paŋŋa k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ tɔ ma m.
51002013	Biisi bɩ, gəəno n'awɔɔ m a mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ ba zɩɩfʋrɔ do barla bɩ tɔ ma sɔ. Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso awɔɔ mɩm bɔ ʋ kan Krista kɩ, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ haay sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ.
51002014	Biisi bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ kʋrɔma nɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n zu Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ Krista bɩ, a mim k'a nɩ wɔɔ yɩm wɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ ciro wɔɔ zaar ba, a wɔ a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma.
51002015	A lɛɛzannɔ kan paŋŋazannɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩr ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa da, an nyannɩ da ŋ ma garga ra, kʋ gʋɔɔ n ŋ yɩ, a bʋr ŋ la, an ŋ gɩngaata a jɛ ʋ, an yirbə si ŋ nɩ.
51002016	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a b'a to gɔsɩ n'awɔɔ dʋdɔ yar, hɔbɩrɛ, gɛɛ hɔmire, gɛɛ cibsarɔ bɩrɛ mim ma, gɛɛ mom daarɔ kan sabaa dɔmɩnnɔ kɩ mim ma y.
51002017	Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay bɩ, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ga m ŋnɩ bʋr lɔ wɔɔ ŋn'a hɩnkam, hɔɔ paan•••rɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y. Hɔ paan••• bɩ, Krista m.
51002018	A b'a to gɔsɩ n a ka a ter bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ ma y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɛ dam kɔrɛ ma, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam malɛɛkarɔ m, ŋn'ɩ hɔhɩnkarɛrɔ mim dɩndam can rɔ wɔɔ m. Mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ vam, a hɔɔn ŋ n'a darɛ am gʋɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
51002019	Ŋ n gɔɔta n a kʋsɩ Krista ma y, an bɔkarɛ, bɩ m minzaa. Krista tɔ ma m, mɛ bɩ jilli nɩ tʋrlɛ yɩm, an n'a kam mɛ bɩ n deem, mɛ bɩ məsiro kan a kunəro kɩ tɔ ma, an nɩ mam amba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m.
51002020	K'awɔɔ gɩnga kan Krista kɩ bɩ, durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ n a so awɔɔ ʋ dɔ y, bɔ m kɛɛrɛ awɔɔ n'a mɩsɩrbaa bam ɩ ʋ, durnya gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ? Bɔ m awɔɔ nɩ yɛrɛ gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ dam lɛrɔ zuure ʋ?
51002021	N n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: Ɩ bɩ hɔ naa do sa y, ɩ bɩ naa da ɩ lɛ ma y, ɩ b'ɩ wɔ da naa do ma y.
51002022	Lɛrɔ nɔɔn duro haay gʋɔɔ hɔɔ m, hɔɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ zi barɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋnɩ nyam mim ŋn'a dɩndam.
51002023	Sɩra m, kʋ gʋaa dɩga lɛrɔ nɔɔn duro ma, b'a ʋ hɔɔntaʋrɛ hɔɔ m, bala, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ n yaa da, ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer, ŋnɩ fɩr ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, an bɔkarɛ, nawɔnnɔ haay naa, ŋ bɩr a dam gʋaa han k'an bʋr a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ma y.
51003001	K'awɔɔ a mɩm bɔ ʋ kan Krista kɩ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ, k'a ka hɔɔ kʋ mim ʋ hɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ma, lɛɛ kʋ Krista n ta ʋ Woso bɩsɩ ra ʋ bɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ.
51003002	K'a bɩr a hɔɔn dam arzana hɔɔ ma, a b'a hɔɔn da durnya hɔɔ ma y.
51003003	Bala, awɔɔ gɩnga, awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa n'a nyaakʋm da Woso zi kan Krista kɩ.
51003004	Kʋ Krista n'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ, k'a b'a hɩnka, a y'awɔɔ hɩnkam sɔ kan a kɩ, a nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
51003005	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'a hɔ kʋ tara burə hɔ m an awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ʋ bɩ zɛ. Hɔɔ wɔɔ duro ba n nɩ: Jaandarɛ m, lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔ barɛ m, lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ n'a som gʋɔɔ ʋ m, mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ kama m, mɩnyɔɔ m, mɩnyɔɔ bɩ, wosobaawɔnnɔ yaadarɛ do vanta m bɩ.
51003006	Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ zɛm Woso nɔmaa m gʋɔɔ [kʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ] zi.
51003007	Naa awɔɔ n'a bam biisi a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ.
51003008	Kɛɛrɛ naa, k'a a bɔ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ haay. A bɩ nɔmaa ba y, a b'a heer der y, a bɩ bʋnyaabaa ba y, a bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y, a bɩ dintim meerbaarɔ ba y.
51003009	A bɩ ŋʋaar ba kʋ nɩ y, bala, awɔɔ a bɔ a mɩsɩrbaa gusire b'ʋ, kan a zibəəro bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ.
51003010	Mɩsɩrbaa daa awɔɔ n ta m kɛɛrɛ, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do, a lʋr a nawʋm tee••• an nɩ bɔm kʋ ʋ kan a darɛzaa bɩ kɩ. Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ n Woso bɩ dɔ fasɩ.
51003011	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, jirəbɔrɛ ba ʋ dɔ, zɩɩfʋrɔ bire ʋ kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ y, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ kɩ bire ʋ y, jirebɔrɛ bahɔdonno kan pooyaa gʋɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ sɔ y, b'a ba lɔnnɔ kan soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ kɩ bire ʋ y. Bala, Krista ɩ lɛ da haay, an nɩ gʋɔɔ k'a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ haay heer ʋ.
51003012	K'awɔɔ nɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ, Woso y'awɔɔ ŋʋa, an awɔɔ bɔ ʋ k'a a so awɔɔ ʋ. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a bɩr kʋ ŋʋarɛ m, a bɩr mɩŋŋabaa bam kʋ m, a bɩr mɩŋŋazerle m, kan bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa kɩ m, bʋraama kɩ m.
51003013	K'a bɩr yɛm kʋ ma, bɩ kʋ gʋaa ɩ mim m kan a mim kɩ, k'a sugur ka kʋ ʋ. Amba Zuuba sugur ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a ba maam sɔ.
51003014	A n cem woo••• bɩ, k'a bɩr ŋʋarɛ m, bala, ŋʋarɛ nɩ hɔ haay nam kʋ ʋ paan•••.
51003015	K'a ka kʋ heer laafɩɩ kʋ Krista n'a kam bɩ n a so awɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ bir Woso ʋ naa tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n yɩ deem. K'a bɩr yaa dam Woso m barka.
51003016	K'a Krista lemim bɩ da a heer ʋ jilli. K'a bɩr hɔ dɩndam kʋ m, a bɩr kʋ bɔm zaa ʋ, hɔɔntaʋrɛ m. K'a bɩr laa lɔm, laarɔ ciro wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, kan mim ma laarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, laa kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a da a heer ʋ haay kɩ. A laa bɩ lɔ ncɩnaaʋ, a Woso barka da kan a heer kɩ haay.
51003017	Kʋ bɔ awɔɔ n'a bam, gɛɛ kʋ bɔ awɔɔ n'a hɩm, k'a ba Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma, a bɩr Woso barka dam a tɔ ma.
51003018	Lannɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ a zino wɔɔ ma, amba a ga m Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
51003019	Zino wɔɔ, k'a a lannɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa, a bɩ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ y.
51003020	Nyɩnɔ wɔɔ, k'a a zɩrɔ wɔɔ lɛ si hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, hɔ kʋ Zuuba n'a ŋʋarɛ awɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ n naa.
51003021	Awɔɔ k'a m zɩrɔ wɔɔ, a b'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ da nɔmaa ma y, ŋ heer y'a a zar.
51003022	Lɔnnɔ wɔɔ, k'a zu a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʋ, hɔ haay nɔ ʋ. A bɩ ŋ zi ba dundo kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ a zi tɔ ma, kʋ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔ a ʋ y. Bɩ, k'a ŋ zi ba kan a heer kɩ haay, k'awɔɔ nɩ Zuuba gore daŋ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
51003023	Kʋ bɔ zi awɔɔ n'a bam, k'a ba kan a heer kɩ haay, ɩ ʋ, Zuuba zi awɔɔ n'a bam, gʋɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y.
51003024	Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Zuuba nɩ ganwʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ hɔ k'a cɩnta a gʋɔɔ m arzana ʋ bɩ yɩm. Awɔɔ Minzaa bɩ n Krista m, a zi awɔɔ n'a bam.
51003025	Gʋaa k'a n'a bʋnyaa bam bɩ, Zuuba y'a zi bʋnyaa bɩ yawʋra bam nɩ, a bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
51004001	Awɔɔ, kʋ lɔnnɔ soʋrezannɔ n'awɔɔ n nɔ wɔɔ, k'a tɩrgabaa kan sɩra kɩ zi ba kan a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ soʋrezaa ta ʋ, an nɩ arzana ʋ.
51004002	K'a bɩr yaa dam tee••• a b'a zu a ʋ y, k'a bɩr Woso barka dam.
51004003	K'a yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma sɔ, kʋ Woso n a ka k'ʋ toore mɩŋŋa yɩ, ʋ a lemim bɩ pa da gʋɔɔ m. K'ʋ Krista mim k'a n dɔ biisi bɩ pa da, bɩ tɔ ma m mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
51004004	Kʋ m a pa da kʋ n a jɩ ma paan•••, amba mɔɔ m ga m, m a ba bɩ m.
51004005	K'a dundo a mɩsɩrbaa barɛ zi gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ n ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ. K'a a tɔ ʋ kan hɔ k'a a ga barɛ m kɩ wakatɩ haay.
51004006	K'a ka k'a meerbaa n bɩr mɩŋŋa, yɛ n bɩr ta ma. Kʋ laakarɔ gʋɔɔ n'a darɛ a han, k'a nyɩbɔʋrɛ dɔ a bɔ ŋ nʋ, amba a ga m bɩ m.
51004007	Kʋ mɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, wɔɔ danyɩ ŋʋarɛzaa Tisikkɩ zɛm b'a dɩnda awɔɔ m haay. Zuuba zi a n'a bam taalɛra m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m Zuuba zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.
51004008	A nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma tɔkkɛ k'an bɩ wɔɔ mim dɩnda awɔɔ m, an awɔɔ heer yo.
51004009	Wɔɔ danyɩ Onezim, awɔɔ gʋaa deem m, a zɛm kan Tisikkɩ kɩ sɔ. Taalɛrazaa m, wɔɔ n'a ŋʋam. Ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a nɩ naa ʋ haay dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m.
51004010	Aristarkɩ k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa ʋ b'ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. Barnabas danyɩ Markɩ b'ɩ yaa darɛ a m sɔ. Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ awɔɔ m m ʋ, k'a lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʋ k'a si mɩŋŋa, k'a ba maam denter.
51004011	Yeezuu kʋ n so ra n n'a birm Zistus b'ɩ yaa darɛ a m. Gʋɔɔ kaakʋrɔ nɔɔm y'a minto n zɩɩfʋrɔ, ŋn'ɩ zi bam kan mɔɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ tɔ ma. Zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, ŋ yɩ mɔɔ heer wʋtam gʋta.
51004012	Awɔɔ kʋrɔ gʋaa Epafras ɩ yaa darɛ a m. Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩ m an nɩ zoo bam awɔɔ tɔ ma yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ. K'awɔɔ n jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a ma Woso zaa bɩ ra, K'a Woso hɔɔnhɔ haay dɔ a ba.
51004013	Mɔɔ sɩra bɩ, m a dɔ m ʋ, a ɩ kɔm gʋta awɔɔ tɔ ma, kan Lawodisee zannɔ kɩ, Hierapolis zannɔ kɩ tɔ ma sɔ.
51004014	Wɔɔ gʋaasɩba Likki k'a m lɔɔtɔr bɩ, kan Demas k'ɩ yaa darɛ a m.
51004015	K'a yaa da wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Lawodisee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, kan Nɩnfa kɩ m, kan kristagʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a som kʋ ma a har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
51004016	K'awɔɔ mɔɔ ci bɩ karɩnda ba, k'a ka Lawodisee kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma b'ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a karɩnda ba sɔ. K'awɔɔ n ci k'a n'a tom Lawodisee ʋ bɩ karɩnda ba sɔ.
51004017	K'a hɩ Arsip m a ʋ, an dundo a zi kan zibəə kʋ Zuuba a ka ʋ bɩ kɩ, an a tɔ ʋ an zi bɩ ba mɩŋŋa.
51004018	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ leersore yaa bɩ darɛ gʋrsɩra nyambʋrlɛ m zim, a ba n nɩ: K'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, a dɔ a ʋ, lɔnnɔcɛ mɔɔ n ta ʋ. Bɩ kʋ Woso barka n bɩr kan a kɩ.
52001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, kan Silas kɩ Timote kɩ, wɔɔ nɩ ci naa do barɛ awɔɔ ma. Awɔɔ k'a m Tesaloniki kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ, Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n'a so awɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Woso m barka, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
52001002	Wɔɔ yaa darɛ nɔ ʋ haay, wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam awɔɔ tɔ ma, ʋ nɩ Woso barka dam dɔmɩm haay awɔɔ minto.
52001003	Wɔɔ y'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ zibəə tɔ darɛ ʋ nɔ ʋ tee••• wɔɔ Zɩ Woso lɛɛ, kan ŋʋarɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ tʋntɔʋrɛ zibəə kɩ, kan taaheerlɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m kɔɔkɔɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ.
52001004	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ Woso awɔɔ ŋʋa, an awɔɔ bɔ ʋ k'a a so awɔɔ ʋ.
52001005	Bala, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, a n yɩ lɛ meerbaa m bala y, yɩ a ʋ, kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ wɔɔ n'a kasɛtɩ m ʋ heer ʋ, ʋ ʋ sɩra lemim m. Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa kʋ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ bire ʋ awɔɔ daahan minto bɩ dɔ.
52001006	Awɔɔ wɔɔ hɔbaa sa, wɔɔ kan Zuuba kɩ, bala, awɔɔ nyɩnta fɩryɩrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ, a a gu a Woso lemim bɩ si heernyɔɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ nɔ ʋ.
52001007	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Masedʋan kan Akayii kɩ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ haay n a ba awɔɔ hɔbaa dɩndarɛ zannɔ.
52001008	Bala, Zuuba lemim b'a to awɔɔ zi an ta Masedʋan kan Akayii kɩ kʋrɔ ʋ, bɩ, kʋrɔ wɔɔ duro bɛɛ m bala y, sɩra k'awɔɔ ka Woso ʋ bɩ mim ta lɛɛ haay ʋ, an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, pakra bɛɛ m dɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ ya ʋ a dɩnda ŋ nɩ y.
52001009	Bala, ta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi awɔɔ m wɔɔ si mɩŋŋa bɩ, gʋaa haay ɩ bɩ mim dɩndam, a bɔ k'awɔɔ ʋ wosobaawɔnnɔ yaadarɛ ʋ, a a bɔ a taam k'a zu Woso k'a m mɩsɩr a m sɩra b'ʋ bɩ, n yɩ bɩ mim dɩndam sɔ.
52001010	A n nɩ dɔrɛ a Nyɩ Yeezuu kʋ Woso mɩŋŋa a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, an n'a tom brama k'a bʋr bɩ ma, an nɩ wɔɔ yɔm Woso nɔmaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ wɔ ʋ.
52002001	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a zim a ʋ, ta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi bɩ, a n bɔ vam y.
52002002	Awɔɔ dɔ sɔ a ʋ, fɩr kʋ ŋ y'a ka wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ wɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ Filipii ʋ bɩ wɔɔ ʋ hʋr ma lɛɛ m, ʋ bʋr awɔɔ zi. Bɩ Woso heerkoodəbaa ka wɔɔ ʋ, baa kʋ jɩnnɔ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ da ma, ʋ lemim nyɩnta k'a a to zi bɩ pa da awɔɔ m.
52002003	Nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ pa bɛɛ wɔɔ n'a darɛ y, gɩnga bʋnyaa bɛɛ wɔɔ n ta m sɔ ʋ nɩ pa bɩ darɛ y, wɔɔ bɩr ʋ kam ma sɔ k'ʋ ŋʋaar ba gʋɔɔ nɩ y.
52002004	Bɩ, kʋ Woso wɔɔ ka lɛɛ an dɩga wɔɔ ma, an a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m bɩ, an a lemim nyɩnta bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ. Naa y'a ka kʋ wɔɔ ɩ meer bam, wɔɔ bɩr ʋ kam ma kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔ n yɩ ʋ ra y, ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ Woso nɔ n yɩ ʋ ra, bala, a mɩŋŋa nɩ hɔ k'a nɩ wɔɔ heer ʋ yɩm.
52002005	Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, wɔɔ n yɛ fɩɩgaa k'ʋ bra bɩmba gʋɔɔ nɩ y, wɔɔ n meer ba ʋ n'a gɩngam k'awɔɔ m hɔ ka wɔɔ ʋ y, naa woo••• naa, Woso m wɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa.
52002006	Wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma fɩɩgaa kʋ gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ da ʋ y, wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma awɔɔ zi, wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ zi sɔ y.
52002007	A n bɔkarɛ, a ga k'a ʋ m kʋ wɔɔ m daʋrɛ kʋ Krista zibəəzannɔ a ga m, ŋn'a yɩ bɩ yɩ bɩ, wɔɔ n ʋ ka ma k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ gʋr zi y. Bɩ, nyɩntabaa wɔɔ ba awɔɔ m gʋta, amba nyɩnɔ da tɩr nyasʋrɛ a nyɩnɔ m nyɩnta bɩ m.
52002008	Awɔɔ ŋʋa kʋ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto bɩ, wɔɔ n a ŋʋa k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta bɩ wɔɔ ka awɔɔ ʋ a minto y, wɔɔ ŋʋa sɔ k'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ka awɔɔ tɔ ma. Bala, wɔɔ awɔɔ ŋʋa maam-maam.
52002009	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, ziro kʋ wɔɔ ŋ ba, ʋ kɔrɛ yɩ bɩ, ŋ tɔ y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ zi ba sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ kɔ wɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ mim tɔ ma y, a ba wɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, ʋ Woso lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da awɔɔ m.
52002010	Awɔɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ kan Woso kɩ sɔ, a dɔ a ʋ, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ k'a m sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ, mɩsɩrbaa kʋ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ zi bɩ, nyɩnta a ʋ mɩŋŋabaa kan tɩrgabaa kɩ nɔ ʋ, mim n nyɩnta wɔɔ gʋr zi y.
52002011	Awɔɔ a ya a dɔ sɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ nyasʋ awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə m, amba nyɩnɔ zɩ tɩr nyasʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ m:
52002012	Ʋ a dʋndɔ, ʋ awɔɔ heer yo, ʋ a hɩ awɔɔ m karɛ, paan••• ʋ ʋ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ ba, a y'awɔɔ bir k'awɔɔ n nyɩnta kan a kɩ a cirbəə kan a lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
52002013	Wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka sɔ dɔmɩm haay, bala, Woso lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ si a dɔ a ʋ, Woso lemim m, gʋaa lemim bɛɛ y, bɩ Woso lemim m denter paan•••, an n'a zi bam awɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'a sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ heer ʋ.
52002014	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, mim kʋ Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, Zidee kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a yɩ bɩ, awɔɔ yɩ sɔ. Bala, awɔɔ danyɩnɔ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma sɔ, amba brɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ fɩr ka ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ m.
52002015	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ duro ɩ Zuuba Yeezuu zɛ gər, ŋ yɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, ŋ yɩ fɩr ka wɔɔ ma sɔ. Woso heer bɩ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ y, gʋɔɔ haay jɩnnɔ n ŋ mɩ.
52002016	Ŋ y'a tam wɔɔ m toore, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m kʋ ŋ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ y, a ba kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ naa, a mimbʋnyaa ŋn'a dam la tee••• bɩ naa haay jɛ ʋ, Woso a nɔmaa kərgu ŋ la.
52002017	Bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ʋ ba awɔɔ ma laatʋ, a maasɩrɛ ba poore. Ʋ n ʋ ya, ʋ n nɩ kʋ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ wɔɔ heer gɔɔta an nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ ŋʋa paan••• k'ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ awɔɔ yɩ, naa tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ tʋntɔ ʋ gʋta k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ awɔɔ yɩ.
52002018	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ n a ŋʋa k'ʋ ʋ wusigə ʋ ta awɔɔ zi. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, mɔɔ m tɔ ʋ gallɛm hɔka kʋ m ta awɔɔ zi, bɩ Sʋtaana wɔɔ zaa tii, wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma y.
52002019	Sɩra nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ taaheerlɛ m, awɔɔ tɔ ma m wɔɔ nɩ zɛm bɩ heernyɔɔ yɩ, ʋ ʋ da ma ʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu taa, a zɛrɛ hinni ʋ.
52002020	Denter m, awɔɔ m wɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ kan wɔɔ heernyɔɔ kɩ.
52003001	Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'a ŋʋam kʋ awɔɔ yɩ, bɩ wɔɔ bɩr ʋ dam ma bɩ, wɔɔ n kɔ ʋ lɛ sa, ʋ ʋ k'ʋ gɔɔta ʋ minto Atɛnnɩ ʋ.
52003002	A m bɩ, wɔɔ n'ʋ danyɩ Timote nyɔɔ, wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m an nɩ Woso zi bam Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ nɔ ʋ. A nyɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ ma k'an awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra, an awɔɔ heer yo a sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ,
52003003	k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ gɔsɩ b'a bɔ a jɛ m fɩr k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm naa minto y. Bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Woso zaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, pakra m kʋ wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ.
52003004	Nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ser ka ʋ a hɩ awɔɔ m, ʋ ʋ, pakra m kʋ wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ, b'awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ hɩ b'ɩ ba bɩ.
52003005	Naa tɔ ma m, kʋ mɔɔ n m da ma dɔ, m bʋr m ma kʋ m awɔɔ mim dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ n Timote nyɔɔ, k'an awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ mim dɔ, k'an b'a hɩ m m. Bala, mɔɔ da bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ, ɩ b'a ka Sʋtaana n awɔɔ makra ba, awɔɔ m sɩrakarɛ to, zi kʋ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ zi bɩ n bɔ vam y.
52003006	Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Timote a to awɔɔ zi b'ʋ an bʋr, a lemim nyɩnta hɩ wɔɔ m, awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ kan awɔɔ ŋʋarɛ kɩ mim bɩncɛ ʋ, a a hɩ, a ʋ, wɔɔ tɔ gɔɔta an awɔɔ nɔ ʋ nyɩnta, bɩ amba wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ awɔɔ yɩ bɩ, awɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a ya, awɔɔ yɩ sɔ.
52003007	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ minto bɩ, wɔɔ n heerkoodəbaa yɩ, ʋ fɩryɩrɛ kan ʋ makrarɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
52003008	Bala, wɔɔ ɩ heernyɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɩsɩrbaa daa wɔɔ yɩ, k'awɔɔ nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ minto.
52003009	Awɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma ʋ Woso barka da, ʋ a nya y, heernyɔɔ gʋta k'awɔɔ n'a kam wɔɔ ʋ a taa bɩ minto.
52003010	Sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ wɔɔ y'a yɛm han gʋta, k'an a ka k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ awɔɔ yɩ k'ʋ hɔ k'a jɩra awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ ma bɩ na awɔɔ m ma.
52003011	Wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ n'a yɛm wɔɔ Zɩ Woso mɩŋŋa kan wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu kɩ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ zaa banka k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ bʋr awɔɔ zi.
52003012	Wɔɔ y'a yɛm kʋ Zuuba n a ka k'awɔɔ ŋʋarɛ kan kʋ kɩ kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ bɩ n a da ra an bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, amba wɔɔ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam bɩ m.
52003013	K'an a ba maam, an awɔɔ heer yo, k'awɔɔ m bɩr mɩŋŋa, mim ba awɔɔ gʋr zi wɔɔ Zɩ Woso taa y, hinni kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ kan a gʋɔɔ kɩ haay bɩ tɔ ma.
52004001	M danyɩnɔ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ʋ awɔɔ dʋndɔ m wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: Biisi bɩ, wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'awɔɔ n'a bam an Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do awɔɔ n'a bam, bɩ k'a ta lɛɛ tee••• kan mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do kɩ a da ra.
52004002	Awɔɔ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ awɔɔ dʋndɔ m wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ra bɩ dɔ.
52004003	Hɔ kʋ Woso lɛ n taa bɩ ba n nɩ: A lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa k'an mɩŋŋa a mɩm ʋ ba, k'a a gʋ jaandarɛ do haay ma.
52004004	Awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə a ga m, an a da a mɛsim ma dɔ, k'an a da ma, an mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba kan daʋrɛ kɩ.
52004005	K'a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ to kʋ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ n a so awɔɔ ʋ, amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Woso dɔ rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y.
52004006	Mim naa do nɔ ʋ, a b'a ka gɔsɩ n kʋrɔma kan a danyɩ kɩ an zambʋ ba ma y, bala, Zuuba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ minno nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋrm, amba wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ʋ a hɩ awɔɔ m, ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ so ra paan••• bɩ m.
52004007	Sɩra nɔ ʋ, Woso n wɔɔ bir kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ y, bɩ kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba mɩŋŋabaa nɔ ʋ.
52004008	Naa minto bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ kaanɩm hɔdɩndarɛ naa do m bɩ, gʋaa bɛɛ a nɩ kaanɩm nɩ y, Woso k'a n'a Sɛnt-Ɛspri karɛ awɔɔ ʋ b'a kaanm m.
52004009	M danyɩnɔ Krista nɔ ʋ, kʋ kʋ ŋʋarɛ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, pakra bɛɛ m kan awɔɔ kɩ kʋ mɔɔ n ci ba awɔɔ ma, m a mim dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y. Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ m bɩr kʋ ŋʋam.
52004010	Bɩ, amba n ŋʋarɛ mim dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ danyɩnɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ Masedʋan kʋ b'ʋ jilli rɔ wɔɔ ŋʋarɛ. Bɩ, kʋ a yɛ awɔɔ han k'a ta lɛɛ tee••• kan ŋ ŋʋarɛ kɩ a da ra.
52004011	K'a a yo ʋ kʋ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta awɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ, gʋaa biyəə n a zerga a mɩŋŋa mim lɛ, an zi ba an a mɩsɩrbaa ba m, amba wɔɔ lɛɛ ka, ʋ a hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ m.
52004012	K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ gore daŋ ʋ, awɔɔ bɩ gɔsɩ mɩm kam sɔ y.
52004013	M danyɩnɔ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, wɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n gɔɔta badɔ nɔ ʋ, a bɩr heerzarlɛ m amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba taaheerlɛ m nɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
52004014	Kʋ wɔɔ sɩra ka, ʋ ʋ Yeezuu ga an a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ, Woso brɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʋ ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba kan Yeezuu kɩ.
52004015	Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ kʋ a hɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Zuuba ɩ nyɩnta an a dɩnda. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'ʋ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr naa, Zuuba zɛrɛ hinni ʋ, wɔɔ bɩ lɛɛ kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
52004016	Bala, kʋ Woso bɩ zaa ka, malɛɛka jɩtaarɛ deem n a leer busu, n nɩ Woso huure bɩ hɛ, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa y'a tom arzana ʋ, an zer. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʋ ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛ ka ŋn'a mɩm bɔ ʋ.
52004017	Bɩ jɛ ʋ kɛɛrɛ, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, n wɔɔ nam kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ n nɩ wɔɔ busu warkʋ nɔ ʋ, kʋ aa Zuuba zɛ ʋ brama, yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ wɔɔ n nyɩnta kan Zuuba kɩ dɔmɩm haay.
52004018	K'a meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba kan kʋ kɩ, a bɩr kʋ heer yom.
52005001	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, pakra bɛɛ m kʋ n nɩ ci ba awɔɔ ma n nɩ dɔmɩm gɛɛ wakatɩ kʋ minno nɔɔn duro n nɩ baŋ ʋ bɩ mim dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y.
52005002	Bala, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a dɔ a zim a ʋ, hinni kʋ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ bɩ, nyɩnta a nawʋm amba koor tɩr bʋr gunuu ʋ gʋaa n a wakatɩ dɔ bɩ m.
52005003	Kʋ gʋɔɔ bʋr ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ: "Laafɩɩ dɔmɩm wɔɔ n ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ, minsi ba ʋ y." Dɔmɩm bɩ do fɩryɩrɛ n nɩ daata zɛrɛ ŋ la amba nyoosibarɛ tɩr daata zɛ lʋ jɩsɩzaa ra bɩ m, ŋ gɔsɩ bɩ bɔm lɛ nɩ y.
52005004	Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, ʋ danyɩnɔ, monsigə bɛɛ awɔɔ n ta ʋ, kʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do n bɩ daata zɛ awɔɔ ra, amba koor tɩr daata zɛ gʋaa ra bɩ nɩ y.
52005005	Bala, awɔɔ haay, lɛɛgure gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, sinuu gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m. Gunuu gʋɔɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ, bɩ monsigə gʋɔɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ m sɔ y.
52005006	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ bɩ hinceem ba am gʋɔɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, ʋ b'a to kʋ hɔsɩ n'ʋ zu ʋ y, ʋ ʋ da ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma.
52005007	Hinceem zannɔ wɔɔ a ba ŋ nawʋm gunuu ʋ, gunuu ʋ ŋnɩ bɛɛ miŋ ʋ sɔ an nɩ ŋ zɛm.
52005008	Bɩ, wɔɔ kʋ sinuu gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ʋ ʋ da ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, k'ʋ gɔɔta ʋ sɩra ka, ʋ bɩr ŋʋarɛ m, ɩ ʋ pɔyaa goŋŋo wɔɔ ka ʋ ma, ʋ bɩr bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm ba yɩ bɩ taaheerlɛ m, ɩ ʋ, pɔyaa firgə wɔɔ ku ʋ mim ma.
52005009	Bala, Woso n wɔɔ bɔ ʋ k'a bɩ fɩr ka wɔɔ ma a nɔmaa nɔ ʋ y, bɩ wɔɔ bɔ a ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
52005010	Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa ɩ ga wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr, gɛɛ gɩnga wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ m mɩsɩrbaa ba kan kɩ a zɛrɛ hinni ʋ.
52005011	Naa minto bɩ, k'a kʋ heer yo, a kʋ sɩrakarɛ da ra, amba awɔɔ n'a bam kara bɩ m.
52005012	M danyɩnɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso zi bam awɔɔ barla ŋnɩ karɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ, ŋn'awɔɔ bɔm zaa ʋ Zuuba zaa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a yɛ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a ŋ gore da ʋ.
52005013	K'a ŋ da ʋ gʋta kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, ŋ zibəə bɩ minto. Awɔɔ haay, k'a bɩr laafɩɩ kan kʋ kɩ.
52005014	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, kʋ a yɛ a han, k'a həən si gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa zore bam nɔ wɔɔ ma, k'a heerkoodəwarzannɔ heer yo, k'a a da paŋŋawarzannɔ han, k'a bɩr bʋraama m kan gʋaa haay kɩ.
52005015	K'a dundo a zi kʋ gɔsɩ b'a bʋnyaa sompi gʋaa n'ʋ y, bɩ k'a bɩr a karɛ a mɩŋŋa barɛ ma tee•••, awɔɔ kan kʋ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ bire ʋ.
52005016	K'a bɩr heernyɔɔ m dɔmɩm haay,
52005017	k'a bɩr yaa dam tee•••.
52005018	Mim woo••• nɔ ʋ, k'a Woso barka da, bala, naa Woso lɛ n taa awɔɔ gʋr zi Krista Yeezuu zuure bɩ nɔ ʋ.
52005019	A b'a ta Sɛnt-Ɛspri zibəə m toore y,
52005020	a bɩ wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ meerbaarɔ gore bɔ ʋ y.
52005021	Bɩ, mim haay nɔ ʋ, k'a a hɔɔn da ma, a dɩga hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa a nɔ ʋ bɩ ma, a nyasʋ hɔ bɩ do m.
52005022	K'a a gʋ mimbʋnyaa do haay ma laatʋ.
52005023	A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ wɔɔ Woso kʋ laafɩɩ karɛzaa m bɩ n'awɔɔ hu bɔ jilli, k'an dɔ awɔɔ hɔɔn ma, kan awɔɔ nyi kɩ a mɛ kɩ ma haay, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta awɔɔ gʋr zi wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛrɛ hinni ʋ y.
52005024	Woso mɩŋŋa y'awɔɔ bir, jɩnalɛrazaa m, an nɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ yɛ naa barɛ.
52005025	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, k'a yaa da Woso m wɔɔ minto sɔ.
52005026	K'a yaa da danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay m, amba a a ga m bɩ m.
52005027	Zuuba tɔ ma, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han paan•••. K'a ci naa do karɩnda ba danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay lɛɛ.
52005028	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
53001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, kan Silas kɩ Timote kɩ, wɔɔ nɩ ci naa do barɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ k'a m Tesaloniki kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n'a so awɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
53001002	A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
53001003	M danyɩnɔ, a a ga m, kʋ wɔɔ n yaa da Woso m barka, awɔɔ tɔ ma tee•••. A ga a ʋ m, kʋ wɔɔ n a ba ncɩnaaʋ, bala awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ y'a dam la, awɔɔ kʋ ŋʋarɛ nɩ tam lɛɛ tee•••.
53001004	Naa minto m, kʋ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim dɩndam Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ vantɔɔ lɛɛ, a dɩnda wɔɔ nawʋm ʋ n'ʋ mim kam brama, bala, gʋɔɔ sɔ awɔɔ m, ŋnɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ nɩ yɛm naa haay ma, an n'a tʋntɔŋ ʋ a gɔɔta an nɩ sɩrakarɛ m.
53001005	Naa woo••• n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, dʋdɔ kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a ka bɩ yɩm tɩrga, fɩryɩrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro k'awɔɔ nɩ yɛrɛ ŋ ma naa n n'a karɛ awɔɔ n'a ga Woso cirbəə gasʋrɛ m, Woso cirbəə bɩ do tɔ ma m awɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩm.
53001006	Sɩra m, hɔ k'an tɩrga bɩ Woso n n'a bam, a y'awɔɔ zɩm bɔm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma, an fɩryɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ.
53001007	Bɩ, awɔɔ k'a nɩ fɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ, a mɛnyɔɔ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ kan wɔɔ kɩ, naa ba a nawʋm hinni kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu n'a tom brama an zer kan a malɛɛkarɔ paŋŋazannɔ kɩ bɩ ma.
53001008	Zer a nawʋm sɛwurə nɔ ʋ, k'a bɩ fɩr ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Woso dɔ, bɩ ŋ bɩr yɛm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma.
53001009	Fɩryɩrɛ kʋ ŋ n'a yɩm bɩ, zaarbarɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ m, n nyɔɔ n nawʋm laatʋ Zuuba taʋrɛ kan a cirbəə paŋŋa kɩ ma.
53001010	Zɛ k'a nawʋm dɔmɩm gʋta bɩ do hinni ʋ bɩ, naa n nɩ baŋ ʋ. Zɛ a nawʋm k'a bɩ nyɩnta lɛbɔʋrɛ m a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zi, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ a ʋ. Awɔɔ nyɩntam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro barla, bala, awɔɔ sɩra ka lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m b'ʋ.
53001011	Bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ nɩ yaa dam Woso m awɔɔ tɔ ma tee•••, k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n a ga mɩsɩrbaa k'a mɩŋŋa awɔɔ bir k'awɔɔ m b'a ba bɩ m. K'an a ka, a paŋŋa bɩ minto bɩ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma, a hɔ mɩŋŋa haay k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa k'a ba bɩ ba, kʋ zi k'awɔɔ n'a bam sɩra k'awɔɔ ka bɩ tɔ ma bɩ m nyɩ da.
53001012	Naa n'a kam wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ awɔɔ gʋr zi, awɔɔ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ a gʋr zi, wɔɔ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ barka tɔ ma.
53002001	M danyɩnɔ, kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛrɛ hinni bɩ nɩ, kan ba wɔɔ n'ʋ som kʋ ma kan kɩ bɩ mim nɩ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a yɛ awɔɔ han bɩ ba n nɩ:
53002002	A a da ma, n ʋ, wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ meerbaa niŋŋə, gɛɛ Woso lemim padarɛ niŋŋə, gɛɛ ci niŋŋə y'a to wɔɔ zi an n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, Zuuba zɛrɛ hinni bɩ lee ku, a b'a hɔɔn war kʋ ma a nyi ba naanaa, naa do tɔ ma y.
53002003	A b'a to kʋ gɔsɩ n bra bɩmba a m fɩɩga y. Bala, pakra m kʋ gʋɔɔ cir gʋta m wuti ŋnɩ bɩsɩ ka Woso ma, kʋ gʋaa bʋnyaa kʋ Woso n n'a dam sɛhar ʋ bɩ n a hɩnka, bɩ jɛ ʋ, Zuuba dɔmɩm bɩ n n'a kuŋ ʋ.
53002004	Gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ do bɩ yɛm, gʋɔɔ n yaa da hɔsɩ m dɔ y, baa Woso mɩŋŋa, a y'a mɩŋŋa cɩntam hɔ haay burə ʋ, baa Woso burə ʋ. A gasʋm Wosocɛ gʋta mɩŋŋa ʋ, an aa nyɩnta an a hɩ a ʋ, Woso n'a mɩ.
53002005	Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, mɔɔ naa mim dɩnda awɔɔ m, a tɔ ba awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra?
53002006	Dɩɩtaa naa, hɔ n'a tam gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ m toore, k'a b'a da ma, an a hɩnka k'a dɔmɩm bɛɛ y'a ku y, awɔɔ hɔ bɩ do dɔ.
53002007	Denter m, gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ paŋŋa a nyaakʋm da an nɩ zi bam kara, bɩ pakra m kʋ gʋaa k'a n'a tam gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ m toore bɩ n'a gaa toore.
53002008	Bɩ jɛ ʋ, gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ y'a hɩnkam kɛɛrɛ, bɩ Zuuba Yeezuu y'a zɛm gər a lɛ hoonsire m, an a hɔɔnsɩ a hɩnkarɛ leegure paŋŋa gʋtabaa m.
53002009	Gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ, a hɩnka a nawʋm kan Sʋtaana paŋŋa kɩ, a zi paŋŋazannɔ do haay bam, an makrarɔ ba kan hoserlo kɩ, k'a gʋɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ.
53002010	A yom zi bʋnyaa do haay ma, an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ, brɔɔ nyaanɩm, bala, sɩra k'a n'a dam ma an ŋ bʋmbɔ bɩ, ŋ n a ŋʋa, bɩ, ŋ n yɛ ma y.
53002011	Bɩ y'a ka, Woso n a ka nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ paŋŋa nɩ zi bam kan ŋ kɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka ŋʋaar ʋ.
53002012	Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, Woso m bɩ zɛm bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n yɛ sɩra ma y, bɩ zibʋnyaa barɛ ŋn'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar.
53002013	M danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ yaa da Woso m barka awɔɔ tɔ ma tee•••, awɔɔ kʋ Zuuba n'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ. Bala, Woso awɔɔ bɔ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya ba ʋ cɩna y. Sɛnt-Ɛspri zibəə tɔ ma, kan yɛ k'awɔɔ ʋ sɩra ma bɩ kɩ minto, k'awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, a yɩ Woso soʋre hɔɔ.
53002014	Bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ tɔ ma m, an zu kʋ ʋ kan lemim nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ kɩ, an awɔɔ bir, k'awɔɔ m bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
53002015	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, danyɩnɔ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m meerbaa nɔ ʋ gɛɛ ci ʋ bɩ nyasʋ mɩŋŋa.
53002016	Wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa, kan wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kɩ wɔɔ ŋʋa, ŋnɩ heerwʋtarɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ, kan taaheerlɛ mɩŋŋa kɩ ka wɔɔ ʋ.
53002017	A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ ŋ han, kʋ ŋ n'a ka kʋ heerwʋtarɛ n'awɔɔ heer han, kʋ ŋ nɩ paŋŋa ka awɔɔ ʋ k'a bɩr hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa haay bam tee•••, zibəə kan meerbaa kɩ nɔ ʋ.
53003001	M danyɩnɔ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ, k'a yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma, kʋ Zuuba lemim n gɔɔta an bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, k'an daʋrɛ yɩ amba a nyɩnta ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ m.
53003002	K'a yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma sɔ, kʋ Woso n wɔɔ yɔ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋsɩ rɔ wɔ ʋ, bala, gʋɔɔ haay bɛɛ nɩ sɩra karɛ y.
53003003	Bɩ, jɩnalɛrazaa m Zuuba m, a y'awɔɔ paŋŋa dam la, an dɔ awɔɔ ma kan a bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩ kɩ.
53003004	K'awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, Zuuba a ka wɔɔ heer n kookoo ʋ a dɔ, ʋ ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bam b'awɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ a ta lɛɛ kan a barɛ kɩ.
53003005	Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba n a ka k'awɔɔ n Woso ŋʋa kan a heer kɩ, k'a a da ma sɔ, a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, baa kʋ bɔ m, amba Krista a ba bɩ m.
53003006	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, a yɛ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, danyɩnɔ haay kʋ yakʋzannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, k'a gʋ ŋ ma laatʋ, brɔɔ bɩr yɛm hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ ma y.
53003007	Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, awɔɔ hɔ k'a n'a bam a wɔɔ hɔbaa dɩnda bɩ dɔ. Bala, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ n nyɩnta yakʋzannɔ y.
53003008	Wɔɔ n gɔsɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ vam y. Bɩ, zi wɔɔ ba ʋ kɔ, wɔɔ zi ba sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ kɔ wɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ mim tɔ ma y.
53003009	Sɩra nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ daahan yɩ awɔɔ zi, bɩ, wɔɔ y'a ŋʋa ʋ zim k'ʋ lɛɛmaa hɔ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n zu wɔɔ hɔbaa ʋ.
53003010	Bala, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, wɔɔ ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, a lɛ baa zibəə ma, k'a bɩ hɔ bɩ sɔ y."
53003011	A n bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ y'a marɛ n n'a hɩrɛ n ʋ, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n ta ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yakʋ bam, ŋ bɩr zi barɛ y, a war ŋ nawʋm gʋɔɔ minno ma.
53003012	Lɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a cɩntam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro m, ʋ nɩ ŋ dʋndɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: K'a a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ zibəə lɛ ʋ zɛny•••, a a lɛɛmaa hɔ bɩ.
53003013	Ʋ danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ nɩ, a bɩ kɔ kan zi mɩŋŋa barɛ kɩ y.
53003014	Kʋ gʋaa n zu hɔ kʋ wɔɔ dɩnda ci naa do nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, k'a zaa da lɛ ʋ, a b'a ya, a a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ y, kʋ nyannɩ n a nyasʋ.
53003015	Bɩ, a b'a zaa ba a jɩm y, k'a dʋndɔ, amba n tɩr a danyɩ dʋndɔ bɩ m.
53003016	Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba mɩŋŋa k'a nɩ laafɩɩ kam bɩ n laafɩɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay, hɔ haay m. Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba m bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
53003017	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ leersore yaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a darɛ awɔɔ m naa gʋrsɩra barɛ m zim, ciro haay kʋ mɔɔ tɩr ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ, m wɔjɩ mɔɔ tɩr a daŋ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa gʋrsɩra n naa.
53003018	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
54001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ ci naa do barɛ. Woso kʋ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ kan Krista Yeezuu k'an wɔɔ taaheerlɛ bɩ k'ɩ zaa ka, mɔɔ nɩ m ba Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa.
54001002	Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, Timote, mɔɔ nyɩ paan••• sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ kʋ Zɩ Woso kan wɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu kɩ n barka, kan cicirzɛrɛ kɩ, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka ɩ ʋ.
54001003	Amba mɔɔ yɛ ɩ han, m hʋrlɛ ma, kʋ m ta Masedʋan ʋ bɩ, gɔɔta ɩ nyɩnta Efɛɛzɩ ʋ, k'ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋʋaar hɔ dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ da jɩm ʋ.
54001004	A hɩ ŋ nɩ sɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ biisi minno kan yaabɔɔ tɔrɔ gaandarɛrɔ sʋʋra jintoo wɔɔ kɩ to. Minno wɔɔ duro, bɩsɩkarɛ ŋn'ɩ zɛm nɩ bala, ŋ bɩr a dam Woso hɔɔnhɔ barɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a dɔm sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ han y.
54001005	Meerbaa naa do ba ɩbɩɩ nawʋm kan ŋ kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋnɩ heer hu yɩ, kʋ ŋʋarɛ n nyɩnta ŋ heer ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa yɩ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka paan•••.
54001006	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a gʋ zaa kʋ wɔɔ hɩnka naa ma, ŋnɩ nyaam, meerbaa yaarsɩrɔ nɔ ʋ.
54001007	Ŋ ʋ, Woso lɛrɔ hɔdonno n a mɩ, an bɔkarɛ hɔ kʋ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n'a hɩm, ŋn'ɩ som la kan paŋŋa kɩ bɩ, ŋn'a jɩ dɔ y.
54001008	Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋa, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gʋaa ɩ zuŋ ʋ amba a a ga m bɩ m.
54001009	Ʋ a tɔ da ʋ nɔ ʋ, ʋ ʋ, n nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ tɔ ma y, a ka n y'a ʋ bayɛrɛzannɔ tɔ ma, kan bɩsɩkənno kɩ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr Woso daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso hɔ gore bɔŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a zɩrɔ kan a dɔɔ kɩ meeyaa bɔŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ kan gərzenno kɩ,
54001010	jaandənno kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ yaarɔ wʋta kan kʋ kɩ zannɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋna ŋnɩ ŋ hɛɛ zannɔ kɩ, ŋʋaarzannɔ kɩ, kan ŋʋaarkasɛtɩzannɔ kɩ. Lɛ bɩ ka n y'a ʋ sɔ mim haay k'a nɩ hɔdɩndarɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ zarm tɔ ma.
54001011	Hɔdɩndarɛ naa do a ga kʋ ʋ kan lemim nyɩnta kʋ Woso a da mɔɔ wɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ. Lemim bɩ do nɩ Woso k'a a so heernyɔɔ ʋ bɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ hɩnkarɛ.
54001012	Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam wɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu m barka, k'a paŋŋa ka mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a zi ba bɩ minto. Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam nɩ barka k'a gɩnga a ʋ, mɔɔ n ga a zibəə bɩ m an mɔɔ da ʋ bɩ minto.
54001013	A n bɔkarɛ biisi bɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta n meerbaa bʋnyaa ba ma, m fɩr ka a gʋɔɔ ma, m a sʋnsɔ wʋ. Bɩ, a mɔɔ cicir zɛ, bala, badɔ ɩ mɔɔ da naa haay barɛ ma, kʋ mɔɔ n sɩra ka bɩ tɔ ma.
54001014	Wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ barka ka mɔɔ ʋ gʋta, an a ka mɔɔ n sɩra ka, m nɩ ŋʋarɛ m Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ.
54001015	Meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ma ba naa, sɩra m, gʋaa haay a ga m, an a si mɩŋŋa: "Krista Yeezuu bʋr durnya ʋ, k'a bɩ mimbʋnyaabənno bʋmbɔ." Bɩ, mɔɔ mimbʋnyaa barɛ ɩ lɛ da.
54001016	Bɩ, Woso mɔɔ cicir zɛ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Krista Yeezuu a bʋraama gʋta hɩnka mɔɔ gʋr zi mɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ m mimbʋnyaabər gʋta k'a lɛ da bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ m yɩ makra gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ sɩra ka ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
54001017	Bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, ŋn'a da ʋ dɔmɩm haay, an cir an nɩ cirbəə m dɔmɩm haay, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa m tee•••, gʋaa bɩr a mɩŋŋa yɩrɛ y, a deem m Woso. Amina.
54001018	M nyɩ Timote, ɩ b'ɩ dʋndɔ mɔɔ nawʋm, amba wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ meerbaa zannɔ nyɩnta ŋ n'ɩbɩɩ mim hɩ bɩ m, hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a hɩ bɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ, ɩ sa ɩ zoobarɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ bam.
54001019	Zoo bɩ ba sɩrakarɛ m, kan hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa kɩ m. Hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ do, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a to, a tore bɩ n a ka ŋ sɩrakarɛ n a zar.
54001020	Yimene kan Alɛsandɩr k'ɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro barla, mɔɔ wɔ daa ŋ ma Sʋtaana wɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔɔn ka, kʋ ŋ b'a ya ŋnɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋ y.
54002001	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m n'a yɛm bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n yaa da Woso m gʋɔɔ haay tɔ ma, a ŋ mim haay da Woso wɔ ʋ, a yaa da m barka ŋ tɔ ma.
54002002	K'a yaa da cinno wɔɔ tɔ ma, kan lɛɛzannɔ haay kɩ tɔ ma sɔ, k'ʋ nyɩnta laafɩɩ nɔ ʋ, ʋ bɩr zum Woso ʋ zenyy•••, mɩsɩrbaa zore nɔ ʋ kan daʋrɛ kɩ.
54002003	Naa m mɩŋŋa, an Woso kʋ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ nɔ yɩ,
54002004	a lɛ taa kʋ gʋɔɔ haay n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋnɩ sɩra dɔ.
54002005	Bala, Woso deem n ta ʋ, gʋaa deem taan••• nɩ gʋɔɔ zɛm kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ, Krista Yeezuu m.
54002006	A ɩ yɛ an a mɩŋŋa ka zɛ ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ haay n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ. Dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a b'a ku an naa ba bɩ, a yɩ kasɛtɩ, an a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso lɛ taa k'a gʋaa haay bʋmbɔ.
54002007	Naa mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m Woso n mɔɔ bɔ ʋ kʋ m yɩ a lemim padər, an mɔɔ ba kristazibəəzaa, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩm, mɔɔ bɩr ŋʋaar barɛ y, mɔɔ cɩnta a ʋ, kʋ m sɩrakarɛ kan sɩra kɩ dɩnda do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
54002008	Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ gʋɔɔ yaarɔ wɔɔ n yaa da Woso m, lɛɛ haay ʋ, ŋn'a wɔrɔ busu brama kʋ mimbʋnyaa bɩ nyɩnta ŋ gʋr zi y, ŋ bɩ nɔmaa kan nyaa kɩ to a heer ʋ ŋnɩ yaa bɩ da y.
54002009	Kʋ lannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa, kʋ ŋ nɩ huu k'a ga kʋ ʋ ba du a ma, ŋnɩ bɩr sappɩ, mɩŋŋahɩnkarɛ ba ŋ zi y, ŋ b'a ka mim kʋsɩrɛ waasɩ ma, gɛɛ sarma nyɛɛnnɔ ma y, gɛɛ busoo gʋta huu ma, gɛɛ mɩŋŋabankarɛ waasɩ ma y.
54002010	Bɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a ka zi mɩŋŋa barɛ ma, bala, lannɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, a ɩ zum Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a ga a wʋm kʋ ŋ n'a ba ncɩnaaʋ.
54002011	Hɔdɩndarɛ wakatɩ ʋ, lannɔ wɔɔ a ga m, ŋnɩ zɛ sɩɩ•••, ŋnɩ yɛ hɔ haay ma.
54002012	Mɔɔ bɩ yɛm kʋ lannɔ n hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ yaarɔ m, ŋn'a so ŋ ʋ y, a a ga m, ŋnɩ zɛ sɩɩ•••.
54002013	Bala, Adam Woso lɛɛ ka an a da, Ɛɛvɩ n bɔkarɛ an a nya ʋ.
54002014	Adam bɛɛ Sʋtaana bra ba nɩ y, Ɛɛvɩ a bra ba m, an yɛ, an bɩsɩ ka Woso lɛ ma.
54002015	Bɩ, k'a yɛ nyɩdazaambaa ma an a tʋntɔ ʋ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, mɩŋŋabaa kɩ, mɩŋŋazerle kɩ, a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
54003001	Sɩra m, meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ba naa m, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a ka wosogʋɔɔ lɛɛ, zibəə mɩŋŋa a ʋ k'a ba.
54003002	Bɩ, kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzaa a ga m, an bɩr gʋaa kʋ n bɩ mim yɩrɛ n a hɩ ma y, a lʋ m bɩr deem, an bɩr gʋaa k'a a da a mɩŋŋa ma zaa, hɔɔndamimmazaa, nyasʋ a mɩŋŋa m zaa, an bɩr saanɔɔ sim mɩŋŋa a har ʋ, an n'a dam ma an hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.
54003003	A bɩ yɩ bɛɛmirezaa waasɩ y, a bɩ yɩ wɔkaarɛzaa nyaa bɩncɛ ʋ y, bɩ k'an yɩ kʋmarɛzaa, laafɩɩkamazaa, a bɩ yɩ busooŋʋarɛzaa y.
54003004	K'an dɩga a har mim ma mɩŋŋa, an a da a nyɩnɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr zuŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr a daŋ ʋ hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
54003005	Bala, kʋ gʋaa n a da ma an nyasʋ a har mim m mɩŋŋa, a y'a bam lɔ k'a a da ma, a nyasʋ Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma nɩ?
54003006	Kʋ gʋaa k'a yɩ kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzaa, a n a ga m, an yɩ sɩrakarɛzaa daa y, kʋ m bɛɛ m, a y'a mɩŋŋa busum, an dʋdɔyarlɛ kʋ Sʋtaana a yɩ bɩ yɩ.
54003007	A a ga m sɔ, k'a kasɛtɩ m bɩr mɩŋŋa gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr zum Krista ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zi, kʋ n b'a da ma, n a gore bɔ ʋ y, k'a b'a da Sʋtaana baŋŋa ʋ y.
54003008	Daahanzannɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, ŋnɩ yɩ mɩsɩrbaa zore zannɔ, sɩrazannɔ, ŋ bɩ yɩ bɛɛmirezannɔ waasɩ y, ŋ bɩ yɩ zambʋ hɔkamazannɔ y.
54003009	Ŋ y'a ga m, ŋnɩ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩra kʋ sɩrakarɛ a hɩnka bɩ nɔ ʋ, hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa m.
54003010	K'a lɛɛ ka a ŋ ka lɛɛ, a dɩga ŋ ma, kʋ mim ba ŋ gʋr zi, k'a bɔkarɛ a ŋ da daahanbaa zibəə b'ʋ.
54003011	Daahanzannɔ kʋ lannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa m, ŋ bɩ yɩ meerbaa bʋnyaa ba gʋɔɔ ma zannɔ y, ŋn'a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ yɩ jɩnalɛrazannɔ hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
54003012	Daahanzaa biyəə lʋ a ga m an bɩr deem, an a da a nyɩnɔ ma mɩŋŋa, an dɩga a har mim ma mɩŋŋa.
54003013	Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ daahanbaa zi bam mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ gore daʋrɛ yɩrɛ ŋnɩ heerkoodəbaa gʋta yɩ sɩra ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
54003014	Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam kʋ m bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi zɔɔ, bɩ naa haay gʋrsɩra mɔɔ ba ɩbɩɩ ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ,
54003015	kʋ mɔɔ bʋr m bɩr zɛm zɔɔ, k'ɩbɩɩ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a a ga m, an bɩr bam Woso gʋɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ dɔ. Wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m, Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ y'a so ʋ, sokʋma bɩ do n ta hɔdɩndarɛ k'a m sɩra bɩ m, an n'a kam gʋɔɔ n'a dɔrɛ.
54003016	Wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ hɔ gʋta k'a nyaakʋm da Woso n a hɩnka bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an bɩsɩ ka ma y. A a hɩnka mɛsim nɔ ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩnka gʋaa tɩrga, malɛɛkarɔ m dɩga a. N n'a mim pa da do vantɔɔ zi. Gʋɔɔ sɩra ka ʋ durnya nɔ ʋ jilli. Woso n a busu an a nyɩnta lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ arzana ʋ.
54004001	Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ paan••• a ʋ, jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ sɩrakarɛ tore, ŋnɩ yɛ brabagʋɔɔ m zinəro ma, kan hɔdɩndarɛrɔ kʋ zinəro wɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ, gʋɔɔ nɩ ŋ dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ ma.
54004002	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔ bam ɩ ʋ, gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n ŋ mɩ, ŋn'ɩ ŋʋaar bam nɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋn'a nyʋnnyɔɔ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro heer ga, amba sɛ tɩr na hɔ ma bɩ m, nyannɩ ba ŋ nɩ fɩɩga y.
54004003	Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ bɩ lʋ ka cɛ ʋ dɔ y, bɩ lannɔ bɩ cɛ ka sɔ y, ŋ hɔbɩrɛrɔ niŋŋoo bɩrɛ cizɛm, an bɔkarɛ Woso ɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro da sɩrakarɛzannɔ tɔ ma, bala, brɔɔ sɩra dɔ, kʋ ŋ nɩ barka yaa da Woso nɩ, ŋn'a dɔ ŋnɩ ŋ bɩ.
54004004	Bala, hɔ haay kʋ Woso a da bɩ mɩŋŋa, kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka ŋn'a dɔ ŋn'a sarɛ, ʋ n'ʋ ga m, ʋ dɩga deem taan••• ma hɔ bʋnyaa y.
54004005	Bala, Woso lemim bɩ kan wɔɔ yaadarɛ kɩ y'a hu bɔm.
54004006	Naa dɩnda sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m, k'ɩbɩɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ, ɩbɩɩ yɩm Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩ k'an mɩŋŋa, bɩ n'a hɩnkam sɔ a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ tʋrm sɩrakarɛ lemim bɩ m, kan sɩra hɔdɩndarɛ k'ɩ nɩ yɛm ma mɩŋŋa bɩ kɩ.
54004007	Ɩ bɩ yɛ biisi minno yaarsɩrɔ wɔɔ dɩndarɛ ma y, ŋ bɩr a dam gʋaa han sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ y. Ɩ bɩr ɩ tʋntɔŋ ʋ kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ barɛ kɩ.
54004008	Bala, kʋ gʋaa y'a mɛ paŋŋa dam la tʋntɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, daahan m, b'a gʋaa bankarɛ bɩ gʋta y, an bɔkarɛ, kʋ gʋaa ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ barɛ, a y'a dam gʋaa han hɔ haay nɔ ʋ. Woso ler bɔ, k'a zaa m mɩsɩrbaa paan••• yɩ tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, kan booti hinni ʋ kɩ.
54004009	Meerbaa naa do, sɩra m, gʋaa haay n'a ga m, an a si mɩŋŋa.
54004010	Naa minto m, wɔɔ nɩ yɛm kɔrɛ ma, ʋ n'ʋ yoŋ ʋ, bala, Woso k'a m mɩsɩr bɩ wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ. A m gʋaa haay bʋmbɔrɛzaa, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ an nɩ ŋ bʋmbɔm.
54004011	Naa, ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ hɩ paan•••, ɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.
54004012	Ɩ b'a ka gɔsɩ n ɩ gore bɔ ʋ, k'ɩ m gʋaa poo bɩ tɔ ma y. Bɩ, a ka k'ɩ yɩ makra mɩŋŋa sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ mɩm ʋ, ɩ meerbaa nɔ ʋ, ɩ tarɛ nɔ ʋ, ɩ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'an mɩŋŋa Woso mɩm ʋ barɛ nɔ ʋ.
54004013	Ɩ bɩr ɩ tɔŋ ʋ, kan Woso lemim bɩ karɩnda barɛ kɩ, gʋɔɔ sokʋma nɔ ʋ. Ɩ tɔ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ dʋndɔrɛ kɩ, kan hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m kɩ, k'an ta an mɔɔ bʋrlɛ ku.
54004014	Ɩ bɩ ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso a ka ɩ ʋ, k'ɩ zi bam bɩ to y. A ka k'a ʋ ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ, nyɩnta ʋ kan wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ meerbaa zannɔ kɩ, kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ y'a wɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ra kɩ sɔ.
54004015	Naa ɩbɩɩ ga m, ɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ ɩ heer ʋ, ɩ ɩ tʋntɔ ʋ kan a zibəə kɩ, gʋaa woo••• n a dɔ ŋ ʋ ɩ y'ɩ yoŋ ʋ, ɩ nɩ tam lɛɛ.
54004016	Dundo ɩ mɩŋŋa zi, ɩ dundo hɔ k'ɩ n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m bɩ zi, ɩ bɩr ɩ tɔŋ ʋ kan naa haay kɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ mɩŋŋa yɔm, ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr karɛ ɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ yɔ sɔ.
54005001	Ɩ bɩ həən si gʋaa gusire ma kan paŋŋa kɩ y, bɩ, dɩga ma ɩ zɩ, ɩ dʋndɔ. Nyukumbonno wɔɔ dʋndɔ danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ.
54005002	Ɩ lannɔ gusinno wɔɔ dʋndɔ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ dɔɔ m, lannɔ pooro wɔɔ dʋndɔ kan heer hu kɩ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ danlʋrɔ m.
54005003	Zonno kʋ ŋ gɔsɩ ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, nyasʋ ŋ nɩ kan daʋrɛ kɩ.
54005004	Zoro k'a nyɩnɔ n ta ʋ gɛɛ a yaŋŋɔɔ, nyɩnɔ wɔɔ, gɛɛ yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a ga m, ŋn'a yɩrɛzannɔ nyasʋm dɩnda. Naa ŋ y'a ga m, ŋn'a ba, a Woso zuure bɩ nɔ ʋ. Kʋ ŋ yɩrɛzannɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ nyasʋ ŋ nɩ sɔ. Woso n'a ŋʋam bɩ m naa.
54005005	Kʋ zoro k'an zoro paan••• an gɔɔta a deem bɩ nɩ, yo b'ʋ Woso ma, an nɩ yaa dam tee••• sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ, an nɩ daahan yɛm Woso han.
54005006	Bɩ, kʋ zoro k'a n'a kam mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ma bɩ nɩ, a mɩsɩr mɩnyaa dɩgarɛ nɔ ʋ, bɩ, sɩra nɔ ʋ, gər m Woso mɩm ʋ.
54005007	Ŋ bɔ zaa ʋ meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro m, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ mim yɩ ŋ gʋr zi k'a dɩnda y.
54005008	Kʋ gʋaa bɩr nyasʋrɛ a hargʋɔɔ nɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, a jɛɛrzannɔ nɩ y, a zaa sɩrakarɛ bɔ a jɛ m, a bʋnyaabaa lɛ da basɩrakarɛzaa m.
54005009	K'ɩ ʋ k'ɩ zoro tɔ da zombaa daahan ci b'ʋ, a a ga m, kʋ zoro bɩ do dɔɔraa m busɔrdɩ ku, bɩ nyɩnta a ʋ, gʋaa deem taan••• lʋ sɔ.
54005010	A a ga m sɔ, gʋɔɔ n a zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ kasɛtɩ ka, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a a nyɩnɔ tʋr mɩŋŋa, a saanɔɔ si mɩŋŋa a har ʋ, an wosogʋɔɔ gannɔ sʋrgɔ, an a da cicirzannɔ han, an zi mɩŋŋa do haay ba.
54005011	Kʋ zonno pooro wɔɔ nɩ, ɩ bɩ ŋ tɔ da ci b'ʋ y, bala, kʋ gʋaayar sʋra bʋr an ta ŋ nɩ, bɩ ŋ y'a gʋ Krista zuure ma, ŋn'a ŋʋam k'a a ya a zim sa.
54005012	A ba kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, n yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarlɛ, bala, ŋ n jɩm a lɛ ra lɛɛkarɛ ler kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ Krista m bɩ nɔ ʋ y.
54005013	A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, mim ŋ y'a ka nyɩnta vam m, ŋn'ɩ gʋɔɔ harlɛrɔ sam, an lɛ da bɩ, a lɛ n'a zum gʋɔɔ minno ʋ, ŋ bɩr dundore a zi y, hɔ k'a n'a ga hɩrɛ m bɩ, bɩ ŋn'a hɩm.
54005014	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ zonno pooro wɔɔ n'a ya ŋnɩ cɛ ka, ŋnɩ nyɩnɔ yɩ, ŋnɩ dɩga a jɛɛr mim ma mɩŋŋa, kʋ ŋ bɩ zaa ka wɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a da ma, ŋn'a bʋnyaa hɩ wɔɔ ma y.
54005015	Bala, zonno pooro wɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a bɔ zaa tɩrga b'ʋ kara, ŋn'ɩ zum Sʋtaana ʋ.
54005016	Kʋ lʋ sɩrakarɛzaa ɩ zonno m a har gʋɔɔ barla, k'an nyasʋ ŋ nɩ, a b'a to kʋ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma n kɔ ŋ tɔ ma y, k'an a da ma, an a da zonno kʋ ŋ gʋɔɔ ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ han.
54005017	Gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ m ŋn'a zi bam mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a ga daʋrɛ m gallɛm hɩɩya, an lɛ da bɩ, niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ nɩ kɔm kan Woso lemim padarɛ zibəə kɩ, hɔdɩnda gʋɔɔ m zibəə kɩ rɔ wɔɔ.
54005018	Bala, Wosoci b'a hɩ a ʋ: Ɩ bɩ hɔ du der k'a n'ɩ yɩr zɔm bɩ lɛ ma y. A a ya, an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Zibəəzaa a ga m, an a zibəə nyɔɔdʋ yɩ.
54005019	Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a ʋ, lɛɛzaa mim ba, kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ n a hɩ ŋ ʋ, a mim bɩ do ba denter y, ɩ bɩ mim bɩ do si sɩra y.
54005020	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ, həən si ŋ ma gʋɔɔ woo••• lɛɛ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ m nyi ba, ŋnɩ dundo a zi.
54005021	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, Woso kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ, Woso malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ, k'ɩ zu hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m haay naa ʋ, ɩ bɩ jirə bɔ k'ɩ zɛ gʋaa m gumə ma y, gɛɛ k'ɩ gumə ka ʋ y.
54005022	Ɩ b'ɩ wɔ ka gɔsɩ mim la nyagɩra m, k'an zi ba wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla y, ɩ bɩ gasʋ gʋaa mimbʋnyaa ʋ y. Dundo ɩ mɩŋŋa zi, k'a bʋnyaa b'a nɔ ɩ ma y.
54005023	Ɩ bɩ gɔɔta ɩ bɩr hi mire a minto bala y, dɩvɛn mi poore, ɩ nɔ k'a tɩr busum an tɩr ɩ dam kɔrɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
54005024	Gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo mimbʋnyaarɔ ɩ yɩm garga ra, bɩ n ŋ dʋdɔ ka cɩna y, gɔsɩnnɔ hɔɔ bɩr dɔm zɔɔ y, ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ dɔ n tɩr a ʋ jɛ ʋ.
54005025	Zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ do m bɩ sɔ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ hɔɔ tɩr yɩm garga ra, nɔɔ zibəə bɩr yɩm garga ra lɛɛm nɩ y, bɩ ŋ zɛm bɩ bɔ garga ra.
54006001	Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ lɔmbaa kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a ga m, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ a ga daʋrɛ m. Kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩ Woso tɔ zar y, kʋ ŋ bɩ wɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ tɔ zar sɔ y.
54006002	Lɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ zannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ b'a hɩ ŋ ʋ, a hɔdeem kan ŋ kɩ Krista danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ gore bɔ ʋ y. A ga a ʋ m, ŋnɩ ŋ zi ba mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa denter an lɛ da, kʋ sɩrakarɛzannɔ m, ŋ bɔɔ m ŋnɩ ŋ ŋʋam, ŋn'ɩ ŋ zi bam bɩ tɔ ma. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ga m, ɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m, ɩ ŋ dʋndɔ m bɩ n naa.
54006003	Kʋ gʋaa ɩ hɔ vanta dɩndam, a bɩr yɛm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista sɩra meerbaarɔ wɔɔ ma y, b'a bɩr yɛm hɔdɩndarɛ k'a ga kʋ ʋ ba kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ kɩ ma sɔ,
54006004	gʋaa bɩ do bɩ, mɩŋŋabusurezaa m. A n hɔsɩ dɔ y, bɩsɩkarɛ waasɩ yaaba n ta m, an n'a kam ma k'a nyaa ba meerbaanyɩrɔ tɔ ma. Naa nɩ zɛm lɛtaama bʋnyaa m kan kʋmarɛwar kɩ, kʋ tɔ zarlɛ kɩ, hɔɔn da kʋ ma bʋnyaa kɩ m.
54006005	A ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔɔn m daŋŋada rɔ wɔɔ dam bɩsɩkarɛ jintoo ma, bala, ŋ n sɩra dɔ y, ŋn'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, sɩrakawosoʋ bɩ, hɔnyɩ yɩrɛ zaa m.
54006006	Denter m, sɩrakawosoʋ bɩ, hɔnyɩ gʋta m, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ʋ, ɩ y'ɩ zergam hɔ k'ɩ m ta m bɩ rɛ.
54006007	Bala, bʋr kʋ wɔɔ ʋ durnya ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ n bʋr hɔsɩ nɩ y, wɔɔ y'ʋ bɔm sɔ ʋ wɔ m vam.
54006008	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ m kan huu kɩ m, naa a ga m, an wɔɔ bɔ.
54006009	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam ma k'a ba hɔnyɩzannɔ wɔɔ, a do ŋ nawʋm makra nɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ gasʋm lɛtaamarɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋnyaa baŋŋa nɔ ʋ. Lɛtaamarɔ wɔɔ duro nɩ gʋɔɔ dam zaarbarɛ kan nyaanlɛ kɩ ma.
54006010	Bala, mimbʋnyaarɔ do haay məsi m busoo ŋʋarɛ m. Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a nyʋnnyɔɔ ŋn'a ba sɩrakarɛ ma laatʋ, ŋn'ɩ fɩr do y'a hʋnhɔ yɩm a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, busoo ŋʋarɛ kʋ ŋ gasʋ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
54006011	B'ɩbɩɩ, Woso gʋaa n'ɩ mɩ, ɩ ba laatʋ naa woo••• ma, ɩ ɩ tɔ ʋ kan tɩrgabaa zibəə kɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ kɩ, kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ, ŋʋarɛ kɩ, tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ, nyɩntabaa kɩ.
54006012	Zoo mɩŋŋa kʋ sɩrakarɛ zoo m bɩ ba, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ. Ɩbɩɩ bir Woso ʋ bɩ tɔ ma, ɩbɩɩ m nyɩnta ɩ yɛ ma, ɩ ɩ sɩrakarɛ bɔ ɩ lɛ ma mɩŋŋa gʋɔɔ cir lɛɛ.
54006013	Kʋ m lɛ cɩnta ɩ m, Woso k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam hɔ haay ʋ bɩ taa, kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ taa, bɩ nyɩnta an a sɩrakarɛ kasɛtɩ ka mɩŋŋa Pɔns Pɩlatɩ taa.
54006014	Lɛ kʋ mɔɔ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Zu hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m haay b'ʋ, ɩ nyasʋ m kʋ dintim b'a nɔ ma y, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta ɩ gʋr zi sɔ y, kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista n tolle ba an a bɔ an bʋr.
54006015	A zɛm dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta k'an b'ʋr ma b'ʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ lɛ da haay, a y'a so heernyɔɔ ʋ, a m cinno haay Cir, a m zuubarɔ haay Zuuba,
54006016	a mɩŋŋa y'a deem taan••• ɩ bɩr garɛ y, lɛɛgure kʋ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a zɔ ma nɔ an nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, gɔsɩ n a yɩ y, bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a yɩ y. A y'a so lɛbɔʋrɛ ʋ kan paŋŋa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ kɩ! Amina.
54006017	A hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ m durnya naa do nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ, ŋ b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu, bɩ ŋ bɩ yo hɔnyɩ ma y, bala hɔ cenlezaa m. Bɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ yo Woso ma, a m nɩ hɔ woo••• kam wɔɔ ʋ gʋta, kʋ wɔɔ m bɩr ta ŋ nɩ, ʋ ʋ heer nyɔɔ ŋ nɩ.
54006018	A hɩ ŋ nɩ ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba, ŋn'a ba zi mɩŋŋa barɛzannɔ gʋtɔɔ, ŋnɩ yɩ hɔkarɛzannɔ, ŋn'a da gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ han a hɔnyɩ bɩ m.
54006019	Kʋ ŋ y'a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, hɔnyɩ mɩŋŋa k'a b'a zarlɛ, ŋn'a cɩntarɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ m booti hinni tɔ ma, k'a bɩ mɩsɩrbaa paan••• yɩ.
54006020	Timote ra, nyasʋ hɔ kʋ Woso a da ɩ wɔ ʋ bɩ m, ɩ b'ɩ lɛ zu meerbaarɔ yaarsɩrɔ kʋ bɩsɩkawosoma meerbaarɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ʋ y, kan bɩsɩkarɛ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma hɔdɔrɛ, bɩ ŋʋaar hɔdɔrɛ m b'ʋ y.
54006021	Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ sɩrakarɛ to ŋn'a nyʋnnyɔɔ, kʋ ŋ ʋ, a ta hɔdɔrɛ naa do m bɩ tɔ ma. Bɩ, kʋ Woso barka n nyɩnta kan ɩ kɩ!
55001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol ɩ ci naa do ba, Woso ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa, kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa kʋ Woso a ler bɔ, wɔɔ n'a yɩm Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ pa da.
55001002	Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, Timote, mɔɔ nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, m n'ɩ ŋʋam, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ kʋ Zɩ Woso, kan wɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu kɩ n barka, kan cicirzɛrɛ kɩ, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka ɩ ʋ.
55001003	Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka, a zi mɔɔ n'a bam kan noom hu kɩ, amba mɔɔ yaabɔɔ zu ʋ bɩ m. Sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ mɔɔ yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ haay, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma, m n'a barka darɛ.
55001004	Nyi k'ɩbɩɩ ka bɩ tɔ ɩ mɔɔ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam paan••• kʋ m m ya, m ɩ yɩ, kʋ m heer n nyɔɔ gʋta.
55001005	Sɩra k'ɩbɩɩ ka denter bɩ, a tɔ ɩ mɔɔ nɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ yaabalʋ Loyis ɩ nyɩnta sɩrakarɛ bɩ do m, ɩ da Enis nyɩntam sɔ. Bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ta sɩrakarɛ bɩ do m sɔ.
55001006	Naa minto m, mɔɔ nɩ m ya, m n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, m ʋ, ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso a ka ɩ ʋ k'ɩ zi ba m, mɔɔ nɩ m wɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ra ɩbɩɩ n a yɩ bɩ, zi ba m.
55001007	Bala, Ɛspri kʋ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩr wɔɔ dam nyibəə ma y, bɩ, paŋŋa kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, daamɩŋŋama kɩ an n'a kam wɔɔ ʋ.
55001008	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ɩ bɩ nyannɩ zɛ wɔɔ Zuuba kasɛtɩ karɛ ma y, ɩ bɩ nyannɩ zɛ mɔɔ tɔ ma kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ a tɔ ma bɩ minto sɔ y. Bɩ, yo Woso paŋŋa ma, ɩ yɛ fɩr ma lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma am mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
55001009	Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ yɔ, wɔɔ bir a ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ a gʋɔɔ. A n naa ba, wɔɔ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ tɔ ma y, a mɩŋŋa hɔɔnhɔ kan barka k'a n'a kam bɩ kɩ tɔ ma m. Barka bɩ do ka a ʋ wɔɔ ʋ, Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya n a sɩŋŋɩda ba y.
55001010	Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa Krista Yeezuu k'a bʋr bɩ, barka bɩ do a hɩnka garga ra. Bala, a zɛ paŋŋa zaar ba, an mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ hɩnka lemim nyɩnta bɩ m.
55001011	Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do padarɛ tɔ ma m, Woso n mɔɔ bɔ ʋ, kʋ m yɩ a padarɛzaa, kristazibəəzaa, a hɔdɩndarɛzaa.
55001012	Bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ fɩr naa yɩm, bɩ fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ nyannɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ y, bala, gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ zaa dɔ mɩŋŋa, bɩ mɔɔ heer kookoo sɔ, m a dɔ m ʋ, a ɩ paŋŋa m k'a dɔ hɔ k'a a da mɔɔ wɔ ʋ bɩ ma, k'an ta an a zɛrɛ hinni ku.
55001013	Yo sɩra meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ba kan ɩ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ jɩm sɩrakarɛ kan ŋʋarɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.
55001014	Dɔ hɔdɩndarɛ mɩŋŋa kʋ n y'a da ɩ wɔ ʋ bɩ ma, ɩ dɔ ma Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa k'a nɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ m.
55001015	Ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, kristagʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Azii kʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ haay a bɔ mɔɔ ʋ, Fizɛl kan Hɛrmozɛnnɩ kɩ yɩ ŋ barla sɔ.
55001016	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Woso n'a cicirzɛrɛ kərgu Onezifɔɔr hargʋɔɔ ra, bala, a tɩr mɔɔ heer ba kookoo dɔmɩm niŋŋoo ʋ, nyannɩ n a nyasʋ mɔɔ dure bɩ tɔ ma y.
55001017	Bala, bʋr k'a ʋ Rɔm ʋ naa ʋ bɩ, a a ka mɔɔ bɩncɛ ma paan•••, an aa mɔɔ yɩ.
55001018	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Zuuba n a ka, k'an Woso ba mɩŋŋa yɩ, Zuuba mɩŋŋa zɛrɛ hinni ʋ. Ɩbɩɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa sɔ ɩ ʋ, nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Efɛɛzɩ ʋ bɩ, a a da mɔɔ han gʋta.
55002001	K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, m nyɩ, ɩ paŋŋa da ra, barka kʋ wɔɔ n ta m Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
55002002	Mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ma gʋɔɔ cir lɛɛ bɩ, a dɩnda gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyasʋm nɩ mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a dɩnda gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ m sɔ.
55002003	Yɛ fɩryɩrɛ ma am mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m, hɔ kʋ Krista Yeezuu yarbər mɩŋŋa a ga m, an a ba bɩ m naa.
55002004	Kʋ yarbər ta yar ma, k'a lɛ taa kʋ yarbənno cir bɩ nɔ n yɩ a ra, a bɩr a kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ ma y.
55002005	A dɔ sɔ ɩ ʋ, kʋ n brasire ganwʋrɛ cɩnta, kʋ gʋaa n zu bra bɩ sire zaa ʋ, n bɩ ganwʋrɛ bɩ kaŋ ʋ y.
55002006	Danwur k'a kɔ dam lɛ ra bɩ n nɩ lɛɛ kam an aa dam bɩ wʋrɛ hɔ yɩ.
55002007	Ɩ hɔɔn da hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm naa ma k'ɩ jɩ ma, bala, Zuuba hɔɔn karɛ ɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ jɩ ma haay.
55002008	Yeezuu Krista tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ, Davɩd do gʋaa m, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, amba lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ m.
55002009	Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩm, n nɩ mɔɔ du, ɩ ʋ, zibʋnyaabarɛzaa m mɔɔ m. Bɩ, kʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɩ, n a du y.
55002010	Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ yɛm fɩr do haay ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto, kʋ brɔɔ n a da ma sɔ, ŋnɩ bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ Krista Yeezuu n'a kam bɩ yɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ.
55002011	Meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ba naa, sɩra m an a ga sire m: Kʋ wɔɔ ga kan Yeezuu Krista kɩ, wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bam kan kɩ sɔ.
55002012	Kʋ wɔɔ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ kan kɩ, wɔɔ cirbəə bɩm kan kɩ sɔ, kʋ wɔɔ bɩsɩ ka ma, a bɩsɩ kam wɔɔ ma sɔ.
55002013	Kʋ wɔɔ n jɩm ʋ lɛ ra kan kɩ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ jɩnɩm a lɛ ra tee•••, bala, a b'a dam ma, an bɩsɩ ka a mɩŋŋa ma y.
55002014	Meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ba nɔɔn m tɔ da gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ haay, ɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ paan••• Woso lɛɛ, ɩ ʋ, ŋn'a si nyaa kʋ n n'a bam meerbaarɔ tɔ ma lɛɛ. Bala, ŋ hɔsɩ ba ʋ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ an nɩ ŋ zaar bam.
55002015	Ɩ tɔ ʋ k'ɩ yɩ gʋaa k'a a ga m kʋ Woso nɔ n yɩ ra, k'ɩ yɩ zibəəzaa k'a zibəə nyannɩ ba ʋ y, an nɩ sɩra lemim bɩ dɩndam mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa.
55002016	Ɩ bɩ yɛ sʋʋra yaarsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr a dam gʋaa han sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ gɔɔtam tee••• ŋnɩ bɩr a bam laatʋ Woso ma.
55002017	Ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nyim k'a nɩ gʋaa mɛ bɩm haay kɩ. Himene kan Filɛtɩ kɩ yɩ ŋ barla.
55002018	Ŋ hɔ, ŋnɩ sɩra bɩ to, ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ cem kara, ŋn'a kam gʋɔɔ gʋta n'a bɔm sɩrakarɛ ʋ.
55002019	Bɩ, kan naa kɩ haay Woso sɩra bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ, kan cɛjɩr kɩ, an gɔɔta an n'a bɩncɛ ʋ, n nɩ gʋrsɩra ba cɛjɩr bɩ ma, n ʋ: Zuuba a gʋɔɔ dɔ. N n'a ya, n ʋ: Gʋaa k'a ʋ Zuuba gʋaa n'a mɩ bɩ, k'an a gʋ mimbʋnyaa ma.
55002020	Cɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ, mɔr y'a hʋnhɔ ta ʋ, n n'a ba sarma m kan wanzurfu kɩ m, n nɩ nɔɔrɔ ba gɔ m kan taa kɩ m. Lɛɛkarɛ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ dɔmɩm gʋta hinni ʋ n nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, n nɩ zi barɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, dɔmɩm biyəə, n yɩ zi yaarsɩrɔ barɛ ŋ nɩ.
55002021	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a gʋ zi bʋnyaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ gaa da rɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hu bɔ, a bɔm mɔr gorezaa rɛ, mɔr k'an zore, an mɩŋŋa Zuuba ma, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ haay tɔ ma.
55002022	Ɩ si nyukumbombaa lɛtaamarɔ lɛɛ, ɩ ɩ tɔ ʋ kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, ɩ bɩr ɩ kam tɩrgabaa zibəə ma, sɩrakarɛ ma, kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, laafɩɩ kɩ ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa dam Zuuba m kan heer hu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
55002023	Bɩ, ɩ bɩ yɛ, hɔɔnwar kan badɔ kɩ bɩsɩkarɛrɔ wɔɔ ma y, ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, ŋ nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, nyaa m.
55002024	A n bɔkarɛ, Zuuba zibəənyɩ n a ga m, an nyaa ba y, a ga a ʋ m, an bɩr mɩŋŋa kan gʋaa woo••• kɩ, an a da hɔdɩnda gʋɔɔ m ma, an bɩr bʋraama m.
55002025	A a ga m, k'an hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam ma rɔ wɔɔ m, heer bʋgʋ-bʋgʋda m, bala, a a da ma, brɔɔ n a bɔ a taa m, ŋnɩ sɩra dɔ.
55002026	Maam bɩ, ŋ hɔɔn zerm, ŋn'a yɔ Sʋtaana k'a ŋ gʋr a baŋŋarɔ ʋ, an ŋ ba a lɔnnɔ, kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔnhɔ ba bɩ m.
55003001	A dɔ mɩŋŋa ɩ ʋ, dɔmɩnnɔ jɛzannɔ ʋ, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ yɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
55003002	Bala, gʋɔɔ y'a kam a mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan ma bala, busoo ŋʋarɛ n'a so ŋ ʋ, nyɩnta ŋ nawʋm lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ zannɔ, mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ, Woso sʋnsɔwʋrɛzannɔ, bɩsɩ ka a zɩrɔ ma zannɔ, bajindɔrɛzannɔ, Woso hɔ gore bɔʋrɛzannɔ.
55003003	Ŋ bɩ nyɩntam ŋʋarɛ m y, ŋ nyɩntam bacicirzɛrɛzannɔ, gʋɔɔtɔzarlɛzannɔ, badaamɩŋŋazannɔ, ŋ nyɩntam bʋnyaa gʋta, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ jɩnnɔ,
55003004	bɩmbɩrkʋmazannɔ, badundoamɩŋŋazizannɔ, mɩŋŋabusure n'a so ŋ ʋ maam-maam, ŋ y'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ŋʋarɛ an lɛ da Woso ŋʋarɛ m.
55003005	Ŋ y'a hɔ barɛ ɩ ʋ, wosozuurezannɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, bɩ ŋ zibəəro y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso paŋŋa bɩ n ŋ mɩsɩrbaa lʋr y. Ɩ gʋ gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma.
55003006	Ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ gasʋm gʋɔɔ hadrɔ ʋ sɩɩ•••, ŋnɩ lannɔ hɔɔnwarzannɔ kum hɔɔnkarɛ m, lannɔ wɔɔ duro mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋta, ŋn'ɩ zum a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ haay ʋ.
55003007	Ŋ yɩ hɔ dɩndam tee•••, bɩ ŋ bɩr a dam ma ŋn'ɩ sɩra dɔrɛ y.
55003008	Amba Zanɛs kan Zambrɛs kɩ a da Moyiisi lɛ ʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro sɔ, a da ŋ nawʋm sɩra lɛ ʋ ŋ bɩr yɛrɛ y. Hɔɔn nyaanlɛzannɔ m, ŋ n sɩra ka Woso ʋ denter y.
55003009	Bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ ta lɛɛ y, bala, gʋaa woo••• sʋrlɛ ŋ hɔɔnwar zibəə bɩ ra, amba n nyɩnta n nɩ sʋr Zanɛs kan Zambrɛs kɩ hɔ ra bɩ m.
55003010	Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, ɩbɩɩ zu mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ ʋ mɩŋŋa, ɩ mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ dɔ, kan mɔɔ gɩngarɔ kɩ, m sɩrakarɛ kɩ, m bʋr m mɩŋŋa ma kɩ, m ŋʋarɛ kɩ, m tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ.
55003011	Ɩbɩɩ fɩr kʋ gʋɔɔ a ka mɔɔ ma, kan cicir kʋ mɔɔ yɩ Antɩyɔs kʋ ʋ, kan Ikoniyɔm kʋ ʋ kɩ, Listɩr kʋ ʋ kɩ bɩ dɔ. Mɔɔ fɩr do haay yɩ, bɩ Zuuba mɔɔ yɔ ŋ haay nɔ ʋ.
55003012	Pakra m hɔɔ, kʋ gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a zu Woso ʋ mɩŋŋa, Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
55003013	Bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ, bra bɩmba gʋɔɔ m zannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, ŋ gɔɔtarɛ ŋnɩ bɩr tam lɛɛ zi bʋnyaa barɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr bra bɩmbam gʋɔɔ m ŋnɩ bɩr tarɛ, ŋnɩ bɩr bra bɩmbarɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ m sɔ.
55003014	K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, jɩm hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ dɩnda ɩ sɩra ka ʋ paan••• bɩ nɔ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ. Bala, ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ sɩra bɩ.
55003015	A n a sa ɩbɩɩ nyɩbaa ma, ɩbɩɩ Wosoci bɩ dɔ, a y'a dam ma an hɔɔn ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ m sɩra ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ, ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
55003016	Hɔ kʋ n y'a da Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʋ haay bɩ, Woso Ɛspri y'a ka n n'a da ʋ, bɩ, ta an a wʋ ʋ gʋɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ minto, k'a nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ da jɩm ʋ, k'a gʋaa bɔ zaa ʋ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa tɩrga barɛ dɩnda gʋaa m.
55003017	Kʋ Woso gʋaa mɩsɩrbaa n bankarɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa, k'a n a da ma an zi mɩŋŋa do haay ba.
55004001	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ han paan••• Woso mɩm ʋ, kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ mɩm ʋ, bɩ zɛm bɩ gʋɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ kan gəəno kɩ dʋdɔ ka, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, hinni k'a nɩ zɛŋ ʋ k'a bɩ cirbəə bɩ bɩ tɔ ma sɔ,
