55004002	k'ɩ Woso lemim bɩ pa da, ɩ bɩr som la tee•••. K'a so ra dɔmɩm naanaa, gɛɛ k'a kʋsɩ, k'ɩ gɔɔta ɩ bɩr som la, həən si gʋɔɔ ma, ɩ bɔ ŋ lɛɛ kʋ ŋ n'a mimbʋnyaa to, ŋ heer yo kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa ba, naa haay ba bʋraama gʋta nɔ ʋ, ɩ bɩr hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
55004003	Bala, dɔmɩm zɛm, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋn'a tʋr ka sɩra hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ ma y, bɩ zu ŋ nawʋrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛtaamarɔ ʋ, ŋn'a ka a hɔɔnhɔ karɩnsaambɔɔ ma ŋn'a bɩr a ma yɔɔgʋ, brɔɔ n bɩr hɔ k'an nyɩnta ŋ ma dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
55004004	Ŋ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋn'a tʋr ka sɩra ma dɔ y, ŋʋaar minno ŋn'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma.
55004005	B'ɩbɩɩ, bʋr ɩ ma hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, yɛ fɩr ma, lemim nyɩnta padarɛzaa zi ba, zibəə kʋ Woso a ka ɩ ʋ bɩ ba mɩŋŋa.
55004006	Bala, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, wakatɩ a ku kʋ m yɛ zɛ ma. Mɔɔ zɛ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan mannɩ kɩ, mɔɔ hʋrlɛ wakatɩ a ku.
55004007	Mɔɔ zoo mɩŋŋa ba, mɔɔ brasire a tɛkka ku, mɔɔ nyasʋ sɩrakarɛ m.
55004008	Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso dama ganwʋrɛ cɩnta mɔɔ m, ganwʋrɛ bɩ do bɩ, tɩrgabaa m, an b'a kam mɔɔ ʋ, dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ b'ʋ. A mɩŋŋa m dʋdɔkarɛzaa tɩrga. Mɔɔ bɛɛ an n'a karɛ m ʋ m deem nɩ y, a y'a kam gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋam k'an bʋr lɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
55004009	Ɩ tɔ ʋ, k'ɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi zɔɔ.
55004010	Bala, Demas a bɔ mɔɔ ʋ, k'a nɩ her durnya naa ŋʋam bɩ tɔ ma. A a hʋr an ta Tesaloniki ʋ, Gresans ta Galasii ʋ, Tiitɩ ta Dalmasi ʋ.
55004011	Likki y'a deem ɩ gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ. K'ɩ bʋr ɩ n nɩ zɛm k'ɩ Markɩ gaa ɩ bʋr m, bala, a y'a dam mɔɔ han gʋta m zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.
55004012	Mɔɔ Tisikkɩ nyɔɔ Efɛɛzɩ ʋ.
55004013	K'ɩ zɛm, kɩ bɔ Trowas kʋ ʋ Karpus zi, ɩ nyɛɛm huu kʋ mɔɔ to b'ʋ bɩ sa ɩ bʋr m, ciro wɔɔ gʋr ɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ sɔ, an lɛ da bɩ, n nɩ ŋ ba hɔbɩsɩ ci m nɔ wɔɔ.
55004014	Alɛsandɩr, saar bɩ, a zi bʋnyaa ba mɔɔ m gʋta, Zuuba y'a zibəə zɩm kaŋ ʋ.
55004015	Dundo ɩ mɩŋŋa zi kan kɩ sɔ, bala, a bɩsɩ ka wɔɔ meerbaarɔ ma gʋta.
55004016	Mɔɔ lɛɛkarɛ dʋdɔ bɩ karɛ ma bɩ, gɔsɩ n nyɩnta ʋ k'a a da mɔɔ han y, a bɔ ŋ y'a mɔɔ ʋ haay. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm Woso han, k'a b'a taar ka ŋ la y.
55004017	Bɩ, Zuuba a da mɔɔ han an paŋŋa ka mɔɔ ʋ, yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ mɔɔ n zi kʋ n y'a ka mɔɔ ʋ lemim nyɩnta padarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ ba haay, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ haay n a ma. Bɩ, Zuuba mɔɔ yɔ taatii bɩ lɛ ʋ!
55004018	Zuuba gɔɔtarɛ an mɔɔ yɔ zi bʋnyaa haay wɔ ʋ, an dɔ mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ n gasʋ a cirbəə kʋ ʋ arzana ʋ. A tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay! Amina.
55004019	Yaa da Priska kan Akilas kɩ m, yaa da Onezifɔɔr har gʋɔɔ m sɔ.
55004020	Erastɩ gɔɔta Korɛntɩ kʋ ʋ. Trofim yaaba zɛ, mɔɔ n a to Milɛ kʋ ʋ.
55004021	Ɩ tɔ ʋ ɩ bʋr, kʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm n bɔkarɛ an a ku. Ebulus kan Pudɛns kɩ, Linus kɩ, Klodɩya kan danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ k'ɩ yaa darɛ ɩ m.
55004022	Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba n bɩr kan ɩ kɩ. Woso barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
56001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, Yeezuu Krista zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, kʋ m a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n sɩra ka, ŋnɩ sɩra dɔ, an a ga mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ m,
56001002	kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ ta a heer lɛ. Woso ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do ler bɔ wɔɔ m, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya ba ʋ y. Bɩ, Woso bɩr ŋʋaar barɛ y.
56001003	Dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a b'a ku bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do hɩnka, lemim k'a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ n a pa da bɩ m. Woso mɩŋŋa, k'an wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ, a lɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ, an lemim bɩ do da mɔɔ wɔ ʋ, kʋ m a pa da.
56001004	Tiitɩ, ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, mɔɔ nyɩ paan••• n'ɩbɩɩ m, sɩrakarɛ deem kʋ wɔɔ m ta m bɩ nɔ ʋ. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa Krista Yeezuu kɩ n barka, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka ɩ ʋ.
56001005	Ɩbɩɩ to mɔɔ ʋ Krɛtɩ kʋ ʋ b'ʋ, k'ɩ gɔɔta ɩ hɔ k'a n bankarɛ yɩ cɩna bɩ banka, k'ɩ gʋɔɔ nyʋkɔ ʋ, ɩ ŋ ba kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ Krɛtɩ kʋnɔ rɔ wɔɔ biyəə nɔ ʋ, amba hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m bɩ m.
56001006	K'ɩ ʋ k'ɩ lɛɛzaa bɔ ʋ, a a ga m, an yɩ gʋaa kʋ n bɩ mim yɩrɛ n a hɩ ma y, a lʋ m bɩr deem, a nyɩnɔ m sɩrakarɛzannɔ, ŋ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa barɛ y, balɛsire zannɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ sɔ y.
56001007	Bala, kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ, wosogʋɔɔ nyasʋnzaa m, bɩ minto bɩ, a a ga m, k'an bɩr gʋaa kʋ n bɩ mim yɩrɛ n a hɩ ma y, a n a ga m, an yɩ mɩŋŋabusurezaa, nɔmaazaa, gɛɛ bɛɛmirezaa waasɩ y, a n a ga m, an yɩ wɔkaarɛzaa nyaa bɩncɛ ʋ, gɛɛ zambʋ hɔ kamazaa y.
56001008	A a ga m, an bɩr saanɔɔ sim a har ʋ mɩŋŋa, an bɩr zi mɩŋŋabarɛ ŋʋarɛ, an bɩr hɔɔndamimmazaa, an bɩr gʋaa tɩrga, gʋaa k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam, bʋraamazaa.
56001009	A a ga m, k'an jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Woso lemim paan••• kʋ ŋ y'a dɩndam bɩ nɔ ʋ. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a y'a dam ma, an gʋɔɔ dʋndɔ sɩra hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, an bɩsɩkənno da jɩm ʋ.
56001010	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋkɔ ʋ amba wɔɔ hɩ bɩ m, bala, gʋɔɔ ta ʋ gʋta, an lɛ da bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, ŋ bɩr yɛm k'a zu sɩra ʋ y. Ŋ nɩ bra bɩmbam gʋɔɔ m meerbaa yaarsɩrɔ m.
56001011	A ka kʋ ŋ n'a meerbaarɔ wɔɔ barɛ to, bala, ŋ yɩ hadrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ gʋɔɔ zaar bam, ŋn'ɩ hɔ k'a n a ga m dɩndam gʋɔɔ m k'a hɔ yɩ, zambʋ hɔ yɩrɛ m.
56001012	Krɛtɩ zannɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ gʋaa deem, kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩgam ma a lɛsinnɩsorazaa nyɩnta an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Krɛtɩ zannɔ wɔɔ, ŋʋaarzannɔ m tee•••, poohɔɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, yakʋzannɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, ŋ n hɔ vanta dɔ kʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɛɛ y."
56001013	Hɔ kʋ gʋaa b'a hɩ naa, sɩra m, naa minto bɩ, həən si ŋ ma paan•••, kʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ n yɩ mɩŋŋa.
56001014	Kʋ ŋ nɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ hɔdɩndarɛ k'ɩ ʋ noondarɛ m bɩ to, ŋ bɩ zu lɛrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra to rɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta rɔ wɔɔ ʋ y.
56001015	Kʋ gʋaa heer hu ta ʋ, hɔ haay hu ta ʋ sɔ kan kɩ. Bɩ kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ dintinzannɔ m, ŋ bɩr sɩra kam nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, dintim m hɔ haay m kan ŋ kɩ. Bala, ŋ hɔɔndarɛrɔ bʋnyaa, kʋ ŋ y'a bʋnyaa bam sɔ, nyannɩ ba ŋ nɩ y.
56001016	Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, a Woso dɔ, bɩ ŋ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ ʋ, ŋ n Woso dɔ y. Hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ Woso mɩm ʋ, bayɛrɛzannɔ m, ŋ b'a dam zi mɩŋŋa sɩ barɛ ma y.
56002001	K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ga kʋ ʋ kan hɔdɩndarɛ k'an sɩra bɩ kɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.
56002002	A hɩ gʋɔɔ gusinno wɔɔ m ɩ ʋ, ŋn'a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr daʋrɛ m, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɔɔn dam mim ma mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ bɩr sɩrakarɛ m paan•••, ŋnɩ bɩr ŋʋarɛ denter m, ŋnɩ bɩr a tʋntɔŋ ʋ tee•••.
56002003	A hɩ lannɔ gusinno wɔɔ m sɔ ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam, ŋ bɩ yɩ gʋɔɔ tɔzarlɛzannɔ y, ŋ bɩ yɩ bɛɛmirewaasɩzannɔ y, ŋnɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.
56002004	Ŋ n'a ba ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ lannɔ pooro wɔɔ n hɔɔntaʋrɛ dɩnda a zino kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ ŋʋarɛ minto,
56002005	kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr hɔɔndamimmazannɔ, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa zore barɛ, ŋnɩ bɩr nyasʋrɛ a jɛɛr m mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ bɩr nyɩntabaa m, ŋnɩ bɩr yɛrɛ a zino lɛ ma, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ Woso lemim bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y.
56002006	Nyukumbonno wɔɔ dʋndɔ maam sɔ ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɔɔn dam mim ma mɩŋŋa hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
56002007	A ka k'ɩ mɩŋŋa n yɩ makra mɩŋŋa, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ nɔ ʋ, hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m sɩra m kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, a ka k'ɩ hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, kʋ n n'ɩ gore da ʋ.
56002008	A ka k'ɩ meerbaa n bɩr mɩŋŋa, kʋ gʋaa bɩ hɔsɩ yɩ k'a hɩ ɩ ma y, kʋ wɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma, ŋnɩ hɔ bʋnyaa hɩ wɔɔ ma y, kʋ ŋ nɩ nyannɩ bɩ.
56002009	Lɔnnɔ wɔɔ dʋndɔ ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ yɛ a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ ma hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, ŋ n'a ka ma k'a ŋ heer nyɔɔ, ŋ bɩ bɩsɩ ka ŋ ma y.
56002010	Ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ kʋna y, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam tee•••, kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a ɩ sɩra bam. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Woso kʋ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ, hɔ kʋ n n'a dɩndam bɩ daʋrɛ yɩm hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
56002011	Bala, Woso a barka hɩnka gʋaa haay bʋmbɔrɛ tɔ ma.
56002012	Woso barka bɩ n'a ŋʋam bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ bɔ mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa haay ʋ, kan durnya naa do lɛtaamarɔ haay kɩ ʋ. K'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ her-her mɩsɩrbaa naa ba mɩŋŋanyasʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, kan tɩrgabaa kɩ, Woso hɔɔnhɔ mɩsɩrbaa kɩ nɔ ʋ.
56002013	Ʋ bɩr ʋ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, ʋ bɩr dɔm dɔmɩm nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ, wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa Yeezuu Krista lɛbɔʋrɛ n n'a hɩnkaŋ ʋ bɩ ma, a m wɔɔ Woso a m gʋta.
56002014	A a mɩŋŋa ka zɛ ma wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a a da ma, a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ mimbʋnyaa haay nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ hu bɔ, awɔɔ ba a mɩŋŋa dogʋɔɔ, k'ʋ bɩr zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ ŋʋam tee•••.
56002015	Naa haay dɩnda, ɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ heer yo, ɩ ŋ bɔzaa ʋ lɛ kʋ Woso a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ m. Ɩ b'a to kʋ gɔsɩ n'ɩ gore bɔ ʋ y.
56003001	A hɩ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m haay, ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ yɛ kʋ lɛɛzannɔ haay ma, ŋnɩ ŋ lɛ si, ŋnɩ bɩr zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ do haay barɛ ŋʋarɛ.
56003002	Ŋ bɩ gɔsɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y, ŋ bɩ nyaa ba y, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩŋŋabaa bam, ŋnɩ bɩr nyɩnta kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ.
56003003	Bala, wɔɔ nyɩnta biisi sɔ, ʋ n nɩ hɔɔnwar zi bam, ʋ m bayɛrɛzannɔ, ʋ nyaam, mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ do haay kan a hɔɔnhɔrɔ kɩ n'a so wɔɔ ʋ, ʋ n nɩ bʋnyaabaa bam, ʋ n n'ʋ kam ma k'ʋ yɩ am gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ m, ʋ a ka gʋɔɔ m sɔ ʋ m, ʋ sɔ kʋ m.
56003004	Bɩ, Woso wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ, k'a b'a mɩŋŋabaa kan a ŋʋarɛ k'an ta m gʋɔɔ haay tɔ ma bɩ hɩnka bɩ,
56003005	a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ vam, a n wɔɔ bʋmbɔ zibəə tɩrga kʋ wɔɔ ba barɛ m tɔ ma y, wɔɔ bʋmbɔ a ʋ, k'awɔɔ cicir zɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ bʋmbɔ a ʋ, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sʋrgɔ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n yɩrɛ daa ka wɔɔ ʋ, an mɩsɩrbaa daa ka wɔɔ ʋ.
56003006	Bala, Woso a ka Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer wɔɔ ra gʋta wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
56003007	A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'awɔɔ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʋ, a barka tɔ ma, kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ hɔjirlezannɔ, wɔɔ taaheerlɛ bɩ m bɩ sɔ.
56003008	Meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ba naa, sɩra m, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'ɩbɩɩ m bɩr a hɩm paan•••, ɩ bɩr som la, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n bɩr a tʋntɔŋ ʋ ŋnɩ bɩr lɛɛ, kan zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ kɩ tee•••. Zi mɩŋŋa barɛ bɩ, hɔ mɩŋŋa m, a y'a dam gʋɔɔ han sɔ.
56003009	Bɩ, ɩ bɩ yɛ bɩsɩkarɛ yaarsɩrɔ ma y, yaabɔɔ tɔrɔ gaandarɛrɔ sʋʋrarɔ ma y, Moyiisi lɛrɔ nyaabarɛ kan ŋ bakʋmarɛ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ y, ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ, bɩ ŋ bɩr a dam gʋaa han sɔ y.
56003010	Kʋ gʋaa ɩ gʋɔɔ gʋngʋ kʋ ma zi bam, k'ɩ həən si ma, k'a gɔɔta an nɩ tam lɛɛ, k'ɩ ɩ ya ɩ həən si ma, k'a a gu an nɩ tam lɛɛ k'ɩ bɔ ɩ zi.
56003011	Ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ zaa tɩrga bɩ to, ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ nyaanlɛ hɩnkarɛ.
56003012	Mɔɔ Artemas gɛɛ Tisikkɩ nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi. K'a bɩ lee ku, k'ɩ tɔ ʋ ɩ bʋr Nikopolis ʋ mɔɔ zi. Bala, kʋ bɩ do mɔɔ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ, kʋ m nyɩnta ʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ.
56003013	Ɩ tɔ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ da lɛrɔ karɩnsaamba Zenas han, kan Apolɔs kɩ, kʋ hɔsɩ bɩ jɩra ŋ ma, ŋ zaakʋrɛ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ y.
56003014	Wɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, ŋnɩ bɩr a kam ma k'a bɩr lɛɛ kan zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ dɩndarɛ kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a da gʋɔɔ kʋ hɔ jɩra ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ han. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ barɛ y.
56003015	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ haay rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩ m. Yaa da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m. Bɩ, Kʋ Woso barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
57001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, mɔɔ kʋ m nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma, mɔɔ kan wɔɔ danyɩ Timote kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ bam. A ba wɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, Filemɔn, wɔɔ gʋaasɩba n'ɩbɩɩ m, wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ.
57001002	A ba wɔɔ nawʋm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma k'a n'a som kʋ ma ɩbɩɩ har ʋ bɩ ma sɔ, kan wɔɔ danlʋ Apɩya kɩ ma, kan lemim nyɩnta zoobarɛkɔɔn Arsip kɩ ma sɔ.
57001003	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka a ʋ.
57001004	Filemɔn, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m, bɩ mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ tɔ da m nɔ ʋ, m n'a barka dam tee••• ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma.
57001005	Bala, mɔɔ ɩ ŋʋarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma bɩ mim mam, kan sɩrakarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m Zuuba Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ mim kɩ.
57001006	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm Woso han, k'ɩbɩɩ sɩrakarɛ k'awɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ n zi ba, an hɔ mɩŋŋa haay kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma ʋ a ba Krista zibəə tɔ ma bɩ hɩnka.
57001007	M danyɩ, zi k'ɩbɩɩ ba ɩ ŋʋarɛ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ gʋta, an mɔɔ heer wʋta, bala, ɩbɩɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ heer ba kookoo.
57001008	Naa minto nɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ to m nɩ lɛ m Krista tɔ ma, kʋ m lɛ ka ɩ ʋ, k'ɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa ɩbɩɩ gʋr zi bɩ ba bɩ,
57001009	kʋ mɔɔ hɔ bɩ do yɛ ɩbɩɩ han ŋʋarɛ tɔ ma, a jɩra mɔɔ m lɛ kʋ mɔɔ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ m. Ɩɩn••• mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m Pol, gʋaa gusire m mɔɔ m, m nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ kɛɛrɛ, Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma.
57001010	M wɔ mɔɔ n'a zɩnzɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, Onezim tɔ ma, a a ba mɔɔ nyɩnnɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa ʋ.
57001011	Biisi bɩ a zibəə ba ɩbɩɩ ma y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a zibəə ta ɩbɩɩ ma, a zibəə n ta mɔɔ ma sɔ.
57001012	A da mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ m zaa ra, a mɩŋŋa a ba hɔdeem kan mɔɔ kɩ kɛɛrɛ.
57001013	Kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ m, mɔɔ ŋʋa k'an gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ naa ʋ, k'an bɩr mɔɔ ziro bam ɩbɩɩ bɩncɛ ʋ, lɔnnɔcɛ kʋ mɔɔ n ta ʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma naa nɔ ʋ.
57001014	Bɩ, mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m hɔsɩ ba k'ɩbɩɩ n zaa ka y. Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'ɩbɩɩ n zi mɩŋŋa ba mɔɔ m paŋŋa nɩ y, mɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ɩbɩɩ n a ba ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ma.
57001015	A a da ma Onezim bɩ, a gʋ a ʋ ɩbɩɩ ma dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, k'an b'a bɔ an bɩ gɔɔta kan ɩ kɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ.
57001016	Dɩɩtaa naa, lɔ bɛɛ m bala dɔ y, a lɛ da lɔ m gʋta kɛɛrɛ, a ba a ʋ wɔɔ danyɩ wɔɔ n'a ŋʋam karɩ paan•••. Mɔɔ y'a ŋʋam gʋta paan•••, bɩ ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m ɩ ŋʋa an lɛ da, bala, gʋaa m, bɩ wɔɔ danyɩ m sɔ Krista nɔ ʋ.
57001017	K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ dɩgam mɔɔ ma ɩ danyɩ, k'a maam k'ɩ si, amba ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ sim bɩ m.
57001018	Bɩ, k'a kʋrɔ ma kan ɩ kɩ, gɛɛ ɩbɩɩ zɩm an ta m, k'ɩ ba mɔɔ mɩŋŋa mim.
57001019	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ gʋrsɩra naa do bam: "K'a zɩm bɩ wuti karɔ, mɔɔ n n'a karɛ," bɩ pakra bɛɛ m kʋ m a hɩ ɩ m sɔ m ʋ, mɔɔ zɩm ta ɩbɩɩ ra y, ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ m.
57001020	Ɩɩn••• m danyɩ, m wɔ mɔɔ n'a zɩnzɛrɛ ɩ m, naa ba m m denter Zuuba tɔ ma. Mɔɔ heer ba kookoo Krista ŋʋarɛ bɩ tɔ ma.
57001021	Ci bɩ kʋ mɔɔ n'a barɛ ɩbɩɩ ma naa, a dɔ mɔɔ ʋ paan••• m ʋ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a yɛm bɩ bam, bɩ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ m ʋ, ɩbɩɩ y'a barɛ an cem hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a yɛm bɩ han.
57001022	Kʋ m a yɛ ɩ han lɛɛm k'ɩ cɛ banka ɩ cɩnta m m, bala, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɩŋŋa awɔɔ yaadarɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, m ʋ, n wɔ daam mɔɔ ma zɔɔ mɔɔ n bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ.
57001023	Epafras ɩ yaa darɛ a m, a du n y'a ʋ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma.
57001024	Mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ, Markɩ kan Aristarkɩ kɩ, Demas kɩ, Likki kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ a m sɔ.
57001025	Bɩ kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan a kɩ.
58001001	Biisi bɩ, Woso meer ba kan wɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lɛ m, gallɛm hɔka, zaa y'a hʋnhɔ m.
58001002	Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, jɛ dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ n ta ʋ naa ma bɩ, Woso meer ba kan wɔɔ kɩ a nyɩ bɩ lɛ m. A Nyɩ bɩ tɔ ma y'a ka an durnya bɩ da, a Nyɩ bɩ bɔ a ʋ sɔ k'an a so hɔ haay ʋ.
58001003	Nyɩ bɩ nɩ Woso mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ hɩnkam, kʋ Woso lʋnlɔ bɩ, a mɩŋŋa maam, an n'a kam durnya bɩ nɩ gɔɔtarɛ a bɩncɛ ʋ, a lɛ meerbaa paŋŋa m. K'a gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋ ŋ ma zi ba an a nya bɩ, a a hʋr an aa nyɩnta Woso k'a nɩ cirbəə m bɩ bɩsɩ ra arzana ʋ.
58001004	Woso Nyɩ bɩ tɔ bɩ lɛ da malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ tɔ m soyy•••. Naa n'a hɩnkam wɔɔ m, ʋ a dɔ ʋ ʋ, a lɛ da malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ m gʋta maam-maam.
58001005	Woso n meer ba kan malɛɛka kɩ cɩna, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ Nyɩ, an a sa her ma, mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ y. A n a hɩ malɛɛka ma sɔ cɩna, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yɩrɛ a Zɩ, an yɩ mɔɔ Nyɩ y.
58001006	Bɩ, Woso k'a bʋr k'a Nyɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ nyɔɔ durnya ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Bɩ kʋ Woso malɛɛkarɔ haay n kukurə zɛ a taa.
58001007	Hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ malɛɛkarɔ mim nɔ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ, ŋ ba a ʋ, ɩ ʋ hɩnhɛr nɩ ŋ mɩ, a zibəənyɩnɔ m, am sɛ nɛɛnnɔ m.
58001008	Bɩ meerbaa k'a a ba a Nyɩ bɩ mim nɔ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ m Woso, ɩ cirbəə nyarɛ ba ʋ y. Ɩ so ɩbɩɩ nawʋrɛ ɩ cirbəə kʋ b'ʋ tɩrgabaa nɔ ʋ.
58001009	Ɩbɩɩ hɔ k'an tɩrga ŋʋa, ɩ n'ɩ sɔm hɔ bʋnyaa m. Bɩ y'a ka, Woso, ɩ Woso bɩ n'ɩ bɔ ʋ, an heernyɔɔ nyɔɔ tɔ ɩ mim ʋ. A ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa an cem ɩ muno wɔɔ han, bɩ tɔ ma m an ɩ bɔ ʋ.
58001010	A a ya, an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Zuuba, durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ tara burə da, bɩ, brama k'an ta ʋ naa, ɩbɩɩ wɔ zibəə m.
58001011	Brɔɔ cenim, b'ɩbɩɩ gɔɔtam tee•••. Brama kan tara bɩ kɩ zarm am huu hɔ bɩ m,
58001012	ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ huŋŋum am huu hɔ bɩ m, denter m, ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ lʋrm am huuro m. Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr ɩ lʋrlɛ y, ɩbɩɩ cenle ba ʋ y.
58001013	Woso n a hɩ malɛɛka m cɩna, amba a a hɩ a Nyɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: Bʋr ɩ nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ra, kʋ m a ka k'ɩ jɩnnɔ n bɩ nyɩnta ɩ taa y.
58001014	Malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ, nyiro m, ŋn'ɩ Woso zi bam, Woso n ŋ nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ ziro ba ŋn'a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ hɔjirle yɩ rɔ wɔɔ han.
58002001	K'a a yo Woso n meer ba kan wɔɔ kɩ a Nyɩ bɩ lɛ m bɩ, ʋ hɔ k'a hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ gʋta, kʋ n bɛɛ m, wɔɔ nyaanɩm.
58002002	Lemim kʋ malɛɛkarɔ nyɩnta ŋnɩ b'a pa da bɩ, a a zi ba fasɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n yɛ ma y, ŋnɩ bɩsɩ ka ma rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ a bɩsɩ bɩ karɛ fɩr yɩ amba a a ga m bɩ m.
58002003	Bɩ, wɔɔ sɔ, kʋ wɔɔ n nyasʋ bʋmbɔrɛ gʋta maam-maam naa do nɩ, Woso wɔɔ dʋdɔ kam sɔ, wɔɔ bɩ bɔm lɛ nɩ y. Zuuba mɩŋŋa ɩ lɛɛ ka an bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ pa da, bɩ jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ma rɔ wɔɔ n a mɩŋŋabaa k'an ta ʋ hɩnka wɔɔ m.
58002004	Woso mɩŋŋa nɩ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ karɛ gore da ʋ, hoserlo paŋŋazannɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ, kan makra do y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ m. A Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ jir amba a lɛ n taa bɩ m.
58002005	Durnya daa kʋ wɔɔ n'a mim dɩndam bɩ, malɛɛkarɔ bɛɛ Woso ŋ da ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a so ʋ y, a Nyɩ b'a da ʋ.
58002006	Bɩ, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ niŋŋə ʋ, n y'a hɩ, n ʋ: Woso ra, bɔ m gʋaa m, ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ hɔɔn dam ma? Gʋaa nyɔɔdʋ n bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ n nɩ nyasʋm nɩ?
58002007	Ɩbɩɩ ka an nɩ malɛɛkarɔ taa dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ b'a gore da ʋ, ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ ka ʋ gʋta.
58002008	Ɩbɩɩ ka an a so hɔ haay ʋ, an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ. Kʋ n y'a hɩ, n ʋ: 'Woso a ka gʋaa nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ bɩ, naa k'a hɩ, a ʋ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʋ, hɔsɩ n gɔɔta k'a bɛɛ y'a so ʋ y.' A n bɔkarɛ, dɩɩtaa naa, dɩgarɛ nɔ ʋ, gʋaa bɛɛ y'a so hɔ haay ʋ y.
58002009	Bɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ n naa do: Woso a ka Yeezuu n a ba poore malɛɛkarɔ taa dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma, a ga gʋɔɔ haay minto. Bɩ wɔɔ y'a yɩm kɛɛrɛ an nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ kan daʋrɛ gʋta kɩ m, fɩr k'a yɩ a zɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
58002010	Woso ɩ hɔ haay da, ŋn'a bɩncɛrɔ ʋ, a a ŋʋa kʋ gʋɔɔ gʋta n yɩ a nyɩnɔ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. A ga a ʋ m denter, k'an a ka kʋ Yeezuu n fɩr yɩ, k'an wɔ ʋ an yɩ gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa k'a a ga m. Bala, Yeezuu nɩ karɛ ŋ lɛɛ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ yɩ.
58002011	Yeezuu nɩ gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋrɛ ŋ ma, a mɩŋŋa kan gʋɔɔ k'a nɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ Zɩ deem. Bɩ y'a ka, Yeezuu nɩ ŋ birle a danyɩnɔ b'a nyannɩ ba nɩ y.
58002012	A a hɩ denter, a ʋ: Woso ra, mɔɔ y'ɩ mim dɩndarɛ m danyɩnɔ m, m m lɛ bɔ ɩ ʋ, sokʋmagʋɔɔ haay lɛɛ.
58002013	A a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yom Woso ma. A n a ya, an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ ba n nɩ kan nyɩnɔ kʋ Woso ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
58002014	Nyɩnɔ k'a n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋnɩ yɩ mɛsim kan ma kɩ nɔ ʋ, Woso Nyɩ bɩ mɩŋŋa a ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m an nyɩnta gʋaa sɔ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m. A ba a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, k'a Sʋtaana zaar ba, bɩ k'a a so zɛ paŋŋa ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
58002015	K'a a da ma, a gʋɔɔ kʋ lɔnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, nyi kʋ ŋ n'a bam zɛ m a mɩsɩrbaa tɛkka ma rɔ wɔɔ yɔ.
58002016	Bala, Yeezuu bɩ, malɛɛkarɔ bɛɛ an n'a darɛ ŋ han y, Abraham nyɩnɔ wɔɔ an n'a darɛ ŋ han.
58002017	Bɩ y'a ka, an yɩ pakra k'an a ba am a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, k'a wɔ ʋ, a yɩ ŋ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kʋ taalɛrazaa m, a m cicirzɛrɛzaa, a zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ Woso lɛɛ. K'a gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, a ka ŋ ʋ.
58002018	Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, a a da ma an a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ makra lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ han, bala, a mɩŋŋa makra yɩ, an fɩr yɩ.
58003001	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m danyɩnɔ wosogʋɔɔ, Woso y'awɔɔ bir sɔ k'awɔɔ n yɩ a gʋɔɔ. K'a a hɔɔn da Yeezuu ma mɩŋŋa, bala, Woso y'a nyɔɔ k'an bɩ yɩ sɩrakarɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ.
58003002	Sɩra m, Yeezuu zi kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ k'an a ba bɩ ba taalɛra nɔ ʋ, amba Moyiisi nyɩnta an a ba bɩ m, n n a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Moyiisi yɩ taalɛrazaa zibəə kʋ Woso a ka ʋ haay a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ nɔ ʋ."
58003003	Gʋaa k'a cɛ dɔ b'ɩ daʋrɛ yɩm an lɛ da cɛ bɩ mɩŋŋa m. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a ga lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta m an lɛ da Moyiisi lɛbɔʋrɛ ra.
58003004	Cɛ k'an ta ʋ haay, gʋɔɔ yɩ ŋ dɔ, an bɔkarɛ, Woso ɩ hɔ woo••• da.
58003005	Kʋ Moyiisi nɩ, zibəənyɩ m, ta a ʋ a lɛ ra zi kʋ Woso a ka ʋ haay a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ nɔ ʋ, a zibəə bɩ, hɔ kʋ Woso ʋ k'a hɩ bɩ kasɛtɩ a a ka.
58003006	Bɩ, kʋ Krista nɩ, a m Woso Nyɩ an nɩ dɩgarɛ a Zɩ bɩ har bɩ nyasʋm ma, taalɛra nɔ ʋ. A har bɩ, wɔɔ m, kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, ʋ n'ʋ heer nyɔɔm hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
58003007	Naa tɔ ma m, amba Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm bɩ, a ʋ: K'awɔɔ Woso leer ma her dɔmɩm naa ʋ,
58003008	a b'a gu ma, amba awɔɔ nyɩnta a bɩsɩ ka ma biisi bɩ nɩ y, amba hinni k'awɔɔ nyɩnta a makra ba poo ʋ bɩ nɩ y.
58003009	Ncɩnaaʋ m Woso n a hɩ, a ʋ: Poo ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ k'a dɩga hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ ma, bɩ, ŋ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ba bɩ yɩ, dɔɔraa bam busi.
58003010	Naa y'a ka mɔɔ nɔ n ma ʋ kan gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro kɩ, m a hɩ, m ʋ: A nyʋnnyɔɔ ŋ nawʋm a hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ tee•••, ŋ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa ŋ gʋr zi bɩ jɩ dɔ y.
58003011	Naa y'a ka mɔɔ nɔ n ma ʋ, mɔɔ n m wer si, m ʋ: Ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩm fɩɩga y.
58003012	M danyɩnɔ, k'a dundo a zi, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩnta heer bʋnyaa m a n a gu sɩrakarɛ ma, a n a bɔ Woso k'an mɩsɩr b'ʋ y.
58003013	Bɩ, an ta ʋ bɩ, k'a bɩr kʋ heer yom dɔmɩm biyəə, a b'a hɩ a ʋ k'a dɔ booti ma y. K'a bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ gɔsɩ b'a mɩŋŋa to kʋ mimbʋnyaa n bra ba nɩ y.
58003014	Bala, Krista hɔjirlezannɔ n wɔɔ m, bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta sɩra kʋ wɔɔ ka a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ m kɔɔkɔɔ, an ta an a tɛkka ku.
58003015	Hɔ kʋ Wosoci bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ, mɔɔ m ya m nɩ som la: K'awɔɔ Woso leer ma her, a b'a gu ma, amba awɔɔ nyɩnta biisi a bɩsɩ ka ma, a a gu ma bɩ nɩ y.
58003016	Nkɔɔ ɩ Woso leer bɩ ma, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a gu ma? Gʋɔɔ kʋ Moyiisi ŋ bɔ Eziptɩ ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ m.
58003017	Nkɔɔ Woso nɔ ma ʋ kan ŋ kɩ dɔɔraa bam busi bɩ? Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mimbʋnyaa ba, ŋnɩ gɩnga poo ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
58003018	Woso k'a wer si, a ʋ: "Ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩm bɩ." Nkɔɔ a a hɩ ŋ ma? Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩsɩ ka ma rɔ wɔɔ a a hɩ ŋ ma.
58003019	Wɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ denter, kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka bɩ y'a ka, ŋ n a da ma, ŋnɩ hoonsire kʋ Woso ʋ k'a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩ y.
58004001	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ nyi ba. Woso ler bɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ da ma ʋ hoonsire k'a ʋ k'a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ yɩ. Ʋ dundo ʋ zi mɩŋŋa, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ barla an jɩra hoonsire bɩ do yɩrɛ zi y.
58004002	Bala, wɔɔ lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma, amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta poo ʋ b'ʋ ŋn'a ma biisi rɔ wɔɔ m. Ŋ lemim bɩ ma, b'a nyɔɔdʋ n nyɩnta ŋ ma y, bala, a ma kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, ŋ n a si kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ y.
58004003	Wɔɔ, k'ʋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ hoonsire bɩ do yɩ. Woso hoonsire bɩ do mim hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ m wer si m ʋ, ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩm fɩɩga y. Meer naa do ba a ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, a a zibəə bɩ nya laatʋ dɔmɩm k'a durnya da ʋ b'ʋ.
58004004	Bala, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ niŋŋə ʋ, n dɔmɩm saanhɩna hɔ bɩ mim hɩ, n ʋ: 'Woso a zi haay ba, an hoon si dɔmɩm saanhɩna hinni ʋ.'
58004005	Wɔɔ ʋ ya ʋ a yɩ, n a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'Ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩm fɩɩga y.'
58004006	K'a maam, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a dam ma ŋn'a yɩ. A n bɔkarɛ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n hoonsire bɩ yɩ y, kʋ ŋ n yɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
58004007	Bɩ y'a ka, Woso n a ya, an dɔmɩm bɔ ʋ, n n'a birm, n ʋ: 'Her'. Maasɩrɛ k'a bɩ ba gʋta bɩ, a dɔmɩm bɩ do mim hɩ gʋta Davɩd lɛ m, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ niŋŋə kʋ wɔɔ mim hɩ b'ʋ, a ʋ: K'awɔɔ Woso leer ma her, a b'a gu ma y.
58004008	Denter sɔ, kʋ yɩ a nawʋrɛ ɩ ʋ, Zoziye wɔ ʋ an hoonsire ka Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Woso bɩ bɩ tom k'a a ya, a dɔmɩm vanta mim hɩ y.
58004009	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hoonsire dɔmɩm ta ʋ Woso n a cɩnta a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan dɔmɩm saanhɩna hinni kʋ Woso hoonsire dɔmɩm m bɩ kɩ.
58004010	Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ hoonsire kʋ Woso n'a kam bɩ yɩm bɩ, a zaa zibəə nya an nɩ hoon sim, amba Woso mɩŋŋa a zi ba, an a nya an hoon si bɩ m.
58004011	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ ʋ tɔ ʋ, k'ʋ hoonsire bɩ do yɩ. Ʋ dundo ʋ zi kʋ wɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ bɩsɩ ka Woso lɛ ma, an a do hoonsire bɩ yɩrɛ ma, amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta poo ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
58004012	Bala, Woso lemim bɩ mɩsɩr an nɩ paŋŋa m. A lɛ ta ʋ an cem hɛɛnm lɛhɩɩyazaa han. A ɩ gasʋm gʋaa ʋ an nɩ tam lɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa kan wɔɔ nyi kɩ nɩ kʋ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ tam lɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ yaarɔ kan a hɩnɔ kɩ nɩ kʋ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ. A ɩ gʋaa lɛtaamarɔ kan a hɔɔndarɛrɔ kʋ ŋ n'a heer ʋ kɩ dʋdɔ kam.
58004013	Hɔsɩ ba ʋ, an nɩ wɔŋ ʋ an a nyaakʋm da Woso lɛɛ y. Hɔ k'a nɩ durnya ʋ haay dɩgɩ, an garga ra, Woso mɩm ʋ. Bɩ, a mɩŋŋa, ʋ woo••• n nɩ zɛm bɩ jɩm a taa, an wɔɔ lɩnlar mim kʋ wɔɔ ba haay ma.
58004014	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩrakarɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ nɔ ʋ. Bala, wɔɔ ɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ k'a lɛ da haay m, an der an cem brama han, an wɔ ʋ an lee ku Woso mɩŋŋa zi, Woso Nyɩ, Yeezuu m.
58004015	Wɔɔ mannɩbər b'ɩ kɔm wɔɔ ma, ʋ paŋŋawarlɔ nɔ ʋ. A mɩŋŋa makra yɩ mim haay nɔ ʋ, amba wɔɔ nɩ makra yɩm bɩ m, b'a n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ fɩɩga y.
58004016	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ ʋ zɔ Woso ma a cirbəəduu bɩ jɩr ʋ heer koodə nɔ ʋ, a mɩŋŋa n ta barka m an n'a kam. Ʋ ʋ zɔ ma, k'an ʋ cicir zɛ an barka ka wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ daahan yɩ, daahan lɛtaama dɔmɩm ʋ.
58005001	Kʋ wɔɔ dɩga a, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ biyəə bɩ, Woso n'a bɔŋ ʋ gʋɔɔ gaa ma, an n'a darɛ a zibəə ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ daahan tɔ ma. A zibəə bɩ, ganwʋrɛrɔ kan mannɩrɔ kɩ an nɩ ŋ kam Woso ʋ, mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ tɔ ma.
58005002	K'a mɩŋŋa ɩ paŋŋawar minno nɔ ʋ bɩ, a a da ma, an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋrɔm ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim jɩ ma, an a da ŋ han.
58005003	Kʋ paŋŋawarzaa n a mɩŋŋa m bɩ, pakra m k'an mannɩ ba a mɩŋŋa mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma sɔ, amba an n'a bam Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ m.
58005004	Gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a mɩŋŋa gore da ʋ, an a ba mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ a zim nɩ y. Woso mɩŋŋa nɩ gʋaa birm an n'a dam zibəə bɩ do ʋ, amba a a ba kan Aarɔn kɩ bɩ m.
58005005	Maam bɩ, Krista bɛɛ y'a mɩŋŋa gore da ʋ, k'a yɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ y. Bɩ, Woso mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ Nyɩ, an a sa her ma bɩ, mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ.
58005006	Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ vanta ʋ, a a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ yɩm mannɩbər dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ, amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
58005007	Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta tara burə ʋ bɩ, a yaa da Woso m gʋta, an a wɔ zɩnzɛ m gʋta, an nyi ka kan zee gʋta kɩ. A n a yɛ Woso k'a a da ma an a yɔ zɛ wɔ ʋ bɩ han k'an a yɔ zɛ wɔ ʋ. Bɩ, Woso a yaa bɩ si, k'a nɩ yɛm Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
58005008	Baa kʋ Woso Nyɩ m bɩ, yɛ Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma bɩ dɔ a ʋ, a fɩryɩrɛrɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
58005009	Ncɩnaaʋ m, Woso a ka an yɩ amba a a ga m bɩ m fasɩ k'an yɩ bʋmbɔrɛzaa. Maam m, an a ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm ma rɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ zaa.
58005010	Bɩ Woso a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ, a m mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
58005011	Wɔɔ ɩ hɔ m gʋta, k'ʋ a hɩ mim naa do nɔ ʋ, bɩ k'awɔɔ bɩr mim jɩ mam zɔɔ-zɔɔ bɩ, a jɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m wer ta ʋ.
58005012	A ga a ʋ m hɔɔ tee••• k'awɔɔ n a ba karɩnsaambɔɔ, kan bɩ kɩ, awɔɔ gɔɔta an n'a ŋʋam kʋ n n'a ya n nɩ Woso lemim bɩ minno k'awɔɔ ma a sɩrakarɛ sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ dɩnda a m. Kʋ hɔ m, k'awɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩm, bɩ ayy•••, awɔɔ gɔɔta an n'a ŋʋam kʋ n nɩ nyonhi ka a ʋ.
58005013	Nyɩ ɩ tɩr nyonhi mi, a n hɔ k'an tɩrga gɛɛ bʋnyaa dɔ kʋ nɩ y.
58005014	Bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩ, gʋɔɔ burgurɔ hɔ m, brɔɔ mim ka hɔ mɩŋŋa kan hɔ bʋnyaa kɩ dɔ n n'a bɔ kʋ zi m.
58006001	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ cem sɩra ka Krista ʋ lɛɛkarɛ hɔdɩndarɛrɔ nyʋgɔ rɔ wɔɔ han, k'ʋ ta lɛɛ, ʋ gʋɔɔ burgurɔ hɔ dɩnda. Hɔdɩndarɛrɔ nyʋgɔrɔ wɔɔ duro jɩr ba n na: Pakra m kʋ gʋaa n a gʋ zibəəro kʋ ŋ nɩ tam gʋaa m zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, k'an sɩra ka Woso ʋ.
58006002	Batɛnnɔ wɔɔ mim ba n nɩ, kan wɔrɔ kɩnka gʋaa ra bɩ mim kɩ, kan gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ mim kɩ, kan durnya nyarɛ dʋdɔ bɩ mim kɩ. Wɔɔ b'ʋ yarɛ ʋ jɩm k'ʋ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro dɩnda y.
58006003	Ʋ ta lɛɛ, ʋ hɔɔ vantɔɔ dɩnda, kʋ Woso yɛ, naa wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a ba.
58006004	Ʋ makra sa gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso lɛɛgure yɩ biisi, ŋnɩ Woso mɩsɩrbaa ganwʋrɛ yɩ, ŋnɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri si a heer ʋ am gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ m,
58006005	ŋnɩ Woso lemim mɩŋŋabaa kasɛtɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ paŋŋa k'a nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ durnya daa b'ʋ bɩ kasɛtɩ bɩ sɔ rɔ wɔɔ ma.
58006006	Baa kan naa haay kɩ, kʋ ŋ y'a gu ŋnɩ sɩrakarɛ to, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a ka gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n a ya, ŋn'a bɔ gallɛm hɩɩya hɔ ma, ŋn'a mɩsɩrbaa lʋr y. Bala, a ya ŋ y'a ʋ ŋnɩ so ra a zim ŋn'ɩ Woso Nyɩ bɩ wɔm gɔdarkʋra ma, ŋn'a kam gʋɔɔ n'a sʋnsɔ wʋm lɛɛ kar ʋ.
58006007	Ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ makra sa, kʋ hɔsɩra ɩ la hi yɩm tee••• an n'a mim, k'a ɩ hɔ bam mɩŋŋa a wʋrɛzannɔ wɔɔ n'a bɩrɛ, naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso tara bɩ do barka da ʋ.
58006008	Bɩ, kʋ laa gɔrɔ an nɩ ŋ bɔm kan bur kɩ, hɔsɩra bɩ do nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y. Woso ler bʋnyaa dam n'ʋ zɔɔ-zɔɔ, a nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, sɛ n n'a bɩ m.
58006009	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, baa kʋ wɔɔ ɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, wɔɔ heer kookoo gʋta awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ. Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ zaa mɩŋŋa ra, bʋmbɔrɛ zaa bɩ m.
58006010	Woso tɩrga, a bɩ ziro k'awɔɔ n ba rɔ wɔɔ tɔ bɔrɛ a nɔ ʋ y, ŋʋarɛ k'awɔɔ n tam kan kɩ a zi ba, a ka a danyɩnɔ wosogʋɔɔ ʋ, a gɔɔta an n'a bam bɩ, a b'a tɔ bɔrɛ a nɔ ʋ sɔ y.
58006011	Bɩ, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə n gɔɔta an bɩr a yoŋ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ tee•••, k'an ta an dɔmɩnnɔ nyarɛ ku, kʋ hɔ k'awɔɔ ta a heer lɛ bɩ n yɩ fasɩ-fasɩ.
58006012	Wɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n a ba yakʋzannɔ y, bɩ, k'awɔɔ n gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ŋn'ɩ bʋrlɛ a mɩŋŋa ma, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm maam nɔ wɔɔ makra sa.
58006013	Woso k'a nyɩnta an ler bɩ bɔ Abraham m bɩ, a a wer si an a na ma. Kʋ gɔsɩ ba ʋ, an lɛ da m an n'a wer bɩ sire a tɔ m bɩ, am naa an a wer bɩ si a mɩŋŋa m.
58006014	A n a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ n wer si, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ barka daŋ ʋ, m yaŋŋɔɔ ka ɩ ʋ gʋta.
58006015	Abraham ler bɩ bɔrɛ mɩm da bʋraama nɔ ʋ, an hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ.
58006016	Kʋ gʋɔɔ y'a wer sire, a si ŋ nawʋm gʋaa k'a lɛ da ŋ nɩ bɩ tɔ ra, bɩ, wer bɩ sire nɩ mim kʋ ŋ ʋ k'a ba bɩ kʋyɩrɛ kasɛtɩ, an nɩ bɩsɩkarɛ haay bɔrɛ ŋ bire ʋ.
58006017	Naa tɔ ma m Woso n a wer si, an a na a ler bɩ bɔrɛ ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ k'a ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ fasɩ ŋ ʋ, a bɩ hɔsɩ lʋrm hɔ k'a cɩnta k'a ba bɩ nɔ ʋ y.
58006018	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔ hɩɩya n ta ʋ, ŋ b'a lʋrlɛ y, bɩ Woso b'a dam ma a n ŋʋaar ba ŋ mim nɔ ʋ sɔ y, ler bɩ bɔrɛ kan wer bɩ sire kɩ m. Ncɩnaaʋ naa, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ si, ʋ b'ʋ nyaakʋm da Woso zi rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ heer kookoo hɔ hɩɩya naa do tɔ ma, k'ʋ hɔ kʋ Woso wɔɔ bir ma, k'ʋ b'a yɩ bɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.
58006019	Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ naa do a ka, wɔɔ nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr digə darɛ y. Amba kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta pɔyaa k'a n'a dam jɩm ʋ bɩ hɔ bɩ m. Taaheerlɛ bɩ do n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ cenim pɛɛra k'a ta lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ bɩ rɛ bɩ han Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ʋ nɩ gasʋm Woso mɩŋŋa zi, lɛɛ k'an ta ʋ b'ʋ.
58006020	Bɩncɛ bɩ do Yeezuu lɛɛ ka wɔɔ m, an gasʋ ʋ, gasʋ a ʋ wɔɔ tɔ ma. Bala, a a ba mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ, amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
58007001	Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ bɩ, nyɩnta a ʋ Salɛm cir, bɩ Woso k'a lɛ da haay bɩ mannɩbər m sɔ. Abraham k'a nyɩnta an yar ba an a da cinno ma, an a bɔ an nɩ zɛm bɩ, Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ta an aa a zɛ ʋ, an barka da a mim ʋ.
58007002	Abraham n hɔ k'an ta m haay bɩ bɔ ʋ, bu biyəə barla deem, an a ka ʋ. Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ tɔ bɩ mɩŋŋa jɩ ba n nɩ: "Tɩrgabaa cir", an ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, nyɩnta a ʋ, Salɛm cir, naa jɩ ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ: "Laafɩɩ cir".
58007003	Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ bɩ, a ba zɩ nɩ, b'a ba da nɩ y, a ba do gʋɔɔ nɩ y. A taʋrɛ sɩŋŋɩda ba ʋ, b'a nyarɛ ba ʋ sɔ y. Bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan Woso Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, mannɩbər m dɔmɩm haay.
58007004	K'a dɩga a, awɔɔ n a dɔ kɛɛrɛ a ʋ, gʋaa gʋta m na? Abraham yɛ an hɔ k'a yɩ haay yar bɩ k'a a da ma bɩ nɔ ʋ bɔ ʋ bu biyəə nɔ ʋ, deem an a ka ʋ.
58007005	Levii nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ cɩnta ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ haay buganwʋrɛ si Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ han, naa ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, a si ŋ nawʋrɛ a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ han, an bɔkarɛ Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n brɔɔ m sɔ.
58007006	Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ n nyɩnta Levii nyɩ y, an bɔkarɛ a hɔ kʋ Abraham m ta m haay bɩ buganwʋrɛ si han, an lɛ da sɔ bɩ, Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ Abraham barka da ʋ, an bɔkarɛ bɩ Woso lerlɔ bɔ m.
58007007	Bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, gʋaa k'a lɛ da b'ɩ tɩr barka da gʋaa poore mim ʋ.
58007008	Levii har gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ buganwʋrɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ yɩ gɩngarɛ am gʋaa haay m. Bɩ, kʋ Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ k'a buganwʋrɛ si bɩ nɩ, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "A garɛ ba ʋ y."
58007009	Wɔɔ ʋ da ma, ʋ meerbaa bɩ nyambʋr, ʋ ʋ, Abraham k'a nyɩnta an buganwʋrɛ bɩ yawʋra bɩ ka Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ʋ bɩ, Levii k'a yaŋŋɔɔ nɩ buganwʋrɛ bɩ sim her naa, a buganwʋrɛ bɩ ka Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ʋ sɔ.
58007010	Bala, baa kʋ Levii n yɩ cɩna dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, bɩ Abraham yaŋŋa m bɩ, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ ʋ, hinni kʋ Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ta an aa Abraham zɛ ʋ bɩ, Levii nyɩnta ʋ hinni bɩ do ʋ sɔ, Abraham mɛ ʋ.
58007011	Levii dogʋɔɔ mannɩbər biyəə bɩ, a to a ʋ lɛrɔ kʋ Woso ŋ ka Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ. A n bɔkarɛ, kʋ yɩ an nawʋrɛ ɩ ʋ, Levii hargʋɔɔ wɔɔ mannɩbər zibəə b'a da ma an a ka gʋɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga fasɩ, pakra bɛɛ m kʋ mannɩbər vanta n nyɩnta ʋ, a zibəə n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ hɔ kɩ y. Mannɩbər bɩ do bɩ, Aarɔn yaŋŋa bɛɛ dɔ y.
58007012	Bala, kʋ mannɩbərbaa b'a lʋr, pakra m kʋ lɛ k'a nyɩnta ʋ bɩ n lʋr sɔ.
58007013	Bɩ, mannɩbər vanta kʋ wɔɔ mim hɩ bɩ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu m. A ba Levii dogʋɔɔ barla y, do k'a a to ʋ bɩ gɔsɩ n nyɩnta mannɩbər Wosocɛ b'ʋ y.
58007014	Gʋaa haay a dɔ, a ʋ, Ziida do gʋaa m, Moyiisi n do naa do mim hɩ mannɩbənno wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ y.
58007015	Hɔ k'a n'a kam wɔɔ n mim naa do jɩ ma fasɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Mannɩbər vanta n ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ, Levii dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, bɔ b'ʋ kʋ ʋ kan Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ kɩ.
58007016	Lɛrɔ k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ yaŋŋɔɔ mim dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɛɛ m an a ba mannɩbər y, a ba a ʋ mannɩbər a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ paŋŋa tɔ ma.
58007017	Denter sɔ, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Ɩ ba ɩbɩɩ nawʋm mannɩbər dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ, amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
58007018	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, n nɩ lɛ k'a nyɩnta ʋ biisi bɩ ci zɛ, bala, a paŋŋa ba ʋ, b'a b'a dam ma an a da gʋaa han y.
58007019	Bala, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ n a da ma, ŋn'a ka gʋɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga fasɩ Woso mɩm ʋ y. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, taaheerlɛ k'a lɛ da haay n ta ʋ, a tɔ ma m wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma, ʋ n'ʋ zɔm Woso ma.
58007020	A n a na ma bɩ, Woso mɩŋŋa a wer si kʋ Yeezuu n yɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ. Levii dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ mannɩbənno, bɩ wersire naa do lɔɔ n nyɩnta ʋ y.
58007021	Bɩ kʋ Yeezuu nɩ, Woso a cɩnta mannɩbər, an a hɩ a ʋ: "Zuuba a wer si, b'a b'a bɔrɛ a taa nɩ y. A ʋ, ɩbɩɩ yɩm mannɩbər dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ."
58007022	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ nɩ gʋaasɩbabaa k'a lɛ da biisi hɔ bɩ ra bɩ m kan Woso kɩ.
58007023	Hɔ vanta n ta ʋ sɔ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Levii dogʋɔɔ mannɩbənno wɔɔ, ŋ nyɩnta yɔɔgʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gɩngam ŋn'a zibəə bɩ tom bɩ tɔ ma.
58007024	Bɩ, kʋ Yeezuu nɩ, a garɛ ba ʋ y, a b'a mannɩbər zibəə bɩ tom gʋaa nɩ y.
58007025	Naa tɔ ma m, an n'a dam ma an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yom ma, k'a a zɔ Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʋ. Bala, k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa m dɔmɩm haay bɩ, a ɩ yaa dam Woso m dɔmɩm haay ŋ tɔ ma.
58007026	Naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Yeezuu n mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ ga m ʋ a yɩ. A tɩrga fasɩ, kʋrɔma sɩ kan mimbʋnyaa sɩ kɩ ba a gʋr zi y. A mɩsɩrbaa y'a hɔ kan mimbʋnyaabənno hɔ kɩ, Woso a busu, an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ.
58007027	A n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan biisi mannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ y, pakra bɛɛ m k'an mannɩ ba dɔmɩm biyəə a mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, k'a bɔkarɛ a gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ ba y. Ga k'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ, a mɩŋŋa a ka am mannɩ hɔ bɩ m, gallɛm deem taan••• dɔmɩm haay minto.
58007028	Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ mannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, ŋ yɩ kʋrɔma bam. Bɩ ler kʋ Woso a bɔ, an a wer si lɛrɔ wɔɔ cenle jɛ ʋ bɩ, a Nyɩ k'a mɩŋŋa a ka an a ba mɩŋŋa fasɩ dɔmɩm haay tɔ ma b'a cɩnta mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ.
58008001	Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kʋ wɔɔ mim hɩ bɩ, wɔɔ n ta m denter, a ɩ nyɩntam cirbəə nɔ ʋ, Woso k'a a so hɔ haay ʋ bɩ jɩr ʋ arzana ʋ.
58008002	A mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ zi an n'a bam b'ʋ Woso taʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, pɛɛracɛ paan••• kʋ Woso a dɔ, gʋɔɔ bɛɛ y'a dɔ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
58008003	Mannɩbər haay zibəə n ganwʋrɛrɔ kan mannɩrɔ kɩ ka Woso ʋ m, a a ga m sɔ, kʋ wɔɔ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n bɩr hɔ m k'a ka Woso ʋ sɔ.
58008004	Kʋ durnya naa do gʋaa nɩ, a b'a dam ma an yɩ mannɩbər y. Bala, mannɩbənno ta ʋ kara, ŋn'ɩ mannɩrɔ kam Woso ʋ amba Moyiisi lɛrɔ a hɩ bɩ m.
58008005	Bɩ, mannɩbənno wɔɔ duro zibəə bɩ, mannɩbər zibəə paan••• k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ bɔkʋrɛ m, a makra m. A do m ba Moyiisi nyɩnta k'a pɛɛracɛ dɔ a ka Woso ʋ bɩ m. Woso a hɩ m, a ʋ: Ɩ tɔ ʋ k'ɩ pɛɛracɛ bɩ dɔ k'an yɩ hɔdeem kan mɔɔ n a hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m ci bɩ burə ʋ bɩ kɩ.
58008006	Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, mannɩbər zibəə k'a lɛ da brɔɔ hɔ bɩ ra gʋta bɩ Yeezuu n n'a bam. Bala, am gʋaasɩbabaa k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da bɩ zɛkʋrazaa, gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ do jɩr bɩ, lerbɔrɛrɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ da a yo ma.
58008007	Kʋ nyɩnta lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa b'ʋ zore, a bɩ yɩm pakra kʋ gʋaasɩbabaa k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da n sompi a yaa ʋ y.
58008008	Bɩ, Woso nyaa ba kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ tɔ ma, a ʋ: Dɔmɩnnɔ ɩ zɛm, mɔɔ m bɩ gʋaasɩbabaa daa dam Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma, kan Ziida gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
58008009	Gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ do bɩ bɩr yɩrɛ, am gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ mɔɔ da ŋ zɩrɔ ma bɩ nɩ y, hinni kʋ mɔɔ ŋ gaa ŋ wɔ ma, m bɔ ŋ nɩ Eziptɩ ʋ bɩ, ŋ n ta a lɛ ra gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ do nɔ ʋ y, bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ m bɔ ŋ ʋ. Mɔɔ m Zuuba, mɔɔ ɩ meer bɩ ba.
58008010	Dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro jɛ ʋ, gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ mɔɔ n n'a dam Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, ba n nɩ: Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛrɔ wɔɔ darɛ ŋ hɔɔn ʋ, m ŋ gʋrsɩra ba ŋ heer ʋ. Mɔɔ yɩrɛ ŋ Woso, ŋnɩ yɩ mɔɔ gʋɔɔ.
58008011	Ŋ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ k'a a ka ma k'a hɔ dɩnda a mim nɩ y, gɛɛ a danyɩ m an bɩr a hɩrɛ a ʋ, a ka k'ɩ Zuuba dɔ. Bala, ŋ haay mɔɔ dɔm, an a sa ŋ poore ma an ta m ŋ gʋtɔɔ ma.
58008012	Mɔɔ yɩ ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ darɛ m nɔ ʋ y.
58008013	Woso k'a bʋr an nɩ gʋaasɩbabaa daa mim dɩndam bɩ, naa ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ ba a ʋ hɔgusire. A n bɔkarɛ hɔ k'a gusi, b'a zibəə ba ʋ bɩ, a nyaanɩm zɔɔ.
58009001	Lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, lɛrɔ nyɩnta ʋ ŋn'ɩ yaa bɩ darɛ zaarɔ hɩnkam, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ cɛ dɔ sɔ k'a bɩr yaa bɩ daŋ ʋ.
58009002	Cɛ bɩ ba ŋ y'a ʋ pɛɛra m, a nɔ n hɩɩya, lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ bir ŋ nawʋm lɛɛ k'an jɩnjɛɛm Woso ma. Lɛɛ bɩ do ŋ fɩtɩrɛ bɩ kan mɔrcɩntarahɔ bɩ kɩ, bur kʋ ŋ n'a kam Woso ʋ bɩ kɩ kuntə ʋ.
58009003	Cɛ nɔ hɩɩyazaa bɩ, pɛɛra ŋ y'a ta a lɛ ma, cɛ nɔ bɩ do Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ m.
58009004	Lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, mannɩduu ŋ y'a ba sarma m, ŋn'a cɩnta b'ʋ, tidəər nyisi sɛnyaʋrɛ mɔr m bɩ, cɛ nɔ bɩ do ʋ sɔ bɩ, daka kʋ ŋ y'a ba gɔ m, ŋn'a lihi sarma m bɩ cɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ b'ʋ, daka bɩ do bir ŋ nawʋrɛ, ŋ ʋ, gʋaasɩbabaa daka. Daka bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, laaga nɩ b'ʋ ŋn'a ba sarma m, ŋnɩ mann zar ʋ, Aarɔn bənkə k'a vu da bɩ nyɩnta daka b'ʋ sɔ, jaa wargarɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ Woso a gʋaasɩbabaa gʋrsɩra ba ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta daka b'ʋ sɔ.
58009005	Gʋaasɩbabaa daka bɩ burə ʋ bɩ, hɔɔ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba hɩɩya ŋ zarɔ n ta ŋ ma, malɛɛkarɔ makra m, hɔɔ wɔɔ duro jɩ ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, Woso ɩ lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ. A zarɔ wɔɔ ku ŋ y'a ʋ lɛɛ kʋ n nɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ mannɩhɔ ma zaasʋm ma bɩ ra. Wɔɔ bɩ toore yɩm dɩɩtaa k'ʋ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro mim dɩnda fasɩ y.
58009006	Pɛɛracɛ bɩ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ cɩncɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ biyəə kan a bɩncɛ kɩ, mannɩbənno wɔɔ nɩ gasʋm cɛ bɩ nɔ lɛɛkarɛ hɔ b'ʋ dɔmɩm biyəə ŋn'a zi bam.
58009007	Bɩ, cɛ nɔ hɩɩyazaa bɩ, mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ y'a deem taan••• nɩ gasʋm b'ʋ, dɔɔraa nɔ ʋ gallɛm deem. Gasʋ an nawʋm b'ʋ hɔbɩsɩ hɩɩya ma m k'a ka Woso ʋ, k'a a mɩŋŋa mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, kan Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba badɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ sugur yɩrɛ kɩ.
58009008	Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay naa, ŋ sa Sɛnt-Ɛspri ʋ k'a hɩnka wɔɔ m a ʋ, kʋ cɛ nɔ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ gɔɔta an ta ʋ, zaa ba ʋ cɩna gʋɔɔ n nɩ gasʋm Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ b'ʋ y.
58009009	Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ hɔ k'an ta ʋ her-her naa hɩnkam. Ŋ jɩ ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, ganwʋrɛrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ ŋ kam Woso ʋ kan hɔbɩsɩrɔ mannɩrɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ kam nɔ wɔɔ heer hu n bɔ y.
58009010	Hɔɔ wɔɔ duro haay, hɔbɩrɛ kan hɔmire kɩ bankarɛ kan wɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ hɔbɩrɛ zaarɔ kɩ, ŋn'a dɩnda gʋɔɔ m. Durnya naa zibəə hɔɔ m. Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ tolle ba ŋnɩ dɔmɩm kʋ Woso hɔ haay lʋr ʋ bɩ ku.
58009011	Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Krista bʋr, mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m, a ɩ bʋr hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ her lɔ nɔɔm m. Cɛ k'a n'a zi bɩ baŋ ʋ bɩ gore kan a mɩŋŋabaa kɩ lɛ da biisi pɛɛracɛ bɩ m. Gʋɔɔ bɛɛ cɛ bɩ do dɔ y, durnya naa hɔ bɛɛ y.
58009012	Krista k'a gasʋ lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a n gasʋ bɔnsannɔ kan dinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ kɩ ma nɩ y. Gasʋ a ʋ b'ʋ a mɩŋŋa ma m gallɛm deem taan••• dɔmɩm haay tɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, an bʋmbɔrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ yɩ an a ka wɔɔ ʋ.
58009013	Biisi bɩ, bɔnsannɔ kan ŋʋannɔ kɩ n nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ m, ŋn'ɩ zullur zɛm sɔ ŋn'a dam sɛ rɛ, ŋnɩ ma bɩ, kan zullur bɩ suu bɩ kɩ sarɛ, ŋn'a zɩnzaasʋm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ ba, a minkəm bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ hu bɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ mim nɔ ʋ.
58009014	K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔbɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ ma a da ma an gʋɔɔ hu bɔ, k'a maam, Krista ma b'ɩ lɛ da haay. A a mɩŋŋa ka Woso ʋ amba mannɩ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da bɩ m, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'an mɩsɩr dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ bɩ paŋŋa m. A ma b'ɩ wɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ sʋrgɔm, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ minno kʋ ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ba y. Kʋ wɔɔ n Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ zi ba.
58009015	Krista k'a naa ba bɩ y'a ka, an a ba gʋɔɔ kan Woso kɩ zɛkʋrazaa, gʋaasɩbabaa daa a a cɩnta ŋ bire ʋ. A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ n hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyarɛ ba ʋ, Woso nɩ ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ yɩ, kʋ gʋaa ga bɩ tɔ ma m, Krista m. A zɛ b'ɩ gʋɔɔ yɔm mimbʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba, gʋaasɩbabaa gusire bɩ zuure dɔmɩm ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
58009016	Kʋ gʋaa ci ba an a hɔnta jirle zaa hɩnka, kʋ n a jir a zɛ jɛ ʋ, hɔnta bɩ b'a dam ma an jir k'a zaa bɩ bɛɛ ga y.
58009017	Bala, k'a zaa bɩ n ga, ci k'a ba bɩ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y, bɩ k'a zaa bɩ bɩ ga, ci bɩ nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ.
58009018	Naa y'a ka, lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, an yɩ pakra kʋ ma n nyɩnta ʋ, kʋ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ n a dɔ an a zi ba.
58009019	Biisi bɩ, lɛɛ Moyiisi a ka, an lɛrɔ kʋ Woso a ka bɩ pa da haay Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m. A n bɔkarɛ an hizɔp gɔ sa, serka piinə n ta ma, an a nyɔɔ dinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ kan bɔnsannɔ kɩ ma ma, kan hi kɩ, an a zaasʋ lɛrɔ ci bɩ ma, kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ ma haay.
58009020	A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ma naa do n'a kam Woso nɩ gʋaasɩbabaa darɛ awɔɔ ma. Woso lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n ta a lɛ ra gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ nɔ ʋ."
58009021	Moyiisi ma zaasʋ pɛɛracɛ bɩ ma sɔ, kan yaa bɩ darɛ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ ma.
58009022	Lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, pakra m kʋ n nɩ ma sa n nɩ hɔ gʋta hu bɔ m. Bɩ, kʋ ma n a lo sɔ, Woso bɩ gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ y.
58009023	Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ makrarɔ m, b'a yɩ pakra kʋ n nɩ ŋ hu bɔ amba wɔɔ yɩ bɩ m. Bɩ, arzana hɔɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛ taa mannɩrɔ kʋ ŋ mɩŋŋabaa lɛ da fasɩ ma.
58009024	Bala, pɛɛracɛ kʋ gʋɔɔ a ba bɩ bɛɛ Krista gasʋ ʋ y, pɛɛracɛ bɩ do bɩ, lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ paan••• bɩ makra m. Krista bɩ, gasʋ a ʋ arzana ʋ, lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ b'ʋ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
58009025	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ, gasʋ a tɩr a ʋ Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ gallɛm deem dɔɔraa biyəə nɔ ʋ, hɔbɩsɩ ma m. Bɩ kʋ Krista nɩ, a n gasʋ Woso zi k'a mɩŋŋa ba mannɩ gallɛm hɔka y. A mɩŋŋa ka a ʋ vugur.
58009026	K'a bɛɛ y'a ba ncɩnaaʋ, pakra m k'an fɩr yɩ gallɛm hɔka an a sa durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma, an lee kum her la. Bɩ, bʋr a ʋ, gallɛm deem taan••• biisi dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn nyarɛ ma, an b'a mɩŋŋa ka mannɩ, k'a mimbʋnyaa zaar ba.
58009027	Pakra m kʋ gʋaa biyəə n ga gallɛm deem taan•••, bɩ jɛ ʋ, Woso n a zaa dʋdɔ ka.
58009028	Ncɩnaaʋ m sɔ, Krista n a mɩŋŋa ka mannɩ, an ga gallɛm deem taan••• k'a gʋɔɔ gʋta mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋ ŋ ma. A y'a yarɛ an bʋr, k'a bɩ bʋr, mimbʋnyaarɔ bɛɛ an nɩ zɛm k'a b'a gʋ gʋɔɔ ma y, zɛ an nawʋm k'a bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩm dam nɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ.
58010001	Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ, hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a ka wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ŋnɩ ŋ hɩnkam, hɔɔ wɔɔ duro bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y. Mannɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ bam tee••• rɔ wɔɔ hɔdeem, ŋnɩ ŋ bam dɔɔraa biyəə, ŋ barɛ nyarɛ ba ʋ y, bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ba tɩrga y.
58010002	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa bɩ do dam Woso m nɔ wɔɔ, kʋ yaa bɩ do darɛ ɩ wɔ ʋ, an ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋ ŋ ma fasɩ, ŋ b'a yarɛ ŋn'a heer kɔ ŋ ʋ a mimbʋnyaa ba y, bɩ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ barɛ nyam sɔ.
58010003	Sɩra nɔ ʋ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro barɛ bɩ, gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ an nɩ ŋ tɔ darɛ ŋ nɔ ʋ dɔɔraa biyəə.
58010004	Bala, ŋʋannɔ kan bɔnsannɔ kɩ ma b'a dam ma fɩɩga an gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ ŋ ma y.
58010005	Naa y'a ka, Krista k'a bʋr durnya ʋ bɩ, an a hɩ Woso m, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa mannɩ ma, bɩ ganwʋrɛ nɩ y, bɩ y'a ka ɩbɩɩ n mɛsim ka mɔɔ ʋ.
58010006	Hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ dam sɛ rɛ k'a ŋ ka ɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bɩr ɩbɩɩ nɔ yɩrɛ y, mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ bɩr ɩbɩɩ nɔ yɩm sɔ y.
58010007	Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ n a hɩ, m ʋ, Woso ra, mɔɔ ba n nɩ, zɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m b'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba, amba hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ lɛrɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
58010008	Lɛɛ a ka an a hɩ a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa mannɩrɔ ma, b'ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa ganwʋrɛrɔ ma y, ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ da sɛ rɛ rɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ y, b'ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ y, ɩbɩɩ bɩr ŋ ŋʋarɛ y. A n bɔkarɛ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro barɛ a ga m, lɛrɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ.
58010009	A n a ya an a na ma, a ʋ: Woso ra, mɔɔ ba n nɩ, zɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m b'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba. Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, Woso n biisi mannɩrɔ wɔɔ haay ci zɛ, an Krista mannɩ bɩ sompi ŋ yaa ʋ.
58010010	Kʋ Yeezuu Krista Woso hɔɔnhɔ ba, an a mɩŋŋa sa an a ba mannɩ gallɛm deem taan••• bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ n'ʋ ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ.
58010011	Zɩɩfʋrɔ mannɩbənno wɔɔ, jɩm ŋ nawʋm dɔmɩm biyəə ŋn'a zi bɩ bam, ŋnɩ mannɩrɔ deem-deem nɔ wɔɔ bam, an bɔkarɛ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro b'a dam ma fɩɩga ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ ŋ ma y.
58010012	Bɩ kʋ Krista nɩ, mannɩ deem taan••• a a ba gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, mannɩ naa do barɛ nyɔɔdʋ bɩr nyam fɩɩga y, bɩ jɛ ʋ an ta an aa nyɩnta cirbəə nɔ ʋ Woso jɩr ʋ.
58010013	Kɛɛrɛ naa, dɔ a nawʋm ma, kʋ Woso n a jɩnnɔ da a wɔ ʋ.
58010014	Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, mannɩ deem taan••• tɔ ma, an a ka gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sʋrgɔ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ n a ba tɩrga fasɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ.
58010015	Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ naa hɩm wɔɔ m paan••• denter. Bala, a y'a hɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, a ʋ:
58010016	Zuuba y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ mɔɔ n n'a darɛ ŋ ma dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn jɛ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ darɛ ŋ heer ʋ, m a gʋrsɩra ba ŋ hɔɔn ʋ.
58010017	A n a ya an a na ma, a ʋ: Mɔɔ bɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ kan ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ kɩ tɔ darɛ m nɔ ʋ y.
58010018	A n bɔkarɛ, kʋ Woso mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka bɩ, a n a ga m dɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ n mannɩ ba k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ y.
58010019	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ heer kookoo kɛɛrɛ k'ʋ gasʋ lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ b'ʋ, Yeezuu ma bɩ mannɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
58010020	A pɛɛra k'a ta Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ bɩ rɛ bɩ kaansʋ kʋ wɔɔ n gasʋ. A zaa daa gʋ wɔɔ m, zaa mɩsɩr m. Pɛɛra k'a kaansʋ bɩ, a mɩŋŋa mɛ bɩ m.
58010021	Wɔɔ ɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m, a m Wosocɛ bɩ nyasʋm minzaa.
58010022	K'a maam, k'ʋ ʋ zɔ Woso ma kan ʋ heer kɩ haay, heerkoodəbaa m sɩrakarɛ denter nɔ ʋ, heer kʋ zi bʋnyaa haay bɔ ʋ Yeezuu ma tɔ ma, kan mɛ k'a sʋrgɔrɛ yɩ hi mɩŋŋa m kɩ.
58010023	Ʋ taaheerlɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m, ʋ n'a pa dam bɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, bala, wɔɔ dɔ denter m, ʋ ʋ, hɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ ler bɔ wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, a yɩ ŋ kam wɔɔ ʋ.
58010024	Ʋ bɩr ʋ dam kʋ han, zi mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋʋarɛ kan ŋ barɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
58010025	Ʋ b'ʋ gʋ ʋ sokʋmarɔ tarɛ ma y, ʋ bɩ yɩ am gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ minkə yarlɛ n nɔ wɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, an ta ʋ bɩ, ʋ bɩr kʋ heer yom, ʋ bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Zuuba dɔmɩm y'a zɔm.
58010026	Bala, kʋ wɔɔ sɩra dɔ, ʋ tɔ ka, ʋ ʋ gu ʋ nɩ mimbʋnyaa barɛ, mannɩ vanta ba ʋ dɔ an nɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋm wɔɔ ma y.
58010027	Kʋ wɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta wɔɔ m bɩ, nyibəə wɔɔ nɩ ba n bɩr a nɔ ʋ, ʋ bɩr dɔm mim k'a nɩ wɔɔ yɩm bɩ ma, mim bɩ do bɩ, dʋdɔyarlɛ k'a nɩ wɔɔ yɩm, ʋ gasʋ sɛ gʋta k'a nɩ Woso jɩnnɔ bɩm bɩ m.
58010028	Kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka Moyiisi lɛ bɩ ma, a bɩsɩ bɩ karɛ kasɛtɩzannɔ n ta ʋ hɩɩya, gɛɛ kaakʋ, a zaa bɩ zɛ n nawʋm gər, cicirzɛrɛ ba ʋ y.
58010029	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa Woso Nyɩ bɩ gore bɔ ʋ, bɩ zaa n a ga fɩryɩrɛ m an lɛ da ra? Bala, naa zaa bɩ, dɩga a ʋ, ma kʋ Woso a sa an gʋaasɩbabaa da an a mɩŋŋa sʋrgɔ m bɩ ma hɔnɩbɩr. Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a nɩ barka kam wɔɔ ʋ b'a n'a sʋnsɔ wʋm sɔ.
58010030	Bala, wɔɔ Woso k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ nɩ zɩm bɔm, mɔɔ n'a sompim gʋaa n'ʋ' bɩ dɔ. A a hɩ sɔ a ʋ: 'Zuuba y'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ kam.'
58010031	Kʋ Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ gʋaa ku, k'a dʋdɔ ka, a yɩrɛ a zaa ma kʋsɩ maam-maam.
58010032	Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ biisi, a sɩrakarɛ daa baa ma, a Woso lɛɛgure yɩ, a fɩr yɩ gʋta, a a gu a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ zoo bɩ barɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
58010033	Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ tɩr awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ, ŋnɩ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ gaa ʋ, awɔɔ tɩr a dam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ rɔ wɔɔ han.
58010034	Awɔɔ kɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ du Krista tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ minto, gʋɔɔ awɔɔ hɔnta yɔ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n yɛ a to kan heernyɔɔ kɩ. Bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔnta k'a mɩŋŋabaa lɛ da bɩ m, bɩ nyarɛ ba ʋ y.
58010035	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a bɩ heerkoodəbaa k'awɔɔ n ta m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ to y, awɔɔ zɛm bɩ ganwʋrɛ gʋta yɩ.
58010036	Pakra m k'awɔɔ n bʋr a ma k'a a da ma, a hɔ k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ ba, k'a hɔ k'a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ.
58010037	Naa y'a ka Wosoci bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: A gɔɔta poore, poore tɔkkɛ, gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ n bʋr, a bɩ maasɩrɛ barɛ y.
58010038	Bɩ, gʋaa k'an tɩrga mɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba a nawʋm sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, k'a zaa a bɔ a jɛ m, mɔɔ heer bɩ yɩm nyɩnta kan kɩ dɔ y.
58010039	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ tɩr a bɔ a jɛ m, ŋnɩ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y. Sɩra wɔɔ n'a kam, ʋ nyiro wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ tɔ ma.
58011001	Sɩrakarɛ bɩ, kasɛtɩ m gʋaa n ta m a heer ʋ, a ʋ, a hɔ k'a ta a heer lɛ bɩ yɩm, an a dɔ paan••• a heer ʋ a ʋ, hɔ k'a bɩr yɩm mɩm m bɩ ta ʋ denter.
58011002	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta biisi rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Woso nɔ ŋ yɩ ŋ la.
58011003	Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka wɔɔ n a dɔ ʋ ʋ, Woso ɩ durnya da a lemim m. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ yɩm mɩm m haay naa, a to a ʋ hɔ kʋ mɩm bɩr a yɩm nɔ ʋ.
58011004	Abɛl sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an mannɩ k'a mɩŋŋabaa cem Kayɛn hɔ han ba an a ka Woso ʋ. A sɩra bɩ karɛ y'a ka Woso n a hɩ a ʋ, a tɩrga a mɩm ʋ, bala, Woso mɩŋŋa yɛ a ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma. Abɛl ga, bɩ, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ, a gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam.
58011005	Enɔk sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Woso n a busu a zi, b'a n ga y. Gʋɔɔ n a ka ma bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y, kʋ Woso a busu a zi bɩ tɔ ma. Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, kʋ Woso n bɔkarɛ an Enɔk busu a zi bɩ, Woso nɔ yɩ ra.
58011006	Woso nɔ b'a dam ma an yɩ gɔsɩ ra, k'a zaa n sɩra ka y. Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a zɔm Woso ma b'a ga m an sɩra ka a ʋ Woso ta ʋ, an sɩra ka sɔ a ʋ, Woso gan wʋm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n a kam ma k'a a dɔ rɔ wɔɔ ma.
58011007	Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Nowee n zu hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ m b'ʋ. Minno kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ ba rɔ wɔɔ a lɛɛ ka an a hɩ m. Nowee n hɔɔ wɔɔ duro yɩ a mɩm nɩ y, b'a gu an zu hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ b'ʋ. A kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta ba an gasʋ ʋ kan a hargʋɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bɔlɛm yɩ. Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, an a hɩnka a ʋ, a zamaana gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bʋnyaa, a sɩra bɩ karɛ tɔ ma, Woso n dɩga a gʋaa tɩrga.
58011008	Woso k'a Abraham bir bɩ, sɩrakarɛ y'a ka, an yɛ Woso ma, an ta tara kʋ Woso n'a kaŋ ʋ k'an yɩ a hɔjirle bɩ ra. A n a hʋr a kʋ b'ʋ, b'a n a dɔ kʋ ta a nawʋm ka y.
58011009	A sɩra bɩ karɛ y'a ka an nyɩnta kʋ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ m b'ʋ, am saana hɔ bɩ m. Nyɩnta a ʋ pɛɛracɛrɔ ʋ, Izakkɩ kan Zakɔɔb kɩ nyɩnta pɛɛracɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ sɔ. Lerbɔrɛ deem-deem bɩ Woso a bɔ brɔɔ m.
58011010	Bala, Abraham bɩ, dɔ a nawʋm kʋ k'a jɩr paŋŋa n ta ʋ bɩ ma, k'a nyɩnta ʋ. Woso mɩŋŋa n kʋ bɩ do dɔrɛzaa.
58011011	Abraham sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an wɔ ʋ an nyɩ yɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, a gusi an cem nyɩyɩrɛ dɔmɩm han, a lʋ Saara maam sɔ. Bɩ, a a gu an sɩra ka a ʋ, Woso hɔ k'a ler bɔ a m bɩ bam.
58011012	Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, gʋaa deem taan••• naa tɔ ma, baa k'a gusi an a zɔ zɛ ma bɩ, yaŋŋɔɔ n nyɩnta ʋ gʋta, am monyaarɔ hɔ bɩ m, am nyɩntaayaa k'a nɩ higʋta lɛ ra bɩ m.
58011013	Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay, gɩnga ŋ y'a ʋ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ. Ŋ n hɔɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ ŋ nɩ bɩ yɩ y, bɩ, ŋ y'a to ŋnɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro yɩ laatʋ, ŋn'a heer nyɔɔ ŋ tɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ ʋ, saanɔɔ n'a mɩ, bɩ zaakʋrɛzannɔ n'a mɩ sɔ tara burə ʋ naa ʋ.
58011014	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a hɩnka ŋ nawʋrɛ ŋ ʋ, a ka a nawʋrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ma.
58011015	Kʋ kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kʋrkʋr n ta ŋ nɩ, ŋ toore yɩrɛ ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ ta ŋ ʋ.
58011016	Bɩ, ncɩnaaʋ bɛɛ y, a ka ŋ nawʋm kʋ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da ma, arzana ŋn'a kam ma. Naa tɔ ma nɩ, nyannɩ bɩr Woso zɛm kʋ n ŋ bir a gʋɔɔ y, bala, a kʋ banka, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ nyɩnta ʋ.
58011017	Abraham sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an yɛ k'a Izakkɩ zɛ Woso m mannɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a ka lɛɛ k'a dɩga ma bɩ ma. Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ ler bɔ Abraham m k'a nyɩ ka ʋ, an bɔkarɛ Abraham yɛ zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'a nyɩ deem taan••• bɩ ka ʋ mannɩ.
58011018	Woso nyɩnta an a hɩ m, a ʋ: Izakkɩ n nɩ yaŋŋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ler bɔ ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ yɩm.
58011019	A dɔ Abraham ʋ a heer ʋ a ʋ, Woso ɩ paŋŋa m k'a Izakkɩ mɩm bɔ ʋ, denter sɔ, Woso a ya an Izakkɩ ka Abraham ʋ ɩ ʋ, a mɩm a a bɔ ʋ.
58011020	Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Izakkɩ n Zakɔɔb kan Eso kɩ barka da ʋ ŋ booti mim nɔ ʋ.
58011021	Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m sɔ, Zakɔɔb zɛ k'a b'a zɔ bɩ, a Zozɛf nyɩnɔ wɔɔ barka da ʋ. A n yo a bənkə ma an zerga, an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ.
58011022	Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka, Zozɛf n Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ bɔ Eziptɩ ʋ bɩ mim hɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, a garɛ a zɔ. A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ kʋ ŋ n'a yaarɔ gʋr, ŋnɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ bɔrɛ bɩ ma.
58011023	Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Moyiisi zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a nyaakʋm da a yɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, mom bam kaakʋ. Dɩga kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ nyɩ bɩ gʋɛrɛ ma bɩ y'a ka, ŋ n nyi ba cir bɩ lɛ k'a ka bɩ bɩsɩ ka ma nɩ y.
58011024	Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Moyiisi k'a b'a ba gʋaa burgu bɩ, a n yɛ kʋ ŋ n'a bir Farawɔn nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ nyɩ y.
58011025	A yɛ k'a fɩr yɩ kan Woso dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an a gu mim bʋnyaa heernyɔɔ k'a nɩ cenim bɩ ma.
58011026	A dɔ a ʋ a heer ʋ, a ʋ, k'ɩ fɩr yɩ amba Krista nɩ, a nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ an lɛ da Eziptɩ hɔnta haay yɩrɛ m. Bala, dɩga a nawʋm ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a ka a gʋɔɔ ʋ bɩ ma.
58011027	Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Moyiisi n a hʋr Eziptɩ kʋ b'ʋ, a n nyi ba cir bɩ nɔmaa nɩ y, an jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, amba gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso kʋ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a yɩ a mɩm m bɩ yɩm.
58011028	Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba, an a hɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m kʋ ŋ nɩ ma zaasʋ a hallɛrɔ, kan a sɩgarɔ kɩ ma, kʋ zɛ malɛɛka bɩ bɩ Israyɛl lɛɛkarɛ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ y.
58011029	Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n bra higʋta piinə bɩ ma, a tara n gər. Bɩ, Eziptɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ k'a bra ma sɔ bɩ, hi bɩ nɩ ŋ bɩ.
58011030	Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Zeriko pəŋŋəro wɔɔ n a dɩnda, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr ma dɔmɩm saanhɩna bɩ tɔ ma.
58011031	Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Rahab n ga kan bɩsɩkawosomazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ y, a yɛ an dundolɛɛzizannɔ wɔɔ si a har ʋ an a mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ.
58011032	M ya m bɔ hɩ? Toore ba ʋ mɔɔ nɩ Zedenyɔɔ mim dɩndarɛ y, kan Barakkɩ hɔ kɩ, Samsɔn kɩ, Zɛfte kɩ, Davɩd kɩ, Sanwɛl kɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ hɔ kɩ y.
58011033	Ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ yar ba ŋn'a so kʋrɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ tɩrgabaa zi ba, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ ŋ nɩ yɩ. Ŋ n'a ka poozannɔ n wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ bɩ y.
58011034	Ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ sɛrɔ gʋtɔɔ lihi, gʋɔɔ n a ŋʋa k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ hɛnnɔ m, ŋnɩ bɔ lɛ m. Ŋ nyɩnta paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ paŋŋa yɩ, ŋ nyɩnta yarbənno wɩsɩrɔ, ŋnɩ bʋr kʋrɔ vantɔɔ yarbənno ra, brɔɔ n a si.
58011035	Lannɔ niŋŋoo sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩngarɔ a mɩm bɔ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ fɩr yɩ, ŋnɩ gɩnga sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ n yɛ ŋn'a bɔ a taa m k'a bɩ ga y, a ba ŋ y'a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'a wɔ ʋ, a mɩmbɔʋrɛ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da yɩ.
58011036	Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n yɛ gʋɔɔ n yaa wʋ ŋ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ zɛ mawʋr m, ŋnɩ nɔɔrɔ kʋsɩ baŋŋarɔ m, ŋnɩ ŋ du.
58011037	Ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ bɩmba jaarɔ m, ŋnɩ ŋ meeyaa bɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ gɔsɩnnɔ zɛ kumbir sii m, gɛɛ ŋnɩ zɛ kargʋ m. Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m nɔɔrɔ n kʋrɔ cɛ ma, ŋn'a dam lɛɛ zi, seero ci gɛɛ biiro ciro ɩ nyɩnta ŋ huuro, ŋnɩ ŋʋazaabaa nɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ nɩ nyannɩ darɛ ŋ ma, ŋn'ɩ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma.
58011038	A n bɔkarɛ gʋɔɔ wɩsɩrɔ m Woso mɩm ʋ, durnya naa do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a ga m kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ y. Ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, ŋ ba lɛɛ nɩ y, ŋn'ɩ poo sam kan ciro gaa kɩ, ŋn'ɩ wʋtam yaarɔ ʋ kan ciro yaarɔ kɩ ʋ.
58011039	Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay, Woso nɔ nyɔɔ ŋ la ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma. A n bɔkarɛ ŋ n hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ ŋ nɩ bɩ yɩ y.
58011040	Bala, Woso hɔ mɩŋŋa k'a lɛ da hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ cɩnta k'a b'a ba wɔɔ m, a ŋʋa a ʋ k'a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro kan wɔɔ kɩ, k'ʋ b'ʋ dakʋ ʋ, ʋ yɩ amba Woso n lɛ n taa kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ bɩ m fasɩ.
58012001	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kasɛtɩzannɔ m, ŋnɩ bɩr wɔɔ ma. Ʋ mɔr haay k'a nɩ wɔɔ tarɛ dam jɩm ʋ bɩ to, kan mimbʋnyaa k'a n'a som wɔɔ ʋ zɔɔ-zɔɔ bɩ kɩ. K'ʋ gɔɔta ʋ ta lɛɛ tee••• hɔ kʋ Woso ʋ wɔɔ n a ba bɩ nɔ ʋ k'an ta an a nyarɛ ku.
58012002	Ʋ ʋ mɩm ka Yeezuu zi, a m wɔɔ sɩra bɩ karɛ sɩŋŋɩda kan a nyambʋrlɛ kɩ. A yɛ n n a zɛ gɔdarkʋra ma, a n nyannɩ zɛ k'a ga gɔdarkʋra ma y, bala, dɩga an nawʋm heernyɔɔ niŋŋə k'a nɩ zɛm ba yɩ bɩ ma. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, nyɩnta an nawʋm Woso jɩr ʋ cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
58012003	K'a a hɔɔn da ma a dɩga a, a yɛ an fɩr yɩ mimbʋnyaabənno wɔ ʋ, k'a a hɔɔn da ma denter k'a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ to heerzar nɔ ʋ, a paŋŋa n a da y.
58012004	Bala, zoo k'awɔɔ n'a bam kan mimbʋnyaa kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ n a ba cɩna an wɔ ʋ a n awɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ y.
58012005	Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, meerbaarɔ k'a ŋ ba k'awɔɔ heer yo bɩ, ŋ tɔ ba awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra? A a hɩ, a ʋ: M nyɩnnɩ, ɩ bɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ kʋ Zuuba n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ ba hɔnɩbɩr y, ɩ b'ɩ heer zar sɔ ɩ bɔ k'a nawʋm zaa ʋ bɩ tɔ ma y.
58012006	Bala, gʋaa kʋ Zuuba a ŋʋa bɩ, bɩ zaa an n'a hʋnhʋrm, gʋaa k'a nɩ dɩgam ma a nyɩ bɩ, bɩ zaa an nɩ mawʋr soŋ ʋ.
58012007	K'a yɛ fɩr k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ ma, ɩ ʋ, hʋnhʋrlɛ m. Bala, awɔɔ fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso ɩ dɩgarɛ awɔɔ ma a nyɩnɔ. Nyɩ ka n ta ʋ, a zɩ bɩr a hʋnhʋrlɛ?
58012008	K'awɔɔ bɩr hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩrɛ amba a nyɩnɔ haay n'a yɩm bɩ nɩ, k'a maam, a nyɩnɔ paan•••rɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y, gʋsɩmarɔ n'awɔɔ m.
58012009	Ʋ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ zɩrɔ n'a bam wɔɔ m bɩ tɔ da ʋ nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ hʋnhʋr ŋ nawʋm, wɔɔ nɩ ŋ da ŋ ʋ. Bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ yɛ ʋ Zɩ Woso ma an lɛ da, maam bɩ a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ kam wɔɔ ʋ.
58012010	Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ hʋnhʋr ŋ nawʋm dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ bala, amba a a ga m ŋ hɔɔn ʋ bɩ m. Bɩ, Woso bɩ, wɔɔ hʋnhʋr an nawʋm k'a wɔɔ banka kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ amba a mɩŋŋa m.
58012011	Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm, wɔɔ heer tɩr a zaar ba fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, heernyɔɔ ba ʋ y. Bɩ, k'a bɩ maasɩrɛ ba fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ dɩnda fɩr bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a nyɔɔdʋ yɩm, laafɩɩ m kan mɩsɩrbaa tɩrga kɩ.
58012012	Awɔɔ kɔ kan Woso hɔɔnhɔ bɩ barɛ kɩ, k'a a ya, a bɩr a bam paan•••, a b'a to y, awɔɔ kɔ kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ kɩ, k'a banka a ta lɛɛ kan kɩ.
58012013	K'a zaarɔ tɩrgɔɔ sa, kʋ gʋaa k'a n'a bam k'a do bɩ b'a do y, bɩ k'a n'a banka an jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
58012014	K'a a tɔ ʋ, a bɩr laafɩɩ m kan gʋaa woo••• kɩ. A bɩr mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam, bala, kʋ gʋaa bɩr mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ barɛ a bɩ Zuuba yɩrɛ y.
58012015	K'a dundo a zi k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ b'a do Woso barka bɩ ma y. K'a dundo a zi k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gɔnyim kʋsɩ kɩ y. Kʋ n bɛɛ m a lɛɛ warm kʋ ma an a kʋsɩrabaa bɩ da gʋɔɔ gʋta ma.
58012016	Gɔsɩ bɩ yɩ jaandər awɔɔ barla, b'a bɩ yɩ Woso hɔɔ gore bɔʋrɛzaa am Eso hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Bɩ yɛ an a jɩtambaa hɔjirle hɛɛ a dam han k'an hɔbɩrɛ ka a ʋ poore k'a bɩ.
58012017	Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, maasɩrɛ k'a bɩ ba bɩ, a a ŋʋa k'a zɩ n a barka da ʋ, bɩ n a gu. A n nyi ka k'a zɩ bɩ n a barka da ʋ ŋʋɩɩ•••, k'an bɩ kɩ haay, an wɔ ʋ an hɔ k'a ba bɩ lʋr y.
58012018	K'a dɔ a ʋ, bɩncɛ k'awɔɔ n ta ʋ Woso taa naa, a do bɛɛ m Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta Sinayii ci jɩr ʋ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋn'a wɔ da ma bɩ nɩ y. Sɛ wurə ɩ nyɩnta ci bɩ ma, monsigə n bɩr ma bidə, kan hɩnhɛr gʋta kɩ.
58012019	Ŋ huure kan leer kɩ ma b'ʋ. Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ leer bɩ do ma bɩ, ŋ n a ŋʋa k'a a ya a tʋr ka ma y.
58012020	Bala, ŋ n wɔ ʋ ŋnɩ lɛ kʋ leer b'a cɩnta naa do si y. Leer b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Gʋaa k'a n'a nɔm ci bɩ ma bɩ, baa kʋ hɔbɩsɩ m, a zaa bɩmba n nawʋm jaarɔ m an ga.
58012021	Hɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ŋ da bɔ ʋ gʋta, baa Moyiisi mɩŋŋa, nyibəə a nyasʋ an kɔ an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Nyibəə ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, mɔɔ mɛ nɩ hinkəm maam-maam."
58012022	Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, a zɔ awɔɔ ʋ Siyɔn ci bɩ ma, Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ kʋ bɩ awɔɔ a zɔ ma, arzana Zerizalɛm bɩ m, kan a malɛɛkarɔ tisi-tisi rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
58012023	Woso lɛɛkarɛ nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ heernyɔɔ bam nɔ wɔɔ awɔɔ a zɔ ŋ ma, Woso brɔɔ tɔrɔ gʋrsɩra ba arzana ʋ. A zɔ awɔɔ ʋ Woso ma, a m gʋɔɔ haay dʋdɔkər, a zɔ awɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ kʋ Woso a ka ŋnɩ yɩ amba a lɛ n taa rɔ wɔɔ ma fasɩ.
58012024	A zɔ awɔɔ ʋ Yeezuu ma, a m gʋaasɩbabaa daa bɩ zɛkʋrazaa, a zɔ awɔɔ ʋ a ma zaasʋrɛ bɩ ma, a ma bɩ nɩ mimbʋnyaa gʋm gʋɔɔ ma, an nɩ meer bam wɔɔ daahan tɔ ma, an lɛ da Abɛl ma bɩ ra.
58012025	Naa minto bɩ, k'a dundo a zi. Woso k'a nɩ meer bam kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a b'a tʋr ta a meerbaa bɩ rɛ y. Awɔɔ yaabɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'a tʋr ta a zaa k'a nɩ ŋ bɔm zaa ʋ tara burə ʋ bɩ meerbaa bɩ rɛ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ fɩr yɩ. Bɩ wɔɔ, Woso y'a to brama an nɩ wɔɔ bɔm zaa ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ tʋr ta a meerbaa bɩ rɛ, ʋ ʋ gu ma, wɔɔ fɩr yɩm an lɛ da paan•••.
58012026	Biisi bɩ, Woso bɩ leer a ka tara n hinkə, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a ler bɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m tara hinkə, bɩ, bɩ bɛɛ nɩ yɩrɛ a deem nɩ y, mɔɔ brama hinkəm sɔ.
58012027	K'a a hɩ a ʋ: "Mɔɔ yɩ m yam" bɩ, naa ʋ k'a hɩ, a ʋ, hɔɔ k'a ŋ da ŋnɩ hinkəm nɔ wɔɔ hinkəre ŋnɩ nyaam, kʋ hɔɔ kʋ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ hinkə rɔ wɔɔ n gɔɔta ŋnɩ bɩr ta ʋ.
58012028	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ yɩ Woso barkadarɛzannɔ, k'a cirbəə kʋ k'a bɩ hinkəm ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ barka bɩ darɛ ba n nɩ: Ʋ bɩr Woso daŋ ʋ amba a a ŋʋa bɩ m, yɛ a lɛ ma nɔ ʋ, kan a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
58012029	Bala, wɔɔ Woso bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛ k'a nɩ bɩm kɩ. Hɔ k'a bɩr a nɔ yɩm bɩ zaar an n'a barɛ.
58013001	Kristagʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr kʋ ŋʋam tee•••,
58013002	k'a bɩr saanɔɔ sim mɩŋŋa a hadrɔ ʋ, a bɩ naa tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ y. Bala, gʋɔɔ nyɩnta ŋnɩ naa ba, ŋnɩ malɛɛkarɔ si a hadrɔ ʋ bɩ ŋ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ, malɛɛkarɔ nɩ y.
58013003	K'a bɩr a hɔɔn dam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʋ, lɔnnɔcɛ awɔɔ n ta ʋ kan ŋ kɩ. K'a bɩr a hɔɔn dam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʋ, fɩr awɔɔ n'a yɩm sɔ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m.
58013004	Gʋaa haay n harcɩntarɛ gore da ʋ, gʋaa kan a lʋ kɩ n bɩr sɩra zi bam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ bɩ jaan da y. Bala, Woso yɔɔdɩrbənno wɔɔ kan jaandənno wɔɔ kɩ dʋdɔ kam.
58013005	A bɩ busoo ŋʋa y, k'a zerga hɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ rɛ, bala, Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ b'ɩbɩɩ tore y, bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ sɔ fɩɩga y.
58013006	Naa y'a ka wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ: Zuuba n mɔɔ daahanzaa, mɔɔ bɩ nyi bam hɔsɩ nɩ y. Bɔ gʋaa n nɩ wɔŋ ʋ an a ba mɔɔ nɩ?
58013007	K'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ka awɔɔ lɛɛ biisi rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso lemim dɩnda awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ. K'a a hɔɔn da ŋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ barɛ lɔɔ ma, kan ga kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ lʋnlɔ bɩ kɩ ma, k'a sɩra ka Woso ʋ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m.
58013008	Yeezuu Krista k'a nyɩnta lʋnlɔ jim bɩ, a maam her sɔ a gɔɔtam maam dɔmɩm haay.
58013009	A b'a to hɔdɩndarɛrɔ daarɔ do y'a hʋnhɔ rɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ y. Woso barka bɩ y'a da ma an paŋŋa ka wɔɔ heer ʋ, hɔbɩrɛrɔ bɩrɛ minno bɛɛ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu minno wɔɔ duro ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n a nyɔɔdʋ yɩ y.
58013010	Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ mannɩbənno kʋ ŋ n'a zi barɛ ŋ Wosocɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ ba lɛ m k'a wɔɔ mannɩduu hɔ bɩ y.
58013011	Zɩɩfʋrɔ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ, hɔbɩsɩrɔ k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, ta an nawʋm nɩ Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an n'a kam Woso ʋ k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ. Bɩ, sɛ n n'a dam hɔbɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ rɛ kʋ bɩ bɔlɛɛma.
58013012	Naa y'a ka Yeezuu mɩŋŋa n bɩ ga kʋ bɩ bɔlɛɛma, k'a gʋɔɔ hu bɔ a ma bɩ m.
58013013	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ bɔ ʋ ta zi amba a mɩŋŋa ga bɔlɛɛma bɩ m, ʋ b'ʋ gu y.
58013014	Bala, wɔɔ ba kʋ m tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, ʋ n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔmɩm haay y. Ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm booti kʋ bɩ ma.
58013015	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ bɩr ʋ lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ tee••• Yeezuu tɔ ma. Ʋ lɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a bɔŋ ʋ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, mannɩ wɔɔ n'a kaŋ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ lɛ bɔŋ ʋ tee••• bɩ tɔ ma.
58013016	K'a bɩr a bam kʋ m mɩŋŋa, a bɩr a dam kʋ han, a bɩ naa barɛ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ y. Bala, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, mannɩrɔ m, Woso yɩ ŋ ŋʋam.
58013017	K'a bɩr yɛm a lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ ma, a bɩr hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ barɛ. Bala, dɔ ŋ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ ma dɔmɩm haay, kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ lar awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ mim ma bɩ y'a ka ŋn'a bam maam. K'awɔɔ ɩ zure ŋ lɛ ʋ, ŋ y'a zi bɩ bam kan heernyɔɔ kɩ. Kʋ n bɛɛ m, zi bɩ ba ŋ nawʋm kan heerzar kɩ, bɩ, naa b'a darɛ awɔɔ han fɩɩga y.
58013018	K'a gɔɔta a bɩr yaa dam wɔɔ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ dɔ paan•••, ʋ ʋ, ʋ n a bʋnyaa ba y, bala, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ʋ bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam tee••• hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
58013019	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm gʋta k'a yaa da mɔɔ tɔ ma, kʋ Woso n a ka kʋ m m bɔ m bʋr awɔɔ zi zɔɔ.
58013020	Bɩ, kʋ Woso k'a nɩ laafɩɩ kam bɩ n'awɔɔ barka da ʋ. Wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu n wɔɔ dundor gʋta, amba hɔbɩsɩrɔ dundor m, a ma k'a ka Woso ʋ am mannɩ hɔ bɩ m bɩ tɔ ma m. A ma bɩ tɔ ma m sɔ gʋaasɩbabaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ n ta ʋ. Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.
58013021	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʋ a hɔ haay k'an mɩŋŋa ba, maam bɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ. K'an a ka kʋ hɔ k'a nɔ yɩ haay n kʋ yɩ wɔɔ gʋr zi Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma. Bɩ kʋ Yeezuu Krista tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
58013022	M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'a a hɔɔn da meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ nɔɔn ma kan bʋraama kɩ, a zu ŋ ʋ. Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba awɔɔ ma sɔ naa, a bɩ jintə y.
58013023	K'a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ danyɩ Timote bɩ, n y'a bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ b'ʋ. K'a bʋr mɔɔ zi zɔɔ, mɔɔ y'a gaam ʋ zu kʋ ʋ, ʋ bʋr ʋ bɩ dɩga awɔɔ ma.
58013024	K'a yaa da a lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ m haay, kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay. Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Italii ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ a m.
58013025	Bɩ kʋ Woso barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
59001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zakkɩ, Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m. Yaa mɔɔ n'a dam Woso dogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a kərgu lɛɛ haay ra durnya nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
59001002	M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ ɩ fɩr do haay yɩm k'a a heer nyɔɔ,
59001003	bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ bʋraama yɩm.
59001004	Bɩ, pakra m, k'awɔɔ bʋraama bɩ n a hɩnka fasɩ, k'awɔɔ n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ, hɔsɩ bɩ jɩra a ma y.
59001005	Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa y'awɔɔ barla mindɔrɛ n jɩra ma, k'an a yɛ Woso han, a y'a kaŋ ʋ, bala, Woso ɩ hɔ kam gʋaa haay ʋ an lɛ da a zaa n'a yɛm bɩ ra, b'a bɩr meer bam ma y.
59001006	A n ta ʋ bɩ, pakra m, k'a zaa n a yɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, a bɩ sɩnsɩm ka y. Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ sɩnsɩm kam bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ, kan higʋta kurə kɩ, hɩnhɛr n'a yəŋŋəm jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ.
59001007	Gʋaa naa do lɔɔ n a ga m an a gɩnga a ʋ, a hɔ yɩm Zuuba zi y.
59001008	Bala, hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya zaa m, a heer n sɩra ka kan hɔsɩ barɛ kɩ y.
59001009	Kristagʋaa k'an ŋʋazaa bɩ n a heer nyɔɔ, bala, Woso a busu.
59001010	Kʋ kristagʋaa kʋ hɔntazaa m bɩ, n a heer nyɔɔ sɔ, bala, Woso a ka an zer. Sɩra nɔ ʋ, hɔntazaa cenim amba burvu tɩr sur bɩ m.
59001011	Bala, kʋ woso haan, b'a gu kan paŋŋa kɩ an na bur bɩ ma, bur bɩ n ga, a vu bɩ n sur, a gʋɛrɛ k'an ta ʋ bɩ n nyaam. Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, hɔntazaa n cem zɔɔ-zɔɔ a zibəəro dɔmɩm ʋ.
59001012	Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ makra nɔ ʋ bɩ m. Bala, k'a wɔ makra b'ʋ an bɔ ʋ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩm, ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ k'a ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ n bɩ.
59001013	Kʋ gʋaa ɩ makra lɛɛ, a b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso nɩ mɔɔ makra barɛ y." Bala, mimbʋnyaa b'a dam ma an Woso makra ba y, bɩ Woso mɩŋŋa bɩr gɔsɩ makra bam k'an mimbʋnyaa ba y.
59001014	Bɩ, gʋaa lɛtaama bʋnyaa ɩ tɩr a zaa gaa an wɔ ʋ an a da makra ʋ, k'an mimbʋnyaa ba.
59001015	Kʋ lɛtaama bʋnyaa bɩ paŋŋa yɩ a zaa zi, b'a a ka a zaa n mimbʋnyaa ba. Kʋ mimbʋnyaa bɩ ba an nya, b'a zaa ga.
59001016	M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, a b'a nyʋnnyɔɔ y.
59001017	Hɔ mɩŋŋa haay kʋ wɔɔ n'a yɩm, ganwʋrɛ k'an mɩŋŋa fasɩ haay, a to a nawʋm Woso zi, brama, a ɩ lɛɛgurehɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ da. A mɩŋŋa bɩr a lʋrm fɩɩgaa y, bɩ monsigə ba zi y.
59001018	A mɩŋŋa ɩ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a zim, an mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ ʋ a lemim k'an sɩra bɩ m. A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ lɛɛkarɛzannɔ hɔɔ daarɔ k'a nɩ ŋ dam nɔ wɔɔ barla.
59001019	M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, a ʋ, gʋaa biyəə a ga m an bɩr a tʋr kam mɩŋŋa, b'a bɩ nyagɩra ba k'a meer ba, a bɩ nyagɩra ba sɔ k'a nɔmaa ba y.
59001020	Bala, nɔmaa kʋ gʋaa n'a bam bɩ bɛɛ n'a kam an hɔ k'an tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ bɩ ba y.
59001021	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a hɔ k'an bʋnyaa a heer ʋ haay to, a a gʋ mimbʋnyaa haay ma.
59001022	A bɩ ŋʋaar ba a mɩŋŋɔɔ m a ʋ, a y'a tʋr kam Woso lemim bɩ ma y, k'a sa a zi bam paan•••.
59001023	Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a tʋr kam lemim bɩ ma b'a bɩr zi bam nɩ bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, kan gʋaa k'a nɩ dɩgarɛ a meer ma jɛtɩga ʋ kɩ,
59001024	dɩga k'a ʋ a ma an a hʋr bɩ, a meer bɩ k'an lʋnlɔ bɩ, an bɩ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ lɛɛm.
59001025	Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ bɩ k'an mɩŋŋa fasɩ bɩ karɩnda bam k'a zu ʋ bɩ, a kʋsɩ a nawʋm ma taalɛra nɔ ʋ, a bɩr a tʋr kam ma bala k'a b'a tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ y, bɩ, zi an n'a bam nɩ, Woso bɩ zaa bɩ barka daŋ ʋ, a zibəə haay nɔ ʋ.
59001026	Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, zu a nawʋm Woso ʋ b'a bɩr bʋrlɛ a nɛɛm ma kan meerbaarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ, bra an n'a barɛ a mɩŋŋa m, wosozuure bɛɛ m bɩ y.
59001027	Wosozuure k'an mɩŋŋa, dintim ba ma Zɩ Woso mɩm ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Ʋ nyasʋ sʋnnɔ m, kan zonno kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩm nɔ kɩ m, ʋ dundo ʋ zi kʋ durnya hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ b'ʋ da mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma y.
59002001	M danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista n nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m gʋta, awɔɔ n sɩra ka ʋ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a n a ga m k'awɔɔ n gʋɔɔ jirə bɔ y.
59002002	Ʋ makra sa, a a da ma, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ n bɩ gasʋ awɔɔ sokʋma nɔ ʋ, deem n huu mɩŋŋa du a ma an sarma tolleŋŋarɔ dɩnda a nyʋkʋnnɔ ma, deem n bɩr ŋʋazaa an huu yaarsɩrɔ du a ma.
59002003	K'awɔɔ gʋaa k'a huu wɩsɩrɔ du a ma bɩ nyaasɩ ka mɩŋŋa, a bɔkarɛ a hɩ m a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ, bʋr ɩ nyɩnta bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa naa do ʋ", a bɔkarɛ a hɩ ŋʋazaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ, jɩm brama" gɛɛ, a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr ɩ nyɩnta tara ʋ naa ʋ, mɔɔ gam taa".
59002004	K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, jirə bɛɛ awɔɔ bɔ a barla ra? Bɩ, naa k'awɔɔ n'a bam naa, a ba bɛɛ awɔɔ ʋ dʋdɔkənno hɔɔndarɛ bʋnyaarɔ m na?
59002005	M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a tʋr ka mɩŋŋa! Woso gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋʋazannɔ m durnya naa do ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔnta paan••• kʋ sɩrakarɛ m bɩ yɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ yɩ, Woso ɩ cirbəə bɩ do ler bɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ m.
59002006	B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ ɩ ŋʋazannɔ gore bɔŋ ʋ. A n bɔkarɛ, hɔntazannɔ wɔɔ nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ awɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno taa.
59002007	Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ tɔ mɩŋŋa kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ma bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋm.
59002008	N y'a da Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: "Ɩ ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m", Woso cirbəə bɩ mɩsɩrbaa zaa n naa do. K'awɔɔ ɩ zuŋ ʋ, awɔɔ y'a bam mɩŋŋa.
59002009	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ, mimbʋnyaa awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, b'awɔɔ ɩ kʋrɔma nɔ ʋ, bala awɔɔ n zu Woso lɛ b'ʋ y.
59002010	Bala, kʋ gʋaa ɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay, k'a bɩ bɔ deem la m, bɔ a ʋ ŋ haay la m.
59002011	Bala, Woso y'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ jaan da y," a a ya an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ gʋaa meeyaa bɔ ʋ y." Bɩ kʋ gʋaa n jaan da y, an bɔkarɛ an gər zɛ, bɩsɩ a a ka lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma.
59002012	Kʋ meer awɔɔ n'a bam, kʋ zi awɔɔ n'a bam, k'a dɔ a ʋ, lɛ k'a nɩ soamɩŋŋaʋ kam bɩ, Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a sa an awɔɔ dʋdɔ ka m.
59002013	Bala, gʋaa k'a n a mim cicir zɛ bɩ, Woso b'a cicir zɛm dʋdɔkarɛ nɔ ʋ y, bɩ kʋ gʋaa y'a muno cicir zɛm, a bɩ nyi bam dʋdɔkarɛ nɩ y.
59002014	M danyɩnɔ, kʋ gʋaa ʋ, a sɩra ka Woso ʋ, an bɔkarɛ a bɩr sɩrakarɛ zibəəro sɩ barɛ y, sɩrakarɛ k'a ʋ, a ta m bɩ y'a dam ma an a bʋmbɔ ra?
59002015	A a da ma kristagʋaa n ta ʋ yar gɛɛ lʋ, ŋ b'a huuro m k'a du a ma, bɩ ŋ ba hɔsɩ m k'a bɩ y.
59002016	K'awɔɔ gʋaa deem a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a doo laafɩɩ, a huu du a ma, k'a hɔ bɩ mɩŋŋa." B'awɔɔ n hɔ k'a jɩra ŋ ma bɩ ka ŋ ʋ y, meerbaa naa do nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ ra?
59002017	Ncɩnaaʋ sɔ bɩ, sɩrakarɛ k'a bɩr zi bam bɩ, hɔgər m fasɩ.
59002018	A a da ma gʋaa n a hɩ, a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ sɩrakarɛ m, mɔɔ nɩ zibəəro m. Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a zaa m, m ʋ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ bɩ hɩnka m m, zibəəbarɛ war nɔ ʋ, kʋ m m zibəəro wɔɔ barɛ hɩnka a ɩ m, k'ɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ sɩrakarɛ m.
59002019	Ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka ɩ ʋ, Woso deem taan••• n ta ʋ, ɩ y'a bam mɩŋŋa, bɩ, zinəro naa dɔ sɔ, ŋn'ɩ nyi bam.
59002020	Yarma ra, a dɔ ɩ ʋ, sɩrakarɛ k'a bɩr zi bam bɩ vam.
59002021	Wɔɔ yaaba Abraham bɩ, a zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y'a ka Woso n a ba tɩrga ra, k'a yɛ k'a mannɩ ba a nyɩ Izakkɩ m bɩ bɛɛ ra?
59002022	Ɩbɩɩ dɔ kɛɛrɛ ɩ ʋ, Abraham sɩrakarɛ bɩ, zu a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan a zibəəro kɩ, a zibəəro wɔɔ y'a ka a sɩrakarɛ bɩ n yɩ paan•••.
59002023	Ncɩnaaʋ m, hɔ kʋ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʋ, am naa, Woso n dɩga a gʋaa tɩrga." Woso n a bir a gʋaasɩba sɔ.
59002024	Awɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ a ʋ, Woso bɩ, gʋaa ba a nawʋm tɩrga a zibəəro tɔ ma, a sɩrakarɛ y'a deem tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
59002025	Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ kan lʋmɩŋŋahɛɛrɛzaa Rahab kɩ, a zibəəro y'a ka Woso n tɩrgabaa ka ʋ, Israyɛl dundolɛɛzizannɔ k'a ŋ si a har ʋ, an zaa vanta hɩnka ŋ nɩ ŋn'a sa ŋn'a hʋr bɩ tɔ ma m.
59002026	Denter m, amba gʋaa nyi nɩ bɔrɛ a mɛ ʋ, a zaa nɩ gam bɩ, sɩrakarɛ k'a n zu kʋ ʋ kan zibəəro kɩ bɩ, hɔ gər m sɔ.
59003001	M danyɩnɔ, a b'a ka ma k'a yɩ hɔdɩndagʋɔɔnzannɔ woo••• y. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ kʋ ʋ nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, n wɔɔ dʋdɔ kam kʋsɩ an lɛ da.
59003002	Bala, wɔɔ haay, wɔɔ ɩ kʋrɔm ma. Gʋaa k'a bɩr kʋrɔm ma a meerbaa nɔ ʋ bɩ, gʋaa tɩrga m fasɩ, a a da ma an bʋr a mɩŋŋa ma jilli.
59003003	Kʋ wɔɔ tɩr sarbɩr da sisiro lɛ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ zu wɔɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ y'ʋ so ŋ mɛ b'ʋ jilli sɔ ŋn'ɩ wɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ bam.
59003004	K'a dɩga kɔɔlʋʋ gʋtɔɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ, kʋ ŋ bɩ to ŋnɩ gʋta maam-maam, hɩnhɛr gʋtɔɔ nɩ ŋ nyɔɔtam bɩ, ŋ hɔ poore n ta ʋ, an a ka ŋn'ɩ tam lɛɛ haay k'a brarɛzaa bɩ lɛ n taa b'ʋ.
59003005	A maam sɔ kan gʋaa nɛɛm kɩ, vəŋŋə poore m gʋaa mɛ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ an n'a mɩŋŋa busum hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ barɛ mim nɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, sɛ poore a da ma, an poo gʋta bɩ.
59003006	Gʋaa nɛɛm bɩ do m bɩ, sɛ m sɔ, an ta hɔ bʋnyaa haay m, wɔɔ mɛ b'an ta ʋ, an nɩ dintim kam wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ma jilli, an nɩ sɛ dam wɔɔ ma haay, sɛhar sɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋa ʋ.
59003007	Gʋɔɔ a da ma, ŋn'ɩ hɔmɩsɩr haay tʋntɔrɛ, poohɔɔ kan bɛnnɔ kɩ, hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ kʋ ŋ n'a gaatam kan zɔnɔ kɩ, ŋ wɔ ŋ ʋ denter.
59003008	Bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an nɛɛm tʋntɔ y. Hɔ bʋnyaa m, an nɩ lɛɛ sam, gʋɔɔ meeyaa bɔʋrɛ nyɩsɩ y'a han.
59003009	Ʋ nɛɛm wɔɔ sa, ʋ n'ʋ lɛ bɔm Zuuba ʋ, ʋ Zɩ b'ʋ, ʋ n'a sam sɔ, ʋ nɩ lɛ kʋsɩ dam gʋɔɔ n'ʋ, an bɔkarɛ Woso yɩ ŋ da ŋnɩ bɔ a mɩŋŋa rɛ.
59003010	M danyɩnɔ, a n a ga m kʋ wɔɔ lɛ deem-deem bɩ n bɩr ler mɩŋŋa bɔm, an bɩr a bʋnyaa bɔm sɔ y.
59003011	Hiyəə ba ʋ, an nɩ bɔm hi nyɩnta m kan hi kʋsɩ kɩ nɩ y.
59003012	Sɔɔn b'a dam ma an tʋgɔ nyɩ da y, gɛɛ dɩvɛn gɔ n sɔɔn nyɩ da y. Yɛhiyəə b'a dam ma, an bɔ hi nyɩnta nɩ y.
59003013	Gʋaa y'awɔɔ barla an mim dɔ ra? K'an a hɩnka mɩsɩrbaa tɩrga nɔ ʋ, bʋraama zibəə nɔ ʋ.
59003014	Bɩ, kʋ jɩmbaa kan heer kʋsɩ kɩ, lɛɛzaabaa kama kɩ y'awɔɔ heer han, a b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ y, b'a bɩ sɩra gore bɔ ʋ a ŋʋaarlɔ nɩ y.
59003015	Bala, mindɔrɛ naa do n a to Woso zi y, durnya hɔ m, a to a ʋ gʋɔɔ zi, bɔ a ʋ Sʋtaana zi.
59003016	Sɩra nɔ ʋ, lɛɛ kʋ jɩmbaa n ta ʋ, gʋɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma con bɩ, lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, hɔ haay woo••• yɩm bʋrga, ziro bʋnyaarɔ n nyɩnta ʋ sɔ.
59003017	Bɩ, mindɔrɛ k'a a to Woso zi bɩ y'a hɔ, a mɩŋŋa, laafɩɩ kama m, a bʋgʋ-bʋgʋ, kʋmarɛ kama m, cicirzɛrɛ m gʋta, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ m gʋta, jɩmbaa b'a nɔ ʋ, bɩ zambʋ b'a nɔ ʋ sɔ y.
59003018	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam ma kʋ laafɩɩ n bɩr ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, tɩrgabaa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba ŋ nawʋm laafɩɩ kama nɔ ʋ, a nyɔɔdʋ bɩ, tɩrgabaa mɩsɩrbaa ŋn'a yɩm.
59004001	A a ba lɔ awɔɔ bɩr kʋ marɛ, an nɩ nyaa bam kan kʋ kɩ tee•••? K'awɔɔ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɩ zoo bam awɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma m.
59004002	Awɔɔ lɛ taa hɔɔ niŋŋoo ma, b'awɔɔ bɩr ŋ yɩrɛ y, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ y'a kam ma k'a gər zɛ, awɔɔ ɩ jɩm bam bɩ hɔsɩ bɩr kʋyɩrɛ awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ n a ka awɔɔ nɩ zoo bam an nɩ nyaa bam kan kʋ kɩ. Awɔɔ bɩr hɔsɩ yɛm Woso han y, bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ ba hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ nɩ y.
59004003	Awɔɔ y'a yɛm b'awɔɔ bɩr a yɩrɛ y, k'awɔɔ bɩr a yɛm han mɩŋŋa bɩ tɔ ma, bala, a yɛ awɔɔ nawʋm k'a sa, a a hɔɔnhɔ ba m.
59004004	Taalɛrazannɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y! Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ durnya jɛ ʋ, Woso jɩm n'ɩ mɩ ra? Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa durnya ma bɩ, a ba a nawʋm Woso jɩm.
59004005	A hɔɔn awɔɔ n'a darɛ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ vam m na? A a hɩ a ʋ, Woso ɩ jɩm bam k'a a Ɛspri ka wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
59004006	Bɩ, a y'a barka kam wɔɔ ʋ gʋta, bɩ tɔ ma m Wosoci bɩ n a hɩ a ʋ, Woso y'a gum mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ ma, b'a ɩ barka kam mɩŋŋazerlezannɔ ʋ.
59004007	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer a yɛ Woso ma. K'a a gu Sʋtaana ma, a y'a sire an a gʋ awɔɔ ma laatʋ.
59004008	K'a zɔ Woso ma, a y'a zɔrɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ. Awɔɔ k'an kʋrɔmazannɔ, k'a zi bʋnyaa barɛ to! K'a heer hu bɔ hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya zannɔ ra!
59004009	K'a heer zaar ba a kʋrɔmarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma! K'a zɛ heerzar ba a nyi ka! K'a yaawʋrɛ to a nyi ka, k'a a heernyɔɔ bɩ to, a a heer zar!
59004010	K'a a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer Zuuba taa, k'an awɔɔ busu.
59004011	M danyɩnɔ, a ba bʋnyaa hɩ kʋ ma y. Gʋaa k'an a bʋnyaa hɩrɛ a mim ma, gɛɛ an a dʋdɔ karɛ, a bʋnyaa an n'a hɩm Woso lɛ ma, an nɩ Woso lɛ bɩ dʋdɔ kam. Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ Woso lɛ bɩ dʋdɔ kam, ɩ ba ɩ ʋ, a dʋdɔkər, a zuurezaa bɛɛ n'ɩ mɩ dɔ y.
59004012	A n bɔkarɛ, Woso y'a deem taan••• nɩ lɛ bɩ kam, a y'a deem taan••• m dʋdɔkər sɔ. A n n'a dam ma an gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔ, an n'a dam ma an ŋ zaar ba sɔ. Nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ n'ɩ mim dʋdɔ karɛ?
59004013	K'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma kɛɛrɛ, awɔɔ k'a n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ: "Her, gɛɛ booti m, wɔɔ tam kʋ na ʋ gɛɛ kʋ na ʋ, ʋ gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔɔraa deem, ʋ ter ba ʋ busoo yɩ,"
59004014	awɔɔ n a dɔ k'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ yɩm lɔ booti nɩ y, bala, awɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛbtur kɩ, k'a bɔ b'a nyaam lɛɛm.
59004015	A ga awɔɔ ʋ m, a hɩ a ʋ: "Kʋ Zuuba yɛ, wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ, ʋ na ba kan na kɩ."
59004016	A n bɔkarɛ a lɛ awɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ a dɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ. Lɛbɔaʋ naa do lɔɔ bʋnyaa.
59004017	Gʋaa k'a hɔ k'a ga barɛ m dɔ, b'a n a ba y, a zaa mimbʋnyaa ba.
59005001	Hɔntazannɔ wɔɔ, k'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma, k'a nyi ka a baa da, bala, awɔɔ fɩr yɩm gʋta.
59005002	Awɔɔ hɔnta bɩ, hɔ vəm m, bɛɛ y'awɔɔ huuro bɩm sɔ.
59005003	Tankampiisi y'awɔɔ sarma kan awɔɔ busoo kɩ zaar bam, ŋ zaarbarɛ bɩ nɩ nyɩntam kasɛtɩ an awɔɔ bɩ, am sɛ hɔ bɩ m. Awɔɔ hɔnta gʋr a kuntə jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔm nɔ ʋ.
59005004	Awɔɔ n gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zi ba awɔɔ hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ yawʋra ba y, k'a a tʋr ka, ŋ yɩ zee dam, bɩ, ŋ zee bɩ darɛ lee ku Zuuba k'a paŋŋa jirə ba ʋ bɩ zi.
59005005	Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nyɩnta yɩ tara burə ʋ, a a hɔɔnhɔ yɩ, awɔɔ hɔ bɩ gʋta a mɛ ka am hɔbɩsɩrɔ m, bɩ awɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ dɔmɩm y'a kum.
59005006	Awɔɔ gʋaa tɩrga dʋdɔ yar, a meeyaa bɔ ʋ, a n wɔ ʋ an jɩm awɔɔ lɛɛ y.
59005007	M danyɩnɔ, ʋ bʋr ʋ ma, kʋ Zuuba n tolle ba an bʋr. K'a makra sa danwur ma, bʋr a nawʋrɛ a ma an nɩ dɔm mɔsa ma, k'a a tara zibəə hɔ yɩ, an nɩ dɔm lɛɛkarɛ labarɛrɔ, kan jɛ labarɛrɔ kɩ ma.
59005008	Awɔɔ, k'a bʋr a ma sɔ, a bɩr heer koodə m, bala, Zuuba wusigəre dɔmɩm a zɔ.
59005009	M danyɩnɔ, a bɩ kukur ba kʋ ma y, kʋ Woso b'a dʋdɔ ka y. K'a dɩga a, ba dʋdɔkər bɩ nɩ cɛlɛ ma na.
59005010	M danyɩnɔ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋnɩ meer ba Zuuba tɔ ra rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ fɩr yɩ, bɩ ŋ bʋr a ma fɩr bɩ nɔ ʋ. K'a ŋ hɔbaa sa.
59005011	K'a dɩga a, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ y'a hɩm wɔɔ ʋ, ŋ mimbirenyɩnta. Awɔɔ Zɔɔb k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩr nɔ ʋ bɩ mim ma, awɔɔ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba m fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʋ bɩ dɔ sɔ, bala, Zuuba ɩ gʋɔɔ cicir zɛm gʋta, an n'a mɩŋŋa barɛ ŋ nɩ.
59005012	M danyɩnɔ, an lɛ da bɩ, a b'a wer si y, a b'a wer si brama tɔ nɩ, b'a ba si tara tɔ nɩ y, a b'a wer si fɩɩga y. K'awɔɔ yɛ mim ma, k'a ʋ ɩɩn••• bala. K'awɔɔ n yɛ, k'a ʋ ayy•••. A bɩ hɔsɩ na ma y, kʋ Woso b'awɔɔ dʋdɔ ka y.
59005013	Kʋ gʋaa y'awɔɔ barla an nɩ fɩr yɩm k'an yaa da. Kʋ gʋaa nɩ heernyɔɔ m, k'an laa lɔ an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ.
59005014	K'awɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ laafɩɩ, k'an kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ bir, kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɔɔ nɔ ma Zuuba tɔ ra, ŋnɩ yaa da a tɔ ma.
59005015	Kʋ ŋ yaa bɩ da kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ, yaabazaa bɩ laafɩɩ yɩm, Zuuba y'a waam, k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ ba sɔ, Zuuba sugur kaŋ ʋ.
59005016	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ bɔ a lɛ ma, a hɩ kʋ m, k'a yaa da kʋ tɔ ma, kʋ Woso n a waa. Gʋaa tɩrga yaadarɛ ɩ zi bam kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ.
59005017	Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Elii nyɩnta gʋaa am wɔɔ m, a yaa da Woso m ŋʋɩɩ•••, kʋ la bɩ ba y, denter sɔ, la a gʋsɩ dɔɔraa kaakʋ kan a kur kɩ.
59005018	A n a ya an yaa da, kʋ la bɩ n ba, Woso n a ka la bɩ n ba, hɔbɩrɛ n nyɩnta ʋ tara burə ʋ.
59005019	M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa deem nyaam, an Woso zaa k'an sɩra bɩ to, kʋ gʋaa a ka an a ya an bʋr zaa bɩ ra,
59005020	k'a dɔ a ʋ, gʋaa k'a ka mimbʋnyaabər n a bɔ a mimbʋnyaabarɛ zaa ʋ, k'a zu Woso ʋ bɩ, a zaa bɩ meeyaa a a bʋmbɔ, an a ka sɔ, baa k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋta, Woso n ŋ sugur ka ʋ haay.
60001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pɩyɛɛr nɩ ci bɩ bam, Yeezuu Krista zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m. A ba mɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ k'a yɩ a gʋɔɔ a hɩsɩga da, a m saanɔɔ Pɔn kʋ ʋ kan Galasii kʋ kɩ ʋ, Kapadɔs kʋ kɩ ʋ, Azii kan Bitinii kʋrɔ kɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma.
60001002	Zɩ Woso y'awɔɔ bɔ ʋ, amba a lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta a hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʋ k'a ba bɩ tɔ ma, a y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, a Ɛspri k'a a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n yɛ Yeezuu Krista ma, k'a ma bɩ n'awɔɔ hu bɔ. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ Woso n a barka, kan a laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta.
60001003	Ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ bɩ, bala, a cicirzɛrɛ gʋta bɩ nɔ ʋ, a a ka wɔɔ n yɩrɛdaa yɩ, k'ʋ taaheerlɛ paan••• yɩ, Yeezuu Krista k'a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
60001004	A ba a ʋ maam kʋ wɔɔ n hɔjirle k'a b'a dam ma an vɔn gɛɛ an dintim ka, gɛɛ a paŋŋa n a bɔ ʋ yɩ, hɔjirle bɩ do Woso a cɩnta awɔɔ m arzana ʋ.
60001005	Awɔɔ kʋ Woso paŋŋa nɩ dɔrɛ a ma sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ k'an b'a hɩnkam lɛɛm jɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ yɩ.
60001006	Bɩ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n'a heer nyɔɔm gʋta, baa kʋ pakra m k'awɔɔ n fɩr yɩ dɩɩtaa, makrarɔ y'a hʋnhɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ heer zarm dɔmɩm poorero nɔɔn duro nɔ ʋ.
60001007	Fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ makra an n'a bam, kʋ sɩrakarɛ paan••• m gɛ. Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ mɩŋŋabaa lɛ da sarma m, hɔcenlezaa m bɩ, an bɔkarɛ n tɩr a makra ba sɛ ʋ, k'a mɩŋŋabaa dɔ. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ makra jɛ ʋ, awɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ kan cirbəə kɩ, daʋrɛ kɩ yɩm dɔmɩm kʋ Yeezuu Krista n b'a hɩnkaŋ ʋ b'ʋ.
60001008	Awɔɔ ɩ Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa ŋʋam b'awɔɔ n a yɩ a mɩm nɩ y, awɔɔ sɩra ka ʋ, b'awɔɔ n a yɩ cɩna y. Naa tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n'a heer nyɔɔm heernyɔɔ gandaa ʋ m, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an heernyɔɔ gʋta bɩ do dɔ an a hɩ y.
60001009	K'awɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'a nyiro wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ bɩ, bɩ y'a ka Woso ʋ awɔɔ n sɩra ka.
60001010	Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta biisi ŋnɩ so Woso lɛ ra, ŋnɩ barka kʋ Woso ʋ k'a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ mim hɩ bɩ, ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ k'awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ bɩ daasɩ ŋn'a a ka.
60001011	A ka ŋ y'a ʋ ma, k'a minno kʋ Krista Ɛspri b'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ bɩ kʋyɩrɛ dɔmɩm kan ŋ zaarɔ kɩ dɔ, bala, Ɛspri bɩ do k'a nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ bɩ lɛɛ ka an fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʋ Krista n'a yɩm bɩ mim hɩ, kan lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a n'a yɩm, fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʋ bɩ kɩ.
60001012	Bɩ, Woso a hɩnka a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ duro m, a ʋ, lemim k'a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ so ra bɩ, a n a ka ŋ bɔɔm tɔ ma y, awɔɔ hɔ m. Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do padənno wɔɔ a hɩ awɔɔ m, bɩ, a pa ŋ y'a da awɔɔ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kʋ Woso a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ m. Malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n lɛ taa k'a lemim bɩ do dɔ gʋta.
60001013	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a a banka, k'a ta lɛɛ kan zibəə kɩ, a b'a zu a ʋ y, k'a barka kʋ Woso n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ Yeezuu Krista hɩnkarɛ ma bɩ ta a heer lɛ kɔɔkɔɔ.
60001014	Amba nyɩnɔ nɩ yɛrɛ a zɩrɔ ma bɩ, k'a yɛ Woso ma, a b'a ya a zu lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ k'awɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ biisi badɔ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ y.
60001015	Bɩ, amba Woso k'awɔɔ bir bɩ n mɩŋŋa bɩ, awɔɔ sɔ k'a bɩr mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa bam a tarɛ haay nɔ ʋ.
60001016	Bala, Woso a hɩ a ci b'ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a yɩ mɩŋŋa, bala, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa."
60001017	Woso k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ kam b'a bɩr ŋ jirə bɔm bɩ, awɔɔ nɩ yaa dam nɩ a ʋ, a Zɩ m, gʋaa biyəə dʋdɔ an n'a kam amba a zaa zibəə a ga m bɩ m. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a gɔɔta awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n'a bam tara burə ʋ bɩ ba, Woso mɩŋŋa daʋrɛ kan a nyibəə kɩ nɔ ʋ.
