60001018	Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ, awɔɔ zɩrɔ n a to awɔɔ m bɩ, Woso awɔɔ yɔ b'ʋ. Bɩ, hɔ k'a n'a zaar bam, gɛɛ wanzurfu gɛɛ sarma bɛɛ a a sa, an awɔɔ yɔ nɩ y.
60001019	Awɔɔ yɔ a ʋ, Krista ma kʋ n b'a dam ma n a lɛ hɩ bɩ m, bɔ b'ʋ kʋ ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm k'a m mɩŋŋa, hɔ bʋnyaa sɩ ba ma bɩ kɩ.
60001020	Woso lɛɛ ka an a bɔ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya ba ʋ y. Kɛɛrɛ naa, a a hɩnka jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ, awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma.
60001021	A tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n sɩra ka Woso ʋ, bɩ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, an lɛbɔʋrɛ ka ʋ, yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ kan awɔɔ taaheerlɛ kɩ n yo Woso ma.
60001022	Yɛ k'awɔɔ ʋ sɩra ma b'a ka, awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ hu n bɔ, k'a a da ma, a kʋ ŋʋa paan••• danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ. K'a kʋ ŋʋa gʋta noom hu m.
60001023	Bala, yɩrɛdaa awɔɔ yɩ, b'a n a to gʋaa zi y, gʋaa ɩ gam, bɩ Woso y'awɔɔ yɩ, a garɛ ba ʋ y. A lemim k'an mɩsɩr a cenle ba ʋ b'a sa an awɔɔ yɩ m.
60001024	Amba Wosoci n'a hɩm bɩ m bɩ: Gʋɔɔ haay bɔ kʋ ʋ kan bur kɩ, lɛbɔʋrɛ kʋ ŋ nɩ tam haay bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan burvu kɩ, kʋ bur bɩ ga, b'a vu bɩ sur.
60001025	Bɩ Zuuba lemim b'ɩ gɔɔtam dɔmɩm haay. Bɩ, lemim bɩ do bɩ, lemim nyɩnta kʋ n y'a pa da awɔɔ m bɩ m.
60002001	K'a bʋnyaabaa do haay to kan ŋʋaar do haay kɩ, noombakʋma kɩ, a bɩ jɩm ba y, b'a b'a bʋnyaa hɩ gɔsɩ ma y.
60002002	Amba nyɩnɔ poorero nɩ nyonhi ŋʋam bɩ, k'a Woso lemim k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ ŋʋa tee••• k'a a da ma a ma Woso zaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
60002003	Bala, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩm denter, a ʋ: Awɔɔ b'a dɔ a ʋ, Zuuba mɩŋŋa.
60002004	K'a zɔ Zuuba ma, jaa mɩsɩr m, gʋɔɔ n kaanm m, bɩ, Woso dɩga a jaa tɔzaa m, an a bɔ ʋ.
60002005	K'a a zɔ ma, bala, awɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan jaa mɩsɩɩrɔ kɩ sɔ, kʋ Woso n awɔɔ sa an awɔɔ ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri cɛ. Awɔɔ yɩrɛ a mannɩbənno kʋ ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa ka ʋ, k'a mannɩrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Sɛnt-Ɛspri zi rɔ wɔɔ ba a ŋ ka Woso ʋ, a yɩ ŋ ŋʋam Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
60002006	Bala, Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: K'a dɩga a, mɔɔ ɩ jaa paŋŋazaa cɩntam Siyɔn ʋ, mɔɔ y'a bɔ ʋ, jaa tɔzaa m gʋta, gʋaa k'a sɩra ka ʋ bɩ, a bɩ nyannɩ bɩrɛ y.
60002007	Awɔɔ k'a sɩra ka ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, jaa naa do tɔ ma awɔɔ ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m, bɩ kʋ bɩsɩkənno wɔɔ nɩ, Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Jaa kʋ cɛdonno wɔɔ kaanm m bɩ y'a ba cɛ bɩ jɩrjaa paŋŋazaa.
60002008	Wosoci b'a y'a an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Jaa bɩ do a ba gʋɔɔ gənzɛrɛ jaa, ŋ dore jaa. Kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka Woso lemim b'ʋ bɩ y'a ka ŋn'a gəm zɛm ma, Woso lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ.
60002009	B'awɔɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, cir m Woso m, a mannɩbənno n'awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, Woso mɩŋŋa y'awɔɔ ba a hɔ, k'awɔɔ n a zibəəro gʋtɔɔ wɔɔ pa da, a y'awɔɔ bir an bɔ awɔɔ m monsigə ʋ, an bʋr awɔɔ m a lɛɛgure k'an mɩŋŋa gʋta b'ʋ.
60002010	Biisi bɩ, Woso bɩ gʋɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m. Biisi bɩ, Woso n a cicirzɛrɛ hɩnka awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a awɔɔ cicir zɛ.
60002011	M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, cenlezannɔ n'awɔɔ m tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, saanɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a gʋ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ma, a ka ŋ nawʋm ma k'a awɔɔ zaar ba.
60002012	K'awɔɔ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ bire ʋ bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'an zore ba, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ ŋ y'awɔɔ tɔ zaar barɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ, maam bɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, hinni k'a n'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ.
60002013	K'a yɛ lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya ʋ naa ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ ma Zuuba tɔ ma. Kʋ cir nɩ, k'a yɛ ma k'a m cir bɩ tɔ ma.
60002014	Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ cir n cɩncɩnta kʋ ŋ n a so lɛɛrɔ ʋ wɔɔ nɩ, k'a yɛ ŋ ma sɔ, ŋ cɩncɩnta a ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋr, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa bam nɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
60002015	Bala, Woso lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ, ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma ŋnɩ hɔsɩ hɩ y.
60002016	K'awɔɔ a so a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba, b'a bɩ yo soamɩŋŋaʋ bɩ do ma, k'a bʋnyaa ba y. Bɩ k'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba, kʋ Woso zibəənyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ tɔ ma.
60002017	K'a gʋɔɔ haay da ʋ, k'a danyɩnɔ Krista nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa, k'a nyi ba Woso m, k'a cir da ʋ sɔ.
60002018	Awɔɔ kʋ zibəənyɩnɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ ma daʋrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ, k'a ba ncɩnaaʋ kan bɔɔ n nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa barɛ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ. K'a ba ncɩnaaʋ sɔ, kan bɔɔ n kʋsɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
60002019	Bala, kʋ gʋaa ɩ yɛm fɩr ma Woso tɔ ma, bɩ kʋrɔ bɛɛ a ʋ ma an nɩ fɩr bɩ do yɩrɛ, Woso nɔ ɩ yɩm bɩ zaa ra.
60002020	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bʋnyaa ba, ŋnɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, nka n'a lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ naa tɔ ma? Bɩ, k'awɔɔ mɩŋŋa ba, n nɩ bɔkarɛ n nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ nɩ yɛm ma bʋraama nɔ ʋ, Woso nɔ ɩ yɩrɛ awɔɔ ra naa nɔ ʋ.
60002021	A n bɔkarɛ Woso bɩ, awɔɔ bir a ʋ, naa tɔ ma. Bala, Krista fɩr yɩ awɔɔ tɔ ma, an n'a ŋʋam k'awɔɔ n a hɔbaa sa.
60002022	A mɩŋŋa n mimbʋnyaa sɩ ba y, a n ŋʋaar ba fɩɩga y,
60002023	n y'a sʋnsɔ wʋ, b'a n a sompi gʋaa n'ʋ y, gʋɔɔ fɩr ka ma, b'a n nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ y, a mɩŋŋa to a ʋ, Woso wɔ ʋ, bɩ n nɩ dʋdɔ kam tɩrga.
60002024	A mɩŋŋa ɩ yɛ an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ sa an fɩr yɩ ŋ nɩ, an ga gɔdarkʋra ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gəəno n wɔɔ m wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ, k'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba tɩrgabaa nɔ ʋ. A mɩŋŋa sampɔɔrlɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n laafɩɩ yɩ.
60002025	Bala, biisi bɩ, awɔɔ nyaam am seero hɔ bɩ m, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ a bɔ a bʋr a dundor bɩ zi, an nɩ dɔrɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ.
60003001	Lannɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ sɔ, k'a zu a zino wɔɔ lɛ ʋ, maam bɩ, kʋ gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʋ, ŋ bɩr sɩra kam Woso lemim b'ʋ, kʋ ŋ lannɔ wɔɔ zibəə n a ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Woso ʋ, baa kʋ ŋ n meer ba y.
60003002	Ŋ y'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'an mɩŋŋa, an nɩ zure ŋ lɛ ʋ bɩ yɩm.
60003003	A b'a ka ma k'a a mɛ gʋɛrɛ da ma, mintɔɔnrɛ m, gɛɛ sarma nyɛɛnnɔ nɩ, gɛɛ garbarɛ waasɩ nɩ y.
60003004	Bɩ k'a ka k'a gʋɛrɛ bɩ n bɩr a heer ʋ, bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa kan bʋraama kɩ gʋɛrɛ bɩ, bɩ nyarɛ ɩ ba ʋ y, a nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ sɔ Woso mɩm ʋ gʋta.
60003005	Lannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta biisi ŋn'ɩ zum Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɛrɛbaa naa do ŋnɩ ta m, ŋn'ɩ zure a zino lɛ ʋ.
60003006	Nyɩnta Saara ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, an nɩ yɛm Abraham lɛ ma, an n'a birm a zuuba, k'awɔɔ y'a mɩŋŋa bam, awɔɔ bɩr a tom hɔsɩ nɩ nyibəə darɛ a ma, awɔɔ nyɩntarɛ a nyɩnɔ.
60003007	Awɔɔ k'an zino wɔɔ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba kan a lannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ paŋŋa n awɔɔ hɔ ku y, k'a daʋrɛ zi ba kan ŋ kɩ, bala, ŋ mɩsɩrbaa denter bɩ hɔjirle yɩm sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ, Woso barka bɩ nɔ ʋ. K'a ŋ da ʋ, kʋ hɔsɩ b'a ta a yaadarɛ nɩ y.
60003008	Meer naa do ba mɔɔ nawʋm kan awɔɔ haay kɩ kɛɛrɛ: K'a ka, k'a hɔɔn n bɩr deem, a bɩr kʋ cicir zɛm, a bɩr kʋ ŋʋam danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ, a bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam kʋ m, a bɩr mɩŋŋazerle m.
60003009	A b'a bʋnyaa sompi gʋaa nʋ y, kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ, a b'a sʋnsɔ wʋ sɔ y. Bɩ, k'a barka da ʋ, bala, awɔɔ bir Woso ʋ, k'awɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba ncɩnaaʋ, k'awɔɔ n a barka hɔjirle yɩ.
60003010	Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa mɩsɩrbaa ma, k'a taʋrɛ n yɩ a ma mɩŋŋa, a zaa a ga m, an meerbaa bʋnyaa barɛ to, kan ŋʋaarbarɛ kɩ.
60003011	K'a zaa n a bɔ a bʋnyaa barɛ ʋ, an a mɩŋŋa ba, an bɩr a kam ma tee••• kʋ laafɩɩ n bɩr gʋɔɔ bire ʋ.
60003012	Bala, Zuuba mɩm ɩ gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ ra, an n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ yaadarɛ ma, bɩ, a bɩr yɛm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ ma y.
60003013	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ ŋʋarɛ, nka n n'a bʋnyaa barɛ awɔɔ nɩ?
60003014	Baa k'awɔɔ fɩr yɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ tɔ ma, k'a dɔ a ʋ, mimbirenyɩnta m. A bɩ nyi ba gʋɔɔ nɩ y, b'a b'a heer kɔ y.
60003015	Bɩ, k'a Krista da ʋ a heer nɔ ʋ, a m Zuuba. K'a banka mɩŋŋa, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ awɔɔ lar taaheerlɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ mim ma, k'a a da ma a jɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa.
60003016	Bɩ, k'a jɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa m, kan daʋrɛ kɩ m, a bɩr noom hu m. Maam bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ tɔ zarm, ŋn'a bʋnyaa hɩrɛ awɔɔ tarɛ ma Krista Zuure tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyannɩ bɩrɛ.
60003017	Bala, k'awɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm zi mɩŋŋa k'awɔɔ n'a bam tɔ ma, kʋ Woso hɔɔnhɔ m maam nɩ, naa jɩra fɩr yɩ a bʋnyaa barɛ tɔ ma m.
60003018	Krista mɩŋŋa ga wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, ga a ʋ gallɛm deem taan•••, a mɩŋŋa tɩrga, an bɔkarɛ an ga gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, a ba a ʋ maam, k'a wɔɔ gaa a bʋr wɔɔ m Woso zi, n y'a zɛ gər a mɛsim nɔ ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ya, an mɩsɩrbaa ka ʋ.
60003019	Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ do a nyɩnta m biisi, an Woso lemim pa da m. Pa bɩ da a ʋ, bayɛrɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga, ŋnɩ gəənokʋ ʋ, lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
60003020	Bayɛrɛzannɔ wɔɔ duro dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, Woso bʋr a ma, Nowee nɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bam. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bɩ gʋta y, ŋ gʋaa sinnyə ŋnɩ bɔlɛm yɩ hi bɩ wakatɩ ʋ.
60003021	Dɩɩtaa sɔ naa, bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ yɩ awɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ, batɛm kʋ wɔɔ n'a sim bɩ bɔkʋrɛ m minno wɔɔ duro m. Batɛm bɩ bɩr wɔɔ mɛ dintim sʋrgɔrɛ y, bɩ, a ka a nawʋm wɔɔ nɩ hɔɔn bɔŋ ʋ, k'ʋ zu Woso ʋ kan noom hu kɩ. Bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ yɩ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ Yeezuu Krista a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
60003022	A a busu, an ta arzana ʋ, an nɩ nyɩntam Woso bɩsɩ ra, malɛɛkarɔ haay kan lɛɛsoʋzannɔ kɩ, paŋŋazannɔ kɩ haay nɩ zure a lɛ ʋ.
60004001	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ Krista fɩr yɩ a mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ sɔ, k'a naa da a heer ʋ a dɔ a ʋ, gʋaa k'a fɩr yɩ a mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ, a a gʋ mimbʋnyaa ma.
60004002	A n a sa dɩɩtaa ma, k'a dɔmɩm k'a gɔɔta awɔɔ m k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba tara burə ʋ bɩ sa, a Woso hɔɔnhɔ ba m, a b'a sa a lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ ŋ ŋʋam bɩ ba nɩ y.
60004003	Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ biisi, a bawosodonno mɩsɩrbaa ba bɩ, a kɔ an bʋrbɔ kɛɛrɛ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, ta awɔɔ nawʋm yɔka, a n nɩ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ m, a n nɩ bɛɛ mim waasɩ, a n nɩ hɔ bɩm waasɩ, a n nɩ hɔ mim waasɩ, a n nɩ yaa dam wosobaawɔnnɔ m zibʋnyaabarɛ nɔ ʋ.
60004004	Kɛɛrɛ naa, bawosodonno kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩgarɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ bɩr a mɩŋŋɔɔ kam zibʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro barɛ ʋ kan a kɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋn'a dɔ kʋ bɔ an n'a hɩrɛ y, am naa, ŋn'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋm.
60004005	Bɩ, Woso zɛm bɩ ŋ da lɛ ʋ, ŋn'a zi bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ mim nyɩ bɔ ʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa a banka an nya, k'a gʋɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ kan gəəno kɩ dʋdɔ ka.
60004006	Naa y'a ka, n nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, n brɔɔ dʋdɔ ka, amba n nɩ gʋaa woo••• dʋdɔ kam bɩ m, lemim bɩ pa n y'a da ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri tɔ ma, amba Woso n mɩsɩr bɩ m.
60004007	Hɔ haay nyarɛ a zɔ, maam bɩ, gʋaa biyəə n bʋr a ma, a b'a zu a ʋ y, k'a a da ma, a bɩr yaa dam.
60004008	A n lɛ da haay bɩ, k'a bɩr kʋ ŋʋam paan•••, bala, ŋʋarɛ ɩ hɔ kam mimbʋnyaa yɔɔgʋ ra.
60004009	K'a saana ba kʋ m, b'a bɩ kukur ba y.
60004010	Woso ganwʋrɛ y'a hʋnhɔ ka awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə ʋ, gʋaa biyəə n zi ba a ganwʋrɛ bɩ m, a mim daahan tɔ ma. K'a ba ncɩnaaʋ, amba zibəənyɩnɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ m, a nyasʋ Woso barka k'a nɩ zi hɔka bam bɩ m mɩŋŋa.
60004011	Kʋ gʋaa ɩ lemim padarɛ ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'an Woso lemim pa da. Gʋaa k'a nɩ daahan zi bam bɩ, k'an a ba paŋŋa kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ m. K'a ba ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ hɔ haay woo••• nɔ ʋ, Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma. Woso mɩŋŋa y'a so lɛbɔʋrɛ ʋ, kan paŋŋa kɩ dɔmɩm haay, Amina.
60004012	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, a bɩ dɩga fɩr k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma naa ma, ɩ ʋ, mim daŋŋada nɩ, a zɛ kədə y.
60004013	K'a a heer nyɔɔ, bala a na awɔɔ ʋ Krista ma a fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ, maam bɩ, k'a lɛbɔʋrɛ b'a hɩnka, awɔɔ nyɩntam heernyɔɔ nɔ ʋ sɔ.
60004014	Kʋ gʋɔɔ y'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋm Krista tɔ ma, mimbirenyɩnta m kan awɔɔ kɩ, bala, Woso Ɛspri kʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ Ɛspri m b'ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
60004015	A b'a ka, awɔɔ gɔsɩ n fɩr yɩ, k'a gər zɛ, gɛɛ k'a kom ba, gɛɛ k'a zi bʋnyaa ba, gɛɛ k'a a lɛ zu gʋɔɔ minno ʋ tɔ ma y.
60004016	Bɩ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa ɩ fɩr yɩm, kʋ kristagʋaa m bɩ tɔ ma, nyannɩ b'a zɛ y, k'an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ denter, kʋ n n'a birm kristagʋaa bɩ tɔ ma.
60004017	Dɔmɩm kʋ Woso n nɩ dʋdɔ kam b'a ku, a sa a nawʋm a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma. Bɩ, k'a sa a nawʋm wɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka Woso lemim nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ dʋdɔ bɩ ŋ ku, a yɩrɛ ŋ ma lɔ?
60004018	Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm, B'a wer nyɩntaŋ ʋ. K'a maam, a nyɩntam gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ ma lʋnlɔ?
60004019	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩm Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ to a darɛzaa Woso wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam. Taalɛrazaa m Woso m.
60005001	Lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m ŋ dʋndɔ. Lɛɛzaa m mɔɔ m sɔ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, bɩ Krista fɩryɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa m mɔɔ m sɔ, mɔɔ nyɩntam lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a n'a hɩnkam b'ʋ sɔ. Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba n nɩ:
60005002	K'a nyasʋ bakʋ kʋ Woso a da awɔɔ wɔ ʋ bɩ m mɩŋŋa. A bɩ dɔ ma pakra nɩ y, k'a dɔ ma heernyɩnta m, amba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m. A bɩ dɔ bakʋ bɩ ma sɔ, k'a busoo yɩ y, bɩ k'a dɔ ma kan a heer kɩ haay.
60005003	A b'a so gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da a wɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ paŋŋa nɩ y, bɩ k'a a tɔ ʋ k'a hɔbaarɔ n bɩr mɩŋŋa, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a da ma ŋnɩ ŋ sa.
60005004	K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ dundonno jɩtaarɛ bɩ bɩ bʋr, a y'a kam awɔɔ n nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a bɩr a zarm bɩ nɔ ʋ.
60005005	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ ma. Awɔɔ haay k'a bɩr mɩŋŋazerle m kan kʋ kɩ, bala, Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Woso bɩr yɛm mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ wɔɔ ma y, b'a y'a barka bɩ kam mɩŋŋazerlezannɔ ʋ.
60005006	K'a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer Woso taa, a paŋŋa ɩ lɛ da haay, maam bɩ, a y'awɔɔ gore daŋ ʋ a dɔmɩm ʋ.
60005007	K'a minno kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ kɔm nɔ wɔɔ haay da a wɔ ʋ, bala, a mɩŋŋa ɩ nyasʋrɛ awɔɔ m.
60005008	A b'a zu a ʋ y, k'a dundo a zi. Sʋtaana awɔɔ jɩm b'ɩ kumkum lɛɛ ma am poozaa hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ baa dam, an n'a kam gʋaa ma k'a nyasʋ a bɩ.
60005009	K'a a da a lɛ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ danyɩnɔ yɩm sɔ durnya b'ʋ jilli.
60005010	Awɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, bɩ, Woso k'a a so barka do haay ʋ, an awɔɔ bir, k'awɔɔ n nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ, Krista zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ y'awɔɔ bankam fasɩ, an awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra, an a ka awɔɔ n jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, hɔsɩ b'a darɛ awɔɔ ma y.
60005011	A y'a so paŋŋa ʋ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
60005012	Wɔɔ danyɩ Silas mɔɔ da ʋ, an ci poore naa gʋrsɩra ba, kʋ m a nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma. Mɔɔ ɩ dɩgam ma sɩrabarɛzaa sɩrakarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ ma, kʋ m awɔɔ heer yo, kʋ m a hɩ a m paan••• m ʋ, Woso barka denter b'awɔɔ n a nɔ ʋ naa, k'a gɔɔta a nɔ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.
60005013	Gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ ba a gʋɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ sokʋma k'a nɩ Babɩlɔnnɩ ʋ naa ʋ b'ɩ yaa darɛ a m. Mɔɔ nyɩ Markɩ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m sɔ.
60005014	K'a yaa da kʋ m mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, kʋ Woso laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay k'a nɩ Krista nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
61001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Simɔn Pɩyɛɛr, mɔɔ nɩ ci bɩ bam, Yeezuu Krista zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, a zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m sɔ. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ k'a sɩrakarɛ n hɔdeem kan wɔɔ hɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ. Yeezuu Krista m wɔɔ Woso, a m wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa sɔ, a tɩrgabaa y'a ka, awɔɔ n sɩra ka.
61001002	A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n bɩr Woso dɔm, kan wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu kɩ, k'a a da ma a barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ yɩ gʋta.
61001003	Woso zi ba a paŋŋa bɩ m, an a ka wɔɔ nɩ hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ ʋ ga m ʋ a yɩ, k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba a zuure nɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa bɩ m. A ka k'a ʋ wɔɔ n Krista dɔ bɩ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ bir a lɛbɔʋrɛ kan a paŋŋa kɩ m.
61001004	Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, an hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋtɔɔ Woso n ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ ka wɔɔ ʋ, ŋ ka a ʋ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a a yɔ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya ʋ, ŋn'ɩ gʋɔɔ zaar bam nɔ wɔɔ m. K'a wɔ ʋ, a Woso mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa ba.
61001005	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a a tɔ ʋ paan••• a mɩsɩrbaa zore na a sɩrakarɛ bɩ ma, a Woso dɔrɛ na mɩsɩrbaa zore bɩ ma.
61001006	A a tɔ ʋ gʋta, a a da a mɩŋŋa ma, k'a tʋntɔʋrɛ na daamɩŋŋama bɩ ma, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ na tʋntɔʋrɛ bɩ ma,
61001007	k'a a tɔ ʋ sɔ, a bakʋmmɩŋŋa na mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ ma, k'a ŋʋarɛ na bakʋmmɩŋŋa bɩ ma.
61001008	K'awɔɔ ɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro bam tee•••, ŋ y'a karɛ awɔɔ n ziro ba gʋta a bɩr wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista dɔm tee•••.
61001009	Bala, gʋaa kʋ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ba zi bɩ, bʋʋ n a zaa m, an n'a wɔ dɩndam, a tɔ ba a nɔ ʋ dɔ, a ʋ, n y'a mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ a ma biisi y.
61001010	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, Woso y'awɔɔ bɔ ʋ, k'a a tɔ ʋ, a gɔɔta a zuure nɔ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ. K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, awɔɔ b'a dom fɩɩga y.
61001011	Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, Woso n zaa ka awɔɔ ʋ fasɩ, awɔɔ n gasʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kʋ wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ cirbəə kʋ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ.
61001012	Naa tɔ ma m, mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam kʋ m bɩr hɔɔ nɔɔn duro tɔ darɛ awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, baa k'awɔɔ ŋ dɔ kara, an nɩ zum sɩra naa do ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ bɩ kɩ.
61001013	Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam m ʋ, a a ga m kʋ m bɩr hɔɔ nɔɔn duro tɔ darɛ awɔɔ nɔ ʋ tee•••, kʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta m m mɩsɩr naa dɔmɩm ʋ, k'awɔɔ b'a zu a ʋ y.
61001014	Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hʋrlɛ a zɔ durnya naa ʋ, amba wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista nyɩnta an a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m.
61001015	Bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m tɔŋ ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ baʋrɛ jɛ ʋ, awɔɔ a da ma dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ a hɔdɩndarɛrɔ nɔɔn duro tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
61001016	Bala, yo bɛɛ wɔɔ ʋ ŋʋaar dɔrɛ noonno ma, ʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista k'a nɩ zɛm kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y. A mɩŋŋa yɩ wɔɔ ʋ ʋ zim a lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ.
61001017	Wakatɩ kʋ Zɩ Woso daʋrɛ kan lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ ka ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ. Woso mɩŋŋa nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ, an meer ba kan kɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ m naa do, mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam gʋta."
61001018	Nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ kan kɩ ci mɩŋŋa bɩ burə ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ leer naa do k'a a to brama bɩ ma ʋ zim.
61001019	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ sɩra ka gʋta, ʋ ʋ, lemim kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ, sɩra m. A a ga m, k'awɔɔ n lemim bɩ si mɩŋŋa, bala, fɩtɩrɛ m, an nɩ yɔm monsigə ʋ, k'a gɔɔta a lemim bɩ si kʋ lɛɛgure dɔmɩm n a ku, kʋ Krista k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ kan dɔgta monyaa kɩ bɩ n bʋr, an lɛɛ gu awɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
61001020	A n cem haay bɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an wosolɛsinnɩsorameerbaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosoci b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ jɩ dɩnda a zim nɩ y.
61001021	Bala, gʋaa bɛɛ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a zim, k'a wosolɛsinnɩsora meer ba y, fɩɩga. Bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a ka gʋɔɔ n wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ Woso lɛ si, ŋnɩ so ra.
61002001	Biisi bɩ, ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ nyɩnta ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla. Kɛɛrɛ sɔ naa, ŋʋaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ barla. Ŋ gasʋm hɔdɩndarɛrɔ bʋnyaarɔ m awɔɔ bire ʋ lɔɔ•••, ŋnɩ bɩsɩ ka Zuuba k'a ŋ bʋmbɔ bɩ ma. Naa ŋn'a bam hʋnhʋrlɛ n bɩ daata zɛ ŋ la, an ŋ zar.
61002002	Gʋɔɔ gʋta zure ŋ jɛ ʋ, ŋ jaandarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kam gʋɔɔ n sɩra zaa bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ.
61002003	Busoo lɛtaama gʋta y'a sore ŋ ʋ, bɩ n a ka, ŋnɩ bra ba awɔɔ m meerbaarɔ nyɩntɔɔ m, k'a hɔ yɩ awɔɔ gʋr zi. Bɩ, Woso lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta tee••• k'a ŋ dʋdɔ yar, ŋ zaarbarɛ ɩ zɛm k'a bɩ ŋ ku.
61002004	Makrarɔ ba n nɩ: Woso n malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ kʋrɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ to y, ŋ nyɔɔ a ʋ, an ŋ da sɛhar ʋ, ŋnɩ baŋŋarɔ n'a ma monsigə ʋ, ŋnɩ dɔm dʋdɔyarlɛ hinni ma.
61002005	Woso n durnya k'a nyɩnta ʋ biisi bɩ to y, a a ka hi gʋta n bʋr an bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zaar ba, nyɩnta brɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ. Bɩ, Woso Nowee bʋmbɔ, kan gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ kɩ saanhɩna. Bɩ nyɩnta an nɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ pa dam.
61002006	Woso Sodɔm kʋ kan Gomɔɔr kʋ kɩ dʋdɔ yar an a ka sɛ n bɩ ŋ zar. A ba a ʋ maam, k'a hɔ k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ yɩm bɩ hɩnka.
61002007	A Lɔttɩ yɔ, nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋaa tɩrga, an nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa bam a zamaana nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, a heer n'a zarm.
61002008	Bala, k'a mɩŋŋa n tɩrga, an nɩ ŋ kʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a yɩ ŋ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ yɩm, an nɩ ŋ mim mam, naa n a ka k'an tɩrga bɩ, a heer nɩ kɔm, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
61002009	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a yɩm minno nɔɔn duro haay nɔ ʋ, ʋ ʋ, zaa kʋ Zuuba n'a sam, an n'a gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔm bɩ, a a dɔ. K'a y'a bam lɔ sɔ an gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ to, k'a bɩ ŋ dʋdɔ ka dʋdɔyarlɛ hinni ʋ, a fɩr ka ŋ ma, a a dɔ sɔ.
61002010	A fɩr kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zure a lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, an lɛ da. Brɔɔ bɩr yɛm Woso ma y. Ŋʋaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ mim hɩ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ heer ka, mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ m sɔ, ŋ leer ba malɛɛkarɔ ʋ y, brɔɔ sʋnsɔ ŋ n'a wʋm a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
61002011	Baa malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ da ŋʋaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m a paŋŋa kan a lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩr malɛɛkarɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarlɛ y, bɩ ŋ bɩr ŋ sʋnsɔ wʋm Zuuba lɛɛ y.
61002012	Bɩ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poohɔɔ kɩ, ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ y, ta ŋ nawʋ ʋ, kʋ n nɩ bɩ ŋ gʋr baŋŋarɔ ʋ, n nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ. Hɔ kʋ ŋ n a dɔ bɩ n n'a sʋnsɔ wʋm. N zɛm bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ am poohɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
61002013	Kʋ ŋ y'a ka gʋɔɔ ŋ fɩr yɩ bɩ, fɩryɩrɛ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ yawʋra sɔ. A lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa ŋ tɩr a ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ ba sinsebir ma. A so k'awɔɔ ʋ tɩr a ʋ kʋ ma, k'a kʋ ŋʋarɛ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ, nyɩnta kʋ ŋ tɩr a ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ ŋnɩ bɩr a heer nyɔɔm a ŋʋaar zibəə nɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ taʋrɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ b'ɩ nyannɩ darɛ awɔɔ ma.
61002014	Ŋ ba zibəə m kʋ dɩga lannɔ ma, k'a mim bʋnyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ bɛɛ y. Ŋ bɩr kɔm kan mimbʋnyaa barɛ kɩ y, ŋn'a kam sɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ paŋŋa ba ʋ Woso zaa bɩ ra rɔ wɔɔ, ŋn'a dam mimbʋnyaa ʋ kan ŋ kɩ. Busoo yɩrɛ lɛtaama y'a so ŋ heer ʋ jilli. Woso lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan ŋ kɩ.
61002015	Ŋ zaa tɩrga bɩ to, ŋn'a nyʋnnyɔɔ. Bozɔɔr nyɩ Balam zaa bɩ ŋ y'a sa, bɩ yɛ an a bʋnyaa ba k'a busoo yɩ.
61002016	Bɩ, Woso həən si ma a kʋrɔma bɩ tɔ ma. Bra bɩr meer barɛ y, bɩ, hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, bra meer ba kan kɩ am gʋaa hɔ bɩ m. Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ bra bɩ n wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ hɔɔzaabaa zibəə bɩ da jɩm ʋ.
61002017	Ŋʋaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ nɔɔm bɔ kʋ ʋ, kan hiyəə gəəro kɩ. Ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ sɔ kan warkʋ kʋ hɩnhɛr gʋta nɩ cenim nɩ kɩ, Woso lɛɛ banka ŋ nɩ monsigə gʋta ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ gɔɔta ʋ.
61002018	A lɛ ŋn'a bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ meerbaa vanvannɔ m, ŋn'ɩ ŋʋaar bam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ nyaanlɛzannɔ bire ʋ lɛɛm nɔ wɔɔ m. Naa ba ŋ nawʋm a jaandarɛ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ m, kʋ brɔɔ n jaan da sɔ.
61002019	Soamɩŋŋaʋ ler ŋn'a bɔm gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro m, an bɔkarɛ mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m. Bala, kʋ hɔ a so ɩ ʋ, hɔ bɩ do lɔ n'ɩ mɩ.
61002020	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista, kʋ wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɔlɛm yɩ durnya zibəə bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dintim kam gʋaa ma rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ. Bɩ, kʋ ŋ y'a ya, ŋnɩ gasʋ minno wɔɔ duro barɛ ʋ, hɔɔ wɔɔ duro barɛ n'a so ŋ ʋ, a yɩrɛ ŋ ma bʋnyaa gʋta, an lɛ da biisi m.
61002021	Kʋ jɩra ŋ y'a ʋ zaa k'an tɩrga bɩ dɔrɛ ra, k'a jɩra hɔɔ. Bɩ, ŋ y'a ku ŋn'a dɔ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a bɔ Woso lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
61002022	Mim niŋŋə k'a ŋ yɩ naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ bɔɔr naa do a hɩ naa, sɩra m, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ji b'a bɔ, an aa hɔ k'a bɔ a rɛ bɩ bɩ." A a y'a an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: "Kurkur kʋ n y'a sʋrgɔ lɛɛm-lɛɛm b'a ya an ta, an n'a birmim bɩtɛ ʋ."
61003001	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, mɔɔ ci hɩɩyazaa m naa, mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma. Ciro hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔm haay nɔ ʋ bɩ, m ya mɔɔ ʋ, m nɩ som hɔɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ dɔ hɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ ra, kʋ ŋ tɔ n bɩr awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, k'a bɩr a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma, amba a a ga m bɩ m.
61003002	Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n meerbaarɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ nyɩnta ŋn'a ba biisi rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ. K'a wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista, kʋ wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ lɛ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ. A zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a ŋ da ʋ, ŋn'a dɩnda awɔɔ m.
61003003	K'a ser ka a dɔ a ʋ, jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩsɩrbaa bam a lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma bala.
61003004	Ŋ yaa wʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Yeezuu a hɩ a ʋ, a zɛm, gɛɛ lɔ? Bɩ bɔ m, an bʋr? Bala, wɔɔ zɩrɔ gɩnga laatʋ, bɩ durnya bɩ gɔɔta an n'a bɩncɛ ʋ, amba a nyɩnta ʋ a darɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ m."
61003005	Meerbaa naa do kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n'a bam naa, a tɔ ŋn'a bɔrɛ a nɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ, biisi-biisi bɩ, Woso nyɩnta an meer ba, an a ka, brama kan tara kɩ n nyɩnta ʋ. Tara bɩ banka a ʋ hi m, zu a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan hi kɩ tara bɩ n ta ʋ.
61003006	Bɩ, durnya k'a nyɩnta ʋ biisi bɩ, hi a a zaar ba m sɔ.
61003007	Bɩ, Woso lemim deem-deem bɩ do a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ, kʋ sɛ n bɩ brama kan tara kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ her lɔ nɔɔm zaar ba. Ŋ to Woso ʋ, k'a bɩ ŋ zaar ba hinni k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm ma rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm, an ŋ zaar ba b'ʋ.
61003008	Bɩ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ, hɔ deem n ta ʋ, a n a ga m k'awɔɔ n a tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ y. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ: Zuuba mɩm ʋ, dɔmɩm deem bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, dɔɔraa tisi m, dɔɔraa tisi n bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, dɔmɩm deem m.
61003009	Gʋɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, Zuuba bɩr hɔ k'a ler bɔ bɩ bam zɔɔ y. A bɩ ncɩnaaʋ y. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, bʋr a nawʋrɛ a ma kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a lɛ baa, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ n nyaam bɩ tɔ ma. A ŋʋa a nawʋm kʋ gʋaa haay n a bɔ a taa m, an sugur yɛ.
61003010	A n bɔkarɛ, hinni kʋ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ bɩ, yɩ a nawʋrɛ am koor hɔ bɩ m. Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, brama nyaanɩm bʋrga guta maam-maam nɔ ʋ, sɛ n hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama haay bɩ. Tara burə kan hɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a nɔ ʋ haay kɩ mim bɔm garga ra.
61003011	K'a yo sɛ n nɩ zɛm bɩ hɔ haay bɩ bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m a mɩsɩrbaa k'awɔɔ a ga m, a ba bɩ dɔ. Awɔɔ a ga m, a a mɩsɩrbaa ba zorebaa nɔ ʋ, a bɩr hɔ k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
61003012	A bɩr dɔm Woso dɔmɩm bɩ ma, a bɩr a tʋntɔŋ ʋ gʋta, k'an bʋr zɔɔ. Hinni bɩ do ʋ, sɛ n nɩ brama zaar baŋ ʋ, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ haay n faan sɛwurəro wɔɔ sebtur nɔ ʋ.
61003013	Bɩ, Woso brama kan tara daa kɩ ler bɔ, tɩrgabaa nyɩntam durnya daa bɩ do ʋ. Naa wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ, ʋ nɩ dɔm ma.
61003014	Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ, kʋ dɔ wɔɔ nawʋm dɔmɩm naa do ma bɩ, k'a a tɔ ʋ paan••• a bɩr mɩŋŋa, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta a ma Woso mɩm ʋ y, k'a bɩr laafɩɩ m kan kɩ.
61003015	K'a dɩga wɔɔ Zuuba bʋraama bɩ ma, a dɔ a ʋ, toore an n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ. Wɔɔ danyɩ Pol kʋ wɔɔ n'a ŋʋam bɩ, a ci ba awɔɔ ma an a hɩ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ. Ci bɩ ba a ʋ, mindɔrɛ kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ m.
61003016	Ciro k'a ŋ ba haay, k'a hɔ naa do mim dɩnda bɩ, naa do an n'a hɩm tee•••. Ciro k'a ŋ ba rɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ, lɛɛ niŋŋoo ta ʋ ŋ jɩ marɛ wer n ta ʋ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔsɩ dɔ, bɩ ŋ bɩr jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ tɩr ŋ jɩ bɩ lʋr, amba ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n'a bam Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ vantɔɔ m bɩ m. A ba kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ naa, a mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋn'a zaar barɛ a zim.
61003017	Bɩ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ, k'awɔɔ m, mɔɔ lɛɛ ka, m hɔ k'a n ta ʋ hɩ awɔɔ m. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a dundo a zi, kʋ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ zibəəro b'a nyʋnnyɔɔ y, k'a b'a gaa jɩnjɩ k'a ŋ ta ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ naa ʋ y.
61003018	Bɩ, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr tam lɛɛ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kʋ wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ barka kan a dɔrɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ tee•••. A tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʋ. Amina!
62001001	Hɔ k'a nyɩnta ʋ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ, wɔɔ n a ma, wɔɔ n a yɩ, ʋ mɩm m. Wɔɔ n dɩga a sɩɩ•••, ʋ ʋ wɔ da ma, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa Lemim dɩndam bɩ,
62001002	bala, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do a hɩnka wɔɔ n a yɩ, ʋ n'a kasɛtɩ karɛ, ʋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ mim hɩrɛ awɔɔ m. A ɩ nyɩnta Zɩ zi, an b'a hɩnka wɔɔ m.
62001003	Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ yɩ, ʋ a ma sɔ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m sɔ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma, a a zɛ kʋ ra kan wɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Zɩ kɩ kan a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista kɩ.
62001004	Naa wɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma, kʋ wɔɔ heernyɔɔ bɩ n yɩ gʋta.
62001005	Lemim kʋ wɔɔ ma zi, ʋ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ. Woso bɩ, lɛɛgure m. Monsigə ba zi fɩɩgaa y.
62001006	Kʋ wɔɔ hɩ, wɔɔ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ", ʋ bɔkarɛ, ʋ nɩ tam monsigə ʋ, ŋʋaar wɔɔ n'a barɛ, bɩ wɔɔ bɩr sɩra barɛ y.
62001007	Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ tam lɛɛgure ʋ, amba a mɩŋŋa nɩ lɛɛgure nɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ, wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan ʋ muno kɩ, b'a Nyɩ Yeezuu bɩ ma bɩ nɩ wɔɔ hubɔm wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
62001008	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: "Mimbʋnyaa ba wɔɔ ma y", bra wɔɔ n'a barɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m, sɩra bɩ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y.
62001009	Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaarɔ bɔ ʋ lɛ ma Woso taa, a wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur kam wɔɔ ʋ, an tɩrgabaawar haay gʋ wɔɔ ma, bala, sɩrazaa m b'a tɩrga sɔ.
62001010	Kʋ wɔɔ hɩ, wɔɔ ʋ: "Mimbʋnyaabənno bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ", a ba wɔɔ ʋ ŋʋaarzaa, b'a meerbaa ba wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y.
62002001	M nyɩnzɛɛnnyɩnɔ, naa gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ minto, k'a bɩ mimbʋnyaa ba y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa mimbʋnyaa ba, wɔɔ mimbankarɛzaa ta ʋ Zɩ taa, Yeezuu Krista k'an tɩrga bɩ m.
62002002	Bala, a mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta mannɩhɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ minto. Bɩ wɔɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ minto bɛɛ m bala y, durnyazannɔ haay hɔɔ minto m sɔ.
62002003	Kʋ wɔɔ zu a lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ Woso dɔ.
62002004	Gʋaa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ dɔ", b'a bɩr zure a lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋʋaarzaa m, sɩra b'a nɔ ʋ y.
62002005	Bɩ kʋ gʋaa a meerbaa bɩ si, kan sɩra kɩ, a zaa Woso ŋʋa paan•••. Bɩ minto bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ʋ ɩ kan kɩ.
62002006	Kʋ gʋaa a ʋ, a ɩ gɔɔtam kan kɩ, pakra m k'a mɩŋŋa m zu zaa kʋ Yeezuu a sa b'ʋ.
62002007	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, lɛ daa bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma y, lɛ gusire m, awɔɔ n ta m a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ. Lɛ gusire naa do, meerbaa k'awɔɔ ma bɩ m.
62002008	Bɩ kan bɩ kɩ, lɛ daa mɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma. Bɩ naa sɩra, kan Krista kɩ, kan awɔɔ kɩ sɔ. Bala, monsigə ɩ cenim, lɛɛgure denter paan••• b'ɩ yɔm kaka.
62002009	Gʋaa k'a ʋ, a ɩ lɛɛgure nɔ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, an sɔ a danyɩ m bɩ, a gɔɔta, an nɩ monsigə ʋ tee•••.
62002010	Gʋaa k'a danyɩ ŋʋa b'ɩ lɛɛgure ʋ, bɩ hɔsɩ ba zi an b'a dam ma, an a ka an a gəm zɛ y.
62002011	Bɩ gʋaa k'a sɔ a danyɩ m bɩ, monsigə nɔ an ta ʋ. A n nɩ tam monsigə ʋ, b'a n a dɔ kʋ ta an nawʋm ka y. Bala, monsigə b'a mɩm ta.
62002012	A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma, m nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, bala, awɔɔ a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, Yeezuu Krista tɔ minto.
62002013	Zɩrɔ, a gʋrsɩra mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma, bala, awɔɔ Gʋaa k'a nyɩnta ʋ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ dɔ. A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ pooro, bala, awɔɔ bʋr Bʋnyaabarɛzaa ra.
62002014	A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma, m nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, bala, awɔɔ Zɩ dɔ. A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma, zɩrɔ, bala, awɔɔ Gʋaa k'a nyɩnta ʋ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ dɔ. A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ pooro, bala, awɔɔ paŋŋa ta ʋ, bɩ Woso lemim gɔɔta awɔɔ ʋ, a bʋr Bʋnyaabarɛzaa ra.
62002015	A bɩ durnya ŋʋa, kan hɔ k'a n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ y. Kʋ gʋaa durnya ŋʋa, Zɩ ŋʋarɛ b'a nɔ ʋ y.
62002016	Bala, hɔ haay k'a nɩ durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɛsim lɛtaama, mɩm lɛtaama bʋnyaa, mɩŋŋabusure arzaka nɔ ʋ, naa haay n a to Zɩ zi y. A to a ʋ durnya nɔ ʋ.
62002017	Durnya ɩ cenim kan a lɛtaamarɔ kɩ. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso hɔɔnhɔ bam bɩ gɔɔtam dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
62002018	M nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, dɔmɩm jɛzaa a ku. Awɔɔ ma, n n a pa da, n ʋ, Krista jɩm b'ɩ zɛm. A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa naa ma, Krista jɩnnɔ wɔɔ a hɩnka gʋta. Naa minto y'a ka, wɔɔ n'a dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, dɔmɩm jɛzaa a ku.
62002019	A to ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ zi, bɩ ŋ n nyɩnta wɔɔ gʋɔɔ y. Kʋ nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ gʋɔɔ, ŋ gɔɔtam kan wɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, pakra m, kʋ gʋaa haay n a dɔ paan••• a ʋ, wɔɔ gʋɔɔ bɛɛ m gʋaa haay nɩ y.
62002020	K'awɔɔ nɩ, Krista bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka awɔɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ haay, awɔɔ sɩra dɔ kɛɛrɛ.
62002021	Mɔɔ n a gʋrsɩra ba awɔɔ ma, mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n sɩra dɔ y, awɔɔ dɔ. B'awɔɔ dɔ sɔ, a ʋ, ŋʋaar n a to sɩra nɔ ʋ y.
62002022	Nka m ŋʋaarzaa? Kʋ bɩ m gʋaa k'a nɩ bɩsɩ karɛ, a ʋ, Yeezuu bɩ Krista bɛɛ nɩ y. Krista jɩm bɩ, gʋaa k'a bɩsɩ ka Zɩ kan Nyɩ kɩ ma m.
62002023	Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a bɩsɩ ka Nyɩ bɩ ma, a ba kan Zɩ bɩ kɩ sɔ y. Gʋaa k'a a bɔ a lɛ ma, a ʋ, a Nyɩ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a ɩ kan Zɩ bɩ kɩ sɔ.
62002024	Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, kʋ lemim niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma a sɩŋŋɩda ma bɩ n gɔɔta awɔɔ heer ʋ. Kʋ lemim niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma bɩ gɔɔta awɔɔ heer ʋ, awɔɔ gɔɔta sɔ, an nɩ Nyɩ kan Zɩ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
62002025	Lerbɔrɛ niŋŋə kʋ Zɩ a bɔ wɔɔ m bɩ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m.
62002026	Naa gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ minto.
62002027	K'awɔɔ nɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'awɔɔ si Krista bɩ zi bɩ, a gɔɔta awɔɔ heer ʋ. Pakra bɛɛ m kʋ n nɩ hɔ dɩnda a m dɔ y. Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ hɔ haay dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m. A hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ sɩra m, ŋʋaar bɛɛ y. K'a gɔɔta Krista nɔ ʋ, amba a hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ m.
62002028	Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a gɔɔta Krista nɔ ʋ, k'a b'a hɩnka, k'ʋ heer n bɩr kookoo, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ nyannɩ yɩ a taa, ʋ ʋ ba ma laatʋ a zɛrɛ hinni ʋ y.
62002029	K'awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ, Krista tɩrga bɩ, k'a dɔ sɔ a ʋ, gʋaa k'a nɩ tɩrgabaa zi barɛ, Woso nyɩ m paan•••.
62003001	K'a dɩga ŋʋarɛ gʋta kʋ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ wɔɔ birm a nyɩnɔ bɩ ma. Bɩ, sɩra m, Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka, durnya b'a dam ma, an wɔɔ dɔ y. Bala, durnyazannɔ wɔɔ n Woso dɔ y.
62003002	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m. Bɩ, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'a ʋ hɔ niŋŋə bɩ, bɩ n a hɩnka cɩna y. Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, k'a b'a hɩnka, wɔɔ zɛm bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ. Bala, k'a lɔ, wɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ.
62003003	Gʋaa niŋŋə k'an ta taaheerlɛ naa do m Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ, a ɩ dintim gʋrɛ a ma, k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa amba Yeezuu m mɩŋŋa bɩ m.
62003004	Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a mimbʋnyaa ba, kaanm a nawʋm Woso lɛ m, bala, mimbʋnyaa bɩ, kaanm lɛ m m.
62003005	Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Yeezuu bʋr k'a bɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ wɔɔ ma, bɩ mimbʋnyaa ba ma y.
62003006	Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a gɔɔta kan kɩ, a bɩr mimbʋnyaa bam dʋntɔ y. Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam, a n a yɩ, b'a n a dɔ sɔ y.
62003007	M nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a bɩ yɛ kʋ gɔsɩ n'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ y. Gʋaa k'a nɩ tɩrgabaa zi bam bɩ tɩrga, amba Yeezuu n tɩrga bɩ m.
62003008	Gʋaa k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam, Sʋtaana gʋaa m. Bala, mimbʋnyaabər m Sʋtaana m a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ. Bɩ minto y'a ka Woso Nyɩ bɩ n bʋr k'a bɩ Sʋtaana zibəəro zaar ba.
62003009	Gʋaa niŋŋə haay kʋ Woso a yɩ bɩ bɩr mimbʋnyaa bam dʋntɔ y, a mɩsɩrbaa hɔdo bɩ y'a nɔ ʋ, a b'a dam ma, an mimbʋnyaa ba dʋntɔ y, bala Woso y'a yɩ.
62003010	Naa minto y'a ka n nɩ Woso nyɩnɔ dɔ, n nɩ ŋ bɔ kʋ zi kan Sʋtaana hɔɔ kɩ. Gʋaa k'a bɩr tɩrgabaa zi barɛ y, b'a bɩr a danyɩ ŋʋam sɔ y, Woso gʋaa bɛɛ y.
62003011	Kʋ sɩra m, lemim niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma a sɩŋŋɩda ma bɩ n naa: Ʋ kʋ ŋʋa.
62003012	A b'a ba am Kayɛn hɔ bɩ nɩ y, kʋ Bʋnyaabarɛzaa gʋaa m bɩ, a a danyɩ zɛ gər. Bɩ, bɔ minto an a zɛ? K'a zibəəro wɔɔ nyɩnta bʋnyaa, a danyɩ bɩ zibəəro wɔɔ n nyɩnta tɩrga bɩ m.
62003013	Kʋ durnya sɔ awɔɔ m, m danyɩnɔ, a bɩ zɛ kədə y.
62003014	Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ nɔ ʋ, ʋ bʋr mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ danyɩnɔ ŋʋa bɩ minto. Gʋaa k'a bɩr a danyɩ ŋʋam bɩ gɔɔta zɛ nɔ ʋ.
62003015	Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a sɔ a danyɩ m bɩ, gərzer m. B'awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, gərzer deem taan••• ba mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɩ a zi y.
62003016	Hɔ k'a a ka wɔɔ n ŋʋarɛ k'an hɔ niŋŋə bɩ dɔ ba n nɩ: Yeezuu a mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ minto. A a ga m sɔ, wɔɔ n ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ka, ʋ danyɩnɔ minto.
62003017	Kʋ gʋaa ɩ durnya naa do arzakarɔ m, an a danyɩ yɩ cicir nɔ ʋ, b'a n a da han y, Woso ŋʋarɛ bɩ y'a bam lɔ k'a bɩr a zaa ʋ?
62003018	M nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, ʋ bɩ ŋʋarɛ ba lɛmindɔ m kan meerbaa kɩ nɔ ʋ y. Ʋ kʋ ŋʋa, zibəə barɛ kan sɩra kɩ nɔ ʋ.
62003019	Naa minto, wɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ ʋ ʋ, ʋ ɩ sɩra nɔ ʋ, bɩ wɔɔ heerkoodəbaa yɩm zi.
62003020	Bala, kʋ wɔɔ heer ɩ mim kam wɔɔ ra, Woso gʋtabaa lɛ da wɔɔ heer la, a hɔ haay dɔ.
62003021	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, kʋ wɔɔ heer bɩr mim kam wɔɔ ra, wɔɔ heer koodə Woso zi.
62003022	Kʋ wɔɔ hɔ yɛ han, wɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ, bala, wɔɔ a lɛrɔ wɔɔ si, ʋ nɩ hɔ k'a nɔ yɩ bɩ barɛ.
62003023	Ba a lɛ n na: K'ʋ sɩra ka a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista bɩ tɔ ʋ, k'ʋ kʋ ŋʋa amba a lɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
62003024	Gʋaa k'a n'a lɛrɔ wɔɔ sire, a ɩ kan Woso kɩ, Woso nɩ kan kɩ sɔ. Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, a ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto.
62004001	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, a bɩ sɩra ka gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ ʋ, a ɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m nɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. K'a ŋ ka a lɛɛ a dɩga ŋ ma, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ŋ nɩ ta m paan••• gɛɛ hɔ vanta m gɛ. Bala, ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gʋta y'a kərgu durnya ra.
62004002	Hɔ niŋŋə k'a n'a karɛ awɔɔ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ dɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: Gʋaa k'a bɔ a lɛ ma, a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista a ba gʋaa bɩ, a ɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.
62004003	Bɩ gʋaa haay k'a bɩr Yeezuu Krista kasɛtɩ karɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, bɩ zaa b'a Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ y. Zinə k'a nɩ Krista jɩm nɔ ʋ bɩ m, awɔɔ n a ma, n n'a hɩrɛ n ʋ, a ɩ zɛm bɩ. B'a lee ku durnya nɔ ʋ kaka.
62004004	Awɔɔ kʋ Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, m nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, awɔɔ paŋŋa bʋr ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ duro ra. Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ paŋŋa lɛ da zinə k'a nɩ kan durnyazannɔ kɩ bɩ ra.
62004005	Durnyazannɔ n ŋ mɩ, ŋn'ɩ durnya mim dɩndam, durnya n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma.
62004006	Wɔɔ, Woso gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m. Gʋaa k'a Woso dɔ bɩ, a tʋr an n'a kam wɔɔ ma. Gʋaa kʋ Woso gʋaa bɛɛ bɩ bɩr a tʋr kam wɔɔ ma y. Bɩ, wɔɔ nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'an sɩra bɩ dɔm ma kan zinə k'a nɩ Krista jɩm nɔ ʋ, an nɩ ŋʋaar bam bɩ kɩ.
62004007	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, ʋ kʋ ŋʋa, bala, ŋʋarɛ bɩ, a to a ʋ Woso zi. Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a a mim ŋʋa Woso y'a yɩ, a Woso dɔ.
62004008	Gʋaa k'a bɩr a mim ŋʋarɛ, a n Woso dɔ y, bala, Woso bɩ ŋʋarɛzaa m.
62004009	Woso ŋʋarɛ k'a hɩnka wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Woso a Nyɩ deem nyɔɔ durnya ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba a minto.
62004010	Ba a ŋʋarɛ bɩ n na: Wɔɔ bɛɛ ɩ Woso ŋʋa y, a ɩ wɔɔ ŋʋa. A y'a Nyɩ nyɔɔ, k'an bɩ nyɩnta mannɩhɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ minto.
62004011	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, kʋ Woso wɔɔ ŋʋa ncɩnaaʋ, wɔɔ sɔ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ kʋ ŋʋa.
62004012	Gɔsɩ n Woso yɩ cɩna y. Kʋ wɔɔ kʋ ŋʋa, Woso ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, b'a ŋʋarɛ b'ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ paan•••.
62004013	Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ ɩ kan kɩ, an nɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ.
62004014	Bɩ wɔɔ yɩ, wɔɔ n'a kasɛtɩ karɛ, wɔɔ ʋ, Woso a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ k'an bɩ yɩ durnya bʋmbɔrɛzaa.
62004015	Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a bɔ a lɛ ma, a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista bɩ Woso Nyɩ nɩ, Woso ɩ gɔɔtam kan kɩ, an nɩ kan Woso kɩ.
62004016	Bɩ wɔɔ, wɔɔ Woso ŋʋarɛ k'an ta m wɔɔ minto bɩ dɔ, wɔɔ sɩra ka naa ʋ sɔ. Woso bɩ, ŋʋarɛzaa m. Gʋaa k'a gɔɔta ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, a zaa ɩ gɔɔtam kan Woso kɩ, Woso nɩ gɔɔtam kan kɩ.
62004017	Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋʋarɛ nɩ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ paan•••, wɔɔ n n'ʋ dam ma, ʋ heerkoodəbaa yɩ dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ. Bala, Yeezuu k'an hɔ niŋŋə bɩ, wɔɔ maam sɔ durnya naa do nɔ ʋ.
62004018	Dabɔʋ ba ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ y. Bɩ ŋʋarɛ paan••• ɩ lam nyibəə ra. Bala, nyibəə ɩ kan booti fɩryɩrɛ kɩ. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ nyi barɛ, ŋʋarɛ paan••• b'a nɔ ʋ y.
62004019	Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ɩ kʋ ŋʋam, bala, Woso ɩ lɛɛ ka an wɔɔ ŋʋa.
62004020	Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ɩ Woso ŋʋam", an bɔkarɛ, an sɔ a danyɩ m, ŋʋaarzaa m. Sɩra m, gʋaa k'a bɩr a danyɩ k'a n'a yɩm bɩ ŋʋarɛ, a b'a dam ma, an Woso k'a bɩr a yɩm bɩ ŋʋa y.
62004021	Ba lɛ kʋ Krista a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ n na: Gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso ŋʋam, k'an a danyɩ ŋʋa sɔ.
62005001	Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a sɩra ka a ʋ, Yeezuu bɩ Krista m, Woso nyɩ m. Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a Zɩ ŋʋa, a a Nyɩ ŋʋa sɔ.
62005002	Hɔ k'a n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, wɔɔ Woso nyɩnɔ ŋʋa bɩ ba n nɩ: Kʋ wɔɔ Woso ŋʋa, ʋ nɩ zure a lɛrɔ ʋ.
62005003	Ba wɔɔ ŋʋarɛ kan Woso kɩ bɩ n na: Kʋ wɔɔ n a lɛrɔ si. B'a lɛrɔ wɔɔ, mɔr gorezaa bɛɛ y.
62005004	Bala, gʋaa haay kʋ Woso y'a yɩ bɩ bʋr durnya ra. Hɔ k'a bʋr durnya ra bɩ, wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ m.
62005005	Nka ɩ bʋr durnya ra? Kʋ bɩ m, gʋaa k'a sɩra ka, a ʋ, Yeezuu bɩ, Woso Nyɩ m.
62005006	Yeezuu Krista ɩ bʋr durnya ʋ, an a hɩnka hi m kan ma kɩ. Hi bɛɛ m bala y, hi m kan ma kɩ. Bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kasɛtɩ kam, bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri m sɩra.
62005007	Ŋ kaakʋ, ŋ n'a kasɛtɩ karɛ:
62005008	Sɛnt-Ɛspri, hi kan ma kɩ. Bɩ ŋ kaakʋ rɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ deem ŋ n'a karɛ.
62005009	Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kasɛtɩ sire, Woso kasɛtɩ bɩ gʋtabaa lɛ da. Ba Woso kasɛtɩ bɩ n na: A kasɛtɩ ka a Nyɩ b'ʋ.
62005010	Gʋaa k'a sɩra ka Woso Nyɩ b'ʋ, a ɩ kasɛtɩ naa do m a heer ʋ. Gʋaa k'a n sɩra ka Woso ʋ bɩ, Woso ba an nawʋm ŋʋaarzaa. K'a n sɩra ka kasɛtɩ kʋ Woso a ka a Nyɩ b'ʋ bɩ minto.
62005011	Ba kasɛtɩ bɩ n na: Woso mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ ka wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do ɩ Nyɩ bɩ zi.
62005012	Gʋaa k'a nɩ kan Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa m. Gʋaa k'a ba kan Woso Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, a ba mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do nɩ y.
62005013	Naa haay gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ k'a nɩ sɩra kam Woso Nyɩ b'ʋ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m.
62005014	Hɔ k'a nɩ wɔɔ heer bam kookoo Woso zi bɩ ba n nɩ: Kʋ wɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə yɛ han an zu a hɔɔnhɔ ʋ, a y'a tʋr kam wɔɔ ma.
62005015	Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, kʋ bɔ wɔɔ yɛ han a y'a tʋr kam wɔɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ yɛ bɩ m.
62005016	Kʋ gʋaa a danyɩ yɩ, an nɩ mimbʋnyaa barɛ, mimbʋnyaa bɩ do bɩr tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, k'an yaa da. Woso mɩsɩrbaa kaŋ ʋ, kʋ mimbʋnyaa bɩ do bɩr tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ paan••• y. Bala, mimbʋnyaa ta ʋ, an nɩ tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ. Mimbʋnyaa bɩ do minto bɛɛ mɔɔ ʋ, a yaa da y.
62005017	Zibəə bʋnyaa haay bɩ, mimbʋnyaa m. Bɩ, mimbʋnyaa haay bɛɛ nɩ tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ y.
62005018	Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa niŋŋə haay kʋ Woso a yɩ bɩ bɩr mimbʋnyaa bam dʋntɔ y. Bala, Woso Nyɩ b'ɩ dɔm ma, Bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩr heer bam ma y.
62005019	Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Woso gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m, bɩ durnya haay jilli ɩ Bʋnyaabarɛzaa wɔ ʋ.
62005020	Bɩ wɔɔ dɔ sɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Woso Nyɩ bʋr, an bɩ wɔɔ hɔɔn gu, k'ʋ Woso paan••• bɩ dɔ. Bɩ Woso paan••• Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista nɔ wɔɔ n ta ʋ. A m Woso paan•••, a m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ.
62005021	M nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, a b'a ka a wosobaawɔnnɔ wɔɔ da ʋ y.
63001001	Mɔɔ, Gʋaagusire, mɔɔ ɩ ci naa do nyɔɔ lʋ kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ bɩ ma kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ ŋ ŋʋam paan•••. Mɔɔ bɛɛ bala y, bɩ mɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ sɩra dɔ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ.
63001002	Sɩra ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, b'a nyɩntam kan wɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
63001003	Wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Yeezuu Krista, Woso Nyɩ bɩ kɩ barka nyɩntam kan wɔɔ kɩ, kan a cicirzɛrɛ kɩ, a laafɩɩ kɩ, sɩra kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
63001004	Mɔɔ heernyɔɔ gʋta yɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ nyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam sɩra zaa ra, amba lɛ kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
63001005	Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lʋ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ʋ kʋ ŋʋa. Mɔɔ bɩr lɛ daa gʋrsɩra barɛ ɩbɩɩ ma y, lɛ kʋ wɔɔ yɩ hallɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ m.
63001006	Ba ŋʋarɛ n na: k'ʋ ta a lɛrɔ wɔɔ zaa bɩ ra. Lɛ naa do awɔɔ nyɩnta a ma a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ, k'awɔɔ n ŋʋarɛ zaa bɩ sa.
63001007	Bala, braba gʋɔɔ m zannɔ a kərgu durnya ra. Ŋ bɩr kasɛtɩ karɛ ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu Krista a ba gʋaa y. Gʋaa k'a nɩ naa bam bɩ, ŋʋaarzaa m, Krista jɩm m.
63001008	K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka awɔɔ zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʋ bɩ n nyaam y, bɩ k'a ganwʋrɛ haay k'an ta ʋ yɩ.
63001009	Gʋaa haay k'a bɩr gɔɔtam Krista hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, an n'a hɔɔnhɔ zum la bɩ, a zaa ba kan Woso kɩ y. Gʋaa k'a gɔɔta a nɔ ʋ, a ɩ kan wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kɩ, a Nyɩ kɩ.
63001010	Kʋ gʋaa bʋr awɔɔ zi, b'a ba hɔdɩndarɛ naa do nɔ ʋ, a b'a si a har ʋ y, a b'a nyaasɩ ka y.
63001011	Bɩ gʋaa k'a nyaasɩ ka, a zɛ a ʋ kʋ ra kan kɩ a mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ.
63001012	Minno ta ʋ gʋta mɔɔ nɩ ŋ ci barɛ awɔɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m ŋ ba, ci m kan gar hi kɩ nɩ y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi, kʋ m bɩ meer ba, m lɛ m kan awɔɔ kɩ, kʋ wɔɔ heernyɔɔ n yɩ gʋta paan•••.
63001013	Ɩ danlʋ kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ sɔ bɩ nyɩnɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m.
64001001	Mɔɔ, Gʋaagusire, mɔɔ ɩ ci naa do nyɔɔ m ŋʋarɛzaa paan••• Gayus ma.
64001002	M gʋaasɩba mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ y'a yɛm Woso han k'ɩbɩɩ n bɩr mɩŋŋa hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, k'ɩbɩɩ laafɩɩ bɩ n bɩr mɩŋŋa, amba ɩ nyi hɔ bɩ m.
64001003	Mɔɔ heer yɩ nyɩnta gʋta, bala, danyɩnɔ bʋr naa ʋ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ mɩsɩrbaa kasɛtɩ karɛ, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ tam sɩra nɔ ʋ. Bɩ denter m, ɩbɩɩ ɩ tam sɩra nɔ ʋ.
64001004	Mɔɔ heernyɔɔ gʋta k'a lɛ da haay bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ma, ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ tam sɩra nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
64001005	M gʋaasɩba mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ hɔbaa mɩŋŋa kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, baa kan saanarɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ bɩ, sɩrakarɛ zibəə m.
64001006	Ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋabaa kasɛtɩ ka Krista gʋɔɔ taa. K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ŋ han amba Woso hɔɔnhɔ m, ŋ zaa sarɛ minto bɩ, a mɩŋŋa gʋta.
64001007	Krista tɔ minto y'a ka, ŋnɩ wuti, ŋn'ɩ tam, bɩ ŋ n hɔsɩ si gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Krista dɔ rɔ wɔɔ zi y.
64001008	Bɩ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ daahan ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ zi ba kan kʋ kɩ sɩra tɔ ma.
64001009	Mɔɔ ci ba Krista gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma. Bɩ, Diyotrefɛs k'a nɩ lɛɛzaabaa ŋʋam ŋ barla bɩ, a bɩr yɛm mɔɔ hɔ ma y.
64001010	Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ bʋr, mɔɔ bɔm hɔ niŋŋə k'a a ba mɔɔ m haay kan a meerbaa bʋnyaa kɩ bɩ m. Bɩ, a n a ba naa n a bɔ y. A lɛ baa k'a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ si sɔ y, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a ŋ si rɔ wɔɔ a y'a tarɛ ŋ nɩ tolle, an nɩ ŋ bɔm Krista gʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla.
64001011	M gʋaasɩba mɩŋŋa, ɩ bɩ gʋaa k'a bʋnyaa ba tar sa y, gʋaa k'a mɩŋŋa ba tar sa. Gʋaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa barɛ, Woso gʋaa m, gʋaa k'a n'a bʋnyaa barɛ, a n Woso yɩ y.
64001012	Kʋ Demetrus nɩ, gʋaa haay y'a kasɛtɩ mɩŋŋa karɛ. Sɩra mɩŋŋa y'a kasɛtɩ kam. Wɔɔ y'a kasɛtɩ kam, b'ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ, sɩra m.
64001013	Minno ta ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m ŋ ci ba ɩbɩɩ ma, bɩ mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m ŋ ba gʋrsɩrabarɛhɔ m kan gar hi kɩ nɩ y.
64001014	A ŋʋa mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m b'ɩ yɩ dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʋ, k'ʋ sʋʋra ba kan kʋ kɩ.
64001015	Kʋ laafɩɩ n bɩr kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ! Gʋaasɩbɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ yaa da gʋaasɩbɔɔ wɔɔ m, gʋaa biyəə m.
65001001	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Ziidi m nɩ ci bɩ bam, Yeezuu Krista zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, Zakkɩ dam m mɔɔ m sɔ. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ kʋ Zɩ Woso a ŋʋa, an awɔɔ bir k'a yɩ a gʋɔɔ, an nɩ dɔrɛ awɔɔ ma Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ.
65001002	Bɩ, kʋ Woso n a cicirzɛrɛ kan a laafɩɩ kɩ, a ŋʋarɛ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta.
65001003	M gʋaasɩbɔɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta kʋ m ci ba awɔɔ ma, kʋ m bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ da kʋ ʋ, ʋ n ta m bɩ mim dɩnda. Bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ dɩga a, pakra m kʋ m ci bɩ ba awɔɔ ma dɩɩtaa, kʋ m a yɛ a han k'a zoo ba sɩrakarɛ kʋ Woso a ka a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ gallɛm deem taan••• dɔmɩm haay minto bɩ tɔ ma.
65001004	Bala, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ a da wɔɔ zi, Woso barka lemim bɩ ŋ n'a nʋkʋm, k'a a da ma a mɩsɩrbaa ba a hɔɔnhɔ ma mimbʋnyaa barɛ nɔ ʋ, bɩsɩ ŋn'a kam Yeezuu Krista ma, an bɔkarɛ a mɩŋŋa y'a deem n soʋrezaa, a m wɔɔ Zuuba sɔ. Bɩ, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ ka an gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro dʋdɔyarlɛ kʋ ŋ n'a yɩm mim hɩ laatʋ.
65001005	Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam kʋ m a hɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ. Zuuba k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ Eziptɩ kʋ ʋ bɩ, a a ya an so ra an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n yɛ ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ.
65001006	Bɩ, malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ y'a bɩncɛrɔ to, ŋn'a zerga paŋŋa kʋ Woso a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ rɛ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Woso brɔɔ da baŋŋarɔ ʋ monsigə nɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay minto, k'a bɩ ŋ dʋdɔ ka dʋdɔkarɛ hinni gʋta b'ʋ.
65001007	Kʋ Sodɔm kan Gomɔɔr kɩ, kan kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ jɩr ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim nɩ, awɔɔ dɔ sɔ. Kʋrɔ nɔɔn duro a mɩŋŋɔɔ sa, ŋn'a ka dintim zibəəro wɔɔ ʋ sɔ, ŋn'ɩ jaandarɛ k'an bʋnyaa maam-maam bam. Naa tɔ ma m, Woso n ŋ dʋdɔ yar, ŋn'ɩ sɛ k'a lihire ba ʋ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋ fɩryɩrɛ bɩ, makra m sɔ, k'a gʋaa haay zɛ kəbə.
65001008	Kan naa kɩ haay, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a da wɔɔ zi rɔ wɔɔ, a ba ŋ nawʋrɛ am kʋrɔ nɔɔn duro hɔ bɩ m. A hɔɔn ŋ n'a dam mim daŋŋadɔɔ ma, bɩ n'a kam ŋn'ɩ jaan dam, ŋ bɩr yɛm Zuuba ma y, malɛɛkarɔ paŋŋazannɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ sʋnsɔ wʋm sɔ.
65001009	A n bɔkarɛ, Malɛɛkarɔ haay cir Misɛl mɩŋŋa, bʋr k'a ʋ, an nɩ bɩsɩ kam kan Sʋtaana kɩ Moyiisi gər sarɛ ma bɩ, a n yɛ an meerbaa bʋnyaa ba Sʋtaana ma y. A hɩ a ʋ bala, a ʋ: "Zuuba fɩr karɛ ɩ ma."
65001010	Bɩ, gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, hɔ kʋ ŋ n a dɔ bɩ ŋn'a sʋnsɔ wʋm. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan poohɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ba hɔɔndarɛ zore nɩ y, hɔ k'a bʋr ŋ heer ʋ bɩ n'a bam, hɔ bɩ do bɔkarɛ an nɩ nyaanlɛ ŋ nɩ.
65001011	Kʋsɩ ɩ kan ŋ kɩ, bala, zu ŋ y'a ʋ Kayɛn hɔbaa ʋ, zi bʋnyaa ŋn'a bam k'a busoo yɩ am Balam hɔ bɩ m. A mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋ n'a zarm, bala, ŋ y'a da a nyaa ma kan Woso kɩ, amba Kooree a ba bɩ m.
65001012	B'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʋ ma k'a hɔ bɩ danyɩbaa zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋ y'awɔɔ barla nyannɩ m, nyannɩ ba ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ kan hɔ bɩ bɩ maam-maam kɩ y, a hɔɔn ŋn'a darɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma bala. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ, kan warkʋ kʋ hɩnhɛr n'a gaam, bɩ la bɩ bam bɩ kɩ. Ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ sɔ kan gɔ k'a bɩr nyɩ darɛ y, baa a nyɩdarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gɔrɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ wʋnwʋr ŋnɩ gɩnga fɩɩgaa rɔ kɩ.
65001013	Amba higʋta kurəro tɩr a fur bɔ a rɛ bɩ, a nyannɩ zibəəro wɔɔ kərgu ŋ nawʋm lɛɛ ra maam sɔ. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan monyaarɔ kʋ ŋ n a tajɩ dɔ rɔ kɩ, Woso n ŋ to kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta monsigə gʋta maam-maam nɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay.
65001014	Adam yaŋŋa tɔɔlɛma saanhɩnazaa Enɔk lɛɛ ka an gʋɔɔ nɔɔm mim hɩ laatʋ hɔɔ, Woso lɛsinnɩsora meerbaa nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A ba n nɩ, Zuuba ɩ zɛm kan malɛɛkarɔ kɩ miliyɔn bam hɔka,
65001015	k'a bɩ durnya jilli dʋdɔ ka. A gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Woso dɔ rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm, ŋ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba haay bɩsɩ ka Woso ma nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma. A yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarm sɔ meerbaarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ bawosodɔrɛzannɔ nɔɔm ŋ ba Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma."
65001016	Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɔ bɩr nyɔɔm fɩɩga y, kukur ŋn'a bam can, a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba ŋ nawʋm a lɛtaamarɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ bala. Mɩŋŋabusure meerbaarɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ bam, ŋn'ɩ bra bɩmbam gʋɔɔ m k'a hɔ yɩ.
65001017	B'awɔɔ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a meerbaarɔ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ ŋ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
65001018	Ŋ y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "Dɔmɩm jɛzannɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr yaa wʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩsɩrbaa bam a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ nɔ ʋ, bawosodɔrɛ nɔ ʋ."
65001019	Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro nɩ zɛm gʋngʋrɛrɔ m bɩ, durnya hɔɔndarɛrɔ y'a so ŋ ʋ, ŋ ba Woso Ɛspri nɩ y.
65001020	B'awɔɔ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee••• a sɩrakarɛ k'an mɩŋŋa an cem bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'a bɩr yaa dam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ.
65001021	K'a gɔɔta Woso ŋʋarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, a bɩr dɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista ma, an nɩ zɛm bɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ, a cicirzɛrɛ nɔ ʋ.
65001022	K'a bɩr gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩnsɩm kam nɔ wɔɔ cicir zɛm.
65001023	K'a ŋ yɔ sɛ zaa ra, a ŋ bʋmbɔ. Gɔsɩnnɔ n ta ʋ, k'a brɔɔ cicir zɛ, bɩ k'a dundo a zi kʋ ŋ b'awɔɔ da a kʋrɔmarɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y. K'a sɔ ŋ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ m, bala, kʋ mimbʋnyaabənno nɩ ŋ mɩ bɩ, ŋ dintim ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma.
65001024	Bɩ kʋ Woso k'an deem an nɩ wɔɔ yɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma bɩ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ. A a da ma, an a ka awɔɔ b'a dore y, an a ka sɔ, awɔɔ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ, bɩ, kʋrɔma sɩ ba awɔɔ ma y, heernyɔɔ gʋta nɔ ʋ, a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ k'a tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, kan gʋtabaa kɩ, paŋŋa kɩ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʋ. Biisi tee•••, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʋ. Amina.
66001001	Yeezuu Krista bɩ, Woso y'a ka ʋ, k'an hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ dɩɩtaa bɩ hɩnka a zibəənyɩnɔ m. A malɛɛka a nyɔɔ k'an b'a hɩ a zibəənyɩ Zaan m.
66001002	A n nɩ Woso lemim bɩ hɩrɛ, an Yeezuu Krista kasɛtɩ ka kan hɔ haay k'a a yɩ bɩ kɩ.
66001003	Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ karɩnda bam, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zum hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba b'ʋ. Bala, wakatɩ b'a zɔ.
66001004	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan m nɩ gʋrsɩra naa do bam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Azii kʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma: K'a barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ yɩ, gʋaa k'an ta ʋ, an nyɩnta ʋ, an nɩ zɛm bɩ zi, kan ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ n a duu jɩr ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ zi,
66001005	kan Yeezuu Krista, kasɛtɩzaa paan•••, k'a lɛɛ ka an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, a m durnya cinno wɔɔ cir bɩ kɩ zi. Bɔ nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sʋrgɔ a ma m,
66001006	an a ka, wɔɔ n ʋ ba a cirbəə mannɩbənno a Zɩ Woso zibəə minto. A y'a ga lɛbɔʋrɛ m kan paŋŋa kɩ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ. Amina!
66001007	Ba n nɩ, a ɩ zɛm warkʋ nɔ ʋ, bɩ gʋaa haay y'a yɩm, baa gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ rɔ wɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ. Tara burə gʋɔɔ heerzarlɛ nyi karɛ a minto. Ɩɩn•••, k'an yɩ maam!
66001008	Zuuba Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa. Mɔɔ n ta ʋ, m nyɩnta ʋ, m n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, hɔ haay Zuuba.
66001009	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan, awɔɔ danyɩ awɔɔ zukuuzaa, fɩryɩrɛ, cirbəə kan tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ Yeezuu zuure nɔ ʋ, nyɩnta mɔɔ ʋ, m nɩ tara deem kʋ hi bɩr ma, n n'a hɩm ma Patmɔs ʋ, Woso lemim kan Krista kasɛtɩ karɛ kɩ minto.
66001010	Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer mɔɔ ra Zuuba dɔmɩm deem hinni ʋ, mɔɔ n leer paŋŋazaa ma m jɛ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, huure n n'a hɛm, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
66001011	Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a yɩm bɩ gʋrsɩra ba ci ʋ, ɩ nyɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ ma: Efɛɛzɩ ʋ, Simɩrnɩ ʋ, Pɛrgam ʋ, Tɩyatɩɩr ʋ, Sardɩ ʋ, Filadɛlfii ʋ, kan Lawodisee kɩ ʋ.
66001012	Mɔɔ n bɔ kʋ m dɩga gʋaa k'a nɩ meer bam kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ ma. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ m wusigə bɩ, mɔɔ sarma fɩtɩrɛrɔ yɩ saanhɩna.
66001013	Fɩtɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ gʋaa yɩ, an bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, Gʋaanyɩ m, an huu jintə da a ra, an sarma hɔsoaʋ so a cɩ ʋ.
66001014	A mim bɩ kan a minkə bɩ kɩ nyɩnta fu fɩtɩtɩ ɩ ʋ, ser ka m, gɛɛ lajaa m, a mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ yɩrɛ ʋ, sɛwurə m.
66001015	A gannɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan zaan kʋ n y'a sʋr, an nɩ yɔm bɩ kɩ. A leer nɩ yɩrɛ ʋ hiro gʋtɔɔ susur m,
66001016	an nɩ monyaa saanhɩna m a bɩsɩ ʋ. Kargʋ lɛ hɩɩya nɩ bɔrɛ a lɛ ʋ. A meer nɩ yɔrɛ ɩ ʋ, woso nɩ gum kan paŋŋa kɩ.
66001017	Kʋ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, mɔɔ m do a taa ɩ ʋ ga mɔɔ ʋ. A n a bɩsɩ wɔ ka mɔɔ ra, an a hɩ, a ʋ: Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa,
66001018	mɔɔ n mɩsɩr. Mɔɔ nyɩnta, m ga, bɩ ba n nɩ, mɔɔ mɩsɩr dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ ɩ zɛ cɛlɛnyɩnɔ m kan gəənokʋ hɔɔ kɩ.
66001019	Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ gʋrsɩra ba, kan hɔ kan ta ʋ kɩ, kan hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr bɩ kɩ.
66001020	Ba monyaa saanhɩnarɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ yɩ mɔɔ bɩsɩ wɔ ʋ kan sarma fɩtɩrɛrɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ kɩ jɩ n na: Monyaa saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ malɛɛkarɔ m. Fɩtɩrɛrɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m.
66002001	Gʋrsɩra ba Efɛɛzɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Gʋaa k'an ta monyaa saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m a bɩsɩ ʋ, an nɩ tam sarma fɩtɩrɛ saanhɩnarɔ bire ʋ,
66002002	bɩ y'a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ kɔrɛ kan ɩ tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ dɔ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr yɛm gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ ma y. Ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ a ma kristazibəəzannɔ, bɩ kristazibəəzannɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ ka lɛɛ. Ɩbɩɩ bɩ ŋ dɔ ŋʋaarzannɔ.
66002003	Tʋntɔʋrɛ ta ɩbɩɩ ʋ: ɩbɩɩ fɩr yɩ mɔɔ tɔ ma, b'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ bɔ ɩ jɛ nɩ y.
66002004	Bɩ mim kʋ mɔɔ n ta m kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ wɔ saa ɩ lɛɛkarɛ ŋʋarɛ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ ma.
66002005	Bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta ʋ, ɩ ɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ. Ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam k'ɩ biisi zibəəro wɔɔ bɔɔta. Kʋ n bɛɛ nɩ, mɔɔ zɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ bɔ ɩ taam, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ fɩtɩrɛ bɩ sarɛ a bɩncɛ ʋ.
66002006	Hɔ niŋŋə k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m bɩ, ɩbɩɩ nyi sɔ Nikola gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zibəəro m, amba mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
66002007	Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma. Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa gɔ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ nyɩ kaŋ ʋ an a bɩ.
66002008	Gʋrsɩra ba Simɩrnɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: A m lɛɛkarɛzaa, a m jɛzaa. A nyɩnta an ga, an a bɔ an bʋr mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, bɩ n nɩ meer naa do barɛ:
66002009	Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ fɩryɩrɛ dɔ kan ɩ ŋʋa kɩ. Bɩ arzakazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ n'a mɩ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔzarlɛ zibəə kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m bɩ dɔ, Sʋtaana sokʋmacɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ.
66002010	Ɩ bɩ nyi ba hɔ k'a n'a kam k'ɩ fɩr yɩ bɩ ma y. Sʋtaana y'ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ dum lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, k'a a gɩnga awɔɔ ma, b'awɔɔ fɩr yɩm dɔmɩm bu. Jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ k'an ta an ɩ zɛ ku. Mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa firgə karɛ ɩ ʋ.
66002011	Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma. Damazaa bɩ bɩ fɩr yɩm zɛ hɩɩya hɔ ma fɩɩga y.
66002012	Gʋrsɩra ba Pɛrgam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: A n nɩ kargʋ lɛ hɩɩyazaa m bɩ nɩ meer naa do barɛ:
66002013	Mɔɔ bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n ta ʋ bɩ dɔ. Sʋtaana cirbəəduu bɩncɛ m. Ɩbɩɩ gɔɔta ɩ nɩ nyasʋm mɔɔ tɔ m, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ to y, baa dɔmɩm niŋŋə kʋ ŋ mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa paan••• Antipas zɛ ʋ gər awɔɔ zi bɩncɛ kʋ Sʋtaana n ta ʋ b'ʋ.
66002014	Bɩ mɔɔ ɩ mim m kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ yɛ Balam mim ma. A ɩ dʋndɔrɛ bʋnyaa ka Balak ʋ k'an Israyɛl nyɩnɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta kʋ ŋ nɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩ sim sʋ kan jaandarɛ do haay kɩ.
66002015	Ɩbɩɩ zi sɔ bɩ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʋ, ŋnɩ yɛ Nikola gʋɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ ma.
66002016	Bɩ minto bɩ, ɩ bɔ ɩ taam, kʋ n bɛɛ mɔɔ zɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi dɩɩtaa, m bɩ yar ba kan ŋ kɩ, m lɛ kargʋ bɩ m.
66002017	Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma. Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ mann k'a nyaakʋm da kaŋ ʋ, m jaa fu kʋ n tɔdaa gʋrsɩra ba ma bɩ ka ʋ. Gɔsɩ n tɔ bɩ do dɔ kʋ gʋaa k'a a si bɩ bɛɛ y.
66002018	Gʋrsɩra ba Tɩyatɩɩr kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Woso Nyɩ k'a mɩnyaarɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛwurə kɩ, a gannɔ m bɔ kʋ ʋ kan zaantɔzaa kɩ bɩ nɩ meer naa do barɛ:
66002019	Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro, ɩbɩɩ ŋʋarɛ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ, ɩ zibəə kan ɩ tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ dɔ. Ɩ zibəəro k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ba jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ da biisi hɔɔ wɔɔ ra.
66002020	Bɩ, mɔɔ heer bɩ nyɩnta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ y. Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ yɛ Zezabɛl ma. Lʋ naa do n'a hɩrɛ a ma wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa, an nɩ mɔɔ zibəənyɩnɔ nyʋnnyɔɔm, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ jaan da, kʋ ŋ nɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩ sim sʋ.
66002021	Mɔɔ toore ka ʋ k'an a bɔ a taam, b'a lɛ baa k'a a bɔ taam a jaandarɛ nɔ ʋ y.
66002022	Dɩga! Mɔɔ y'a karɛ an wʋta yaaba m, an fɩr yɩ, a muno jaandənno wɔɔ maam sɔ, kʋ ŋ n a bɔ a taam a zibəəro wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y.
66002023	Mɔɔ y'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛm. Bɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ haay y'a dɔrɛ ŋ ʋ: mɔɔ m gʋaa k'a gʋaa haay lɛtaama dɔ kan a heer kɩ. Bɩ mɔɔ y'awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə hɔ kaŋ ʋ, an a ga kʋ ʋ kan a zaa zibəə kɩ.
66002024	B'awɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'a nɩ Tɩyatɩɩr ʋ, a gɔɔta a n yɛ hɔdɩndarɛ naa do ma bɩ, awɔɔ n yɛ hɔ kʋ n'a hɩm ma Sʋtaana minno kʋ ŋ y'a nyaakʋm da rɔ wɔɔ ma y, awɔɔ n a ka ma k'a ŋ dɔ y. Maam bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m mɔr gorezaa ka awɔɔ m la y.
66002025	Bɩ, k'a nyasʋ hɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ m bala kɔɔkɔɔ, k'an ta an mɔɔ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ku.
66002026	Damazaa bɩ, gʋaa k'a nyasʋ mɔɔ zibəə bɩ m an ta an a nyarɛ ku, mɔɔ paŋŋa kʋ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ m Zɩ zi bɩ kaŋ ʋ: Mɔɔ y'a karɛ an a so do gʋta ʋ, a y'a sore ŋ ʋ kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ, a yɩ ŋ zɔrɛ amba nɩ gedro zɔm bɩ m. Mɔɔ dɔmɩrɛ monyaa kaŋ ʋ.
66002029	Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
66003001	Gʋrsɩra ba Sardɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ m kan monyaa saanhɩnarɔ kɩ bɩ nɩ meer naa do barɛ: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro dɔ, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ ŋ ʋ, ɩ mɩsɩr, bala gər n'ɩ mɩ.
66003002	Ɩ tɔ ʋ, ɩ b'a ka an gɔɔta an n'a ŋʋam k'a ga bɩ n a nyambʋr y, a mɩm bɔ ʋ. Bala, mɔɔ yɩ, ɩbɩɩ zibəə bɩ mɩŋŋabaa bɩ gʋta mɔɔ Woso mɩm ʋ y.
66003003	Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ, ɩ ma sɔ bɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ. Nyasʋ m k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam. K'ɩbɩɩ n dundo ɩ zi, mɔɔ zɛrɛ am koor hɔ bɩ m. B'ɩbɩɩ bɩ wakatɩ kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ daata zɛ ɩbɩɩ ra bɩ dɔrɛ y.
66003004	Bɩ kan bɩ kɩ, ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ Sardɩ ʋ, ŋ n dintim ka a huuro ma y. Ŋ zum kʋ ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ, huu furo n a ma, bala, ŋ y'a ga m.
66003005	Damazaa bɩ, huu fu dure a ma ncɩnaaʋ, mɔɔ b'a tɔ bɔm mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ y. Mɔɔ y'a kasɛtɩ kam m Zɩ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ taa, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ gʋaa m.
66003006	Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
66003007	Gʋrsɩra ba Filadɛlfii kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Gʋaa mɩŋŋa, sɩrazaa bɩ, k'a nɩ Davɩd cɛlɛnyɩ m, an a gʋm bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma a n a ta y, an n'a tam bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a gʋ y bɩ nɩ meer barɛ, a ʋ:
66003008	Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro dɔ: Ba n nɩ, mɔɔ cɛlɛ gʋ, ɩ lɛɛ, bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a ta y. Ɩbɩɩ paŋŋa bɩ bɩ gʋta y, bɩ kan bɩ kɩ, ɩbɩɩ gɔɔta ɩ zu mɔɔ lemim ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ tɔ ma y.
66003009	Sʋtaana sokʋmacɛ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋʋaar ŋn'a barɛ, zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ n ŋ mɩ y. Mɔɔ y'a karɛ, ŋnɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ kukurə zɛ ɩbɩɩ taa, bɩ ŋn'a dɔm ma ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa.
66003010	Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ zum mɔɔ lemim ʋ kan tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ, mɔɔ dɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma sɔ fɩryɩrɛ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr durnya jilli nɔ ʋ k'a bɩ durnyazannɔ makra ba bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ.
66003011	Mɔɔ zɛm zɔɔ, nyasʋ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ta m bɩ m kɔɔkɔɔ, kʋ gɔsɩ b'ɩbɩɩ firgə bɩ yɔ ɩ nɩ y.
66003012	Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ y'a bam mɔɔ Zɩ Wosocɛ bɩ sagɔ, a bɩ bɔm dɔ fɩɩga y. Bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m Woso tɔ gʋrsɩra bam ma, kan mɔɔ Woso kʋ tɔ kɩ, Zerizalɛm daa k'a a to brama mɔɔ Woso zi an nɩ zerm bɩ kɩ, kan mɔɔ tɔ daa bɩ kɩ.
66003013	Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
66003014	Gʋrsɩra ba Lawodisee kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Ba hɔ kʋ Amina, kasɛtɩzaa paan•••, sɩrazaa, an a zɛ kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ hɔ haay darɛ sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ n'a hɩm na:
66003015	Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro dɔ. Ɩbɩɩ bɩ nyɔɔrɛ, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩ kaarɛ y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ ʋ k'ɩbɩɩ n bɩr nyɔɔrɛ gɛɛ kaarɛ.
66003016	Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n zaarɔɔ, ɩbɩɩ bɩ nyɔɔrɛ, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩ kaarɛ bɩ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ bɔrɛ m lɛ.
66003017	Bala, ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ: Hɔnyɩzaa n'ɩ mɩ, mɔɔ m ba hɔnyɩzaa, mɔɔ bɩr m kam hɔsɩ ma dɔ y, bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ ɩ ʋ, ɩ ɩ fɩr nɔ ʋ, cicir nɔ ʋ, ɩ m ŋʋazaa, ɩ m bʋʋ, ɩ m dɩgɩ bɩ.
66003018	Ɩbɩɩ dʋndɔ mɔɔ nawʋm k'ɩ sarma kʋ ŋ y'a sʋr bɩ si mɔɔ zi k'ɩ ba hɔnyɩzaa, k'ɩ huuro furo si, k'ɩ du ɩ ma, k'ɩ nyannɩ nyaakʋm da m. Ɩ hɔ si ɩ tɔ ɩ mɩm la k'ɩ ɩ da ma ɩ lɛɛ yɩ.
66003019	Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋa rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ nɩ ŋ bɔm zaa ʋ, m nɩ ŋ hʋnhʋrm. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ɩ tɔ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam!
66003020	Ba mɔɔ jɩm cɛlɛ ma, m n'a zɛm na. Kʋ gʋaa mɔɔ leer ma, an cɛ bɩ lɛ gʋ, mɔɔ gasʋm zi. M hɔ bɩ kan kɩ, an a bɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
66003021	Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ y'a karɛ, an nyɩnta kan mɔɔ kɩ, m cirbəəduu ra, amba mɔɔ m da ma sɔ, m ta m aa nyɩnta kan m Zɩ kɩ a cirbəəduu ra bɩ m.
66003022	Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
66004001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ m ya m a yɩ cɛlɛ n a gʋ brama, bɩ leer kʋ mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a ma, an meer ba kan mɔɔ kɩ an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan huure leer kɩ b'a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Der naa ʋ, kʋ m hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ bɩ hɩnka ɩ m.
66004002	Lɛɛm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer mɔɔ ra. Bɩ, mɔɔ duu yɩ brama b'ʋ, gʋaa nɩ nyɩntam la.
66004003	Gʋaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam la bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan jaa kʋ n n'a birm zaspɩ, n n'a birm sardʋannɩ bɩ kɩ. Bramahɔwosɩʋrɛ k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ kan jaa kʋ n n'a birm emerodɩ bɩ n bɩr duu bɩ ma.
66004004	Duuro buhɩra a yaa si ɩ bɩr duu bɩ ma, bɩ duuro wɔɔ duro burə ʋ, gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si ɩ nyɩnta ŋ la, ŋnɩ huuro furo du a ma, sarma firgəro nɩ ŋ mim ma.
66004005	Brama nyakɩ nɩ bɔm duu bɩ nɔ ʋ kan leerlo kɩ, kan bramahəənsire kɩ. Fɩtɩrɛ saanhɩnarɔ nɩ cirbəəduu bɩ jɩr ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yɔm kan paŋŋa kɩ, brɔɔ m Woso ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ.
66004006	Duu bɩ lɛɛ bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, higʋta hi k'a nɩ yɔm pɛkʋ-pɛkʋ am kristal hɔ bɩ m bɩ m. Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ si ɩ bɩr duu bɩ ma. Ŋ nɩ mɩnyaarɔ m a mɛ ma jilli lɛɛ kan jɛ kɩ.
66004007	Lɛɛkarɛ hɔmɩsɩr bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan poozaa kɩ. A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan ŋʋaapoo kɩ. A kaakʋ hɔ bɩ meer ɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa hɔ kɩ. A si hɔ bɩ bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan caa gʋta k'a wer bɩ kɩ.
66004008	Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ za sɔrdɩ-sɔrdɩ, mɩnyaarɔ n bɩr ŋ ma jilli, kan ŋ nɔ ʋ kɩ. Sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, a hɩ nawʋm ncɩnaaʋ bɩ ŋ bɩr a tore y, ŋ ʋ: "Mɩŋŋa, Mɩŋŋa, Mɩŋŋa, Zuuba, Woso paŋŋa k'a jirə ba ʋ, a ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, an ta ʋ, an nɩ zɛm bɩ."
66004009	Bɩ kʋ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ bʋr ŋn'ɩ laa lɔm ŋn'a lɛ bɔm bɔ nɩ nyɩntam duu bɩ ra an mɩsɩr dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam nɩ barka,
66004010	gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si rɔ wɔɔ ɩ kukurə zɛrɛ bɔ nɩ nyɩntam duu burə ʋ an mɩsɩr dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ taa, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ, ŋn'a firgəro wɔɔ zom duu bɩ lɛɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ:
66004011	"Zuuba wɔɔ Woso, ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga lɛbɔʋrɛ, daʋrɛ kan paŋŋa kɩ m. Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ haay da: ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ ŋʋa, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr ta ʋ, bɩ y'a ka, ɩ ŋ da."
66005001	Mɔɔ ci yɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam duu bɩ ra bɩ bɩsɩ wɔ ʋ, n n a gʋrsɩra ba a nɔ ʋ kan a burə kɩ, n n a kʋsɩ kʋsɩrɛ saanhɩna m.
66005002	Mɔɔ malɛɛka paŋŋazaa yɩ, an n'a hɩm kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: Nka y'a ga m, an ci bɩ gʋ, an a kʋsɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ cincer?
66005003	Bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ brama gɛɛ, tara burə ʋ gɛɛ, tara noom ʋ, an n'a dam ma, an ci bɩ gʋ, gɛɛ an dɩga a y.
66005004	Bɩ, mɔɔ heer a zar kʋ n n gʋaa yɩ an a ga m an ci bɩ gʋ, gɛɛ, an dɩga a bɩ tɔ ma.
66005005	Gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ gʋaa deem n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Ɩ b'ɩ heer zar y. Ba n nɩ, Ziida do poozaa k'an Davɩd yaŋŋa bɩ, k'a yɩ damazaa bɩ, an nɩ ci bɩ gʋm kan a kʋsɩrɛrɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
66005006	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ sinnyɛɛm yɩ an jɩm, ɩ ʋ, a zɛ n y'a ʋ, duu bɩ bire ʋ, hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ m bɩr ma. A mɩnnɔ saanhɩna kan a mɩnyaarɔ kɩ saanhɩna, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n Woso ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ k'a ŋ nyɔɔ tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
66005007	A a zɔ k'a ci bɩ si bɔ nɩ nyɩntam duu bɩ burə ʋ bɩ bɩsɩ wɔ ʋ.
66005008	K'a ci bɩ si bɩ, hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ si rɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra yaa si rɔ wɔɔ kɩ kukurə zɛ sinnyɛɛm bɩ taa. Gʋaa biyəə nɩ kɔnnɩ m kan sarma laagarɔ kɩ, tidəər nyisi nɩ ŋ hɩnhan. Wosogʋɔɔ yaadarɛ m.
66005009	Ŋ nɩ laa daa lɔrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ ga m ɩ ci bɩ si, ɩ kʋsɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ cincer, bala, n y'ɩbɩɩ zɛ ɩbɩɩ n gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔ do haay nɔ ʋ, lemim biyəə nɔ ʋ, kʋrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ, tara y'a hʋnhɔ ɩ ma bɩ m, ɩ ŋ ka Woso ʋ.
66005010	Ɩbɩɩ ŋ ba cinno, mannɩbənno wɔɔ Woso minto, bɩ ŋ cirbəə bɩm tara burə ʋ."
66005011	Mɔɔ dɩga, m malɛɛkarɔ cir leer ma, ŋ lɛ tisi-tisi kan tisi-tisi k'a lɛ ba ʋ y, ŋnɩ bɩr duu bɩ ma kan hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ.
66005012	Ŋ n a leer busu kan paŋŋa kɩ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Sinnyɛɛm kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ b'a ga m an paŋŋa yɩ kan arzaka kɩ, mindɔrɛ kɩ, kan dama kɩ, daʋrɛ kɩ, cirbəə kɩ, lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ."
66005013	Hɔɔdarɛ haay k'a nɩ brama, an nɩ tara burə ʋ, tara noom ʋ kan hi burə kɩ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ ma ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ nɩ duu burə ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ m lɛbɔʋrɛ, daʋrɛ, cirbəə kan paŋŋa kɩ yɩ dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ."
66005014	Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Amina!" Gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ n kukurə zɛ, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ.
66006001	Kʋ sinnyɛɛm bɩ lɛɛkarɛ kʋsɩrɛ bɩ hʋr saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ bar la bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ, m a ma hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ həən si bramahəənsire m, a ʋ: "Bʋr!"
66006002	Bɩ, mɔɔ sisi fu yɩ. Gʋaa k'a da ʋ bɩ n sa nyasʋ a wɔ ʋ. N n cirbəə firgə ka ʋ, an ta k'a yaa yar ba, a ɩ dama m, b'a dama yɩm.
66006003	K'a kʋsɩrɛ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ ma hɔmɩsɩr hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n həən si, a ʋ: "Bʋr!"
66006004	Sisi vanta n a hɩnka piin•••: N lɛ ka gʋaa k'a da ʋ b'ʋ k'an laafɩɩ bɔ durnya ʋ kʋ gʋɔɔ n bɩr kʋ zɩnzɛm, n kargʋ jintə ka ʋ sɔ.
66006005	K'a kʋsɩrɛ kaakʋ hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ ma, hɔmɩsɩr kaakʋ hɔ bɩ həən si, a ʋ: "Bʋr!" Bɩ, mɔɔ sisi kundə yɩ. Gʋaa k'a da ʋ bɩ nɩ hɔ kʋ n nɩ mɔr gore makra bam nɩ bɩ n'a wɔ ʋ.
66006006	Bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə ma an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan leer kɩ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ bire ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Yɩryaa makra ba deem, hindeem zibəə busoo ma, naanyaa makra kaakʋ, hindeem zibəə busoo ma. K'a gɔɔta nyɔɔ bɩ ma kan dɩvɛn bɩ kɩ, ɩ b'ɩ wɔ da ma y."
66006007	K'a kʋsɩrɛ si hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ ma hɔmɩsɩr si hɔ bɩ m həən si, a ʋ: "Bʋr!"
66006008	Bɩ, mɔɔ sisi vɔnnɩmɛzaa yɩ. Gʋaa k'a da ʋ bɩ bir n nawʋm "zɛ" gəənokʋ n zu a jɛ ʋ. Ŋ paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a so tara burə zɛkumbir si kər bɩ deem ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛ kargʋ m, nɔ m, yaaba bʋnyaa m kan poohɔɔ kɩ m.
66006009	K'a kʋsɩrɛ soor hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ Woso lemim kan kasɛtɩ kʋ ŋ y'a ka bɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ nyiro yɩ, mannɩduu bɩ lɛtaa.
66006010	Ŋ n'ɩ zee dam kan paŋŋa kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba mɩŋŋa, sɩrazaa, ɩbɩɩ maasɩrɛ barɛ an ta an dɔmɩm kara ku k'ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ dʋdɔ ka, ɩ wɔɔ ma bɩ zɩm bɔ durnyazannɔ ma?"
66006011	N n huu fu ka ŋ gʋaa biyəə ʋ, n n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a ya, ŋnɩ bʋr a ma poore, k'an ta, an ŋ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ kan ŋ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ lɛzerle dɔmɩm ku.
66006012	Bɩ, k'a kʋsɩrɛ sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ taranyiŋŋəre gʋta yɩ. Woso n a ba kundə ɩ ʋ pɛɛra kʋ n y'a ba hɔmɩsɩr ka kundə m, mom bɩ jilli n a ba ɩ ʋ ma m.
66006013	Monyaarɔ n sur tara ʋ, ɩ ʋ, hɩnhɛr gandaara ɩ sɔɔn jɩngɩr sur.
66006014	Brama n a gʋr ɩ ʋ, wʋtaa n y'a gʋr. Ciro haay kan tararɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hi bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ n'a gaa a bɩncɛrɔ ʋ.
66006015	Tara burə cinno, gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ, yarbənno cinno, arzakazannɔ kan paŋŋazannɔ kɩ, lɔnnɔ kan soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ kɩ, ŋ haay, a nyaakʋm dɩnda ciyaarɔ kan cigəəziro kɩ ʋ.
66006016	Ŋ n a hɩ ciro kan jaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'a dɩnda wɔɔ ra, k'a wɔɔ nyaakʋm da laatʋ gʋaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam cirbəəduu burə ʋ bɩ meer ma, kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ nɔmaa kɩ.
66006017	Bala, ŋ nɔmaa dɔmɩm gʋta ɩ bʋr, nka n n'a dam ma an bɔlɛ nɩ?"
66007001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛkarɔ yɩ si, ŋnɩ jɩm tara gʋrga si bɩ nɔ ʋ. Ŋ nɩ tara burə hɩnhɛr si bɩ nyasʋ, kʋ hɩnhɛr sɩ b'a da ma an hɔn tara burə ʋ, higʋta burə ʋ, gɛɛ gɔ deem taan••• burə ʋ y.
66007002	Mɔɔ malɛɛka vanta yɩ, an a to dɔgʋr ʋ, an Woso mɩsɩr bɩ hɔ makra sa a wɔ ʋ. A n a leer busu gʋta an a hɩ malɛɛkarɔ siro kʋ ŋ nɩ paŋŋa m, ŋn'a dam ma, ŋn'a bʋnyaa ba tara kan higʋta kɩ m nɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ:
66007003	"A bɩ hɔsɩ ba tara m kan higʋta kɩ, gɔrɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, kʋ wɔɔ n makra da wɔɔ Woso zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ tusə ʋ y."
66007004	Bɩ, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso makra bɩ yɩ a tusə ma rɔ wɔɔ lɛ ma: Ŋ tisi-tisi zɔrɔ busi yaa si, ŋnɩ makra bɩ yɩ, Israyɛl nyɩnɔ paryaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ nɔ ʋ.
66007005	Ziida paryaa ma, gʋaa tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya, ŋ makra bɩ nɔ ŋ tusə ma. Rubɛn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Gaad paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya;
66007006	Asɛɛr paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Nɛftalii paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Manase paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya;
66007007	Sɩmɩnyɔn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Levii paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Isakaar paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya;
66007008	Zabɩlɔn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Zozɛf paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Bɛnzamɛn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya, ŋnɩ makra bɩ m a tusə ma.
66007009	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ cir gʋta yɩ, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an ŋ lɛ sa y. Tara y'a hʋnhɔ, do y'a hʋnhɔ, kʋrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ, lemim y'a hʋnhɔ gʋɔɔ m. Ŋ n jɩm brama cirbəəduu bɩ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ taa, ŋnɩ zaba huuro du a ma, ŋn'ɩ bɛ lɛɛrɔ m a wɔ ʋ.
66007010	Ŋ n a leer busu brama, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ, a to a ʋ wɔɔ Woso k'a nɩ nyɩntam cirbəəduu ra kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ zi!"
66007011	Malɛɛkarɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra ŋnɩ bɩr cirbəəduu bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ, hɔmɩsɩr siro wɔɔ kɩ kukurə zɛ ŋn'a meer ku tara ma duu bɩ lɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ Woso daŋ ʋ.
66007012	Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Amina! Wɔɔ Woso n daʋrɛ yɩ kan lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ, mindɔrɛ, barka yaa, cirbəə kan paŋŋa kɩ yɩ dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ. Amina!"
66007013	Gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ gʋaa deem meerbaa sa, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro kʋ ŋ zaba furo du a ma rɔ wɔɔ, nkɔɔ nɩ? A to ŋ y'a ʋ ka?
66007014	Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, mɔɔ ʋ: Mɔɔ Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ y'a dɔ! A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ fɩr gʋta bɩ nɔ ʋ. A huuro wɔɔ sʋrgɔ ŋ y'a ʋ, sinnyɛɛm ma bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋ fu n bɔ.
66007015	Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm Woso cirbəəduu bɩ lɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ daʋrɛ zi bam sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ a cɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Bɩ, bɔ nɩ nyɩntam a cirbəəduu bɩ ra bɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma.
66007016	Nɔ bɩ ŋ zɛm dɔ, mɩsɩ bɩ ŋ nyasʋm dɔ y, wosogure kan sɩnsɛɛm kɩ bɩ narɛ ŋ ma dɔ y.
66007017	Bala, sinnyɛɛm k'a nɩ jɩnɩm cirbəəduu bɩ burə ʋ bɩ n nɩ yɩrɛ ŋ dundor. A karɛ ŋ lɛɛ, an ta ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa himinyaarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ. Bɩ Woso yɩ ŋ nyifeer do haay gʋngʋm ma.
66008001	Kʋ sinnyɛɛm bɩ kʋsɩrɛ saanhɩna hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, lɛɛ zɛ sɩɩ••• brama ʋ, an ta, an miniti bukərku ku.
66008002	Bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso taa rɔ wɔɔ yɩ. Ŋ n huurero gʋtɔɔ ka ŋ ʋ saanhɩna.
66008003	Malɛɛka vanta n bʋr an bɩ jɩm mannɩjaa bɩ lɛ ʋ. A n tidəər nyisi laaga kʋ n y'a ba sarma m bɩ sa a wɔ ʋ, n n tidəərlo ka ʋ gʋta k'an a zɛ kʋ ra kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay yaadarɛrɔ kɩ k'a nɩ ŋ ka Woso ʋ sarma mannɩjaa k'a nɩ cirbəəduu bɩ lɛ ʋ bɩ burə ʋ.
66008004	Tidəər siŋŋə bɩ n a to malɛɛka bɩ wɔ ʋ kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ yaa darɛ kɩ, an der an ta Woso taa.
66008005	Malɛɛka bɩ n tidəər nyisi mɔr bɩ sa, an mannɩduu bɩ sɛ sa an a da ʋ, an a han, an a zo tara burə ʋ. Bramahəənsirero, leerlo kɩ, brama nyakɩ kan taranyiŋŋəre kɩ nyɩnta ʋ.
66008006	Malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ huurero saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, ŋ y'a banka ka ŋ hɛ.
66008007	Lɛɛkarɛzaa b'a huure bɩ hɛ: Lajaa kan sɛ kɩ an a war kʋ ma kan ma kɩ sur tara burə ʋ. Sɛ n tara burə zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem sa kan tara burə zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem gɔrɔ kɩ, burbutur do haay kɩ.
66008008	Malɛɛka hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Hɔ m, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan ci gʋta kʋ sɛ a sa, n n a nyɔɔta n a da higʋta ʋ kɩ. Higʋta bɩ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem a ba ma.
66008009	Higʋta bɩ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem nɔ n gɩnga, kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta-gʋtarɔ wɔɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem n a zar.
66008010	Malɛɛka kaakʋ hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Monyaa gandaa n a to brama an a da an nɩ bɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ sɛwurə m. A da a ʋ kɔyaarɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem kan himinyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ra.
66008011	Monyaa bɩ do tɔ m "kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ". Hiro wɔɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem n a ba "kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ", gʋɔɔ n gɩnga gʋta hiro wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ minto.
66008012	Malɛɛka si hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Wosogure zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem kan mom zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem kɩ, monyaarɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem kɩ n a ba monsigə. Sinuu zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem n a ba monsigə, gunuu maam sɔ.
66008013	Mɔɔ n dɩga, m cɛda yɩ werle ma brama nɔyaa ʋ, m a ma, an n'a hɩm kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "A yɩm kʋsɩ! A yɩm kʋsɩ! A yɩm kʋsɩ, tara burə gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma huurero kʋ malɛɛkarɔ kaakʋrɔ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm k'a b'a hɛ bɩ minto."
66009001	Malɛɛka soor hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Mɔɔ n monyaa yɩ, an a to brama ʋ, an b'a da. N n yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ bɩ cɛlɛnyɩ ka ʋ.
66009002	A n yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ bɩ lɛ gʋ, siŋŋə n bɔ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, sɛ gandaa siŋŋə m. Siŋŋə bɩ n a ka woso kan hɩnhɛr kɩ n a ba kundə.
66009003	Bɩsɩnɔ n bɔ siŋŋə bɩ do nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kərgu tara burə ra. N n paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ, am tara burə bɔɔrɔrɔ hɔ bɩ m.
66009004	N n lɛ ka ŋ ʋ: Kʋ ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ ba tara burə bur nɩ, bɩ ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ ba gɔ m, gɛɛ hɔ k'a nɩ lɛɛ dam tara burə ʋ bɩ nɩ y. Bɩ kʋ ŋ n nyaa ba kan gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso makra ba ŋ tusə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bala.
66009005	N zaa ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n fɩr ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma mom soor tɔr, bɩ kʋ ŋ bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ y. Bɩ fɩr kʋ ŋ n'a kam gʋɔɔ ma bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan bɔɔrɔ k'a nɩ gʋaa hanm bɩ kɩ.
66009006	Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ zɛ birm, bɩ ŋ b'a yɩrɛ y. Ŋ y'a ŋʋam k'a gɩnga, bɩ zɛ bɩ y'a sire ŋ lɛɛ.
66009007	Bɩsɩnɔ wɔɔ duro bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan sisiro kʋ ŋ mɔr da ŋ ma k'a ta ŋ nɩ yar ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Ŋ minno wɔɔ ra bɩ, a k'an naa ɩ ʋ, sarma firgəro m. Ŋ meerlɔ wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ hɔɔ kɩ.
66009008	Ŋ minkəro n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan lannɔ hɔɔ kɩ, ŋ sɔrɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poozaa sɔrɔ kɩ.
66009009	Ŋ cɩrɔ wɔɔ k'an naa ɩ ʋ, pɔyaa goŋŋoro ŋ yɩ ŋ ka a ma, ŋ zarɔ wɔɔ bʋgʋr bɩ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sisiro tɛrkʋrɔ kʋ ŋ bra si ŋn'ɩ tam yar ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bʋgʋr kɩ.
66009010	Ŋ monno wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan bɔɔrɔrɔ monno kɩ, ŋ karɔ n ta ʋ. Ŋ monno wɔɔ ŋ paŋŋa bɩ n ta ʋ, k'a fɩr ka gʋɔɔ ma mom soor tɔr.
66009011	Ŋ cir bɩ m yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ malɛɛka kʋ n n'a birm ebree lemim m "Abadɔn", n n'a birm grɛkkɩ m "Apoliyɔn" bɩ m.
66009012	Lɛɛkarɛ kʋsɩ bɩ cem: Ba kʋsɩ vantɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ n nɩ zɛm k'a b'a nya ʋ na.
66009013	Malɛɛka sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Bɩ, mɔɔ leer ma an a to sarma mannɩjaa kɔɔn siro k'a nɩ Woso lɛɛ bɩ zeezi.
66009014	A n n'a hɩm malɛɛka sɔrdɩ hɔ k'a nɩ huure bɩ m bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bar zɛ malɛɛkarɔ siro kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ sur Efratɩ kɔ gʋta burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma."
66009015	N n bar zɛ malɛɛkarɔ siro kʋ ŋ y'a banka ŋn'ɩ dɔm wakatɩ, dɔmɩm, mom kan dɔɔraa kɩ minto, k'a bɩ zamaa zɛkumbir kaakʋ deem zɛ rɔ wɔɔ ma.
66009016	Bɩ, mɔɔ sisiro zannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ma: Ŋ miliyɔn zɔɔhɩra.
66009017	Siirozannɔ kʋ ŋ y'a hɩnka mɔɔ m makra bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ba n nɩ: Goŋŋoro ŋ yɩ ŋ ka a ma, ŋnɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛ kɩ, bʋramɛ kɩ, kidibirmɛ kɩ. Sisiro wɔɔ minno wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poozannɔ minno kɩ, sɛ n nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ lɛ ʋ kan siŋŋə kɩ, kidibir kɩ.
66009018	Kʋsɩ kaakʋrɔ nɔɔm, sɛ, siŋŋə kan kidibir kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ lɛrɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ deem zɛ.
66009019	Bala, sisiro wɔɔ paŋŋa bɩ, ŋ lɛrɔ an ta ʋ kan ŋ monno kɩ sɔ. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, ŋ monno wɔɔ bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan mɩnnɔ kɩ, ŋ minno n tɩnta ʋ, bɩ n'a karɛ ŋn'a dam ma, ŋn'ɩ fɩr kam gʋɔɔ ma.
66009020	Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔtarɔ wɔɔ nɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n gɩnga fɩryɩrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n a bɔ a taam ŋn'a wɔbʋmbɔ a zibəəro wɔɔ ʋ y. Ŋ gɔɔta, ŋn'ɩ zinəro, wosobaawɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba sarma m gɛɛ wanzur m, gɛɛ zaan m, gɛɛ jaa m, gɛɛ gɔ m, kʋ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ lɛɛ yɩ, ŋnɩ mim ma, ŋnɩ ta rɔ wɔɔ daŋ ʋ y.
66009021	Ŋ n a bɔ a taam ŋn'a wɔbʋmbɔ a gərzɛrɛ, a wɔkurero, a jaandarɛ kan a kombaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ y.
66010001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛka paŋŋazaa deem yɩ, an a to brama, an nɩ zerm, warkʋ n a kurə ɩ ʋ, huu m. Brama hɔwasɩʋʋrɛ n a bɩr a mim ma, a meer nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ wosogure m. A gannɔ nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ sɛ y'a zaa da.
66010002	Ci poore n'a wɔ ʋ, an gʋ. A n a bɩsɩ gam tɔ higʋta ra, an a jɩsa gam tɔ tara ra.
66010003	A n zee gʋta da, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poozaa baadarɛ kɩ. K'a zee bɩ da kan paŋŋa kɩ bɩ, bramahəənsire saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ baa da.
66010004	Kʋ bramahəənsire saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ baa da bɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta kʋ m a gʋrsɩra ba, mɔɔ leer ma an a to brama, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Bramahəənsire saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ leer nyaakʋm da, ɩ bɩ ŋ da ci ʋ y.
66010005	Malɛɛka kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta m a yɩ, an nɩ jɩnɩm higʋta kan tara kɩ burə ʋ bɩ, a a bɩsɩ wɔ busu brama, an a wer si
66010006	k'an bɔ m mɩsɩr dɔɔraa nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, an brama da kan tara kɩ kan hɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an higʋta da kan hɔ k'a n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ m, a ʋ: Dɔmɩm darɛ ba ʋ dɔ y.
66010007	Dɔmɩm kʋ malɛɛka saanhɩna hɔ bɩ n n'a huure bɩ hɛŋ ʋ bɩ, Woso mim k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ kʋ yɩrɛ, amba a hɩ a zibəənyɩnɔ lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ padarɛ m bɩ m.
66010008	Leer kʋ mɔɔ ma an a to brama b'a ya an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Ta, ɩ ci kʋ n y'a gʋ malɛɛka k'a nɩ jɩnɩm higʋta burə ʋ kan tara kɩ wɔ ʋ bɩ si.
66010009	Mɔɔ nɩ m zɔ malɛɛka bɩ ma, m a yɛ han k'an ci poore bɩ ka m ʋ. A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: A si, ɩ sʋ. A nyɩntam kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ ɩbɩɩ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, a nyɩntarɛ am zɔɔn hɔ bɩ m ɩbɩɩ lɛ ʋ.
66010010	Mɔɔ n ci poore bɩ si malɛɛka bɩ wɔ ʋ, m a sʋ. Mɔɔ lɛ ʋ bɩ a nyɩnta am zɔɔn hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ sʋ bɩ, mɔɔ nɔ a ba kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ.
66010011	N n a hɩ mɔɔ m, n ʋ: A a ga m k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ ya, ɩ Woso lɛ si ɩ so ra kʋrɔ gʋta minto, tararɔ gʋta minto, lemim gʋta kan cinno gʋta kɩ minto.
66011001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, n n niigə gɔ ka mɔɔ ʋ, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔ makra barɛ gʋra kɩ, n n'a hɩ mɔɔ m, n ʋ: wuti, ɩ Wosocɛ bɩ makra ba kan mannɩjaa bɩ kɩ, k'ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ sa.
66011002	Bɩ kʋ Wosocɛ jɛɛr bɩ nɩ, k'ɩ to maam, ɩ b'a makra ba y. Bala, a da n y'a ʋ doro vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ tʋntɔ tara mɩŋŋa bɩ ra mom busi a yaa hɩɩya nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
66011003	Bɩ mɔɔ y'a kam mɔɔ kasɛtɩzannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ m yɔrgɔrɔ huuro du a ma, ŋnɩ Woso lɛ si ŋnɩ so ra dɔmɩm tisi kan a zɔɔhɩra a busɔrdɩ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
66011004	Kasɛtɩzannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ, oliviyee hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ m kan fɩtɩrɛ cɩntarahɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ jɩnɩm durnya Zuuba taa rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m.
66011005	Kʋ gʋaa ʋ k'a bʋnyaa ba ŋ nɩ, sɛ n nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ lɛ ʋ, an ŋ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ bɩ. Denter, kʋ gʋaa ʋ k'a hɔ bʋnyaa ba ŋ nɩ, a a ga m, k'an ga ncɩnaaʋ.
66011006	Bala, ŋ y'ɩ lɛ m k'a brama ta, bɩ la b'a dam ma, an tɔkʋ ŋ wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa dɔmɩm ʋ y. Ŋ y'a da ma, ŋn'a ka hi n a lʋr ma. Ŋ y'a da ma ŋn'a ka fɩr do haay n bʋr durnya ʋ, dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ y'a ŋʋa ma.
66011007	Bɩ kʋ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ ka ŋn'a nya, hɔnyaazaa k'a n'a tom yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ b'ʋ bɩ wutim yarm kan ŋ kɩ, an bʋr ŋ la, an ŋ zɩnzɛ.
66011008	Ŋ gəəro wɔɔ gɔɔtam kʋ gʋta kʋ n n'a birm makra nɔ ʋ Sodɔm kan Eziptɩ kɩ bire ma. Bɩncɛ bɩ do n yɩ ŋ Zuuba bɩ wɔ ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ.
66011009	Kʋrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ, do y'a hʋnhɔ, lemim y'a hʋnhɔ, kan tararɔ y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ zɛm bɩ dɩga ŋ gəəro ma dɔmɩm kaakʋ kan a kur kɩ, bɩ, ŋ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋ birle ma y.
66011010	Durnyazannɔ y'a heer nyɔɔrɛ ŋ mim ma, ŋ nyɩntam heer nyɔɔ nɔ ʋ, ŋ ganwʋrɛ nyɔɔm kʋ ma, kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro fɩr ka ŋ ma gʋta bɩ minto.
66011011	Bɩ dɔmɩm kaakʋ kan a kur kɩ rɔ nɔɔn duro jɛ ʋ bɩ, Woso a ka mɩsɩrbaa hoonsi n gasʋ ŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ wuti, ŋnɩ jɩnjɩm. Bɩ, nyibəə gʋta gasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
66011012	Ŋ leer gʋta ma an a to brama, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a der naa ʋ!" Bɩ ŋ der brama warkʋ nɔ ʋ, ŋ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ mɩm m.
66011013	Wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, taranyiŋŋəre paŋŋazaa nyɩnta ʋ. Tara bɩ do nɔ ʋ, cɛ bu barla, cɛ deem wurgə haay, bɩ gʋaa tisi saanhɩna ɩ gɩnga tara bɩ nyiŋŋəre nɔ ʋ. Nyibəə gasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ brama Woso ʋ.
66011014	Kʋsɩ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ cem. Ba "kʋsɩ" kaakʋ hɔ n nɩ zɛm lɛɛm na.
66011015	Malɛɛka saanhɩna hɔ b'a huure bɩ hɛ: Leer gʋtɔɔ n a to brama, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ Zuuba Woso kan a Krista kɩ y'a so durnya cirbəə b'ʋ kɛɛrɛ. A cirbəə bɩm dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ."
66011016	Gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si rɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso taa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋn'ɩ nyɩntarɛ a cirbəəduuro ra rɔ wɔɔ kukurə zɛ, ŋn'a meer ku tara ma, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ,
66011017	ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ɩ barka darɛ ɩbɩɩ m Zuuba Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n ta ʋ, ɩ nyɩnta ʋ. Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ paŋŋa gʋta hɩnka ɩ ɩ cirbəə cɩnta.
66011018	Tara cinno wuti nɔmaa m, b'ɩbɩɩ nɔmaa ɩ bʋr. Gəəno dʋdɔkarɛ dɔmɩm m naa, ɩbɩɩ zibəənyɩnɔ lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ganwʋrɛ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm m naa, kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi barɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ poorero kan gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya zarm nɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ dɔmɩm m naa."
66011019	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Wosocɛ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ b'a gʋ, gʋaasɩbabaa daka bɩ n a hɩnka Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, brama nyakɩrɔ, leerlo kan bramahəənsirero kɩ, taranyiŋŋəre kɩ lajaa paŋŋazannɔ kɩ nyɩnta ʋ.
66012001	Makra gandaa a hɩnka brama. Lʋ m, an wosogure du a ma, mom n'a gannɔ taa, an monyaa bueerehɩɩya ku a mim ma, ɩ ʋ, firgə m.
66012002	A n nɩ jɩsɩ m, an nɩ zee darɛ a nyoosibarɛ nɔbusu nɔ ʋ.
66012003	Makra vanta n a hɩnka brama. Mɩnda gandaara m bʋmbʋɛɛda yoyy••• A mim saanhɩna, a mɩnnɔ bu, firgəro saanhɩna n a minno wɔɔ ma.
66012004	A mom bɩ n brama monyaarɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋrɔ wɔɔ deem waa, an a sur tara ʋ. Mɩnda bɩ n a da lʋ k'a nɩ nyɩ yɩm bɩ lɛ ʋ, kʋ nyɩ bɩ bɩ bɔ k'a a da ma a mom.
66012005	Lʋ bɩ n nyɩ bɩ yɩ yar. A n n'a so tara burə kʋrɔ haay ʋ kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ. Bɩ, n y'a nyɩ bɩ busu, n n der m Woso zi a cirbəəduu bɩ jɩr ʋ.
66012006	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lʋ bɩ bra si an ta poohɔɔn ʋ. Poohɔɔn bɩ do Woso bɩncɛ banka ʋ a tɔ ma, kʋ n n'a tʋr ʋ dɔmɩm tisi zɔɔhɩra busɔrdɩ nɔ ʋ.
66012007	Yar nyɩnta ʋ brama b'ʋ: Misɛl kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ yar ba kan mɩnda bɩ kɩ. Mɩnda bɩ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ nɩ yar bam sɔ.
66012008	Bɩ, Misɛl kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ bʋr ŋ la. Mɩnda kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ ba bɩncɛ m brama dɔ y.
66012009	N n mɩnda gʋta bɩ bra n n a da tara ʋ. A m mɩm gusire, n n'a birm minkagʋaarazaa gɛɛ Sʋtaana, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ, jɩm, a m nɩ bra bam durnya haay m bɩ. N y'a bra n n a da tara ʋ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ.
66012010	Mɔɔ n leer paŋŋazaa ma brama, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Wɔɔ Woso bʋmbɔrɛ dɔmɩm a ku. Wɔɔ Woso paŋŋa kan a cirbəə kɩ dɔmɩm n a ku, a Krista paŋŋa dɔmɩm a ku. Bala, bɔ nɩ mim kam wɔɔ danyɩnɔ ra Woso taa sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ bɩ, n bɩ bra n n a da tara ʋ:
66012011	Bɩ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bʋr la sinnyɛɛm bɩ ma paŋŋa m, kan ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ kɩ m. Bala, ŋ yɛ ŋnɩ kaanm a mɩsɩrbaa m, ŋnɩ yɛ zɛ ma.
66012012	Arzana kan a gʋɔɔ kɩ k'a heer nyɔɔ, tara kan higʋta kɩ kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ. Bala, Sʋtaana zer awɔɔ zi nɔmaa n a heer ʋ, bala, a a dɔ a ʋ, a dɔmɩm n gɔɔta hɔsɩ y."
66012013	Mɩnda bɩ k'a bɩ dɩga a, ŋ y'a bra ŋn'a dam bɩ, a a da a ra, an nɩ lam lʋ k'a nyɩ yɩ yar bɩ ra.
66012014	Bɩ, n cɛda za hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ka lʋ b'ʋ kan wer an ta poohɔɔn ʋ bɩncɛ kʋ n y'a ka ʋ, k'an nyɩnta ʋ kʋ n n'a tʋr ʋ b'ʋ dɔɔraa kaakʋ kan a kur kɩ nɔ ʋ, laatʋ mɩnda bɩ ma.
66012015	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɩnda bɩ hi bɔ a rɛ gʋta am kɔyaa hɔ bɩ m, lʋ bɩ jɛ ʋ, k'an a gaa an cenim.
66012016	Tara n bʋr an b'a da lʋ bɩ han, an yar ʋ, an kɔyaa kʋ mɩnda b'a bɔ a rɛ bɩ mom.
66012017	Mɩnda bɩ k'a heer nɩ busum kan lʋ bɩ kɩ bɩ, a yar bɩ lɛ bɩr kan lʋ bɩ yaŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ zum Woso lɛrɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta Yeezuu kasɛtɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
66012018	A m bɩ, an gɔɔta higʋta nyɩntaa bɩ ra.
66013001	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ hɔturma yɩ an wuti an nɩ bɔm higʋta b'ʋ. A mɩnnɔ bu, a mim saanhɩna. A mɩnnɔ wɔɔ, firgəro bu nɩ ŋ la. A minno wɔɔ ra bɩ, Woso sʋnsɔ tɔ n ta ŋ ma.
66013002	Hɔturma kʋ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan bɔnla kɩ. A gannɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan ursi gannɔ kɩ, a lɛ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poozaa hɔ kɩ, mɩnda bɩ n a paŋŋa ka ʋ kan a cirbəə kɩ, lɛ gʋta kɩ.
66013003	A minno wɔɔ deem nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, a sakʋ n y'a ʋ, k'an ga, b'a sakʋrɛ maam-maam bɩ nyim bɩ nya. Durnya haay n a lɛ bɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ zu a jɛ ʋ.
66013004	Ŋ n mɩnda bɩ da ʋ, bala, a ɩ paŋŋa ka hɔturma b'ʋ, ŋn'a da ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n'a makra bam kan hɔturma bɩ kɩ? Nka y'a da ma, an zoo ba kan kɩ?"
66013005	N n a da meerbaa ma k'an a lɛ bɔ a ʋ, k'an Woso sʋnsɔ wʋ. N lɛ ka ʋ k'an zi ba mom busi a yaa hɩɩya.
66013006	A n a lɛ gʋ, an nɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ an n'a tɔ kan a har bɩ kɩ sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ arzana ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
66013007	N lɛ ka ʋ k'an yar ba kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'an bʋr ŋ la. N paŋŋa ka ʋ do y'a hʋnhɔ, kʋ y'a hʋnhɔ, lemim y'a hʋnhɔ kan tara y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ burə ʋ.
66013008	Kʋ durnya gʋɔɔ haay n a da ʋ kan gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ n ŋ tɔ gʋrsɩra ba sinnyɛɛm kʋ n y'a zɛ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ hal durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
66013009	"Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa bɩ k'an a ma!
66013010	Kʋ n y'a cɩnta kʋ gʋaa m ta lɔmbaa ʋ, ta an nawʋm lɔmbaa ʋ. Kʋ n y'a cɩnta kʋ kargʋ n gʋaa zɛ, kargʋ n n'a zɛm. Wosogʋɔɔ tʋntɔʋrɛ wakatɩ m naa kan ŋ sɩrakarɛ kɩ."
