66013011	Mɔɔ m ya, m hɔturma vanta yɩ, an nɩ bɔm tara ʋ. A mɩnnɔ hɩɩya, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm mɩnnɔ kɩ. A n nɩ meer barɛ am mɩnda bɩ hɔ bɩ m.
66013012	A n nɩ lɛɛkarɛ hɔturma bɩ paŋŋa m haay, an nɩ zi bam lɛɛkarɛ hɔturma bɩ mɩm m. A n a ka durnya kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɩ lɛɛkarɛ hɔturma kʋ n y'a sakʋ maam-maam, a nyi m n nya bɩ daŋ ʋ.
66013013	A ɩ makrarɔ gʋta bam. A a ka sɛ n'a tom brama sɔ an nɩ zerm tara burə ʋ, gʋaa haay mɩm ʋ.
66013014	Bra an n'a bam tara burə gʋɔɔ m kan makrarɔ gʋtɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ ka ʋ k'a nɩ ŋ ba lɛɛkarɛ hɔturma bɩ mɩm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. A a hɩ durnyazannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ, ŋnɩ hɔturma kʋ n y'a sakʋ kargʋ m, a nyim n nyɔɔ bɩ bɔkʋrɛ ba.
66013015	N paŋŋa ka hɔturma hɩɩya hɔ b'ʋ k'an meeyaa ka hɔturma bɩ bɔkʋrɛ b'ʋ, k'a n'a da ma an meer ba sɔ. Gʋaa haay k'a bɩr hɔturma bɩ bɔkʋrɛ bɩ daŋ ʋ bɩ, k'an a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
66013016	Hɔturma b'ɩ paŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ poorero gɛɛ gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ, arzakazannɔ gɛɛ ŋʋazannɔ, soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ gɛɛ lɔnnɔ, an nɩ gʋrsɩra barɛ ŋ bɩsɩ wɔ ma gɛɛ ŋ tusə ma.
66013017	Gʋaa b'a dam ma an hɔ hɛɛ gɛɛ an hɔ si k'a ba hɔturma bɩ makra m, a tɔ gɛɛ a tɔ bɩ lɛsarɛnyɩ m a mɛ ma y.
66013018	Mindɔrɛ bɩncɛ n naa: Bala, gʋaa k'a hɔɔn ta ʋ k'an lɛsarɛnyɩ kʋ hɔturma bɩ n ta m bɩ jɩ hɩ. Gʋaa makra m lɛsarɛnyɩ bɩ m. Lɛsarɛnyɩ bɩ zɔrsɔddɩ busɔrdɩ yaa sɔrdɩ.
66014001	Bɩ, mɔɔ m ya, m dɩga, m sinnyɛɛm bɩ yɩ, an jɩm Siyɔn ci bɩ burə ʋ, gʋaa tisi-tisi zɔrɔ busi a yaa siro kʋ ŋ y'a tɔ kan a zɩ tɔ kɩ gʋrsɩra ba ŋ tusə ma rɔ wɔɔ nɩ kan kɩ.
66014002	Mɔɔ leer ma, an a to brama an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan higʋtɔɔ susur bɩncɛ kɩ, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan bramahəənsire paŋŋazaa kɩ. Bɩ, leer kʋ mɔɔ ma bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan kɔnnɩ zenno kʋ ŋ n'a kɔnnɩ zɛm nɔ laa leer kɩ.
66014003	Ŋ n'ɩ laa daa lɔrɛ cirbəəduu kan hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ taa. Bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma an laa bɩ do dɩnda kʋ gʋaa tisi-tisi zɔrɔ busi a yaa siro kʋ ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y.
66014004	Gʋɔɔ m, ŋ n a mɩŋŋɔɔ zar kan lannɔ kɩ y, ŋ n dintim zi ba kan lannɔ kɩ y. Zu ŋ nawʋm kʋ ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ bɩncɛ haay k'a nɩ taŋ ʋ b'ʋ. Ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ gʋɔɔ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ lɛɛkarɛ gʋɔɔ, n nɩ ŋ ka Woso ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ ʋ.
66014005	Ŋʋaar n nyɩnta ŋ lɛ ʋ y, bala, kʋrɔma ba ŋ gʋr zi y.
66014006	Mɔɔ malɛɛka vanta yɩ an wer brama yaa ʋ, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m, k'a pa da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, tara y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ, do y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ, lemim y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ, kʋ y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ m.
66014007	A n n'a hɩm leer paŋŋazaa m, a ʋ: "K'a nyi ba Woso m, k'a a lɛ bɔ ʋ, bala, a dʋdɔkarɛ wakatɩ a ku. K'a bɔ ɩ brama da kan tara kɩ, higʋta kan himinyaarɔ kɩ bɩ da ʋ!"
66014008	Malɛɛka vanta n zu lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ jɛ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "A a da! A a da! Babɩlɔnnɩ kʋ gʋta b'a da! A y'a ka tararɔ haay n a jaandarɛ bʋnyaabaa dɩvɛn bɩ mi!"
66014009	Malɛɛka kaakʋ hɔ n zu malɛɛka hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ jɛ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ kan leer paŋŋazaa kɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa hɔturma bɩ bɔkʋrɛ bɩ da ʋ kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ, k'a a makra bɩ yɩ a tusə ma gɛɛ a wɔ ma,
66014010	a zaa Woso nɔmaa dɩvɛn bɩ mire. A heerbusu dɩvɛn paan•••, dɩvɛn k'a a tɔ nɔmaa laaga ʋ bɩ, a bɩ mim sɔ. B'a fɩryɩrɛ dɔm sɛ ʋ kan kidibir sɛ kɩ malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ mɩm ʋ.
66014011	Ŋ fɩryɩrɛ sɛ siŋŋə bɩ derm dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔturma bɩ da ʋ kan a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ kɩ, ŋnɩ yɛ a tɔ makra ma rɔ wɔɔ bɩ mɛnyɔɔ yɩm sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ y."
66014012	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum Woso lɛrɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tʋntɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm m naa.
66014013	Mɔɔ leer ma brama, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: naa gʋrsɩra ba: "Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga Zuuba zaa zuure nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m dɩɩtaa." "Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ, a ʋ: sɩra m, kʋ ŋ n a kɔrɛ mɛnyɔɔ da. Bala, ŋ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ zure ŋ jɛ ʋ."
66014014	Mɔɔ m ya, m warkʋ yɩ fu. Warkʋ bɩ burə ʋ bɩ, gʋaa nɩ nyɩntam, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa nyɩ kɩ. Sarma firgə n'a mim ma, gore lɛzaa n'a wɔ ʋ.
66014015	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, malɛɛka vanta n bɔ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an a leer busu, an a hɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam warkʋ burə ʋ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ gore bɩ sa, ɩ hɔ dam, bala, hɔdarɛ dɔmɩm y'a ku. Bala, hɔ ma tara burə ʋ."
66014016	Gʋaa k'a nɩ warkʋ burə ʋ bɩ n a gore bɩ sa, an a nyɔɔ tara burə ʋ, an hɔ k'a nɩ tara burə ʋ bɩ da.
66014017	Mɔɔ m ya, m malɛɛka deem yɩ, an bɔ Wosocɛ ʋ arzana ʋ. Guere lɛzaa n'a wɔ ʋ sɔ.
66014018	Malɛɛka vanta n a ya, an bɔ mannɩjaa bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ. A paŋŋa n bʋr sɛ ra. A n a leer busu kan paŋŋa kɩ an a hɩ malɛɛka k'a nɩ gore lɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ gore lɛzaa bɩ nyɔɔ, ɩ tara burə dɩvɛn gɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ nɔ m. Bala, a nyɩ bɩ ma."
66014019	Malɛɛka bɩ n a gore bɩ sa, an a nyɔɔ tara burə ʋ, an tara burə dɩvɛn gɔ nyɩ bɩ nɔ m, an a nyɔɔ an a zar Woso nɔmaa mɔr gʋta ʋ.
66014020	N n tʋntɔ ra mɔr gʋta b'ʋ kʋ bɩ toore ma. Ma n bɔ an der an b'a dam ma an sisi mom an a sarbɩr ku, an bra, an yar an a zɔ cilo zɔɔhɩra bunɛɛhʋ ma.
66015001	Mɔɔ m ya, m makra vanta yɩ brama gandaa ʋ, a dɩgama sʋra n ta ʋ. Malɛɛkarɔ saanhɩnarɔ nɩ kʋsɩrɔ saanhɩna m a wɔ ʋ. Kʋsɩrɔ jɛzannɔ m, bala, brɔɔ nɩ Woso heerbusu bɩ zibəə nyambʋrlɛ.
66015002	Mɔɔ m higʋta hi k'a nɩ yɔm pɛkʋ-pɛkʋ an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan kristal kɩ yɩ, an a war kʋ ma kan sɛ kɩ. Mɔɔ yɩ sɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr hɔturma bɩ ra kan a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ kɩ, kan a tɔ bɩ lɛsarɛnyɩ bɩ kɩ ra rɔ wɔɔ n jɩm higʋta hi k'a nɩ yɔm pɛkʋ-pɛkʋ am kristal hɔ bɩ m bɩ jɩr ma, ŋn'ɩ Woso kɔnnɩrɔ m.
66015003	Ŋ n'ɩ laa kʋ Moyiisi, Woso zibəənyɩ a lɔ bɩ lɔrɛ, sinnyɛɛm bɩ hɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ zaa, ɩbɩɩ zibəəro wɔɔ gʋta, ŋnɩ mɩŋŋa paan•••, ŋn'a ga dɩgama m. Tararɔ haay cir, ɩbɩɩ n'a bam haay bɩ tɩrga, sɩra m sɔ, Zuuba!
66015004	Nka ɩ bɩ nyi barɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ m, an a lɛ bɔ ʋ? Bala, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ deem n mɩŋŋa. Tararɔ haay zɛrɛ ŋnɩ b'ɩbɩɩ da ʋ. Bala, ɩbɩɩ dʋdɔkarɛ b'a hɩnka."
66015005	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ Wosocɛ kʋ gʋaasɩbabaa kasɛtɩ pɛɛracɛ bɩ n ta ʋ bɩ n a gʋ brama.
66015006	Malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋsɩ saanhɩna rɔ wɔɔ n bɔ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Ŋ n huu furo kʋ ŋ nɩ yɔm nɔ wɔɔ du a ma, ŋnɩ sarma hɔsoaʋrɔ so a cɩ ʋ.
66015007	Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ deem n sarma laaga saanhɩnarɔ ka malɛɛkarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Woso k'an mɩsɩr dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔmaa nɩ ŋ hɩnhan.
66015008	Siŋŋə n Wosocɛ bɩ han, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ kan a paŋŋa gʋta bɩ kɩ minto. Bɩ gʋaa b'a dam ma, an gasʋ Wosocɛ b'ʋ kʋ kʋsɩ saanhɩnarɔ kʋ malɛɛkarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ bʋr ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ n nya y.
66016001	Mɔɔ leer gʋta ma an a to Wosocɛ bɩ zeezi, an n'a hɩm malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a ta, a Woso nɔmaa k'a nɩ laaga saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lo tara burə ʋ!"
66016002	Lɛɛkarɛ malɛɛka bɩ n ta, an aa a laaga hɔ bɩ lo tara burə ʋ. Nyim bʋnyaa k'a nɩ busum gʋta y'a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔturma bɩ makra m, ŋn'a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
66016003	Malɛɛka hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo higʋta burə ʋ. Hi bɩ n a ba am gər ma hɔ bɩ m. Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n gɩnga.
66016004	Malɛɛka kaakʋ hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo kɔyaarɔ ʋ, himinyaarɔ kɩ ʋ, ŋn'a ba ma.
66016005	Mɔɔ malɛɛka k'a so hi ʋ bɩ leer ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n ta ʋ, ɩ nyɩnta ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ tɩrga. Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa, bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ dʋdɔ ka kan tɩrgabaa kɩ.
66016006	Kʋ ŋ y'a ka wosogʋɔɔ ma n bra kan ɩ lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ hɔ kɩ bɩ, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ ma ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a mi sɔ, naa ŋ y'a ga m."
66016007	Mɔɔ ma mannɩjaa bɩ n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Zuuba Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ zaa, ɩbɩɩ dʋdɔkarɛrɔ wɔɔ sɩra m, bɩ ŋ tɩrga sɔ."
66016008	Malɛɛka si hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo wosogure burə ʋ. N n paŋŋa ka ʋ k'a sɛ n gʋɔɔ bɩ.
66016009	Fɩnfɩr gandaara n na gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma. Ŋ n Woso k'a so kʋsɩrɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ. Ŋ lɛ baa k'a bɔ a taam, k'a a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ y.
66016010	Malɛɛka soor hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo hɔturma bɩ cirbəəduu bɩ ra. A cirbəə bɩncɛ bɩ n a ba monsigə bimm•••. Gʋɔɔ n'a nɛɛm sʋm fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ.
66016011	Ŋ n arzana Woso bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ, ŋ fɩryɩrɛ kan ŋ nyinno wɔɔ kɩ minto, bɩ ŋ heer n a lʋr a zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ minto y.
66016012	Malɛɛka sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo Efratɩ kɔ gʋta b'ʋ. Hi bɩ n gaan k'a zaa to cinno kʋ ŋ n'a tom dɔjɩr ʋ rɔ wɔɔ cenle minto.
66016013	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ zinəro yɩ kaakʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan ŋʋɩɩkannɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bɔ mɩnda bɩ lɛ ʋ kan hɔturma bɩ lɛ kɩ, ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazaa lɛ kɩ.
66016014	Zinəro wɔɔ duro nɩ hoserlo barɛ. Ta ŋ nawʋm durnya haay cinno wɔɔ zi k'a yaa ŋ so kʋ ma yar k'a nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ zaa dɔmɩm gʋta hinni ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
66016015	"Ba n na: Zɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ, am koor hɔ bɩ m. Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ dɔrɛ a huuro ma, a n a zu a ʋ y, a yaa ta dɩgɩ, a a nyannɩ hɩnka bɩ m."
66016016	Zinəro wɔɔ cinno wɔɔ so kʋ ma bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm ebree lemim m Armagedɔn b'ʋ.
66016017	Malɛɛka saanhɩna hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo hɩnhɛr nɔ ʋ. Leer paŋŋazaa n a to cirbəəduu bɩ zeezi Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "A ba an nya!"
66016018	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, bramanyakɩrɔ, leerlo kan bramahəənsirero kɩ, taranyiŋŋəre paŋŋazaa kɩ nyɩnta ʋ. Hɔ kʋ gʋaa bʋr durnya ʋ, taranyiŋŋəre naa do lɔɔ n nyɩnta ʋ cɩna y.
66016019	Kʋnɔ gʋta bɩ n a zɛ kumbir lɛ kaakʋ, tararɔ kʋnɔrɔ n wurgə. Woso Babɩlɔnnɩ gʋta bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, k'a nɔmaa dɩvɛn laaga k'a nɩ hirm bɩ kɩnka ma.
66016020	Kʋrɔ kʋ hi bɩr ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ haay n nyaam, n n a ya, n n ciro yɩ sɔ y.
66016021	Lajaa gandaarɔ ŋ cilo n a zɔ busi-busi ma n a to brama, ŋnɩ b'a da gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ra. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n Woso sʋnsɔ wʋ, kʋsɩ lajaa k'a nyɔɔ bɩ minto, bala, kʋsɩ m, a paŋŋa n ta ʋ gʋta.
66017001	Malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ deem k'a nɩ laaga saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ n b'a zɔ, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr kʋ m hʋnhʋrlɛ niŋŋə kʋ jaandər gʋta bɩ n'a yɩm bɩ hɩnka ɩ m. Jaandər bɩ do, kʋ gʋta k'a nɩ bɔrkɔrɔ lɛ ra bɩ m.
66017002	Durnya cinno wɔɔ jaan da ma, durnyazannɔ n a jaandarɛ dɩvɛn mi an ŋ zɛ."
66017003	Ɛspri n gasʋ mɔɔ ʋ, malɛɛka bɩ n mɔɔ gaa, an ta mɔɔ m poohɔɔn ʋ. Bɩ, mɔɔ lʋ yɩ an nɩ nyɩntam hɔturma piin••• ra. Hɔturma bɩ mim saanhɩna, a mɩnnɔ bu. N n Woso sʋnsɔrɔ gʋrsɩra ba a mɛ bɩ ma.
66017004	Lʋ bɩ n huu piinə wɩsɩ du a ma, kan sarma mɔdrɔ kɩ, jaa tɔzannɔ kɩ, nyɛɛnnɔ kɩ da a ma. Sarma laaga n'a wɔ ʋ, hɔ bʋnyaa n a han: a jaandarɛ bɩ dintim m.
66017005	Tɔ k'a jɩ n dɔ n'a tusə ma: "Babɩlɔnnɩ gʋta, jaandənno kan durnya hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ da."
66017006	Bɩ mɔɔ lʋ bɩ yɩ, an wosogʋɔɔ ma kan Yeezuu kasɛtɩzannɔ ma kɩ mi, an n'a zɛrɛ. Kʋ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, mɔɔ n zɛ kədə.
66017007	Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto ɩbɩɩ n zɛ kədə? Mɔɔ lʋ bɩ kan hɔturma k'a da ʋ a minno saanhɩna, a mɩnnɔ bu bɩ jɩ k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m.
66017008	Hɔturma k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ nyɩnta ʋ, b'a ba ʋ dɔ y. A bɔm yaa gʋta k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ b'ʋ an ta nyaanlɛ bɩncɛ ʋ. Bɩ durnyazannɔ kʋ ŋ n tɔ gʋrsɩra ba mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ hal durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zɛm kədə hɔturma bɩ yɩrɛ tɔ ma. Bala, a nyɩnta ʋ biisi, b'a ba ʋ dɔ y, b'a y'a bɔrɛ an bʋr.
66017009	Naa ʋ bɩ, mimpʋnɔ kan mindɔrɛ kɩ bɩncɛ m. Mim saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʋ, ciro saanhɩnarɔ kʋ lʋ bɩ nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, cinno saanhɩnarɔ m sɔ.
66017010	Cinno soorlɔ wɔɔ cirbəə nya, a sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ gɔɔta an nɩ cirbəə ʋ, a saanhɩna hɔ bɩ n bʋr cɩna y, bɩ k'a bɩ bʋr, a bɩ maasɩrɛ barɛ y.
66017011	Hɔturma k'a nyɩnta ʋ, b'a ba ʋ dɔ bɩ, a mɩŋŋa m cir sinnyə hɔ. A nyɩnta cinno saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ barla, b'a ɩ tam nyaanlɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
66017012	Mɩnnɔ buro k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ, cinno bu kʋ ŋ n cirbəə bɩ cɩna rɔ m. Bɩ, wakatɩ deem nɔ ʋ, ŋ yirm cirbəə ma ŋn'a bɩ kan hɔturma bɩ kɩ.
66017013	Cinno buro wɔɔ haay lɛ bɩ deem: Ŋ y'a paŋŋa kan a cirbəə kɩ sam, ŋn'ɩ zi bam hɔturma bɩ minto.
66017014	Ŋ yar bam kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ, bɩ sinnyɛɛm bɩ bʋrlɛ ŋ la. Bala, a m zuubarɔ haay Zuuba, cinno Cir. A kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bʋrlɛ ŋ la. Gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ bir, n ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ, a lɛsirezannɔ m."
66017015	Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Hiro k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ yɩ bɩncɛ kʋ jaandər bɩ n ta ʋ bɩ, do y'a hʋnhɔ m, gʋɔɔ ciiro m, tararɔ m kan leminno kɩ m.
66017016	Mɩnnɔ buro kan hɔturma bɩ kɩ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ sɔm lʋ jaandər bɩ m, ŋ hɔ k'an ta m yɔm nɩ, ŋn'a to dɩgɩ. Ŋ y'a nyasʋrɛ ŋn'a sʋ, ŋn'a mɩsɩ zar sɛ ʋ.
66017017	Bala, Woso hɔɔndarɛ da ŋ heer ʋ, hɔɔndarɛ deem ŋn'ɩ zi bam nɩ: kʋ ŋ n'a cirbəə bɩ sa ŋnɩ zi ba m hɔturma bɩ minto, k'an ta an Woso meerbaarɔ wɔɔ kʋyɩrɛ dɔmɩm ku.
66017018	Bɩ, lʋ k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ, kʋ gʋta k'a a so durnya cinno wɔɔ bɩ m."
66018001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛka vanta yɩ an a to brama an nɩ zerm. Paŋŋa gʋta an ta m, a gure n tara bɔ a ʋ jilli.
66018002	A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "A a da, Babɩlɔnnɩ gʋta b'a da. A a ba zinəro bɩncɛ. A tara b'a ba ɛspri bʋnyaarɔ haay bɩncɛ kɛɛrɛ. Bɛnnɔ bʋnyaarɔ do haay kʋ ŋ dɩgama sʋra ba ʋ rɔ bɩncɛ.
66018003	Bala, a a jaandarɛ waasɩ bɩ dɩvɛn kɩnka tararɔ haay ma. Durnya cinno jaan da ma, durnya terbənno n a ba arzakazannɔ a hɔnta paŋŋa minto."
66018004	Mɔɔ m ya, m leer vanta ma, an a to brama, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ, k'a bɔ kʋ naa do bire ʋ a mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ yaa zar da a ma, kʋsɩ k'a nɩ zɛm la bɩ yaa a ku.
66018005	Bala, a mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ a sonso kʋ ra an ta an brama ku. Bɩ, Woso a zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
66018006	K'a ba m sɔ, amba a a ba awɔɔ m bɩ m. Hɔ k'a ba awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a suutə gallɛm hɩɩya. Dɩvɛn k'a tɔ a laaga ʋ an a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a dɩvɛn k'a paŋŋa lɛ da a hɔ bɩ ra gallɛm hɩɩya bɩ tɔ nʋ.
66018007	K'a hʋnhʋrlɛ kan kʋsɩ kɩ k'a ka a mɩŋŋa ʋ tɔkama kan gʋɛrɛ kɩ m bɩ ka ʋ maam sɔ. A y'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Nyɩnta mɔɔ nawʋrɛ m cirbəə nɔ ʋ naa ʋ, zoro bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y, mɔɔ bɩ zɛheerzar dɔrɛ y.
66018008	Bɩ y'a ka, kʋsɩrɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ banka awɔɔ minto bɩ zɛm hindeem ʋ, an b'awɔɔ zɛ: zɛ, zɛheerzar, nɔ kɩ. Sɛ n n'a bɩm. Bala, Zuuba Woso k'a n'a dʋdɔ kam bɩ, paŋŋa gʋtazaa m."
66018009	Durnya cinno wɔɔ kʋ ŋ jaan da ma kan a hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ baa darɛ, ŋ y'a wʋnwʋrŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ bʋr ŋn'ɩ sɛ k'a n'a bɩm bɩ siŋŋə bɩ yɩm.
66018010	Ŋ jɩnɩm laatʋ, a hʋnhʋrlɛ bɩ nyibəə minto. Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Waay••• waay•••. Babɩlɔnnɩ tara gʋta ra, Babɩlɔnnɩ gʋta k'a paŋŋa n ta ʋ! Wakatɩ deem taan••• ɩbɩɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ bɔ ra?"
66018011	Bɩ durnya terbənno wɔɔ ɩ baa dam sɔ ŋn'a zɛnyi da ʋ, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩr ŋ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ sim dɔ bɩ minto.
66018012	Sarma kan wanzur kɩ, jaa tɔzannɔ kan nyɛɛnnɔ kɩ, pɛɛrarɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba pannɩ mɩŋŋɔɔ furo m kan pɛɛrarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ piinoo kɩ, sʋa kɩ, gɔ mɩŋŋa k'a ji n ta ʋ k'a yɩrɛ wer n ta ʋ kan mɔdrɔ do haay kʋ n y'a ba yɩbɩr sɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gɔrɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, zaan kan pɔyaa mɔdrɔ kɩ, jaa mɩŋŋɔɔ mɔdrɔ n nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
66018013	Kanɛl kan dʋrɔ kɩ, tidəər, miir kan tidəər nyisi kɩ, dɩvɛn, nyɔɔ, nyisi kan ble kɩ, dono kan seero kɩ, sisiro kan tɛrkʋrɔ kɩ, lɔnnɔ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ gʋr yar ʋ rɔ kɩ.
66018014	Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, a ʋ: "Mɔdrɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa k'ɩ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ nyaam ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ. Ɩbɩɩ arzaka bɩ haay kan ɩbɩɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ kɩ a zar, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩ ɩ yarɛ, ɩ ŋ yɩ fɩɩga y!"
66018015	Terbənno k'a ŋ ba arzakazannɔ terbarɛ naa do jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm laatʋ a fɩryɩrɛ nyibəə minto. Ŋ baa darɛ ŋnɩ zɛnyi da ʋ,
66018016	ŋ ʋ: "Waay••• waay•••, bɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ ɩ kʋ gʋta yɩ! A pannɩ mɩŋŋa huu da a ra, kan pɛɛrarɔ piinoo mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, sarma mɔdrɔ n a bɔ mɩŋŋa, jaa tɔzannɔ kɩ, nyɛɛnnɔ kɩ!
66018017	Wakatɩ deem taan••• ɩbɩɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ bɔ, k'ɩbɩɩ arzaka haay n a zar!" Kɔɔlʋʋ gʋtɔɔ kənno haay, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ zi bam higʋta burə ʋ bɩ zeezi, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zi bam kɔɔlʋʋ gʋtɔɔ burə ʋ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a lɛhɔ yɩm higʋta zibəə minto rɔ wɔɔ kɩ jɩm laatʋ,
66018018	ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ a sɛ siŋŋə kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ minto: "Kʋ kara ɩ nyɩnta an kʋ gʋta naa do ku?"
66018019	Ŋ taapuu gʋr, ŋn'a lore a mim la, ŋn'ɩ baa darɛ, ŋn'ɩ zɛnyi daŋ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Waay••• waay•••, bɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ ɩ kʋ gʋta yɩ! A arzaka minto y'a ka higʋta kɔɔlʋʋ zannɔ a ba arzakazannɔ haay. Wakatɩ deem taan••• nɔ ʋ a a do hɔ haay ma!"
66018020	Brama, ɩ heer nyɔɔ a darɛ minto! K'a heer nyɔɔ wosogʋɔɔ, kristazibəəzannɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ! Bala, Woso a dʋdɔ ka, k'a zibəə bʋnyaa ba awɔɔ m bɩ minto.
66018021	Malɛɛka paŋŋazaa deem jaa busu an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan jɛnlajaa gʋta kɩ, an a nyɔɔ an a da higʋta ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋta Babɩlɔnnɩ bɩ busu n nawʋrɛ n n a da ncɩnaaʋ kan paŋŋa kɩ, bɩ n b'a yarɛ, n a yɩ fɩɩga y.
66018022	N b'a yarɛ, n n kɔnnɩzenno, kan hɔzenno kɩ leer ma ɩbɩɩ zi y. Hirhenno kan huurehenno kɩ leer b'a yarɛ, an bɔ ɩbɩɩ zi y. N b'a yarɛ n n zibəəsɩzaa yɩ ɩbɩɩ zi y. N b'a yarɛ n n jaalɔrɛ nyi ma ɩbɩɩ zi y.
66018023	Fɩtɩrɛ lɛɛgure b'a yarɛ an yɔ ɩbɩɩ zi fɩɩga y. N b'a yarɛ n n lʋdaa kan a zim kɩ leer ma ɩbɩɩ zi y. Ɩbɩɩ terbənno wɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta terbənno paŋŋazannɔ durnya naa nɔ ʋ, bɩ kan ɩbɩɩ ŋʋaar zibəəro wɔɔ kɩ, ɩbɩɩ bra ba gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m haay."
66018024	Babɩlɔnnɩ fɩr yɩ, bala, n wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ma kan wosogʋɔɔ kɩ ma, kan gʋɔɔ haay kʋ n yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ tara burə ʋ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ma yɩ tara naa do nɔ ʋ.
66019001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ gʋaa cir gʋta leer paŋŋazaa ma brama ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a Woso da ʋ! Bʋmbɔrɛ, kan cirbəə kɩ, paŋŋa gʋta kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ Woso hɔɔ m.
66019002	A dʋdɔkarɛrɔ mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ tɩrga. Bala, a jaandər gʋta bɩ dʋdɔ ka, k'a gʋɔɔ zar gʋta tara burə ʋ a jaandarɛ bɩ minto, n bɩ dʋdɔ ka. Woso hʋnhʋrlɛ ka ʋ an a zibəənyɩnɔ k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ zɩm bɔ ma."
66019003	Ŋ n a ya, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a Woso da ʋ! Bɩ kʋ gʋta bɩ sɛ siŋŋə bam bɩr derm dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ."
66019004	Bɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si rɔ wɔɔ kan hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ kɩ kukurə zɛ ŋnɩ Woso k'a nɩ nyɩntarɛ cirbəəduu ra bɩ da ʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Amina, Aleluya!"
66019005	Leer n a to cirbəəduu bɩ ra, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ haay k'an Woso zibəənyɩnɔ, awɔɔ k'a nɩ nyi bam nɩ, gʋɔɔ poorero kan gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ, k'a wɔɔ Woso bɩ da ʋ!"
66019006	Mɔɔ m ya, m a ma ɩ ʋ, gʋaa cir gʋta leer m, ɩ ʋ, higʋta surle m, ɩ ʋ, bramahəənsire paŋŋazaa leer m. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a Woso da ʋ! Bala, Zuuba, wɔɔ Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ b'a cirbəə hɩnka.
66019007	Ʋ ʋ heer nyɔɔ k'ʋ saŋŋa ba, k'ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ ʋ, bala, sinnyɛɛm bɩ lʋsarɛ cibsa m. A lʋ b'a banka,
66019008	ŋ zaa ka ʋ k'an huu fu k'a nɩ yɔm bɩ du a ma, a fu n ta ʋ." Bala, huu fu bɩ, wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ zibəə mɩŋŋɔɔ m.
66019009	Malɛɛka deem n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: A gʋrsɩra ba! Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ bir sinnyɛɛm lʋsarɛ hɔbɩrɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ m. A n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Woso mɩŋŋa leminno m.
66019010	Mɔɔ n kukurə zɛ a taa kʋ m a da ʋ, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Ɩ b'a ka ɩ naa ba y. Ɩ zibəəkɔɔn m mɔɔ m, ɩbɩɩ kan ɩ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra zi bam Yeezuu zuure nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Woso ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ da ʋ, bala, Yeezuu kasɛtɩ bɩ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn gum.
66019011	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ brama yɩ an a gʋ: sisi fu n bɔ, gʋaa k'a da ʋ bɩ tɔ m, gʋaa paan••• sɩrazaa, dʋdɔ an n'a kam, an nɩ zoo bam kan tɩrgabaa kɩ.
66019012	A mɩnyaa bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan sɛwurə kɩ. A mim la bɩ, cinno firgəro gʋta ta ma, n n tɔ k'a deem y'a dɔ bɩ ba a mɛ ma.
66019013	A n huu gʋta kʋ n y'a gɔrmɩ ma ʋ du a ma b'a tɔ m: 'Woso lemim'.
66019014	Brama yarbənno n da sisi furo ʋ, ŋnɩ huu furo kʋ ŋ fu n ta ʋ rɔ du a ma, ŋn'ɩ zure a jɛ ʋ.
66019015	Kargʋ lɛzaa nɩ bɔrɛ a lɛ ʋ k'a tararɔ zɛ m. A y'a sore ŋ ʋ kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ, b'a Woso k'a paŋŋa jire ba ʋ bɩ nɔmaa gʋta lom tara burə gʋɔɔ ra.
66019016	A huu gʋta burə kan a ganda burə kɩ ma, n tɔ gʋrsɩra ba ŋ ma ncɩnaaʋ: 'Cinno wɔɔ Cir, zuubarɔ wɔɔ Zuuba'.
66019017	Mɔɔ malɛɛka deem yɩ, an nɩ jɩnɩm wosogure nɔ ʋ. A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ bɛnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ werm brama yaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr, a a zɛ kʋ ra hɔbɩrɛ gʋta kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
66019018	K'a bʋr a cinno mɛsim sʋ, kan yarbənno lɛɛzannɔ mɛsim kɩ, paŋŋazannɔ mɛsim kɩ, k'a sisiro sim sʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ darɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mɛsim kɩ. K'a gʋɔɔ haay mɛsim sʋ, lɔnnɔ mɛsim kan soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ mɛsim kɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ poorero mɛsim kɩ."
66019019	Bɩ, mɔɔ hɔturma bɩ yɩ, tararɔ cinno kan a yarbənno kɩ n a zɛ kʋ ra k'a yar ba kan gʋaa k'a da sisi b'ʋ bɩ kɩ, a yarbənno kɩ.
66019020	N hɔturma bɩ nyasʋ kan hɔdɔrɛŋʋaarzaa bɩ kɩ. A ɩ hoserlo ba hɔturma bɩ mɩm ʋ bɩ. A ɩ hoserlo ba an bra ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔturma bɩ makra yɩ, ŋn'a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m. N yɩ ŋ hɩɩya haay zar sɛ haarɛ gʋta kʋ kidibir sɛ nɩ bɩŋ ʋ b'ʋ hɩɩya haay mɩsɩr.
66019021	Kargʋ k'a nɩ bɔm gʋaa k'a da sisi ʋ bɩ lɛ ʋ bɩ bɔ ɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, bɛnnɔ haay nɩ ŋ sinno bɩ, an ŋ ka.
66020001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛka deem yɩ an a to brama an nɩ zerm. A n nɩ yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ bɩ lɛ nyɩ m, kan baŋŋa gandaa kɩ a wɔ ʋ.
66020002	A mɩnda gʋta bɩ nyasʋ, mɩm gusire bɩ, n n'a birm minkagʋaarazaa gɛɛ Sʋtaana bɩ, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ, jɩm bɩ, an a sur dɔɔraa tisi minto.
66020003	A n a nyɔɔ an a da yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ b'ʋ, an a lɛ bɩ ta, an a nyɩ da ʋ, an a naasʋ, k'a b'a da ma dʋntɔ, an bra ba tararɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, kʋ dɔɔraa tisi bɩ n ta an a ku. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a a ga m, kʋ n n wɔ saa ma dɔmɩm poore minto.
66020004	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ cirbəəduuro yɩ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ la rɔ wɔɔ, n paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ ka. Mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ mim gʋngʋ ma Yeezuu kasɛtɩ karɛ kan Woso lemim kɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ nyiro yɩ sɔ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n hɔturma bɩ gɛɛ a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ kɩ da ʋ, bɩ ŋ n makra yɩ a tusə ma gɛɛ a wɔ kɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyiro kɩ sɔ. Ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ cirbəə bɩ dɔɔraa tisi nɔ ʋ kan Krista kɩ.
66020005	Gəəno gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ b'a bɔrɛ ŋnɩ bʋr mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ kʋ dɔɔraa tisi bɩ n a ku y. Lɛɛkarɛ mɩmbɔʋrɛ m bɩ.
66020006	Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛkarɛ mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m, wosogʋɔɔ m sɔ. Zɛ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ paŋŋa ba ŋ zi y. Ŋ nyɩntam Woso kan Krista kɩ mannɩbənno. Ŋ cirbəə bɩm kan kɩ dɔɔraa tisi bɩ nɔ ʋ.
66020007	Kʋ dɔɔraa tisi b'a ku, n Sʋtaana bɔrɛ a dujɩ ʋ b'ʋ.
66020008	Bɩ, a tarɛ an aa bra ba tararɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya gʋrga siro wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, Gɔg kan Magɔg kɩ m. A yɩ ŋ som kʋ ma yar bɩ barɛ minto. Ŋ lɛ gʋtabaa do m higʋta nyɩntaayaa m.
66020009	Ba ŋ y'a kərgu durnya burə ʋ jilli, ŋnɩ bɩr wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ bɩ ma kan kʋ kʋ Woso a ŋʋa bɩ kɩ ma na. Bɩ, sɛ a to brama, an ŋ bɩ.
66020010	Bɩ, minkagʋaarazaa k'a nɩ bra barɛ ŋ nɩ bɩ, n y'a nyɔɔ, n n a da sɛ haarɛ kʋ kidibir sɛ nɩ bɩŋ ʋ b'ʋ, hɔturma bɩ kan hɔdɔrɛŋʋaarzaa bɩ kɩ zi. Ŋ fɩr yɩm b'ʋ gʋta sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ.
66020011	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ cirbəəduu gʋta yɩ fu, a zaa nɩ nyɩntam la. Brama kan tara kɩ n nyaam a lɛɛ fɩɩgaa.
66020012	Mɔɔ gəəno yɩ sɔ, gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ poorero kɩ, ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm cirbəəduu bɩ lɛ ʋ. N n ciro gʋngʋ, n n a ya, n nɩ ci vanta gʋ: mɩsɩrbaa ci bɩ. N n gəəno wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar an a gakʋ ʋ ba kan ŋ zibəəro kɩ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba ciro wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
66020013	Higʋta, zɛ kan gəənokʋ kɩ a gəəno bɔ a rɛ. Ŋ gʋaa biyəə dʋdɔ ka an a gakʋ ʋ ba kan a zibəə kɩ.
66020014	Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, n zɛ kan gəənokʋ kɩ nyɔɔta n nɩ ŋ da sɛ haarɛ b'ʋ. Sɛ haarɛ bɩ do m zɛ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ.
66020015	Gʋaa kʋ n n'a tɔ yɩ mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ bɩ, bɩ n y'a nyɔɔta, n n a da sɛ haarɛ b'ʋ.
66021001	Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ brama daa yɩ kan tara daa kɩ. Bala, lɛɛkarɛ brama bɩ kan lɛɛkarɛ tara bɩ kɩ nyaam, bɩ higʋta bɩ ba ʋ dɔ y.
66021002	Mɔɔ kʋ mɩŋŋa bɩ yɩ, Zerizalɛm daa bɩ. Mɔɔ yɩ, an a to brama Woso zi an nɩ zerm. A n a banka am lʋ daa k'a gar ba a zim minto bɩ hɔ bɩ m.
66021003	Mɔɔ leer paŋŋazaa ma an a to cirbəəduu bɩ zeezi, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ba Woso a har cɩnta gʋɔɔ bireyaa ʋ na. A gɔɔtam kan ŋ kɩ. Ŋ nyɩntarɛ a gʋɔɔ, a mɩŋŋa n nyɩnta ŋ Woso, an bɩr kan ŋ kɩ.
66021004	A yɩ ŋ nyifeer do haay gʋngʋm ma. Zɛ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y. Heerzar bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ kan zee kɩ, fɩr kɩ y. Bala, durnya gusire bɩ cem."
66021005	Bɔ n nɩ nyɩntam cirbəəduu ra bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Kɛɛrɛ naa hɔ haay daarɔ mɔɔ n nɩ ŋ bam." A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "A gʋrsɩra ba: Meerbaa paan•••rɔ m nawɔnnɔ, n a ga m, n ŋ si sɩra m sɔ."
66021006	A n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ haay nya. Mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa. Mɔɔ n'a sɩŋŋɩda, mɔɔ n'a nyarɛ. Gʋaa kʋ mɩsɩ n'a zɛrɛ, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa himinyaa hi kaŋ ʋ, an a mi vam.
66021007	Damazaa bɩ ganwʋrɛ naa do yɩm, mɔɔ nyɩntarɛ a Woso, a m nyɩnta mɔɔ nyɩ.
66021008	Kʋ nyibəəzannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, sɩrakarɛwarzannɔ wɔɔ, dintinzannɔ wɔɔ, gərzenno wɔɔ, jaandənno, nyɩsɩzannɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ wosoro bawɔnnɔ daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kan ŋʋaarzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, ŋ hɔjirlehɔ ɩ sɛ haarɛ kan kidibir sɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ. Zɛ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ m bɩ."
66021009	Malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ laaga saanhɩnarɔ kʋ kʋsɩ jɛzannɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ a hɩnhan rɔ wɔɔ deem bʋr, an b'a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr kʋ m lʋdaa k'a m sinnyɛɛm bɩ lʋ bɩ hɩnka ɩ m."
66021010	Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer mɔɔ ra, malɛɛka bɩ n mɔɔ gaa an ta mɔɔ m ci gandaa k'a nɩ mim ʋ nɩʋʋ••• b'ʋ, an kʋ mɩŋŋa Zerizalɛm, k'a a to Woso zi brama an nɩ zerm bɩ hɩnka mɔɔ m.
66021011	A n nɩ yɔm Woso mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. A yɔrɛ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan jaa tɔzaa yɔrɛ kɩ, an nɩ yɔrɛ ɩ ʋ jaa kʋ n n'a birm zaspɩ bɩ m.
66021012	A pəŋŋə bɩ nyɩnta jintə brama, a dəu n ta ʋ. A lɛrɔ bueerehɩɩya. Malɛɛka bueerehɩɩyɔɔ nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma. N n Israyɛl paryaa bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ bɩmba cɛlɛrɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ma.
66021013	Dɔjɩr ʋ cɛlɛ kaakʋ, meer ʋ cɛlɛ kaakʋ, jɩsadɔpaasɩ ma cɛlɛ kaakʋ bɩsɩdɔpaasɩ ma cɛlɛ kaakʋ.
66021014	Kʋ bɩ pəŋŋə bɩ jɩr jaa bueerehɩɩya, n sinnyɛɛm bɩ zibəəzannɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ gʋrsɩra bɩmba jaarɔ wɔɔ ma.
66021015	Malɛɛka k'a nɩ meer bam kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ nɩ makra ba hɔ m a wɔ ʋ, sarma bənkə m, k'a kʋ bɩ kan a cɛlɛrɔ, a pəŋŋəro kɩ makra ba m.
66021016	Kʋnɔ bɩ pəŋŋə bɩ gʋrga si, b'a jintəbaa kan a hɛ kɩ hɔdeem. Malɛɛka bɩ kʋ bɩ makra ba a bənkə bɩ m. A jintəbaa bɩ cilomɛtɩr tisi hɩɩya kan a zɔɔhɩra kɩ. A hɛ kan a jintəbaa burə kɩ hɔdeem sɔ.
66021017	Malɛɛka bɩ n pəŋŋə bɩ makra ba. A jintəbaa burə bɩ mɛtɩr busaanhɩna a yaa hɩɩya. Makra bɩ ba a ʋ gʋɔɔ makra barɛ m.
66021018	Pəŋŋə bɩ dɔ n y'a ʋ jaa kʋ n n'a birm zaspɩ bɩ m. Kʋ bɩ mɩŋŋa dɔ n y'a ʋ sarma paan••• m, an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ jaa pɛkʋ-pɛkʋda fɩrr••• m.
66021019	Kʋnɔ bɩ pəŋŋə bɩ jɩr banka n y'a ʋ jaa tɔzaa do haay m. A jɩr bɩ lɛɛkarɛ jaa bɩ, zaspɩ m, a hɩɩya hɔ bɩ, safɩɩr, a kaakʋ hɔ bɩ, agatɩ, a si hɔ bɩ, emerodɩ,
66021020	a soor hɔ bɩ, oniksi, a sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ, sardʋannɩ, a saanhɩna hɔ bɩ, krizolitɩ, a sinnyə hɔ bɩ, beril, a nɛɛhʋ hɔ bɩ, topaazɩ, a bu hɔ bɩ, krizopraazɩ, a bueeredeem hɔ bɩ, tɩrkʋaazɩ, a bueerehɩɩya hɔ bɩ, ametistɩ m.
66021021	Cɛlɛ bueerehɩɩya rɔ wɔɔ nyɛɛnyaa bueerehɩɩyɔɔ m. Cɛlɛ biyəə bɩ ba n y'a ʋ nyɛɛnyaa deem m. Kʋ bɩ bire ma bɩ, sarma n y'a wʋta ra, an nɩ yɔrɛ am jaa pɛkʋ-pɛkʋda hɔ bɩ m.
66021022	Mɔɔ n Wosocɛ yɩ kʋ bɩ do nɔ ʋ fɩɩga y, bala, a Wosocɛ bɩ m Zuuba Woso k'a paŋŋa jire ba ʋ bɩ m, kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ m.
66021023	Kʋ bɩ bɩr a kam wosogure ma, a bɩr a kam mom gure ma sɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ gu a nɩ y. Bala, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ nɩ guŋ ʋ, a sinnyɛɛm bɩ m fɩtɩrɛ.
66021024	Tararɔ tarɛ a lɛɛgure bɩ nɔ ʋ, durnya cinno zɛrɛ a arzakarɔ m.
66021025	N bɩ kʋ bɩ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ tɩntam sinuu ʋ fɩɩga y, bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ gunuu bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y.
66021026	N zɛm tararɔ arzaka m kan a daʋrɛ kɩ m kʋ b'ʋ.
66021027	Bɩ dintim sɩ bɩ gasʋm kʋ bɩ do ʋ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dintim zi bam kan ŋʋaar kɩ rɔ wɔɔ bɩ gasʋŋ ʋ sɔ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ tɔ gʋrsɩra ba sinnyɛɛm bɩ mɩsɩrbaa ci ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ bala n nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ bala.
66022001	Malɛɛka b'a ya, an mɩsɩrbaa kɔyaa hi hɩnka mɔɔ m, an nɩ yɔm am jaa kristal hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ bɔm Woso cirbəəduu kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ bɩncɛ ʋ.
66022002	Hi bɩ nɩ bram kʋ bɩ bire ʋ. Kɔyaa bɩ gəm biyəə ra bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa gɔ nɩ b'ʋ, an nɩ nyɩ dam gallɛm bueerehɩɩya dɔɔraa deem nɔ ʋ. Mom biyəə, a ɩ nyɩ dam. A lɛɛ bɩ, yaaba nyɩsɩ m tararɔ minto.
66022003	Ler kʋsɩ bɔrɛ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y. Woso kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ cirbəəduu nyɩntam kʋ b'ʋ, a zibəənyɩnɔ y'a daŋ ʋ.
66022004	Ŋ y'a meer yɩrɛ, bɩ, a tɔ nyɩntarɛ ŋ tusə ma.
66022005	Gunuu bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y. Gɔsɩ b'a kam fɩtɩrɛ lɛɛgure ma gɛɛ woso gure ma dɔ y. Bala, Zuuba Woso y'a lɛɛgure kərgure ŋ la. Bɩ ŋ cirbəə bɩm dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ.
66022006	Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Meerbaarɔ paan•••rɔ n'awɔɔ m, n a ga m, n ŋ si sɩra m sɔ. Woso k'a m Zuuba, k'a n'a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ hɔɔn gum Sɛnt-Ɛspri m bɩ, a malɛɛka nyɔɔ k'an hɔ k'a nɩ zɛrɛ an a zɔ bɩ hɩnka a zibəənyɩnɔ m."
66022007	Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zɛm dɩɩtaa. Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ ci naa do meerbaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso hɔɔnhɔ hɩnkam sim an nɩ zuŋ ʋ bɩ m."
66022008	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma, m ŋ yɩ sɔ. Kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma, m ŋ yɩ sɔ bɩ, mɔɔ kukurə zɛ malɛɛka k'an ŋ hɩnka mɔɔ m bɩ taa.
66022009	Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'a ka ɩ naa ba y. Ɩ zibəəkɔɔn n mɔɔ m kan ɩbɩɩ danyɩnɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ci naa do meerbaarɔ sim ŋn'ɩ zuŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Woso ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m ɩ da ʋ."
66022010	A n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ ci naa do wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaarɔ to ɩ nɔ ʋ y, bala, dɔmɩm b'a zɔ.
66022011	Kʋ gʋaa bʋnyaa n gɔɔta an bɩr a bʋnyaa bam, kʋ dintinzaa n gɔɔta, an bɩr a dintim zi bam. Kʋ sɩrazaa n gɔɔta an bɩr a sɩra ra, kʋ gʋaa mɩŋŋa n bɩr a mɩŋŋabaa dam la."
66022012	"K'a tʋr ka, mɔɔ zɛm dɩɩtaa. Bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ zɛrɛ m ganwʋrɛ m, m n'a kam gʋaa biyəə ʋ, amba a a ga a zibəə m.
66022013	Mɔɔ m Alfa, mɔɔ m Omega. Mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa. Mɔɔ n'a sɩŋŋɩda, mɔɔ n'a nyarɛ."
66022014	Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a huuro sʋrgɔm k'a b'a da ma a zaa yɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa gɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ, k'a b'a da ma, a gasʋ kʋ b'ʋ a cɛlɛrɔ rɔ wɔɔ m.
66022015	Bɩ jino, wɔkunno kan jaandənno kɩ, gerzenno kan wosoro ba a wɔ m nɔ daʋrɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan gʋaa k'a ŋʋaar ŋʋa gɛɛ an n'a zi bam bɩ kɩ, brɔɔ haay gɔɔtam garga ra.
66022016	"Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, Yeezuu, m malɛɛka bɩ nyɔɔ mɔɔ ʋ k'an bɩ kasɛtɩ naa do ka mɔɔ gʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Davɩd yaŋŋa m mɔɔ m. Dɔgta Monyaa k'a nɩ yɔm bɩ m mɔɔ m."
66022017	Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan lʋdaa bɩ kɩ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bʋr!" Kʋ gʋaa k'a n'a mam bɩ na hɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋr!" Kʋ gʋaa kʋ mɩsɩ n'a zɛm bɩ n bʋr! Kʋ gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa mɩsɩrbaa hi ma bɩ n a yɩ vam!
66022018	Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan, awɔɔ haay k'a n'a tʋr kam wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ma ci naa do nɔ ʋ bɩ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa hɔ zu hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ bɩ ra, Woso kʋsɩrɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ gaa da ci naa do nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zure a zaa m la.
66022019	Bɩ kʋ gʋaa hɔ bɔ hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ ci naa do nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, Woso mɩsɩrbaa gɔ bɩ, kan kʋ mɩŋŋa kʋ n yɩ ŋ hɩnka ci naa do ʋ kɩ bɩ, hɔjirle k'a zaa n n'a yɩm bɩ yɔm nɩ.
66022020	Gʋaa k'a nɩ naa haay kasɛtɩ kam bɩ n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Denter m, Mɔɔ zɛm dɩɩtaa." Amina, Zuuba Yeezuu, bʋr!
66022021	Kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu barka n nyɩnta awɔɔ haay mim ʋ.
